<html><head><meta charset="UTF-8"></head><table style="width:100%" border="1"><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ sarvathāsarvahatāndhakāraḥ saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāra /<br/> tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmyabhidharmakośam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgya gar skad du / aa bhi dharmma ko sham bh'a shyam / bod skad du / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo / gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing / 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa / don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya śāsturmāhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāramārabhate ya iti /<br/> buddhaṃ bhagavantamadhikṛtyāha hatamasyāndhakāramanena veti hatāndhakāraḥ /<br/> sarveṇa prakāreṇa sarvasmin hatāndhakāraḥ sarvathāsarvahatāndhakāraḥ /<br/> ajñānaṃ hi bhūtārthadarśanapratibandhādhakāram /<br/> tacca bhagavato buddhasya pratipakṣalābhenātyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra jñeye punaranutpattidharmatvāddhatam /<br/> ato 'sau sarvathāsarvahatāndhakāraḥ /<br/> pratyaikabuddhaśrāvakā api kāmaṃ sarvatra hatāndhakārāḥ /<br/> kliṣṭasaṃmohātyantavigamāt /<br/> na tu sarvathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya / bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag 'tshal ba rtsom mo / gang zhig ces bya ba ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du byas nas smras pa'o / 'di'i 'am 'dis mun pa bcom bas mun pa bcom pa'o / thams cad la mun pa rnam pa thams cad du bcom pas kun la mun pa gtan bcom pa'o / mi shes pa ni yang dag pa'i don mthong ba la bgegs su gyur pa'i phyir mun pa ste / de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyen po brnyes nas shes bya thams cad la phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur pa'i phyir gtan nas ye bcom pa ste / de'i phyir 'di'i ni kun la mun pa gtan bcom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatha hyeṣāṃ buddhadharmeṣvativiprakṛṣṭadeśakāleṣu artheṣu cānantaprabhedeṣu bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānam /<br/> ityātmahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstutya punastameva bhagavantaṃ parahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstauti saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāreti /<br/> saṃsāro hi jagadāsaṅgasthānatvāt duruttaratvācca paṅkabhūtaḥ /<br/> tatrāvamagnaṃ jagadatrāṇamanukampamāno bhagavān saddharmadeśanāhastapradānairyathābhavyamabhyuddhṛtavān iti ya evamātmaparahitapratipattisaṃpadā yuktastasmai namaskṛtyeti śirasā praṇipatya /<br/> yathārthamaviparītaṃ śāstīti yathārthaśāstā /<br/> anena parahitapratipattyupāyamasyāviṣkaroti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyang nyon mongs pa can gyi rmongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir kun la mun pa bcom par ni 'dod mod kyi gtan nas ni ma yin te 'di ltar de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yul dang dus shin tu bskal pa dang don rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa yod pa nyid do / de ltar bdag la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pas yang dag par bstod nas / yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pas yang dag par bstod pa ni / 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa / zhes bya ba ste / 'khor ba ni 'gro ba kun tu chags pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang brgal bar dka' ba'i phyir 'dam lta bu yin te / 'gro ba der bying ba skyabs med pa la bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos ston pa'i phyag brkyang ba dag gis skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du drangs so / don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas na don bzhin ston pa'o / 'dis ni 'di'i gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa'i thabs ston te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathābhūtaśāsanācchāstā bhavanntasau saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāra na tvṛddhivarapradānaprabhāveṇeti /<br/> tasmai namaskṛtya kiṃ kariṣyāmī tyāha śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi /<br/> śiṣyaśāsanācchāstram /<br/> katamacchāstramityāha abhidharmakośam /<br/> ko 'yamabhidharmo nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni ston pa na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs kyi rdzu 'phrul dang dam pa sbyin pa'i mthus ni ma yin no / de ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba ni mgos btud nas so don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas ci zhig bya zhe na / bstan bcos rab bshad bya zhes bya ba smos te / slob ma 'chos pas na bstan bcos so / bstan bcos gang zhe na / chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba smos so / chos mngon pa zhes bya ba 'di gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñā 'malā sānucarā 'bhidharmaḥ  prajñā dharmapravicayaḥ /<br/> amaleti anāsravā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas / zhes bya ba ste / de la shes rab ces bya ba ni / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o / dri med ces bya ba ni gang zag pa med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sānucareti saparivārā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes 'brang bcas zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang bcas pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanāsravaḥ pañcaskandhako 'bhidharma ityuktaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga po la chos mngon pa zhes bstan par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa tāvat pāramārthiko 'bhidharmaḥ /<br/> sāṃketikastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de zhig 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mngon pa'o / brdar btags pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatprāptaye yāpi ca yacca śāstram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de thob bya'i phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāpi ca śrutacintābhāvanāmayī sāsravā prajñā upapattipratilambhikā ca sānucarā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dang zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab gang zag pa dang bcas pa dang skyes nas thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca śāstramasyāḥ prāptyarthamanāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ tadapi tatsaṃbhārabhāvādabhidharma ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos gang zhes bya ba ni de yang zag pa med pa'i shes rab thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshogs su gyur pas chos mngon pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvacanaṃ tu svalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa'i tshig tu rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadayaṃ paramārthadharmaṃ vā nirvāṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyabhimukho dharma ityabhidharmaḥ /<br/> ukto 'bhidharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa 'am / chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir chos mngon pa'o / chos mngon pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tu śāstraṃ kathamabhidharmakośam /<br/> tasyārthato 'smin samanupraveśāt /<br/> sa cāśrayo syetyabhidharmakośam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos 'di ji ltar na chos mngon pa'i mdzod yin zhe na / 'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram / 'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi śāstrasaṃjñako 'bhidharma etasminnarthato yathāpradhānamantarbhūta ityetacchāstraṃ tasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati /<br/> athavā so 'bhidharma etasyāśrayabhūtaḥ śāstrasya /<br/> tato hyetannirākṛṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya ba de ji ltar gces gces rnams don du 'dir chud de / de lta bas na bstan bcos 'di ni de'i mdzod lta bu yin no / yang na de las 'di phyung bas chos mngon pa de bstan bcos 'di'i gnas lta bu yin no / de'i phyir chos mngon pa de nyid 'di'i mdzod yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ sa evāsyābhidharmaḥ kośa ityetacchāstramabhidharvarmakośam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bstan bcos 'di ni chos mngon pa'i mdzod yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthaṃ punarabhidharmopadeśaḥ kena cāyaṃ prathamata upadiṣṭo yaṭa ācāryo 'bhidharmakośaṃ vaktumādriyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir chos mngon pa bstan / 'di dang po nyid du sus bstan na / 'di ltar slob dpon chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'chad par gus she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āha /<br/> dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos rnams rab tu rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams / gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho 'dir 'khyams te / de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo / zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yato na vinā dharmapravicayenāsti kleśopaśamābhyupāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed pa med par nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśāśca lokaṃ bhramayanti saṃsāramahārṇeve 'sminan /<br/> atastaddhetostasya dharmapravicayasyārthe śāstrā kila buddhenābhidharma uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po 'dir 'khyam par byed pa de'i phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'dod pa de'i don du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mngon pa gsungs so lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi vinā 'bhidharmopadeśena śiṣyaḥ śakto dharmān pravicetumiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa bstan pa med par ni slob mas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed par mi nus so / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sil bur bshad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa tu prakīrṇa ukto bhagavatā bhadantakātyāyanīputraprabhṛtibhiḥ piṇḍīkṛtya sthapitobhadanta dharmatrāto dānavargīyakaraṇavadityāhurvaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> katame punaste dharmā yeṣāṃ pravicayārthamabhidharmopadeśa ityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa k'a ty'a'i bu la sogs pas bsdus nas bzhag ste / btsun pa chos skyob kyis ched du brjod pa'i sde / sde tshan du byas pa bzhin no zhes zer ro / gang dag chos mngon pa bstan pas rab tu rnam par dbye par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravā 'nāsravā dharmāḥ  sarvadharmāṇāṃ samāsanirddeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams / zhes bya ba smos te / 'di ni chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra katame sāsravā dharmā ityāha /<br/> saṃskṛtā mārgavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas rnams / zag bcas zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravāḥ  varjayitvā 'nye saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa 'dus byas kyi chos gzhan rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag go / ci'i phyir zhe na / gang phyir de dag la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsravāsteṣu yasmāt samanuśerate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur / zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmaṃ nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyante na tinuśerate tatreti na tayoḥ sāsravatvaprasañgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa la dmigs pas kyang zag pa skye bar ni 'dod mod kyi / de gnyis la rgyas par mi 'gyur bas de gnyis zag pa dang bcas pa nyid du thal ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'tra nānuśerate tat paścādanuśayanirdeśa eva jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> uktāḥ sāsravāḥ /<br/> anasravāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar rgyas par mi 'gyur ba de ni 'og nas phra rgyas bstan pa nyid du bstan par bya'o / zag pa dang bcas pa dag bshad zin to / zag pa med pa rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravā mārgasatyaṃ trividhaṃ cāpyasaṃskṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med lam gyi bden pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste / zhes bya ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamattri vidham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam gsum gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca  dvau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis / zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis gang zhe na / so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetadākāśādi trividhamasaṃskṛtaṃ mārgasatyaṃ cānāsravā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po de dang lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> nahi teṣvāsravā anuśerata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la zag pa rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadetat trividhamasaṃskṛtamuddiṣṭam /<br/> tatrākāśamanāvṛtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po bstan pa gang yin pa de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāvaraṇasvabhāvamākāśaṃ yatra rūpasya gatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' ni sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin te gang na gzugs kyi go yod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyogaḥ  sāsravairdharmairvisaṃyogaḥ sa pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang bral ba'o / gang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang bral ba de ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā prajñāviśeṣastena prāpyo nirodhaḥ /<br/> pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ni so sor brtags pa ste shes rab kyi bye brag go / des thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhyapadalopāt gorathavat /<br/> kiṃ punareka eva sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> pṛthak pṛthak
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar gyi tshig mi mngon par bya ba ste / dper na ba lang dag dang ldan pa'i shing rta la ba lang gi shing rta zhes bya ba lta bu'o / ci zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gcig kho na 'am zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvanti hi saṃyogadravyāṇi tāvanti visaṃyogadravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so so so yin / ldan pa'i rdzas rnams ji snyed pa bral ba'i rdzas rnams kyang de snyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi duḥkhadarśanaheyakleśanirodhasākṣātk karaṇāt sarvakleśanirodhasākṣātkriyā prasajyeta /<br/> sati caivaṃ śeṣapratipakṣabhāvanāvaiyarthyaṃ syāt /<br/> yattarhyuktam asabhāgonirodha ityasya ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> nāsya kaścit sabhāgaheturasti nāsau kasyacidityayamasya vākyasyārtho na tu nāsya kaśicat sabhāgo 'stīti /<br/> uktaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'gog pa mngon sum du byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gos pa mngon sum du byed par thal bar 'gyur ro / de lta ma yin na lhag ma'i gnyen po bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro / 'o na 'gog pa ni 'dra ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin zhe na / tshig de'i don ni 'di 'dra ba'i rgyu gang yang ma yin la / 'di yang gang gi 'dra ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no zhes bya'o / 'di la 'dra ba gang yang med do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no / so sor brtags pas 'gog pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpādātyantavighno 'nyo nirodho 'pratisaṃkhyayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye la gtan du bgegs byed pa / 'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādasyātyantaṃ vighnabhūto visaṃyogād yo 'nyo nirodhaḥ so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /<br/> na hyasau pratisaṃkhyayā labhyate /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> pratyayavaikalyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos ma 'ongs pa rnams skye ba la gtan du bgegs su gyur pa bral ba las gzhan pa'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste / 'di so sor brtags pas 'thob pa ni ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / rkyen ma tshang ba las thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaikarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanaso yāni rūpāṇi śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cātyayante tadālambanaiḥ pañcabhirvijñānakāyairna śakyaṃ punarutpattum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mig dang yid gzugs gcig la yengs pa'i gzugs gzhan pa rnams dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya gang yin pa dag ni 'das par 'gyur la / de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni yang skye bar yang mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi te satyā atītaṃ viṣayamālambayi tulmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag 'das pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ sa teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ pratyayavaikalyāt prāpyate /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaṃ cātra bhavati /<br/> santi te dharmā yeṣāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodha eva labhyate /<br/> tadyathā atitapratyutpannotpattidharmāṇāṃ sāsravāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de dag gi so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa de ni rkyen ma tshang bas 'thob bo / 'dir mu bzhir 'gyur te / gang dag gis so sor brtags pas 'gog pha kho na 'thob pa'i chos de dag kyang yod de / 'di lta ste / zag pa dang bcas pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santi yeṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodha eva /<br/> tadyathā 'nutpattidharmāṇāmanāsravasaṃskṛtānām /<br/> santi te yesāmubhayam /<br/> tadyathā sāsravāṇāmanutpasttidharmāṇām /<br/> santi yeṣāṃ nobhayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gis so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa kho na 'thob pa yang yod de / 'di lta ste / zag pa med pa'i 'dus byas mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o / gang dag gis gnyi ga 'thob pa yang yod de / 'di lta ste / zag pa dang bcas pa mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o / gang dag gis gnyi ga mi 'thob pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā atītapratyutpannotpattidharmāṇāmaṇāsravāṇāmiti /<br/> uktaṃ trividhamasaṃskṛtam /<br/> yattūktaṃ saṃskṛtā mārgavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / zag pa med pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o / 'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum bshad zin to / lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravā iti katame te saṃskṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag bcas zhes gang smras pa'i 'dus byas de dag gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punaḥ saṃskṛtā dhārmā rūpādiskandhapañcakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang / gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaścetyete saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi phung po dang tshor ba'i phung po dang 'du shes kyi phung po dang 'du byed kyi phung po dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sametya saṃbhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtāḥ iti saṃskṛtāḥ /<br/> nahyekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidastīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen rnams 'dus shing phrad nas byas pa dag na 'dus byas rnams te / rkyen gcig gis bskyed pa ni 'ga' yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tajjātīyatvādanāgateṣvavirodho dugdhendhanavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa dag la yang mi 'gal te 'o ma dang shing bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta evādhvā kathāvastu saniḥsārāḥ savastukāḥ /<br/> ta eva saṃskṛtā gatagacchadgamiṣyadbhāvādadhvānaḥ adyante 'nitayatyeti vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang / nges par 'byung ba gzhi dang bcas / de dag nyid ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so / song ba dang 'gro ba dang 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram / mi rtag pa nyid kyis za ba'i phyir dus rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathā vāvāyam tasyā vastu nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtam ni ngag go / de'i gzhi ni ming ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sārthakavastugrahaṇāt tu saṃskṛntaṃ kathāvastūcyate /<br/> anyathā hi urakaraṇagrantho virudhyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don dang bcas pa'i gzhi smos pa'i phyir na 'dus byas ni gtam gyi gzhi zhes bya'o / de lta ma yin na rab tu byed pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathāvastūnyaṣṭādaśabhirdhatubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtam gyi gzhi rnams ni khams bco brgyad kyis bsdus so zhes 'byung ba'i gzhung dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niḥsaraṇaṃ niḥsāraḥ sarvasya saṃskṛtasya nirvāṇam /<br/> tadeṣāmastīti saniḥsārāḥ /<br/> sahetukatvāt savastukāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gdon mi za bar 'byung ba ni nges par 'byung ba ste / 'dus byas thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o / de 'di dag la yod pas nges par 'byung bcas dag go / rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhi dang bcas pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetuvacanaḥ kila vastuśabda iti vaibhāṣicāḥ /<br/> ityete saṃskṛtadharmauaryāyāḥ /<br/> ta eva puyaḥ saṃskṛtā dharamāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzhi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rgyu'i tshig yin lo / de ltar na de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dag yin no / yang 'dus byas de dag nyid / gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye sāsravā upādānaskandhāste  kiṃ diddhaṃ /<br/> ya upādānaskandhāḥ skandhā api te syuḥ eva nopādānaskandhāḥ /<br/> anāsravāḥ saṃskārā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po'ang de dag / 'dis ci zhig grub par 'gyur zhe na / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gang dag yin pa de dag ni phung po yang yin no / phung po dag kho na yin la nye bar len pa'i phung po ma yin pa dag kyang yod de / 'du byed zag pa med pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra upādānāni kleśāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nye bar len pa dag ni nyon mongs pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃbhūtatvādupādānaskandhāḥ /<br/> truṇatupāgnivat /<br/> taddhidheyatvādvā rājapurūpavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las byung ba'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po dag ste / dper na rtsva dang sog ma'i me bzhin pa 'am / de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir rgyal po'i mi bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upādānāni vā tebhyaḥ saṃbhavantīti upādānaskandhāḥ puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat /<br/> ta eva sāsravā dharmā ucyante /<br/> saraṇā api /<br/> raṇsā hi kleśāḥ /<br/> ātmapāravyāvādhanāt /<br/> stadanuśayitatvāt saraṇāḥ /<br/> sāsravavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na de dag las nye bar len pa rnams 'byung bas nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams te / me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa bzhin no / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos de dag nyid / 'thab bcas kyang zhes bya'o / 'thab pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams te / bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa'i phyir ro / de dag gis rgyas par byas pa'i phyir 'thab bcas dag ste zag pa dang bcas pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ /<br/> duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang / lha gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvādduḥkham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samudetyasmād duḥkhamiti samudayaḥ /<br/> lakṣyata iti lokaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di las sdug bsngal kun 'byung bas kun 'byung ba'o / 'jig pas na 'jig rten no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭirasmiṃstiṣṭhatyanuśayanāditi dṛṣṭisthānam /<br/> bhavatīti bhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gnas pas na lta ba'i gnas so / 'byung bas na srid pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete sāsravāṇasaṃ dharmāṇāmānvarthaparyāyāḥ /<br/> pañca rūpādayaḥ skandhā ityuktam /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam grangs don dang mthun pa dag go / gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga / zhes smras pa de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaṃ pañcendriyāṇyarthāḥ pañcāvijñaptireva ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don / lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcendriyāṇi cakṣuḥśtrotragrhāṇajihvākāyendariyā ṇa /<br/> pañcārthāsteṣāmevacakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ ye pañca viṣayāḥ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyāḥ /<br/> avijñaptiśceti /<br/> etāvān rūpaskandhaḥ /<br/> tatra ya ete pañca rūpādayo 'rthā uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po lnga po mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus kyi dbang po rnams dang don lnga po mig la sogs pa rnams de dag nyid kyi yul gang dag yin pa gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ste de snyed cig ni gzugs kyi phung po'o / de la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag smos pa gang dag yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvijñānāśrayā rūpaprasādāścakṣurādayaḥ /<br/> rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyavijñānānāmāśrayabhūtā ye pañca rūpātmakāḥ prasādāste yathākramaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten / mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rten du gyur pa gzugs dang ba'i bdag nyid lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni go rims bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dag yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktaṃ bhagavatā cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpa prasāda iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du dge slong mig ni nang gi skye mched de / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs dang ba'o zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yānyetāni cakṣurādīnyuktani tadvijñānāśrayā rūpaprasādāścakṣurādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na mig la sogs pa 'di dag smos pa gang dag yin pa / de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten / mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurvijñānādyāśrayā ityarthaḥ /<br/> evaṃ kṛtvā prakaraṇagraṇtho 'pyanuvṛtto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / de ltar bshad na rab tu byed pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥ katamat /<br/> cakṣurvijñānāśrayo rūpaprasāda iti vistaraḥ /<br/> nirddiṣṭāni pañcendriyāṇi /<br/> arthāḥ pañcā nirddeśyāḥ /<br/> tatra tāvat] /<br/> rūpaṃ dvidhā /<br/> varṇaḥ saṃsthānaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi dbang po gang zhe na / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang ba'o zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'i gzhung dang yang mthun par 'gyur ro / dbang po lnga dag bshad zin to / don lnga bshad par bya ste / de la re zhig / gzugs rnam gnyis dang kha dog dang dbyibs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra varṇaścaturvidho nīlādiḥ /<br/> tadbhedā anye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la kha dog ni rnam pa bzhi ste / sngon po la sogs pa'o / gzhan dag ni de'i bye brag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samsthānamaṣṭavidhaṃ dīrghadi visātāntam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbyibs ni rnam pa brgyad de / ring po la sogs pa nas phya le ba ma yin pa la thug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadeva rūpāyatanaṃ punarucyate /<br/> vimśatidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gzugs kyi skye mched de nyid / rnam pa nyi shu zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātaṃ abhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā cchāyā ātapaḥ ālokaḥ andhakāramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ring po dang thung ngu dang lham pa dang zlum po dang mthon po dang dma' ba dang phya le ba dang phya le ba ma yin pa dang sprin dang du ba dang rdul dang khug rna dang grib ma dang nyi ma dang snang ba dang mun pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecinnabhaścaikavarṇamiti ekaviṃśatiṃ saṃpaṭhanti /<br/> tatra sātaṃ samasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni nam mkha' la kha dog gcig dang rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'don to / de la phya le ba ni dbyibs mnyam pa'o / phya le ba ma yin pa ni dbyibs mi mnyam pa'o / khug rna ni lho bur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālokaḥ candratārakāgnyoṣadhimaṇīnaṃ prabhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi ma ni nyi ma'i 'od do / snang ba ni zla ba dang skar ma dang me dang sman dang nor bu rnams kyi 'od dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chāyā yatra rūpāṇāṃ darśanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grib ma ni gang na gzugs rnams snang ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viparyayādandhakāram /<br/> śeṣaṃ sugamatvānna vipañcitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las bzlog pa ni mun pa'o / lhag ma ni brda phrad par sla bas rnam par ma phye ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti rūpāyatanaṃ varṇato vidyate na saṃsthānataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi skye mched kha dog tu yod la dbyibs su med pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nīlapītalohitavadātacchāyātapālokāndhakārākhyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang grib ma dang nyi ma dang snang ba dang mun pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti saṃsthānato na varṇataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbyibs su yod la kha dog tu med pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghādīnāṃ pradeṣaḥ kāyavijñaptisvabhāvaḥ /<br/> astyubhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ring po la sogs pa'i phyogs lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi ngo bo nyid do / gnyi gar yod pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pariśiṣṭaṃ rūpāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi skye mched lhag ma'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātapālokāveva varṇato vidyete ityapare /<br/> dṛśyate hi nīlādīnaṃ dīrghādipariccheda iti /<br/> kathaṃ punarekaṃ dravyamubhayathā vidyate /<br/> astyubhayasya tatra prajñānāt /<br/> jñānārtho hyeṣa vidirna sattārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re / sngon po la sogs pa dang ring po la sogs par yongs su chad par snang bas na nyi ma dang snang ba kho na kha dog tu yod do zhes zer ro / ji ltar na rdzas gcig la gnyi gar yod ce na / de la gnyi ga mngon pa'i phyir te / yod pa 'di ni shes pa'i don yin gyi yod pa'i don ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavijñaptāvapi tarhi prasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed la'ang thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi skye mched bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śabdastvaṣṭavidhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāttānupāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ sattvāsattvākhyaśceti caturvidhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa ste rnam pa bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punarmanojñāmanojñabhedādaṣṭavidho bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatropāttamahābhūtahetuko yathā hastavākchabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste / lag pa dang ngag gi sgra lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anupāttamahābhutahetuko yathā vāyuvanaspatinadīśabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste / rlung dang nags tshal dang chu'i sgra lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvākhyo vāgvijñaptiṣabdaḥ /<br/> asattvākhyo 'nyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can du ston pa ni ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra'o / gzhan ni sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāttānupāttamahābhūtahetuko 'pyasti śabda ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyus las byung ba'i sgra yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā hastamṛdaṅgasaṃyogaja iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na lag pa dang rdza rnga phrad pa las skyes pa lta bu'o zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa tu yathaikau varṇaparamāṇurna bhūtacatuṣkadvayamupādāyeṣyate tathā naivaiṣṭavya iti /<br/> uktaḥ śabdaḥ /<br/> rasaḥ /<br/> ṣoḍha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'di ltar kha dog gi rdul phra rab gcig las byung ba bzhi tshan gnyis rgyur byas par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du mi 'dod par bya'o / sgra bshad zin to / ro ni rnam pa drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukatittakaṣāyabhedāt /<br/> caturvidho gandhaḥ /<br/> sugandhadurgandhayoḥ samaviṣamagandhatvāt /<br/> trividhastu śāstre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska ba'i bye brag gis so / dri rnam bzhi / dri zhim pa dang dri nga ba rnam pa gnyis / dri mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sugandho durgandhaḥ samagandha iti /<br/> spṛśyamekādaśātmadkam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las ni dri zhim pa dang dri nga ba dang dri mnyam pa'o zhes rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo / reg bya bcu gcig bdag nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spraṣṭavyamekādaśadravyasvabhāvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg bya rdzas kyi rang bzhin ni bcu gcig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāri mahābhūtāni ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ gurutvaṃ laghutvaṃ śītaṃ jighatsā pipāsā ceti /<br/> tatra bhūtāni paścādvakṣyāmḥ /<br/> ślakṣṇatvaṃ mṛdutā /<br/> karkaśatvaṃ paruṣatā /<br/> gurutvaṃ yena bhāvāstulyante /<br/> laghutvaṃ viparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'jam pa nyid dang rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid dang yang ba nyid dang grang ba dang bkres pa dang skom pa'o / de la 'byung ba rnams ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o / 'jam pa nyid ni mnyen pa'o / rtsub pa nyid ni rud rud pa'o / lci ba nyid ni gang gis na dngos po rnams 'jal bar byed pa'o /  / bzlog pa ni yang ba nyid do / grang ba ni dro bar 'dod par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śītamuṣṇābhilāṣakṛt /<br/> jighatsā bhojanābhilāṣakṛt /<br/> kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /<br/> yathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bkres pa ni zad 'dod par byed pa'o / skom pa ni skom 'dod par byed pa'o / rgyu la 'bras bu brtags pa'i phyir te dper na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhānāṃ sukha utpādaḥ sukhā dharmasya deśanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas rnams na 'byung ba bde / chos bstan pa yang bde pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhā saṅghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṃ tapaḥ sukhaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge 'dun mthun pa bde ba yin / mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra rūpadhātau jighatsāpipāse na staḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes bya ba bzhin no / de la gzugs kyi khams na ni bkres pa dang skom pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣamasti /<br/> yadyapi tatra vastrāṇyekaśo na tulyante sañcitāni punastulyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni yod do / gal te de ni gos re re nas mi 'jal yang bsags pa dag ni 'jal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śītamupaghātakaṃ nāsti /<br/> anugrāhakaṃ kilāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod par byed pa'i grang ba med kyi phan par byed pa ni yod do lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadetadbahuvidhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ tatra kadācidekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang 'di gzugs rnam ba mang po bshad pa de la res 'ga' ni rdzas gcig gis mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed de / gang gi tshe de'i rnam pa bye brag tu gcod par 'gyur ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācid bahubhiryadā na vyavacchedaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni mang pos te / gang gi tshe bye brag tu mi gcod pa na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā senāvyūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ maṇisamūhaṃ ca dūrāt paśyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na thag ring po nas dmag bshams pa 'am / nor bu'i tshogs kyi kha dog dang dbyibs du ma la lta ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ śrotrādivijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavijñānaṃ tu paraṃ pañcabhiḥ spraṣṭavyairutpadyata ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig na re shin tu mang na 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhirmahābhūtairekena ca ślakṣṇatvādinā /<br/> sarvairekādaśabhirityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jam pa nyid la sogs pa gcig dang reg bya lngas skyed do zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re bcu gcig po thams cad kyis kyang skyed do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu caivaṃ samastālambanatvāt sāmānyaviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ prāpnuvanti na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na spyi la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag spyi'i yul can du 'gyur gyi / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante na dravyasvalakṣaṇamityadoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni skye mched kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'dod kyi / rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ni ma yin pas nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ vicāryate /<br/> kāyajihvendriyayoryugapad viṣayaprāptau satyāṃ katarad vijñānaṃ pūrvamutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dpyad par bya ste / lus dang lce'i dbang po gnyis cig car du yul dang phrad na rnam par shes pa gang sngar skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya viṣayaḥ paṭīyān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi yul shas che ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samaprāpte tu viṣaye jihvāvijñānaṃ pūrvamutpadyate /<br/> bhoktukāmatāvarjitatvātsasntateḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul mnyam pa dang phrad na ni lce'i rnam par shes pa sngar skye ste / za bar 'dod pas rgyud gtad pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktāḥ pañācendriyārthāḥ yathā ca teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ /<br/> avijñaptiridānīṃ vaktavyā /<br/> seyamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po lnga dang don lnga dang de dag la ji ltar 'dzin pa yang bshad zin to / da ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bsnyad par bya ba de brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vikṣiptācittakasyāpi yo 'nubaṇdhaḥ śubhāśubhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">g yengs dang sems med pa yi yang / dge dang mi dge'i rjes 'brel gang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahābhūtānyupādāya sa hyavijñaptirucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa / de ni rnam rig byed min brjod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vikṣiptacittakasyeti tadanyacittasyāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems gyengs pa zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i sems kyi yang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">acittakasyāpītyasaṃjñinirodhasamāpattisamāpannasyāpi /<br/> apiśabdenāvikṣiptasacittasyāpīti vijñāyate /<br/> yo 'nu bandha iti yaḥ pravāhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems med pa'i yang zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yang yin pa'o / yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma gyengs pa sems dang bcas pa'i yang yin no zhes bya bar mngon no / dge dang mi dge zhes bya ba ni dge legs dang dge legs ma yin ba'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhāśubha iti kuśalākuśalaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes 'brel gang zhes bya ba ni rgyun to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalākuśale prāptivāho 'pyastīdṛśa iti tadviśeṣaṇārthamucyate mahābhūtānyupādāyeti /<br/> hetvartha upādāyārtha iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> jananādihetubhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa'i rgyun yang 'di lta bu yod pas bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir / 'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa / zhes bya ba brjod do / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rgyur byas pa'i don ni rgyu'i don to / skyed pa la sogs pa rgyu'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hyavijñaptiriti hiśabdastannāmakaraṇavijñāpanārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rnam rig byed min zhes bya ba la / de ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de'i ming shes par bya ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī vijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñāpayatītyavijñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang byed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par rig byed bzhin du gzhan dag la rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ucyata iti ācāryavacanaṃ darśayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brjed ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyi tshig yin par ston pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāsatastu vijñaptisamādhisaṃbhūtaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ rūpamavijñaptiḥ /<br/> mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktāni katamāni bhūtāni /<br/> bhūtāni pṛthivīdhāturaptejovāyudhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor na rnam par rig byed dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i gzugs dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o / 'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa / zhes smras pa de dag gang zhe na / 'byung ba dag ni sa'i khams dang / chu dang me dang rlung gi khams rnams zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete catvāraḥ svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇād dhātavaścatvāri mahābhūtāny ucyante /<br/> mahattvameṣāṃ sarvānyarūpāśrayatvenaudārikatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi po de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i phyir khams dag go / 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gzugs gzhan thams cad kyi rten nyid du rigs pa'i phyir na chen po nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha vā tadudbhūtavṛttiṣu pṛthivyaptejovāyuskandheṣveṣāṃ mahāsṇniveśatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi phung po de dag bya ba la shas che ba de dag la de rnams chen por gnas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punahete dhātavaḥ kasmin karmaṇi saṃsidhāḥ kiṃsvabhāvāścetyāha /<br/> dhṛtyādikarmasaṃsiddhāḥ /<br/> dhṛtisaṃgrahapaktivyūhanakarmasvete yathākramaṃ saṃsiddhāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang khams de dag gi las ni gang du yang dag par 'grub / rang bzhin ni ci zhe na / 'dzin pa la sogs las su grub / ces bya ba smos te / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du 'dzin pa dang sdud pa dang smin par byed pa dang rgyas par byed pa'i las dag tu grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyūhanaṃ punarvṛddhiḥ prasarpaṇaṃ ca veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyas par byed pa ni 'phel ba dang rgyas par byed par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idameṣāṃ karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni de dag gi las yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvastu yathākramaṃ /<br/> kharasnehosṇateraṇāḥ /<br/> kharaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /<br/> sneho 'bdhātuḥ /<br/> uṣṇatā tejodhātuḥ /<br/> īraṇā vāyudhātuḥ /<br/> īryate 'nayā bhūtasroto deśāntarotpādanāt pradīperaṇavaditīraṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin ni go rims bzhin du / sra gsher dro nyid gyo ba rnams te / sra ba ni sa'i khams so / gsher ba ni chu'i khams so / dro ba ni me'i khams so / g yo ba ni rlung gi khams so / 'dis 'byung ba'i rgyun yul gzhan du skyed ba'i phyir gyo bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyudhātuḥ katamo laghusamudīraṇatvam iti prakāraṇeṣu nirdiṣṭaṃ sūtre ca /<br/> tattu laghutvamupādāya rūpamapyuktaṃ prakaraṇeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgron ma gyo ba bzhin du gyo bar byed pa yin no / rab tu byed pa dag dang mdo sde las rlung gi khams gang zhe na / yang ba nyid do zhes gsungs la / rab tu byed pa dag las / yang ba nyid de rgyur byas pa'i gzugs zhes kyang bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato ya īraṇāsvabhāvo dharmaḥ sa vāyuriti karṃaṇā 'sya svabhāvo 'bhivyaktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir gyo ba'i rang bzhin gyi chos gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams shes pa ste / 'di'i rang bzhin las kyis gsal ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ punaḥ pṛthivyādināṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ ca viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa la sogs pa dang sa'i khams la sogs pa la bye brag ci yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānamucyate lokasaṃjñayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad do / kha dog dbyibs la sa zhes brjod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi pṛthivīṃ darśayanto varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ ca darśayanti /<br/> yathā pṛthivī evaṃ /<br/> āpastejaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar sa ston pa na kha dog dang dbyibs ston par byed do /  / sa la ji lta ba de bzhin du / chu me yang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varṇasaṃsthānamevocyate lokasaṃjñayā /<br/> vāyustu dhātureva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten gyi tha snyad du kha dog dang dbyibs nyid la brjod do / rlung tshogs khams nyid yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eva tu vāyudhātuḥ sa eva loke vāyuarityucyate /<br/> tathapi ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung gi khams gang yin pa de nyid la 'jig rten na rlung zhes 'dogs so / de dang 'dra ba'ang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānamucyate lokasaṃjñayā tatha vāyuarapi /<br/> nīlikā vātyā maṇḍalikā vātyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du kha dog dang dbyibs la sa zhes brjod pa de bzhin du rlung la yang rlung sngon po rlung zlum po'o zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt punarayamavijñaptiparyanto rūpaskandha ityucyate /<br/> raupaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin ba'i par 'di gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya zhe na / gzugs su rung ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ bhagavatā rūpyate rupyata iti bhikṣavastasmādrūpopādānasdandha ityucyate /<br/> kena rupyate /<br/> pāṇisparśenāpi spṛṣṭo rūpyata iti vistaraḥ /<br/> rūpyate bādhyata ityarthaḥ /<br/> tathā hyarthavargīyeṣūktam /<br/> tasya cet kāmayānasya cchandajātasya dehinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gzugs su yod cing gzugs su rung bas / de'i phyir gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o / cis gzugs su rung zhe na / lag pa'i 'dus te reg pas na reg na yang gzugs su rung ngo zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o / gzugs su rung zhes bya ba ni gnod par byar rung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste 'di ltar don gyi sde tshan dag las / gal te 'dod pa tshol byed cing / 'dun pa skyes pa'i lus can te / 'dod pa de dag ma 'byor na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te kāmā na samṛdhyanti śalyaviddha iva rūpyate /<br/> rūpasya punaḥ kā badhanā /<br/> vipariṇāmotpādanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zug rngus zug bzhin gnod par 'gyur / zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / gzugs kyi gnod pa gang zhe na / yongs su 'gyur ba skyed pa'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratighāto rūpeṇetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gzugs su rung ba ni thogs pa'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramāṇurūpaṃ tarhi rūpaṃ na prāpnotyarūpaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni rdul phra rab gzugs ma yin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vai paramāṇurūpamekaṃ pṛthag bhūtamasti /<br/> sañghātasthaṃ tu tad rūpyata eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs su med pa'i phyir ro / rdul phra rab kyi gzugs gcig pu logs shig tu gyur pa ni med pa nyid do / 'dus pa la gnas pa de la ni gzugs su rung ba nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītānāgataṃ tarhi rūpaṃ na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba gzugs ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadapi rūpitaṃ rūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ tajjātīyaṃ ceti rūpamindhanavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang gzugs su yod zin pa dang gzugs su yod par 'gyur ba dang de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs yin te bud shing bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptistarhi na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzugs ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāpi vijñaptirūpaṇād rūpitā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rnam par rig byed la gzugs su lod pa'i phyir gzugs su yod par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vṛkṣapracalane cchāyāpracalanavat /<br/> nāvikārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing ljon pa gyos bas grib ma gyo ba bzhin no / 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptinivṛttau cāvijñaptinivṛttiḥ syād vṛkṣābhāve cchāyā 'bhāvavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed log na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang ldog par 'gyur te / shing ljon pa med na grib ma med pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayabhūtarūpaṇādityapare evaṃ tarhi cakṣurvijñānādīnāmapyāśrayarūpaṇāt rūpatvaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / de lta na 'o na ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṣamo 'yamupanyāsaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar bkod pa 'di ni mi mthun pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptirhi cchāyeva vṛkṣaṃ prabheva maṇiṃ bhūtānyāśrtya varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin ba 'di ni shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang nor bu la 'od nyid bzhin du 'byung ba rnams la brten nas 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvevaṃ cakṣurādīnyāśritya varttante cakṣurvijñānādīni kevalaṃ tūtpattinimiktamātraṃ tāni teṣāṃ bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes ba la sogs pa ni de ltar mig la sogs pa la brten nas 'jug pa ma yin te / de dag ni de dag gi skye ba'i rgyu mtshan tsam yin pa 'ba' zhig tsam du zad pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tāvadavaibhāṣikīyaṃ vṛkṣamāśritya cchāyā varttate maṇiṃ cāśritya prabheti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing ljon pa la brten nas grib ma dang mar me la brten nas 'od 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di ni re zhig bye brag tu smra ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cchāyādivarṇaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekaṃ svabhūtacatuṣkāśritatvābhyupagamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grib ma la sogs pa kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams so so rang gi 'byung ba bzhi tshan la brten pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyapi ca tadāśritatve cchāyāprabhayornāvijñaptistathaivāśritā /<br/> yujyate /<br/> niruddheṣvapi avijña ptyāśayeṣu mahābhūteṣu tasyā anirodho 'bhyupagamyate /<br/> ato na bhavatyeṣa parihāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grib ma dang 'od de dag la brten pa nyid yin yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang 'gag par khas len pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni de ltar brten par mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punaratra parihāramāhuḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmāśrayo bhedaṃ gataḥ /<br/> kaṣcidrūpyate cakṣurādiḥ kaścinna rūpyate yathā manaḥ /<br/> na tvevamavijñaptiḥ /<br/> tasmādasamānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityata upapannametadāśraya rūpaṇādrūpamiti /<br/> ya eva rūpaskandhasvabhāvā uktāḥ /<br/> indriyārthasta eveṣṭā aśāyatanadhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de ni lan du mi rung ngo / gzhan dag ni 'di la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten ni tha dad du gyur pa ste / kha cig ni gzugs su rung ba ste mig la sogs pa'o / la la ni gzugs su mi rung ba ste yid do / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni de lta ma yin te / de lta bas na 'dra bar thal ba med do / de'i phyir gzugs su yod pas na gzugs so zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa yin no zhes lan 'debs so / gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa gang dag yin pa / dbang don de dag kho na la / skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ daśāyatanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched rnam par gzhag pa ni skye mched bcu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi skye mched dang gzugs kyi skye mched nas / lus kyi skye mched dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi bar yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva daśadhātavaścakṣurchātū rūpadhāturyāvat kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhāturiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams rnam par gzhag pa ni de dag nyid khams bcu ste / mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams nas / lus kyi khams dang reg bya'i khams kyi bar yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ukto rūpaskandhastasya cāyatanavyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi phung po dang de'i skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanādayo vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la logs pa brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> vedanā 'nubhavaḥ /<br/> trividho 'nubhavo vedanāskandhaḥ /<br/> sukho duḥkho  duḥkhāsukhaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la tshor ba myong ba / myong ba rnam pa gsum ni tshor ba'i phung po ste / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punarbhidyamānaḥ ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yāvamvanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang dbye na tshor ba'i tshogs drug ste / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nas / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñā nimittodgrahaṇātmikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes ni / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvannīlapītadīrghahrasvastripuruṣamitramitrasukhaduḥkhādinimittodgrahaṇamasau saṃjñāskandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang sngon po dang ser po dang ring po dang thung ngu dang pho dang mo dang mdza' bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par la mtshan mar 'dzin ba de ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punarbhidyamānaḥ ṣaṭsaṃjñākāyā vedanāvat /<br/> caturbhyo 'nye tu saṃskāraskandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang dbye na 'du shes kyi tshogs drug ste / tshor ba bzhin no / 'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpavedanāsaṃjñāvijñānebhyaścatubbryo 'nye tu saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang rnam par shes pa dang phung po bzhi las gzhan pa'i 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhagavatā tu sūtre ṣaṭ cetanākāyā ityuktaṃ prādhānyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las / sems pa tshogs drug go zhes gsungs pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā hi karmasvarūpatvādabhisaṃskaraṇe pradhānā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtamabhisaṃskaroti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis / 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt saṃskārā upādānaskandha ity ucyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi śeṣāṇāṃ caitasikānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ skandhāsaṃgrahādduḥkhasamudayasatyatvaṃ na syāditi parijñāparihāṇe api na syātām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na sems las byung ba lhag ma rnams dang ldan ba ma yin pa rnams phung por 'dus pa'i phyir sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa nyid du mi 'gyur bas yongs su shes pa dang spang bar yang mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca bhagavatā nāhamekadharmamapi anabhijñāyāparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti /<br/> evamaprahāye tyuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis ni / chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes par yang sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs la / de bzhin du ma spangs par yang zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādavaśyameṣāṃ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgraho bhyupagantavyaḥ /<br/> ete punastrayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gdon mi za bar de dag 'du byed kyi phung por bsdus par khas blang bar bya'o / de gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ āyatanadhātuvyavasthāyāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed kyi phung po dag ste / skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmāyatanadhātvākhyāḥ sahāvijñaptyasaṃskṛtaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam rig byed min dang 'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni / chos kyi skye mched khams zhes bya / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetāni sapta dravyāṇi dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuścetyākhyāyante /<br/> vijñānaṃ prativijñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na rdzas bdun po de dag ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams zhes bya'o / rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vijñaptirupalabdhirvijñāna skandha ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul dang yul la so sor rnam par rig cing dmigs pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvanmanovijñānamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste / mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eṣa vijñānaskandha ukta āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ /<br/> mana āyatanaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i phung po bstan pa gang yin pa de skye mched rnam par gzhag pa ni / yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ sa eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams rnam par gzhag pa yang de dag nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātavaḥ saspta ca matāḥ /<br/> katame sapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams bdun dag tu'ang 'dod pa ste / bdun gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍ vijñānānyatho manaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa drug dang yid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurvijñānadhāturyāvanmanovijñānadhātumanodhātuśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yid kyi khams kyi bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamatra pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo nirddiṣṭā bhavaṇti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'dir phung po lnga dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang khams bco brgyad du bstan par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptivarjyo rūpaskandho daśāyatanāni daśa dhatavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched bcu dang khams bcu dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanā dayaḥ skandhāstrayo vijñaptirasaṃskṛtāni ca dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuśca vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo manodhātuśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang 'dus ma byas dag ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams so / rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yid kyi skye mched dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang yid kyi khams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā vijñānaskandha ityuktam /<br/> atha ko yaṃ punastebhyo nyo manodhātuḥ na khalu kaścidanyaḥ /<br/> kiṃ narhi /<br/> teṣāmeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por bshad pa ma yin nam / yang de dag las gzhan pa yid kyi khams de gang zhe na / gzhan ni gang yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṇṇāmanantarātītaṃ vijñānaṃ yaddhi tanmanaḥ /<br/> yadyatsamanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ tanmanodhāturityucyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci zhe na / drug po de dag / nyid las 'das ma thag pa yi / rnam shes gang yin de yod do / rnam par shes pa gang dang gang 'gags ma thag pa de nyid ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā sa eva putro nyasya pitā bhavati tadeva phalamanyasya bījamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bu de nyid gzhan gyi phar 'gyur ba dang 'bras bu de nyid gzhan gyi sa bon yin pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi dravyataḥ saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti dvādaśa vā ṣaḍvijñānadhātumanodhātūnāmitaretarāntarbhāvāditi kasmādaṣṭādāśa vyavasthāpyante /<br/> yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi /<br/> ṣaṣṭhāśrayaprasiddhyartha dhātavo ṣādaś smṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drag dang yid kyi khams rnams gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir rdzas su na khams bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis su 'gyur na ci'i phyir khams bco brgyad du rnam par gzhag ce na / de lta'ang yin mod kyi / 'on kyang / drug pa'i rten ni rab bsgrub phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ cakṣurdhātvāyatanādayaḥ pañcāśrayāḥ /<br/> ṣaṣṭhasya manovijñānadhātorāśrayo nyo nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod / rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag gi rten lnga ni mig gi khams la sogs pa yin na drug po yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni gzhan med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastadāśrayaprasiddhacyartha manodhāturūpadiṣṭaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de'i rten rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir yid kyi khams bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamāśrayāśritālambanaṣṭkavyavasathānādaṣṭādaśa dhātavo bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na rten pa dang dmigs pa drug tshan rnam par gzhag pas khams bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhatastarhi caramaṃ cittam na mano bhaviṣyati /<br/> nahi tadasti yasya tatsasmanantarātītaṃ syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems tha ma yid ma yin par 'gyur ta / de gang gis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa 'das par 'gyur ba de ni med do zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> tasyāpi manobhāvenāvasthitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang yid kyi ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir na ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyakāraṇavaikalyāttu nottaravijñānasaṃbhūtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gzhan mtshang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye bar zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra skandhaiḥ sarvasaṃskṛtasaṃgrahaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la phung po dag gis ni 'dus byas thams cad bsdus so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upādānaskandhaiḥ sarvasāsravāṇāmā yatanadhātubhiḥ sarvadharmāṇām /<br/> samāsatastu jñātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar len pa'i phung po de dag gis ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad bsdus so / skye mched dang khams dag gis ni chos thams cad bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvasaṃgraha ekena skandehnāyatanena ca /<br/> dhātunā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor bsdu na phung po dang ni skye mched dang khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus par shes par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaskandhena mana āyatanena dharmadhātunā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃgraho boddhavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi phung po dang yid kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams kyis chos rnams thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa khalveṣa saṃgraho yatra kvaciducyamāno veditavyaḥ /<br/> svabhāvena /<br/> na parabhāvena /<br/> kim kāraṇam /<br/> parabhāvaviyogataḥ /<br/> viyukto hi parabhavena dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsdu ba de ni gang dang gang nas 'byung yang rung / rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te / gzhan gyi dngos pos ni ma yin par rig par bya'o / ci'i phyir zhe na / gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir / chos ni gzhan gyi dngos po dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānna yena viyuktastenaiva saṃgṛhīto yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gang dang mi ldan bde nyid kyis bsdus par ni mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpaskandhena cakṣurāyatanadhātubhyāṃ ca duḥkhasamudayasatyābhyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mig gi dbang po ni gzugs kyi phung po dang mig gi skye mched dang khams dag dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dag gis bsdus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsvabhāvatvāt /<br/> nānyaiḥ skandhādibhistadbhāva viyuktatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / de dag gi ngo bo dang mi ldan pa'i phyir phung po la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastvanyenānyasya saṃgraha ucyate yathā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ parṣadāṃ sa hi kādācitkatvāt sāṃketiko veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis 'khor rnams bsdus pa lta bu gzhan gyis gzhan bsdus so zhes bya ba gang yin ba de ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir brdar btags pa yin par bya'o
