</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu caikaviṃśatyā dhātubhirbhavitavyam /<br/> cakṣuṣo dvitvāt śrotraghrāṇayośca /<br/> na bhavitavyam /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> jātigocaravijñānasāmānyādekadhātutā /<br/> dvitve pi cakṣuradīnaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang rna ba dang sna dag gnyis gnyis yod pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na mi 'gyur te / 'di ltar / mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi / rigs dang spyod yul rnam par shes / 'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tra jātisāmānyamubhayoścakṣuḥsvabhāvatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rigs 'dra ba ni gnyi ga mig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gocarasāmānyamubhayo rūpaviṣayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod yul 'dra ba ni gnyi ga'i yul gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānasāmānyamubhayorekacakṣurvijñānāśrayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa 'dra ba ni gnyi ga mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig gi rten yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmadeka eva cakṣurdhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na mig gi khams ni gcig pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ śrotraghrāṇayorapi yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śobhārthaṃ tu dvayodbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekadhātutve pi tu cakṣurādīnaṃ dvayoḥ saṃbhava āśrayasya śobhārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa khams gcig pa nyid yin yang rten mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gnyis 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anya thā hyekacakṣuḥśrotrādhiṣṭhānaikanāsikāvilasaṃbhavāt mahad vairupyaṃ syāditi /<br/> uktāḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ /<br/> idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kaḥ skandhāyatanadhātvartha iti /<br/> rāśyāyadvāragotrārthāḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ /<br/> 'yat kiñcidrūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannamādhyātmibāhyam audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre antike tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī ti vacanāt sūtre rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti siddham /<br/> tatrātītaṃ rūpamanityatāniruddham /<br/> anāgatamanutpannam /<br/> pratyutpannamutpannāniruddham /<br/> ādhyātmikaṃ svāsāntānikaṃ bāhyamanyadāyatanato vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin te / mig dang rna ba'i rten gcig dang / sna'i bu ga gcig tu gyur na shin tu mi mdzes par 'gyur ro / phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag bshad zin to / phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi don gang yin pa 'dir brjod par bya ste / spungs dang skye dgu rigs kyi don / phung po skye mched khams rnams yin / mdo las / gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa 'am / ma 'ongs pa 'am / da ltar byung ba 'am / nang gi 'am / phyi'i 'am / rags pa 'am / phra ba'am / ngan pa 'am / gya nom pa 'am / thag ring ba na yod pa gang yin ba 'am / nye ba na yod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes bya bar grub po / de la bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzugs 'das pa ni mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'gags pa'o / ma 'ongs pa ni ma byung ba'o / da ltar byung ba la ma 'gags pa'o / nang gi ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'o / gzhan ni phyi'i 'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">audārikaṃ sapratighaṃ sūkṣmamapratighamāpekṣikaṃ vā /<br/> āpekṣikatvādasiddhamiti cet /<br/> na /<br/> apekṣābhedāt /<br/> yadapekṣyau dārikaṃ na jātu tadapekṣya sūkṣmaṃ pitāputravat /<br/> hīnaṃ kliṣṭam /<br/> praṇitamakliṣṭam /<br/> dūramatītānāgatam /<br/> antikaṃ pratyutpannam /<br/> evaṃ yāvat vijñānam /<br/> ayaṃ tu viśaṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang skye mched kyi sgo nas so / rags pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'o / phra ba ni thogs pa med pa'o / yang na ltos pa pa yin no / gal te ltos pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub bo zhe na / ma yin te / ltos pas tha dad pa'i phyir ro / gang la ltos te rags pa yin pa ni nam du yang de la ltos nas phra ba ma yin te / pha dang bu bzhin no / ngan pa ni nyon mongs pa can no / gya nom pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o / ring ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'o / nye ba ni da ltar byung ba ste / rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de dang 'dra'o / 'di ni khyad par yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">audārikaṃ pañcendriyāśrayam sūkṣmaṃ mānasam /<br/> bhūmito veti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rags pa ni dbang po lnga la brtan pa'o / phra ba ni yid las byung ba'o / yang na sa las rig par bya'o zhes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhadanta āha audārikarūpaṃ pañacendriyagrāhyam sūkṣmamanyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa na re ni gzugs rags pa ni dbang po lngas gzung bar bya ba'o / gzhan ni phra ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hīnamamanāpaṃ praṇītaṃ manāpam /<br/> dūramadṛśyadeśam /<br/> antikaṃ dṛśyadeśam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba'o / gya nom pa ni yid du 'ong ba'o / ring ba ni yul mi snang ba can no / nye ba ni yul snang ba can no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītādīnāṃ svaśabdenābhi hitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa la sogs pa ni rang gi ming gis bstan pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam vedanādayo 'pi veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dūrāntikatvaṃ tu teṣāmāśrayavaśāt /<br/> audārikasūkṣmatvaṃ tu pūarvavaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis ring ba dang nye ba nyid ni de rten gyi dbang gis so / rags pa dang phra ba nyid ni snga ma bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittacaittāyadvārārtha āyatanārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skye ba'i sgo'i don ni skye mched kyi don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvacanaṃ tu cittacaittānāmāyaṃ tanvantīti āyatanāni /<br/> vistṛṇvantītyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa'i tshig tu na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skye ba mched par byed bas skye mched rnams te / rgyas par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gotrārtho dhātvarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs kyi don ni khams kyi don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaikasmin parvate bahūnyayastāmrarūpyasuvarṇādigotrāni dhātava ucyante evam ekasminnāśraye santāne vā aṣṭādaśa gotrāṇi aṣṭādaśa dhātava ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na ri 'ga' zhig la lcags dang zangs dang dngul dang gser la sogs pa rigs mang po dag yod pa la khams zhes brjod pa de bzhin du rten dang rgyud gcig la rigs bco brgyad dag yod pa la khams bco brgyad ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākarāstatra gotrāṇyuacyante /<br/> ta ime cakṣurādayaḥ kasyākarāḥ /<br/> svasyā jāteḥ /<br/> sabhāgahetutvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'byung gnas dag ni rigs zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa 'di dag gang gi 'byung gnas yin zhe na / rang gi rigs kyi yin te / skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtaṃ tarhi na dhātuḥ syāt /<br/> cittacittānāṃ tarhi jātivācako yaṃ dhātuśabda ityapare /<br/> aṣṭādaśdharmāṇāṃ jātayaḥ svabhāvā aṣṭādaśa dhātava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas khams ma yin bar 'gyur ro zhe na / 'o na ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yin no / gzhan dag na re chos bco brgyad po dag rigs kyi rang bzhin no zhe na / khams bco brgyad ces bya bas khams zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni rigs kyi tshig yin zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārthaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ skandhāḥ prāpnuvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te spungs pa'i don phung po'i don yin na phung po rnams btags pa'i yod par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anekadravyasamūhatvāt rāśipudgalavat /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas sum 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir spungs pa dang gang zag bzhin no zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasyāpi dravyaparamāṇoḥ skandhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas kyi rdul phra rab gcig pu yang phung po yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tarhi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti vaktavyam /<br/> na hyekasyāsti rāśitvamiti /<br/> kāryab hārodvahanārthaḥ skandhārtha ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na gcig pu la spungs pa nyid med pas spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes brjod par mi bya'o / gzhan dag na re / bya ba'i khur khyer ba'i don nam / yongs su chad pa'i don ni phung po'i don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pracchedārtho vā /<br/> tathāhi vaktāro bhavanti tribhiḥ skandhakairdeyaṃ dāsyāma iti /<br/> tadetadutsūtram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar smra ba po dbul bar bya ba'i phung po gsum dag tu dbul bar bya'o zhes smra ba bzhin no zhes zer te / de ni mdo dang 'gal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtraṃ hi rāśyarthameva bravīti yatkiñcidrūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannamiti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni spungs pa'i don kho nar gsungs te / gzugs gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am / ma 'ongs pa'am zhes rgyas par gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekamatītādirūpasya skandhatvaṃ tatra vijñāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni gzugs 'das pa la sogs pa so sor phung po nyid yin par shes te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvametadatītādi rūpamekaśo rūpaskandha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs 'das pa la sogs pa 'di thams cad re re zhing gzugs kyi phung po yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na śakyamevaṃ vijñātum /<br/> tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipyeti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar ni shes par mi nus te / de thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / de lta bas na gzugs kyi phung po dag ni spungs pa bzhin du btags pa'i yod pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpoīnyapi tarhyāyatanāni prajñaptisanti prāpnuvanti /<br/> bahunāṃ cakṣurādiparamāṇūnāmāyadvāra bhāvāt /<br/> na /<br/> ekaśaḥ samagrāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt viṣayasahakāritvādvā nendriyaṃ pṛthagāyatanaṃ syāt /<br/> vibhāṣāyāṃ tūcyate yadyābhidharmikaḥ skandhaprajñaptimapekṣate /<br/> sa āha paramāṇurekasya dhātorekasyāyatanasyaikasya skandhasya pradeśaḥ /<br/> atha nāpekṣate /<br/> sa āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na skye mched gzugs can rnams kyang btags pa'i yod par 'gyur te / mig la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab mang po ni skye ba'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te tshogs pa rnams re re nas rgyu'i ngo bor gyur pa'i phyir ram / yul lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po las logs shig tu skye mched du yang mi 'gyur ro / bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni / gal te chos mngon pa ba zhig phung po btags pa'i yod par lta na ni de rdul phra rab khams gcig dang skye mched gcig dang phung po gcig gi phyogs yin no zhes smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramāṇureko dhāturekamāyatanamekaḥ skandha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te mi lta na ni de rdul phra rab khams gcig dang skye mched gcig dang phung po gcig yin no zhes smra'o zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavati hi pradeśe pi pradeśivadupacāro yathā paṭṭaiakadeśe dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs yin yang phyogs can yin bzhin du nye bar 'dogs pa yang yod de / dper na ras yug gi phyogs gcig tshig pa la ras yug tshig gi zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kirthaṃ bhagavān skandhādimudhena trividhāṃ deśanāmārabhate /<br/> āha /<br/> vineyānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa'i sgo nas ston pa rnam pa gsum rtsom par mdzad ce na / smras pa / gdul ba rnams kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mohendriyarucitraidhāttisraḥ skandhādideśanāḥ /<br/> trayaḥ prakārāstraidham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmongs dbang 'dod rnams gsum gyi phyir / phung po la sogs gsum bstan to / rnam pa gsum ni rnam gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">triprakāraḥ kila sattvānāṃ mohaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams kyi rmongs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">keciccaitteṣu saṃmūḍhāḥ piṇḍātmagrahaṇataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni sems las byung ba rnams la ril po'i bdag nyid du 'dzin pas rmongs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecidrūpa eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni gzugs kho na la'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecidrūpacittayoḥ /<br/> indriyāṇyapi trividhāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni gzugs dang sems dag la'o / dbang po dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīkṣṇamadhyamṛdvindriyatvāt /<br/> rūcirapi trividhā /<br/> saṃkṣiptamadhyavistaragrantharucitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnon po dang 'bring dang rtul po'i phyir ro / 'dod pa yang rnam pa gsum ste / tshig bsdus pa dang bar ma dang rgya chen po 'dod pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ tisraḥ skandhāyatanadhātudeśanā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la go rims bzhin du phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang gsum bstan to zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃ caitasikā ekatra saṃskāraskandhanikṣiptā vedanāsaṃjñe tu pṛthak skandhīkṛte ityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir sems las byung ba gzhan rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung po gcig tu bsdus la 'du shes dang tshor ba dag ni logs shig tu phung por byas she na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivādamūlasaṃsārahetutvāt kramakāraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caittebhyo vedanāsaṃjñe pṛthakaskndhau niveśitau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang / 'du shes logs shig phung por bzhag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve vivādamūle
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsod pa'i rtsa bdag ni gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmādhyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭyadhyavasānaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa dang lta ba la lhag par zhen pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayorvedanāsaṃjñe yathākramaṃ pradhānahetū
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi rgyu'i gtso bo ni go rims bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanāsvādavaśāddhi kāmānabhiṣvajante viparītasaṃjñāvaśācca dṛṣṭīriti /<br/> saṃsārasyāpi te pradhānahetū /<br/> vedanāsvādagṛddho hi viṣaryastasaṃjñaḥ saṃsarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba ro myang ba'i dbang gis ni 'dod pa rnams las mngon par zhen la / 'du shes phyin ci log gis ni lta ba rnams la'o / de dag ni 'khor pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yang yin te / tshor ba la zhen cing 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni 'khor ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca skandhakrame kāraṇamupadekṣyamāṇaṃ tato 'pi kramakāraṇādanayoḥ pṛthakskandhīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /<br/> etacca tredho papādayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> skandheṣva saṃskṛtaṃ noktamarthāyogāt /<br/> taddhi skandheṣūcyamānaṃ na tāvadeteṣvevāntarṇetuṃ śakyate /<br/> arthāyogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang phung po'i go rims kyi rgyu ston par 'gyur ba'i go rims kyi rgyu de'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu phung por byas par rig par bya ste / de ni de nyid du bshad par bya'o / 'o na ci'i phyir skye mched dang khams dag tu ni 'dus ma byas bshad la / phung po dag tu ni ma yin zhe na / phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas / don du mi rung phyir ma bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tadrūpaṃ nāpi yāvadvijñānamiti /<br/> nacāpi ṣaṣṭhaḥ skandho vaktuṃ śakyate /<br/> kutaḥ /<br/> arthāyogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni phung po dag gi nang du brjod na de ni gzugs ma yin zhing rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ma yin pas don du mi rung ba'i phyir re zhig de dag nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar ni mi nus so / phung po drug par brjod par yang mi nus so / ci'i phyir zhe na / don du mi rung ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāśyartho hi skandhārtha ityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spungs pa'i don du ni phung po'i don to zhes bshad na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nacāsaṃskṛtamatītādibhedabhinnaṃ rūpādivadyatastatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipyāsaṃskṛtaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas na gzugs bzhin du 'di ltar de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas 'dus ma byas kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkleśavastujñāpanārthaṃ khalūpādānaskandhavacanaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavastujñāpanārthaṃ skandhavacanaṃ /<br/> nacobhayathā pyasaṃskṛtamityarthāyogānna teśu vyavasthāpitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya la / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i gzhi shes par bya ba'i phyir phung po zhes kyang bya na / 'dus ma byas ni don du mi rung ba'i phyir gnyi ga yang ma yin te / de dag tu rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ghaṭoparamo na ghaṭa evaṃ skandhoparamo na skandho bhavitumarhatītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re ji ltar bum pa chag pa bum pa ma yin pa de bzhin du phung po zhig pa yang phung po yin par mi 'os so zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ dhātvāyataneṣvapyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> uktaḥ skandhānāmanyaḥ prakāraḥ /<br/> kramaḥ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ltar na khams dang skye mched dag la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / phung po rnams kyi rnam pa gzhan bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaudārikasaṃkleśabhājanādyarthadhātutaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs / snod sogs don khams ji bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaṃ hi sapratighatvātsarvaudārikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni thogs pa dang ba cas pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arupiṇāṃ vedanā pracāraudārikatayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi nang na yang tshor ba ni rgyu ba rags pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi vyapadiśanti haste me vedanā pāde me vedaneti /<br/> dvābhyāṃ cau dārikatarā saṃjñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar nga'i lag pa la tshor ro / nga'i rkang pa la tshor ro zhes tha snyad 'dogs so / 'du shes ni gnyis pas ches rags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānātsaṃskārā ityato yadaudārikataraṃ tatpūrvamuktam /<br/> athavā anādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāste ca vedanāsvādagarddhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa bas ni 'du byed de / de'i phyir gang ches rags pa de sngar bshad do / yang na thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor ba na pho dang mo dag phan tshun gzugs la mngon par dga' ste / de dag kyang tshor ba'i ro myang ba la chags pa'i phyir ro /  / de la chags pa yang 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadgarddhaḥ saṃjñāviparyāsāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyin ci log de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dag gis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadviparyāsaḥ kleśaiścittaṃ aca tatsaṃkliṣṭamiti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ ca kramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyang de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du byas pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims ji lta ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhājanādyarthena vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na snod la sogs pa'i don gyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhajanabhojanavyañjanakarttṛ bhoktṛbhūtā hi rūpādayaḥ skandhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po ni snod dang zas dang tshod ma dang byan po dang za ba po lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātuto vā /<br/> kāmaguṇarūpaprabhāvito hi kāmadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na khams kyis te 'dod ba'i yon tan gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanāprabhāvitāni dhyānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor bas rab tu phye ba ni bsam gtan rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñāprabhāvitāḥ trayaḥ ārūpyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes kyis rab tu phye ba ni gzugs med pa gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskāramātraprabhāvitaṃ bhavāgram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etā eva vijñānasthitayaḥ tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānamiti kṣetrabijasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin la / de dag la rnam par shes pa gnas so zhes phung po'i go rims zhing dang sa bon gyi go rims lta bur bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva pañcaskandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir phung po rnams ni lnga ste mi nyung mi mang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva ca kramakāraṇādvedanāsaṃjñe saṃskārebhyaḥ pṛthaka skandhīkṛte /<br/> yata ete audārikatare saṃkleśānukramahetū bhājanavyañjanabhūte tatprabhāvitaṃ ca dhātudvayamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir 'di dag ni ches rags pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims kyi rgyu dang zas dang tshod ma lta bu dang de dag gi khams gnyis rab tu phye ba'i go rims kyi rgyu de nyid kyi phyir tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ni 'du byed rnams las logs shig tu phung por byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyatanadhātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāmanukramo vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa'i khams dang skye mched drug gi ge rims brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvaśenaiva hi tadviṣayavijñānānāṃ kramaḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ ca punaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dbang nyid kyis na de'i yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi go rims su 'gyur ro / drug po de dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāk pañca vārttamārthyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da lta'i don phyir dang por lnga / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurādīni pañca varttamānaviṣayatvāt pūrvamuktāni /<br/> manastvaniyataviṣayam /<br/> kiñcidvarttamānaviṣayaṃ kiñcit vyadhvānadhraviṣayam /<br/> bhautikārthyāccatuṣṭayam /<br/> prāgiti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa lnga'i yul ni da ltar yin pa'i phyir sngar smos so / yid kyi yul ma nges pa can yin te / kha cig gi yul ni da ltar yin pa nas / kha cig gi yul ni dus gsum dang dus ma yin pa'i par yin no / 'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi / dang por zhes bya bar snyegs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcānāṃ punaśctvāri pūrvamuktāni /<br/> bhautikaviṣayatvāt /<br/> kāyasya tvaniyato viṣayaḥ /<br/> kadācid bhūtāni kadācid bhautikam kadācidubhayam /<br/> dūrāśutaravṛttyā 'nyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga rnams las kyang bzhir sngar smos pa ni yul 'byung ba las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro / lus kyi yul ni ma nges te / res 'ga' ni 'byung ba dag yin la / res 'ga' ni 'byung ba las gyur pa dag yin no / res 'ga' ni gnyi ga yin no / gzhan ni ches ring myur 'jug phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣaṃ punaritasmād yathāyogaṃ dūrāśutaravṛttyā pūrvamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni ci rigs par ches rgyang ring ba dang myur bar 'jug pas gzhan bas sngar smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥśrotraṃ hi dūraviṣayam /<br/> tat pūrvamuktaṃ dvayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang rna ba'i yul rgyang ring ba'i phyir gnyis pas de dag sngar smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayorapi cakṣuṣo dūratare vṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis las kyang mig ni ches rgyang ring po la 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paśyato 'pi dūrānnadīṃ tacchabdāśravaṇādatastat pūrvamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu klung rgyang ring po nas mthong yang de'i sgra mi thos pas de'i phyir de sngar smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghrāṇasya tu nāsti dūre vṛttiḥ /<br/> jihvāyāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna dang lce ni rgyang ring po la 'jug pa med mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayorāśutaravṛttitvāt ghrāṇaṃ pūrvamuktamaprāptasyaiva jihvā bhojyasya gandhagrahaṇāt /<br/> yathāsthānaṃ kramo 'thavā /<br/> athavā asmin śarīre cakṣuṣo 'dhiṣṭhānamupāriṣṭāt niviṣṭam /<br/> tasmādadhaḥ śrotrasya /<br/> tasmādadho ghrāṇasya /<br/> takyāḥ syāsya bahulyena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis las kyang sna ni ches myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir sngar smos te / zas lce dang ma phrad pa nyid kyi dri 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin rim /  / yang na lus 'di la mig gi rten ni dang po na gnas so / de'i 'og na ni rna ba'i 'o / de'i 'og na ni sna'i 'o / de'i 'og na ni lce'i 'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥ punastānyeva niśritamadeśasthaṃ ceti yathāsthānameṣāṃ kramaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi ni phal cher de'i 'og na'o / yid ni de dag la brten pa dang yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir te / de dag gi go rims ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ daśasvāyataneṣu rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhīteṣvekaṃ rūpāyatanamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i skye mched bcu po dag las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du brjod la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣu ca dharmasvabhaveṣvekaṃ dharmāyatanamityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad kyang chos kyi rang bzhin yin na gcig chos kyi skye mched ces bya zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśeṣaṇārthaṃ prādhānyādbahudharmāgrasaṃgrahāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag don dang gtso po'i phyir / chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekamāyatanaṃ rūpamekaṃ dharmākhyamucyate /<br/> kathaṃ viśeṣaṇārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched dang / gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod / bye brag gi don ci lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā gamyeta pratyekameṣāṃ daśānāmāyatanatvaṃ viṣayaviṣayitvena vyavasthānaṃ na samastānāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci nas kyang yul dang yul can nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas bcu po 'di dag gi so sor skye mched nyid yin gyi spyir ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurādibhiśca viśeṣitairyanna cakṣurādisaṃjñakaṃ rūpaṃ ca tadrūpakayātanaṃ jñāsyata ityasya punarnāmāntaraṃ nocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa bye brag tu byas pa dag gis ni gang mig la sogs par ni ming ma btags la gzugs ni yin pa de gzugs kyi skye mched du shes par 'gyur bas 'di'i ming gzhan ma brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā rūpāyatanasya prādhānyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na gzugs kyi skye mched ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taddhi sapratighatvācca /<br/> pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaṃ rūpyate /<br/> sanidarśanatvācca /<br/> idamihāmutreti nirūpaṇāt loke 'pi ca tadrūpamiti pratītaṃ nānyāni /<br/> viśeṣaṇārthameva caikaṃ dharmāyatanamuktaṃ na sarvāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis reg na gzugs su rung ba dang bstan du rung ba'i phyir te / 'di ni 'di na'o / che ge mo zhig na'o zhes brtag tu rung ba'i phyir ro / 'jig rten na yang de gzugs so zhes grags kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no / bye brag gi don nyid kyis gcig ni chos kyi skye mched du bshad kyi thams cad ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api cātrabahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgraho vedanādīnām /<br/> ataḥ sāmānyenābhidhānaṃ kriyate dharmaśabdena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang 'dir tshor ba la sogs pa chos mang po rnams bsdus te / de'i phyir chos kyi sgrar spyir rjod par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agrasya ca nirvāṇadharmasyātra saṃgraho nānyeṣviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi mchog mya ngan las 'das pa de yang der bsdus te gzhan dag tu ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṃśatiprakāratvenaudārikatvānmāṃsa divyāryaprajñācakṣustrayagocaratvāccaikaṃ rūpāyatanamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rnam pa nyi shu'i rig pa'i phyir dang sha'i dang lha'i dang 'phags pa'i shes rab dang mig gsum gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyānyapi skandhāyatanadhātusaṃśabditānyupalabhyante sūtreṣu teṣāṃ kiṃebhireva saṃgraho veditavya āhosvidvyatirekaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo dag las phung po dang skye mched dang khams zhes bya ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang dmigs na / ci de rnams 'di dag nyid kyis bsdus sam / 'on te tha dad pa zhig yin par rig par bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ebhireva saṃgraho na vyatirekaḥ /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> dharmaskandhasahasrāṇi yānyaśītiṃ jagau muniḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag nyid kyis bsdus kyi tha dad pa ni med de de la re zhig / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag / gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni vāṅnāma vetyeṣāṃ rūpasaṃskārasaṃgrahaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig gam ming yin de dag ni / gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ vāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ teṣāṃ tāni rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gi ltar na sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshig gi rang bzhin yin ba de dag gi ltar na de dag ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ nāmasvabhāvaṃ teṣāṃ saṃskāraskandhena /<br/> kiṃ punardharmaskandhasya pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gi ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi ltar na ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so / yang chos kyi phung po'i tshad ji tsam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstrapramāṇa ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eke tāvat āhurdharmaskandhasaṃjñakasyaivābhidharmaśāstrasyāsya opramaṇamiti /<br/> tacca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re de ni chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba bstan bcos mngon pa'i tshad tsam mo zhes zer te / de ni shlo ka drug stong ngo / yang gzhan dag na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhādīnaṃ kathaikaśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po la sogs gtam re yin / zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhāyatanadhātupratītyasamutpādasatyāhāradhyānāpramāṇārūpyavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanabodhipākṣikābhijñāpratisaṃvitpraṇidhijñānāraṇādīnāṃ kathā prātyekaṃ dharmaskandha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang bden pa dang zas dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa dang rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang smon nas shes pa dang nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caritapratipakṣastu dharmaskandho 'nuvarṇitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni / chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu varṇayantyaśītiścaritasahasraṇi sattvānām /<br/> rāgadveṣamohamānādicaritabhedena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du / sems can rnams kyi spyod pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nga rgyal la sogs pa spyod pa tha dad pa brgyad khri yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā 'śītirdharmaskandhasahasrāṇyuktāni /<br/> yathaitānyaśītirdharmaskandhasahasrāṇyeṣveva pañcaskandheṣu opratipāditāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi gnyen por bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri gsungs so zhes brjod do / ji ltar chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'di phung po lnga po 'di dag nyid du bsdus pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā 'nye 'pi yathāyogaṃ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ /<br/> pratipādyā yathokteṣu saṃpradhārya svalakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par / phung po skye mched khams rnams ni / rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de / ji skad bshad par bsdu par bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye 'pyanye skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ sūtrāntareṣūktāste 'pyeṣveva yathokteṣu skandhādiṣu pratiopādyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathāvihitamasmiṃacchāstre saṃpradharya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo gzhan dag las phung po dang skye mched dang khams gzhan gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang bstan bcos 'di las / ji skad bshad pa bzhin de dag gi rang rang gi mtshan nyid legs par dpyad nas phung po la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa 'di dag nyid du bsdu bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ /<br/> śeṣāḥ saṃskāraskandhena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag las tshul khrims kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so / lhag ma rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśānāṃ kṛtsnāyatanānāmaṣṭāvalobhasvabhāvatvāddharmāyatanena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad par gyi skye mched bcu po dag las brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saparivārāṇi tu pañcaskandhasvabhāvatvānmanodharmāyatanābhyām /<br/> tathā 'bhibhvāyatanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor rnams dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus te / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne catvāri cākāśānantyāyatanādīni catuḥskandhasvabhāvatvāt manodharmāyatanābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca vimuktyāyatanāni prajñāsvabhāvatvāddharmāyatanena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga po dag ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saparivārāṇi tu śabdo manodharmāyatanaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor rnams dang bcas na ni sgra dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched rnams kyis bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayorāyatanayorasaṃjñisattvā daśabhirāyatanairgandharsāyatanābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched gnyis las 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni dri dang ro'i skye mched bcu bzhi po rnams kyis bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā manodharmāyatanābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ bahudhātuke 'pi dvāṣaṣṭirdhātavo deśitāḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ yathāyogaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du khams mang po la las khams drug cu rtsa gnyis bstan pa de dag kyang ci rigs par bsdu par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam /<br/> tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der gang dag sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug bstan pa la / de dag las gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma bshad na / de ci nam mkha' nyid nam mkha'i khams yin la / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams yin par rig par bya 'am zhe na / smras pa ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvāravātāyanamukhanāsikādiṣu /<br/> chidramākāśadhātvākhyam /<br/> chidramityucyamānaṃ kiṃ veditavyam /<br/> ālokatamasī kila
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgo dang skar khung dang kha dang sna la sogs pa'i bu ga nam mkha'i khams zhes bya / bu ga zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par rig par bya / snang dang mun ba dag yin lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi chidramālokatamobhyāmanyad gṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bu ga ni snang ba dang mun pa dag las gzhan du gzung du med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt kilākāśadhāturālokatamaḥsvabhāvo rātrindivasvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /<br/> sa eva cāghasāmantakaṃ rūpamityucyate /<br/> aghaṃ kila cittasthaṃ rūpam /<br/> atyarthaṃ ghātāt /<br/> tasya tatsāmantakamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na nam mkha'i khams ni snang ba dang mun pa'i rang bzhin te / mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i rang bzhin du yin par rig par bya'o zhes grag go / de nyid thogs pa'i nye ba'i 'khor gyi gzugs zhes bya ste / thogs ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu gnod par byar rung ba'i phyir bsags par gnas pa'i gzugs te / de ni de'i 'khor ro lo / gzhan dag na re de la gzhan mi thogs pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare /<br/> vijñānadhāturvijñānaṃ sāsravaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni thogs med kyang yin la gzugs gzhan gyi nye 'khor yang yin pas thogs med nye 'khor yin no zhes zer ro / zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni / rnam shes khams yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādanāsravaṃ nocyate /<br/> yasmādime ṣaḍ dhātava iṣṭāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir zag pa med pa la mi bya zhe na / 'di ltar khams drug po 'di dag ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">janmaniśrayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i rten yin par 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete hi janmanaḥ pratisandhicittādyāvat cyuticittasādhāraṇabhūtāḥ /<br/> anāsravāstu dharmā naivamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems nas 'chi ba'i sems kyi bar du skye ba'i gzhir gyur pa ste / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de ltar na de dag las khams bzhi ni reg bya'i khams kyi nang du 'dus so / lnga pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi nang du 'dus so / drug pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bdun po dag tu 'dus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ /<br/> sanidarśana eko 'tra rūpaṃ /<br/> sa hi śakyate nidarśayitumidamihāmutreti /<br/> uktaṃ bhavati anidarśanāḥ śeṣā iti /<br/> kati sapratighāḥ katyapratighāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag khams bco brgyad bstan pa de dag las bstan du yod pa rnams ni du / bstan du med pa rnams ni du zhe na / bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig tu / de ni 'di ni 'di na 'o / che ge mo zhig na'o zhes bstan par nus so / lhag ma rnams ni bstan du med pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro / thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / thogs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saparatighā daśa /<br/> rūpiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i khams bcu gang dag bshad pa de dag ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ /<br/> āvaraṇaviṣayālambanapratighātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thogs pa zhes bya ba ni rdugs pa'o / de yang rnam pa gsum ste / sgrib pa dang yul dang dmigs pa la thogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāvaraṇapratighātaḥ svadeśe parasyotpattiporativandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la sgrib pa la thogs pa ni rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gegs byed pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā /<br/> upalo 'pi tayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na lag pa 'am / rdo ba la lag pa rdugs shig thogs pa'am / rdo ba yang de gnyis la thogs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṣayapratighātaścakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayiṇāṃ rūpādiṣu viṣayeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul la thogs pa ni mig la sogs pa yul can rnams gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la thogs pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktaṃ prajñaptāvasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btags pa las ji skad du / chu la thogs pa la skam lam yin pa'i mig kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā matsyānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na nya rnams kyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti sthale na jale /<br/> prāyeṇa manuṣyāṇām /<br/> astyubhayatra /<br/> śiśumāramaṇḍūkapiśācakaivarttādīnām /<br/> asti nobhayatra /<br/> etānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skam thogs la chu la ma yin pa yang yod de / mi phal che ba'i lta bu'o / gnyi gar thogs pa yang yod de / chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang sbal pa dang sha za ba dang nya pa la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / gnyi gar ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti cakṣuryadrātrau pratihanyate na divā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o / mig gang mtshan mo thogs la nyin par ma yin pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā titīlolūkādīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha wang dang 'ug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divā na rātrau /<br/> prāyeṇa manuṣyāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyin par thogs la mtshan mo ma yin pa ni mi phal che'i lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rātrau divā ca /<br/> śvaśṛgālaturagadvīpimārjārādīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan mo dang nyin par thogs ba ni khyi dang wa dang rta dang gung dang byi la la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayatra /<br/> etānākārān sthāpayitvetyayaṃ viśayapratighātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi gar yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / 'di ni yul la thogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanapratighātaścittacaittānāṃ sveṣbālamvaneṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa la thogs pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rang gi dmigs pa dag la thogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ punarviṣayālambanayorviśeṣaḥ /<br/> yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul dang dmigs pa dag la bye brag ci yod ce na / gang la gang zhig byed pa de ni yul yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccittacaittairgṛhyate tadālambanam /<br/> kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate /<br/> tasmāt pareṇāpravṛtteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis 'dzin pa de ni dmigs pa yin no / yang ji ltar na rang gi yul la dmigs pa la 'jug pa la thogs pa zhes bya zhe na / de las gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'di la gtod pa ni thogs pa yin te / rang gi yul la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadihāvaraṇapratighātena daśānāṃ sapratighatvaṃ veditavyamanyonyāvaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'dir bcu po dag ni sgrib pa la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid du rig par bya ste / phan tshun sgrib pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dag yul la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa de dag sgrib pa la thogs pas kyang yin nam zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /<br/> dvitīyā pañca viṣayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni sems kyi khams bdun dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa'o / gnyis pa ni yul lnga po dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā pañcendriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni dbang po lnga dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthī dharmadhātupradeśaḥ saṃprayuktakavarjyaḥ /<br/> ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti /<br/> paścātpādakaḥ /<br/> ye tāvadālambanapratighātenāpi viṣayapratighātenāpi te
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa chos kyi khams kyi phyogs so / gang dag yul la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa de dag nyid dmigs pa la thogs bas kyang yin nam zhe na / tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste / re zhig dmigs pa la thogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni yul la thogs pas kyang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syurviṣayapratighatenaiva nālambanapratighātena /<br/> pañcendriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul la thogs pas yin la dmigs pa la thogs pas ma yin pa yang yod de dbang po lnga rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatrotpitsormanasaḥ pratighataḥ śakyate paraiḥ karttum /<br/> tatsapratighaṃ jñeyaṃ viparyayādapratighamiṣṭamiti /<br/> bhadantakumāralātaḥ /<br/> uktāḥ sapratighā apratighāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa gzhon nu lan na re ni gang la yid skye bar 'dod pa la gzhan dag gis thogs par byed nus pa de ni thogs pa dang bcas ba yin par shes par bya la / bzlog pa ni thogs pa med par 'dod do zhes zer ro / thogs ba dang bcas pa dag bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmaṣṭādaśadhātūnāṃ kati kuśalāḥ katyakuśalāḥ katyavyākṛtā /<br/> avyākṛtā aṣṭau /<br/> katame aṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams bco brgyad po de dag las dge ba rnams ni du / yi dge ba rnams ni du / lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni du zhe na / lung ma bstan brgyad / brgyad po dag gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete sapratighā daśoktāḥ /<br/> ta evārūpaśabdakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thogs pa dang bcas pa bcu bshad pa gang dag yin pa / de dag nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcendriyāṇi gandharasaspraṣṭavyā dhātavaśca /<br/> ete 'ṣṭau kuśalākuśalabhāvenāvyākaraṇādavyākṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs sgra ma gtogs dbang po lnga rnams dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams rnams dang brgyad po de dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngo bor lung bstan du med pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaṃ pratyavyākaraṇādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung bstan du med pa'i phyir zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanāsrave 'pi prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> tridhā 'nye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na ni zag pa med pa la thal bar 'gyur ro / gzhan rnam gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye daśa dhātavaḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan khams bcu po dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra sapta dhātavo 'lobhādisaṃprayuktā kuśalāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la sems kyi khams bdun ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba dag ni dge ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhādisaṃprayuktā akuśalāḥ /<br/> anye avyākṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag ni mi dge ba yin no / gzhan dag ni lung du ma bstan ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmadhāturalobhādisvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamutthaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca kuśalaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi khams ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas bslang ba dang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni dge ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhādisvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamuttho 'kuśalaḥ /<br/> anyo 'vyākṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs bar ldan pa dang kun nas bslang ba ni mi dge ba'o / gzhan ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaśabdadhātū kuśalākuśalacittasamuṭthau kuśalākuśalau kāyavāgvijñaptisaṃgṛhītau /<br/> tadanyāvyākṛtau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang sgra'i khams ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis bsdus pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba yin no / de las gzhan pa dag ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaḥ kuśalādibhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba la sogs pa'i dngos po bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmaṣṭādaśadhātūnāṃ kati kāmadhātvāptāḥ kati rūpadhātvāptāḥ /<br/> kāmadhātvāptāḥ sarve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams bco brgyad po de dag las 'dod par gtogs pa rnams ni du / gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams ni du zhe na / 'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āptā aviyuktāḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktā ityarthaḥ /<br/> rupe caturdaśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtogs pa ni ma bral ba ste / 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / gzugs kyi khams ni bcu bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātau caturdaśa dhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams na ni khams bcu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vinā gandharasaghrāṇajihvāvijñānadhātubhiḥ /<br/> tatra hi gandharasau na staḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri dang ro dang sna dang ni / lce'i rnam par shes khams ma gtogs / de na dri dang ro dag med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayoḥ kavaḍīkārāhāratvāttaddvītarāgāṇāṃ ca tatropapatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni khams kyi zas yin pa'i phyir la / de dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang der skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato ghrāṇajihvāvijñāne api na staḥ /<br/> ālambanābhāvāt /<br/> evaṃ tarhi spraṣṭavyadhātorapi tatrabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir sna dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang med do / de lta na ni 'o na de ni rig bya'i khams kyang med par thal bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kavaḍīkārāhāratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams kyi zas yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo nāhārasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zas kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de de na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gandharasayorapyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri dang ro dag kyang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti vinā 'bhyavahāreṇa gandharasayoḥ paribhogaḥ /<br/> asti tu spraṣṭavyasyendriyāśrayādhāraprāvaraṇabhāvena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg bya dbang po'i rten dang gzhi dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i dngos por yod du chug kyang zas mid pa med par dri dang ro dag la yongs su longs spyod pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam /<br/> anye punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de na zas mid pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la dri dang ro dag dgos pa med kyi reg bya ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasamāpattisaniśrayeṇeha rūpāṇi saṃdṛśyante śabdāśca śrūyante /<br/> prasrabdhisahagatena spraṣṭavya viśeṣeṇa ca kāyo 'nugṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan la brten nas 'dir gzugs rnams kyang mthong zhing sgra rnams kyang thos la shin tu sbyangs pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i reg bya'i khyad bar gyis kyang lus la phan 'dogs pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir skye ba'i bsam gtan na gsum po de dag srid kyi / dri dang ro dag ni ma yin no zhes zer ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi ghrāṇajihvendriyayorabhāvaprasaṅgo niṣprayojanatvāt /<br/> asti prayojanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni 'o na sna dang lce'i dbang po dag kyang med par thal bar 'gyur te / dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro / dgos pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyāṃ hi vinā’ śrayaśobhaiva na syāditi vyavahārśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag med par ni rten mdzes pa nyid dang mngon bar brjod par yang mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam /<br/> nānindriyamadhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dgos pa der zad na mdzes par bya ba'i don dang tshig gi don du rten kho nas chog gi dbang po ni dgos pa med do / dbang po med pa'i rten ni mi srid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puruṣendriyādhiṣṭhānavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pho'i dbang po'i rten bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuktastadasaṃbhavo niṣprayojanatvāt /<br/> ghrāṇajihvādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu saprayojanam /<br/> ato 'sya vinā 'pīndriyeṇa yuktaḥ saṃbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir mi srid par rigs kyi sna dang lce'i dbang po'i rten ni dgos pa dang bcas pa yin pas / de'i phyir 'di dag ni dbang po med par yang srid par rigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niḥprayojanā 'pīndriyābhinirvṛttirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgos pa med par yang dbang po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā garbhe niyatamṛtyūnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mngal du nges par 'chi ba rnams kyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syānnāma niḥprayojanā na tu nirhetukā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgos pa med pa yin mod kyi rgyu med pa can ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaśca heturindriyotpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po skye ba'i rgyu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indariyasatṛṣṇasya karmaviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi khyad par ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca viṣayādvitṛṣṇaḥ sa niyatamindriyādapīti /<br/> na tadviṣayavītarāgāṇāṃ ghrāṇajihvendriye saṃbhavitumarhataḥ /<br/> puruṣendraiyamapi vā kiṃ na nivarttate /<br/> aśobhākaratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang yul la sred pa dang bral ba de ni gdon mi za bar dbang po las kyang sred pa dang bral ba yin pas de dag gi yul la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la sna dang lce'i dbang po dag 'byung bar 'os pa ma yin no / yang na pho'i dbang po yang ci ste 'grub par mi 'gyur / mi mdzes par byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kośagatavastiguhyānāṃ kiṃ na śobheta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdoms kyi spa ba sbubs su nub pa rnams kyi ci'i phyir mi mdzes par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca prayojanavaśādutpattiḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgos pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba yang ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāraṇavaśādityaśobhākarasyāpi syādeva sati hetāvutpattiḥ /<br/> sūtraṃ tarhi virudhyate /<br/> avikalā ahīnendariyā iti /<br/> yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ /<br/> itarathā hi puruśendriyasyāpi syāt prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> evaṃ tuvarṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu'i dbang gis 'byung bas rgyu yod na mi mdzes par byed bzhin du yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid do / 'o na ni mdo las dbang po rnams mtshang ba med cing med pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo zhe na / de na dbang po gang dag srid pa de dag gis dbang po med pa ma yin bas 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod / de lta ma yin na pho'i dbang po yang yod par thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau /<br/> ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du lus kyi sgo nas skye mched drug la sred pa kun du spyod kyi yul gyi sgo nas ni ma yin bas de na sna dang lce'i dbang po dag ni yod pa nyid kyi dri dang ro dag ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puruṣendriye tu maithunasparśamukheneti /<br/> tasmātsiddhametadrūpadhātvāptāścaturdaśa dhātava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pho'i dbang po ni 'khrig pa reg pa'i sgo nas sred pa kun tu spyod pas de lta bas na gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i khams bcu bzhi'o zhes bya ba de grub po zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāptā manodharmamanovijñānadhātavaḥ /<br/> rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti /<br/> kati sāsravāḥ katyanāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni / chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes / khams gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams der skye ste / de'i phyir de ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams bcu dang de dag la rten pa dang dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete manodharmamanovijñānadhātava uktāḥ /<br/> sāsravānāsravā ete trayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na / yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang dag bshad pa / de gsum zag bcas zag pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye mārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasaṃghṛhītāste 'nāsravā anye sāsravāḥ /<br/> śeṣāstu sāsravāḥ /<br/> pañcadaśa dhātavaḥ śeṣāstvekāntasāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa de dag ni zag pa med pa yin no / gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin no / lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas so / lhag ma khams bco lnga po de dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dag ni du / rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa rnams ni du zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">savitarkavicārā hi pañca vijñānadhātavaḥ /<br/> nityamete vitarkavicārābhyāṃ saṃprayuktāḥ /<br/> avadhāraṇārtho hiśabdaḥ /<br/> antyāstrayastriprakārāḥ /<br/> manodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuścāntyāḥ /<br/> ete trayastriprakārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni / rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yin /  / 'di dag ni rtag tu rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin te / 'di ltar kha phyi rol du bltas pa'i phyir rtsing ba yin no / ni zhes bya ba ni nges par bzung ba'i don to / tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo / tha ma dag ni yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te / gsum po de dag ni rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ /<br/> dhyānāntare 'vitarkā vicāramātrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag las gzhan ba chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin no / bsam gtan khyad par can ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag yin no / bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyāddhyānāt prabhṛtyābhavāgrādavitarkā avicārāḥ /<br/> sarvaścāsaṃprayukto dharmadhāturdhyānātare aca vicāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi dang chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa thams cad dang bsam gtan khyad par can gyi dpyod pa ni rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkastū nityamaviatarko vicāramātro dvitīyavitarkābhāvāt vicārasaṃprayogācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa ni rtog pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang dpyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati /<br/> sa kathaṃ vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i dpyod pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gi nang du mi 'dun de ji skad du brjod par bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avicāro vitarkamātaraḥ /<br/> dvitīyavicārābhāvāt vitarkasaṃprayogācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpyod pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang rtog pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evocyate syuḥ savitarkasavicārāyāṃ bhūmau dharmāścatuḥprakārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa na chos rnam pa bzhi yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">savitarkāḥ savicārā vicāravitarkavarjyāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa ma rtogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avitarko vicāramātro vitarkaḥ /<br/> avitarkā avicārā asaṃprayuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag ni rtog pa'o / rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avicāro vitarkamātro vicāra iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam ni dpyod pa'o zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣā ubhayavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams ni gnyi ga spangs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams ni gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag ste / de dag ni mtshungs par ldan ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante /<br/> nirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpenāvikalpakāḥ /<br/> trividhaḥ kila vikalpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par shes pa'i tshogs ba lnga po rnams rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin na / ji ltar na rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya zhe na / nges par rtog dang rjes dran pa'i / rnam par rtog pa rnams mi rtog / rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum mo zhes grag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvābhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngo bo nyid dang nges par rtog pa dang rjes su dran ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadeṣāṃ svabhāvavikalpo 'sti /<br/> netarau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bas na de dag la ngo bo nyid kyi rtog pa yod kyi gzhan dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādavikalpakā ityucyante /<br/> yathā ekapādako 'śvo 'pādaka iti /<br/> tatra svabhāvavikalpo vitarkaḥ /<br/> sa caitteṣu paścānnirdekṣyate /<br/> itarau punaḥ kiṃsvabhāvau /<br/> yathākramaṃ /<br/> tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya ste / dper na rta rkang gcig pa la rkang med ces bya ba bzhin no / de la ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa yin te / de ni 'og nas sems las byung ba dag gi nang nas ston to / gzhan dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na / rim bzhin du / de dag yid kyi shes rab gyeng /  / yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manovijñānasaṃprayuktā prajñā mānasītyucyate /<br/> asamāhitā vyagretyucyate /<br/> sā hyabhinirūpaṇāvikalpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab ni yid kyi zhes bya'o / mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa ni gyeng ba zhes bya ste / de ni nges par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi dran pa nyid mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa thams cad ni rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kati sālambanāḥ katyanālambanāḥ /<br/> sapta sālambanāścittadhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / dmigs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na / dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt /<br/> ardhaṃ ca dharmataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams dang yid kyi khams te / sems kyi khams bdun po de dag ni yul 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go / chos kyi skye mched kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sālambanaṃ yaccaitasikasvabhāvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin te / sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham /<br/> katyupāttāḥ katyanupāttāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ldan pa ma yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya bar grub bo / zin pa rnams ni du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navānupāttāḥ /<br/> katame nava
