</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma zin pa rnams ni du zhe na / ma zin dgu / dgu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham /<br/> te cāṣṭau śabdaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa dang bcas pa bdun brgyad pa'i phyed dang bcas te bshad pa gang dag yin pa / brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime te navānupāttāḥ /<br/> sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuḥ śabdadhātuśca /<br/> anye nava dvidhā /<br/> upāttā anupāttāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams dang sgra'i khams dang khams dgu po de dag ni ma zin pa yin no / dgu po gzhan na rnam pa gnyis / zin pa dag kyang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyāḥ pratyutpannā upāttāḥ /<br/> atītānāgatā anupāttāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma zin pa dag kyang yin te / de la mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang da ltar byung ba rnams ni zin pa yin no / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma zin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyadhātavaḥ pratyutpannā indriyāvinirbhāgiṇa upāttāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams da ltar byung ba dbang po dang tha mi dad pa rnams ni zin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag ni ma zin pa rnams te / 'di lta ste rtsa ba ma gtogs pa'i skra dang ba spu dang sen mo dang so dag la yod pa dang phyis dang gcin dang mchil ma dang / snabs dang khrag la sogs pa dag la yod pa dang sa dang chu la sogs pa dag la yod pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāttamiti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> yaccittacaittairadhiṣṭhānabhāvenopiagṛhītamanugrahopaghātābhyāmanyonyānuvidhānāt /<br/> yalloke sacetanamityucyate /<br/> kati dhātavo bhūtasvabhāvāḥ kati bhautikāḥ /<br/> spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividhaṃ /<br/> bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ca /<br/> tatra bhūtāni catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / phan pa dang gnod pa dag gis phan tshun mthun par byed pa'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis rten gyi dngos por nye bar gzung ba ste / 'jig rten gyi na sems pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o / khams nga dag gcig ni 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin / du dag gcig ni 'byung ba las gyur pa yin zhe na / reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te / 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'o / de la 'byung ba dag ni bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhautikaṃ ślakṣṇatvādi saptavidham /<br/> bhūteṣu bhavatvāt /<br/> śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba las gyur pa ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa rnam pa bdun te / 'byung ba dag la yod pa'i phyir ro / lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcendriyadhātavaśca catvāro viṣayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung gyur / dbang po lnga'i khams dag dang yul bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete nava dhātavo bhautikā eva /<br/> dharmadhātvekadeśaśca /<br/> avijñaptisaṃjñako bhautikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams dgu po de rnams ni 'byung ba las gyur pa dag kho na'o / chos khams phyogs gcig kyang / 'byung ba las gyur pa ste / rnam par rig byed ma yin ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāḥ cittadhātavo dharmadhātuścāvijñaptivarjyo nobhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma sems kyi khams bdun dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa chos kyi khams ni gnyis ga ma yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtamātraṃ daśāyatanānīti bhadantbduddhadevaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa sangs rgyas lha na re ni skye mched bcu po dag ni 'byung ba tsam mo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni de lta ma yin te / mdo las 'byung ba rnams ni bzhi nyid dang sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du nges par gzung ba'i phyir la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ spraṣṭavyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang reg bya yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pas kyang sra ba la sogs pa mi 'dzin la / lus kyi dbang pos kyang kha dog la sogs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca sūtre cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las kyang dge slong mig ni nang gi skye mched yin te / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs dang ba gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ste lus kyi bar du yang de bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong gzugs rnams ni phyi'i skye mched yin te / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /<br/> evaṃ gandharasāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong sgra ni phyi'i skye mched yin te / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ste / dri dang ro yang de bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong reg bya rnams ni phyi'i skye mched yin te / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg bya'i skye mched kyi phyogs gcig kho nas 'byung ba rnams bsdus pa'i phyir lhag ma rnams ni 'byung ba dag ma yin no zhes bya bar gsal bar kun du bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti /<br/> tenāvinirbhadivarttino maṃsapiṇḍsyaiṣa upadeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las / gang mig gi sha'i gong bu la sra ba mkhrang bar gyur pa gang yin pa zhes gsungs so / de dang tha mi dad par 'jug pa'i sha'i gong bu la de skad du bstan par zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣaiti garbhavakrāntau maulasattvadravyasaṃdarśanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngal du 'jug pa las / dge song 'di ni khams drug pa yin no zhes gsungs so / sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi bstan pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ ṣaṭsparśyatanavacanāccaittābhāvaprasaṅgācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang reg pa'i skye mched drug ces gsungs pa'i phyir dang sems las byung ba rnams med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems nyid sems las byung ba rnams yin no zhes bya bar khas blangs par rigs pa yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita’ iti sūtre vacanātsarāgacittādi vacanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / 'du shes dang sems pa'i chos 'di ni sems las byung ba sems la brten pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmācyathoktaṃ dhātūnaṃ bhūtabhautikatvam /<br/> kati saṃcitāḥ katyasaṃcitāḥ /<br/> saṃcitā daśa rūpiṇaḥ /<br/> pañcendriyadhātavaḥ pañca viṣayāḥ saṃcitāḥ /<br/> paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na khams rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin yin no / bsags pa rnams ni du / bsags pa ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na / gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o / dbang po'i khams lnga dang yul lnga dag ni rdul phra rab 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir bsags pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate /<br/> chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams bco brgyad po dag las gcod par byed pa ni gang gcad par bya ba ni gang / sreg par byed pa ni gang / bsreg par bya ba ni gang / 'jal bar byed pa ni gang / gzhal bar bya ba ni gang zhe na / gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid / phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ paraśudārvādisaṃjñakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya zhes bya ba ste / dgra sta dang shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chedo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃbandhotpādinaḥ saṃghātasrotaso vibhaktotpādanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus pa'i rgyun 'brel bar 'byung ba can rnam par 'byed pa skyed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na kāyendriyādīni cchidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi dbang po la sogs pa ni gcad par bya ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niravaśeṣāṅgacchede tadadvaidhīkaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag ma lus par bcad na de dag la gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hīndriyāṇi dvidhā bhavanti /<br/> chinnasyāṅgasya nirindriyatvāt /<br/> na cāpi cchindanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnams la ni gnyis su 'gyur ba med de / gcad pa'i yan lag la dbang po med pa'i phyir ro / gcod par byed pa yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maṇiprabhāvadandhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nor bu'i 'od bzhin du dang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam /<br/> dahyate tulayatyevaṃ /<br/> tadeva dahyate tadeva tulayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid phyi rol gyi khams bzhi yin ba ltar de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal bar byed pa'o / de dag nyid bsreg par bya ba yin la / de dag nyid 'jal bar byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nendriyāṇyacchatvānmaṇiprabhāvat /<br/> na śabda ucheditvāt /<br/> vivādo dagdhṛtulyayoḥ /<br/> kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca /<br/> kecidāhustejodhātureva dagdhā gurutvameva ca tulyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang pa rnams ni ma yin te / dang ba'i phyir 'od bzhin no / sgra yang ma yin te / chad pa yin pa'i phyir ro / sreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra / kha cig na re ni khams bzhi po de dag nyid sreg par byed pa yang yin la / gzhal bar bya ba 'ang yin no zhes brjod do / kha cig na re ni me'i khams kho na sreg par byed pa yin la / lci ba nyid kho na gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhes brjod do / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i khams rnams ni du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ /<br/> āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni du / rgyu mthun pa las byung ba rnams ni du / rdzas dang ldan pa rnams ni du / skad cig pa rnams ni du zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākajaupacayikāḥ pañcādhyātmaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin las skyes pa dang / rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mig la sogs pa nang gi khams lnga po dag ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang yin la / rgyas pa las byung ba yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiḥṣyandikā na santi /<br/> tadvyatiriktaniṣyandābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ni med de / de dag las ma gtogs pa rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vipākahetorjātāḥ vipākajāḥ /<br/> madhyapadalopāt gorathavat /<br/> phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karma vipāka ityucyate /<br/> vipacyata iti kṛtvā /<br/> tasmājjātā vipākajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las skyas pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ste / bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ba lang gi shing rta zhes bya ba lta bu'o / yang na 'bras bu'i dus su phyin pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa zhes bya ste / rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / de las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalaṃ tu vipaktireveti vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa kho na yin pas rnam par smin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ /<br/> ṣaḍimāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa yin te / dper na 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di dag ni sngon gyi las yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āhārasaṃskārasvapnasamādhiviśeṣairupacitā aupacayikāḥ /<br/> brahṃacaryeṇa cetyeke /<br/> anupaghātamātraṃ tu tena syānnopacayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zas dang legs par bya ba dang gnyid log pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dag gis rgyas par byas pa rnams ni rgyas pa las byung ba dag go / gzhan dag na re ni tshangs par spyod pas kyang rgyas par byed do zhes zer te / des ni mi gnod pa tsam du zad kyi rgyas pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākasantānasyopacayasantānaḥ pratiprākāra ivārakṣā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyas pa'i rgyud ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyud la phyir bzhin du kun tu bsrung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śabda aupacayiko naiḥṣyandikaścāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra ni rgyas pa las byung ba dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākajaḥ /<br/> na śabdaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> īhātaḥ pravṛtteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min / ci'i phyir zhe na / 'dod dgur 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang bstan bcos btags pa las / tshig rtsub po spong ba shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid 'grub po zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā 'sau paraṃparetyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re ni brgyud pa 'di ni gsum pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dag las ni 'byung ba rnams 'grub / 'byung ba rnams las ni sgra 'grub bo zhes zer ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcamyasau paraṃparetyapare /<br/> karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re brgyud pa 'di ni lnga pa yin te / las dag las na rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'byung ba rnams 'grub / de dag las ni rgyas pa las byung ba rnams 'grub / de dag las ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba rnams 'grub bo / de dag las ni sgra 'grub po zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni lus kyi tshor ba yang las las skyes pa'i 'byung ba las byung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi śabdavad yuktivirodhaḥ syāt /<br/> apratighā aṣṭau naiḥṣyandikavipoākajāḥ /<br/> katame 'ṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sgra bzhin du rigs pa dang 'gal bar gyur na rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro / rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes / thogs pa med pa brgyad / brgyad gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuśca /<br/> naiḥṣyandikāḥ sabhāgasarvatragahetujanitāḥ /<br/> vipākajā vipākahetujanitāḥ /<br/> aupacayikā na santyapratighānāṃ sañābhāvāt /<br/> tridhā 'nye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi khams bdun dag dang chos kyi khams te skal pa mnyam ba dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyus bskyed pa rnams ni rgyu mthun ba las byung ba dag go / rnam par smin pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag go / rgyas pa las byung ba ni med de / thogs pa med pa rnams la rgyas pa med pa'i phyir ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye catvāraḥ śeṣā rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyadhātavaḥ /<br/> te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api /<br/> dravyavānekaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan rnam gsum / gzhan ni lhag ma bzhi po gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams dag ste / de dag ni rnam par smin pa las skyes ba dag kyang yin / rgyas pa las byung ba dag kyang yin / rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag kyang yin no / rdzas dang lhan cig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtaṃ hi sāratvād dravyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas ni brtan pa'i phyir rdzas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca dharmadhātāvastyato dharmadhātureko dravyayuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang chos kyi khams la yod pas de'i phyir chos kyi khams gcig pu rdzas dang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣaṇikāḥ paścimāstrayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha ma gsum skad cig ma ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca pāṭhakrameṇa paścimāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'don pa'i rim pas tha ma dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante /<br/> anyasaṃbhūtasaṃskṛto nāsti kaścidanaiḥṣyandikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni zag pa med pa'i bzod pa'i dang po sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs la skad cig ma gcig rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ma yin par 'gyur te / de'i phyir skad cig ma rnams zhes bya'o / 'dus byas gzhan ni rgyu mthun ba las ma byung ba 'ga' yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca /<br/> śeṣāstatsahabhuvo dharmadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no / lhag ma de dang lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni chos kyi khams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ vicāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścakṣurdhātunā 'samanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate cakṣurvijñānadhātunā 'pi saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis mig gi khams dang mi ldan pa las ldan pa 'thob pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo vā cakṣurvijñānadhātunā cakṣurdhātunā 'pi saḥ /<br/> āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang mig gi rnam par shes pa dang yin pa de mig gi khams dang yang yin nam zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang ni / rnam shes khams dag so so dang / lhan cig tu yang 'thob pa yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthak tāvat syāccakṣurdhātunā na cakṣurvijñānadhātunā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig so so ni mig gi khams dang yin la / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau krameṇa cakṣurindriyaṃ pratilabhamānaḥ /<br/> ārupyadhātucyutaśca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapadyamānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na rim gyis mig gi dbang po 'thob pa dang gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skye ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāccakṣurvijñānadhātunā na cakṣurdhātunā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yin la mig gi khams dang ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyādidhyānopapannaścakṣurvijñāna saṃmukhīkurvāṇastatpracyutaścādhastādupapadyamānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon du byed pa dang de dag nas shi 'phos nas 'og mar skye ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahāpi syādubhayena samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate /<br/> ārūpyadhātucyutaḥ kāmadhātau brahmaloke copapadyamānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig tu yang ni gnyi ga dang ldan pa yang yod de / gzugs med pa'i khams nas shi 'phos nas 'dod pa'i khams dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayena /<br/> etānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga dang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataścakṣurvijñānadhātunā 'pi saḥ /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang mig gi khams dang ldan pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yang yin nam zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭirdvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapannaścakṣurvijñānāsaṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon du mi byed pa na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā kāmadhātāvalabdhavihīna cakṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na mig ma thob ba dang nyams pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan /<br/> catuṛthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na mig gi thob pa dang ma nyams pa dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa dang bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa lta bu'o / bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cakṣurdhāturūpadhātvoścakṣurvijñānarūpadhātvośca pratilambhasamanvāgamau yathāyogamabhyūhitavyau /<br/> etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti /<br/> katyādhyātmikā dhātavaḥ kati bāhyāḥ /<br/> dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ /<br/> katame dvādaśa /<br/> hitvā rūpādan
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mig gi khams dang gzugs dag dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang gzugs dag 'thob pa dang ldan ba dag kyang ci rigs par brtag par bya'o / lhan cig tu yang zhes bya ba'i yang gi sgra ni zhar la 'ongs pa 'di bsdu ba'i don to / khams du dag gcig ni nang gi yin / du dag gcig ni phyi'i yin zhe na / nang gi bcu gnyis / bcu gnyis gang dag ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la sogs pa ma gtogs rnam par shes pa drug dang rten drug ste / khams bcu gnyis po de dag ni nang gi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpādayastu ṣaḍ viṣayadhātavo bāhyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi khams drug po de dag ni phyi'i yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmanyasati kathamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med na ji ltar na nang gi 'am / phyi'i yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahaṅkārasanniśrayatvāccittamātmetyupacaryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems ni ngar 'dzin pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir bdag ces nye bar 'dogs te / mkhas pas bdag nyid shin tu ni / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ /<br/> ityuktam /<br/> cittasya cānyatra damanamuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dul bas mtho ris thob par 'gyur / zhes gsungs la / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan las / sems dul ba ni legs pa ste / sems dul bas ni bde ba 'dren
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham iti /<br/> ata ātmabhūtasya cittasyāśrayabhāvena pratyāsannatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes sems dul ba yan par gsungs pas de'i phyir mig la sogs pa ni sems bdag tu gyur pa'i rten gyi dngos por nye bar gyur pa'i phyir nang gi nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurādīnāmādhyātmikatvaṃ rūpādīnāṃ viṣayabhāvād bāhyatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni yul du gyur pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi nyid yin no / de lta na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po dag nang gi yin par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hyete manodhātutvamaprāptāścittasyāśrayībhavanti /<br/> yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag yid kyi khams nyid du ma gyur pa ni sems kyi rten du mi 'gyur ro zhe na / gang gi tshe yin pa de'i tshe na yang de dag nyid de dag yin te mtshan nyid las ni mi 'da'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi manodhāturatīta eva syānnānāgatapratyutpannaḥ /<br/> iṣyante cāṣṭādaśa dhātavastraiyadhvikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na yid kyi khams 'das pa kho na yin par 'gyur gyi ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yin par ni mi 'gyur ba zhig na khams bco brgyad po dag ni dus gsum pa yin par yang 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yid kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid ma yin par gyur na 'das pa'i dus na yang yid kyi khams su rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi lakṣaṇasyādhvasu vyabhicāro 'stīti /<br/> kati dhātavaḥ sabhāgāḥ kati tatsabhāgāḥ /<br/> ekāntena tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid ni dus rnams su 'khrul pa med do / brten pa dang bcas pa'i khams rnams ni du / de dang mtshungs pa rnams ni du zhe na / re zhig gcig tu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmasaṃjñakaḥ /<br/> sabhāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos zhes bya ba ni / brten pa dang bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate /<br/> na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig rnam par shes pa gang gi yul du nges la gal te de la rnam par shes pa de skyes pa 'am skyes pa'i chos can gyi yul de ni brten pa dang bcas pa zhes bya la / gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa ma skyes pa'am skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khams gang yin pa de ni 'ga' yang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /<br/> tasya ca svabhāvasahabhūnirmuktāḥ sarvadharmā ālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni gdon mi za bar chos thams cad la bdag med do snyam pa'i sems 'di skye'o / de'i dmigs pa yang rang gi ngo bo dang lhan cig 'byung ba ma gtogs pa chos thams cad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi skad cig ma de yang sems kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi dmigs pa ma yin pas skad cig ma gnyis kyi dmigs par ni chos thams cad 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmād dharmadhātuarnityaṃ sabhāgaḥ /<br/> tatsabhāgāśca śeṣāḥ /<br/> sabhāgaśceti caśabdaḥ /<br/> ko 'yaṃ tatsabhāgo nāma /<br/> yo na svakarmakṛt /<br/> uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na chos kyi khams ni rtag tu brten pa dang bcas pa yin no / lhag ma ni / de dang mtshungs pa dag kyang yin / kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni brten pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin pa'o / de dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na / gang zhig rang gi las mi byed / gang rang gi las byed pa de ni brten pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mig gang gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang lta ba 'am lta bar 'gyur ba'i mig de ni brten pa dang bcas zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvanmanaḥ svena viṣayakāritreṇa vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du yid kyi bar la yang rang rang gi yul la byed pas brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsabhāgaṃ cakṣuḥ kāśmīrāṇāṃ caturvidham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na de dang mtshungs pa'i mig ni rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi /<br/> pāścāttyānāṃ punaḥ pañcavidham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs rnams ma mthong bar 'gags pa dang 'gag pa dang 'gag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang mi skye ba'i chos gang yin ba'o / nub phyogs pa rnams kyi ltar na rnam pa lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi skye ba'i chos de nyid rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyis su phye ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat kāyo veditavyaḥ /<br/> manastvanutpattidharmakameva tatsabhāgam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o / yid ni mi skye ba'i chos kho na de 'dra ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni /<br/> tatsabhāgāni caturvidhāni /<br/> yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs gang dag mig gis mthong bar gyur pa dang mthong ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni brten pa dang bcas pa rnams so / de dang 'dra ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste / gang dag ma mthong ba nyid du 'gags pa dang 'gag pa dang 'gag par 'gyur ba dang gang dag mi skye ba'i chos rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyāni /<br/> svendriyakāritreṇa sabhāgatatsabhāgāni veditavyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du reg bya'i bar dag la yang rang gi dbang po'i byed pas de dang 'dra ba dag tu rig par bya'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadekasya cakṣuḥ sabhāgaṃ tatsarveṣām /<br/> evaṃ tatsabhāgamapi /<br/> tatha yāvanmanaḥ /<br/> rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig gi mig brten pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi yin no / de dang mtshungs pa rnams kyang de bzhin te / yid kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o / gzugs ni gang zhig lta ba de'i brten pa dang bcas pa yin la gang mi lta ba de'i ni de dang mtshungs pa yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs gang la gcig lta ba de la mang po yang lta bar 'gyur ba srid pa yod de / dper na zla ba dang bro gar dang gyad dag la lta ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gnyis mig gcig gis lta bar 'gyur ba srid pa ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'syāsādhāraṇatvādekasantānavaśena vyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'di thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rgyud gcig gi dbang gis rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpasya tu sādhāraṇatvāt anekasantānavaśena /<br/> yathā raupamevaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadhātavo veditavyāḥ /<br/> bhavatu śabda evam /<br/> gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir rgyud ma'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag go / gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams dag la yang rig par bya'o / sgra ni de lta yin du chug na dri la sogs pa ni gang dag gcig gis 'dzin pa de dag gzhan gyis mi 'dzin te / phrad nas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / de lta bas na de dag kyang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa bzhin du bsgre ba'i rigs so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyetadevamapi tveśāmapi saṃbhavaṃ prati sādhāraṇatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bu yod mod kyi 'on kyang de dag la yang srid pa'i phyir thun mong ba nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi /<br/> na tvevaṃ cakṣurādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig gis sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed par 'gyur ba'i dri la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag nyid gzhan dag gi yang yin pa srid pa de ni yod kyi mig la sogs pa ni de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāndeṣāṃ rūpādivadatideśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de dag ni gzugs bzhin du bsgre'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgatvamutpattyanutpattidharmitvādyathā manodhātoḥ /<br/> sabhāga iti ko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag gi brten pa dang bcas pa dang de dang mtshungs pa nyid ni skye ba dang mi skye ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir yid kyi khams ji lta ba bzhin no / brten pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyaviṣayavijñānānāmanyonyabhajanaṃ kāritrabhajanaṃ vā bhāgaḥ /<br/> sa eṣāmastīti sabhāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams phan tshun brten pa 'am / byed pa la brten pa ni brten pa'o / de 'di dag la yod pas brten pa dang bcas pa rnams sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśasamānakāryatvādvā /<br/> ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu reg pa 'dra ba'i phyir brten pa mtshungs pa'o / gang dag brten pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa de dag ni brten pa dang bcas pa de dag dang rigs 'dra ba'i phyir de dag dang mtshungs pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /<br/> rūpiṇastāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i khams rnams ni du / bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni du / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśa bhāvanayā heyāḥ pañca ca /<br/> vijñānadhātavaḥ /<br/> antyāstrayastridhā /<br/> manodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca /<br/> ete trayo dhātavaḥ pāṭhānupūrvyā 'ntyāstriprakārāḥ /<br/> aṣṭāśītyanuśayāḥ tatsahabhuvastatpraptayaśāca sānucarā daṛśanaheyāḥ /<br/> śeṣāḥ sāsravā bhāvanāheyāḥ /<br/> anāsravā aheyāḥ /<br/> nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma /<br/> āryamārgavirodhitvāt na tad daṛśanaprahātavyam /<br/> eṣa hi saṃkṣepaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gzugs can bcu ni bsgoms pas spang bya yin / lnga yang yin te rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag go / tha ma'i gsum rnam gsum / yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang khams gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ste / phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad dang / de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de dag gi thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / zag pa dang bcas pa lhag ma rnams ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / zag pa med pa rnams ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag go / so so'i skye bo nyid dang ngan song ba'i lus dang ngag gi las kyang 'phags pa'i lam dang 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzhan yang yod ba ma yin nam zhe na / de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin te / mdor bsdu ba ni 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na dṛṣṭiheyamakliṣṭaṃ na rūpaṃ nāpyaḍaḍtḥajaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs can min mthong spang min / gzugs min drug pa min skyes min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti kiñcidakliṣṭaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ nāpi rūpam /<br/> akliṣṭavyākṛtaṃ ca pṛthagjanatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba cung zad kyang med la gzugs kyang ma yin no / so so'i skye bo nyid ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i lung du ma bstan pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samucchinnakuśalamūlavītarāgāṇāmapi tatsamanvāmat rūpaṃ kāyavākkarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro / lus dang ngag gi las ni gzugs yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānna darśanaprahātavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyeṣva vipratipatterduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau prthagjanatvaprasaṅgācca /<br/> nāpyaṣaṣṭajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa dag la log par mi rtog pa'i phyir dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa na so so'i skye bo nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro / drug pa las ma skyes pa yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṣṭhamucyate mana āyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drug pa zhes bya ba ni yid kyi skye mched do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gzhan pa las skyes pa ni drug pa las ma skyes pa ste / dbang po lnga las skyes pa gang yin pa ste / de yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams bco brgyad po dag las lta ba ni du / lta ba ma yin pa ni du zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuśca dharmadhātośca pradeśu dṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> katamaḥ sa ityāha /<br/> aṣṭadhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni / lta ba yin te / de gang zhe na / smras pa / rnam pa brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa la lta ba lnga dag dang 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / slob pa'i lta ba dang mi slob pa'i lta ba ste / chos kyi khams rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag ni lta ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra satkāyadṛṣṭyādīnāmanuśāyanirdeśe nirddeśaḥ prāptakālo bhaviṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni lta ba ma yin no / de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa ni phra rgyas bstan par ston pa'i dus la 'bab par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikī punaḥ samyagdṛṣṭirmanovijñānasaṃprayuktā kuśalasāsravā prajñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣasyanāsravā dṛṣṭiḥ ṣaikṣī aśaikṣasya akśaikṣī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i lta ba ni slob pa'i 'o / mi slob pa ni mi slob pa'i 'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sameghāmegharatrindivarūpadarśanavat kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikīśaikṣyaśaikṣībhirdṛṣṭibhirdharmadarśanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprin dang bcas pa dang sprin med pa'i mtshan mo dang nyin mo gzugs la lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten pa nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lta ba dag gis chos la lta ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmāllaudikī samyagdṛṣṭirmanovijñānasaṃprayuktaivocyate /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa kho na la 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya zhe na / 'di ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcavijñānasahajā dhīrna dṛṣṭiratīraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam shes lnga dang mtshungs skyes blo / nges rtog med phyir lta ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santīrikā hi dṛṣṭirupadhyānapravṛttattvāt /<br/> na caivaṃ pañcavijñānasahājā prajñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog par byed pa ni lta ba yin te / nges par sems pa la zhugs pa dag lta ba yin na rnam par shes pa lnga dang lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab ni de lta ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādsau na dṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni lta ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can nam nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa gzhan yang lta ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuridānīmasantīrakatve kathaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> rūpālocanārthena /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni mig kyang rtog par byed pa nyid med na / ji ltar lta ba yin zhe na / gzugs la lta ba'i don gyis te / gang gi phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gis gzugs rnams mthong
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cakṣuḥ paśyedanyavijñānasamaṅgino 'pi paśyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mig gis mthong bar gyur na / rnam par shes pa gzhan dang ldan pas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vai sarvaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sabhāgaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig thams cad kyis mthong ba ni ma yin pa nyid do / 'o na ci zhe na / brten bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa de'i cho mthong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu /<br/> na tadāśritam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni mig la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa de kho nas mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānaṃ /<br/> paśyatīti śasyamavijñātum /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pas mthong ngo zhes nges par bya bar nus pa ni min no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang phyir bar du chod pa yi / gzugs ni mthong ba min phyir lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir rtsig pa la sogs pas bar du chod pa'i gzugs mi mthong ngo zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par shes pas mthong bar gyur na de ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa la yang thogs pa med pas gzugs bsgribs pa la yang mthong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati /<br/> kiṃ khalu notpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs pa la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye ba nyid de / de bas na ma skyes pas ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur / ci ste mi skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate /<br/> kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi ltar na mig gis mthong ba de'i ltar na ni mig thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bsgribs pa la 'jug pa med pas rnam par shes pa yang rten dang lhan cig tu yul gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir mi skye bar mi rung ngo / mig kyang lus kyi dbang po bzhin du yul de phrad pa zhig yin nam ci na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapratighatvāt /<br/> kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāmbubhiścāntaritaṃ kathaṃ dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bsgribs pa mi mthong mching bu dang lhang tsher dang shel dang chu dag gis bar du chod pa yang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapratighatvāccakṣuṣa āvṛtasya rūpasyādarśanam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na mig thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzugs bsgribs pa mi mthong ba ni ma yin no / 'o na ji lta zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam /<br/> yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la snang ba la gegs med na gzugs bsgribs bzhin du yang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba nyid yin la / gang la gegs yod pa de ni mi skye bas ma skyes pa'i phyir bsgribs pa mi mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭveti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang mdo las / gang mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenāśrayeṇetyayamatrābhisandhiryathā manasā dharmān vijñāye tyāha /<br/> na ca mano dharmān vijānāti /<br/> atītatvāt /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> manovijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni dgongs pa ni de la brten te zhes bya ba 'di yin te / dper na yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes par byas nas zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / yid ni 'das pa yin pa'i phyir / chos rnams rnam par mi shes so / 'o na ci ltar zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśritakarma vā āśrayasyopacaryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi rnam par shes pas so / yang na brten pa'i las brten la nye bar btags pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na khri'u dag 'bod do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāniti /<br/> na ca tāni cakṣuṣā vijñāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mdo las / mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba sdug pa rnams zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / de dag mig gis rnam par mi shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca sūtre cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /<br/> darśane tatra dvārākhyā /<br/> nahyetadyujyate /<br/> cakṣurdārśanaṃ arūpāṇāṃ darśnāyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / bram ze mig ni 'di lta ste / gzugs rnams mthong bar bya ba la sgo yin no zhes kyang gsungs te / de'i phyir mig gi sgo nas mig gi rnam par shes pas mthong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud do / der ni lta ba la sgo zhes bya bar zad do / mig ni gzugs rnams mthong bar bya ba la lta ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par shes pas mthong na gang gis rnam par shes she na / 'di gnyis la khyad par yang ci zhig yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis gzugs rnam par shes pa de nyid kyis 'di mi mthong mod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi /<br/> anye punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na shes rab 'ga' zhig la mthong zhes kyang bya / rab tu shes pa zhes kyang bya ba de bzhin du / rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig la mthong zhes kyang bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriyeti vaktavyam /<br/> tadetadacodyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya'o / gzhan dag na re ni gal te mig gis mthong na mig byed pa por gyur pa'i lta ba'i bya ba gzhan gang zhig yin pa brjod dgos so zhes zer ro / de ni klan kar mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi vijñānaṃ vijānātītīṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar rnam par shes pas shas so zhes bya bar 'dod la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca tatra kartṛkriyābhedaḥ /<br/> evamatrāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la byed pa po dang bya ba'i bye brag kyang med pa de bzhin du 'di la yang rung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apare punarbruvate /<br/> cakṣurvijñānaṃ darśanaṃ tasyāśrayabhāvāccakṣuḥ paśyatītyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ni mthong ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa yin la / mig ni de'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir mthong ba zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā nādasyāśrayabhāvāt ghaṇṭā nadatītyucyate iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na sgrogs ba'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir dril sgrogs sa zhas bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu caīvaṃ vijñānasyāśrayabhāvācakṣurvijānātīti prāpnoti /<br/> na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur ba'i phyir rnam par shes so zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvijñānaṃ darśanamiti ruḍhaṃ loke /<br/> tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten na rnam par shes pa de ni mthong ba'o zhes grags te / 'di ltar de skyes na gzugs mthong ngo zhes zer gyi rnam par shes so zhes ni mi zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vibhāṣāyāmapyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ saṃpraptaṃ cakṣurvijñānānubhūtaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyata iti /<br/> tasmāccakṣuḥ paśyatītyevocyate na vijānātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu bshad pa las kyang / mig dang phrad cing rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba la mthong ba zhes bya ba'o zhes 'byung ste / de lta bas na mig gis mthong ba kho na zhes bya'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānaṃ tu sānnidhyamātreṇa rūpaṃ vijānātītyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa zhes ni mi bya'o / rnam par shes pa ni yod pa tsam gyis gzugs rnam par shes pas so zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sūryo divasakara iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na nyi mas nyin par byed do zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra sautrāntikā āhuḥ /<br/> kimidamākāśaṃ khādyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams na re ni nam mkha' ldan pa 'dis ci dgos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurhi pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /<br/> tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba de la lta ba ni su zhig yin / lta ba ni gang zhig yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivryāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātraṃ hetuphalamātraṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni byed pa med pa dang chos tsam dang rgyu dang 'bras bu tsam du zad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vyavahārārthaṃ cchandata upacārāḥ kriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yang tha snyad du gdags pa'i don du 'dun pa'i sgo nas mig gis mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥ paśyati vijñānaṃ vijānātīti nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes nye bar 'dogs par byed pas 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ hi bhagavatā janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvediti /<br/> eṣa tu kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ siddhāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ljongs kyi mi'i tshig la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o / 'jig rten gyi ming la mngon par brgyug par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / mig gis mthong ngo / rna bas thos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti /<br/> tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snas tshor ro / lces myong ngo / lus kyis reg go / yid kyis rnam par shes so zhes bya ba 'di ni kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mtha' yin no / ci mig gcig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngam / 'on te gnyi gas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nātra niyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la nges pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhābhyāmapi cakṣubhuyāṃ paśyati vyaktadarśanāt /<br/> ubhābhyāmapi cakṣurbhyāṃ paśyatītyābhidhārmikāḥ /<br/> tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig ni gnyi ga dag gis kyang / mthong ste gsal bar mthong phyir ro / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re mig gnyi gas kyang mthong ste / 'di ltar gnyi ga phye na gsal bar rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati /<br/> naikatarānyathībhāvāt /<br/> na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gcig phye la gnyis pa phyed phye na zla ba gnyis su 'dzin gyi gang yang rung ba zhig gzhan du gyur na nim yin no / rten rnam par chad par thal bar yang med de / rnam par shes pa ni gzugs bzhin du yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mig gis mthong ba dang rna bas thos pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yin na ci 'di dag yul dang phrad pa zhig gam / 'on te ma phrad pa zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥśrotramano 'prāptaviṣayaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang yid dang rna ba ni / yul dang ma phrad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar gzugs rgyang ring po nas mthong zhing mig la yod pa'i mig sman mi mthong la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dūrācchabdaṃ śṛṇoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du sgra rgyang ring po nas thos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul dang phrad pa nyid cig yin na ni 'di na bsam gtan pa rnams la lha'i mig dang rna ba skye bar mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghrāṇādivat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna la sogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mig yul dang ma phrad pa yin na ci'i phyir thag ring ba dang bar du chod pa ma phrad pa thams cad mi mthong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvadayskānto na sarvamaprāptamayaḥ karṣati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig khab long gis kyang lcags ma phrad pa thams cad ji ltar mi 'dren
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptaviṣayatve 'pi caitatsamānam /<br/> kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul dang phrad pa nyid cig yin na yang ci'i phyir mig sman nam thur ma phrad pa thams cad mi mthong ste de ni mtshungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ /<br/> sahabhūgandhādyagrahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar yang sna la sogs pa yul dang phrad pa yin yang lhan ci skyes pa'i dri la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa'i phyir thams cad ni ma yin ba de bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cakṣuṣo 'pyaprāptaḥ syānna tu sarvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig kyang ma phrad pa yin mod kyi thams cad ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manastvarūpitvāt prāptumevāśaktam /<br/> kecit punaḥ śrotraṃ praptāprāptaviṣayaṃ manyayante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir phrad pa nyid du mi nus so / yang kha cig ni rna ba'i nang du yang sgra thos pa'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karṇabhyantare 'pi śabdaśravaṇāt /<br/> śeṣaṃ tu ghrāṇajihvākāyākhyam /<br/> trayamanyathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rna ba ni yul dang phrad pa dang ma phrad pa yang yin par sems so / lhag ma sna dang lce dang lus zhes bya ba / gsum gzhan du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptaviṣayamityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghrāṇaṃ kathaṃ prāptaviṣayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna ji ltar yul dang phrad pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirucchvāsasya gandhāgrahaṇāt /<br/> keyaṃ prāptirnāma /<br/> nirantarotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbugs ma brngubs par dri mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / phrad pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / 'dab chags par 'byung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśantyanyonyamāhosvinna /<br/> na spṛśantīti kāśmīrakāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun reg gam 'on te mi reg ce na / kha che ba rnams na re mi reg go zhes zer ro / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tāvat sarvānmanā spṛśeyurmiśrībhaveyurdravyāṇi /<br/> athaikadeśena sāvayavāḥ prasajyeran /<br/> niravayavāśca paramāṇavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gal te bdag nyid thams cad kyis reg par 'gyur na ni rdzas rnams 'dres par 'gyur ro / 'on te phyogs gcig gis reg na ni cha shas dang bcas ba dag tu thal bar 'gyur ba zhig na rdul phra rab rnams ni cha shas med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ śabdābhiniśpattirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ji ltar sgra mngon bar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale /<br/> kathaṃ citaṃ pratyāhataṃ na viśīryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir te / gal te reg par gyur na lag ba sa lag pa la bsnun na 'bying bar 'gyur la / rdo bas rdo ba la bsnun na yang 'bying bar 'gyur ro / ji ltar bsags pa la brgyab na zhigs par mi 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyudhātusaṃdhāritatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung gi khams kyis bzung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti /<br/> kathamidānīṃ nirantara prāptyā prāptaviṣayaṃ trayamucyate /<br/> tadevaiṣāṃ niruttaratvaṃ yanmadhye nāsti kiñcit
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung gi khams kha cig ni 'jig bar zhugs pa yin te dper na 'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o / kha cig ni 'dzin par zhugs pa yin te dper na chags pa'i tshe lta bu'o / da ni ji ltar 'dab chags par phrad bas gsum po yul dang phrad pa zhes bya zhe na / de dag gi dbus na cung zad kyang med pa gang yin pa da kho na 'dab chags ba nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apikhlu saṃghātāḥ sāvayavatvāt spṛśantītyadvīṣaḥ /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'dus pa rnams ni cha shas dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir reg par 'gyur bas nyes pa med do / de ltar byas na bye brag tu bshad pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāhakāraṇaṃ prati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa zhig skyes pa 'am / 'on te ma reg pa'i rgyu can zhig skye zhes dris nas smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācit spṛṣṭahetukamaspṛṣṭamutpadhate yadā viśīryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu'i phyir res 'ga' ni rig pa'i rgyu chan gyi ma reg pa skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācidaspṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayaṃ gacchati /<br/> kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi cho rnam par zhigs pa na'o / res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste / gang gi cho bsags par 'gyur ba na'o / res 'ga' ni reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste / gang gi tshe bsags pa dang ldan pa bsags pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācidaspṛṣṭahetukamaspṛṣṭaṃ yadā vātāyanaraja iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi ma reg pa skye ste dper na nyi zer gyi rdul lta bu'o zhes 'byang ba'i gzung 'di yang 'thad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi paramāṇavaḥ spṛśeyuruttarakṣaṇāvasthānaṃ syāditi bhadantavasumitraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa dbyig bshes na re ni rdul phra rab rnams reg par gyur na ni skad cig ma phyi mar gnas bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na spṛśanti /<br/> nirantare tu spṛṣṭasaṃjñeti bhadantaḥ /<br/> bhadantamataṃ caiṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa na re ni reg pa ni med kyi 'dab chags pa la reg go snyam du 'du shes par zad do zhes zer te / btsun pa'i lugs 'dod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta /<br/> yataḥ sapratighā iṣyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na ni rdul phra rab bar dang bcas pa rnams kyis bar stong pa dag tu 'gro ba la su zhig 'gog na 'di ltar thogs pa dang bcas pa dag tu 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naca paramāṇubhyo 'nye saṃghātā iti /<br/> ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab rnams las bsags pa dag gzhan yang ma yin pas de dag kho na bsags pa la reg pa yin te dper na gzugs su rung ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rdul phra rab la phyogs cha tha dad par rtog na ni reg gam ma reg kyang rung ste / cha shas dang bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">no cet spṛṣṭasyāpyaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma yin na ni / reg kyang thal bar mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarebhiścakṣurādibhirātmaparimāṇatulyasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavatyāśuvṛttyā ca parvatādīnāmalātakrādivadāhosvittulyātulyasya /<br/> yāni tāvadetāni prāptaviṣayāṇyuktānyebhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i mig la sogs pa 'di dag gis bdag nyid kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i don la mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin du myur du 'jug pas ri la sogs pa 'dzin tam / 'on te mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa zhig la 'dzin ce na / re zhig gang dag yul dang phrad par bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhirghrāṇādibhistulyaviṣayagrahaṇaṃ matam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna la sogs pa gsum po de dag rnams kyis ni / yul ni mnyam par 'dzin par 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti /<br/> cakṣuḥśrotrābhyāṃ tvaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yul gyi rdul phra rab rnams dang phrad nas rnam par shes pa skyed de / mig dang rna ba dag gis ni ma nges te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācidalpīyāṃso yadā vālāgraṃ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni chung ste gang gi tshe skra'i rtse mo mthong ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācit samā yadā drākṣāphataṃ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni mnyam ste gang gi tshe rgun 'brum mthong ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni che ste gang gi tshe mig phye ba tsam gyis ri chen po mthong ba na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam śrotreṇa maśakameghādiśabdaśravaṇe ghoṣam /<br/> manastvamūrttivadeveti nāsya parimāṇaparicchedaḥ saṃpradhāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rna bas sbrang bu dang 'brug la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o / yid ni lus can ma yin pa kho na bas 'di'i tshad yongs su chad pa ni mi spyod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katahaṃ punareṣāṃ cakṣurādīndriyaparamāṇūnāṃ saṃniveśaḥ /<br/> cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavastāvadakṣitārakāyāmajājīpuṣpavadavasthitāḥ /<br/> acchacarmāvacchāditāstu na vikīryante /<br/> adharauttaryeṇa piṇḍavadavasthitā ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang mig gi dbang po la sogs pa 'di dag gi rdul phra rab rnams ji ltar gnas she na / re zhig mig gi rdul phra rab rnams ni mig gi 'bras bu la / go snyod kyi me tog bzhin du gnas te / kha dog dang bcas bkab pas gyes par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cānyo 'nyamāvṛṇvanti sphaṭikavadacchatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gong bu bzhin du bla 'og na gnas te / shel bzhin du dang ba'i phyir phan tshun mi sgrib po zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrotrendriyaparamāṇavo bhūrjābhyantarāvasthitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rna ba'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang na gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghrāṇendriyaparamāṇavo ghaṭābhyantareṇa śalākāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mtshul pa'i nang na gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādyāni trīṇīndriyāṇi mālāvadavasthitāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang po gsum ni phreng ba bzhin du gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jihvendriyaparamāṇvo 'rdhacandravat
