</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vālāgramātraṃ kila madhyajivhāyāṃ jihvendriyaparamāṇubhirasphuṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lce'i dbus na skra'i rtse mo'i byon tsam zhig lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab dag gis ma khebs so zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyendriyaparamāṇavaḥ kāyavadavasthitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni lus bzhin du gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">strīndriyaparamāṇavo bherīkaṭāhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mo'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rnga'i sbubs lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puruṣendriyaparamāṇavo 'ṅguṣṭhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pho'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mthe bong lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ /<br/> kadācideke sabhāgāḥ eke tatsabhāgāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mig gi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams res 'ga' ni thams cad bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin no / res 'ga' ni de dang mtshungs pa dag yin no / res 'ga' ni kha cig bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin la / kha cig de dang mtshungs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam yāvajjihvendriyaparamāṇavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyendriyaparamāṇavastu sarve sabhāgā na bhavanti /<br/> pradīptanarakābhyantarāvaruddhānāmapi hyaparimāṇāḥ kāyendriyaparamāṇavastatsabhāgā bhavanti /<br/> sarvaiḥ kila vijñānotpattāvāśrayo viśīryeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni ril gyis bsten pa dang bcas pa ni med de / rab tu 'bar ba'i dmyal ba'i nang na 'khod pa rnams la yang lus kyi dbang pa'i rdul phra rab tshad med ba zhig de dang mtshungs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caika indriyaparamāṇurviṣayaparamāṇurvā vijñānaṃ janayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa bskyed na ni lus zhig par 'gyur ro lo / dbang po'i rdul phra rab bam yul gyi rdul phra rab gcig gis rnam par shes bskyed pa ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃcitāśrayālambanatvāt pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānām /<br/> ata evānidarśanaḥ paramāṇuradṛśyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gi rten dang dmigs pa ni bsags pa yin pa'i phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir rdul phra rab ni mi mthong ba'i phyir bstan du med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi khams drug po bshad pa gang dag yin pa'i dag ji ltar lnga rnams kyi yul da ltar yin la / tha ma'i dus gsum yin pa ltar rten kyang de lta bu yin nam zhe na / smras pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caramasyāśrayo 'tītaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci zhe na / tha ma'i rten 'das
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manovijñānadhātoḥ samanantaraniruddhaṃ mana āśrayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni 'gags ma thag pa'i yid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcānāṃ sahajaśca taiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga rnams kyi / de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītaśceti caśabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa yang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rten ni mig yin pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang lus yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag 'das pa'i rten ni yid yin no / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag gi rten ni dbang po gnyis gnyis yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evocyate yaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayabhāvena samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi sa tasyeti /<br/> catuṣkotikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi phyir gang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi dngos por yin pa de de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis dngos por yang yin zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā kotiścakṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni mig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā samanantarātītaścaitasiko dharmadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni chos kyi khams sems las byung ba 'das ma thag pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā samanantarātītaṃ manaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i yid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthī koṭiruktanirmuktā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānasya svamindriyaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rang gi dbang po brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manovijñānasya pūrvapādakaḥ /<br/> yastāvadāśrayabhāvena samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ni tshig snga ma dang sbyor ba ste / re zhig gang rten gyi dngos por yin pa de ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syātsamanantarapratyayabhāvena nāśrayabhāvena /<br/> samanantarābhyatītaścetasiko dharmadhāturiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yin la rten gyi dngos por ma yin pa yang yod de / chos kyi khams sems las byung ba 'das ma thag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni gnyi ga la rag lus te skye na / ci'i phyir mig la sogs pa kho na la rten zhes bya'i gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayāścakṣurādayaḥ /<br/> dhātava ityadhikāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir / rten ni mig la sogs pa yin / khams rnams zhes bya bar sbyar te / mig la sogs pa rnams gyur pas rnam par shes pa rnams 'gyur ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ /<br/> tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan pa dang gnod pa dang gsal ba dang mi gnod pa dang mi gsal ba nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro / gzugs la sogs pa rnams gyur pas ni de dag 'gyur ba ma yin te / de lta bas na de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir de dag nyid rten yin no / zhes bya ba ni shin tu legs pa yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin no / yang de dag gis ni gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam /<br/> na punā rūpavijñānaṃ yāvaddharmavijñānamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar yin gyi gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas chos kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete cakṣurādaya āśrayā eṣām /<br/> ato 'sādhāraṇatvāddhi vijñānaṃ tairnirucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir de dag gi rten ni mig la sogs pa yin na / de'i phyir thun mong ma yin phyir / de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasādhāraṇatvam /<br/> na hi cakṣuranyasya vijñānasyāśrayībhavitumutsahate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin zhe na / mig ni rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur bar mi nus la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaṃ tu manovijñānasyālambanībhavatyanyacakṣurvijñānasyāpīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs par yang 'gyur la / mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi dmigs par yang 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat kāyo veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rten du gyur pa'i phyir dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir de dag kho nas rnam par shes pa bstan gyi gzugs la sogs pas ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na rnga bo che'i sgra dang / nas kyi myu gu bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi /<br/> āha /<br/> sarveṣāṃ bhedaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang lus dag la gnas te mig gis gzugs rnams la lta ba nas / ci lus dang mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa de rnams gcig pa kho na zhig yin nam / 'on te gzhan gyis pa yang yin zhe na / smras pa / thams cad la bye brag yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati /<br/> tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni thams cad rang gis pa yin no / de nyid rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan dang po'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gi sa pa yin la / rnam par shes pa dang mig dag ni de'i sa pa yin no / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta na ni gzugs rnams kyang de'i sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi gzugs rnams kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gis pa yin la / mig ni de'i sa pa yin no / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sa ni bsam gtan dang pho'i sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta ba na rnam par shes pa dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la / lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no / mig ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dag la lta ba na mig dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la / lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no / rnam par shas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bsam gtan gsum pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i mig gis de dag gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po'i skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba na thams cad rang gi sa pa yin no / 'og ma rnams la lta ba ni gsum rang gi sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na gsum ni rang gi sa pa yin la / mig ni de'i sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa rnams la lta ba na lus dang rnam par shes pa dag na rang gi sa pa yin la / gzugs rnams ni 'og ma pa yin no / mig ni de'i sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūrūpe tadbhūmike śeṣaṃ svabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa rnams la lta ba na mig dang gzugs ni de'i sa pa yin la / lhag ma ni rang gi sa pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tṛtīyadhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa'i mig gis lta ba'i yang de bzhin du sbyar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rang dang gzhan gyi mig dag gis rang dang gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ /<br/> na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni nges pa yin te / lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcabhūmikāni hi kāyacakṣūrūpāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar sa lnga pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvibhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca /<br/> tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam /<br/> yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati /<br/> ūdhrvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ /<br/> na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang sa gnyis pa yin no / de las gang ba'i lus yin pa sa de ba'am / sa gong ma pa'i mig yin gyi sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no / 'di'i mig gi yul ni de'i sa pa 'am / sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs yin gyi / mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin / sa gong ma pa'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mthong bar ni nam yang mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhva na cakṣuṣo rūpavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te / gzugs bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yi gzugs / lus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang 'og ma dang rang gis ba'i gzugs thams cad du yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyasya cobhe rūpavijñāne sarvato bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi 'ang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dag thams cad du yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cecaṃ cakṣuruttaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam /<br/> tathā śrotraṃ /<br/> na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotramūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ /<br/> vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdastu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ /<br/> vistareṇa yojyam /<br/> trayāṇāṃ tu sarvameva svabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mig 'di rgyas par bshad pa ltar / rna ba'ang de bzhin du rig par bya ste / lus la 'og ma'i rna ba yin /  / rna ba'i gong ma'i sgra ma yin / rnam par shes pa'ang de'i sgra / lus kyi'ang gnyi ga thams cad du zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o / gsum dag ni / thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghrāṇajihvākāyadhātūnāṃ kāyaviṣayavijñānāni svabhūmikānyeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams rnams kyi lus dang rang gi yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams rang gi sa pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityutsargaviśeṣeṇa kṛtvā punarviśeṣaṇārthamapavāda ārabhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bye brag tu ma phye bar spyir bstan nas / yang bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir dmigs kyis bsal ba rtsom ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavijñānamadharasvabhūmi /<br/> kāyaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ ca svabhūmikānyeva nityaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni / rang gi sa / lus dang lus kyi khams dang reg bya ni rtag tu rang gis pa dag kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavijñānaṃ tu keṣāñcit svabhūmikaṃ yathākāmadhātuprathamadhyānopapannāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig gi ni rang gi sa pa yin te / 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">keṣāñcidadharabhūmikaṃ yathā dvitīyādidhyānopapannānāmiti /<br/> aniyataṃ manaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig gi ni sa 'og ma yin pas te / 'di lta ste / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / yid ma nges te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācit kāyamanovijñānadharmaiḥ samānabhūmikaṃ mano bhavati kadācidūrdhvādhobhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos dag dang mtshungs pa'i sa pa'i yid yin la / res 'ga' ni sa gong ma dang 'og ma pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcabhūmike 'pi hi kāye sarvabhūmikāni mana ādīni bhavanti samāpattyupapattikāle yathāyogamiti vistareṇa samāpattinirdeśe kośasthāna etadākhyāyiṣyate /<br/> atihahugranthabhāraparihārārthaṃ tu nedānīṃ punarākhyāyate /<br/> alpaṃ ca prayojanaṃ mahāṃśca śrama iti samāpta ānuṣaṅgikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> idamidānīṃ vicāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa'i lus la yang snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba'i tshe yid la sogs pa ci rigs par sa thams cad pa dag yin te / 'di rgyas par ni snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro / tshig gi khur ha cang mangs pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir da ni mi bshad de / dgos pa chung la ngal ba che ba'i phyir ro / zhar la 'ongs pa'i skabs rdzogs so / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśānāṃ cdātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kaḥ kena vijñeyaḥ /<br/> āha /<br/> pañca bāhyā dvivijñeyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams bcva brgyad dang rnam par shes pa drug po rnams la gang zhig rnam par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin zhe na / smras pa / gnyis kyis rnam par shes phyir lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaśabagandharasaspraṣṭavyadhātavo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānairanubhūtā manovijñānena vijñāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni grangs bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shas pa dag gis nyams su myong nas yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamete pratyekaṃ dvābhyāṃ vijñānābhyāṃ vijñeyā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na de dag ni re re zhing rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāstrayodaśa dhātavaḥ pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāmaviṣayatvādekena manovijñānena vijñeyā ityākhyātaṃ bhavati /<br/> eṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ madhye kati nityāḥ katyanityāḥ /<br/> na kaśct sakalo 'sti nityo dhāturapi tu /<br/> nityā dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /<br/> tena dhārmadhātvekadeśo nityaḥ śeṣā anityāḥ /<br/> katīndriyaṃ kati nendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams lhag ma bcu gsum ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig pus rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes rnam par bshad par 'gyur ro / rtag pa rnams ni du / mi rtag pa rnams ni du zhe na / khams gcig ril por rtag pa ni med mod kyi / 'on kyang / 'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o / des na chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag la / lhag ma rnams ni mi rtag pa yin no / dbang po rnams ni du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmārdhamindriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na / chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇyuktāni sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu gnyis nang gi rab shad dbang po / mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendraiyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smādhīndriyaṃ prajñendariyaṃ anājñātamājñāsyāmīndariyam ājñendriyaṃ ājñātāvīndriyamiti /<br/> ābhidhārmikāstu ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthānamādṛtya jīvitendriyānantaraṃ manaindriyaṃ paṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po dang yid kyi dbang po dang mo'i dbang po dang pho'i dbang po dang srog gi dbang po dang bde ba'i dbang po dang sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang yid bde ba'i dbang po dang yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang dran pa'i dbang po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang shes rab kyi dbang po dang mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis gsungs pa la chos mngon pa ba rnams ni skye mched drug gi go rims rnam par gzhag pa la ma gus pas yid kyi dbang po srog gi dbang po'i mjug thogs su 'don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dharmārdhaṃ jīvitendriyādīnyekādaśendriyāṇi trayāṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmadhātupradeśatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la chos kyi phyed ni srog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang gsum po dag gi cha ste / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvādaśānāmādhyātmikānāṃ cakṣurādayaḥ pañca svanāmoktāḥ /<br/> sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyaṃ stripuruṣendriye kāyadhātupradeś iti paścād vakṣyati /<br/> śeṣāḥ pañca dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca nendriyamiti siddham /<br/> abhidharmakośabhāṣye dhātunirdeśo nāma /<br/> prathamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptam iti /<br/> ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /<br/> teṣāṃ ca yo nirhodha evaṃvādīu mahāśramaṇaḥ /<br/> likhāpitamidaṃ śrīlāmāvākeneti /<br/> dvitīyaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> oṃ namo buddhāya /<br/> uktānīndriyāṇi /<br/> kaḥ punarindriyārthaḥ /<br/> idi paramaiśvarye /<br/> tasya indantīti indriyāṇi /<br/> ata ādhipatyārtha indriyārthaḥ /<br/> kasya caiṣāṃ kvādhipatyam /<br/> caturṣvartheṣu pañcānāmādhipatyaṃ /<br/> cakṣuḥśrotrayostāvat pratyekaṃ caturṣvarthevādhipatyam /<br/> ātmabhāvaśobhāyāmandhabadhirayorakāntarūpatvāt /<br/> ātmabhāvaparikarṣaṇe dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca viṣamaparivarjanāt /<br/> cakṣuḥśrotravijñānayoḥ sasaṃprayogayorutpattau /<br/> rūpadarśanaśabdaśāravaṇayoścāsādhāraṇakāraṇatve /<br/> ghrāṇajihvākāyānāmātmabhāvaśobhāyāṃ pūrvavat /<br/> ātmabhāvaparikarṣaṇe taiḥ kavaḍīkārāhāraparibhogāt /<br/> ghrāṇādivijñānānāṃ sasaṃprayogāṇāmutpattau /<br/> gandhaghrāṇarasāsvādanaspraṣṭavyaspaṛśanānāṃ cāsādhāraṇakāraṇatva iti /<br/> dvayoḥ kila /<br/> caturṇāṃ /<br/> strīpuruṣajīvitamanaindriyāṇāṃ /<br/> dvayorarthayoḥ pratyekamādhipatyam /<br/> strī puruśendriyayyostāvatsattvabhedavikalpayoḥ /<br/> tatra sattvabhedaḥ stri puruṣa iti /<br/> sattvavikalpaḥ stanādisaṃsthānasvarācārānyathātvam /<br/> saṃsleśavyavadānayorityapare /<br/> tathā hi tadviprayuktavikalpānāṃ ṣaṇḍha paṇḍakobhayavyañjanānāmasaṃvarānantāryakuāśalamulasamucchedā na bhavanti saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti /<br/> jīvitendriyasya nikāyasabhāgasaṃbandhasādhāraṇayoḥ /<br/> manaindriyasya punarbhavasaṃbandhavaśibhāvānuvarttanayoḥ /<br/> tatra punrbhavasaṃbandhe yathoktaṃ gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataracittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti /<br/> vaśibhāvānuvarttane yathoktaṃ cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata iti vistaraḥ /<br/> yat punaḥ sukhādīndriyapañcakaṃ yāni cāṣṭau śraddhādīni teṣāṃ /<br/> pañcakāṣṭānaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nang gi bcu gnyis ni mig la sogs pa rang gi ming gis smos pa lnga dang yid kyi dbang po ni sems kyi khams bdun no / pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni lus kyi khams kyi phyogs yin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do / lhag ma khams lnga po de dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ni dbang po ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'grub bo / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas dang po'o / dbang po rnams bshad pa la dbang po'i don ci zhe na / dbang ni dbang phyug dam pa'o / de dbang byed pas na dbang po rnams te / de'i phyir dbang byed pa'i don ni dbang po'i don to / 'di dag las gang zhig gang la dbang byed ce na / lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la dbang byed / re zhig mig dang rna ba dag re re zhing don bzhi la dbang byed pa ni long ba dang 'on pa dag ni mi mdzes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang mthong ba dang thos nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa dag skyed pa dang gzugs blta ba dang sgra mnyan pa dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o / sna dang lce dang lus rnams ni snga ma bzhin du mdzes par bya ba la dbang byed pa dang de dag gi kham gyi zas la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba la dbang byed pa dang sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams skyed pa dang dri bsnams pa dang ro myang pa dang reg bya reg pa rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o / bzhi rnams gnyis la lo / pho dang mo dang srog dang yid kyi dbang po rnams ni re re zhing don gnyis la dbang byed de / re zhig pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni sems can gyi bye brag dang khyad par dag la dbang byed de / de la sems can gyi bre brag ni pho'o mo'o zhes bya'o / sems can gyi khyad par ni nu ma la sogs pa dbyibs dang nga ro dang spyod pa gzhan pa nyid do / gzhan dag na re ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag la dbang byed de / 'di ltar de dag dang mi ldan pa dang nyams pa za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa rnams la sdom pa ma yin pa dang mtshams med pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa dang sdom pa dang 'bras bu 'thob pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams med do zhes zer ro / srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par mtshams sbyor ba dang yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la dbang byed do / yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa dag la dbang byed de / de la yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du / de'i tshe dri za'i sems gnyis po rjes su chags pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa 'am / khong khro ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa gang yang rung ba zhig mngon du gyur na zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du / 'jig rten 'di ni sems kyis khrid do zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o / bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gang yin pa dang dad pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa / lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni / kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la / go rims bzhin du dbang byed de / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādhipatyaṃ yathākramaṃ pañcānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃkleśe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la 'dod chags la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgādīnāṃ tadanuśāyitvāt /<br/> śraddhādīnāṃ vyavadāne /<br/> tai rvyavadāyate /<br/> vyavadāne 'pi sukhādīnāmādhipatyamityapare /<br/> yasmāt sukhitasya cittaṃ samādhīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la dbang byed de / de dag gis rnam par byang bar byed do / gzhan dag na re bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la yang dbang byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥdhupaniṣacchraddhāṣaṇnaiṣkramyāśritāḥ saumanasyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu can gyi dad pa zhes bya ba dang yid bde ba la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba la rten pa drug ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva cakṣuḥśrītrābhyāmātmabhāvaparikaṛṣaṇaṃ vijñāya viṣamaparihārāt /<br/> vijñāne tu tayorādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rnam par shes nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir mig dang rna ba dag gis lus yongs su bsrung ba ni ma yin ba nyid kyi de gnyis rnam par shes pa la ni dbang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpi vijñānādanyadrūpadarśanaṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ vā 'sti /<br/> yatastayorasādhāraṇakāraṇatve pṛthagādhipatyaṃ yujyeta /<br/> tasmānnaivameṣāmindriyatvam /<br/> kathaṃ tarhi /<br/> svārthopalabdhyādhipatyāt sarvasya ca ṣaḍindriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir de gnyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la so sor dbang byed par rung bar 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa gzugs mthong ba 'am skra thos pa yang med pa de'i phyir de dag de lta bur ni dbang po nyid ma yin no /  / 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na / rang gi don dang thams cad la / dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurādīnāṃpañcānāṃ svasyasvasyārthasyopalabdhādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rang rang gi don la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manasaḥ punaḥ sarvārthopalabdhāvādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata etāni ṣaṭ pratyekamindriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de dag ni so sor dbang po yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cārthānāmapyatrādhipatyam /<br/> nādhipatyam /<br/> adhikaṃ hi prabhutvamādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la don rnams kyang dbang byed pa ma yin nam zhe na / dbang byed pa ma yin te / lhag par dbang byed pa nyid ni dbang byed pa nyid yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuṣaścakṣūrūpopalabdhāvadhikamaiśvaryam /<br/> sarvarūpopalabdhau sāmānyakāraṇatvāttatpaṭumandatādyanuvidhānāccopalabdheḥ /<br/> na rūpasya /<br/> tadvi paryayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig ni gzugs thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la thun mong gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir gzugs la dmigs par bya ba la lhag par dbang byed pa yin gyi / de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat manaso dharmeṣu yojyam /<br/> srītva puṃstvādhipatyāttu kāyāt strīpuruṣendriye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid chos rnams la dbang byed pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro / mo nyid pho nyid las dbang phyir / lus las mo dang po'i dbang dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyendriyādeva strīpuruṣendriye pṛthak vyavasthāpyete /<br/> nārthantarabhūte /<br/> kaścidasau kāyendriyabhāga upastha pradeśo yaḥ strīpuruṣendriyākhyāṃ paratilabhate /<br/> yathākramaṃ strītvapuṃstvayyorādhipatyāt /<br/> tatra strībhāvaḥ striyākṛtiḥ svaraceṣṭā abhiprāyāḥ /<br/> etaddhi striyā strītvam /<br/> puṃbhāvaḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ svaraceṣṭā abhiprāyāḥ /<br/> etaddhi puṃsaḥ puṃstvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi dbang po kho na las mo dang pho'i dbang po dag rnam par bzhag ste / don tha dad par gyur pa dag ni med kyi lus kyi dbang po'i cha 'ga' ste / mdoms kyi phyogs mo dang pho'i dbang po'i ming 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni rim bzhin du mo nyid dang pho nyid dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro / de la mo'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang gyo ba dang bsam ba dag ste / de ni mo'i mo nyid yin no / pho'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang gyo ba dang bsam pa dag pa dag ste / de ni pho'i pho nyid yin no / rigs gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang / rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir / srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni / dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nikāyasthitisaṃkleśavyavadānādhipatyataḥ /<br/> jīvitaṃ vedanāḥ pañca śraddhādyāścendriyaṃ matāḥ /<br/> nikāyasabhāgasthitau jīvitendriyasyādhipatyaṃ saṃkleśe vedanānām /<br/> tathāhi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete duḥkhāyāṃ pratigho 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyetyuktaṃ sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas par bya ba la dbang byed do / tshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba la dbang byed de / 'di ltar mdo las / bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur / sdug bsngal la ni khong khro ba / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la ni ma rig pa zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyavadāne śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rnam par byang bar bya ba la dbang byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi taiḥ kleśāśca viṣkabhyante mārgaścāvāhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar de dag gis nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon la lam yang 'dren par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata ete 'pi pratyekamindriyamiṣṭāḥ /<br/> ājñāsyā myākhyamājñākhyamājñātāvīndriyaṃ tathā /<br/> uttarottarasaṃprāptinirvāṇādyādhipatyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de dag kyang so sor dbang po yin par 'dod do /  / mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong / 'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir / kun shes byed dang kun shes dang / de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekamindrimityupadarśanārthaṃ tathāśabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni so sor dbang po yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrājñāsyāmīndriyasyājñendriyasya prāptāvādhipatyam /<br/> ājñendraiyasyājñātāvīndriyaprāptau ājñātāvīndriyasya parinirvāṇe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba la dbang byed do / kun shes pa'i dbang po ni / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba la dbang byed do / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba la dbang byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyavimuktacittasyāsti parinirvāṇamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems rnams par ma grol ba la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādiśabdo 'nyaparyāyadyotanārthaḥ /<br/> katamo 'nyaḥ pāryāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam grangs gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir te / rnam grangs gzhan gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśnaheyakleśaparihāṇam pratyājñāsyāmīndriyasyādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyakleāśaprahāṇaṃ pratyājñendriyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes pa'i dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāraṃ pratyājñātāvīndriyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir dbang byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedanāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol bas dga' ba dang bde ba la so sor yang dag par myong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādhipātyādindriyatve 'vidyādīnāmupasaṃkhyānaṃ karttavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid yin na / ma rig pa la sogs pas kha bskang dgos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyādīnāmapi hi saṃskārādiṣvādhipatyamata eṣāmapīndriyatvamupasaṃkhyātavyam /<br/> vāgādīnāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams la dbang byed pas / de'i phyir de dag kyang dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vākyāṇipādapāyūpasthānāmapi cendriyatvamupasaṃkhyātavyam /<br/> vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandeṣvādhipatyāt /<br/> na khalūpasaṃkhyātavyam /<br/> yasmādiheṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag la sogs pa dag dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang rkub dang mdoms rnams kyang tshig dang len pa dang 'gro ba dang rtug pa dang kun tu dga' ba'i bya ba dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya'o zhe na / kha bskang bar mi bya ste 'di ltar 'dir ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittāśrayastadvikalpaḥ sthitiḥ saṃkleśa eva ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃbhāro vyavadānaṃ ca yāvatā tāvadindriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid / tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed pa / dbang po dag kyang de snyed du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cittāśrayaḥ ṣaḍindriyāṇi /<br/> etacca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ maulaṃ saṭtvadravyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod de / de la sems kyi rten ni dbang po drug dag yin te / skye mched drug po de ni sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya strīpuruṣavikalpaḥ strīpuruṣendraiyābhyāṃ sthitirjīvitendriyeṇa saṃkleśo vedanā bhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mo dang pho'i dbang po dag gis ni de mo dang por bye brag tu 'byed do / srog gi dbang pos ni gnas par byed do / tshor ba rnams kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyavadānasaṃbharaṇaṃ pañcabhirvyavadānaṃ tribhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa lngas ni rnam par byang ba'i tshogs sogs par byed do / gsum gyis ni rnam par byang bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato nāvidyādīnāmindriyatvamiṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa ni dbang po nyid du mi 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravṛtterāśrayotpattisthitipratyupabhogataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni / skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturdaśa tathā 'nyāni nivṛtterindriyāṇi vā /<br/> matavikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu bzhi de bzhin ldog pa la / dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no / yang na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gzhung lugs tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravṛtteraśrayaḥ ṣaḍindriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re 'jug pa'i rten ni dbang po drug yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpattiḥ strīpuruṣendriye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba ni mo dang po'i dbang po dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata utpatteḥ /<br/> sthitirjīvitendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las skye ba'i phyir ro / gnas pa ni srog gi dbang po yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenāvasthānāt /<br/> upabhogo vedanābhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro / tshor ba rnams kyis ni nye bar spyod par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata etāni caturdaśendriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de dag ni dbang po bcu bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenaiva prakāreṇa nivṛtteranyāni /<br/> śraddhadīni hi nivṛtterāśrayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa de nyid kyis gzhan dag ni ldog pa yin te / ldog pa'i rten ni dad pa la sogs pa yin no / skye ba ni kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prabhavaḥ sthitirājñendriyam upabhoga ājñātāvīndriyeṇetyata etāvantyevendriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang pos ni nye bar spyod par byed do zhes zer te / de'i phyir dbang po dag ni de snyed cig yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva caīṣāmeṣo 'nukramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de dag gi go rims kyang de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vācastu nendriyatvaṃ vacane śikṣāviśeṣāpekṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag gi tshig smra bar bya ba la dbang po nyid ma yin te / slob pa'i khyad par ltos pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pāṇipādasya cādānaviharaṇādananyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lag pa dang rkang pa dang len pa dang 'gro ba las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadeva hi tadanyathā 'nyatra cotpannamādānaṃ viharaṇaṃ cocyate /<br/> vināpi ca pāṇipādenādānaviharaṇāduragaprabhṛtīṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid de dag yin te / gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba la len pa dang 'gro ba zhes bya'o / sbrul la sogs pa la lag pa dang rkang pa med pa bzhin du yang len zhing 'gro ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pāyorapi nendriyatvamutsarge gurudravyasyākāśe sarvatra patanāt /<br/> vāyunā ca tatpreraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkub kyang rtug par bya ba la dbang po nyid ma yin te / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rdzas lci ba thams cad du ltung ba'i phyir dang de rlung gis kyang bro bar byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upasthasyāpi nendriyatvamānande strīpuruṣendriyakṛtaṃ hi tat saukhyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdoms kyang kun tu dga' bar bya ba la dbang po nyid ma yin te / dga' ba de ni mo dang po'i dbang pos byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaṇṭhadantākṣivartmaparvaṇāmapi cābhyavaharaṇacarvaṇonmeṣanimeṣākuñcanavikāśana kriyāsvindriyatvaṃ prasajyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lkog ma dang so dang mig gi lam dang tshigs rnams kyang mid pa dang bca' ba dang 'byed pa dang 'dzum pa dang bskums pa dang brkyang ba'i bya ba dag la dbang po nyid yin pa 'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya svasyāṃ kariyāyāmityayukataṃ vāgādīnāmindriyatvam /<br/> tatra cakṣurādīnāṃ puruṣendriyaparyantānāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyur gyur pa thams cad rang gi bya ba la dbang po nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur bas ngag la sogs pa dbang po nyid yin par rigs pa ma yin no / de la mig la sogs pa pho'i dbang po la thug pa rnams ni bstan zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jīvitendriyasya viprayuktatvādviprayukteṣveva karisyate nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gi dbang po ni ldan pa ma yin ba yin pa'i phyir ldan pa ma yin pa dag gi nang kho na nas 'chad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādīnāṃ caitteṣu kariṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni sems las byung ba dag gi nang nas 'chad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhādīnāmājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāṃ ca karttavyaḥ /<br/> so 'yaṃ kriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba la sogs pa dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa bshad par bya ste de brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhendriyamaśātā yā kāyikī vedanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang / sdug bsngal dbang po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśātetyupadhātikā duḥkhetyarthaḥ /<br/> sukham /<br/> śātā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sim pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa ste sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / sim pa ni bde ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhendriyaṃ kāyikī śāta vedanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi tshor ba sim pa ni bde ba'i dbang po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śātetyanugrāhikā sukhetyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sim pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa ste bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa na / sems kyi de ni bde dbang po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye tu dhyāne saiva śātā vedanā caitasī sukhendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa na ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de nyid bde ba'i dbang po yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tatra kāyikī vedanā 'sti /<br/> pañcavijñānakāyābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga med pa'i phyir lus kyi tshor ba ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatra sā saumanasyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan na de yis bde ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyāddhyānādanyatra kāmadhātau prathame dvitīye ca dhyāne sā caiatasikī śātā vedanā saumanasyendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa las gzhan pa 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa gang yin pa de yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye tu dhyāne prītivītarāgatvāt sukhendriyameva sā na saumanasyendriyam /<br/> prītirhi saumanasyam /<br/> aśātā caitasī punaḥ /<br/> daurmanasyamupekṣā tu madhyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa na ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir bde ba'i dbang po kho na yin gyi yid bde ba ni ma yin te / dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin no / sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa / yid mi bde ba'o btang snyoms ni bar ma'o / sim pa yang ma yin sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaśātānāśātā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā madhyetyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal yang ma yin / bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni bar ma zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sopekṣendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāyikī caitasikītyāha /<br/> ubhayī /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamiyamabhisamasyai kamindriyaṃ kriyate /<br/> avikalpanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci lus kyi 'am / sems kyi zhes bya zhe na / smras pa / gnyi ga'i yin no / ci'i phyir 'di bsdus nas dbang po gcig tu byas she na / mi rtag phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caitasikaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhaṃ prāyeṇa vikalpanādutpadyate na tu kāyikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni phal cher rnam par rtog pa las skye'i lus kyi ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṣayavaśādarhatāmapyutpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul gyi dbang gis ni dgra bcom pa rnams la yang skye bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastayorindriyatvena bhedaḥ /<br/> upekṣā tu svarasenāvikalpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī ce tyekamindriyam kriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de dag dbang po nyid du tha dad kyi lus kyi dang sems kyi btang snyoms ni rnam par mi rtog pa kho nar rang gi ngang gis skye bas dbang po gcig tu byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā ca kāyikam sukhamanugṛhṇātyanyathā caitasikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi bde ba yang gzhan du phan 'dogs la / sems kyi yang gzhan du phan 'dogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evam duḥkhamanyathā kāyikamupahantyanyathā caitasikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du lus kyi sdug bsngal yang gzhan du gnod pa byed la / sems kyi yang gzhan du gnod pa byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upekṣāyāṃ tveṣa vikalpo nāstyata upekṣaṇaṃ pratyavikalpanādabhedaḥ /<br/> dṛgbhāvanā 'saikṣapathe nava trīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btang snyoms la ni bye brag de med de / de bas na / btang snyoms ni bye brag med pas tha dad pa med do / mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥ sukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ sraddhādīni ca pañca /<br/> tāni navendriyāṇi triṣu mārgeṣu trīṇīndriyāṇyucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum yin / yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms rnams dang dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po dgu po de dag ni lam gsum dag tu dbang po gsum zhes bya ste / mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyamiti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> darśanamārge hyanājñātamājñātuṃ pravṛttaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o / mi slob pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o / ci'i phyir zhe na / mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par bya bar zhugs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāmārge nāstyapūrvamājñeyaṃ tadeva tvājānāti śeṣānuśayaprahāṇārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pa'i lam la ni sngon ma mthong ba kun shes par bya ba ni med kyi / phra rgyas lhag ma spang bar bya ba'i phyir de nyid kun shes par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣamārge tvājñātmityavagama ājñātāvaḥ /<br/> so 'syāstīti ājñātāvī /<br/> ājñātamavituṃ śīlamasyeti vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa'i lam la ni kun shes so snyam du rtogs pa ni kun shes pa ste / de 'di la yod pas sam / 'di kun shes pa srung ba'i dang tshul can yin pas na kun shes pa dang ldan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayānutpādijñānalābhāt /<br/> duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyamiti tathābhūtasyenriyamājñātāvīnriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes te yang yongs su shes par byar med do snyam pa ste / de lta bu'i dbang po ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvanirdeśāṃ kṛtvā prakārabhedo vaktavya kati sāsravāṇi katyanāsravāṇi inriyāṇityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi ngo bo bstan nas zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa rnam pa'i bye brag brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvadyadetadanantaroktamājñāsyāmīnriyādikametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa gang dag yin pa de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amalaṃ trayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum ni dri ma med pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravamityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">malānāmāsravaparyāyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri ma rnams ni zag pa'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpīṇi jīvitaṃ duḥkhe sāsravāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag / zag dang bcas pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpīṇi saptendriyāṇi jīvitendriyaṃ dukhaḥdaurmanasyendriye caikāntasāsravāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po gzugs can bdun dang srog gi dbang po dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpīṇi punaḥ sapta cakṣuḥ /<br/> śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyastripuruṣendriyāṇi rūpaskandhasaṃgrahāt /<br/> dvidhā nava
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can bdun ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang mo dang po'i dbang po rnams te / gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro / dgu rnam gnyi se
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ śraddhādīni ca pañca etāni navendriyāṇi sāsravāṇyanāsravāṇyapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dag dang dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po dgu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāṇyeva śraddhādīnītyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni zag pa med pa kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ hi bhagavatā yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa srvaṃ na santi tamahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la dbang po lnga po 'di dag thams cad du thams cad med pa de ni phyi rol so so'i skye bo'i phyogs la gnas par nga smra'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nedaṃ jñāpakamanāsravāṇyadhikṛtya vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni khungs su mi rung ste / zag pa med pa rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hyāryapudgalavyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā yasyemānītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam par gzhag pa mdzad nas gang la dbang po 'di dag ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthagjano vā dvividhaḥ /<br/> ābhyantarakaścāsamucchinna kuśalamūlo bāhyakaśca samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na so so'i skye bo ni rnam pa gnyis te / nang pa dang phyi rol pa'o / nang pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu ma chad pa'o / phyi rol pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tamadhikāṛtyāha bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dbang du mdzad nas phyi rol so so'i skye bo'i phyogs la gnas par nga smra'o zhes gsungs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca sūtre santi ca sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhāstīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apī tyapravarttita eva dharmacakre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las kyang sems can 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa rnams la dbang po rnon po dag kyang mchis / dbang po 'bring po dag kyang mchis / dbang po rtul po dag kyang mchi sa so zhes chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba kho na'i tshe gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātsantyeva sāsravāṇi śraddhādīni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yod pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaścoktaṃ yāvacchāhameṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samudayaṃ cāstagamaṃ ca svādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ nādhyajñāsiṣaṃ na tāvadahamasmātsadevakāllokāditi vistaraḥ /<br/> na cānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmeṣa parīkṣāprakāraḥ /<br/> katīndriyāṇi vipākaḥ kati na vipākaḥ /<br/> ekāntena tāvat /<br/> vipāko jīvitaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ngas ji srid du dbang po lnga po 'di dag gi kun 'byung ba dang mi snang ba dang ro myong ba dang nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma shes pa de srid du nga 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa 'di las zhes rgyas par gsungs te / zag pa med pa rnams la ni yongs su brtag pa'i rnam pa 'di med do / dbang po du ni rnam par smin pa dag yin / du ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa dag yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yadarhan bhikṣurāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati tajjīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gcig tu srog ni rnam smin / 'o na dge slong dag dgra bcom pa'i tshe'i 'du byed dag 'jog par byed pa'i srog gi dbang po gang yin pa de gang gi rnam par smin pa zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstra ukthaṃ kathamāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati /<br/> arhan bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśitvaṃ prāptaḥ saṃghāya va pudgalāya vā pātraḥ vā cīvaraṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ vā dattvā tat praṇidhāya prantakoṭikam caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /<br/> sa tasmāt vyutthāya cittamutpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate yanme bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavatviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las / tshe'i 'du byed dag ji ltar 'jog par byed ce na / dge slong dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems la dbang thob pas dge 'dun nam gang zag la lhung bzed dam chos gos sam / dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba phul nas / de bsams te rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing de de las langs nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya yat bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gi longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ punarayamabhiprāyo vipākoccheṣaṃ vipacyata iti /<br/> ta āhuḥ pūrvajātikṛtasya karmaṇo vipākoccheṣaṃ /<br/> sa bhāvanābalenākṛṣya pratisaṃvedayata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe'i rnam par smin par gyur cig snyam du sems skyed par byed cing tshig tu yang smra bar byed do / de'i longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de'i tshe'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo / gang dag rnam par smin pa'i lhag ma rnam par smin par byed do snyam du sems pa de dag na re ni nges tshe rabs snga ma la las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis drangs nas so sor myong bar byed do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamāyuḥsaṃskārā nutsṛjati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe'i 'du byed dag ji ltar gtong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathaīva dānaṃ dattvā praṇidhāya prantakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /<br/> yanme āyurvipākaṃ tat bhogavipākaṃ bhavatviti tasya tathā bhavati /<br/> bhadantaghoṣakastvāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du sbyin pa byin nas bsams te rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing de de las langs nas bdag gi tshe'i rnam par smin pa gang yin bde longs spyod kyi rnam par smin par gyur cig snyam du sems skyed par byed cing tshig tu yang smra bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasminneva āśraye rūpāvacarāṇi mahābhūtāni dhyānabalena saṃmudhakarotyāyuṣo 'nukūlāni vaihodhikāni ca /<br/> evamāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayatyevamutsṛjatīti /<br/> evaṃ tu bhavitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i de lta bur 'gyur ro / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re ni des lus de nyid la gzugs na spyod pa'i 'byung ba chen po tshe dang mthun pa'am 'gal bdag bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis mngon du byed do / de ltar tshe'i 'du byed dag 'jog par byed cing / de ltar gtong bar byed do zhes zer ro / 'di lta bu yin te / de dag gi de lta bu de ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhiprabhāva eva sa teṣāṃ tadṛśo yena pūrvakarmajaṃ ca sthitikālāvedhamindriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvrttayantyapūrvaṃ ca samādhijamāvedhamākṣipanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu kho na ste / des sngon gyi las las skyes pa dbang po'i 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi gnas pa'i dus 'phen pa ni zlog par byed la / sngon med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i 'phen pa ni 'phen par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānna tajjīvitendriyaṃ vipākaṃ tato 'nyattu vipākaḥ /<br/> praśnāt praśnāntaramupajāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na srog gi dbang po de ni rnam par smin pa ma yin la / de las gzhan pa ni rnam par smin pa yin no / dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthamāyuḥsaṃskārānadhitiṣṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir tshe'i 'du byed dag byin gyis rlob par byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parahitārthaṃ śāsansthityarthaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan la phan pa'i don tam / bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i don du ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hyātmanaḥ kṣīṇamāyuḥ paśyanti /<br/> na ca tatrānyaṃ śaktaṃ paśyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni bdag nyid tshe zad par mthong zhing de las gzhan nus pa yang ma mthong ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kimarthamutsṛjanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci'i phyir gtong bar byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alpaṃ ca parahitaṃ jīvite paśyanti rogābhibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam /<br/> yathoktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gson na gzhan la phan pa chung ba dang lus nad la sogs pa lta bur mthong ba yin te / ji skad du / tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sucīrṇe brahmacarye 'smin mārge caiva subhāvite /<br/> tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣayāt bhavati rogasyāpagame yathā /<br/> iti /<br/> athaitadāyuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthāpanārthamutsarjanaṃ vā kva kasya vā veditavyam /<br/> manuṣyeṣvevatriṣu dvīpeṣu strīpuruṣayorasamayavimuktasyārhataḥ prāntakoṭikadhyānalābhinaḥ /<br/> tasya hi samādhau vaśitvam /<br/> kleśaiścānupastabdhā santatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam la'ang shin tu bsgoms na ni / tshe zad pa la dga' 'gyur te / dper na nad dang bral ba bzhin / zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / 'o na gang du'am / gang zhig gi tshe'i 'du byed dag 'jog pa'am / gtong ba de rig par bya zhe na / mi'i nang kho na dag tu ste gling gsum po dag tu'o / gang zhig gi zhe na / dgra bcom pa pho mo rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan thob pa dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam bar grol ba ste / de ni ting nge 'dzin la yang dbang zhing nyon mongs pa dag gis kyang rgyu nye bar ma bstan pa yin no / mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktam bhagavān jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāyāyuḥsaṃskārānustsṛṣṭavān /<br/> teṣāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ /<br/> na kaścidityeke /<br/> tathā hyuktam jīvitendriyaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gi 'du byed dag byin gyis brlabs nas tshe'i 'du byed dag btang ngo zhes gsungs pa de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na / kha cig na re cung zad kyang med de / 'di ltar srog gi dbang po gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traidhātukamāyuriti /<br/> pūrvakarmaphalamāyuḥsaṃskārāḥ pratyutpannakarmaphalaṃ jīvitasaṃskārā ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa'i tshe yin no zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / kha cig na re ni sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu ni tshe'i 'du byed dag yin la / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi 'bras bu ni srog gi 'du byed dag yin no zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yairvā nikāyasabhāgasthitista āyuḥsaṃskārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gis ris mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni tshe'i 'du byed dag yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaistu kālāntaraṃ jīvati te jīvitasaṃskārā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gis dus gzhan gyi bar du 'tsho ba de dag ni srog gi 'du byed dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahuvacanaṃ bahūnāmāyurjīvitasaṃskārakṣaṇānāmutsarjanā dhiṣṭhānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mang po'i tshig ni tshe dang srog gi 'du byed kyi skad cig ma rnam pa mang po rnams la gtong zhing byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyekasya kṣaṇasyotsarjanamadhiṣṭhanaṃ cāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma gcig la ni gtong ba'am byin gyis rlob pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca kālāntarasthāvaramekamāyurdravyamiti dyotanārthamityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re dus gzhan gyi bar du 'dug pa tshe'i rdzas gcig pu ni med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahuśveva saṃskāreṣvāyurākhyā nāstyekamāyurdravyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re 'du byed mang po rnams la tshe zhes bya ba'i tshe'i rdzas gcig pu ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā naiva saṃskāragrahaṇamakariṣyadityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'du byed smos pa mi mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthaṃ punarbhagavatā āyuhsaṃskārā utsṛṣṭāścādhiṣṭitāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe'i 'du byed dag btang zhing byin gyis brlabs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maraṇavaśitvajñāpanārthamutsṛṣṭājīvitavaśitvajñāpanārthamadhiṣṭitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi ba la mnga' ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ni btang la / tshe la mnga' ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ni zla ba gsum kho na byin gyis brlabs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traimāsyameva nodhrvam vineyakāryābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyin chad ni gdul ba'i don med pa'i phyir ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccāpi tat pratijñātam evaṃbhāvitairahaṃ caturbhirṛddhi pādairākāṅkṣankalpamapi tiṣṭheyaṃ kalpāvaśeṣamapīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang ngas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de ltar bsgoms pa dag gis 'dod na bskal pa'am bskal ba bas lhag par bzhugs par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa de yang sgrub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāpi saṃpādanārtham /<br/> skandhamaraṇamārayornirjayārthamiti vaibhaṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re ni phung po dang 'chi bdag gi bdud dag las rgyal bar bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhimūle kleśadevaputramārau nirjitāviti /<br/> niṣṭhitamānuṣaṅgikam /<br/> prakṛtamevārabhyate /<br/> dvedhā dvādaśa /<br/> katamāni dvādaśa /<br/> antyāṣṭakādṛte /<br/> daurmanasyācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub kyi shing drung du ni nyon mongs pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud dag las rgyal lo / zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so / dkyus ma nyid brtsam par bya ste / bcu gnyis gnyis / bcu gnyis gang zhe na / tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde / ma gtogs pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antyamaṣṭakaṃ śraddhādīni daurmanasyaṃ ca varjayitvā /<br/> jīvitendriyādanyāni dvādaśa dvividhāni vipākaścāvipākaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde ba ma gtogs pa srog gi dbang po las gzhan pa bcu gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis te / rnam par smin pa yang yin la / rnam par smin pa ma yin pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cakṣurādīni saptaupacayikāni avipākaḥ /<br/> śeṣāṇi vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mig la sogs pa bdun rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no / lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manoduḥkhasukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇi kuśalakliṣṭānya vipākaḥ /<br/> airyāpathikaśāilpasthānikanairmāṇikāni ca yathāyogam /<br/> śeṣāṇi vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can rnams dang spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dang sprul pa rnams ni ci rigs par rnam par smin pa ma yin no / lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jīvitendriyaṃ cakṣurādīni dvādaśa hitvā śeṣāṇyavipāka iti siddham /<br/> yadi dauarmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka iti sūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate trīṇi kāryāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gi dbang po dang mig la sogs pa bcu gnyis ma gtogs pa lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar grub po / gal te yid mi bde ba rnam par smin pa ma yin na las ni gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma upekṣā vedanīyaṃ karmeti saṃprayogavedanīyatāmadhikṛtyoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang yid mi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang btang snyoms myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes gsungs pa'i mdo 'di ji ltar drang zhe na / mtshungs par ldan pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daurmasyena saṃprayuktaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyam
