</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i las ni yid mi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sukhasaṃparayuktaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i reg pa bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye api tarhi karmaṇī evaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ /<br/> yathecchasi tathā 'stu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni yid bde ba dang btang snyoms myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhe na / ji ltar dga' ba de ltar yin la rag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ vipāke 'pi na doṣaḥ /<br/> agatyā hyetadevaṃ gamyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pa yin na yang nyes pa med la / rnam par smin pa yin na yang nyes pa med do / go skabs med pas na de ni de ltar shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kā punratra yuktirdaurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba rnam par smin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daurmanasyaṃ hi parikalpaviśeṣairutpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba ni kun tu rtog pa'i khyad par dag gis skyed par byed pa yin gyi rnam par smin pa ni de ltam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nacaivam vipākaḥ /<br/> saumanasyamapyevaṃ na syādvipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba yang de dang 'dra bas rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tarhi daumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syādānantaryakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ daurmanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt /<br/> saumanasyamapyevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gal te yid mi bde ba rnam par smin par gyur na mtshams med pa byed pa rnams de'i phyir yid mi bde bskyed pas las de rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhe na / yid mi bde ba yang de dang 'dra ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi saumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syāt puṇyakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ saumanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yid bde ba rnam par smin par gyur na bsod nams byed pa rnams de'i phyir yid bde ba skyed pas las de rnam par smin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vītarāgāṇāṃ tarhi daurmanasyāsaṃbhavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la yid mi bde ba mi srid pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caivaṃ vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa ni de lta ma yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saumanasyamapyeṣāmavyākṛtaṃ kodṛśaṃ vipākaḥ syāt /<br/> yādṛśaṃ tādṛśamastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi yid bde ba lung du ma bstan pa rnam par smin pa yang ji lta bu zhig yin / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sati tu saṃbhave saumanasyasyāsti vipākāvakāśī na dauarmanasyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'dra yang rung ste / yid bde ba la rnam par smin pa'i go skabs yod ji srid du zin kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvathā 'samudācārāditi nāstyevaṃ daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> tatra jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya vipāko durgatāvakuśalasya /<br/> manaindriyamubhayorubhayasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba ni rnam pa thams cad du yang kun du mi 'byung bas yid mi bde ba la rnam par smin pa med ces zer ro / de la brgyad pa srog gi dbang po dang gzhan rnams bde 'gro na ni bde ba rnam par smin pa yin la / ngan 'gro ba ni mi bde ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no / yid kyi dbang po ni gnyis kar gnyi ga'i rnam par smin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇi kuśalasya /<br/> duḥkhendriyamakuśalasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sugatābubhayavyañjanasyākuśalenatatsthānapratilambhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde 'gro na mi dge bas mtshan gnyis po de'i gnas rnyed pa yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin te / dge bas 'phangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natvindriyasya kuśalākṣepāt /<br/> gatametad /<br/> idaṃ nu vaktavyam /<br/> katīndriyāṇi savipākāni katyavipākāni /<br/> yadetat daurmanasyamanantaroktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rdzogs so / 'di brjod par bya ste / dbang po du ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag yin / du ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin zhe na / gang 'di yid mi bde ba bshad ma thag pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tattvekaṃ savipākaṃ /<br/> tadekaṃ savipākameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gcig ni rnam par smin bcas de gcig pu ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tuśabda evakārārtho bhinnakramaśca veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kho na zhes bya ba'i don dang rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tadavyākṛtamasti nāpyanāsravamasamāhitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni lung du ma bstan pa yang med la / mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato nāstyavipākaṃ daurmanasyam /<br/> daśa dvidhā /<br/> savipākānyavipākāni ca /<br/> katamāni daśa /<br/> mano 'nyavittiśraddhādīni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir yid mi bde ba rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin no / bcu rnam gnyis / rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin / rnam par smin pa med pa dag kyang yin no / bcu gang zhe na / yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyavittigrahaṇāt daurmanasyādanyat veditaṃ gṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba gzhan zhes bya ba smos pas ni yid mi bde ba las gzhan pa'i tshor ba gzung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādīni śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamāchiprajñāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad la sogs ni dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣā akuāśalāḥ kuśalāḥ sāsravāśca savipākāḥ /<br/> anāsravā avyākṛtāścāvipākāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms mi dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no / zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhendriyaṃ kuśalākuāśalaṃ savipākamavyākṛtamavipākam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no / lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādīni sasravāṇi savipākānyanāsravāṇyavipākāni /<br/> anyadavipākamiti siddham /<br/> kati kuśalāni katyakuśalāni katyavyākṛtāni /<br/> ekāntena tāvat /<br/> aṣṭakaṃ kuśalaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no / zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin no / gzhan ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / du ni dge ba dag yin / du ni mi dge ba dag yin zhe na / re zhig gcig tu dge ba brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcaśraddhādīni trīṇi cājñāsyāmīndriyādīni /<br/> dvidhā /<br/> daurmanasyaṃ /<br/> kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca /<br/> mano 'nyā ca vittistredhā /<br/> kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāni /<br/> anyadekadhā /<br/> kiñcidanyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum mo / yid mi bde ba rnam gnyis / dge ba yang yin mi dge ba yang yin no / yid dang tshor gzhan ni / rnam gsum / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dag go / gzhan ni rnam pa gcig / gzhan de yang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jīvitāṣṭamaṃ cakṣurādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa dang brgyad pa srog ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadavyākṛtameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamadindriyaṃ katamadhātvāptameṣāmindriyāṇām /<br/> kāmāptamamalaṃ hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po 'di rnams las dbang po gang zhig khams gang du gtogs she na / dri med ma gtogs 'dod par gtogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ tāvadindriyaṃ veditavyam /<br/> ekāntānāsravamājñāsyāmīndriyāditrayaṃ hitvā /<br/> taddhyapratisaṃyuktameva /<br/> rūpāptaṃ strīpumindriye /<br/> duḥkhe ca hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gcig tu zag pa med pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ma gtogs pa'i dbang po rnams ni 'dod pa dang ldan par rig par bya ste / de ni ldan pa ma yin pa kho na yin no / pho mo'i dbang dang sdug bsngal dag / ma gtogs gzugs gtogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amalaṃ ceti varttate /<br/> duḥkhe iti duḥkhadaurmanasye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te / sdug bsngal dag ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra maithunadharmavairāgyādaśobhākaratvācca rūpadhātau strīpuruṣendriye na staḥ /<br/> kathamidānīṃ puruṣāsta ucyante /<br/> kvocyante /<br/> sūtre /<br/> asthānamanavakāśo yat strī brahmatvaṃ kārayiṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams de na 'khrig pa'i chos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir dang mi mdzes par byed pa'i phyir po dang mo'i dbang po dag med do / da ni ji ltar na de dag pho zhes bya / ga las 'byung / mo tshangs pa nyid byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gnas med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /<br/> sthānametat vidyate yat puruṣa iti /<br/> anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo yaḥ kāmachātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pho gang yin pa de ni gnas yod do / zhes gsungs te / pho'i ngo bor gzhan 'dod pa'i khams na pho rnams la yod pa gang yin pa ni yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhendriyaṃ nāstyāśrayasyācchatvādakuśalā bhāvāccha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ba'i phyir dang mi dge ba med pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi dbang po med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daurmanasyendriyaṃ nāsti śamathasnigdhasantānatvādāghātavastvabhāvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu zhi gnas kyis brlan pa'i phyir dang kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi med pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'i dbang po med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can dang bde ba'am ma gtogs gzugs med gtogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">strīpuruṣendriye duḥkhe cāmalaṃ hitveti varttate /<br/> kimavaśāiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pho dang mo'i dbang po dag dang bde ba dag dang dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar ro / ci zhig lus she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manojīvitopekṣendriyāṇi śraddhādīni ca pañca /<br/> etānyārūpyapratisaṃyuktāni santi nānyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid dang srog dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dad pa la sogs pa lnga po de dag ni gzugs med pa dang ldan par 'dod do / gzhan dag ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katīndriyāṇi darśanaprahātavyāni kati bhāvanāprahātavyāni katyaprahātavyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po du ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin / du ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin / du ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag gi yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manovittitrayaṃ tredhā /<br/> katamad vittitrayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid dang tshor ba gsum rnam gsum / tshor ba gsum gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ /<br/> dviheyā durmanaskatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms rnams so / gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dauarmanasyaṃ dvābhyāṃ praheyaṃ darśanabhāvanābhyām /<br/> nava bhāvanayā /<br/> heyānītyadhikāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang gnyis kyis spang bar bya ba yin no / dgu ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jīvitāṣṭamāni cakṣurādīni duḥkhendriyaṃ ca bhāvanāheyānyeva /<br/> pañca tvaheyānyapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa dang brgyad pa srog dang sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kho na yin no / lnga po ni / spang bar bya min yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādīni pañca bhāvanāheyānyapyaheyānyapi /<br/> sāsravānāsravatvāt /<br/> na trayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kyang yin la / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag kyang ma yin no / gsum min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trayaṃ naiva praheyamājñāsyāmīndriyādikamanāsravatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ni zag pa med pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi nirdoṣaṃ prahāṇārham /<br/> uktaḥ prakārabhedaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes pa med pa ni spang bar 'os pa ma yin no / rnam pa'i bye brag bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lābha idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni rnyed pa dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katīndriyāṇi kasmindhātau vipākaḥ prathamato labhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gang du dang po nyid du dbang po rnam par smin pa du zhig rnyed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmeṣvādau vipāko dve labhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis / rnyed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ ca /<br/> te punaḥ /<br/> nopapādukaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi dbang po dang srog gi dbang po 'o / de dag kyang / rdzus te skye bas min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapādukapratiṣedhādaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaīriti veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzus te skye ba bkag pas sgo nga las skye ba dang mngal las skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dag gis rnyed par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna manaupekṣendriye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyis dbang po dag ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisandhikāle tayoravaśyaṃ kliṣṭatvāt /<br/> athopapādukaiḥ kati labhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tsheg don mi za bar nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro / yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taiḥ ṣaḍa vā /<br/> yadyavyañjanā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yis drug gam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan ma med pa zhig yin na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā prāthamakalpikāḥ /<br/> katamāni ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar bskal pa dang po pa rnams lta bu'o / drug gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyajīvitendriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang srog gi dbang po rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta vā /<br/> yadyekavyañjanā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdun nam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā devādiṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar lha la sogs pa dag na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭau vā /<br/> yadyubhayavyañjanā bhavanti /<br/> kiṃ punarubhayavyañjanā apyupapādukā bhavanti /<br/> bhavantyapāyeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad ces bya ba ni gal te mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na'o / ci rdzus te skye ba yang mtshan gnyis pa yod dam zhe na / ngan song dag na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvat kāmadhātau /<br/> atha rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātau ca kathamityāha /<br/> ṣaḍ rūpeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na ni de lta bu yin no / 'o na gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams na ji lta bu yin zhe na / gzugs na drug go zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmapradhānatvāt kāmadhātuḥ kāmā iti nirdiśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa rnam zhes bstan la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpapradhānatvād rūpadhātū rūpāṇīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs rnams zhes bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre 'pyuktaṃ ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las kyang / gang yang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra rūpadhātau ṣaḍḍindriyāṇi vipākaḥ parathamato labhyante /<br/> yānyeva kāmadhātāvavyañjanaiarupapādukaiḥ /<br/> ekamuttare /<br/> rūpadhātorārūpyadhāturuttaraḥ /<br/> samāpattitaśca paratvādupapattitaśca pradhānataratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams de na ni dang po nyid du dbang po drug rnam par smin pa 'thob ste / 'dod pa'i khams na rdzus te skye ba mtshan ma med pa dag gis rnyed pa gang dag yin ba de dag nyid do / gong mar gcig / gzugs kyi khams pas ni gzugs med pa'i khams snyoms par 'jug pas ring ba'i phyir dang skye bas ches mchog yin pa'i phyir gong ma ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmin ekameva jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ prathamato labhyate nānyat /<br/> ukto lābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni dang po nyid du srog gi dbang po gcig kho na rnam par smin pa thob ste / gzhan ni ma yin no / rnyed pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tyāga idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni gtong ba brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmindhātau mriyamāṇaḥ katīndriyāṇi nirodhayatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gang du 'chi ba na dbang po zhig thams cad kyi tha mar gtong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhayatyuparamānnārūpye jīvitam manaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni / srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upekṣāṃ caiva rūpe 'ṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātau mriyalmāṇo 'ṣṭau nirodhayati /<br/> tāni ca trīṇi cakṣurādīni pañca /<br/> sarve hyupapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ca /<br/> kāme daśa navāṣṭau vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams su 'chi na phung po de dag dang mig la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po brgyad 'gag ste / brdzus te skye ba thams cad ni dbang po rnams tshang bar skye zhing 'chi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau mriyamāṇa ubhayavyañjanī daśendriyāṇi nirodhayati /<br/> tāni cāṣṭau strī puruṣendriye ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod par bcu'am dgu 'am brgyad 'dod pa'i khams su 'chi na mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na ni brgyad po de dag dang pho dang mo'i dbang po dang dbang po bcu 'gag par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekavyañjano nava /<br/> avyañjano 'ṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan gcig pa zhig na ni dgu'o / mtshan med pa zhig yin na ni brgyad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakṛnmaraṇa eṣa nyāyaḥ /<br/> kramamṛtyau tu catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cig car 'chi ba la ni tshu la de lta bu yin no / rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">krameṇa tu mriyamāṇaścatvārīndriyāṇi nirodhayati /<br/> kāyajīvitamanaupekṣendriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rim gyis 'chi na lus dang srog dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dbang po bzhi 'gag ste / de rnams la ni so sor 'gag pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyeṣāṃ pṛthagnirodhaḥ /<br/> eṣa ca nyāyaḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni tshul de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā tu kuśale cetasi sthito mriyate tadā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi ba de'i tshe ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣubhe sarvatra pañca ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba thams cad dag tu lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśale cetasi mriyamāṇaḥ sarvatra yathoktamindriyāṇi nirodhayati /<br/> śraddhādīni ca pañcādhikāni /<br/> eṣāṃ kuśale cetasyavaśyaṃbhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi na thams cad du ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhag par dad pa la sogs pa lnga 'gag ste / de rnams ni dge ba'i sems la gdon mi za bar yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau nirodhayati rūpeṣu trayodaśāeti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na gzugs med pa na ni brgyad 'gag par 'gyur ro / gzugs na ni bcu gsum mo zhes rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyaprakaraṇe sarva indriyadharmā vicāryante /<br/> atha katamacchrāmaṇyaphalaṃ katibhirindriyaiḥ prāpyate /<br/> navāptirantya phalayoḥ /<br/> navabhirindriyaiḥ praptirantyaphalayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste / dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gang zhig dbang po du dag gis 'thob ce na / 'bras bu tha ma gnyis ni dbang po dgus 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ke punarantye /<br/> srota āpattiphalamarhattvaṃ ca /<br/> ke madhye /<br/> sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang tha ma gang dag yin zhe na / rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o / bar ma gang dag yin zhe na / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra srota āpattiphalasya śraddhādibhirājñātāvīndriyavarjyairmanaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti navabhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dad pa la sogs pa dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dgus 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājñāsyāmīndriyamānantaryamārge veditavyamājñendriyaṃ ca vimuktimārge
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni bar chad med pa'i lam la rig par bya'o / kun shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhābhyāṃ hi tasya prāptirvisaṃyiogaprāpterāvāhakasanniśrayatvādyathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis kyang de 'thob ste / go rims bzhin du bral ba'i 'thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang rten yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhattvamasya punaḥ śraddhādibhirājñāsyāmīndriyavarjyairmanaindriyeṇa sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ cānyatameneti navabhiḥ /<br/> saptāṣṭnavabhirdvayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang yid kyi dbang po dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig dang dgus 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalayoḥ pratyekaṃ saptabhiraṣṭabhirnavabhiṣcendriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dag ni re re zhing dbang po bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag gis 'thob ste / ji lta zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvadyadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /<br/> pañcabhiḥ śraddhādibhirupekṣāmanaindriyābhyāṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang btang snyoms dang yid kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭabhirindriyai praptiḥ /<br/> ājñendriyamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni des dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste / brgyad pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha bhūyovītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiryeneva srota āpattiphalasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste / gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgāmiphalaṃ yadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasya /<br/> atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭabhistathaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no / 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po brgyad kyis 'thob ste / de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha vītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiḥ /<br/> yathā srota āpattiphalasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni khyad par yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāmanyatamaṃ bhavati /<br/> niśrayaviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāpyayamānupūrviko navame vimūktimārge tīkṣṇenriyatvā ddhyānaṃ praviśāti laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpyaṣṭābhirindriyairanāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la / rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsam gtan la 'jug pa de'i tshe yang dbang po brgyad kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrahi navame vimuktimārge saumanasyendriyamaṣṭamaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la ni yid bde ba'i dbang po brgyad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavatyānantaryamārge tūpekṣendriyameva nityamubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar chad med pa'i lam la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha lokottareṇa praviśāti tasya navabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ /<br/> ājñenriyaṃ navamaṃ bhavati /<br/> yattarhyabhidharma uktaṃ katibhirindriyairarhattvaṃ prapnotītyāha ekādaśbhhiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gnyi gas kyang 'thob bo / 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pas 'jug na nad dbang po dgus 'thob ste / dgu pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no / 'o na chos mngon pa las dbang po du zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob ce na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat kathaṃ navabhirityucyate /<br/> navabhireva tat prāpnoti /<br/> ekādaśabhirarhattavamuktaṃ tvekasya saṃbhavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu gcig gis 'thob po zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar dgu dag gis 'thob ces bshad ce na / de ni dgu kho nas 'thob ste / bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid / 'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti saṃbhavo yadekaḥ pudgalaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyīpekṣābhirarhattvaṃ prāpnuyādata ekādaśabhirityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag gcig 'ga' zhig yongs su nyams shing yongs su nyams nas bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa srid pa yod pas de'i phyir bcu gcig gis zhes bshad kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natu khalu saṃbhavo 'sti sukhādīnāmekasmin kāle /<br/> kathamanāgābhino 'pyeṣa prasaṅgo na bhavati /<br/> nahyasau parihīṇaḥ kadācitsukhendriyeṇa prāpnnoti na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba la sogs pa dus gcig tu srid pa ni med do / 'di phyir mi 'ong ba la yang ji ltar thal bar mi 'gyur zhe na / 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do /  / 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba la ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvairāgyasya dvimārgaprāpaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni lam gnyis kyis 'thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ vicāryate /<br/> katamenendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ katibhiḥ avaśyaṃ samanvāgato bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po gang zhig dang ldan na gdon mi za bar dbang po dag dang ldan pa dag yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> upekṣājīvitamanoyukto 'vaśyaṃ trayānvitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni / yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eṣāmupekṣādīnāmanyatamena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ tribhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyebhireva /<br/> nahyeṣāmanyo 'ynena vinā samanvāgamaḥ /<br/> śeṣaistvaniyamaḥ /<br/> syātsamanvāgataḥ syādasamanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig btang snyoms la sogs pa 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan ba de ni gdon mi za bar dbang po gsum dag dang ldan ba yin te / de dag nyid dang ngo / 'di dag ni phan tshun med na mi ldan pa yin gyi lhag ma rnams dang ni ma nges te / ldan pa yang yod mi ldan pa yang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvaccakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvendriyai rārūpyopapanno na samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po dag ni gzugs med par skyes pa dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau ca yenāpratilabdhavihīnāni /<br/> kāyendriyeṇārūpyopapanno na samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ni gang gis ma thob pa dang rnam par nyams pa dag dang mi ldan no / lus kyi dbang pa ni gzugs med par skyes pa dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">strīndriyeṇa rūpārūpyopapannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mo'i dbang po dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhatau yenāpratilabdhavihīnam /<br/> evaṃ puruṣendriyeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ni gang gis ma thob pa dang rnam par nyams pa dang mi ldan te / pho'i dbang po yang de bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhendriyeṇa caturdhyānārūpyopapannaḥ pṛthagjano na samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i dbang po dang ni bsam gtan bzhi pa dang gzugs med par skyes pa'i so so'i skye bo dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saumanasyendriyeṇa tṛtīyacaturthadhyānārūpyopapannaḥ pṛthagjana eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba'i dbang po dang ni bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang gzugs med par skyes pa'i so so'i skye bo kho na dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhendriyeṇa rūpārūpyopapannaḥ /<br/> daurmanasyena kāmavītarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa mi ldan no / yid ma bde ba dang ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādibhiḥ samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa dang ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad par mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājñāsyāmīndriyeṇa pṛthagjanaphalathānasamanvāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang ni so so'i skye bo dang 'bras bu la gnas pa dag dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājñendriyeṇa pṛthagjanadarśanāśaikṣamārgasthāḥ /<br/> ājñātāvīndriyeṇa pṛthagjanaśaikṣaikṣyā asamanvāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ni so so'i skye bo dang mthong ba dang mi slob pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams ni mi ldan no / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ni so so'i skye bo dang slob pa dag dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apratipiddhāsvavasthāsu yathoktasamanvāgato veditavyaḥ /<br/> caturbhiḥ sukha kāyābhyāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma bkag pa'i gnas skabs dag tu ni ji skad bshad pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o / bde lus ldan la bzhi dag dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bde ba'i dbang po dang ldan bde ni gdon mi za bar btang snyoms la sogs pa gsum bo de dag dang bde ba'i dbang po dang dbang po bzhi dang ldan la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig lus kyi dbang po dang ldan ba de yang gsum po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po bzhi dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcabhiścakṣurādimān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig sogs ldan la lnga dang ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścakṣurindriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ pañcabhirupekṣājīvitamanaḥ kāyendriyaistena ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig mig gi dbang po dang ldan ba de ni gdon mi za bar btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang lus kyi dbang po dag dang de dang dbang po lnga dang ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvendriyairveditavyam /<br/> saumanasyī ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po dag dang ldan ba de yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / yid bde ldan yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścāpi saumanasyendriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ pañcabhirupekṣājīvitamanaḥsukhasaumanasyaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig yid bde ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa de yang gdon mi za bar btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang dbang po lnga dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānajastṛtīyadhyānālābhī katamena sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis par skyes pa bsam gtan gsum pa ma thob pa bde ba'i dbang po gang dag dang ldan pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭena tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikena /<br/> duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo duḥkhendriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ saptabhiḥ kāyajīvitamanobhiścaturbhirvedanendriyaiḥ /<br/> strīndriyādimān /<br/> aṣṭābhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal ldan / bdun dang gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang ldan bde ni gdon mi za bar lus dang srog dang yid dag dang tshor ba'i dbang po bzhi dang bdun dang ldan no / mo'i dbang sogs ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad dang gang zhig mo'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar bdun po de dag dang mo'i dbang po dang brgyad dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādiśabdena puruṣendriyadaurmanasyaśaraddhādīnāṃ saṃgrahaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni pho'i dbang po dang yid mi bde ba dang dad pa la sogs pa gzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvānapi pratyekamaṣṭābhiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /<br/> taiśca saptabhiraṣṭamena ca puruṣendriyeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag dang ldan pa ni re re zhing yang brgyad dang ldan pa yin te / bdun po de dag dang pho'i dbang po dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ daurmanasyendriyeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba'i dbang po yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādimāṃstu taiśca pañcabhirupekṣājīvitamanobhiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni lnga po de dag dang btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dag dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekādaśabhistvājñājñātendriyānvitaḥ /<br/> ājñāta indriyamājñātendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes ldan pa'i / dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan / kun shes pa la dbang byed pas na kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ājñātendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamekādaśabhiḥ sukhasaumanasyopekṣājīvitamanaśraddhādibahirājñendriyeṇa ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang dad pa la sogs pa dag dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang bcu gcig dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamājñā tāvīndriyeṇāpi /<br/> taireva daśabhirājñātāvīndriyeṇa ca /<br/> ājñāsyāmīndriyopetastrayodaśabhiranvitaḥ /<br/> katamaistrayodaśabhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ldan ba yang bcu po de dag nyid dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ldan no / kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la / bcu gsum dag dang ldan ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manojīvitakāyendriyaiḥ catasṛbhirvedanābhiḥ śraddhādibhirājñāsyāmīndriyeṇa ca /<br/> atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu gsum dag dang ldan zhe na / yid dang srog dang lus kyi dbang po dag dang tshor ba'i dbang po bzhi dag dang dad pa la sogs pa dag dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvālpairniḥśubho 'ṣṭābhirvinmanaḥkāyajīvitaiḥ /<br/> yuktaḥ /<br/> samucchinnakuśamūlo niḥśubhaḥ /<br/> sa sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gang zhig nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan ba de dbang po ji snyed cig dang ldan zhe na / dge med nang na nyung ldan pa / lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan / dge med ne dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcabhirvedanādibhiḥ kāyamanojīvitaiśca /<br/> vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā /<br/> vedanaṃ vā vit /<br/> yathā saṃpadanaṃ saṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan na tshor ba lnga dag dang lus dang yid dang srog dag dang dbang po brgyad dang ldan no / tshor bar byed pa ni tshor ba ste / myong bar byed pa'i phyir ro / yang na tshor ba ni tshor ba ste / dper na phun sum tshogs pa la phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca niḥśāubhaḥ sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyairyuktaḥ /<br/> bālastathārūpye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar dge ba med pa nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan na dbang po brgyad dag dang ldan pa ltar gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bāla iti pṛthagjanasyākhyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byis pa zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i ming ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamairaṣṭābhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad gang dag dang ldan zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upekṣāyurmanaḥśubhaiḥ /<br/> upekṣājīvitamanobhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekāntakuśalatvāt śraddhādīni śubhagrahaṇena gṛhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba smos pa ni dad pa la sogs pa gzung bar bya ste / gcig tu dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāmapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa yang bsdus par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> aṣṭādhikārād dvālādhikārācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir dang byis pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ /<br/> bahubhiryukta ekānnaviṃāśatyā 'malavarjitaiḥ /<br/> anā sravaṇi trīṇi varjayitvā /<br/> sa punaḥ /<br/> dviliṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gang zhig nang na dbang po mang po dag dang ldan ba de ji snyed cig dang ldan zhe na / mang por ldan na bcu dgu ste / dri ma med rnams ma gtogs so / zag pa med pa gsum ma gtogs so / de yang mtshan gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvivyañjano yaḥ samagrendriyaḥ ekānnaviṃśatyā samanvāgataḥ /<br/> kaścāparaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan gnyis pa dbang po tshang ba gang yin pa de ni bcu dgu dang ldan no / gzhan yang gang zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryo rāgī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa chags bcas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avītarāgo 'pi śaikṣaḥ sarvabahubhirekānnaviṃśatyā samanvāgataḥ /<br/> ekaliṅgadvayamalavarjitaiḥ /<br/> ekaṃ vyañjanaṃ dve cānāsrave varjayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang nang na mang po dang ldan na bcu dgu dang ldan te / mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs / mtshan gcig dang zag pa med pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājñātāvīndriyaṃ dvayośācānyatarat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang gnyis po las gang yang rung ba zhig ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ukta indriyāṇāṃ dhātuprabhedaprasaṅgenāgatānāṃ vistareṇa prabhedaḥ /<br/> idamidānīṃ vicāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams rab tu dbye ba'i zhar la 'ongs pa dbang po rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rgyas par bshad zin to / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti /<br/> santītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ci ltar mtshan nyid tha dad pa de bzhin du tha dad par skye ba zhig yin nam / 'on te kha cig nges par lhan cig skye ba'ang yod ce na / smras pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarva ime dharmāḥ pañca bhavanti /<br/> rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba dag dang sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag dang 'dus ma byas dang lngar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāsaṃskṛtaṃ naivotpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba med pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpiṇāṃ tu dharmāṇāmayaṃ niyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gzugs can rnams kyi nges pa ni 'di yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme 'ṣṭadravyako 'śabdaḥ paramāṇuranindriyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod na dbang po med pa dang sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte /<br/> yato nānyataro vijñāyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad las phra ba'i gzugs ni bsags pa'i rdul phra rab ces bya ste / de las ches chung ba ni mi mngon no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'dod pa'i khams na sgra yang med dbang po yang med pa zhig yin na ni rdzas brgyad dang ldan par skye ste / gang yang rung ba zhig med par ni ma yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas brgyad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bzhi ste / gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> kāyendriyī navadravyaḥ /<br/> kāyendriyamatrāstīti so 'yaṃ kāyendriyī /<br/> tatra navadravyāṇi /<br/> tāni cāṣṭau kāyendriyaṃ ca /<br/> daśadravyo 'parendriyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab dbang po dang bcas la sgra med pa zhig yin na ni rdzas dgu 'am / rdzas bcu dang ldan par skye ste / de la re zhig / lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o / 'di la lus kyi dbang po yod pas na 'di ni lus dbang ldan no / de la rdzas dgu ni brgyad po dag dang lus kyi dbang po'o / dbang po gzhan rdzas bcu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po gzhan gyi rdul phra rab gang la yod pa de la rdzas bcu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tānyeva nava cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvendriyāṇāṃ cānyatamam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgu po de dag nyid dang mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab de dag sgra dang bcas pa zhig tu skye na ni go rims bzhin du rdzas dgu dang bcu dang bcu gcig dang ldan bar skye ba na skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti hīndriyāvinirbhāgī śabdo 'pi ya upāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i sgra yang yod de / zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na 'byung ba rnams tha mi dad pa las 'di na 'dus pa kha cig kho na ni sra bar dmigs / kha cig kho na ni gsher ba'am dro ba'am gyo bar dmigs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gang na ches gsal zhing mthu'i sgo nas shas che ba de ni de na dmigs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūcītūnī kalāpasparśavat saktulavaṇacūrṇarasavacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na khab dang sdong bu'i tshogs la reg pa lta bu dang phye dang lan tshva'i phye ma'i ro bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punasteṣu śeṣāstitvaṃ gamyate /<br/> karmataḥ saṃgrahaghṛtipaktivyūhanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar de dag na lhag ma rnams yod par khong du chud par bya zhe na / las kyi sgo nas te / sdud pa dang 'dzin pa dang smin pa dang gyo ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare /<br/> avyati bhede 'pi tu syācchaityātiśayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen dang phrad na sra ba la sogs pa yang gsher ba la sogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re chu dag la grang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo nas dro ba yod par khong du chud do zhes zer ro / ma 'dres kyang khyad par yod par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śabdavedanātiśayavat /<br/> bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra dang tshor ba'i khyad par bzhin no / gzhan dag na re de dag las de dag sa bon gyi sgo nas yod kyi rang gi ngo bor ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santyasmin dāruskandhe vividhā dhātavaiti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing gi phung po 'di la khams rnam pa sna tshogs yod do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ vāyau varṇasadbhāvaḥ /<br/> śraddhānīya eṣo 'rtho nānumānīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung la kha dog ji ltar yod ce na / don 'di ni dad par bya ba yin gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃspandato gandhagrahaṇāt tasya varṇāvyabhicārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'dres par dri 'dzin pa'i phyir te / de la ni kha dog 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams na ni dri dang ro dag med par bshad pas des na yod pa'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rdzas drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang ldan pa zhes bshad zin pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir mi bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ /<br/> yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti /<br/> avaśyaṃ hi taddravyasaṃsthānenāpi bhavitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci 'dir rdzas kho na la rdzas su gzung ngam / 'on te skye mched kyi rdzas la rdzas su gzung / des na cir 'gyur / gal te rdzas kho na la rdzas su gzung nas ni rdzas brgyad dang ldan pa dang rdzas dgu dang bcu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di ha cang nyungs par smras pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāpi paramāṇusaṃcitatvāt /<br/> gurutvalaghutvayoścānyatareṇa ślakṣṇatvakarkaśatvayośca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rdul phra rab bsags pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za par de la dbyibs kyang yod do / lci ba nyid dang yang ba nyid dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang 'jam pa nyid dang rtsub pa nyid dag las gang yang rung ba zhig kyang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śītenāpi kvacit jighatsayā pipāsayā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig la ni grang ba yang yod la / bkres pa dang skom pa yang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāpyāyatanadravyaṃ gṛhyate ayivahṇidamucyate aṣṭadravyaka iti /<br/> caturdravyako hi vaktavyo yāvatā bhūtānyapi spraṣṭavyāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te skye mched la rdzas su gzung na ni rdzas brgyad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di ha cang mangs par smras pa yin te / rdzas bzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya ste / 'byung ba ji snyed pa dag kyang reg bya'i skye mched yin no / 'dir cung zad cig ni rdzas kho na la rdzas su gzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiñcidatra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśrayabhūtaṃ kiñcidatrāyatanaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśritabhūtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten du gyur pa gang yin pa'o / 'dir cung zad cig ni skye mched kyi rdzas la rdzas su gzung ste rten can du gyur pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapi bhūyāṃsi bhūtadravyāṇi bhavantyupādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt /<br/> atra punarjātidravyaṃ gṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na yang 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur te / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs rnams re re zhing 'byung ba bzhi tshan la brten pa'i phyir ro / 'dir ni rigs la rjes su gzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtacatuṣkāntarāṇāṃ svajātyanatikramāt /<br/> kaḥ punaryatsa evaṃ vikalpena vaktum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba bzhi po gzhan dag kyang rigs las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro / de ltar 'bad de bye brag tu bshad ci dgos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cchandato 'pi hi vācāṃ pravṛttirarthastu parīkṣyaḥ /<br/> ukto rūpiṇāṃ sahotpādaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig ni 'dun pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa yin pas don la brtag par bya'o / gzugs can rnams kyi nges par ltan cig skye ba bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāṇāṃ vaktavyastatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams kyi brjod par bya ste / de la re zhig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittaṃ caittāḥ sahavaśyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems byung nges lhan cig / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyete vinā 'nyonyaṃ bhavitumutsahante /<br/> sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ /<br/> sahāvaśyamiti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni phan tshun med na 'byung bar mi nus so / thams cad 'dus byas mchan nyid dang / nges par lhan cig ces bya par sbyar te / gzugs sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatkiṃ cidutpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā viprayuktā vā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhamutpadyate /<br/> prāptyā vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems sam / sems las byung ba dag gam / ldan pa ma yin pa dag kyang rung / gang cung zad skye ba de thams cad ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams dang lhan cig skye'o / 'thob pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptyā saha satvākhyamevotpadyate nānyaditi vikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ /<br/> caittā ityucyante /<br/> ka ime caittāḥ /<br/> pañcadhā caittā mahābhūmyādibhedataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa dang ni sems can du snyon pa kho na dang lhan cig skye'i gzhan dang ni ma yin no / zhes bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir ram zhes bya pa'i sgra smos so / sems las byung ba rnams zhes brjod pa sems las byung ba de dag gang zhe na / sems byung rnam lnga ste / sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir / sems las byung ba rnams ni rnam pa lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca prakārāścaittā mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ akuśalamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāśca /<br/> bhūmirnāma gativiśayaḥ /<br/> yo hi yasya gativiśayaḥ sa tasya bhūmirityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa mang po dag dang dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa rnams dang mi dge pa'i sa mang po pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa pa rnams so / sa zhes bya ba ni go skabs kyi yul te / gang zhig gang gi go skabs kyi yul yin pa de ni de'i sa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti /<br/> ke punaḥ sarvatra cetasi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'di dag la sa mang po pa yod pas nas mang po pa rnams te / gang dag sems thams cad la 'byung ba'o / gang dag sems thams cad la 'byung ba de dag kyang gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang / 'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaskāro 'dhimokṣaśca samādhiḥ sarvacetasi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid la byed dang mos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin sems thams cad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos bcu po 'di dag ni sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad la tshogs par 'byung ngo zhes grag go lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vedanā trividho 'nubhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la tshor ba ni myong ba rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukho duḥkho 'duḥkhā sukhaśca /<br/> cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o / sems pa ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñā saṃjñānaṃ viṣayanimittodrūha /<br/> cchandaḥ karttṛkāmatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes ni 'dus nas shes pa ste / yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o / 'dun pa ni byed 'dod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśa indriyaviṣayavijñānasannipātajā spṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg pa ni yul dang dbang po rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las skyes pa'i reg pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">matiḥ prajñā dharmapravicayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">blo gros ni shes rab ste / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtirālambanāsaṃpramoṣaḥ /<br/> manaskāraścetasa ābhogaḥ /<br/> adhimokṣo 'dhimuktiḥ /<br/> samādhiścittasyaikāgratā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran ba ni dmigs pa mi brjed pa'o / yid la byed pa ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o / mos pa ni 'dod pa'o / ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dad sems las byung ba rnams kyi bye brag ni phra bas de ni re zhig rgyun rnams la yang yongs su gcad par dka' na skad cig ma dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ /<br/> kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti /<br/> ke punasta iti /<br/> śraddhā 'pramādaḥ praśrabdhirupekṣā hrīrapatrapā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sman la sogs pa gzugs can rnams la yang ro mang po kha cig gi ro'i khyad par dbang pos gzung bar bya ba rnams nges par gzung bar dka' na / chos gang dag gzugs can ma yin zhing blos gzung bar bya ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos / 'di dag la dge pa'i sa mang po yod pas 'di dag ni dge pa'i sa mang po pa dag yin te / gang dag dge pa'i sems la rtag tu 'byung ba'o / de dag kyang gang zhe na / dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs /  / btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang / brtson 'grus rtag tu dge las 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos 'di dag ni dge ba'i sems la rtag tu 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra śraddhā cetasaḥ prasādaḥ /<br/> satyaratna karmaphalābhisaṃpratyaya ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dad pa ni sems dang ba'o / gzhan dag na ni bden pa dang dkon mchog dang las dang 'bras bu rnams la mngon bar yid ches pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apramādaḥ duśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bag yod pa ni dge pa'i chos rnams bsgom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kā punaste bhyo 'nyā bhāvanā /<br/> yā teṣvavahitatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las gzhan pa bsgom pa de gang zhig yin zhe na / de dag nyid la gces su 'dzin pa nyid gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetasa ārakṣeti nikāyāntarītāḥ sūtre paṭhanti /<br/> praśrabdhiścittakarmaṇyatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan dag gi mdo las ni sems kun tu bsrung ba'o zhes 'don to / shin tu sbyangs pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca sūtre kāyapraśrabdhirapyuktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las lus shin tu sbyangs pa zhes kyang gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na khalu noktā /<br/> sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma gsungs pa ni ma yin mod kyi de ni lus kyi tshor ba ji lta ba de bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ sā bodhyaṅgeṣu yokṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag tu rung bar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tarhi kāyakarmaṇyataiva kāyikī praśrabdhirveditavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na der ni lus las su rung ba kho na la lus shin tu sbyangs pa yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ sā bodhyaṅgamitayucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhyaṅgānukūlyāt /<br/> sā hi kāyakarmaṇyatā cittakarmaṇyatā bodhyaṅgamāvahati /<br/> asti punaḥ svacit anyatrāpyevaṃ dṛśyate /<br/> astītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub kyi yan lag dag mthun pa'i phyir te / lus las su rung ba de ni sems las su rung ba byang chub kyi yan lag 'dren par byed do / de lta bu gzhan la lar snang ba yod dam zhe na / smras pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> pratighaḥ pratighanimittaṃ ca vyāpādanivaraṇamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba dang dga' ba'i gnas lta bu'i chos rnams dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pa dang khong khro ba dang khong khro ba'i rgyu mtshan gnod sems kyi sgrib par gsungs pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang rtsol ba rnams shes rab kyi phung por gsungs pa dag lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyakdṛṣṭisaṃkalpavyāyāmāśca prajñāskandha uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang rtsol ba dag shes rab kyi rang bzhin ma yin yang de dang mthun pa'i phyir de'i sgra 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete /<br/> evaṃ kāyapraśrabdhirapi bodhyaṅgānuguṇyādvodhyaṅgaśabdaṃ labhate /<br/> upekṣā cittasamatā cittānābhogatā /<br/> kathamidānīmetadyokṣyate /<br/> tatraiva citte ābhogātmako manaskāro 'nābhogātmikā copekṣeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir / byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i sgra 'thob par 'gyur ro / btang snyoms ni sems mnyam pa nyid dang sems lhun gyis grub pa nyid do / da ni ji ltar na sems de nyid la rtsol pa'i bdag nyid yid la byed pa yang 'byung / rtsol ba med pa'i bdag nyid btang snyoms kyang 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rung par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu coktaṃ durjñāna eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti /<br/> asti hi nāma durjñānamapi jñāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi bye brag ni shes par dka'o zhes bshad pa ma yin nam / shes par dka' ba yang shes pa ni yod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idam tu khalvatidurjñānaṃ yadvirodhe 'pyavirodha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang 'gal bzhin du yang mi 'gal lo zhes bya ba ni shin tu shes par dka'o / rtsol ba yang gzhan du 'byung la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatrābhogo 'nyatrānābhoga iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsol ba med pa yang gzhan du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba ci yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tarhīdānīmekālambanāḥ sarve saṃprayuktāḥ prāpnuvanti /<br/> evañjātīyakamatrānyadapyāyāsyatīti yastasya nayaḥ so 'syāpi veditavyaḥ /<br/> hrīrapatrāpyaṃ ca paścādvakṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni mtshungs par ldan pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu mi 'gyur ro / 'di las 'di lta bu'i rigs gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas dang tshul gang yin pa de 'di la yang rig par bya'o / ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūladvayaṃ dve kuśalamūle alobhādveṣau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsa ba gnyis ni dge pa'i rtsa ba gnyis po chags pa med pa dang zhe sdang med pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amoho 'pyasti sa tu prajñātmakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gti mug med pa yang yod mod kyi de ni shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate /<br/> avihiṃsā aviheṭhanā /<br/> vīryaṃ cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ /<br/> uktāḥ kuśalā mahābhūmikāḥ /<br/> mahatī bhūmirmahābhūmiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab ni sa mang po pa yin pas 'di dge ba'i sa mang po pa kho na yin par ni mi brjod do / rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni rnam par tho mi 'tshams pa'o / brtson 'grus ni sems mngon par spro ba'o / dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams bshad zin to / sa mang po ni sa mang ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag la nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po yod pas / 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag yin te / chos gang dag nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la rtag tu 'byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /<br/> mohaḥ pramādaḥ kauśīdyamā śraddhyaṃ styānmuddhavaḥ /<br/> kliṣṭe sadaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la rtag tu 'byung ba de dag kyang gang zhe na / rmongs dang bag med le lo dang / ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod / nyon mongs can la rtag tu 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra moho nāmāvidyā 'jñānamasaṃprakhyānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa ste / mi shes pa dang mi gsal ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pramādaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhāvanā 'pramāda vipakṣo dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bag med pa ni dge pa'i chos rnams mi bsgom pa ste / bsgom pa'i mi mthun ba'i phyogs kyi chos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kauśīdyaṃ cetaso nābhyutsāhho vīryavipakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">le lo ni sems mngon par mi spro ba ste / brtson 'grus kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśraddhyaṃ cetaso 'prasādaḥ śraddhāvipakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma dad pa ni sems ma dad pa ste / dad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">styānaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā kāyagurutā cittagurutā kāyākarmaṇyatā cittākarmaṇyatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus lci ba nyid dang / sems lci ba nyid dang lus las su mi rung ba nyid dang sems las su mi rung ba nyid gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyikaṃ satyānaṃ caitasikaṃ styānamityuktamabhidharme /<br/> kathaṃ caitasiko dharmaḥ kāyika ityucyate /<br/> yathā kāyikī vedanā /<br/> auddhatyaṃ punaścetaso 'vyupaśamaḥ
