</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa las lus kyi rmugs pa dang sems kyi rmugs pa zhes bshad pa ji ltar na sems las byung ba'i chos lus kyi zhes bya zhe na / lus kyi tshor ba ji ltab bzhin no / rgod pa ni sems rnam par ma zhi ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itīme ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na drug po 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cābhidharme daśa kleśamahābhūmikāḥ paṭhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa las / nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa bcu po 'di dag ma yin nam / de las rmugs pa mi 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce ti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma dad pa dang le lo dang brjed ngas pa dang sems rnam par gyeng ba dang ma rig pa dang shes bzhin ma yin pa dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang log par mos pa dang rgod pa dang bag med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praptijño devānāṃ priyo na tviṣṭijñaḥ /<br/> kā punaratreṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyur ba shes pa ni lha rnams dga' ba yin gyi / 'dod pa shes pa ni ma yin no / 'di la 'dod pa gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">muṣitasmṛtivikṣepāsaṃprajanyāyoniśomanasikāramithyādhimokṣā mahābhūmikatvāt na kleśamahābhūmikā evāvadhāryante /<br/> yathivāmohaḥ kuśalamahābhūmiko nāvadhāryate prajñāsvabhāvatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brjed ngas pa dang rnam par gyeng ba dang shes bzhin ma yin pa dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang log par mos pa rnams ni sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir / dper na gti mug med pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de dge ba'i sa mang po par nges par ma bzung ba ltar nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag khon yin par nges par mi bzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtireva hi kliṣṭā muṣitasmṛtitā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa nyon mongs pa can kho na brjed ngas pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhireva kliṣṭo vikṣepa ityevamādi /<br/> ata evocyate ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta iti /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin nyon mongs pa can kho na rnam par gyeng ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no / de nyid kyi phyir gang dag sa mang po pa yin ba de dag nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa yang yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu bzhi ste / mu dang po ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa dang 'dun pa dang reg pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā 'śrāddhyaṃ kauśīdyamavidyā auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni ma dang pa dang le lo dang / ma rig pa dang rgod pa dang bag med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā muṣitasmṛtyādayaḥ pañca kliṣṭā yaṭhoktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni dran pa la sogs ba nyon mongs pa can lnga ji skad bshad pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitveti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecittu mithyāsamādheranyacetaso vikṣepamicchanti /<br/> teṣāmanyathā catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni sems rnam par gyeng ba log pa'i ting nge 'dzin las gzhan du 'dod de / de dag gi mu bzhi pa ni de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs pa ni nyon mongs ba thams cad dang mtshungs bar ldan par 'dod pa de nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag tu ma bton ba su zhig gis nyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du gdon par bya ba ni yin mod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ma bton te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣiprataraṃ kila styānacaritaḥ samādhimutpādayennauddhatyacarita iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs pa spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin shin tu myur du skyed par 'gyur gyi rgod pa spyod pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ /<br/> nahyete jātu sahacariṣṇutāṃ jahītaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig rgod pa mi spyod la rmugs pa spyod pa yang su zhig yod / yang na gang zhig rmugs pa mi spyod la rgod pa spyod pa yang su zhig yod de / 'di dag ni nam du yang lhan cig spyod pa nyid 'dor bar mi 'gyur mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāpi yadyasyādhimātraṃ sa taccarito jñātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on kyang gang zhig gang la shas che ba de ni spyod par shes par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ ṣaḍeva kleśamahābhūmikāḥ siddhyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i sa chen po pa ni drug po kho nar 'grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra /<br/> akuśale tvāhrīkyamanapatrapā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang rtag tu nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kho na la 'byung gi gzhan du ni ma yin no / mi dge la ni khrel med dang / ngo tsha med pa'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete /<br/> tayośca paścāllakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyate /<br/> krodhopanāhaśāṭhyerṣyāpradāsamrakṣamatsarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni mi dge ba'i sems la rtag tu 'byung bas chos 'di nyid ni mi dge ba'i sa chen po pa dag ces bya'o / de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do / khro ba dang khon du 'dzin dang gyo dang ni / phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">māyāmada vihiṃsāśca parīttakleśbhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgyu dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni / nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag la nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa yod pas 'di ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa pa rnams te / ma rig pa tsam dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dang yid kyi sa pa kho na dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ tu nirdekśa upakleśeṣu kariṣyate /<br/> uktā ime pañcaprakārāścaittāḥ /<br/> anye 'pi cāniyatāḥ santi vitarkavicārakaukṛtyamiddhādayaḥ /<br/> tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni nye pa'i nyon mongs pa dag gi nang nas ston par 'gyur ro / sems las byung ba rnam pa lnga po de dag bshad zin to / rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang 'gyod pa dang gnyid la sogs pa ma nges pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas / de la sems gang zhig la sems las byung ba du zhig gdon mi za par 'byung ba brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ tāvat pañcavidhaṃ cittam /<br/> kuśalamakuśalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni rnam pa lnga ste / dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrākuśalaṃ dvividhamāveṇikamanyakleśasaṃprayuktaṃ ca /<br/> avyākṛtaṃ dvividhaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'dres pa dang nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang lung du ma bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang ma bsgribs pa la lung du ma bstan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvat kāmāvacaracittamavaśyaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /<br/> ato 'tra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni nges par rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin pas de'i phyir 'di la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">savitarkavicāratvāt kuśale kāmacetasi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i dge pa'i sems la ni / rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvāviṃśatiścaitasikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avaśyaṃ bhavanti /<br/> daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca /<br/> kaukṛtyamadhikaṃ kvacit
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gdon mi za par [*bar?] 'byung ste / sa mang po pa bcu dang dge ba'i sa mang po pa bcu dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi sarvatra kuśale cetasi kaukṛtyamasti /<br/> yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la dag tu 'gyod pa bsnan / dge ba'i sems thams cad la ni 'gyod pa med pas gang la yod pa der de nyid kyis glags na sems las byung ba nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kukṛtasya bhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam /<br/> iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan par byas pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'gyod pa'o / 'di ni 'gyod pa la dmigs pa'i chos yid la gcags pa la 'gyod pa zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti /<br/> loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti /<br/> sthānabhūtaṃ ca kaukṛtyaṃ vipratisārasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la stong pa zhes bya ba dang mi sdug pa la dmigs pa'i ma chags pa la mi sdug pa zhes bya ba bzhin no / 'jig rten na yang grong thams cad lhags so / yul thams cad lhags so zhes gnas pa ston pa mthong la / 'gyod pa yang yid la gcags pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phale vā hetūpacāro 'yam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'di ni 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktaṃ ṣaḍimāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di dag ni sngon gyi las yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi akṛtālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ kaukṛtyam /<br/> akṛte 'pi kṛtākhyā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang ma byas pa la dmigs pa de ji ltar 'gyod pa yin zhe na / ma byas pa la byas pa zhes bya ba yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gis ma byas pa gang yin pa de ma legs pa byas so zhes bya ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamat kaukṛtyaṃ kuśalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyod pa dge ba gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatkuśalamakṛtvātapyate akuśalaṃ ca kṛtvā /<br/> viparyayādakuśalaṃ kaukṛtyam /<br/> tadetadubhayamapyubhayādhiṣṭānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba ma byas pa dang mi dge ba byas pa nas gdung ba gang yin pa'o / bzlog pa ni 'gyod pa mi dge ba yin te / de gnyi ga yang gnyi ga la brten pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āveṇike tvakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśātiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba ni ma 'dres dang / lta dang ldan la'ang nyi shu 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadakuśalaṃ cittamāveṇikaṃ tatra viṃśatiścaittāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i sems ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de la ni sems las byang ba nyi shu 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa mang po pa bcu dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa drug dang mi dge ba'i rtsa pa'i sa mang po pa gnyis dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni / sems gang la ma rig pa 'ba' zhig yod kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gzhan med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiyukte 'pyakuśale viṃśatirya evāveṇike
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i sems lta ba dang ldan pa la yang nyi shu 'byung ste / ma 'dres pa la gang dag 'byung ba kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca dṛṣṭyadhikatvādeka viṃśatirbhavanti /<br/> na bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba lhag pa'i phyir nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ba ma yin nam zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmānmahābhūmika eva kaścit prajñāviśeṣo dṛṣṭirityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar sa mang po pa kho na'i shes rab kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la lta ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā /<br/> kleśaiścaturbhiḥ krodhādyaiḥ kaukṛtyenaikaviṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mi dge ba lta ba dang ldan ba ni gang la log par lta ba'am / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'am / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yod pa'o / nyon mongs pa zhi dang khro sogs dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu gcig / mi dge ba'i sems 'dod chags kyang rung / khong khro ba yang rung / nga rgyal yang rung / the tshom yang rung / nyon mongs pa bzhi dang mtshungs par ldan ba gang yin pa de la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ca kleśaḥ āveṇikoktāśca viṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa de dang ma 'dres par bshad pa nyi shu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khro ba la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ji skad bshad pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems la yang nyi shu po de dag dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dang nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaukṛtyenāpyekaviṃśatiḥ /<br/> tadeva kaukṛtyamekaviṃśatitamaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyod pa dang ldan pa la yang nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ste / 'gyod pa de nyid nyi shu rtsa gcig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor na mi dge ba'i sems ma 'dres pa dang lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba la yang nyi shu 'byung la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyakleśopakleśasaṃprayukte tvekaviṃśatiḥ /<br/> nivṛte 'ṣṭadaśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ngo / bsgribs la bco brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ kāmadhātau nivṛtāvyākṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāṣṭādaśa caittāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni sems las byung ba bco brgyad 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa dang po pa bcu dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa drug dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiḥ pūrvavadeva nādhikā bhavati /<br/> aynatra dvādaśāvyākṛte matāḥ /<br/> nivṛtādanyadavyākṛtamanivṛtāvyākṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba ni snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid de lhag pa ma yin no / lung ma bstan pa gzhan la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa las gzhan ba ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dvādaśa caittā iṣṭāḥ /<br/> daśa mahābhūmikā vitarkavicārau ca /<br/> bahirdeśakā avyākṛtamapi kaukṛtyamicchanti /<br/> teṣāṃ tatsaṃprayukte cetasi trayodaśa bhavanti /<br/> middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat /<br/> sarvairebhiryathoktai ścaitairmiddhamaviruddhaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni sems las byung ba bcu gnyis 'byung bar 'dod de / sa mang po pa bcu dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go / nyi 'og pa dag ni 'gyod pa lung du ma bstan par yang 'dod la yid mi bde ba yang yid bde ba dang 'dra bar lung du ma bstan par yang 'dod de / de dag gi ltar na de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems la bcu gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro / gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir / gang la yod pa des bsnan no / gnyid ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang yin pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i sems thams cad dang mi 'gal bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato tatra tatsyāt tatrādhikaṃ tadveditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir gang la de yod pa de la des bsnan par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra dvāviṃśatistatra trayoviṃśatiryatra trayoviṃśatistatra caturviṃśatirityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung ba de la ni nyi shu rtsa gsum mo / gang la nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung ba de la ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems las byung ba nges par bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaukṛtyamiddhākuśalānyādye dhyāne na santyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las 'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams / bsam gtan dang po dag na med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po na ni ji skad bshad pa de las 'gyod pa dang gnyid dang gang yang cung zad mi dge ba 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratighaḥ śāṭhyamadamāyāvarjyāśca krodhādaya āhrīkyānapatrāpye ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">g yo dang sgyu dang rgyags pa ma gtogs pa khro ba la sogs pa dang khong khro ba dang nga cha med pa dang khrel med pa dag thams cad du med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatsarva tathaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan thams cad ni de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva /<br/> dhyānāntare vitarkaśca /<br/> nāsti /<br/> śeṣaṃ tathaiva /<br/> vicāraścāpyataḥ param
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po na med pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na dang rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad par can na med de / lhag ma ni de dang 'dra'o / de yi gong na dpyod pa yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca /<br/> māyā śāṭhyaṃ cetyapiśabdāt /<br/> śeṣaṃ tathaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan khyad par can las gong ma bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dang gzugs med pa dag na ni ji skad rtog pa dang dpyod pa yang med do / yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gyo dang sgyu yang med de / lhag ma ni de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmaṇo hi yāvacchāṭhyaṃ paṭhyate parṣatsambandhatvānnordhvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa'i bar du sgyu yod par 'byung gi / 'khor dang 'brel ba ma yin pa'i phyir gong na ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante iti /<br/> aprajānan kṣepamakārṣīt /<br/> ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rang gi 'khor gyi nang du dge slong rta thul gyis 'byung ba chen po 'di dag yongs su ma lus par gang du 'gag par 'gyur zhes dri ba dris pa dang mi shes pas kho bo ni tshangs pa'o / tshangs pa chen po'o / dbang phyug go / byed pa po'o /  / sprul pa po'o / 'byin par byed pa po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktametadyasyāṃ bhūmau yatra citte yāvantaścaittāḥ /<br/> idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate /<br/> āhrīkyasyānapatrāpyasya ca kiṃ nānākāraṇam /<br/> ahrīragurutā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byin pa po'o / dngos po rnams kyi pha lta bu yin no zhes gtam rlung la bskur ro / sa gang na sems gang la sems las byung ba ji snyed cig 'byung ba de ni bshad zin to / da ni gzhung la sems las byung ba kha cig gi tha dad du bya ba 'byung ba brjod par bya ste / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na / ma gus ngo tsha med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yon tan rnams dang yon tan can rnams la ma gus pa nyid de / bkur ba med pa nyid dang 'jigs pas dbang mi sgyur ba nyid ni ngo tsha med pa nyid de gus pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avadye bhayādarśitvamatrapā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khrel med / kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avadyaṃ nāma yadvigarhitaṃ sadbhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha na ma tho ba zhes bya ba ni dam pa rnams kyis smad pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrābhayadarśitā 'napatrāpyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'jigs par mi lta ba ni khrel med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhayamatrāniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhīyate 'smāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir 'jigs pa ni mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ste / 'di las 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ji ltar shes par bya / mi 'jigs par lta ba 'jigs par mi lta ba nyid yin nam 'on te 'jigs par mi lta ba nyid yin / de las cir 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate /<br/> naiva hi darśanaṃ darśitā nāpyadarśanamadarśitā /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi 'jigs par lta ba yin na ni shes rab yin par shes par 'gyur ro / gal te 'jigs par mi lta ba yin na ni ma rig par shes par 'gyur ro / lta ba yang lta ba nyid ma yin la mi lta ba yang mi lta ba nyid ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastayornimittamupakleśastaccānapatrāpyamiti /<br/> anye punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi rgyu mtshan nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa ste / de ni khrel med pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmāpekṣayā doṣairalajjana māhrīkyaṃ parāpekṣayā 'napatrāpyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ni bdag la ltos nas nyes pa rnams kyis mi 'dzem pa ni ngo tsha med pa yin te / gzhan la ltos nas ni khrel med pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na yang ltos pa gnyis cig car ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam /<br/> asti yā paramapekṣamāṇasya pravarttate sā 'napatrāpyam /<br/> viparyayeṇa hrīrapatrāpyaṃ ca veditavyam /<br/> pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ /<br/> avadyeṣvabhayadarśiatā 'patrāpyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag dang gzhan la ltos pa cig car ro zhes ni mi zer ro / 'on kyang mi 'dzem pa kha cig bdag la ltos nas kyang 'jug pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni ngo tsha med pa yin no / gzhan la ltos nas 'jug pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni khrel med pa yin no / bzlog pa ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa yin par rig par bya ste / re zhig rtog pa dang po ltar na gus pa dang bcas pa nyid de / bkur ba dang bcas pa nyid dang 'jigs pas dbang sgyur ba dang bcas pa nyid ni ngo tsha shes pa yin la / kha na ma tho ba dag la 'jigs par lta ba nyid ni khrel yod pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyena kalpenātmaparāpekṣābhyāṃ lajjane /<br/> premṇo gauravasya ca kiṃ nānākāraṇam /<br/> prema śraddhā /<br/> dvividhaṃ hi prema kliṣāṭamakliṣṭaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa gnyis pa ltar na ni bdag dang gzhan la ltos ba dag las 'dzem pa dag yin no / dga' ba dang gus pa la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na / dga' dang zhes bya ba smos te / dga' ba ni rnam pa gnyis te / nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o / de la nyon mongs pa can ni srid pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kliṣṭaṃ tṛṣṇā yathā putradārādiṣu /<br/> akliṣṭaṃ śraddhā śāstṛguruguṇānviteṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bu dang chung ma la sogs pa dag la dga' ba lta bu'o / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni dad pa ste / dper na ston pa dang bla ma dang yon tan can rnams la dga' ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syācchraddhā naprema
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa yin la dga' ba ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥdhasamudayālambanā śraddhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i dad pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt prema na śraddhā /<br/> kliṣṭaṃ prema
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dga' ba yin la dad pa ma yin pa yang yod de / dga' ba nyon mongs pa can lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayaṃ nirodhamārgālambanā śraddhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga yin pa ni 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa'i dad pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayametānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu /<br/> gauravaṃ na prema anyaguruṣu /<br/> ubhayaṃ svaguruṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag dag la ltos nas ni dga' ba yin la gus pa ma yin pa ni bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag la dga' ba lta bu'o / gus pa yin la dga' ba ma yin pa ni bla ma gzhan dag la gus pa lta bu'o / gnyi ga yin pa ni rang gi bla ma dag la gus pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayam etānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyi ga ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhā hi nāma guṇasaṃbhāvanā /<br/> tatpūrvikā ca priyatā prema /<br/> tasmānna saiva premetyapare /<br/> gurutvaṃ hrīḥ /<br/> gauravaṃ hi nāma sapratīśatā /<br/> tatpūrvikā ca lajjā hrīḥ /<br/> ato na gauravameva hlīrityapare /<br/> te punaḥ kāmarūpayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dad pa zhes bya ba ni yon tan la yid ches pa yin la / de sngon du 'gro ba'i dga' ba ni dga' pa yin te / de lta bas na de nyid dga' ba yin no zhes zer ro / gus nyid ngo tsha shes / gus pa ni ngo tsha shes pa ji skad bshad pa yin no / gzhan dag na re gus pa zhes bya ba ni bkur ba dang bcas pa nyid yin la / de sngon du 'gro ba'i 'dzem pa ni ngo tsha shes pa yin te / de'i phyir gus pa nyid ngo tsha shes pa ma yin no zhes zer ro / de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyadhātau premagaurave na staḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i khams na ni dga' ba dang gus pa dag med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dge pa'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir de na yang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /<br/> evaṃ sapratīśatā 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / chos dag dang gang zag la dad pa yin la / bkur ba dang bcas pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ /<br/> te ceha premagaurave abhiprete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la gang dag gang zag la dmigs pa'i dad pa dang ngo tsha shes pa de dag de na med de / 'dir ni dga' ba dang gus pa de dag la bsams pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkavicārayoḥ kiṃ nānākāraṇam /<br/> vitarkacārā vaudāryasūkṣmate /<br/> kasya /<br/> cetasa iti paścādvakṣyati /<br/> cittaudārikatā vitarkaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtogs pa dang dpyod pa dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na / rtog dang dpyod pa rtsing zhib nyid / gang gi zhe na / sems kyi'o zhes 'og nas 'chad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittasūkṣmatā vicāraḥ /<br/> kathaṃ punaḥ anayorekatra citte yogaḥ /<br/> kecidāhuḥ /<br/> yathā 'pyasuniṣṭhyūtaṃ sarpiḥ sūryaraśmibhirūpariṣṭātspṛṣṭaṃ nātiśyāyate nātivilīyate evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ /<br/> evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa ni sems rtsing ba'o / dpyod pa ni sems zhib pa'o / sems gcig la de gnyis ji ltar ldan zhe na / kha cig na re dper na mar sar chu dag gi nang du bor ba steng nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis reg na ha cang yang mi 'khyag la / ha cang yang mi 'ju ba de bzhin du / sems kyang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ha cang zhib par yang mi 'gyur / ha cang rtsing bar yang mi 'gyur la / de la gnyi ga'i bya ba yang yod do zhes zer ro / de lta na ni ji ltar nyi ma dang chu mar sar 'khyag pa nyid dang 'ju ba nyid dag gi rgyu mtshan nyid yin gyi de dag gi ngo bo nyid ni ma yin pa ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag kyang rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid dag gi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yin no / rtsing ba dang zhib pas dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis ltos pa can yang yin pas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag yod par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āpekṣikī caudārikasūkṣmatā bhūmiprakārabhedādityābhavāgrādvitarkavicārau syātām /<br/> nacaudārikasūkṣmātayā jātibhedo yukataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid kyis rang bzhin tha dad par yang rigs pa ma yin no / gzhan dag na re mdo las rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag ni ngag mngon par 'du byed pa yin par gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarāhuḥ /<br/> vāksaṃskārā vitrkavicārāḥ sūtra uktāḥ /<br/> vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣate nāvitasryāvicāryeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brtags shing dpyad nas tshig tu smra'i ma brtags ma dpyad par ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo / de la rtsing ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni rtog pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhib pa gang dag yin pa de dag na dpyod pa yin no zher zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sems rtse gcig la rtsing ba yang chos gzhan yin / zhib pa yang chos gzhan yin na 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na syādvirodho yadi jātibhedaḥ syādvedanāsaṃjñāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes bzhin du rigs tha dad pa zhig yin na ni 'gal ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasyāṃ jātau mṛdvadhimātratā yugapanna saṃbhavati /<br/> jātibhedo /<br/> sa tarhi vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs gcig pa ni chung du dang chen pa nyid cig car 'byung ba mi srid do / rigs tha dad pa yang yod do / 'o na ni de brjod par bya dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">durvaco hyasāvato mṛdvadhimātratayā vyajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de brjod par ni dka' ste / de'i phyir chung du dang chen po'i nyid kyis gsal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaṃ vyakto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni gsal bar mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekaṃ jātīnāṃ mṛdvadhimātratavāt /<br/> naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs re re la yang chung du dang chen po yod pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re sems gcig la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag mi 'byung ba nyid do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgayuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar bsam gtan dang po yan lag la par bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūmitastat pañcāṅgayukataṃ na kṣaṇataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa las de yan lag lnga par bshad kyi skad cig las ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mānamadayoḥ kiṃ nānākāraṇam /<br/> māna unnatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na / nga rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi chos la chags pa yi / sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol po las gang yang rung pa'i khyad par zhig yongs su brtags nas sems khengs pa ni nga rgyal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madastu svadharmeṣveva raktasya yaccetasaḥ paryādānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyags pa ni rang gi chos rnams kho na la chags pa'i sems yongs su gtugs pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā madyaja evaṃ rāgajaḥ /<br/> saṃprahaṛśaṇaviśeṣo mada ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re chang las skyes pa ji lta bde bzhin du rgyags pa yang 'dod chags las skyes pa'i kun tu dga' ba'i bye brag yin no zhas zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante /<br/> pravacana etābhiḥ sadvyavahārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems las byung ba rnams sems dang bcas te rnam pa re re nas bshad zin to / gsung rab las 'di dag gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i phyir de dag gi ming 'di dag brjod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittaṃ mano 'tha vijñānamekārthaṃ /<br/> cinotīti cittam /<br/> manuta iti manaḥ /<br/> vijānātīti vijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni don gcig 'byed pas na sems so / shes pas na yid do / rnam par shes pa nas rnam par shes pa'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittaṃ śubhāśubhairdhātubhiriti cittam /<br/> tadevāśrayabhutaṃ manaḥ /<br/> āśritabhūtaṃ vijñānamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re dge ba dang mi dge ba'i khams dag gis bsags pas na sems so / de nyid rten du gyur pa ni yid do / rten par gyur pa ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cittaṃ mano vijñānamityeko 'rthaḥ /<br/> evaṃ /<br/> cittacaitasāḥ /<br/> sāśrayā lambanākārāḥ saṃparayuktāśca /<br/> eko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba don gcig pa de bzhin du sems dang sems byung dang /  / rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang mtshungs par ldan ba'ang / don gcig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba de dag nyid dbang po la brten pa'i phyir rten dang bcas pa dag ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt /<br/> sākārāstasyaivālambanasya prakāraśa ākaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go / dmigs pa de nyid la rnam pa re re nas bye brag tu gcod pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samprayuktāḥ samaṃ prayuktatvāt /<br/> kena prakāreṇa samaṃ parayuktā ityāha /<br/> pañcadhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par ldan pa'i phyir mtshungs par ldan ba dag go / rnam pa gang dag gis mtshungs par ldan zhe na / rnam pa lngas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcabhiḥ samatāprākārairāśrayālambanākārakāladravyasamatābhiḥ /<br/> keyaṃ samatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa rnam pa lnga po rten dang dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang dus dang rdzas mtshungs pa dag gis mtshungs par ldan no / rdzas mtshungs pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar sems gcig kho na yin pa de bzhin du sems las byung ba rnams kyang re re yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirdiṣṭāścittacaittāḥ savistaraprabhedāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba rgyas pa dang rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dag bstan zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viprayuktāstu saṃskārāḥ prāptyaprāptī sabhāgatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi ldan pa yi 'du byed rnams / thob dang ma thob skal mnyam dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca /<br/> nāmakāyādayaśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med snyoms 'jug dag dang srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni / ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed 'di dag ni sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la gzugs kyi nga bzhin yang ma yin bas sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvat /<br/> praptirlābhaḥ samanvayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig thob pa rnyed dang ldan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / ma thob pa dang rnam par nyams pa las rnyed pa dang thob nas ldan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viparyayādaprāptiriti siddham /<br/> kasya punarime prāptyaprāptī /<br/> prāptyaprāptī svasaṃtāna patitānāṃ /<br/> na parasaṃtānapatitānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzlog pa ni ma thob pa zhes bya bar grub bo / thob pa dang ma thob pa 'di dag gang gi yin zhe na / thob dang ma thob dang rgyud du / gtogs pa rnams kyi'o / gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi parakīryaiḥ kaścitsamanvāgataḥ nāpyasaṃtatipatitānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi dag dang ni 'gal yang ldan pa med do / rgyud du ma gtogs pa rnams kyi yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hyasatatvasaṃkhyātaiḥ kaścitsamanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can du mi bgrang ba dag dang ni 'ga' yang ldan pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa tāvat saṃskṛteṣu niyamaḥ /<br/> asaṃskṛteṣu punaḥ prāptyaprāptī /<br/> nirodhayoḥ /<br/> sarvasattvā apratisaṃkhyānirodhena samanvāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni re zhig 'dus ma byas dag gi nges pa yin no / 'dus ma byas rnams kyi thob pa dang ma thob pa dag ni / 'gog gnyis kyi / so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang ni sems can thams cad dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva hi cottamabhidharme anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ /<br/> āha /<br/> sarvasattvā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir chos mngon pa las / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang su zhig ldan zhe na / smras pa / sems can thams cad do zhes 'byung ngo zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ /<br/> ākāśena tu nāsti kaścitsamanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang ni 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa skad cig ma dang po la gnas pa ma gtogs pa 'phags pa thams cad dang so so'i skye bo kha cig kyang yin no / nam mkha' dang ni 'ga' yang ldan ba med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādasya nāsati prāptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bas na 'di la thob pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la thob pa med pa de la ni ma thob pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptirnāmāsti kiñcit bhāvāntarmiti /<br/> kuta etat /<br/> āha sūtrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa zhes bya ba rdzas gzhan cung zad cig yod do zhes bya ba 'di gang las / smras pa mdo las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre hyustaṃ sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las de mi slob pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag bskyed cing so sor thob pa las kun tu ldan pas na yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa'i 'phags par gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni des ni sems can du mi sten pa dag dang sems can gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur te / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra vacanāt /<br/> rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vaśitvamatra samanvāgamaśabdenoktam /<br/> tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni dbang ba de nyid la ldan pa'i sgrar gsungs te / de rin po che sna bdun dag la dbang nyid dga' dgur byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra vaśitvaṃ samanvāgamo 'nyatra punardravyāntaramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ldan ba der ni dbang ba nyid yin la / gzhan du ni rdzas gzhan yin no / zhes bya ba 'di dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuta etat kaḥ punarevamayogaḥ /<br/> ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat /<br/> tasmāt dravyadharmāsaṃbhavādayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na yang mi rung ba ci zhig yod / mi rung ba 'di dag yod de / gang gi phyir gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa ltar ram / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa ltar 'di'i rang gi ngo bo yang mi snang la / mig dang rna ba la sogs pa ltar bya ba yang mi snang ba de'i phyir rdzas kyi chos mi srid pas mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpattiheturdharmāṇāṃ prāptiriti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te chos rnams skye ba'i rgyu la thob pa'o zhes bya'o zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtasya na syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas kyi ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt /<br/> sahajaprāptihetukā cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dag ma thob pa rnams dang gang dag sa 'phos pa dang 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms pa de dag kyang ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ro / 'on te lhan cig skyes pa'i thob pa'i rgyu rkyen yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātiridānīṃ kiṅkarī jātijātirvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe skye ba'am / skye ba'i skye ba ci zhig byed par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po skye ba'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur te / thob pa bye brag med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ /<br/> tasmānnotpattihetuḥ prāptiḥ /<br/> kaścaivamāhotpattihetuḥ prāptiriti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te de las de dag gi bye brag tu 'gyur na ni de kho na las de dag skye ba yin no / de lta bas na thob pa skye ba'i rgyu ma yin no / thob pa skye ba'i rgyu yin no zhes de skad du su zer / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyavasthā hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa med na 'jig rten pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams la 'di dag ni 'phags pa'o / 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo ngo shes rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahīṇāprahīṇa kleśatāviśeṣādetat bhavitumarhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang ma spangs pa nyid kyi bye brag las 'gyur bar 'os so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti /<br/> praptau satyāmetatsidhyati tadvigamāvigamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa'o / 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur / thob pa yod na ni de dang bral ma bral las 'di yang 'grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayaviśeṣādetatsidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rten gyi bye brag las 'grub par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rnams kyi gnas de ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi mthus ji ltar de dag gis spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yang 'byung bar mi nus pa de ltar gyur pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'gnidagdhavrīhivadavījībhūte āśraye kleśānāṃ prahīṇakleśa ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rten 'bru mes tshig pa bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon du ma gyur pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upahatavījabhāve vā laukikena mārgeṇa /<br/> viparyayādaprahīṇakleśaḥ /<br/> yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa'i lam gyi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par byas na nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bya la / bzlog pa ni ma spangs pa ma yin pas gang ma spangs pa de dang mi ldan / gang spangs pa de dang ni mi ldan no zhes gdags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rnam pa gnyis te / ma 'bad par skye ba rnams dang 'bad de skye ba rnams te / gang dag skye bas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba de dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ /<br/> tasya tūpaghāto mithyādṛṣṭyā veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ma 'bad par skye ba rnams dang ni rten de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par ma byas pa'i phyir ldan la / nyams par byas pa'i phyir mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa yin no / de yang log par lta bas yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu la dge ba'i chos rnams gyi [*kyi?] sa bon gyi dngos po gtan du yang dag par bcom pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yepunaryatnabhāvinastairutpannaistadutpattirvaśitvā vighātātsantateḥ samanvāgata ucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag 'bad de skye ba ni skyes pa de dag dang rgyud la de dag skye ba'i dbang nyid thogs pa med pa'i phyir ldan pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'dir sa bon kho na rtsa nas ma bton pa dang nyams par ma byas pa dang dbang nyid kyi dus na rgyas par gyur pa ni ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob kyi rdzas gzhan ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaridaṃ bījaṃ nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bon zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā /<br/> santatipariṇāmaviśeṣāt /<br/> ko 'yaṃ pariṇāmo nāma /<br/> santateranyathātvam /<br/> hetuphalabhūtastraiyadhvikāḥ saṃskārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la rgyud 'gyur ba'i bye brag gi mngon sum mam brgyud pas nus pa'i ming dang gzugs gang yin pa'o / 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin / rgyud gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba'o / rgyud ces bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat tūkta lobhena samanvāgato 'bhavyaścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitumiti /<br/> tatrādhivāsanaṃ lobhasyāvinodanaṃ vā samanvāgamaḥ /<br/> yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed dus gsum pa rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa rnams so / gang las chags pa dang ldan pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzhi po dag bsgom pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan no zhes gsungs pa der ni ldan pa chags pa dang du len ba'am mi sel ba yin te / ji srid du de dang du len ba'am mi sel ba de srid du de dag bsgom pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ /<br/> tasya ca pratiṣedho 'samanvāgama iti /<br/> dravyameva tu vaibhāṣikāḥ ubhayaṃ varṇayanti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> eṣa hi naḥ siddhānta iti /<br/> sā kilaiṣā praptiḥ /<br/> traiyadhvikānāṃ trividhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na ldan pa 'di dang de 'gog pa mi ldan pa ni rnam pa thams cad du btags pa'i chos yin gyi rdzas kyi chos ni ma yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gnyi ga rdzas kho na yin no zhes brjod do / ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ni kho bo cag gis grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhes zer ro / thob pa de ni / dus gsum pa'i rnam pa gsum zhes grag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītānāṃ dharmāṇāmatītā 'pi prāptirastyanāgatyā 'pi pratyutpannā 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos 'das pa rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa yang yod / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yang yod la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanāgataparatyutpannānāṃ pratyekaṃ trividhā /<br/> ṣubhādīnāṃ ṣubhādikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang so sor rnam pa gsum mo / dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ kuāśalākuśalāvyākṛtaiva yathākramaṃ prāptiḥ /<br/> svadhātukā tadāptānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no / der gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye dharmāstaddhātvāptāsteṣāṃ svadhātukā prāptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dag khams gang du gtogs pa de dag gi thob pa ni rang gi khams pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī yathākramam /<br/> anāptā nāṃ caturvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin no / ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ caturvidhā praptiḥ /<br/> samāsena traidhātukī cānāsravā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa ni mdong bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ste / khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca /<br/> mārgasatyasyānāsravaiva /<br/> seyaṃ samasya caturvidhā bhavati /<br/> śaikṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śaikṣaiva prāptiḥ akṣaikṣāṇāmaśaikṣānāśaikṣāṇāntubhedaḥ /<br/> sa nirdiśyate /<br/> tridhā naśaikṣā 'śaikṣāṇāṃ /<br/> naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i ni khams gsum pa yin no / so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang yin la / zag pa med pa yang yin no /  / lam gyi bden pa'i zag pa med pa nyid do / de ni mdor bsdus te rnam pa bzhi yin no / slob pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa ni slob pa kho na yin no / mi slob pa rnams kyi ni mi slob pa kho na yin no / slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams kyi ni bye brag yod pas de bstan par bya ste / slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum / slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos zhas bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang 'dus ma byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ śaikṣādibhedena trividhā prāptiḥ /<br/> sāsravāṇāṃ tāvat naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣī prāptiḥ /<br/> apratisaṃkhyānirodhasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya cānāryeṇa praptasya /<br/> tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi thob pa ni slob pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste / re zhig zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pas thob pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i thob pa ni slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin no / de nyid slob pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i ni slob pa'o / mi slob pa'i lam gyi sa thob pa'i ni mi slob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanabhāvanāheyānāṃ yathākramaṃ darāśanabhāvanāheyaiva parāptiḥ /<br/> aheyānāṃ tu bhedaḥ /<br/> sa nirdiśyate /<br/> aheyānāṃ dvidhā matā /<br/> apraheyādharmā anāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du mthong bas dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na yin no / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyi ni bye brag yod pas de bstan par bya ba ste / sang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i chos dag ni zag pa med pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pas thob pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i thob pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaivāryamārgaprāptasyānāsravā 'heyā mārgasatyasya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid 'phags pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i dang lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa ste spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ traiyadhvikānāṃ trividhe ti tasyotsargasyāyamapavādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus gsum pa'i rnam pa gsum zhes spyir bstan pa gang yin pa de'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni 'di yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛtāptiḥ sahajā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ sahajaiva prāptirnāgrajā na paścātkālajā /<br/> durbalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni stobs chung ba'i phyir lhan cig skye ba kho na ste / sngar skye ba yang med la dus phyis skye ba yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenateṣāmatītānāmatītaiva yāvat pratyutpannānāṃ pratyutpannaiva /<br/> kiṃ sarvasyaivānivṛtāvyākṛtasya /<br/> na sarvasya /<br/> abhijñānairmāṇikādṛte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na de dag gi ni 'das pa rnams kyi yang 'das pa kho na yin la / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi bar du yang da ltar byung ba kho na yin no / ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa thams cad kyi de dang 'dra'am zhe na / mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad kyi de dang mi 'dra ste / mngon par shes pa lung du ma bstan pa gnyis dang sprul pa'i sems ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ /<br/> śailpasthānikasyāpi kasyacidīryāpathikasyā /<br/> tyarthamabhyastasyecchanti /<br/> kimanivṛtāvyākṛtasyaiva sahajā praptirityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis 'grub pas stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir sngar dang phyis dang lhan cig tu skye ba yang yod do / bzo'i gnas pa kha cig dang spyod lam pa shin tu goms pa yang 'dod do / ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na'i thob pa la lhan cig skye ba yin nam zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtasya ca rūpasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtāvyākṛtasyāpi vijñaptirūpasya saharjaiva prāptiradhimātreṇāpyavijñaptyanutthāpanādaurbalyasiddheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi rnam par rig byed bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i thob pa yang lhan cig skye ba kho na ste / chen pos kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mi slob pas stobs chung bas grub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti /<br/> astītyāha /<br/> kāme rūpasya nāgrajā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa'i bye brag 'di yin pa ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa la yang bye brag 'ga' zhig yod dam zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarasya vijñaptyavijñaptirūpasyāgrajā praptiḥ sarvathā nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de / 'dod pa na / gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi thob pa ni rnam pa thams cad du sngar skye ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahajā cāsti paścātkālajā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig skye ba dang dus phyis skye ba ni yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimaprāpterapi prāptivatprakārabhedaḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> akliṣṭāvyākṛtā 'prāptiḥ /<br/> aprāptiranivṛtāvyākṛtaiva sarvā /<br/> adhvabhedena punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci ma thob pa yang thob pa bzhin du rnam pa'i bye brag yod dam / smras pa med do / 'o na ci lta bu zhe na ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan / ma thob pa thams cad ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no / dus kyi bye brag gis ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā 'tītājātayostridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das ma skyes kyi de rnam gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyutpannasya nāratyaprāptiḥ pratyutpannā /<br/> atītānāgatayostu traiyadhvikī /<br/> kāmādyāptāmalānāṃ ca /<br/> trividheti varttate /<br/> kāmāptānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ltar byung ba'i ma thob pa da ltar byung ba ni med do / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag gi ni dus gsum pa ma yin no / 'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang / rnam gsum zhes bya bar sbyar te / 'dod par gtogs pa rnams kyi ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ rūpārūpyāptānāmanāsravāṇāṃ ca nāstyanāsravā kācidaprāptiḥ /<br/> tathāhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams dang ma gtogs pa rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o / ma thob pa zag pa med pa ni 'ga' yang med de / 'di ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgasyāprāptiriṣyate /<br/> pṛthagjanatvam /<br/> pṛthagjanatvaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam ma thob pa so so yi / skye bor 'dod do / bstan bcos las / so so'i skye bo nyid gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryadharmāṇāmalābha iti śāstrapāṭhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi ma rnyed pa'o zhes 'don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alābhaśca nāmāprāptiḥ /<br/> naca pṛthagjanatvamanāsravaṃ bhavitumarhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba ma thob pa yin pas so so'i skye bo nyid ni zag pa med pa yin par mi 'os so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katameṣāmāryadharmāṇāmalābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i chos gang dag gi ma rnyed pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣāmaviśeṣavacanāt /<br/> sa tu yo vinā lābhenālābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad kyi yin te / khyad par med par 'byung ba'i phyir ro / de ni rnyed pa med par ma rnyed pa gang yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt /<br/> evaśabdastarhi paṭhitavyaḥ /<br/> na paṭhitavyaḥ /<br/> ekapadānyapi hyavadhāraṇāni bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da lta ma yin na sangs rgyas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dang 'phags pa ma yin par 'gyur ro / 'o na ni kho na zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don dgos so / gdon mi dgos te / tshig gcig pu dag kyang nges par 'dzin pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa iti /<br/> duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvāmalābha ityapare /<br/> na ca tadyogā danāryatvaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na chu 'thung ba'o / rlung za ba'o zhes bya ba bzhin no / gzhan dag na re sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang de dag lhan cig 'byung ba rnams kyi'o zhes zer ro / de dag btang bas 'phags pa ma yin pa nyid du thal bar yang mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadalābhasyātyantaṃ hatatvāt /<br/> te tarhi trigotrā iti katameṣāmalābhaḥ /<br/> sarveṣām /<br/> evaṃ tarhi sa eva doṣaḥ /<br/> punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ma rnyed pa gtan du bcom pa'i phyir ro / 'o na ni de dag kyang rigs gsum pa yin na gang dag gi ma rnyed pa yin / thams cad kyi yin no / 'o na ni nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatnastarhi vyarthaḥ /<br/> evaṃ tu sādhu yathā sautrāntikānām /<br/> kathaṃ ca sautrāntikānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lan yang de nyid yin no / 'o na ni 'bad pa don med par 'gyur bas mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de lta bu ni legs pa yin no / mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta bu yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anutpannāryadharmasantatiḥ pṛthagjanatvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa'i rgyud ni so so'i skye bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atheyamaprāptiḥ kathaṃ vihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ma thob pa 'di ji ltar rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya yā dharmasya prāptirasau /<br/> tatprāptibhusaṃcārād vihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang gi ma thob pa gang yin pa de ni / de thob dang sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur / re zhig 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca /<br/> evamanyeṣāmapi yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i lam gyi ma rnyed pa ni so so'i skye bo nyid de / de ni de rnyed pa dang sa 'phos pa las rnam par nyams par 'gyur te / gzhan dag gi yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vihīyata iti tasyā aprāpteraprāptirutpadyate prāptiśchidyate /<br/> kiṃ punaraprāptiprāptyorapi prāptyaprāptī bhavataḥ /<br/> ubhayorapyubhayaṃ bhavtītyāhuḥ /<br/> nanu caivamanavasthā prasaṅgaḥ praptīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa de ma thob pa skye zhing thob pa 'chad par 'gyur ro / ci ma thob pa dang thob pa dag gi yang thob pa dang ma thob pa yod dam / smras pa / gnyi ga'i yang gnyi ga yod do / de lta na thob pa rnams thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> parasparasamanvāgamāt /<br/> ātmanā tṛtīyo hi dharma utpadyate /<br/> sa ca dharmastasya prāptiḥ prāptiprāptiśca /<br/> tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan tshun ldan pa'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro / chos bdag nyid gtogs pa gsum skye ste / chos de dang de'i thob pa dang thob pa'i thob pa'o / de la thob pa skyes pas chos de dang thob pa'i thob pa dang ldan par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa'i thob pa skyes pas thob pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur bas de'i phyir thug pa med pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na skad cig ma gnyis pa la dge ba'ang rung nyon mongs pa can yang rung chos bdag gnyid gtogs par gsum gyi thob pa gsum skye bar 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi rjes kyi thob pa yang gsum yin pas drug tu 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma gsum pa la ni skad cig ma dang po dang gnyis pa la skyes pa'i rdzas rnams kyi thob pa dgu po rjes kyi thob pa dang bcas pas bco brgyad du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamuttarottaravāṛddhiprasaṇṅgenaitāḥ praptayo visarpantyaḥ sarveṣāmatītānāgatānāṃ kleśopakleśakṣaṇānāmupapattilābhikānāṃ ca kuśalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃprayoga sahabhuvāmanādyantasaṃsāraparyāpannānāmanantā ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ sattvānāṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar thob pa rnams gong nas gong du spel ba'i 'gres kyis bskyed na srog chags gcig la yang skad cig skad cig la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang skyes nas thob pa'i dge ba'i skad cig ma mtshungs par ldan pa dang lhan cig 'byung bar bcas pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor bar gtogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas pa dag skye bar 'gyur bas sems can rnams kyi so so'i rgyud kyi lus kyi skad cig ma la rdzas mtha' yas pa can dag 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atyutsavo vatāyaṃ prāptīnāṃ varttate /<br/> kevalaṃ tu apratighātinyo yato 'vakāśamākāśe labhante
