</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kye ma 'di ni thob pa rnams kyi dga' ston chen po zhig ste / de thogs pa med pas 'di ltar go skabs rnyed kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ /<br/> atha keyaṃ sabhāgatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na srog chags gnyis pa'i ni nam mkha' la go skabs yod par mi 'gyur ro / yang skal ba mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgatā sattvasāmyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal mnyam sems can 'dra ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgatā nāma dravyam /<br/> sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i rdzas ni sems can rnams kyi 'dra ba yin te / bstan bcos las ni 'di'i ming ris mthun pa zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā punarabhinnā bhinnā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang tha dad pa ma yin pa dang tha dad pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhinnā sarvasattvānāṃ sattvasabhāgatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha dad pa ma yin pa ni / sems can thams cad sems can du skal ba mnyam pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisattvaṃ sarveṣu bhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad la yang sems can re re yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha dad pa ni sems can de dag nyid khams dang sa dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang rigs dang pho dang mo dang dge bsnyen dang dge slong dang slob pa dang mi slob pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so sor nges pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi skal ba mnyam pa ni phung po dang skye mched dang khams kyi sgo nas so / gal te skal pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas khyad par med pa zhig med na phan tshun khyad par tha dad pa'i sems can rnams la bye brag med par sems can zhes bya ba'i blo 'jug pa dang 'dogs par yang mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ skandhādi buddhiprajñaptayyo 'pi yojyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po la sogs pa'i blo dang 'dogs pa dag la yang de bzhin du sbyor bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi 'pho bar yang 'gyur zhing skye bar yang 'gyur la / sems can gyi skal ba mnyam pa nyid 'dor par yang mi 'gyur thob par yang mi 'gyur pa yod dam zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiḥ yataścyavate tatraivopapadyamānaḥ /<br/> dvitīyā niyāmamavkrāman
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni gang nas 'chi 'pho ba de nyid du skye ba na'o / gnyis pa ni nges pa la 'jug pa na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi pṛthagjanasabhāgatāṃ vijahyādāryasabhāgatāṃ pratilabhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni sems can gyi skal ba mnyam pa nyid 'dor zhing / 'phags pa'i skal ba mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā gatisaṃcārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni 'gro ba 'pho ba las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena /<br/> nahi manuṣyasabhāgatāyā anyanmanuṣyatvaṃ kalpyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te so so'i skye bo'i skal ba mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i rdzas shig yod na go so so'i skye bo nyid kyis ci zhig bya ste / mi'i skal pa mnyam pa las ni mi nyid gud na brtag tu med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten gyis ni skal ba mnyam pa nyid gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir mi mthong ba nyid la / 'di shes rab kyis kyang yongs su mi chod mod kyi / sems can rnams kyi rigs tha mi dad pa yang khong du chud do / de yod du chug na yang de las ji lta bu zhig byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apicāsattvasabhāgatā 'pi kiṃ neṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang sems can ma yin pa'i skal ba mnyam pa nyid kyang ci'i phyir mi 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate /<br/> vaiśeṣikāścaivaṃ dyotitā bhavanti /<br/> teṣāmapi hyeṣa siddhāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">s'a lu dang nas dang mon sran sde'u dang mon sran gre'u dang aa mra dang shing pa nas dang lcags dang gser la sogs pa rnams rang gi rigs 'dra ba'i phyir ro / skal pa mnyam pa phan tshun tha dad pa de dag kyang ji ltar bye brag med par skal ba mnyam pa nyid du 'dogs par byed / de lta na ni bye brag pa rnams kyis gsal pa byas pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmānyapadārtho nāmāsti yataḥ samānapratyayotpattiratulyaprakāreṣvapīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi grub pa'i mtha' ni spyi zhes bya ba'i dngos po zhig yod de / des na rnam pa mi 'dra ba rnams la yang shes pa mtshungs pa skye'o zhes bya ba 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ tu teṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā /<br/> astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> ustaṃ hi bhagavatā sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gcig yin yang du ma la 'jug pa 'di ni de dag gi khyad par yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gal te gsal bar byas kyang rung / gal te gsal bar ma byas kyang rung ste / mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa ni yod pa kho na ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang brgya la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa 'di lta bu nyid du 'ong na zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktametannatūktaṃ dravyāntaramiti /<br/> kā tarhi sā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de skad gsungs mod kyi rdzas gzhan no zhes ni ma gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat /<br/> tattvetanna varṇayanti /<br/> atha kimidamāsaṃjñikaṃ nāma /<br/> āsaṃjñikamasaṃjñiṣu /<br/> nirodhaścittacaittānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci zhe na / gang dag la mi la sogs par 'dogs pa'i 'du byed de lta bur gyur pa de dag kho nar zad de / s'a lu la sogs pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang 'dra'o / de skad du ni mi brjod do / yang 'du shes med pa pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / 'du shes med pa pa 'du shes / med par sems dang sems byung rnams / 'gog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante /<br/> nadītoyasaṃnirodhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes med pa pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas yin te / gang gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dus gzhan gyi bar du klung gi chu 'gog pa bzhin du 'gog cing skyer mi ster ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat punarekāntena /<br/> vipākaḥ /<br/> kasya vipākaḥ /<br/> asaṃjñisamāpatteḥ /<br/> katame te sattvā yeṣvasaṃjñisattvāḥ /<br/> te bṛhatphalāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang gcig tu rnam par smin / gang gi rnam par smin pa yin zhe na / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yin no / gang dag na 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams 'khod pa'i sems can de dag gang zhe na / de 'bras che'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat /<br/> kiṃ punastenaiva kadāciat saṃśino bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gi phyogs gcig na sems can 'du shes med pa kha cig 'khod pa'i lha de dag ni 'bras bu che ba zhes bya ba yin te / bsam gtan khyad par can bzhin no / ci de dag nam yang 'du shes can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavantyupapattikāle cyutikāle ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i dus dang 'chi 'phos pa'i dus na 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt cyutirbhavatīti sūtre pāthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / sems can de dag dus ring mo zhig tu 'dug ste / 'du shes skyes nas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra /<br/> pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang yun ring por gnyid kyis log pa las sangs pa bzhin du de nas shi 'phos nas sngon gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du byed yongs su zad pa'i phyir dang sngon med pa ma bsags pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs pa shugs zad pa dag sa la ltung ba bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur te / gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig der skye bar 'gyur ba de la ni gdon mi za bar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathottarakauravāṇāṃ devopapāttivedanīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi lhar skye ba myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin no / yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms 'jug dag ces gang bshad pa / snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃjñisamāpattirnirodhasamāpattiśca /<br/> keyamasaṃjñisamāpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaivāsaṃjñikamuktaṃ niarodhaścittacaittānāmiti /<br/> tathā 'saṃjñisamāpattiḥ /<br/> asaṃjñināṃ samāpattirasaṃjñā ve tyasaṃjñisamāpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ci zhe na / ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa la 'du shes med pa par bshad pa / de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug / 'du shes med pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am 'du shes med pa can yin pas 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā 'pi cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ /<br/> etāvattathāśabdenānvākṛṣyate /<br/> sā tu samāpattiḥ /<br/> dhyāne 'ntye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi 'gog pa yin no / de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de tsam zhig mthun par 'don to /  / snyoms par 'jug pa de ni bsam gtan tha mar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antyadhyānaṃ caturthaṃ tatparyāpannā 'sau nānyabhumikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan tha ma ni bzhi pa ste / de ni der gtogs pa yin gyis gzhan pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthamenāṃ samāpadyante /<br/> niḥsṛtīcchayā /<br/> niḥsaraṇameṣāṃ manyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir 'di la snyoms par 'jug ce na / 'byung 'dod pas / 'di la nges par 'byung bar sems te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato mokṣakāmatayā samāpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir thar par 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsaṃjñikaṃ vipākatvāt avyākṛtamiti siddham /<br/> iyaṃ tu /<br/> śubhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa pa ni rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya bar grub bo / 'di ni dge ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaivāsaṃjñisamāpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni dge ba kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyā asaṃjñisattveṣu pañcaskandhako vipākaḥ /<br/> kuśalā satī /<br/> upapadyavedyaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rnam par smin pa ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du phung po lnga 'grub pa'o / de dge ba yin yang / skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyavedanīyaiva /<br/> na dṛṣṭadharmaparyāyavedanīyā nāpi aniyatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba kho na yin gyi mthong ba'i chos dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin la ma nges pa yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gis 'di bskyed nas yongs su nyams pa de yang gdon mi za bar yang bskyed nas 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro / zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva tallābhī niyāmaṃ nāvakrāmati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de thob pa ni nges pa la mi 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">seyaṃ pṛthagjanasyaiveṣyate /<br/> nāryasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang so so'i skye bo kho na'i yin par 'dod kyi / 'phags pa'i ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyāryāṃ asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ samāpadyante vinipātasthānamivaitāṃ paśyantaḥ /<br/> niḥsaraṇasaṃjñino hi tāṃ samāpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rnams ni 'di la rnam par ltung ba'i gnas lta bur gzigs pas 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par mi 'jug gi nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes can dag ni de la snyoms par 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kimenāmāryāścaturthadhyānalābhādatītānāgatāṃ pratilabhante dhyānavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci 'phags pa bsam gtan bzhi pa thob nas bsam gtan bzhin du 'di 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag kyang 'thob bam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye 'pi atāvanna pratilabhante /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'thob po ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā hyucitā 'pi satī mahābhisaṃskārasādhyatvādacittakatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni 'dris pa yin yang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang sems med pa pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekādhvikāpyate /<br/> ekakāliketyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus gcig 'thob dus gcig pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varttamānakālikaiva labhyate /<br/> yathā prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /<br/> labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna tyajati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ji lta ba bzhin du da ltar gyi dus pa kho na 'thob po / skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs par ni ji srid mi gtong bde srid du thob pa 'das pa dang yang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">acittaka tvānnānāgatā bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems med pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa ni mi 'thob po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhasamāpattiridāniṃ katamā /<br/> nirodhākhyā tathaiveyaṃ /<br/> yathaivāsaṃjñimāpatthiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ji lta bur / 'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāśabdena kaḥ prakāro gṛhyate /<br/> nirodhaścittacaittānāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras rnam pa gang zhig gzung zhe na / sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba gzung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ tvasyā viśeṣaḥ /<br/> iyaṃ /<br/> vihārārthaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te / 'di gnas don du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūarvakeṇa manasikāreṇa enāṃ samāpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang ba'i yid la byed pas 'di la snyoms par 'jug gi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāṃ tu niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvakeṇa /<br/> sā khalvapi caturthadhyānabhūmikā /<br/> iyaṃ tu /<br/> bhavāgrajā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes sngon du btang bas so / yang de ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin gyi 'di ni / srid rtse skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanabhūmikaiva /<br/> sā ceyaṃ /<br/> śubhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa pa kho na yin no / 'di ni dge ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaiva na klilṣṭā nāvyākāṛtā /<br/> kuśalā satī /<br/> dvivedyā 'niyatā ca /<br/> dvayoḥ kālayorvedyā upapadyavedanīyā cāparaparyāyavedanīyā ca /<br/> aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate /<br/> yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ /<br/> sā ceyamekāntena /<br/> āryasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba kho na yin te / nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la / lung du ma bstan pa yang ma yin no / dge ba yin yang / gnyis su myong 'gyur dang ma nges / skye nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ste / dus gnyis su myong bar 'gyur ba dang rnam par smin pa'i phyir ma nges pa yang yin te / gal te 'dir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed na nam yang rnam par mi smin pa kho nar 'gyur ro / de'i rnam par smin pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ /<br/> āryasyāpi ceyaṃ na vairāgyalabhyā /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> āpyā prayogataḥ /<br/> prayogalabhyaiveyam /<br/> na cātītā labhyate nāpyanāgata bhāvyate /<br/> cittabalena tadbhāvanāt /<br/> kiṃ bhagavato 'pi parāyogikī /<br/> netyāha /<br/> bodhilabhyā muneḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang gcig tu 'phags pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skyed mi nus te / chad pas 'jigs pa'i phyir dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi stobs kyis bskyed pa'i yang phyir ro / mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa ni de la mos pa'i phyir ro / 'phags pa'i yang 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral bas thob par bya ba ma yin te / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / sbyor bas 'thob / 'di ni sbyor bas 'thob par bya ba kho na yin pas / 'das pa yang mi 'thob la ma 'ongs pa yang mi 'thob ste / de ni sems kyi stobs kyis 'thob pa'i phyir ro / ci bcom ldan 'das kyi yang sbyor ba las byung ba yin nam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / thub pa'i byang chub kyis thob bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni 'di zad pa mkhyen pa dang dus mnyam du brnyes so / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">icchāmātrapratibaddho hi teṣāṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpātsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /<br/> tasmādeṣāṃ sarvavairāgyalābhikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi yon tan 'byor ba mngon sum du 'gyur ba thams cad ni bzhed pa tsam la rag lus pa yin pas de lta bas na de dag gi thams cad ni / 'dod chags dang bral bas brnyes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma bskyed na zad pa mkhyen pa'i dus su gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol bar ji ltar 'grub ce na / 'grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskyed zin pa bzhin du de la mnga' ba'i phyir ro / nub phyogs pa dag na re de ni dang po kho nar byang chub sems dpa' slob pa'i gnas skabs na skyed par byed do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmādevaṃ neṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'di ci'i phyir mi 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati /<br/> nirodhasamāpattimutpādya kṣayajñānamutpādayatīti vaktavyaṃ tathāgataiti /<br/> na prāk /<br/> nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> catustriṃśatkṣaṇāptitaḥ /<br/> catusriṃśatā kila cittakṣaṇairbodhisattvo bodhimanuprāptaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na gnas brtan nye bsrungs kyi lugs kyi tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed nas zad pa mkhyen pa skyed par mdzad do zhes brjod par bya'o / zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'di tshad mar byas pa yin no / dang por ma yin / kha che ba rnams na re de ltar bskyed du mi rung ngo zhes zer ro / ci'i phyir zhe na / skad cig ma / sum cu rtsa bzhis 'thob phyir ro / byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi skad cig ma sum cu rtsa bzhis byang chub rjes su 'thob pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt /<br/> ta ete catustriṃśat bhavanti /<br/> ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyāsyaniyāmāvakramaṇādadhobhūmikā na punaḥḥ praheyā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa mngon par rtogs pa na bcu drug dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'dod chags dang bral ba na nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu spong bar byed pa na bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu dgu skye ba'i phyir bco brgyad de / de dag ni sum cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro / ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba de nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyir sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni yang spang bar bya ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata etasminnantare visabhāgacittāsaṃbhavānnirodhasamāpatterayoga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir bar skabs 'dir mi 'dra ba'i sems mi srid pas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi rung ngo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi visabhāgacittamantarā saṃmukhīkkuryāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes grag go / gal te bar skabs su mi 'dra ba'i sems mngon du byas na cir 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyutthānāśayaḥ syādavyutthānāśayāśca bodhisattvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam ba ldang ba can du 'gyur te / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsam ba mi ldang ba can yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyamavyutthānāśayā natu āsrava mārgāvyutthānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi 'og pa rnams na re bsam pa mi ldang ba can yin ba bden mod kyi / zag pa med pa'i lam las ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tarhi na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya iti /<br/> asyāśayasyāvyutthānā dekāyana eva sarvārthaparisamāpteriti bahirdeśakāḥ /<br/> pūrvameva tu varṇayanti kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci zhe na / zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du re zhig skyil mo krung mi gzhig go snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di mi ldang ba'i phyir te / stan gcig kho na la don thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / snga ma kho na yin no zhes ni brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapyanayoḥ samāpattyorbahuprakāro viśeṣaḥ /<br/> kāmarūpāśraye bhūte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis kyi rnam ba'i bye brag ma yin mod kyi / gnyi ga 'dod dang gzugs rten can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyi ga yang 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su skyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate /<br/> syādrūpabhavo na cāsau bhavaḥ pañcavyavacāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gzugs kyi khams su mi 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na chos mngon pa'i gzhung gzugs kyi srid pa yin la / srid pa de rnams dang 'drid pa can snga ma yin pa yod dam zhe na / yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can lha 'du shes can sems mi 'dra ba la gnas pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang lha 'du shes med pa 'du shes med pa pa thob pa rnams kyi srid pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba 'di dang 'gal te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata ubhe apyete kāmarūpāśraye /<br/> tatrāpi tvayaṃ viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'di gnyi ga yang 'dod pa dang gzugs la brten pa dag yin no / de la yang khyad par ni 'di yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhākhyādito nṛṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhasamāpattiḥ prathamato manuṣyepūtpādyate paścādrūpadhātau parihīṇapūrvaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni dang po nyid du mi dag gi nang du skyed do / phyis ni sngar yongs su nyams pa dag gis gzugs kyi khams su yang skyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimato 'pyasti parihāṇiḥ /<br/> astītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'di las kyang yongs su nyams pa yod dam zhe na / smras pa yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi ndāyi sūtraṃ virudhyeta /<br/> ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaśca bhavati samādhisaṃpannaśca prajñāsaṃpannaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'char byed kyi mdo las tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang yin / ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang yin pa de ni yang dang yang du 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i gnas de yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so / de ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la dang po nyid du kun shes pa thob par yang mi byed cing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang ma yin la lus zhig nas kyang kham gyi zas za ba'i lha las 'das te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid las byung ba'i lha'i lus gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro / de der skyes nas yang dang yang du 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang pa'i gnas de yang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis yid las byung ba'i lus can gyi lha ni gzugs na spyod pa yin par gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ ca samāpattirbhāvāgrikī /<br/> tatkathamaparihīṇasya tallābhino rūpadhātau syādupapattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo pa yin na de ji ltar de thob pa yongs su ma nyams pa gzugs kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthadhyānabhūmikāmapi nirodhasabhāpatiṃ nikāyāntarīyā icchanti /<br/> teṣāṃ vināpi parihāṇyā sidhyatyetat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yang yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na 'di yongs su nyams pa med bzhin du yang 'grub pa 'dra mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadeva tu na sidhyati /<br/> caturthadhyānabhūmikā 'pyasāvastīti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yang yod do zhes bya ba 'di ni mi 'grub bo / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navānupūrvasamāpattaya iti sūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyeṣa niyamaḥ kathaṃ vyutkrāntasamāpattayo bhavanti /<br/> prāthamakalpikaṃ pratyeṣa niyamaḥ /<br/> praptaprakāmavāśitvāstu santo vilaṅghyāpi samāpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de nges pa yan na ji ltar thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa dag yin zhe na / 'di ni rtsom pa dang po pa las nges pa yin te / dga' mgu'i dbang thob pa dag yin na ni rnam par rgal te yang snyoms par 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanayoḥ samāpattyorbhūmito 'pi viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis ni sa las kyang khyad par yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthadhyānatayā 'grābhūmikatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogato 'pi niḥsaraṇavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakamanasikāraprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byung ba dang gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang ba'i yid la byed pas sbyor ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃtānato 'pi pṛthagjanāryasaṃtānatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud las kyang so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i rgyud la skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalato 'pyāsaṃjñikabhavāgraphalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu las kyang 'du shes med pa pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanīyato 'pi niyatāniyatopapadyobhayathāvedanīyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myong bar 'gyur ba las kyang myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang gnyi ga yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamotpādanato 'pi dvidhātumanuṣyotpādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po skyed pa las kyang khams gnyis dang mi'i nang du skyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt punarete cittatacaittanirodhasvabhāve satyāvasaṃjñisamāpattiḥ saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattiścocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir 'di dag sems dang sems las byung ba 'gog pa'i rang bzhin yin na 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatprātikūlyena tatsamāpattiprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag dang mi mthun pas de dag la snyoms par 'jug par sbyor ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanādijñāne 'pi paracittajñānavacanavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la sogs pa yang shes mod kyi gzhan gyi sems shes pa zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate /<br/> atītasyāpyastitvāt iṣyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ samanantarapratyayatvam /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar 'gags nas yun ring du lon pa'i sems las yang sems skye bar 'gyur zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'das pa yang yod pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi slob dpon gzhan dag na re ni re zhig gzugs med par skyes pa rnams kyi gzugs 'gags nas ring du lon na yang gzugs ji ltar skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni sems kho na las skye'i gzugs las ni ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du sems kyang dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus 'di kho na las skye'i sems las ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / sems dang dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus gnyis ni phan tshun sa bon can yin no zhes zer ro / btsun pa dbyig bshes kyis ni yongs su dris pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhadantavasumitrastvāha paripṛcchāyāṃ yasyācittikā nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiriti /<br/> ti /<br/> bhadantaghoṣaka āha tadidaṃ nopapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni gang gi ltar na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems med pa pa yin pa de la skyon du 'gyur gyi kho bo ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ro / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re de ni mi 'thad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sati hi vijñāne trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ /<br/> sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> ataḥ saṃjñāvedanayorapyatra nirodho na syāt /<br/> athāpi syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa yod na gsum 'dus pa las reg pa / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa zhes gsungs te / de'i phyir 'di la 'du shes dang tshor ba dag kyang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyuktam /<br/> satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti /<br/> tasyāviśeṣitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes gsungs mod kyi dgra bcom pa la tshor ba yod bzhin du sred pa mi skye ba de bzhin du reg pa yod bzhin du tshor ba las sogs pa mi 'byung ngo zhe na / khyad par du byas pa'i phyir de ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba la brten nas sred pa skyes so zhes gsungs kyi / tshor ba skyes pa la reg pa ni bye brag tu ma byas pas 'di ni mi 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādacittikā nirodhasamāpattiriti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni sems med pa pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamacittikāyāḥ samāpattitvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahābhūtasamatāpādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba chen po mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa'i phyir ram
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyis de la snyoms par 'jug cing 'thob par 'gyur bas na snyoms par 'jug pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ /<br/> dravyata ityāha /<br/> cittotpattipratibandhanāt /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag rdzas su yod dam 'on te btags par yod ce na / sems skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir rdzas su yod do zhes zer ro / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpatticittenaiva tatpratibandhanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho na de la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati /<br/> tadviruddhāśrayāpādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho na de dang 'gal ba'i rten skyed pa'i phyir gang gis na dus gzhan gyi bar du sems mi 'jug pa tsam du 'gyur ba de las gzhan pa'i sems dang 'gal bar skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags so / mi 'jug pa tsam ste yang sngon ma byung ba dang phyis langs pa la med pa yin pas snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni 'dus byas su btags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā āśrayasyaiva tathā samāpādanaṃ samāpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na rten nyid de ltar mnyam par bsgrubs pas na snyoms par 'jug pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamāsaṃjñikamapi draṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes med pa pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti /<br/> vyākhyāte samāpattī /<br/> jīvitaṃ katamat /<br/> āyurjīvitam /<br/> evaṃ hyuktamabhidharme 'jīvitenriyaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dis des sems kho na sems 'jug pa dang 'gal ba thob ste / mi 'jug pa tsam de yang 'du shes med pa par gdags so / de skad du ni mi brjod do / snyoms par 'jug pa dag bshad zin to / srog gang zhe na / srog ni tshe yin / chos mngon pa las 'di skad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traidhātukamāyuriti /<br/> etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti /<br/> ādhāra ūṣmavijñānayorhi yaḥ /<br/> idamuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gi dbang po gang zhe na / khams gsum pa'i tshe yin no zhes 'byung ngo / tshe zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin pa de yang mi shes pas / drod dang ni / rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyurūṣmātha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahatyamī /<br/> apaviddhastadā śete yathā kāṣṭhamacetana iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis / gang tshe lus ni 'dor byed cing / bor nas de tshe 'dug pa ni /  / sems med ji ltar shing bzhin no / zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ /<br/> tasyedānīmāyuṣaḥ ka ādhārabhūtaḥ /<br/> evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na drod dang rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur ba'i chos gnas pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni tshe yin no / da ni tshe de'i rten du gyur ba gang yin zhe na / drod dang rnam par shes pa de dag nyid yin no / 'o na ni phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadvaśādibhavau vivarttiṣyete iti nityānivṛttiprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las gang gi dbang gis na gzhan dag ldog par 'gyur ba gang zhig sngar ldog par 'gyur te / rtag tu ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyuṣastarhi karmādhārabhūtaṃ yāvadākṣiptaṃ karmaṇā tāvadanuvarttanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni tshe'i rten du gyur pa las yin te / las kyis ji srid du 'phangs pa de srid du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūṣmavijñānayorapi kimarthaṃ karmaivādhārabhūtaṃ neṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drod dang rnam par shes pa dag gi rten du gyur pa yang las kho na yin par ci'i phyir mi 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mā bhūt sarvaṃ vijñānamāmaraṇādvipāka iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma shi ba'i bar du rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par smin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni drod kyi rten du gyur pa las yin par 'gyur la / drod kyang rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur pa yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapyārūpyeṣvanādhāraṃ vijñānaṃ syādūṣmābhāvāt /<br/> tasya punaḥ karmādhāro bhaviṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni gzugs med pa dag na drod med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa rten med par 'gyur ro / de'i rten ni las yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti /<br/> uktaṃ cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la lar ni rnam par shes pa'i rten drod kho na yin par 'gyur ro / la lar ni las kho na yin no zhes bya ba 'dod dgu mi 'thob pa nyid de bshad kyang zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimuktam /<br/> mā bhūtsarvaṃ vijñānamāmaraṇādvipāka iti /<br/> tasmādastyeva tayorādhārabhūtamāyuḥ /<br/> nahi nāstīti brūmo natu dravyāntaram /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> traidhātukena karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasya sthitikālāvedhaḥ /<br/> yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du bshad ce na / ma shi ba'i bar du rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par smin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bshad do / de lta bas na de gnyis kyi rkyen du gyur pa tshe ni yod pa kho na'o / med do zhes ni mi smra mod kyi rdzas gzhan ni med do / 'o na de ci yin zhe na / khams gsum pa'i las kyis ris mthun pa gnas pa'i dus kyis 'phen pa yin te / dus 'di srid cig tu gnas par bya'o zhes ji srid du las kyi ris mthun pa 'phangs pa de srid du de gnas pa de la tshe zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sasyānāṃ pākakālāvedhavat kṣipteṣusthitikālāvedhavacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bru rnams kyi smin pa'i dus kyis 'phen pa lta bu dang mda' 'phangs pa dag gi gnas pa'i dus kyis 'phen pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti /<br/> tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig 'du byed ces bya ba yon tan gyi khyad par 'ga' mda' la skye ste / de'i dbang gis na ma ltung gi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa de'i de ni gcig pu yin pa'i phyir dang gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir yul gzhan dag tu mgyogs pa dang ches dang shin tu ches mgyogs par phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag kyang mi 'thad la ltung ba yang mi 'thad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyunā tatpratibandha iti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rlung gis de la gegs byed do zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arvākpatanaprasaṅgo na vā kadācidvāyoraviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung la khyad par med pa'i phyir drung du ltung ba'am yang na gzhar yang mi ltung bar thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu varṇayanti dravyāntaramevāyurastīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du tshe rdzas gzhan kho na zhig yod do zhes ni brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kimāyuḥkṣayādeva maraṇaṃ bhavatyāhosvidanyathāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci tshe zad pa kho nas 'chi bar 'gyur ram / 'on te gzhan du yang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñaptāvuktam āyuḥkṣayānmaraṇaṃ na puṇyakṣayāditi /<br/> catuṣkoṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btags pa las / tshe zad par 'chi bar 'gyur la bsod nams zad pas ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭirāyurvipākasya karmaṇaḥ paryādānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni tshe rnam par smin pa can gyi las yongs su gtugs pa las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā bhogavipākasya /<br/> tṛtīyobhayoḥ /<br/> caturthī viṣamāparihāreṇa /<br/> āyurutsargācceti vaktavyakm /<br/> na vaktavyam /<br/> āyuḥkṣayādeva tanmaraṇam /<br/> prathamakoṭyantargamāt /<br/> kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni longs spyod rnam par smin pa can gyi las yongs su gtugs pa las so / gsum pa ni gnyi ga'o / bzhi pa ni ya nga ba yongs su ma spangs so / tshe btang ba las kyang brjod par bya'o / tshe zad na bsod nams zad pa 'chi bar bya ba la nus pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādubhayakṣaye sati maraṇamāyuḥkṣayādityuktam /<br/> jñānaprasthāne 'pyuktam āyuḥ santatyupanibaddhaṃ vartata iti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gnyi ga zad na gnyi ga zad pa las 'chi bar bshad do / ye shes la 'jug pa las / tshe rgyud la rag lus te 'jug pa zhes brjod par bya'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakṛdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhanīti vaktavyam /<br/> āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lan cig skyes nas gnas pa zhes brjod par bya / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par ma zhugs pa rnams kyi ni rgyud la rag lus te / 'jug pa zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vaktavyam /<br/> ko 'sya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi ni lan cig skyes nas gnas pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa bshad pa 'di'i don gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāśrayopaghātādupāghatastatsantatyadhīnatvāt prathamam /<br/> yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam /<br/> sāntarāyaṃ prathamaṃ nirantarāyaṃ dvitīyamiti kāśmīrāḥ /<br/> tasmādastyakālamṛtyuḥ /<br/> sūtra uktam catvāra ātmabhāvapratilambhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la lus la gnas pas gnod par 'gyur ba de ni rgyud la rag lus pa'i phyir dang po yin no / gang gi lus la gnod pa nyid med pa de ni ji ltar skyes pa bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir gnyis pa yin no / kha che ba rnams na re glo bur dang bcas pa ni dang po yin no / glo bur med pa ni gnyis pa yin no zhes zer te / de lta bas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do / mdo las lus thob pa ni bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyātmabhāvapratilambho yatrātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃcetaneti /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus thob pa gang la bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis gsod pas ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na lha rtsed mos myos pa rnams dang yid rab tu 'khrugs pa rnams ni bdag nyid 'chi ba kho nar 'gyur ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā /<br/> duddhānāṃ ceti vaktavyam /<br/> svayaṃmṛtyutvāt /<br/> parasaṃcetanaiva kramate garbhāṇḍagatānām /<br/> ubhayamapyeṣāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prāyeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de rnams ni rab tu dga' ba dang yid rab tu 'khrugs pa dag gi gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang yin par brjod par bya ste / bdag nyid 'grongs pa'i phyir ro / mngal dang sgo da na 'dug pa rnams ni gzhan gyis gsod pa kho nar 'gyur ba yin no / 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams gzhan dag phal cher ni gnyi ga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayaṃ sarveṣā mantarābhavikāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāmanekajātīyānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tadyathā nārakāṇā muttarakauravāṇāṃ darśanamārgamaitrīnirodhāsaṃjñi samāpattisamāpannānāṃ rājarṣijinadūtajinādiṣṭa dharmilo ttaragaṅgila śreṣṭhiputrayaśaḥ dumārajīvakādīnāṃ sarveṣā caramabhavikānāṃvodhisattva mātustadgarbhāyāḥ cakravarttinaścakravarttimātuśca tadgarbhāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma pa thams cad dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams dang 'dod pa na spyod pa kha cig 'di lta sta dmyal pa ba rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang mthong ba'i lam dang byams pa dang 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang rgyal po'i drang srong dang rgyal po'i pho nya dang rgyal bas bstan pa dang chos len pa dang mchog can dang gang la len pa dang tshong dpon gyi bu grags pa gzhon nu dang 'tsho byed la sogs pa rnams dang srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i yum de lhums na gnas pa dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i ma de mngal na gnas pa gnyi ga ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir mdo las / btsun pa gang dag bdag nyid 'gum par yang mi 'gyur la gzhan gyis gsod pa yang ma lags pa'i sems can de dag gang lags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāḥ śāriputreti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams yin no zhes gsungs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti /<br/> nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti /<br/> paryantagrahaṇāttarhi tadādisaṃpratyayaḥ /<br/> kvacidādisaṃpratyayaḥ kvacidādinā paryanto 'pi pratīyate /<br/> yadāha /<br/> tadyathā devā brahmakāyikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan dag ni bdag nyid 'chi ba ni rang gi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yin la / gzhan gyis gsod pa ni sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs yin gyi / de na ni gnyi ga med do zhes zer ro zhes grag go / de lta na 'o na de na yang gzhan gyi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gzhan gyis gsod par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / 'o na ni mthar smos pas de la sogs pa go'o / la lar ni mtha' yang dang pos go ste / 'di lta ste tshangs ris kyi lha dag lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ prathamā sukhopapattiriti /<br/> kvacit paryantenādirapi pratīyate /<br/> yadāha /<br/> tadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni bde ba skye ba dang po yin no zhes gang bshad pa lta bu'o / la lar ni dang po yang mthas go ste / 'di lta ste / 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ dvitīyā sukhopapattiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni bde ba skye ba gnyis pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di dper na brjod pa yin pas 'di las lhag ma go bar yang rigs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpe'i chos ni gang gcig yin yang de dang 'dra ba yang ston par byed pa 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ceha tadyathāśabdo nāstītyanupasaṃhāra eṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra de yang 'di na med pas 'di ni nye bar sbyar du mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt /<br/> santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di dper brjod pa yin na ni sems can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de / 'di lta ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go zhes bya ba 'dir thob par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādupadarśanārtha evāyaṃ draṣṭavya ityalamatiprasaṅgena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni nye bar bstan pa'i don kho nar blta bar bya'o / ha cang thal bas chog go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ jīvitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lakṣaṇāni punarjātirjarā sthitiranityatā /<br/> etāni hi saṃskṛtasya catvāri lakṣaṇāni /<br/> yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate /<br/> viparyayādasaṃskṛtaḥ /<br/> tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati /<br/> nanu trīṇimāni saṃskṛta lakṣaṇānīti sūtra uktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang / rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid / bzhi po 'di rnams ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag yin te / gang la 'di dag yod pa'i chos de ni 'dus byas su mngon no / bzlog pa ni 'dus ma byas so / de la skye bas ni chos de skyed par byad do / gnas pas ni gnas par byed do / rga bas ni rnyings par byed do / mi rtag pa nyid kyis ni 'jig par byed do / mdo las gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthamapyatra vaktavyaṃ syāt /<br/> kiṃ cātra noktam /<br/> āha /<br/> sthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der bzhi pa yang brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro / der gang zhig ma gsungs / smras pa / gnas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi idaṃ sthityanyathātvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rga ba'i rnam grangs yin te / dper na skye ba'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'jig pa zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni yid 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos gang dag 'du byed rnams kyi dus 'pho bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa de dag nyid mtshan nyid du gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātirhi yā saṃskārānanāgatādadhvanaḥ pratyutpannamadhvānaṃ saṃcārayati /<br/> jarā 'nityate punaḥ pratyutpannādatītaṃ durbalīkṛtya pratighātāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye bas ni 'du byed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas da ltar byung ba'i dus su skyed par byed do / rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid dag gis ni da ltar byung ba nas 'das par te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyam chung ngur byas te 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dper na thibs por zhugs pa'i mi zhig la dgra gsum yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gcig gis ni thibs po nas 'byin par byed / gnyis kyis ni srog gcod par byed pa de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthitistu tān saṃskārānupaguhya tiṣṭhatyaviyogamivecchantī /<br/> ato 'sau saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ na vyavasthāpitā /<br/> asaṃskṛtasyāpi ca svalakṣaṇe sthitibhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa ni mi 'bral bar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'du byed de dag 'khyud nas gnas so / de'i phyir 'di ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du rnam par ma bzhag go / 'dus ma byas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid la gnas pa yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre /<br/> kiṃ prayojanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag rtog par byed pa ni mdo las gnas pa dang rga ba bsdus te / gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid ces mtshan nyid gcig tu gsungs so / ci dgos she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi nang na 'di ni chags pa'i gzhi yin pas de'i phyir de la ma chags par bya ba'i don du de ni dpal dang 'dra ba 'di dang rna nag ma dang lhan cig tu bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataścatvāryeva saṃskṛta lakṣaṇāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni bzhi kho na'o snyam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi nāma jātyādīnāṃ saṃskṛtatvādanyairjātyādibhirbhavitavyam /<br/> bhavantyeva /<br/> jātijātyādayasteṣāṃ /<br/> teṣāmapi catvāryanulakṣaṇāni bhavanti /<br/> jātijātiḥ sthitisthitiḥ jarājarā anityatā 'nityatā iti /<br/> nanu caikasyaikasya caturlakṣaṇī prāpnoti aparyavasānadoṣaśca /<br/> teṣāṃ punaranyajātyādiprasaṅgāt /<br/> na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la sogs pa de dag kyang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ro zhe na / yod pa kho na ste / de dag skye ba'i skye la sogs / de dag la yang skye ba'i skye ba dang rga ba'i rga ba dang gnas pa'i gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi yod do / de dag la yang skye ba la sogs pa gzhan du thal ba'i phyir re re la yang mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang mthar thug pa med pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāt /<br/> te 'ṣṭadharmaikavṛttayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar / de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ jātyādīnāmaṣṭāsu dharmeṣu vṛttiḥ /<br/> kimidaṃ vṛttiriti /<br/> kāritraṃ puruṣakāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la sogs pa de dag ni chos brgyad la 'jug go / 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / byed pa ste skyes bu'i rtsal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate /<br/> sārdhaṃ lakṣaṇānulakṣaṇairaṣṭābhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i skye ba la sogs pa ni chos gcig la 'jug go / ji lta zhe na / chos bdag nyid gtogs par mtshan nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad dang lhan cig tu dgu skye la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra jātirātmānaṃ virahayyānyānaṣṭau dharmān janayati /<br/> jātijātiḥ puna stāmeva jātim /<br/> tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la skye bas ni bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan brgyad skyed par byed do /  / skye ba'i skye bas ni skye ba de kho na skyed par byed do / dper na khyim bya mo la la las ni phru gu mang du 'brang la / la las ni nyung du 'brang ba de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pas kyang bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan brgyad gnas par byed la / gnas pa'i gnas pas ni gnas pa de kho na gnas par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ jarā 'nityate api yathāyogyaṃ yajye /<br/> tasmānā bhavatyanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya ste / de bas na thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadetadākāśaṃ pāṭyata iti sautrāntikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams na re 'di ni nam mkha' la 'dral bar bskyod pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> pramāṇābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la sogs pa'i chos can de dag ni ji ltar rnam par 'byed pa ltar rdzas su yod pa ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / tshad ma med pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti /<br/> yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapī ti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag rdzas su yod pa'i tshad ma ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bzhin du mngon sum pa 'am / rjes su dpag pa 'am / yid ches pa'i lung ni cung zad kyang med do / 'on gang mdo sde las / 'dus byas skye bar yang mngon no / 'jig par yang mngon no / gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du yang mngon no zhes gsungs so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">granthajño devānāṃ priyo natvarthajñaḥ /<br/> arthaśca pratiśaraṇa muktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> kaḥ punarasyārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig shes pa ni lha rnams dga' ba yin gyi don shes pa ni ma yin no / bcom ldan 'das kyis ni don la brten par gsungs so / 'di'i don gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante /<br/> tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni /<br/> na tu kṣaṇasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pas ldongs pa'i byis pa rnams 'du byed kyi rgyun la bdag dang bdag gir mos pas mngon par zhen pas mos pa de bzlog pa'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed kyi rgyun de 'dus byas nyid dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du bstan par bzhed nas / gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag yin no zhes gsungs par zad kyi yang skad cig ma la ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi kṣaṇasyotpādādayaḥ prajñāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma la ni skye ba la sogs pa mi mngon no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nacāprajñāyamānā ete lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi mngon pa de dag ni mtshan nyid yin par 'os pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha evātra sūtre saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyata ityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir mdo de las / 'dus byas skye bar yang mngon no zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta /<br/> maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'dus byas zhes smos pa ni ci nas kyang 'dus byas nyid kyi mtshan nyid dag yin no snyam du shes par bya ba'i chu dang chu skyar ltar ram / dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid kyi bu mo'i mtshan bzhin du 'dus byas kyi dngos po yod pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dag yin no zhes bya ba de ltar shes na ni mi rung ngo snyam nas smos pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra pravāhasyādirutpādo nivṛttirvyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rgyun gyi dbang po ni skye ba yin no / ldog pa ni 'jig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa eva pravāho 'nuvarttamānaḥ sthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun de nyid rjes su 'jug pa ni gnas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya pūrvāparaviśeṣaḥ sthityanyathātvam /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantīti /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i snga phyi'i bye brag ni gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yin no / de lta yin pas na / rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i tshor ba ni rig bzhin du skye'o / rig bzhin du gnas so / rig bzhin du nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātirādiḥ pravāhasya vyayaśchedaḥ sthitistu saḥ /<br/> sthityanyathātvaṃ tasyaiva pūrvāparaviśiṣṭatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun gyi dang po skye ba yin / chad pa 'jig pa gnas pa ste / de nyid snga phyi'i bye brag ni /  / gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid / yang 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātirapūrvo bhāvaṃ sthitiḥ prabandho vyayastaducchedaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon med las byung skye ba ste / rgyun gnas de chad 'jig pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthityanyathātvamiṣṭaṃ prabandhapūrvāparaviśeṣa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun gyi snga phyi'i bye brag ni / gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur bar 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /<br/> na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma yi chos la ni / gnas pa med na 'jig par 'gyur / de yang 'jig 'gyur de yi phyir / de yi der rtogs don med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt pravāha eva sthitiḥ /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapyabhidharmanirdeśa upapannno bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gnas pa ni rgyun kho na yin no / de ltar bshad na chos mngon pa las gnas pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthitiḥ katamā /<br/> utpannānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmavināśa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas skye ba rnams mi 'jig pa yin no zhes bstan pa 'di yang 'thad pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi kṣaṇasyotpannasyāvināśo 'stīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes pa skad cig ma la ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ /<br/> āha /<br/> jātiḥ /<br/> ko vyayo maraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang ye shes la 'jug pa las / sems gcig la 'byung ba gang zhe na / smras pa / skye ba'o / 'jig pa gang zhe na / 'chi ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ jareti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpi nikāyasabhāgacittaṃ yujyate /<br/> pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi dravyāntarakalpanayā /<br/> kathamiti /<br/> pratikṣaṇamabhūtvābhāva utpādaḥ /<br/> bhūtvā 'bhāvo vyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rga ba'o zhes gsungs pa der yang ris mthun pa'i sems la rung bar 'gyur ro / skad cig ma re re la yang rdzas gzhan du rtogs pa med pa bzhin du 'dus byas kyi de dag rung ste / ji lta zhe na / skad cig ma re re la ma byung ba las byung ba ni skye ba'o / byung nas med pa ni 'jig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvasya pūrvasyottarakṣaṇānuvandhaḥ sthitiḥ /<br/> tasyāvisdṛśatvaṃ sthityanyathātvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snga ma snga ma dang phyi ma phyi ma'i skad cig ma rjes su 'brel ba ni gnas pa'o / de'i mi 'dra ba nyid ni gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā tarhi sadṛśā utpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang gi tshe 'dra bar yang skye'o zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na te nirviśeṣā bhavanti /<br/> kathamidaṃ jñāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag khyad par med pa ma yin no / 'di ji ltar shes she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣiptākṣiptabalidurbalakṣiptasya vajrādeścirāśutarapātakālabhedāttanmahābhūtānāṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣasiddheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdo rje la sogs pa 'phangs pa dang ma 'phangs pa dang stobs chen po dang stobs chung ngus 'phangs pa bul ba dang myur ba dang ches dal ba dang ches myur bar ltung ba'i dus kyi bye brag las de'i 'byung ba rnams yongs su gyur ba'i bye brag 'grub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas rnams ni bye brag gi khyad par chen po mtshar cig med pas gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yod du zin kyang 'dra ba bzhin du snang ngo
