</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni sgra dang me lce'i skad cig ma tha ma dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe'i skye mched drug la skad cig ma phyi ma med pa'i phyir gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa ma khyab pa can du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vai saṃskṛtasya sthitirevocyate /<br/> lakṣaṇamapi tu sthityanyathātvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gnas pa kho na yang ma yin gyi gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ /<br/> samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtaṃ nāma yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ so 'nyathā cānyathā ca bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir gang la gnas pa yod pa de la gdon mi za bar gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang yod pas rnam par gzhag pa nyams pa med do / mdor na bcom ldan 'das kyis ni mdo 'di las 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni / gang ma byung ba las 'byung ba dang byung nas kyang mi 'byung ba 'di 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin par gsungs la / 'di'i gnas pa zhes bya ba rgyun gang yin pa de yang gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir skye ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan dag gis ci zhig bya / de ni ji ltar na mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i chos de nyid kyi mtshan nyid du rung bar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnālāṅgūlakakudaśaphaviṣāṇādīni ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ji ltar na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams skyes bu chen po las mi gzhan pa yin / ba lang nyid kyi mtshan nyid lkog shal dang mjug ma dang nog dang rmig pa dang rva rnams kyang ba lang las mi gzhan pa yin / sa'i khams la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sra ba nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang de dag las mi gzhan pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat /<br/> sa evātra nyāyaḥ syāt /<br/> naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate /<br/> gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ /<br/> tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang ji ltar gyen du 'gro ba las ni thag ring po nas du ba la du ba nyid du shes mod kyi / de ni de las kyang mi gzhan pa ltar 'dir yang tshul de nyid yin no / 'dus byas gzugs la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo bzung yang ji srid du snga na med pa dang phyis med pa dang rgyun gyi bye brag mi shes pa de srid du 'dus byas nyid du mi shes te / de lta bas na de nyid kyis de mtshon pa yang ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāpi nāma dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni bhaveyuḥ /<br/> kimayuktaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las skye ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan nyid du yod pa yang ma yin no / 'on te skye ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan zhig tu gyur na yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt /<br/> kāritrakālabhedāt /<br/> anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti /<br/> yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā /<br/> idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryaṃ bhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir chos gcig dus gcig tu skyes pa dang gnas pa dang rgas pa dang zhig par 'gyur ro / ma yin te / bya ba'i dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro / skye ba ma 'ongs pa ni bya ba byed de / 'di ltar ma skyes pa skyed do / bskyed zin pa'i chos la ni da ltar gnas pa la sogs pa bya ba byed pas gang gi tshe skye ba de tshe gnas pa'am / rga ba 'am / 'jig par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'dir ci ma 'ongs pa rdzas su yod dam med ces bya ba 'di dpyad dgos par 'gyur te / phyis ni skyed par byed dam 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yod du chug na yang skye ba bya ba byed na ji ltar ma 'ongs par 'grub par 'gyur / de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byung ba yang bya ba zhig pa yin na ji ltar na da ltar 'grub par 'gyur / de lta bas na da lta'i mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa la sogs pa yang cig car bya ba la 'jug pa yin na ni skad cig ma gcig kho na la chos gnas pa dang rga ba dang 'jig par thal bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti /<br/> kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate /<br/> athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti /<br/> evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti /<br/> kuta etat /<br/> sthiterbalīyastvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gang gi tshe gnas pas gnas par byed pa de nyid kyi tshe rga bas rga bar byed cing mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'jig par byed pa'i phyir 'di ci dus der gnas sam / 'on te rga ba 'am / 'on te 'jig par 'gyur / gang yang skye ba la sogs pa rnams kyang bya ba rim gyis byed do zhes zer ba de'i ltar na skad cig ma gcig la gnod par 'gyur ro / 'on te ji skad du kho bo cag gi skad cig ma ni ji tsam gyis 'di thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur bde yin no zhes brjod na / de lta na yang de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba las re zhig gnas pas ni gnas par byed kyi rga bas kyang rgas par mi byed la / mi rtag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig par mi byed do zhes bya ba 'di ga las / gnas pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ kenāvalīyastvam /<br/> yadaināṃ saha dharmeṇānityatā hanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyis ci'i phyir stobs dang mi ldan pa nyid du 'gyur / gang gi phyir na 'di chos dang lhan cig tu mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'joms
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtakṛtyā punaḥ karttuṃ notsahate jātivat /<br/> sthaturyuktamanutsoḍhum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba byas zin pas yang mi nus te skye ba bzhin no / skye bas ni mi nus par rigs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi śakyaṃ jātyādijanyaṃ vartamānatāmānītaṃ punarānetum /<br/> śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum /<br/> ato na yuktaṃ yannotsahate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye bas bskyed par bya ba da lta nyid du khyer te 'ongs nas yang bkur bar ni mi nus so / gnas pas ni gnas par bya ba ye gnas par bya bar yang nus so / de lta bas na gang mi nus pa ni rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko vā 'tra pratibandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'di la bgegs byed pa yang gang zhig yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te eva jarā 'nityate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid de dag kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām /<br/> nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de dag stobs dang ldan pa zhig yin na ni sngon kho na yin no / gnas pa'i bya ba log na yang de dag kyang mi gnas la chos de yang mi gnas na ji ltar gang la bya ba byed pa nus par 'gyur / yang na de dag gis ci zhig bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat /<br/> sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pas yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos skyes pa tsam de ma zhig par gyur pa yin la / des de yal bar btang na ni nges par mi gnas pas 'di nyid 'di'i 'jig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syācca tāvadekasya dharmasyotpannasyāvināśaḥ sthitiḥ vināśo 'nityatā /<br/> jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig chos skyes pa gcig la mi 'jig pa ni gnas pa yin la / 'jig pa ni mi rtag pa nyid yin la / gcig la rga ba ni rnam pa thams cad du mi srid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvāparaviśeṣāt vipariṇāmācca /<br/> atastadanyathātve 'nya eva /<br/> uktaṃ hi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rga ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid du 'gyur zhing rnam par 'gyur ba yin na de nyid las de'i rnam pa gzhan nyid du ni rung ba ma yin no / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathātvena jarā 'siddhiranyathātve 'nya eva saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin na ni rga mi 'gyur / gzhan du 'gyur na de gzhan nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānaikasya bhāvasya jarā nāmopapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na dngos gcig la / rga zhes bya ba mi 'thad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatīti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang sde pa gzhan dag na re 'jig pa'i rgyu dang phrad nas mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'jig par byed do zhes zer ba de'i ni 'khru ba dang phrad nas lhas 'khru bar byed do zhes bya ba lta bur 'gyur te / 'jig pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis 'jig na de brtags pas ci zhig bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā vināśakāraṇānapekṣatvāt sthityanityate kāritramabhinnakālaṃ kuryātāmityekasyaikatra kāle sthita vinaṣṭatā saṃprasajyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skad cig ma nyid du khas blangs pas de dag gis mi rtag pa nyid 'jig pa'i rgyu la mi ltos pa'i phyir gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag dus tha mi dad par bya ba byed par 'gyur bas cig la dus gcig tu gnas pa dang 'jig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rgyun la 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag gsungs pa yin te / de lta na mdo de legs par drangs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvenā /<br/> nahi vinā hetupratyayasāmagrayā jātirjanikā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang gal te ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba bskyed par bya ba skyed par byed pa yin nam 'ongs pa thams cad cig car ci'i phyir mi bskyed / 'di ltar / rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni / skye bas bskyed bya skyed byed min / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med par ni skye bas skyed par byed pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetupratyayānāmeva tarhi sāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /<br/> sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni tshogs pa yod na ni 'byung la med na ni mi 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na'i mthu yin par blta bar bya'i skye ba ni ma yin pas rgyu dang rkyen kho na skyed par byed pa dag yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ ca bhoḥ sarvaṃ vidyamānamupalabhyate /<br/> sūkṣmā api dharmaprakṛtayaḥ saṃvidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kye yod pa thams cad dmigs sam ci chos kyi rang bzhin phra mo dag yod bzhin du yang mi dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba zhig med na skyes zhes bya ba nyid dang gzugs kyi skye ba zhes bya ba drug pa'i tshig tu yang mi 'gyur te dper na gzugs kyi gzugs zhes mi bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvadanityatā yathāyogaṃ vaktavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar du ci rigs par brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhisiddhyartham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni des na bdag med pa'i blo 'grub par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa nyid cig kyang 'dod par byas la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgaparatvaaparatvasattādayo 'pi tīrthakaraparikalpitā abhyupagantavyā ekadvimahadaṇupṛthaksaṃyuktaviyuktaparāparasadādibuddhisiddhyartham /<br/> ṣaṣṭīvidhānārthaṃ ca rūpasya saṃyoga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig dang gnyis dang chen po dang chung ngu dang tha dad pa dang ldan pa dang rnam par phye ba dang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa dang yod pa la sogs pa'i blo 'grub par bya ba'i phyir dang drug par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs byed kyis yongs su brtag pa grangs dang tshad dang tha dad pa nyid dang ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba dang gzhan nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang yod pa la sogs pa dang gzugs kyi ldan pa zhes bya ba yang khas blang bar bya dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā ca ṣaṣṭo kathaṃ kalpyate /<br/> rūpasya svabhāva iti /<br/> tasmāt prajñaptimātramevaitadabhūtvābhāvajñāpanārthaṃ kriyate jātamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba drug pa 'di yang ji ltar brtag / de lta bas na skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma byung ba las byung ba kho nar shes par bya ba'i don du brtags pa tsam mdzad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cābhūtvābhāvalakṣāṇa utpādo bahuvikalpaḥ /<br/> tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma byung ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi skye bde yang rnam pa mang du yod pas de bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir gzugs kyi skye bzhes drug par mdzad de / ci nas kyang gzugs zhes bya ba kho na skye bar shes par bya'i gzhan du ni shes par mi 'gyur bar bya ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā candanasya gandhādayaḥ śilāputrakasya śarīramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na tsan dan gyi dri la sogs pa dang mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sthityādayo 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gnas pa la sogs pa la yang ci rigs par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te skye ba med par skye na nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas kyang ci'i phyir mi skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāyat ityabhūtvā bhavati /<br/> asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nityamastīti na jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba zhes bya ba ni ma byung ba las 'byung ba yin na 'dus ma byas ni rtag tu yod pa'i phyir mi skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar chos nyid kyis thams cad skye ba dang ldan par mi 'dod pa de ltar thams cad mi skye'o zhes bya bar 'dod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ /<br/> siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ji ltar skye ba dang ldan par mtshungs pa las de dag las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams kyis de dag las gzhan pa bskyed par nus pa ma yin pa de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang 'dus ma byas bskyed par mi nus par 'gyur ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re skye ba la sogs pa rdzas kyi dngos por grub pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante /<br/> tasmāddoṣeṣu pratividhātavyaṃ siddhāntaścānuvarttitavyaḥ /<br/> uktāni lakṣaṇāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri dags dag yod ces te nas mi rmo ba ma yin pa dang sbrang bu dag yod ces tel du mi bza' ba ma yin pa ltar sun 'byin pa dag yod ces te lung dor du mi rung bas de lta bas na skyon rnams la yang lan gdab par bya la / grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su 'brang bar yang bya'o zhes zer ro / mtshan nyid rnams bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmakāyādayaḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming gi tshogs la sogs pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmakāyādayaḥ saṃjñāvākyākṣarasamuktayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādigrahaṇena padavyañjanakāyagrahaṇam /<br/> tatra saṃjñākaraṇaṃ nāma /<br/> tadyathā rūpaṃ śabda ityevamādiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming dang ngag dang yi ge'i tshogs / sogs pa smos pas ni tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs gzung ngo / de la ming byed pa ni ming ste / dper na gzugs sgra zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa lta bu'o / ngag ni tshig ste / dper na / kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā anityā vata saṃskārā ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa ji tsam gyis don yongs su rdzogs pa ste / gang gis bya ba dang yon tan dang dus kyi 'brel ba'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyañjanamakṣaraṃ tadyathā a ā ityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yi ge ni yi ge ste / dper na aa a'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cākṣarāṇyapi lipyavayavānāṃ nāmāni /<br/> na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ /<br/> kathamaśrūyamāṇāni lekhyena pratīyeranniti nākṣarāṇyeṣāṃ nāmāni /<br/> eṣāṃ ca saṃjñādīnāṃ samuktayo nāmādikāyāḥ /<br/> uca samavāye paṭhanti /<br/> tasya samuktirityetad rūpaṃ bhavati /<br/> yo 'rthaḥ samavāya iti so 'rthaḥ samuktiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yi ge rnams kyang yi ge 'bru'i yan lag dag gi ming dag ma yin nam zhe na / yi ge 'bru'i yan lag rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir yi ge rnams byas pa ni ma yin gyi / ji ltar na ming thos pa bris pas go bar 'gyur zhes yi ge rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir ni yi ge'i 'bru rnams byas pa yin pas / yi ge rnams ni de dag gi ming ma yin no / ming la sogs pa de dag gi tshogs ni ming la sogs pa'i tshogs dag yin te / mang po'i don gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra nāmakāyastadyathā rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānītyevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ming gi tshogs ni dper na gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag ces bya ba ste / de lta bu la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">padakāyaḥ tadyathā sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami tyevamādi /<br/> vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig gi tshogs ni dper na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dag go / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ste / de lta bu la sogs pa'o / yi ge'i tshogs ni dper na ka kha ga gha nga zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti /<br/> kasmāccittaviprayuktā ityucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bu la sogs pa'o / de dag kyang ngag ni rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag ma yin nam ci'i phyir sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naite vāksvabhāvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni ngag gi rang bzhin ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag gi sgra yin na sgra tsam gyis ni don gang dag go bar mi 'gyur ro / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag ni ming la 'jug la ming gis ni don rjod par byed do / sgra tsam kho na ni ngag ma yin gyi sgra gang gis don go bar 'gyur ba'i sgra de dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kena punarghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sgra gang gis don go bar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'rtheṣu kṛtāvadhirvaktṛbhistadyathāgaurityeṣa śabdo navasvartheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis smra ba po rnams kyis don dag la mtshams bcad pa ste / dper na goo zhes bya ba lta bu'o / sgra de ni don dgu dag la mtshams bcad pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāgdigbhūraśmivajreṣu paśvakṣisvargavāriṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag phyogs pa dang 'od zer dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navasvartheṣu medhāvī gośabdamupadhārayediti /<br/> yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti /<br/> taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā /<br/> idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti /<br/> kiṃ tāvadutpādayatyāhosvit prakāśayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyugs dang mig dang rdo rje dang / mtho ris chu dang don dgu la / mkhas pas goo sgra des gzung bya / zhes bya ba lta bu'o / gang yang ming gis don rjod par byed do snyam du sems pa des kyang gdon mi za bar gal te don go bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba 'di khas blang bar bya dgos te / de ni don go bar byed pa'i sgra tsam kho nas 'grub na don gzhan rdzas ming btags te ci zhig bya / ji star [*ltar?] na ngag ming la 'jug pa 'di yang mi shes so / ci re zhig skyed par byed dam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyutpāda yati /<br/> ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gsal bar byed / gal te skyed par byed na ni ngag ni sgra'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra tsam thams cad kyis ming skyed par 'gyur ro / 'on te sgra'i khyad par de lta bu zhig ming skyed par byed pa yin par 'dod na ni de nyid don rjod par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha prakāśayati /<br/> ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na ni ngag gi sgra'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra tsam thams cad kyi ming gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro / 'on te sgra'i khyad par de lta bu zhig gsal bar byed pa yin par 'dod na ni de nyid don gsal bar byed pa yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na khalvapi śabdānāṃ sāmargyamasti kṣaṇaikamilanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sgra rnams ni tshogs pa med la chos gcig la cha shas kyi skyed pa yang rigs pa ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet /<br/> kathaṃ tāvadatītāpekṣaḥ paścimo vijñaptikṣaṇa utpādayatyavijñaptim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyed par byed pa na ji ltar dag gis ming skyed par byed / re zhig ji ltar na 'das pa la ltos pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma tha mas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skyed par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni sgra tha ma kho nas ming skyed pa'i phyir gang gis de gcig kho na thos pa des kyang don go ngar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'di snyam du ngag gis ni yi ge skyed par byed la / yi ges ni ming skyed par byed do snyam du rtog par byed na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la yang skyon de nyid yod de / yi ge rnams tshogs pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag ming gsal bar byed pa yin na yang skyon de nyid yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yi ge yang ngag las khyad par du yod par shes rab dang ldan par yid brtan pas kyang mtshan nyid gyi [*kyi?] sgo nas yongs su bcad par mi nus pas dag ni yi ge skyed par byed pa yin par yang mi rung la / gsal bar byed pa yin par yang mi rung ngo / 'on te mang don dang lhan cig skyed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāpyarthasahajaṃ nāma jātyādivadiṣyate /<br/> evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya bar 'dod na ni de lta na don 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i ming da lta ba yin par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam /<br/> yadapyuktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> nāmasaṃniśāritā gāthā gāthānāṃ kavirāśrayaḥ iti /<br/> atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rnams kyis bu dag gi ming dga' mgur 'dogs na ming gang zhig de dang lhan cig skyes pa yin par 'gyur / chos 'dus ma byas pa rnams kyi ming yang gang dang lhan cig skyes pa yin par 'gyur / de lta bas na 'di nyid mi 'dod pa nyid do / gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis / tshigs bcad ming la brten pa ste / tshigs bcad bzhi ni snyan dngags mkhan / zhes gsungs pa der yang don rnams la mtshams bcad pa'i sa ni ming yin la / ming rnams bkod pa'i khyad par yang tshigs su bcad pa yin pas ming la brten pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paṅktivaccittānupūrvyavacca /<br/> astu vā vyañjanamātrasya dravyāntarabhāvaparikalpanā /<br/> tatsamūhā eva nāmakāyādayo bhaviṣyantītyapārthikā tatprajñaptiḥ /<br/> santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> nahi sarva dharmāstarkagamyā bhavantīti /<br/> atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam /<br/> āha /<br/> kāmarūpāptasattvākhyā niḥṣyandāvyākṛtāḥ /<br/> kāmāptā rūpāptāśceti /<br/> ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare /<br/> sattvākhyā ete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bkod pa'i khyad par yang rdzas gzhan du mi 'thad de phreng ba lta bu dang sems kyi rim pa bzhin no / yi ge tsam zhig rdzas gzhan gyi dngos por yongs su rtog pa yin du chug na yang de'i tshogs kho na ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yin par 'gyur bas de dag tu rtog don med pa yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re chos thams cad rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pas ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni rdzas su yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro / yang ci ming gi tshogs la sogs pa 'di dag ldan pa 'am / sems can du ston pa 'am / sems can du ston pa ma yin pa 'am / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa 'am / rgyas pa las 'byung ba 'am / rgyu mthun pa las byung ba 'am / dge ba 'am / mi dge ba 'am / lung du ma bstan pa dag cig ces brjod par bya zhe na / smras pa / 'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston /  / rgyu mthun las byung lung bstan min / 'di dag ni 'dod par gtogs pa dang gzugs su gtogs pa dag yin no / gzhan dag na re gzugs med par gtogs ba yang yod mod kyi de dag ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes zer ro / de dag ni sems can du ston pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate /<br/> naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig rjod par byed pa de dag dang ldan gyi brjod par bya ba gang yin pa dang ni ma yin no / rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /<br/> tathā /<br/> sabhāgatā sā tu punarvipāko 'pi /<br/> na kevalaṃ naiḥṣyandikī kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī /<br/> āptayo dvidhā /<br/> prāptayo naiḥṣyandikyo vipākajāśca /<br/> lakṣaṇāni ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar ming gi tshogs la sogs pa 'di dag sems can du ston pa dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag yin ba de bzhin skal mnyam de ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi / rnam par smin pa 'ang yin / khams gsum pa ste / 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin no / thab rnam gnyis / thob pa rnams ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvidheti varttate prāptivat /<br/> niḥṣyandāḥ samāpattya samanvayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid rnams kyang / rnam gnyis zhes bya bar sbyar te thob pa bzhin no / snyoms 'jug dang mi ldan pa dag rgyu mthun pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve acittasamāpattī asamanvāgamaśca naiḥṣyandikā eva /<br/> śeṣameṣāṃ vaktavyamuktam /<br/> śeṣayoścāsaṃjñikajīvitayorato na punarbrumaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa gnyis dang mi ldan pa rnams ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag kho na yin no / 'di dag gi brjod par bya ba lhag ma dang lhag ma 'du shes med pa pa dang srog gi dbang po dag gis ni bshad zin pas de'i phyir yang mi brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ prāptyādīnāṃ sattvākhyatoktā samanvāgamavacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar thob pa rnams kyi sems can du ston pa nyid bshad zin ce na / ldan pa zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ sattvāsattvākhyatoktā /<br/> sarvasaṃskṛṭasahabhūtvāt /<br/> uktā viprayuktāḥ /<br/> yaktūktaṃ janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ /<br/> kāraṇaṃ sahabhūścaiva sabhāgaḥ saṃprayuktakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mtshan nyid rnams sems can du ston pa dang sems can du ston pa ma yin par bshad ce na / 'dus byas thams cad dang lhan cig 'byung pa'i phyir ro / ldan ba ma yin pa rnams bshad zin to / rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni / skye ba bskyed bya skyed byed min / zhes gang bshad pa / rgyu rnams ni gang / rkyen rnams ni gang zhe na / byed rgyu lhan cig 'byung ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatrago vipākākhyaḥ ṣaḍvidho heturiṣyate /<br/> ṣaḍime hetavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal mnyam mtshungs par ldan pa dang / kun tu 'gro dang rnam smin dang / rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu 'dod / rgyu ni drug po 'di dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byed pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> svato 'nye kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ /<br/> saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati /<br/> avighnabhāvāvasthānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu / rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa chos thams cad ni chos 'dus byas kyi byed rgyu'i rgyu yin te / skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti jñānameṣāṃ vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtasya kāraṇaheturbhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa gang dag mi shes pa de la skye ba de dag shes pa de la mi skye'o zhes gsungs pas de dag skye ba la yang shes pa gegs byed la / skar ma rnams mthong ba la yang nyi ma'i 'od bgegs byed pa ma yin nam / ji ltar na rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa chos thams cad chos 'dus byas kyi byed rgyu yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpadyamānasyāvidhnabhāvenāvasthānāditi jñātavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir shes par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavettāvadutpattau vidhnakāraṇe samarthānāmavighnakāraṇāddhetutvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig skye ba la bgegs byed nus pa rnams ni bgegs mi byed pa'i phyir rgyu nyid du yang 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na spyod par byed pa'i mi 'tshe ba'i dbang du byas nas grong mi rnams bdag cag ni rje bos bde bar byas so zhes 'dzer blta bu yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau /<br/> asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bgegs byed par mi nus pa dper na chos thams cad skye ba la mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi skye ba'i chos can rnams lta bu dang gzugs med pa'i sems can gyi phung po skye ba la dmyal ba la sogs pa dag lta bu de go ji ltar na rgyu'i dngos po yin / de dag med du zin kyang de kho na bzhin du bgegs byed mi nus par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod par byed par mi nus bzhin du yang de skad du 'dzer ba yod pas 'dir dpe ni de nyid yin no / 'di ni spyir bstan pa yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti /<br/> yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti /<br/> tasyedamacodyam /<br/> yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byed rgyu'i rgyu gtso bo gang yin pa 'di ni bskyed par bya ba la yang nus / yod de dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig dang gzugs dag dang lus la zas dang myu gu la sogs pa la sa bon la sogs pa bzhin no / gang zhig 'di skad du gal te mi sgrib pa'i ngo pos chos thams cad rgyu dag yin no / ci'i phyir chos thams cad cig car skye bar mi 'gyur ro / srog gcod pa la sogs pa la yang gshed ma pa bzhin du thams cad de bsten par mi 'gyur zhes rgol bar byed pa de'i de ni klan kar mi rung ste / 'di ltar mi sgrib pa'i ngo bos chos thams cad rgyu yin par dam 'cha'i / byed pa po'i ngo bo ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvasyaiva kāraṇahetoḥ sarvotpattau sāmarthyamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re thams cad skyes pa la byed pa'i rgyu thams cad kyang nus pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā nirvāṇasyāpi cakṣurvijñānam /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste mya ngan las 'das pa yang mig gi rnam par shes pa la nus pa yod pa lta bu'o zhes zer ro / ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa des yid kyi rnam par shes pa dge ba dang mi dge ba skye la / des rim gyis phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i phyir rgyu rgyud pa'i sgo nas de yang rkyen du gyur pa'i phyir nus pa yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyasyāpi pratipattavyam /<br/> eṣā hi dik /<br/> uktaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gzhan la yang rtogs par bya ste / 'di ni phyogs tsam du zad do / byed pa'i rgyu bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahabhūrye mithaḥphalāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung gang phan tshun 'bras
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /<br/> katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan tshun zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig ste / chos gang dag phan tshun gyi 'bras bu yin pa de dag ni phan tshun lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu'o / dpe ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtavaccittacittānuvartilakṣaṇalakṣyavat /<br/> catvāri mahābhūtānyanyonyaṃ sahabhūhetuḥ /<br/> cittaṃ cittānuvarttināṃ dharmāṇāṃ te 'pi tasya /<br/> saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni lakṣyasya so 'pi taṣām /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung bzhin sems kyi rjes 'jug dang / sems dang mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bzhin / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag ni phan tshun lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no / sems ni sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i chos rnams kyi yin la de dag kyang sems kyi yin no / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams ni mtshan gzhi'i yin la de yang de dag gi yin te / de ltar na 'dus byas thams cad ni ci rigs par lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan tshun 'bras bu nyid med bzhin du chos ni mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin la de dag ni de'i ma yin pas kha bskang bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ke punarete cittānuvarttino dharmāḥ /<br/> caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /<br/> cittānuvarttinaḥ /<br/> sarvecittasaṃprayuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na / sems las byung dang sdom gnyis dang / sems dang de dag gi mtshan nyid / sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvarasteṣāṃ ca ye jātyādayaścittasya ca /<br/> ete dharmāścittānuvarttina ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa thams cad dang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang de dag dang sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa gang dag yin pa'i chos de dag ni sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamete cittamanuparivarttante /<br/> samāsataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ji ltar sems kyi rjes su 'jug ce na / mdor bsdu na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kālaphalādiśubhatādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus dang ni / 'bras sogs dge la sogs pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kālastāvaccitenaikotpādasthitinirodhatayā ekādhvapatitatvena ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig dus las ni sems dang lhan cig skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'gag pa gcig pa nyid dang dus gcig tu gtogs pa nyid kyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalādibhirekaphalavipākaniḥṣyandatayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu la sogs pas ni 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa dang / rgyu mthun pa gcig pa nyid kyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvakastvekaśabdaḥ sahārthe veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig ces bya ba'i sgra snga ma ni lhan cig pa'i don du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhatādibhiḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtacitte kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatayā /<br/> evaṃ daśabhiḥ kāraṇaiścittānuparivarttina ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba la sogs pas ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa nyid kyis te / de ltar na rgyu bcus sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra sarvālpa cittamaṣṭapañcāśato dharmāṇāṃ sahabhūhetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la sems nang na nyung ba ni chos lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśānāṃ mahābhūmikānāṃ cattvāriṃśatastallakṣaṇānāmaṣṭānāṃ ca svalakṣaṇānulakṣāṇānām /<br/> tasya punaścatuḥpañcāśaddharmāḥ sahabhūhetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa mang po pa bcu dang de dag gi mtshan nyid bzhi bcu dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad kyi yin no / de'i lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni chos lnga bcu rtsa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svānyanulakṣaṇāni sthāpayitvā /<br/> caturdaśetyapare /<br/> daśa mahabhūmikāḥ svānyeva ca lakṣaṇānīti /<br/> tadetanna varṇayanti /<br/> prakaraṇagrantho hyevaṃ virudhyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa rnams so / gzhan dag na re bcu bzhi yin te / sa mang po pa bcu dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag kho na'o zhes zer ro / de skad du ni mi brjod de / de ltar na rab tu byed pa'i gzhung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādduḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ /<br/> satkāyadṛṣṭekśca heturyadetat sthāpitami ti /<br/> ye tarhi tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ /<br/> yaktāvat sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ sahabhvapi tat /<br/> syāttu sahābhūrna sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ /<br/> dharmasyānulakṣaṇāni /<br/> tāni cānyonyam /<br/> anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt /<br/> na caitāḥ sahacariṣṇavaḥ pūrvamapyutpatteḥ paścādapīti /<br/> sarvamapyetat syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig tshogs la lta ba dang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skye ba dang rga ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa dag ma gtogs pa de dag las gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o /  / 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu yang yin pa ni ma gtogs pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro / kha che ba rnams na re'o na ni gang dag de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi zhes de skad du mi 'don pa de dag gis kyang de skad du gdon par bya ba 'am / yang na don gyis de ltar go bar bya'o zhes zer ro / re zhig gang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyus rgyu yin pa des ni lhan cig 'byung ba yang yin no / lhan cig 'byung ba yin la lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyus rgyu ma yin pa yang yod de / chos kyi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang de dag phan tshun dang sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams nyid dang de dag phan tshun dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thogs pa dang bcas pa phan tshun dang thogs pa med pa cung zad dang thams cad 'byung ba dag dang lta bu'o / thob pa dang ldan pa'i thob pa lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyang lhan cig 'byung ba yin la lhan cig 'byung pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te / 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa gcig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / de dag ni sems dang lhan cig spyod pa'i dang tshul can yang ma yin te sngar yang skye la phyis kyang skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de thams cad kyang rung mod kyi 'on kyang sa bon la sogs pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por grags pa rnams la tshul 'di mi snang bas ji ltar lhan cig 'byung pa'i chos rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa de brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā pradīpaprabhayoraṅkuracchāyayośca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mar me dang 'od dag dang myu gu dang grib ma dag lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti /<br/> itastarhi bhāvābhāvayostadvattvāt /<br/> etaddhi hetuhetumato lakṣaṇamācakṣater hetukāḥ /<br/> yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ci mar me 'od kyi rgyu yin nam / 'on te tshogs pa sngar byung ba kho na mar me 'od dang bcas pa skye ba'i rgyu yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya'o / 'o na ni yod dam med na de dag dang lhan cig de'i phyir rgyu smra ba rnams rgyu dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni de yin no zhes zer ro / gang zhig yod dam med na gang zhig nges par yod dam med pa de ni rgyu yin zhing cig shos ni rgyu dang ldan pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ /<br/> syāttāvatsahotpannānāṃ parasparaṃ tu katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung pa'i chos rnams kyang gcig yod na thams cad yod la gcig med na thams cad med pas rgyu de dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rigs pa yin no / re zhig lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni rung na phan tshun du go ji ltar rung / de nyid kyi phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni rgyur byas pa'i gzugs med na mi 'byung ba phan tshun dang 'byung ba rnams dang yang lhan cig der thal bar 'gyur la / sems kyi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa yang sems la sogs pa dang nger thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridaṇḍānyonyabalāvasthānavattarhi sahabhuvāṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ sidhyati /<br/> mīmāṃsyaṃ tāvadetat /<br/> kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni myu gu gsum phan tshun stobs kyis gnas pa bzhin du lhan cig 'byung ba rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'grub bo / re zhig ci 'di dag lhan cig 'byung ba'i stobs kyis gnas sam / 'on te tshogs pa snga ma'i dbang gis de ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya'o / de la gzhan yang srad bu 'am gzer bu 'am rten par byed pas yang cung zad yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgahetuḥ katamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgahetuḥ sadṛśāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal mnyam rgyu ni 'dra ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām /<br/> catvārastu na rūpasyetyapare /<br/> nyūnatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos 'dra ba rnams ni chos 'dra ba rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin te / 'di lta ste / dge ba'i phung po lnga po dag ni phan tshun dge ba rnams kyi yin no / nyon mongs pa can rnams ni nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi yin no / lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi yin no / gzhan dag na re lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni lnga po dag gi yin la / bzhi ni gzugs kyi ma yin te / dman pa dang stobs chung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kalalaṃ kalalādīnāṃ daśānāmavasthānām arvudāyo 'rvudādīnāmekaikāparhāsenaikasminnikāyasabhāge
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nur nur po ni nur nur po la sogs pa gnas skabs bcu po dag gi yin no / mer mer po la sogs pa ni ris mthun pa gcig la re re phri nas mer mer po la sogs pa'i yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyeṣu tu samānajātīyeṣu daśāpyavasthā daśānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa mthun pa gzhan dag tu ni gnas skabs bcu char yang bcu po dag gi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi'i dag la yang nas ni nas kyi yin la / s'a lu ni s'a lu'i yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati riti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gzugs kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gzugs yin par mi 'dod pa de dag la ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rgyu dang bdag po yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di 'dod pa la gnod par gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ sarve sadṛśānāṃ sabhāgahetaḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> svanikāyabhuvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'dra ba thams cad 'ang ba thams cad kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin nam zhe na / smras pa ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang ris sa pa'o / 'di dag la rang gi ris dang sa yod pas 'di dag ni rang gi ris dang sa pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca nikāyāḥ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvat bhāvanāprahātavyaḥ /<br/> nava bhūmayaḥ /<br/> kāmadhāturaṣṭau ca dhyānārūpyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ris ni lnga ste / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nas bsgom pas spang par bya pa'i bar ro / sa ni dgu ste / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ duḥkhadarśanaheyānāṃ sabhāgaheturnānyeṣām /<br/> evaṃ yāvat bhāvanāheyā bhāvanāheyānām /<br/> te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām /<br/> te 'pi na sarve /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la sdug bsngal mthong bas spang par bya ba rnams ni sdug bsngal mthong bas spar par bya ba rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin gyi gzhan dag gi ni ma yin no / de bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar du yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi yin no / de dag kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi yin la / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnams kyang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i yin pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa'i par dag kyang de'i sa pa'i rnams kho na'i yin gyi gzhan dag gi ni ma yin no / de dag kyang thams cad ni ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agrajāḥ /<br/> pūrvotpannāḥ paścimānāmutpannānutpannānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngar skyes pa rnams ni phyi ma skye ba dang ma skyes pa rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatā naiva sabhāgahetuḥ /<br/> evamatīte kuta etat āha /<br/> śāstrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa khon skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di dag las smras pa / bstan bcos las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgahetuḥ katamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba sngar byung ba rnams ni rang gi khams na dge ba'i rtsa ba phyis 'byung ba rnams dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus rgyu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamatītānyatītapratyutpannānām /<br/> atītapratyutpannānyanāgatānāmiti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yin no / 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams ni ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idapi śāstraṃ yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ /<br/> āha /<br/> na kadāciditi sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetvabhisandhivacanādadoṣaḥ eṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang chos gang gi rgyu'i yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na smras pa / nam yang ma yin no zhes 'byung ba 'di yang bstan bcos yin no / lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir de ni nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ na kadācinna heturiti /<br/> tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%"> / gang zhig chos ma 'ongs pa de yang skye pa'i tshe'i gnas skabs na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'gyur ba yin no / de'i phyir tha ma'i gnas skabs de las dgongs nas nam yang rgyu ma yin pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so snyam du sems pa de ni de'i lan du mi rung ste / 'di ltar chos de skye pa'i gnas skabs kyi sngon rol nas skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pa las phyis yin pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi /<br/> kasmādevamāha /<br/> yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam /<br/> yathā ceha tathā tatreti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang zhig chos gang gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba 'dri ba 'di yang yongs su rtogs pa 'dis res 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes brjod par nus na ci'i phyir 'di skad du gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes gsungs / der ji lta ba de bzhin 'dir yang brjod par bya la / 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin der yang brjod par bya'o zhes sgo gnyis su bstan par bya ba'i bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta /<br/> tasmāt pūrvaka evātra parihāraḥ sādhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta yin na yon tan ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur te / de lta na 'dir bstan bcos byed pa mi mkhas pa kho nar yid ches par 'gyur ro / de lta bas na 'dir lan snga ma kho na legs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhīdamuktam anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu sthāpitaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeśca heturiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang 'di skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang de dang mtshungs bar ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba ni yin la / 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no / ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin no zhes gsungs so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'di skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa zhes brjod par bya ba'am / yang na don gyis na de ltar go par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā iti /<br/> heturatra saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sahabhūhetuśca /<br/> phalaṃ puruṣakāraphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na btags pa'i bshad pa chos thams cad ni bzhi chen du nges pa yin te / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rten dang dmigs par nges so zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar dang 'dir rgyu ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung pa'i rgyu yin no / 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayaścakṣurādirālambanaṃ rūpādikamiti draṣṭavyam /<br/> nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten ni mig la sogs pa'o / dmigs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa yin no zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o / de lta na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pa las rgyu yin par 'gyur ba ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iṣyata evāvasthāṃ prati na dravyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs ni 'dod pa kho na yin gyi rdzas la ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avasthāphalalṃ hi sāmargyaṃ na dravyaphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshogs pa ni gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu can yin gyi / rdzas kyi 'bras bu can ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par smin pa'i rgyu bzhin du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma 'ongs pa yin na cir 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstre tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las de smos par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa eva hi phaladānagrahaṇakriyāsamarthastasyaiva grahaṇādadoṣaḥ /<br/> naitadasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu 'byin pa dang 'dzin par byed nus pa gang yin pa de kho na smos pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na / de ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niḥṣyandaphalena hi saphalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ /<br/> taccānāgatasyāyuktaṃ pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin na de yang ma 'ongs pa la rigs pa ma yin te / snga phyi med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cotpannamanāgatasya niṣyando yujyate /<br/> yathā 'tītaṃ varttamānasya /<br/> mā bhūddhetoḥ pūrvaṃ phalamiti /<br/> nāstyanāgataḥ sabhāgahetuḥ /<br/> vipākaheturapi evamanāgato na prapnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byung zin pa yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun par mi rung ste / dper na da lta'i 'das pa bzhin no / rgyu bas 'bras bu nga na mi rung bas skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa ni med do / de lta na rnams par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma 'ongs pa yin par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt /<br/> naitadasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu snga ba dang lhan cig pa mi rung ba'i phyir la / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la yang snga phyi med pa'i phyir ro zhe na / de ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgahetorvinā paurvāparyeṇa sadṛśaḥ sadṛśasya sabhāgaheturityanyonyahetutvādanyonyaniḥṣyandatā saṃprasajyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni snga phyi med par 'dra ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'dra ba yin bas phan tshun du rgyur gyur pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyu mthun pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nacānyonyaniḥṣyandatā yuktimatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan tshun rgyu mthun pa nyid du ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natveva vipākahetorvinā paurvāparyeṇānyonyahetuphalatā saṃprasajyate /<br/> bhinnalakṣaṇātvāddhetuphalayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni snga phyi med bzhin du yang de ltar phun tshun 'bras bu nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te / rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir do [*ro?]
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādavasthāvyavsthitaṃ eva sabhāgaheturlakṣaṇavyavasthitastupākaheturityanāgato 'pi na vāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni gnas skabs las rnam par gnas pa kho na yin la / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni mtshan nyid las rnam par gnas pa yin pas ma 'ongs pa yang mi bzlog go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ /<br/> anyo 'nyaṃ navabhūmistu mārgaḥ /<br/> sabhāgaheturityadhikāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rang gi sa pa yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa ci de ltar nges sam zhe na / de zag pa dang bcas pa la ni nges so / sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du / skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no / zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum dag gi lam gyi bden pa ni phan tshun du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni sa de dag tu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la / sa de pa dag gis bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir khams de dag tu gtogs pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ mānajātīyasyānyabhūmikasyāpi sabhāgaheturbhavati /<br/> sa punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bas na sa gzhan pa'i rigs mthun pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang yin no / de yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samaviśiṣṭayoḥ /<br/> nyūnasya heturbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin / chung ngu'i rgyu ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya /<br/> anutpādajñānamanutpādajñānasyaivānyaviśiṣṭabhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni de nyid ma 'ongs pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i khyad par can gyi rgyu yang yin no / mi skye ba shes pa ni khyad par can gzhan med pa'i phyir mi skye ba shes pa kho na'i yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣyamārgāstridhyekeṣām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig dag gi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpi mṛdvindriyamārgo mṛdutīkṣṇendriyamārgasya hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yang dbang po rtul po'i lam ni dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i lam gyi rgyu yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīkṣṇendriyamārgastīkṣṇendriyamārgasyaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po'i lam kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā śraddhānusāriśraddhādhimuktasamayavimukttamārgāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ caturṇāṃ dvayośca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni drug dang bzhi dang gnyis dag gi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmānusāriṣṭaprāptāsamayavimuktamārgāḥ trayāṇāṃ dvayorekasya /<br/> kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol pa'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi yin no / yang ji ltar sa gong ma pas 'og ma pa'i lam dang mnyam ba'am khyad par can yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyato hetūpacayataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra darśanādimārgāṇāṃ mṛdumṛdvādīnāṃ cottarottara hetūpacitatarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rgyus shin tu rgyas par byas pa ni mthong pa'i lam la sogs pa dang chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa gong nas gong du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapyekasantāne śraddhārnusārimārgayorasaṃbhavaḥ utpannastvanāgatasya hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud gcig la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dag mi srid mod kyi 'byung ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /<br/> netyāha /<br/> laukikā api hi /<br/> prayogajāstayoreva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci lam kho na mnyam pa dang khyad par can dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin nam zhe na smras pa ma yin te / 'jig rten pa dag kyang / sbyor byung de gnyis kho na'i yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavanti na nyūnasya /<br/> yathā katame ityāha /<br/> śrutacintāmayādikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam pa dang khyad par can dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin gyi dman pa'i ni ma yin no / dper ji lta bu zhe na smras pa / thos dang bsams byung la sogs pa'ang / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba sbyor ba las 'byung ba'i yon tan de dag kyang nyams pa dang khyad par can dag kho na'i rgyu yin gyi dman pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā kāmāvacarāḥ śrutamayāḥ śrutacintāmayānāṃ cintāmayācintāmayānām /<br/> bhāvanāmayābhāvāt /<br/> rūpāvacarāḥ śrutamayāḥ śrutabhāvanāmayānāṃ cintāmayābhāvāt /<br/> bhāvanāmayā bhāvanāmayānāmeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i thos pa las byung ba rnams ni thos pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin no / bsam pa las byung ba rnams ni bsams pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin te / bsgoms pa las byung ba ni med pa'i phyir ro / gzugs na spyod pa'i thos pa las byung ba rnams ni thos pa las byung ba dang bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin te / bsams pa las byung ba ni med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāvacarābhāvanāmayā bhāvanāmayānāmeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams ni bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams kho na'i yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang rnam pa dgu tha dad pa'i phyir chung ngu'i chung ngu dag ni thams cad kyi yin la / chung ngu'i 'bring po dag ni brgyad kyi yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ /<br/> kliṣṭā apyevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lugs ni de lta bu'o / skyes nas thob pa can gyi dge ba'i chos rnams ni rnam pa dgu po thams cad phan tshun du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin te / nyon mongs pa can rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anivṛtāvyākṛtāstu caturvidhāḥ /<br/> vipākajā airyapathikāḥ śailpasthānikāḥ nirmāṇacittasahajāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa 'am / bzo'i gnas pa dang sprul pa'i sems lhan cig skyes pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni go rims bzhin du bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis dang gcig dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no / sprul pa'i sems bsam gtan bzhi'i 'bras bu 'dod pa na spyod pa yang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra nottaradhyānaphalamadharadhyānaphalasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bsam gtan gong ma'i 'bras bu ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bu ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyābhisaṃskārikasya sabhāgahetorhīyamānaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /<br/> tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bad pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu mngon par 'du byed pa can gyi 'bras bu ni dman pa ma yin te / dper na s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām /<br/> sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ
