</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir zag pa med pa skyes pa zag pa med pa ma skyes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yod dam zhe na yod de / dper na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ma skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu dang khyad par can thams cad dman pa'i lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādekasantānaniyataḥ pūrvapratilabdho 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasya nahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gcig la nges pa'i zag pa med pa'i chos sngon thob pa phyis skyes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ma 'ongs pa dag sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i lta bu'o / 'di ltar 'bras bu snga ma 'am / skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ /<br/> syādavimātro nyūnasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i chos sngar skyes pa rnams zag pa med pa'i chos phyis skye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa yod dam zhe na yod de / chen po chung ngu'i lta bu ste / 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi /<br/> uktaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu gor ma las yongs su nyams pa 'bras bu 'og ma mngon du byed pa'i tshe dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i thob pa skad cig ma phyi ma dang lhan cig skyes pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i thob pa rnams kyi lta bu ste / dman pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so / skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayuktakahetustu cittacaittāḥ /<br/> evaṃ sati bhinnakālasantānajānāma pyanyonyasaṃprayuktakahetutvaprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> ekākārā lambanāstarhi /<br/> evamapi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> ekakālāstarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs ldan rgyu ni sems dag dang / sems byung / de lta na ni dus dang rgyud tha dad pa las skyes pa rnams phan tshun du mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro / 'o na ni rnam pa dang dmigs pa gcig la dag pa yin no / de lta na yang de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro / 'o na ni dus gcig pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām /<br/> tasmāttarhi /<br/> samāśrayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na zla ba tshes pa la sogs pa la lta ba'i lta bur rgyud tha dad pa las skyes pa rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur te / de lta bas na rten mtshungs pa can rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag la rten mtshungs pa yod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba de dag ni phan tshun du mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ /<br/> indriyakṣaṇo manovijñānatsaṃprayukṭānāṃ veditavyaḥ /<br/> yaḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sahabhūheturapi saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa ste / 'di lta ste / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten mig gi dbang po'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de nyid de dang mtshungs par ldan pa tshor ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yang yin pa lta bu ste / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi yid kyi skad cig ma yin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o / mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kenārthena sahabhūhetuḥ kena saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /<br/> anyonyaphalārthena sahabhūhetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang don gang gis na lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin / gang gis na mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gang yin zhe na / phan tshun 'bras bu'i don gyis na lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahasārthikānyonyabalamārgaprayāṇavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dron pa rnams phan tshun gyi stobs kyis lhan cig lam du 'gro ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcabhiḥ samatābhiḥ saṃprayogārthena saṃprayuktakahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa lngas mtshungs par ldan pa'i don gyis na mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmeva sārthikānāṃ samānānnapānādiparibhogakriyāprayogavat /<br/> ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ /<br/> uktaḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /<br/> sarvatragahetuḥ katamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dron pa de dag nyid zas la sogs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i bya ba la 'dra bar sbyor ba bzhin no / gcig med na yang thams cad mtshungs par mi ldan pas 'di ni de dag gi rgyu'i dngos po yin no / kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatragākhyaḥ klilṣṭānāṃ svabhūmau pūrvasarvagāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun 'gro zhes bya nyon mongs can / rnams kyi rang sar kun 'gro lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gis pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i chos sngar skyes pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos / phyi ma rnams kyi kun tu 'gro pa'i rgyu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tān punaḥ paścādanuśayanirdeśakośasthāna eva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang 'og nas phra rgyas bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas nyid nas bshad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatvenāyaṃ sabhāgahetoḥ pṛthak vyavasthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos kyi thun mong gi rgyu nyid yin bas na skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu las logs shig tu rnam par gzhan go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ris gzhan dag gi yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir te / de dag gi mthus ni ris gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa dag kyang skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimāryapudgalasyāpi kliṣṭā dharmāḥ sarvatragahetukāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'phags pa'i gang zag gi nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu las byung ba dag yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che ba rnams na re nyon mongs pa can gyi chos thams cad kyang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rgyu las byung ba dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā prakāraṇeṣūktaṃ darśanaprahātavyahetukāḥ dharmāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar rab tu byed pa dag las mthong bas spang par bya pa'i rgyu las byung pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti /<br/> avyākṛtahetukā dharmāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛtāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā akuśalāśceti /<br/> duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung du ma bstan pa'i chos 'dus byas rnams dang mi dge ba rnams so zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu can yin pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa yang yod de zhes bya ba nas rgyas par 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang chos de dag gi skye ba dang rga ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag ma gtogs pa de dag las gzhan pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate syāddharmo 'kuśalo 'kuśalahetuka eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na btags pa'i bshad pa mi dge ba'i chos mi dge ba'i rgyu can kho na yin pa yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de / 'phags pa'i gang zag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de las dang por nyon mongs pa can gyi sems pa mngon du byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aprahīṇahetumetat saṃdhāyoktam /<br/> darśanaprahātavyo hi tasyā hetuḥ prahīṇatvānnoktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rgyu ma spangs pa las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin gyi de'i rgyu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni spangs zin pa'i phyir ma gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaḥ sarvadagahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu bshang zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākahetuḥ katamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaheturaśubhāḥ kuśalāścaiva sāsravāḥ /<br/> akuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāśca dharmā vipākahetuḥ /<br/> vipākadharmatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang / dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na / mi dge pa rnams dang dge ba'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin te / rnam par smin pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādavyākṛtā dharmāḥ vipākaṃ na nirvarttayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam par smin pa 'grub par mi byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">durbalatvāt /<br/> pūti bījavat /<br/> kasmānnānāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stobs chung ba'i phyir te sa bon rul pa bzhin no / ci'i phyir zag pa med pa rnams ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇānabhiṣyanditatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sred pas mngon par ma brlan pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anabhiṣyanditasārabījavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par ma brlan pa'i sa bon grung po bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apratisaṃyuktā hi kiṃpratisaṃyuktaṃ vipākamabhinirvarttayeyuḥ /<br/> śeṣāstūbhayavidhatvānnirvarttayanti /<br/> sārābhiṣyanditabījavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ldan pa ma yin pa rnams gang dang ldan pa'i rnam par smin pa zhig mngon par 'grub par byed par 'gyur / lhag ma rnams ni rnam pa gnyi ga yin pa'i phyir 'grub par byed de sa bon grung po mngon par brlan pa bzhin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ji ltar shes par bya / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu zhig rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin nam / 'on te rnam par smin pa nyid rgyu yin pas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ vīpākajaṃ cakṣuriti etanna prāpnoti /<br/> atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ karmaṇo vipāka ityetanna prāpnoti /<br/> naiṣa doṣaḥ /<br/> ubhayathāpi yoga ityuktaṃ prāk /<br/> atha vipāka iti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> visadṛśaḥ pāko vipākaḥ /<br/> anyeṣāṃ tu hetūnāṃ sadṛśaḥ pākaḥ /<br/> ekasyobhayatheti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> naiva tu teṣāṃ pāko yuktaḥ /<br/> pāko hi nāma santatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phalaparyantaḥ /<br/> na ca sahābhūsaṃprayuktahetvoḥ santatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaṃ phalamasti /<br/> na cāpi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phalaparyanto 'sti /<br/> punaḥ punaḥ kuśalādyāsaṃsāraphalatvāt /<br/> kāmadhātāvekaskandhako vipākaheturekaphalaḥ pratyayastajjātyādayaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na cir 'gyur / gal te rnam par smin pa'i rgyu zhig rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin na ni mig gi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur ro / ci'i phyir zhe na / las las skyes pa'i phyir la las kyang rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro / 'on te rnam par smin pa nyid rgyu yin pas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin na ni las kyi rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur ro / ci'i phyir zhe na / rnam par smin pa ni rgyu yin pa'i phyir la rnam par smin pa yang las kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro / gnyi ga ltar yang rung ngo zhes sngar bshad zin to / yang rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / mi 'dra bar smin pa ni rnam par smin pa'o / 'dod pa'i khams na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu phung po gcig la 'bras bu gcig pa can ni thob pa rnams dang de dag gi skye ba la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ kāyavākkarma tajjātyādayaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po gnyis pa la 'bras bu gcig pa can ni lus dang ngag gi las dang de dag gi skye ba la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catuskandhaka ekaphalaḥ kuśalākuśalāścittacaittāḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po bzhi las 'bras bu gcig pa can ni sems dang sems las byung ba dge ba dang mi dge ba skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātāvekaskandhako vīpākaheturekaphalaḥ prāptirasaṃjñisamāpattiśca saha jātyādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu phung po gcig la rnam par smin pa gcig pa can ni thob pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po gnyis pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i rnam par rig byed skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catuskandhaka ekaphalaḥ kuśale cetasyasamāhite /<br/> pañcaskandhaka ekaphalaḥ samāhite
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po bzhi pa ni dge ba'i sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa na'o / phung po lnga pa ni mnyam par bzhag pa na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyadhātāvekaskandhako vipākaheturekaphalaḥ prāptirnirodhasamāpatiśca saha jātyādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i khams na rnam par smin pa'i rgyus phung po gcig la 'bras bu gcig pa can ni thob pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catuskandhakaḥ kuśalāścittacaittāḥ tajjātyādayaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po bzhi pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba dge ba rnams dang de dag gi skye ba la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi rnam par smin pa chos kyi skye mched gcig kho na rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las kyang yod de / gang gi srog gi dbang po yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi yid kyi skye mched yin pa de'i ni gnyis te / yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi reg bya'i skye mched yin pa yang de dang 'dra'o / gang gi lus kyi skye mched yin pa de'i ni gsum ste / lus dang reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yasya rūpagandharasāyatanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi gzugs dang dri dang ro'i skye mched dag yin pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ tasya catvāri cakṣuḥkāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi mig gi skye mched yin pa de'i ni bzhi ste / mig dang lus dang reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched rnams so / gang gi rna ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yasya śrotragrāṇajihvāyatanāni /<br/> asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sna dang lce'i skye mched dag yin pa yang de dang 'dra'o / gang gi rnam par smin pa lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang dgu dang bcu dang bcu gcig smin par 'gyur ba'i las de yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicitrāvicitraphalatvāt karmaṇo bāhyabījavat /<br/> tadyathā bāhyāni vījāni kānicidvicitraphalāni bhavanti /<br/> tadyathā padmadāḍimanyagrodhādīnām /<br/> kānicidavicitraphālāni tadyathā yavagodūmādīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi 'dras bu sna tshogs dang sna tshogs ma yin pa'i phyir phyi'i sa bon bzhin no / dper na phyi'i sa bon rnams la kha cig ni 'bras bu sna tshogs pa yin te / 'di lta ste padma dang bal po se'u dang shing n+ya gro dha la sogs pa dag gi lta bu'o / kha cig ni 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ma yin te / 'di lta ste / nas dang gro la sogs pa dag gi lta bu'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekādhvikasya karmaṇastraiyadhviko vipāko vipacyate /<br/> na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti /<br/> ekamekakṣanikasya bahukṣāṇiko nanu viparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dus gcig pa'i rnam par smin pa dus gsum pa rnam par smin pa ni mi 'gyur gyi las dus gnyis pa'i yang dus gcig pa ni ma yin te / rgyu bas 'bras bu ha cang nyung bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro / de bzhin du skad cig ma gcig pa'i skad cig ma du ma pa ni yin gyi bzlog pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya /<br/> pravāhāpekṣo hi vipākahetuḥ /<br/> atha ka eṣāṃ hetūnāmadhvaniyamaḥ /<br/> ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa ni las dang lhan cig tu rnam par smin pa yang ma yin la mjug thogs su yang ma yin te / mjug thogs kyi skad cig ma ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis drangs pa'i phyir ro / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu smin pa ni rgyu la ltos pa yin no / yang rgyu 'di dag gi dus nges pa gang zhe na / 'di dag gi dus nges par don gyis ni bshad mod kyi mdor byas nas ma bshad pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatragaḥ sabhāgaśca dvayadhvagau /<br/> atītapratyutpannāveva anāgatau na staḥ /<br/> uktaṃ cātra kāraṇam /<br/> tryadhvagā strayaḥ /<br/> sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetava strikālāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir mdor byas te / kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa dang 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba kho na yin gyi ma 'ongs pa dag ni med do / 'dir gtan tshigs ni bshad zin to / gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa / lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag ni dus gsum pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāraṇahetustu kālaniyamānupadarśanāt /<br/> sarvādhvaka ścādhvaviprayuktaśca veditavyaḥ /<br/> uktā hetavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byed rgyu'i rgyu ni dus nges pa ma bstan pas dus thams cad pa dang dus dang bral bar yang rig par bya'o / rgyu rnams bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punastatphalaṃ yasyaite hetavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu de dag gang gi yin pa'i 'bras bu de dag gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskṛtaṃ savisaṃyoga phalaṃ /<br/> phalaṃ dharmāḥ /<br/> katame /<br/> saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti śāstram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas bral bcas 'bras bu yin / bstan bcos las / 'bras bu'i chos rnams gang zhe na / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad dang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o zhes 'byung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ /<br/> saṃskṛtasyaiva dharmasya hetuphale bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni 'dus ma byas 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de gang gi 'bras bu yin pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur la / rgyu yin pa'i phyir de gang gi rgyu yin pa'i 'bras bur yang 'gyur ro / 'dus byas kho na la rgyu dang 'bras bu dag yod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsaṃskṛtasya te /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas la de dag med / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍvidhahetvasaṃbhavāt pañcavidhaphalāsaṃbhavācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu rnam pa drug mi srid pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu rnam pa lnga mi srid pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇaheturneṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir lam 'bral ba'i byed rgyu'i rgyur mi 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat /<br/> kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam /<br/> tadbalena prāpteḥ /<br/> prāptireva tarhi mārgasya phalaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> tasyāmeva tasya sāmarthyānna visaṃyogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar de ni skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor rnam par gzhag pa yin na 'dus ma byas ni skye ba dang ldan pa ma yin no / da ni de gang gi 'am ji ltar na 'bras bu yin zhe na / lam gyi 'bras bu yin te / de'i stobs kyis 'thob pa'i phyir ro / 'o na ni de de kho na la nus pa'i phyir thob pa kho na lam gyi 'bras bu yin gyi bral ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hysya prāptau sāmarthyamanyathā visaṃyoge
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa la yang de'i nus pa gzhan la / bral ba la yang gzhan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasya prāptau sāmarthyam /<br/> utpādanāt /<br/> kathaṃ visaṃyoge /<br/> prapaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa la de ji ltar nus she na bskyed pa'i phyir ro / bral ba la ji ltar zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānna tāvadasya mārgaḥ kathañcidapi hetuḥ /<br/> phalaṃ cāsya visaṃyogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob par byed pa'i phyir ro / de lta bas na re zhig lam ni ji ltar yang 'di'i rgyu ma yin gyi bral ba ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāsatyadhipatiphale kathamasaṃskṛtaṃ kāraṇahetuḥ /<br/> utpattyanāvaraṇabhāvena kāraṇahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bdag po'i 'bras bu yang med na go ji ltar na 'dus ma byas byed rgyu'i rgyu yin zhe na / skye ba la mi sgrib pa'i dngos pos byed rgyu'i rgyu yin gyi 'di la 'bras bu yod pa ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cāsya phalamastyadhvavinirmuktasya phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus las grol ba la 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang smin pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hi kvacidasaṃskṛtaṃ bhagavatā heturityuktam /<br/> uktaṃ tu paryāyeṇa heturiti sautrāntikāḥ /<br/> kathamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams na re / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang 'dus ma byas rgyu yin no zhes ma gsungs kyi / rgyu ma yin no zhes rnam grangs kyis gsungs so / ji ltar gsungs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye hetavo ye pratyayā rūpasyotpādāya te 'pyanityāḥ /<br/> anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam bhaviṣyati /<br/> evaṃ yāvaddhi vijñānamiti /<br/> evaṃ tarhi vijñānasyālamabanapratyayo 'pyasaṃskṛtaṃ na prāpnoti /<br/> utpādāyetyavadhāraṇāt /<br/> prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs skyed pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin na rgyu dang rkyen mi rtag pa dag la brten nas byung ba'i gzugs lta rtag par ga la 'gyur / rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / de lta na 'o na ni 'dus ma byas rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rkyen du yang mi 'gyur ro / skyes pa'i zhes dkar ba'i phyir 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye hetavo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā /<br/> ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na zhes gsungs kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na zhes ni mi gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyaṃ syāt

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi punardravyamevāsaṃskṛtamiṣyeta kiṃ syāt /<br/> kiṃ ca punaḥ syāt /<br/> vaibhāṣikapakṣaḥ pālitaḥ syāt /<br/> devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa tasyeti vyavadiśyate /<br/> tasya tarhi prāptiniyame ko hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po gzhan nyid yin na yang nyon mongs pa gang gi thob pa chad nas 'gog pa gang thob pa de de'i yin no zhes tha snyad gdags so / 'o na de thob par 'dod pa'i rgyu gang zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaprāpto bhikṣurityuktaṃ sūtre /<br/> tatra kathamabhāvasya prāptiḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las mthong pa'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na med pa thob par rung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratipakṣalābhena kleśapunarbhavotpādātyantaviruddhāśraya lābhāt prāptaṃ nirvāṇamityucyate /<br/> āgamaścāpyabhāvamātraṃ dyotayati /<br/> evaṃ hyāha /<br/> yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati sandhiranutpādo 'prādurbhāvaḥ /<br/> etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa miti /<br/> kimevaṃ neṣyate nāsmin prādurbhavbatītyato 'prādurbhāva iti /<br/> asamarthāmetāṃ saptamīṃ paśyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyen po thob pas nyon mongs pa dang yang srid pa'i skye ba dang shin tu 'gal ba'i rten thob pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa zhes bya'o / lung las kyang dngos po med pa tsam nyid du brjod par mdzad de / 'di skad du sdug bsngal 'di ma lus par spangs pa / nges par spangs pa / byang bar 'gyur ba / zad pa / 'dod chags dang bral ba / 'gog pa / rnam par zhi ba / nub pa / sdug bsngal gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyong ba med pa / len pa med pa / 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste / phung po thams cad nges par spangs pa / sred pa zad pa / 'dod chags dang bral ba / 'gog pa / mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni zhi ba'o / 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes gsungs so / 'dir yin na 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba de ltar ci ste mi 'dod ce na / bdun pa 'di ni nus pa med par lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimuktaṃ bhavati /<br/> nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt /<br/> atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ /<br/> ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir yin na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya pa ji skad du bshad pa yin / gal te yod na zhes bya bar sbyar na ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni mi rtag pa'i phyir rtag tu mi 'byung ba kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro / 'on te thob na zhes bya bar sbyar na ni gang kho nas de 'thob par yongs su rtog pa de nyid yod dam thob na sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar 'dod par gyis shig / de ltar na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradyotasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar / de yi sems kyi rnam par thar / zhes gsungs pa'i dpe 'di yang legs par drangs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti /<br/> abhidharme 'pi coktam avastukā dharmāḥ katame /<br/> asaṃskṛtā dharmā iti /<br/> avastukā aśarīrā asvabhāvā ityuktaṃ bhavati /<br/> nāsyāyamarthaḥ /<br/> kastarhi /<br/> pañcavidhavastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mar me shi ba med pa ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems kyi rnam par thar pa yang de dang 'dra'o / chos mngon pa las kyang dngos po med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dag yin no zhes gsungs te / dngos po med pa ni lus med pa dang rang gi ngo bo med pa ni zhes bshad pa yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / dngos po ni rnam pa lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastuneti /<br/> ālambanavastu /<br/> yathoktaṃ sarvadharmajñeyā jñānena yathāvastveti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni ji skad du de dngos po gang zhig thob pa'i dngos po de dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / dmigs pa'i dngos po ni ji skad du chos thams cad dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas shes par bya ba yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃyogavastu /<br/> yathoktaṃ yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ldan pa'i dngos po ji skad du dngos po gang la rjes su chags pa'i kun nas dkris pa dang ldan pa de yang khong khro ba'i kun nas bkris pa dang yang ldan no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetuvastu yathoktaṃ savastukā dharmāḥ katame /<br/> saṃskṛtā dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu'i dngos po ni ji skad du dngos po dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parigrahavastu /<br/> yathoktaṃ kṣatravastu gṛhavastviti /<br/> tadatra heturvastuśabdenoktastasmādastyevāsaṃskṛtaṃ dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti /<br/> gataṃ tāvadetat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su gzang ba'i dngos po ni ji skad du zhing gi dngos po dang khyim gyi dngos po zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / de la 'dir ni rgyu'i dngos po'i sgrar gsungs pa yin te / de lta bas na 'dus ma byas rdzas su yod pa kho na yin la de la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni med do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ /<br/> vipākaphalamantyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig de ni rdzogs so / yang 'bras bu 'di dag las 'bras bu gang zhig rgya gang gi yin zhe na / rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaheturantye 'bhihitatvāt antyaḥ /<br/> tasya vipākaphalam /<br/> pūrvasyādhipataṃ phalam /<br/> kāraṇahetuḥ pūrvamuktatvāt pūrvaḥ /<br/> tasyādhipajaṃ phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni tha mar bstan pa'i phyir tha ma ste / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni de yin no / bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin / byed rgyu'i rgyu ni dang par bstan pa'i phyir dang po ste bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i yin no / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni bdag po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇāvasthitasya kimādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sgrib pa'i dngos po tsam du gnas pa go ci zhig dbang byed ce na / de nyid dbang byed pa yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadeva aṅgībhāvo 'pi cāsti kāraṇahetostadyathā pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣudaśānāmāyatanānāṃ bhājanaloke ca karmaṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byed rgyu'i rgyu la skyed pa'i dngos po yang yod de / 'di lta ste rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag la skye mched bcu lta bu dang snod kyi 'jig rten la las rnams lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrotrādīnāmapyasti cakṣurvijñānotpattau pāraṃparyeṇādhipatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rna ba la sogs pa la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa bskyed pa la brgyud pas dbang byed pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrutvā draṣṭukāmatotpatte rityevamādi yojyam /<br/> sabhāga sarvatragayorniṣyandaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos nas lta bar 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o / rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sadṛśaphalatvādanayorniḥṣyandaphalam /<br/> pauruṣaṃ dvayoḥ /<br/> sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvoḥ puruṣakāraphalam /<br/> puruṣabhāvavyatirekāt puruṣakāraḥ puruṣaṃ eva /<br/> tasya phalaṃ pauruṣam /<br/> ko 'yaṃ puruṣakāro nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gnyis dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no / skyes bu pa ni gnyis kyi yin / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi yin no / skyes bu'i ngo bo las mi gzhan pa'i phyir skyes bu byed pa ni skyes bu nyid yin no / de'i 'bras bu ni skyes bu yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya dharmasya yat kāritram /<br/> puruṣakāra iva hi puruṣakāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes bu byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na / chos gang gi byed pa gang yin pa de skyes bu'i byed pa lta bu ni skyes bu byed pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā kākajaṅghā oṣadhirmattahastī manuṣya iti /<br/> kimanyeṣāmapyasti puruṣakāraphāmutāho dvayoreva /<br/> anyeṣāmapyastyanyatra vipākahetoḥ /<br/> yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati /<br/> na caivaṃ vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na sman bya rog rkang dang mi glang po che myos pa zhes bya ba bzhin no / ci gzhan dag la yang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yod dam / 'on te gnyis kho na'i yin zhe na / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa gzhan dag la yang yod de / 'di ltar skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang de ma thag tu 'byung ba yin na rnam par smin pa ni de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāpyasti viprakṛṣṭapuruṣakāraphalam /<br/> yathā karṣakāṇāṃ sasyamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de la yang skyes bu'i byed pa'i 'bras bu'i skal ba ni yod do / dper na zhing pa rnams kyi 'bras bu lta bu'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam /<br/> vipāko 'vyākṛto dharmaḥ /<br/> anivṛtāvyākṛto hi dharmaḥ vipākaḥ /<br/> asattvākhyo 'pi syādata āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'di ni ci yin / bdag po'i 'bras bu'i bar du ci zhig yin zhe na / rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos / rnam par smin pa ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i chos yin no / sems can du ston pa ma yin ba yang yod pas de'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvākhyaḥ /<br/> aupacayiko 'pi syāt naiḥṣyandiko 'pyat āha /<br/> vyākṛtodbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can brjod ces bya ba smos so / rgyas pa las byung ba dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yang yod pas de'i phyir / lung bstan phyis byung zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalākuśalaṃ hi vipākaṃ prati vyākaraṇādvyākṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung du bstan pas lung du bstan pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig de las dus phyi ma la 'byung zhing de ma thag tu ma yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadvipākasya lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādasattvākhyo 'rthaḥ karmajo na vipākaḥ /<br/> sādhāraṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'i don las las skyes pa rnam par smin pa ma yin nam zhe na / thun mong ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyo 'pi hi tattathaiva paribhoktuṃ samarthaḥ /<br/> asādhāraṇastu vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin du yongs su spyad par nus so / rnam par smin pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyanyakṛtasya karmaṇo 'nyo vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyis byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gzhan gyis myong bar ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhipatiphalaṃ kasmāt pratisaṃvedayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag po'i 'bras bu ci'i phyir myong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sādhāraṇakarmasaṃbhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thun mong gi las las byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niḥṣyando hetusadṛśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetoryaḥ sadṛśo dharmaḥ sa niṣyandaphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu dang 'dra ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā sabhāgasarvatragahetvoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu'i 'bras bu yang 'dra ba yin na go ci'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu kho nar mi 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar de ni sa dang nyon mongs pa can las 'dra ba yin gyi / rnam pa las kyang 'dra ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig rnam pa las kyang 'dra ba de ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin par khas len pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate /<br/> prathamā koṭirasarvatragaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ /<br/> dvitīyā 'nyanaikāyikaḥ sarvatragahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig gang gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa de kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu yang yin nam zhe na / mu bzhir bya ste / mu dang po ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni kun tu 'gro ba ma yin pa'o / gnyis pa ni ris gzhan pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyaikanaikāyikaḥ sarvatragahetuḥ /<br/> caturthyatānākārānsthāpayitveti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni ris gcig pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu'o / bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">visaṃyogaḥ kṣayo dhiyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bral ba blo yis zad pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayo nirodhaḥ /<br/> dhīḥ prajñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad pa ni 'gog pa'o / blo ni shes rab ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenā pratisaṃkhyā nirodho visaṃyogaphalamityuktaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadvalājjāyate yattatphalaṃ puruṣakārajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi stobs kyis gang skye ba'i / 'bras de skyes bu byed las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na sa 'og ma pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis gong ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i zag pa med pa dang bsam gtan gyi sems kyi sprul pa'i sems so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisaṃkhyānirodhastu yadvalāt prāpyata iti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni gang gi stobs kyis 'thob pa zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apūrvaḥ saṃskṛtasyaiva saṃskṛto 'dhipateḥ phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni / 'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvotpannādanyaḥ saṃskṛto dharmaḥ saṃskṛtasyaiva sarvasyādhipatiphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngar byung ba las gzhan pa'i 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'dus byas thams cad kyi bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puruṣādhipatiphalayoḥ kiṃ nānā kāraṇam /<br/> kartuḥ puruṣakāraphalam /<br/> akarturapyadhipatiphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po'i yin no / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i yang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā śilpini śilpaṃ puruṣakāraphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / bzo bo rnams kyi bzo ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yang yin la bdag po'i 'bras bu yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyeṣāmadhipatiphalameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag gi ni bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā /<br/> vartamānāḥ phalaṃ pañca gṛhṇanti /<br/> nātītāḥḥ pratigṛhītatvānnāpyanāgatā niṣpuruṣakāratvāt /<br/> kāraṇaheturapyevam /<br/> sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate /<br/> dvau prayacchataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rgyu 'di dag las rgyu gang zhig dus gang du 'bras bu 'dzin tam 'byin ce na / lnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin / yongs su bzung zin pa'i phyir 'das pa rnams kyang ma yin la skyes bu byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang ma yin no / byed rgyu'i rgyu yang de dang 'dra mod kyi de ni 'bras bu dang bcas par ma nges pas ma brjod do / gnyis ni rab tu 'byin par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetū varttamānau phalaṃ prayacchataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag ni da ltar 'bras bu 'byin par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samānakālameva hyanayeḥ phaladānagrahaṇam /<br/> varttamānābhyatītau dvau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gnyis kyi 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang 'byin pa ni dus mnyam pa kho na yin no / da ltar gyi dang 'das pa dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalaṃ prayacchataḥ sabhāgasarvatragahetū /<br/> yuktaṃ tāvadyadatītāviti /<br/> atha kathaṃ varttamānau niṣyandaphalaṃ prayacchataḥ /<br/> samanantaranivarttanāt /<br/> nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ /<br/> phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu 'byin par byed de / skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dag go / re zhig gang 'das pa dag ni rigs ni da ltar gyi dag go / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byin ce na / mjug thogs su bsgrub pa'i phyir te / 'bras bu grub na ni de dag kyang 'das pa yin la 'bras bu yang byung zin pas yang de nyid mi 'byin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras bu 'dzin la mi 'byin pa yod dam zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni dge ba'i rtsa bdag kun tu gcod pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi nyid mtshams sbyor bas thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu vaktavyam /<br/> syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du de dag nyid kyis nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no / gsum pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu ma chad pa'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyatānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalasya tu prathamā koṭiḥ /<br/> kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate /<br/> evaṃ tu vaktavyam /<br/> syāttā eva parihīyamāṇasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i mu dang po ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral pa thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa'o / gnyis pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pas thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa'o / 'di skad du de dag nyid kyis yongs su nyams pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā kāmāvītarāgasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral pa'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyatānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtasyāpyarhattvaprāptiparihāṇito yathāyogaṃ yojyam /<br/> anivṛtāvyākṛtasya paścātpādakaḥ /<br/> yāstāvat dadāti pratigṛhṇātyapi saḥ /<br/> syāt pratigṛhṇāti na dadātyarhataścaramāḥ skndhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i yang de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang yongs su nyams pa las ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i ni tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste / re zhig 'byin pa gang yin pa ni 'dzin pa yang yin no / 'dzin pa las mi 'byin pa yang yod de / dgra bcom pa'i phung po tha ma rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sālambananiyamena tu kṣaṇaśaḥ /<br/> kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /<br/> catuṣkokṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i nges pas ni skad cig re re la ste / dge ba'i skal pa mnyam pa'i 'bras bu 'dzin la mi 'byin pa zhes bya ba mu bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can nam lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā viparyayāt /<br/> tṛtīyā kuśalacittānantaraṃ kuśalameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni bzlog pa'o / gsum pa ni dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyatānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamakuśalādayo 'pi yojyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punaḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar na 'bras bu gzung ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya bījabhāvopagamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i sa bon gyi dngos por nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eko 'tītaḥ prayacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig ni 'das pas 'byin par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaheturatīta eva phalaṃ prayacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni 'das pa kho nas 'bras bu 'byin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar lhan cig gam de ma thag tu rnam par smin pa ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaranye caturvidhaṃ phalamāhuḥ /<br/> pratiṣṭhāphalam /<br/> yathā jalamaṇḍalaṃ vāyumaṇḍalasya yāvattṛṇādayaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag ni 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhig tu yang 'chad de / rten gyi 'bras bu ni / 'di lta ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor lta bu nas sa gzhi'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i bar lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogaphalam /<br/> yathā 'śubhāyā yāvadanutpādajñānam /<br/> sāmagrīphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste mi sdug pa nas mi skye ba shes pa'i bar lta bu'o / tshogs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa dag gi mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāphalam /<br/> yathā rūpāvacarasya cittasya nirmāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste gzugs na spyod pa'i lam gyi sprul pa'i sems lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etattu puruṣakārādhipatiphalayorantarbhūtam /<br/> uktā hetavaḥ phalāni ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di thams cad ni skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag gi khongs su 'dus so / rgyu rnams dang 'bras bu rnams bshad zin to / de la chos gang zhig rgyu dag du zhig gis skyed par byed ce na smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ /<br/> ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ /<br/> vipākavarjyāḥ avyākṛtāḥ prathamānāsravakṣaṇavarjyāśca kuśalā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor bsdu na chos ni rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag yin te / 'di lta ste chos nyon mongs pa can rnams dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams dang zag pa med pa'i dbang po rnams dang de dag gi lhag ma rnams so / lhag ma yang gang dag yin zhe na / rnam par smin pa las ma gtogs pa'i lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang zag pa med pa'i skad cig ma dang po ma gtogs pa'i dge ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete caturvidhā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭā vipākajāḥ śeṣāḥ prathamāryā yathākramam /<br/> vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes / lhag dang dang po 'phags rim bzhin / rnam smin kun 'gro de gnyis dang / skal mnyam ma gtogs lhag las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos nyon mongs pa can rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa lhag ma lnga las skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams ni kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu ma gtogs pa lhag ma lnga po kho na las skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu de dag ma gtogs pa lhag ma bzhi las skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i dang po rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu de dag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa lhag ma gsum las skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katame ime dharmāścaturvidhā nirdiṣṭā ityāha /<br/> cittacaittāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos rnam pa bzhi po bstan pa de dag gang yin snyam pa la / sems dang sems las byung ba yin zhes bya ba smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha /<br/> tathā 'nye 'pi saṃprayuktakavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang dag sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang gzugs can gyi chos de dag ji lta bu zhe na / mtshungs ldan ma gtogs gzhan de bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gcig po ma gtogs pa chos nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa gzhan yang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kliṣṭāścatubhryo vipākajāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nyon mongs pa can rnams dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams ni bzhi las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāstribhyaḥ prathamānāsravā dvābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams ni gsum las so / zag pa med pa'i dang po ni gnyis las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekahetusaṃbhūto nāsti dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gcig las byung ba'i chos ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpto hetuvistaraḥ /<br/> pratyayāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu rgya cher bshad pa rdzogs so / rkyen rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāraḥ pratyayā uktāḥ /<br/> kvavoktāḥ /<br/> sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen ni bzhi po dag tu gsungs / gang nas gsungs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catasraḥ pratyayatāḥ /<br/> hetupratyayatā samanantarapratyayatā ālambanapratyayatā adhipatipratyayatā ceti /<br/> pratyayajātiḥ pratyayatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las rkyen nyid ni bzhi ste rgyu'i rkyen nyid dang de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid dang dmigs pa'i rkyen nyid dang bdag po'i rkyen nyid do zhes gsungs so / rkyen du 'dra ba ni rkyen nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> hetvākhyaḥ pañca hetavaḥ /<br/> kāraṇahetuvarjyāḥ paṇyca hetavo hetupratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rgyu zhes bya ba rgyu lnga yin / byed rgyu'i rgyu ma gtogs pa rgyu lnga ni rgyu'i rkyen yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittacaittā acaramā utpannāḥ samanantaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems byung skyes pa rnams / tha ma yin mtshungs de ma thag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhataḥ paścimānapāsyotpannāścittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /<br/> samaścāyamanantaraśca pratyaya iti samanantarapratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa'i tham ma gtogs pa sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin te / rkyen 'di ni mtshungs pa yang yin la de ma thag pa'i yang yin pas mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir mi mnyam par 'byung ba'i phyir gzugs ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi mjug thogs su res 'ga' ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa 'byung bas gzugs mngon du 'gyur ba 'chol pa yin no / mtshungs pa de ma theg pa'i rkyen ni 'chol pa ma yin no / btsun pa dbyig bshes na re rgyas pa las byung ba'i gzugs kyi rgyud gcig ma 'gags pa kho nar gnyis pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alpabahutarotpatteriti bhadantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun ba na re ches mang ba dang nyung du 'byung ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadāciddhi mahato rūpādalpamutpadyate /<br/> tadyathā palālarāśerbhasma /<br/> kadācidalpādvahūtpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni gzugs mang po las nyung du 'byung ste / dper na sog ma'i thal ba lta bu'o / res 'ga' ni nyung du las mang po 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na shing pa ta'i sa bon chung du las rim gyis yal ga du ma skye ba dang ldan pa'i shing n+ya gro dha'i bar lta bu'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cāsti caittānā mapyalpabahutarotpattiḥ /<br/> kuśalākuśalāvyākṛteṣu cittesu savitarkasavicārādau ca samādhitraye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dag dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum la chos mang ba dang nyung du 'byung ba ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti jātyantaraṃ prati na svajātim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs gzhan la ni yod kyi rang gi rigs la ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi kadācidvahutarā vedanotpadyate saṃjñādayo vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam yang tshor ba'am 'du shes la sogs pa ches mang du 'byung ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ svajātereva samanantarapratyayo bhavati /<br/> naitadasti /<br/> sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam /<br/> santānasabhāgikāstu manyante svajātereva samanantarapratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci rang gi rigs kho na'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin nam zhe na / de ni ma yin te / 'dir ni tshogs mtha' dag kho na tshogs mtha' dag gzhan gyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin gyi / 'dir ni tshor ba la sogs pa'i rdzas nyung ngu las tshor ba la sogs pa'i rdzas mang po 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de tsam zhig bshad par zad do /  / rgyud 'dra ba dag ni rang gi rigs kho na'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin te / sems kyang sems kho na'i yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eveti vistaraḥ /<br/> yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti /<br/> tadetanna vatsryate /<br/> prathamānāsravacittānutpattiprasaṅgat cittaviprayuktā api saṃskārāḥ /<br/> ata eva vyākulasaṃmukhībhāvānna samanantarapratyayastraivātukāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ yugapat saṃmukhībhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba yang tshor ba kho na'i yin no snyam du rgyas par sems shing gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni sngon 'gags pa'i nyon mongs pa yin te / dper na ldang ba'i sems kyi 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems lta bu'o zhes zer te / de skad du ni mi brjod do / ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams kyang 'chol bar mngon du gyur pa de nyid kyi phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin te / khams gsum pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams cig car mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādanāgato neṣyate samanantarapratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir ma 'ongs pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du mi 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyākulatvādanāgatasyādhvanaḥ pūrvottaratā 'bhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs ba'i dus ni 'chol ba yin pa'i phyir te / snga phyi med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti /<br/> atītasāṃpratānumānāt /<br/> atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ /<br/> idaṃ cāpi saṃpratyevañjātīyakaṃ karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa che ge mo zhig gi mjug tu ma 'ongs pa 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya bar ji ltar mkhyen ce na / 'das pa dang da ltar gyi las rjes su dpag pa'i phyir te / bcom ldan 'das kyis las 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di lta bu 'am chos las chos skyes so zhes bya bar 'das pa'i dus gzigs la / da lta'i las 'di yang de lta bu yin pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti /<br/> nacānyat jñānamānumānikaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di las kyang rnam par smin pa de lta bu'am / chos las chos skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen la / de'i mkhyen pa de yang rjes su dpag pa las byung ba yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti /<br/> evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang da ltar las rjes su dpag nas ma 'ongs pa'i rdzas 'chol pa rnams mngon sum du brtags te / gang zag 'dis las 'di lta bu byas pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu 'di yongs su bzung ngo zhes bya bar mkhyen to zhes grag go / de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' ma gzigs par phyi ma'i mtha' mi mkhyen par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarāhuḥ /<br/> phalacihnabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ santatau cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣo 'sti yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re sems can rnams kyi rgyud la 'bras bu'i rtags su gyur pa sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi khyad par zhig yod de / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs nas bsam gtan nam mngon par mkhyen pa mngon du mdzad bzhin du yang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī /<br/> tasmātsarvamicchāmātreṇa bhagavān jānātīti sautrāntikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams na re di ltar na bcom ldan 'das mtshan mkhan kho na yin par 'gyur gyi mngon sum du mdzad pa ni ma yin no / de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das ni bzhed pa tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">acintyo hi buddhānāṃ buddhiviṣaya ityuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa'i go rims nges par gnas pa med na ci'i phyir chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa kho na skye'i gzhan ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su zad pa shes pa kho na skye'i gzhan ma yin pa'i bar du yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya yatpratibaddha utpādaḥ sa tasyānantaramutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gang la rag las te skye ba de ni de'i mjug thogs su skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā vījādīnāmaṅkurādayo vināpi samanantarapratyayeneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen med bzhin du yang sa bon la sogs pa'i myu gu la sogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādarhataścaramāścittacaittā na samanantarapratyayaḥ /<br/> anyacittāsaṃbandhanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tham rnams mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin zhe na / sems gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'gags ma thag pa'i sems yid yin no zhes bya ba de ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir sems tha ma yid du yang mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayabhāvapratibhāvitaṃ mano na kāritraprabhāvitamityastyevāśrayabhāvaḥ /<br/> kāraṇāntaravaikalyāttu vijñānāntaraṃ notpadyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid ni rten gyi dngos pos rab tu phye ba yin gyi / byed pas rab tu phye ba ni ma yin pas rten ni yod pa nyid kyi rgyu ma tshang bas rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skye ba kho nar zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no / des chos gang 'bras bur gzung ba de ni chos thams cad dam srog chags thams cad kyis kyang ji ltar yang mi skye bar dgag par mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye dharmāścittasamanantarāścittanirantarā api te /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dag sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin pa de dag sems kyi de ma thag pa can yang yin nam zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i sems dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu gnyis pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi skye ba la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu gsum pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu bzhi pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dang ldang ba'i sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye dharmāścittasamanantarāḥ samāpattinirantarā api te /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dag sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin pa de dag snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yin nam zhe na / mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa dang bzhi pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni dang po dang gnyis pa dag go / dang po dang gnyis pa gang dag yin ba de dag ni gsum pa dang bzhi pa gang dag yin par bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīṃ dūrāntaravicchinnaṃ vyutthānacittaṃ samāpatticittasya samanantaramityucyate /<br/> cittāntarāvyavahitatvāt /<br/> uktaḥḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar ldang ba'i sems yun ring mo zhig tu chad pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa zhes bya zhe na / sems gzhan gyis mchod pa'i phyir ro / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanaṃ sarvadharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathāyogaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya sasaṃprayogasya rūpam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci rigs par mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i ni gzugs so
