</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrotravijñānasya śabdaḥ /<br/> grāṇavijñānasya gandhaḥ /<br/> jihvāvijñānasya rasaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ni sgra'o / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ni dri'o / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ro'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavijñānasya spraṣṭavyam /<br/> mannovijñānasya sarvadharmāḥ /<br/> yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya nālambanam /<br/> anālambyamāno 'pi tathālakṣaṇatvād
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni reg bya'o / yid kyi rnam bar shes ba ni chos thams cad do / chos gang zhig chos gang gi dmigs pa yin pa'i chos de ni mi dmigs kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir nam yang dmigs pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'nidhyamānamapīndhanamucyate kāṣṭhādikaṃ tathālakṣāṇatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na shing la sogs pa mi sreg kyang de lta ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bud shing zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ /<br/> kimāśrayaniyamenāpi niyatāḥ /<br/> omityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos skye mched dang rdzas dang skad cig ma des pas dmigs pa la skad cig bdag nyid ji lta bar nges pa 'di dag ci rten nges pas kyang nges pa zhig yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpannāstvāśrayasahitā anutpannā hyatītā āśrayaviśliṣṭāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smras pa de bzhin te / skyes pa rnams ni rten dang lhan cig pa dag yin no / ma skyes pa rnams dang 'das pa rnams ni rten dang ma 'brel pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītā apyāśrayasahitā ityapare /<br/> ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ /<br/> kāraṇākhyo 'dhipaḥ smṛtaḥ /<br/> ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re 'das pa rnams kyang rten dang lhan cig pa dag yin no zhes zer ro / dmigs pa'i rkyen bshad zin to / byed rgyu zhes bya bdag por bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhiko 'yaṃ pratyaya ityadhipatipratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de nyid bdag po'i rkyen yin no / rkyen 'di ni lhag pa yin pas bdag po'i rkyen to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanapratyayo 'pi savandharmāḥ adhipatipratyayo 'pīti kimastyādhikyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa'i rkyen yang chos thams cad yin la / bdag po'i rkyen yang chos thams cad yin na 'di la lhag pa ci zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti /<br/> bhavanti tvadhipati pratyaya ityasyaivādhikyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni nam yang dmigs pa ma yin gyi bdag po'i rkyen ni yin pas 'di la lhag pa yod pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhikasya vā pratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na lhag pa'i rkyen yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaḥ sarvasya saṃskṛtasya svabhāvavarjyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa'i 'dus byas thams cad kyi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāddharmo dharmasya caturbhirapi pratyayairna pratyayaḥ /<br/> syātsvabhāvaḥ svabhāvasya parabhāvo 'pi /<br/> syātsaṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtasyāsaṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen bzhi char gyis kyang chos kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i chos lta yod dam zhe na / yod de / rang gi ngo bos rang gi ngo bo lta bu'o / gzhan gyi ngo po yang yod de / 'dus ma byas kyi 'dus byas lta bu dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'dus ma byas lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti /<br/> hetupratyayastāvat pañcavidha uktaḥ /<br/> tatra /<br/> nirudhyamāne kāritraṃ dvī hetū kurutaḥ /<br/> nirudhyamānaṃ nāma varktamānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rkyen 'di dag bya ba byed pa na gnas skabs gang gi chos la byed ce na / re zhig rgyu'i rkyen rnam pa ldar bshad pa de las / rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la bya ba byed do / 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni da ltar yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhābhimukhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetu kāritraṃ kurutaḥ /<br/> sahotpanne 'pi phale tayorvyāpāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag bya ba byed de / de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu la bya ba byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trayaḥ /<br/> jāyamāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum po ni skye ba la'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāyamānaṃ nāmānāgatamutpādābhimukham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa ste / skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra sabhāgasarvatragavipākahetavaḥ kāritraṃ kurvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rnams bya ba byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvaddhetupratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig rgyu'i rkyen ni de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato 'nyau tu pratyayau tadviparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gzhan pa'i rkyen dag de las bzlog pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena kāritranyāyena hetupratyayau dvidhā kṛtvoktastadviparyayātsamanatarapratyayālambanapratyayau veditavyau /<br/> samantarapratyayo jāyamāne kāritraṃ karotyavakāśadānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa'i rkyen dag ni byed pa'i tshul gang gis rgyu'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis su byas nas bshad pa de las bzlog par rig par bya ste / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni skabs 'byed pa'i phyir skye ba la bya ba byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanapratyayo nirudhyamāne /<br/> varttamānaiścittacaitairgrahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa'i rkyen ni da ltar gyi sems dang sems las byung pa rnams kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir 'gag pa la bya ba byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhipatipratyayastu sarvasyāmavasthāyāmanāvaraṇabhāvenāvasthita ityetadevāsya kāritram /<br/> uktāḥ sakāritrāḥ pratyayāḥ /<br/> atha katamo dharmaḥ katibhiḥ pratyayairutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag po'i rkyen ni gnas skabs thams cad du mi sgrib pa'i ngo por gnas pas 'di'i bya ba ni 'di nyid yin no / rkyen rnams byed pa dang bcas par bshad zin to / yang chos gang zhig rkyen du zhig gis skyed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhiścattacaittā hi /<br/> tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi yis sems dang sems byung rnams / de la 'di dag rgyu'i rkyen ni rgyu lnga po thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samantarapratyayaḥ pūrvakāścittacaittā anyairavyavahitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba snga ma gzhan dag gi bar du ma chod pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca /<br/> adhipatipratyayaḥ svabhāvarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa'i rkyen ni ci rigs par yul lnga po dag dang chos thams cad do / bdag po'i rkyen ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa chos thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattidvayaṃ tribhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattyo rālambanapratyayo nāsti /<br/> nahi te ālambike /<br/> hetupratyayastutayordvividho hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la ni dmigs pa'i rkyen med de / de dag ni dmigs par byed pa ma yin no / de gnyis kyi rgyu'i rkyen ni rnam pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni skye ba la sogs pa'o / skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni sa mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i chos sngar byung ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samanantarapratyayaḥ sasaṃprayogaṃ samāpatticittam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhipatipratyayaḥ pūrvavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag po'i rkyen ni snga ma bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittābhisaṃskārajatvādete samāpattī cittasamanantare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa las skye ba'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittotpattivibandhakatvāt na samanantarapratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can dag ni yin gyi sems skye pa la bgegs byed pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāmanye tu jāyante /<br/> anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye / chos gzhan ldan pa ma yin pa rnams dang gzugs can rnams ni rgyu dang bdag po'i rkyen dag las skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āha tu pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti /<br/> ko 'tra hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po rnams ni ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na las skye'i 'gro pa thams cad kyi rgyu gcig pu dbang phyug dang skyes bu dang gtso bo la sogs pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi khalu hetukṛtāṃ siddhiṃ manyase /<br/> nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti /<br/> apica
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gtan tshigs kyis byas pa'i grub par sems na de nyid kyis thams cad kyi rgyu dbang phyug la sogs pa cig car du zhig yin no zhes bya ba'i smra ba 'di pa stsal ba ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">neśvarādeḥ kramādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang / dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt /<br/> dṛśyate ca bhāvānāṃ kramasaṃbhavaḥ /<br/> sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dbang phyug gam / gzhan yang rung ste rgyu gcig pu kho na zhig yin na 'gro ba thams cad cig car du 'byung bar 'gyur pa zhig na / dngos po rnams ni rim gyis 'byung ba yang snang ngo / de ni 'di ni da ltar skye bar gyur cig / 'di ni 'gag par gyur cig / 'di ni phyis skye bar gyur cig ces dbang phyug gi 'dod pa'i dbang gis yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cchandabhedāttarhi siddhamanekaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni 'dod pa tha dad pa'i phyir rgyu du mar 'grub par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cāpi cchandarbhedo yugapatsyāttaddhetorīśvarasyābhinnatvāt /<br/> kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa tha dad pa de yang de'i rgyu'i dbang phyug la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir cig car 'byung bar 'gyur ro / 'on te rgyu gzhan la ltos na ni dbang phyug rgyu ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi ca kramotpattau kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇādanavasthāprasaṅga syādityanantarabhedāyāḥ kāraṇaparaṃparāyā anāditvābhyupagamādayamīśvarakāraṇādhimuktaḥ śākyayūrvīyameva nyāyaṃ nātivṛttaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang rim gyis skye ba la rgyu gzhan gyi bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur bas rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa thog ma med pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dbang phyug gi rgyur mos pa 'di ni sh'akya'i sras po'i lus kho na las ma 'das pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yogapadye 'pīśvaracchandānāṃ jagato na yaugapadyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dbang phyug gi 'dod pa rnams cig car yin du zin kyang 'gro ba ni cig car ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathācchandamutpādanādi ti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa ji lta bar skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> teṣāṃ paścādviśeṣābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la phyis khyad par med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaśca tāvadīśvarasyeyatā sargaprayāsenārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig dbang phyug gi 'byin pa'i tshegs 'di rnyed la don ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dga' ba yin no zhe na / 'o na ni thabs med par de byed par mi nus pas de la dbang phyug ma yin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya /<br/> sugītaścāyaṃ tamārabhya śloko bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan la yang de kho na dang 'dra'o / gal te yang dbang phag dmyal ba la sogs par skye dgu gnod pa mang po dang 'bol pa dag phyung nas des dga' bar 'gyur na ni de lta bu'i dbang phyug de la phyag 'tshal lo / de las brtsams nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yannirdahati yattīkṣṇo yadugro yatpratāpavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang phyir ma lus sreg pa dang / gang phyir rna dang gang phyir gtum / gang phyir gdung ldan gang gi phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">māṃsaśoṇitamajjādo yattato rudra ucyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sha dang khrag dang rkang za ba / de phyir drag po zhes bya'o / zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang legs par smras pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'gro ba'i rgyu gcig tu yongs su bzung bas don gzhan dag gi skyes bu'i phyed pa mngon sum ni bsnyon par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat /<br/> kāraṇebhyo 'nyasya tadutpattau vyāpārādarśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu rnams dang bcas pa'i dbang phyug la yang rgyur rtog pa rnams ni gus pas smra ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de / rgyu rnams las gzhan gyis byed pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahakāriṣu cānyeṣu kāraṇeṣvīśvaro neśvaraḥ syāt /<br/> athādisarga īśvarahetukaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang phyug de lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dang po rnams la yang dbang phyug ma yin par 'gyur ro / 'on te dang po byung pa dbang phyug gi rgyu las byung ba yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāpyanyānapekṣatvādīśvaravadanāditvaprasaṅga
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir dbang phyug bzhin du thog ma med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ pradhāne 'pi yathāyogaṃ vācyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gtso bo la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānna lokasyaikaṃ kāraṇamasti /<br/> svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi rgyu gcig pu ni med kyi 'di ni rang gi las rnams kho nas skye ba de dang der skye bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti /<br/> gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta iti /<br/> atha kathaṃ bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ hetupratyayaḥ /<br/> dvidhā bhūtāni taddhetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs blo ma sbyangs pa rnams ni rang rang gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba na log par gzhan dbang phyug tu yongs su rtog par byed do / de ni rdzogs so / yang / gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye / zhes gang bshad pa de ji ltar na 'byung ba rnams 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyu'i rkyen yin zhe na / de yi 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtaheturityarthaḥ /<br/> sabhāgasahabhūhetubhyāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / skal ba mnyam pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dag gis so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhautikasya tu pañcadhā /<br/> bhautikasya tu bhūtāni pañcaprakāro hetuḥ /<br/> katham /<br/> jananānniḥśrayāt sthānādupastambhogavṛṃhaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga / byung ba rnams 'byung ba las gyur pa'i ni rgyu rnam pa lnga yin te / ji lta zhe na / skyed phyir brten phyir gnas phyir dang rtog pa'i phyir dang 'phel byed phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'yaṃ kāraṇahetureva punaḥ paṇycadhā bhinnaḥ /<br/> jananahetustebhya utpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang byed rgyu'i rgyu kho na rnam pa lnga tha dad pa yin te / skyed pa'i rgyu ni de dag las skye pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niśrayaheturjātasya bhūtānuvidhāyitvāt puruṣakāraphalādācāryādiniḥśrayavat /<br/> pratiṣṭhāheturādhārabhāvāt /<br/> citrakṛtyavat /<br/> upastambhaheturanucchedahetutvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brten pa'i rgyu ni skyes pa 'byung ba'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i phyir te / slob dpon la sogs pa la brten pa bzhin no / gnas pa'i rgyu ni rten du gyur pa'i phyir te / ri mo'i rtsig pa bzhin no / rton pa'i rgyu ni rgyan mi 'chad pa'i rgya yin pa'i phyir ro / 'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu ni 'phel ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evameṣāṃ janmavikārādhārasthitivṛddhihetutvamākhyātaṃ bhavati /<br/> tridhā bhautikamanyonyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de dag gi skye ba dang 'gyur ba dang brten pa dang gnas pa dang rton pa dang 'phel ba'i rgyu nyid du bstan pa yin no / 'byung 'gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetusahabhūsabhāgavipākahetubhiḥ kāraṇaheturaviśeṣayattitvāt na sarvadā gaṇyate /<br/> tatra sahabhūheturanyonyaṃ cittānuparivartti kāyavākkarma /<br/> nānyadupādāyarūpam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu yin te / lhan cig 'byung ba dang skal ba mnyam pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag gis so / byed rgyu'i rgyu ni bye brag med par 'jug pa'i phyir rtag tu mi bgrang ngo / de la lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni lus dang ngag gi las sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa phan tshun du yin gyi rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gzhan ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgahetuḥ sarvaṃ pūrvotpannaṃ sabhāgasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni sngar byung ba thams cad skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaheturyasya vākkarmaṇaścakṣurādayo vipākaḥ /<br/> bhūtānāmekadhaiva tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni lus dang ngag gi las gang gi rnam par smin pa mig la sogs pa yin pa'o / 'byung ba rnams kyi de rnams gcig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung pa las gyur pa'i gzugs 'byung ba rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu kho na yin te / lus dang ngag gi las gang gi rnam par smin pa rnams yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti /<br/> sa idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba rnams bye brag med par mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du bshad kyi / sems gang gi mjug thogs su gang 'byung zhes bya ba nges pa ni ma bshad pas da ni de brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvat samāsena dvādaśa cittāni /<br/> kimarthamityāha /<br/> kuśalākuśalaṃ kāme nivṛtānivṛtaṃ manaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig mdor bsdu na sems bcu gnyis so / ji lta zhe na / 'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang / bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa / zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau catvāri cittāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na sems bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca /<br/> rūpārūpyeṣvakuśalādanyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba dang mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o / gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātāvakuśalaṃ nāsti /<br/> trīṇi santi /<br/> evamārūpyadhātau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge las gzhan / gzugs kyi khams na mi dge ba med kyi gsum yod do / gzugs med pa'i khams na yang de dang 'dra ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetāni sānusravāṇi daśa cittāni bhavanti /<br/> anāsravaṃ dvidhā /<br/> śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /<br/> evametāni dvādaśa cittāni bhavanti /<br/> tatra /<br/> kāme nava śubhāccittāccittāni /<br/> anantaramiti paścādvakṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na bcu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no / zag med gnyis / slob pa dang mi slob pa ste / de ltar na de dag ni sems bcu gnyis yin no / de la / 'dod sems dag pa las sems dgu / mjug thogs su zhes 'og nas 'chad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na dge ba'i sems gang yin pa de'i mjug thogs su ni sems dgu 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikāni catvāri /<br/> rūpāvacare dve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa bzhi dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dang gzugs na spyod pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattikāle kuśalaṃ pratisandhikāle nivṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms bar 'jug pa'i tshe dge ba dang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe bsgribs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāvacaraṃ nivṛtameva pratisandhikāle
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe bsgribs pa kho na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ativiprakṛṣṭatvāt na kuśalam /<br/> ārūpyā hi kāmadhātoścatasṛbhirdūratābhirdūre /<br/> āśrayākārālambanapratipakṣadūratābhiḥ /<br/> śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ceti /<br/> aṣṭābhya eva tat /<br/> tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /<br/> svabhūmikebhyaścaturbhyo rūpāvacarābhyāṃ dvābhyām /<br/> kuśalācca vyutthānakāle
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shin tu bskal pa'i phyir dge ba ni ma yin no / gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nas ring ba yin te / rten dang rnam pa dang dmigs pa dang gnyen po ring ba nyid dag gis so / de la rten ring ba nyid ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rten nyid du mi srid pa'i phyir ro / rnam par ring ba nyid ni 'dod pa'i khams rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag tu rnam par mi byed pa'i phyir ro / des na dmigs pa ring ba nyid kyang bshad pa yin te / bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na la rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag tu dmigs so / gnyen po ring ba nyid ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la de mngon du 'gyur mi srid pa'i phyir ro / rnam par sun 'byin pa la sogs pa yang mi 'thad pa'i phyir te / yul ma yin pa ni rnam par sun dbyung bar mi nus so / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o / de ni brgyad po kho na las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems de ni brgyad kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste / rang gi sa pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa gnyis las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtācca kliṣṭasamāpattyutpīḍitasyādhārakuśalabhūmisaṃśrayaṇāt /<br/> śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca vyutthānakāle /<br/> daśabhyo 'kuśalaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ldang ba'i tshe dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pas gzir ba sa 'og ma'i dge ba la brten pa'i phyir bsgribs pa dang ldang ba'i tshe slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so / mi dge ba ni bcu dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate /<br/> tasmāccatvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs te / 'dod pa'i khams su nying mtshams sbyor ba na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i sems thams cad kyi mjug thogs su mi dge ba'i sems 'byung ngo / de las bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalāccittāt samanantaraṃ cittānyutpadyante svabhūmikānyeva /<br/> yathā 'kuśalamuktaṃ kāmadhātau /<br/> nivṛtaṃ tathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su ni sems bzhi 'byung ste / rang gi sa pa dag kho na'o / ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi dge ba'i sems bshad pa / bsgribs de bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśabhya eva samanantaram /<br/> tasmācca punaścatvāryeva /<br/> pañcabhyo 'nivṛtaṃ /<br/> kāma iti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu po kho na'i mjug thogs su 'byung la / de las ni bzhi kho na'o / ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las / 'dod pa na zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ pañcabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /<br/> svabhūmikebhya ścaturbhyo rūpāvacarācca kuśalānnirmāṇacittam /<br/> tasmātsapta cittānyanantaram /<br/> anivṛtāvyākṛṭātkāmāvacarātsvabhūmikāni catvāri /<br/> rūpāvacare dve /<br/> kuśalaṃ nirmāṇacittādanantaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni lnga'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste / rang gi sa pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba las sprul pa'i sems so / de las mjug thogs sems bdun no / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pas las ni rang gi sa pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭam pratisandhikāle /<br/> ārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam pratisandhikāla eva /<br/> rūpe daśaikaṃ ca śubhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba dang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can dang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na'o / gzugs na dge ba las bcu gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams na dge ba'i sems gang yin pa de'i mjug thogs su sems bcu gcig kho na 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyāvacaramanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ varjayitvā /<br/> navabhyastadanantaram /<br/> rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so / de ni dgu yi mjug thogs su / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems de ni dgu'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayamārupyāvacaraṃ cānivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ hitvā /<br/> aṣṭābhyo nivṛtaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so /  / bsgribs pa brgyad las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cittamaṣṭabhya utpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i sems bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni brgyad las 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣe ca sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang slob pa dang mi slob pa gnyis ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt ṣaṭ /<br/> rūpāvacarānnivṛtāvyākṛtādanantaraṃ ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las drug gzugs na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su ni drug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikāni trīṇi kāmāvacarāṇi cānivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ muktvā /<br/> tribhyo 'nivṛtaṃ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa gsum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs pa rnams so / ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacaramanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ tribhyaḥ svabhūmikebhya eva /<br/> tasmāt ṣaṭ /<br/> svabhūmikāni trīṇi /<br/> kāmāvacare ca kliṣṭe /<br/> ārūpyāvacaraṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni gsum kho na las 'byung ste / rang gi sa pa dag kho na las so / de las drug ste / rang gi sa pa gsum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā rūpadhātāvanivṛtāvyākṛtamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ji skad du bshad pa ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamārūpye tasya nītiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'ang de'i tshul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatastadapyanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ tribhya evotpadyate svabhūmikebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na yod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rang gi sa pa gsum kho na las 'byung la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādapi ca ṣaḍevotpadyante /<br/> svabhūmikāni trīṇi adharadhātukāni ca kliṣṭāni /<br/> śubhātpunaḥ /<br/> nava cittāni /<br/> ārūpyāvacarātṛ kukśalānnava cittānyutpadyante /<br/> kāmāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ kāmarūpāvacare cānivṛtāvyākṛte hitvā /<br/> tat ṣaṇṇāṃ /<br/> ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las kyang rang gi sa pa gsum dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang drug 'byung ngo / dge ba las sems dgu dag go / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge pa'i sems las ni sems dgu 'byung ste / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ma gtogs so / de drug gi / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba ni rang gi sa pa gsum dang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtātsapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs pa las bdun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam /<br/> tattathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsgribs pa las ni rang gi sa pa gsum dang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang bsgribs pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis so / de de bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadapi saptabhya evotpadyate /<br/> kāmarūpāvacarāṇi kliṣṭāni śaikṣāśaikṣe ca hitvā /<br/> caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam /<br/> traidhātukebhyaḥ kuśalebhyaḥ śaikṣācca /<br/> asmāttu pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang bdun kho na las 'byung ste / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs so / slob pa bzhi las / khams gsum pa'i dge ba dang slob pa las so / de las lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tānyeva catvāryaśaikṣaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi po de dag nyid dang / mi slob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt /<br/> ata evānantaroktāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa ni lnga las so / bshad ma thag pa'i lnga po de nyid las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāccatvāri cittāni /<br/> tasmātpunaraśaikṣāccittātsamanantaraṃ catvāri cittānyutpadyante /<br/> traidhātukāni kuśalānyaśaikṣaṃ ca /<br/> samāptāni dvādaśa cittāni /<br/> punaḥ kriyante /<br/> dvādaśaitāni viṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las sems ni bzhi dag go / mi slob pa'i sems de'i mjug thogs su ni sems bzhi 'byung ste / khams gsum pa'i dge ba dang mi slob pa'o / sems bcu gnyis rdzogs so / yang bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā /<br/> triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /<br/> prāyogikaṃ copapattilābhikaṃ ca /<br/> vipākajaiyapithikaśailpasthānikanairmitam /<br/> caturdhā 'vyākṛtaṃ kāme
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas nas she na / gsum du skyes nas thob pa dang / sbyor byung dge rnams gnyis phye nas / khams gsum po dag tu skyes nas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o / rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam pa / bzo yi gnas dang sprul pa dang / 'dod na lung bstan min rnam bzhir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhittveti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phye nas zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaramanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ caturdhā bhidyate /<br/> vipākajamairyāpathikaṃ śelpasthānikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ ca /<br/> rūpe śilpavivarjitam /<br/> rūpadhātau tridhā bhidyate śailpasthānikaṃ varjayitvā /<br/> tatra śilpābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa la ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dang sprul pa'i sems dang rnam pa bzhir dbye'o / gzugs na bzo ma gtogs pa'o / gzugs kyi khams ni rnam pa gsum dbye ste / de na bzo med pa'i phyir bzo'i gnas pa ma gtogs so

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaramupapattipratilambhikaṃ paṭutvāt śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ rūpāvacaraprāyogikāccānantaramutpadyate /<br/> anabhisaṃskāravāhitvāttasmādetāni notpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa la ni gsal ba'i phyir slob pa dang mi slob pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su 'byung gi mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i phyir de las ni de dag mi 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarakilaṣṭānantaraṃ kāmāvacaramupapattipratilambhikamutpadyate /<br/> paṭutvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa 'byung ste / gsal ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāvacarakliṣṭānantaraṃ tu rūpāvacaramupapattipratilambhikaṃ notpadyate 'paṭutvāditi /<br/> trayo manaskārāḥ /<br/> svalakṣaṇamanaskāraḥ /<br/> tadyathā rūpaṇālakṣaṇaṃ rūpamityevamādi /<br/> sāmānyalakṣaṇamanaskāraḥ /<br/> ṣoḍaśākārasaṃprayuktaḥ /<br/> adhimuktimanaskāraḥ /<br/> aśubhāpramāṇārūpyavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādiṣu /<br/> trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni gzugs na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa mi 'byung ste / mi gsal ba'i phyir ro / yid la byed pa ni gsum ste / rang gi mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ni dper na gzugs ni gnod par byar rung ba'i mtshan nyid can no snyam pa de lta bu la sogs pa'o / spyi'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ni rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'o /  / mos pa yid la byed pa ni mi sdug pa dang tshad med pa dang gzugs can gyi rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa dag la'o / de la yid la byed pa rnam pa gsum gyi mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed la / de las kyang yid la byed pa rnam pa gsum ste / de lta na mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmānyamanaskārānantaramevāryamārga saṃmukhīkaroti /<br/> tasmāttu trividhamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re spyi yid la byed pa kho na'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed la / de las ni rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /<br/> ataḥ pāraṃparyamabhisaṃdhāyoktam aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sdug pas sems btul nas spyi yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed pa de'i phyir brgyud pa las dgongs nas mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryamārgānantaramapi sāmānyamanaskāramevetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su yang spyi yid la byed pa kho na'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pas gsum la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na ni lam de rnams kyi mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyi yid la byed pa mngon du byed pa par 'gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha dvitīyādidhyānasaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmā vakrāntau katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na go ji ltar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi kāmāvacaraḥ śakyo 'tiviprakṛṣṭatvāt /<br/> naca tadbhūmikaḥ pratilabdho 'nyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt /<br/> nacāryo nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ punaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti /<br/> nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati /<br/> tadyathā sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati /<br/> tadetanna varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shin tu bskal pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa ni mi nus so / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs par de dag gis pa yang mi thob bo / 'phags pa ni yang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa mngon du mdzad pa yang ma yin te / 'bras bu thob zin pa de'i sbyor ba mngon du byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no / des ni de dang 'dra ba'i spyi yid la byed pa gzhan yang 'di lta ste / 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa 'thob par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam /<br/> ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ niśritya tadbhūmikaṃ bhāvāgrikaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de mngon du byed par 'gyur ro / de skad du ni mi brjod do / mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'i ldang ba'i sems ni de'i sa pa'am 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no / ci yang med pa'i skye mched la brten nas 'thob pa ni de'i sa pa'am srid pa'i rtse mo pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāsu svabhūmikameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa lhag ma rnams su ni rang gi sa pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau trayo manaskārāḥ śrutacintāmayopapattipratilambhikāḥ /<br/> bhāvanāmayo nāsti /<br/> rūpadhātau trayaḥ śrutabhāvanāmayopapattipratilambhikāḥ /<br/> cintāmayo nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ni yid la byed pa gsum ste / thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba dang skyes nas thob pa rnams so / gzugs kyi khams na ni gsum ste / thob pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skyes nas thob pa rnams so / bsams pa las byung ba ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā cintamitumārabhante tadaiṣāṃ samādhirevopatiṣṭhate /<br/> ārūpyadhātau bhāvanāmayopapattipratilambhikau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe de dag sems par rtsom pa de'i tshe de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kho na nye bar gnas pa yin no / gzugs med pa'i khams na ni bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skyes nas thob pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra pañcavidhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgasaṃmukhībhāvo 'nyatropapattipratilabhbhikebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la skyes nas thob pa dag ma gtogs pa yid la byed pa rnam pa lnga'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogapratibaddhatvāt /<br/> mārgānantaraṃ tūpapattipratilambhikasyāpi kāmāvacarasya saṃmukhībhāvaḥ /<br/> paṭutvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba la rag lus pa'i phyir ro / lam gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa yang mngon du 'gyur te / gsal ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag sems bcu gnyis bshad pa de dag las sems gang la du zhig rnyed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can / drug dang drug dang gnyis rnyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na / sems drug po 'di dag dang mi ldan pa las rnyed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tairsamanvāgatasya kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya vicikitsayā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānāddhātupratyāgamanācca /<br/> akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca /<br/> ārūpyāvacarasya kliṣṭasya parihāṇitaḥ śekṣasya ca /<br/> rūpāvacare 'pi klilṣṭe ṣaṇṇāṃ lābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">the tshom gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba dang khams su slar ldog pa las 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba dang khams su slar ldog pa dang yongs su nyams pa las mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmāvacarasya cānivṛtāvyākṛtasya dhātupratyāgamanāt /<br/> ārūpyāvacarasya kliṣṭasya śaikṣasya ca parihāṇitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la yang drug rnyed de / khams su slar log pa las gzugs na spyod pa gsum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāvacare tu kliṣṭe dvayorlābhaḥ /<br/> parihāṇitastasyaiva kliṣṭasya śaikṣasya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni gnyis rnyed de / yongs su nyams pa las nyon mongs pa can de nyid dang slob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhe /<br/> trayāṇāṃ rūpaje
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs skyes dge la gsum dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba la sems gsum rnyed de / dge ba de nyid dang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣe caturṇāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa la bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaiva śaikṣasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayorārūpyāvacārasya ca kuśalasya /<br/> āryamārgeṇa kāmarūpadhātuvairāgye /<br/> tasya śeṣite
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa de nyid dang 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang gzugs med pa'i dge ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣaṃ kṛtaṃ śeṣitam /<br/> yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma de / lhag mar byas pas lhag ma ste / sems gang la rnyed pa ma bshad pa de la ni de nyid rnyed par blta bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarabhedenāhuḥ /<br/> kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /<br/> ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu /<br/> tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag la ni khyad par med par nyon mongs can gyi sems la ni / mkhas pa rnams kyi dgu rnyed brjod / dge ba'i sems la drug yin te / lung ma bstan la de nyid do / zhes 'chad de / der mi dge ba'i sems la bdun yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya samyagdṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānāt kāmarūpāvacarayoranivṛtāvyākṛtayorvairāgyataḥ rūpārūpyāvacarayoḥ kuśalayostatastyasamādhilābhataḥ śaikṣāśaikṣasya ca niyāmāvakrāntyarhattvayoḥ śeṣamata evavyākhyānādavadhāryam /<br/> saṃgrahaślokaḥ /<br/> upapattisamāpattivairāgyaparihāṇiṣu /<br/> kuśalapratisaṃdhau ca cittalābho hyatadvataḥ /<br/> iti /<br/> abhidharmakośabhāṣye indriyanirddeśo nāma /<br/> dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ /<br/> samāptamiti /<br/> śrīlāmāvākasya /<br/> tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> oṃ namo duddhāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes brjod par bya ste / yang dag pa'i lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang de ni yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob pa las gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag dang des 'jug dgra bcom nyid kyi tshe / slob pa dang ni mi slob pa'o / lhag ma ni rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis khong du chud par bya'o / bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni / skye dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'dod chags bral dang yongs nyams dang / dge ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe / sems de ldan pa min las rnyed / rkyen gyi skabs rdzogs so / dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba mjod [*mdzod?] kyi bshad pa las gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamidānīṃ vaktavyam /<br/> kāmarūpārūpyanaiyamyena cittādīnāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi nges pa nyid kyi sems la sogs pa bstan pa byas pa de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra katame te kāmarūpārūpyadhātava ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams de dag gang yin pa brjod par bya ste / de'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakapretatiryañco manuṣyāḥ ṣaḍ divaukasaḥ /<br/> kāmadhātuḥ /<br/> catasro gatayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang / mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag / 'dod pa'i khams yin zhes bya ba 'di smos te / 'gro ba bzhi dang lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena /<br/> sa eṣa kati sthānānītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyal chen bzhi po rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan pa rnams dang 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams te / de ltar na de dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang bcas pa ni 'dod pa'i khams yin no / de la gnas du zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa narakadvīpabhedena viṃśatiḥ /<br/> sthānānīti vākyaśeṣaḥ saṃbadhyate /<br/> aṣṭau mahānarakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dang gling dbye ba las de nyi shu zhes bya ba smos te / gnas rnams zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma dang sbyar ro / dmyal ba chen po brgyad yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti /<br/> catvāro dvīpāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang gling bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvīpaḥ pūrvavideho 'varagodānīyaḥ uttarakuruśca /<br/> ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling dang shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang bshad ma thag pa'i lha'i ris drug dang yi dvags rnams dang dud 'gro ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam /<br/> etasmācca kāmadhātoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa dag nas mnar med pa'i bar gyi gnas nyi shu po de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams yin no / snod dang bcas par bzung na ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi bar yin no / 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvaṃ saptadaśasthāno rūpadhātuḥ /<br/> kathamityāha /<br/> pṛthak pṛthak /<br/> dhyānaṃ tribhūmikaṃ tatra /<br/> prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānāni pratyekaṃ tribhūmikāni /<br/> caturthaṃ tvaṣṭabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni / gzugs khams yin / ji lta zhe na / der so so'i / bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin / zhes bya ba smos te / bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag na re re zhing sa gsum pa dag yin no / bzhi bas ni brgyad pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra prathamadhyānaṃ brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ /<br/> dvitīyaṃ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ /<br/> tṛtīyaṃ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bsam gtan dang po ni tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang tshangs chen rnams so / gnyis pa ni 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ /<br/> saha tannivāsibhiḥ sattvaiḥ ṣoḍaśeti kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams so / bzhi pa ni sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang mi che ba rnams dang mi gdung ba rnams dang gya nom snang ba rnams dang shin tu mthong ba rnams dang 'og min rnams te / de ltar na gnas bcu bdun po 'di dag den gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang bcas pa ni gzugs kyi khams yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti /<br/> ārūpyadhāturasthānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che ba rnams na re bcu drug yin no zhes zer ro / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don kho na dag na tshangs pa chen po'i gnas ches mchog tu gyur pa gtso bo gcig pa can cig spags pa bzhin du mngon par grub kyi sa gzhan ni med do zhes grag go / gzugs med khams na gnas med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyarūpiṇāṃ dharmānāṃ sthānamasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gzugs can ma yin pa rnams la ni gnas med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ /<br/> sa tu /<br/> upapattyā caturvidhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / chos gzugs can ma yin pa rnams ni yul na mi gnas zhes bya bar nges pa yin no / de yang / skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattibhedena caturvidha ārūpyadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i khams skye ba'i bye brag gis ni rnam pa bzhi ste / 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduta ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivarāñjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti /<br/> natveṣāṃ deśakṛtamauttarādharya bhidyate /<br/> yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti /<br/> punaśca tasmāccyavamānānāṃ tatraivāntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do / de dag la yul gyis byas pa'i bla 'og ni med do / ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams yul gang du 'chi 'pho ba de nyid du skye la / yang de nas 'chi 'pho ba rnams kyi srid pa bar ma yang de nyid du 'grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud gzugs la brten nas 'jug pa de ltar gzugs med pa dag na ci la brten nas 'jug ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ /<br/> nikāyasabhāgaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ ca niśrityetyābhidhārmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni ris dang srog la yang / sems kyi rgyud ni brten pa yin / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po la brten nas so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ /<br/> durbalatvāt /<br/> tasyāḥ kena balavattvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci'i phyir sems can gzugs can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun yang de gnyis kho na la brten nas 'jug par mi 'gyur / stobs chung ba'i phyir ro / de na ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattiviśeṣajatvāt /<br/> sā hi samāpattirvibhūtarūpasaṃjñā /<br/> tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i phyir te / snyoms par 'jug pa de ni gzugs dang bral ba'i 'du shes can yin no / 'o na ni stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir de kho nas 'jug par 'gyur gyi rten gyis ci zhig bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ cāpi vaktavyam /<br/> yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate /<br/> tadeva dvayamanyo 'nyam /<br/> rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /<br/> durbalatvāttayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po gzugs la brten nas 'jug pa de ltar sems can gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi ci la brten nas 'jug pa 'di yang brjod par bya'o / de gnyis phan tshun du'o / 'o na ni gzugs can rnams kyi yang de gnyis kho na phan tshun du ci'i phyir mi brten / de gnyis stobs chung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatredānīṃ kena balavattvām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattiviśeṣajatvāt /<br/> tadetaccittasantatau samānaṃ cittacaitteṣu vā /<br/> tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ /<br/> api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ /<br/> hetostadvimukhatvāditi /<br/> atha kasmādete kāmarūpārūpyadhātava ityucyante /<br/> svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāddhātuḥ /<br/> kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca /<br/> nātra rūpamastityarūpaḥ /<br/> arūpasya bhāva ārupyam /<br/> rūpaṇīyo vā rūpyaḥ /<br/> na rūpyo 'rūpyastadbhāva ārūpyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i phyir ro / mdo sde pa rnams na re de ni sems kyi rgyud dam / sems kyang sems las byung bdag la yang mtshungs te de lta bas na sems can gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi sems kyi rten gzhan ni med do zhes zer ro / gzhan yang sems kyi rgyun gang gi 'phen pa'i rgyu gzugs la sred pa dang ma bral ba de ni gzugs dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir / gzugs la brten nas 'jug go / gang gi rgyu gzugs la sred pa dang bral ba de ni gzugs la mi ltos par 'jug ste / rgyu de la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro / yang ci'i phyir 'di dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams rnams zhes bya zhe na / rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir na khams so / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams so / gzugs dang ldan pa'i khams ni gzugs kyi khams so / bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir te / rdo rje'i sor gdub lta bu dang na le sham gyi btung ba zhes bya ba bzhin no / 'di na gzugs med pas gzugs med pa'o / gzugs med pa'i ngo bo ni gzugs med pa nyid do / yang na gzugs su rung ba ni gzugs so / gzugs med pas na gzugs med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpratisaṃyukto dhāturārūpyadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i ngo bo ni gzugs med pa nyid do / de dang ldan pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'dod pa rnams kyi khams ni 'dod pa'i khams te / gang zhig 'dod pa rnams 'dzin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ rūpārūpyadhātū veditavyau /<br/> ko 'yaṃ kāmo nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāsātaḥ kavaḍīkārāhāra maithunopasaṃhito rāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor bsdu na kham gyi zas dang 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod chags yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten sna tshogs gang yang 'dod pa min / skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam /<br/> iti /<br/> gāthābhidhānān /<br/> ajīvaka āryaśāriputraṃ pratyāha /<br/> na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /<br/> bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyapi kāmabhogī saṃkalpayan so 'kuśalān vitarkān /<br/> āryaśāriputra āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten dag na sna tshogs de bzhin gnas / 'on kyang rten rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul / zhes tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa'i phyir ro / kun tu rgyu 'tsho byed kyis 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la / 'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min gyi / kun rtog 'dod chags 'dir 'dod yin smra na / de ni mi dge'i rtog pa kun rtog tshe / dge slong yang ni 'dod spyod can du 'gyur / zhes smras pa dang 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod / ci ste khyod kyi kun rtog 'dod chags ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa min na gzugs rnams mthong nas ni / khyod kyi ston pa 'ang 'dod spyod can du 'ong
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes smras so / yang ci chos gang dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na spyod pa de dag thams cad 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dag cig yin nam zhe na / smras pa ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣu kāmarūpārupyarāgā anuśerate /<br/> ke punaramī kāmarūpārūpyarāgāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dag rgyas par 'gyur ba'o / 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags de dag kyang gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣvanuśerate /<br/> idamidānīṃ tadaśvavandhīyam /<br/> kasyāyamaśvabandho yasyāyamaśvaḥ /<br/> kasyāyamaśvaḥ /<br/> yasyāyamaśvabandhaḥ /<br/> ityubhayamapi na jñāyate /<br/> nedamaśvabandhīyam /<br/> kṛtanirdeśāni hi sthānāni kāmadhātau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu rgyas par 'gyur ba'o / da ni 'di rta dang bres lta bu de yin te / rta'i bres 'di su'i yin zhes smras na / rta 'di su'i yin pa'o zhes zer ro / rta 'di su'i yin zhes smras na / rta'i bres 'di su'i yin pa'o zhes zer bas gnyi ga yang mi shes pa lta bu yin no / 'di ni rta dang bres lta bu ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣvavītarāgasya yo rāgaḥ sa kāmarāgaḥ /<br/> yatrānuśete so 'pi dharmaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams su gnas brten pa de dag la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags yin la de gang du rgyas par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang 'dod pa dang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ rūpārūpyarāgāvadhovītarāgasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang 'og ma'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dag kyang ci rigs par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asamāhitabhūmiko vā rāgaḥ kāmarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i 'dod chags ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānārūpyeṣu rāgo rūpārūpyarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa dag la 'dod chags pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirmāṇacitte kathaṃ kāmarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprul pa'i sems la ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrutvā parihāya ca tadāsvādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos pa dang yongs su nyams nas de la chags pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirmāṇavaśena vā nirmāyaka citto 'pi rāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na sprul pa'i dbang gis sprul pa byed pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gandharasanirmāṇādvā /<br/> tasya kāmavacaratvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%"> / yang na dri dang ro sprul pa'i phyir na de 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacareṇa tayoranirmāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pas ni de gnyis mi sprul pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarekameva traidhātukam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci khams gsum gcig kho na zhig yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traidhātukānāmanto nāsti /<br/> yāvadākāśaṃ tāvanto dhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum rnams la mtha' med de / nam mkha' ji tsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang de tsam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha eva ca nāstyapūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir sngon med pa'i sems can 'byung ba yang med la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas 'byung ba re res sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can rnams yongs su gtugs pa med de nam mkha' bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamavasthānaṃ lokadhatūnāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten gyi khams rnams ji ltar gnas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām /<br/> evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thad kar gnas te / mdo las dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab pa na bar snang las chu'i rgyun 'bab pa rnams kyi mtshams sam bar med do / de bzhin du shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'chags pa dang 'jig pa rnams kyi mtshams sam bar med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmiti /<br/> natūktamūrdhvamadhaśceti /<br/> ūrdhvamapyadhho 'pītyapare /<br/> nikāyāntarapāṭhād /<br/> akaniṣṭhādūrdhvaṃ punaḥ kāmadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shar phyogs su ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang gi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs kyi steng dang 'og ces ni ma gsungs so / gzhan dag na re sde pa gzhan dag las byung ba'i phyir steng dang 'og dag na yang yod de / 'og min gyi gong na yang 'dod pa'i khams yod la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātoścādhaḥ punarakaniṣṭhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams kyi 'og na yang 'og min yod do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścaikasmāt kāmadhātorvītarāgaḥ sa sarvebhyaḥ /<br/> evaṃ rūpārūpyebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang 'dod pa'i khams gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no / gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag las kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam /<br/> ya ete trayo dhātava uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bsam gtan dang po la brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul skyed par byed pa de ni des 'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes pa nas skyed par byed pa de kho na na yod pa'i tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro'i gzhan du ni ma yin no / khams gsum po dag bshad pa gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakādisvanāmoktā gatayaḥ pañca teṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni dmyal sogs 'gro ba lnga / rang gi ming gis bstan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā iti /<br/> svaireva nāmabhisteṣu pañca gatayaḥ proktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag tu dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags dang lha dang mi zhes bya ba 'gro ba lnga po rang gi ming dag kho nas bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhāto catasro gatayaḥ pañcamyāśca pradeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ni 'gro ba bzhi dang lnga pa'i phyogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārūpyadhātvorekasyā devagateḥ pradeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na ni lha'i 'gro ba gcig kho na'i phyogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis na / de dag khams dag tu zhes bya ba ci 'gro ba las ma gtogs pa'i khams dag cig yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santi kuśalakliṣṭabhājanāntarābhavasvabhāvā api dhātavaḥ /<br/> yāstu pañca gatayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de khams rnams ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dang snod dang srid pa bar ma pa'i rang bzhin dag kyang yin gyi 'gro ba lnga po gang dag yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāḥ /<br/> akliṣṭāvyākṛtā eva sattvākhyā nāntarābhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyon mongs can min lung bstan min / sems can zhes bya bar srid min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anivṛtāvyākṛtā eva gatayaḥ /<br/> anyathā hi gatisaṃbhedaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba rnams ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na'o / de lta ma yin na 'gro ba lnga 'chol bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvākhyā eva ca nacāntarābhavasvabhāvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can zhes bya ba kho na yin yang srid pa bar ma'i rang bzhin dag ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñyaptipūktam catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ /<br/> kimasaṃbṛhītam /<br/> antarābhava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btags pa las kyang / skye gnas bzhis ni 'gro ba lnga bsdus kyi 'gro ba lngas ni skye gnas bzhi ma bsdus te / gang zhig ma bsdus she na / srid pa bar ma'o zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmaskandhe 'pi coktam cakṣurdhātuḥ katamaḥ /<br/> catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśceti /<br/> sūtre 'pi ca bahiṣkṛto 'ntarābhavo gatibhyaḥ /<br/> kasmin sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi phung po las kyang mig gi khams gang zhe na / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang ba gang yin pa dmyal ba 'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang yi dvags pa'i yul pa'am / lha 'am mi 'am / bsgoms pa las byung ba'am / srid pa bar ma pa'i mig dang mig gi dbang po dang mig gi skye mched dang / mig gi khams so zhes gsungs so / mdo las kyang srid pa bar ma 'gro ba rnams las logs shig tu mdzad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti
