</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo gang las she na srid pa ni bdun te / dmyal ba'i srid pa dang dud 'gro'i srid pa dang yi dvags kyi srid pa dang lha'i srid pa dang mi'i srid pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ /<br/> atha eva cānivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ sidhyanti /<br/> taddhetoḥ karmabhavasya tābhyo bahiṣkaraṇāt /<br/> kāśmīrāśca sūtraṃ paṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi srid pa dang srid pa bar ma'o zhes gsungs pa las te / 'dir ni 'gro ba lnga po rgyu dang bcas pa dang 'gro ba dang bcas par bshad do / de nyid kyi phyir ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan par 'grub ste / de'i rgyu las de dag las logs shig tu mdzad pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ nārakāṇāmāyuṣmannāsravāṇāṃ saṃmukhībhāvānnarakavedanīyāni karmāṇi karotyupacinoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che ba rnams kyang gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa dmyal ba pa'i zag pa rnams mngon du gyur pa las dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i las rnams byed cing sogs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe dang ldan pa lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dkyil 'khor dang lus dang ngag dang yid skyon dang snyigs ma de dag gi rnam par smin pa gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni dmyal ba dag tu rnam par smin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /<br/> tatrāyuṣmannārako nopalabhyate 'nyatra tebhyo dharmebhya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin par grub nas dmyal bzhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o / tshe dang ldan pa de la chos de dag ma gtogs pa dmyal ba mi dmigs so zhes gsungs so zhes mdo 'don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'pyanivṛtāvyākṛtā eva gatayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir yang 'gro ba dag ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakaraṇāgranthastarhi parihāryo gatiṣu sarve 'nuśayā anuśerata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni rab tu byed pa'i gzhung 'gro ba dag la phra rgyas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i lan gdab par bya dgos so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva /<br/> grāmagrahaṇe grāmopacāra grahaṇavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba rnams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i sems rnam pa lnga yod de / de'i phyir 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba smos pas de ni nyes pa med de / grong smos na grong gi nye 'khor yang smos pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalakliṣṭā apītyapare /<br/> yaktūktam karmabhavasya tābhyo bahiṣkaraṇāditi /<br/> nāvaśyaṃ pṛthagvacanādbahiṣkṛto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag kyang yod do / las de dag las logs shig tu mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes gang bshad pa ni tha dad du gsungs pa'i phyir logs shig tu mdzad pa yin par nges pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu kleśadṛṣṭikaṣāyau pṛthaguktau /<br/> na ca dṛṣṭayo na kleśāḥ /<br/> evaṃ karmabhavo 'pi gatiśca syāt /<br/> pṛthak cāsya vacanaṃ syāt gatihetujñāpanāṛtham /<br/> antarābhave 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> nāyogāt /<br/> gacchanti tāmiti gatiḥ /<br/> nacāntarābhavo gantavyaścyutideśa evotpādanāt /<br/> ārūpyā api gatirna bhaviṣyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na snyigs ma lnga po dag tu nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i snyigs ma dag tha dad du gsungs kyang lta ba rnams nyon mongs pa dag ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du las kyi srid pa yang yin 'gro ba yang yin 'gro ba'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir 'di tha dad du bstan pa yang yin no zhes zer ro / 'di ni srid pa bar ma yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na / mi rung ba'i phyir ma yin te / der 'gro bas na 'gro ba yin na srid pa bar ma ni 'gro bar bya ba ma yin te / 'chi 'pho ba'i yul nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro / gzugs med pa rnams kyang 'gro ba ma yin par 'gyur te 'chi 'pho ba'i yul nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cyutideśa evotpādāt /<br/> evaṃ tarhyantarābhavatvādevāntarābhavo na gatirgatyantarālatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni srid pa bar ma yin pa kho na'i phyir srid pa bar ma 'gro ba ma yin te / 'gro ba'i bar ma do yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'gro ba yin par gyur na ni srid pa bar ma zhes bya ba nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus rnam par smin pa grub nas dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti /<br/> yattarhyaktaṃ tatrāyuṣmannārako nopalabhyate 'nyatra tebhyo dharmebhya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa grub nas zhes bshad kyi rnam par smin pa kho na'o zhes ni ma bshad pa ji ltar / 'o na tshe dang ldan pa de la chos de dag ma gtogs pa dmyal ba mi dmigs so zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham /<br/> avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ /<br/> tāśca vipākasvabhāvā evetyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po dag las gzhan pa dmyal ba mi dmigs so zhes 'gro bar 'gro ba'i gang zag gi rdzas 'gog par byed pa yin gyi phung po gzhan 'gog pa ni ma yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'gro ba rnams ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag kho na yin no zhes zer ro / de dag kyang kha cig na re rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin dag kho na yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aupacayikasvabhāvā apītyapare /<br/> atraiva pañcagatike dhātutraye yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /<br/> nānātvakāyasaṃjñāśca nānākāyaikasaṃjñinaḥ /<br/> viparyayāccaikakāyasaṃjñāścārūpiṇasrayaḥ /<br/> vijñānasthitayaḥ sapta /<br/> sūtre uktaḥ rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rgyas pa las byung ba'i rang bzhin dag kyang yin no zhes zer ro / 'gro ba lnga pa'i khams gsum pa 'di nyid du / lus dang 'du shes tha dad dang lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig / bzlog dang lus dang 'du shes gcig / gzugs can ma yin gsum po dag / rnam shes gnas pa bdun rim bzhin du rig par bya'o / mdo las sems can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de / 'di la ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ prathamā vijñānasthitiḥ /<br/> katame punaste tadekatyā devāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas dang po'o zhes gsungs te / lha kha cig gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāḥ prathamaghyānabhūmikāśca prathamābhinirvṛttavarjyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang bsam gtan dang po pa dang por byung ba ma gtogs pa rnams so / de dag gi lus tha dad pa'i phyir ram
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānātvena kāya eṣāmiti nānātvakāyāḥ /<br/> anekavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi lus tha dad pa yin pas na lus tha dad pa dag ste / kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs du ma'i phyir ro / 'du shes du ma'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānātvena saṃjñā nānātvasaṃjñā /<br/> saiṣāmastīti nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ /<br/> sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes du ma'i phyir 'du shes tha dad pa'o / de 'di dag la yod pas 'du shes tha dad pa rnams te / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig pa dag kyang yod de / 'di lta ste tshangs ris kyi lha gang dag dang por byung ba de dag go / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ dvitīyā vijñānasthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa gnyis pa'o zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang por byung ba de dag thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ni tshangs pa 'dis phyung ngo snyam du 'du shes par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmaṇo 'pyevaṃ bhavati mayaite sṛṣṭā ityabhinnakārasaṃjñānādekatvasaṃjñinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa yang 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bdag gis phyung ngo snyam du sems pas 'du shes kyi rgyu ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir 'du shes gcig pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa chen po'i chu zheng dang dbyibs kyi lus dang tshig tu brjod pa dang gos gyon pa yang gzhan yin la / de'i 'khor gyi yang gzhan yin pas na lus tha dad pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadidamuktaṃ sūtre teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmiti /<br/> asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sems can 'di tshe ring zhing dus ring por gnas par mthong la zhes bya ba nas sems can 'di yang sems la 'di snyam du kye ma sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir bdag dang skral ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig snyam du smos la / bdag cag kyang 'dir skyes pas zhes bya bar shes so zhes gang gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tamadrākṣuḥ /<br/> ābhāsvarasthā ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis de ji ltar mthong zhe na / kha cig na re 'od gsal la gnas pa rnams kyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni de nas shi 'phos pa yin no zhes zer ro / de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma thob na ni ji ltar na de'i sa pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran 'on te thob na ni ji ltar na tshangs pa chen po la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba la zhen pa dag yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarābhavasthā adrākṣurityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re srid pa bar ma la gnas pa dag gis mthong ngo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpi na dīrghamadhvānamavasthātuṃ saṃbhavaḥ pratibandhābhāvāditi /<br/> kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na yang bgegs byed pa med pa'i phyir dus ring por gnas pa mi srid na ji ltar na de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sems can 'di tshe ring zhing dus ring por gnas pa mthong ngo snyam du shes par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de na gnas pa de dag kho nas de'i sngon gyi tshul rjes su dran zhing de ltar dus ring por gnas pa mthong ngo / mthong nas kyang phyis de dag mthong ngo snyam du shes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gzugs can lus gcig cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de / 'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ tṛtīyā vijñānasthitiḥ /<br/> atra punaḥ paryantagrahaṇātsakaladvitīyadhyānagrahaṇaṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa gsum pa'o zhes gsungs te / 'dir ni mtha' smos pas bsam gtan gnyis pa mtha' dag smos par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams rnam par shes pa gnas pa gang du rnam par gzhag par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrābhinnavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānatvādekatvakāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs tha mi dad pa'i phyir lus gcig pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasaṃjñitvādaduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvācca nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du shes pa'i phyir 'du shes tha dad pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni dngos gzhi'i sa la yid bde ba'i dbang pos yongs su skyo nas nyer bsdogs las btang snyoms kyi dbang po mngon du byed la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyer bsdogs kyi btang snyoms kyi dbang po sa yongs su skyo nas ni yang dngos gzhi'i sa la yid bde ba'i dbang po mngon du byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti /<br/> nanu ca śubhakṛtsneṣvapyeṣa prasṅgaḥ /<br/> na teṣāṃ tena sukhenāsti parikhedaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na dbang phyug dag 'dod pa'i dga' bas yongs su skyo nas chos kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed la / chos kyi dga' bas yongs su skyo nas ni yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa bzhin no zhes grag go / 'di dge rgyas pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / ma yin te / de dag ni bde ba des yongs su skyo ba med do / de ci'i phyir zhe na / bde ba ni zhi ba yin la / yid bde ba ni sems gyo bar byed pa yin pas ma zhi ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ yathā te nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ /<br/> tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante /<br/> sahaivaiṣā 'rciḥ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ dagdhvā 'rvāgāgamiṣyatīti /<br/> tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams ni mdo las 'od gsal ba'i lha'i ris de na sems can gang dag skyes nas ring po ma lon pa 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa la mi mkhas shing 'chags pa la mi mkhas pa de dag me lce de mthong nas me lce de tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong pa bsregs nas 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo zhes skra gnas yi chad cing skyo bar 'gyur ro / 'od gsal ba'i lha'i ris de na sems can gang dag skyes nas ring du lon pa 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa la mkhas shing 'chags pa las mkhas pa la de dag sems can skrag pa de dag la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ /<br/> pūrvamapyeṣā 'rciḥ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ dagdhvā 'traivāntarhiteti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig / mi lce 'di ni sngon yang tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong pa bsregs nas de nyid du med par gyur to zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do zhes de dag ji ltar 'du shes tha dad pa dag yin par bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi /<br/> rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ /<br/> iyaṃ caturthī vijñānasthitiḥ /<br/> tatrābhinnavarṇasaṃsthānaliṅgatvādekatvakāyāḥ /<br/> ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ sukhasaṃjñitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de dag me lce 'ong ba dang med par 'du shes pa'i phyir dang skrag pa dang mi skrag par 'du shes pa'i phyir 'du shes tha dad pa dag yin gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du shes pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhes 'chad do / sems can gzugs can lus gcig 'du shes gcig pa dag kyang yod de / 'di lta ste / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so / 'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi pa'o zhes gsungs te / 'du shes gcig pa dag ces bya ba ni / bde bar 'du shes pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bsam gtan dang po na ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'du shes su 'du shes gcig pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa na ni dge ba'i 'du shes su 'du shes tha dad pa dag yin no / gsum pa na ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes su 'du shes gcig pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyāstrayo yathāsūtramityetāḥ sapta vijñānasthitayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa gsum po ni mdo las ji skad 'byung ba ste / de ltar na de dag gi ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kā 'tra vijñānasthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la rnam par shes pa gnas pa gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpratisaṃyuktāḥ pañca skandhāścatvāraśca yathāyogam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci rigs par de dag dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga dang bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣaṃ kasmānnā vijñānasthitiḥ /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> śeṣaṃ tatparibhedavat /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ śeṣam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir lhag ma rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin zhe na / 'di ltar / lhag ma de 'joms byed ldan / lhag ma gnag zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">durgatayaścaturtha dhyānaṃ bhavagraṃ ca /<br/> atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ /<br/> kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan 'gro rnams dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'o / 'di dag na rnam par shes pa 'joms par byed pa dag yod pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin no / 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba ci zhe na / gang gis rnam par shes pa 'joms par byed pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpāyeṣu duḥkhā vedanā paribheda upadhātidatvāt /<br/> catuteṃ dhyāne āsaṃjñikamasaṃjñisamāpattiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ngan song dag na ni 'joms par byed pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yin te / gnod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro / bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni 'du shes med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgre nirodhasamāpattiścittasantaticchedāt /<br/> punarāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo na ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin te / sems kyi rgyun gcod pa'i phyir ro / yang smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatrehasthānāṃ gantukāmatā tatrasthānāṃ cāvyuccalitukāmatā 'sau vijñānasthitiruktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang du 'di na gnas pa rnams na 'gro bar 'dod la / de na gnas pa rnams ni bskyod par mi 'dod pa de rnam par shes pa gnas par bshad na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāyeṣu cobhayaṃ nāshi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan song dag na ni gnyi ga med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni sems can rnams bskyod pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag yin te / so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'du shes med par 'jug 'dod la / 'phags pa rnams ni gnas gtsang mar ro / srid pa'i rtse mo ni rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etāśca sapta vijñānasthitayo yathoktāḥ /<br/> bhavāgrāsaṃjñisattvāśca sattvāvāsā nava smṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun po ji skad bshad pa de dag dang srid rtse dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams / sems can gyi ni gnas dgur bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣu hi sattvā āvasanti svecchayā /<br/> anicchāvasanānnānye /<br/> ke punaranye /<br/> apāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag tu sems can rnams rang dgas kun tu gnas so / mi 'dod bzhin gnas phyir gzhan min / gzhan gang zhe na / ngan song rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣu hi sattvā akāmakāḥ karmarākṣasairāvāsyante /<br/> natvicchayā vasanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag tu sems can rnams mi 'dod bzhin du las kyi srin po dag gis kun tu gnas su 'jug gi dga' ste gnas pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastena sattvāvāsā bandhanasthānavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de dag ni sems can rnams kyi gnas pa ma yin te btson ra bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo gzhan las ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun zhes gsungs so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catasraḥ sthitayaḥ punaḥ /<br/> katamāścatasraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan las ni gnas pa dag ni yang bzhi ste / zhes gsungs pa / bzhi gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti /<br/> tāsāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa gnas pa gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba dang tshor bar yang nye bar 'gro ba dang 'du shes su nye bar 'gro ba dang 'du byed du nye bar 'gro ba'o / de dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tā hi yathākramaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni go rims bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāraḥ sāsravāḥ skandhāḥ /<br/> te punaḥ /<br/> svabhūmāveva /<br/> nānyatra bhūmau /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> pratiṣṭā hi sthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag dang bcas pa'i phung po bzhi / de dag kyang rang gi sa pa nyid / sa gzhan du ni ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / gnas pa ni brten pa yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mi mnyam pa'i sa pa'i phung po dag la ni rnam par shes pa sred pa'i dbang gis mi brten pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti /<br/> sthātuḥ parihāreṇa sthitividhānāt /<br/> nahi sthātaiva sthitirucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa gnas pa zhes mi bya zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gnas pa po yongs su spangs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir te / gnas pa po nyid la ni gnas pa zhes mi bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā na rājaiva rājāsanamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na rgyal po nyid rgyal po'i bstan ma yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na chos gang dag la rnam par shes pa gnas nas gru dang mnyen pa'i tshul du 'gro bar byed pa'i chos de dag rnam par shes pa gnas pa dag ces bshad na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par shes pa la gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa ni ma yin pas de'i phyir ma bshad do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las / rnam par shes pa'i zas la dga' ba yang yod / 'dod chags kyang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhamiti /<br/> tatkatham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la dga' ba yod cing 'dod chags yod pa de la rnam par shes pa brten cing gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta ca vijñānasthitayaḥ pañcaskandhasaṃgṛhītā iti tatkatham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun phung po lnga'i rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bya ba de yang ji lta bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni bye brag med par ni skye ba'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i phung po dag la mngon par dga' ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa 'jug na rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa gnas pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor dbye ba ni ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig ni de lta ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāccatasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu /<br/> kevalam /<br/> vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi dag tu / rnam shes 'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi ni zhing gi ngo bor bstan la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa zag par ni sa bon gyi ngo bo kho nar bstan gyi / sa bon nyid sa bon gyi zhing gi ngo bor rnam par gzhag par gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yongs su brtag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ /<br/> atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta /<br/> naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta /<br/> catuṣkoṭi tu saṃgrahe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dag rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba de dag ni 'di'i zhing gi ngo bor shin tu legs pa yin pas de dag nyid 'di'i gnas pa dag ces bshad do / yang ci rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun gyis bzhi bsdus sam / 'on te bzhis bdun bsdus she na / bdun gyis bzhi yang ma yin la bzhis kyang bdun ma yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃgrahe vicāryamāṇe catuṣkoṭikaṃ veditavyam /<br/> syātsaptabhiḥ saṃgṛhītaṃ na catasṛbhirityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsdu na mu ni bzhi yin no / bsdu ba dpyad na bdun gyis bsdus la bzhis ma yin pa yang yod de zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa mu bzhir rog par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāḥ koṭiḥ saptasu yaddhijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni bdun dag tu rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni ngan song rnams dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo na rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i phung po rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā saptasu catvāraḥ skandhāścaturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa dag ni bdun dag tu phung po bzhi rnams so / bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccaitat gatyādibhedabhinnaṃ traidhātukamuktaṃ veditavyāḥ /<br/> catasro yonayastatra sattvānāmaṇḍajādayaḥ /<br/> aṇḍajā yonirjarāyujā saṃsvedajā upapādukā yoniḥ /<br/> yonirnāma jātiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i khams gsum bshad pa gang yin pa / der ni sgo nga las skyes sogs / sems can skye gnas bzhi dag tu / rig par bya ste / sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas dang mngal nas skyes pa'i skye gnas dang drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas dang rdzus te skyes pa'i skye gnas so / skye gnas zhes bya ba ni skye ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuvāntyasyāṃ sattvā miśrībhavanti prasavasāmyāditi yoniḥ /<br/> aṇḍajā yoniḥ katamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir sems can rnams 'chol bar 'gyur zhing skye ba thun mong pa'i phyir 'dra bar 'gyur bas skye gnas so / sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye sattvā aṇḍebhyo jāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gang dag sgo nga las skyes pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā haṃsakroñcacakravākamayūraśūkaśārikādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs la sogs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jarāyujā yoiḥ katamā /<br/> ye sattvā jarāyorjāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngal nas skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na / sems can gang dag mngal las skyes pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā hastyaśvagomahiṣakharavarāhādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / glang po che dang rta dang ba lang dang ma he dang bong bu dang phag la sogs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃsvedajā yoniḥ katamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye sattvā bhūsaṃsvedājjāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gang dag 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skye ba rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā kṛmikīṭapataṅgamaśakādayaḥ /<br/> upapādukā yoniḥ katamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste srin bu dang sbur pa dang phye ma leb dang sbrang bu la sogs pa lta bu'o / rdzus te 'byung ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin la / yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan par cig car du skye ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva upapadane read: upapādane sādhukāritvādupapādukā ityucyante /<br/> tadyathā devanārakāntarābhavikādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de dag skye ba la mdzes par byed pa'i phyir rdzus te 'bang ba rnams zhes bya ste / 'di lta ste / lha dang srid pa bar ma la sogs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha /<br/> caturdhā nara tiryañcaḥ /<br/> manuṣyāścaturvidhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'gro ba gang na skye gnas du zhig yod ce na / smras pa / mi dang dud 'gro rnam pa bzhi / mi rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sgo nga las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / khrung khrung mo las skyes pa brag dang nye brag dang ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rgyal po lnga len gyi bu lnga brgya rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jarāyujā yathedānīm
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngal na skyes pa ni ji ltar da ltar gyi lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃsvedajāstadyathā māndhātucāruśpacārūpacārukapotamālinyāmrapālyādayaḥ /<br/> upapādukāḥ punaḥ prāthamakalpikāḥ /<br/> evaṃ tiryañco 'pi caturvidhāḥ /<br/> trividhā dṛśyanta eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drod gsher las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / da las nu ba dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang thi ba'i phreng ba can dang aa mra skyong ma la sogs pa lta bu'o / rdzus te skye ba ni bskal pa dang po pa rnams kho na'o / dud 'gro yang rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapādukāstu nāgasuparṇi prabhṛtayaḥ /<br/> nārakā upapādukāḥ /<br/> antarābhavadevāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa gsum ni snang ba kho nar zad do / rdzus te skye ba rnams ni klu dang 'dab bzangs la sogs pa lta bu'o / dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang / srid pa bar ma rdzus te skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve nārakā antarābhavikāḥ devāścopapādukā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dang srid pa bar ma pa dang lha thams cad ni rdzus te skye ba kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pretā api jarāyujāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yi dvags mngal nas skye ba yang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apiśabdādapyupapādukā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdzus te skye ba dag yin no zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pretī nivedayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po la yi dvags mo zhig na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gis mtshan mo bu lnga dang / de bzhin nyi na mo gzhan lnga dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me /<br/> katamā yoniḥ sarvasādhvī /<br/> upapādukā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskyed nas de dag za mod kyi / 'on kyang bdag ni tshim pa med / ces smras pa'o / skye gnas thams cad kyi nang na bzang ba gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate /<br/> evaṃ hi kriyamāṇe mahāntamarthaṃ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzus te skye ba yin no / 'o na ci'i phyir srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba la dbang thob pa yang mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas la brten ce na / de ltar mdzad na don chen po gzigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñātisaṃbandhena mahataḥ śākyavaṃśasya dharme 'vataraṇārthaṃ cakravarttivaṃśyo 'yamiti cānyeṣāṃ bahumānādarāvarjanārthaṃ manuṣyabhūtā api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye du dang 'brel bas sh'akya'i rigs chen po chos la gzud pa'i phyir dang 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs yin no zhes gzhan dag rim gro bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir dang mir gyur pa dag gis kyang grub pa 'di thob bo zhes gdul bya rnams spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke prādurbhūya māyayā lokaṃ bhakṣayatīti /<br/> apare tvāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin te / rigs dang gdung med na / ji ltar gzhan mu stegs can na re bskal pa brgyar 'das nas sgyu ma mkhan 'di lta bu zhig 'jig rten du byung nas sgyu mas 'jig rten za'o zhes kha zer ba ltar 'di su zhig yin / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'am / 'on te sha za zhig ces de snyam du yongs su rtog par 'gyur ro / gzhan dag na re gang dag la mi rnams dang gzhan dag gis mchod pa byas nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate niśānta iva tailapradyoto 'ntardhīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong phrag gis mtho ris dang byang grol 'thob pa ring bsrel sku gdung rnams bzhag pa'i phyir te / rdzus te skye ba'i sems can rnams la ni phyi'i sa bon med pa'i phyir shi ba rnams kyi lus mi gnas te / tho rangs kyi til mar gyi mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin no zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ /<br/> praśnātpraśnāntaramupajāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul yin par 'dod pa rnams la ni lan de rigs pa ma yin no / dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthamiti /<br/> noktaṃ bhakṣayatītyapi tūddharati bhakṣārthamajñatvādityadoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rdzus te skye ba rnams kyi lus zhig pa med na / ji ltar mdo las rdzus te skye ba'i nam mkha' lding gis rdzus te skye ba'i klu bza' ba'i phyir 'byin to zhes gsungs she na / za'o zhes ni ma gsungs pas ma shes nas bza' ba'i phyir 'byin pas nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti /<br/> katamā yoniḥ sarvavahvī /<br/> upapādukaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ji srid ma shi'i bar du za bar byed kyi shi pa de'i tshim par 'gyur pa ni ma yin no / skye gnas thams cad kyi nang nas mang ba gang yin zhe na / rdzus te skye ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti /<br/> ko 'yamastarābhāvo nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'gro ba gnyis dang gsum gyi phyogs dang srid pa bar ma thams cad yin no / srid pa bar ma zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛtyūpapattibhavayorantarā bhavatīha vaḥ /<br/> maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir gang 'chi dang skye ba yin / srid pa'i bar du 'byung ba'o / lus gang yul gzhan du skye ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i srid pa dang skye ba'i srid pa'i bar du mngon par 'grub pa de ni srid pa bar ma zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gatyantarālatvāt /<br/> kathamayaṃ jātaśca nāma nacopapanno bhavati /<br/> gamyadeśānupetatvānnopapanno 'ntarābhavaḥ /<br/> upapattigato hyupapanna ityucyate /<br/> padergatyarthatvāt /<br/> nacāyaṃ gamyadeśamupagatontarābhavastasmānnopapannaḥ /<br/> kaḥ punarasau deśo gantavyaḥ /<br/> yatrākṣiptasya vīpākasyābhivyaktiḥ samāptiśca /<br/> vicchinna evopapattibhavo maraṇabhavātsaṃbhavatīti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /<br/> tadetanneṣyate /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> yuktitaśca āgamataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba'i bar ma yin pa'i phyir ro / ji ltar na 'di skye ba yang yin la byung ba yang ma yin zhe na / bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin phyir / srid pa bar ma byung ba min / son pa ni byung ba yin na srid pa bar ma 'di ni bgrod par bya ba'i yul du son pa ma yin te / de lta bas na byung ba ma yin no / bgrod par bya ba'i yul de gang zhig ce na / gang du rnam par smin pas 'phangs pa mngon zhing rdzogs pa'o / sde pa gzhan dag na re / 'chi ba'i srid pa chad pa kho na las skye ba'i srid pa 'byung ngo zhes zer te / de ni mi 'dod do / de ci'i phyir zhe na / rigs pa dang lung las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvat yuktiṃ niśrityocyate /<br/> vrīhisantānasādharmvādavicchinnabhavodbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig rigs pa la brten nas / 'bru'i rgyun dang chos mthun phyir / srid pa chad las 'byung ba min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun gyi 'jug pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad par yul gzhan dag tu 'byung ba mthong ste / dper na 'bru'i rgyun lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādasyāpi sattvasantānasyāvicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo bhaviṣṇuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na sems can gyi sems kyi rgyun 'di yang mi 'chad par yul gzhan du 'byung ba'i chos can yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chad nas 'byung ba yang mthong ste / dper na me long la sogs pa dag gi nang du gzugs las gzugs brnyan lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ maraṇabhavādupapattibhavasya syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'chi ba'i srid pa las kyang skye ba'i srid pa rung ngo zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratibimbamasiddhatvādasāmyācchānidarśanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir ba dang / mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratibimbaṃ nāmānyadevotpadyate dharmāhntaramityasiddhametat /<br/> siddhāvapi ca satyāmasāmyādanidarśanaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba kha dog gi khyad par gzhan kho na zhig 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni ma grub bo / grub tu zin kyang mi 'dra ba'i phyir dpe ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvadasiddham /<br/> sahaikatra dvayābhāvāt /<br/> tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ji ltar ma grub ce na / gcig na lhan cig gnyis med phyir / yul de nyid na me long gi gzugs kyang snang / gzugs brnyan yang snang ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten gyi 'byung ba tha dad pa'i phyir yul gcig tu gzugs gnyis lhan cig 'byung ba ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā digbhedavyavasthiterekasminvāpyambudeśe svābhimukhadeśasthānāṃ rūpāṇāmanyo 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti na tatra rūpāntaropapattiryuktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du phyogs tha dad pa na gnas pa rnams kyi mtshe'u'i chu yul gcig na rang gi mdun rol gyi yul na gnas pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan phan tshun dmigs te / gzugs gcig la lta ba po gnyis kyis lhan cig mi mthong ba ni ma yin pas der gzugs gzhan zhig 'byung bar rigs pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chāyātapayośca dvayoḥ sahaikatrabhāvo na dṛṣṭaḥ /<br/> upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grib ma dang nyi ma gnyis kyang lhan cig 'byung ba ma mthong ba na grib ma na 'dug pa'i me long gi nang na nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan yang dmigs pas der de 'byung bar rigs pa ni ma yin no / yang na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā sahaikatra dvayābhāvāditi katamasya dvayasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig na lhan cig gnyis med phyir / zhes bya ba gnyis gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādarśatalasyendupratibimbakasya ca /<br/> anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam /<br/> tacca tatropapadyamānaṃ nānyatropalabhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me long gi ngos dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan te / me long gi ngos kyang gzhan kho na la yod la / zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nang du song ba yang khron pa'i chu bzhin du gzhan kho na na snang ngo / de yang de'i nang du 'byung na ni gzhan na dmigs par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato nāstyeva tat kiñcit /<br/> sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati /<br/> acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ /<br/> evaṃ tāvandasiddhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de ni cung zad kyang med kyi gang phyir de ltar snang ba de ni tshogs la de'i mthu de 'dra ba yin te / chos rnams kyi mthu'i bye brag ni bsam gyis mi khyab po / re zhig ma grub pa'i phyir ni de lta bu yin no / ji ltar na mi 'dra ba'i phyir dpe ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasāmyādanidarśanaṃ bhavati /<br/> asantānād /<br/> nahi vimvasya pratibimbakaṃ santānabhūtamādarśasantānasaṃvaddhatvāt sahabhāvācca /<br/> yathā maraṇasyopapattibhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun min phyir / ji ltar 'chi ba'i srid pa skye ba'i srid pa lta bur gzugs brnyan ni gzugs kyi rgyun du gyur pa ma yin te / me long gi rgyud dang 'brel pa'i phyir dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca /<br/> dvayodayāt /<br/> dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ pratibimbasyodayo bhavati /<br/> bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate /<br/> nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /<br/> na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun la mi 'chad par yul gzhan dag tu 'byung bar brjod kyi rgyun ma yin pa la ni ma yin pas dpe mi 'dra ba yin no / gzugs brnyan ni / gnyis las 'byung phyir / gzugs brnyan ni gzugs dang me long dang rgyu gnyis las 'byung bar 'gyur te / gtso bo'i rgyu gang yin pa de la brten nas 'byung na / skye ba'i srid pa yang de ltar 'chi ba'i srid pa dang gtso bo'i rgyu gang yang rung ba zhig dang rgyu gnyis las 'byung ba ni med do / de'i phyir yang de'i 'di ni mi 'dra ba yin no / phyi'i khu chu dang khrag la sogs pa sems pa med pa gtso bo'i rgyu yin pa yang rigs pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate /<br/> evaṃ tāvadyuktito neṣyate /<br/> na marāṇabhavādvicchinna upapattibhavaprādurbhāvaḥ /<br/> tasmādastyevāntarābhavaḥ /<br/> kaṇṭhokteścāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang du rdzus te skye ba rnams nam mkha' kho na la 'byung ba der ci zhig yongs su brtag / de ltar re zhig rigs pa las 'chi ba'i srid pa 'byung bar mi 'dod do / de lta bas na srid pa bar ma ni yod pa nyid do / mgur nas gsungs phyir yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ sapta bhavāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / srid pa ni bdun te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /<br/> naitatsūtraṃ tairāmnāyate /<br/> itastarhi /<br/> gandharvāt /<br/> trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntirbhavati /<br/> mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba'i srid pa dang dud 'gro'i srid pa dang yi dags kyi srid pa dang lha'i srid pa dang mi'i srid pa dang las kyi srid pa dang srid pa bar ma'o zhes gsungs so / mdo 'di ni de dag mi 'don to zhe na / 'o na / dri za zhes bya ba 'di las te / gnas gsum mngon du gyur pas ma'i mngal du bu chags par gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ sanipatitau ca /<br/> gandharvaśca pratyupasthito bhātīti /<br/> antarābhavaṃ hitvā ko 'nyo gandharvaḥ /<br/> etadapi naiva tairāmnāyate /<br/> kathaṃ tarhi /<br/> skndhabhedaśca pratyupasthito bhavatīti /<br/> yadyevamāśvalāyanasūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang pha ma chags par gyur cing phrad pa dang dri za yang nye bar gnas par gyur na'o zhes gsungs pa / srid pa bar ma ma gtogs par dri za gzhan gang zhig yin / 'di yang de dag 'di skad du mi 'don to / 'o na ji ltar zhe na / phung po zhig pa nye bar gnas par gyur na'o zhes 'don to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jānanta bhavanto yo 'sau gandharvaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ /<br/> kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de lta na lnga len gyi bu'i mdo / khyod kyi dri za nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa 'di rgyal rigs sam / bram ze 'am / rje'u rigs sam / dmangs rigs sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa zhig gam / 'on te lho dang nub dang byang nas 'ongs pa zhig shes sam zhes bya ba ji ltar drang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi skandhabhedasyāgamanaṃ yujyate /<br/> athaitadapi na paṭhacyate /<br/> itastarhi /<br/> pañcokteḥ /<br/> pañcānāgāmina ityuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po zhig pa ni 'ong bar rung ba ma yin no / 'on te 'di yang mi 'don to zhe na / 'o na / sngar gsungs / zhes bya ba 'di las te / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir mi 'ong ba ni lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrdhvastrotāśceti /<br/> asatyantarābhave kathamantarāparinirvāyī nāma syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang gong du 'pho ba'o zhes gsungs pa srid pa bar ma med na ji ltar bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarā nāma devāḥ santītyeke /<br/> upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /<br/> tasmānyeyaṃ kalpanā sādhvī /<br/> itaśca /<br/> gatisūtrataḥ /<br/> sapta satpuruṣagatayaḥ ityatra sūtre /<br/> antarāparinirvāyiṇastraya uktāḥ /<br/> kāladeśaprakarṣabhedena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re bar ma dor zhes bya ba'i lha dag cig yod do zhes zer ro / de lta na skyes ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang lha dag cig yin par thal bar 'gyur ro / de lta bas na rtog pa 'di ni bzang po ma yin no / 'gro mdo zhes bya ba 'di las kyang 'grub ste / skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes bya ba'i mdo las kyang dus dang yul gyi khyad par gyi bye brag gis bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gsum du bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na zhog ma'i me chung du mngon par 'grub bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni dang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā 'yaḥ prapāṭikā utpatantyeva nirvāyādevaṃ dvitīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na lcags kyi tsha tsha gnam du yar ba bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni gnyis pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā 'yaḥprapātikā utplutya pṛthivyāmapatitaiva nirvāyādevaṃ tṛtīyaḥ /<br/> nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā /<br/> anye punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na lcags kyi tsha tsha gnam du yar nas sa la ma lhung ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni gsum pa'o zhes gsungs la / bar mdo zhes bya ba'i lha ni yul dang dus kyi khyad par gyi tha dad pa rnam pa gsum pa de lta bu med pas 'di ni rtog pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gang zhig tshe'i tshad kyi bar du'am / lha dang nye ba'i bar du nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar byed pa gang yin pa der ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā /<br/> tena trividho bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang khams kyi gnas skabs pa'am / 'du shes kyi gnas skabs pa'am / rnam par rtog pa'i gnas skabs pa zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste / des na rnam pa gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na dang po ni gzugs kyi khams su ris mthun pa yongs su blangs nas mya ngan las 'da' ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyo devasamṛddhiṃ cānubhūya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni lha rnams kyi 'byor ba nyams su myong nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyo devānāṃ dharmasaṃgītimanupraviśya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni lha rnams kyi chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i nang du zhugs nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante /<br/> deśagativiśeṣābhāvāt /<br/> ārupyeṣvapi cāntarāparinirvāyī paṭhyetāyuḥpramāṇāntare parinirvāṇāt /<br/> na ca paṭhyate /<br/> dhyānaiścatasro daśikā ārupyaiḥ saptikātrayam /<br/> saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ /<br/> ityetasyāyurdānagāthāyām /<br/> tasmādetadapi sarvaṃ kalpanāmātram /<br/> athaitānyapi sūtrāṇi tairnāmnāyante /<br/> kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca /<br/> yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ /<br/> yattarhi sūtra uttam atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita iti /<br/> tat kathamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni yang dag par 'gro ba mchog tu ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am / skyes pa tsam kho nar ma yin gyi tshe phal cher bcom nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes zer te / de dag thams cad kyang yul du 'gro ba'i bye brag med pa'i phyir zhog ma la sogs pa'i dpe dag dang mi 'byor ro / tshe'i tshad kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gzugs med pa dag tu yang bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsungs par 'gyur ba zhig na / bsam gtan dag gi bcu tshan bzhi / gzugs med dag gi bdun tshan gsum / 'du shes kyi ni drug tshan du / mdzad nas tshoms su yang dag bsdeb / zhes gsungs pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di las kyang mi 'byung ngo / de lta bas na de dag thams cad kyang rtog pa tsam du zad do / 'on te de dag ni mdo de dag kyang mi 'don to zhe na / ston pa gang yin pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das / bstan pa 'di'i 'dren pa ni med / rnam pa mang po ni tha dad kyi steng du da dung yang tshig dang don la dga' dgur byed na go / da ci zhig byar yod de re zhig gang dag la lung 'di tshad ma yin pa de dag la ni lung las kyang srid pa bar ma grub bo / 'o na mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi jīvanneva nārakībhirjvālābhirāliṅgitaḥ /<br/> kālalṃ kṛtvā 'ntarābhavenāvīciṃ prāpta ityayaṃ tatrābhiprayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas bdud sun 'byin byed rang gi lus kho nas mnar med pa'i dmyal pa chen por lhung do zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang 'dir dgos pa ni de gson po kho nar dmyal ba'i me dag gis bskor te shi nas srid pa bar mas mnar med par song do snyam du dgongs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante /<br/> ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las shin tu drag po yongs su rdzogs pa rnams ni lus 'dor ba la mi sdod pas de'i phyir 'di'i mthong ba'i chos la myang bar 'gyur ba'i las ni dang por smin la / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni phyis smin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata iti /<br/> anyāṃ gatimagatvetyabhiprāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni mtshams med pa lnga'i las gang dag byas shing bsags nas de ma thag tu dmyal ba dag tu skye'o zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang / dgongs pa ni 'gro ba gzhan du mi 'gro bar zhes bya ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyavedanīyatvaṃ tatra karmaṇo dyotitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yathārutaṃ kalpyate /<br/> pañcaiva kṛtvā naikamiti prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te sgra ji bzhin du brtags na ni lnga kho na byas nas yin gyi gcig ces bya bar yang mi 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kriyānantaraṃ ca /<br/> na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byas ma thag tu yin gyi dus gzhan gyi bar du gson por 'dug nas kyang ma yin no / srid pa bar ma skye ba nyid yin par go su zhig mi 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarā bhavenaiva hyasau maraṇāntaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /<br/> abhimukhatvāt /<br/> na ca brūma upapanno bhavatīti /<br/> iyaṃ tarhi gāthā kathaṃ nīyate /<br/> upanītatayā jarāturaḥ saṃprāpto hi mamāntikaṃ dvija /<br/> vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave ti /<br/> atrāpi manuṣyeṣvantarāvāso nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di 'chi ba'i srid pa'i mjug thogs su skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir srid pa bar ma kho nas dmyal ba dag tu skye ba yin gyi skyes pa yin no zhes ni mi smra'o / 'o na / bram ze na tshod khyer zin rga ba dang / na ba yin te gshin rje'i drung du phyen / bar na khyod kyi gnas kyang yod min zhing / khyod kyi lam brgyags kyang ni yod ma yin / zhes gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ji ltar drang / 'dir yang dgongs pa ni mi dag gi nang na gnas su med do snyam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā 'ntarābhave 'pyasya vāso nāstyupapattideśasaṃprāptiprati gamanādhiṣṭhānāditi /<br/> ayamatrābhiprāyo nāyamabhiprāya iti duta evaitat /<br/> tulya eṣa bhavato 'pyanuyogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na skye ba'i yul du phyin par bya ba'i phyir dang 'gro ba la bgegs byed pa med pa'i phyir srid pa bar ma na yang 'di gnas pa med do snyam pa yin no / 'di la 'di ni dgongs pa yin gyi 'di ni dgongs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las brtags pa 'di ni khyod la yang mtshungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādubhayasminnapi pakṣe yathhottasūtrāvirodhānna bhavatyetadantarābhavasyābhāve jñāpakam /<br/> jñāpakaṃ hi nāmāgatikā gatiriti /<br/> atha kāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyataḥ kimākṛtirantarābhavo 'bhinivarttate /<br/> ekākṣepādasāvaiṣyatpūrvakālabhavākṛtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gnyi ga'i phyogs la yang ji skad gsungs pa'i mdo mi 'gal ba'i phyir 'di ni srid pa bar ma med pa'i khungs ma yin no / khungs zhes bya ba ni shes par byed pa gzhan du shes par mi byed pa yin no / yang 'gro ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa bar ma'i sha tshugs ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'grub ce na / de ni 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir / sngon dus srid 'byung sha tshugs can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yenaiva karmaṇā gatirākṣipyate tenaivāntarābhavastatprāptaye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las gang gis 'gro ba 'phen pa de nyid kyi der phyin par bya ba'i phyir sred pa bar ma yang 'phen te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de ni 'gro ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro bde dus snga ma'i srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i sha tshugs lta bur 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na khyi mo la sogs pa'i mngal gcig tu 'gro ba lnga pa'i srid pa bar ma mngon par 'grub pas dmyal ba'i srid pa bar mas ma'i mngal tshig par 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig srid pa snga ma la yang dmyal ba pa rnams lhag pa dag na 'phyan pa na rtag tu 'bar ba ma yin na srid pa bar ma pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astu vā prajvalitaḥ /<br/> sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'bar du chug na yang de ni lus shin tu dang ba'i phyir ji lta ba bltar mi nus pa de ltar reg pa yang mi nus pas 'di ni klan kar mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarābhavānāmapyanyonyaṃ kukṣāvasaṃśleṣātkarmapratibandhācca na dāhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma rnams kyang mngal na phan tshun mi reg pa'i phyir dang las la rag lus pa'i phyir mi tshig go / bong tshod ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na byis pa lo lnga 'am drug lon pa lta bu ste / de yang dbang po gsal ba yin no / byang chub sems dpa' ni dper na gzhon nu thor bu lta bu mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir srid pa bar ma la gnas pa yum gyi lhums su zhugs pas gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya snang bar mdzad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt /<br/> nimittamātraṃ tat tiryagyoneściravyāvṛttatvāt /<br/> tadyathā kṛkī rājā daśa svapnānadrākṣīditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi rmi lam na lhums su glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhugs par gzigs pa ji lta bu zhe na / dud 'gro'i skye gnas bzlog nas yun ring du lon pa'i phyir de ni mtshan ma tsam du zad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karikūpasaktu candanakalabhārāmāsta thā kaperabhiṣekaḥ /<br/> aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ /<br/> naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na rgyal po kri kis glang po dang khron pa dang phye dang tsan dan dang tshal dang glang po che'i phru gu dang spre'u gnyis dang ras yug dang 'thab mo zhes bya ba rmi lam bcu mthong ba lta bu'o / srid pa bar ma ni lto ba brtol te 'jug pa ma yin gyi skye gnas kyi sgo nas 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti /<br/> dharmasūtravibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate /<br/> vāraṇa tvamupagamya pāṇḍaraṃ ṣaḍviṣāṇaruciraṃ catuṣkramam /<br/> mātṛgarbhaśayanaṃ viśeṣasaṃprajānanṛṣirāśramaṃ yatheti /<br/> naitadavaśyanetavyam /<br/> nahyetat sūtraṃ na vinayaḥ nābhidharmaḥ /<br/> kāvyametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir mtshe ma las gang phyis byung ba de ni nu bo zhes bya'o / gang sngar byung ba de ni phu bo zhes bya'o / 'o na chos ldan rab 'byor gyis / glang chen dkar po mche ba drug ldan pa / rkang bzhi mdzes dang ldan par zhal bzhes nas / drang srong gnas zhes pa ni ji bzhin du / yum gyi lams kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur / ces bshad pa 'di ji ltar drang zhe na / 'di ni gdon mi za bar drang bar bya ba ma yin te / 'di ni mdo sde yang ma yin / 'dul ba yang ma yin / chos mngon pa yang ma yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rang bzo yin te / rang bzo mkhan rang bzo sbyor ba rnams kyi bsam pa kha cig ni sgro 'dogs par yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā netavyameva /<br/> yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gdon mi za bar drang bar bya'o zhe na yang ji ltar yum gyi rmi lam na de zhugs par gzigs pa ltar des kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di ltar byas so zhes de ltar drang bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacaro 'pyantarābhavaḥ saṃpūrṇapramāṇaḥ savastraśca prādurbhavati /<br/> apatrāpyotsadatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma yang bong tshod rdzogs pa dang ngo tsha shes pa'i shas che ba'i phyir gos dang bcas par 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub sems dpa'i yang gos dang bcas pa yin no / dge slong ma dkar mo'i yang gos dang bcas pa yin te / smon lam gyi dbang gis de nyid kyis dkris nas bsregs pa'i bar du yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyo nagnaḥ /<br/> kāmadhātoranapatrāpyotsadatvāt /<br/> atha ko 'yaṃ pūrvakālabhavo nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ngo tsha med pa'i shas che ba'i phyir gzhan ni gcer bu yin no / yang srid pa snga ma zhes bya ba 'di gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punarmaraṇātpūrva upapattikṣaṇātparaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te / skye ba'i skad cig phan chad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavo hi nāmāviśeṣeṇa pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /<br/> sa eva caturdhā bhidyate /<br/> antarābhavo yathoktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag med par nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag go / da ni rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / srid pa bar ma ni ji skad bshad pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattibhabo gatīṣu pratisandhikṣaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i srid pa ni 'gro ba rnams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de phan chad 'chi ba'i skad cig ma ma gtogs pa'i srid pa gzhan thams cad ni dus snga ma'i srid pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate /<br/> sa cāyamantarābhavaḥ /<br/> sajātiśuddhadivyākṣidṛśyaḥ /<br/> samānajātīyairevāntarābhavikairdṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma tha ma ni 'chi ba'i srid pa yin te / gal te sems can gzugs can dag gi nang du skye na gang gi 'og tu srid pa bar ma 'byung ba yin no / srid pa bar ma de yang / ris mthun lha mig dag pas mthong / srid pa bar ma ris mthun pa dag gis mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti /<br/> upapattikṣuṣā tu na dṛśyate /<br/> jātyarthamacchatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag la lha'i mig shin tu rnam par dag pa mngon par shes pa las byung ba yod pa de dag gis 'di mthong gi / shin tu dang ba'i phyir skyes nas thob pa'i mig gis ni mi mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">devāntarābhavikaḥ sarvān paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re lha'i srid ba bar ma pas ni thams cad mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyapretatiryagnārakāntarābhavikāḥ pūrva pūrvamapātyetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dang / yi dags dang dud 'gro dang dmyal ba'i srid pa bar ma rnams kyis ni gong ma ma gtogs pa'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmarddhivegavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhirākāśagamanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmaṇā ṛddhiḥ karmarddhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi rdzu 'phrul byed pas na las kyi rdzu 'phrul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyā vegaḥ karmarddhivegaḥ śīgratā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i shugs ni las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs de mgyogs pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'syāstīti karmarddhivegavān /<br/> yenāsau na śakyo buddhairapi pratibanddhum /<br/> karmaṇo 'sya balīyastvāt /<br/> sakalākṣaḥ /<br/> samagrapañcendriyaḥ /<br/> apratighavān /<br/> pratighātaḥ pratighaḥ /<br/> so 'syāstīti pratighavān /<br/> na pratighavānapratighavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'di la yod pas na las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs dang ldan pa'o / des na 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang dgag par mi spyod de / las stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro / dbang po kun tshang / dbang po lnga char tshang pa'o / thogs med ldan / thogs pa ni rdugs pa'o / de 'di la yod pas thogs pa dang ldan pa'o / thogs pa med pa dang ldan pas na thogs med ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vajrādibhirapyanivāryatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdo rje la sogs pas kyang mi zlogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba gshegs nas de'i nang nas byung ba'i srin bu dmigs so zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā /<br/> anivartyaḥ
