</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'gro ba gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de las rnam pa thams cad du mi zlogs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi kadācinmanuṣyāntarābhavo 'ntardhāya devāntarābhavo bhavatyanyo vā /<br/> niyatamanena yāmeva gatimadhikṛtyābhinirvṛttastasyāmevopapattavyam nānyasyāmiti /<br/> kiṃ punarantarābhavo 'pi kāmāvacaraḥ kavaḍīkāramāhāraṃ bhuṅkte /<br/> omityāha /<br/> na tvaudārikam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sa gandhabhuk /<br/> ata eva gandharva ityucyate /<br/> dhātūnāmanekārthatvāt /<br/> hrasvatvaṃ śakandhukarkandhuvat /<br/> alpeśākhyastu durgandhāharo maheśakhyaḥ sugandhāhāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi'i srid pa bar ma med par gyur nas lha'i srid pa bar ma'am / gzhan du 'gyur ba ni nam yang med kyi 'di 'gro ba gang gi dbang du byas nas mngon par 'grub pa de kho nar skye bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so / yang ci 'dod pa na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma yang kham gyi zas za'am zhe na / smras pa de bzhin te / rags pa ni ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / de ni dri za'o / de nyid kyi phyir dri za zhes bya'o / dbang chung bar grags pa ni dri mi zhim pa za ba'o / dbang che bar grags pa ni dri zhim po za ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyantaṃ kālamavatiṣṭhate /<br/> nāsti niyama iti bhadantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus ji srid kyi bar du gnas she na / btsun pa na re nges pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /<br/> ekanikāyasabhāgatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji srid du skye ba'i tshogs pa ma rnyed kyi bar du'o / de'i tshe 'phen pa logs shig na med de / ris mthun pa gcig pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā hi tasyāyuṣaḥ kṣayānmaraṇabhavaḥ prasajyeta /<br/> yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta /<br/> kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam /<br/> naitadāgataṃ sūtre śāstre vā /<br/> evaṃ tu yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na de'i tshe zad pas 'chi ba'i srid par yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / gal te sha'i phung po ri rab tsam du gyur la de dag thams cad srin bu rnams kyis gang bar gyur na / de ci de dag gi srid pa bar ma rnams der sdod pa kho nar gyur tam / de dag ga las 'ongs pa brjod par bya'o zhe na / 'di mdo 'am bstan bcos dag las ni mi 'byung mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gandharasābhigṛddhānāmalpāyuṣāṃ jantūnāmanto nāsti /<br/> te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar dri dang ro la mngon par chags pa'i skye bo phra mo tshe thung du rnams mtha' med pas de dag dri tshor nas dri dang ro la mngon par chags pa rnams 'chi ba na srin bu'i ngo bor 'gyur ba'i las sang par byas nas / srid pa des srin bu'i nad dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na gdon mi za bar de'i rkyen mang po kho na'i dus su der 'gyur ba'i las rnams rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba la 'jug pa rnyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'khor los sgyur pa'i las yod du zin kyang skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri 'am / tshe lo ches mang ba na 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung gi gzhan du ma yin pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatīti bhadantavasumitraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa dbyig bshes na re zhag bdun du gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te da srid kyi tshogs pa ma rnyed na shi 'phos shing shi 'phos nas yang de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta saptāhānītyapare /<br/> alpaṃ kālamiti vaṃbhāṣikāḥ /<br/> sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re zhag bdun phrag bdun du'o zhes zer ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni srid pa tshol ba yin pa'i phyir myur ba kho nas song ste nyid mtshams sbyor bas na dus thung ngur gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati /<br/> tadā karmāṇyeva pratyayānāṃ sāmagrīmāvahanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe rkyen tshogs pa yang ma yin la 'di nges par yul der skye bar 'gyur pa yang yin no de'i tshe las rnams kho nas rkyen dag tshogs pa 'dren par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te ma des na ni de las gzhan pa'i yul du skye ba der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re de 'dra bar skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste ba lang dag ni dbyar rnams su 'khrig pa mang la / khyi rnams ni ston kar ro / dom rnams ni dgun kar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti /<br/> na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rta rnams ni sos kar ro / ba men dang ce spyang dang bong bu dang dred mo rnams la ni dus med pas dus gzhan pa ba lang rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni ba men rnams kyi nang du skye'o / khyi rnams kyi nang du gang yin pa de ni ce spyang rnams kyi nang du'o / rta rnams kyi nang du gang yin pa de ni bong bu rnams kyi nang du'o / dom rnams kyi nang du gang yin pa de ni dred mo rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir ris gzhan gyi srid pa bar mas ris mthun pa gzhan du skye bar mi nus pas de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa khalveṣa gatideśasaṃprāptyarthaṃ prādurbhūto 'ntarābhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'gro ba'i yul du phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i srid pa bar ma de ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viparyastamatiryāti gatideśam riraṃsayā /<br/> sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate /<br/> tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari /<br/> viparyayāt pratighaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas / rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro / da ni las kyi mthu las byung ba'i mig gis rang gi skye ba'i yul thag ring po na 'dug kyang mthong ngo / des de na pha ma nyal pa byed pa de mthong nas pa zhig yin na ni des ma la pho'i 'dod chags skye'o / mo zhig yin na ni pha la mo'i 'dod chags skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzlog pa ni khong khro ba skye ba ste / btags pa las 'di skad du de'i che dri za la sems gnyis las rjes su chags pa dang ldan pa'am / khong khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems gang yang rung ba'i mngon du gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate /<br/> tasmiṃścāśucau garbhasthānasaṃprāpte jātaharṣo 'bhiniviśate /<br/> tato 'sya skandhā ghanībhavantyantarābhavaskandhāścāntardhīyante ityupapanno bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gnyis kyi phyin ci log tu gyur pas yul der phyin pa dang dga' bar 'dod pa'i gnas skabs der bdag nyid mos so / mngal gyi gnas mi gtsang ba der phyin nas dga' ba skyes nas gnas so / de nas de'i phung po mkhrang por 'gyur la srid pa bar ma yang 'gag par 'gyur bas na skyes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de pho zhig yin na ni ma'i lto'i gyas phyogs su snyes nas rgyab rol du kha bltas te tsog tsog por skye'o / gal te mo zhig yin na ni de ma'i lto'i gyon phyogs su snyes nas lto'i mdun rol du kha lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te de ma ning zhig yin na ni de 'dod chags gang dang ldan pa de bzhin du gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cāstyantarābhavo vyantaraḥ sakalendriyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma'i dbang po thams cad tshang ba yin pa'i phyir dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir mor gyur pa dang phor gyur pa zhugs nas gnas pa'i lta ba bzhin du gnas so / phyis lus skye zhing ma ning du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ vicāryate /<br/> kimasya śukrakśoṇitamahābhūtānyevendriyāśrayabhāvamāpadyante karmavaśādāhosvit bhūtāntarāṇyeva karmabhirjāyante /<br/> tānyupaśrityeti /<br/> tānyevetyeke /<br/> anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste / ci las kyi dbang gis khu chu dang khrag gi 'byung ba chen po dag kho na 'di'i dbang po'i rten du 'gyur ram / 'on te las rnams las / de dag la brten nas 'byung ba kho na zhig skye bar 'gyur zhe na / kha cig na re de dag kho na yin te / khu chu dang khrag dbang po med pa na ni 'gag la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vījāṅduranirodhotpādanyāyena yattatkālamityākhyāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bon dang myu gu 'gag pa dang skye ba'i tshul du dbang po dang bcas pa nur nur po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bshad na pha ma'i nur nur po mi gtsang ba las skyes pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du dge slong dag khyed kyis ni yun ring po nas ngur khrod skyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta iti /<br/> bhūtāntarāṇyevetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khrag gi thigs pa blangs so zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig legs pa yin no zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re 'byung ba gzhan dag kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathāparṇakrimeḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na lo ma'i srin bu lta bu yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśucisaṃniśrayotpattyabhisaṃbandhivacanāttu kalalasya sūtrāvirodha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gtsang ba la brten nas skye ba la dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir mdo dang yang mi 'gal lo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate /<br/> anyatra tu yathāyogaṃ vaktavyamityāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sgo nga las skye ba dang mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas su 'jug pa ni de lta bu'o / gzhan la ni ci rigs par brjod par bya'o zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cāyaṃ yogo dṛśyate /<br/> gandhasthānābhikāmo 'nyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rigs pa ni 'di yin par snang ngo / dri dang gnas la mngon 'dod gzhan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam /<br/> upapādukāṃ tu yoniṃ prapadyamānaḥ sthānābhilāṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas su skye ba ni las ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba'i gnas gtsang ma'am mi gtsang bar dri 'dod pas 'gro'o / rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas su skye ba ni gnas 'dod pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ narakeṣu sthānābhilāṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na dmyal ba dag tu gnas 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viparyastabuddhitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni bdag nyid rlung dang char pa shin tu grang mo dag gis btab nas nyen pa dang dmyal ba dag na me 'bar ba mthong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra uṣṇābhilāṣāddhāvati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir dro bar 'dod de rgyug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bdag nyid rlung tsha ba dang nyi ma dang me'i gdung ba dag gis nyen pa dang dmyal ba dag na bsil ba mthong bas bsil ba 'dod pas rgyug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi slob dpon dag na re bdag nyid gnas skabs gang gis der skye bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa'i gnas skabs de yin pa dang sems can de dag kyang mthong nas rgyug go zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat /<br/> ūrdhvapādastu nārakaḥ /<br/> te vai patanti narakādūrdhvapādā avāṅmukhāḥ /<br/> ṛṣīṇāmabhivaktāraḥ saṃyatānāṃ tapasvinām iti /<br/> gāthābhidhānāt /<br/> yaduktaṃ viparyastamatiryātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la lha'i srid pa bar ma ni stan las ldang ba bzhin du gyen du 'gro'o / mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyi ni mi la sogs pa bzhin no / dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin / yang dag sdom dang dka' thub can / drang srong rnams la skur 'debs pa / de dag spyi'u tshugs dag tu ni / dmyal ba kho nar ltung bar 'gyur / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir ro / blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas / rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro / zhes bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimavaśyaṃ sarvo 'ntarābhavastathā mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati /<br/> nityāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> catasro garbhāvakrāntayaḥ sūtra uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci nges par srid pa bar ma pa thams cad ma'i mngal du de ltar 'jug gam zhe na / smras pa ma yin no / 'on kyang mdo las mngal du 'jug pa ni bzhi zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamāścatasraḥ /<br/> saṃprajānan viśatyekaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi gang zhe na / gcig ni shes bzhin du 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmati sā saṃprajānan
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa dang 'byung ba ni shes bzhin du ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiṣṭhatyapyaparaḥ /<br/> saṃprajānanniti varttate /<br/> praviśatyapītyapikṣabdāt /<br/> aparaḥ /<br/> niṣkrāmatyapi /<br/> saṃprājānan praviśati tiṣṭhatyapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni gnas pa yang shes bzhin du zhes bya bar sbyar te / yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'jug pa yang ngo / gzhan ni / 'byung ba'ang / shes bzhin du ste / yang zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvāṇi mūḍho 'nyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni thams cad rmongs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la ni thams cad shes bzhin ma yin par 'gyur te / 'jug pa yang shes bzhin ma yin la gnas pa dang 'byung ba yang shes bzhin ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etāścatasro garbhāvakrāntayaḥ pratilomaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ /<br/> ślokabandhānuguṇyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngal du 'jug pa de bzhi ni tshigs su bcad pa bsdeb pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir bzlog ste bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nityamaṇḍajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgo nga las skyes rtag tu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can sgo nga las skyes pa ni rtag tu thams cad rmongs pa kho nar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamaṇḍājjāto garbhaṃ praviśati /<br/> yo 'pi janiṣyate so 'pyaṇdajaḥ /<br/> athavā bhāvinyāpi saṃjñayā nirdeśāḥ kriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgo nga las skyes pa ji ltar skye gnas su 'jug ce na / gang zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de yang sgo nga las skyes pa zhes bya'o / yang na 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i ming gis bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotīti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mdo las 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed do zhes gsungs pa dang 'jig rten na 'bras chan 'tshed do / phye 'thag go zhes pa lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnaiṣa doṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de ni nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan /<br/> alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete /<br/> vāto vāti devo varṣati /<br/> śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti /<br/> tiṣṭhato 'pyeṣu tiṣṭhāmiti niṣkrāmato spyebhyo niryāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar na shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal du 'jug cing 'byung ba'i bar du yin pa'am / ji ltar na shes bzhin du yin zhe na / re zhig sems can dbang thang chung bar grags pa ma'i mngal du 'jug pa la 'di snyam du rlung langs pa'am / char pa 'bab pa'am / grang ba'am / yul ngan nam / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ku co 'don pa snyam byed nas / ma la rtsva thibs po'am / nags thibs po'am / rtsva'i spyil po'am / lo ma'i spyil por 'jug pa'am / shing drung ngam / rtsig pa'i drung du 'gro'o / gnas na yang 'di dag tu gnas par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā 'bhirohāmi kūṭāgāraṃ vā paryaṅka veti /<br/> tathā tiṣṭhāmi niryāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung na yang 'di dag nas 'byung ngo snyam du log pa'i 'du shes dang mos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro / sems can dbang thang che bar grags pa ni kun dga' ra ba'am / skyed mos tshal lam / khang bzangs su 'jug pa'am / khang pa brtsegs pa'am / khri la 'dzeg go / de bzhin du gnas so / 'byung ngo snyam du sems so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadasaṃprajānan praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati /<br/> saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig shes bzhin ma yin par 'jug pa nas 'byung ba'i bar ni de lta bu yin no / shes bzhin yin pa ni ma'i mngal la 'jug go / de nyid du gnas so / de nyid nas 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bar du rab tu shes te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsya viparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la phyin ci log gi 'du shes dang mos pa dag mi 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra punarapadiśyate /<br/> garbhāvakrāntayastisraścakravarttisvayaṃbhuvām /<br/> cakravarttinaśca svayaṃbhuvośca pratyekabuddhasaṃbuddhayośca /<br/> yathākramamityante vakṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'dir bstan pa dang mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ste / 'khor los sgyur dang rang byung gnyis / 'khor los sgyur ba dang rang byung rang sangs rgyas dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ste / 'og nas go rims zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra prathamā cakravarttinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'khor los sgyur ba ni dang po ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'jug pa kho na shes bzhin yin gyi gnas pa yang ma yin la / 'byung ba yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekabuddhastiṣṭhatyapi /<br/> buddho niṣkrāmatyapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang sangs rgyas ni gnas pa yang ngo / sangs rgyas ni 'byung ba yang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atrāpi bhāvinyā saṃjñayā nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmajñānobhayeṣāṃ vā viśadatvād yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las sam ye shes sam gnyi ga / rgya che'i phyir na go rims bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśadakarmaṇāmdārapuṇyakriyāṇāṃ prathamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las rgya chen po bsod nams rgya chen po byed pa rnams ni dang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśadajñānānāṃ bāhuśrutyakṛtapravicayānāṃ dvitīyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye shes rgya chen po thos pa mang ba dang rab tu 'byed pa byas pa rnams ni gnyis pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśada puṇyakarmajñānānāṃ tṛtīyā /<br/> ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams kyi las dang ye shes rgya che ba rnams ni gsum pa yin te / de lta bur gyur pa de dag ni rim bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāṇāṃ caturthīti siddhaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams ni bzhi pa yin no zhes bya bar grub po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atredānīṃ bāhyakā ātmavādaṃ parigṛhyottiṣṭhante /<br/> yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti /<br/> sa eṣa pratiṣidhyate /<br/> nātmāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni 'dir phyi rol pa rnams gal te sems can 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho'o zhes bya bar dam bca' na bdag grub pa yin no zhes bdag tu smra ba yongs su bzung nas rgol te / de dgag pa'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate /<br/> sa tadṛśo nāstyantarvyāpārapuruṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med ces bya ba smos so / bdag ji lta bu zhig ce na / gang phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing phung po gzhan dag tu nying mtshams sbyor ro zhes bya bar yongs su rtog pa nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu de lta bu de med de bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las ni yod do / rnam par smin pa ni yod do / chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa gang phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing phung po gzhan dag tu nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i byed pa po ni mi dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la chos su brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te / 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba'o zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyas par gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśastarhyātmā na pratiṣidhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bdag ji lta bu zhig mi dgag ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhamātraṃ tu /<br/> yadi tu skandhamātramevātmeti upacaryate tasyāpratiṣedhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po tsam nyid do / gal te phung po tsam kho na la bdag ces 'dogs na de la ni dgag pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti /<br/> kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na phung po bdag nyid 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho'o zhes bya bar gyur to zhe na / de dag ni mi 'pho ba'i phung po tsam ni / nyon mongs las kyis mngon du byas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarābhavasaṃtatyā kukṣimeti pradīpavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis na / mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ /<br/> kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po rnams ni skad cig ma ste / de dag la ni 'pho ba'i mthu med kyi nyon mongs pa rnams dang las rnams kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i phung po tsam gyis srid pa bar ma zhes bya ba'i rgyun gyis ma'i mngal du 'gro ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mar me skad cig ma yin yang rgyun gyis yul gzhan du 'gro ba lta bu yin pas de ni nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti /<br/> sa punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bdag med bzhin du yang nyon mongs pa dang las rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phung po rnams kyi rgyun ma'i mngal du 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di grub bo / de yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathākṣepaṃ kramādvṛddhaḥ santānaḥ kleśakarmabhiḥ /<br/> paralokaṃ punaryāti /<br/> nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'phangs bzhin rim gyis rgyun / skyes nas las dang nyon mongs kyis /  / 'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro / tshe'i las tha dad pa'i phyir phung po'i rgyun thams cad kyi 'phen pa 'dra ba ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir gang zhig ji srid du 'phangs pa de de srid du rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kena krameṇa /<br/> kalalaṃ prathamaṃ dhavati kalalājjāyate 'rbudaḥ /<br/> arbudājjāyate peśī peśīto jāyate ghanaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rim pa gang gis she na / gtsug lag las / dang por nur nur po yin no / nur nur po las mer mer skye / mer mer po las nar nar skye / nar nar po las mkhrang 'gyur skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghanāt praśākhā jāyante keśaromanakhādayaḥ /<br/> indriyāṇi ca rūpīṇi vyañjanānyanupūrvaśaḥ /<br/> ityāryāḥ /<br/> etāḥ pañca garbhāvasthāḥ kalalārbudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mkhrang las rkang lag 'gyus pa 'dra / skra spu sen mo la sogs pa / dbang po gzugs can rnams dang ni / mtshams rnams rim gyis skye bar 'gyur / zhes 'byung ngo /  / nur nur po dang mer mer po dang nar nar po dang mkhrang 'gyur dang rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs de dag ni mngal gyi gnas skabs lnga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti /<br/> sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate /<br/> yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya tasminvarcaskūpa ivogradurgandhāndhakārasamalapalvale suvahukrimikulasahasrāvāse nityasrāviṇi satatapratikriye śukraśroṇitalasikāmalasaṃklinnaviklinnakvathitapicchile paramavībhatsadarśane chidratanucarmāvacchādite pūrvakarmavīpākarje mahati kāmanāḍīrvaṇe hastaṃ praveśyā ṅgamaṅgaṃ nikṛtyādhyāharanti /<br/> sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dus gzhan na mngal gyi zug rngu de yongs su smin par gyur pa mngal gyi nang na gang dag gis mngal gyi zug rngu de bsgyur nas ma'i lus kyi mi gtsang ba'i sgo logs su kha bstan nas 'jog par byed pa las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung dag ldang ste / de gnas nas sbed pa na mi gtsang ba mkhrang po de shin tu chen po 'chir ba bzhin du spo dka' ba yin no / gal te na res 'ga' ma'i zas dang gnas pa'i bya ba mi mthun par spyod pa'am sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas mngal kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur ro / de nas 'di de shes pa'i bud med dam / gzhon nu'i sman pas mar sar ram / til mar 'jam tsam mam / shing shal ma le legs par btags pa'i phye ma'am / gzhan yang rung bas lag pa bskus nas / de la mtshon rnon po srab mo btags te / rkyag dong lta bur mi bzad pa dri nga ba mun khung la sogs pa'i 'dam rdzab srin bu'i rigs shin tu mang po stong phrag gi gnas / rtag tu 'dzag par 'gyur ba / rtag tu byi dor bya dgos pa / khu chu dang khrag dang chu ser dang dri mas kun tu myags pa / rnam par myags pa / rul pa / rnags pa / 'gred pa / mthong na 'jigs su rung ba pags pa rdol ba srab mos gyogs pa / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa lus kyi rma 'khyims pa chen po der lag pa bcug ste / yan lag dang nying lag bcad nas 'byin to / de yang sngon gyi las lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur bas shed du khrid par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur na ni de nas 'di bu 'dod pa'i ma'am / de'i gyog bu med rnams kyis btsas ma thag pa'i lus rma sar pa lta bu mtshon dang thal ba'i sman lta bu'i reg pa dang ldan pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas 'khru bar byed do / nu zho dang mar sar gyis skyed par byed cing rim gyis kha zas rags pa bza' bar goms par yang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de skye ba'i rgyus dbang po rnams longs su smin nas ni yang nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu spyod cing / las rnams kyang stsogs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti /<br/> ityanadibhavacakrakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi lus zhig nas yang snga ma bzhin du srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ste / srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa des na las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i skye ba dang yang de las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang de las skye ba rnams yin pas na srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med pa yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt /<br/> dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ /<br/> nityakāraṇāstitvavādaśca prāgeva paryudastaḥ /<br/> tasmānnāstyeva saṃsārasyādiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thog ma zhig brtags na ni de'i rgyu med pa nyid du thal par 'gyur ro / rgyu med pa nyid gcig yin na ni 'di thams cad kyang rgyu med pa kho nar 'gyur ba zhig na yul dang dus so sor nges pa las myu gu la sogs pa la sa bon la sogs pa dang chos pa la sogs pa la me la sogs pa'i nus pa yang mthong bas rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ni med do / rgyu rtog pa yod par smra ba ni sngar bsal zin pa nyid do / de lta bas na 'khor ba'i thog ma ni med pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antastu hetukṣayāt yuktaḥ /<br/> hetvadhīnatvājjanmano vījakṣayādivaṅkurasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba ni rgyu la rag lus pa'i phyir rgyu zad pa las mtha' dang ldan par ni rigs te / sa bon zad bas myu gu bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eṣa skandhasaṃtāno janmatrayāvastha ūpadiṣṭaḥ /<br/> sa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgastrikāṇḍakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar phung po'i rgyun skye ba'i gnas skabs gsum pa bstan pa gang yin pa / de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i / yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca /<br/> trīṇi kāṇḍāni pūrvāparāntamadhyānyatītānāgatapratyutpannāni janmāni /<br/> kathameṣu trikāṇḍeṣu dvādaśāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante /<br/> pūrvāparāntayordve dve madhye 'ṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yan lag bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi dang cha gsum ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar dag ste / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i skye ba dag yin no / cha gsum po 'di dag tu yan lag bcu gnyis ji ltar rnam par gzhag ce na / sngon dang phyi mtha'i gnyis gnyis pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyā saṃskārāśca pūrvānte jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ cāparānte /<br/> śeṣāṇyaṣṭau madhye /<br/> kiṃ punaretānyaṣṭāṅgāni sarvasyāṃ jātau bhavanti /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kasya tarhi /<br/> paripūriṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa dang 'du byed rnams ni sngon gyi mthar ro / skye ba dang rga shi ni phyi ma'i mthar ro / lhag ma brgyad ni bar du'o / yang ci thams cad kyi skye ba 'di la yan lag brgyad po 'di dag yod dam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na su la yod ce na / yongs rdzogs ldan no / 'di la yongs su rdzogs pa yod pas na yongs su rdzogs ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate /<br/> nāpi rūpārupyāvacaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni gang zag gang zhig gnas skabs kyi bye brag 'di thams cad la reg pa de la dgongs pa yin gyi / gang bar ma do kho nar 'chi ba yang ma yin la / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ /<br/> vijñānaṃ cedānanda mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmediti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar gleng gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs kyi mdo las kun dga' bo gal te rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur na zhes gsungs pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gang zag kho nar bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ /<br/> saphalahetukayoḥ pūrvāparāntayorgrahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mtha' ba dang phyi ma'i mtha' pa zhes rnam pa gnyis su brjod pa de'i tshe ni tshor ba la thug pa'i bar yan lag bdun ni sngon gyi mtha' pa yin la / lnga ni phyi ma'i mtha' pa yin te / sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang 'bras bu dang rgyu dang bcas pa dag smos pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha ka ime 'vidyādayaḥ /<br/> pūrvakleśā daśā 'vidyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ma rig pa la sogs pa 'di dag gang yin zhe na / ma rig nyon mongs sngon gnas skabs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā pūrvake janmani kleśāvasthā sehāvidyetyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe snga ma la nyon mongs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni 'di la ma rig pa zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāhacaryāttadvaśena teṣāṃ samudācārācca /<br/> rājāgamanavacane tadanuyātrikā gamanasiddhavat /<br/> saṃskārāḥ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ /<br/> daśeti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir dang de'i dbang gis de dag kun tu 'byung ba'i phyir rgyal po gshegs so zhes byas na de'i zha 'bring pa yang 'ong bar 'grub pa bzhin no / 'du byed dag ni sngon las kyi / gnas skabs zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">che snga ma la bsod nams la sogs pa'i las kyi gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni 'di la 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste / las gang gis 'dir rnam par smin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃdhiskandhāstu vijñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam /<br/> nāmarūpamataḥ param /<br/> prāk ṣaḍāyatanotpādāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la phung po lnga ni rnam par shes pa yin no / ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad / skye mched drug dong tshun chad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams sbyor ba'i sems phan chad nas ji srid du skye mched drug ma dod kyi bar gyi gnas skabs de ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakcaturāyatanotpādādini vaktavye ṣaḍāyatanavacanaṃ tadā tadvyavasthāpanāt /<br/> tatpūrvaṃ trikasaṃgamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched bzhi dod tshun chad do zhes brjod pa bya ba yin pa las skye mched drug ces brjod pa ni de'i tshe de rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro / de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ /<br/> sparśaḥ prāksukhaduḥkhādikāraṇajñānaśaktitaḥ /<br/> trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātāt sparśo bhavati /<br/> sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate /<br/> paricchedasāmarthye sati /<br/> vittiḥ prāk maithunāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched drug dong nas ji srid du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa dang gsum ma 'dus pa de srid kyi gnas skabs de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o zhes reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do / reg pa ni gsum 'dus te des ji srid du tshor ba gsum gyi rgyu yongs su gcod par ma nus pa'i gnas skabs de ni reg pa zhes bya'o / yongs su gcod nus nas ni / tshor 'khrig tshun chad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanāvasthā yāvanmaithunarāgo na samudācarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba'i gnas skabs ni ji srid du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kun tu mi spyod pa'i bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇā bhogamaithunarāgiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sred pa ni / longs spyod 'khrig pa'i chags can gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmaguṇamaithunarāgasamudācārāvasthā tṛṣṇetyucyate yāvanna tadviṣayaparyeṣṭimāpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kun tu spyod pa'i gnas skabs ji srid du yul yongs su tshol ba la ma zhugs pa ni srid pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams / thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate /<br/> tathā ca paridhāvan
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs gang du yul thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su tshol ba la zhugs nas thams cad du rgyug pa de ni len pa zhes bya'o / de ltar yongs su rgyug pa na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i / las byed de ni srid pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya bhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yul rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyug pa na yang srid pa la sogs pa de ni de'i srid pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati /<br/> yo 'sau /<br/> pratisaṃdhiḥ punarjātiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las des yang 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshe phyi mar nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te / nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni skye ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadeveha vijñānāṅgaṃ tadevāsyānyatra janmani jātiḥ /<br/> tat ūrdhvaṃ /<br/> jarāmaraṇamā vidaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la rnam par shes pa'i yan lag gang yin pa de ni tshe gzhan du skye ba yin no / de phan chad tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāteḥ pareṇa yāvadedanāvasthā jarāmaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba phan chad tshor ba'i gnas skabs kyi bar ni rga shi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yānyeveha catvāryaṅgāni nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanāstānyevānyatra jarāmaraṇamityetāni dvādaśāṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la yan lag bzhi po ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag nyid gzhan dag tu rga shi yin no / de ltar na de dag ni yan lag bcu gnyis yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaścaturvidha ucyate /<br/> kṣaṇikaḥ prakarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ āvasthikaśca /<br/> kathaṃ kṣaṇikaḥ /<br/> ekasmin khalvapi kṣaṇe dvādaśāṅgāni bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni rnam pa bzhir brjod do / skad cig pa dang rgyun chags pa dang 'brel pa can dang / gnas skabs pa'o / skad cig ma ji lta bu zhe na / skad cig ma gcig la yan lag bcu gnyis yod pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā lobhavaśena prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / chags pa'i dbang gis srog gcod pa'i rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo mohaḥ sā 'vidyā /<br/> yā cetanā te saṃskārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'du byed rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vastuprativijñaptirvijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānasahabhuvaścatvāraḥ skandhā nāmarūpam /<br/> nāmarūpe vyavasthāpitāni indriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam /<br/> ṣaḍḍāyatanābhinipātaḥ sparśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so / ming dang gzugs la rnam par gnas pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go / skye mched drug 'dus pa ni rig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśānubhavanaṃ vedanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo lobhaḥ sa tṛṣṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃprayuktāni paryavasthānāni upādānam /<br/> tatsamutthitaṃ kāyavākkarma bhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i kun nas dkris pa rnams ni len pa'o / des kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las ni srid pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti /<br/> punarāhuḥ /<br/> kṣaṇikaḥ sāṃbandhikaśca yathā prakaraṇeṣu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ /<br/> sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las de rnams skye ba ni skye ba'o / yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o / zhig pa ni shi ba'o / yang smras pa / skad cig pa dang 'brel pa can ni rab tu byed pa dag las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no / rab tu byed pa dag las ji skad du 'byung zhe na / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad do / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad do zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āvasthiko dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā nirantarajanmatrayasaṃbaddhāḥ /<br/> sa eva prākarṣikaḥ /<br/> eṣāṃ katamo 'yamabhipreto bhagavataḥ /<br/> āvasthikaḥ kileṣṭo 'yaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs pa ni bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga'i gnas skabs tshe gsum bar chad med par 'brel ba dag yin no / de nyid rgyun chags pa yang yin no / de rnams las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gang las dgongs she na / 'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma /<br/> prādhānyattvaṅgakīrtanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yan lag dang yan lag la phung po lnga char yod na ci'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kho nar bsgrags she na / gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāpradhānāmavasthāmavidyāṃ jagāda saṃskārapradhānāṃ saṃskārānyāvajjarāmaraṇamityadoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa gtso bo yin pa'i gnas skabs su ni ma rig par bshad la / 'du byed gtso bo yin par ni 'du byed nas rga shi gtso bo yin pa'i bar du ni rga shi kho na bshad pas nyis pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ /<br/> sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /<br/> abhiprāyikaḥ sūtre lākṣaṇiko 'bhidharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir mdo sde las ni yan lag bcu gnyis su gsungs la / rab tu byed pa dag las ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad do zhes gzhan du 'byung zhe na / mdo las gsungs pa ni dgongs pa can yin no / chos mngon pa las ni mtshan nyid pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gnas skabs pa dang skad cig pa dang rgyun chags pa dang 'brel pa can dang sems can du ston pa dang sems can ma yin par ston pa zhes bya ba tha dad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthaṃ punaḥ sūtre sattvākhya eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir mdo las sems can du ston pa kho na gsungs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvāparāntamadhyeṣu saṃmohavinivṛttaye /<br/> ata eva ca trikāṇḍaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la / rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir cha gsum pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvaṃ ko nvahamabhūvaṃ kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la sngon gyi mtha' la rmongs pa la ne 'di ji ltar bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam / 'on te byung bar ma gyur bdag ci zhig tu ni byung bar gyur / bdag ji ltar na ni byung bar gyur snyam pa'i the tshom 'di skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ /<br/> madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi ma'i mtha' la rmongs pa la ni 'di ltar ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram snyam pa rgyas par the tshom 'di skye'o / bar du rmongs pa la ni 'di ltar ci zhig yin / 'di ji ltar yin / yod pa ni ci zhig yin / 'gyur ba ni ci zhig yin snyam pa'i the tshom 'di skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na rmongs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di bzlog pa'i phyir mdo las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sems can du ston pa kho na cha gsum du bstan te / ma rig pa dang 'du byed rnams dang skye ba dang rga shi dang rnam par shes pa nas srid pa'i bar dang go rims bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti /<br/> sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar mdo nyid las dge slong dag dge slong gis gang phan chad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la 'brang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇopādānabhavā apyaparāntasaṃmohavyāvartanārthamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re phyi ma'i mtha' la rmongs pa bzlog pa'i phyir sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dag kyang bstan te / 'di dag ni de kho na'i rgyu yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /<br/> kleśakarmavastūni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa de ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang bzhi ngag dang gsum gyi rang bzhin du rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> kleśāstrīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nyon mongs gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇyaṅgāni kleśasvabhāvānyavidyātṛṣṇepādānāni /<br/> dvayaṃ karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin can te / ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa rnams so / las gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṅgadvayaṃ karmasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārā bhavaśca /<br/> sapta vastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag gnyis ne las kyi rang bzhin yin te / 'du byed dang srid pa'o / gzhi bdun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptāṅgāni vastusvabhāvāni vijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanājātijarāmaraṇāni /<br/> kleśakarmāśrayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag bdun po rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang skye ba dang rga shi rnams ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir gzhi'i yan lag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca vastu saptāṅgāni /<br/> phalaṃ tathā /<br/> saptaivāṅgāni phābhūtāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar yan lag bdun gzhi yin pa de bzhin 'bras bu yin / yan lag bdun po nyid 'bras bur gyur pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāṇi pañca hetubhūtāni /<br/> karmakleśasvabhāvabhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma lnga ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yin ba'i phyir rgyur gyur pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau /<br/> vastunaḥ pañcadhā bhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir gzhi rnam pa lnga dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir dbus su ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag rgya cher bskyed la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśasya dvidhā /<br/> anāgate 'dhvani phalaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ dvidhā bhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ni rnam pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir 'bras bu mdor bsdus
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atīte 'dhvani heturekamukhakleśopadeśāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa'i dus su ni nyon mongs pa sgo gcig tu bstan pa'i phyir rgyu mdor bsdus she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalahetvabhisaṃkṣepo dvayormadhyānumānataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras mdor bsdus pa / bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhyenaiva hi pūrvāntāparāntayorapi hetuphalavistaraḥ śakyo 'numānumiti noktaḥ /<br/> punaraparātmakaṃ hi yatnaṃ mā kāryamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma kho nas sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyas par rjes su dpag par nus pas ma bshad de / yang don med pa'i 'bad pa ma byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān /<br/> aṅgāntaraṃ vā punarupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ tasyāpyanyasmāditya navasthāprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> nopasaṃkhyātavyam /<br/> yasmādupadarśito 'tra bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kho na yin na de lta na go / ma rig pa'i rgyu ma bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba thog ma can du yang 'gyur la / rga shi'i 'bras bu ma bstan pa'i phyir mtha' dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba'am / yang na ni yan lag gzhan gyis kha bskang dgos so / de la yang gzhan zhig yod na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na / kha bskang bar bya mi dgos te / 'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang / bya ba nyid do de las gzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vastukleśāśca jāyante bhavāṅganāmayaṃ nayaḥ /<br/> kleśāt kleśo jāyate tṛṣṇāyā upādānam /<br/> kleśāt karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gzhi dang nyon mongs skyes / 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs / zhes bstan zin to / nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs pa skye ste / sred pa las len pa'o / nyon mongs pa las las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upādānāt bhavo 'vidyāyāśca saṃskārā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">len pa las ni srid pa dang ma rig pa las 'du byed rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmavastusaṃskārebhyo vijñānaṃ bhavācca jātiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las las gzhi ste / 'du byed rnams las rnam par shes pa dang srid pa las skye ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi las gzhi ste / rnam par shes pa las ming dang gzugs nas reg pa las tshor ba'i bar dang skye ba las rga shi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vastunaḥ kleśo vedanāyā stṛṣṇeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi las nyon mongs pa ste / tshor ba las srid pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi lugs de ltar rnam par gzhag pa de'i phyir ma rig pa nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yang gzhi 'am nyon mongs pa las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rga shi ni tshor ba la thug pa'i gzhi las kyang nyon mongs pa 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin pas yang 'di la kha bskang bar bya ba cung zad kyang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi kimasya sāmarthyaṃ syāt /<br/> ayoniśomanaskārahetukā 'vidyoktā sūtrāntare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'di'i nus pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur / gzhan dag na re mdo gzhan las ma rig pa yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāhetukaścāyoniśomanaskāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang ma rig pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cehāpyupādānāntarbhūtatvādukto bhavatīti apare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gsungs la / de ni 'dir yang len pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir bshad pa yin no zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamayoniśomanaskārasyopādāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ /<br/> yadi saṃprayogataḥ /<br/> tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tasyāntarbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti /<br/> yadi tarhyantarbhāvenaiva hetuphalabhāvo vijñāyate tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tarhi tatrāntarbhāvā daṅgantaratvaṃ śakyamakarttum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa / len pa'i nang du ji ltar 'dus / gal te mtshungs par ldan pa las yin no zhe na ni srid pa dang ma rig pa dag gi nang du yang de 'dus par thal bar 'gyur ro / nang du 'dus pa yin du chug na yang ji ltar 'dir ma rig pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no zhes bya bar bstan pa yin / gal te nang du 'dus pa kho nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por shes par 'gyur na / 'o na ni sred pa dang ma rig pa dag kyang de'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir yan lag gzhan nyid du mi bya bar nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyaḥ punarāha /<br/> ayoniśo manaskāro heturavidyāyā uktaḥ sūtrāntare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i rgyu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin par gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cāpi sparśakāle nirdiṣṭaḥ /<br/> cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas gti mug las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir reg pa'i dus su bstan pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanākāle cāvaśyamavidyayā bhavitavyam /<br/> avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇeti sūtrāntarāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la brten nas sred pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir tshor ba'i dus su yang ma rig pa gdon mi za bar yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam /<br/> nacāpyanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na reg pa'i dus na yod pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni tshor ba dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bor grub pas ma rig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyang ma yin zhing / yan lag gzhan gyis kha bskang bar yang mi bya'o / thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāpyayoniśomanaskārasya punarmohajavacanādāvilo manaskāro mohaja iti /<br/> tattarhyetadantyatroktamiha punarvaktavyam /<br/> na vaktavyam /<br/> kathamanucyamānaṃ gamyate /<br/> yuktitaḥ /<br/> kayā yuktyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gti mug las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa rnyog pa zhes 'byung bas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de yang gti mug las skyes par gsungs pa'i phyir ro / 'o na ni de ni gzhan du gsungs pas 'dir yang brjod par bya dgos so zhe na / brjod par bya mi dgos so / ma brjod bzhin du ji ltar go zhe na rigs pa las so / rigs pa gang gis she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa rnams kyi tshor ba ma rig pa med pa ni sred pa'i rkyen ma yin no / phyin ci log med pa'i srid pa yang nyon mongs pa can gyi tshor ba'i rkyen ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā /<br/> atiprasaṅga evaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti /<br/> tasmānna bhavatyayaṃ parihāraḥ /<br/> acodyameva tvetad
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa ma rig pa med pa'i reg pa yang phyin ci log ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa 'dis so / ji snyed rigs pas 'thad pa de snyed ma bshad bzhin du yang go bar 'gyur na / de lta na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te / de lta bas na 'di ni lan ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyājarāmaraṇayoḥ pareṇāṅgantarānabhidhānātsaṃsārasyādyantavattvaprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> nacāparipūrṇo nirdeśa iti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa dang rga shi dag las gzhan ma bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni klan kar mi rung ba kho na yin la ma tshang bar bstan pa yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt /<br/> etasya ca pūrvamevottatvāt /<br/> pūrvāparāntamadhyeṣu saṃmoha vinivṛttaye /<br/> uktaṃ bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> śāstratastāvanna kaścit /<br/> ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir zhe na / 'dir ni ji ltar na 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir / 'jig rten 'di nas yang 'jig rten pha rol du 'brel snyam du 'jug pa la rmongs pa'i gdul ba rnams la de tsam zhig brjod par bzhed pa'i phyir la / de ni / sngon dang phyi mtha'i bar dag la / rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro / zhes bya ba 'dis sngar bshad zin pa'i phyir ro / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyang bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa / yang de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na / re zhig bsnyan [*bstan?] bcos las ni khyad par cung zad kyang med de / gnyi ga yang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad yin par gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīmanutpannā evānāgatāḥ pratītyasamutpannā ityucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar na ma 'ongs pa ma byung ba rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag ces bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvadakṛtā evānāgatāḥ saṃskṛtā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ma 'ongs pa ma byas pa rnams kho na yang ji ltar na 'dus byas dag ces bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābhisamskārikayā cetanayā cetitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems pas bsams pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāḥ katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa rnams ji ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati /<br/> nirvāṇe 'pi prasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang thob par bya ba'i phyir sems pa dge bas bsams pa dag yin no / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ /<br/> sūtrābhiprāyastvayamucyate /<br/> heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ matam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir de kho na bzhin du mthun par bsgres pa yin te / dper na re zhig gzugs su ni rung ba yang de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba bzhin pas de ni nyes pa med do / mdo'i dgongs pa ni / 'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te / byung ba 'bras bu yin par 'dod / ces pa 'di yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetubhūtamaṅgapratītyasamutpādaḥ samutpadyate 'smāditi dṛtvā phalabhūtamaṅga pratītyasamutpannam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te / 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro / 'bras bur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sarvāṇyaṅgānyubhayayathā sidhyanti /<br/> hetuphalabhavāt /<br/> na caivaṃ satyavyavasthā bhavantyapekṣābhedāt /<br/> yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca /<br/> sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti /<br/> catuṣkoṭikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na yan lag thams cad kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir gnyi gar 'grub par 'gyur ro / de lta yin yang ltos pa'i bye brag gis rnam par gzhag pa med pa yang ma yin te / gang la ltos nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa yin pa de nyid la ltos nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ma yin te / rgyu dang 'bras bu bzhin dang pha dang bu bzhin no / gnas brtan bsam rdzogs na re / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin la / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos dag ma yin pa yang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste / mu dang po ni chos ma 'ongs pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiranāgatā dharmāḥ /<br/> dvitīyā 'rhataścaramāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos tha ma 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā tadanye 'tītapratyupannā dharmāḥ /<br/> caturthya saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /<br/> atra tu sautrāntikā vijñāpayanti /<br/> kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni de las gzhan pa'i chos 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams so / bzhi pa ni chos 'dus ma byas rnams so zhes zer ro zhes grag go / 'dir mdo sde pa rnams rgol bar bye de / ci 'di dag gang zhig gang 'dod pa'i 'dod rgyal du 'chad pa zhig gam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtrārtha ityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te mdo'i don yin / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi sūtrārtho naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo'i don yin no / gal te mdo'i don yin no zhe na / 'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattāvaduktamā vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī tyetadutsūtram /<br/> sūtre 'nyathā nirdeśād /<br/> avidyā katamā /<br/> yattat pūrvānte 'jñānamiti vistareṇa /<br/> yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ /<br/> na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati /<br/> yathāpradhānaṃ cāpi nirdeśāḥ kriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar zhe na re zhig gnas skabs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga'i gnas skabs kyi yan lag bcu gnyis pa dag yin no zhes gang smras pa ni mdo dang 'gal ba yin no / mdo las ni ma rig pa gang zhe na / smras pa / sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs te / nges pa'i don gang yin pa de ni drang ba'i don ma yin pas 'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no / bstan pa'i sgo nas thams cad nges pa'i don kho na yang ma yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā hastipadopame pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ ityadhikṛtyāha keśā romāṇīti /<br/> santi ca tatrānye 'pi rūpādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtso bo ji lta bar bstan par yang mdzad de / dper na glang po che'i rjes lta bu las / sa'i khams gang zhe na zhes bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas 'di lta ste / skra dang kha spu dag go zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / de dag la ni gzugs la sogs pa gzhan yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamatrāpi yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśaḥ syāt /<br/> aupasaṃhāra eṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'dir yang gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yin no / 'di ni dpe ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tatra keśādayaḥ pṛthivīdhātunā nirdiśyante /<br/> yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate /<br/> na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las ni gang gis na de dag ma rdzogs par bstan par 'gyur ba sa'i khams kyi skra la sogs pa ston pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de las ni skra la sogs pa dag kho nas sa'i khams ston pa yin te / skra la sogs pa ma gtogs pa yang sa'i khams med pas 'di rdzogs par bstan pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'di las kyang ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa kho nar bstan pa yin gyi lhag ma dang bcas par ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ /<br/> so 'pi nirdiṣṭa eveti /<br/> yadva punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum /<br/> jātyantarasya tvavidyāyāṃ kiṅkṛtaḥ prakṣepaḥ /<br/> yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum /<br/> satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
