</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skra la sogs pa ma gtogs par yang mchi ma dang mchil ma dang snabs la sogs pa dag la sa'i khams yod pa ma yin nam zhe na / de yang bstan zin pa nyid de / lus 'di la gzhan yang zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / yang na gal te de kho na dang 'dra bar bstan par nus na ma rig pa'i lhag ma yod la rag go / rigs tha dad pa ni ma rig par ci'i phyir bstan / gnas skabs de dag la phung po lnga char yod du zin kyang gang zhig yod dam med na gang yod pa dang med par nges pa de kho na yan lag yin no / dgra bcom pa la phung po lnga yod kyang 'du byed rnams kyang mi 'byung la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāhetukā eva /<br/> tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti /<br/> yathānirdeśameva sūtrārthaḥ /<br/> yadapyuktaṃ heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika iti /<br/> etadapyutsūtram /<br/> sūtre 'nyathā nirdeśāt /<br/> pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ /<br/> yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda iti /<br/> dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ /<br/> ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ /<br/> avidyāyāmevasatyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nonyathā /<br/> eṣa pratītyasamutpādo na hetureva /<br/> yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate /<br/> pratītyasamutpannā dharmāḥ katame /<br/> avidyā yāvajjātiḥ jarāmaraṇam /<br/> tayo ranāgatādhvavyavasthānaṃ naiṣṭavyamiti trikāṇḍavyavasthā bhidyate /<br/> asaṃskṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /<br/> utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmateti vacanāt /<br/> tadetadabhiprāyavaśādevaṃ ca na caivam /<br/> kathaṃ tāvadevaṃ kathaṃ vā naivam /<br/> yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam /<br/> athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti /<br/> naitadevamiti pratiṣeddhavyam /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> utpādasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt /<br/> na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate /<br/> utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta /<br/> padārthaścāsamartho bhavatīti nityaśa nāma pratītyasamutpādaśceti /<br/> atha pratītyasamutpāda iti kaḥ padārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi gyo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sred pa la sogs pa yang ma yin pas mdo'i don ni ji skad bstan pa kho na yin no / mu bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa de la yang / gal te chos ma 'ongs pa rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin nam rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na / ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar dag yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo / yang na skye ba dang rga shi'i yan lag dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rnam par gzhag par mi 'dod par bya dgos pas cha gsum du dgod pa rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro / de sde pa gzhan dag na re / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos nyid 'di dag ni gnas pa kho na'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni 'dus ma byas yin no zhes zer ro / de ni dgongs pa'i dbang gas de bzhin yang yin la de bzhin yang ma yin no / re zhig ji ltar de bzhin yin / yang na ji ltar na de bzhin ma yin zhe na / gal te dgongs pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung rtag tu ma rig pa la sogs pa dag la brten nas 'du byed la sogs pa rnam pa kun tu 'byung gi ma brten par ram / gzhan dag la brten nas ni nam yang ma yin pas rten cing 'brel pa ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba yin no zhe na ni / de de bzhin no zhes gzung bar bya'o / 'on te dgongs pa 'di rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba dngos po gzhan rtag pa cung zad cig yod do zhes bya ba yin no zhe na ni de de lta ma yin no zhes dgag par bya'o / ci'i phyir zhe na / 'byung ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / dngos po gzhan rtag pa ni mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid yin par yang mi rung ngo / 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba yin pa'i phyir 'di ma rig pa la sogs pa dang ci zhig 'brel na gang gi phyir de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes brjod par 'gyur / rtag pa zhes kyang bya la / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes kyang bya bas tshig gi don kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro / yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don gang yin zhe na / rten cing 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni phrad pa'i don to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratiḥ prāptyartha eti gatyarthaḥ /<br/> upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ai ti ni 'gro ba'i don to / nye bar bsgyur ba'i dbang gis skad kyi dbyings kyi don yongs su bsgyur ba'i phyir phrad nas zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel te zhes bya ba'i don yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">padiḥ sattārthaṃ samutpūrvaḥ prādurbhāvārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pa da ni yod pa'i don to / sam dang aud gong na yod na 'byung ba'i don to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena prātyayaṃ prāpya samudbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ /<br/> na yukta eṣa padārthaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> ekasya hi kartturdvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na phrad nas 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin no / tshig gi don 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / byed pa po gcig gis bya ba gnyis ni dus sngar te zhes bya ba'i rkyen yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā snātvā bhuṅkta iti /<br/> nacāsau pūrvamutpādāt kaścidasti yaḥ pūrvaṃ pratītyottarakālamutpadyate /<br/> nacāpyakartu kāsti kriyeti /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na khrus byas te bza'o zhes bya ba lta bu yin no sngar phrad nas phyis skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i sngon rol na 'ga' yang med la / byed pa po med pa'i bya ba yang med do / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyeti pūrvamutpādādyadyasattvānna yujyate /<br/> saha cet ktvā na siddho 'tra pūrvakālavidhānata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'byung sngon phrad nas yin / med phyir rung ba ma yin no / gal te lhan cig 'dir de ni / ma grub sngon du byed phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiṣa doṣaḥ /<br/> idaṃ tāvadyaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ śābdikaḥ /<br/> kimavastho dharmaḥ utpadyate varttamāna utāho 'nāgate iti /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni nyes pa med de / re zhig sgra pa la gnas skabs gang gis chos zhig skye / da lta'i 'am 'on te ma 'ongs pa zhig ces bya ba 'di bri bar bya'o / de las cir 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi varttamāna utpadyate /<br/> kathaṃ varttamāno yadi notpannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci ste da lta'i zhig skye'o zhe na ni / gal te ma skyes na ji ltar da ltar yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpannasya vā punarutpattāvanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te skyes zin pa zhig yang skye na ni thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athānāgata utpadyate kathamasataḥ kartṛtvaṃ siddhatyakartṛkā vā kriyeti /<br/> ato yadavastha utpadyate tadavastha eva pratyeti /<br/> kimavasthaścotpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci ste ma 'ongs pa zhig skye'o zhe na / med pa ji ltar byed pa po nyid dam / byed pa po med pa'i bya ba 'grub / de'i phyir gnas skabs gang skye ba'i gnas skabs de nyid dang phrad nas zhes bya ba bzhin no / gnas skabs gang zhig skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpādābhimukho 'nāgataḥ /<br/> tadavastha eva pratyayaṃ pratyetītyucyate /<br/> aniṣpannaṃ cedaṃ yaduta śābdikīyaṃ kartṛkriyāvyavasthānaṃ bhavatītyeṣa karttā bhūtirityeṣā kriyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i ma 'ongs pa ste / gnas skabs de kho na rkyen dang phrad nas zhes bya'o / sgra pa'i 'di lta ste / byed pa po dang bya ba rnam par 'jog pa 'di yang grub pa ma yin te / skye'o zhes bya ba 'di ni byed pa po yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cātra bhaviturarthāt bhūtimanyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye zhes bya ba 'di ni bya ba yin na 'di la skye'o zhes bya ba'i don las bya ba gzhan yang ma mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādacchalaṃ vyavahāreṣu /<br/> eṣa tu vākyārthaḥ /<br/> asmin satyasya bhāvaḥ asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti /<br/> āha cātra /<br/> asannutpadyate yadvat pratyetyapi tathā 'tha san /<br/> utpanna utpadyata ityaniṣṭhā 'san purā 'pi vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na tha snyad dag la klan ka med do / tshig gi don ni 'di yod na 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to zhes bya ba 'di yin no / 'dir bshad pa / ji ltar med pa skye ba ltar / med pa phrad pa'ang de dang 'dra / skyes pa skye na mthar thug med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahakāle 'pi ca ktvā 'sti dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te snga na yod na 'ang rung / lhan cig pa la 'ang de yod de / mar me byung nas mun pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsyaṃ vyādāya śete ca paścāccetkiṃ na saṃvṛte /<br/> anye punarasya codyasya parihārārthamanyathā parikalpayanti /<br/> pratirvīpsārthaḥ /<br/> itau sādhava ityā anavasthāyinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha gdangs nyal bzhin gal te phyis / btsums pa la yang ci phyir min / gzhan dag ni klan ka 'di yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir don gzhan du yongs su rtog par byed do / rten cing 'bral pa ni zlos pa'i don yin no / sam ni 'du ba'i don yin no / a'itya ni 'gro bar rung ba ste mi sdod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārthaḥ /<br/> tāṃ tāṃ kāraṇa sāmagrīṃ prati ityānāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aung gong na yod pa'i pad ni 'byung ba'i don te / 'di skad du tshogs pa de dang de na 'gro bar rung ba rnams 'dus nas skye ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes bshad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā tu kalpanā 'traiva kalpyate /<br/> iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamititi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtogs pa 'di ni 'di kho na la rab tu brtag tu rung gi mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes bya ba 'di la ji ltar rung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthaṃ punarbhagavān paryāyadvayamāha asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādādidamutpadyate iti /<br/> avadhāraṇārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di yod na 'di 'byung / 'di skye bas 'di skye'o zhes rnam grangs gnyis gsungs she na / nges par gzung ba'i don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'nyatrāha avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārā iti /<br/> aṅgaparaṃparāṃ vā darśayitum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na gzhan las ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams 'byung gi / ma rig pa'i rkyen med par 'du byed rnams ma yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / yang na yan lag 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asminnaṅge satīdaṃ bhavati asya punaraṅgasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /<br/> janmaparaṃparāṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag 'di skyes pas yan lag gzhan skye'o zhes yan lag brgyad par bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvānte sati madhyānto bhavati madhyāntasyotpādādaparānta utpadyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na sngon gyi mtha' yod na da ltar gyi mtha' 'byung ngo / da ltar gyi mtha' skyes pas phyi ma'i mtha' skye'o zhes tshe brgyud par bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa pratyayabhāvaṃ darśayati /<br/> kadāciddhi samanantaramavidyāyāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti kadācit pāraṃparyeṇeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na res 'ga' ni 'du byed rnams ma rig pa'i mjug thogs su 'byung ngo / res 'ga' ni brgyud nas so zhes mngon sum dang brgyud nas rkyen gyi ngo bor bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahetunityahetuvādapratiṣedhārthamityapare /<br/> nāsati heto bhāvo bhavati na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikātkiñcidutpadyata iti /<br/> asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rgyu med na dngos po mi 'byung la / rang bzhin dang skyes bu la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang ldan pa rtag pa las kyang cung zad kyang mi skye'o zhes rgyu med pa dang rgyu rtag par smra ba dgag pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te / rtog pa 'di la ni tshig snga ma smos pa don med par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asyotpādādimutpadyata ityanenaivobhayavādapratiṣedhasiddheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skyes pas 'di skye'o zhes bya ba 'di kho nas smras pa gnyi ga dgag pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santi tarhi kecidya ātmani satyāśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ bhāvaṃ parikalpayanti avidyādīnāṃ cotpādāttadutpattim /<br/> atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni gang lags bdag rten du gyur pa yod pas 'du byed la sogs pa rnams 'byung ngo / ma rig pa la sogs pa skyes pas de dag skye bar rtog par byed pa yod pas de'i phyir rtog pa de bsal bar byas pa'i phyir gang zhig skyes pas gang skye ba ni de nyid yod pas de 'byung gi / gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes 'di nges par gzung ba mdzad pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadutā vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aprahīṇotpattijñāpanārthamityācāryāḥ /<br/> avidyāyāmaprahīṇāyāṃ saṃskārā na prahīyante /<br/> tasyā evotpādādutpadyanta iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob dpon dag na re / ma rig pa ma spangs na 'du byed rnams mi spong la de nyid skyes pas skye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma spangs pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthityutpattisaṃdarśanārthamityapare /<br/> yāvat kāraṇasrotastāvat kāryasroto bhavati /<br/> kāraṇasyaivacotpādāt kāryamutpadyata iti /<br/> utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam /<br/> punarāha asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rgyu'i rgyun ji srid pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur ro / rgyu nyid skyes pas 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas pa dang skye ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te / 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad pa yin na gnas pa'i tshig tu thal ba ci zhig yod / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ci'i phyir rim pa mi mthun par sngar ni gnas pa dang phyis ni skye ba gsungs par 'gyur / yang smras pa / 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu yod na rgyu 'jig par 'byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni rgyu med pa las 'bras bu 'byung ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur bas smras pa / de'i phyir rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmādasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar na 'di skyes pas 'di skye'o zhes bka' stsal to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa cetsūtrārtho 'bhaviṣyadasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatītyevācakṣata
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mdo'i don de yin par gyur na ni 'di yod pas 'di mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba kho nar bka' stsal par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sngar ni 'bras bu skye ba kho na yin la / phyis ni 'di yod na 'di mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ hi sādhuḥ kramo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na go rims legs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan du na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba'i skabs su 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa gang zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnaiṣa sūtrārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de ni mdo'i don ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ puna rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmiti /<br/> ābhisaṃbandhamātraṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yin pa nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar dag yin zhe na / 'brel pa tsam zhig bstan par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bālo hi pratītyasamutpannaṃ saṃskāramātramidamityaprajānan ātmadṛṣṭyasmimānābhiniviṣṭa ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ puṇyaṃ sukhāduḥkhāsukhārthamānaijjamaihikasukhārthamapuṇyaṃ tasyāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ karmākṣepavaśācca vijñānasaṃatatistāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gacchati /<br/> jvālāgamanayogenāntarābhavasaṃbandhāt /<br/> tadanyasaṃskārāpratyayaṃ vijñānam /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe vijñānaṃ katamat /<br/> ṣaḍvijñānakāyā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byis pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'du byed tsam 'di mi shes pas bdag tu lta ba dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal la mngon par zhen cing bdag nyid bde ba'i don tam / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i don du lus la sogs pa dag gis las rnam pa gsum rtsom ste / tshe phyi ma la bde ba'i don du bsod nams bde ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i don du ni mi gyo ba / tshe 'di la bde ba'i don du bsod nams ma yin pa rtsom ste / de dag ni 'di'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed dag yin no / las kyi 'phen pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa'i rgyun srid pa bar ma dang 'brel pa'i phyir me 'bar ba 'gro ba'i tshul du 'gro ba de dang der 'gro bar 'gyur te / de ni 'di'i 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin no /  / de ltar bshad na rnam par shes pa'i yan lag bstan pa las / rnam par shes pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam /<br/> vibhaṅge mahānidānaparyāye caivaṃ nirdeśāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug go zhes bshad pa de 'thad pa yin no / yang rnam par shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ming dang gzugs phung po lnga po 'gro ba de dang der skye bar 'gyur te / rnam par 'byed pa las de skad bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā nāmarūpaparipākātkrameṇa ṣaḍāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu ming dang gzugs yongs su smin pa'i rim gyis skye mched drug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato viṣayasaṃprāptau satyāṃ vijñānasaṃbhava iti /<br/> trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sukhādivedanīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu yul dang phrad na rnam par shes pa skye bas gsum 'dus pa las bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatastrividhā vedanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu tshor ba rnam pa gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatstṛṣṇā /<br/> duḥkhotpīḍitasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ kāmatṛṣṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu sred pa ste / sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i tshor ba bde ba la ni 'dod pa'i sred pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhāyāmaduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ ca rūpatṛṣṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la ni gzugs kyi sred pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aduḥkhāsukhāyāmārupyatṛṣṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la ni gzugs med pa'i sred pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata iṣṭavedanātṛṣṇāyāḥ kāmādīnāmutpādanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu tshor ba yid du 'ong ba la sred pa las 'dod pa la sogs pa nye bar len te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kāmāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ /<br/> dṛṣṭayo dvāṣaṣṭiryathā brahmajālasūtre /<br/> śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyaviratiḥ /<br/> vrataṃ kukkuragovratādīni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dod pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag go / lta ba dag ni drug cu rtsa gnyis te / tshangs pa'i dra ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no / tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spong ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ /<br/> brāhmaṇapāśupataparibrājakādīnāṃ ca daṇḍājinabhasmajaṭātridaṇḍamauṇḍyādisamādānam /<br/> ātmavādaḥ punarātmabhāvaḥ /<br/> ātmeti vādo 'sminnityātmavādaḥ /<br/> ātmadṛṣṭyasmimānāvityapare /<br/> kathamanayorātmavādatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brtul zhugs ni khyi dang ba lang gi brtul zhugs la sogs pa dang ji skad du gcer bu pa la sogs pa rnams ni sgren mo gos med pa yin no zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu dang bram ze dang phyugs bdag pa dang kun tu rgyu la sogs pa dag dbyu gu dang gyang gzhi dang ral bu dang thal ba dang dbyu gu gsum dang sgre bo la sogs pa yang dag par len pa'o / bdag tu smra ba ni lus te / de la bdag tu smra ba yod pas na bdag tu smra ba'o / gzhan dag na re bdag tu lta ba dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yin no zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābhyāmātmeti vacanāt /<br/> ātmano hyasattvādātmavādopādānamityucyate /<br/> prajñaptimātrakasyopādānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gnyis ji ltar na bdag tu smra ba nyid yin no zhe na 'di gnyis kyang bdag go zhes smra ba'i phyir ro / bdag med pa'i phyir bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathokta mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad du dge slong dag bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa btags pa'i rjes su lhung bar zad kyi / 'di la bdag gam bdag gi ni med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmupādānaṃ teṣu yaśchandarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nye bar len pa ni de dag la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ hi bhagavatā sarvatrākhyātam upādānaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad las ji skad du nye bar len pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'tracchandarāgaṃ iti /<br/> upādānapratyayaṃ punaḥ paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o / yang len pa'i rkyen gyis yang srid pa'i la sogs par byed pa de ni srid pa yin te mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadbhavaḥ /<br/> yadapyānanda karmāyatyāṃ punarbhāvābhinivartamkamidamatra bhavasyeti sūtrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun dga' bo tshe phyi ma la yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'dir srid pa yang yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavapratyayaṃ punarvijñānāvakrāntiyogena /<br/> anāgataṃ janma jātiḥ pañcaskandhikā /<br/> jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre /<br/> evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo ghavatīti /<br/> kevalasyetyātmīyarahitasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'i tshul du ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba ni skye ba yin te / phung po lnga po yin no / skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung ste / mdo las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o / de ltar 'di 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahato duḥkhaskandhasyetyanādyanantasya duḥkhasamūhasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samudayo bhavatīti pradurbhāvaḥ /<br/> sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o / bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs ni sngar bshad ba gang yin pa de kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāvidyeti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> yā na vidyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ma rig pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin / rig pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurādiṣvapi prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> vidyāyā abhāvastarhi /<br/> evaṃ sati na kiñcit syāt /<br/> na caitat yuktam /<br/> tasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig la sogs pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro / 'o na ni rig pa med pa yin no / de lta na ci yang ma yin par 'gyur te / de yang rig pa ma yin no / de lta bas na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vidyāvipakṣo dharmo 'nyo 'vidyā 'mitrānṛtādivat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs chos gzhan / ma rig mi mdza' brdzun sogs bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ /<br/> ṛtaṃ cocyate satyam /<br/> tadvipakṣabhūtaṃ vākyamanṛtaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mdza' bo zhes bzlog na de'i mi mthun pa'i sa phyogs su gyur pa mi mdza' pa 'ga' zhig yod kyi / mdza' bo las gzhan pa gang yin pa yang ma yin la / mdza' bo med pa yang ma yin pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adharmānarthākāryādayaśca dharmādipratidvandvabhūtāḥ /<br/> evamavidyā 'pi vidyāyāḥ pratidvandvabhūtadharmāntaramiti draṣṭavyam /<br/> kuta etat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i tshig ni mi bden pa yin pa dang chos ma yin pa dang don ma yin pa dang bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa yang chos la sogs pa'i mi mthun par gyur pa de bzhin du ma rig pa yang rig pa'i mi mthun par gyur pa chos gzhan zhig tu blta bar bya'o / 'di ga las she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyayabhāvenopadeśāt /<br/> api ca /<br/> saṃyojanādivacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen gyi dngos por bstan pa'i phyir ro / gzhan yang kun sbyor sogs kyi phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃyojanaṃ bandhanamanuśaya ogho yogaścāvidyocyate sūtreṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo dag las ma rig pa ni kun tu sbyor ba dang 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang chu bo dang sbyor ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cābhāvamātraṃ tathā bhavitumarhati /<br/> na cāpi cakṣurādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">med pa tsam ni de lta bu yin par 'ongs pa ma yin la mig la sogs pa yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāddharmāntaramevāvidyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na ma rig pa ni chos gzhan kho na zhig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tarhi kubhāryā abhāryetyucyate kuputraścāputraḥ /<br/> evamavidyā 'pyastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni dper na chung ma ngan pa la chung ma ma yin zhes bya ba dang bu ngan pa la bu ma yin pa zhes bya ba ltar ma rig pa yang de dang 'dra'o / gal te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuprajñā cenna darśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab ngan pa'o min lta phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kutsitā hi prajña kliṣṭā /<br/> sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smad pa'i shes rab ni nyon mongs pa can yin na de yang lta ba'i rang bzhin yin pas ma rig pa yin par mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati /<br/> sā 'pi bhavituṃ nārhati /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> dṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni gang lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de yin par 'gyur ro / de yang yin par mi 'os so / de ci'i phyir zhe na / lta ba de dang mtshungs ldan phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata /<br/> dvayoḥ prajñādravyayorasaṃprayogāt /<br/> itaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma rig pa shes rab yin par gyur na shes rab kyi rdzas nyid mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir lta ba de dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ro / shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñopakleśadeśanāt /<br/> rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatītyuktam sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes bya ba 'di las kyang 'grub ste / mdo las / 'dod chags kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems ni rnam par mi 'grol lo / ma rig pas nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i shes rab ni rnam par mi 'dag go zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti /<br/> yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab de nyid shes rab de'i nyon mongs pa 'dod chags rigs pa ma yin pas ji ltar sems kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa 'dod chags rigs tha dad pa gzhan yin pa ltar shes rab kyi ma rig pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarevaṃ neṣyate /<br/> kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir 'di ltar shes rab nyon mongs pa can dang shes rab dge ba 'dres na rnam par mi 'dag pas de'i phyir 'di de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yin par mi 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'sau tasyā upakleśa iti /<br/> yadvāpi rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ na vimucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems rnam par mi 'grol ba gang yin pa de yang gdon mi za bar 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa yin nam ci
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tadavaśyaṃ rāgaparyavasthitaṃ bhavati /<br/> uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate /<br/> tāṃ punrbhāvanāṃ vyāvartayato vimucyate /<br/> evamavidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatītyavidyopahatāṃ pariklpayāmaḥ /<br/> ko hi parikalpayan vāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang rnam par mi 'grol ba de ni 'dod chags kyis de ltar nye bar bcom pa yin la / bag chags rnam par bzlog pa ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro / de bzhin du ma rig pas nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i shes rab rnam par mi 'dag pas ma rig pas nye bar bcom pa yin par yongs su brtag par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jātyantarameva tvavidyāṃ varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su rtog pa la ni su zhig bzlog ste / ma rig pa rigs gzhan kho na zhig yod do zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pi manyate sarvakleśā avidyeti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang nyon mongs pa can thams cad ma rig pa yin no snyam du sems pa de'i yang 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin na kun tu sbyor ba la sogs pa'i nang du yang logs shig tu bshad par mi 'gyur zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba la sogs pa phan tshun mtshungs par ldan pa med pa'i phyir lta ba 'am nyon mongs pa gzhan dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur la / sems kyang ma rig pas nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa kho nar bshad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha mataṃ viśeṣaṇārthaṃ tathoktamiti /<br/> prajñāyāmapyavidyāviśeṣaṇaṃ karttavyaṃ bhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir de skad du bshad do zhes bya bar 'dod na ni shes rab la yang ma rig pa bye brag tu bya dgos par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavatvavidyā dharmāntaraṃ kastu tasyāḥ svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa chos gzhan zhig yin la rag na de'i rang bzhin ci yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyavanna karmaphalānāmasaṃprakhyānam /<br/> etaccaiva na jñāyate kimidamasaṃprakhyānaṃ nāmeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa dang dkon mchog dang las dang 'bras bu rnams mi gsal ba'o / mi gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin pa 'di yang mi shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām /<br/> atha saṃprakhyānavipakṣabhūtaṃ dharmāntaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gsal ba ma yin pa zhig gam / gsal ba med pa zhig yin na ni ma rig pa la ni ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du skyon du 'gyur ro / 'on te gsal ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi /<br/> evañjātīyako 'pi dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati /<br/> tadyathā cakṣuḥ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gzhan zhig yin no zhe na yang de bzhin du de ci yin pa 'di mi shes so zhe na / chos rnams bstan pa de lta bu yang yod de / dper na mig gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo rūpaprasādaścakṣurvijñānasyāśraya iti /<br/> asmīti sattvamayatā 'vidyete bhadantadharmatrātaḥ /<br/> kā punarasmimānādanyā mayatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang ba mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang btsun pa chos skyob na re nga'o snyam du sems can la 'jug pa ni ma rig pa'o zhes zer ro / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal las gzhan pa'i 'jug pa gang zhig yin zhe na / mdo las bdag gis de ltar shes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā 'sau sūtra uktā so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ mayatānāṃ sarveṣāmahaṅkāramamakārāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayānāṃ prahāṇāt parijñānānniśchāyo nivṛta iti /<br/> astyeṣā mayatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar mthong ste / sred pa thams cad dang lta ba thams cad dang 'jug pa thams cad dang ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal la mngon par zhen pa'i phra rgyas thams cad spangs shing yongs su shes nas grib ma med par mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā tviyamavidyeti kuta etat /<br/> yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%"> / 'jug pa de yod kyang de ni ma rig pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na 'di ltar nyon mongs pa gzhan yin no zhes brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cānyo māna eva syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nga rgyal gzhan yang yod pa kho na ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra punarvicāryamāṇe bahu vaktavyaṃ jāyate /<br/> tasmāttiṣṭhatvetat /<br/> atha nāmarūpamiti ko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la dpyad par chad na brjod pa mang por gyur te / de lta bas na 'di ni bzhag go / yang ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di'i don ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpaṃ vistareṇa yathoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni rgya cher bshad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāma tvarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming ni gzugs can min phung po / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmendriyārthavaśenārtheṣu namatīti nāma /<br/> katamasya nāmno vaśena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming dang dbang po dang don gyi dbang gis don rnams la gzhol bas na ming ngo / ming gang gi dbang gis she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi /<br/> etasya punaḥ kena nāmatvam /<br/> teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten na grags pa ming yin pa ste / don de dang de dag go bar byed pa ba lang dang rta dang gzugs dang ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o / de yang ci'i phyir ming nyid yin zhe na / 'on te de dag la ming de gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re 'dir lus bor nas skye ba gzhan du gzhol ba'i phyir ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po dag yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍāyatanamuktam /<br/> sparśo vaktavyaḥ /<br/> ṣparśāḥ ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched drug ni bshad zin no / da ni reg pa brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśa iti /<br/> te punaḥ /<br/> saṃnipātajāḥ /<br/> trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātājjātā indriyārthavijñānānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar ro / de dag kyang / 'dus te byung ba ni / dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa dang gsum 'dus pa las skyes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuktaṃ tāvat pañcānāmindriyāṇāmarthavijñānābhyāṃ saṃnipātaḥ /<br/> sahajatvāt /<br/> manaindriyasya punarniruddhasyānāgatavarttamānābhyāṃ dharmamanovijñānābhyāṃ kathaṃ saṃnipātaḥ /<br/> ayameva teṣāṃ saṃnipāto yaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig lhan cig skye ba'i phyir dbang po lnga ni don dang rnam par shes pa dag dang 'du bar yang rigs na / yid kyi dbang po 'gags pa'i chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dag dang ji ltar 'du zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekakāryārtho vā saṃnipātārthaḥ /<br/> sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gang yin ba de nyid de dag gi 'du ba yin no / yang na gsum po de dag thams cad kyang reg pa bskyed par bya ba la mthun pa yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu gcig pa'i don ni 'du ba'i don to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra punarācāryāṇāṃ bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la slob dpon rnams kyi blo tha dad par gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ iti /<br/> kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ /<br/> ṣaḍādhyātmikānyāyatanāni /<br/> ṣaṭ bāhyānyāyatanāni /<br/> ṣaṭ vijñānakāyāḥ /<br/> ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ /<br/> ṣaṭ vedanākāyāḥ /<br/> ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re 'dus pa nyid reg pa yin no zhes zer te / 'dir mdo'i khungs de ltar na chos gsum po 'di dag 'brel cing 'dus la tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yang khyer te 'ong bar byed do / kha cig na re sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos gzhan kho na zhig reg pa yin no zhes zer te / 'dir mdo'i khungs chos kyi rnam grangs drug tshan drug gang zhe na / nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi'i yul drug dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dang reg pa'i tshogs drug dang tshor ba'i tshogs drug dang sred pa'i tshogs drug go zhes gsungs pa yang khyer te 'ong bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra hīndriyārthavijñānebhyaḥ sparśakāyāḥ pṛthag deśitāḥ /<br/> tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ /<br/> na vai pṛthignirdeśāt pṛthagbhāvo bhavati /<br/> mā bhūddharmāyatanādvedanātṛṣṇayoḥ pṛthagbhāva iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni reg pa'i tshogs dbang po dang don dang rnam par shes pa dag las logs shig tu bstan to / de la gang dag 'dus pa nyid reg pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag ni 'di skad du logs shig tu bstan pa'i phyir logs shig na yod pa kho na yang ma yin te / tshor ba dang sred pa dag kyang chos kyi skye mched las logs shig na yod par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes lan 'debs par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiṣa doṣastadvyatiriktasyāpi dharmāyatanasya bhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni nyes pa med pa de dag las ma gtogs pa'i chos kyi skye mched kyang yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bur 'dir lhag ma gang zhig smos su rung ba reg par gyur pa gsum las gzhan gsum ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam /<br/> tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par shes pa med pa'i dbang po dang don dag yod du zin kyang dbang po dang don med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni med do / de lta bas na gsum bstan zin pas yang reg pa smos pa ni don med par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam /<br/> ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke /<br/> ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa iti /<br/> na vā evaṃ paṭhanti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re mig dang gzugs thams cad kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu ma yin la / mig gi rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang mig dang gzugs thams cad kyi 'bras bu ma yin pas de'i phyir gang dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa de dag ni reg pa'i dngos por rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro / gang de dag reg pa ni 'dus pa las gzhan no zhes zer ba de'i chos gsum po 'di dag 'brel zhing 'dus la tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo 'di la ji ltar lan 'debs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti /<br/> ativahuvistaraprasāriṇī tveṣā kathetyalaṃ prasaṅgena /<br/> anyameva sparśaṃ varṇayantyābhidhārmikāḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ pnnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sparśānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de skad du mi 'don to / yang na ni 'di rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa yin no zhes zer ro / brjod pa 'di rgya che ba'i rnam pa ha cang mang por 'phro ba yin pas zhar la 'ongs pas chog go / chos mngon pa rnams na re reg pa gzhan kho na yin no zhes zer ro / reg pa drug po de dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcapratighasaṃsparśaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'dhivacanāhvaya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga ni thogs pa'i reg pa yin / drug pa bla dags tshig ces bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyasaṃsparśāḥ pañca pratigha saṃsparśa ityucyate /<br/> sapratighendriyāśrayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lnga ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po la brten pa'i phyir thogs pa'i reg pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ so 'dhivacanasparśa ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drug pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni tshig bla dags kyi reg pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇaṃ adhivacanamucyate nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir zhe na / tshigs bla dags zhes bya ba ni ming yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatkilāsyādhikamālambanamato 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lhag par 'di'i dmigs pa yin pas / de'i phyir tshig bla dags kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o zhes grag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktaṃ cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du mig gi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po rnam par shes kyi sngon po'o zhes bya bar ni rnam par mi shes so / yid kyi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po yang rnam par shes la sngon po'o zhes bya bar yang rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eka āśrayiaprabhāito dvitīya ālambanaprabhāvitaḥ /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ /<br/> vacanamadhikṛtyārtheṣu manovijñānasya pravṛtti rna pañcānām /<br/> atastadevādhivacanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig ni rten gyis rab tu phye ba yin no / gnyis pa ni dmigs pas rab tu phye ba yin no / gzhan dag na re yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni tshig gi dbang du byas nas don rnams la 'jug gi lnga po dag ni ma yin te / de'i phyir de ni tshig bla dgas yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i reg pa ni tshig bla dgas kyi reg pa zhes bya bas gcig ni rten gyis rab tu phye ba yin no / gnyis pa ni mtshungs par ldan pas rab tu phye ba yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punasta eva ṣaṭ sparśāstrayo bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang reg pa drug po de dag nyid gsum du 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vidyāvidyetarasparśāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rig dang ma rig dang gzhan reg
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vidyāsaṃsparśo 'vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ /<br/> tābhyāṃ cānyo naivavidyānāvidyāsaṃsparśa iti /<br/> ete punaryathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /<br/> amalakliṣṭaśeṣitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rig pa'i reg pa dang ma rig pa'i reg pa dang de gnyis las gzhan pa rig pa yang ma yin ma rig pa yang ma yin pa'i reg pa'o / de dag kyang go rims bzhin du / dri med nyon mongs can lhag ma / yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rig pa'i reg pa ni zag pa med pa'i reg pa'o / ma rig pa'i reg pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi reg pa ste / rig pa dang ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣo naivavidyānāvidyāsaṃsparśa ubhābhyāmasaṃprayogāt /<br/> kaḥ puna śeṣaḥ /<br/> kuśalasāsravo 'nivṛtāvyākṛtaśca /<br/> punaravidyāsaṃsparśasyābhīkṣṇasamudācāriṇa ekadeśasya grahaṇāt dvau soparśau bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni gnyis ka dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir rig pa yang ma yin ma rig pa yang ma yin pa'i reg pa'o / lag pa yang gang zhig ce na / dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o / ma rig pa'i reg pa yang dang yang du kun tu 'byung ba'i phyogs gcig smos pas reg pa gnyis su 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpādānunayasparśau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod sems rjes su chags pa'i reg
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpādānunayābhyāṃ saṃprayogāt /<br/> punaḥ sarvasaṃgraheṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod sems dang rjes su chags pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro / yang thams cad bsdu na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhavedyādayastrayaḥ /<br/> sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo duḥkhavedanīyo 'duḥkhāsukhavedanīyaśca /<br/> sukhavedanādihitatvāt /<br/> athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam /<br/> kiṃ tat /<br/> veditam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum / bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba ste / bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro / yang na de myong bar bya ba'am / myong bar nus pa'i phyir myong bar 'gyur ba ste / de gang zhe na / tshor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti /<br/> evaṃ duḥkhāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyāvapi yojyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa ste / gang la bde ba'i tshor ba yod pa'o / de bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba dag la yang sbyar bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete ṣoḍaśa sparśā bhavanti /<br/> uktaḥ sparśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni reg pa bcu drug yin no / reg pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanā vaktavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba bshad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la reg pa rnam ba drug sdar bshad pa gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tajjāḥ ṣaḍvedanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāsāṃ punaḥ /<br/> pañca kāyikī caitasī parā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las / lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyasaṃsparśajāḥ pañccavedanāḥ kāyikī vedanetyucyate /<br/> rūpīndriyāśritatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba lnga ni dbang po gzugs can la brten pa'i phyir lus kyi tshor ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥsaṃsparśajā punarvedanā caitasikītyucyate /<br/> cittamātrāśritatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sems tsam la brten pa'i phyir sems kyi zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci tshor ba reg pa'i 'og tu 'byung ngam / 'on te dus mnyam du 'byung zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samānakālamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> anyonyaṃ sahabhūhetutvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phan tshun du lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dus mnyam mo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvaḥ sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na lhan cig 'byung ba gnyis skyed par byed pa dang bskyed par bya ba'i dngos por 'grub
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ ca na sidhyati /<br/> asāmarthyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mi 'grub mthu med pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāte dharme dharmasyanāsti sāmarthayaṃ pratijñā 'viśiṣṭam /<br/> yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti /<br/> anyonyajanakaprasaṅgattarhi /<br/> iṣṭatvādadoṣaḥ /<br/> iṣṭameva hi sahabhūhetoranyonyaphalatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos skyes zin pa la ni chos kyi nus pa med do / lhan cig 'byung ba nyid skyed par byed pa dang bskyed par bya ba'i dngos po med do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nyid chos skyes zin pa la ni chos kyi nus pa med do zhes bya ba yin pas dam bcas pa dang bye brag tu med pa yin no / 'o na ni phan tshun du skyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / 'dod pa'i phyir nyes pa med de / lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu la phan tshun gyi 'bras bu nyid du ma 'dod pa kho na'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iṣṭamidaṃ sūtre tvaniṣṭaṃ sparśavedanayoranyonyaphalatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni 'dod mod kyi reg pa dang tshor ba dag phan tshun nam 'bras bu nyid du 'dod ba 'di ni mdo las mi bzhed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa iti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi 'dus te reg pa la brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye'o / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">janakadharmātikramāvcāyuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyed par byed pa'i chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir yang rigs pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang zhig chos gang gi skyed par byed par gnas pa de ni de dang dus tha dad par grags te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi /<br/> anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper nas bon snga la myu gu 'phyi ba dang 'o ma snga la zho 'phyi ba dang bsnun pa snga la sgra 'phyi ba dang yid snga la yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'phyi ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o / rgyu dang 'bras bu dag snga phyi'i dngos por ma grub pa yang ma yin mod kyi lhan cig pa'i dngos por yang 'grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi na siddhaḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ pūrvāparābhāvaḥ /<br/> sahabhāvo 'pi tu siddhaḥ /<br/> tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam /<br/> pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams dang mig dang gzugs dag dang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams lta bu'o / de la yang dbang po dang don dag snga la rnam par shes pa 'phyi ba dang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur ba rgyu tshogs pa snga ma las phyi ma 'byung ngo zhes bya bar 'dod na dgag pa ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re'o na ni myu gu dang grib ma dag ji lta bar reg pa dang tshor ba dag kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re reg pa'i 'og tu tshor ba 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyārthau hi pūrvānto vijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang don dag ni snga la de'i 'og tu rnam par shes pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum 'dus pa de ni reg pa yin no / reg pa'i rkyen gyis skad cig ma gsum pa tshor ba 'byung ngo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ /<br/> naiṣa doṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni rnam par shes pa thams cad la tshor ba yod par mi 'gyur la / rnam par shes pa thams cad reg pa yin par yang mi 'gyur ro / de ni nyes pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg pa phyi ma la yod pa'i tshor ba reg pa snga ma'i rgyu las byung ba yin pas reg pa thams cad kyang tshor ba dang bcas pa yin no / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang reg pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamayuktaṃ varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatrāyuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduta bhinnālambanayorapi sparśayoḥ pūrvasparśaitukottarasya vedaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste reg pa dmigs pa tha dad pa dag reg pa phyi ma la yod pa'i tshor pa reg pa snga ma'i rgyu las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ste / ji lta zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs mi 'dra ba la dmigs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzhan la dmigs par 'gyur ba 'am / yang na sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de las gzhan pa la dmigs par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astu tarhi tasminkāle sparśabhūtaṃ vijñānamavedanakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni de'i tshe reg pa ni gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa tshor ba med pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ /<br/> pratyayavaidhuryādityevaṃ sati ko doṣaḥ /<br/> mahābhūmikaniyamo bhidyate /<br/> sarvatra citte daśamahābhūmikā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i sngon rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i tshor ba dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin te rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir ro / de lta yin na nyes pa ci zhig yod / sems can thams cad las mang po pa bcu yod do zhes bya ba sa mang bo pa'i nges pa nyams pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kva caiṣa niyamaḥ siddhaḥ /<br/> śāstre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa 'di ga las grub / bstan bcos las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtrapramāṇakā vayaṃ na śāstrapramāṇakāḥ /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā sūtrāntapratiśaraṇairbhavitavyami ti /<br/> na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti /<br/> kastarhi mahābhūmikārthaḥ /<br/> tisro bhūmayaḥ /<br/> savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ /<br/> punaśtisra kusalā bhūmiḥ akuśalā 'vyākṛtā bhumiḥ /<br/> punastisraḥ /<br/> śaikṣī bhūmiraśaikṣī naivaśaikṣī bhumiḥ /<br/> tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ /<br/> ye kukśalāyāmeva te kukśalamahābhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kho bo cag ni mdo tshad mar byed pa yin gyi / kho bo cag bstan bcos tshad mar byed pa ni ma yin te / bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde la brten par bya'o zhes gsungs so / yang na sems thams cad la yod do zhes bya ba 'di sa mang po pa'i don ma yin no / 'o nas mang po pa'i don gang yin zhe na / sa ni gsum ste / rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang dge ba'i sa dang mi dge ba'i sa dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sa dang yang gsum ste / slob pa'i sa dang mi slob pa'i sa dang slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i sa'o / de la gang dag sa 'di dag thams cad ni yon pa de dag ni sa mang po pa yin no / gang dag dge ba kho na la yod pa de dag ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye kliṣṭāyāmeva te kleśamahābhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag nyon mongs pa can kho na la yod pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punaryathāsaṃbhavaṃ paryāyeṇanatu sarve yugapadityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de dag ni ci rigs par rnam grangs kyis yin gyi / thams cad cig car ni ma yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalamahābhūmikāstu pāṭhaprasaṅge nāsañjitāḥ /<br/> idānīṃ pūrvaṃ na paṭhyante sma /<br/> yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams ni 'don pa'i zhar la de khong nas drangs kyi sngon ni ma bstan to / gal te reg pa'i 'og tu tshor ba 'byung ngo zhe na / mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa dang gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i lan gdab par bya dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig skyes pa zhes gsungs so / reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa zhes ni ma gsungs na / 'di la lan gdab tu ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī tyajñāpakametat /<br/> yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam /<br/> saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetat ka eṣa samsṛṣṭārthaḥ /<br/> tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig ces bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa la yang mthong ste / dper na byams pa dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba'i dran pa yang dag par byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes bya ba lta bu yin pas 'di ni khungs su mi rung ngo / 'o na mdo las tshor ba gang yin pa dang sems pa gang yin pa dang 'du shes gang yin pa dang rnam par shes ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag ni 'dres pa yin gyi ma 'dres pa ni ma yin no zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang / de lta bas na tshor ba la sogs pa dag kyang ma 'dres pa'i rnam par shes pa ni med do / re zhig 'dres pa'i don ci yin pa 'di dpyad par bya ste / mdo de nyid las 'di skad du / gang myong bar byed pa de sems par byed do / gang sems par byed pa de / 'dus te shes par byed do / gang 'dus te shes par byed pa de rnam par shes par byed do zhes gsungs na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci re zhig 'di de dag gis dmigs par nges par gsungs sam / 'on te skad cig ma la nges par gsungs pa de mi shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyuruṣmaṇoḥ sāhabhāvye saṃsṛṣṭavacanāt siddhaḥ kṣaṇaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe dang drod dag lhan cig pa la 'dres pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir skad cig ma la nges pa yin par grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ iti /<br/> tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang mdo las gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa zhes gsungs pas de yang ji ltar na rnam par shes pa ni yod la / gsum 'dus pa ni ma yin pa 'am / yang na 'dus pa yin la reg pa ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rnam par shes pa thams cad la reg pa dang reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba yang 'dod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alamatiprasaṅgiyā kathayā /<br/> prakṛtamevānukramyatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gyis chog gi dkyus ma kho na rim gyis brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktā samāsena caitasikī vedanā /<br/> punaścāṣṭādaśavidhā sā manopavicārataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems las byung ba tshor ba mdor bshad zin to / de yid nye bar rgyu ba las / rnam pa dag ni yang bco brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate /<br/> punaḥ saṃdhikaraṇaṃ cātra draṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sems las byung ba'i tshor ba de nyid yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad rnam par gzhag pa las rnam pa bco brgyad du dbye'o / yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśamano pavicārāḥ katame /<br/> ṣaṭ saumanasyopacirāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārāḥ /<br/> kathameṣāṃ vyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug go / de dag ji ltar rnam par bzhag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi svabhāvataḥ /<br/> trayo bhaviṣyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ngo bo nyid las na ni gsum du 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāvicārāḥ /<br/> atha saṃprayogataḥ /<br/> eko bhaviṣyati /<br/> sarveṣāṃ manaḥ saṃprayuktatvāt /<br/> athālambanataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba dag yin no / 'on te mtshungs par ldan pa las na ni yid dang mthun par ldan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṭ bhaviṣyanti /<br/> rūpādiṣaḍviṣayālambanatvat /<br/> tribhirapi sthāpanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te dmigs pa las na ni gzugs la sogs pa yul drug la dmigs pa'i phyir drug tu 'gyur ro zhe na / gsum kar yang gzhag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ pañcadaśa rūpādyupavicārā asaṃbhinnālambanāḥ pratiniyatarūpādyālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las bco lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa la nye bar rgyu ba yin te / gzugs la sogs pa so sor nges pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trayo dharmopavicārā ubhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos la nye bar rgyu ba gsum ni rnam pa gnyi ga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manopavicārā iti ko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i don ci ltar zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥ kila pratītyaite saumanasyadayo viṣayānupavicarantīti /<br/> viṣayeṣu vā mana upavicārayantītyapare /<br/> vedanāvaśena manaso viṣayeṣu punaḥ punarvicaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid la brten nas yid bde ba la sogs pa de dag yul la nye bar rgyu ba'i phyir ro zhes grag go / gzhan dag na re / yul dag la yid nye bar rgyu bar byed pa'i phyir te / tshor ba'i dbang gis yid yul dag la yang dang yang du rnam par rgyu ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt kāyikī vedanā na manopavicāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi tshor ba ci'i phyir yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hyasau mana evāśritā nāpyupavicārikā 'vikalpakatvādityayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni yid kho na la brten pa yang ma yin la / rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nye bar rgyu bar byed pa yang ma yin pas mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyadhyānasukhasya kasmānmanopavicāreṣvagrahaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa'i bde ba ci'i phyir yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba'i nang dag tu ma smos she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āditaḥ kila kāmadhātau manobhūmikasukhendriyābhāvāttatpratidvandvena kuḥkhopavicārābhāvācceti /<br/> yadi manobhūmikā evaite
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po 'dod pa'i khams na yid kyis pa'i bde ba'i dbang po med pa'i phyir dang de'i mi mthun pa sdug bsngal gyi yid nye bar rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go / gal te 'di dag yid kyi sa pa kho na zhig yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ /<br/> katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las / mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu'i gzugs rnams la nye bar rgyu'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang gsungs pa de ji ltar drang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcavijñānakāyābhinirhṛtatvamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktaṃ manobhūmikā hyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs ltas mngon par bsgrubs pa nyid la dgongs te gsungs par zad kyi / 'di dag ni yid kyi sa pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā 'śubhā cakṣurvijñānābhinirhṛtā ca manobhūmikā ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mi sdug pa lta bu mig gi rnam par shes pas mngon par bsgrubs pa yang yin la / yid kyi sa pa yang yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tu dṛṣṭvā yāvat spṛṣṭveti vacanāt /<br/> acodyamevaitat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang mthong nas zhes bya ba nas reg nas zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa'i phyir de ni klan kar mi rung ba nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye 'pya dṛṣṭvā yāvadaspṛṣṭvopavicarnti te 'pi manopavicārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis ma mthong ba nas ma reg pa'i bar du nye bar rgyu ba de yang yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan du na 'dod pa'i khams na gzugs kyi khams la dmigs pa dag kyang gzugs la sogs pa la nye bar rgyu ba yin par mi 'gyur la / gzugs kyi khams na 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag kyang dri dang ro dang reg bya la nye bar rgyu ba yin par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ /<br/> yathā tvanākulaṃ tathoktamindriyārthasya vyavacchedataḥ
