</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar ches gsal ba de ltar bshad de / gang gzugs dag mthong nas sgra rnams la nye bar rgyu ba de dag yang yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba yin mod kyi dbang po dang don rnam par chad pa'i sgo nas ji ltar mi 'chol ba de ltar bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimasti rūpaṃ yatsaumanasyasthānīyameva syāt yāvadupekṣāsthānīyameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci gzugs gang yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu kho na yin pa nas btang snyoms kyi gnas lta bu kho na yin pa'i bar yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti saṃtānaṃ niyamayya na tvbālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud nges pas ni yod kyi dmigs pas ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ /<br/> āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba 'di dag las du zhig ni 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin de dag las kyang du zhig gi dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin / de bzhin du gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i bar du brjod par bya zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme svālambanāḥ sarve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa thams cad rang dmigs can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam /<br/> teṣāmeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ni bco brgyad po thams cad yod la / de dag thams cad kyi dmigs pa yang de yin no / de dag nyid kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpī dvādaśagocaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhāturdvādaśānāmālambanaṃ ṣaṭ gandharasopavicārānapāsya /<br/> tatra tayorabhāvāt /<br/> trayāṇāmuttaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams ni bcu gnyis kyi dmigs pa yin no / dri dang ro la nye bar rgya ba drug ma gtogs pa ste / de lta na de gnyis med pa'i phyir / gong ma gsum gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gocara iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod yul zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyadhātustrayāṇāṃ dharmopavicārāṇāmālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa ni chos la nye bar rgyu ba gsum gyi dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra rūpādyabhāvāt /<br/> uktāḥ kāmapratisaṃyukatāḥ /<br/> rūpapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> dhyānadvaye dvādaśa /<br/> daurmanasyopavicārānapāsya /<br/> te ca dvādaśa /<br/> kāmagāḥ /<br/> kāmān gacchantīti kāmagāḥ /<br/> kāmadhātumālabanta ityarthaḥ /<br/> dṛṣṭo hi viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇārthe gamiprayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro / 'dod pa dang ldan pa bshad zin to / gzugs dang ldan pa brjod par bya ste / de la re zhig / bsam gtan ni / gnyis na bcu gnyis / yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba rnams ma gtogs so / bcu gnyis po de dag kyang 'dod par 'gro bas na 'dod 'gro rnams te / 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / yul rnam par 'dzin pa'i don la yang 'gro ba sbyor ba mthong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathametat gamyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ji ltar 'gro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evametat gamyata iti /<br/> svo 'ṣṭālambanam /<br/> sa eva rūpadhātusteṣaṃ svaḥ /<br/> sa eva rūpadhātusteṣāṃ svaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni 'di ltar 'gro'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o / rang la dmigs brgyad / gzugs kyi khams de nyid ni de dag gi rang bzhin yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svo 'ṣṭānāṃ manopavicārāṇāmālambanaṃ gandharasopavicārāṃścaturo hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin te / dri dang ro la nye bar rgyu ba bzhi ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyo dvayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa gnyis kyi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmopavicārayorālambanam /<br/> dhyānadvaye tu ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos la nye bar rgyu ba dag gi dmigs pa yin no / bsam gtan gnyis na drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyacaturthayordhyānyoḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā eva santi nānye /<br/> teṣāṃ punarālambanaṃ /<br/> kāmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug kho na yod kyi gzhan dag ni med do / de dag drug gi / dmigs pa ni 'dod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātuḥ ṣaṇṇāmapyālambanam /<br/> caturṇāṃ svaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams ni drug car kyi yang dmigs pa yin no / rang gi bzhi'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātuścaturṇāṃ tatra gandharasābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams ni bzhi yin te / de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasyālambanaṃ paraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyadhāturekasyaiva dharmopavicārasyālambanam /<br/> uktā rūpapratisaṃyuktāḥ /<br/> ārūpyapratisaṃyuktā idānīmucyante /<br/> catvāro 'rūpisāmante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i khams ni chos la nye bar rgyu ba gcig kho na'i dmigs pa yin no / gzugs dang ldan pa dag bshad zin to / da ni gzugs med pa dang ldan pa brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakamatrārūpisāmantakam /<br/> tatra catvāro rūpaśabdaspraṣṭavyadharmopavicārāḥ /<br/> te ca /<br/> rūpagāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi / gzugs med pa'i nyi bar bsdogs ni 'dir nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nye bar bsdogs pa yin te / de na ni gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya dang chos la nye bar rgyu ba bzhi'o / de dag kyang / gzugs sgra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthaṃ hi dhyānameṣāmālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi dmigs pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gi ltar na de rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa yod pa yin no / gang dag gi ltar na ni de dag bzlums te dmigs pa de dag gi ltar na ni de na chos la nye bar rgyu ba 'dres pa la dmigs pa gcig kho na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eka ūrdhvagaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong mar 'gro ba gcig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eka eva dharmopavicārastatrārūpyadhātvālambanaḥ /<br/> eko maule
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na gzugs med pa'i khams la dmigs pa ni gcig kho na ste / chos la nye bar rgyu ba'o / dngos gzhi na gcig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maule punarārūpye dharmopavicāra evaiko 'sti nānyaḥ /<br/> sa cāpi /<br/> svaviṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi na ne chos la nye bar rgyu ba gcig kho na yod kyi gzhan ni med do / de yang / rang yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyadhātvālambana eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i khams kho na la dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi maulānāmārupyāṇāmadharo dhāturālambanamiti paścāt prativedaviṣyāmaḥ /<br/> ete ca manopavicārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi rnams kyi dmigs pa ni kha cig ma yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o / yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba de dag kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve 'ṣṭādaśa sāsravāḥ /<br/> nāsti kaścidanāsravaḥ /<br/> kaḥ katibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bco brgyad thams cad zag dang bcas / zag pa med pa ni 'ga' yang med do / gang zhig du dag dang ldan zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikaiścaturbhiḥ kliṣṭairgandharasālambanān paryudasya ārūpyāvacareṇaikena kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā vitarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ prathamadhyānabhumikairdaśabhiḥ /<br/> caturbhiḥ saumanasyopavicāraiḥ kliṣṭairgandharasālambanau vyudasya ṣaḍbhirūpekṣopavicārairanāgamyabhūmikaiḥ /<br/> dvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems ma thob pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa thams cad dang ldan no / bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa ni dri dang ro la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa nyon mongs ba can brgyad brgyad dang ldan no / bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa ni bzhi bzhi dang ldan no / gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni nyon mongs pa can gcig kho na dang ldan no / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems thob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa thams cad dang ldan no / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ni bcu dang ldan te / yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba dri dang ro la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa nyon mongs pa can bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyacaturthadhyānārūpyabhūmikaiḥ pūrvavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang gzugs med pa las skyes pa rnams dang ni snga ma bzhin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anayā varttanyā śeṣamanugantavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srol 'dis lhag ma yang khong du chud par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānopapannastu kāmāvacareṇaikenopekṣādharmopavicāreṇa nirmāṇacittasaṃprayuktena samanvāgato veditavyaḥ /<br/> apara āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan du skyes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i btang snyoms chos la nye bar rgyu ba sbrul pa'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa gcig dang ldan par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyevaṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthaḥ /<br/> sūtrārthastvanyathā dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba rnams kyi don bye brag tu smra ba lta bu 'di yang yod mod kyi mdo'i don ni gzhan du snang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni dmigs pa de la nye bar rgyu bar rig pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sāṃkleśikā yairmano viṣayānupavicaratīti /<br/> kathaṃ copavicarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na yid bde ba la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dag kyang thams cad ni nye bar rgyu ba ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams yin te / de dag gis yid yul rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed pa'o / ji ltar nye bar rgyu bar byed ce na / rjes su chags par byed / so sor ma brtags pa yang btang snyoms su byed pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gi gnyen por rtag tu yod pa drug gnas pa yin pa ste / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid bde bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas so zhes bya ba nas / de bzhin du yid kyis chos rnams shes nas zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa la yang 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i yid bde ba med pa ma yin pas 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid nye bar rgyu ba de dgag pa ma yin par bde bar mngon no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punasta eva saumanasyādayaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśacchāstṛpadāni bhavanti /<br/> gardhanaiṣkramyāśritabhedena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang yid bde ba la sogs pa de dag nyid zhen ba la brten pa dang nges par 'byung ba nyid la brten pa'i bye brag gis ston pa'i bka' sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadbhedasya śāstrā gamitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi bye brag ston pas bka' stsal ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra gardhāśritāḥ kliṣṭā naiṣkramyāśritāḥ kuśalāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la zhen pa la brten pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa can dag go / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa rnams ni dge ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evametadvedanākhyaṃ bhavāṅgamanekaprakārabhedaṃ veditavyam /<br/> śeṣāṇyaṅgāni punarnocyante /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> uktaṃ ca vakṣyate cānyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na tshor ba dag ces bya bar sred pa'i yan lag 'di'i rab tu dbye ba ni du ma yod par rig par bya'o / yan lag lhag ma rnams ni yang mi brjod do / ci'i phyir zhe na / bshad dang 'chad par 'gyur ba gzhan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiñcidatrāṅgamuktaṃ kiñcit paścadvakṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir yan lag kha cig ni bshad zin / kha cig ni 'og nas 'chad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vijñānaṃ tāvaduktaṃ /<br/> vijñānaṃ prativijñaptirmana āyatanaṃ ca taditi /<br/> ṣaḍāyatanamapyuktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig rnam par shes pa ni / rnam par shes pa so sor rnam rig pa / yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin zhes bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvijñānāśrayā rūpaprasādāścakṣurādaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched drug kyang / de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten mig la sogs pa gzugs dang ba rnams zhes bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskārā bhavaśca karmakośasthāne vyākhyāsyante /<br/> tṛṣṇopādānāni kleśakośasthāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed dang srid pa ni las kyi mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro / sred pa dang len pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i gnas kyi mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam /<br/> atra tu kleśa iṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de yang mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa dang las dang gzhi rnams so zhes bstan pa / 'dir ni nyon mongs bon bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bījavannāgavanmūlavṛkṣavattuṣavattathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">klu bzhin rtsva bzhin ljon shing bzhin / de bzhin shun pa bzhin du 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimasya vījādibhiḥ sādharmyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i sa bon la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na sa bon las sdong bu dang lo ma la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du / nyon mongs pa las kyang nyon mongs pa dang las dang gzhi rnams skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na klu gnas pa'i mtsho ni skam par mi 'gyur ba ltar / nyon mongs pa'i klan ka gnas pa'i skye ba'i mtsho yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na nags tshal rtsa ba nas ma phyung ba rnams ni bcad kyang slar skye bar 'gyur pa ltar / nyon mongs pa rtsa ba nas ma bton pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti /<br/> yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ tāvat kleśo bījādivadveditavyaḥ /<br/> tuṣitaṇḍulavat karma tathaivauṣadhipuṣpavat /<br/> tuṣau 'syāstīti tuṣī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na shing ljon pa rnams dus dus su me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skyed par byed pa de bzhin du / nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lan cig ma yin par nyon mongs pa dang las dang gzhi rnams kyi rgyu yin no / dper na shun pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras thug po che rnams ni skye bar nus kyi 'ba' zhig dag ni ma yin pa de bzhin du / nyon mongs pa'i thob pa'i shun pa dang bcas pa'i las skye ba gzhan du skye bar nus kyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no / de ltar na re zhig nyon mongs pa sa bon la sogs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / las ni shun bcas 'bras dang 'dra / de bzhin sman dang me tog bzhin / 'di la shun pa yod pas na shun pa dang bcas pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tuṣasthānīyaḥ kleśa uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shun pa lta bu'i nyon mongs pa ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idānīṃ tuṣitaṇḍulasthānīyaṃ karmmocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni shun pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu lta bu'i las brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na 'bru dang sman dag 'bras bu smin pa mthar phyin pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du las rnams kyang rnam par smin nas yang rnam par smin pa mngon par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na me tog 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la nye ba'i rgyu yin pa ltar las rnams kyang rnam par smin pa bskyed par bya ba la de bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">siddhānnapānavadvastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi ni bza' btung grub pa bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu /<br/> nahi punarvipākādvipākāntaraṃ janmāntareṣu pravarhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bza' ba dang btung ba grub zin pa yongs su longs spyad par bya ba 'ba' zhig yin gyi yang bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa ltar rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi yang de dang 'dra ste / rnam par smin pa las tshe rabs gzhan dag tu rnam par smin pa gzhan dang 'brel pa ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt /<br/> na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati /<br/> yadutāntarābhavamupapattibhavaṃ pūrvakālabhavaṃ maraṇabhavaṃ ca /<br/> te ca vyākhyātāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'brel par 'gyur na ni thar par yang mi 'gyur ro / yang tshe'i rgyun de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba na 'di lta ste srid pa bar ma dang skye ba'i srid pa dang dus snga ma'i srid pa dang 'chi ba'i srid pa dang srid pa bzhi las mi 'da' ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmin bhavacatuṣṭaye /<br/> upapattibhavaḥ kliṣṭaḥ /<br/> ekāntena /<br/> katamena kleśena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni bshad zin to / srid pa bzhi po de dag las gcig tu / skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can / nyon mongs pa gang gis she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvakleśai svabhūmikaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gis ba'i nyon mongs kun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhamika upapattibhavastadbhūmikaīreva sarvakleśaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa ba rnams na re skye ba'i srid pa sa gang yin pa de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yin pa nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis nying mtshams sbyor bar dgag par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa de ni med do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśaireva tu na paryavasthānaiḥ svatantraīḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can rnams kho nas yin gyi kun nas dkris pa chig rkya thub pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate /<br/> pūrvāvedhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs de zhan pa yin mod kyi / gang zhig gis gang la yang dang yang du dang nye bar dpyad pa de la ni de'i tshe nyon mongs pa de nyid nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / sngon 'phangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarabhavapratisaṃdhirapyevamavaśyaṃ kliṣṭo veditavyaḥ /<br/> tridhā 'nye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma nying mtshams sbyor ba yang de bzhin du gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can du rig par bya'o / gzhan rnam gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye trayo bhavāstriprakārāḥ antarabhavādayaḥ kuśalakliṣṭāvyākṛtāḥ /<br/> athaiṣāṃ bhavānāṃ katamaḥ kiṃpratisaṃyuktaḥ /<br/> traya ārūpye /<br/> antarābhavaṃ varjayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma la sogs pa srid pa gzhan gsum ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa dang gsum char yin no / yang srid pa 'di rnams las gang zhig gang dang ldan zhe na / gzugs med gsum / srid pa bar ma ma gtogs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyārūpyadhātuḥ sthānāntaraparicchinno yasya prāptyarthamantarābhavo 'bhinirvarteta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i khams ni gang du phyin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa bar ma mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba nas gzhan du na yongs su chad pa ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag gis ni chad pa ma smos pas srid pa bzhi po thams cad yong do zhes bya bar gnas par byas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vistareṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kathaṃ sattvānāṃ sthitibhavatītyāha /<br/> āhārasthitikaṃ jagat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sems can rnams ji ltar gnas pa yin zhe na / 'gro ba zas kyis gnas pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eko dharmo bhagavatā svayamabhijñāyābhisaṃbadhyākhyāto yaduta sarvasttvā āhārasthitikā iti sūtrapadam /<br/> ke punarāhārāḥ /<br/> catvāra āhārāḥ /<br/> kavaḍīkārāhāraḥ prathamaḥ /<br/> audārikaḥ sūkṣmaśca /<br/> sūkṣmo 'ntarābhavikānāṃ gandhāhāratvāt /<br/> devānāṃ prāthamakalpikānāṃ ca niḥṣyandābhāvāt /<br/> tailasyeva sikatāsvaṅgeṣvanupraveśāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par mkhyen cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos gcig bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste / sems can thams cad ni zas kyis gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig yin no / zas rnams kyang gang dag ce na / zas ni bzhi ste / kham gyi zas ni rags pa dang phra ba'o / phra ba ni srid pa bar ma rnams kyi yin te / dri za ba'i phyir ro / lha rnams dang bskal pa dang po pa rnams kyi yang yin te / bye ma dag gi nang du til mar blugs pa bzhin du yan lag rnams kyi nang du 'jug pas rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūkṣmāṇāṃ vā sūkṣmo bālakasaṃsvedajantukādīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na phra mo rnams kyi yin bas phra mo ste / byis pa dang drod gsher las skye ba la sogs pa'i'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśo dvitīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg pa ni gnyis pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥsaṃcetanā tṛtīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid la sems pa ni gsum pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñānamāhāraścaturthaḥ /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ kāme
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i zas ni bzhi pa'o / de la kham gyi zas ni 'dod pa na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na rūpārūpyadhātvostadvītarāgasya tatropapatteḥ /<br/> sa ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na ni med do / de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dag der skye ba'i phyir ro / de yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tryāyatanātmakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye mched gsum gyi bdag nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāṇi gandharasaspraṣṭavyāyatanāni sarvāṇyeva kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ /<br/> kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavaharaṇāt /<br/> mukhanāsikāgrāsavyavacchedataḥ /<br/> cchāyātapajvālāprabhāsu teṣāṃ kathamāhāratvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i dri dang ro dang reg bya'i skye mched rnams ni sna dang lce dang lus kyis kham du bcad nas kham du byas te mid pa'i phyir thams cad kham gyi zas kho na yin no / grib ma dang nyi ma dang me dang 'od dag la yod pa de dag ji ltar zas nyid yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bāhulyena kilaiṣa nirdeśaḥ /<br/> yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni phal che bar bstan pa yin no zhes grag go / gang dag mi mid la gnas par yang byed pa de dag kyang zas phra mo yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snānābhyaṅgavaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khrus dang lus mnye ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna rūpāyatanamāhāraḥ /<br/> tadapi kavaḍīkṛtyābhyavahriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gzugs kyi skye mched zas ma yin / de yang kham du byas nas mid par ni byed do zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na rūpāyatanaṃ tena svākṣamuktānanugrahāt /<br/> āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate /<br/> rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi skye mched ma yin des / rang dbang grol la mi phan phyir / zas zhes bya ba ni gang dbang po dang 'byung ba chen po rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin na gzugs kyi skye mched ni med pa'i tshe rang gi dbang po'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuta evānyānyaviṣatvāt /<br/> yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la phan mi 'dogs na yul ma yin pa'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos / gang gi tshe mthong ba na bde ba dang yid bde bar byed pa de'i tshe yang de la dmigs pa'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa zas yin gyi gzugs ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">muktānāmanāgāmyarhetāṃ sumanojñamapyāhāraṃ paśyatāmanugrahābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grol ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa zas shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba mthong ba rnams la yang phan 'dogs pa med pa'i yang phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśasaṃcetanāvijñā āhārāḥ sāsravāstriṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg dang sems pa rnam shes ni / zag bcas zas yin gsum dag na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśastrikasaṃnipātajaḥ /<br/> cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante /<br/> kimarthaṃ nānāsravāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg pa gsum 'dus pa las byung ba dang sems pa yid kyi las dang rnam par shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa dag kho na zas yin te / khams gsum char na yang yod de / ci'i phyir zag pa med pa rnams ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāt bhavāpoṣaṇārtha āhārārthaḥ /<br/> tāni ca bhāvakṣayāyotthitānīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'di ltar srid pa gso bar byed pa'i don ni zas kyi don yin na de dag ni srid pa zad par bya ba'i phyir skyes pa dag yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tu sūtra uktaṃ catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāyeti /<br/> na caivamanāsravā dharmā iti nāhārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang mdo las / sems can byung ba rnams gnas par byed pa dang 'tsho bar byed pa dang srid pa tshol ba rnams la phan par byed pa yin no zhes gsungs nas zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni de lta ma yin pas zas dag ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /<br/> atha saṃbhavaiṣiṇaḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig byung ba ni sems can skyes pa rnams zhes bya bar yang shes na / srid pa tshol ba rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manomayaḥ saṃbhavaiṣī gandharvaścāntarābhavaḥ /<br/> nirvṛttiśca /<br/> antarābhavo hyebhirabhidhānairukto bhagavatā /<br/> sa eva manonirjātatvāt manomaya uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid las byung dang srid tshol dang / dri za srid pa bar ma dang / 'grub pa'o / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa bar ma ni brjod pa 'di dag gis gsungs so / de ni yid las skyes pa'i phyir yid las byung ba zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śukraśoṇitādikaṃ kiñcidbāhyamanupādāya bhāvāt /<br/> saṃbhavaiṣaṇaśīlatvāt saṃbhavaiṣī /<br/> gandharvaṇāt gandharvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi'i khu chu dang khrag la sogs pas cung zad kyang rgyur byas pa med pa'i phyir ro / srid pa tshol ba'i ngang tshul can yin pa'i phyir srid pa tshol ba'o / dri za ba'i phyir na / dri za'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattyadbhimukhatvādabhinirvṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir mngon par 'grub pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyābādhamātmabhāvamabhinirvartya savyābādhe loke upapadyata iti sūtrapadāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / gnod pa dang bcas pa'i lus mngon par grub nas gnod pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāsti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanam iti sūtra catuḥkoṭikāt /<br/> prathamā koṭirdvidhātuvītarāgasyordhvaṃsrotaso 'nāgāminaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mdo las / gang gis mngon par 'grub pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni spangs la skye ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni ma yin pa'i gang zag kyang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir te / mu dang po ni phyir mi 'ong ba khams gnyis las 'dod chags dang bral ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyāntarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā 'rhatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni dgra bcom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā /<br/> bhūtāvā 'rhantaḥ saṃbhavaiṣiṇaḥ satṛṣṇāḥ /<br/> atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya /<br/> sarve 'pyubhayatheti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> kavaḍīkārāhāro 'pi hi tadrāgiṇāṃ punarbhavāya saṃvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o / yang na byung ba ni dgra bcom pa'o / srid pa tshol ba rnams ni srid pa dang bcas pa dag go / yang zas du zhig ni sems can byung ba rnams gnas par byed pa yin / du zhig ni srid pa tshol ba rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams cad kyang gnyi ga yin no zhes zer ro / kham gyi zas kyang de la chags pa rnams kyi yang 'byung bar byed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ hi /<br/> bhagavatā atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya iti /<br/> manaḥsaṃcetanā 'pi ceha sthitaye dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis zas bzhi ni nad dang 'bras dang zug rngu'i rtsa ba yin no / rga shi'i rkyen yin no zhes gsungs so / yid la sems pa yang 'dir gnas par byed pa yin par snang ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau /<br/> tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du lo nyes kyis nyen pa'i pha zhig gis thal ba'i rkyal ba kha thur mas gtur te phye yin no / bar du bu gnyis shig yid ches par byas ba dang de gnyis kyang de la rtog par byed cing ring mo zhig tu gnas par gyur to / gcig gis kha phye nas thal ba yin no snyam ste re ba med par gyur pa dang shi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rgya mtshor gru chag ba'i mi zhig thang yin no snyam nas dbu ba'i phung po chen po zhig gi drung du song ste / de la kun du bsnams nas re ba med pa dang shi'o zhes grag go zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre 'vataranti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba'i rnam grangs las kyang rgya mtsho chen po nas srog chags che long rnams chu nang nas skam la 'thon te bye ma can gyi thang la sgong rnams bzhag nas bye mas bkab ste slar yang rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti /<br/> tadetanna varṇayanti sautrāntikāḥ /<br/> mā bhūt parakīyeṇāhāreṇāhāra iti /<br/> evaṃ tu varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ma gang dag gis sgo nga las brtsams te dran pas ma brjed pa'i sgo du de dag ni 'drul bar mi 'gyur ro / gang dag gis brjed pa de dag ni 'drul bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de / gzhan gyi zas kyis zas dang bcas par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir de ni mi brjod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti /<br/> yeṣāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du sgo nga gang dag gis ma las brtsams nas dran pas mi brjed pas de dag ni reg ba'i gnas skabs de dran pas 'drul bar mi 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāḥ sparśāvasthāyāḥ smarantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gis brjed ba de dag ni 'drul bar 'gyur ro zhes ni brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmāccatvāra evāhārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir zas bzhi kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ /<br/> yadyapyetadevaṃ tathāpi pradhānyenoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad srid pa rnams gso bar byed pa dag ma yin nam zhe na / de ni de lta na yin mod kyi 'on kyang gtso bor bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha puṣṭyarthamāśrayāśritayordvayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la gnas dang ni / rten ba rgyas pa'i don du gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayamanyabhavākṣpanivṛttyarthaṃ yathākramam /<br/> āśrayo hi sendriyaḥ kāyaḥ /<br/> tasya puṣṭaye kavaḍīkārāhārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid gzhan 'phen dang 'grub pa yi / don du gnyis te go rims bzhin / gnas ni dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus so / de rgyas par byed pa ni kham gyi zas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśritāścittacaittāsteṣāṃ puṣṭaye sparśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so / de dag rgyas par byed pa ni reg pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anayostāvadihotpannasya bhavasya poṣaṇe prādhānyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'di gnyis ni 'dir skyes pa'i srid pa gso bar bya ba gtso bo yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam /<br/> ataścatvāra uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid la sems pas ni yang srid pa 'phen par byed do / 'phangs zin pa ni las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon las mngon par 'grub pas 'di gnyis ni ma skyes pa'i srid pa skyes ba la gtso bor yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir bzhir gsungs so / snga ma gnyis ni skyes zin pa gso bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ma ma lta bu dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uttarau mātṛsthānīyau janakatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi ma gnyis ni skyed par byed ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma lta bu dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la la kham yin pa de thams cad zas kyang yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt kavaḍīkāro nāhāra iti catuṣkoṭikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kham yin la zas ma yin pa yang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ /<br/> dvitīyā koṭistraya āhārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams nyams par 'gyur la / 'byung ba chen po rnams kyang yongs su 'jig par 'gyur ba'o / mu gnyis pa ni zas gsum pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ /<br/> caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā /<br/> evaṃ sparśadibhirapi yathāyogaṃ catuḥkoṭikāni karttavyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'gyur zhing 'byung ba chen po rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o / bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o / de bzhin du reg pa la sogs pas kyang ci rigs par mu bzhir bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg pa la sogs pa la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'gyur zhing 'byung ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba de dag zas kyang ma yin pa lta yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādanyabhūmikānanāsravāṃśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de / gzhan gyi sa pa dang zag pa med pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva /<br/> āpāte 'nugrahāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / gang zhig zos nas za ba po la gnod par byed pa de la yang dang po phan 'dogs pa'i phyir zas yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> atha kasyāṃ gatau katyāhārāḥ /<br/> sarvāsu sarve /<br/> evaṃ yoniṣvapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zas ni dus gnyis su zas kyi bya ba byed de / yongs su longs spyod pa'i tshe dang 'ju ba'i tshe'o zhes zer ro / 'gro ba gang na zas du zhig yod ce na / thams cad na thams cad yod de / skye gnas dag na yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ narakeṣu kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ /<br/> pradīptāyaspiṇḍāḥ svathitaṃ ca tāmrām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dag na kham gyi zas ji lta bu zhe na / lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba dang zangs zhun ma yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gnod par byed pa yang zas yin na ni mu ba zhi la yang gnod par 'gyur la rab tu byed pa'i gzhung kham gyi zas gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'byung zhing 'gyur ba chen po rnams kyang 'phel ba dang 'tsho ba dang nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba nas / rnam par shes pa'i bar du rgyas par gsungs pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upacayāhārābhisaṃdhivacanādavirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyas par 'gyur ba'i zas la dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apacayāhārastu narakekṣu lakṣaṇaprāptatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyams par 'gyur ba'i zas ni dmyal ba dag tu zas kyi mtshan nyid thob pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des kyang bkres pa dang skom pa dag 'joms par nus pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apitu pratyekanarakeṣu manuṣyavat kavaḍīkārāhārasadbhāvādyuktaṃ pāñcagatikatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba dag na mi dang 'dra bar kham gyi zas yod pa'i phyir 'gro ba lnga pa nyid du rigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ bhagavatā yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam /<br/> ato dānādidaṃ dānaṃ mahāphalataramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis / gang gis phyi'i drang srong 'dod pa dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya la zas byin pa bas gang gis 'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa'i so so'i skye bo gcig la byin na spyin pa de bas spyin pa 'di 'bras bu ches che'o zhes gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko 'yaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagato nāma pṛthagjanaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa'i so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvīpanivāsinaḥ kukṣimanta ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa lto dang ldan pa dag yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadetanna yuktamekamiti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rigs pa ma yin te / gcig ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścātra viśeṣaḥ /<br/> syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so'i skye bo mang po la zas byin na bsod nams mang por 'gyur gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba nyung du la zas byin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃnikṛṣṭo bodhisattva ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re byang chub sems dpa' nye ba yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadetanna varṇayanti bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni de skad du mi brjod de / de la byin na dgra bcom pa bye ba la byin pa bas bsod nams che sa mang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa so so'i skye bo yin par dgongs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā /<br/> jambūṣaṇḍagato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhīti parikalpa evāyaṃ kevalaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i ming yang don dang mthun pa ma yin la / mdo 'am bstan bcos gang las kyang 'dzam bu'i tsha la du gtogs pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa'o zhes 'ol phyir ma ba shad pas 'di ni yongs su rtog pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'dzam bu'i tshal na bzhugs pa kho na yin par rigs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti /<br/> anantebhyo 'pi hi sa tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so'i skye bo de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar 'dra bas de'i tshe de dag las khyad par du 'phags par gsungs so / de ni de dag mtha' yas pa pas kyang khyad par du 'phags na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śatagrahaṇaṃ tu pūrvādhikārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgya smos pa ni dang po'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gdon mi za bar de lta yin par shes par bya ste / 'di ltar de ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol pa rnams las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa khyad par du 'phags par mdzad par gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi jambūṣaṇḍagatādeva vyaśeṣayiṣyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'dzam bu'i tshal du gtogs pa las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa kho nar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta ba dang ji ltar gnas pa bshad zin to / ji ltar tshe zad pa la sogs pas 'chi 'pho ba la yang bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamidānīṃ vaktavyam /<br/> katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha /<br/> chedasaṃdhāna vairāgyahānicyutyupapattyaḥ /<br/> manovijñāna eveṣṭāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni sems gang la gnas te 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar 'gyur ba 'di brjod par bya ste / 'chad dang mtshams sbyor 'dod chags bral /  / nyams dang 'chi 'pho skye ba rnams / yid kyi rnam shes kho nar 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalalmūlasamucchedaḥ kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānaṃ dhātubhūmivairāgyaṃ parihāṇiścyutirupapattiśca /<br/> ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ces bya ba smos so / de dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'chad pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba nying mtshams sbyor ba dang khams dang sa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang yongs su nyams pa dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang chos drug po 'di dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na yin par 'dod kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattivacanādantarābhavapratisaṃdhirapyuktarūpo veditavyaḥ /<br/> vedanāyāṃ tu /<br/> upekṣāyāṃ cyutodbhavau /<br/> cyutireva cyutamupapattirudbhavaḥ /<br/> etāvaduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ bhavatastasyā apaṭutvāt /<br/> itare hi vedane paṭvyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba smos pa ni srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba bshad zin pa'i ngo bor rig par bya'o / tshor ba ni / 'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la / 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba nyid yin no / skye ba ni skye ba yin no / 'di gnyis bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yin te / de ni mi gsal ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca paṭuvijñāne cyutyupapattī yujyete /<br/> tatrāpi ca manovijñāne 'pi /<br/> naikāgrācittayoretau /<br/> cyutodbhavāviti vartate /<br/> nahi samāhitacittasyāsti cyutirupapattirvā /<br/> visabhāgabhūmikatvādabhisaṃskārikatvādanugrāhakatvācca /<br/> nāpyacittasya sā nahyacittaka upakramituṃ śasyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba gzhan dag ni gsal ba yin te / rnam par shes pa gsal ba dag gis 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar ni rung ba ma yin no / yid kyi rnam par shes pa de la yang / rtse gcig sems med la de med / 'chi 'a pho ba dang skye ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro / skal pa mi nyam pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang phan 'dogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la 'chi 'pho ba 'am skye ba med do / sems med pa la yang med de / sems med pa la ni gnod pa bya bar mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe de'i lus yongs su 'jig par rtsom pa de'i tshe yang de las gdon mi za bar de'i lus dang 'brel pa'i sems mngon du gyur nas phyis 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattau ca cittacchedahetvabhāvādvinā ca kleśenānupapatterayuktamacittakatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba la yang sems 'chad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa med par mi skye ba'i phyir sems med par rigs pa nyid ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maraṇabhavastriprakāra ityuktam /<br/> arhastu /<br/> nirvātyavyākṛtadvaye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi ba'i srid pa rnam pa gsum du bshad pa la / dgra bcom pa ni / mya ngan 'das lung bstan min gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">airyāpathike vipākacitte vā /<br/> asti cetkāmadhātau vipāka upekṣā /<br/> nāsti cedairyāpathika eva /<br/> kimarthamavyākṛṭa eva nānyasmin
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod lam pa dang gal te 'dod pa'i khams na rnam par smin pa'i btang snyoms yod na rnam par smin pa'i sems la gnas nas so / ci ste med na ni spyod lam pa kho na la'o / ci'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa kho na la yin gyi gzhan lam yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvi cittacchedānukūlaṃ durbalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni nyam chung ba'i phyir sems 'chad pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'chi ba na lus kyi phyogs gang du rnam par shes pa 'gag ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakṛnmaraṇe samanaskaṃ kāyendriyaṃ sahasā'ntardīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cig car 'chi na ni yid dang bcas pa'i lus kyi dbang po mod la 'gag par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tu krameṇa cyavate tataḥ /<br/> kramacyutau pādanābhihṛdayeṣu manaścyutiḥ /<br/> adhonṛsuragājānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rim gyis 'chi 'pho ba na de'i tshe / 'og min lhar 'gro mi skye rnams / rim gyis 'chi na rkang pa dang / lte ba snying gar yid 'chi 'pho
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adho gacchantītyadhogā apāyagāminaḥ /<br/> nṛn gacchantīti nṛgā manuṣyagāminaḥ /<br/> surān gacchantīti suragā devagāminaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og tu 'gro bas na 'og tu 'gro ba ste / ngan song du 'gro ba rnams so / mir 'gro bas na mir 'gro bas te / mi'i nang du 'gro ba rnams so / lhar 'gro bas na lhar 'gro ba ste / lha'i nang du 'gro ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate /<br/> na punarjāyanta ityajā arhantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi rnam par shes pa ni grangs bzhin du rkang pa dang lte ba dang snying gar 'gag go / yang mi skye bas na mi skye ba ste / dgra bcom pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi hṛdaye vijñānaṃ nirudhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi rnam par shes pa snying khar 'gag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūrdhnītyapare /<br/> kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti /<br/> evaṃ ca punaḥ krameṇa maraṇam /<br/> prāṇināṃ prāyeṇa marmacchedavedanābhyāṃ hatānāṃ jāyate /<br/> marmacchedastvabādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re spyi bor zhes zer ro / de dag tu lus kyi dbang po 'gag pa'i phyir ro / 'chi ba'i lus kyi dbang po ni rdo leb bsregs pa'i thog tu chus btab pa zhum par 'gyur ba bzhin du rkang pa la sogs par nub par 'gyur ro / gnad 'chad pa'i tshor bas nyen pa'i srog chags rnams ni phal cher de lta de ltar rim gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śarīrapradeśāḥ kecidupahanyamānā maraṇamānayanti /<br/> te hyetaducyante marmāṇīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnad gcod pa ni tshul sogs kyis lus kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig nyams na 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gnad rnams zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni cāptejovāyudhātūnāmanyatamenātiprāyaṃ gatena niśitaśastrasaṃpātasyardhināḍītībrābhirvedanābhiḥ chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig drag tu 'khrugs par gyur pa mtshon cha thams cad bdar bas btab pa dang 'dra bas tshor ba mi bzad pa dag gis bcad pa lta bu yin gyi / de dag shing gcod pa lta bur ni ma yin no / yang na bcad pa dang 'dra bar yang gyo ba med pas na bcad pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna pṛthivīdhātunā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir sa'i khams kyi ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthadoṣābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyon bzhi pa med pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vātapittaśleṣmāṇo hi trayo doṣāḥ /<br/> te cāptejovāyudhātupradhānā yathāyogamiti /<br/> bhājanalokasaṃvarttanīsādharmyeṇetyapare /<br/> deveṣu nāsti marmacchedaḥ /<br/> kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti /<br/> vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ /<br/> etāni tu vyabhicārīṇi /<br/> pañca punarnimittāni maraṇaṃ nātivarttante /<br/> vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams ni skyon gsum yin pa de dag gi gtso bo ni ci rigs par chu dang me dang rlung gi khams dag yin no / gzhan dag na re snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa dang chos mthun pas so zhes zer ro / lha dag gi nang na ni gnad 'chad pa med mod kyi / 'on kyang lha'i bu 'chi ba'i chos can la ni nye ba'i snga ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te / gos rnams dang rgyan rnams las sgra yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro / lus kyi 'od chung bar 'gyur / khrus byas pa'i chu'i thigs pa dag lus la chags par 'gyur / g yo ba'i bdag nyid can yang blo yul gcig la gnas par 'gyur / mig gnyis 'dzums pa dang 'byed pa dag srid par 'gyur te / de dag ni 'khrul pa can yin no / 'chi ba'i ltas lnga las ni mi 'da' ste / gos dri ma can du 'gyur / me tog phreng rnyings par 'gyur / mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'byung bar 'gyur / lus las dri da ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā /<br/> trayo rāśayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i bu rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o / sems can gyi 'jig rten 'di de ltar skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs gsum du bzhag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyaktvaniyato rāśirmithyātvaniyato rāśiraniyato rāśiriti /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> samyaṅmithyātvaniyatā āryānantaryakāriṇaḥ /<br/> samyaktvaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshogs gsum ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang ma nges pa'i tshogs so / de la 'phags dang mtshams med byed pa dag yang dag log pa nyid du des / yang dag pa nyid gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktvamiti sūtram /<br/> āryāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las gang 'dod chags gtan nas spangs pa dang zhe sdang gtan nas spangs pa dang gti mug gtan nas spangs pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan nas spangs pa nyid ni yang dag pa nyid do zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāmanāsravo mārga utpannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rnams gang zhe na / gang dag la zag pa med pa'i lam skyes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārādyātāḥ pāpakebhyo dharmebhya ityāryāḥ /<br/> ātyantikavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdig pa'i chos las ring du song pas na 'phags pa rnams te / gtan du 'bral ba'i thob pa rnyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti /<br/> kasmānna samyaktve niyatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni nyon mongs pa zad par nges pa'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dag yin no / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa yang gdon mi za bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin na ci'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dag ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi mithyātve'pi niyatā bhaveyuḥ /<br/> na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni log pa nyid du yang nges par 'gyur la / de dag ji ltar de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa la sogs pa ltar dus nges par yang dag pa nyid du nges pa yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mithyātvaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">log pa nyid gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakāḥ pretāstiryañca idamucyate mithyātvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba rnams dang dud 'gro dang yi dags te / 'di ni log pa nyid ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrānantaryakāriṇo narake niyatatvānmithyātvaniyatāḥ /<br/> niyatebhyo'nye'niyatā iti siddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mtshams med pa byed pa rnams ni dmyal bar nges pa'i phyir log pa nyid du nges pa dag yin no / nges pa de dag las gzhan pa ni ma nges pa'o zhes bya bar grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyayāpekṣaṃ hi teṣāmubhayabhāktvamanubhayabhāktvaṃ ca /<br/> uktaḥ sattvaloko bhājanaloka idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni rkyen la ltos na gnyi ga la brten pa nyid dang gnyi ga la mi brten ba nyid kyang yin no / sems can gyi 'jig rten bshad zin to / da ni snod kyi 'jig rten bshad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra bhājanalokasya saṃniveśamuśantyadhaḥ /<br/> lakṣaṣoḍaśakodvedhamasaṃkhyaṃ vāyumaṇḍalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi / gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni / sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātorevaṃ saṃniveśamicchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di ltar gnas par 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadutākāśaṣpratiṣṭhamadhastādvāyumaṇḍalamabhinirvṛttaṃ sarvasattvānām /<br/> karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ /<br/> tasyopariṣṭāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis 'og na nam mkha' la brten pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub ste / de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad sa ya drug 'bum mo / rgyar ni grangs med de / 'di ltar gang tshan po che chen po'i rdo rjes kyang gzhig par mi nus par sra ba yin no / de'i steng na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāmekādaśodvedhaṃ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang / stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maṇḍalamiti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmin vāyumaṇdale sattvānāṃ karmabhirmeghāḥ saṃbhūyākṣamātrābhirdhārābhirabhivarṣanti /<br/> tat bhavatyaṣāṃ maṇḍalam /<br/> tasya yojanānāmekādaśalakṣāṇyūrdhve'dho viṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams kyi las dag gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor der sprin rnams 'dus nas / char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam la bab pa de chu'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te / de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang nyi khri'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tā āpo na tiryaṅgvisravanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na chu de dag thad kar mi 'bo zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena /<br/> yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis te / dper na bza' ba dang btung ba zos pa dang 'thung ba ma zhu ba long kar mi ltung ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kusūlanyāyena vāyunā saṃdhāryanta iti nikāyāntarīyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan dag na re sbyang gi tshul du rlung gis 'dzin to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāśca punarāpaḥ sattvānāṃ karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtairvāyubhirāvartyamānā upariṣṭātkāñcanībhavanti pakvakṣīrīśarībhāvayogena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sems can rnams kyi las kyi mthu las byung ba'i rlung dag gis chu de kun nas dkrugs pa na'o ma bskol ba spris ma chags pa'i tshul du steng ma gser du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat bhavatyaṣāṃ maṇḍalam /<br/> aṣṭalakṣocchrayaṃ paścāccheṣaṃ bhavati kāñcanam /<br/> kiṃ ca śeṣam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu'i dkyil 'khor de phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad / lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur / lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trayo laklṣāḥ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ /<br/> sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ /<br/> tiryak trīṇi sahasrāṇi sārdhaṃ śatacatuṣṭayam /<br/> lakṣadvādaśakaṃ caiva jalakāñcanamaṇḍalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu'i steng rim dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhir gyur pa de'i chu dang gser gyi rngams bshad zin to / chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi / thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang / stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samānaṃ hyetadubhayaṃ vistārataḥ /<br/> samantatastu triguṇaṃ /<br/> samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām /<br/> yacca tatkāñcanamayaṃ mahīmaṇḍalamapāmupariṣṭāt saṃniviṣṭaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o / 'di gnyi ga rgya mnyam mo / khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro / khor yug tu brtsi na ni sum 'gyur du 'gyur te / dpag tshad sa ya phrag gsum dang 'bum phrag drug dang khri sum brgya lnga bcu'o / gser gyi sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor chu'i steng na gnas pa gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra meruryugandharaḥ /<br/> īśādhāraḥ khadirakaḥ sudarśanagiristathā /<br/> aśvakarṇo vinitako nimindharagiriḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin / gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can / de bzhin blta na sdug ri dang rta rna dang ni rnam bdud dang / mu khyud 'dzin ri'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itīme kāñcanamaṇḍalapratiṣṭhā aṣṭau mahāparvatāḥ /<br/> madhye sumeruḥ /<br/> śeṣāḥ sumeruparicāyāvasthitāḥ /<br/> tasyānyasaptaparvataprākāraparikṣiptasya yo bāhyaḥ parvate nimindharagiriḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri chen po brgyad po 'di dag ni gser gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa yin te / ri rab ni dbus na'o / lhag ma rnams kyis ni ri rab bskor te gnas so / ri bdun gyi ra bas bskor ba de'i phyi rim gang yin pa de ni ri mu khyud 'dzin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ /<br/> dvīpāḥ /<br/> tato bahiścatvāro dvīpāḥ /<br/> tebhyaḥ punaḥ /<br/> bahiścakravāḍaḥ /<br/> tena cāturdvipakaścakrīkṛtaḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni gling rnams yin no / de'i phyi rol na ni gling bzhi dag go / de dag gi yang phyi rol na ni khor yug ste / des ni gling bzhir khor yag tu bskor te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta haimāḥ sa āyasaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las / bdun ni gser yin te lcags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yugandharādayaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sauvaṛṇāścakravāḍaḥ śastrakaḥ /<br/> catūratnamayo meruḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa'i ri bdun ni gser gyi rang bzhin yin no / khor yug ni lcags kyi rang bzhin yin no / lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gser gyi rang bzhin dang dngul gyi rang bzhin dang beed'urya'i rang bzhin dang shel gyi rang bzhin te / ngos bzhi dag tu grangs bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri rab kyi ngos gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de'i mthus de'i ngos kyi nam mkha' yang de'i kha dog tu snang ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāmbūdvīpakamasya pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i ngos 'dzam bu'i gling logs bee d'urya'i rang bzhin yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'di'i nam mkha' yang bee d'urya'i kha dog tu snang ngo zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kathaṃ teṣāṃ saṃbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de dag ji ltar 'byung zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ punarvāridhārā atipatanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la char pa'i rgyun 'bab ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti /<br/> evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti /<br/> na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ ca sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod pa'i chu de dag mthu rnam pa du ma'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i rlung dag gis bshig pa na ri de dang de dag tu 'gyur ro / 'di ltar 'gyur te / gang rigs tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par bskyed par bya ba la ma phrad par rkyen du 'gyur ba yin gyi / ji ltar grangs can pa rnams kyi 'gyur ba lta bu ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraprādurbhāva iti /<br/> kaścātra doṣaḥ /<br/> sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta /<br/> kaścaiṃvamāha dharmebhyo'nyo dharmīti /<br/> tasyaiva tu dravyasyānyathībhāvamātraṃ pariṇāmaḥ /<br/> evamapyayuktam /<br/> kimatrāyuktam /<br/> tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grangs can pa rnams kyi 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na / rdzas gnas pa la chos gzhan log na chos gzhan 'byung ba'o / 'di la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na / gnas pa gang gi chos rnams kyi bye brag brtag par bya ba'i chos can nyid med do / chos can rnams las chos can gzhan no zhes de skad du zer / chos de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba tsam ni 'gyur ba yin no zhe na / de lta na yang rigs pa ma yin no / 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na / de nyid 'di yin la / 'dis de lta bu yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lugs 'di ni sngon ma byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante /<br/> ta ete parvatāśca bhavanti dvīpāśca /<br/> te punaḥ sumevadayaścakravāḍaparyantāḥ parvatāḥ /<br/> jale'śītisahasrake /<br/> magnāḥ /<br/> kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byung ba'i gser la sogs pa las gyi [*kyi] mthus bskyed pa'i rlung dag gis bsdus nas phung por byed de / de dag ni ri dag tu 'ang 'gyur la / gling rnams su yang 'gyur ro / ri rab la sogs pa khor yug la thug pa'i ri de dag ni chu'i nang du brgyad khri dag nub bo / de dag gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng na chu dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa der nub bo
