</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvaṃ jalāt merurbhūyo 'śītisahasrakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu'i steng du yang / dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ /<br/> ardhārdhahāniraṣṭāsu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na ri rab ni 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum drug khri'o / brgyad po'i 'phang du phyed phyed dbri
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jalādūrdhvaṃ yāvānsumerustato'rdhena yugandharaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri rab chu'i steng du ji tsam 'phags pa de'i phyed ni gnya' shing 'dzin te / dpag tshad bzhi khri yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ /<br/> samocchrāyaghanāśca te
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyed ni gshol mda' 'dzin to zhes bya bas / de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang mu khyud 'dzin gyi phyed ni khor yug ste / 'phang du dpag tshad sum brgya phyed dang bcu gsum yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du phyed phyed kyis dbri bar rig par bya'o / de dag rngams su 'phang dang mnyam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ /<br/> śītāḥ saptāntarāṇyeṣāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag chu las ji tsam gyen du 'phags pa rngams su yang de tsam ste / rgyar zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya /<br/> taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate /<br/> tāsāṃ ca punaḥ /<br/> ādyāśītisahasrikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu khyud 'dzin la thug pa'i ri de dag gi bar bdun ni rol mtsho bdun zhes bya ste / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ngo / chu de ni bsil ba dang zhim pa dang yang pa dang 'jam pa dang dangs pa dang dri nga ba med pa dang 'thung na mgrin pa la mi gnod pa dang 'thungs na lto la mi gnod pa'o / yang de dag las / dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sumeruyugandharāntaraṃ prathamā śītā /<br/> aśītiryojanasahasrāṇi vaipulyena /<br/> ābhyantaraḥ samudro'sau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri rab dang gnya' shing 'dzin gyi bar gyi rol mtsho dang po ni kha tshon dpag tshad brgyad khri'o / de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvau hi samudrāvābhyantaro bāhyaśca /<br/> tadā'sau śītā'bhyantaraḥ samudraḥ /<br/> triguṇaḥ sa tu pārśvataḥ /<br/> aśītiryojanasahasrāṇyasya vaipulyamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgya mtsho ni gnyis te / nang gi dang phyi'i 'o / rol mtsho de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin no / de'i ngos la sum 'gyur ro / kha tshon ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca /<br/> ardhārdhenāparāḥ śītāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngos la ni gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'gram nas bgrangs na sum 'gyur te / dpag tshad nyis 'bum bzhi khri'o / rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnya' shing 'dzin nas gshol mda' 'dzin gyi bar gyi rol mtsho gnyis pa ni dang po'i phyed de / dpag tshad bzhi khri yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato 'rdhena punastṛtīyetyevamardhārdhenāparāḥ śītāḥ bhavanti /<br/> yāvadardhatrayodaśaśatāni saptamī śītā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni de'i phyed do zhes bya ba nas / de bzhin du rol mtsho bdun pa ni / dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dairdhyaṃ tu tāsāṃ na parisaṃkhyātamatibahuprakarṣavisarpaṇāt /<br/> śeṣaṃ bāhyo mahodadheḥ /<br/> kiṃ śeṣam /<br/> nimindharacakravāḍayorantaram /<br/> taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya /<br/> sa khalu vistāreṇa yojanānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rol mtsho gzhan rnams phyed phyed kyis dbri'o / de dag gi srid du ni ha cang 'byams klas pa'i phyir ma bgrangs so / lhag ma phyi'i mtsho chen yin / lhag ma gang zhig ce na mu khyud 'dzin dang khor yug gi bar de'i ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po yin te / tshva sgo'i tshva chus gang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca /<br/> tatra catvāro dvīpāścaturṣu sumerupārśveṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang kha tshon du dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni nyi shu gnyis so / de la ri rab kyi ngos bzhi ni gling bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tu /<br/> jambūdvīpo dvisāhasrastripārśvaḥ śakaṭākṛtiḥ /<br/> sāhasrāṇi trīṇi pārśvānyasya śakaṭasyevākṛtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la / stong phrag gnyis po shing rta'i dbyibs / de'i ngos gsum la dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong yod la / de'i dbyibs kyang shing rta dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dbus su gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la gang du byang chub sems dpa' ba zhugs nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyed par mdzad pa rdo rje'i gdan mngon par 'grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /<br/> sārdhatriyojanaṃ tvekaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni lus sam sa phyog [*phyogs?] gzhan gyis bzod par mi nus so / gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cturthamasya pārśvaṃ sārdhāni trīṇi yojanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i ngos bzhi pa dag la ni dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva hyasau śakaṭākṛtiḥ /<br/> prāgvideho'rdhacandravat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shing rta chen po'i dbyibs lta bu yin no / shar gyi lus 'phags zla gam 'dra
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /<br/> so 'rdhacandra ivābhinirvṛttaḥ /<br/> parimāṇatastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di nas shar phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos rol na shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling yod de / de ni zla ba kham pa lta bur mngon par grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pārśvatrayaṃ tathā 'sya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyar ni ngos gsum 'di dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā jambūdvīpasya dve dve yojanasahasre /<br/> ekaṃ sārdhaṃ triśatayojanam /<br/> caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sārdhāni trīṇi yojanaśatāni /<br/> godānīyaḥ sahasrāṇi sapta sārdhāni maṇḍalaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling la dpag tshad nyis stong nyis yod pa bzhin no / gcig la dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o / ngos bzhi pa la ni dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o / ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste / stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di nas nub phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos rol na ba lang spyod kyi gling yod de / dpag tshad bdun stong lnga brgya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maṇḍalaścāsau pūrṇacandravat /<br/> sārdhe dve madhyamasya /<br/> madhyamasyārdhatṛtīye yojanasahasre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni zla ba nya ba bzhin du kun nas zlum po yin te / de dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum / chu zheng du ni dpag tshad stong phrag phyed dang gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭau caturasraḥ kuruḥ samaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha uttareṇa sumerupārśve uttarakurudvīpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di nas byang phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos la byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'ṣṭau yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena caturasraḥ /<br/> kṛtyāpīṭhikāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun du dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do / dbyibs ni khri'u bzhin du kun nas gru bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre /<br/> tathā 'nyāni stokamapi nādhikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar ngos gcig la dpag tshad nyis stong yod pa ltar gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste / cung zad kyang lhag ma med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gling gang gi dbyibs ci 'dra ba de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi gdong gi dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ khalu dvīpānāmantarāle 'ntaradvīpā abhinirvṛttāḥ /<br/> ke punaste kati cetyāha /<br/> dehā videhāḥ kuravaḥ kauravāścāmarāvarāḥ /<br/> aṣṭau tadantaradbvīpā gāṭhā uttaramantriṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de dag gi bar bar na bar gyi gling rnams mngon par grub pa de dag ni gang yin / du zhig ni yod ce na / de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni /  / lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan / sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni / rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan / g yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dehavidehau pūrvavidehaparivārau /<br/> kurukauravau uttarakuroḥ /<br/> gāṭhottaramantriṇāvaparagodānīyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la lus dang lus 'phags ni shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling 'khor yin no / sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi'o / g yo ldan dang lam mchog 'gro ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cāmarāvarau jambūdvīpasya /<br/> sarve manuṣyairāvāsitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi ste / thams cad na yang mi rnams gnas so / kha cig na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eko rākṣasairityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig na srin po dag gnas so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihottareṇa kīṭādrinavakāddhimavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di nas byang du ri nag po / dgu 'das gangs ri'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ /<br/> tataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i byang phyogs 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na ri nag po gsum yod do / de dag 'das nas yang gsum yod de / de 'das nas yang gsum yod do / ri nag po dgu 'das pa'i pha rol na gangs ri yod do / de nas ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcāśadvistṛtāyāmaṃ saro 'rvāggandhamādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spos ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na / chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca /<br/> tasya pañcāśadyojanāni vistāraḥ pañcāśadāyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gangs ri de'i pha rol ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na mtsho ma dros pa zhes bya ba gnas pa las chu bo chen po bzhi po gang g'a dang sin dhu dang si ta dang pakshu 'bab pa yod do / de'i zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrṇamaṣṭāṅgasyāṅgopetasyāmbhasaḥ /<br/> durgamaṃ ca manuaṣyāṇāmanṛddhimatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chur yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ngo / der ni rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa'i mis 'gro bar dka'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi drung na gang la 'bras bu mngar bo dag yod pa shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba mngon par 'grub ste / de'i dbang gis 'di 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar grags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatphalādhikāreṇa vā jambūdvīpa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na de'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar grags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakāḥ kasminnavakāśe kiyatpramāṇāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba rnams ni gang rol na yod / tshad ni ji tsam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhaḥ sahasraiviṃśatyā tanmātro 'vīcirasya hi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na / mnar med pa'o de tsam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati /<br/> duḥkhanirantaratvādavīciḥ /<br/> anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti /<br/> ata eva saṃjīvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dpag tshad nyi khri na dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yod de / gnam 'phang dang rgyar ni dpag tshad nyi khri'o / de'i 'og gzhi yang de dang 'dra ste / 'di nas ni dpag tshad bzhi khri yod do / sdug bsngal bar chad med pas na mnar med pa'o / gzhan dag ni sdug bsngal bar chad dang bcas pa yin te / 'di lta ste / yang sos na ni lus rnams bcad cing phug la btags kyang rlung grang mo dag langs na sems can de dag yang sos par 'gyur bas de'i phyir yang sos yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsmin sukhavīcirastītyavīcirityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de na bde ba'i gnas skabs med pas na mnar med pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyeṣvapi sukhā vedanā vipāko nāsti /<br/> naiḥ ṣyandikī na vāryate /<br/> tadūrdhvaṃ sapta narakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na yang bde ba'i tshor ba rnam par smin pa las byung ba ni med kyi rgyu mthun par byung ba ni 'gag pa med do zhes zer ro / de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādavīcerūrdhvaṃ sapta narakāḥ uparyupari saṃniviṣṭāḥ /<br/> pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnar med pa de'i steng na dmyal ba bdun po rab tu tsha ba dang tsha ba dang du 'bod chen po dang du 'bod dang bsdus 'joms dang thig nag dang yang sos dag gong nas gong du gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avīcipārśveṣvityapare /<br/> te punaḥ /<br/> sarve 'ṣṭau ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re mnar med pa'i gro dag na gnas so zhes zer ro / de dag kyang / brgyad po kun la lhag bcu drug / bcom ldan 'das kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete narakā aṣṭāvākhyātā duratikramāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar de dag dmyal ba ni / brgyad ces bya ste rgal bar dka'
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">raudrakarmabhirākīrṇāḥ pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ /<br/> catuskandhāścaturdvārā vibhaktā bhāgaśo 'sitāḥ /<br/> ayaḥprākāraparyantā ayasā prativarjitāḥ /<br/> taptā caivāyasī bhumirjvalitā tejasā yutā /<br/> anekayojanaśatā sphuṭā tiṣṭhati arcciṣeti /<br/> ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ katame /<br/> kukūlaṃ kuṇapaṃ cātha kṣuramārgādikaṃ nadī /<br/> teṣāṃ caturdiśaṃ /<br/> dvāre dvāre teṣāṃ catvāra utsadāḥ /<br/> kukūlaṃ jānumātram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drag po'i las kyis kun du gang / re re la yang lhag bcu drug / rtsig pa bzhi dang sgo bzhi ste / rnam phye ris su chad pa yin / lcags kyi ra bas kun du bskor / lcags dag gis ni gang ba yin / de la lcags 'bar sa gzhi ste / 'bar ba'i mi dang ldan pa yin / dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar ni / me lce dag gis khyab par gnas / zhes gsungs so / lhag ma bcu drug gang zhe na / de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na / me ma mur dang ro myags dang / spu gri la sogs chu bo yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi sgo re re na lhag pa bzhi bzhi yod de / me ma mur pus mo nub tsam gang du sems can de dag gi rkang pa bzhag na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag zhig par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti /<br/> kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat /<br/> asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkang pa bteg na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag slar skye ba dang ro myags rkyag pa'i 'dam rdzab gang du 'bu mchu rnon zhes bya ba lus thams cad dkar zhing mgo gnag la mchu smyung ba'i srog chags dag gnas shing de dag gis sems can de dag gi rus pa'i bar du 'bigs par byed pa dang spu gri'i sos gtams pa'i lam po che gang du sems can de dag 'gro ba na rkang pa bzhag na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag zhig par 'gyur zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no / lo ma ral gri lta bu'i gnas gang du ral gri rnon po rnams lhung zhing / sems can de dag gi yan lag dang nyid lag rnams gcod par 'gyur zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaḥśālmalīvanaṃ tīkṣṇaṣoḍśāṅgulakaṇṭakam /<br/> teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyi sre bo rnams kyang za bar byed pa dang lcags kyi shal ma ri nags tsher ma rnon po sor bcu drug pa gang du sems can de dag 'dzeg pa na ni tsher ma de rnams kha thur du lta bar 'gyur zhing lus 'bigs par byed la / 'bab ba na ni kha gyen du lta bar 'gyur zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayastuṇḍāśca vāyasā akṣīṇyutpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khva lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyis mig dag phyung zhing phyung nas za bar byed pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadetat kṣuramārgādika trayaṃ śastrābhinipātaṃ sāmānyādekīkriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spu gri'i lam la sogs pa gsum po de ni mtshon cha mngon par 'bab pa 'dra ba'i phyir gcig tu bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante adhastiryagapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante /<br/> tadyathā bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāmagnāvadhiśritāyāṃ tilataṇḍuilādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma bzhi pa ni chu bo rab med thal chu khol mas gang ba ste / gang du sems can de dag 'gram gnyis nas skyes bu lag na ral gri dang mdung thung dang thag mdung thogs pa dag gis 'gog cing / dper na phru ba chu mang pos bkang ba thab tu bcug pa'i nang du til dang 'bras thug po che la sogs pa blugs pa bzhin du / steng du 'gro na yang gdu zhing 'tshed la / 'og dang thad kar 'gro na yang gdu zhing 'tshed par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā hi mahānarakasya parikhevotpannā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des kyang dmyal ba chen po 'obs bzhin du bskor ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante /<br/> adhikayātanāsthānitvādutsadāḥ ityucyante /<br/> narakeṣu hi patitā eteṣu punaryātyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma bzhi po 'di dag ni phyogs kyi bye brag gis bcu drug ces bya'o / gnod pa lhag ma'i gnas yin pa'i phyir lhag pa'o zhes bya ste / dmyal ba dag tu gnod pa byas nas yang 'di dag tu gnod par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakā varodhādurdhvameteṣu sīdantyutsadā ityapare /<br/> praśnātpraśnāntaramupajāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dmyal ba pa'i 'ching ba'i 'og tu 'di dag tu bying bas na lhag pa'o zhes bya'o zhes zer ro / dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti /<br/> netyeke /<br/> kathamidānīṃ ceṣṭante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag sems can du bgrang ba zhig yin nam / 'on te ma yin zhe na / kha cig na re ma yin no zhes zer ro / da ni ji ltar na de dag gyo ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvānāṃ karmabhirvivarttanīvāyubījavat /<br/> yattrhi bhadantadharmasubhūtinoktaṃ /<br/> krodhanāḥ krūrakarmāṇaḥ pāpābhirucayaśca ye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams kyi las dag gis te / 'chags pa'i rlung bzhin no / 'o na btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor gyis / gang dag khro zhing gtum las dang / sdig la mngon par dga' ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal ba la dga' de dag / gshin rje srin por skye bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang zhe na / gshin rjes bsgo ba gang dag gi sems can rnams dmyal ba dag tu khrid par byed pa de dag gshin rje srin po zhes bshad kyi / gang dag las rnam par byed pa de ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvasaṃkhyātā ityeke /<br/> tasyedānīṃ karmaṇaḥ kva vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re sems can dag tu bgrang ba yin no zhes zer ro / da ni las de dag gang du rnam par smin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba de dag nyid du ste / gang dag tu mtshams med pa byed pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i go skabs yod pa de dag gi su zhig 'gog pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamagninā na dahyante /<br/> agnernūnaṃ karmabhiḥ kṛtāvadhitvāt /<br/> bhūtaviśeṣanirvṛttervā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me'i nang na gnas pa rnams ji ltar mi tshig ce na / me ni gdon mi za bar las dag gis mtshams gcad pa'i phyir ro / yang na 'byung ba'i khyad par grub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime tāvaduṣṇā aṣṭau mahānarakā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig de dag ni tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams zhes bya'o

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye śītanarakā aṣṭau /<br/> tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad de / 'di lta ste / chu bur can dang chu bur rdol pa dang so thams thams dang aa chu zer ba dang kyi hud zer ba dang autpala ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa dang padma ltar cher gas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīrvaśītābhihatānāṃ kāyaśabdavikārānurūpāṇyetāni nāmāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mir 'di rnams ni sems can grang ba mi bzad pas nyen pa de dag gi lus dang sgra 'gyur ba dang sgra mthun pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te 'pyasyaiva jambūdvīpasyādhastāt mahānarakāṇāṃ tiryak
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi thad ka na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuta iyato jambūdvīpasyādhastādavīcyādīnāmavakāśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling 'di tsam gyi 'og rnam nar med pa la sogs pa'i go skabs ga la yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhānyarāśivadadho viśālā hi dvīpāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gling rnams ni 'phru'i phung po bzhin du zhabs rgya che ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva mahāsamudro 'nupūrvanimnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir rgya mtsho chen po rim gyis gzhol ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itīme ṣoḍaśa narakāḥ sarve sattvakarmādhipatyanirvṛttāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na sems can dmyal ba bcu drug po de rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekaṃ narakāstu svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhirabhinirvṛttāḥ /<br/> bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ dvayorekasya vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams ni mang po'am gnyis sam gcig gi so so'i las dag gis mngon par grub pa yin te / de dag gi rnam pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa dum yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas ni ngas pa med de / chu bo dang ri dang mya ngam gyi phyogs dag dang gzhan dag dang 'og na yang yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa tāvannarakabhājanānāṃ saṃniveśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'di ni dmyal ba'i snod rnams kyi gnas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiryañcaḥ sthalajalākāśagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dud 'gro ni thang dang chu dang nam mkha'i spyod yul pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti /<br/> pretānāṃ yamo rājā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi gnas kyi rtsa ba ni rgya mtsho chen po yin te / gzhan ni de dag las 'phros pa dag yin no / yi dgas rnams kyi rgyal po ni gshin rje zhes bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi gnas kyi rtsa ba rgyal po'i khab ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgyas bcad pa na yod de / gzhan ni de las 'phros pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecit pretā maharddhikā daivīmiva śriyamudvahanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen po kha cig ni lha'i dpal lta bu yang nyams su myong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣā yathā pretāvadāne /<br/> athemau candrārkau kasmin pratiṣṭhitau /<br/> vāyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni ji ltar yi dags kyi rtogs pa brjod pa dag las 'byung ba yin no /  / yang nyi ma dang za ba 'di dag ci la brten zhe na / rlung la ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyavo'ntarīkṣe sarvasattvasādhāraṇakarmādhipatyanirvṛttā āvartavat sumeruṃ parivartante /<br/> candrārkatārāṇāṃ vordhvacāraḥ /<br/> kiyadvīprakṛṣṭāvitaścandrārkau /<br/> ardhena meroścandrārkau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gi sa bar snang la nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma rnams 'phul bar byed pa'i rlung dag grub ste / ri rab la rlung gi 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor ro / nyi ma dang zla ba dag 'di nas thag ji srid ce na / nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yugandharagirermūrdhnā samaṃ vahataḥ /<br/> kiṃ pramāṇau /<br/> yathākramaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri gnya' shing 'dzin gyi rtse mo dang mnyam pa nas rgyu'o / tshad ji tsam zhe na / go rims bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paṇcāśatsaikayojanau /<br/> pañcāśat yojanāni candramaṇḍalasya pramāṇam /<br/> saikāni pañcāśat sūryamaṇdalasya pramāṇam /<br/> ekapañcāśadityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gcig dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ste / lnga bcu rtsa gcig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tārakāvimānānāṃ yasyālpapramāṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya krośaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skar ma'i gzhal yas khang rnams kyi nang gi tshad chung ba de'i ni rgya nga grags gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog chags rnams kyi las dag gis nyi ma'i gzhal med khang 'og gi phyi rol ni me shel gyi dkyil 'khor tsha bar byed pa dang snang bar byed pa mngon par grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">candravimānasyādhastādāpyaṃ śītalaṃ bhāsvaraṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi ni chu shel bsil bar byed pa dang snang bar byed pa mngon par grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praṇīnāṃ karmabhirdṛṣṭiśarīraphalapuṣpasasyoṣadhīnāmanugrahārthamupaghātakārthaṃ yathāsaṃbhavam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci rigs par mig dang lus dang 'bras bu dang me tog dang lo tog dang sman rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturdvīpake ekaścandramāḥ kṛtyaṃ karotyekaḥ sūryaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gling bzhi pa gcig tu ni zla ba gcig kho na dang nyi ma gcig gis bya ba byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> teṣu /<br/> ardharātro'staṅgamanaṃ madhyāhna udayaḥ sakṛt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci gling bzhi po dag tu nyi mas cig car bya ba byed dam zhe na / ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / de dag tu / nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang / nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ /<br/> evamanyeṣvapi yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe byang gi sgra mi snyan du nam phyed pa de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags su ni nyi ma nub bo / 'dzam bu'i gling du ni nyi ma phyed do / ba lang spyod du ni nyi ma shar te / de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūryasyeha gatibhedena rātridivānāṃ vṛddhihrāsau /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> prāvṛṇmāse dvitīye 'ntyanavamyāṃ vardhate niśā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi ma'i 'gros kyi bye brag las 'di na nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams ring thung du 'gyur te / de la / dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi / tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ /<br/> hemantānāṃ caturthe tu hīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbyar rnams kyi zla ba gnyis pa dbyar zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo'i tshes dgu nas mtshan mo ring ngo / dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saiva hemantānāṃ caturthe māse punarhīyate /<br/> antyanavamyāmiti varttate /<br/> phālgunamāsasya dvitīyapakṣanavamyām /<br/> aharviparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thung ngur 'gyur ro / de bzhin du dgun rnams kyi zla ba bzhi pa'i tha ma'i tshes dgu nas thung ngur 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te / dgun zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo'i tshes dgu nas so / nyin mo bzlog
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā rātrirvardhate tadā divaso hīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe mtshan mo ring ba de'i tshe nyin mo thung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā rātrirhīyate tadā divaso vardhate /<br/> kiyatyā mātrayā vardhate /<br/> lavaśo rātryaharvṛddhī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe mtshan mo thung ba de'i tshe nyin mo ring bar 'gyur ro / ji tsam zhig gis ring por 'gyur zhe na / nyin mtshan mtshan ring ba thang cig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lavaṃ lavaṃ rātrirvardhate divaso vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyin mo 'am mtshan mo thang cig thang cig gis ring bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca hānivṛddhī yathākramaṃ /<br/> dakṣiṇottarage ravau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ring ba de dag kyang go rims bzhin du / nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs kyi ngos su 'gro ba mtshan mo ring ngo / byang phyogs su 'gro ba na nyin mo ring ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuklapakṣasyādau candramaso vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /<br/> kiṃ tatra kāraṇam /<br/> svacchāyayā 'rkasāmīpyādvikalendusamīkṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dang po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma rangs par snang ba de la rgyu ci yod ce na / nyi ma dang ni nye ba las / rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btags pa las / gang gi tshe zla ba'i gzhal med khang nyi ma'i gzhal med khang dang nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis de'i gzhal med khang la 'bab ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na de'i phyi rol gyi ngos su grib ma bab pas dkyil 'khor ma rangs par snang ngo zhes bstan to zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re gang res 'ga' gzhal med khang gi phyed snang ba de lta bu de ni rgyu ba'i tshul yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaitāni sūryādivimānāni katame sattvā adhyāvasanti /<br/> devāścāturmahārājakāyikāḥ /<br/> kimetānyeva teṣāṃ sthānāni /<br/> vimānavāsināmetāni /<br/> bhūminivāsināṃ punaḥ sumerūpariṣaṇḍādīni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang 'di dag na sems can gang dag cig gnas she na / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa'i lha rnams so / ci de dag gi 'di dag kho na'am zhe na / gzhal med khang na gnas pa rnams kyi ni 'di dag go / sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ni ri rab kyi bang rim la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kati cāsya pariṣaṇḍāḥ kiyatyo vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la bang rim ni du zhig yod / thag ni ji srid ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pariṣaṇḍāścatasro 'sya daśasāhasrikāntarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la bang rim bzhi yod de / bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśayojanasahasrāṇyudgamyaikā /<br/> evaṃ yāvaccaturthī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpag tshad ni khri'i ltag na gcig yod de / bzhi'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o / de dag gis ni ri rab kyi phyed man chad du phyin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhiḥ sumerorardhamākṣiptam /<br/> tāśca tato yathāsaṃkhyaṃ /<br/> ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ /<br/> prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā /<br/> dvitīyā 'ṣṭau tṛtīyā catvāri caturthī dve /<br/> karoṭapāṇayastāsu mālādhārāssadāmadāḥ /<br/> mahārājikadevāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang de las grangs bzhin du / stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang / brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis 'phags so / bang rim dang po ni ri rab las dpag tshad stong phrag bcu drug 'phags so / gnyis pa ni brgyad do / gsum pa ni bzhi'o / bzhi pa ni gnyis so / de la lag na gzhong thogs dang / phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bang rim dang po la ni gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs zhes bya ba rnams gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyāyāṃ mālādhārāstṛtīyāyāṃ sadāmadāḥ sadāmattāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa la ni phreng thogs rnams gnas so / gsum pa la ni rtag tu myos rnams gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarva ete caturmahārājakāyikāḥ /<br/> caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha 'di dag thams cad kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa dag yin no / bzhi pa la ni rgyal po chen bo bzhi bdag nyid dang de'i 'khor rnams gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastasyāṃ mahārājakāyikā devā ityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir na rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā pariṣaṇḍāsu caturmahārājakāyikā devā evaṃ /<br/> parvateṣvapi saptasu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar bang rim dag la rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ka nas pa de bzhin du / ri bo bdun po dag la yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yugandharādiṣu parvateṣu teṣāṃ grāmanigamāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa na yang de dag gi grong dang grong rdal dag yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evaiṣa devanikāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ mahiṣṭhaḥ /<br/> merumūrdhni trayastriṃśāḥ /<br/> atha kiyānmerumūrdhā /<br/> sa cāśītisahasradik /<br/> ekaikapārśvamaśītisahasrāṇi yathaivādhastāt /<br/> anye punarāhuḥ /<br/> sa viṃśatisahasradik /<br/> catvāri pārśvanyasya catasro diśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir lha'i ris de ni thams cad pas che ba yin no / lhun po'i rtse na sum cu gsum / yang lhun po'i rtse mo ji tsam zhi [*zhe?] na / de yi ngos la brgyad khri'o / thur du ji lta bar ngos re re la yang brgyad khri'o / gzhan dag na re / de yi ngos la nyi khri'o / zhes zer te / 'di la ngos bzhir phyogs bzhi yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaikaṃ pārśvaṃ viṃśatiryojanasahasrāṇi samantāt parikṣepeṇāśītiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyi khri nyi khri yod la kun du bskor na ni brgyad khri'i zhe'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya ca /<br/> vidikṣu kūṭāścatvāra uṣitā vajrapāṇibhiḥ /<br/> sūmerumūrdhno vidiśaḥ koṇāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni / lag na rdo rje gnas / ri rab rtse mo'i phyogs mtshams ni gru bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /<br/> tasya ca merumūrdhnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam gyis brtsegs pa bzhi gyen du 'phags te / de dag la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba gnas so / ri rab kyi rtse mo de'i dbus na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhye sārdhadvisāhasrapārśvamadhyardhayojanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa / ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpag tshad byed dang gnyis gser gyi / rang bzhin gzhi bkra mnyen pa yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam /<br/> prākāraḥ sauvarṇa ekottareṇa dhātuśatenāsya bhumiścitritā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ri rab kyi gzhi'i dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya pa / 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa / gser gyi rang bzhin 'di'i sa gzhi tshon brgyas bkra bar byas la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī /<br/> sārdhadviśatapāśrvo 'tra vaijayantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa gzhi de yang shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du reg na 'jam pa rkang pa gzhag pa dang bteg pa dag gis na nems zhes byed pa dang par zhes byed pa yod do / de na rnam par rgyal byed do / ngos la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grong khyer gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba rin po che dang gnas rnam pa du ma phun sum tshogs pa gnas gzhan thams cad kyi dpal gyi che ba'i bdag nyid do tsha bar byed pa ngos ngos kyi srid du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu pa zhig yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ tāvannagarasyābhirāmatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'di ni grong gi mngon par dga' ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahiḥ punaḥ /<br/> taccaitrarathapāruṣyamiśranandanabhūṣitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyi rol shing rta sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur 'dres pa dga' bas brgyan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ /<br/> caitrarathamudyānaṃ pāruṣyakaṃ miśrakāvaṇaṃ nandanavanaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grong khyer de'i phyi rol gyi ngos bzhi dag na lha rnams kyi rtsed mo'i sa skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de / 'di lta ste skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can dang rtsub 'gyur dang 'dres pa dang dga' ba'i tshal te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taistannagaraṃ bahiralaṅkṛtam /<br/> viṃśatyantaritānyeṣāṃ subhūmīni caturdiśam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis grong khyer de'i phyi rol brgyan to / de dag gi ni phyogs bzhi na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti /<br/> vahireva nagarasya pārśve /<br/> pūrvottare pārijātaḥ sudharmā dakṣiṇāvare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi shus bcad nas gzhi bzang / skyed mos tshal de dag gi phyogs bzhi dpag tshad nyi shus bcad pa na lha rnams kyi rtse ba'i gnas sa gzhi bzang po phan tshun 'gran pa lta bur mdzes pa dang ldan pa bzhi yod do / grong khyer gyi phyi rol gyi ngos / byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste / lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pārijāto nāma kovidārastrāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ kāmaratiprakarṣāśrayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing sa brtol yongs 'du zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba mchog gi gnas zhig yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya pañca yojanāni mūlāhiniveśo yojanaśatamucchrāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu zug go / gnam 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya 'phags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcāśat yojanāni śākhāpatrapalāśaṃ skaritvā tiṣṭhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur khyab par gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i me tog dang 'dab ma thams cad rgyas pa'i dri dad rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ldang ngo / rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuktaṃ tāvadanuvātam /<br/> prativātaṃ tu katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig rdzi phyogs su ni rigs na rdzi phyogs ma yin par go ji ltar zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vṛkṣānatikramaṃ saṃdhāyoktamityeke /<br/> nahi nāma sprativātaṃ vāto vāti /<br/> tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt pratibadhyamāno'pi divyairmṛdumārutairgandhāntaraṃ saṃtanoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re shing las mi 'da' ba las dgongs te gsungs so zhes zer ro / de rdzi phyogs sum yin par 'gro ba ma yin gyi / dri de nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa lha'i rlung chung du dag gis bkag bzhin du yang dri gzhan gyi rgyun 'byung ba de lta bur 'dod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mandataratamasamārambhāttu saṃtāna āśveva samucchidyate yato na tathā viprakṛṣṭamadhvānaṃ prasarpati /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ svabhūtāśrita evamapuṣpagandhasaṃtāno vartate utāho vāyuradhivāsito jāyate /<br/> nātra niyamaḥ /<br/> ubhayathāpi hyācāryeṣṭiḥ /<br/> yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun chung ba dang ches chung ba dang ches shin tu chung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir myur ba kho nar kun du chad par 'gyur te / de bzhin du lam ring por mi 'gro'o / ji me tog gi dri'i rgyun de rang gi 'byung ba kho na la brten nas 'jug gam / 'on te rlung la brten nas kyang skye zhe na / slob dpon gyi 'dod pa ni de la nges pa med de / gnyi ga ltar yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na puṣpagandhaḥ prativātameti na maulikastāgaraścāndano vā /<br/> satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātameti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis / me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi 'gro / rtsa ba'am rgya spos tsan dan yang ma yin / mkhas rnams dri ni rdzi phyogs min 'gro ste / skyes bu dam pa phyogs rnams kun du 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mānuṣyakaṃ puṣpagandhaṃ saṃdhāyoktam /<br/> taddhi pratītaṃ loke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang zhe na / mi'i me tog gi dri'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa yin no / de ni 'jig rten na grags pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca tasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ mahīsāsakāstu pathanti yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojanāni prativātamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mthu de lta bu ni med do / sa ston sde rnams rdzi phyogs su ni dpag chad brgyar dri'i ngad ldang ngo /  / rlung med na ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo zhes 'don to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sudharmā nāma devasabhā dakṣiṇapaścime digbhāge yasyāṃ niṣadya devāḥ kṛtyākṛtyaṃ samarthayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lho nub kyi phyogs cha na gang du lha rnams 'khod nas bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa 'gro bar byed pa lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa tāvattridaśānāṃ bhājanasaṃniveśaḥ /<br/> tataūrdhvaṃ vimāneṣu devāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi snod gnas pa yin no / de'i steng lha rnams gzhal med khang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridaśebhya ūrdhvaṃ devā vimāneṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sum cu rtsa gsum gyi steng gi lha rnams ni gzhal yas khang dag na gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punaryāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca brahmakāyikādayaśca pūrvoktāḥ ṣoḍaśasthānāntaragatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang sngar bshad pa tshangs ris la sogs pa gnas gzhan bcu drug tu gtogs pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete dvāviṃśatidevanikāyāḥ samāsena yeṣāṃ bhājanaṃ prajñāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na gang dag gi snong mngon pa ni mdor bsdu na lha'i ris nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmabhujastu ṣaṭ /<br/> teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devanikāyāḥ kāmān paribhuñjate na śeṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no / de dag las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā caturmahārājakāyikā yāvat paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ /<br/> te punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar rnams ni 'dod pa dag la spyod kyi lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no / de dag kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvandvāliṅganapāṇyāptihasitekṣitamaithunāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang / dgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvandvena maithunaṃ bhūmisambaddhavāsinām /<br/> cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ trāyastriṅkśānāṃ yathā manuṣyāṇām /<br/> teṣāṃ tu vāyunirmokṣāt dāhavigamaḥ śukrābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa dang 'brel par gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams ni mi rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis gnyis kyis 'khrig go / de dag la yang khu chu med pa'i phyir rlung btang bas yongs su gdung ba dang bral lo / 'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pas 'khrig pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āliṅganena maithunaṃ yāmānāmāliṅganamātreṇa dāhavigamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khyud pa tsam gyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro / dga' ldan pa rnams ni lag bcangs byas pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pāṇisaṃprāptyā tuṣitānāṃ hasitena nirmāṇaratīnāṃ prekṣitena paranirmitavaśavartinām /<br/> svavartināṃ sarveṣāṃ dvandvasamāpattyā /<br/> kālaparimānaṃ tu prajñaptāvuktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phrul dga' ba rnams ni dgod pas so / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams ni bltas pas so / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams cad kyang gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pas yin no / brtags pa las bshad pa ni dus kyi tshad yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvadyāvadviṣayāṇāṃ tīvrataratā tāvattāvadrāgo'pi tīvrataraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji tsam ji tsam du yul rnams ches shas che ba de tsam de tsam du 'dod chags kyang ches shas che'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya devasya devyā vā utsaṅge devakumāro devakanyā vā jāyate sa tayoḥ putro bhavati sā ca duhitā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha 'am lha mo gang gi pang du lha gzhon nu 'am lha'i bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de gnyis kyi bu yang yin la / de'i bu mo yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyatpramāṇo jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bong tshod ji tsam du skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcavarṣopamo yāvat daśavarṣopamaḥ śiśuḥ /<br/> saṃbhavatyeṣu /<br/> yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ṣaṭsu devanikāyeṣu /<br/> te tu kṣipramevābhivardhante /<br/> saṃpūrṇāḥ savastrāścaiva rūpiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byis pa lo lnga lon pa nas / lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar / de dag tu skye / lha'i ris de dag tu grangs bzhin te / de dag kyang myur ba nyid du skye'o / gzugs can rnams / kun rdzogs gos dang bcas pa nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarā devāḥ saṃpūrṇakāyāḥ vastreṇa saṃvītā upapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni lus kun rdzogs pa dang gos gyon bzhin du skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve devā āryabhāṣābhāṣiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i skad du smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadatra kāmadhātau veditavyāḥ /<br/> kāmopapattayastisraḥ kāmadevāḥ samānuṣāḥ /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti /<br/> tadyathā manuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ /<br/> te punaścatvāro devanikāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dod pa skye ba gsum po ni / 'dod pa'i lha dang mir bcas rnams / 'dod pa'i khams su rig par bya ste / ji lta zhe na sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag la dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de / 'di lta ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang lha'i ris bzhi rnams so / sems can 'dod pa sprul pa rnams 'dod pa rnams sprul zhing dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā devā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa rnams 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa dag la dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tā etā yathot pannaparibhogitvāt yathecchātmanirmitaparibhogitvādyathecchātmapara nirmitaparibhogitvācca tisraḥ kāmopapattaya ityucyante /<br/> rūpadhātau tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni ji ltar byung ba la yongs su longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag nyid kyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag dang gzhan gyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir 'dod pa skye ba gsum zhes bya'o / gzugs kyi khams ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhopapattayastriso navatridhyānabhūmayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba skye ba gsum po ni / bsam gtan gsum la sa dgu yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">triṣu dhyāneṣu yā nava bhūmayaḥ tāstisraḥ sukhopapattayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum dag nas dgu po gang dag yin pa de dag ni bde ba skye ba gsum yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi devā vivekajena samādhijena ca prītisukhena ca niṣprītikena ca sukhena sukhaṃ viharanto dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha de dag ni dben pa las skyes pa dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba dang dga' ba med pa'i bde bas bde bar gnas pa na yun ring mo zhig tu gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata etā nirduḥkhadīrghasukhatvātsukhā upapattayaḥ sukhopapattayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir bde ba skye ba de dag ni sdug bsngal ba med pa dang yun ring por bde ba'i phyir bde ba skye ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāntarotpattau tu prītisukhābhāvātsukhopapattitvaṃ vicāryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan khyad par can du skyes pa la ni dga' ba dang bde ba med pa'i phyir bde ba skye ba nyid dpyad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yānyetāni devānāṃ dvāviṃśatisthānānyuktāni teṣāmadharāduttaraṃ kiyadviprakṛṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag lha rnams kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis bshad pa de dag la 'og ma nas gong mar thag ji srid ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naitat sarvaṃ yojanaparisaṃkhyayā sukaraṃ parisaṃkhyātum /<br/> api tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag thams cad dpag tshad kyi grangs kyis bgrang bar ni sla ba ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthānāt sthānādadho yāvattāvadūrdhvaṃ tatastataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas dang gnas 'og ji srid pa / de nas de yi gong de srid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvīpāt prabhṛti yaduttaraṃ sthānaṃ tasmādyāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvat punastasmādūrdhvaṃ sthānāntaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling nas bzung ste gong pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par de nas gong ma'i gnas gzhan du yang de srid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā caturthī pariṣaṇḍā caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ mūlasthānamitaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / 'di nas dpag tshad bzhi khri na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rtsa ba'i gnas bang rim bzhi pa yod pa de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādyāvadadhojambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tridaśānāṃ sthānam tasmādapi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ yāmānāṃ sthānam /<br/> tato'pi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tuṣitānāṃ sthānamiti /<br/> evaṃ vistareṇa sarvamanukramya sudarśanebhyo yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃmakaniṣṭhānāṃ sthānam /<br/> tasmādūrdhvaṃ na punaḥ sthānamasti /<br/> ata eva jyeṣṭhabhūtvādakaniṣṭhā ucyante /<br/> aghaniṣṭhā ityapare /<br/> aghaṃ kila cittasthaṃ rūpaṃ tanmātraniṣṭheti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji srid bar gong ma sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do / de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'thab bral ba rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do / de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma dga' ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do / de bzhin du rgyas par thams cad go rims dang mthun par bya ste / shin du mthong ba dag nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'og min pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do / de'i gong na ni gnas med do / de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni thu bor gyur pa'i phyir 'og min zhes bya'o / gzhan dag na re thog mtha' zhes bya ste / thogs pa ni bsags par gnas pa'i gzugs te / de ni 'dir mthar thug go zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaradharasthānopapannā urdhvāni vimānāni gatvā paśyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang cig nas 'og mar skyes pa rnams gong ma'i gzhal med khang du dong nas mthong bar 'gyur ram zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nordhvaṃ darśanamastyeṣāmanyatrarddhiparāśrayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul gzhan brten ma gtogs par / de dag gong ma mthong ba med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhyā vā trāyastriṃśā yāmān /<br/> gaccheyuḥ /<br/> parāśrayeṇa vā yadvṛddhimatā nīyeran devena vā tatratyena /<br/> evaṃ śeṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul gyis sam / gzhan la brten nas te / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'am / de na gnas pa'i lhas khrid par gyur na sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams 'thab bral ba'i nang du 'gro bar 'gyur te / lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āgataṃ tūrdhvopapannaṃ paśyennatūrdhvadhātukaṃ nordhvabhūmikam /<br/> yiathā spraṣṭavyaṃ na spṛśedaviṣayatvāt /<br/> ata eva tenāsvena kāyenāgacchanti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi nirmitenādharabhūmikena tadicchayā paśyedihatyamiveti nikāyāntarīyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du skyes pa 'ongs pa mthong bar 'gyur gyi / khams gong ma pa yang ma yin la / sa gong ma pa yang ma yin te / dper na yul ma yin pa'i phyir reg bya reg par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no / de nyid kyi phyir rang gi lus kyis mi 'ong ngo / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / sa 'og ma'i sprul pas so / sde pa gzhan dag na re / de'i 'dod pas 'di na 'khod pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ yāmādivimānānāṃ kiyat pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'thab bral ba la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang de dag gi tshad ji tsam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturṇāṃ tāvadyāvatsumerumūrdhnaḥ ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig kha cig na re bzhi rnams kyis ni ri rab kyi rtse mo de tsam mo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dviguṇottaramityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gong ma gnyis 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamaṃ tu dhyānaṃ yāvāṃścāturdvīpakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re bsam gtan dang po'i ni gling bzhi pa tsam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyaṃ yāvān sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ /<br/> tṛtīyaṃ yāvān dvisāhasraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa'i ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo / gsum pa'i ni stong gnyis pa tsam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthaṃ yāvāṃsrisāhasra ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa'i ni stong gsum pa tsam mo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamādīni sāhasrādiparimāṇāni /<br/> caturthaṃ tvaparimāṇamityapare /<br/> atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dang po la sogs pa ni stong la sogs pa'i tshad tsam mo /  / bzhi pa ni tshad med do zhes zer ro / yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ci / stong gnyis pa 'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturdvīpakacandrārkamerukāmadivaukasām /<br/> brahmalokasahasraṃ ca sāhasraścūḍiko mataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong gsum pa ni ci zhe na / gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang / ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni / stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahasrañjaṃbūdvīpānāṃ pūrvavidehānāmaparagodānīyānāmuttarakuruṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sahasraṃ brahmalokānāmayamucyate sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ /<br/> tatsahasraṃ dvisāhasro lokadhātustu madhyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling dang shar gyi lus 'phags dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang ri rab stong dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar stong dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o / de stong la ni stong gnyis pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ /<br/> tatsahasraṃ trisāhasraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no / stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin no / de stong la ni stong gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ /<br/> eṣa hi kṛtsnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin te / 'di thams cad ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samasaṃvartasaṃbhavaḥ /<br/> samaṃ saṃvartate samaṃ vivartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin / mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃbhavo hi vivartaḥ ityuttaratra vyākhyāsyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba ni chags pa yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti /<br/> astītyāha /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> jāmbūdvīpāḥ pramāṇena catuḥsārdhatrihastakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar snod rnams kyi tshad bye brag yod pa de bzhin du de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshad kyang / bye brag yod dam zhe na / smras pa yod de / de la re zhig / 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams kyi tshad / khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ pramāṇārdhacaturhastakāḥ kecittu caturhastakāḥ /<br/> dviguṇottaravṛddhyā tu pūrvagodottarāhvayāḥ /<br/> pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam /<br/> pādavṛddhyā tanuryāvatsārdhakrośo divaukasām /<br/> kāmināṃ /<br/> pādaḥ krośasya caturtho bhagaḥ /<br/> tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni phal cher khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o / kha cig ni khru bzhi pa dag yin no / shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni / byang zhes bya ba gnyis 'gyur bskyed / shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni rim bzhin du khru brgyad pa dang bcu drug pa dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dag yin no / 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus / bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag / phye dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed / bzhi cha zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha ste / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris ba rnams kyi lus ni de tsam mo / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gnyis so / 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gsum mo / dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go / 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang bzhi cha gcig go / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rupiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram /<br/> tataḥ param /<br/> ardhārdhavṛddhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can gyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi dang po ni tshangs ris pa rnams kyi lus ni dpag tshad phyed tsam mo / de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane /<br/> urdhvaṃ tu parīttābhebhya āśrayaḥ /<br/> dviguṇadviguṇā hitvā 'nabhrakebhya'striyojanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas gsum dag na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyi dpag tshad gcig go / tshangs pa chen po'i ni phyed dang gnyis so / 'od chung pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so / 'od chung rnams kyi lha yan chad / lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te / sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apramāṇābhānāṃ catvāri yojanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshad med 'od rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābhāsvarāṇāmaṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni brgyad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ dviguṇavṛddhyā yāvacchubhakṛtsnānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni drug cu rtsa bzhi yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur du bskyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprin med pa rnams kyi ni nyis 'gyur du bsgyur nas de las dpag tshad gsum phri nas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yan chad bsod nams skyes pa la sogs pa nas 'og min pa rnams kyi lus dpag tshad khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du bsgyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ pramāṇabhinnānāṃ kimāyuṣo'pyasti bhedaḥ /<br/> astītyāha /<br/> sahasramāyuḥ kuruṣu /<br/> varṣāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci de ltar bod tshod tha dad pa rnams kyi tshe yang bye brag yod dam zhe na / smras pa yod de / sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste / lo rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayorardhārdhavarjitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis la phyed phyed spangs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayordvipayorardhārdhaṃ varjayitvā pañca varṣaśatāni godānīyānām /<br/> ardhatṛtīye varṣaśate pūrvavidehānām /<br/> ihāniyatam /<br/> jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ /<br/> ante tu daśābdāḥ /<br/> abdaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis la ni phyed phyed spangs nas / ba lang spyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni lo lnga brgya'o / shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi ni nyis brgya lnga bcu'o / 'di na ma nges / 'dzam bu gling 'di na ni tshe nges pa med de / res 'ga' ni ring por 'gyur ro / res 'ga' ni thung ngo / tha mar ni / lo bcu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ante hīyamānaṃ daśa varṣāṇyāyurbhavati /<br/> ādito'mitam /<br/> āditaḥ prāthamakalpikānaṃ manuṣyāṇāmaparimāṇamāyurbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lo zhes bya ba ni lo skor yin te / tha ma thung ngur gyur pa na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro / dang po dpag tu med / bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med pa yin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahasrādisaṃkhyayā parimātuṃ na śakyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong la sogs pa'i grangs kyis yongs su tshad gzung bar mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devānāṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyi bshad zin to / lha rnams kyi brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate /<br/> nṛṇāṃ varṣāṇi pañcāśadahorātro divaukasām /<br/> kāme'dharāṇāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang nyin zhag rnam par bzhag nas brjod par nus pas re zhig de dag gi de nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste / mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la / 'dod pa dag gi lha rnams las
