</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam /<br/> tenāyuḥ pañcavarṣaśatāni tu /<br/> tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam /<br/> dviguṇottaramūrdhvānāmubhayaṃ /<br/> ūrdhvānāṃ devānāmubhaya dviguṇottaramahorātraścāyuśca /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig / mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go / des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o / de'i nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go / zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya'o / gong ma gnyi ga nyis 'gyur ro / lnga po gong ma rnam sa ni nyin zhag dang tshe gnyi ga nyis 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tattrāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāmekaṃ rātrindivam /<br/> tena rātrindivena divyaṃ varṣasahasramāyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji lta zhe na / mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / nyin zhag des na tshe lha'i lo stong thub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāmādīnāṃ yathākramam /<br/> mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam /<br/> tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya dang bzhi brgya dang brgyad brgya dang stong drug brgya ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i nyin zhag gcig yin la / nyin zhag des na tshe'i tshad lha'i lo nyis stong dang bzhi stong dang brgyad stong dang khri drug stong thub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yugandharādūrvaṃ sūryācandramasorabhāvāt /<br/> kathaṃ devānāmahorātravyavasthānamālokakṛtyaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnya' shing 'dzin yan chad na nyi ma dang zla ba med pa'i phyir lha rnams kyi nyin zhag rnam par gzhag pa dang snang ba'i bya ba ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ku mu ta dang pad ma bzhin du me tog rnams kha 'dzums pa dang kha 'byed pa dang bya rnams skad 'byin pa dang skad mi 'byin pa dang gnyid sangs pa dang bro ba las so / snang ba'i bya ba ni bdag nyid la 'od yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktamāyuḥ kāminām /<br/> rūpiṇāṃ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstyahorātramāyustu kalpaiḥ svāśrayasaṃmitaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni / rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāmardhayojanamāśrayaḥ teṣāmardhakalpamāyuḥ /<br/> yeṣāṃ yojanaṃ teṣāṃ kalpam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can gang dag gi lus dpag tshad phyed yin pa de dag gi tshe bskal pa phyed yin la / gang dag gi dpag tshad gcig yin pa de dag gi ni bskal pa gcig yin pa nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'og min pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bskal pa khri drug stong yod pa'i bar du gang gi lus dpag tshad ji snyed pa de'i tshe yang bskal pa de snyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpye viṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇya dhikādhikam /<br/> ākāśānantyāyatane viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam /<br/> vijñānānantyāyatane tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ sahasrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni / nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched na ni tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi khri'o / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākiñcanyāyatane tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci yang med pa'i skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgre tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mon ni de las nyi khri lhag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni go rims bzhin du bskal pa nyi khri dang bzhi khri dang drug khri dang brgyad khri yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamo'tra kalpo veditavyaḥ kimantarakalpo'tha saṃvartakalpo'tha vivarttakalpo'tha mahākalpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir bskal pa gang zhig yin par rig par bya / ci bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa dang gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu pa chen po zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahākalpaḥ parīttābhāt prabhṛtyardhamadhastataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te / de yi 'og ma phyed yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parīttābhādeva nikāyāt prabhṛti mahākalpenāyuḥ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i ris 'od chung nas bzung ba'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen por rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādadho mahākalpasyārdha kalpīkṛtya mahābrahmādīnāmāyurvyavasthāpitam /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og ma tshangs chen la sogs pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen po phyed la bskal par byas nas rnam par bzhag go / ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpānvivarta āste yacca viṃśatimantarakalpānsaṃvartate ime ṣaṣṭirantarakalpā mahābrahmaṇo'dhyardhaḥ kalpaḥ uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang 'jig rten bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur chags pa dang gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nye shur 'dug pa dang gang yang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig pa dang bar gyi bskal pa drug cu po de dag la tshangs pa chen po'i bskal pa phyed dang gnyis su bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca kṛtvā mahākalpasyārdhaṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpān kalpīkṛtya teṣāmāyuḥ pramāṇamuktam /<br/> uktaṃ sugatāvāyuḥ pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na bskal pa chen po'i phyed bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal par byas nas de dag gis tshe'i chad du byas nas bshad pa yin no / bde 'gro'i tshe'i tshad bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">durgatāvidānīṃ vaktavyam /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> kāmadevāyuṣā tulyā ahorātrā yathākramam /<br/> saṃjīvādiṣu ṣaṭsu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ngan 'gro'i brjod par bya ste / de la re zhig / yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin / 'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvat ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāmāyuruktaṃ tena tulyā ahorātrāḥ ṣaṭṣu narakeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /<br/> saṃjīve kālasūtre saṃghāte raurave mahāraurave tāpane ca /<br/> āyustaisteṣāṃ kāmadevavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po de dag gi tshe ji tsam par bshad pa de dang go rims bzhin du yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang dmyal ba drug gi nyin zhag dang mnyam par rig par bya ste / des na de dag rnams kyi tshe / 'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tairidānīṃ svairahorātraisteṣāṃ yathā ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāmāyustathaiva yathākramaṃ veditavyam /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rang gi nyin zhag de dag gis de dag tshe'i tshad 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po de dag gi tshe ji lta ba de bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddhi cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tatsaṃjīvane mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji lta zhe na / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa tatratyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i los tshe de na yod pa'i lo lnga brgya zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattrāyastriṃśānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tat kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivam /<br/> tena rātrindivena tasminvarṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig yin la / nyin zhag des na de'i tshe lo stong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tattulyenāhorātreṇa tāpane ṣoḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam /<br/> ardhaṃ pratāpane /<br/> pratāpane mahānarake'ntarakalpasyārdhamāyuḥ pramāṇam /<br/> avīcāvantaḥkalpaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis dmyal ba chen po tsha ba na tshe'i tshad lo khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du gzhan dag la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o / rab tu tsha phyed / dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba na ni tshe'i tshad bar gyi bskal pa phyed do / mnar med ni / bar gyi bskal pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiraścāṃ tu niyamo nāsti /<br/> paraṃ punaḥ /<br/> kalpaṃ tiraścāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dud 'gro rnams ni nges pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramāyustiraścāmantarakalpaṃ tat punarnāgānāṃ nandopanandāśvatalīprabhṛtīnām /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aṣṭāvime bhikṣavo nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā dharaṇidharā iti vistaraḥ /<br/> pretānāṃ māsāhnā śatapañcakam /<br/> yo manuṣyāṇāṃ māsaḥ sa pretānāmahorātraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dud 'gro rnams / mchog ring bskal pa'o / dud 'gro'i tshe mchog tu ring ba ni bar gyi bskal pa gcig ste / klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang rta mgo la sogs pa dag ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis / dge slong dag klu brgyad po 'di dag ni klu chen po ste / bskal par gnas pa / sa 'dzin pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs so / yi dvags rnams / zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya'o / mi rnams kyi zla ba gcig gang yin pa de ni yi dvags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenāhorātreṇa pañca varṣaśatānyāyuḥ /<br/> śītanarakeṣvāyuṣaḥ kiṃ pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyin zhag des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o yang grang ba'i dmyal ba dag na tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhe na / ji srid du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāhādvarṣaśatenaikatiloddhārakṣayāyuṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">til sbyang nas ni lo brgya zhing / til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arvudādviṃśatiguṇaprativṛddhyāyuṣaḥ pare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu bur can gyi tshe yin te / gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shur 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upamānamātreṇa teṣvāyurākhyātaṃ bhagavatā tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syādviṃśatikhārīko māgadhakastilavāhaḥ pūrṇastilānāṃ cūḍikāvaddhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyi dpe tsam du dge slong dag dper na 'di na yul ma ga dh'a'i til gyi sbyang khal brgyad cu ba zhig til dag gis byur bur bkang ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ kaścideva varṣaśatasyātyayādekaṃ tilamapanayate kṣiprataraṃ bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīko māgadhastilavāho'nenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas la la zhig gis lo brgya brgya 'das shing til re re bor na dge slong dag rim pa des na yul ma ga dh'a'i til gyi sbyang khal brgyad cu pa de ma lus par yongs su zad par gyur pa ni tshes myur gyi chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe yongs su gtugs par ni nga mi smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvevāhamarvudopapannānāmāyuṣaḥ paryantaṃ vadāmi /<br/> yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatirvudā evameko nirarvudo vistareṇa yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatiḥ padyā evameko mahāpadma iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag chu bur can nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du chu bur rdol pa gcig yin no zhes bya ba nas rgyas par yang dge slong dag padma ltar gas pa nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du padma ltar gas pa chen po gcig yin no zhes gsungs so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evameṣāmāyuṣmatāṃ sattvānāṃ kimastyaparipūrṇāyuṣāmantarā mṛtyurāhosvinna
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag tshe yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma ngor 'chi ba yod dam 'on te / med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatrāsti /<br/> kurubāhyo'ntarāmṛtyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad la yod de / sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uttarakuruṣu niyatāyuṣaḥ sattvā avaśyaṃ kṛtsnamāyurjīvanti /<br/> anyeṣu nāvaśyam /<br/> pudgalānāṃ tu bahūnāṃ nāstyantareṇa kālakriyayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na ni sems can rnams tshe nges pa yin te / gdon mi za bar tshe rangs par 'tsho'o / gzhan dag ni ma nges so / gang zag rnams las bar ma dor 'chi ba med pa yang mang ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tuṣitastharsyakajātibaddhasya bodhisattvasya caramabhavikasattvasya jinādiṣṭasya jinabhutasya śraddhādharmānusāriṇo bodhisattvacakravarttimātrośca tadgarbhayorityevamādinām /<br/> yojanapramaṇena sthānāni śarīrāṇi cotkāni varṣapramāṇenāyuruktaṃ tayośca pramāṇaṃ noktamiti vaktavyaṃ nānā ca sarveṣāṃ vavasthānamatastasyāpi paryanto vaktavyaḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ samānākhyānārthamādiprakrama ārabhyate /<br/> paramāṇvakṣarakṣaṇāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan na bzhugs pa dang sems can srid pa tha ma pa dang rgyal bas bstan pa dang rgyal ba'i thad du btang ba'i pho nya dang dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i yum de dag lhums na yod pa dang de lta bu la sogs pa'o / dpag tshad kyi tshad kyis gnas rnams dang lus rnams kyang lo'i tshad kyis tshe yang bshad na / de gnyis kyi tshad ni ma bshad pas brjod par bya la / de dag thams cad kyi rnam par gzhag pa yang ming yin pas de'i mtha' yang brjod par bya ste / de rnams yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang po'i rim pa brtsam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpanāmādhvaparyantāḥ /<br/> rūpasyāpacīyamānasya paryantaḥ paramāṇuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ming dus mtha' rdul yig dang / skad cig / gzugs 'grib pa'i mtha' ni rdul phra rab yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kālasya paryantaḥ kṣaṇo nāmnaḥ paryanto'kṣaraṃ tadyathā gauriti /<br/> kṣaṇasya punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus kyi mtha' ni skad cig ma'o / ming gi mtha' ni yi ge ste / dper na ba lang zhes bya ba lta bu'o / yang skad cig ma'i tshad ji tsam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samagreṣu pratyayeṣu yāvatā dharmasyātmalābhaḥ gacchanvā dharmo yāvatā paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantaraṃ gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen rnams tshogs na ji srid du chos kyi bdag nyid thob ba'am / chos 'gro phan ji srid du rdul phra rab nas rdul phra rab gzhan du 'gro ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">balavatpuruṣāddhaṭmātreṇa pañcaṣaṣṭiḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmantītyābhidhārmikāḥ /<br/> paramāṇuraṇustathā /<br/> lohāpaśaśāvigocchidrarajolikṣāstadudbhavāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa rnams na re skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig ma drug cu rtsa lnga 'da'o zhes zer ro / de la phra rab rdul dang ni / rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du / lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang / nyi zer rdul dang sro ma dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yavastathāṅgulīparva jñeyaṃ saptaguṇottaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las byung dang de bzhin du / sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etatparamāṇvādikaṃ saptaguṇottaraṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab la sogs pa 'di dag ni gong nas gong du bdun 'gyur du rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta paramāṇavo'ṇuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phran no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptāṇavo loharajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phran bdun la ni lcags rdul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni saptāvrajastāni sapta dāśarajastāni saptaiḍakarajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag bdun la ni chu rdul lo / de dag bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni sapta gorajaḥ tāni sapta vātāyanacchidrarajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag bdun la ni lug rdul lo / de dag bdun la ni glang rdul lo / de dag bdun la ni nyi zer rdul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni sapta likṣāstadudbhavā yūketyarthaḥ /<br/> sapta yūkā yavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag bdun la ni sro ma'o / sro ma bdun la ni de las byung ba ste / sro ma las byung ba ni shig cis bya ba'i tha tshig go / shig bdun la ni nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta yavā aṅgulīparva trīṇi parvāṇyaṅgurīti prasiddhameveti noktam /<br/> pārśvākṛtāstu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nas bdun la ni sor mo'i tshigs so / sor mo'i tshigs gsum la ni sor mo zhes bya bar grags pa nyid pas ma bshad do / ngos su bya ba ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturviṃśatiraṅgulyo hasto hastacatuṣṭayam /<br/> dhanuḥ /<br/> vyāsenetyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sor ni nyi shu bzhi la khru / khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo / 'dom gang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni / rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣāṃ pañca śatāni krośaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhu lnga brgya la ni rgyang grags te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">krośamātraṃ ca grāmādi raṇyamiṣṭam /<br/> te'ṣṭau yojanamityāhuḥ /<br/> uktaṃ yojanasya pramāṇam /<br/> varṣasyedānīmucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grong nas rgyang grags tsam gyi thag la ni dgon pa yin par 'dod do / de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o / rgyang grags de dag brgyad la dpag tshad ces bya'o / dpag tshad kyi tshad ni bshad zin to / da ni lo'i tshad brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṃśaṃ kṣaṇaśataṃ punaḥ /<br/> tatkṣaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la / de yi skad cig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣaṇānāṃ viṃśaṃ śatamekastatkṣaṇaḥ /<br/> te punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma brgya nyi shul de'i skad cig go / de dag kyang / drug cu la ni thang cig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatkṣaṇāḥ ṣaṣṭirlava ityucyate /<br/> triṃśadguṇottarāḥ /<br/> trayo muhūrttāhorātramāsāḥ /<br/> triṃśallavā muhūrttastriśanmuhūrttā ahorātraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i skad cig drug cu la ni thang cig ces bya'o / yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni / gong nas gong du sum cur 'gyur / thang cig sum cu la yud tsam mo / yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācittu rātriradhikā bhavati kadācidūnā kadācitsamā /<br/> tridaśāhorātrā māsaḥ /<br/> dvādaśamāsakaḥ /<br/> saṃvatsaraḥ sonarātraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni mtshan mo ring ngo / res 'ga' ni thung ngo / res 'ga' ni mnyam mo / nyin zhag sum cu la ni zla ba gcig go / zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāro māsā hemantānāṃ catvāro grīṣmāṇāṃ catvāro varṣāṇāmityete dvādaśa māsā saṃvatsaraḥ sārdhamūnarātraiḥ /<br/> saṃvatsareṇa hi ṣaḍūnarātrā nipātyante /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> hemantagrīṣmavarṣāṇāmadhyardhe māsi nirgate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig go / dgun rnams kyi zla ba bzhi dang dpyid rnams kyi zla ba bzhi dang dbyar rnams kyi zla ba bzhi ste / de dag zla ba bcu gnyis po de dag zhag mi thub dang bcas pa la lo gcig go / lo la ni zhag gcig gi shol drug dor te / ji lta zhe na / dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar rnams kyi / zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣe'rdhamāse vidvadbhirūnarātro nipātyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zla ba phyed ni lus pa na / mkhas pas zhag mi thub pa dor
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ varṣapramāṇam /<br/> kalpasyedānīṃ vaktavyam /<br/> kalpo bahuvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ /<br/> antarakalpo saṃvarttakalpo vivartakalpo mahākalpaśceti /<br/> tatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lo'i tshad bshad zin to / da ni bskal pa brjod par bya ste / bskal ba rnam pa mang bshad pa / bar gyi bskal pa dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang bskal pa chen po'i / de la re zhig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvarttakalpo narakāsaṃbhavāt bhājanakṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi / srid pa med nas snod zad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakeṣu hi sattvāsaṃbhavāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanasaṃkṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dag nas sems can mi srid pa nas bzung ste snod zad pa'i bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve hi saṃvarttanyau /<br/> gatisaṃvartanī dhātusaṃvartanī ca /<br/> punardve saṃvartanyau /<br/> sattvasaṃvartanī bhājanasaṃvartanī ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji lta bu zhe na / 'jig pa ni gnyis te / 'gro ba 'jig pa dang khams 'jig pa'o / yang gnyis te / sems can 'jig pa dang snod 'jig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavati sa kālo yannarakeṣu sattvāścyavante nopapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang sems can rnams dmyal ba dag nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ārambhaḥ saṃvartakalpasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa mgo brtsam pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadayaṃ loko viṃśatyantarakalpān vivṛtto'sthāt tanniryātaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang 'jig rten 'di chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug pa de las ni nges par 'byung ba zhes brjod par bya la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadviṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvartiṣyate tat pratipannaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig par 'gyur ba de la ni zhugs pa zhes brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā narakeṣvekasattvo nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā 'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe dmyal ba dag na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduta narakasaṃvarttanyā yasya tadānīṃ niyataṃ narakavedanīyaṃ karma ghriyate sa lokadhātvantaranarakeṣu kṣipyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no / de'i tshe gang la nges par dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu 'phen par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tiryaksaṃvarttanī pretasaṃvarttanī ca vaktavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba dang yi dags myong bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahāsamudragatāstiryañcaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃvartante /<br/> manuṣyasahacariṣṇavastu taireva sārdhaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgya mtsho chen po na 'khod pa'i dud 'gro rnams ni sngar 'jig go / mi dang lhan cig rgyu ba rnams ni de dag mi dang lhan cig tu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa kālo yanmanuṣyeṣvanyatamaḥ sattvaḥ svayamanācāryakaṃ dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa tasmāt vyutthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang mi rnams dag gi nang na sems can gang yang rung ba bdag nyid kyis slob dpon med par chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de / de de las langs nas tshig tu kye ma dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni bde ba yin no / dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni zhi ba yin no zhes kyang smra la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taṃ ca śabdaṃ śrutvā anye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante /<br/> kālaṃ kṛtvā brahmaloka upapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra de thos nas sems can de dag kyang snyoms par 'jug cing / shi nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā jambūdvīpa ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta jambūdvīpasaṃvartanyā /<br/> evaṃ pūrvavidehagodānīyottarakurusaṃvartanyo vaktavyāḥ /<br/> yadā manuṣyeṣvekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta manuṣyagatisaṃvarttanyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste / 'dzam bu'i gling 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no / shar gyi lus 'phags dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan 'jig pa dag kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste / gang gi tshe mi dag gi nang na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste / mi 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">auttarakauravāstu kālaṃ kṛtvā kāmāvacareṣu deveṣūpapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vairāgyābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣvapi deveṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya brahmaloka upapadyante /<br/> yadā tatraikasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta cāturmahārājakāyikasaṃvartanyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag na / yang bsam gtan dang po bskyed pa nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te / gang gi tshe de na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartisaṃvarttnyo vaktavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'jig pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadaikasattvo'pi kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta kāmadhātusaṃvartanyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag gi nang na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmaloke'pyanyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyotthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na yang sems can gang yang rung ba zhig chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs te / langs nas tshig tu kye ma ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni bde ba yin no / kye ma ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni zhi ba yin no zhes smra ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā'nye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante kālaṃ ca kṛtvā ābhāsvareṣu deveṣūpapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas snyoms par 'jug cing shi nas kyang 'od gsal gyi lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā brahmaloka ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta sattvasaṃvartanyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste / sems can 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ śūnye bhājane ita eva sāmantakāt sattvānāṃ tadākṣepake karmaṇi parikṣīṇe sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇa yāvat pṛthivīṃ sumeruṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ dahanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu sems can rnams kyi da 'phen pa'i las yongs su zad pa dang snod stong pas 'di nyid nas kun nas nyi ma bdun byung nas rim gyis sa dang ri rab kyi bar du ma lus par sreg par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādevaṃ prajvalitādarcirvāyunā kṣiptaṃ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahat paraiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu 'bar ba de nyid las me lce rlung gis khyer nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi bar du sreg par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca tadbhūmikamevārcirveditavyam /<br/> nahi visabhāgā apakṣālāḥ kramante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me lce de dang de'i sa pa kho nar rig par bya ste / ris mi mthun pa'i skyon dag 'gro ba ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃbaddhasaṃbhūtatvāttasmāttadityuktam /<br/> kāmāvacaro hyagnī rūpāvacaramagniṃ saṃbadhnātīti /<br/> evamanyasyāmapi saṃvartanyāṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang 'brel pa las byung ba nyid kyi phyir de nyid las zhes bshad de / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i me ni gzugs na spyod pa dang 'brel par byed do / de bzhin du 'jig pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakeṣu sattvānāṃ cyutyanutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānāṃ saṃkṣaya eṣa kālaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na dmyal ba dag na sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang mi skye ba nas bzung ste / snod rnams zad pa'i bar gyi dus de ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivartakalpaḥ prāgvāyoryāvannarakasaṃbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chags pa dang po'i rlung ni dmyal ba srid pa'i bar du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thamādvāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvannarakeṣu sattvasambhavaḥ eṣa kālo vivartakalpa ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po'i rlung nas bzung ste dmyal ba dag nas sems can srid pa'i bar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā saṃvṛte hi loka ākāśamātrāvaśeṣaścira kālaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat punarapi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanānāṃ pūrvanimittabhūtā ākāśe mandamandā vāyavaḥ syandante /<br/> tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvṛtto'sthāttanniryātaṃ vaktavyam /<br/> yadviṃśatimantarakalpān vivarttiṣyate tadupayātaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar 'jig rten zhig pa ni nam mkha' tsam lus par yun ring du gnas so / yang rim gyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis nam mkha' la snod rnams kyi snga ltas su gyur pa rlung 'jam po 'jam po dag ldang ste / de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di zhig nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug pa gang yin pa de las ni nges par byung ba zhes brjod par bya la / bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'ongs par brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataste vāyavo vardhamānā yathoktaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ jāyate /<br/> tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas rlung de dag skye ba na ji skad bshad pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro / de'i 'og tu rim gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor dang gser gyi rang bzhin gyis gzhi chen po dang gling rnams dang ri rab la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa dang tshul du thams cad 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamaṃ tu brāhma vimānamutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang por ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato yāvat yāmīyaṃ tato vāyumaṇḍalādīni /<br/> iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu ni 'thab bral pa'i bar du 'byung ngo / de'i 'og tu ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste / de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste snod chags pas 'jig rten 'di chags pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas sems can gang yang rung ba zhig 'od gsal dag nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skye bar 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye'pi sattvāstataścyutvā brahmapurohiteṣūpapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gzhan dag kyang de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato brahmakāyikeṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu /<br/> krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante /<br/> dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu tshangs ris dag dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag dang 'phrul dga' dag nas rim gyis byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dang ba lang spyod dang shar gyi lus 'phags po dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang yi dgas rnams dang dud 'gro rnams dang dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te / gang mjug tu 'jig pa de dang por 'chags pa 'di ni chos nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati /<br/> yadviṃśatimantaralpān vivarttaḥ sthāsyati tadupayātaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe dmyal ba dag na sems can 'ga' zhig skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa gang yin pa de las ni nges par byung ba yin la / chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'ongs pa yin no

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utkarṣā apakarṣāśca kalpā aṣṭādaśāpare /<br/> tasmādapare'ṣṭādaśotkarṣā apakarṣāścāṣṭādaśāntarakalpā bhavanti /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> tebhyo hi daśavarṣāyuṣkebhya utkarṣaṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti /<br/> punaścāpakarṣaṃ gacchanto daśavarṣāyuṣo bhavanti /<br/> evaṃ dvitīyo'ntarakalpaḥ

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśavarṣāyuṣkebhyo yāvadaśītivarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmiti varttate /<br/> athaite utkarṣāḥ kiyantaṃ prakarṣaṃ gacchanti /<br/> te'śītisahasrādyāvadāyuṣaḥ /<br/> nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu pa dag las tshe lo brgyad khri pa'i bar du 'gyur ro / yang mar skye ba de dag ji tsam du yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na / de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar / de las yar ni mi skye'o / bar gyi bskal pa gzhan rnams kyi yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa'i dus ji srid par bar gyi bskal pa dang po'i mar 'grib pa dang tha ma'i yar skye ba'i dus kyang de srid pas thams cad dus mnyam pa yin no

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivartate'tha saṃvṛtta āste samvartate samam /<br/> viṃśatimevāntarakalpān vivartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvṛtta āste

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parārthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante kathaṃ parānapi mahato duḥkhaughāt paritrātuṃ śaknuyāmiti /<br/> ka eṣāṃ parārthena svārthaḥ /<br/> eṣa eva teṣāṃ svārtho yaḥ parārthastasyābhimatatvāt /<br/> idānīmetacchrāddhāsyate /<br/> satyaṃ duḥśraddhānametadātmaṃbharibhirniṣkaruṇaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni ji ltar na gzhan dag kyang sdug bsngal gyi chu bo chen po las yongs su bskyab par nus par 'gyur snyam du gzhan gyi don du 'bad pa rtsom par byed do / 'di dag gi gzhan gyi don gyis bdag gi don du 'gyur ba gang yin zhe na / de dag gi gzhan gyi don gang yin pa de nyid bdag gi don te / de 'dod pa'i phyir ro / da ni su zhig 'di la dad par 'gyur zhe na / bdag gso bar byed pa'i snying rje med pa rnams kyis 'di la dad par dka' ba ni bden no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante /<br/> tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snying rje can rnams kyis dad par byas zin pa yin te / dper na 'di na snying rje med pa la goms pa kha cig rang gi don med bzhin du yang gzhan nyon mongs pa la mngon par dga' ba dmigs pa de bzhin du snying rje la goms pa dag rang gi don med bzhin du yang gzhan la phan par bya ba la mngon par dga' ba yod do snyam du yid ches par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaiva cābhyāsavaśādanātmabhūteṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānabhijñā ātmasnehaṃ niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya pareṣvapekṣāṃ vardhayitvā taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahantīti saṃbhāvyam /<br/> gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti /<br/> na te punaḥ svārthamanyaṃ paśyanti /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dper na 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mngon par mi shes pa dag goms pa'i dbang gis 'dus byas bdag med par gyur pa dag la bdag tu chags pa bskyed nas rgyu des sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong par 'gyur ba de bzhin du goms pa'i dbang gis de dag las bdag tu chags pa bzlog nas / gzhan dag la lta ba bskyed de / rgyu des sdug bsngal dag myong bar 'gyur ro snyam du yid ches par bya'o / gang gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan dag gi bde bas bde bar 'gyur gyi / bdag nyid kyi ni ma yin pa de lta bu'i rigs gzhan kho na yang 'grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hīnaḥ prārthayate svasaṃtatigataṃ yaistairūpāyaḥ sukhaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ni rang gi don du mi blta'o / 'dir smras pa / dman pa de dang de'i thabs kyis rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i bde ba don du gnyer
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bring po sdug bsngal ldog pa kho na'o / bde min gang phyir de ni sdug bsngal gnas yin phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śreṣṭhaḥ prārthayate svasaṃtatigatairduḥkhaiḥ pareṣāṃ sukhaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dam pa rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis gzhan dag la ni bde ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhātyantanivṛttimeva ca yatastadduḥkhaduḥkhyeva saḥ /<br/> kiṃ punarutkarṣā buddhā utpayante āhosvidapakarṣāḥ /<br/> apakarṣe hi śatādyāvattadudbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gtan ldog kho na don gnyer gang phyir de yi sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal phyir / yang ci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yar skye ba'i tshe 'byung ngam / 'on te mar 'grib pa'i tshe 'byung zhe na / mar ni 'grib pa yi / brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśītivarṣaśatāyupi prajāyāmapakarṣe ārabdhe yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣo manuṣyā bhavantyetasminnantare buddhā utpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri ba mar 'grib pa nas brtsams pa nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya pa yin pa'i bar 'dir sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānnotkarṣakāle
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir yang skye ba'i dus su ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadā hi duḥsamudvejāḥ sattvā bhavanti /<br/> kasmānna śatāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe sems can rnams skyo bar dka' ba'i phyir ro / ci'i phyir brgya las mar 'grib pa'i tshe ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadā hi pañca kaṣāyā abhyutsadā bhavanti /<br/> tadyathā'yuṣkaṣāyaḥ kalpakaṣāyaḥ kleśakaṣāyaḥ dṛṣṭikaṣāyaḥ sattvakaṣāyaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste / tshe'i snyigs ma dang dus kyi snyigs ma dang nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang lta ba'i snyigs ma dang sems can gyi snyigs ma shin tu lhag pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante /<br/> dvābhyāṃ hi jīvitopakaraṇavipattī yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mar 'grib pa'i 'og tu ni tshe la sogs pa tha chad yin no / ngan snyigs su gyur pa'i phyir snyigs ma dag ces bya'o /  / gnyis kyis ni go rims bzhin du srog dang yo byad rgud par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāṃ kuśalapakṣavīpattiḥ /<br/> kāmasukhallikā'tmaklamathānuyogādhikārāt gṛhipravrajitapakṣayorvā /<br/> ekenātmabhāvavīpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis kyis ni 'dod pa'i bsod nyams dang bdag ngal ba la sogs pa'am / yang na khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'i phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas dge ba'i phyogs rkud par byed do / gcig gis ni lus rgud par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pramāṇarūpārogyabalavṛddhismṛtivīryadhairyabhraṃsāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bong tshod dang gzugs dang nad med pa dang stobs dang blo dang dran pa dang brtson 'grus dang brtan pa nyams pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha pratyekabuddhānāṃ kasmin kāle utpādaḥ /<br/> dvayoḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ /<br/> utkarṣe'yapakarṣe'pi /<br/> dvividhā hi pratyekabuddhā vargacāriṇaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dus gang du 'byung zhe na / rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyi ga la / yar skye ba la yang 'byung / mar 'grib pa na yang 'byung ngo / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rnam pa gnyis te / tshogs shing spyod pa rnams dang bse ru lta bu rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vargacāriṇaḥ śrāvakapūrviṇaḥ pratyekajinā ucyante /<br/> pṛthagjanapūrviṇo'pi santītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la tshogs shing spyod pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi rigs su gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rang rgyal ba rnams zhes bya'o / gzhan dag na re so so'i skye bo sngon du 'gro ba dag kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye'nyatrotpāditanirvedhabhāgīyā iha svayaṃ mārgamabhisaṃbudhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gzhan du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams bskyed pa tshe 'di la bdag nyid kyis lam mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā iti /<br/> nacāryāḥ santaḥ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyeran
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du re zhig ri la dka' thub can lnga brgya zhig dka' thub drag po dag gis gdung bar byas pa na rang sangs rgyas dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa'i spre'u zhig dang phrad nas de'i spyod lam bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du grag go zhes sngon gyi gtam 'don par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpāḥ punarekavihāriṇaḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa dag cig yin na ni dka' thub drag po dag gis gdung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe'o / bse ru lta bu rnams ni re re gnas pa dag yin no / rang sangs rgyas de dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khaḍgaḥ kalpaśatānvayaḥ /<br/> mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bse ru bskal pa brgya'i rgyus bskal pa chen po brgyar byang chub kyi tshogs dag la spyod pas bse ru lta bur 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vinopadeśenātmānamekaṃ pratibudhā iti pratyekabuddhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung med par bdag gcig pu'i phyir sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hyekamātmānaṃ damayanti nānyān /<br/> kiṃ punaratra kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni bdag nyid 'dul bar byed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no / 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tāvadaśaktā dharmaṃ deśayituṃ pratisaṃvitprāptatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i phyir chos ston par mi spyod pa yang ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum /<br/> nāpi niṣkaruṇāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa rjes su dran nas yang chos ston par spyod do / thugs rje med par yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvānugrahārthamṛddherāviṣkaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpi sattvānāmabhavyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i phyir yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi laukikamārga vītarāgāḥ saṃvidyante /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> pūrvābhyāsavaśenālpotsukatā'dhimuktatvāt notsahante gambhīradharmagrahaṇāya pareṣāṃ vyāpartum /<br/> anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba dag kyang yod do / 'o na ji lta zhe na / sngon goms pa'i dbang gis bsod snyoms la mos pa'i phyir sems can rnams chos zab mo 'dzin du 'jug pa'i don du byed par mi spro ste / skye dgu rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba rnams ni rgyun phyogs las bzlog par bkri bar dka'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gaṇaparikarṣaṇaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ ca vyākṣepasaṃsargabhīrutvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par gyeng ba dang 'du 'dzis skrag pas 'khor yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba spang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha cakravarttinaḥ kadotpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor los sgyur ba rnams nam 'byung zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakravartisamutpattirnādho'śītisahasrakāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba ni / stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amite cāyuṣi manuṣyāṇāṃ yāvadaśītisahasrake cotpattiścakravarttināṃ nādhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa nas brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams 'byung ngo / 'og tu ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāḥ sasyasaṃpadastadūnāyuṣāmabhājanatvāt /<br/> rājyaṃ cakreṇa vartayituṃ śīlameṣāmiti cakravarttinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bas thung ba'i tshe ni phun sum tshogs pa de'i snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro / de dag ni rgyal srid 'khor los sgyur ba'i dang tshul can yin pas 'khor los sgyur ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punaścaturvidhāḥ /<br/> suvarṇarūpyatāmrāyaścakriṇaḥ /<br/> suvarṇarūpyatāmrāyaścakrkāṇi yeṣāṃ santi /<br/> prathama eṣāmuttamo dvitīya upottamaḥ tṛtīyo madhyamaścaturtho 'dhamaḥ /<br/> te 'dharakramāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang rnam pa bzhi ste / gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can / gang dag la gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags kyi 'khor lo dag yod pa ste / de dag gi dang po ni mchog yin no / gnyis pa ni nye ba'i mchog yin no / gsum pa ni 'bring yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekadvitricaturdvīpāḥ /<br/> yasyāyasaṃ cakraṃ sa ekadvīpādhipatiḥ /<br/> yasya tāmramayaṃ sa dvayoḥ /<br/> yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa trayāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni tha ma'o / de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang / gsum dang bzhi la mas rim bzhin / gang la lcags kyi 'khor lo yod pa de ni gling gcig gi bdag po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya suvarṇmayaṃ sa caturdvīpādhipatiḥ /<br/> eṣa prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la zangs kyi yod pa de ni gnyis kyi'o / gang la dngul gyi yod pa de ni gsum gyi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre tu pradhānagrahaṇādekameva sauvarṇaṃ cakram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la gser gyi yod pa de ni gling bzhi la dbang ba yin te / 'di ni btags pa las bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadaīva poṣadhe pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopoṣadho poṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ sa rājā bhavati cakravartīti /<br/> evaṃ caite cakravartina utpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni gtso bo smos pa'i phyir rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang zhig tshes bco lnga la gso sbyong gi dus de kho nar mgo bkrus gso sbyong bsten nas khang bzangs kyi thog tu blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba la shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong pa / lte ba dang bcas pa / mu khyud dang bcas pa / rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa / mdzes pa / mkhan bzos ma byas pa / lha rdzas thams cad gser gyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ba'i rgyal po yin no zhes gser gyi 'khor lo gcig kho nar gsungs so / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag ni 'di ltar 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca dvau saha buddhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra ukta masthānamanavakāśo yadapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatāvarhantau samyaksaṃbuddhau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate sthānametadvidyate yadaikastathāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de / 'di ni gnas med kyi / gcig gang yin pa de ni gnas yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tathāgata evaṃ cakravarttināviti /<br/> idamatra saṃpradhāryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin gshegs pa dag ji lta bar 'khor los sgyur ba dag kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs so / 'dir ni 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturloka iṣṭa utāho sarvalokadhātava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'dir stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jig rten du 'dod dam / 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānyatra buddhā utpadyante ityeke /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re gzhan du sangs rgyas dag mi 'byung ngo / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mā bhūt bhagavataḥ śaktivyāghātaḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu thogs pa yod par 'gyur du 'ong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eka eva hi bhagavān sarvatra śaktaḥ /<br/> yatra buddha eko na śaktaḥ syād vineyān vinetuṃ tatrā'nyo'pi na śakta iti /<br/> uktaṃ ca sūtre sa cettvāṃ śāriputra kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet asti kaścidetarhi śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamaḥ śramaṇena gotamena yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /<br/> evaṃ ca pṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ vyākuryāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das gcig kho nas thams cad du yang spyod do / gang du bcom ldan 'das gcig gis gdul bya rnams gdul bar mi spyod pa de ni gzhan gyis kyang mi spyod do / mdo las kyang / sh'a ri'i bu gal te la la zhig khyod kyi thang du 'ongs nas 'di skad du / da ltar dge slong ngam / bram ze gang yang rung / dge sbyong goo ta ma dang 'di lta ste / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la mnyam zhing mnyam pa 'ga' zhig yod dam zhes 'dri bar 'gyur na / de skad du dris na ji skad du lan gdab
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cenmāṃ bhadanta kaścidupasaṃkramyevaṃ pṛcchettasyāhaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryā nāsti kaścidetarhhi śṛamaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamo bhagavatā yadutābhisaṃbodhāya /<br/> tatkasya hetoḥ /<br/> saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītaṃ asthānamanavakāso yadapūrvācaramau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcun pa gal te la la zhig bdag gi thad du mchis nas 'di skad du 'dri bar 'gyur na / de la bdag gis 'di skad ces da ltar dge slong ngam / bram ze yang rung / bcom ldan 'das dang mnyam zhing mnyam pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes dris pa'i lan gdab bar bgyi'o / btsun pa de ci'i slad du zhe na / gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de / 'di ni gnas med do zhes bcom ldan 'das las thos shing mngon sum du bzung ba'i slad du'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ brahmasūtre yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko vaśe me'tra vartata iti /<br/> ābhiprāyika eṣa nirdeśaḥ /<br/> ko'trābhiprāyaḥ tāvato'nabhisaṃskāreṇa vyavalokanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i mdo las / nga ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar 'di la dbang bsgyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang zhe na / bstan pa 'di ni dgongs pa can yin no / 'di la dgongs pa gang yin zhe na / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar de srid du rnam par gzigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhisaṃskārena tvananto buddhānāṃ cakṣurviṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par 'du mdzad na ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan gyi yul mtha' yas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santyevānyalokadhātuṣu buddhā iti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> bahavo hi samaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan dag na re 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs so / ci'i phyir zhe na / mang po zhig mnyam du tshogs dag la zhugs par snang la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caikatra bahūnāṃ buddhānāṃ yugapat yoga utpattuṃ na cāsti tadut pattau kakścit pratibandhaḥ iti niyataṃ lokadhātvantareṣūtpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig tu sangs rgyas mang po zhig cig car 'byung bar yang mi rung la / 'byung ba la bgegs byed pa 'ga' yang med pas gdon mi za bar 'jig rten gzhan dag tu 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anantā lokadhātava iti na śakyaṃ bhagavatā kalpamapyāyurvirbhratā yitheha tathā'nyeṣvapi ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu vyāpartuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣāyuṣam /<br/> kathaṃ ceha buddho vyāpriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang mtha' yas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe bskal par bzhugs kyang / 'dir ji lta bar mtha' yas pa gzhan dag tu mdzad par mi spyod na mi'i tshes lta smos kyang ci dgos / 'dir bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mdzad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asya pudgalasyedamindriyam iyatā kālelāmuṣmin deśe amuṃ pudgalamāgamyāsya doṣasya parihārādasyāṅgasyopasaṃhārādanena prayogeṇānutpannaṃ votpatsyate aparipūrṇaṃ vā paripūrayiṣyatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag 'di'i dbang po 'di ni dus 'di srid kyis yul che ge mo zhig tu gang 'di la brten nas nyes pa 'di yongs su spangs shing yan lag 'di nye bar bsgrubs pa'i phyir sbyor ba 'dis nam skyes pa ni skye bar 'gyur ro / ma rdzogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen pa lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattvidaṃ sūtramatropanīta masthānamanavakāśo yadpūrvācaramau dvī tathāgatāvekatra loka utpadyeyātāmiti tadevedaṃ saṃpradhāryate kimidamekaṃ lokadhātumadhikṛtyoktamāhosvit sarvāniti /<br/> cakravartino'pi cāsya lokaddhātau na syādutpādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la khungs su gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di phyung ba gang yin pa de nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa zhig gam / 'on te thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa zhig ces dpyad par bya'o / 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahotpattipratiṣedhāt buddhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung ba bkag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaitat kṣamyate idaṃ tu kasmānna kṣamyate puṇyastu buddhānāṃ loka utpāda iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te bzod na ni sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni bsod nams kyi gzhi yin pas 'di yang ci'i phyir mi bzod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi bahūnāṃ bahuṣu syānna doṣaḥ syāt /<br/> bhūyasāṃ lokānāmabhyudayena yogaḥ syānniḥśreyasena ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mang po zhig tu phal po che zhig 'byung bar gyur na yang skyon du mi 'gyur gyi 'jig rten phal cher mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṅkasminnapi kasmāt dvau tathāgatau na sahotpadyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gcig tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis ci'i phyir 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayojanābhāvāt praṇidhānavaśācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang smon lam gyi dbang gis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti aho vatāhamandhe loke 'pariṇāyake buddho loka utpadyeyamanāthānāṃ nātha iti /<br/> ādarābhitvarārthaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di skad du kye ma bdag ni 'dren pa med pa ldongs pa'i 'jig rten du mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du sangs rgyas su 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par byed do / gus pa dang rings par bya ba'i yang phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasminhi buddhe sutarāmādriyante durlabha īdṛśo'nya iti manyamānāḥ sutarāṃ cābhitvarante śāsanapratipattau mā'smin gate parinirvṛte vā 'nāthā bhūmeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas gcig la ni shin tu yang gus par 'gyur la / 'di lta bu gzhan la ni rnyed par dka'o snyam du sems pa ni 'di gshegs sam yongs su mya ngan las 'das na mgon med par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bstan pa bsgrub pa la shin tu rings par yang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaite cakravartinaḥ suvarṇādimayaiścakraiḥ pṛthivīṃ jayantaḥ kathaṃ jayanti /<br/> yathākramaṃ /<br/> pratyudyānasvayaṃyāna kalahāstrajitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang 'khor lo ma sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag gser la sogs pa'i 'khor lo dag gis sa las rgyal bar byed pa na ji ltar rgyal par byed ce na / go rims bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya sauvarṇa cakraṃ bhavati taṃ koṭarājānaḥ svayaṃ pratyudgacchanti /<br/> ime devasya janapadāḥ ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca /<br/> tān devaḥ samanuśāstu /<br/> vayaṃ devasyānuyātrikā bhaviṣyāma iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phas bsu rang 'gro gyul bshams dang / mtshon brtsams pas rgyal / gang la gser gyi 'khor lo yod pa de la ni khams kyi rgyal phran rnams 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang gang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi phal po ches bltams pa'i ljongs 'di dag ni lha'i lags kyi lhas de dag rjes su bstan du gsol / bdag cag ni lha'i zham 'bring 'tshal lo zhes phas bsu bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa svayameva teṣāmantikaṃ yāti paścādasya prahvībhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la dngul gyi 'khor lo yod pa de la ni bdag nyid de dag gi thad du 'gro ste / phyis 'dud par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya tāmramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gatvā kalahāyate paścāt prahvībhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la zangs kyi 'khor lo yod pa de ni de dag gi thad du song nas gyul shom par byed de / phyis 'dud par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya śastramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gacchati anyonyaṃ śastrāṇyāvahanti paścānnamanti /<br/> sarve tu cakravartinaḥ /<br/> avadhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la lcags kyi 'khor lo yod pa de ni de dag gi thad du song nas phan tshun mtshon brtsams pa las phyis 'dud par byed do / 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śastreṇāpi jayatāṃ badho na pravartate nirjitya ca sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod pa med / mtshon chas rgyal yang gsod du mi 'jug go / rgyal nas yang sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la 'jog par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva te niyataṃ deveṣūtpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi phyir de dag ni nges par lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ rājñaścakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag 'jig rten du byung bas 'jig rten du rin po che sna bdun po 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasyeti /<br/> kathaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātā hastyādayaḥ parakīyeṇa karmaṇotpadyante /<br/> na vai kaścit parakīyeṇotpadyate /<br/> yena tu sattvena tatsaṃbandha saṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ tasminnutpanne svānyevainaṃ karmāṇyutpādayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor lo rin po che dang glang po rin po che dang rta rin po che dang nor bu rin po che dang bud med rin po che dang khyim bdag rin po che dang blon po rin po che 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ji ltar na sems can zhes bya ba glang po che la sogs pa gzhan gyi las kyi sa 'byung zhe na / gzhan gyi las kho nas 'byung ba ni ma yin gyi / sems can gang dag gis de dang 'brel par 'gyur ba'i las brtsams pa de ni de byung na rang gi las de dag kho nas skyed par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimeṣa evānyarājabhyaścakravartināṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> anyo'pi viśeṣo'sti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'khor los sgyur ba rnams rgyal po gzhan dag las khyad par de kho na yod dam zhe na / khyad par gzhan yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyeṣāṃ bhavanti tadyathā buddhānām /<br/> tatra tu /<br/> deśasthottaptapūrṇatvairlakṣaṇātiśayo muneḥ /<br/> deśasthatarāṇi buddhānāṃ lakṣaṇāni /<br/> uttaptatarāṇi saṃpūrṇatarāṇi cetyeṣa teṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> kiṃ khalu prāthamakalpikā api manuṣyāḥ sarājakā āsan /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> prāgāsannupivat sattvāḥ /<br/> prathamakalpikā manuṣyā rūpāvacarā ivāsan /<br/> sūtra uktaṃ te bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā āvikalā ahīnendriyāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃ prabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣaḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantīti /<br/> rasarāgāttataḥ śanaiḥ /<br/> ālasyātsamnidhim kṛtvā sāgrahaiḥ kṣetrapo bhṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang yod de / dper na sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhin no / de la / thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang / gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan ni shin tu yul la gnas pa dang shin tu gsal ba dang shin tu kun rdzogs pa dag yin pas de dag gi khyad par ni de yin no / yang ci bskal ba dang po pa'i mi rnams kyang rgyal po dang bcas par gyur tam zhe na / smras pa ma yin no /  / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin / bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams ni gzugs na spyod pa bzhin du 'gyur te / mdo las / de dag ni gzugs dang ldan pa / yid las byung ba / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa / ngan pa ma yin pa / mdzes pa / kha dog la gnas pa / rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / dga' ba za zhing zas su dga' ba za ba / tshe ring ba / yun ring por gnas pa yin no zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ tathābhūtānāṃ bhūmirasaḥ prādurbhūto madhusvādurasaḥ /<br/> tasyānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ sattvo gandhaṃ ghrātvā rasaṃ svāditavān bhakṣitavāṃśca /<br/> tathā'nye'pi sattvāstathaivākārṣuḥ /<br/> sa ārambhaḥ kavaḍīkārāhārasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas rim gyis ro la chags / le los gsog 'jog byas nas ni / 'dzin chags rnams kyis zhing dpon btab / de bzhin du 'byung ba de dag las sa'i ro sbrang rtsi'i ro bro ba zhig byung ba dang sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis de'i dri bsnams nas ro myangs shing zos so / de nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du byed par 'gyur te / kham gyi zas za ba'i rtsom pa ni de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ tadāhārābhyāsāt kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ ca kāye'vakrāntaṃ prabhāvā antarhitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag zas de la goms pa'i phyir lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid ni zhugs / 'od ni nub par gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato'ndhakāra utpanne sūryācandramasau prādurbhūtau /<br/> so'pyeṣāṃ bhūmirasa āsvādagṛddhānāṃ krameṇāntarhito bhūmiparpaṭakaṃ prādurbhūtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu mun pa 'byung ba dang nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang byung bar gyur / ro la chags pa de dag las sa'i ro de yang rim gyis nub nas sa zhag cig byung bar gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpi gṛddhāstadapyantarhitam /<br/> vanalatā prādurbhūtā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yang chags par gyur pa dang de yang nub nas myug gu'i tshal zhig byung bar gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpi gṛddhāḥ sā'pyantarhitā /<br/> akṛṣṭoptaḥ śālirutpannastaṃ prabhuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yang chags par gyur pa dang de yang nub nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu zhig byung bar gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyedānīmaudārikatvānniḥsyandanirvāhārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mūtrapurīṣamārgau saha strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ prādurbhūtau saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe de zos pa dang de ni ches rags pa yin pa'i phyir na rgyu mthun pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi gcin dang phyi sa'i lam dang pho mo'i dbang po dang bcas pa dang dbyibs tha dad pa yang byung bar gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmanyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśādayoniśomanaskāragrāhagrāsatāṃ gatānāṃ kāmarāga udīrṇo yato vipratipannāḥ /<br/> eṣa ārambhaḥ kāmināṃ kāmabhūtagrahāveśasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag phan tshun mthong ba dang sngon goms pa'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa chu srin 'dzin khri'i kham du gyur pa rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags shas cher skyes nas de nas log par zhugs pa yin te / 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i 'byung po'i gdon gyis rlom pa'i rtsom pa ni de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca khalu taṃ śāliṃ sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśārthaṃ prātaśca prātarāśārthaṃ praveśayanti sma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de dag gi 'bras s'a lu de nang bza' bar bya ba de nang len / nub bza' bar bya ba yang nub len pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athānyatamaḥ sattvo'lasajātīyaḥ saṃnidhikāramakārṣīt /<br/> anye'pi ca sattvāḥ saṃnidhikāramakārṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sems can le lo'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsog 'jog byas pa dang sems can gzhan dag kyang gsog 'jog byed par gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ tatra mamakāra utpanne sa śālirlūno lūno na punarjāyate sma /<br/> tataḥ kṣetrāṇi pravibhajya sveṣvāgrahaṃ kṛtvā parakīyaṃ hartumārabdhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag de la bdag tu 'dzin pa skyes pa dang 'bras bu de brngas shing brngas pa dang yang mi skye bar gyur to / de nas zhing rnams bgos te de bdag gis ni kun tu bzung nas gzhan gyi la ni dbrog par rtsom ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathama ārambhaścauryasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chom rkun gyi rtsom pa dang po ni de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taisteṣāmaṅkuśārthaṃ sametyānyatamaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ kṣetrāṇi pālayituṃ ṣaṣṭhabhāgena bhṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis de dag dgag pa'i phyir 'dus nas mi'i khyad par gang yang rung ba zhig zhing rnams srung bar drug shas bstabs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya kṣetrāṇāmadhipatiḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriya iti saṃjñotpannā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la zhing rnams kyi dpon po rgyal rigs rgyal zhes bya ba'i mid byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahājanakāyasya saṃmataḥ prajāṃ ca rañjayatīti mahāsaṃmato rājeti samjñotpannā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches bkur ba dang skye dgu yang dga' bar byed pas rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa ārambho rājaparaṃparāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyal po gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rtsom pa ni de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra ye gṛhebhyo vahirmanasaḥ saṃvṛttāsteṣāṃ brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñotpannā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la gang dag khyim dag nas yid phyir phyogs pa de dag la ni bram ze zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athānyatamasya rājño lobhāt samvibhāgamakurvantaḥ sattvānāṃ tāskaryaṃ prācuryamāpannaṃ sa tān śastreṇopasaṃkramate sma
