</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas gang yang rung ba'i rgyal po zhig gis chags pas sems can rnams la ma bgos pa dang rkun po mang du gyur te / de dag la mtshon gyis 'debs par gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas gzhan dag na re yang bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyis pa ma mchis so zhes brdzun du smra bar brtsams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ karmapathādhikyādapahrāse daśāyuṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas las kyi lam lhag pas / tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na de ltar las kyi lam rnams 'phel ba dang mi rnams kyi tshe khad kyis thung ngur gyur te / tha mar mi tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca /<br/> daśavaṛṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmantarakalpasya niryaṇaṃ bhavati /<br/> kathaṃ bhavatītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir phung khrol gyi chu bo 'di mtha' dag gi rtsa ba'i skye gnas ni chos gnyis te / ro la chags pa dang le lo'o / mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu pan bar gyi bskal ba tshar phyin pa yin no / ji ltar yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kalpasya śastrarogābhyāṃ durbhikṣeṇa ca nirgamaḥ /<br/> tribhirantarakalpasya niryāṇaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni / mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to / bar gyi bskal pa ni mtshon dang nad dang mu ge dang gsum gyis tshar phyin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śastreṇa rogeṇa durbhikṣeṇa ca /<br/> antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar gyi bskal pa tshar phyin pa'i tshe mi rnams tshe lo bcu pa dang chos ma yin pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa dang ya nga ba la chags pas zil gyis non pa dang log pa'i chos kyis kun nas dkris par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ vadhakacittaṃ ca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis gnod sems yongs su skye bar 'gyur ba na sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na dper na da ltar ri dags kyi rngon pas dgon pa'i ri dgas mthong ba bzhin du gnod pa mi bzang pa'i sems gnod pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati /<br/> te'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanti /<br/> punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti /<br/> teṣāmasādhyā vyādhyādayaḥ prādurbhavanti yato mriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis shing ngam thong ba yang rung gang dang gang blangs pa de dag gi mtshon cha rnon po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de dag gcig la gcig srog gcod par byed do / yang mi tshe lo bcu ba rnams la bar gyi bskal pa tshar phyin pa'i tshe nyes pa dag nyid kyis mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yams kyi nad dag gtong bar byed do / de dag la gang las 'chi bar 'gyur zhing gsor mi rung ba'i nad dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ /<br/> kathaṃ ca cañcaḥ /<br/> dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām /<br/> ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate /<br/> samudgo'pi cañcaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang mi tshe lo bcu pa rnams la nyes pa dag nyid kyis lhas char pa mi 'bebs te / des na mu ge gab tse zhes bya ba dang / rus gong dkar po zhes bya ba dang thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro / ji ltar gab tse yin zhe na / rgyu gnyis kyis yin te / deng sang 'du ba gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe gab tse zhes bya ba / gab tshe la yang gab tshe zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca manuṣyā jighatsādaurbalyaparītāḥ sametya kālaṃ kurvanti samudreṣu cānāgatajanatā'nugrahārthaṃ bījānyavasthāpayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bkres pa dang nyam chung bas bkres pa'i mi dag 'du zhing 'dus nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir gab tse dag gi nang du sa bon dag 'jog par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastaddurbhikṣaṃ cañcamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir mu ge de ni gab tshe zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ śvetāsthi /<br/> dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na rus gong dkar po yin zhe na / rgyu gnyis kyis yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti /<br/> kathaṃ śalākāvṛttiḥ /<br/> dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus skams shing rtsub po de dag shi ba dang myur ba kho na rus pa dkar por gyur pa dang bkres pas nyen pa de rnams kyi rus gong dkar po de dag bsdus te bskol nas 'thung bar byed pa'o / ji ltar na thur mas 'tsho ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya bahulodakena kvāthayitvā pivanti /<br/> evaṃ varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gnyis kyis yin te / sems can de dag thur mas bsgo bas khyim dag tu de ring ni khyim bdag za ba'i res la bab bo / sang ni khyim bdag mo zhes bya de lta bu la sogs pas zas 'gyed par byed pa dang 'bru'i gnas kyi gseb dag nas 'bru dag thur mas brus te / chu mang por bskol nas bskol ba de 'thung bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du gang gis nyi ma 'ga' zhig srog gcod pa spangs pa legs par bsrungs ba dang dge 'dun la aa ru ra 'ga' dang bsod snyoms 'ga' zhig gus par byas te / phul ba de ni mtshon dang nad dang mu ge dang bar gyi bskal pa de dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sems can de dag la mtshon gyis gsod pa dang nad dang mu ge dag dus ji srid du 'du zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam /<br/> śastrakaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ sapta divasān bhavati /<br/> rogaḥ sapta māsāṃśca divasāṃśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhag rnams dang ni zla ba dang / lo bdun dag tu go rims bzhin / mtshon chas gsod pa zhag bdun du 'byung ngo / nad ni zla ba bdun dang zhag bdun du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ /<br/> tadā ca dvayordvīpayosteṣāṃ pratirūpakāṇi bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu ge ni lo bdun dang zla ba bdun dang zhag bdun du'o / dang zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to / de'i tshe na gling gnyis su ni de dag dang 'dra ba dag 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca /<br/> yaduktamevamanyasyāmapi saṃvartanyāṃ veditavyam yathāyogamiti /<br/> atha katīmāḥ saṃvartanyaḥ /<br/> saṃvartanyaḥ punastisro bhavantyagnyambuvāyubhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod sems lhag par 'gyur ba yin / kha dog dan pa dang nyam chung ba dang bkres pa dang skom par 'gyur ba yin no / de bzhin du 'jig pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par bya'o zhes gang bshad pa 'jug pa de dag du zhe na / me dang chu dang rlung dag gis / 'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe sems can rnams bsam gtan gcig tu 'du bas na 'jig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi ma bdun gyis ni mes 'jig pa yin no / char gyi chus ni chus 'jig pa'o / rlung rab tu 'khrugs pas ni rlung gis 'jig pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhiśca bhājanānāṃ sukṣmo'pyavayavo nāvaśiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis ni snod rnams kyi cha shas phra mo yang mi lus par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra tu kecitīrthaṅkarā icchanti /<br/> paramāṇavo nityāste tadānīṃ śiṣyanta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la mu stegs byed kha cig ni rdul phra rab rnams ni rtag pa yin pas de'i tshe de dag lus so zhes bya bar 'dod do / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmātta evamicchanti /<br/> mā bhūdabījakaḥ sthūlānāṃ prādurbhāva iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ci'i phyir de ltar 'dod ce na / rags pa rnams rgyu med pa can du 'byung bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams kyi las las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag can gyis rlung gis khon yin no zhes ma bshad dam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvartanīśīrṣavāyurvātasya nimittaṃ bhaviṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'jig pa'i rlung gi rtse mo ni de'i phyir rgyu yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ston pa'i sde'i mdo las ni rlung gis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas sa bon dag khyer te 'ong ngo zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapi na te bījādibhyo'ṅkurādīnāmutpattimicchanti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> svebhya evāvayavebhyasteṣāmapi svebhyaḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvat paramāṇubhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar yin yang de dag sa bon la sogs pa las myu gu la sogs pa skye bar ni mi 'dod do / 'o na ji zhe na / rang gi yan lag dag kho na las skye ba la / de dag kyang rang gi kho na dag las skye ste / rdul phra rab dag las skye ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidaṃ bījādīnāmaṅkurādiṣu sāmarthyam /<br/> na kiñcidanyatra tatparamāṇūpasarpaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni myu gu la sogs pa dag las sa bon la sogs pa'i nus pa ci zhig yod ce na / de'i rdal phra rab rnams phrad pa las ma gtogs par cung zad kyang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ ta evamicchanti /<br/> nahi vijātīyātsaṃbhavo yukta iti /<br/> kasmānna yuktaḥ /<br/> aniyamo hi syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir de dag de ltar 'dod ce na / rigs mi mthun pa las skye bar ni rigs pa ma yin no snyam mo / ci'i phyir mi rigs she na / nges pa med par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaktiniyamānnaivaṃ bhaviṣyati /<br/> śabdapākajotpattivat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nus pa med pa'i phyir de ltar mi 'gyur te / sgra dang chos byed las skye bar 'byung ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yon tan gyi chos ni sna tshogs yin gyi rdzas kyi chos ni de ltam yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti /<br/> idamayuktaṃ vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs mthun pa dag kho na las rigs mthun pa rnams 'byung ba mthong ste / dper na 'jag ma dge bas re lde dang skud pa dag las ras yug 'byung ba bzhin no / 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatrāyuktam yadasiddhaṃ sādhanāyodāhriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la mi rigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na / gang ma grub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dper brjod pa ma grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatrāsiddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'di la ci zhig ma grub ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyo vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭo'nyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti /<br/> ta eva hi te yathāsaṃniviṣṭāstāṃ tāṃ saṃjñāṃ labhnte /<br/> pipīlikāpaṅktivat /<br/> kathaṃ gamyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jag ma dag las re lde gzhan pa dang skud pa dag las ras yug gzhan zhes bya ba ma yin te / de dag dang de dag kho na de ltar gnas pa la de dang de'i ming thob ste / grog sa'i phreng ba bzhin no / ji ltar khong du chud ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekatantusaṃyoge paṭasyānupalambhāt /<br/> ko hi tadā sataḥ paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skud pa gcig dang ldan na ras yug mi dmigs pa'i phyir te / de'i tshe ras yug yod na ni dmigs par bya ba la su zhig bgegs byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akṛtsnavṛttau paṭabhāgo'tra syānna paṭaḥ /<br/> samūhamātraṃ ca paṭaḥ syāt /<br/> kaśca tantubhyo'nyaḥ paṭabhāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad par yod pa ma yin na ni de la ras yug gi cha yod kyi ras yug ni ma yin pas 'dus pa tsam ras yug yin no / skud pa dag las gzhan la ras yug gi cha yang gang zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anekā śrayasaṃyogāpekṣaṇe daśāmātrasaṃyoge paṭopalabdhiḥ syānna vā kadācit
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten du ma zhig dang ldan pa la ltos na ni kha tshar mthong ba tsam dang ldan na ras yug dmigs par 'gyur ro / yang na nam yang mi dmigs par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhyaparabhāgānāmindriyeṇāsaṃnikarṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbus dang pha rol gyi cha rnams dbang po dang ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kramasaṃnikarṣe cāvayavānāṃ cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāmavayavavijñānaṃ na syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang reg pa dag rim gyis yan lag rnams dang phrad na yang yan lag can ni shes par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātkrameṇa saṃnikarṣādavayavivyavasāyādavayaveṣveva tadbuddhiralātacakravat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rim gyis yan lag can shes pa'i phyir yan lag dag kho na la de'i blo skye bar zad de / mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhinnarūpajātikriyeṣu tantuṣu paṭasya rūpādyasaṃbhavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang rigs dang bya ba tha dad pa'i skud pa dag las ras yug gi gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i yang phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">citrarūpāditve vijātīyārambho'pi syāt acitre ca pārśvāntare paṭasyādarśanaṃ citradarśanaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs pa yin na ni rigs mi mthun pa rtsom par yang 'gyur ro / ngos cig shos mi bkra na yang ras yug mi mthong ba 'am / khra bo'i ngo bor mthong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kriyā'pi citretyaticitram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba yang sna tshogs pa yin pas shin tu sna tshogs pa yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāpaprakāśabhede vā'gniprabhāyā ādimadhyānte tadrūpasparśayoranupapattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me'i 'od kyi tsha ba dang snang ba dang po dang bar ma dang tha ma dag tu tha dad pas de'i gzugs dang reg bya dag kyang mi 'thad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramāṇvatīndriyatve'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ yathā teṣāṃ kāryārambhakatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ ca taimirikāṇāṃ ca vikīrṇakeśopalabdhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin pa yang 'dus pa dag ni mngon sum nyid yin te / dper na de dag gi 'bras bu rtsom pa dang mig la sogs pa 'bras bu rtsom pa dang / rab rib can rnams la skra gram pa'i tshogs dmigs pa lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ paramāṇuvadekaḥ deśo'tīndriyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skra nyag ma gcig ni rdul phra rab bzhin du de dag gi dbang po'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpādiṣveva ca paramāṇusaṃjñāniveśā ttadvināśe siddhaḥ paramāṇuvināśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la sogs pa dag kho na la rdul phra rab kyi ming du 'dogs pa'i phyir de zhig na rdul phra rab kyang zhig par grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dravyaṃ hi paramāṇuranyacca rūpādibhyo dravyamiti na teṣaṃ vināśe tadvināśaḥ siddhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdul phra rab ni rdzas yin la rdzas kyang gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan yin pas zhig na de dag zhig par ma 'grub bo zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayuktamasyānyatvaṃ yāvatā na nirdhāryate kenacit imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi ima eṣāṃ rūpādaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gzhan pa nyid yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te / 'di lta bur sus kyang 'di dag ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca prajñāyante dagdheṣu corṇākarpāsakusumbhakuṅkumādiṣu tadbuddhyabhāvādrūpādibhedeṣveva tadbuddhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni de dag gi gzugs la sogs pa yin no zhes nges par mi zin la / mig dang reg pa'i gzung ba dag yin par yang dam bca'o / bal dang ras bal dang le brgan rtsi dang gur gum tshig pa dag la de dag gi blo med pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa kho na la de'i blo 'jug par zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pākajotpattau ghaṭaparijñanaṃ saṃsthānasāmānyāt paṅktivat /<br/> cihnamapaśyataḥ parijñānābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos byed las skye ba byung ba la bum par yongs su shes pa ni dbyibs 'dra ba'i phyir phreng ba bzhin te / rtags ma mthong bar yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko vā bālapralāpeṣvādaraḥ iti tiṣṭhatu tāvadevāpratiṣedhaḥ /<br/> atha kasyāḥ saṃvartanyāḥ katamacchīrṣa bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na byis ba blo rdol ba lta bu dag las su zhig gus par 'gyur te / de dag dgag pa ni re zhig bzhag go / yang 'jig pa de dag gi rtse mo gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānatrayaṃ dvitīyādi śīrṣa tāsām yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis sogs gsum po ni / de dag gi rtse go rims bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi saṃvartanīśīrṣāṇi /<br/> tejaḥsaṃvartanyā dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho dahyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig pa'i rtse mo gsum la mes 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni bsam gtan gnyis pa yin te / de man chad sreg par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apsaṃvartanyāstṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣa bhavatyadhaḥ klidyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chus 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni bsam gtan gsum pa yin te / man chad srul bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyusaṃvarttanyāścaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho vikīryate /<br/> yaddhi saṃvartanyā upariṣṭāttacchīrṣamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rlung gis 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni bsam gtan bzhi pa yin te / man chad 'thor bar byed do / 'jig pa'i lhag ma gang yin pa de ni / rtse mo zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānāni tejojalavāyubhirdhvasyante /<br/> tadapakṣālasādhamryāt /<br/> pratheme hi dhyāne vitarkavicārā apakṣālāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de'i phyir bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang bsam gtan gsum pa dag me dang chu dang rlung dag gis 'jig ce na / de yi skyon dang chos mthun phyir / bsam gtan dang po na ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag skyon yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca manasaḥ paridāhakatvādagnikalpāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang yid yongs su gdung bar byed pa dag yin pa'i phyir me'i bsal pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīye prītirapakṣālaḥ sā ca prasrabdhiyogenaśrayamṛdūkaraṇādapkalpāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa na ni dga' ba skyon yin te / de yang shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pas lus mnyen par byed pa dag yin pa'i phyir chu'i bskal pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evatasmin kṛtsnakāyakrauryāpagamāt duḥkhendriyasya nirodha uktaḥ sūtre /<br/> tṛtīye dhyāne āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ /<br/> te ca vāyava eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir mdo las / de ni lus kyi mkhrang po zad par med pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi dbang po 'gags so zhes gsungs so / bsam gtan gsum pa la ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iti yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhuta ādhyātmiko'pakṣālastasyām dhyānopapattau tathābhūto bāhya iti /<br/> kasmāt pṛthivīsaṃvartanī na bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da dag kyang rlung kha na yin pas snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gang na nang gi skyon ji lta bar skye ba'i bsam gtan de na phyi rol gyi yang de lta bu yin no / ci'i phyir sas 'jig pa ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthivyeva hi bhājanākhyā tasyāṃ tejojalavāyubhirvirodho na pṛthhivyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snod ces bya ba nis kho na yin la de ni me dang chu dang rlung dag dang mi mthun gyi sa dang ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha caturthadhyāne kathaṃ na saṃvartanī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa ni ji ltar mi 'jig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caturthe'styaniñjanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa na med mi gyo'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthaṃ dhyānamādhyātmikāpakṣālarahitatvādāneñja muktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> ato'tra bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti nāstyatra saṃvartanī /<br/> śuddhāvāsaprabhāvādityapare /<br/> nahi taiḥ śakyamārupyān praveṣṭuṃ nāpyanyatra gantumiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa ni nang gi skyon dang bral ba'i phyir mi gyo ba zhes gsungs te / de'i phyir de'i phyi'i skyon yang mi 'jug pas de na 'jig pa med do / gzhan dag na re gnas gtsang ma'i mthus yin te / de dag gis gzugs med pa dag tu 'jug par yang mi nus la / gzhan du yang 'gro bar mi nus so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nityaṃ tarhi caturthadhyānabhājanaṃ prāpnnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i snod rtag par 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na nityaṃ saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rtag de yi gzhal med khang / sems can bcas te 'byung 'jig phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi caturthaṃ dhyānamekabhūmisaṃbaddham /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa ni sa gzhi gcig tu 'brel pa ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicchinnasthānāntaraṃ tārakāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas gzhan du rnam par chad pa yin te skar ma bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāpyayaṃ sattva upapadyeta cyaveta vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na sems can gang dang gang skye ba'am 'chi 'pho yang rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa sārdhaṃ vimāneneti nāstyasya nityatvam /<br/> kena punaḥ krameṇaitāḥ saṃvartanyo bhavanti /<br/> nirantaraṃ tāvat /<br/> saptāgninā /<br/> sapta saṃvartanyastejasā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gzhal med khang dang bcas te skye zhing 'chi 'pho bas de la rtag pa nyid med do / yang 'jig pa de dag go rims gang gis 'byung zhe na / re zhig par chad med par ni / me yis bdun no / mes 'jig pa bdun 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ /<br/> adbhirekā /<br/> saptānāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāmanantaramadbhiḥ saṃvartanī bhavati /<br/> evaṃ gate'dbhiḥ saptake punaḥ /<br/> tejasā saptakaḥ /<br/> etena krameṇāpsaṃvartanīnāṃ gate saptake punaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ saptako bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu ni / chu yis gcig / mes 'jig pa bdun gyi mjug thogs su chu dag gis 'jig pa 'byung ngo / de ltar chu bdun thal nas kyang / me yis bdun no / rim pa des na chus 'jig pa bdun thal nas yang mes 'jig pa bdun 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścādvāyusaṃvartanī tataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni / mjug tu rlung gis 'jig pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścādekāvāyusaṃvartanī bhavati /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni mjug tu rlung gis 'jig pa gcig 'byung ngo / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathiva hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattiviśeṣādātmabhāvānāṃ sthitiviśeṣastathā bhājanānāmapāmiti tā etā bhavanti ṣaṭpañcāśattejaḥ saṃvartanyaḥ saptāpsaṃvarttanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvarttanī /<br/> evaṃ ca prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ sunītaṃ bhavati catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇamiti /<br/> ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetum teṣāṃ tathāgatohyavadat /<br/> teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇa /<br/> abhidharmakośabhāṣye lokanirdeśo nāma /<br/> tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam samāptamiti /<br/> caturthaṃ kośasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can de dag gi snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las lus dag gnas pa'i khyad par ji lta bar snod rnams kyang de bzhin no / de dag ni mes 'jig pa lnga bcu rtsa drug dang chus 'jig pa bdun dang rlung gis 'jig pa gcig yin te / de ltar bshad nas btags pa'i bshad pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi'i zhes bya ba legs par drangs pa yin no / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">oṃ namo buddhāya /<br/> atha yadetatsattvabhājanalokasya bahudhā vaicitryamukta tat kena kṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa mang po sna tshogs pa bshad pa gang yin pa de sus byas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na khalu kenacidbuddhipūrvakaṃ kṛtam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sattvānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sus kyang blo sngon du btang ste byas pa ni med do / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / sems can rnams kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi karmajaṃ kasmātsattvānāṃ karmabhiḥ kuṅkumacandanādayo ramyatarā jāyante na teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te las las skyes nas ci'i phyir sems can rnams kyi las dag gis gur gum dang / tsan dan la sogs pa ches dga' dga' lta bur skyes par 'gyur la de dag gi lus ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmāṇyeva tānyevañjātīyāti vyābhiśrakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ yadāśrayāśca vraṇabhūtā jāyante bhogāśca ramyāstatpratīkārabhūtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can 'dren mar byed pa rnams kyi las de lta bu dag kho na gang rma lta bur gyur pa'i lus dag dang de'i tshe gnyen por gyur pa longs spyod dga' dga' lta bu dag kyang skye'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyāmiśrakāriṇāṃ tu devānāmubhaye 'pi ramyāḥ /<br/> kiṃ punastatkarmetyāha /<br/> cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha 'dren mar byed pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni gnyi ga yang dga' dga' lta bu dag yin no / las de yang gang zhig ce na / de ni sems pa dang des byas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ dve karmaṇī cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti /<br/> yattaccetayitvā cetanākṛṭaṃ ca tat /<br/> te ete dve karmaṇī trīṇi bhavanti /<br/> kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi /<br/> kathameṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni gnyis te / sems pa dang bsams pa'i las so zhes gang gsungs pa la / bsams pa gang yin pa de ni / sems pas byas pa de yin no / las gnyis po de dag ni gsum yin te / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams so / las 'di dag ji ltar rnam par gzhag ci rten las sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimāśrayataḥ āhosvit svabhāvataḥ samutthānato vā /<br/> āśrayataścedekaṃ kāyakarma prāpnoti /<br/> sarveṣāṃ kāyāśritatvāt svabhāvataścedvākkarmaikaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te ngo bo nyid las sam / 'on te kun nas slong ba las gal te rten las yin na ni thams cad lus la brten pa'i phyir lus kyi las gcig pur 'gyur ro / gal te ngo bo nyid las yin na ni de dag gi las gcig pur 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vacasaḥ karmasvabhāvatvāt /<br/> samutthānataścenmanaskarmaikaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te kun nas slong ba las yin na ni thams cad kyang yid kyi kun nas bslang ba'i phyir yid kyi las gcig pur 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣāṃ manaḥ samutthitatvāt /<br/> yathākramaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaistrayāṇāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> cetanā mānasaṃ karma /<br/> cetanā manaskarme ti veditavyam /<br/> tajjaṃ vākkāyakarmaṇī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rgyu gsum gyis go rims bzhin du gsum rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro / de la / sems pa yid kyi las yin no / sems pa ni yid kyi las yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye /<br/> te tu vijñaptyavijñaptī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des bskyed lus dang ngag gi las / sems las skyes pa gang yin pa bsams pa'i las zhes gsungs pa de dag ni lus dang ngag gi las su rig par bya'o / de dag rnam rig rnam rig min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /<br/> tatra tu /<br/> kāyavijñaptiriṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag gi las de dag ni so sor rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dag tu rig par bya'o / de la'ang / lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃsthānaṃ /<br/> cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /<br/> gatirityapare /<br/> prasyandamānasya hi kāyakarma no 'prasyandamānasyeti /<br/> ta ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi dbang gis lus de dang de ltar gnas pa ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed yin no / gzhan dag na re 'gro ba yin te / lus gyo ba las yin gyi mig gyo ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na gatiryasmātsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la / 'gro min gang phyir 'dus byas ni / skad cig pa yin zhes bya ba brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko 'yaṃ kṣaṇo nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmalābho 'nantravināśī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag nyid du red ma thag tu 'jig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'syāstīti kṣaṇikam /<br/> daṇḍakavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'di la yod pas na skad cig pa ste dbyug pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas thams cad bdag nyid thob pa las phan chad du med pa'i phyir gang du skyes pa de nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāyuktā deśāntarasaṃkrāntiḥ /<br/> tasmānna gatiḥ kāyakarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni yul gzhan du 'pho bar rig pa ma yin te / de lta bas na lus kyi las ni 'gro ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādetadeva yadi sarvasya ṣkṇikatvaṃ sidhyet /<br/> siddhamevaitat viddhi /<br/> kutaḥ /<br/> saṃskṛtasyāvaśyaṃ /<br/> vyayāt /<br/> akasmiko hi bhāvānāṃ vināśaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> kāryasya hi kāraṇaṃ bhavati /<br/> vanāśaścābhāvaḥ /<br/> yaścābhāvastasya kiṃ kartavyam /<br/> so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt /<br/> tathānyathībhūtaḥ /<br/> na yuktaṃ tasyaiva /<br/> nyathātvam /<br/> na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te thams cad skad cig par grub par gyur na ni de de lta yin no / 'di'i grub pa kho nar khong du chud par gyis shig / ga las she na / 'dus byas ni gdon mi za bar 'jig phyir ro / dngos po rnams 'jig pa ni rgyu med pa las byung ba yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / bya ba'i rgyu yin na 'jig pa yang med pa yin pas med pa gang yin pa de la ni ci zhig byar yod / rgyu med pa las byung ba'i 'jig pa de ni dngos po skyed pa tsam la ma yin na phyis kyang mi 'byung ste / dngos po mtshungs pa'i phyir ro / 'on te gzhan du gyur pa yin no zhe na / de nyid gzhan du gyur pa ni rigs pa ma yin te / de nyid de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun par ni mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭo vai kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaḥ /<br/> na ca dṛṣṭādgariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamastīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing la sogs pa dag me dang 'brel pa las 'jig par yang mthong la mthong ba las brling ba'i tshad ma yang med pas thams cad kyi 'jig pa ni rgyu med pa las byung ba ma yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate /<br/> teṣāṃ punaradarśanāt /<br/> saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig khyod shing la sogs pa dag me dang 'brel pa las 'jig par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ji lta bur sems / de yod na de dag la yang mi snang ba'i phyir ro / re zhig 'di dpyad par bya ste / ci me dang 'brel ba las shing la sogs pa zhig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante /<br/> yathā vāyusaṃyogātpradīpaḥ pāṇisaṃyogādghaṇṭāśabda iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir mi snang ba zhig yin nam / 'on te rang nyid zhig la gzhan dag kyang ma skyes pas de'i phyir mi snang ste dper na rlung dang phrad pa las mar me dang lag pa dang phrad pa las dril bu'i sgra lta bu zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādanumānasādhyo 'yamarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na don 'di ni rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaratrānumānam /<br/> uktaṃ tāvat akāryatvādabhāvasyeti /<br/> punaḥ /<br/> na kasyacidahetoḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la rjes su dpag pa gang zhe na / re zhig med pa ni bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes ni bshad zin to / yang na / rgyu med pa las 'ga' mi 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi vināśo hetusāmānyānna kasyacidahetukaḥ syādutpādavat /<br/> kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'jig pa rgyu dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur na skye ba bzhin du 'ga' yang rgyu med pa las mi 'gyur ba zhig na skad cig ma blo dang sgra dang me lce dag 'jig pa rgyu med pa las byung ba yang mthong bas 'di rgyu la ltos pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu manyate buddhyantarādbuddhervināśaḥ śabdāntarācchabdasyeti /<br/> tadayuktam /<br/> buddhyorasamavadhānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig blo yang blo gzhan gyis 'jig la sgra yang sgra gzhan gyis 'jig go snyam du sems pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te / blo gnyis phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">the tshom can dang nges pa'i shes pa dag dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dag dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag phrad par ni rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe blo dang sgra gsal ba nyid dag gi mjug thogs su blo dang sgra mi gsal ba 'byung ba de'i che [*tshe?] ji ltar na mi gsal ba rigs mthun pa'i chos kyi gsal ba 'jig par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam /<br/> na hyabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang gnas pa'i rgyu med pa'am / chos dang chos ma yin pa'i dbang gis me lce dag 'jig go snyam du sems pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te / med pa ni rgyu yin par 'os pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu chos dang chos ma yin pa dag kyang skad cig skad cig nyid la 'jug pa thob pa dang bgegs byed par 'os pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu yongs su brtags pa 'di yang 'dus byas thams cad la bya bar nus pas brtsad mi dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau /<br/> hetuḥ syācca vināśakaḥ /<br/> hetureva ca vināśakaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te shing la sogs pa dag 'jig pa me dang 'brel ba'i rgyu las byung ba zhig yin na de lta na ni tshos byed las skyes pa rnams kyi tshos pa dang ches tshos pa dang ches cher tshos pa byung bal / rgyu yang 'jig pa por 'gyur ro / rgyu nyid 'jig pa por 'gyur ba ji lta zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā /<br/> na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me dang 'brel pa gang las tshos byed las skyes pa 'byung ba de nyid dam de dang 'dra ba las tshos pa dang ches tshos pa dang ches cher tshos pa byung na de dag 'jig pas rgyu nyid de dag gi 'jig pa por 'gyur ba'am yang na rgyu bye brag med par 'gyur ro / gang las sam / gang dag 'dra ba las de dag 'byung ba nyid dam / de dang 'dra ba las yang med par 'gyur ba ni rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jvālāntareṣu tāvaddhetubhedakalpanāṃ parikalpeyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig me lce gzhan dag las rgyu tha dad par yongs su brtag par ni bya la reg na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣarahimaśuktasūryodakabhūmisaṃbandhāttu pākajaviśeṣotpattau kāṃ kalpanāṃ kalpayeyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thal ba dang kha ba dang rtsva dang nyi ma dang chu dang sa dang 'brel pa las smin byed las skyes pa'i bye brag byung ba la gang la brtag par bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang chu bskol bzad par 'gyur ba de la me dang 'brel pa dag ci zhig byed ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti /<br/> idamatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthu'i sgo nas me'i khams 'phel bar byed cing de'i mthus na chu'i tshogs nyam chung zhing nyam chung bar 'gyur la shin tu nyam chung ba'i bar du gyur pa dang mjug tu rgyun yang rgyun chags par mi byed de / 'di la me dang 'brel ba dag gis ni 'di byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na dngos po rnams 'jig pa la rgyu ni med kyi rang nyid 'jig pa'i ngang can yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa na byung ba tsam gyis 'jig pa'i phyir 'di dag skad cig ma la 'jig par yang grub la skad cig ma la 'jig pa'i phyir 'gro ba yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gatyabhimānastu deśāntareṣu nirantarotpattau tṛṇajvālāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul gzhan dag tu 'dab chags par 'byung ba las 'gro bar mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed par zad de rtsva'i me bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gatyabhāve ca saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiriti siddham /<br/> nāsti saṃsthānaṃ dravyata iti sautrāntikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba med na lus kyi rnam par rig byed de dbyibs yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / mdo sde pa rnams na re dbyibs ni rdzas su med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs gcig gi sgor kha dog phal cher byung ba la gzugs ring por zhes 'dogs par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tamevāpekṣyālpīyasi hrasvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid la ltos nas nyung ngur byung ba la thung du zhes 'dogs par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturdiśaṃ bhūyasi caturasramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs bzhir mang por byung ba la gru bzhi zhes 'dogs par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatra same vṛttamiti /<br/> evaṃ sarvam /<br/> tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti /<br/> na tu khalu jātyantaramasti saṃsthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad du mnyam pa na lham pa zhes 'dogs par byed de / thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o / dper na mgal me phyogs gzhan gcig tu myur du 'dab chags par snang ba ni ring po'o snyam du shes la / thams cad du snang na zlum po'o snyam du shes kyi dbyibs rdzas su gzhan yod pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi syāt /<br/> dvigrāhyaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yod na ni / gnyis gzung 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gis mthong na yang ring po'o snyam du shes par 'gyur la / lus kyi dbang po reg na yang shes par 'gyur bas 'di dbang po gnyis kyi gzung bar 'gyur ba zhig na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca rūpāyatanasya dvābhyāṃ grahaṇamasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi skye mched la ni gnyis kyis 'dzin pa med do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām /<br/> smṛtimātraṃ tatra spraṣṭavyasāhacaryāt bhavati /<br/> sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ji ltar reg bya la ring po la sogs par 'dzin pa ltar kha dog la yang de bzhin du yid ches par bya'o / de la ni reg bya dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir dran pa tsam yin gyi mngon sum du 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na me'i gzugs mthong nas de'i tsha ba'i dran pa 'byung ba dang me tog gi dri bsnams nas de'i kha dog gi dran pa 'byung ba bzhin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la ni 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dran par rigs kyi gang las 'di nges par dran par 'gyur ba reg bya las ni cung zad kyang dbyibs gang la yang nges par med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāsatyapi sāhacaryaniyame saṃsthānasmaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te lhan cig spyod par nges pa med kyang nges par dbyibs dran par 'gyur na ni kha dog kyang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varṇe 'pi syāt varṇavaddhā saṃsthāne 'pyaniyamena syāt /<br/> nacaivaṃ bhavati /<br/> ayuktamasya spraṣṭavyātsmaraṇaṃ /<br/> citrāstaraṇevā 'nekavarṇasaṃsthāne darśanādbahūnāmaikadeśyaṃ prāpnuyāt /<br/> taccāyīuktaṃ varṇavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ni kha dog bzhin du dbyibs kyang nges par mi 'gyur ba zhig na de lta yang ma yin par reg bya las 'di dran par ni rigs pa ma yin no / ri mos bkram pa la dbyibs du ma snang ba'i phyir mang po yang phyogs gcig par 'gyur ba zhig na de yang rigs pa ma yin te / kha dog bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnāsti dravyataḥ saṃsthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na dbyibs ni rdzas su med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate /<br/> na cāṇau tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs cung zad yod pa de ni gdon mi za bar rdul phra rab la yod pa yin na de rdul la med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs ni rdul phra rab la med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādbahuṣveva tathā saṃniviṣṭeṣu dīrghādiprajñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na dbyibs ni mang po de ltar gnas pa dag kho na la ring po la sogs pa 'dogs par zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti /<br/> so 'yaṃ kevalaḥ pakṣapātasteṣāmasiddhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab dag kho na de ltar gnas pa la ring po la sogs pa'i ming 'dogs par 'dod na ni de dag ma grub pa'i phyir de ni phyogs 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">siddhasvalakṣāṇānāṃ hi teṣāṃ saṃcayo yujyate /<br/> na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi mtshan nyid rnams grub na ni de dag bsags pa cung bar 'gyur na dbyibs kyi yan lag rnams ni kha dog la sogs pa de bzhin du rang gi ngo bor grub pa yang med na de dag bsags pa lta zhig ga la yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on gang kham pa'i snod rnams kha dog kyang tha mi dad pa la dbyibs kyang tha dad par snang ngo zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar gnas par gyur pa'i kha dog la ring po la sogs par ming 'dogs par zad do zhes ma bshad dam / dper na grog ma la sogs pa tha mi dad bzhin du 'khor lo la sogs pa tha dad par 'dogs pa ltar dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang mun khung dang thag ring po nas sdong dum la sogs pa'i kha dog ma mthong bar ring po la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na / de dag gi de kha dog mi gsal ba kho na mthong nas ring po la sogs par yongs su rtog par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paṅktisenāparikalpavat /<br/> itthaṃ caitadevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phreng ba dang dmag la sogs pa la yongs su rtog pa bzhin no / de ni gdon mi za bar de ltar shes par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatkadācidanirdhāryamāṇaparicchedaṃ saṃghātamātramavyaktaṃ dṛśyate kimapyetaditi /<br/> athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang res 'ga' yongs su chad pa nges par mi zin pa ni tshogs pa tsam dang mi gsal ba snang ba yin no / yang da ni mdo sde pa khyed rnams kyi lugs kyis lus kyi 'gro ba dang dbyibs kyang bsal nas gang la lus kyi rnam par rig byed du 'dogs par byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃsthānameva hi te kāyavijñarpti prajñapayanti /<br/> natu punardravyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni dbyibs kho na la lus kyis rnam par rig byed 'dogs par byed la rdzas su ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dogs par byed pa na ji ltar lus kyi las su 'dogs par byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī /<br/> evaṃ vāṅmanaskarmaṇī api yathāyogaṃ veditavye /<br/> yattarhi cetanā karma cetayitvā cetyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus la brten pa'i las ni lus kyi las te / de dang der lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o / de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi las dag la yang ci rigs par rig par bya'o / 'o na gang sems pa dang bsam pa'i las so zhes gsungs so zhe na / 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig bya'o snyam pa'i kun du rtog pa ni sngar 'byung la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā cetayitvā paścāt kriyā cetanotpadyate /<br/> yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bsams nas de'i 'og tu gang gis lus 'jug par byed par bya ba'i sems pa skye bar 'gyur te / de ni bsam pa'i las zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante /<br/> anuṣaṅgānāṃ punaḥ pratyanuṣaṅgā bhaviṣyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltan na 'o na rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang med bas nyes pa chen por thal bar 'gyur ro / thal ba rnams la yang thal ba'i gnyen po dag yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tasmādeva kāyakarmasaṃśabditāccetanāviśeṣādavijñaptiḥ syāt /<br/> cittānuparivartinī syātsamāhitavijñaptivat nai vaṃ bhaviṣyati /<br/> cetanāviśeṣeṇa tadākṣpaviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te lus kyi las zhes bya ba'i sems pa'i khyad par de nyid las rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'byung bar 'gyur na yang cir 'gyur mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin du sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin par 'gyur ro / de ltar mi 'gyur te / sems pa'i khyad par gyis de'i 'phen pa khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate /<br/> jaḍatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed de yod na yang de 'phang bar bya ba ni sems pa'i stobs la rag las pa yin te de blun pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim /<br/> vāgvijñaptistu vāgdhvaniḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re dbyibs kyang rdzas kho na yin la / lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes zer ro / ngag rnams rig byed 'di ngag sgra
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāksvabhāvo yaḥ śabdaḥ saiva vāgvijñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag gi rang bzhin gyi sgra gang yin pa de nyid ngag gi rnam par rig byed yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptiḥ pūrvamevoktā /<br/> sā 'pi dravyato nāstīti sautrāntikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni sngar bshad pa kho na yin no / mdo sde pa rnams na re yang rdzas su med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhyupetyākaraṇamātratvāt /<br/> atītānyapi mahābhūtānyupādāya prajñaptesteṣāṃ cāvidyamānasvabhāvatvādrūpalakṣaṇābhāvācca /<br/> astīti vaibhāṃṣikāḥ /<br/> kathaṃ jñāyate /<br/> trividhāmalarūpoktivṛddhyakurvatpathādibhiḥ /<br/> trividhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam gyi phyir dang 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la yang brten nas 'dogs pa'i phyir dang de dag kyang rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang zhes zer ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro / ji ltar shes she na / rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang / 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhiḥ sthānai rūpasya rūpasaṃgraho bhavati /<br/> asti rūpaṃ sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /<br/> asti rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratigham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / gnas gsum gyi gzugs kyis gzugs bsdus pa yin te / bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod / bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti rūpamanidarśanamapratighamiti /<br/> anāsravaṃ ca bhagavatā rūpamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang yod do zhes gzugs rnam pa gsum gsungs so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāḥ dharmāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne /<br/> ima ucyante 'nāsravā dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba gang dang rnam par shes pa'i bar gang la rjes su chags pa'am khong khro ba mi skye ba 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o zhes gzugs zag pa med pa yang gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par ni bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang med la zag pa med pa yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vṛddhirapi coktā /<br/> ebhiḥ saptabhiraupadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ni rgyu yang rung 'dug kyang rung nyal yang rung mi nyal yang rung ste / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod nams mngon par 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur zhing bsod nams nye bar skye ba kho nar 'gyur te / rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes 'phel bar yang gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ niraupadhikairiti /<br/> na cāvijñaptimantareṇānyamanaso 'pti puṇyasyābhivṛddhiryujyate /<br/> akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau /<br/> nahyājñāpanavijñaptiḥ maulaḥ karmapatho yujyate /<br/> tasya karyaṇo 'kṛtatvāt /<br/> kṛte 'pi ca tasyāḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par ni yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyang mngon par 'phel bar mi rung ngo / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na bdag nyid kyis ma byas la / gzhan dag byed du bcug pa'i las kyi lam dag 'grub par mi 'gyur te / lung du bsgo ba tsam gyis las kyi lam du mi rung ste / las de ma byas pa'i phyir ro / byas su zin kyang de'i rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca bhagavatā dharmā bhikṣavo bāhyamāyatanamekādaśabhirāyatanairasaṃgṛhītamanidarśanamapratighamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong chos ni phyi'i skye mched yin te / skye mched bcu gcig gis ma bsdus pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa'o zhes gsungs kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvarūpītyuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can ma yin pa'o zhes ni ma gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der gal te chos kyi skye mched kyi khongs su ma gtogs pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs shig ma gzigs na dgos pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭāṅgaśca mārgo na syādavijñaptimantareṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs med na lam yan lag brgyad par yang mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpannasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvānāmayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa la ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams mi rung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhīdamuktaṃ tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na 'di skad du de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong ba de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni sngon yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba yin no zhes gang gsungs so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikamārgavairāgyaṃ pūrvakṛtamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar byas pa la dgongs te gsungs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimokṣasaṃvaraścapi na syādasatyāmavijñaptau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang med par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu gang gis na yid gzhan dang ldan pa 'di yang dge slong ngam dge slong mar 'gyur ba de ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">setuśca sūtre viraktiruktā /<br/> dauḥśīlyavivandhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las spong ba ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi bgegs byed pa'i phyir chu lon du yang gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vā bhavantī seturbhavitumarhatītyastyevāvijñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">med pa ni chu lon yin par 'os pa yang ma yin pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni yod pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra sautrāntikā āhuḥ bahvapyetaccitramapyetat /<br/> naivaṃ tvetat /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la mdo sde ba rnams na re 'di ni mang po yang yin la / 'di ni sna tshogs pa yang yin mod kyi 'di de ltar yang ma yin no zhes zer mod / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat tāvaduktaṃ trividharūpokteri ti /<br/> tatra yogācārā upadiśanti /<br/> dhyāyināṃ samādhiviṣayo rūpaṃ samādhiprabhāvādutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gang gzugs rnam pa gsum gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa / de la rnal 'byor spyod pa dag na re bsam gtan pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi gzugs skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣurindriyāviṣayatvāt anidarśanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang dbang po'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ni bstan du med pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">deśānāvaraṇatvādapratighamiti /<br/> atha matam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul la mi sgrib pa'i phyir ni thogs pa med pa yin no zhes ston par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīṃ tat rūpam iti /<br/> etadavijñaptau samānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni de ji ltar gzugs yin snyam du sems na de ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la yang mtshungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang gzugs zag pha med pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa ni rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams na re ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu las skyes ba'i gzugs de nyid zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zag pa med pa yin no zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhato yadrūpaṃ bāhyaṃ cetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dgra bcom pa'i gzugs dang phyi rol gang yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsravāṇāmaniśrayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa rnams kyi rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ sāsravā dharmāḥ katame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang mdo las zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvadeva cakṣuryavadeva rūpāṇīti vistaraḥ /<br/> tatra punarāsravāṇāmapratipakṣatvātsāsravamuktam /<br/> paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /<br/> kiṃ syāt /<br/> lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig ji snyed pa dang gzugs ji snyed pa dag yin no zhes rgyas par gsungs so zhe na / de ni zag pa rnams kyi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas par gsungs pa yin no / 'o na ni rnam grangs kyis de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin par 'gyur ro / cir 'gyur na / mtshan nyid 'tshol bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin pa de ltar nam yang zag pa med pa ma yin pas 'di la 'chol ba ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syuryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastviti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa dag yin par 'gyur na / ci'i phyir mdo las gzugs zag pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni sems kyi thab dang spags pa'i gzhi yin no zhes rgya cher khyad par du mdzad par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapyuktaṃ puṇyābhivṛddhivacanāditi tatrāpi pūrvācāryā nirdiśanti dharmatā hyeṣā yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti yenāyatyāṃ bahutaraphalābhiniṣpattaye samarthā bhavanti /<br/> idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa de la yang sngon gyi slob dpon dag na re ji lta ji ltar sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba dag yongs su spyad pa de lta de ltar za ba po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par dang phan btags pa'i khyad par gyis yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po rnams la yang gang gis na tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu ches mang po mngon par bsgrub nus par 'gyur ba de la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i sems pas yongs su bsgos pa'i rgyu de yongs su 'gyur pa'i khyad par phra mo 'thob pa 'di ni chos nyid yin te / bsod nams mngon par 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur zhing bsod nams nye bar skye ba kho nar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'di las dgongs te gsungs pa srid do zhes ston par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te de ji ltar na rgyud gzhan gyi khyad par gyis yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i rgyud gzhan yongs su 'gyur bar ji ltar 'gyur snyam du sems na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadavijñaptau smānam /<br/> kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na rgyud gzhan gyi khyad par gyis yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i la chos gzhan rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur zhes rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la yang mtshungs so / da ni rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag la ji ltar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhikṣṇaṃ tadālambanacetanābhyāsātsvapneṣvapi tā anuṣaṅginyo bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dang yang du de la dmigs pa'i sems pa la goms pas rmi lam dag na yang de dag rjes su 'brel par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt /<br/> aupadhike 'pyabhīkṣaṇaṃ tadālambanecetanābhyāsādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin par smra ba'i ltar na rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa gang la rnam par rig byed med pa de la ji ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur zhe na / gzhan dag na re rdzas las byung ba dag la yang dang yang du de la dmigs pa'i sems pa de la goms par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / 'o na mdo las gang drag shul can dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamārdhiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyapramāṇastannidānadāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya ityatra tadānīṃ dātuḥ kaścetanāviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i chos dang ldan pas gang gi bsod snyoms yongs su zos nas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa lus kyis mngon du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas na / de'i gzhi las sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa dag gis bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang bde ba'i gzhi tshad med par re bar bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la de'i tshe sbyin pa po'i sems pa'i khyad par gang zhig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣa eva nyāyyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par kho na rigs pa dang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapyuktaṃ kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantīti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti /<br/> tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang byed du bcug pa'i las kyi lam du ji ltar 'gyur zhes smras pa de la yang 'di skad du de'i sbyor bas gzhan dag la gnod pa'i bye brag gis sbyor ba po la rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par phra mo gang las na tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu ches mang po mngon par 'grub nus pa'i rgyu de skye bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod de / bdag nyid kyi byed pa la 'ang bya ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs nas tshul ni 'di nyid yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'sau saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ karmapatha ityākhyāyate /<br/> kārye kāraṇopacārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par 'di ni las kyi lam zhes bya ste / 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyikavācikatvaṃ tu tatkriyāphalatvādyathā vijñaptivādināmavijñapteriti /<br/> upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ /<br/> haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti /<br/> na tviyatā karmapathaḥ parisamāpyate /<br/> mā bhūdahate 'pi mātrādau hatābhimānināmānantaryaṃ karmeti /<br/> svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi dang ngag gi ni de dag gi bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dper na rnam par rig byed ma yin par smra ba rnams kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa lta bu'o / btsun pa na re 'di gang gi tshe zin pa'i phung po dag la bsad par bya'o / gsod do / bsad do snyam du sems pa na dus gsum pa'i sems pas srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro zhes zer na / ma la sogs pa ma bsad par bsad do snyam pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la / mtshams med pa'i las kyi lam du 'gyur du 'ongs pas de tsam gyis las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni ma yin gyi 'di la bsam pa ni bdag nyid kyis gsod pa la sems pa de snyed cig kun du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di yin par rigs pa'i ngo bo yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni rnam par rig byed ma yin ba ni spong bar byed cing de kho na dang 'dra bar mi mngon par rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag khas len par byed pa'i rab tu snang ba de gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na khalu kaścit pradveṣaḥ /<br/> kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu snang ba ni ci yang med mod kyi 'on kyang sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i lus kyi sbyor bas bya ba yongs su rdzogs na sbyor ba po la de dag dang tha dad par gyur pa'i chos gzhan zhig na skye'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su dga' ba mi skye'o
