</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa de kho na la de'i rgyu can gyi rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni yongs su dga' bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittacaitasaṃtānāccāyatyāṃ phalotpatteḥ /<br/> uktaṃ cātra /<br/> kimuktam /<br/> vijñaptyabhāvādityevamādi /<br/> tadabhāvādavijñapterabhāvaḥ /<br/> yadapyuktaṃ dharmāyatanasyārūpitvaṃ yasmānnoktamiti /<br/> tadyadevātra rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ coktaṃ tadevāstu dharmāyatanaparyāpannam /<br/> yadapyuktamaṣṭāṅga āryamārgo na syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu byung ba'i yang phyir ro / 'di la bshad kyang zin to / ji skad du bshad ce na / rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o / gang yang 'di ltar chos kyi skye mched gzugs can ma yin par gsungs so zhes smras pa ni bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de nyid chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṅgaṃ tāvadācakṣva /<br/> kathaṃ mārgasamāpannasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvā bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni re zhig ji ltar na lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba dag yod pa khyod smros shig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci 'di tshig tu smra 'am / 'on te bya ba byed dam / 'on te chos gos la sogs pa dag 'chol bar byed / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadrūpāmanāsravāmavijñaptiṃ pratilabhate /<br/> yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate /<br/> ato nimitte naimittikopacārādavijñaptau tadākhyā kriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig thob pa'i phyir langs na yang log pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni mi 'jug la / yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zag pa med pa 'thob ste / de'i phyir rgyu mtshan la rgyu mtshan can btags pa nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la der bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de lta na go 'di la yang de bzhin du lam la snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med bzhin du gang zhig thob pa'i phyir langs na yang log pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni mi 'jug la / yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam pa dang lus thob par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti /<br/> aparastvāha /<br/> tadakriyāmātramatrāṅgamuktaṃ syāt /<br/> yadasāvāryamārgasāmarthyādakriyāniyamaṃ pratilabhate taccānāsravamārgasaṃniśrayalābhādanāsravaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rgyu mtshan la rgyu mtshan can nye bar btags pa byas nas lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnam par gzhag go zhes bya bar ci'i phyir mi gzung gzhan dag na re de dag mi byed pa tsam 'dir yan lag tu gsungs pa yin te / 'dis 'phags pa'i lam gyi mthus nges par mi byed par 'thob pa gang yin pa de yang zag pa med pa'i lam la brten nas 'thob pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi sarvatra dravyamanto dharmāḥ parisaṃkhyāyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad du rdzas su yod pa'i chos yongs su bgrang ba yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /<br/> nacātra cīvarādīnāmalābho nāmāsti dravyāntaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na 'jig rten pa'i chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang snyan pa pa dang mi snyan pa dang bstod pa dang smad pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba bzhin te / de la ni chos gos la sogs pa dag ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba rdzas gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti /<br/> anyacittona saṃvṛtaḥ syāditi cet /<br/> na /<br/> tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar pa'i sdom par yang 'gyur te / sems pa gang gis cho ga sngon du btang ba'i khas blangs te las bkag nas lus dang ngag dag sdom par byed do / gal te sems gzhan dang ldan na ma bsdams par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te / de la goms par byas pa'i dus su dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro / chu lon gyi ngo bor yang 'gyur te / ngo tsha shes pas mi bya bar dam bcas pa yang dag par dran zhing yang dag par dran nas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi byed pa'i phyir te / de lta bu kho na'i don du de yang dag par len pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi bgegs byed pa yin par gyur na ni brjed ngas pa 'gags kyang tshul khrims 'dral bar mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alaṃ vistareṇāstyeva dravyāntaramavijñaptirūpati vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyas par ni mi dgos so / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs rdzas gzhan kho nar yod do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni /<br/> anyānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate /<br/> na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate /<br/> kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yod la de yang 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa yin no zhes bshad na de ci rnam par rig byed kyi 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye ba'am / 'on te gzhan dag kyang yin zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / de ni 'byung ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan dag kho na rgyur byas nas skye bar 'gyur te / tshogs pa de nyid 'bras bu phra mo can yang yin la / 'bras bu rags pa can yang yin par ni mi rung ngo / yang ci de gang gi tshe rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod pa de'i tshe yod pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag kho na rgyur byas nas 'byung ngam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya /<br/> kiṃ punastaditi /<br/> kṣaṇādūrdhvamavijñaptiḥ kāmāptātītabhūtajā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyur byas pa'i gzugs phal cher thams cad ni de lta bu yin no / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa cung zad cig ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas nas 'byung ngo / de yang gang zhe na / 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyi chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī atītāni mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate /<br/> tānyasyā āśrayārthena bhavanti /<br/> pratyutpannāni śarīramahābhūtāni saṃniśrayārthena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni skad cig ma dang po phyin cad 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas nas skye'o / de dag ni 'di'i gzhi'i don du 'gyur la lus kyi 'byung ba chen po de ltar 'byung ba rnams ni rten gyi don du 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravṛtyanuvṛttikāraṇatvādyathākramam /<br/> cakrasyeva bhūmau saparivartamānasya pāṇyāvedhabhūmipradeśau /<br/> atha kutastyāni mahābhūtānyupādāya kutastyaṃ kāyavākkarma /<br/> svāni bhūtānyupādāya kāyavākkarma sāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jug pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin te / 'khor lo sa la 'dril ba la lag pas 'phul ba dang sa'i phyogs bzhin no / yang gang na yod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las gang na yod pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa yin zhe na / zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las / rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas pa yin la / de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi ba'i sa pa'i bar du yang de'i sa pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaṃ yatra jātaḥ /<br/> asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med gang du skyes pa yin / zag pa med pa'i lus dang ngag gi las de ni sa gang du skyes te skyed par byed pa de'i sa pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātvapatitatvādanāsravāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāmabhāvāttadvalena cotpatteḥ /<br/> tatra vijñaptyavijñaptyākhyakarmaṇī veditavye /<br/> avijñaptiranupāttikā /<br/> naiḥṣyandikī ca sattvākhyā /<br/> kiñca /<br/> niṣyandopāttabhūtajā /<br/> naiḥṣyandikānyeva bhūtānyupādāya cittacaittāni copādāyāvijñaptirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir dang zag pa med pa rnams las 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir dang de'i stobs las skye ba'i phyir ro / rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i las de las kyang / rnam rig byed min ma zin dang / rgyu mthun las byung sems can ston / gzhan yang / rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rgyu mthun pa dang zin pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas nas skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asamāhitabhūmikāyā eṣa prakāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i sa pa'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhijaupacayikānupātābhinnabhūtajā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting 'dzin skyes 'byung ma zin dang / rgyas byung tha dad min las skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāvijñaptiḥ samādhijā /<br/> sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> cittavat bhūtābhedāt /<br/> prātimokṣasaṃvare tvanyānyāni mahābhūtānyupādāya saptāvijñaptayo bhavanti /<br/> vijñaptistu naiḥṣyandikī /<br/> upāttā tu kāyikī /<br/> kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na /<br/> kiñcātaḥ yadi bādhitvotpadyate /<br/> na /<br/> vipākarūpasyocchinnasya punaḥ pravandhādavaibhāṣikīyaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> athābādhitvā /<br/> kathamekasminbhūtasaṃghāte saṃsthānadvayaṃ sidhyati /<br/> anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati /<br/> evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam /<br/> tanmahābhūtairabhivyāpanāt /<br/> anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet /<br/> śuṣiratvāt kāyasyāsti teṣāmavakāśaḥ /<br/> tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam /<br/> cetanā cetayitvā ceti /<br/> cetayitvā punardvidhā /<br/> kāyavākkarma cetanā ca /<br/> kāyakarma punaḥ dvividhaṃ vijñaptyākhyamavijñaptyākhyaṃ ca /<br/> evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati /<br/> tatra punaravijñaptirdvidhā /<br/> kuśalā 'kuśalā ca /<br/> nāvyākṛtāstyavijñaptiḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yin te de ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa rgyas pa las byung ba dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas nas skye'o / tha mi dad pa dag kyang 'byung ba yin te / 'byung ba chen po gang dag kho na rgyur byas nas srog gcod pa spong ba skye ba de dag kho na las tshig kyal pa spong ba'i bar du skye'o / ci'i phyir zhe na / sems bzhin du 'byung ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni 'byung ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bdun skye'o / rnam par rig byed ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ste / lus kyis ni zin pa yin no / yang ci rnam par rig byed 'di skye ba na dbyibs snga ma'i rgyud bshig nas skye'am / 'on te ma yin / de las cir 'gyur / gal te bshig nas skye na ni / rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang rgyun chags pa'i phyir 'di bye brag tu smra ba ma yin par 'gyur ro / 'on te ma bshig par skye na ni ji ltar 'byung ba'i tshogs gcig la dbyibs gnyis 'grub par 'gyur / de'i tshe gang dag rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed skye bar 'gyur ba rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan de dag skye bar 'gyur ro / de dag de lta na ni 'o na de'i 'byung ba chen po de dag gis mngon par khyab pa'i phyir yan lag dang gang dang gang la brten nas rnam par rig byed skye bar 'gyur ba'i yan lag de dang de chen por 'gyur ro / mngon par ma khyab na ni ji ltar na yan lag zad par gyis rnam par rig par byed par 'gyur / lus la gseb yod pa'i phyir de dag gi go skabs yod do / yang las de rnam grangs kyis rnam pa gnyis dang rnam pa gsum dang rnam pa lngar bshad pa de la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa gnyis so / rnam rig min lung bstan min med / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt /<br/> tridhā 'nyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni stobs chung ba yin te / de'i phyir gang 'gags kyang de'i rjes su 'brel par 'gyur ba'i las stobs dang ldan pa 'phen par mi nus so / gzhan ni rnam gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatkarma trividham /<br/> kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam /<br/> kiṃ tadanyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las gzhan ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptiścetanā ca /<br/> aśubhaṃ punaḥ /<br/> kāme
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan de yang gang zhe na / rnam par rig byed dang sems pa'o / mi dge ni / 'dod na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalaṃ vastu karma kāmahātau veditavyam /<br/> nānyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i las ni 'dod pa'i khams na yod par rig par bya'o / gzhan dag na ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalamūlānāṃ prahīṇatvādāhrīkyānapatrāpyayośca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dag pa'i rtsa ba rnams dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dag spangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalāvyākṛtaṃ tu sarvatrā prativedhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ni ma bkag pa'i phyir thams cad na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> rūpe 'pyavijñaptiḥ /<br/> kāme 'pītyapiśabdāt /<br/> ārūpyeṣu nāsti bhūtābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la gzugs na'ang rnam rig min / yang gi sgras ni 'dod pa na yang yod do / gzugs med pa dag na ni 'byung ba med pa'i phyir med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra hi kāyavācoḥ pravṛttistatra kāyavāksaṃvarau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang na lus dang ngag dang 'jug pa de na lus dang ngag gi sdom pa yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha tarhi samāpannasya syādanāsravā vijñaptivat /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na 'dir snyoms par 'jug pa la yod par 'gyur te / zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin no zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyā dhātvapatitatvāt /<br/> ārūpyāvacarī tvavijñaptināṃrhati visabhāgāni bhūtānyupādāya bhavitum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni skal pa mi mnyam pa'i 'byung ba rgyur byas nas skye ba ni 'os pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvarūpavaimukhyāccārūpyasamāpattunārlaṃ rūpotpattaye /<br/> vibhūtarūpasaṃjñatvāt /<br/> dauḥśīlyapratipakṣeṇa śīlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs skyed par mi nus te / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca dauḥśīlyaṃ kāmāvacaram /<br/> ārūpyāśca kāmadhātorāśrayā kārālambanapratipakṣadūratābhirdūre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chal pa'i tshul khrims de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa yin na gzugs med pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nas rten dang rnam pa dang dmigs pa dang gnyen po ring ba dag gis ring ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eṣvavijñaptirnāstīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'di dag rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptiḥ savicārayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptistu savicārayoreva bhūmyoḥ /<br/> kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ni sa gnyis po 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po kho na na yod kyi de yan chad na ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme 'pi nivṛtā nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtā tu vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātāvapi nāsti /<br/> brahmaloka evāsti /<br/> mahābrāhmaṇo hi śāṭhyasamutthitaṃ kāyakarma śrūyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ni 'dod pa'i khams na yang med kyi tshangs pa'i 'jig rten kho na na yod do / tshangs pa chen po la yang gyos kun nas slong ba'i ngag gi las yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des rang gi 'khor gyi nang du tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la gtam rlung bskur ba'i phyir bdag nyid rnam par bsngags so zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yan chad ni ngag gi rnam par rig byed med na sgra'i skye mched ji ltar yod ce na / phyi'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarāhuḥ /<br/> dvitīyādiṣvapi dhyāneṣu vijñaptirastyanivṛtāvyākṛtā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na yang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed ni yod kyi dge ba yang med la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na kuśalā na kliṣṭā /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can yang med do / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag tu skyes ba ni sa 'og ma pa'i sems gang gis na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mngon sum du mi byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyūnatvātprahīṇatvacca /<br/> pūrvameva tu varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dman pa dang spangs zin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te snga ma kho na brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti /<br/> samutthānamasadyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yan chad na rnam par rig byed med la / 'dod pa'i khams na yang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">savitarkavicāreṇa hi cittena vijñaptiḥ samutthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang phyir kun slong med / rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate /<br/> darśanaprahātavyasyāntarmukhapravṛttatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na med do / bsgom pas spang bar bya bas slong bar byed kyi de kha nang du bltas pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca kāmadhātau nivṛtavyākṛtaṃ nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems de yang 'dod pa'i khams na med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ni kun nas slong ba'i dbang po kho na las chos rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid du rig par bya 'am zhe na / smas pa [*smras?] / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> paramārthaśubho mokṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bzhis te / don dam pa dang ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong bas so / de la re zhig / thar pa dam pa'i don du dge
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇaṃ hi sarvaduḥkhavyupaśamaḥ /<br/> tataḥ paramakṣematvāt paramārthena kuśalamārogyavat /<br/> svato mūlahyar patrapāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa ni sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin te de bas na mchog tu bde ba'i phyir don dam par dge ba ste nad med pa bzhin no / rtsa ba ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi kuśalamūlāni /<br/> hriścāpatrapyaṃ ca svabhāevna kuśalāni anyasaṃprayogasamutthanānapekṣatvāt /<br/> pathyauṣadhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang po tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa na gzhan mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba yin te 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayogeṇa tadyuktāḥ /<br/> taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat /<br/> samutthā nāt kriyādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa de dag nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas dge ba dag yin te / de dag dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa rnams la dge ba nyid med pa'i phyir sman dang sbyar ba'i btung ba bzhin no / bya ba la sogs kun slong bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ /<br/> auṣadhapānīyasaṃbhūtadhātrīkṣīravat /<br/> prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam /<br/> tadyathā vicikitsayā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānaṃ dhātupratyāgamaparihāṇibhyāṃ ca /<br/> yathā ca kuśalamuktaṃ tato /<br/> viparyayeṇākuśalaṃ /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos de dag kho nas kun nas slong ba'i lus dang ngag gi las dang skye ba la sogs pa dang thob pa dang 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni kun nas slong ba'i dge ba yin te sman dang sbyar ba'i btung ba las 'byung ba'i 'o ma bzhin no / bskal pa mi mnyam pa'i sems kyi kun nas slong ba'i thob pa rnams ji ltar dge ba nyid yin pa ni brjod dgos so / dge ba ji skad du bshad pa de las / bzlog pa ni mi dge / ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃsāraḥ paramārthenākuśalaḥ /<br/> sarvaduḥkhapravṛttyātmakatvena paramākṣematvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyis mchog tu mi bde ba'i phyir don dam par mi dge ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalamūlāhrīkyānapatrāpyāṇi svabhāvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa rnams ni ngo bo nyid kyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsamutthāpitāḥ kāyavākkarmajātyādiprāptayaḥ samutthānataḥ vyādhyapathyauṣadhādibhirūpameyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis kun nas slong ba'i lus dang ngag gi las dang skye ba la sogs pa dang thob pa rnams ni kun nas slong ba las te nang dang mi 'phrod pa'i sman la sogs pas dper bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /<br/> saṃsārābhyantaratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni 'khor ba'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang lung du ma bstan pa'am / dge bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate /<br/> iṣṭavipākaṃ ca kukśalamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don dam par de skad du bshad kyi zag pa dang bcas pa gang zhig rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya la / rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba can ni dge ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tu paramārthenāvyākṛtaṃ mṛgyate tat /<br/> paramāvyākṛte dhruve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te don dam par lung du ma bstan pa btsal na ni de la / don dam par lung ma bstan pa dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve asaṃskṛte niṣparyāyeṇānivṛtāvyākṛte /<br/> ākāśamapratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas / gnyis po nam mkha' dang so sor ma brtags pas 'gog pa ni rnam grangs med par lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ vicāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām /<br/> karmaṇi hi kartturabhiprāyo na mahābhūteṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te kun nas slong ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag gi las dag dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid yin na / ci ste 'byung ba chen po rnams ma yin zhe na / byed pa po ni las la sems pa yin gyi 'byung ba rnams la ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la ni bsam pa med do / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir de kun nas slong bar byed pa ma yin na ji ltar de dge ba nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divyayorapi vā cakṣuḥśrotrayoḥ kukśalatvaprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> karttavyo 'tra yatnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na lha'i mig dang rna ba dag kyang dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas 'di la 'bad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittaṃ vijñapterasamutthāpakamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong nas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta mityevamādi /<br/> aviruddhametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis log par lta ba de las ni log par rtog pa dang log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs she na / 'di ni 'gal ba med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samutthānaṃ dvidhā hetutatkṣaṇotthānasaṃjñitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar / kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni / de yi dus kyis slong zhes bya / kun nas slong ba ni rnam pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvividhaṃ samutthānaṃ hetusamutthānaṃ tatkṣaṇasamutthānaṃ ca /<br/> tatraiva kṣaṇe tadbhāvāt /<br/> pravartakaṃ tayorādyaṃ dvitīyamanuvartakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu'i kun nas slong ba dang de'i dus kyis kun nas slong ba ste / de'i dus kho na na de yod pa'i phyir ro / gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed / gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetusamutthānaṃ pravartakamākṣepakatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu'i kun nas slong ba ni 'phen par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatkṣaṇasamutthānamanuvartakaṃ kriyākālānuvartanāt /<br/> kimidānīṃ tasya tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ sāmarthyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dus kyis kun nas slong ba ni bya ba'i dus su / mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa yin no / da ni bya ba de la de'i nus pa ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī /<br/> acittakasya tarhi saṃvarotpattau kathaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phangs su zin kyang de med na shi ba bzhin du de yod par mi 'gyur ro / 'o na sems med pa'i sdom pa skye ba la ji ltar yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sphuṭatarā tarhi sacittakasya bhavatītyetatsāmarthyam /<br/> tatra ca /<br/> pravartakaṃ dṛṣṭiheyaṃ vijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni sems dang bcas pa la ches gsal ba yin pas nus pa ni de yin no / de la yang / mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittaṃ vijñapteḥ pravartakam /<br/> tatsamutthāpakayorvitarkavicārayornidānabhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu 'jug byed yin / mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvanuvartakam /<br/> bahirmukhacittasya kriyākāle tadabhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kha phyir bltas pa'i bya ba'i dus na de med pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsamutthāpitaṃ ca rūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ syāt /<br/> kiṃ syāt /<br/> abhidharmobādhitaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des kun nas slong ba'i gzugs kyang mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin par 'gyur ro / cir 'gyur / chos mngon pa la gnod par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ cāvirodhānnāsti rūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyam /<br/> sādhya eṣa pakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni rig pa dang ma rig pa dag dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin no / phyogs 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtānyapi tarhi darśanaprahātavyāni syuḥ /<br/> samānacittotthāpitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni sems dang mtshungs pas bslang ba'i phyir 'byung ba rnams kyang mthong bas spang bar bya bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /<br/> athavā punarbhavantu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar ni mi 'gyur te / ji ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba dag tu mi 'gyur ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaṃ śakyam /<br/> nahi tāni darśanaprahātavyāni yujyante nāpyaprahātavyāni /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> akliṣṭasya dharmasya vidyā 'vidyābhyāmavirodhāt /<br/> ato hetusamutthānamadhikṛtya sūtre paṭhanānnāsti virodhaḥ /<br/> ubhayaṃ punaḥ /<br/> mānasaṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'gyur du zad mod / de skad brjod pa ni mi nus te / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos ni rig pa dang ma rig pa dag dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang ma yin la spang bar bya ba ma yin pa yang ma yin no / de lta bas na mdo las rgyu'i kun nas slong ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo / yid ni / bsgom pas spang bya gnyi ga yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyaṃ punarmanovijñānamubhayaṃ bhavati /<br/> pravarttakaṃ cānuvartakaṃ ca /<br/> pañcakaṃ tvanuvartakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyi ga yin te / rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang yin la rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang yin no / lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca vijñānakāyā anuvartakā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadidaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni mu bzhir 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravartakameva darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anuvartakā eva pañca vijñānakāyāḥ /<br/> ubhayaṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ manovijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no / yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyi ga yin no / zag pa med pa ni gnyi ga ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayamanāsravam /<br/> kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati /<br/> nāyamekāntam /<br/> pravartake śubhādau hi syāttridhā 'pyanuvartakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bar rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang de dang 'dra 'am zhe na / 'di ni nges pa med de / rab tu 'jug byed dge sogs las / rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum 'gyur / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśale pravartake kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtamanuvartakaṃ syāt /<br/> evamakuśale cāvyākṛte ca /<br/> tulyaṃ muneḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu 'jug par byed pa dge ba las kyang rjes su 'jug par byed pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par 'gyur la / mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la yang de dang 'dra'o / thub pa'i 'dra ba'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhasya tu bhagavatastulyaṃ pravartakenānuvartakam /<br/> kuśale kuśalamavyākṛte cāvyākṛtam /<br/> śubhaṃ yāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang rjes su 'jug par byed pa 'dra ste / dge ba las kyang dge ba yin la lung du ma bstan pa las kyang lung du ma bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaṃ vā bhavatyanuvartakamavyākṛte 'pi pravartake
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dge ba / yang na rab tu 'jug par byed pa lung du ma bstan pa las kyang rjes su 'jug par byed pa dge bar 'gyur gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati /<br/> āmnāyamānā hi buddhānāṃ deśaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu 'jug par byed pa dge ba las rjes su 'jug par byed pa lung du ma bstan par ni rnam yang mi 'gyur te / sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs ni dman par 'gyur ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti buddhānāmavyākṛtaṃ cittamiti nikāyāntarīyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan dag na re sangs rgyas rnams la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt /<br/> uktaṃ hi sūtre /<br/> caran samāhito nāgastiṣṭhannāgaḥ samāhitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir dge bar rgyud gcig pa ni yin no / mdo las kyang / glang chen gshegs na'ang mnyam par gzhag / glang chen bzhengs na'ang mnyam par gzhag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">glang chen mnal na'ang mnyam par gzhag / bzhugs na'ang mnyam par gzhag pa yin / zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'di'i thugs mi bzhed bzhin du mi 'gro ba'i phyir de skad gsungs kyi sangs rgyas rnams la lung du ma bstan pa rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa dang sprul pa'i sems kyis mi mnga' ba ni ma yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mānasaṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ pravartakaṃ cānuvartakaṃ cetyuktam /<br/> tatkuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ veditavyam /<br/> nobhayaṃ tu vipāpkajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i yid ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang yin la rjes su 'jug par byed ba yang yin no zhes bshad pa de thams cad ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o / rnam smin las skyes gnyi ga min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug ba nyid kyi phyir rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin la rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidānīṃ yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirāhosvidyathā 'nuvartakam /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ /<br/> yathā pravartakaṃ cet /<br/> ihāpi nivṛtāvyākṛtā vijñaptiḥ prāpnoti /<br/> satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭipravartitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ci rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bar rnam par rig byed kyang de dang 'dra 'am / 'on te rjes su 'jug par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du yin / de las cir 'gyur / gal te rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin yin no zhe na ni 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta bas rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni yang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed yod par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa ma yin no zhes khyad par du brjod dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rjes su 'jug par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no zhe na ni sems mi dge ba lung du ma bstan pa can gyi so sor thar ba'i rnam par rig byed dge bar mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam /<br/> bhāvanā heyāntaritatvāt /<br/> yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bar rnam par rig byed kyang de dang 'dra mod kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya bas bar du gcod pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ji lta ba bzhin ni ma yin no / gal te rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i dbang gis dge ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetusamutthānaṃ saṃdhāyoktaṃ sūtre na tatkṣaṇasamutthānam /<br/> ato nāstīha nivṛtāvyākṛtā vijñaptiriti /<br/> evaṃ vaktavyam /<br/> anyavyavahitaṃ hetusamutthānaṃ saṃdhāyoktamiti /<br/> avasitaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> sā tu pūrvoktā /<br/> avijñaptistridhā jñeyā saṃvarāsaṃvaretarā /<br/> saṃvaraścāsaṃvaraśca /<br/> tābhyāṃ cetaro naivasaṃvaro nāsaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni mdo las rgyu'i kun nas slong ba las dgongs te gsungs kyi de'i dus kyi kun nas slong ba las ni ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di ni bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed med do zhes bya ba 'di brjod par mi bya'i 'di skad du gzhan gyis chod pa'i rgyu'i kun nas slong ba las dgongs nas gsungs so zhes brjod par bya'o / zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so / sngar bshad pa'i / rnam rig min / de ni rnam gsum zhes bya / sdom dang sdom pa min dang gzhan / sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang de dag las gzhan pa sdom pa yang ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dauḥśīlyaprasarasya saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃrodhaḥ saṃvaraḥ /<br/> tatra punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa ste / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyu sdom zhing 'gogs pas na sdom pa'o / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvaraḥ prātimokṣākhyo dhyānajo 'nāsravastathā /<br/> trividhaḥ saṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa so sor thar zhes bya / de bzhin zag med bsam gtan skyes / sdom pa rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimokṣasaṃvara ihatyānāṃ kāmāvacaraṃ śīlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni 'di pa rnams kyi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i tshul khrims so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasaṃvaro rūpāvacaraṃ śīlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi sdom pa ni gzugs na spyod pa rnams kyi tshul khrims yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravasaṃvaro 'nāsravaṃ śīlam /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> aṣṭadhā prātimokṣākhyaḥ /<br/> bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca /<br/> eṣo 'ṣṭavidhasaṃvaraḥ prātimokṣasaṃvara ityākhyāyate /<br/> nāmata eṣo 'ṣṭavidhaḥ /<br/> dravyatastu caturvidhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yin no / de la / so sor thar zhes bya rnam brgyad / dge slong gi sdom pa dang dge slong ma'i sdom pa dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang dge tshul ma'i sdom pa dang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa dang bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ste / sdom pa rnam pa de brgyad ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes bya ste / ming du ni rnam pa de brgyad yin no / rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ śramaṇerasaṃvara upāsakasaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong gi sdom pa dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityeṣa caturvidhaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarastu dravyataḥ /<br/> pratiniyatalakṣaṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar nas sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni mtshan nyid so sor nges pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du rnam pa de bzhin yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhikṣusaṃvarādbhikṣuṇīsaṃvaro nānyaḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvarācca śikṣamāṇāśrāmaṇerīsaṃvarau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong gi sdom pa las ni dge slong ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin no / dge tshul gyi sdom pa las kyang dge slong ma dang dge tshul ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāsakasaṃvarādupāsikāsaṃvaro nānyaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ jñāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las kyang dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin no / ji ltar shes she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">liṅgato nāmasaṃcārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">liṅgamiti vyañjanasyākhyā yena strīpuruṣau liṅgyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan zhes bya ba ni rtags zhes bya ba ste / gang gis skyes pa dang bud med dag tu mtshon par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">liṅgato hi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyādīnāṃ nāmasaṃcāro bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan las ni dge slong dang dge slong ma la sogs pa'i ming 'pho par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ /<br/> śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na / mtshan gyur na dge slong ni dge slong ma zhes bya / dge slong ma yang dge slong zhes bya'o / dge tshul ni dge tshul ma zhes bya la dge tshul ma dang dge slong ma yang dge tshul zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen ni dge bsnyen ma zhes bya la dge bsnyen ma yang dge bsnyen zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan gyur pa las sngon gyi sdom pa gtong ba'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin la sngon med pa'i sdom pa 'thob pa'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na sdom pa bzhi po de dag ni gsum po las rang bzhin tha mi dad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca āhosvit pṛthageva te sakalā jāyante /<br/> āha /<br/> pṛthak
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs la / de las yang dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par blangs na / ci spong ba'i 'phel ba dang ldan pa'i phyir sdom pa de dag lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu zhes bya ba lta bu dang dong tse gcig dang gnyis zhes bya ba bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba'am / 'on te de dag thams cad tha dad pa nyid gcig tu skye zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyāmiśrā eva te pṛthaglakṣaṇā upajāyante /<br/> triṣu saṃvareṣu tisraḥ prāṇātipātaviratayo yāvanmadyapānaviratayaḥ /<br/> evaṃ śeṣāḥ /<br/> ko nu tāsāṃ viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha dad / de dag ni ma 'dres pa nyid de / sdom pa gsum dag la srog gcod pa spong ba gsum nas myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba gsum gyi bar du mtshan nyid tha dad par skye ste / lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o / de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nidānaviśeṣādviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi'i khyad par las khyad par yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu pravartata iti nidānaviśeṣādviratīnāṃ viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji lta ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi chos mang po dag yang dag par len par 'dod pa de lta de ltar rgyags pa dang bag med pa'i gnas ches mang po dag las ldog pa na srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i gzhi ches mang po dag las ldog par 'gyur zhing spong ba'i gzhi rnams la yang 'jug par 'gyur bas gzhi'i khyad par las spong ba rnams khyad par yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt /<br/> na caitadiṣṭam /<br/> tasmāt pṛthageva te saṃvarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na gnyi ga yang der 'dus pa'i phyir dge slong gi sdom pa btang bas sdom pa gsum char yang btang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni mi 'dod do / de lta bas na sdom pa de dag ni tha dad pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te cāvirodhinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag 'gal ba med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca trayo 'pi saha vartante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gsum char yang lhan cig par 'gyur gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nottarasaṃvarasamādānāt purvakasya tyāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa phyi ma yang dag par blangs pas snga ma gtong ba ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mā bhūt bhikṣusaṃvaraparityāgādanupāsaka eveti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su btang bas dge bsnyen yang ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur du 'ong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ji ltar na dge bsnyen yin / ji ltar na bsnyen gnas pa nas dge slong gi bar du yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcāṣṭadaśasarvebhyo varjyebhyo viratigrahāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spang bya lnga brgyad bcu dang ni / thams cad spong ba mnos pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāsakopavāsasthaśramaṇoddeśabhikṣutā /<br/> yathāsaṃkhyamanudeśo veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang / dge tshul ched dang dge slong nyid / grangs bzhin du bstan par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañccabhyo varjanīyebhyo dharmebhyo viratisamādānādupāsakasaṃvarastho bhavati /<br/> prāṇātipātādadattādānātkāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādātsurāmaireyamadyapānācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spang bar bya ba lnga po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par gyem pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭābhyo viratisamādānādupavāsasthaḥ /<br/> prāṇātipātādattādānābrahmacaryamṛṣāvādamadyapānebhyo gandhamālyavilepananṛtyagītavāditrāduccaśayanamahāśayanādakālabhojanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang mi tshangs par spyod pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dag dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gar dang glu dang rol mo dang khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po dang dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni bsnyen gnas la gnas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśabhyo viratisamādānācchrāmaṇero bhavati /<br/> ebhya eva jātarūparajatapratigrahācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid dang gser dang dngul 'dzin pa dang bcu spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge tshul yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nṛtyagitavāditragandhamālyavilepanaṃ cātra dvayīkṛtya daśa bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gar dang glu dang rol mo dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa gnyis su byas nas bcur 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate /<br/> sa eṣa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag gi las spang bar bya ba thams cad spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge slong yin no / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlaṃ sucaritaṃ karma saṃvaraścocyate /<br/> viṣamakarmaṇāṃ viratisamādānācchīlam /<br/> śītalatvāditi niruktiḥ /<br/> sukhaśīlasamādānaṃ kāyo na paridahyata iti /<br/> gāthāvacanāt /<br/> vidvatpraśastatvātsucaritam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang / las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o / las mi mnyam pa can rnams yang dag par 'jog par byed pas na tshul khrims se / nges pa'i tshig tu na bsil ba'i phyir te / tshigs su bcad pa las / lus las yongs su gdung med pas / tshul khrims yang dag blangs pa bde / zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir legs par spyad pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kriyāsvabhāvatvātkarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cāvijñaptirakriyetyucyate /<br/> sā kathaṃ kriyā bhāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes mi bya'am de ji ltar na bya ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngo tsha shes pa rnams yang dag par blangs pa des sdig pa mi byed pas na bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rnam par rig byed dang sems dag gis byed pas na bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kriyāhetutvāt kriyāphalatvāccetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re bya ba'i rgyu yin pa dang bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvara iti kāyavācoḥ saṃvaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ saṃśabdyate /<br/> punaḥ /<br/> ādye vijñaptyavijñaptī prātimokṣakiyāpathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar re zhig bye brag med par so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par bstan to / yang / dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min / so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvarasamādānasya prathame vijñaptyavijñaptī prātimokṣa ityucyate /<br/> pāpasya tena prātimokṣaṇādutsarjanādityarthaḥ /<br/> svārthe vṛddhividhānādvaikṛtavaiśasavat /<br/> prātimokṣasaṃvara ityapi kāyavāksaṃvaraṇāt karmapatha ityucyate /<br/> maulasaṃgṛhītatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa yang dag par blang pa'i rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang po dag ni so sor thar pa zhes bya ste / des sdig pa las so sor thar pa'i phyir te / spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya ste / lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir ro / las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ /<br/> pṛṣṭhaṃ ca na maulaḥ karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa kho na yin gyi so sor thar pa ni ma yin no / mjug yin gyi las kyi lam dngos ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ saṃvarāṇāṃ kena kaḥ samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sdom pa 'di rnams las gang zhig gang dang ldan zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimokṣānvitā aṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimokṣasaṃvareṇāṣṭau nikāyāḥ samanvāgatā bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī yāvadupavāsastho 'ṣṭamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang ni ris brgyad po dge slong dang dge slong ma dang brgyad pa bsnyen gnas pa'i bar dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ khalu bāhyakānāṃ samādānaśīlaṃ nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci phyi rol pa rnams la yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims med dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti natu prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod mod kyi so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ni ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tadatyantaṃ pāpasya pratimokṣaṇāya saṃvartate /<br/> bhavasaṃniśritatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni srid pa la brten pa'i phyir gtan du sdig pa las so sor thar par byed pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānajena tadanvitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan skyes dang de ldan pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāddhyāne vā jāto dhyānajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan las bsam gtan gyis bskyed pas na bsam gtan skyes te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo dhyānena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ dhyānasaṃvareṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang bsam gtan dang ldan pa de gdon mi za bar bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmantakamapyatra dhyānaṃ kṛtvocyate /<br/> yathā grāmasāmantakamapi grāma ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni nyer bsdogs kyang bsam gtan du brjod nas bstan te / dper na grong 'di na s'a lu'i zhing yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyasmin grāme śāleyaṃ kṣetramasti vraiheyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bru'i zhing yod do zhes grong gi nye 'khor la yang grong zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsraveṇāryasattvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryapudgalā anāsraveṇa saṃvareṇa samanvāgatāḥ /<br/> te punaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ldan te / de dag kyang slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ sahabhūhetāvucyamāne dvau saṃvarau cittānuvartināviti /<br/> katamo tau /<br/> eṣāmeva trayāṇām /<br/> antyau cittānuvartinau /<br/> dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvaraśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig 'byung ba'i rkyen bshad par sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sdom pa gnyis zhes gang bshad pa de gnyis gang yin zhe na gsum po 'di dag nyid las / tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang / bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyacittācittakasyāpyanuvṛtteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems gzhan dang ldan pa dang sems med pa la yang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punastāveva dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau prahāṇasaṃvarākhyāṃ labhete /<br/> kasyāmavasthāyāmityāha /<br/> anāgamye prahāṇākhyau tāvānantaryamārgajau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa de dag nyid spong ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo / gang gi gnas skabs su zhe na / smras pa / bar chad med lam skyes de gnyis / mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamye tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau navasvānantaryamārgeṣu prahāṇasaṃvarāvityucyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi lcogs pa med pa la bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa de gnyis bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu spong ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyis 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi sdom pa yin la / spong ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiranāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyaḥ sāsravo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ /<br/> dvitīyā anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣvanāsravaḥ /<br/> tṛtīyā anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣu sāsravaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ma gtogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan gyi sdom pa'o / gnyis pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu zag pa med pa'o / gsum pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu zag pa dang bcas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthī anāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyo 'nāsravasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ma gtogs pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /<br/> yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du zag pa med pa'i sdom pa yin la spong ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir ci rigs par rig par bya'o / 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā 'tha saṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste / ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste / thams cad du ni sdom pa legs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccoktaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇa saṃvarasaṃvṛto viharatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gang gsungs pa dang gang yang mig gi dbang po 'di sdom pas bsdams te / gnas so zhes gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etau manaindriyasaṃvarau kiṃsvabhāvau /<br/> naitāvavijñaptiśīlasvabhāvau /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid dang dbang po'i sdom pa 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na / 'di gnyis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprajñānasmṛtī dve tu manaindriyasaṃvarau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis / yid dang dbang po sdom pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti /<br/> indriyasaṃvaro 'pi /<br/> idaṃ vicāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grangs bzhin du shes par 'gyur du 'ong bas so sor gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin par bstan pa'i phyir yang gnyis zhes bya ba smos te / yid kyi sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin yin la / dbang po'i sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin no / gang zhig rnam par rig byed dam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang zhig dang dus ji srid cig tu ldan zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimmokṣasthito nityamatyāgādvartamānayā /<br/> avijñaptyā 'nvitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar gnas ji srid du / ma btang bar rtag da ltar gyi / rnam rig mi ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pas bshad pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de ni ji srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de mi gtong ba de srid du rtag tu da ltar gyi de dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma / dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā 'pi samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma dang po phyin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atyāgāditi sarvatrādhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /<br/> yathā prātimokṣasaṃvarastha uktaḥ /<br/> tathaivāsaṃvarastho 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad du yang ji srid du ma btang bar zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa ji skad du bshad pa / sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ /<br/> kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā 'pi /<br/> dhyānasaṃvaravān sadā /<br/> atītājātayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa yang ji srid du sdom pa ma yin pa mi gtong ba de srid du rtag tu da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan no / skad cig ma gcig phyin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan no / bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni / rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasaṃvarasya lābhī nityamatītānāgatābhyāmavijñaptibhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ ātyāgāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi sdom pa thob pa ni ji srid du ma btang gi bar du rtag tu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate /<br/> āryastu prathame nābhyatītayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des ni skad cig ma dang po la yang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu btang pa'i bsam gtan gyi sdom pa 'das pa thob bo / 'phags ni dang po 'das dang min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryastu pudgalo 'pyevamanāsravyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i gang zag kyang zag pa med pa dang de bzhin du ldan la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni khyad par yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt /<br/> samāhitāryamārgasthau tau yuktau vartamānayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam sngon ma bskyed pa'i phyir de skad cig ma dang po la 'das pa dang mi ldan no / mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis / da ltar dang ldan bsam gtan dang / zag pa med med pa'i sdom pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau /<br/> saṃvarāsaṃvarasthānāṃ tāvadeṣa vṛttāntaḥ /<br/> athedānīṃ madhyasthasya /<br/> madhyasthasyāsti cedādau madhyayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ldan pa mnyam par gzhag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag ni go rims bzhin du da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan gyi langs pa dag ni ma yin no / re zhig sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gtam ni de lta bu'o / yang da ni bar ma la gnas pa brjod par bya ste / bar gnas la / yod na dang po bar gyi dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang sdom pa yang ma yin sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas pa de ni bar ma la gnas pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya nāvaśyamavijñaptirasti /<br/> yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gdon mi za bar yod pa ni ma yin gyi gang la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang tshul khrims kyi yan lag la sogs pas bsdus pa yod pa de ni dang po bar gyi dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vartamānā hyavijñaptiratītānāgatayormadhyād /<br/> ūrdhvaṃ dvikālayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis kyi bar ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā vartamānayā ca /<br/> ātyāgāditi vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo / skad cig ma dang po byin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan / da ltar gyi dang yang ldan te / ma btang gi bar du zhes bya bar sbyar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci res 'ga' sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'am / sdom pa la gnas pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la gnas par 'gyur ram zhe na / 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavan kadā kiyantaṃ vā kālamityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam zhig dus ji srid cig tu 'gyur zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvarasthaḥ śubhayā 'śubhayā saṃvare sthitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom min gnas pa dge ba dang / sdom la gnas pa mi dge ba'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptyānvito yāvat prasādakleśavegavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam rig mi ldan ji srid du / rab dang nyon mongs shugs ldan par
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena prasādavegenāsaṃvarasthasya kuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate stavavandanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate vadhabandhanatāḍanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ tau yāvadanuvartete tāvatte apyavijñaptī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ni rab tu dang ba'i shugs gang gis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa na dag ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye la / sdom pa la gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i shugs gang gis gsod pa dang 'ching ba dang brdeg pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa ni mi dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye ste / de gnyis ji srid du rjes su 'brang ba de srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang rjes su 'brang ngo
