</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang skad cig ma dang po la ni da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur la / gzhan dag tu ni 'das pa dang yang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptyadhikāraḥ samāptaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skabs rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam rig byed ni thams cad la / byed pa dag la da ltar ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ /<br/> atītayā kṣaṇādūrdhvamātyāgāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang bar ma la gnas pa thams cad ji srid du rnam par rig byed byed pa de srid du da ltar gyi de dang ldan no / ma btang bar du skad cig ma / phyin chad 'das ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamātyāgādatītayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati /<br/> nāstyajātayā /<br/> anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma dang po phyin chad ni ji srid ma btang gi bar du 'das pa'i rnam par rig byed dang yang ldan no / ma 'ongs med / ma 'ongs ba'i rnam par rig byed dang ni su dang yang mi ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nivṛtānivṛtābhyāṃ ca nātītābhyāṃ samanvitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa / 'das pa dag dang ldan pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītābhyāmapi nivṛtānivṛtāvyākṛtābhyāṃ vijñaptibhyāṃ na kaścitsamanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgribs pa dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed 'das pa dag dang yang 'ga' yang ldan pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos nyam chung ba'i thob pa yang nyam chung ba yin pas rjes su 'brel ba can ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṅkṛtaṃ tasyā daurbalyam /<br/> cittakṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de cis nyam chung bar byas she na / sems kyis byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittasyāpi tarhi nivṛtāvyākṛtasya mā bhūt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi dang yang mi ldan par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naitadevam /<br/> jaḍā hi vijñaptiḥ paratantrā ca /<br/> na caivaṃ cittam /<br/> sā hi vijñaptirdurbalenotthāpitā durbalatarā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni de lta ma yin te / rnam par rig byed blun pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang yin pa de ltar sems ni de lta ma yin la / nyam chung du blangs pa de ni ches nyam chung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvarastha ityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa zhes gang bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko 'yamasaṃvaro nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karmaṃ tatpathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa min dang nyes spyad dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las de'i lam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvarasyeme paryāyaśabdāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni sdom pa ma yin pa'i rnam grangs kyi sgra ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kāyavācorasaṃvaraṇādasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la lus dang ngag mi sdom pa'i phyir sdom pa ma yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sadbhiḥ kutsitatvādaniṣṭaphalatvād duścaritam /<br/> śīlavipakṣāddauḥśīlyam /<br/> kāyavākkarmatvātkarma /<br/> maulasaṃgṛhītatvātkarmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dam pa rnams kyis smad pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir nyes par spyod pa yin no / tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin no / lus dang ngag gi las yin pa'i phyir las so / dngos kyis bsdus pa'i phyir las kyi lam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādvijñaptyā samanvāgato nāvijñaptyeti catuṣkoṭikam /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> vijñaptyaivānvitaḥ kurvanmadhyastho mṛducetanaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed dang ldan la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang mi ldan pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi ste / de la re zhig / bar ma dor gnas sems zhan pas / byed na rnam rig nyid dang ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ /<br/> tyaktānutpannavijñaptiravijñaptyāryapudgalaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa yang ma yin sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas pa zhig sems zhan pas dge ba'am mi dge ba zhig byed na rnam par rig byed kho na dang ldan gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ni ma yin na / lung du ma bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang las kyi lam ni ma gtogs so / rnam rig btang dang ma skyes pa'i / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam /<br/> uktaṃ saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthānāṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisamanvāgamanavyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig tshe gzhan du yongs su gyur nas da dung du rnam par rig byed ma byung ba'am / rnam par rig byed rnam par nyams na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na dang ldan gyi rnam par rig byed dang ni ma yin no / sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang bar ma la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan pa rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaite saṃvarāḥ kathaṃ labhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sdom pa de dag ji ltar 'thob ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānajo dhyanabhūmyaiva labhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi / sa nyid kyis 'thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt /<br/> anāsravastayā /<br/> āryayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe bsam gtan gyi sa pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa dngos gzhi pa'am / nyer bsdogs pa 'thob pa de'i tshe bsam gtan gyi sdom pa yang 'thob ste / lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro / zag med ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayaiva dhyānabhūmyā 'nāsravayā labhyamānayā 'nāsravaḥ saṃvaro labhyate /<br/> tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni anāgamyasyānantaraṃ ceti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> prātimokṣākhyaḥ paravijñapanādibhiḥ /<br/> prātimokṣasaṃvarastu paravijñaptito labhyate /<br/> yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param /<br/> sa punaḥ saṃghādvā pudgalādvā /<br/> saṃdhādbhīkṣubhikṣuṇīśikṣamāṇāsaṃvarāḥ pudgalāddanye /<br/> daśavidhā upasaṃpaditi vinayavibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> tasya ūpasaṃgrahaṇārthamādiśabdaḥ /<br/> svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā yaśaḥprabhṛtīnām śāsturabhyupagamānmahākāśyapasya praśnārādhanena sodāyinaḥ gurudharmābhyupagamena mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti teṣāṃ nāvaśyaṃ vijñaptyadhīnaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags des / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyis 'thob pa de nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i sdom pa yang 'thob bo / de la zag pa med pa ni bsam gtan gyi sa drug po bsam gtan bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o / so sor thar ces pa / gzhan gyi rnam rig byed sogs kyis / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni gal te / 'di la gzhan gyis rnam par rig par byed la / 'di yang gzhan la rnam par rig par byed na gzhan gyi rnam par rig byed las 'thob bo / de yang de dge 'dun nam gang zag las te / dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge slong ma'i sdom pa rnams ni dge 'dun las so / gzhan dag ni gang zag las so / bye brag tu smra ba 'dul ba pa rnams na re rnam pa bcus bsnyen par rdzogs so zhes zer ba bsdu ba'i phyir sogs pa'i sgra smos te / rang 'byung gis ni sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so / nges par 'jug pas ni rten lnga po rnams so / dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas ni grags pa la sogs pa rnams so / ston par khas blangs pas ni 'od srungs chen po'o / dri ba mnyes pas ni legs sbyin no / bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'o / pho nyas ni chos sbyin no / 'dul ba 'dzin par gtogs pa lngas ni mtha' 'khob kyi mi rnams so / bcu'i tshogs kyis ni dbus kyi mi rnams so / skyabs su 'gro ba lan gsum bzlas pas ni sde bzang drug cu'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa rnams te / de dag gi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed la rag lus pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ /<br/> yāvajjīvaṃ samādānamahorātraṃ ca saṃvṛteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de yang dag par blangs pa na dus ji srid cig gi bar du yang dag par blang bar bya zhe na / ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu / sdom pa yang dag blang bar bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> dvau hi kālaparyantau /<br/> ahorātraparyanto jīvitaparyantaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ris bdun gyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang dag par blang bar bya'o / bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni nyin zhag tu'o zhes bya ba de ltar nges so / ci'i phyir zhe na / dus kyi mtha' ni gnyis te / srog gi mtha' dang nyin zhag gi mtha'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahārotrāṇāṃ paunaruktyena pakṣādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zla ba phyed la sogs pa ni nyin zhag bzlas pas so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kālo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus zhes bya ba'i chos de ci zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskāraparidīpanādhivacanametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'du byed yongs su ston pa'i tshig bla dags yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālokāvasthā hi dvīpeṣu divasa ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snang ba'i gnas skabs la ni gling dag na nyin par zhes bya la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tamo 'vasthā rātriḥ /<br/> yuktaṃ tāvajjīvitādūrdhvaṃ satyapi samādāne saṃvarasyānutpattiḥ /<br/> visabhāgatvādāśrayasya tena ca tatrāprayogādasmaraṇācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mun pa'i gnas skabs la ni mtshan mo zhes bya'o / re zhig ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ni yang dag par blangs pa yod kyang lus skal ba mi 'dra ba'i phyir dang des kyang / der sbyor ba ma byas pa'i phyir dang mi dran pa'i phyir dang sdom pa mi skye bar rigs na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang nyin zhag gi 'og zhag lnga 'am zhag bcu yang rung ste / bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa yang mang po skye ba la su zhig bgegs byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itthamasti pratibandho yadbhagavānahorātrikamevopavāsaṃ sūtre śāstisma /<br/> idamidānīṃ saṃpradhāryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las gang nyin zhag gi bsnyen gnas kho na bstan pa 'dis na bgegs byed pa yod do / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti /<br/> kutastvetadevaṃ tarkyate /<br/> ahorātrāt pareṇāpi saṃvarotpattau yuktyavirodhāt /<br/> tadetatkasyacidapyahorātrādūrdhvamadeśanāṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> asaṃvarasyedānīṃ kaḥ kālaniyamaḥ /<br/> nāsaṃvaro 'styahorātraṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ci bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nyin zhag gi 'og tu sdom pa mi skye bar gzigs nas nyin zhag pa'i bsnyen gnas bstan tam / 'on te dbang po gdul dka' ba rnams nyin zhag pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i ched gcig yin / de de ltar brtag ga la nus / phyin chad sdom pa skye ba la yang rigs pa dang 'gal ba ni med pa'i phyir ro / phyin chad po 'di su la yang ma bstan pas bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni mi 'dod do / da ni sdom pa ma yin pa'i dus nges pa gang yin zhe na / nyin zhag pa yi sdom min med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvajjīvaṃ pāpakarmābhyupagamādasaṃvara upajāyate nāhorātraṃ yathopavāsaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> na kilaivaṃ pragṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdig pa'i chos khas blangs pa las sdom pa ma yin pa skye'o ji ltar bsnyen gnas pa bzhin du nyin zhag pa ni med do / ci'i phyir zhe na / de de ltar nod med ces grag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /<br/> kutsitatvātkarmaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar bsnyen gnas pa ltar bdag ni nyin zhag gcig tu sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas par gyur cig ces sdom pa ma yin pa yang dag par len pa ni su yang med de / las smad pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti /<br/> yāvajjīvamapyasya lābho na syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na bdag ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas par gyur cig ces len pa ni su yang med pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang de 'thob par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de ltar mi len mod kyi 'on kyang gtan du log par zhugs pa'i bsam pas bya ba de byed pa na sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob par 'gyur gyi dus gzhan gyi bar du log bar zhugs pas ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upavāsasaṃvarastu samādānabalādhānādanātyantike 'pyāśaye labhyata eva /<br/> saṃvarārthitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ni gtan du ba'i bsam pa ma yin yang sdom pa don du gnyer ba'i phyir yang dab par len pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'thob pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so 'vaśyaṃ labheta /<br/> na tvedadṛṣṭamiti naivaṃ vyavasthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'ga' zhig sdom pa ma yin pa don du gnyer zhing dus gzhan gyi bar du sdom pa ma yin pa yang dag par len par 'gyur na des kyang gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro / de ni ma mthong bas de ltar rnam par mi gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptivadasaṃvaro 'pi nāsti dravyata iti sautrāntikāḥ /<br/> sa eva tu pāpakriyābhisaṃdhirasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams na re sdom pa ma yin pa yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin du rdzas su ni med kyi sdig pa bya ba'i bsam pa rjes su 'brel pa dang bcas pa de nyid sdom pa ma yin pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sānubandho yataḥ kuśalacitto 'pi tadvānucyate /<br/> tasyānirākṛtatvāt /<br/> athāhorātraṃ gṛhyamāṇa upavāsaḥ kathaṃ grahītavyaḥ /<br/> kālyaṃ grāhyo 'nyato nīcaiḥ sthitenoktānuvāditā /<br/> upavāsaḥ samagrāṅgo nirbhuṣeṇāniśākṣayāt /<br/> kālyaṃ tāvatsūryodayakāle ahorātrikatvātsaṃvarasya /<br/> yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt /<br/> anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham /<br/> nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra sthāsyāt /<br/> agauravasya hi saṃvaro notpadyate /<br/> dātuśca vacanamanubruvīta /<br/> na pūrvaṃ na yugapat /<br/> evaṃ hyasau parasmāt gṛhīto bhavati /<br/> anyathā hi dānagrahaṇaṃ na sidhyet /<br/> samagrāṅgaścāṣṭāṅga eva grahītavyo na vikalāṅgaḥ /<br/> nirbhūṣeṇa ca /<br/> ājasrikamabhyalaṅkāraṃ muktvā /<br/> ājasriko hyalaṅkāro nātyarthaṃ madamādadhāti /<br/> ārātriparikṣayācca grahītavyo yāvat punaḥ sūryodayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na sems dge ba la yang de ma spangs pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa zhes bya'o / yang bsnyen gnas nyin zhag tu nod na ci ltar mnod par bya zhe na / dma' bar 'dug smras bzlas pa yis / mi brgyan nam ni nang par du / bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni / nang par gzhan las mnod par bya / dma' bar 'dug pa ni tsog tsog por 'dug pa'am pus mo btsugs nas / thal mo snol ba'am thal mo sbyar ba ste / nad pa ni ma gtogs so / ma gus pa ni sdom pa mi skye'o / 'bogs pa pos tshig ma smras par sngar yang smra bar mi bya la kha bsnyams te smra bar yang mi bya ste / de ltar na 'di gzhan las mnos pa yin gyi gzhan du 'bogs pa dang nod pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro / mi brgyan pa ni rgyan nar ma ma gtogs te rgyan nar ma ni mtshar gcig rgyags par mi byed do / nam nangs kyi bar du mnod par bya ba ni nyi ma shar gyi bar du'o / yan lag brgyad tshang bar mnod par bya ba'i yan lag ma tshang bar ni ma yin no / nang par ni re zhig nyi ma shar ba'i tshe ste / nyin zhag pa'i sdom pa yin pa'i phyir ro / gang gis tshes brgyad la rtag tu bsnyen gnas la gnas par bya'o zhes sngon yang dag par blang bar byas pa de ni zas zos nas kyang mnod par bya'o / gzhan las mnod par bya'i bdag nyid las ni ma yin te / gzhan la ltos pas ni rkyen yod kyang mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang de las gzhan du mnos pa ni legs par spyad pa tsam du 'gyur gyi bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'nyathā gṛhṇataḥ sucaritamātraṃ syānnatūpavāsasaṃvaraḥ /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na shan pa dang byi bo byed pa dag gis mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bsnyen gnas dag kyang 'bras bu yod par rung ngo / 'dis dgra bcom pa dag dang nye bar gnas par byed pas na bsnyen gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhatāṃ samīpe vasantyanenetyupavāsasteṣāmanuśikṣaṇāt /<br/> yāvajjīvikasaṃvarasamīpe vasantyanene tyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi rjes su slob pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re 'dis ji srid 'tsho'i bar gyi sdom pa dang nye bar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alpakuśalamūlānāṃ kuśalamūlapoṣaṇāt poṣadha iti vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsos 'debs pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila poṣadho 'yamiti /<br/> kimarthaṃ punaraṣṭāṅganyupādīyante /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang phyir yid kyi dge ba gsos 'debs de yi phyir / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong bshad ces grag / zhes 'byung bas na gso sbyong yin no / ci'i phyir yan lag brgyad nod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlāṅgānyapramādāṅgaṃ vratāṅgāni yathākramam /<br/> catvāryekaṃ tathā trīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims yan lag bag yod pa'i / yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste / bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāri tāvacchīlāṅgāni yāvanmṛṣāvādaviratiḥ /<br/> prakṛtisāvadyaviratitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i bar bzhi ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba spong ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekamapramādāṅga madyapānādviratiḥ /<br/> samāttaśīlo 'pi madyapaḥ pramādyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba gcig pu ni bag yod pa'i yan lag ste myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba ni tshul khrims rdzogs kyang bag med par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi vṛtāṅgāni yāvadakālabhojanādviratiḥ /<br/> saṃvegānuguṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba'i bar gsum ni skye bo'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir brtul zhugs kyi yan lag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarebhirapramādāṅgavṛtāṅgairanupāttaiḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci bag yod pa'i yan lag dang brtul zhugs kyi yan lag 'di dag ma mnos pas cir 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtināśo madaśca taiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yis dran nyams dregs par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pas ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i dran pa nyams pa nyid du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uccaśayanamahāśayananṛttagītādikaṃ pratisevamānasya madaḥ saṃbhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po dang gar dang glu la sogs pa bsten pas ni dregs par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mattasya ca dauḥśīlyamadūraṃ bhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dregs par gyur pa la ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims thag mi ring bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāle punarbhuñjānasyocitabhaktakālaparihārādupavāsasmṛtiḥ saṃvegaścopatiṣṭhet /<br/> tadabhāvādubhayaṃ na syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus su za zhing zas nar ma'i dus su yongs su spangs pa las ni bsnyen gnas kyi dran pa dang skyo ba'i dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / de med na gnyi ga yang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecittu khalvakālabhojanāt prativiratimevopavāsaṃ manyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang kha cig ni dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba kho na 'dir bsnyen gnas yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya śeṣāṇyaṣṭāṅgānīti /<br/> nṛtyagotavāditraṃ gandhamālyavilepanaṃ ca dvayaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams ni 'di'i yan lag yin te gar dang glu dang rol mo dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byung pa ni 'dir gnyis su bya'o snyam du sems so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta /<br/> akālabhojanādvirati muktvā anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar yin na ni dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba bka' stsal nas yan lag brgyad pa 'dis 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo / rjes su bgyid do zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig mi rung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kastarhi so 'nya upavāso yasyemānyaṅgāni /<br/> samudāyasyāvayavā aṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na yan lag brgyad po 'di dag gang gi yin pa'i bsnyen gnas gzhan de gang zhig yin bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dus pa'i yan lag rnams ni yan lag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga upavāso draṣṭavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing rta'i yan lag dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang phye ma yan lag lnga pa ji lta bur bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca /<br/> dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba ni bsnyen gnas kyang yin la / bsnyen gnas kyi yan lag kyang yin te / dper na yang dag pa'i lta ba lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin pa dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan kyang yin la bsam gtan gyi yan lag kyang yin pa bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi yan lag nyid du rung ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa snga ma rnams phyi ma rnams kyi yan lag tu 'gyur na ni skad cig ma dang po la skyes pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ khalvayamupavāsakasyaivopavāsa āhosvidanyasyāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci bsnyen gnas 'di dge bsnyen kho na la yod dam / 'on te gzhan la yang yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyasyāpyupavāso 'sti śaraṇaṃ tvagatasya na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi / skyabs su ma song ba la med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā /<br/> anyatrājñānāt /<br/> sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen ma yin pa la yang gang zhig nyin zhag de la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ste / bsnyen gnas nod pa de la bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa skye bar 'gyur te / gzhan du ni ma yin no / mi shes ba ni ma gtogs so / mdo las / ming chen 'di ltar khyim pa gos dkar po bgos pa skyes pa po'i dbang po dang ldan pa zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyatā upāvāsako bhavatīti /<br/> tat kiṃ śaraṇagamanādevopavāsako bhavati /<br/> bhavatīti bahirdeśakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes tshig tu yang smra na 'di tsam gyis dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de ci skyabs su 'gro ba kho nas dge bsnyen du 'gyur ram zhe na / nyi 'og pa rnams na re 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vinā saṃvareṇeti kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che ba rnams na re sdom pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang mdo las gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstyatra virodhaḥ /<br/> yasmādasyotpadyate tata eva /<br/> upāsakatvopagamātsaṃvṛt /<br/> upāsakatvābhyupagamādevāsyopāsakasaṃvaro jāyate /<br/> yadevābhyupagacchatyupāsakaṃ māṃ dhārayetyādyagreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇāpetamiti /<br/> prāṇātipātādyapetamityartho madhyapadalopāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la 'gal ba med de / 'di ltar dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pa de kho na 'di'i sdom pa skye bar 'gyur te / gang gi tshe bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol / deng slan chad nam ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo zhes dge bsnyen du khas blangs pa kho na sa'i di'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa skye bar 'gyur ro / srog gcod pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laghusaṃvarasyāpi vyutpādanārthaṃ śikṣāpadānām /<br/> uktistu bhikṣuvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro / sdom pa thob kyang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dge slong bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā saṃvareṇopāsako 'sti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar dge slong dang dge sbyong gi sdom pa thob zin kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi 'di dang 'di ltar du bsdam mo zhes bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang 'dzin du 'jug pa ltar dge bsnyen yang de dang 'dra bas sdom pa med pa'i dge bsnyen ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve cet saṃvṛtā ekadeśakāryādayaḥ katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te thams cad sdom yin na / sna gcig spyod sogs ji lta bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ /<br/> tatpālanāt kila proktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dge bsnyen thams cad dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa yin na bcom ldan 'das kyis sna gcig spyod pa dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang phal cher spyod pa dang yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu yin / de bsrung ba la gsungs zhes grags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ /<br/> sarve tu samaṃ saṃvarasthāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bslab pa'i gzhi gang srung bar byed pa ni de spyod pa zhes gsungs par zad kyi thams cad kyang sdom pa la gnas par ni 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamutsūtraṃ vartate /<br/> kimatrotsūtram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni mdo las 'das pa yin no / 'dir ci zhig mdo las 'das
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāsakatvābhyupagamādeva saṃvaralābho yasmāt prāṇatipātamityāheti /<br/> na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ /<br/> tatraiva copāsakalakṣaṇopadeśo nānyatra /<br/> yatra tveṣa pāṭho yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇāpetaṃ śaraṇagatamabhiprasannamiti /<br/> tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma /<br/> jīvitaheto rapyabhavyā vayamenaṃ dharmaṃ parityaktumiti /<br/> na tveṣa lakṣaṇopadeśaḥ saṃvarasya /<br/> prāṇāpetaṃ tu na kvacit paṭhyate /<br/> kaścaitadaparisphuṭārthaṃ paṭhet /<br/> ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate /<br/> kuto visarjanamāveṇikadharmāṇām /<br/> ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar srog gcod pa spong ngo zhes dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pa kho nas sdom pa 'thob par gsungs so zhes bya ba ste / mdo'i tshig ni de lta ma yin no / mdo'i tshig ji lta bu yin zhe na / ji ltar ming chen gyi mdo las gsungs pa las 'byung ba bzhin te / de nyid las dge bsnyen gyi mtshan nyid bstan gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no / gang las 'di skad du nam 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngo ba skyabs su song ba mngon par rab tu dang ba zhes 'byung ba der ni bden pa mthong ba de dag bdag cag gis srog la thug kyang chos 'di btang du mi rung ngo zhes shes nas dad pa'i rgyus srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos la khas 'che bar ston pa yin gyi de sdom pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa ni ma yin no / srog gcod pa spong ba zhes ni gang nas kyang mi 'byung na su zhig yongs su mi gsal ba'i don 'di 'don par byed / tshul khrims nyams pa'i dbang du byas nas ni sna gcig spyod pa la sogs pa zhu ba nyid kyang mi 'thad na lan lta smos kyang ci dgos te / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa zhes pa su zhig gang zhig bslab pa'i gzhi gang nyams par mi byed pa de ni de spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate /<br/> kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i tshang mi shes pas bslab pa'i gzhi de tsam zhig bzod pa la ni btsun pa ji tsam gyis na sna gcig spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba nas yongs su rdzogs par spyod pha [*pa?] lags zhes bya ba'i bar du zhu ba 'di rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sdom pa med ba'am ma tshang bar yang dge bsnyen du 'gyur na dge slong dang dge sbyong dag tu yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvadeṣāmupāsakasaṃvarādīnāmaṅgapratiniyamo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ji ltar na dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi yan lag nges pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstṛprajñaptivaśāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ston pas btags pa'i dbang gis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upāsakatvādipratiniyamo 'pi śāstṛprajñaptivaśādiṣyatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen nyid la sogs pa yang ston pas btags pa'i dbang gis so sor nges par 'dod par gyis shig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ /<br/> sarveṣāṃ tu saṃvarāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge bsnyen ni sdom pa med par yang btags kyi dge slong dang dge sbyong dag ni ma yin no / kha che ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do / sdom pa thams cad kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdvāditvaṃ yathā manaḥ /<br/> mṛdumadhyādhimātratvaṃ sasaṃtānacittavaśāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chung ngu la sogs yid ji bzhin / chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po nyid ni yang dag par len pa'i sems kyi dbang gis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt pṛthagjanasyādhimātraḥ /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ saṃvaragrahaṇādevopāsakaḥ syādvinā śaraṇagamanaiḥ /<br/> na syādanyatrājñānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na dgra bcom pa la yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa chung ngu yod la / so so'i skye bo la yang chen po yod par 'gyur ro / yang ci skyabs su 'gro ba med par yang sdom pa mnos pa kho nas dge bsnyen du 'gyur ram zhe na / mi 'gyur te mi shes pa ni ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati /<br/> buddhasaṃghakarāndharmānaśaikṣānubhayāṃśca saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba de ci la skyabs su 'gro zhe na / gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro de / sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa dang gnyi ga dang / mya ngan 'das la skyabs su 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati /<br/> ke punaste
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te / gang dag gtso bor gyur pas sku de sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa'am / yang na gang dag brnyes pas thams cad thugs su chud par spyod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayajñānādayaḥ saparivārāḥ /<br/> rūpakāyasya pūrvaṃ paścāccāviśeṣāt /<br/> kiṃ sarvabuddhānathaikam /<br/> lakṣaṇataḥ sarvabudhān /<br/> mārgasyāvilakṣāṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang gang zhe na / zad pa shes pa la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa yin no / gzugs kyi sku ni snga ma dang phyi mar yang bye brag med pa'i phyir ro / ci sangs rgyas thams cad la'am / 'on te gcig la zhe na / mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas ni sangs rgyas thams cad la ste / lam mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni dge 'dun du byed pa'i chos slob pa dang mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te / gang dag thob pas gang zag brgyad po mi phyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun du 'gyur ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhedatvāt /<br/> kiṃ sarvasaṃghānathaikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci dge 'dun thams cad la'am / 'on te gcig la zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lakṣaṇataḥ sarvasaṃghānmārgasyāvilakṣaṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas ni thams cad la ste / lam mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattu sūtra uktaṃ yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi śaraṇaṃ gacchatami ti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang mdo las gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la yang skyabs su song zhig zhes gsungs so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpratyakṣabhāvinaḥ saṃvaratvasyodbhāvanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun dkon mchog brjod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig chos la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svaparasaṃtānaklelśānāṃ duḥkhasya ca śāntyekalakṣaṇātvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa rnams dang sdug bsngal zhi bar mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi slob pa'i chos dag kho na sangs rgyas yin na ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung bas mtshams med par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayavipādanātte 'pi vipāditā bhavantīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / rten la gnod pa byas pas de dag la yang gnod pa byas pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> buddhakarakā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las ni mi slob pa'i chos kho na sangs rgyas yin no zhes de skad du mi 'byung ngo / 'o na ji skad du 'byung zhe na / sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos zhes 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata āśrayasya buddhatvāpratiṣedhādacodyamevaitat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rten sangs rgyas nyid du ma bkag pas de ni klan kar mi rung pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'jig rten pa'i sems la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyang ma yin par 'gyur / dgra bcom pa yang ma yin par 'gyur la dge slong du byed pa'i tshul khrims kho na yang dge slong du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar gang zhig dge slong la mchod pa byed pa de dge slong du byed pa'i tshul khrims la mchod pa byed pa yin pa de bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de yang mi slob pa sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos dag la skyabs su 'gro ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati so 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikānbuddharmānityapare /<br/> kiṃsvabhāvāni śaraṇagamanāni /<br/> vāgvijñaptisvabhāvāni /<br/> kaḥ punaḥ śaraṇārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skyabs su 'gro ba yin no zhes zer ro / skyabs su 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na / ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi ngo bo nyid dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trāṇārthaḥ śaraṇārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang skyabs kyi don ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadāśrayeṇa sarvaduḥkhātyantanirmokṣāt /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā /<br/> bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca /<br/> ārāmānvṛkṣāṃścaityāṃśca manuṣyā bhayavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la brten nas sdug bsngal thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir ro / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni / phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang / kun dga' dang ni mchod gnas kyi / ljon shing rnams la skyabs 'gro ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvetaccharaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naitaccharaṇamuttamam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing / skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naitaccharaṇamāgamya sarvaduḥkhātpramucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyabs de la ni brten nas kyang / sdug bsngal kun las mi grol gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /<br/> catvāri cāryasatyāni paśyati prajñayā yadā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang tshe gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun skyabs song la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamutpādaṃ duḥkhasya samatikramam /<br/> āryaṃ cāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ kṣemaṃ nirvāṇagāminam /<br/> etaddhi śaraṇaṃ śreṣṭhametaccharaṇamuttamam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang / sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang / 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bde ba / mya ngan 'das par 'gro 'gyur dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag / shes rab kyis ni lta byed pa / skyabs de gtso bo yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etaccharaṇamāgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa yin / skyabs de la ni brten nas kyang / sdug bsngal kun las 'grol bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eta eva śaraṇagamanāni sarvasaṃvarasamādāneṣu dvārabhūtāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gsungs te / de nyid kyi phyir skyabs su 'gro ba rnams ni sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa thams cad la sgor gyur pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt /<br/> mithyācārātigarhyatvātsaukaryādakriyāptitaḥ /<br/> kāmamithyācāro hi loke 'tyantaṃ garhitaḥ /<br/> pareṣāṃ dāropaghātādāpāyikatvācca /<br/> na tathā 'brahmacaryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir sdom pa gzhan dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par bzhag la / dge bsnyen la ni 'dod pas log par gyem pa las spong ba bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par gzhag ce na / log gyem shin tu smad phyir dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran /<br/> āryāścākaraṇasaṃvaraṃ kāmamithyācārāt pratilabhante /<br/> janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sla phyir mi byed thob phyir ro / 'dod pas log par gyem pa ni gzhan dag gi chung ma sun 'byin pa'i phyir dang ngan song ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shin tu smad pa yin gyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin pa dang khyim na gnas pa 'dod pas log par gyem pa las bsdams bla'i mi tshangs par spyod pa las ni dka' ba'i phyir / dka' ba byed par mi spra bar 'gyur ba dang 'phags pa rnams che rabs gzhan dag tu yang mi spyod pa'i phyir 'dod pas log par gyem pa mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob kyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin pas slob pa tshe rabs gzhan du gyur pa dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa ma yin par 'gyur du 'ong bas dge bsnyen la yang de kho na las ldog pa sdom par rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akriyāniyamo hyakaraṇasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi byed par nges pa ni mi byed pa'i sdom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag dge bsnyen yin bzhin du chung ma len par byed na ci de dag gis de las kyang sdom pa thob bam / 'on te ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratilabdho mā bhūt prādeśikasaṃvaralābha iti /<br/> kathaṃ saṃvarakṣobho na bhavati /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyi tshe ba'i sdom pa thob par 'gyur du 'ong bas 'thob bo / ji ltar na sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na / 'di ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtateḥ /<br/> yathā hyeṣāmabhyupagamastathā saṃvaralābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ji ltar khas blangs bzhin / 'thob kyi rgyud las ma yin no / de dag gi sdom pa ni ji ltar khas len pa de bzhin 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ caiṣāmabhyupagamaḥ /<br/> kāmamithyācārādviramāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ji ltar khas len zhe na bdag 'dod pas log par gyem pa spong ngo zhes khas len gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gi rgyud 'di la mi tshangs par spyod par mi bya'o zhes ni ma yin te / de'i phyir de dag gis gzhi de las 'dod pas log par gyem pa'i yan lag kho na sdom pa 'thob kyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni ma yin pas chung mar gyur pa la sdom pa nyams pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ /<br/> ebhireva ca tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir brdzun du smra ba spong ba kho na dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la bslab pa'i yan lag tu bzhag la phra ma la sogs pa las ni ma yin zhe na / rgyu gsum pa de dag nyid kyi phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛṣāvādātigarhyatvāt saukaryādakriyāptitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brdzun smra shin tu smad phyir dang / sla phyir mi byed 'thob phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛṣāvādaprasaṅgācca sarvaśikṣāvyatikrame
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bslab pa thams cad 'das gyur na / brdzun du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bslab pa thams cad du 'das na dri bar bya ba la bdag gis de lta bu ma byas so zhes bya ba 'di nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / brdzun du sma ba thal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji ltar na 'das par byas kyang bdag nyid 'chags par 'gyur snyam nas brdzun du smra ba las zlog pa bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam /<br/> pratikṣepaṇasāvadyānmadyādeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'dir bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par ma bzhag ce na / bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba / myos 'gyur las / rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇaṃ madyādeva nānyasmāt /<br/> anyaguptaye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba kho na las yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin zhe na gzhan srung phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madyaṃ pivato 'nyānyapyaṅgānyaguptāni syuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs na yan lag gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang mi srung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punarmadyapānaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyaṃ gamyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yin par shes she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakṛtisāvadyalakṣaṇābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakṛtisāvadyaṃ hi kliṣṭenaiva cittenādhyācaryate /<br/> śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ni sems nyon mongs pa can kho nas spyod pa yin na chang ni ji srid myos par mi 'gyur bar gnyen po'i blo kho nas btung bar nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭameva taccittaṃ yanmadanīyaṃ jñātvā pibati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang myos par 'gyur ba yin par shes nas 'thung ba'i sems de nyid nyon mongs pa can yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang myos par mi 'gyur ba'i drod rig nas 'thung ba de ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakṛtisāvadyaṃ madyamiti vinayadharāḥ /<br/> kathaṃ bhadanta glāna upasthātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams na re myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yin te / btsun pa ji ltar bro gyog bgyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakṛtisāvadyamupālin sthāpayitvā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye ba 'khor rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs pa zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śākyeṣu ca glāneṣu madyapānaṃ nābhyanujñātam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sh'akya nad pa rnams la yang myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba ma gnang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate /<br/> āryaiśca janmāntaragatairapyanadhyācārāt /<br/> prāṇivadhādivat /<br/> kāyaduścaritavacanāddurgatigamanācceti /<br/> netyābhidhārmikāḥ /<br/> utsargavihitasyāpi glāneṣu prajñaptisāvadyasya punarmadyasyāpavādaḥ prasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ madnīyamātrānīyamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du dge slong dag nga ston pa yin par smra ba rnams kyis myos par 'gyur ba rtsva'i rtse mos kyang btung bar mi bya'o zhes kyang gsungs te / de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yin par mngon no / srog gcod pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'phags pa rnams tshe 'phos kyang mi spyod pa'i phyir dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa zhes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re / ma yin te / nad pa rnams la bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spyir bstan mod kyi / yang myos par 'gyur ba'i drod ma nges par thal bar 'gyur ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba dmigs kyis bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva kuśāgrapānapratiṣedhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir rtsva'i rtse mos 'thung ba bkag pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryairanadhyācaraṇaṃ hrīmattvāttena ca smṛtināśāt /<br/> alpakasyāpyapānamaniyamādviṣavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rnams mi spyod pa ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i phyir dang des kyang dran pa nyams par byed pa'i phyir cung zad kyang mi gsol te / dug bzhin du ma nges pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duścaritavacanaṃ pramādasthānatvāt /<br/> ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt /<br/> atyāsevitena durgatigamanābhidhānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes par spyod pa zhes 'byung ba ni bag med pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te / de nyid kyi phyir 'di la bag med pa'i gnas zhes smos kyi gzhen dag la ni ma yin te / de dag la ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma thob yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatprasaṅgenābhīkṣṇamakuśalasaṃtatipravṛtterāpāyikasya karmaṇa ākṣepādvṛttilābhādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ha cang kun du bsten pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar gsungs pa ni de'i zhar la mi dge ba'i rgyun yang dang yang du 'jug pas ngan song ba'i las 'phen pa 'am 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānamiti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> surā anāsavaḥ /<br/> maireyaṃ dravāsavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / 'bru'i chang ni zas las sbyar ba'i btung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam /<br/> pūgaphalakodravādayo 'pi madayantīti surāmaireyagrahaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyar ba'i chang ni rdzas las sbyar ba'i btung ba'o / de dag kyang res 'ga' myos par 'gyur ba'i dngos por ma red pa'am yal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba zhes bya bar smos so / gla gor zho sha dang khre rgod la sogs pa yang myos par byed pas 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang zhes bya ba smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñaptisāvadyasyāpyādareṇa praheyatve kāraṇajñāpanārthaṃ pramādasthānavacanam /<br/> sarvapramādāspadatvāditi /<br/> ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sarvobhayebhyaḥ kāmāpto vartamānebhya āpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yin yang bag med pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas bsgrims te spang par bya ba nyid yin pa'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir bag med pa'i gnas zhes smos so / ci so sor thar pa dang bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang gsum po 'di dag gang las gcig 'thob pa de las lhag ma dag thob pa'am zhe na / ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ji lta bu zhe na / 'dod gtogs thams cad gnyi ga dang / da ltar dag las 'thob par 'gyur / 'dod gtogs zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvebhya iti maulaprayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad las zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate /<br/> sattvādhiṣṭānapravṛttatvāt nātītānāgatebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga las zhes bya ba ni sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa dang rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha na mtho ba las so / sems can gyi rten la 'jug pa'i phyir da ltar gyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched kho na las 'thob kyi 'das pa dang ma 'das pa dag las ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmasattvasaṃkhyātatvāt /<br/> maulebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni sems can du mi bgrang ba'i phyir ro / bsam gtan zag med sdom pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi /<br/> ata eva catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos dang dus ni thams cad la / bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni las kyi lam dngos kho na las 'thob kyi sbyor ba dang mjug las kyang ma yin na bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos / dus thams cad kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched las 'thob ste / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag las kyang 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir gang dag las so sor thar pa'i sdom pa 'thob la bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag ma yin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched de dag kyang yod ces bya ba rgyas par mu bzhir 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ sāmantakapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po ni da ltar byung ba'i nyer bsdogs dang mjug dag dang bcas pa'i kha na ma thob las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā 'tītānāgatebhyo maulebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi lam dngos dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā pratyutpannebhyo maulebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni da ltar byung ba'i las kyi lam dngos dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyatītānāgatebhyaḥ sāmantakapṛṣṭhemyaḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyer bsdogs dang mjug dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa 'thob ba'i tshe na da ltar gyi las kyi lam rnams med pas da ltar gyi gzhi can las zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatānāmeva saṃvaraṇaṃ yujyate nātītavartamānānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa rnams kho na las sdom par rung gi 'das pa dang da ltar gyi rnams la ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ /<br/> niyataṃ tāvat labhyate /<br/> saṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo vibhāṣā tvaṅgakāraṇaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dag sems can thams cad dang yan lag thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyis 'thob bam / 'on te bye brag ci yod ce na / re zhig nges par / sdom pa sems can thams cad las / 'thob la / yan lag rgyu la dbye ba yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā /<br/> kaścit sarvebhyo labhyate /<br/> bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ /<br/> kaściccaturbhyaḥ /<br/> tato 'nyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ni sems can thams cad las 'thob pa nyid de 'ga' las ma yin no /  / yan lag las ni dbye ba ni yod de / la la ni thams cad las 'thob ste / dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmapathā hi saṃvarasyāṅgāni /<br/> kāraṇairapi kenacit paryāyeṇa sarvaiḥ kenacidekena /<br/> kena tāvatsarvaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la ni gzhi las te de las gzhan pa'o / las kyi lam rnams ni sdom pa'i yan lag dag yin no / rgyu las kyang rnam grangs la la las ni thams cad kyis so / la la las ni gcig gis so / re zhig gang gis na thams cad kyis yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyalobhādveṣāmohāḥ kāraṇānīṣyante /<br/> kenai kena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa rgyur 'dod na'o / gang gis na gcig gis she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi mkṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi cittāni kāraṇānīṣyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sems chung du dang 'bring dang chen po dag rgyur 'dod na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam grangs tha ma nges pa la brten te smras pa / sdom pa la gnas pa sems can thams cad la bsdams la yan lag thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyi ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sems chung ngu 'am 'bring ngam chen pos dge bsnyen dang bsnyen gnas pa dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can thams cad dang yan lag thams cad kyis bsdams la rgyu thams cad kyi ma yin pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte /<br/> asti sarvasattveṣu sarvaṅgaiḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sems chung ngu'am 'bring ngam chen pos dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa'o / sems can thams cad dang yan lag thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyis bsdams pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastrividhena cittena trīn saṃvarān samādatte /<br/> asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ /<br/> ya upāsakopavāsaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarānmṛdumadhyādhimātraiḥ samādatte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sems rnam pa gsum gyis sngom pa rnam pa gsum yang dag par len pa'o / sems can thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyis bsdams pa la yan lag thams cad kyis ma yin pa yang yod do / gang zhig sems chung du dang 'bring dang chen po dag gis dge bsnyen dang bsnyen gnas dang dge sbyong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu na sarvasattveṣu syādīdṛśo nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sems can thams cad la ma bsdams pa de lta bu ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dge ba la gnas pas sdom pa 'thob kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te / sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca niyamān kurvan prātimokṣasamvaraṃ pratilabhate /<br/> sattvāṅgadeśakālasamayaniyamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa lnga po sems can dang / yan lag dang yul dang dus dang tshe nges pa mi byed na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amuṣmātsattvādviramāmīti sattvaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can che ge mo zhig las spong ngo zhes bya ba ni sems can nges pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amuṣmādaṅgādityaṅaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag che ge mo zhig las zhes bya ba ni yan lag nges pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amusmina deśa iti deśaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul che ge mo zhig tu zhes bya ba ni yul nges pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">māsādyāvaditi kālaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zla ba'i bar du zhes bya ba ni dus nges pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatra yuddhāditi samayaniyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'thab mo ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni tshe nges pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sucaritamātraṃ tu syāttathā gṛhṇataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar mnos na legs par spyad pa tsam du ni 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamaśakyebhyaḥ saṃvaralābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na mi nus pa dag las sdom pa 'thob ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvasattvajīvitānupaghātādhyāśayenābhyupagamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can thams cad kyi srog la mi gnod pa'i bsam pas khas blang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt /<br/> śakyāśakyānāmitaretarasaṃcārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gal te nus pa dag kho na las sdom pa 'thob na ni sems can nus pa dang mi nus pa rnams ni phan tshun 'pho bas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang ldan bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'thob pa dang gtong ba'i rgyu dag med par yang sdom pa 'thob pa dang gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaṃ bhavisyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar ni mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar sngon med pa'i rtsva la sogs pa skyes sam bskams na sdom pa 'phel ba dang 'grib par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du nus pa dang mi nus pa 'phos su zin kyang mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt /<br/> ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet /<br/> yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can rnams ni sngon yang yod la phyis kyang yod pa'i phyir la rtsva la sogs pa ni med pa'i phyir ro / 'di la de ltar mi nus par gyur pa dang zad par ci zhig yod pa gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas med pa kho nar gyur pa de'i tshe ji ltar sdom pa 'grib par mi 'gyur te / lan 'di ni mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātpūrvaka eva parihāraḥ sādhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gtan tshigs snga ma nyid bzang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'o na ni sngon gyi sems can ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams las sangs rgyas phyi ma rnams kyis so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ma thob pa'i phyir ji ltar tshul khrims nyung bar mi 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣāṃ sattvebhyo lābhāt /<br/> yadi hi te 'pyabhaviṣyaṃ stebhyo 'pi te 'lapsyanta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad kyis sems can thams cad las 'thob pa'i phyir te / gal te de dag kyang yod na ni de rnams kyis de dag las kyang thob par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ yataḥ saṃvaro labhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa gang las 'thob pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asamvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ /<br/> asaṃvarastu sarvasattvebhyo labhyate sarvakarmapathebhyaśca /<br/> nāsti hi vikalenāsaṃvareṇāsaṃvarikaḥ /<br/> na tu sarvakāraṇairyugapat mṛdvādicittāsaṃbhavāt /<br/> yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa min pas thams cad dang / yan lag kun las rgyus min no / sems can thams cad dang las kyi lam thams cad las 'thob ste / sdom pa ma yin pa ma tshang ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa can ni med do zhes grag go / rgyu thams cad kyis ni ma yin te / sems chung ngu la sogs pa cig car du mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / gang zhig sems chung ngus sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob ste / sems chen pos srog chags kyi srog gcod par byed na yang sdom pa ma yin pa ni chung ngu kho na dang ldan la / srog gcod pa'i rnam par rig byed ni chen po dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ madhyādhimātreṇa yojyam /<br/> tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'bring dang chen po la yang sbyar bar bya'o / de la 'di dag ni sdom pa ma yin pa can yin te / 'di lta ste / shan pa rnams dang bya gag gsod pa rnams dang phag gsod pa rnams dang bya pa rnams dang nya pa rnams dang ri dags 'chor ba rnams dang chom rkun pa rnams dang gshed ma rnams dang btson rdzi rnams dang glang po che 'chor ba rnams dang khyi 'chor ba rnams dang bku ri 'chor ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā /<br/> urabhrān ghnantīti aurabhrikāḥ /<br/> evamanye 'pi yojyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyal po dang blon po dang shags zin po rnams kyang don gyis na sdom pa ma yin no / de la gnas pas sdom pa ma yin ba yod pa'i phyir ram / 'di dag la sdom pa ma yin pa yod pas na sdom pa ma yin pa can rnams so / lug gsod pas na shan pa rnams te / gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuktastāvat saṃvarasya sarvasattvebhyo lābhaḥ /<br/> sarvasattvahitādhyāśayena grahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sdom pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pas zhes smos pas sems can thams cad las thob par yang rigs na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate /<br/> mātrādīnapi hi ta urabhrībhūtān hanyuḥ /<br/> na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shan pa la sogs par pha dang ma dang bu dang bran la sogs pa la log par ma zhugs pa'i bsam pa can 'tsho ba'i phyir yang gsod par mi 'dad pa rnams go ji ltar sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob par rung / de dag ni ma la sogs pa lug tu gyur pa yang gsod do / re zhig de dag nyid yin par shes nas ni mi gsod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt
