</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags mar gyur pa rnams la yang phyugs su gyur pa'i go skabs med na ji ltar na de dag las sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma 'ongs pa'i lus la ltos te da ltar gyi las sdom pa ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur na ni de dag lug bur gyur pa rnams kyang gtan mi gsod pas de dag las sdom pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ /<br/> etanmātrādiṣu samānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na gsod par 'dod bzhin du de dag las sdom pa ma yin par mi 'gyur / de ni ma la sogs pa la yang mtshungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na gsod par mi 'dod bzhin du de dag las sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścaurabhriko janmanāpyādatte svadāraparituṣṭo mūkaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shan pa gang zhig tsher yang ma byin par mi len / rang gi chung mas kyang chog shes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasya pūrvaṅgebhyo 'saṃvaraḥ syāt /<br/> āśayasyāvipannatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lkugs pa yang yin na ji ltar na de yan lag thams cad las sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur / bsam pa log par zhugs pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lkugs bzhin du ngag gis thob par bya ba'i don lus kyis 'thob par nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte /<br/> sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang zhig gis bslab pa'i gnas gnyis sam gsum zhig yang dag par blangs na ji lta bur 'gyur / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re sdom pa ma yin pa la ma tshang ba dang nyi tshe ba ni rnam pa thams cad du med do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā bhyupagamaṃ vikalo 'pi syāt prādeśiko 'pyasaṃvaraḥ saṃvaraścānyatrāṣṭavidhāditi sautrāntikāḥ /<br/> tanmātraśīla dauḥślīlyapratibandhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams na re ni ji ltar khas blangs pa bzhin du sdom pa ma yin pa dang rnam pa brgyad ma gtogs pa sdom pa yang ma tshang ba yod la nyi tshe ba yang yod de tshul khrims dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims de tsam gyis gegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktamidamasaṃvarasya yebhyo lābhaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ tu lābha iti noktam /<br/> tata idamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa gang dag las 'thob pa de ni bshad zin to / ji ltar 'thob pa ma bshad pas / de'i phyir 'di brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvarasya kriyayā lābho 'bhyupagamena vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa min pa bya ba 'am / khas len pa las 'thob par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmasaṃvaro labhyate /<br/> vadhaprayogakriyayā tatkulīnaiḥ tatkarmābhyupagamāccānyatra kulīnaiḥ /<br/> vayamapyanayā jīvikayā jīviṣyāma iti /<br/> śeṣāvijñaptilābhastu kṣetrādānādarehanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis 'thob ste / de'i rigs su skyes pa rnams ni gsod par sbyor ba'i bya ba las so / gzhan gyi rigs su skyes pa rnams ni bdag cag kyang 'tsho ba 'dis 'tsho bar bya'o zhes khas len pa las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣetraṃ vā tadrūpaṃ bhavati yatrārāmādipradānamātreṇāvijñaptirutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma'i rnam rig min zhing dang / len dang gus par byed pas 'thob / gang du kun dga'i ra ba la sogs pa phul ba tsam gyis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhing yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaupadhikeṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na sangs rgyas la phyag ma 'tshal gyi bar du zas mi bza'o / tshes sam zla ba gcig gam zla ba phyed cing rtag tu zas dag sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i yi dam bcas pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato 'syāvijñaptirutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba 'am mi dge ba gang las 'di'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gus pas las byed pa las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktametadyathā saṃvarāsaṃvaretarāṇāṃ pratilambhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa rnams ji ltar 'thob pa 'di ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tyāga idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ /<br/> tatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni gtong ba brjod par bya ste / de la re zhig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prātimokṣadamatyāgaḥ śikṣānikṣepaṇāccyuteḥ /<br/> ubhayavyañjanotpattermūlacchedānniśātyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang / mtshan nyid dag ni byung ba dang / rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las / so sor thar ba'i 'dul ba gtong
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dāmyantyaneneti damaḥ saṃvaro 'bhipretastenendriyadamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dis 'dul bar byed bas na 'dul ba ste / des dbang po 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin par dgongs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasya tyāgaḥ /<br/> sthāpayitvopavāsam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsnyen gnas ma gtogs pa'i so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ni rgyu rnam pa bzhis gtong bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi brda phrad pa'i drung du bslab ba'i gzhi rnams bsam pa thag pa nas slar phul ba dang ris mthun pa btang ba dang mtshan nyid cig car du 'byung ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upavāsasaṃvarasya tvebhiścaturbhirārātrikṣayācca /<br/> tānyetānyabhisamasya pañca tyāgakāraṇāni bhavanti /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamebhiḥ kāraṇaistyāgo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni rgyu de dag dang mtshan mo 'das pa las te / de dag ni mdor bsdu na gtong ba'i rgyu lnga yin no / ci'i phyir rgyu de dag gis gtong bar gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādānaviruddhavijñaptyutpādādāśrayatyāgādāśrayavikopanānnidānacchedāttāvadevākṣepācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i rnam par rig byed skyed pa dang rten bor ba dang rten nyams pa dang gzhi chad pa dang de srid du 'phangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">patanīyena cetyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ltung bar 'gyur ba las smra
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarāhuścaturṇāṃ patanīyānāmanyatamena bhikṣuśrāmaṇerasaṃvaratyāga iti /<br/> saddhamantirdhito 'pare /<br/> saddharmasyāntardhānādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ltung bar 'gyur ba bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig gis dge slong dang dge sbyong gi sdom pa gtong ngo zhes zer ro / gzhan dag dam chos nub pa las / gzhan dag na re dam pa'i chos nub pa las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmādantarhite saddharme sarvaśikṣāsīmākarmāntāḥ pratiprasrabhyanta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar dam pa'i chos nub na bslab pa'i mtshams thams cad dang las kyi mtha' rnams med par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhanarṇavattu kādmīrairāpannasyeṣyate dvayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che rnams ni byung ba la / bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāśmīrāstu khalu vaibhāṣikāḥ evamicchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di ltar 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na maulīmadhyāpattimā pannasyāsti bhikṣusaṃvaratyāgaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti /<br/> naiva cānyāmapyāpatti māpannasyāsti śīlacchedaḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> dvayamasya bhavati śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba la yang sdom pa gtong ba med do / ci'i phyir zhe na / phyogs gcig nyams pas sdom pa zad par gtong ba ni mi rigs so / ltung ba gzhan byung ba la yang tshul khrims 'chal pa med do / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / 'di la tshul khrims dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims gnyi ga yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā kasyaciddhanaṃ syādṛṇaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mi 'ga' zhig la nor yang bdog bu lon yang chags pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ltung ba de bshags na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin gyi tshul khrims 'chal pa ni ma yin te / dper na bu lon btsal nas nor dang ldan pa yin gyi bu lon chags pa ma yin pa bzhin no zhes bya bar 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi bhagavatoktam bhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo 'śākyaputrīyo dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt /<br/> katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma yin dge sbyong ma yin / sh'akya'i bu ma yin / dge sbyong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur te / de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur / nyams pa dang bcom pa dang ltung ba dang pham par 'gyur zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramārthabhikṣutvaṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktam /<br/> idamabhisāhasaṃ vartate /<br/> kimatrābhisāhasam /<br/> yat bhagavatā nītārthaṃ punaranyathā nīyate /<br/> dauḥśīlyāya ca bahukleśebhyaḥ pratyayā dīyante /<br/> kathameta nītārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni don dam pa'i dge slong nyid las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no / 'di ni ha cang thug thub ches par 'gyur ro / 'di la thug thub ci zhig bya zhe na / bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i don gang yin pa gzhan du 'dren pa'o / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la 'chal pa'i thul khrims su bya ba'i phyir rkyen byed pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa hi vinaye nirdeṣaḥ /<br/> caturvidho bhikṣuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ji ltar na nges pa'i don yin zhe na / 'dul ba las 'di skad du dge slong ni rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñābhikṣuḥ pratijñābhikṣurbhikṣata iti bhikṣurbhinnakleśatvāt bhikṣuḥ /<br/> asmiṃstvarthe jñapticaturthakarmopasaṃpanno bhikṣuriti /<br/> na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi atra śāstraiva datto 'nuyoga stadyathā tālo mastakācchinno 'bhavyo 'ṅkuritatvāya abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāptu mityupamāṃ kurvatā /<br/> kaḥ punarūpamārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming gi dge slong dang khas 'che ba'i dge slong dang slong bas na dge slong dang nyon mongs ba bcom pas na dge slong ngo / don 'di la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong yin no zhes gsungs te / de sngon don dam pa'i dge slong du gyur la gang gis ni / phyis dge slong ma yin par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no / phyogs gcig nyams pas zhes gang smras pa de ni ston pa de nyid kyis / dper na shing ta la'i mgo bcad na sngon por 'gyur du mi btub 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par mi btub pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dper mdzad pas lan btab pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpe'i don yang ji lta bu yin zhe na / rtsa bar gyur pa phyogs gcig chad pas kyang sdom pa lhag ma 'phel du mi btub zhes bya ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ /<br/> yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ /<br/> nāśayata kāraṇḍavakaṃ kaśambakamapakarṣata /<br/> athotplāvinaṃ vāhayata abhikṣuṃ bhikṣuvādinamiti /<br/> tasya kīdṛśo bhikṣubhāvaḥ /<br/> yādṛśastādṛśo 'stu /<br/> asti tu bhikṣubhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang dge slong gis dngos po'i mtshams 'jig par byed pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba lci ba byung na khrel med pa shas chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sdom pa'i rtsa ba 'chad pas sdom pa zad pas gtong bar rigs so / ston pas gang la dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang gtsug lag khang la kham gcig dang gom pa gcig 'dor ba'i phyogs longs spyad par yang ma gnang ba ni dge slong gi longs spyod thams cad las kyang bkar ro / gang gi dbang du mdzad nas / dge slong min la dge slong du / smra ba sre da [?] bsal bar gyis / shing rul dag ni spang bar gyis / snying po med pa dor bar gyis / zhes gsungs pas de'i dge slong gi dngos po ci 'dra ba zhig yin ci 'dra yang rung dge slong gi dngos po ni yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi catvāraḥ śramaṇā na pañcamo 'sti cundeti /<br/> bhagavānavocat /<br/> mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī astyetaduktam /<br/> sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun de dge sbyong bzhi ste lnga pa med / lam gyi rgyal dang lam ston dang / lam phyir 'tsho dang lam sun 'byin / zhes gsungs so / de skad du gsungs pa yod mod kyi / de ni sha tshugs tsam lus pa'i phyir dge sbyong zhes gsungs par zad de / shing tshig pa dang mtshe'u skams pa dang ne tso'i mchu dang sa bon rul pa dang / mgal me'i 'khor lo dang sems can shi ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las dge slong ma yin par 'gyur na bslab pa sbyin pa po med par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti /<br/> yastu pārājikaḥ so 'vaśyamabhikṣuḥ /<br/> kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā /<br/> yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad ltung ba byung ba'i mdo las phas pham pa pa yin no zhes mi zer gyi / gang phas pham ba pa de ni gdon mi za bar dge sbyong ma yin no / la la rgyud kyi khyad par las phas pham pa pa ma yin te / sems 'gas kyang mi 'chab pa'i phyir de ni chos kyi rjes su rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā /<br/> tathā hyasau nikṣiptaśikṣo 'pi na pravrājyate /<br/> kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te phas pham pa pa dge slong ma yin na ci ste yang rab tu mi 'byung / rgyud khrel med pa shas chen bos nyams par byas pas sdom pa'i skal ba med pa'i phyir yin gyi / dge slong gi dngos po la ltos te ma yin te / 'di ltar de ni bslab pa phul yang rab tu mi 'byung ngo / don med pa 'di la ci zhig 'bad de / gal te de lta bur gyur pa yang dge slong yin na dge slong nyid de 'dra ba de la phyag 'tshal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saddharmāntardhāne bu vinayakarmābhāvādapūrvasaṃvaralābho nāsti /<br/> labdhasya tu nāsti tyāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dam pa'i chos nub na 'dul ba'i las mes pa'i phyir sngon med pa'i 'dul ba 'thob pa ni med kyi thob zin pa ni gtong ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha dhyānānāsravasaṃvarayoḥ kathaṃ tyāgaḥ /<br/> bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ dhyānāptaṃ tyajyate śubham /<br/> sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag ji ltar gtong zhe na / bsam gtan gtogs pa'i dge ba ni /  / sa 'phos nyams pa dag gis gtong / bsam gtan du gtogs pa'i dge ba thams cad ni rgyu gnyis kyis gtong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong ma 'og tu skye ba ste sa 'phos pa las sam / snyoms par 'jug pa la sa yongs su nyams pa las so / ris mthun pa btang ba las kyang cung zad gtong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar gzugs su gtogs pa'i dge bas 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag gis gtong ba ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathārūpyāptamāryaṃ tu phalāptyuttaptihānibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin gzugs med gtogs 'phags pa / 'bras bu thob sbyangs nyams pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba zag pa med pa ni rgyu gsum gyis gtong bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalaprāptitaḥ pūrvako mārgaḥ parityakṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu thob pa las ni lam snga ma gtong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyottāpanena mṛddhindriyamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po sbyangs pa las ni dbang po rtul po'i lam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇita uttaro mārgaḥ /<br/> phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭo vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa las ni lam gong ma 'bras bu 'am 'bras bu khyad par can te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvat saṃvarāstyajyante /<br/> asaṃvaraḥ saṃvarāptimṛtyudvivyañjanodayaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sdom pa rnams ni de ltar gtong ngo / sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang / shing dang mtshan nyid byung ba las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhiḥ kāraṇairasaṃvaracchedaḥ /<br/> saṃvaraprāptitaḥ /<br/> yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa ni rgyu gsum gyis 'chad de / sdom pa thob pa las ni gal te sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa las sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetupratyayabalena samādhilābhāt /<br/> tenāsaṃvaśchidyate /<br/> pratidvandvabalīyastvāt /<br/> maraṇenāśrayatyāgāt /<br/> dvivyañjanotpādenāśrayavikopanāditi /<br/> śastrajālatyāge 'pyakaraṇāśayataḥ /<br/> saṃvaramantareṇāsaṃvaracchedo nāsti /<br/> nidānaparivarjane 'pyauṣadhamantareṇa pravṛddharogāvinivṛttivat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin thob pas bsam gtan gyi sdom pa thob na gnyen po stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir des sdom pa ma yin pa 'chad par 'gyur ro / lus bor ba'i phyir shi ba dang rten nyams pa'i phyir mtshan nyid byung ba las 'dor bar 'gyur ro / mtshon dang rgyu mi bya ba'i bsam pa thag pa nas bor du zin kyang sdom pa med par sdom pa ma yin pa 'chad pa med de / gzhi yongs su spangs kyang sman med par nad rnying mi bzlog pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram /<br/> asaṃvaramityeke /<br/> tyāgāśayasyānātyantikatvāt /<br/> pradīptaivāyaḥpiṇḍaḥ punaḥ śyāmatāṃ nāprayujyamāno gacchatītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa can gang zhig bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa nod na ci 'di sdom pa de las yang sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur ram / 'on te sdom pa yang ma yin sdom ba ma yin pa yang ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur zhe na / kha cig na re gtan du gtong ba'i bsam pa med pa'i phyir sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur te / lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba yang sngon por 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tallābhasya vijñaptyadhīnatvāt /<br/> atha saṃvarāsaṃvaravinirmuktā kathamavijñaptistyajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de thob pa ni rnam par rig byed la rab lus pa'i phyir sbyor ba mi byed na mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / yang sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ji ltar gtong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vegādānakriyārthāyurmūlacchedaistu madhyamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma shugs blangs bya ba dang / don tshe rtsa ba chad pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi cchidyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu dang ba dang nyon mongs pa'i shugs gang gis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'di 'phangs pa de chad pa de yang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kumbhakāracakreṣugativat /<br/> ādānatyāgādapi cchidyate /<br/> yadi samādānaṃ tyajatyalaṃ samādāneneti /<br/> kriyāvicchedādapi vicchidyate yathāsamāttamakurvataḥ /<br/> arthavicchedādapi vicchidyate /<br/> katamasyārthasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo dang mda'i 'gros bzhin no / gal te yang dag par blangs pa 'dis chog go zhes yang dag par len pa gtong na kun du blangs pa btang ba las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur ro / ji ltar blangs pa bzhin ma byas pa'i bya ba rnam par 'chad pa las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur ro / don rnam par 'chad pa las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur ro / don gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caityārāmavihāraśayanāsana yantrajālādino vastunaḥ /<br/> āyuṣo 'pi kuśalalmūlānāmapi cchedādvicchidyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchod rten dang kun dga' ra ba dang gtsug lag khang / mal cha dang stan dang gos dang rgya la sogs pa'i dngos po'i / tshe chad pa las kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'chad pa las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par rtsom pa na'o / de ltar na rgyu de drug gis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gtong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāptaṃ kuśalārūpaṃ mūlacchedordhvajanmataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod gtogs dge ba gzugs min ni / rtsa chad gong du skyes pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamarūpasvabhāvaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba gzugs can ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni rgyu gnyis kyis gtong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalamūlasamucchedādrūpārūpyadhātūpapattito vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa'am / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratipakṣodayāt kliṣṭamarūpaṃ tu vihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gzugs min ni / gnyen po skyes pas rnam nyams 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭaṃ tvarūpasvabhāvaṃ sarvameva pratipakṣodayādvihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gzugs can ma yin pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum pa thams cad ni gnyen po skyes pas rnam par nyams par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gang gis spong ba'i lam gang yin pa des 'di 'khor dang bcas pa yongs su spong bar byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ /<br/> nṛṇāmasaṃvaro hitvā śaṇḍapaṇḍadvidhākṛtīn /<br/> kuruṃśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sdom pa ma yin pa ni sems can gang dag la yod / sdom pa ni gang dag la yod ce na / za ma ma ning sgra mi snyan / mtshan gnyis ma gtogs mi rnams la / sdom min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyagatāvevāsaṃvaro nānyatra /<br/> tatrāpi śaṇḍhapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanānutarakauravāṃśca hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa ma yin pa ni mi'i 'gro ba kho na la yod kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no / de la yang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvaro 'pyevaṃ devānāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa'ang de bzhin la / lha la'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdom pa yang ji skad bshad pa ma gtogs pa mi rnams dang lha rnams la yod pas 'gro ba gnyis na sdom pa yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaṇḍhādīnāṃ saṃvaro nāstīti kathaṃ gamyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">za ma la sogs pa la sdom pa med do zhes bya ba ji ltar shes she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtrādvinayācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo dang 'dul ba las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / ming chen 'di ltar khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa skyes pa pho'i dbang po dang ldan pa zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba nas bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes tshig tu smra ba'i bar du yang byed na 'di tsam gyis dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vinaye 'pi tadrūpo nāśayitavya uktaḥ /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇameṣāṃ saṃvaro nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dul ba las kyang de lta bu gsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs so / ci'i phyir de dag las sdom pa med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayāśrayakleśādhimātratayā pratisaṃkhyānākṣamatvāttīvrahrīvyapatrāpyābhāvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa shas che ba'i phyir dang so sor rtog pa mi bzod pa'i phyir dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa shas chen po med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvarastarhi kasmānnāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na sdom pa ma yin pa ci'i phyir med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pāpe 'pyasthirāśayatvāt /<br/> yatraiava ca saṃvarastatrāsaṃvaro 'pi pratidvandvabhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdig pa la yang bsam pa mi brtan pa'i phyir dang gang la sdom pa yod pa de la sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod de / gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uttarakoravāṇāṃ samādānasamādhyabhāvāt pāpakriyāśayābhāvācca saṃvarāsaṃvarābhāvaḥ /<br/> āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni yang dag par len pa dang ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir dang sdig pa bya ba'i bsam pa med pa'i phyir sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa med do / ngan song ba rnams la yang gang dang ldan pa dang gang med pas sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dag tu 'gyur ba ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa shas chen po med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa dang ngan song ba de dag gi lus nyid du lus gang la sdom pa yang mi skye sdom pa ma yin pa yang mi skye ba zhing tsha sgo can lta bur gyur pa yin te / zhing tsha sgo can la 'bru yang tshar cig mi skye / tsva yang tshar cig mi skye ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktam aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya bhāvanādabhyudgamyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las / dge slong dag sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu ni zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la gnas nas byung nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sucaritamātraṃ tatteṣāṃ na saṃvaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni de dag gis legs par spyad pa tsam yin gyi sdom pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādevamanuṣyāṇāmeva saṃvaraḥ /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> nṛṇāṃ trayaḥ /<br/> manuṣyāṇāṃ sarve trayaḥ prātimokṣādisaṃvarāḥ saṃvidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na sdom pa ni lha dang mi rnams kho na la yod do / de la yang mi rnams la gsum mo / mi rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa thams cad yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmarūpajadevānāṃ dhyānajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod dang gzugs skyes lha rnams la / bsam gtan skyes yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasaṃvaraḥ kāmarūpadhātūpapannānāṃ devānāmurdhvaṃ nāsti /<br/> anāsravaḥ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi sdom pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams su skyes ba'i lha rnams la yod kyi gong na ni med do / zag med ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāntarāsaṃjñisattvavarjyānāmapyarūpiṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan khyad par 'du shes med / sems can ma gtogs gzugs med na'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravasaṃvarastu kāmarūpadhātūpapannānāmapyasti dhyānāntarikāsaṃjñisatvopapannānvarjayitvā /<br/> ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rnams la yang yod la bsam gtan khyad par can dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skyes pa rnams ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa rnams la yang yod de / de dag gis ni ldan pa'i sgo nas yod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa las ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate /<br/> trīṇi karmāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pas 'di man chad ni mdo las bstan pa'i las rnams bshad par brtsam mo / las ni gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaṃ karmākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ kameti /<br/> tatra /<br/> kṣemākṣemetaratkarma kuśalākuśaletarat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dge ba dang las mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa zhes 'byung ba de la / las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni / dge dang mi dge ni gzhan yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni dge ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt /<br/> tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las bde ba ni dus re zhig dang gtan du sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa'i phyir dge ba yin te / 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par byed pa yin no / mi dge ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi dge ba yin te / gang gis rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyed [*nyid?] las gzhan pa bde ba yang ma yin mi bde ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba las gzhan pa yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛtamityarthaḥ /<br/> punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams bsod nams min mi gyo / bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇī karmāṇi puṇyamapuṇyamāneñjaṃ ca /<br/> punaḥ trīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las ni gsum ste / bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi gyo ba'o / yang gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ ca /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> kāmadhātau śubhaṃ karma puṇyamāneñjamūrdhvajam /<br/> śubhamiti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'o / de la re zhig bsod nams 'dod khams dge ba'i las / mi gyo gong ma las skyes pa'i / dge ba zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ karmāneñjam /<br/> nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā /<br/> yadatra vitarkitaṃ vicāritamidamatrāryā iñjitamityāhurityevamādi /<br/> samādau sāpakṣālatāṃ teṣāmadhikṛtyaivamuktam /<br/> āniñjānyapi tu tānyuktānyāniñjasūtre /<br/> āniñjasaṃpreyagāminīṃ pratipadamārabhya /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ señjitamevānyatrāniñjamuktam /<br/> tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las dge ba ni mi gyo ba yin no / bcom ldan 'das kyis / 'di la rnam par brtags pa dang rnam par dpyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis gyo ba'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bsam gtan gsum po gyo ba dang bcas par gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na / de dag gi ting nge 'dzin skyon dang bcas pa las dgongs nas de skad du gsungs par zad kyi / de dag ni mi gyo ba'i mdo las mi gyo ba dang mthun par 'gro ba'i lam las brtsams te mi gyo bar gsungs so / yang ci'i phyir gyo ba dang bcas pa kho na gzhan du mi gyo bar gsungs she na / gang phyir sa ni de dag tu / las rnams smin phyir mi gyo'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ hi vipākaṃ prati kampate /<br/> kathaṃ kampate /<br/> avyavasthānāt /<br/> anyagati kamapi hyanyasyāṃ gatau vipacyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir gyo ba yin no / ji ltar gyo zhe na rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba gzhan yang 'gro ba gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyadevanaikāyikaṃ cānya devanikāye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i ris gzhan pa yang lha'i ris gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bong tshod dang stobs dang kha dog dang bde ba dang longs spyod la sogs par 'gyur ba'i las lha dag gi nang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de nyid res 'ga' rkyen gzhan gyi dbang gis mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi nang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las ni sa gzhan las gzhan du rnam par smin par nam yang mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādvyavasthitavipākatvādāneñjamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rnam par smin pa rnam par gnas pa'i phyir mi gyo ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apuṇyaṃ tu karmākuśalamiti prasiddhaṃ loke /<br/> yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /<br/> kṛtaḥ puṇyādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams ma yin pa'i las ni mi dge ba'o zhes 'jig rten na grags bas 'jig rten las grags pa gang yin pa de la 'bad pas ci zhig bya / bsod nams la sogs pa'i las bstan zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhavedanīyādīnāṃ kartavyaḥ /<br/> sa eṣa kriyate /<br/> sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyāt /<br/> kuśalaṃ karma sukhavedanīyaṃ yāvat tṛtīyāddhyānāt /<br/> eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni /<br/> ataḥ param /<br/> aduḥkhāsukhavedyaṃ tu /<br/> śubhamiti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste de tsam mo / bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba / bde ba myong 'gyur / bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar gyis las dge ba ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pas bde ba'i tshor ba'i sa ni 'di yin te / 'di lta ste / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan gsum mo /  / de yan chad / sdug min bde min myong 'gyur ba / bde ba zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyadhyānāt pareṇa kuśalaṃ karmāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanā 'bhāvāt /<br/> duḥkhavedyamihāśubham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa yan chad kyi las dge ba ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin te / de na bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir ro / sdug bsngal myong 'gyur 'di'i mi dge
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las mi dge ba ni sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihagrahaṇaṃ kāmadhātāveva tadbhāvajñāpanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i zhes smos pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kho na na de yod par bstan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na caiṣāṃ vedanaiva phalam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sasaṃbhārā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi 'bras bu tshor ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad do / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / tshogs dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adho 'pi madhyamastyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og na'ang bar ma yod do zhes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarāhuḥ tadetanmadhyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmoktametaccaturthadhyānādadho 'pyasti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> dhyānāntaravipākataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig zer te / gzhan dag na re bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su bshad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi pa man chad na yang yod do zhes zer ro / ci'i phyir zhe na / gang gi phyir / bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar ma yin na bsam gtan khyad par can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'am / las gang gis kyang bsam gtan khyad par can du rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra sukhaduḥkhayorabhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re bsam gtan khyad par can gyis las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i dbang po kho na yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva tasya vedanā vipāka ityapare /<br/> tadetaducchāstram /<br/> śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta /<br/> syātkuśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇa iti /<br/> apurvācaramaḥ pākastrayāṇāṃ ceṣyate yataḥ /<br/> yataścoktaṃ sūtre syāttrayāṇāṃ karmaṇāmapūrvācaramo vipāko vipacyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de'i rnam par smin pa tshor ba med pa nyid do zhes zer ro / 'di ni bstan bcos dang 'gal ba yin te / bstan bcos las ni / las kyi rnam par smin pa sems kyi tshor ba kho na rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yod ngam [*dam?] zhe na / yod do / rtog pa med pa'i las dge ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo / snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir / ji ltar las gsum po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa snga phyi med par smin par 'gyur ba yod ngam [*dam?] zhe na / yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syātsukhavedanīyasya rūpaṃ duḥkhavedanīyasya cittacaittā dharmāḥ /<br/> aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasya cittaviprayuktā ityato 'pyastyaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmādhastāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ni gzugs so / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams so zhes 'byung ste / 'di'i phyir yang 'og na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi kāmadhātoranyatrāsti yugapatkarmatrayasya vipāke saṃyogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams las gzhan na ni las gsum gyi rnam par smin pa dang cig car du ldan pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidānīṃ tatkukśalamāhosvidakuśalaṃ /<br/> durbalaṃ tu tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ci las de dge ba yin nam / 'on te mi dge ba yin zhe na / dge ba ste stobs chung du ni ma yin no / de lta na ni 'o na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā diṣṭavipākaṃ ca kuśala mityasya virodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba / bde ba myong 'gyur zhes bya ba dang rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba ni dge ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bāhulika eṣa nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni phal che ba bstan pa yin par blta bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punaravedanāsvabhāvaṃ karma sukhādivedinīyamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na tshor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i las bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā /<br/> kaśca vedanīyaḥ /<br/> yo vipākaḥ /<br/> sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate /<br/> snānīyakapāyavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'am / 'di'i bde ba myong bar bya ba yin pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin no / myong bar 'gyur ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na / rnam par smin pa ste / de myong bar byed pa yin no / yang na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ste / gang gi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ni / 'khru bar byed pa'i 'dag pa'i chal bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ duḥkhavedanīyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /<br/> api ca /<br/> svabhāvasaṃprayogābhyāmālambanavipākataḥ /<br/> saṃmukhībhāvataśceti pañcadhā vedanīyatā /<br/> svabhāvavedanīyatā vedanānām /<br/> svabhāvenaiva vedanīyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la yang de bzhin du ba lta bar bya'o / gzhan yang / ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang / dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang / mngon sum du ni gyur ba las / myong 'gyur rnam pa lnga yin no / ngo bo nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ba ni tshor ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayogavedanīyatā sparśasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pas myong bar 'gyur ba ni reg pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśaḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa zhes bya ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanavedanīyatā viṣayāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni yul rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedītyevamādi /<br/> vedanayā hi tāmālambamānaḥ pratisaṃvedayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas gzugs so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur gyi gzugs la 'dod chags so sor yang dag par myong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pa ste / dmigs pa na tshor bas de dag so sor yang dag par myong bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākavedanīyatā karmaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni las yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karmeti vistaraḥ /<br/> saṃmukhībhāvavedanīyatā /<br/> yathoktaṃ yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o / mngon sum du gyur pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni ji skad du / gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa de'i tshe tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate /<br/> saṃmukhīkurvastu tāṃ vedayata ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba 'jug pa de'i tshe gang gis na de myong bar 'gyur ba gzhan ni med kyi des mngon sum du byed na ni de myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato vipākasya vedanīyatvāt karmāpyucyate sukhavedanīyamityevamādi /<br/> niyatāniyataṃ tacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir las kyang bde ba myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do / de yang nges dang ma nges pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i las rnam pa gsum po de yang nges pa dang ma nges pa yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāvaśyavedanīyamaniyatam /<br/> niyataṃ trividhaṃ punaḥ /<br/> dṛṣṭadharmādivedyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no / mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la / myong 'gyur phyir na nges rnam gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena /<br/> pañcadhā karma kecana /<br/> apare punaḥ pañcavidhaṃ karmecchanti /<br/> aniyatavedanīyaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā /<br/> vipākena niyatamaniyataṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ste / las rnam pa 'di gsum ni nges pa'o / de ltar na de ni myong bar 'gyur ba ma nges pa dang bcas pa ste las rnam pa bzhi yin no / kha cig las rnam pa lnga zhes zer / gzhan dag ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa la rnam par smin par nges pa dang ma nges pa rnam pa gnyis su phye nas las rnam pa lngar yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni skye ba gang du byas pa de nyid du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyavedanīyaṃ dvitīye janmani /<br/> aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ tasmātpareṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ni skye ba gnyis pa la'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">janmāntare 'pyasti dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya karmaṇo vipāka ārambhavaśāttannāmavyavasthānamityapare /<br/> mā bhūdyadevamiṣṭakarma tasyālpiṣṭho vipākaḥ iti /<br/> tadevaṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ni de phan chad du'o / gzhan dag na re ches stobs dang ldan pa'i las gang yin pa de'i rnam par smin pa chung ches par 'gyur du 'ong bas mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa tshe rabs gzhan dag na yang yod mod kyi rtsom pa'i dbang gis ming de rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni de mi 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu nye la 'bras bu ring ba ma yin pa'i las kyang yod / bzlog pa yang yod de phyi'i sa bon bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti /<br/> catuṣkoṭikamityanye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar lcam pa la sogs pa ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis kyis 'bras bu smin la / nas dang gro la sogs pa ni zla ba drug gis 'bras bu smin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dārṣṭāntikāstu catuṣkoṭikaṃ kurvanti /<br/> asti karmāvasthāniyataṃ na vipāke niyatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer / dpes ston pa rnams ni gnas skabs nges la rnam par smin par ma nges pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatkarma dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ vipāke 'nīyatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur la rnam par smin pa ni ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti vipāke niyataṃ nāvasthāyām /<br/> yatkarmāniyatavedanīyaṃ vipāke niyatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin par nges la gnas skabs dag tu ma yin pa yang yod do / rnam par smin pa ni nges la myong bar 'gyur ba ni ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyubhayaniyataṃ yadṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ vipāke niyatam /<br/> asti nobhayaniyataṃ yatkarmāniyatavedanīyaṃ vipāke aniyatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga nges pa yang yod de / mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur la rnam par smin par yang nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o / gnyi ga ma nges pa yang yod de / myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma nges la rnam par smin par yang ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba mu bzhir byed de de dag gi ltar na las rnam pa brgyad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ tatkarmāṣṭavidhaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ niyatamaniyataṃ ca /<br/> evaṃ yāvadaniyatavedanīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niyatameva tu dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyamaniyataṃ caturthamiti varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa ni nges pa kho na yin no / bzhi pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādekasmin kṣaṇe caturvidhaṃ karmākṣipet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma gcig la las rnam pa bzhi 'phen par 'gyur ba lta yod dam zhe na / yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau /<br/> eṣāṃ ca punaścaturṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol po gsum la sbyar nas bdag nyid 'dod pas log par gyem pa la zhugs te / de dag cig car mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o / las bzhi po de dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nikāyākṣepaṇaṃ tribhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum gyis ris ni 'phen par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyena karmaṇā nikāyasabhāga ākṣipyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis ni ris mthun pa 'phen par mi byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau /<br/> sarvatra caturākṣepaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gang ngam / 'gro ba gang na las kyi 'phen pa rnam pa du zhig yod ce na / thams cad na ni 'phen pa bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /<br/> asyotsargasyāyamapavādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum po thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad na dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams ci rigs par las bzhi'i 'phen pa yod de / spyir bstan pa 'di'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni 'di yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhasya narake tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba na ni dge ba'i gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dag na ni las dge ba rnam pa gsum gyis 'phen pa yod kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatreṣṭavipākābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadviraktaḥ sthiro bālastatra notpadyavedyakṛt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i / byis pa der skyes myong mi byed / so so'i skye bo yin pa de yang brtan pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti /<br/> kimanyatkaroti /<br/> nānyavedyakṛdapyāryaḥ /<br/> thara iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can zhig na de ni sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi byed do / gzhan dag rnam pa gsum ni byed do / 'phags pa gzhan du'ang myong mi byed / brtan pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i gang zag yin la yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can yang yin nas gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang mi byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ /<br/> kāme 'gre vā 'sthiro 'pi na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di na yangs 'og mar 'ong bar rung ba ma yin no / gang du skyes par ma nges pa dang mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni byed do / 'dod rtse'i mi brtan pa yang min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> phalāddhi sa parihīṇo bhavati /<br/> na cāsti laparihīṇasya kālakriyeti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams sam / srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag tu yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin yang skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byed par rung ba ni ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa las ni 'chi ba med do zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimantarābhave 'pyasti karmaṇa ākṣepaḥ /<br/> astītyāha /<br/> dvāviṃśatividhaṃ kāmeṣvākṣipatyantarābhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci srid pa bar ma na yang las kyi 'phen pa yod dam zhe na smras pa / yod de / srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su / 'phen pa rnam pa nyi shu gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gāmāvacaro hyantarābhavo dvāviṃśatividhaṃ karmākṣipati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma ni las rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'phen te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> pañca hi garbhāvasthāḥ /<br/> kalalārvudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na / mngal gyi gnas skabs lnga ste / nur nur po dang mer mer po dang nar nar po dang gor gor po dang rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca jātāvasthāḥ /<br/> bālakumāravamadhyavṛddhāvasthāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes pa'i gnas skabs rnam pa lnga ste / byis pa dang gzhon nu dang dar la bab pa dang dar yol ba dang rgan po'i gnas skabs rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāntarābhavaḥ kalalavedanīyaṃ karmākṣipatyaniyataṃ niyataṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la srid pa bar ma ni nur nur po myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa'i las kyang 'phen par byed pa nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvadvṛddhavedanīyamantarābhavavedanīyaṃ ca /<br/> dṛṣṭadharma phalaṃ tacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rgan po myong bar 'gyur ba dang srid pa bar ma myong bar 'gyur ba'i bar du 'phen par byed do / de ni mthong chos 'bras bu yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccaitadantarābhavikaṃ karma yanniyatamekādaśavidhamuktaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tadveditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma'i las nges pa rnam pa bcu gcig bshad pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni ris gcig kho na yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni ris mthun pa gcig kho na yin te / srid pa bar ma gang yin pa dang de'i rgyu las byung ba gnas skabs bcu po gang dag yin pa de ni las gcig gis 'phangs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evānyadantarābhavavedanīyaṃ karma noktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir srid pa bar ma myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gzhan ma bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyavedanīyena ca tasyākṣepāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba kho nas 'phangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśaṃ karma niyataṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang nges pa'i las ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīvrakleśaprasādena sātatyena ca yatkṛtam /<br/> guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs rab dang drag po dang / yon tan zhing dang rgyun chags su / byas pa gang zhig yin pa dang / pha ma gsod gang de nges so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa drag pos byas pa'i las gang yin pa dang rab tu dang ba drag pos byas pa gang yin pa dang rgyun du byed pa gang yin pa dang yon tan gyi zhing la byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra guṇakṣetraṃ trīṇi ratnāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yon tan gyi zhing ni dkon mchog gsum mam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pudgalaviśeṣo vā kaścitphalasamāpattiviśeṣaprāptaḥ /<br/> tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate /<br/> pitarau punarmātā ca pitā ca /<br/> tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'ga' zhig gis 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa khyad par can thob pa'i gang zag khyad par can te / de la ni nyon mongs pa dang rab tu dang ba drag po dang rgyun du byed pa med par yang dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las nges par 'gyur ro / pha ma ni pha dang ma ste / pha dang ma gnyis gsod pa'i las de ni ci 'dra yang rung ste / nges par 'gyur ro / gzhan ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma kīdṛśaṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ karma kṣetrāśayaviśeṣataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi las / zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma kṣetraviśeṣādvā bhavati /<br/> yathā saṃghastrīvādasamudācārādvyañjanaparivṛttiḥ śrūyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las / zhing gi khyad par las 'gyur ba ni dper na dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun la bud med do zhes thab mo brgal ba las mtshan gyur to zhes grags pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśayaviśeṣādvā /<br/> yathā śaṇḍhasya gavāmapuṃstvapratimokṣaṇātpumbhāvaḥ /<br/> athavā /<br/> tadbhūmyatyantavairāgyāt /<br/> tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /<br/> tasyāṃ bhūmau jātasya kīdṛśaṃ karmetyāha /<br/> vipāke niyataṃ hi yat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam pa'i khyad par las ni dper na nyung rum zhig gis glang zhig rlig pa dbyung ba las thar bar byas pas skyes pa nyid du gyur pa lta bu'o / yang na / sa de'i 'dod chags gtan bral phyir / yang na las dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las gang yin de las gtan du 'dod chags dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir las de mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ro / las ji lta bu zhig ce na / rnam smin nges pa gang yin pa'o / las gang rnam par smin par nges la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ /<br/> yatpunaravasthāntaraniyataṃ tasya tatraiva niyato vipākastadvato 'tyantavairāgyāsaṃbhavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs su yang ma yin / ma nges pa yang ma yin pa de ni de ltar nges kyi gnas skabs gzhan du nges pa gang yin pa de ni de dang ldan bzhin du gtan du 'dod chags dang bral mi srid pas de nyid du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccāniyataṃ tasyāvipāka evātyantavairāgyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma nges pa gang yin pa de ni gtan du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi smin pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /<br/> āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang du gdon mi za bar mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ba'i zhing de ji lta bu zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ pudgalāstu pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smras pa sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gang zag lnga po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye nirodhāraṇāmaitrīdarśanārhatphalotthitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag 'gog byams nyon mongs med / mthong dang dgra bcom 'bras langs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣu kārāpakārasya phalaṃ sadyo 'nubhūyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la phan gnod byas pa yis / 'bras bu 'phral du myong bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhasamāpattivyutthitaḥ parāṃ cittaśāntiṃ labhate /<br/> nirvāṇasadṛśatvātsamāpatteḥ /<br/> sa hi gatapratyāgata eva nirvāṇādbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir sems mchog tu zhi ba 'thob ste / de ni mya ngan las 'das par son pa las slar log pa dang 'dra ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">araṇāvyutthitasyāpramāṇasattvāraṇāhitādhyāśayānugatātyudagrāpramāṇapuṇyaparibhāvanānugatā ca saṃtatirvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa med pa la langs pa'i rgyud ni sems can tshad med pa la nyon mongs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i bsod nams tshad med pas yongs su bsgos pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maitrīvyutthitasyāpramāṇasattvasukhādhyāśayānugatātyudagrāpramāṇapuṇyaparibhāvanānugatā ca saṃtativartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byams pa las langs pa'i rgyud ni sems can tshad med pa la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i bsod nams tshad med pas yongs su bsgos pa dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgavyutthitasyāśeṣadarśanaprahātavyaprahāṇāt pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttinirmalā saṃtatirvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam las langs pa'i rgyud ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa yin pa dri ma med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhatphalavyutthitasyāśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇātpratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhā saṃtatirvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu las langs pa'i rgyud ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa yin pas dri ma med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate /<br/> śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de dag las phan pa dang gnod pa byas pa rnams kyi 'bras bu mthong ba'i chos kho na la nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ro / lhag ma bsgom pa'i lam ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa can nyid kyi phyir de las langs pa rnams kyi rgyud de ltar gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa dang dag pa ma yin pas de dag ni de ltar bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaḥ punarvedanāpradhānaḥ /<br/> tadidānīṃ vicāryate /<br/> syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i gtso bo ni tshor ba yin pas de'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ste / las kyi rnam par smin pa sems kyi tshor ba kho na yin la lus kyi ma yin pa yod dam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt kāyikyeva na caitasikī syādityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi kho na yin la sems kyi ma yin pa yang yod dam zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kukśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇo vedanā matā /<br/> vipākaścaitasikyeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de / rnam par rtog pa med pa yi / dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin ni / sems kyi tshor ba kho nar 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre /<br/> tasyāvitarkasya kuśalasya karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rtog pa med pa'i las ni bsam gtan khyad par can nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar dag na yod de / dge ba'i las rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni sems kyi tshor ba kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna kāyikī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir lus kyi ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyā avaśyaṃ savitarkavicāratvāt /<br/> kāyikyevāśubhasya tu /<br/> akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kāyikyeva vedanā vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gdon mi za bar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dpyad pa yin pa'i phyir ro / mi dge ba ni lus kyi yin / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni lus kyi tshor ba kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna caitasikī /<br/> tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat /<br/> yattarhi sattvānāṃ cittakṣepo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir sems kyi ma yin zhe na / de'i rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yin la / sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni yid mi bde ba yin te / yid mi bde ba ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no zhes de ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena /<br/> cittakṣepo manaścitte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na sems can rnams kyi sems gyeng bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sems gang zhig la gnas pa yin / rgyu ni ci zhig gis 'gyur zhe na / g yeng ba'i sems ni yid sems las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manovijñāna ityarthaḥ /<br/> nahi pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣu cittaṃ kṣipyate /<br/> avikalpakatvāt /<br/> sa ca karmavipākajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga la gnas pa la ni gyeng ba med de / rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro / de ni las kyi rnam smin skyes / g yeng ba'i sems de ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa caiṣa cittakṣepaḥ sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ /<br/> ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate
