</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas dang gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas pha rol gyi sems gyeng bar byed pa'am / mi 'dod bzhin du dug dang myos par 'gyur ba ldud pa'am / ri dags la sogs pa skrag par byed pa'am / nags mes gtong ba 'am / g yang du 'dor bar byed pa 'am / gzhan gang yang rung bas pha rol po dag gi sems nyams par byed pa de dag las de'i rnam par smin pas che phyi ma la sems gyeng bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhayopaghātavaiṣamyaśokaiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skrag gnod ma mnyam mya ngan gyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvadbhayena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig skrag pas ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amanuṣyādayo manuṣyānvirūpeṇa rūpeṇopasaṃkrāmanti /<br/> tebhyo bhītānāṃ cittaṃ kṣīpyate /<br/> kathamupaghātena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi ma yin pa gzugs mi sdug pas mi'i gan du nye bar 'ongs la de dag gis skrag pa rnams sems gyeng bar 'gyur ro / gnod pas ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti /<br/> kathaṃ mahābhūtavaiṣamyeṇa /<br/> vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ prakopamāpadyante /<br/> kathaṃ śokena /<br/> yathā vāsiṣṭhīprabhṛtīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi ma yin pa de dag nyid du 'khrugs nas gnad du snun par byed pas so / 'byung ba chen po ma mnyam pas ji lta bu zhe na / rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dag 'khrugs par gyur pa'o / mya ngan gyis ji lta bu zhe na / dper na gnas byed kyi bu la sogs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi mano vikṣipyate karmavipākajaśca cittakṣepaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gyeng bar 'gyur la / sems gyengs pa yang las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin pa yin na go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na sems kyi tshor ba rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ /<br/> tasmājjātamato vipākajam /<br/> karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate /<br/> evaṃ cedaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ yujyate /<br/> asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems de nyid rnam par smin pa yin no zhes ni mi zer ro / de lta mod kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de rnam par smin pa yin la de las skyes pas de'i phyir rnam par smin pa yin te / las las skyes pa'i khams rnams 'khrugs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang dbang med pa dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur bas na sems gyengs pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣiptaṃ tāvanna kṣiptaṃ vikṣiptacittasya /<br/> kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na de ni sems gyengs la rnam par ma gyengs pa yang yod ces bya bar mu bzhir rung ste / re zhig gyengs la rnam par ma gyengs pa ni sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o / rnam par gyengs la sems ma gyengs pa ni sems rnal du 'dug pa'i nyon mongs pa can no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayaṃ kṣiptacittasya kliṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga yin pa ni sems gyengs pa'i nyon mongs pa can no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayaṃ svasthacittasyākliṣṭam /<br/> katameṣāṃ punaḥ sattvānāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate /<br/> akurukāminām /<br/> akuruṇāṃ kāminām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga ma yin pa ni sems rnal du 'dug pa'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o / sems can gang dag gi sems gyengs par 'gyur zhe na / sgra mi snyan min 'dod ldan rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">deveṣvapi hi deva /<br/> unmattāḥ santi prāgeva manuṣyatiryakpreteṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra mi snyan ma yin pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang na yang lha smyon pa yod na mi dang dud 'gro dang li dags kyi nang na lta smos kyang ci dgos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nārakāstu nityaṃ kṣiptacittā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba rnams ni rtag tu sems gyengs pa kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod pa sna tshogs stong phrag dag gis gnad gcod pa'i tshor ba drag po dag gis mngon par nyen pa de dag ni re zhig bdag nyid kyang mi dran na bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hācittaparidevakaścātra nāraka udāhāryaḥ /<br/> āryāṇāmapi cittaṃ kṣipyate bhūtavaiṣamyeṇānyatra buddhāt /<br/> na karmaṇā niyatasya pūrvaṃ vipākādaniyatasyāvipākāt /<br/> na bhayena /<br/> pañcabhayasamatikramāt /<br/> nopaghātena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir kyi hung sems zhes smre sngags 'don pa'i dmyal ba dper bya'o / sangs rgyas ma gtogs pa'i 'phags pa rnams la yang 'byung ba ma mnyam pas sems gyeng ba yod do / las kyis ni ma yin te / nges pa ni sngon rnam par smin zin pa'i phyir ro / ma nges pa ni rnam par mi smin pa'i phyir ro / 'jigs pas kyang ma yin te / 'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyaprakopakāraṇasyāprāsādikasyākaraṇāt /<br/> na śokena /<br/> dharmatābhijñatvāt /<br/> punastrayo vaṅkā uktāḥ sūtre /<br/> kāyavaṅkok vāgvaṅko manovaṅkaḥ /<br/> trayo doṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod pas kyang ma yin te / mi ma yin pa 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mi mdzes pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro / mya ngan gyis kyang ma yin te / chos nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro / mdo las / yon po gsum gsungs te / lus kyi yon po dang ngag gi yon po dang yid kyi yon po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyadoṣo vāgdoṣo manodoṣaḥ /<br/> trayaḥ kaṣāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes pa gsum ste / lus kyi nyes pa dang ngag gi nyes pa dang yid kyi nyes pa'o / snyigs ma gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyakaṣāyo vākkaṣāyo manaḥ kaṣāyaḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi snyigs ma dang ngag gi snyigs ma dang yid kyi snyigs ma'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /<br/> vaṅkadoṣakaṣāyoktiḥ śāṭhyadveṣajarāgaje
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la / yon po snyigs mar gsungs pa ni / de dag kyang rim bzhin du / g yo dang zhe sdang 'dod chags skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaṭhyajaṃ kāyakarma kāyavaṅka ityuktam /<br/> kuṭilānvayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi gyo las skyes pa ni gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi yon po zhes bshad de ngag dang yid kyi yon po yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ vāṅmanovaṅkau /<br/> dveṣajaṃ kāyakarma kāyadoṣa ityuktam /<br/> cittapradoṣānvayatvāt /<br/> evaṃ vāṅmanodoṣau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi las zhe sdang las skyes pa ni sdang ba'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi nyes pa zhes bshad de / ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgajaṃ kāyakarma kāyakaṣāya ityuktam /<br/> rāñjanānvayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi las 'dod chags las skyes pa ni chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi snyigs ma zhes bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ vāṅmanaḥkaṣāyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag dang yid kyi snyigs ma yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛṣṇaśuklādibhedena punaḥḥ karma caturvidham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis / las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti karma kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las kyang yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las kyang yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākam /<br/> asti karmākṛṣṇamaśuklamavipākam /<br/> yattatkarma karmakṣayāya saṃvartata iti /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa dkar gnag pa'i las kyang yod / mi dkar mi gnag cing rnam par smin pa med pa las zad par byed pa'i las kyang yod de / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhaṃ rūpakāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ caiva yathākramam /<br/> kṛṣṇaśuklobhayaṃ karma tatkṣayāya nirāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i / dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin du / gnag dang dkar dang gnyi ga'i las / de zad byed pa zag med yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las mi dge ba ni nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu gnag pa yin la / rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang gnag pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāptaṃ śubhamekāntena śuklamakuśalenāvyatibhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs su gtogs pa'i dge ba ni / mi dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir gcig tu dkar ba yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuklavipākaṃ ca manojñavipākatvāt /<br/> ārupyāptaṃ kasmānnocyate /<br/> yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca /<br/> trividhasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo yatraiva saṃbhavastatraivoktamiti /<br/> tadapi tūktaṃ sūtrāntare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba yin no / ci'i phyir gzugs med par gtogs pa ma bshad ce na / gang na rnam par smin pa rnam pa gnyis po srid pa bar ma pa dang skye ba'i srid pa yang yod pa dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum char gyi yod pa de kho nar bshad do zhes grag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklamakuśalavyavakīrṇatvat kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ vyavakīrṇavipākatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo gzhan las de yang bshad do / 'dod par gtogs pa'i dge ba ni mi dge ba dang 'dres pa'i phyir dkar gnag yin la / rnam par smin pa 'dres pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang dkar gnag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃtānata etadvyavasthāpitaṃ na svabhāvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rgyud kyi sgo nas rnam par gzhag gi ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt /<br/> nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las sam rnam par smin pa gcig la dkar po yang yin / nag po yang yin pas de lta bu ni med do / phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro / de lta na mi dge ba yang dge ba dang 'dres pa'i phyir / dkar gnag tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāvaśyamakuśalaṃ kuśalena vyavakīryate /<br/> kāmadhātau tasya balavattvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams ni mi dge ba gdon mi za bar dge ba dang 'dre ba ni ma yin te / de stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kukśalaṃ tu vyavakīryate /<br/> durbalatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba ni stobs chung ba'i phyir 'dre bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i las ni las gsum po de dag zad par byed cing spong bar byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taddhyakṛṣṇamakliṣṭatvādaśuklaṃ vipākaśuklatā 'bhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir mi gnag pa'o / rnam par smin pa dkar po nyid med pa'i phyir mi dkar ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābhiprāyiko hyeṣo 'śukla śabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dkar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa chen po'i mdo las mi slob pa'i chos las brtsams te / kun dga' bo chos 'di dag ni gcig tu dkar ba gcig tu dge ba / gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstre ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuklā dharmāḥ katame /<br/> kuśalā dharmā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos dkar po rnams gang zhe na / dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams yin no zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avipākaṃ dhātvapatitatvāt pravṛttivirodhācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jug pa dang 'gal bas khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate /<br/> netyucyate /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci zag pa med pa'i las dang las thams cad las rnam pa gsum po 'di dag thams cad zad par byed pa yin nam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmakṣāntiṣu vairāgye cānantaryapathāṣṭake
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos bzod 'dod chags bral ba yi / bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de / nag po zad par byed pa'i las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma /<br/> navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba las bar chad med pa'i lam brgyad kyi sems pa gang yin pa ste / sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis po de ni nag po'i las zad par byed pa'i las yin no / dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa / de ni dkar nag zad byed yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba las bar chad med pa'i lam dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa de ni dkar gnag ste dge ba dang mi dge ba nag po rnam pa dgu po spong bar byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuklasya dhyānavairāgyeṣvantyānantaryamārgajā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dkar po bsam gtan chags bral la / bar chad med lam skyes tha mas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang bsam gtan las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam tha ma dgu pa de'i sems pa gang yin pa ste / sems pa rnam pa bzhi po de ni dkar po'i las spong bar byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir bar chad med pa'i phyir lam tha ma kho nas spong bar byed la gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahhi tasya svabhāvaprahāṇaṃ prahīṇasyāpi saṃmukhībhāvāt /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rang gi ngo bo ni spong ba ma yin te / spangs kyang mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir ji srid du de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig yod pa de srid du de mi spong ba mi 'thad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye narakavedyānyakāmavedyaṃ dvayaṃ viduḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni dmyal ba myong 'gyur dang / 'dod gzhan myong 'gyur gnyis su rigs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob dpon gzhan dag ni dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang dmyal ba las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni rim bzhin du nag po dang dkar nag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam /<br/> dṛgdheyaṃ kṛṣṇamanye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba na ni las mi dge ba kho na'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de'i phyir de myong bar 'gyur ba ni nag po zhes bya'o / de las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams na ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de'i phyir de myong bar 'gyur ba ni dkar nag ces bya bar lta'o / gzhan ni mthong bas spang bya gnag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye punarāhurdarśanaprahātavyaṃ karma kṛṣṇa kuśalenāmiśratvāt /<br/> anyatkṛṣṇaśuklaṃ tu kāmajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re mthong bas sdang bar bya ba'i las ni dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir nag po yin no zhes zer ro / 'dod pa las skyes gzhan dkar gnag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyattu kāmāvacaraṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklam /<br/> kiṃ tadanyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i las gzhan ni dkar gnag yin no / de las gzhan pa ci zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāprahātavyam /<br/> taddhi kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste / de ni dge ba yang yin la mi dge ba yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las thub pa'i ni gsum ste / thub pa'i lus dang thub pa'i ngag dang thub pa'i yid yod do zhes gsungs pa de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣaṃ kāyavākkarma manaścaiva yathākramam /<br/> maunatrayam /<br/> aśaikṣe kāyavākkarmaṇī kāyavāṅmauneye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid / thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin / mi slob pa'i lus dang ngag gi las dag ni thub pa'i lus dang dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa'i yid kho na yid kyi thub pa yin te / yid kyi las ni ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittaṃ hi paramārthamuniḥ /<br/> tat kila kāyavākkarmabhyāmanumīyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems ni don dam par thub pa yin la / de ni lus dang ngag gi las dag gi sgo nas rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma /<br/> cittā vijñaptyabhāvāt /<br/> viramārthena ca maunam /<br/> ato mana eva virataṃ maunamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang lus dang ngag gi las dag ni spong ba'i rang bzhin yin gyi sems la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi las ni ma yin no / thub pa'i yang spong ba'i don gyis yin te / de'i phyir yid nyid spong ba la thub pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādaśaikṣameva nānyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir mi slob pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhataḥ parmārthamunitvāt /<br/> sarvakleśajalpoparateḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa'i brjod pa thams cad med pas don dam par thub pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi śauceyāni uktāni sūtre /<br/> kāyaśauceyaṃ vākśauceyaṃ manaḥsauceyaṃ ca /<br/> tadetat /<br/> tridhā śaucaṃ sarvaṃ sucaritatrayam /<br/> sarvaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyaśaucam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las lus gtsang byed dang ngag gtsang byed dang yid gtsang byed dang gtsang byed gsum gsungs pa de ni / legs spyad gsum po thams cad ni / gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no / lus kyi legs par spyad pa thams cad ni lus gtsang byed yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaṃ vāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ vāṅmanaḥ śaucam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyad pa thams cad ni ngag dang yid kyi gtsang byed yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duścaritamalāpakarṣaṇāttāvatkālamatyantaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus re zhig dang gtan du nyes par spyad pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spongs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bstan pa 'di ni log pa'i thub pa dang gtsang sbra la mos pa rnams dkar ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi duścaritānyuktāni /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes par spyad pa gsum gsungs pa de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhaṃ kāyakarmādi mataṃ duścarita trayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba / nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma yathākramaṃ kāyavāṅmanoduścaritam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba ni rim pa bzhin du lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akarmāpi tvabhidhyādimanoduścaritaṃ tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems la sogs las min yang / yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa yang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / sems pa las don gzhan du gyur pa brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidhyādaya eva manaskarmeti dārṣṭāntikāḥ /<br/> saṃcetanīyasūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpes ston pa rnams na re ched du bsam par bya ba'i mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir brnab sems la sogs pa kho na yid kyi las yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu sati karmakleśayoraikyaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni las dang nyon mongs pa dag gcig tu 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te nyon mongs pa 'ga' zhig las su gyur na yang cir 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naitadasti /<br/> sūtraṃ viruddhaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re mdo dang 'gal ba'i phyir de ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni de'i sgo nas sems pa zhugs pa'i phyir de dag gis de ston par byed do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aniṣṭaphalatvātkuṭsitaḥ kāyavāṅmanaścāro duścaritam /<br/> viparyayātsucaritam /<br/> iṣṭaṃ kuśalaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarmānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa smad pa ni 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir nyes par spyad pa yin no / bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin / nyes par spyad pa las bzlog pa ni legs par spyad pa yin par 'dod de / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba dang brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parānugrahopaghātābhisaṃdhyabhāve kathaṃ samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭavyoḥ kuśalākuśalatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol la phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa bya ba'i bsam pa med par na ji ltar na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang log pa'i lta ba dag dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tanmūlatvāt /<br/> yāni caitāni duścaritasucaritānyuktāni /<br/> tadaudārikasaṃgrahāt /<br/> daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro / nyes par spyad pa dang legs par spyad par bshad pa gang dag yin pa / de las che long bsdus nas ni / dge dang mi dge ci rigs par / las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes par spyad pa dang legs par spyad pa de dag nyid bas che long bsdus te ci rigs par mdo las las kyi lam bcur gsungs te / dge ba rnams ni legs par spyad pa dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatra duścaritamasaṃgṛhītaṃ kiṃ vā sucaritam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba rnams ni nyes par spyad pa dag las so / 'dir nyes par spyad pa ci zhig gam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">legs par spyad pa ci zhig ma bsdus she na / re zhig mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams su ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i phyogs sbyor ba dang mjug dang nyon mongs pa can gzhan yang ma bsdus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya nātyaudārikatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni shin tu rags pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi nyes par spyad pa gzhan dag 'tsho ba dang longs spyod dang chung ma rnams dang 'bral bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de dang 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir las kyi lam du bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag gi nyes par spyad pa yang tshabs po che gang yin pa de kho na nyid kyi phyir las kyi lam du bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manoduścaritasya ca pradeśacetanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i phyogs sems pa yang ma bsdus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā /<br/> eṣāṃ ca karmapathānām /<br/> aśubhāḥ ṣaḍavijñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba la yang lus kyi legs par spyad pa'i phyogs sbyor ba dang mjug dang myos par 'gyur ba la sogs pa spong ba dang sbyin pa dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa ma bsdus so / ngag gi legs par spyad pa'i yang snyan par smra ba la sogs pa ma bsdus so / yid kyi legs par spyad pa'i yang sems pa ma bsdus so / las kyi lam de rnams las / mi dge drug ni rnam rig min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalāḥ ṣaṭ karmapathā avaśyamavijñaptisvabhāvāḥ prāṇātipātādattādānamṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārupyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ /<br/> pareṇa kārayato maulavijñaptyabhāvāt /<br/> dvidhaikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i las kyi lam drug po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang ngag kyal pa rnams ni gzhan byed du 'jug pa la dngos kyi rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no / gcig rnam gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmamithyācāro nityaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāvastasya svayeva niṣṭhāpanāt /<br/> nahi taṃ pareṇa kārayatastādṛśī prītirbhavatīti /<br/> te 'pi kurvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pas log par gyem pa de ni bdag nyid kyis mthar phyin par byed pa la ni dus de'i tshe shi na rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin te / de gzhan byed du bcug pa ni de dang 'dra bar dga' ba ma yin no / de dag kyang byed na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva /<br/> kuśalānāṃ punaḥ karmapathānāṃ /<br/> dvividhāḥ sapta kuśalāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam drug po de dag kyang bdag nyid byed pa la ni dus de'i tshe shi na rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro / phyis shi na ni rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na yin no / dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams las ni / dge ba bdun rnam gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca /<br/> vijñaptyadhīnatvātsamādānaśīlasya /<br/> avijñaptiḥ samādhijāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims ni rnam par rig byed la rag lus pa'i phyir las kyi lam gzugs can bdun ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga yin no / ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītāḥ samādhijāḥ ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa rnams ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hyavijñaptireva cittamātrādhīnatvāt /<br/> sāmantakāstu vijñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni sems tsam la rag lus pa'i phyir / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na yin no / nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmapathasāmantakāstu vijñaptisvabhāvā avaśyam /<br/> avijñaptirbhavenna vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam nyer bsdogs rnams ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed kyi rang bzhin yin no /  / rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba'am / ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt /<br/> viparyayeṇa pṛṣṭhāni /<br/> sāmantakebhyo viparyayeṇa karmapathānāṃ pṛṣṭhāni veditavyāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te kun nas dkris pa drag po'am / rab tu dang ba lhur len pa chen pos sbyor ba rtsom pa rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur gyi / gzhan du ni ma yin no / bzlog pa mjug yin no / nyer bsdogs las bzlog pa ni las kyi lam rnams kyi mjug yin par blta bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni avaśyamavijñaptisvabhāvāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed kyi rang bzhin ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptistu bhavenna vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed du ni 'gyur ba'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt /<br/> atha kuto yāvadeṣāṃ prayogamaulapṛṣṭhānāṃ vyavasthānam /<br/> yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ /<br/> yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ /<br/> dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca /<br/> tata ūrdhvamavijñaptikṣaṇāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ma yin te / gal te las kyi lam byas nas de'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos spyod na ni rnam par rig byed du 'gyur gyi / gzhan du ni ma yin no / yang ji tsam gyis na sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug 'di dag rnam par bzhag ce na / 'di ltar re zhig 'di na kha cig phyugs gsod par 'dod la / khri la sogs pa las ldang bar byed / rin len par byed / 'gro bar byed / nom par byed / phyugs nyo bar byed / 'khrid par byed / dran par byed / 'dzud par byed / gnod par byed / mtshon len par byed / mtshon len gcig gam lan gnyis 'debs par byed pa nas ji srid du srog gcod par mi byed pa de srid du ni sbyor ba yin no / bsnun pa gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de'i tshe'i rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi lam dngos yin no / rgyu gnyis kyis ni srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur te / sbyor ba dang 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pas so / de phyin chad kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skad cig ma rnams ni mjug yin no / ji srid du phyugs de'i pags pa 'chu ba'am / bkru bshal byed pa 'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti /<br/> evamanyeṣvapi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'tshong ba'am / 'tshed pa'am / za ba'am rjes su sgrogs pa de srid du ni de'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma dag kyang mjug yin no / de bzhin du gzhan drug la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems la sogs pa ni mngon du gyur pa tsam gyis las kyi lam du 'gyur ba'i phyir sbyor ba yang med la mjug kyang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamatra vaktavyam /<br/> kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ /<br/> yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti /<br/> na ceṣa siddhāntaḥ /<br/> atha mṛte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ci re zhig srog chags de 'chi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa de'i tshe rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang dag las kyi lam yin nam 'on te shi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa de'i tshe yin pa zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o / de las cir 'gyur / re zhig gal te 'chi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa yin na ni gsod pa'am / gsod du 'jug pa lhan cig shi ba yang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang ldan par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha iti tanā vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grub pa'i mtha' las ni de skad du mi 'byung ngo / 'on te shi ba yin na ni bsnun pa gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de'i tshe'i rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi lam dngos yin no zhes gang smras pa de brjod par mi bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang bstan bcos las 'di skad du / srog chags bsad la srog gcod pa ma 'gags pa yod dam zhe na / yod de / 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na srog chags kyi srog gcod la sbyor ba med par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa 'dir mjug sbyor ba'i sgrar gsungs so zhes bya ba bye brag tu smra ba'i don ni 'gal te / de'i tshe dngos kho na ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā na doṣastathā 'stu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar nyes pa med pa de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ ca na doṣaḥ /<br/> maula evātra prayogaśabdenokta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na nyes pa med pa de dngos kho na sbyor ba'i sgrar gsungs zhes bya ba'o / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati /<br/> kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam /<br/> asāmarthyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na de'i tshe rnam par rig byed ji ltar las kyi lam dngos su 'gyur / ji ltar na mi 'gyur / mi nus pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avijñaptiridānīṃ kathaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rnam par rig byed ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir sbyor ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe gnyi ga las kyi lam yin no / las kyi lam gzhan gyi sbyor ba'am mjug las kyi lam gzhan yin pa yang yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāṇātipātasya daśāpi karmapathāḥ prayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de / srog gcod pa'i sbyor ba las kyi lam bcu tshar yang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti /<br/> evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na dgra gsad pa'i phyir gshed byed gsad bar gzhan gyi nor 'grogs nas phyugs kyis gtor ma / byed pa dang de nyid kyis de gsod du gzhug pa'i phyir de'i chung ma la nyal po byed pa dang de la gang dag yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba de'i mdza' bo la brdzun dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang kyal pa dag gis dbyen byed pa dang de'i nor la brnab sems byed pa dang de nyid la gnod sems byed pa dang de gsad pa'i phyir log pa'i lta ba 'phel bar byed pa lta bu ste / de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvabhidhyādayaḥ prayogā yujyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems la sogs pa ni sbyor ba yin par mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi cittotpādamātreṇa prayukto bhavati /<br/> kriyānārambhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba ma brtsams pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa tsam gyis ni sbyor ba byas pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiriti /<br/> tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las dge slong dag srog gcod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / chags pa las skyes pa dang zhe sdang las skyes pa dang / gti mug las skyes pa'o zhes bya ba nas log par lta ba'i bar du gsungs pa de la srog gcod pa chags pa las skyes pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig ces bya ba de la sogs pa brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nātra sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la las kyi lam thams cad chags pa la sogs pas mthar phyin par byed pa ni ma yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogastu trimūlajaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba rtsa pa gsum las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogasteṣāmakuśalamūlatrayājjāta ityādisamutthānavacanādevamuktaḥ /<br/> tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya /<br/> dveṣajo yathā vairanipīḍanārtham /<br/> mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi sbyor ba ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum las skyes pa yin pas na dang po kun nas slong ba'i tshig las de skad bshad do / de la srog gcod pa chags pa las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / de'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyir ram / nor gyi phyir ram / rtsed mo'i phyir ram / bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir srog gcod par byed pa'o / zhe sdang las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gsod par byed pa'o / gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / mchod sbyin byed pa rnams dang rgyal pos chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas chos kyi blos gsod pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti /<br/> pārasīkānāṃ ca /<br/> te hyevamāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi bsgrungs pa rnams chad pas bcad na / rgyal po bsod nams kyi snod du 'gyur ro zhas grags pa lta bu dang par sig pa rnams kyi lta bu ste / de dag ni 'di skad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mātāpitarau jīrṇau vā glānau vā hantavyāviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha dang ma rgas sam nad tshabs chen pos thebs na gsod par bya'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye cānye 'pyevamāhurahivṛścikatryamvukādayo manuṣyāṇāmupaghātāpakā hantavyāḥ mṛgapaśupakṣimahiṣādayaścopabhogārthatvāditi /<br/> yaśca mithyādṛṣṭipravartitaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang 'di skad du sbrul dang sdig pa dang sbrang bu trya [?] ma bu ka la sogs pa rnams ni mi rnams la gdung bar byed pa yin pas gsad par bya'o / ri dags dang phyugs dang bya dang ma he la sogs pa rnams ni longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir gsad par bya'o zhes zer ba dang gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i srog gcod pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā /<br/> dveṣajaṃ yadvairanipīḍanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma byin par len pa chags pa las skyes pa ni gang zhig gang don du gnyer ba des 'phrog pa'am / gzhan gyi rnyed pa'am bkur sti'am grags pa'i phyir ram / bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'phrog pa'o / zhe sdang las skyes pa ni kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir 'phrog pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mohajaṃ yathā rājñāṃ dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāt /<br/> duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate /<br/> tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce ti /<br/> na caiśāmaparasvasaṃjñā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste rgyal pos chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas mi bsgrungs pa chad pas bcad pa'i phyir 'phrog pa lta bu dang 'di lta ste / bram ze rnams na re 'di thams cad ni tshangs pas bram ze rnams la byin pa yin na bram ze rnams dmas pas dmangs rigs rnams yongs su spyod par zad de / de lta bas na bram ze 'phrog pa na bram ze bdag nyid kyis len pa yin / bdag nyid kyis za ba yin / bdag nyis kyis gyon pa yin / bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa yin no zhes zer ba lta bu'o / de dag la bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca mithyādṛṣṭipravarttitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i ma byin par len pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhajaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ dārādiṣu tatsaṃrāgādabrahmacaryaṃ lābhasatkārārthamātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pas log par gyem pa chags pa las skyes pa ni gzhan gyi chung ma la sogs pa la de la chags pa'am / rnyed pa 'am bkur sti'i phyir ram / bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mi tshangs par spyod pa 'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dveṣajo vairanipīḍanārtham /<br/> mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe /<br/> yothoktaṃ brāhmaṇo gosaveneṣṭyā saṃvatsaragovratī bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhe sdang las skyes pa ni kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nyal po byed pa gang yin pa'o / gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / par sig la sogs pa ma la sogs pa la nyal ba dang ba lang 'bring gi mchod sbyin la cho ga can gyi chu btung ngo / rtsva bcad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrāmiti /<br/> ye cāhu rudūkhalapuṇyaphalapakvānnatīrthamārgaprakhyo mātṛgrāma iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma'i gan du nyal po la 'gro'o / sring mo'i gan du 'gro'o / rus gcig pa'i gan du 'gro'o zhes bya ba dang gang dang gang na 'di dag rnyed pa de dang der 'gro bar bya ste / de lta bas na ba lang dang 'jig rten las rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu dang gang dag bud med ni gtun dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang zas smin pa dang ngogs dang lam dang 'dra'o zhes zer ba lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛṣāvādādayo lobhajā dveṣajāścapūrvavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa chags pa las skyes pa dang zhe sdang las skyes pa ni snga ma bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mohajo mṛṣāvādo yathāha /<br/> na narmayuktamanṛtaṃ hi nāsti /<br/> na strīṣu rājanna vivāhakāle /<br/> prāṇātyaye sarvadhanāpahāre /<br/> pañcānṛtānyāhurapātakānīti /<br/> yaṣca mithyādṛṣṭipravartito mṛṣāvādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brdzun du smra ba gti mug las skyes pa ni ji skad du / rgyal po bzhad gad ldan dang bud med dang / bag ma len pa'i tshe dang gsod pa dang / nor kun 'phrog tshe brdzun byas gnod med de / brdzun lnga ltung bar byed pa min zhes bshad / zhes smras pa lta bu dang gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i brdzun du smra ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paiśunyādayastu mithyādṛṣṭipravartitā mohajāḥ /<br/> yaṣcaca vedādyasacchāstrapralāpaḥ /<br/> abhidhyādayaḥ kathaṃ lobhajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra ma la sogs pa gti mug las skyes pa ni log pa'i lta bas rab tu bcug pa dang gang yang rig byed la sogs pa bstan bcos ngan pa rdol ba'o / ji ltar na brnab sems la sogs pa chags pa la sogs pa las skyes pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadanantarasaṃbhūterabhidhyādyāstrimūlajāḥ /<br/> lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ /<br/> uktā kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ /<br/> kuśalāḥ kathamityāha /<br/> kuśalāḥ saprayogāntā alobhadveṣamohajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir / brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes / chags pa'i mjug thogs su byung ba ni chags pa las skyes pa dag yin no / zhe sdang gi mjug thogs su byung ba ni zhe sdang las skyes pa dag yin no / gti mug gi mjug thogs su byung ba ni gti mug las skyes pa dag yin no / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saprayogapṛṣṭhāḥ kuśalāḥ karmapathā alobhadveṣamohajāḥ /<br/> kuṣalacittasamutthitatvāt /<br/> tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ /<br/> maulādviratiḥ maulaḥ /<br/> pṛṣṭhād viratiḥ pṛṣṭhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams ji lta bu zhe na / dge ba sbyor dang mjug bcas rnams / chags sdang gti mug med las skyes / dge ba'i las kyi lam sbyor ba dang mjug dang bcas pa rnams ni dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba'i phyir dang de yang gdon mi za bar ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa las skyes pa dag yin no / de la mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ni sbyor ba spong ba ni dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi sbyor ba yin no / dngos spong ba ni dngos yin no / mjug spong ba ni mug yin te / 'di sta [*lta?] ste dge tshul bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa gnas sna tshogs par 'jug par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar byed / mkhan po la gsol ba 'debs par byed pa nas las lan gcig brjod pa dang lan gnyis brjod pa'i bar 'di ni sbyor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ prayogaḥ /<br/> tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lan gsum pa brjod pa'i che rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa 'di ni las kyi lam dngos yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu ji srid du gnas bsgo ba'am / de'i rten rnam par rig par byed pa dang ji srid du rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni mjug yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhetyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam thams cad chags pa la sogs pas mthar phyin par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gang bshad na / 'o na gang zhig gang gis mthar phyin par byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vadhavyāpādapāruṣyaniṣṭhā dveṣeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub po / zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ prāṇātipātavyāpādapāruṣpāṇāṃ dveṣeṇa samāptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gcod pa dang gnod sems dang tshig rtsub po dang 'di dag ni zhe sdang gis mthar phyin par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parityāgaparuṣacittasaṃmukhī bhāvāt /<br/> lobhataḥ /<br/> parastrīgamanābhidhyā 'dattādānasamāpanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su 'dor ba dang rtsub pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro / log gyem brnab sems ma byin len / chags pa sems ni rdzogs par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhena kāmamithyācārābhidhyā 'dattādānānāṃ samāptiḥ /<br/> mithyādṛṣṭestu mohena /<br/> adhimātrabhūto hi tāṃ niṣṭhāpayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pas log par gyem pa dang brnab sems dang ma byin par len pa rnams ni chags pas rdzogs par byed do / log par lta ba gti mug gis / cher rmongs par gyur na mthar phyin par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāṇāṃ tribhiriṣyate /<br/> ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ /<br/> mṛṣāvādapaiśunyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod / lhag ma yang gang dag ce na / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig kyal pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni chags pa'am / zhe sdang ngam / gti mug gsum kas kyang mthar phyin par byed do / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang 'di las kyi lam cha bzhir bshad pa de dag ni gsum dang gsum dang gcig dang gsum dang go rims bzhin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca /<br/> sattvādhiṣṭhānā vadhādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi ni sems can longs spyod dang / ming dang gzugs dang ming yin no / srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i gzhi ni sems can yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhogādhiṣṭhānāṃ parastrīgamanādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gzhi ni longs spyod yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmarūpādhiṣṭhāmithyādṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">log par lta ba'i gzhi ni ming dang gzugs yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmakāyādhiṣṭhānā mṛṣāvādādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa'i gzhi ni ming gi tshogs yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na /<br/> samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gi pha rol po 'chi bar nges par byas nas de dang mgo mnyam du 'am sngar shin ci de la las kyi lam dngos yod dam 'on te med ce na / snga dang mnyam du shi ba la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evocyate syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate /<br/> āha /<br/> syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryāditi kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ /<br/> anyāśrayodayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po med de nyid kyi phyir / sbyor ba yang byas la 'bras bu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur kyang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis sam / bka' stsal pa yod de / 'di lta ste gsod pa po sngar ram mnyam du shi bar gyur pa lta bu'o zhes gsungs so / de la rgyu ci zhig yod ce na / gsad par bya ba gson bzhin du gsod pa po la kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa yang med la / gsod pa po shi ba la yang ma yin te / lus gzhan skyes phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus gang gis de la sbyor ba byas pa de ni chad la ris mthun pa tha dad pa gzhan gyi lus kho na zhig byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni sbyor ba po ma yin pa'i phyir las kyi lam dang ldan par rig pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dmag gis gdab pa dang lings 'debs pa dang ma 'phrigs par gdab pa dag tu pha rol po gsad par bya ba'i phyir mang po tshogs pas btab la gcig cig gis srog gcod na de dang su zhig ldan par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">senādiṣvekakāryatvāt sarve kattṛvadanvitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir / thams cad byed pa blo bzhin ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt /<br/> arthato hi te 'yonyaṃ payoktāro bhavanti /<br/> yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don gcig pa'i phyir thams cad byed pa po ji lta ba bzhin ldan par 'gyur te / de dag ni don gyis na phan tshun du sbyor bar byed pa yin no / 'o na gang zhig nan gyis khrid pa de ji lta bu zhe na / de yang ldan par 'gyur ba ste / gang zhig 'di snyam du sog gi phyir yang srog chags mi gsod de zhes bya bar nges bar byas te 'gro ba ni ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate /<br/> prāṇātipātaḥ saṃcintya parasyābhrāntimāraṇam /<br/> yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā /<br/> iyatā prāṇātipāto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi srog gcod par byed pa la ji tsam gyis las kyi lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba nas ji tsam gyis na log par lta ba'i las kyi lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste / de brjod do / srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du ma nor ba ni gzhan gsad pa'o / gal te 'di bsad do snyam du bsams nas gsod par byed la / gzhan dang ma nor bar de nyid kyang gsod par byed na de tsam gyis srog gcod pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati /<br/> yo 'stu so 'stviti kṛtamevānena tyāgacittaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang zhig 'di ci srog chags sam srog chags ma yin / de 'am gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tsom zos nas gsod par byed pa de ji lta bu zhe na / de yang gdon mi za bar gang yin pa yin zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di rnyed nas de la snun par byed pas des na 'dor ba'i sems su byas pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu skandheṣu prāṇātipāto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po skad cig ma rnams la ji ltar srog gcod pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāṇo nāma vāyuḥ kāyacittasaṃniśrito vartate /<br/> tamabhipātayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog zhes bya ba ni lus dang sems la brten nas 'jug pa'i rlung yin te / de gcod par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā pradīpaṃ nirodhayati ghaṇṭāsvanaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mar me 'am / dril bu'i skad 'gag par byed pa dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jīvitendriyaṃ vā prāṇāstannirodhayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na srog gi dbang po srog yin te / de 'gag par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā /<br/> kasya tajjīvitaṃ yastadabhāvānmṛto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te srog gi dbang po'i skad cig ma gcig skye ba la bar chad byed na yang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no / de med pas gang zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i srog de gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasyeti ṣaṣṭhīṃ pudgalavāde vicārayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> uktaṃ tu bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi zhes bya ba'i drug pa ni gang zag tu smra ba dgag par dpyad par bya'o / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyuruṣmā 'tha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahatyamī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang tshe tshe dang drod rnams shes / 'di dag gis ni lus 'dor zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apaviddhastadā śete yathā kāṣṭhamacetana /<br/> tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bor na de tshe 'dug pa ni / ji ltar shing la sems med bzhin / zhes gsungs te / de lta bas na dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus ni gson po zhes bya la / dbang po med pa ni shi ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcer bu pa rnams na re blo sngar ma btang ba'i srog gcod pas kyang byed pa po chos ma yin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te / dper na me dang reg pa las tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ paradāradarśane 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ltar na gzhan gyi chung ma mthong ba dang reg pa la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcer bu pa skra 'bal ba dang dka' thub drag po'i lung 'bogs pa dang de dag gsad de shin yang sbyin pa po la de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / ma dang bu lto na yod pa dag kyang phun tshun sdug bsngal gyi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa'i phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vadhyasyāpi ca tatkriyāsaṃbandhādagnisvāśrayadāhavat /<br/> kāryataścāprasaṅgastadasambandhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsod par bya ba yang de'i bya ba dang 'brel ba'i phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur te / mes rang gi rten sreg pa bzhin no / byed du 'jug pa la yang thal par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pareṇāgnim sparśayatastenādāhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan me la reg tu 'jug pa me des mi 'tshig pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti /<br/> uktaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyim rdib na srog chags dag 'chi ba'i phyir shing la sogs pa med pa rnams kyang sdig pa dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro / nad pa la gnod pa dang shi ba na sman pa rnams la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / yang na dpe tsam gyis ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adattādānamanyasvasvīkriyā balacauryataḥ /<br/> abhrāntyeti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gcod pa bshad zin to / ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor / mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed / ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati /<br/> stūpādapaharato buddhāda dattādānam /<br/> sarvaṃ hi tadbhagavatā parinirvāṇakāle parigṛthītamiti /<br/> yeṣāṃ samrakṣyamityapare /<br/> asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa la mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed cing / gang du mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir bya bar bsams pa de las gzhan du 'du shes kyang ma 'khrul na de tsam gyis ma byin par len pa yin no / mchod rten las phrogs pa ni sangs rgyas las ma byin par blangs pa yin te / bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i che de dag thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re srung ma gang dag yin pa las so zhes zer ro / bdag po med pa'i gter brus na ni yul gyi bdag po las so / shi ba'i nor phrogs na las byas pa zhig yin na ni mtshams kyi nang du gtogs pa rnams las so / ma byas pa zhig yin na ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agamyagamanaṃ kāmamithyācāraścaturvidhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bgrod mi ma 'gro ba 'dod pa yis / log par gyem pa rnam pa bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catuṣprakāramagamyagamanaṃ kāmamithyācāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bgrod par bya ba ma yin par 'gro ba 'dod pas log par gyem pa rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bgrod pa bya ba ma yin pa gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba 'am / ma 'am / bu mo 'am pha dang ma dang 'brel ba'i gan du 'gro'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi chung ma yin yang yan lag ma yin par 'gro ba ste / kha'am rkub tu 'jug pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul ma yin par 'gro ba'am / snang ba'am mchod rten nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akāle vā gacchati /<br/> kaḥ punaḥ akālaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtsug lag khang ngam / dus ma yin par 'gro ba ste / dus ma yin pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbrum ma'am / nu zho 'thung ba'am / nges pa dang bcas pa'i gan du 'gro ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi bharturanujñayā saniyamā bhavatītyeke /<br/> abhrāntyeti vartate /<br/> yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re gal te khyos gnang na nges pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ro / ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te / gal te bdag gi yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du song na las kyi lam du mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyanyaḥ parastrīsaṃjñayā 'nyāmabhigacchet paradāraprayogādvastuparibhogācca syādityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gzhan gyi chung ma ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhan zhig gi gan du song na / kha cig na re gzhan gyi chung ma la sbyar bar byas pa'i phyir dang dngos po yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatra prayogānna syāt prāṇāti pātavadityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re sbyor ba gzhan du byas pa'i phyir mi 'gyur te / srog gcod pa bzhan [*bzhin?] no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhikṣuṇīṃ gacchataḥ kasyāntikāt kāmamithyācāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong ma'i gan du 'gro ba su las 'dod pa la log par gyem pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viṣayasvāminaḥ /<br/> tasya hi tanna marṣaṇīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul gyi bdag po las te des ni de mi bzod par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des ni rang gi chung ma nges pa dang bcas pa bzhin du bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhon nu ma'i gan du 'gro ba ni gang la byin pa las so / gal te sbyin pa med na srung ba gang yin pa dang tha na rgyal po las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathāsaṃjñino vākyamarthābhijñe mṛṣāvacaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan bsgyur ba'i / tshig don mngon par go ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ /<br/> anabhijñe kiṃ syāt /<br/> saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don smra ba gang yin pa de la 'du shes gzhan du bsgyur la des gang gi dbang du byas nas smras pa'i tshig de'i don yang go na tshig de ni brdzun du smra ba'i yin no / mngon par ma go na cir 'gyur zhe na / tshig kyal par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vākyamityucyate /<br/> kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig ces bya ba ni res 'ga' yi ge mang po zhig las tshig tu 'gyur na de la las kyi lam gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścimaḥ sahāvijñaptyā yatra cārthābhijño bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha ma rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang bcas pa'o / yang na gang las don go bar 'gyur ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrve tu varṇāḥ prayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yi ge snga ma rnams ni sbyor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arthābhijña ityucyate /<br/> ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don mngon par go ba zhes bya ba ci re zhig nyan pa pos don mngon par go ba yin nam / 'on te mngon par go bar nus pa zhig yin / de las cir 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te don mngon par go ba yin na ni tshig gi don yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'gags pa'i phyir / rnam par rig byed ma yan pa kho na las kyi lam du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athābhijñātuṃ samarthe /<br/> evaṃ doṣo na bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te mngon par go bar nus pa ma yin na ni de lta ni nyes par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ cābhijñātuṃ samartho 'pyutpannabhāva utpanne śrotravijñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na mngon par go bar nus pa yin zhe na / skad byang ba dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā na doṣastathā 'stu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar nyes pa med pa de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣodaśa vyavahārāḥ sūtra uktāḥ /<br/> adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las tha snyad bcu drug gsungs pa la ma mthong ba la mthong zhes smras pa dang ma thos pa dang ma rtogs pa dang rnam par ma shes pa la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba dang mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba dang rnam par shes pa'i bar la rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba dang brgyad po 'di ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba la mthong ngo zhes smra ba nas rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba'i bar dang / ma mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba nas rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba'i bar brgyad po 'di ni 'phags pa'i tha snyad dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatraiṣāṃ dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānāṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs pa dang rnam par shes pa de dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na
