</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥ śrotramanaścittairanubhūtaṃ tribhiśca yat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig rna yid kyi rnam shes dang / gsum gyis nyams su myong gang des
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taddṛṣṭaśrutavijñātaṃ mataṃ coktaṃ yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang / rtogs pa yin te go rims bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccakṣurvijñānenānubhūtaṃ taddṛṣṭamityuktam /<br/> yacchrotravijñānena tacchrutam /<br/> yanmano vijñānena tat vijñātam /<br/> yat ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānaistanmatam /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni mthong ba zhes bshad do / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni thos pa zhes bshad do / yid kyi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bshad do / sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do / ci'i phyir zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gandharasaspraṣṭavyānyavyākṛtatvānmṛtakalpāni /<br/> ata eteṣu matākhyeti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir shi ba dang 'dra ste / de'i phyir de dag la ni rtogs pa zhes zer ro / de'i phyir de dag la ni rtogs pa zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatra jñāpakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la khungs ci zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtraṃ yuktiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo dang rigs pa yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtraṃ tāvat tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mdo ni mchod byed kyi ma can 'di ji snyam du sems / gzugs gang dag khyod kyi mig gis ma mthong ste sngon ma mthong zhing mi lta la / khyod 'di snyam du blta bar bya'o snyam du yang mi sems na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā /<br/> no bhadanta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi de las khyod 'dun pa'am / 'dod chags sam 'dod pa'am dga' ba'am / chags pa'am / 'chums pa'am / lhag par chags pa skye ba'am / btsun pa ma lags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgra gang dag khyod kyi rna bas ma thos te / sngon ma thos zhes bya ba dang rgyas par yid kyis chos rnams rnam par ma shes te zhes bya ba nas rgyas par btsun pa ma lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchod byed kyi ma can khyod 'di la mthong na yang mthong ba tsam du 'gyur la / thos pa dang rtogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa tsam du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastriṣu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭaśrutavijñātaśabdāpadeśādgandhādiṣu matākhyā amyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir yul gsum la mthong ba dang thos pa dang rnam par shes pa'i sgras bstan pa'i phyir dri la sogs pa la rtogs zhes bya bar go 'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar mi 'dod na mthong ba la sogs pa'i dngos po'i nang du ma gtogs pa'i phyir dri la sogs pa la tha snyad 'dogs par yang mi 'gyur te / 'di ni rigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtraṃ tāvajjñāpakamanyārthatvāt /<br/> na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mdo 'di don gzhan yin pa'i phyir / khungs ma yin te / bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di la tha snyad rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa de ni ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate /<br/> kiṃ punarḍṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ ca yāvadvijñātam /<br/> kecittāvadāhuḥ /<br/> yat pañcabhirindriyaiḥ pratyakṣaṃ taddṛṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni khyod yul rnam pa drug po 'di la mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhi la mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad tsam du 'gyur gyi sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan mar sgro 'dogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo'i don yin par snang ngo / yang mthong ba ni ci zhig yin / rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ci zhig yin zhe na / re zhig kha cig na re dbang bo lngas mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat parata āgamitaṃ tacchrutam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol las 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat svayaṃ yuktyanumānato rucitaṃ tanmatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag nyid kyi rigs pas rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yanmanaḥpratyakṣabhāvenādhiṣṭitaṃ pratyātmavedyaṃ tadvijñātamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa bsgoms na sa rtogs pa so so rang gis rig par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante /<br/> śrutā matā vijñātā iti vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang yul lnga po 'di dag re re la yang mthong ba'am thos pa'am / rtogs pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṣṭho 'nyatra dṛṣṭāditi nāsti gandhādiṣu vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> tasmādyuktiṃrapyeṣā yuktirna bhavati /<br/> pūrvācāryā evamāhuḥ /<br/> yad dṛṣṭaṃ yat pratyakṣīkṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa yin no zhes tha snyad gdags la / drug pa la ni mthong ba ma gtogs te / de ltar na dri la sogs pa la tha snyad 'dogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang med de / de lta bas na rigs pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams ni 'di skad du / mig gis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrutaṃ yac chrotreṇa parataścākharitam /<br/> mataṃ yat svayaṃ cintitam /<br/> vijñātaṃ yat pratyātmapratisaṃveditamadhigataṃ cotpannam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rna bas thos pa dang pha rol las 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'o / bdag nyid kyis bsam pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa'o / bdag nyid kyis so sor yang dag par rig pa dang rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prasaṅgena śāstraṃ pravartayatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so / bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ kāyenānyathātvaṃ prāpyetsyānmṛṣāvādaḥ /<br/> syāt /<br/> ata evocyate /<br/> syiānna kāyena parākrameta prāṇātipātāvadyena ca spṛśyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig lus kyi don gzhan go par byed na brdzun du smra par 'gyur ram zhe na / 'gyur ro / de nyid kyi phyir / lus kyis mi byed na srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho pa'i reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /<br/> syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag gis byed par 'gyur na'o / ngag gis mi byed na brdzun gyi kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod do / lus kyis byed par 'gyur na'o / lus kyis kyang mi byed / ngag gis kyang mi byed na / kha na ma tho ba gnyi gas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt ṛśīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇa poṣadhanidarśanaṃ cātreti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod de / 'dir drang srong rnams yid rab tu khros pa dang gso sbyong dper bya'o zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati /<br/> kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ /<br/> gato mṛṣāvādaḥ /<br/> paiśunyaṃ kliṣṭacittasya vacanaṃ parabhedane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi gas yang mi byed na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam par rig byed med pa can yang med pas ji ltar na de gnyis kyis las kyi lam du 'grub ste / 'di la 'bad par bya'o / brdzun du smra ba rdzogs so / phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir / nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam /<br/> arthabhijña iti vartate abhrāntyeti ca /<br/> pāruṣyamapriyaṃ /<br/> vacanat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol po dag dbye zhing mi mdza' bar bya ba'i phyir sems kyi nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ni phra ma yin te / don mngon par go ba dang ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro / tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭacittasyeti vartate /<br/> arthābhijñe abhrāntyeti ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig dang don mngon par go ba dang ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam /<br/> sarvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ bhinna pralāpitā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems nyon mongs pa can gyis ci'i tshig mi snyan pa pha rol po la smras shing don mngon par go la gang la smra bar 'dod pa de nyid la smra ba gang yin pa de ni tshig rtsub po yin no / nyon mongs can kun kyal pa nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vākyamityadhikāro vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig ces bya ba'i dbang du byas par sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /<br/> saiva saṃbhinnapralāpitā /<br/> tadyogena hi saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati /<br/> ato 'nyat kliṣṭamityanye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig thams cad ni tshig kyal pa yin no / de nyid na ni kyal pa nyid yin te / de dang ldan pa ni tshig kyal pa can yin no / gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon mongs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare /<br/> lapanāgītanāṭyavat /<br/> kuśāstravacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ngag gi las brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa de dag las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ni tshig kyal pa yin no zhes zer te / kha gsag glu dang zlos gar bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti /<br/> kukśāstrāṇi ca taddṛṣṭayo 'pi gadanti /<br/> evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos ngan bzhin / dper na dge slong log pas 'tsho ba can kha gsag byed pa dang chags pas kha cig glu len pa dang zlos gar mkhan rnams zlos gar gyi tshe gzhan dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir 'khyal pa dang de'i lta bar gyur nas bstan bcos ngan pa dag gdon pa dang de bzhin du smre sngags 'don pa dang 'du 'dzi'i gtam la sogs pa brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de yang tshig kyal pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /<br/> naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe glu yang yod la tshig kyal pa yang ma yin zhe na / de'i tshe nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i glu dag blangs kyi stegs sngags dang ldan pa dag ni ma yin no / gzhan dag na re de'i tshe yang bag ma len pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadāpyāvāhavivāhadyabhilāpasadbhāvādasti saṃbhinnapralāpo na karmapatha ityapare /<br/> abhidhyā tu parasvaviṣamaspṛhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bag ma gtong ba la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod pa yod pas tshig kyal pa ni yod mod kyi las kyi lam ni ma yin no zhes zer ro / brnab sems ni / log pas gzhan gyi nor la chags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol po dag gi gang yin pa de bdag gi yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas gzhan gyi nor dag la mthu'am 'jab bu 'ang rung log par mi rigs pas bdag gi ra byed 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brnab sems kyi las kyi lam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaiva kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇābhidhyetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa thams cad brnab sems yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye tyevamādi /<br/> yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar sgrib pa'i skabs su 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i dbang du mdzad nas mdo las de 'jig rten na brnab sems spangs te zhes bya ba de la sogs pa gsungs so zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang brnab sems kyi las kyi lam yod par 'gyur du 'ong bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mā bhūccakravartināmapyuttarakauravānāṃ pābhidhyā karmapatha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te thams cad brnab sems yin na yang thams cad las kyi lam ni ma yin te / nyes par spyad pa che long bsdus pa'i phyir zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpādaḥ sattvavidveṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod sems sems can la sdang ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattveṣu vidveṣo vyāpādaḥ parapīḍākārapravṛttaḥ /<br/> nāstidṛṣṭiḥ śubhāśubhe /<br/> mithyādṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can dag la zhe sdang ba pha rol la gnod pa'i rnam par zhugs pa ni gnod sems yin no / dge dang mi dge med lta ba / log par lta ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dge ba dang mi dge ba med do zhes lta ba de ni log par lta ba yin te / 'di lta ste sbyin pa med do / mchod sbyin med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta iti /<br/> saiṣā sākalyena karmaphalāryāpavādikā mithyādṛṣṭirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyin sreg med do / legs par spyad pa med do / nyes par spyad pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nas 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar las dang 'bras bu dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ni ril gyis log par lta ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādimātraṃ tu śloke darśitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshigs su bcad par ni dang po tsam zhig bstan par zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃlakṣaṇā ete daśa karmapathāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam bcu po de dag gi mtshan nyid ni de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmapathā iti ko'rthaḥ /<br/> trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / 'di la / gsum mam bdun ni las kyang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems la sogs pa gsum ni las kyi lam yin pas las kyi lam dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati /<br/> tadvaśena tathābhisaṃskaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa can gyi sems pa ni de dag gi rgyu bas rgyu ste / de dag gi dbang gis de bzhin du mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir de dag gi 'gros kyis 'gro'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti /<br/> karmapathāścakarma ca karmapathāśceti karmapathāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun ni lus dang ngag gi las yin pa'i phyir las kyang yin la las kyi lam yin pas las kyi lam yang yin te / de dag kun nas slong ba'i sems pa ni de dag la brten nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro / de ltar na las kyi lam dang las dang las kyi lam yin pas na las kyi lam ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asarūpāṇāmapyekaśeṣasiddheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi 'dra ba rnams la yang gcig bsdus par 'grub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanabhidhyādayaḥ prāṇātipātaviratyādayaśca jñeyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems med pa la sogs pa dang srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ /<br/> yathaudārikaṃ ca grahaṇādityuktaṃ prāk /<br/> yeṣāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣeṇādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmutkarṣāpakarṣau loke bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir sbyor ba dang mjug dag las kyi lam ma yin zhe na / 'di ltar de dag gi de'i don dang de'i rtsa ba can du 'jug pa yin no / sngar yang che long bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bshad pa yang yin no / 'jig rten na gang dag 'phel ba dang 'grib pas phyi nang gi dngos pa rnams 'phel ba dang 'grib pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ /<br/> ta eva hi praṣṭavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo sde pa gang dag brnab sems pa la sogs pa kho na yid kyi las su 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na de dag ji ltar las kyi lam yin zhe na / de dag nyid la dris shig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ /<br/> itaretarāvāhanādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta mod kyi brjod par nus te / de dag ni bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro rnams kyi las kyang yin la lam yang yin pas las kyi lam yin pa'am / yang na gcig gis gcig 'dren pas na las kyi lam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ /<br/> mūlacchedastvasaddṛṣṭyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dge pa'i chos rnams kun tu spyod pa dang 'gal ba yin la / med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalamūlacchedastu mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavatyadhimātraparipūrṇayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa ni log par lta ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par gcod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi śāstra uktaṃ katamānyadhimātrāṇyakuśalamūlāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci'i phyir bstan bcos la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rnams gang dag yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod par byed pa dang 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par byed pa na dang po nyid du spong ba dag yin pa'o zhes bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">log par lta ba mi dge ba'i rtsa bas drangs pa'i phyir de dag kho na la las kyi lam de bstan par mdzad de / dper na me kho nas grong sreg par byed na rkun po rnams me de 'dren pa byed pa yin pas rkun po rnams kyis grong bsregs so zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katameṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ samucchedo bhavati /<br/> kāmāptotpattilābhinām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gcig kun du 'chad par 'gyur zhe na / 'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlāni samuchidyante /<br/> rūpārūpyāvacarairasamanvāgatatvāt /<br/> prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ tarhi kathaṃ nīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du 'chad par 'gyur te / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyatā 'nena pudgalena traidhātukāni kuśalamūlāli samucchinnāni bhavantīti /<br/> tatprāptidūrīkaraṇamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na btags pa las 'di tsam gyis na gang zag 'dis khams gsum pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcad pa yin no zhes ba shad pa ji ltar grangs de ni de'i thob pa thag sring par byed pa las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃtatestadabhājanatvāpādanāt /<br/> upapattipratilābhikānyeva ca samucchidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud de'i snod ma yin pa nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro / skyes nas thob pa kho na dag kun du chad par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāyogikebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ parihīṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba las byung ba dag las ni sngar yongs su nyams zin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā samucchidyante /<br/> phalahetvapavādinyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci la dmigs pa'i log par lta bas kun du gcod par byed ce na / rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti /<br/> ānantaryavimuktimārgasthānīye ete ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">legs par spyad pa med do / nyes par spyad pa med do zhes rgyu la skur pa 'debs pa gang dag yin pa dang legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa med do zhes 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa gang dag yin pa'o / gzhan dag na re de dag ni bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa kho nas yin gyi zag pa med pa la dmigs pas ni ma yin no / skal ba mnyam pa'i khams la dmigs pa kho nas yin gyi skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams la ni dmigs pas ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayogamātrānuśāyitvena durbalatvādityeke /<br/> evaṃ tu varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pa tsam gyi sgo nas rgyas pas nyam chung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvathā /<br/> navaprakārāṇyapi kuśalamūlāni sakṛtsamucchidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du kun gyis kha cig na re dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu char yang cig car du 'chad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaprahātavyavadityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu varṇayanti /<br/> kramaśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du rim gyis zhes brjod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navaprakārayā mithyādṛṣṭyā navaprakārāṇi kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante /<br/> bhāvanā heyakleśavat yāvadadhimātrādhimātrayā mṛdumṛdūnīti /<br/> evamayaṃ granthaḥ pālito bhavati /<br/> katamānyaṇusahagatāni kuśalamūlāni /<br/> āha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du chen po'i chen pos chung ngu'i chung ngu gcod par byed pa'i bar du log par lta ba rnam pa dgus dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu gcod par byed de / de ltar na phra mo dang lhan cig tu gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti /<br/> asya tarhi granthasya ko nayaḥ /<br/> katamānyadhiṃmātrādhimātrāṇyakuśalamūlāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par byed pa na thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba gang dag yin pa ste / gang dag med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du 'chad pa zhes bya ba'i grang su 'gro ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di bskyab pa yin no / 'o na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po gang dag yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yairakukśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinattīti /<br/> samāptimetat saṃdhāyoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di'i tshul ji lta bu yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tainiravaśeṣacchedāt /<br/> eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis ma lus par gcod pa'i phyir de ni rdzogs pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin te / de dag las rnam pa gcig ma chad na yang thams cad skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgavadabhyutthānena cchinattītyeke /<br/> evaṃ tu varṇayantyubhayatheti /<br/> pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke /<br/> evaṃ tu varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re mthong ba'i lam bzhin du ma langs par gcod par byed do zhes zer ro / 'di skad du gnyi gar gcod par byed do zhes brjod do / kha cig na re sngar sdom pa spangs la phyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya cittasya phalasaṃvarastattyāgāttasya tyāga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du sdom pa sems gang gi 'bras bu yin pa de gtong ba de yang gtong ngo zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nṛṣu /<br/> manuṣyeṣveva nāpāyeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi'i nang du mi'i nang kho na dag tu gcod kyi ngan song dag na ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭākliṣṭayoḥ prajñayoradṛḍhatvāt /<br/> na deveṣu karmaphala pratyakṣatvāt /<br/> triṣu dvīpeṣu nottarakurau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dag mi bstan pa'i phyir ro / lha dag gi nang na yang med de / las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / gling gsum dag na yod kyi byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na yang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāpāśayatvāt jambūdvīpa evetyapare /<br/> teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate /<br/> jāmbūdvīpakaḥ sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ /<br/> evaṃ pūrvavidehako godānīyaka iti /<br/> tāni punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdig pa'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re 'dzam bu'i gling kho na na yod do zhes zer te / 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad pas nyung na dbang po brgyad dang ldan pa yin te / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro / de dag kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chinatti strī pumān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes pa bud med kyis gcod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stri ca samucchinatti puruṣaśca mandacchandavīryaprajñatvāt /<br/> na strītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes pa dang bud med kyis kun du gcod par byed de / gzhan dag na re 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus zhen pa'i phyir bud med kyis ni ma yin no zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ grantho virudhyeta /<br/> yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgato niyatamasāvaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong ma'i dbang po dang ldan pa de dag gdon mi za bar dbang po brgyad dang ldan no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi tṛṣṇācarito na samucchinatti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las kyang sred pa spyad pas ni kun du gcod par mi byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">calāśayatvāt /<br/> kastarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam pa gyo ba yin pa'i phyir ro / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭicaritaḥ /<br/> dṛḍhagūḍhapāpāśayatvāt /<br/> ata eva na śaṇḍādayastṛṣṇācarite pakṣyatvāt /<br/> āpāyikavacca /<br/> kiṃsvabhāvaḥ kuśalamūlasamucchedaḥ /<br/> so 'samanvayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta spyad / sdig pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / mkhyud pa can yin pa'i phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir ma ning la sogs pas kyang ma yin te / sred pa'i spyad pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyir dang ngan song bzhin no dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du 'chad pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni mi ldan pa'o / gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thob pa yang mi skye la ma thob pa skye ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasminnasamanvāgama utpanne samucchinnāni kuśalamūlānyucyante /<br/> teṣāṃ samucchinnānāṃ kathaṃ punaḥ pratisaṃdhiḥ /<br/> saṃdhiḥ kāṅkṣāstidṛṣṭibhyāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi ldan pa de skyes na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du chad pa zhes bya'o / kun du chad pa de dag ji ltar na yang nyid mtshams sbyor zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā 'sya hetuphale vicikitsā cotpadyate /<br/> aṣṭidṛṣṭirvā samyak dṛṣṭirityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas / nam zhig 'di la rgyu dang 'bras bu la the tshom skyes pa'am / yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba'i don te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadā punaḥ tatprāptisamutpādāt pratisaṃdhitāni kuśalamūlānyucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod par lta ba skyes pa de'i tshe yang de'i thob pa kun du spyod pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nying mtshams ni rnam pa dgu cig car du sbyar ba la / mngon sum du ni rim gyis 'gyur te / nad med nas stobs rnyed pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punasteṣāṃ pratisaṃdhiḥ /<br/> nehānantaryakāriṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de dag gi nying mtshams sbyor ba ni / mtshams med byed pa 'di las min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyasyaiveha syādānantaryakāriṇastu neha syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyis ni 'di nyid la 'gyur gyi mtshams med par byed pa ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tameva saṃdhāyoktam abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid la dgongs nas / gang zag 'di ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi 'di ni nges par dmyal ba dag na 'chi 'pho ba 'am skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ /<br/> evaṃ yaḥ svabalena parabalena /<br/> punarāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba ni srid pa bar ma la gnas pa'o / 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba la mngon du phyogs pa'o / de la gang zhig rgyu'i stobs kyis kun du gcod pa de ni 'chi 'pho ba na nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro / gang zhig rkyen gyi stobs kyis kun du gcod pa de ni skye ba na nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te / rang gi stobs kyis gcod pa gang yin pa dang gzhan gyi stobs kyis gcod pa gang yin pa de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang smras pa / gang zhig bsam pa nyams pas kun du gcod par byed pa de ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya āśayaprayogavipannaḥ sa bhedātkāyasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bsam pa dang sbyor ba nyams pas gcod par byed pa de ni lus zhig nas nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba nyams pa gang yin pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims nyams pa gang yin pa de yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syātsamucchinna kuśalamūlo na mithyātvaniyata iti /<br/> catuṣkoṭikam /<br/> prathamā koṭiḥ pūraṇādayaḥ /<br/> dvitīyā 'jātaśatruḥ /<br/> tṛtīyā devadattaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du 'chad pa yin la log pa nyid du nges pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi ste / mu dang po ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa'o / gnyis pa ni ma skyes dgra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni lha sbyin no / bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalamūlasamucchedikāyā mithyādṛṣṭeravīcau vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod par byed pa'i log par lta ba'i rnam par smin pa ni mnar med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake /<br/> karmapathaprasaṅga evāyaṃ vartate /<br/> tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti /<br/> yugapadyāvadaṣṭābhiraśubhaiḥ saha vartate /<br/> cetanā /<br/> ekena tāvatsaha vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med par byed pa rnams kyis ni der ram gzhan gyi nang du'o / 'di ni las kyi skabs yin pas de la las kyi lam du zhig dang sems pa lhan cig tu 'byung bar 'gyur par brjod par bya ste / mi dge brgyad kyi bar dag dang / sems pa cig car lhan cig 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vinā 'nyenābhidhyādisaṃmukhībhāve akliṣṭacetaso vā tatprayogeṇa rūpiṇāmanyatamaniṣṭhāgamane /<br/> dvabhyāṃ saha vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sems pa gcig dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni gzhan med par brnab sems la sogs par mngon du 'gyur ba'am / sems pa nyon mongs pa can / de'i sbyor bas gzugs can rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig mthar phyin par byed na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā /<br/> tribhiḥ saha vartate /<br/> vyāpannacittasya parakīya prāṇimāraṇāpaharaṇe yugapat /<br/> na tarhīdānīmadattādānasya lobhenaiva niṣṭā sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba ni gnod sems su 'gyur ba srog gcod pa dang brnab sems dang ldan pa ma byin par len pa'am / 'dod pas log par gyem pa'am / tshig kyal pa smra na'o / gsum dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba na brnab sems dang ldan pa cag car du gzhan gyis srog chags bsad pas 'phrog na'o / 'o na ni de chags pa kho nas ma byin par len pa mthar phyin par byed pa mi 'grub pa ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ananyacittasya tatsamāptau sa niyamo jñeyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa de ni sems gzhan dang mi ldan pa'i de rdzogs pa la shes par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidhyādyāviṣṭasya ca tatprayogeṇa rūpidvayaniṣṭhāgamane tribhireva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems mngon sum du gyur pa de'i sbyor bas gzugs can gnyis mthar phyin par byed na yang gsum kho na dang lhan cig 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhiḥ saha vartate /<br/> bhedābhiprāyasyānṛta vacane paruṣavacane vā /<br/> tatra himānasa eko bhavati vācikāstrayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dbye na bya ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa brdzun gyi tshig gam tshig rtsub po smra na ste / de la ni yid kyi gcig yin la ngag gi gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidhyādigatasya vā tatprayogeṇā nyarūpitraya niṣṭhāgamane /<br/> evaṃ paṇcaṣaṭsaptabhiryo jayitavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na brnab sems la sogs par gyur pa de'i sbyor bas gzhan gsum mthar phyin par byed na ste / lnga dang drug dang bdun dang yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭābhiḥ saha vartate /<br/> ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni brnab sems la sogs pa mngon du gyur pa kho na drug la sbyor ba byas nas 'dod pas log par gyem pa dag nyid kyis byed la mnyam du mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadakuśalaiḥ /<br/> daśabhiryāvacchubhaiḥ /<br/> kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti /<br/> naikāṣṭapañcabhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mi dge ba dag dang ni de lta bu yin no / dge ba bcu yi bar dag dang / dge ba'i las kyi lam dag ni bcu'i bar dang sems pa lhan cig 'byung ngo zhes spyir bstan nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang min / las kyi lam gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang lhan cig tu mi 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dvābhyāṃ saha vartate /<br/> kuśaleṣu pañcasu vijñāneṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la gnyis dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni de dag rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyasamāpattau ca kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ /<br/> tribhiḥ samyagdṛṣṭisaṃprayukte manovijñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i gnas pa'o / gsum dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhirakuśalāvyākṛtacittasyo pāsakaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarasamādāne /<br/> ṣaḍbhiḥ kuśaleṣu pañcaṣu vijñānakāyeṣu tatsamādāne /<br/> saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne /<br/> navabhiḥ kuśaleṣu pañcaṣu vijñāneṣu /<br/> tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte /<br/> daśabhistato 'nyatra kuśale manovijñāne bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāna eva /<br/> sarvā ca dhyānānāsrava saṃvarasahavartinī cetanā 'nyatra kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o / drug dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa de yang dag par len pa na'o / bdun dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas te de kho na yang dag par len pa dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o / dgu dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de yang dag par len pa dang de nyid bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa la gnas pa bcu dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa kho na dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag kho na ma gtogs pa bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i sems pa thams cad yin no / sdom pa ma gtogs par ni gcig dang lhan cig 'byung ba yang yod de / sems gzhan dang ldan pa spong ba'i yan lag gcig yang dag par len pa na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcāṣṭābhirapi syātkuśale manovijñāne dvipañcāṅgasamādāne yugapat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga dang brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba yang yod de / dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa cig car du yan lag gnyis dang lnga yang dag par len pa na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba gang na dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du zhig mngon sum du gyur pa'am ldan pa'i sgo nas yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhinnapralāpapāruṣyavyāpādā narake dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba na ni kyal pa dang / tshig rtsub gnod sems rnam gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi /<br/> saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamabhāvataśca /<br/> paridevanātsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /<br/> parasparaparitāpanātpāruṣyaṃ rukṣasaṃtānatayā /<br/> parasparadveṣādvyāpādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba na ni las kyi lam 'di gsum mngon sum du gyur pa dang ldan pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'i sgo nas yod de / smre sngags 'don pa'i phyir tshig kyal pa yin no / phan tshun brgyad gags byed pa'i phyir tshig rtsub po yin no / gcig la gcig sems kyi rgyud rtsub pos zhe sdang ba'i phyir gnod sems yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samanvāgamato 'bhidhyāmithyādṛṣṭī /<br/> na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /<br/> rañjanīyavastvabhāvātkarmaphalapratyakṣatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems log lta ldan pas so / chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir dang las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur ba'i phyir mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmakṣayeṇa maraṇānna prāṇātipātaḥ /<br/> dravyastrīparigrahābhāvānnadattādānakāmamithyācārau prayojanābhāvānna mṛṣāvādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las zad nas 'chi ba'i phyir dang rdzas dang bud med yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par gyem pa dag med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva na paiśunyaṃ nityabhinnatvācca /<br/> kurau trayaḥ /<br/> samanvāgamata iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgos pa med pa'i phyir brdzun du smra ba med do / de nyid kyi phyir dang rtag tu byed zin pa'i phyir phra ma med do / sgra mi snyan na gsum yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭayo na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /<br/> amamāparigrahatvāt snigdha saṃtānatvādāghātavastvabhāvādapāpāśayatvācca /<br/> saptamaḥ svayamapyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba dag ste / ldan pa'i sgo nas yod par sbyar gyi nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir dang rgyud 'jam pa'i phyir dang kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir dang sdig pa can gyi bsam pa ma yin pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pyasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na bdun pa dngos su yang / de na tshig kyal pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi kliṣṭacittāḥ kadācit gāyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi sems su gyur pa de dag ni res 'ga' glu dag len to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāpāśayatvāt na prāṇatipātādayaḥ /<br/> niyatāyuṣkatvāddravyastrīparigrahābhāvāt prayojanābhāvācca /<br/> kathameṣāmabrahmacaryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdig pa can gyi bsam pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang tshe nges pa'i phyir dang rdzas dang bud med yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir dang dgos pa med pa'i phyir srog gcod pa la sogs pa med do / ji ltar 'di dag mi tshangs par spyod pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti /<br/> gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti /<br/> agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni bud med gang dag lhan cig dga' bar 'dod pa de'i lag nas gzung nas zhing gi drung du 'gro ste / gal te bgrod par bya ba zhig yin na ni shing gis sgrib par byed pas de dag de la nyal po byed do / ci ste bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa zhig yin na ni sgrib par mi byed pas ni de dag de la nyal po mi byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme 'nyatra daśāśubhāḥ /<br/> svayamapīti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa gzhan na mi dge bcu / dngos su yang yod ces bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dag las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams na ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu mngon sum du 'gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiryakpretadeveṣvasaṃvaranirmuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dud 'gro dang yi dags dang lha dag gi nang na ni sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyeṣvasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā api
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dag gi nang na ni sdom pa ma yin pas bsdus pa yang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang lhas lha mi gsod kyang 'gro ba gzhan na gnas na ni gsod par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">devā api śiromadhyacchedāt bhriyanta ityapare /<br/> uktā aśubhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re lha yang mgo dang rked pa bcad na 'chi'o zhes zer ro / mi dge ba rnams bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhāstrayastu sarvatra saṃmukhībhāva lābhataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba gsum ni thams cad na / rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams ni khams gsum po thams cad na / 'gro ba lnga char du ni mngon du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i sgo nas yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyāsaṃjñisattveṣu lābhataḥ sapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med 'du shes med sems can / rnyed pa bdun yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dag na ni lus dang ngag gi dge ba'i las kyi lam bdun ldan pa'i sgo kho na nas yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyoopapannānāmāryāṇāmatītānāgatānāsravasaṃvarasamanvāgamāt /<br/> asaṃjñisattvānāṃ ca dhyānasaṃvarasamanvāgamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med par skyes pa'i 'phags pa rnams la zag pa med pa'i sdom pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang ldan pa'i phyir dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa dag na 'phags pas gang la brten pa can gyi zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed de 'gag pa ni 'das pa de dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca bhūmyāśrayeṇa tvanāgatena /<br/> śeṣite /<br/> saṃmukhībhāvataścāpi hitvā sanarakān kurun /<br/> śesaḥ kṛtaḥ śeṣitaḥ /<br/> yo 'nyo dhātuḥ śeṣito gatirvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa lnga char la brten pa can dang ma 'das pa dang ldan no / lhag par byas na mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang / dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs / lhag mar byas pas na lhag byas te lhag mar byas pas ni khams sam 'gro ba gzhan gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatraite sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi saṃvidyante 'nyatra narakottarakurubhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dag ma gtogs pa de na ni dge ba'i las kyi lam bdun po 'di dag mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punastiryakpreteṣu saṃvaranirmuktā rūpadhātau tu saṃvarasaṃgṛhītā anyatrobhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi nang dag na ni sdom pas bsdus pa ma gtogs pa rnams so / gzugs kyi khams na ni sdom pas bsdus pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ kuśalāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan na ni gnyis ga yod do / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve 'dhipatiniṣyandavipākaphaladā matāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang / rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalaistāvatsarvairevāsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtaiḥ narakeṣrapapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mi dge ba kun du bstan pa dang goms par byas pa dang lan mang du byas pa thams cad kyis ni dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadeṣāṃ vipākaphalam /<br/> sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena bhogavyasanī bhavatikāmamithyācārena sa saṃpannadāraḥ mṛṣāvādenābhyākhyānabahulaḥ paiśunyena mitrabhedo 'sya bhavati pāruṣyeṇāmanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpenānādeyavākyaḥ abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ /<br/> tasyā mohabhūyastvāt /<br/> idameṣāṃ niḥṣyandaphalam /<br/> alpamapyāyurmanuṣyeṣu kuśalaphalam /<br/> tat kathaṃ prāṇātipātasya niḥṣyandaphalaṃ bhavati /<br/> nocyate tadevāyustasya phalam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> tenālpāyurbhavatīti /<br/> ato 'ntarāyahetuḥ prāṇāti pātastasyāyuṣo bhavatīti veditavyam /<br/> prāṇātīpātenātyāsevitena bāhyā bhāvā alpaujaso bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin no / brgya la 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ongs na yang srog gcod pas ni tshe thung bar 'gyur ro / ma byin par len pas ni longs spyod kyis phongs par 'gyur ro / 'dod pas log par gyem pas ni dgra dang bcas pa'i chung ma can du 'gyur ro / brdzun du smra bas ni skur ba mang por 'gyur ro / phra mas ni de mdza' bo dang 'byed par 'gyur ro / tshig rtsub pos ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro / tshig kyal pas ni tshig gzung bar mi 'os par 'gyur ro / brnab sems kyis ni 'dod chags shas che bar 'gyur ro / gnod sems kyas ni zhe sdang shas che bar 'gyur ro / log par lta bas ni gti mug shas che bar 'gyur te / de la ni gti mug mang po'i phyir ro / 'di ni de dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no / ma dag gi nang na tshe thung ba yang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yin na de ji ltar srog gcod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin zhe na / tshe de nyid de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes ni mi zer ro / 'o na ci zhe na / des tshe thung ngur 'gyur bas de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i phyir rgyu yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adattādānenāśanirajobahulāḥ kāmamithyācāreṇa rajo 'vakīrṇāḥ mṛṣāvādena durgandhāḥ paiśunyenotkūlanikūlāḥ pāruṣyeṇoparajāṅgalā pratikuṣṭāḥ pāpabhūmayaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpena viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog gcod pa ha cang kun du bsten pas ni phyi'i dngos po rnams gzi mthu chung bar 'gyur ro / ma byin par len pas ni ser ba dang char ba mang bar 'gyur ro / 'dod pas log par gyem pas ni rngul gyis 'khrig par 'gyur ro / brdzun du smra bas ni dring bar 'gyur ro / phra mas ni mthon dman can du 'gyur ro / tshig rtsub pos ni sa tshva sgo can dang dgon dung dang tha chad dang sdig pa can gyi sar 'gyur ro / tshig kyal pas ni dus log pa can du 'gyur ro / brnab sems kyis ni 'bras bu phra mor 'gyur ro / gnod sems kyis ni 'bras bu kha bar 'gyur ro / log par lta bas ni 'bras bu chung ngu'am 'bras bu med par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idameṣāmadhipatiphalam /<br/> kiṃ tenaiva karmaṇā 'yamihālpāyurbhavatyathānyena /<br/> tenevetyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni de dag gi bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no / ci las de kho nas de 'dir tshe thung ngur 'gyur ram / 'on te gzhan zhig gis she na / kha cig na re de kho nas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvipākaphalamidaṃ niṣyandaphalamiti /<br/> tatra prayogeṇeha maulelnetyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin la 'di ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re der ni sbyor bas yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pare saparivāragrahaṇāttu prāṇātipātenetyuktamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni dngos kyis yin te / 'khor dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir srog gcod pas zhes gsungs par zad do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapyetanniḥṣyandaphalamuktaṃ naitaddvayamativartate vipākaphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur bshad pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang gnyis po 'di las ni mi 'da'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sādṛśyaviśeṣāttu tathoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dra ba'i khyad par las de skad du bshad par zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇameṣāṃ karmapathānāmetattrividhaphalamabhinivartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir las kyi lam 'di dag gis 'bras bu rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig srog gcod par byed pas ni gsad par bya ba sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang gsad pa dang gzi byin med par bya bas yin te / de nyid kyi phyir 'di
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhanānmāraṇādojonāśanāttrividhaṃ phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal phyir dang gsad phyir dang / gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parasya duḥkhanādvipākaphalena narake duḥkhito bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol po sdug bsngal bar byas pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus dmyal ba dag tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">māraṇanniḥṣyandaphalenālpāyurbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsad pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus tshe thung ngur 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ojonāśanādadhipati phalenālpaujaso bāhyā auṣadhayo bhavanti /<br/> evamanyeṣvapi yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzi byin med par byas pa'i phyir bdag po'i 'bras bus phyi'i sman rnams gzi mthu chung bar 'gyur te / gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi 'bras bu gsum yang de bzhin du rig par bya ste / srog gcod pa spong ba kun tu bsten pa dang goms par byas pa dang lan mang du byas pas ni lha dag gi nang du skyes par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgya la 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ongs na yang tshe ring por 'gyur te / thams cad mi dge ba las bzlog ste sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhagavatā mithyāvāṃimathyākarmānto mithyājīva ityuktaṃ ko 'yamanyastābhyāṃ mithyājīvaḥ /<br/> nāyamanyo 'sti /<br/> tadeva tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang log pa'i 'tsho ba zhes gang gsungs pa de gnyis las gzhan pa'i log pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhig yin zhe na / 'di gzhan ni med kyi de nyid yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhajaṃ kāyavākkarma mithyājīvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag las chags las skyes / log 'tsho
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dveṣamohajau tu kāyavākkarmāntau /<br/> sa caiṣa tābhyāṃ /<br/> pṛthak kṛtaḥ /<br/> duḥśodhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' zhe sdang las skyes pa dang gti mug las skyes pa ni log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' yin no / de ni sbyang dka'i phyir / de gnyis las logs shig tu bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hārī hi lobhadharmaḥ /<br/> tatsamutthāt karmaṇaścittaṃ na surakṣyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags pa'i chos ni 'phrog par byed pa yin pas des kun nas bslang ba'i las las sems bsrung bar sla ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata ājīvo duḥkhaśodha ityādarotpādanārthaṃ tatrāsau pṛthagnirdiṣṭaḥ /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sbyang dka' bas bsgrim par bya ba'i phyir de ni der logs shig tu bstan to / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥśodhā gṛhiṇāṃ dṛṣṭirnityaṃ vividhadṛṣṭinā /<br/> ājīvo bhikṣuṇā caiva pareṣvāyattadṛṣṭineti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtag tu lta ba sna tshogs kyis / khyim pas lta ba sbyang bar dka' / gzhan la 'tsho ba rag lus pa'i / dge slong gis ni 'tsho bar dka'
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pariṣkāralobhotthaṃ cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yo byad la / chags bslang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo manyate jīvitpariṣkāralobhotthameva kāyavākkarma mithyājīvonānyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig 'tsho ba'i yo byad la / chags pas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las kho na log pa'i 'tsho ba yin gyi / gzhan ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyātmaratinimittaṃ nṛttagītādi ājīvayoga iti tat /<br/> na sūtrataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag dga' bar bya ba'i ched du gar dang glu len pa la sogs pa ni log pa'i 'tsho ba yin par mi rigs so snyam du sems pa de ni / mdo dang 'gal phyir min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlaskandhikāyāṃ hi bhagavatā hastiyuddha darśanādīnyapi mithyājīve nyastāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mdo las glang po che 'thab pa la lta ba la sogs pa la yang log pa'i 'tsho ba gzhag ste de ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> mithyaviṣayaparibhogāt /<br/> gatametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro / 'di ni rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāni pūrvaṃ pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ katamat karma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ prahāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'bras bu lnga bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag las las gang zhig 'bras bu du zhig 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇamārge samale saphalaṃ karma pañcabhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gis / las ni lnga yi 'bras bur bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇārthaṃ mārgaḥ prahīyante vā 'nena kleśā iti prahāṇamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spong ba'i phyir lam yin pa'am / 'dis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pas spong ba'i lam ste / bar chad med pa'i lam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasminsāsrave yat karma tat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa de'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu lngas 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya hi vipākaphalaṃ svabhūmāviṣṭo vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niḥṣyandaphalaṃ samādhijā uttare sadṛśā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos 'dra ba phyi ma rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">visaṃyogaphalaṃ visaṃyoga eva /<br/> yattat prahāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bral ba'i 'bras bu ni bral ba kho na yin te / spangs pa gang yin pa de yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puruṣakāraphalaṃ tadākṛṣṭā dharmastadyathā 'dhimuktimārgastatsahabhuvaśca /<br/> yaccānāgataṃ bhāvyate tacca prahāṇam /<br/> adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvādanye sarvasaṃskārāḥ pūrvotpannavarjyāḥ /<br/> caturbhiramale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni des drang pa'i chos 'di lta ste / rnam par grol ba'i lam dang de dag lhan cig 'byung ba dang gang yang ma 'ongs pa thob pa dang spangs pa de yang yin no / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba rnams ma gtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do / dri med bzhi yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsrave prahāṇamārge yatkarma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spong ba'i lam zag pa med pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu bzhis 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyacca sāsravaṃ yacchubhāśubham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag bcas gzhan / dge dang mi dge gang yin pa'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccānyat prahāṇamārgātsāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhirvisaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spong ba'i lam las gzhan pa'i las dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa dang mi dge ba gang yin pa de yang 'bras bu bzhis 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣāṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa lhag ma dang lung stan min gang gsum gyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇamārgādanyadanāsravaṃ karma avyākṛtaṃ ca karma tribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spong pa'i lam las gzhan pa'i las zag pa med pa dang lung du ma bstan pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu gsum gyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ /<br/> anukramamiti paścādvakṣyati /<br/> kuśalsya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā /<br/> akuśalā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /<br/> avyākṛtā strīṇi niḥṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni / bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum / rim pa bzhin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do /  / las dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba ni bzhi ste / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / mi dge ba gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang lung du ma bstan pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhasya śubhādyā dve trīṇi catvāryanukramam /<br/> yathākramamityarthaḥ /<br/> akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /<br/> akuśalāstrīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /<br/> avyākṛtāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni / gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin / go rims ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tsheg ste / las mi dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go / mi dge ba ni gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / lung du ma bstan pa ni bzhi ste bral ba ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛte hi satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśana heyānāṃ ca niḥṣyandaphalam /<br/> avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ /<br/> avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphalel
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung du ma bstan pa 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dag ni mi dge ba kun tu 'gro ba rnams dang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no / lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs / de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum / las lung du ma bstan pa'i 'bras bu chos dge ba gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalāḥ trīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba ni gsum ste / bral ba dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bum gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalā hi duḥkhadarśanādiheyā avyākṛtayordṛṣṭyoniḥrṣyandaphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal la sogs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i mi dge ba rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i lta ba gnyis kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛtā dharmā etānyeva trīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste / rgyu de dag kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve 'tītasya catvāri /<br/> sarva iti traiyadhvikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no / thams cad ces bya ba ni dus gsum pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītasya karmaṇastraiyadvikāḥ dharmāścatvāri phalāni /<br/> visaṃyogaphalalṃ hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu dus gsum pa'i chos ni bzhi ste / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">madhyamasyāpyanāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyutpannasyāpi karmaṇo 'nāgatā dharmāścatvāti phalānyetānyeva /<br/> madhyamā dve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ltar byung ba'i las kyi 'bras bu chos ma 'ongs pa yang bzhi ste / de dag nyid do / bar ma gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyutpannā dharmāḥ pratyupannasya dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ltar byung ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba'i chos ni gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ajātasya phalāni triṇyanāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma skyes pa'i / 'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatasyānāgatāni trīṇi phalāni /<br/> niḥṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /<br/> svabhūmidharmāścatvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i chos ni gsum ste / rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / rang gi sa pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikasya karmaṇaḥ svabhūmikā dharmāścatvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /<br/> trīṇi dve vā 'nyabhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rang gi sa ba'i chos ni bzhi ste / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyabhūmikā dharmā anāsravāścet trīṇi phalāni /<br/> vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa med pa zhig yin na ni 'bras bu gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātvapatitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravāścet dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /<br/> śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na ni gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go / slob pa'i slob pa sogs pa gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /<br/> aśaikṣā apyevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / mi slob pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā api vipākaniḥṣyandaphale hitvā /<br/> aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ
