</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa yang gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni / slob pa yi ni chos la sogs / gcig dang gsum dang gnyis yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāḥ ekamadhipatiphalam /<br/> aśaikṣāstrīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /<br/> naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gcig ste / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o / mi slob pa ni gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa ni gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go / de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāmanyasya karmaṇo naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣā apyevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa'ang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāḥ pañca phalāni /<br/> trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa ni 'bras bu lnga char yin no / mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs / gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaheyasya karmaṇodarśanaheyā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphalehitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos ni gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apraheyā ekamadhipatiphalam /<br/> te dve catvāryatha trīṇi bhāvanāheyakarmaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni gcig ste / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o / bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi / de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ muktvā /<br/> apraheyāstrīṇi vipākaniḥṣyandaphale muktvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni bzhi ste / bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni gsum ste / rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig / gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apraheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni gcig ste bdag po'i 'bras bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apraheyāścatvāri vipākaphalaṃ muktvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni bzhi ste / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaryathākramagrahaṇamādyantavanmadhye 'pi jñāpanārtham /<br/> eṣa hi peyāladharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang go rims bzhin zhes smos pa ni dbus su yang thog ma dang tha ma bzhin shes par bya ba'i phyir te / de ni mthun par sbyor ba'i chos yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmanirdeśaprasaṅgenedamapi paripraśnyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las bstan pa'i skabs su 'di yang yongs su bri bar bya ste / bstan bcos dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstreṣu ayogavihitaṃ yogavihitam naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitaṃ ca karmoktam /<br/> tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa dang rigs pas bskyed pa dang rigs pas bskyed pa yang ma yin rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa'i las zhes gsungs pa de'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayogavihitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vidhibhraṣṭaṃ ca kecana /<br/> kliṣṭaṃ karmāyogavihitamayoniśomanaskārasaṃbhūtatvādityeke /<br/> vidhibhraṣṭamapītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs min bskyed pa nyon mongs can / kha cig cho ga nyams pa zhe'o / kha cig na re rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa ni las nyon mongs pa can yin te / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid las byung ba las byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi /<br/> taccānyathā vidadhāti /<br/> tadayuktavidhānādayogavihitamiti /<br/> kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yogavihitamavidhibhraṣṭaṃ cetyapare /<br/> ubhābhyāmanyannobhayathā /<br/> naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitam /<br/> kimekaṃ karma ekameva janmākṣipati atha naikamapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re cho ga nyams pa yang yin te / gang gis ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba dang gnas par bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba dang bgo bar bya ba dang de la sogs pa de gzhan du byed na de ni rigs pa ma yin pas byed pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin pas skyes pa zhes bya'o / rigs pas bskyed pa ni las dge ba yin no / gzhan dag na re cho ga ma nyams pa yang yin no zhes zer ro / de gnyis las gzhan pa ni gnyi ga ma yin pa'o / ci las gcig gis skye ba gcig kho na 'phen tam 'on te du ma yang 'phen
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā kimekamapi karmaikaṃ janmākṣipatyathānekam /<br/> eṣa hi siddhāntaḥ /<br/> ekaṃ janmākṣīpatyekam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du las du mas kyang skye ba gcig 'phen tam / 'on te du ma kho na zhig 'phen zhe na / 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' yin te / gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekameva janmākṣipatyekameva ca karma nānekaṃ janmeti nikāyasabhāgasyākhyā /<br/> tatra hi labdhe jāta ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las gcig kho nas skye ba gcig kho na 'phen gyi du ma ni ma yin no / skye ba zhes bya ba ni ris mthun pa la bya ste / der phyin nas skye ba zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag ni bsod snyoms gcig po de'i rnam par smin pas lan bdun gyi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa nas da ltar sh'akya phyug po'i rigs su skyes pa'i bar du yin no zhes gang smras pa de ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena hyasau samṛdviṃ labdvā jātismaraḥ punaranyat puṇyaṃ kṛtavān /<br/> tata utthānaṃ darśayati sma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di des 'byor pa rnyed nas tshe rabs dran pa dang yang bsod nams gzhan byas pas de'i phyir slob pa ston par byed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā manuṣyo dīnārottho 'nena sahasraṃ nirviśyāha ekena dīnāreṇāhamaita dīśvaryaṃ prāpta iti /<br/> apare tvāhuḥ /<br/> tasya taṃ piṇḍapātamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā dānacetanānāṃ pravāho mahānutpannaḥ kayācit kiñcitphalaṃ parigṛhītamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mi zhig gis dong tse gcig gis stong du bsgyur te bdag ni dong tse gcig gis dbang phyug 'di thob par gyur to zhes smra ba lta bu'o / yang smras pa / de bsod snyoms de la brten te sems pa rnams kyi rgyun mang po byung nas 'ga' zhig gi 'bras bu 'ga' yongs su gzung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anekenāpyekamākṣipyate mā bhūt khaṇḍaśo nikāyasabhāgasyākṣepa iti /<br/> ekena tu karmaṇā kliṣṭasya nikāyasabhāgasyeṣyate karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ris mthun pa dum bur 'phen pa 'gyur du 'ongs bas du mas kyang gcig 'phen pa ma yin gyi las gcig gis 'phangs pa'i ris mthun pa la las yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin par 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anekaṃ paripūrakam /<br/> yathā citrakara ekayā vartyā rūpamālikhya vahvībhiḥ paripūrayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na ri mo mkhan gyi ri lu gcig gis gzugs kyi sa bcad nas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang 'dra ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi tulye mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyāṅgapratyaṅgo bhavativarṇakṛtipramāṇabalasaṃpadā vibhrājamānaḥ kaścideṣāṃ kenacidvikalaḥ /<br/> na ca kevalaṃ karmaivākṣepakaṃ janmanaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar mir mtshungs mod kyi / kha cig dbang po dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur zhing / kha dog dang sha tshugs dang bong tshod dang nyams stobs phun sum tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa yin la / kha cig ni de dag las la lam tshang ba yin no / las 'ba' zhig tshe 'phen par byed pa yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tarhi /<br/> anyadapi savipākam /<br/> sarvathā tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ji lta bu zhe na rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa gzhan yang yin no / rnam pa thams cad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avipākābhyāmapyacittasamāpattibhyāṃ nikāyasabhāgo nākṣipyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis kyang ris mthun pa 'phen par mi byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmāsahabhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptibhiśca karmaṇo 'nekaphalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa rnams kyis kyang ma yin te / las dang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">triṇyāvaraṇānyuktāni bhagavatā /<br/> karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇaṃ ca /<br/> teṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang sgrib pa gsum gsungs pa de dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi tīvrakleśo 'tha durgatiḥ /<br/> kauravāsaṃjñisattvāśca matamāvaraṇatrayam /<br/> pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang / nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod / mtshams med pa'i las rnams ni las kyi sgrib pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā mātṛvadhaḥ pitṛvadho 'rhadvadhaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ tathāgataśrīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanam /<br/> tīvrakleśatā kleśāvaraṇam /<br/> dvividho hi kleśaḥ /<br/> tivraśca ya abhikṣṇikaḥ tīkṣṇaśca yo 'dhimātraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / ma gsod pa dang pha gsod pa dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'o / nyon mongs pa shas chen po ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'o / nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / nyon mongs pa shas che ba dang rno ba'o / de la shas che ba ni rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa'o / rno ba ni chen po gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yastīvraḥ sa āvaraṇam /<br/> yathā śaṇṭhādīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la shas che ba gang yin pa de ni sgrib pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śakto hyadhimatravego 'pi kleśaḥ kādācitko nihantuṃ natu samūho 'pyājasrikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na za ma la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / nyon mongs pa res 'ga' 'byung ba ni shugs drag kyang gzhom par nus kyis rgyun du 'byung ba ni dpal yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ājasrike he kleśe tannirghātāya parākramakālaṃ na labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rgyun du 'byung ba ni de nges par gzhom pa'i phyir rtsol ba'i dus mi rnyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya mṛduṃ pratītya madhya upajāyate /<br/> madhyaṃ pratītyādhimātraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni chung ngu la brten nas 'bring skye'o / 'bring la brten nas chen po skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt evāvaraṇaṃ trividhā durgatiḥ vipākāvaraṇaṃ sugateśca pradeśaḥ auttarakauravā asaṃjñisattvāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de nyid sgrib pa yin no / ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum dang bde 'gro'i phyogs byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasyaitānyāvaraṇāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gang la sgrib ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryamārgasyāryamārgaprāyogikāṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlānām anyānyapi hyapāyādiniyatāni aṇḍajasaṃsvedajastrītvāṣṭamabhavayatāni karmāṇi vaktavyāni syuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i lam dang 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor bar byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la sgrib bo / ngan song la sogs par nges par 'gyur ba dang sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur ba dang drod gsher las skye bar 'gyur ba dang bud med nyid du 'gyur ba dang srid pa brgyad par nges par 'gyur ba'i las gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yānyeva tu pañcabhiḥkāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni pajñakāni adhiṣṭhānataḥ phalato gatitaḥ upapattitaḥ pudgalataśca tānyevoktāni nānyāni /<br/> kleśāvaraṇaṃ caiṣāṃ sarvajaghanyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gzhi dang 'bras bu dang 'gro ba dang skye ba dang gang zag dang rgyu lngas bstan par sla zhing gdags par bya ba de dag kho na bshad kyis gzhan dag ni ma yin no / de dag las nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni thams cad kyi tha shal yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ karmāvaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu ni las kyi sgrib pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāmyāṃ hi dvitīye 'pi janmanyacikitso bhavatyuttarottarāvāhanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyis ni tshe phyi ma la yang gsor mi rung bar 'gyur ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phyi ma phyi ma 'dren pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānantaryāṇīti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> nāntarāyituṃ śakyāni vipākaṃ prati janmāntaraphalena karmāntareṇetyānantaryāṇi /<br/> na tiraskartumityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / tshe rabs gzhan gyi 'bras bu can gyi las dag gi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bar du gcod par mi nus pas mtshams med pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vā tatkāriṇaḥ pudgalasyetaścyutasyāntaramasti narakopapattigamanaṃ pratītyanantaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zil gyis mi gnon zhes bya pa'i tha tshig go / yang na de byed pa'i gang zag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba la bar chad med pas de ni bar chad med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadbhāva ānantaryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dngos po ni bar chad med pa nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya dharmasya yogātso 'nantaro bhavati /<br/> śrāmaṇyavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos gang dang ldan pa'i phyir de bar chad med pa yin te / dge sbyong gi tshul bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāmāvaraṇānāṃ katamat kasyāṃ gatau veditavyam /<br/> ekāntena tāvat /<br/> triṣu dvīpeṣvānantarya /<br/> nottarakurau nānyāsu gatiṣu /<br/> kuta evānyatra dhātau /<br/> tetṣvapi stripuruṣāṇāmeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sgrib pa 'di dag las gang zhig khams gang na yod par rig par bya zhe na / re zhig gcig tu / mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang 'gro ba gzhan dag na yang med na khams gzhan na lta smos kyang ci dgos / de dag na yang skyes pa dang bud med rnams kho na la yod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaṇḍā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇaṃ

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyasyāpyamānuṣau mātāpitarau mārayato na syādānantaryam /<br/> uktaṃ karmāvaraṇam /<br/> śeṣe gatiṣu pañcasu /<br/> ke punaḥ śeṣe /<br/> kleśavipākāvaraṇe /<br/> manuṣyeṣu vipākāvaraṇam /<br/> kauravā deveṣvasaṃjñisattvāḥ /<br/> kiṃsvabhāvānyānantaryāṇi /<br/> catvāri kāyakarma ekaṃ vākkarma trīṇi prāṇātipāta ekaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ ekaṃ prāṇātipātaprayogaḥ /<br/> anupakramadharmāṇo hi tathāgatāḥ /<br/> hetau phalopacārātsaṃghabheda ānantaryamuktam /<br/> bhidyate vā 'neneti kṛtvā /<br/> saṃghabhedastvasāmagrīsvabhāvo viprayuktakaḥ /<br/> akliṣṭāvyākṛto dharmaḥ /<br/> asāmagrī nāna cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāro 'nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ /<br/> sa kimānantaryaṃ bhaviṣyati naiva ca tena bhettā samanvāgataḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> saṃghastena samanvitaḥ /<br/> yo hi bhinnastasya bhedo na bhettuḥ /<br/> atha bhettā kena samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi'i yang pha ma mi ma yin pa bsad na mtshams med par mi 'gyur ro / las kyi sgrib pa bshad zin to / lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na / lhag ma gang dag ci yin zhe na / nyon mongs pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa ste / mi dag gi nang na ni sgra mi snyan pa rnam par sman pa'i sgrib pa yin no / lha dag gi nang na ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams so / mtshams med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na / bzhi ni lus kyi las yin la / gcig ni ngag gi las yin te / gsum ni srog gcod pa yin no / gcig ni brdzun du smra ba yin no / gcig ni srog gcod pa'i sbyor ba ste / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nye bar mi brdzi ba'i chos can yin no / rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'am / 'dis 'byed par byed pas na dge 'dun gyi dbyen la mtshams med pa zhes bshad kyi / dge 'dun dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa'i / rang bzhin ldan pas ma yin chos / nyon mongs can min lung bstan min / dge 'dun gyi dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa zhes bya ba sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed de

punaḥ saṃghabhedasahaje vāgvijñaptyavijñaptī /<br/> sa ca tenāvadyena samanvāgato bhettā /<br/> avīcau pacyate kalpan /<br/> antarakalpamavīcau mahānarake vipacyate /<br/> anyaistu nāvaśyamavīcau /<br/> atha yena bahunyānantaryāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti anantarameva tāni vipacyante /<br/> kiṃ tu taistasya bhavati /<br/> adhhikairadhikā rujaḥ /<br/> sahi bhūyobhirānantaryaistasminnavīcau ghanataraṃ bhikṣurbhinatti na gṛhī na bhikṣuṇyādayaḥ /<br/> sa ca dṛṣṭicarita eva na tṛṣṇācaritaḥ /<br/> ṛtastho na bhinnavṛttastasyānādeyavākyatvāt /<br/> kva bhinatti /<br/> atra bhagavān saṃnihitastataḥ /<br/> anyatra /<br/> nahi śāstureva saṃnidhau śakyo bhettum /<br/> tathāgatānāṃ duṣprasahatvādādeyavākyatvācca /<br/> kān bhinatti /<br/> bāliśān /<br/> pṛthagjanāneva nāryān pratyakṣadharmatvāt /<br/> tānapi na kṣāntilābhina ityapare /<br/> kiyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho bhavati /<br/> śāstṛmārgāntarakṣāntau bhinnaḥ /<br/> yadā tebhyastathāgatādanyaḥ śāstā kṣamate tadupadiṣṭācca mārgādanyo mārga iyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho vaktavyaḥ /<br/> kiyantaṃ kālaṃ bhinna āste /<br/> tāmeva rātriṃ /<br/> na vivasatyasau /<br/> aparyuṣita eva hi saṃghabhede saṃgho 'vaśyaṃ pratisaṃdhīyate /<br/> yo 'yaṃ saṃghabheda uktaḥ /<br/> cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ /<br/> dharmacakraṃ hi tadā bhagavato bhinnaṃ bhavati /<br/> mārgapravṛttiviṣṭhāpanāt /<br/> ata eva cakrādaścocyate saṃghabhedaśca /<br/> kva punaścakrabhedo bhavati /<br/> jambūdvīpe /<br/> nānyeṣu dvīpeṣu /<br/> katibhirbhikṣubhiḥ /<br/> navādibhiḥ /<br/> navādiṃ kṛtvā /<br/> pareṇāniyamaḥ /<br/> aṣṭau bhikṣayaḥ saṃgho bhavati /<br/> navamo bhettā /<br/> avaśyaṃ hi saṃghena dvayoḥpakṣayoḥ sthātavyam /<br/> evaṃ bhinno bhavati /<br/> anyastu saṃghabhedaḥ karmabhedād bhavati /<br/> yadyekasīmāyāṃ vyagrāḥ karma kurvanti /<br/> sa caiṣa /<br/> karmabhedastriṣu dvīpeṣu /<br/> yeṣveva śāsanam /<br/> katibhirbhikṣubhiḥ /<br/> aṣṭābhiradhikaiśca saḥ /<br/> cakrabhedastu ṣaṭsu kāleṣu na bhavati /<br/> katameṣu /<br/> ādāvante saṃgha ekaraso bhavati /<br/> madhye 'pyarbudāt pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchāsane śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca notpannaṃ bhavati /<br/> yugācca pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchrāvakāgrayugaṃ notpannaṃ bhavati /<br/> bhinnanyāyaparivāsāttena ca pratisaṃdhānīyatvāt /<br/> uparate munau śāstari parinirvṛte pratidvandvābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin na de ji ltar mtshams med par 'gyur / de dang byed pa por yang mi ldan pa kho na yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / de dang dge 'dun yang dag ldan / gang bye ba de dbyen dang ldan gyi / 'byed pa po la ni ma yin no / 'o na 'byed pa po ci dang ldan zhe na / de yi kha na ma tho brdzun / de dang byed po yang dag ldan / 'byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen gyi kha na ma tho ba dang ldan te / de ni brdzun yin no / de yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ngag gi rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag yin no / kha na ma tho ba de dang ldan pa'i byed pa po de ni / bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur / bar gyi bskal par mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por smin par 'gyur ro / gzhan gyis ni mnar med par ma nges so / yang gang zhig gis mtshams med pa mang po byas pa yin la / de dag bar chad med pa kho na smin par 'gyur na de la de dag gis ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na / lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur / de mtshams med pa mang pos mnar med pa der gang gis na gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lngar 'gyur gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i lus chen po dang shin tu gzhon sha can gyi lus 'thob cing / gnod pa yang rab tu mang ba dang shin tu mi bzad par 'gyur ro / dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa de su zhig yin zhe na / dge slong dka' spyod tshul ldan pas / 'byed do / dge slong gis 'byed kyi khyim pa yang ma yin la / dge slong ma la sogs pa yang ma yin no / de yang lta ba spyod pa kho nas 'byed kyi sred pa spyod pas ni ma yin no / tshul dang ldan pas 'byed kyi tshul nyams pas ni ma yin te / de'i tshig mi btsan pa'i phyir ro / gang du 'byed ce na / gang na bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa de las / gzhan du'o / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bzod par dka' ba'i phyir dang bka' stsal ba'i phyir ston pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa nyid du dbye par mi nus so / su dag cig 'byed ce na / byis pa rnams / byis pa rnams kho na yin gyi 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin te / chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir ro / kha cig na re de dag las kyang bzod pa thob pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes zer ro / ji tsam gyis na dge 'dun bye ba yin zhe na / ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa / bye ba'o / gang gi tshe de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i ston pa dang des bstan pa'i lam las gzhan pa'i lam la bzod na de tsam gyis dge 'dun bye ba zhes brjod do / bye nas dus ji srid du cig tu 'dug ce na / de nyid kyi nub gcig tu de ni mi gnas so / dge 'dun dbye na gdon mi za bar nam ma langs pa nyid du dge 'dun slar 'dum par 'gyur ro / dge 'dun gyi dbyen du bshad pa gang yin pa / de ni 'khor lo'i dbyen du 'dod / de'i tshe lam du 'jug pa'i bgegs su gyur pa'i phyir de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang phye ba yin te / de nyid kyi phyir 'khor lo'i dbyen zhes kyang bya la / dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes kyang bya'o / 'khor lo'i dbyen yang gang na yod ce na / 'dzam bu'i gling na'o / gling gzhan dag na ni med do / dge slong du zhig gis she na / dgu sogs kyis dgu la sogs pa smos pas yan chad ni ma nges so / dge slong brgyad ni dge 'dun yin no / dgu pa ni 'byed pa po yin te / gdon mi za bar dge 'dun phyogs gnyis su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni bye ba yin no / dge 'dun gyi dbyen gzhan ni las kyi dbyen las 'gyur te / gal te mtshams gcig gi nang du mi mthun pas las dag byed na'o / las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na yod de / gang dag na bstan pa yod pa kho na na'o / dge slong du zhig gis she na / de ni brgya da dag yan chad kyis 'khor lo'i dbye na ni dus drug dag tu mi 'byung ste / gang dag tu zhe na / dang po mtha' skyon zung gcig gi / snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang / mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang / 'khor lo'i dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo / dang po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ring po ma lon pa dang tha ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe dang gnas skabs de gnyis su ni dge 'dun sha gcig ma yin no / bar du yang skyon ma byung ba'i sngon rol du 'byed par mi 'gyur te / ji srid du bstan pa la tshul khrims kyi skyon dang lta ba'i skyon ma byung gi bar du'o / zung gcig ma byung ba'i sngon rol du yang dbye bar mi 'gyur te / ji srid du nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig ma byung gi bar du ste / bye ba yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir dang des phyir sdum par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / thub pa nongs na yang mi 'byung ste / ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na 'gran zla med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sīmāyāmabaddhāyāṃ yāvat sīmā na baddhā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang ste / ji srid du mtshams ma bcad par mi 'byung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasīmāyāṃ hi pakṣadvayāvasthānātsaṃghabheda ityeṣu kālesu cakrabhedona bhavati /<br/> na ca punaḥ sarveṣāṃ baddhānāṃ cakrabhedaḥ /<br/> karmādhīnatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams gcig gi nang du phyogs gnyis su gnas pa'i phyir bye ba zhes bya'o / de ltar na dus drug po de dag tu 'khor lo'i dbyen mi 'byung ngo / las la rag lus pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo la yang dbyen mi 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt mātṛvadhādiṣvānantaryaṃ nānyatra /<br/> upakāriyuṇakṣetranirākṛtivipādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir ma bsad pa la sogs pa mtshams med pa yin la gzhan ni ma yin zhe na /  / phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing / spangs dang med par byas phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mātāpitṛvadhe tāvadupakāriṇo nirākaraṇāt /<br/> kathaṃ tāvupakāriṇau /<br/> ātmabhāvasya tatprabhavatvāt /<br/> kiṃ tayornirākaraṇam /<br/> parityāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig pa ma gsad pa ni phan 'dogs pa med par byas pa'i phyir ro / ji ltar de gnyis phan 'dogs pa yin zhe na / de dag las lus skyes pa'i phyir ro / de dag spangs ba ji lta bu zhe na / yongs su bor ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">guṇakṣetratvādarhadvadhād ānantaryam /<br/> yadi punarmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāt piturvā tatraikasminnāmnāyo /<br/> vyañjanāntarito 'pi syāt /<br/> ata evocyate syāt puruṣaṃ jīvitādvacyaparopayenna pitaraṃ nārhantam /<br/> ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /<br/> syānmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yon tan gyi zhing yin pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa gsad pa la sogs pa yang mtshams med pa yin no / gal te pha'am ma mtshan gyur pa na yang lus gcig pa de la ni / mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang 'gyur / de nyid kyi phyir pha yang ma yin dgra bcom pa yang ma yin pa'i skyes pa zhig bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / yod de / ma mtshan gyur pas bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāt strīṃ jīvitādvyaparopayenna mātaraṃ nārhantīm ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /<br/> syāt piturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma yang ma yin dgra bcom pa yang ma yin pa'i bud med gcig bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / yod de / pha mtshan gyur pas bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyasyāḥ striyāḥ kalalaṃ prasrutamanyayā yonyā pītam /<br/> katarā tasya mātā yāṃ ghnataḥ syādānantaryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bud med gzhan las nur nur po zags nas bud med gzhan gyi mang la du blugs na gang zhig bsad na mtshams med par 'gyur ba de'i ma gang yin zhe na

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāḥ śoṇitādasāvudbhūtaḥ sattvaḥ sā 'sya mātā dvitīyā tu sarvakṛtyeṣvavalokyā /<br/> sā hyāpāyikā poṣikā saṃvardhikā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can de gang gi zla mtshan las byung ba de ni de'i ma yin no / gnyis pa yang bya ba thams cad khu par bya ba yin te / de ni nu zho ldud par byed pa dang gso bar byed pa dang skyed par byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi mātari prayogaṃ kṛtvā 'nyāṃ mārayenna syādānantaryam /<br/> amātṛprayogeṇa mārayettathāpi na syāt /<br/> mañcatalāvalīnamātṛmāraṇaṃ cātrodāhārya dhāvakasya ca putreṇa masaka prayogeṇa piturmāraṇaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma la sbyor ba byas nas gzhan bsad na yang mtshams med par mi 'gyur la ma ma yin pa la sbyor ba byas nas ma bsad na yang mtshams med par 'gyur te / ma khri'u 'i 'og na 'dug pa bsad pa dang khrus pa'i bus sbrang bu la sbyor ba byas pas pha bsad pa dper bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekena prahāreṇa mātaramanyāṃ ca mārayato dve avijñaptī bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshon thabs gcig gis ma dang gzhan zhig kyang bsad na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni gnyis yin la

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par rig byed ni mtshams med pa kho na yin te / las de stobs che ba'i phyir ro

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anarhatsaṃjñayā 'pi arhadghāte bhavatyānantaryam aham hanmītyāśrayāvadhāraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dgra bcom pa bsad na yang mtshams med par 'gyur te / 'di gsad do snyam du rten nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ pitaramarhantaṃ hiṃsyāttasyāpyekameva syādānantaryamāśrayaikatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gis pha dgra bcom pa bsad na yang de la mtshams med pa ni gcig kho nar 'gyur te / rten gcig pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamavadānaṃ kathaṃ nīyate gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhi dve ānantarye bhavatā kṛte /<br/> yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhanniti /<br/> dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmiti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">song la skra can la khyod kyis ni mtshams med pa gnyis byas te / pha gsad pa gang yin pa dang gang yang dgra bcom pa gsad pa'o zhes smros shig ces bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa 'di ji lta bu zhe na / rgyu gnyis kyis zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāṃ vā mukhābhyāṃ paribhāṣitaḥ /<br/> kimavaśyaṃ tathāgatasyāsti kuṭuṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryam /<br/> vadhābhiprāyasya syāt /<br/> buddhe na tāḍanecchasya /<br/> yadi tāḍanābhitrāya utpādayenna syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na sgo gnyis nas spyos pa yin no / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung bas gdon mi za bar mtshams med par 'gyur ram zhe na / bgrod par sems pa la ni 'gyur gyi / sangs rgyas brdeg par sems pa la'ang min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyanarhati praharetsa ca prahārādūrdhvamarhan syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dgra ma choms pa'i tshe bsnun la bsnun pa'i 'og tu dgra bcom par gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahārānnordhvamarhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsnun 'og dgra bcom pa la min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādānantaryamiti vartate /<br/> nahi tena tatra prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med par 'gyur bzhes bya bar sbyar te / des ni de la sbyor ba ma byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimānantarye prayogaṃ kṛtvā tasminnavyāvartite vairāgyaṃ phalaṃ vā na prāpnuyāt /<br/> nānantaryaprayuktasya vairāgyaphalasaṃbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci mtshams med pa'i sbyor ba byas te / de yang ma bzlog par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur zhe na / mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la / 'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do / ci'i phyir zhe na / bsam pa shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyakarmaphalapathaprayogaṃ tu kṛtvāryamārgotpattau na punaḥ karmapathotpattirāśrayasyātyantaṃ tadviruddhatvāt /<br/> eṣāmānantaryāṇāṃ katamat mahāsāvadyam /<br/> saṃghamede mṛṣāvādo mahāvadyatamo mataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam gzhan gyi sbyor ba byas nas 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa la ni yang las kyi lam mi skye ste / rten de dang shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro / mtshams med pa'i las 'di dag las thams cad kyi nang na kha na ma thob dang bcas pa chen po gang yin zhe na / dge 'dun dbye phyir brdzun smra ba / kha na ma tho bar cher 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ saṃghabhedanimittaṃ mṛṣāvādo dharmādharmajñasya viparyayadyotanāt sa sarveṣāṃ duścaritānāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig chos dang chos ma yin pa shes bzhin du dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir brdzun du smra na log par ston pa'i phyir nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi nang na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rab tu che ba yin no / de ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāgatadharmaśarīraprahāritatvāt lokānāṃ ca svargāpavargamārgāntarāyakatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bsnun pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten rnams kyi mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam gyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃghe hi bhinne lokasya niyāmāvakrantiphalaprāptivairāgyāsravakṣayāḥ pratibadhyante dhyānādhyayanasvādhyāyacintākarmāṇyapi na pravartante sadevanāgamanuṣyaṃ jagaccākulaṃ vimanaskaṃ vartate yāvat punarna pratisaṃdhito bhavatiyasmāccāvicau kalpaṃ vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge 'dun dbye na ji srid du slar ma dum gyi bar du 'jig rten nges pa la 'jug pa dang 'bras bu 'thob pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang bag [*zag?] pa zad par bya ba rnams la bgegs su gyur pa yin zhing / bsam gtan dang klog pa dang kha ton dang sems pa'i las rnams kyang mi 'jug cing / lha dang klu dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs pa dang yid mi bde ba dang rang dbang med pa dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur la / 'di ltar 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang bskal pa gcig tu mnar med par skye ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāṇāmānantaryāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pañcamatṛtīyaprathamāni gurutarāṇi sarvalaghuḥ pitṛvadhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med pa lhag ma rnams las ni go rims bzhin du lnga ba dang gsum pa dang dang po rnams ches lci ba yin te / pha gsod pa ni thams cad kyi nang na yang ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi bhagavatā trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ manodaṇḍo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ punarmithyādṛṣṭiḥ paramavadyānāmityuktam ānantaryāṇi niyamasya saṃghabhedo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes pa gsum gyi nang na yid kyi nyes pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen por gsungs pa dang yang log par lta ba ni kha na ma tho ba dam pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / mtshams med pa rnams nges par mdzad nas ni dge 'dun gyi dbye na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen por gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi karmāṇi niyamayya manodaṇdaḥ dṛṣṭīrniyamayya mithyādṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las gsum nges par mdzad nas ni yid kyi nyes pa gsungs / lta ba rnams nges par mdzad nas ni log par lta ba gsungs pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā vipākavistaraṃ mahājanavyāpādanaṃ kuśalamūlasamucchedaṃ cādhikṛtya yathākramam /<br/> sucaritānāṃ punaḥ katamat mahāphalatamam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na rnam par smin pa rgya che ba dang skye bo phal po che 'chi ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod pa'i dbang du mdzad nas go rims bzhin du gsungs pa yin no / legs par spyad pa rnams las 'bras bu rab tu che ba gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgracetanā loke mahāphalatamā śubhe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa'i dge ba la / srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśale punaḥ karmaṇi bhavāgracetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalatamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dge ba la ni thams cad kyi nang na srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems pa 'bras bu rab tu che ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyā aśītikalpasahasrāṇyatipraśānto vipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rnam par smin pa ni bskal pa brgyad khrir rab tu zhi ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākaphalaṃ cādhikṛtyaitaduktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas de skad bshad kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">visaṃyogaphalaṃ tvadhikṛtya vajropamasamādhicetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalā sarvasamyojanaparyādānaphalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bral ba'i 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas ni thams cad kyi nang na rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems pa 'bras bu che ba yin te / kun du sbyor ba thams cad gtan du gtugs pa 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva loka ityuktam /<br/> kimānantaryairevāvaśyaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten pa'i zhes bshad do / ci mtshams med pa rnams kho nas dmyal ba dag tu gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur ram / 'on te gzhan dag gis kyang skye bar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānantaryasabhāgairapyavaśyamupapadyate /<br/> natvanantaramevetyapare /<br/> katamāni tānītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur ro / gzhan dag na re bar chad med pa kho nar ni ma yin no zhes zer ro / de dag kyang gang zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dūṣaṇaṃ māturarhantyā niyatisthasya māraṇam /<br/> bodhisattvasya śaikṣasya saṃghāyadvārahārikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma dgra bcom ma sun byas dang / byang chub sems dpa' des [*nges] gnas dang / slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi / 'du ba'i sgo ni 'phrogs pa dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānantaryasabhāgāni pañcamaṃ stūpabhedanam /<br/> etāni pañca pañcānāmānatnaryāṇāṃ yathākramam sabhāgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste / lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin / lnga po 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du mtshams med pa lnga dang cha 'dra pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi mātaramarhantīṃ dūṣayatyabrahmacaryakaraṇāt niyatipatītaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mārayati śaikṣaṃ mārayati saṃghasya sukhāyadvārikaṃ harati stūpabhedaṃ karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi tshangs par spyod pas ma dgra bcom ma sun par byed pa dang nges par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsod pa dang slob pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi zhal du 'du pa'i sgo 'phrogs pa dang mchod rten 'jig par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyadapi tu karma savipākaṃ triṣu kāleṣvatyarthaṃ vighnayati /<br/> katameṣu trisu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'i las gzhan yang dus gsum po dag tu shin tu bgegs byed de / gsum po gang dag tu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntyanāgāmitārhattvaprāptau karmātivighnakṛt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod dang phyir mi 'ong dgra bcom / 'thob pa las bgegs shin tu byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūrdhabhyaḥ kṣāntimākirata āpāyikāni karmāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante /<br/> tadvipākabhūmyatikramāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtse mo las bzod pa thob pa la ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i sa las 'da' ba'i phyir ngan song ba'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā puruṣasya deśatyāgaṃ kurvato dhanikā upatiṣṭhante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na mi zhig yul 'dor bar byed pa la bu lon pa dag ldang ba bzhin no / de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa la ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvataḥ kāmāvacarāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante tathaiva sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas te / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhattvaṃ prāpnuvato rūpārūpyāvacarāṇi tathaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa la ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ bodhisattvasya māraṇamiti /<br/> bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat /<br/> kuta upādāya bodhisattvovaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub sems dpa' gsad pa zhes bshad pa gang yin pa / gang nas byang chub sems dpa' yin / gang na gzung ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod par bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt /<br/> yataḥ prabhṛti lakṣaṇavipākāni karmāṇyārabhate kartuṃ sa hi tadānīṃ niyatipatito bhavati /<br/> kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> sa hi tasmāt kālāt prabhṛti nityaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa gang phan chad nas mtshan rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las rnams byed par rtsom ba de'i tshe nges par rtogs pa yin no / ji lta zhe na / de ni dus de phan chad rtag tu yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sugatiḥ kulajo 'vyakṣaḥ pumān jātismaro 'nivṛt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde 'gror rigs mthor skye dbang tshang / phor 'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog / pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praśastā gatirasyeti sugatirdevamanuṣyopapatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i 'gro ba rab tu bsngags pa yin pas na bde 'gro ste / lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāṃ ca sugatau kṣatriyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatimahāśālakulajo bhavati nānyaḥ kulīnaḥ /<br/> vikalānyakṣāṇyasyeti vyakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba de dag tu yang rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skye ba yin gyi rigs dma' bar ni mi skye'o / 'di'i dbang po rnams ma tshang bas na dbang po ma tshang ba'o / dbang po tshang bas na dbang po tshang ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vyakṣo 'vyakṣaḥ avikalendriyaḥ ityarthaḥ /<br/> puruṣa eva na strī kuta eva śaṇḍhādiḥ /<br/> jātismaraśca bhavati /<br/> sarvasyāṃ jātau nivartata iti nivṛt /<br/> na nivṛdanivṛt /<br/> anivartaka ityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po ma tshang ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go / pho kho nar 'gyur gyi mor yang mi 'gyur na za ma la sogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos / skye ba thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro / nur bas na ldog pa'o / nur ba med pas na mi ldog pa ste / ldog pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvahitārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhaprakāraiḥ sarvasattvavipratipattibhiścākheditatvāt /<br/> yattalloka ucyate apaṇakrīto dāsa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad dang log par sgrub pa thams cad kyis skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro / 'jig rten na zong gis ma nyos pa'i bran zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag yin te / bdag nyid chen po de dag ni / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhisattvāste te hi mahātmānaḥ sarvasaṃpatprakarṣaviśeṣaprāptā api santo niṣkāraṇakaruṇāpāratantryātsarvasattveṣu caṇḍālakumārakasadṛśamātmānaṃ nirmānatayā vyavasthāpya sattvebhyaḥ sarvakadarthānāṃ soḍhāro bhavanti sarvaśramayantraṇānāṃ codvoḍhāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byor pa'i mchog khyad par can thams cad brnyas kyang thugs rje'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi drung du khyi dang 'dra bar nga rgyal med par gnas te / sems can thams cad kyis brnyas gnod byas pa thams cad bzod cing ngal ba dang mnags pa thams cad kyang nyams su len pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccaitallakṣaṇavipākaṃ karmetyuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan rnam par smin pa can gyi las su bshad pa gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvīpe pumāneva saṃmukhaṃ buddhacetanaḥ /<br/> cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'dzam gling phor gyur nyid / mngon sum sangs rgyas la sems pa / bsams pa las byung bskal pa brgya / lus pa dag tu 'phen par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jambūdvīpa eva bodhisattvo lakṣaṇavipākaṃ karmākṣipati /<br/> nānyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dzam bu gling kho nar mtshan rnam par smin pa can gyi las 'phen par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ tīkṣṇabuddhitvāt /<br/> puruṣa eva na strī /<br/> saṃmukhībhūta eva śāstari buddhālambanayaiva cetanayā cintāmayaṃ tatkarma na śrutamayaṃ na bhāvanāmayam /<br/> kalpaśate ca śeṣa ākṣipati na bahubhavesu /<br/> bhagavatā tu śākyamuninottaptavīryatayā nava kalpā apāvartitā ekanavatyā kalpairākṣiptam /<br/> ata eva cokta mito 'haṃ grāmaṇīrekanavataṃ kalpamupādāya na samanusmarāmi nābhijānāmi yadekakulamapi pakṣabhikṣāpradānahetoḥ kṣataṃ vā syādupahataṃ veti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams blo rno ba'i phyir ro / pho lo nas 'phen gyi mos ni ma yin no / ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems pa kho nas bskal pa brgya lus pa'i tshe 'phen gyi mang po lus pa'i tshe ni ma yin no / las de yang bsams pa las byung ba yin gyi thos pa las byung ba yang ma yin la bsgoms pa las byung ba yang ma yin no / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas ni brtson 'grus spyad pas bskal pa dgu bsdums te / bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig lus pa'i tshe 'phangs so / de nyid kyi phyir grong dpon ngas 'di nas bzung ste / bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du yang dag par rjes su dran te / zas smin pa ster bar bya ba'i phyir khyim 'ga' la yang mi 'di ba 'am / gnod par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par mi mkhyen to zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ prabhṛti prakṛtijātismaratvāt prathamakalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryāta eva bodhisattva etāṃścaturo doṣān vyāvartayati dvau ca guṇo pratilabhata iti pūrvācāryāḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇānām /<br/> ekaikaṃ puṇyaśatajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de tshun chad rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa'i phyir ro / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re bskal pa dang po tshar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kho nas skyon bzhi po 'di dag ni bzlog par byed pa / yon tan gnyis po ni 'thab bo zhes zer ro / mtshan de dag kyang re re 'ang bsod nams brgya las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ puṇyasya parimāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams kyi ni tshad ji tsam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃnikṛṣṭabodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ bhogaphalamityeke /<br/> yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena trisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko 'bhinivartata ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re byang chub sems dpa' nye ba ma gtogs pa sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'bras bu can ji snyed pa de tsam mo zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis stong gsum 'chags pa ji snyed tsam mo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhā eva ca tatparimāṇajñā ityapare /<br/> atha bodhisattvabhūto bhagavān kiyato buddhān paryupāsayāmāsa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de'i tshad ni sangs rgyas kho nas mkhyen par zad do zhes zer ro / yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratheme kalpāsaṃkhyeye pañcasaptatisahasrāṇi dvitīye ṣaṭsaptatiṃ tṛtīye saptasaptatim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskal pa grangs med pa dang po la ni sangs rgyas bdun khri lnga stong la bsnyen bkur byas so / gnyis pa la ni bdun khri drug stong la bsnyen bkur byas so / gsum pa la ni bdun khri bdun stong la bsnyen bkur byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyānte katamo buddha āsīt /<br/> pratilomānukrameṇa yathākramam /<br/> asaṃkhyeyatrayāntyajāḥ /<br/> vipaśyī dīpakṛdratnaśikhī /<br/> ratnaśikhini samyaksaṃbuddhe prathamo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ samāptaḥ /<br/> dīpaṅkare bhagavati dvitīyaḥ /<br/> vipaśyini tathāgate tṛtīyaḥ /<br/> sarveṣāṃ tu teṣāṃ /<br/> śāsyamuniḥ purā /<br/> śākyamunirnāma samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ vabhūva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskal pa grangs med pa gang gi tha mar sangs rgyas gang zhig byung bar gyur zhe na / bzlog pa'i go rims kyis go rims bzhin du / rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug / grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi tshe ni bskal pa grangs med pa dang po rdzogs so / bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi tshe ni gnyis pa rdzogs so / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshe ni gsum pa rdzogs so / de dag thams cad kyi dang po sh'akya thub pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra bhagavatā bodhisattvabhūtenādyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃprakāra evāhaṃ buddho bhaveyamiti no 'pyevaṃ kaliyuga evotpannavānāryavattasyāpyevaṃ varṣa sahasrāntaṃ śāsanaṃ babhūva /<br/> atha kasyāmavasthāvāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāṃ pāramitāṃ paripūrayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rnam pa kho nar sangs rgyas par shog shig ces dang por smon lam btab pa byung ste / de yang 'di bzhin du rtsod pa'i dus kho na la byung la / de'i bstan pa yang la stong gi mtha'i bar du gnas par gyur to / yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas skabs gang dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa gang yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatra sarvaṃ dadataḥ kāruṇyāddānapūraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun la thams cad snying rje yis / sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā sarvasmai sarvaṃ dadāti ā akṣṇaḥ ā majjāyāḥ kāruṇyānnābhyudayaviśeṣaṃ lipsamānaḥ iyatā dānapāramitā paripūrṇā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi cha gang la kun la ni mig gi bar dang rkang gi bar thams cad mngon par mtho ba'i khyad par la mi re bar snying rjes sbyin par byed na de tsam gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṅgacchede 'pyakopāttu rāgiṇaḥ kṣāntiśīlayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni / mi 'khrug bzod dang tshul khrims kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā 'yamavītarāgo 'pi cchidyamāneṣvaṅgeṣu nālpamapi kupyati tadā 'sya kṣāntiśīlapāramite paripūrṇe bhavataḥ /<br/> tiṣyastotreṇa vīryasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'dod chags dang ma bral bzhin du yan lag bcad kyang cung zad kyang mi 'khrug pa de'i tshe 'di'i tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag yongs su rdzogs pa yin no / skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tiṣyaṃ tathāgataratnaguhāyāṃ tejodhātusamāpannadṛṣṭyā bhagavān bodhisattvabhūta ekena pādena sthitvā sapta divasān stutavānekagāthayā /<br/> na divi bhuvi vā nāsmin loke na vaiśravaṇālaye /<br/> na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā /<br/> caratu vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ kṛtsnāṃ saparvatakānanām /<br/> puruṣavṛṣabhastvattulyo 'nyo mahāśramaṇaḥ kuta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal ri'i phug cig na me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas rkang pa gcig gis 'grengs te zhag bdun gyi bar du / skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dri'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul pa la med / 'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin / lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs sam phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med / ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas par kun tu yul gcig ga la yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadā kila vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhīsamādhyoranantaram /<br/> bodheḥ pūrvasamanantaraṃ dhyānaprajñāpāramitayoḥ paripūrirvajropamasamādhau svasyāḥ saṃpadaḥ pāragamanāt pāramitāḥ /<br/> sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi puṇyakriyāvastūni /<br/> dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskal pa dgu yang bsdums so zhes grag go de ma thag la ting nge 'dzin blo'i byang chub pa'i sngon rol gyi de ma thag rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bdag yongs su rdzogs te / rang rang gi phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dag yin no / mdo las sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathametattrayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na gsum po 'di dag bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi yin zhe na / gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puṇyaṃ kriyā 'tha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā /<br/> puṇyamapyetattrayaṃ kriyā 'pi vastvapi yathāyogamiti puṇyakriyāvastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin / gsum po 'di dag ni ci rigs par bsod nams kyang yin / bya ba yang yin / gzhi yang yin pas bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā karma ca te panthānaśca panthāna eva ca karmaṇa iti karmaṃpathā uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na de dag ni las kyang yin la las kyi lam yang yin pa dang las kyi lam kho na yin pas las kyi lam mo zhes bshad pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dānamaye tāvat puṇyakriyāvastuni kāyavākkarma tridhā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi la lus dang ngag gi las ni rnam pa gsum char yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsamutthāpikā cetanā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems pa ni bsod nams kyang yin la bya ba yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ puṇyameva /<br/> śīlamayaṃ tu kāyavākkarmaiveti tridhā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni bsod nams kho na yin no / tshul khrims las byung ba ni lus dang ngag gi las kho na yin pas rnam pa gsum char yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāmayo maitrī puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāyāśca vastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pa las byung ba la byas pa ni bsod nams kyang yin la bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi yang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitrīmukhenābhisaṃskaraṇāt tatsahabhuvaścetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca /<br/> anye tatsahabhuvaḥ puṇyameva puṇyasya vā kāraṇaṃ puṇyakriyā puṇyaprayogastasyā etāni trīṇi vastūni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byams pa'i sgo nas de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro / de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i sems pa dang tshul khrims ni bsod nams kyang yin la bya ba yang yin no / de dang lhan cig 'byung ba gzhan ni bsod nams kho na yin no / yang na bsod nams byed pa ni bsod nams bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ saṃpādanārthaṃ puṇyaprayogārambhāditi /<br/> kuśalacetanāparamārthena puṇyakriyā /<br/> tasyā etāni vastūnītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba'o / 'di dag sgrub pa'i ched du bsod nams kyi 'byor ba rtsom pa'i phyir gsum po 'di dag ni de'i gzhi yin no / gzhan dag na re bsod nams bya ba ni don dam par na sems pa dge ba yin la / 'di dag ni de'i gzhi yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidaṃ dānaṃ nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapi dīyate daddānam /<br/> iha tu /<br/> dīyate yena daddānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang sbyin par bya ba de yang sbyin pa yin mod kyi 'dir ni / gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavati sma /<br/> rāgādibhirapi dīyate /<br/> na cātra tadiṣṭam /<br/> ato viśeṣaṇārthamāha /<br/> pūjānugrahakāmyayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jigs pa dang lan la re ba dang 'dod chags pa la sogs pas kyang sbyin par byed mod kyi / de ni 'dir mi 'dod pas de'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'i phyir / mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pareṣāṃ pūjānugrahakāmatābhyāṃ yena dīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes bya ba smos te / gang gis gzhan dag la mchod pa dang phan gdags par 'dod pa dag gis sbyin par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punastatsyādyena dīyate /<br/> kāyavākkarma sotthānaṃ /<br/> kiṃ punastadutthānam /<br/> yena kalāpena tadutthāpyate /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis sbyin par byed pa de yang gang zhig ce na / lus dang ngag la slong dang bcas / slong ba yang gang zhig ce na / tshogs gang gis de slong bar byed pa'o / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang tshe skyes bu dge yid kyis / rang gi rdzas ngag sbyin byed pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat kṣaṇaṃ kuśalāḥ skandhāḥ dānamityabhidhīyate /<br/> mahābhogyaphalaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de tshe dge ba'i phung po rnams / sbyin pa zhes ni brjod pa yin / zhes bya ba'o / de 'bras longs spyod chen po can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccaitaddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogyaphalam /<br/> svabhāve caiṣa mayaḍveditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu longs spyod chen po yin no / 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā tṛṇamayaṃ gṛhaṃ parṇamayaṃ bhājanamiti /<br/> tat khalvetaddānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na rtsa las byung ba'i khyim dang lo ma las byung ba'i snod ces bya ba bzhin no / yang sbyin pa de ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svaparārthobhayārthāya nobhayārthāya dīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir / gnyi ga'i don du min phyir sbyin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yadavītarāgaḥ āryaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaścaitye dānaṃ dadāti tadasyātmana evārthāya /<br/> pareṣāṃ tenānugrahābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am / so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral bas mchod rten la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa des pha rol po dag la phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid kho na'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāryo vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tatra dānaṃ pareṣāmarthāya /<br/> tena teṣāmanugrahāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par des de dag la phan btags pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi phyir yin gyi bdag gi don gyi phyir ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nātmano 'rthāya /<br/> tadvipākabhūmeratyantasamatikrāntatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rnam par smin pa'i sa las shin tu yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dadāti taddānamubhayeṣāmarthāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am / so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāryo vītarāgaścaitye dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ taddānamubhayeṣāṃ nārthāya /<br/> taddhi kevalaṃ gauravaṃ kṛtjñābhyāṃ dīyate /<br/> sāmānyena dānaṃ mahābhogyaphalamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa 'dod chags dang bral bas mchod rten la 'bul bar byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yang ma yin te de ni bkur sti dang byas pa gzo ba 'ba' zhig gis 'bul bar zad do / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po can zhes spyir bstan pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadviśeṣaḥ punardātṛvastukṣetraviśeṣataḥ /<br/> tatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i khyad par sbyin bdag dang / dngos dang zhing gi khyad par las / de la re zhig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhāśīlaśrutādiguṇayukto dātā viśiṣṭo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sbyin bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya taddānadātṛviśeṣeṇa phaladānaṃ prativiśiṣyate /<br/> sa ca tādṛśo dātā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyin bdag de'i sbyin pa de ni sbyin bdag gi khyad par gyis 'bras bu 'byin pa la khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur te / sbyin bdag de lta bu de ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkṛtyādi dadāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gus pa la sogs pas sbyin par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkṛtya svahastaṃ kāle parānupahatya dadāti /<br/> ataḥ /<br/> satkārodārarucitā kālānācchedyalābhitā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gus pa dang rang gi lag dang dus su dang gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin par byed de / de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang / dus dang bar chad med par rnyed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'sya dātustattādṛśaṃ dānaṃ dattvā yathākramaṃ catvāro viśeṣā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir sbyin bdag 'di'i sbyin pa de lta bur byin pas go rims bzhin du khyad par bzhir 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāralābhī bhavati /<br/> udāreṣu ca bhogeṣu ruciṃ labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur / longs spyod rgya chen po la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kālelna ca bhogān labhate nātikrāntikālena /<br/> anācchedyāṃśca bhogān labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">longs spyod dus las mi yol bar dus su rnyed par 'gyur / longs spyod bar chad med par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsya bhogāḥ parairācchādyante nāpyagnyādibhirvināśyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i longs spyod gzhan dag gis bar du mi chod cing / me la sogs pas med par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ yathā dātā viśiṣyate tadviśeṣācca dānaviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na sbyin bdag khyad par du 'phags pa yin pa dang de'i khyad par gyis sbyin pa'i khyad par yang bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha vastu kathaṃ viśiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na dngos po khyad par du 'phags pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varṇādisampadā vastu /<br/> viśiṣṭamiti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos / khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi yaddīyate dadvarṇagandharasasparśānāmanyatamenāpi saṃpannaṃ bhavati /<br/> evaṃ vastu viśiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gang sbyin par bya ba de kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis phun sum tshogs pa yin na / de lta bu ni dngos po khyad par du 'phags pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tādṛśaṃ vastu dattvā kiṃ bhavati /<br/> yathākramam /<br/> surūptvaṃ yaśasvi vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po de lta bu byin pas ci ltar 'gyur zhe na / rim pa bzhin du / de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">priyatā sukumārartusukhasparśāṅtā tataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dga' dang shin tu gzhon sha can / dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varṇasampannaṃ dattvā surūpo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg bya phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni gzugs bzang por 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gandhasaṃpannaṃ dattvā yaśasvī bhavati /<br/> gandhavadyaśaso dikṣu vidhāraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni dri bzhin du grags pas phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rasasaṃpannaṃ dattvā priyo bhavati /<br/> rasa iva svāduḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni ro zhim po bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sparśasaṃpannaṃ dattvā sukumārāṅgāśca bhavati ṛtusukhasparśāni cāsyāṅgāni bhavanti yathā strīratnasya /<br/> atha kṣetraṃ kathaṃ viśipyate /<br/> gatiduḥkhopakāritvaguṇaiḥ kṣetraṃ viśiṣyate /<br/> gativiśeṣātāvadviśiṣyate /<br/> tathā hyuktaṃ bhagavatā tiryagyonigatāya dānaṃ dattvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /<br/> duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya dānaṃ dattvā sahasraguṇa iti /<br/> duḥkhaviśeṣā dviśiṣyate /<br/> tathā hyaupadhikeṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg bya phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni lus shin tu gzhon sha can dang / bud med rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du 'di'i dus su reg na bde ba'i lus su 'gyur ro / yang ji ltar na zhing khyad du 'phags pa yin zhe na / 'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs dang / yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags / re zhig 'gro ba'i khyad par gyis khyad du 'phags pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la sbyin pa byin na slar rnam par smin pa brgya 'gyur du re bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">glāne dānaṃ glānopasthāpake dānam /<br/> śītalikādiṣu ca dānamuktvoktame bhiḥ saptabhiḥ auṣadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥsamanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na labhyaṃ puṇyānāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītumiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na stong 'gyur du re bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / sdug bsngal gyi khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di ltar rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag tu nad pa la sbyin pa dang nad gyog la sbyin pa dang grang ba la sogs pa la sbyin par gsungs nas / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo'i bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upakāritvaviśeṣādyathā mātāpitroranyeṣāṃ copakāriṇām ṛṣyamṛgajātakādyudāharaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par las ni 'di lta ste pha ma dang phan 'dogs pa gzhan rnams la sbyin pa byin pa ste / dom dang ri dvags la sogs pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dper bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">guṇaviśeṣādyathā śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka ityevamādi /<br/> sarveṣāṃ tu dānānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yon tan gyi khyad par las ni 'di lta ste / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin na rnam par smin pa 'bum 'gyur zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o / sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agraṃ muktasya muktāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchog ni grol bas grol ba la'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadvītarāgo vītarāgāya dattvā 'tidānamidaṃ śreṣṭhamāmiṣadāneṣu dānamityuktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> bodhisattvasya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba la byin pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zang zing gi sbyin pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog yin no zhes gsungs so / byang chub sems dpa' yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadvā dānaṃ bodhisattve dadāti sarvasattvahitahetostadamuktasyāpyamukte 'bhyādānamagram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni grol ba ma yin pas ma grol ba rnams la yang byin na mchog yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat sthāpayitvā yāni bhagavato 'nyānyaṣṭau dānānyuktāni teṣām /<br/> aṣṭamam /<br/> agramiti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ma gtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag sbyin pa brgyad gsungs pa de dag gi nang na ni brgyad pa mchog yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamānyaṣṭau /<br/> āsādya dānaṃ bhayadānam adānme dānaṃ dāsyati me dānaṃ dattpūrvaṃ me dānaṃ pitṛbhiśca pitāmahaiśceti dānaṃ dadāti svargārthaṃ dānaṃ kīrtyarthaṃ dānaṃ cittālaṅkārārthaṃ dānaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yiogasaṃbhārārthamuttamārthasya prāptaye dānaṃ dadāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad gang zhe na / nye ba la sbyin pa dang 'jigs pas sbyin pa dang bdag la byin pas sbyin pa dang bdag la sbyin par 'gyur bas sbyin pa dang sngon bdag gi pha dang mes po dag gis sbyin pa byin pas sbyin pa byin pa dang mtho ris kyi don du sbyin pa dang grags pa'i don du sbyin pa dang sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāsādya dānaṃ yat āsannebhya upagatebhyo dānaṃ dadātīti paurāṇāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nye ba la sbyin pa ni snga ma dag na re nam nye bar gyur cing nye bar lhags pa dag la sbyin par byed pa'o zhes zer ro
