</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhayadānaṃ yadvināśābhimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā varaṃ dadāmīti dadāti /<br/> śeṣaṃ sugamatvānna vibhaktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jigs pas sbyin pa ni med par byed pa mngon sum du mthong nas dam pa sbyin no zhes sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa'o / lhag ma ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srota āpattiphalapratipannakāya dānaṃ dattvā 'prameyavipākaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa la sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gzhal du med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato 'prameyataraḥ srota āpannāyeti vistareṇoktaṃ sūtre /<br/> apitu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun du zhugs pa la byin na de bas kyang ches gzhal du med do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs mod kyi / gzhan yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mātṛpitṛglānadhārmakathikebhyo 'ntyajanmane /<br/> bodhisattvāya cāmeyā anāryebhyo 'pi dakṣiṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa min yang pha ma dang / nad pa dang ni chos smra dang / skye mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' la / yon ni gzhal du med pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ pṛthagjanabhūtebhyo 'pyaprameyā phalato dakṣiṇā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga po 'di dag la ni so so'i skye bor gyur pa yin yang 'bras bu'i sgo nas yon gzhal du med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāntyajanmā bodhisattvaścaramabhavikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la skye ba tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmakathikaścaturvidhe kṣetraviśeṣe katamasmin pakṣe dikṣeptavyaḥ /<br/> upakāripakṣe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos smra ba zhing gi khyad par rnam pa bzhi po'i phyogs gang du gtogs par bya zhe na / phan 'dogs pa'i phyogs su gtogs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi mahākalyāṇamitram avidyāndhāyāṃ prajāyāṃ prajñācakṣuṣo dātā samaviṣamasya prakāśayitā anāsravasya dharmakāyasyātinivartayitā samāsato buddhakṛtyasya kartā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni skye dgu ma rig pas ldongs pa rnams la shes rab kyi mig sbyin par byed pa dang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa rab tu ston par byed pa dang chos kyi sku zag pa med pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang mdor na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmaṇāṃ tu gurulaghutvaṃ jñātukāmena samāsataḥ ṣaṭ kāraṇāni jñeyāni /<br/> tadyathā /<br/> pṛṣṭhaṃ kṣetramadhiṣṭhānaṃ prayiogaścetanāśayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las rnams kyi lci ba dang yang ba nyid shes par 'dod pas mdor na rgyu drug shes par bya ste / 'di lta ste / mjug dang zhing dang gzhi dang ni / sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ mṛdvadhimātratvāt karmamṛdvadhimātratā /<br/> pṛṣṭhaṃ nāma yatkṛtasya punaranukriyā /<br/> kṣetraṃ nāma yatra kārāpakārāḥ kriyante /<br/> adhiṣṭhānaṃ karmapathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag chung dang che ba las / las kyang chung dang che ba nyid / mjug ces bya ba ni byas pa'i rjes la byed pa gang yin pa'o / zhing zhes bya ba ni gang du phan pa dang gnod pa dag byed pa'o gzhi ni las kyi lam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogastadarthaṃ kāyavākkarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba ni de'i don du lus dang ngag gis las byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetanā yayā karmapathaṃ niṣṭhāpayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems pa ni gang gis las kyi lam mthar phyin par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśayastadabhiprāya evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāmevaṃ caivaṃ ca na kariṣyāmīti /<br/> kasyacit pṛṣṭhaparigraheṇaiva tatkarma guru saṃpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam pa ni de dag la de dang 'di lta bu zhig ni bya'o / de dang 'di lta bu zhig ni phyis bya'o snyam du sems pa ste / la la'i mjug yongs su bzung ba kho na las de lci bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākanaiyamyenāvasthānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin par nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasyacit kṣetravaśenaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la'i ni zhing gi dbang kho nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatraiva kṣetre punaradhiṣṭhānavaśāt guru saṃpadyate nānyathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhing de nyid la gzhi'i dbang gis lci bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā mātāitroḥ prāṇātipātāt na tvevamadattādānādikāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar pha dang ma la srog gcad pas lci bar 'gyur ba ltar ma byin par blangs pa la sogs pas ni de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyadapi yojyam /<br/> yasya tu sarvāṇyadhimātrāṇi bhavanti tasyātyarthamadhimātraṃ guru karma veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o / gang gi thams cad che ba yin pa de ni las kyang shin tu ches lci ba yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya mṛdūni tasyātyarthaṃ mṛdu veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi chung ngu yin pa de ni shin tu chung ba yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtaṃ copacitaṃ ca karmocyate /<br/> kathaṃ karmopacitaṃ bhavati /<br/> pañcabhiḥ karaṇaiḥ /<br/> saṃcetanasamāptibhyāṃ niṣkaukṛtya vipakṣataḥ /<br/> parivārādvipākācca karmopacitamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las byas pa dang bsags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar na las bsags pa yin zhe na / bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang / mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang / 'khor dang rnam par smin pa las / bsags pa'i las zhes bya ba bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ saṃcenataḥ /<br/> saṃcintya kṛtaṃ bhavati nābuddhipūrvaṃ na sahasā kṛtam /<br/> kathaṃ samāpattitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsams bzhin pa las ji lta bu zhe na / ched du bsams nas byas pa yin gyi blo sngon du ma btang ba yang ma yin la bab col du byas pa yang ma yin pa'o / rdzogs pas ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścidekena duścaritenāpāyānyātikaścidyāvattribhiḥ /<br/> kaścidekena karmapathena kaścidyāvaddaśabhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni nyes par spyad pa gcig gis ngan song du 'gro la / kha cig ni gsum gyi bar gyis 'gro ba dang kha cig ni las kyi lam gcig gis ngan song du 'gro la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yo yāvatā gacchati tasminnasamāpte kṛtaṃ tatkarma nopacitam samāpte tūpacitam /<br/> kathaṃ niṣkaukṛtyavipakṣataḥ /<br/> nirvipratisāraṃ ca tat karma bhavati niṣpratipakṣaṃ ca /<br/> kathaṃ parivārataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni bcu'i bar gyis 'gro ba de gang zhig gis ji tsam gyis der 'gro bar 'gyur ba rdzogs par ma byas na yang las de byas pa yin gyi bsags pa ni ma yin no / rdzogs na ni bsags pa yin no / mi 'gyod pa dang gnyen po med pas ji lta bu zhe na / las de la yid la gcags pa med pa dang gnyen po med pa yin no / 'khor las ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalaṃ cākuśalaparivāraṃ ca bhavati /<br/> kathaṃ vipākataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba la 'khor yang mi dge ba ma yin no / rnam par smin pa las ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipākadāna niyataṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa 'byin par nges pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kuśalamapi yojyam /<br/> ato 'nyathā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati nopacitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du dge ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o / de las gzhan du byas pa'i las ni ma bsags pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caitye sarāgasyātmārthaṃ dānamityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bcas pas mchod rten la sbyin pa byin pa ni bdag gi don du'o zhes bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāsatyupabhoktari kathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la longs spyod par byed pa med na ji ltar bsod nams su 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvividhaṃ hi puṇyaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ tyāgādeva yadupapadyate paribhogānvayaṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogādyadutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams ni rnam pa gnyis te / btang ba'i rgyu las byung ba ni btang ba kho na las byung ba gang yin pa'o / yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba ni sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caitye tyāgānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ /<br/> paribhogānvyaṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i bsod nams yongs su longs spyod pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tatrāpratigṛhṇati kasmiṃścit puṇyam /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ nāsatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la len pa su yang med na ji ltar bsod nams yin zhe na / len par byed pa yod na ni bsod nams su 'gyur la / med na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la yang rgyu ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasyacidapyanugrahābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">su la yang phan btags pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamakāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni rgyu ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt maitryādyapramāṇasamyagdṛṣṭibhāvanāyāṃ na syāt /<br/> tasmādeṣṭavyaṃ caityai 'pi puṇyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te phan btags pa kho nas bsod nams su gyur na ni / byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa rnams bsod nams su mi 'gyur te / de lta bas na mchod rten la yang bsod nams su 'dod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maitryādivadagṛhṇati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">len med byams sogs bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā maitryādiṣvantareṇāpi pratigrāhakaṃ parānugrahaṃ vā puṇyaṃ bhavati svacittaprabhavaṃ tathābhyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittāt puṇyaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byams pa la sogs pa la len par byed pa 'am / gzhan la phan 'dogs par med kyang rang gi sems kyi mthus bsod nams su 'gyur ba de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa 'das kyang de la dad pa byas pa rang gi sems las bsod nams su 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dānamānakriyā tarhi vyarthā prāpnoti /<br/> na /<br/> tatkarmasamutthāpikāyā bhakteḥ prakṛṣṭataratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni sbyin pa dang mchod par bya ba don med par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te / las de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i dad pa ni ches mchog yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā hi śatruvadhābhiprāyasya tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyavākkarma /<br/> śatrusaṃjñayā tasminmṛte 'pi kurvato bahutaramapuṇyaṃ jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar dgra gsang pa'i bsam pa can des kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las de shi bzhin du dgra'i 'du shes kyis byed na bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi bsams pa tsam gyis ni ma yin pa de bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nābhiprāyamātreṇa /<br/> tathābhyatīte śāstari tadbhaktisamutthāṃ dānamānakriyāṃ kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ston pa 'das kyang de la dad pas kun nas bslang ba'i sbyin pa dang mchod pa'i bya ba byed na bsod nams ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi dad pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na bhaktimātreṇa /<br/> yadi svakṣetre dānakriyāvījamiṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati tatkṣetre tarhyaniṣṭaphalaṃ bhaviṣyati /<br/> kukṣetre 'pīṣṭaphalatā phalabījāviparyayāt /<br/> kukṣetre 'pi phalasya bījādaviparyayo dṛṣṭo mṛdvīkābījānmṛdvīkāphalamevotpadyate madhuraṃ nimbavījānnimbameva tiktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te zhing bzang po la sbyin par bya ba'i sa bon 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba can yin no / 'o na zhing ngan pa la byin na 'bras bu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhe na / rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir / ngan pa'i zhing la'ang 'bras yid 'ong / zhing ngan pa la yang sa bon las 'bras bu mi 'khrul ba mthong ste / rgun 'brum gyi sa bon las ni rgun 'brum gyi 'bras bu mngar ba kho na skye la / nim pa'i sa bon las ni nim pa'i 'bras bu kha ba kho na skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kukṣetre 'pi parahitādhyāśayapravṛttasya dānabījasyeṣṭameva phalaṃ nirvartate nāniṣṭam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du zhing ngan pa la yang gzhan la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sbyin pa'i sa bon gyi 'bras bu yang yid du 'ong ba kho na 'grub kyi yid du mi 'ong ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣetradoṣāttu tadvījamalpaphalaṃ vā bhavatyaphalaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhing gi skyon gyis ni sa bon de'i 'bras bu chung ba 'am / 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gataṃ dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastu saprasaṅgam /<br/> śīlamayaṃ vaktavyam /<br/> taducyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi zhar la 'ongs pa dang bcas te rdzogs so / tshul khrims las byung ba brjod par bya ste / des smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dauḥśītlamaśubhaṃ rūpaṃ śīlaṃ tadviratiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chal ba'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs / de spang tshul khrims
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akuśalaṃ hi rūpaṃ dauḥśīlyamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs mi dge ba ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādviratiḥ śīlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de spong ba ni tshul khrims yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā punarviratiḥ /<br/> dvidhā /<br/> yayā ca viramyate vijñaptyā yacca tadviramaṇam avijñaptiḥ /<br/> na ca kevalaṃ dauḥśīlyādviratiḥ śīlam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> pratikṣiptācca buddhena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spong ba de yang rnam pa gnyis so / rnam par rig byed gang gis spong bar byed pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa spong ba gang yin pa'o / tshul khrims ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims las spong ba 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapi na prakṛtyā dauḥśīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptamakālabhojanādikaṃ tasmādapi dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin gyis 'chal ba'i tshul khrims ma yin yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcad pa dus ma yin pa'i zas la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag spong ba rnam pa gnyis kyang tshul khrims yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāttaśikṣasya tu tadadhyācārāddauḥśīlyaṃ jāyate /<br/> uktaṃ tamāsena śīlam /<br/> viśuddhaṃ tu caturguṇam /<br/> tattu śīlaṃ caturguṇaṃ bhavati /<br/> viparyayādaviśuddham /<br/> atha kathaṃ caturguṇamityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slab pa mnos pas de dag spyad na 'chal ba'i tshul khrims su 'gyur ro / tshul khrims mdor bshad zin to / rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no / yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims de ni rnam par dag pa yin no / bzlog pa ni rnam par ma dag pa yin no / ji ltar na yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dauḥśīlyataddhetvahataṃ tadvipakṣaśamāśritam /<br/> dauḥśītyena tāvadanupahataṃ bhavati yathoktena dauḥśīlyena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims de rgyus 'phen ma byung / de yi gnyen po zhi la brten / re zhig 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis 'phen ma byung ba ni ji skad du bshad pas 'phen ma byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetunā 'pyanupahataṃ bhavati /<br/> lobhādibhiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ dauḥśīlyavipakṣāśritaṃ ca bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%"> / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi rgyus 'phen ma byung ba ni chags pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phen ma byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtyupasthānasaṃniśritatvāt samāśritaṃ ca bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po la brten pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la brten pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nopapattiviśeṣāśritam /<br/> nirvāṇapariṇāmitavāt /<br/> pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhi ba la brten pa ni skye ba'i khyad par la mi brten gyi mya ngan las 'das par yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re rgyu lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulaiḥ karmapathairviśuddhaṃ bhavati sāmantakairviśuddhaṃ vitarkairanupahataṃ smṛtyā 'nuparigahītaṃ nirvāṇapariṇāmitaṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las kyi lam dngos kyis rnam par dag pa yin pa dang nyer bsdogs dag gis rnam par dag pa dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis 'phen ma byung ba dang / dran pas yongs su bzung ba dang mya ngan las 'das par yongs su bsngos pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturvidhaṃ śīlamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re tshul khrims ni rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhayaśīlaṃ yadā jīvikāślokadaṇḍadurgatibhayāt pālyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jigs pa'i tshul khrims ni 'tsho ba med pa dang tshigs su bcad pa med pa dang chad pa dang ngan 'gros 'jigs nas srung ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśāstiśīlaṃ yadbhavabhogasatkāratṛṣṇākṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">legs su smon pa'i tshul khrims ni srid pa dang longs spyod dang bkur sti la chags nas srung ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhyaṅgānulomaṃ śīlaṃ yanmokṣārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭikāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub kyi yan lag gi rjes su mthun pa'i tshul khrims ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can rnams thar pa'i don du srung ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pariśuddhaṃ śīlamanāsravaśīlaṃ nirmalatvāditi /<br/> gataṃ śīlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims ni dri ma med pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yin no zhes zer ro / tshul khrims rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāhitaṃ tu kuśalaṃ bhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par gzhag pa'i dge ba ni sgom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidaṃ samāhitaṃ nāma /<br/> samādhisvabhāvaṃ sahabhū yat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na / ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang de dang lhan cig 'byung ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthametat bhāvanetyucyate /<br/> cittavāsanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ci'i phyir bsgom pa zhes bya zhe na / sems la sgo phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taddhi samāhitaṃ kuśalamatyarthaṃ cittaṃ vāsayati /<br/> guṇaistanmayīkaraṇātsaṃtateḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i dge ba de ni rgyud yon tan rnams kyis de'i bdag nyid du byed pa'i phyir sems la shin tu sgo bar byed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puṣpaistilabhāvanāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me tog rnams kyis til la bsgos pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dānaṃ tāvanmahābhogatāyai saṃvartata ityuktam /<br/> atha śīlaṃ bhāvanā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro zhes bshad na / yang na tshul khrims dang bsgom pas cir 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt visaṃyogāya bhāvanā /<br/> dānamapi svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang / 'bral ba'i don du bsgom gtso'i phyir / sbyin pa yang mtho ris kyi don du ni 'gyur mod kyi tshul khrims ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlamapi visaṃyogāya /<br/> bhāvanā tu prādhānyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims kyis kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur mod kyi bsgom pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sutra uktaṃ catvāraḥ pudgalā brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantīti /<br/> katamat tad brāhmapuṇyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las gang zag bzhi ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed do zhes gsungs pa / tshangs pa'i bsod nams gang zhig yin zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattallakṣaṇavipākasya karmaṇaḥ parimāṇajñāpanāyoktam iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> pūrvācāryās tu vyācakṣate /<br/> caturṇāṃ brāhmapuṇyatvaṃ kalpaṃ svargeṣu modanāt /<br/> yāvatā puṇyena kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan ma rnam par smin pa can gyi las kyi tshad shes par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa gang yin pa'o zhes zer ro / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re / bskal par mtho ris dag gnas phyir / bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin / zhes zer te / bsod nams ji tsam gyis na bskal par mtho ris su dga' bar gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmapurohitānāṃ kalpāyuṣkatvāt /<br/> nikāyāntare gāthāṃ paṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi tshe bskal par thub pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata iti /<br/> āmiṣadānamuktam /<br/> dharmadānaṃ vaktavyam /<br/> tadidamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan las kyang / tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa ni / bskal par mtho ris dga' bar gnas / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ngo / zang zing gi sbyin pa bshad zin to / chos kyi sbyin pa brjod par bya ste / des smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmadānaṃ yathābhūta sūtrādyakliṣṭadeśanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas / mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtrādīnāṃ yathābhūtamakliṣṭadeśanā dharmadānam /<br/> ato mahatīṃ ta ātmanaḥ puṇyajyāniṃ kurvanti ye viparītadharmaṃ deśayanti /<br/> kliṣṭacittā vā lābhasatkāra yaśāṃsi vāñchantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi sbyin pa ni mdo la sogs pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ston pa'o / de'i phyir gang dag chos log par 'chad par byed pa'am / sems nyon mongs pa can rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa 'dod pas chad pa de dag ni bdag nyid kyi bsod nams chen po nyams par byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ puṇyakriyāvastubhedena trividhaṃ kuśalaṃ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams bya ba'i gzhir bye brag gis dge ba rnam pa gsum bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puṇyanirvāṇanirvedhabhāgīyaṃ kuśalaṃ tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang / nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnams gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ yasminnutpanne niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsod nams kyi cha dang mthun pa ni rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba can gang yin pa'o / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni gang skyes na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su nam 'gyur ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya saṃsārādīnavanairātmyanirvāṇaguṇadyotikāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā romaharṣāśrūpātau bhavatastasyāsti mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamityavaseyaṃ pravṛṣīvāṅkuraprarohāt khalavileṣu bījāstitvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang bdag med pa dang dmyal ba las 'das pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i gtam thos nas sgu zing zhes byed pa dang mchi ma 'khrug ces byed pa de la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yod par shes par bya ste / dbyar myu gu skye ba las na gyul gyi gseb na sa bon yod par shes pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvedhabhāgīyamuṣmādi caturvidhaṃ paścādvyākhyāsyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yin te / 'og nas bshad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanā kāvyaṃ saṃkhyeti ka eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ /<br/> yogapravartitaṃ karma sasamutthāpakaṃ tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten yig 'bru dang rgya dang bgrang ba dang snyan ngag dang grangs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na / rigs pa'i rab tu bcug pa'i las / rnam gsum kun slong bcas pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lipimudre sagaṇanaṃ kāvyaṃ saṃkhyā yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yig 'bru rgya dang grangs bcas pa'i / snyan ngag grangs te go rims bzhin / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yogapravartitamiti upāyaviśeṣapravartitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs pas bcug pa zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi bye brag gis bcug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridhā karmeti kāyavāṅmanaskarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra lipimudre tāvadyogapravartitaṃ kāyakarma samutthāpanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig yig 'bru dang rgya ni lus kyi las rigs pas rab tu bcug pa kun nas slong ba dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gaṇanā kāvyaṃ ca vākkarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bgrang ba dang snyan ngag ni ngag gi las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetāni pañcaskandhasvabhāvāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na de dag ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkhyā manaskarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">grangs ni yid kyi las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yanmanasā saṃkalanaṃ dharmāṇām /<br/> dharmāṇāmidānīṃ kecit paryāyā ucyante /<br/> sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi chos rnams sdom par byed pa gang yin pa'o / da ni rnam grangs kha cig brjod par bya ste / sgrab ngan kha na ma tho bcas / nyon mongs can ches
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnā iti paryāyāḥ /<br/> śubhāmalāḥ /<br/> praṇītāḥ /<br/> kuśalānāsravāṇāṃ praṇītā iti paryāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang bsgribs pa dang ngan pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dag yin no / dri med dge / gya nom / gya nom pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba zag pa med pa rnams kyi rnam grangs yin no / ngan pa dang gya nom pa dag las gzhan pa ni bar ma zhes bya bar grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hīnapraṇītebhyo 'nye madhyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati /<br/> saṃskṛtaśubhāḥ sevyāḥ /<br/> kusalasaṃskṛtānāṃ sevitavyā iti paryāyaḥ /<br/> śeṣā asevitavyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas dge bsten bya / bsten par bya zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos dge ba rnams kyi rnam grangs yin no / lhag ma rnams ni bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādasaṃskṛtaṃ na sevyam /<br/> anabhyasanīyatvādaphalatvācca /<br/> phalarthaṃ hi sevā bhavati /<br/> sottarā anye sarvadharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir 'dus ma byas bsten par bya ba ma yin zhe na / goms par byar mi rung ba'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i don du bsten par bya ba yin na 'bras bu yang med pa'i phyir ro / chos gzhan thams cad ni bla ma dang bcas pa yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mokṣastvanuttaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thar pa bla na med pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi nirvāṇādviśiṣṭataramasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa las ches khyad par du 'phags pa ni med kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca sarvebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ kuśalanityatvāt /<br/> abhidharmakośabhāṣye karmanirddeśo nāma caturthaṃ kośasthānamiti /<br/> pañcamaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> oṃ namo buddhāya /<br/> karmajaṃ lokavaicitrya mityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni dge ba dang rtag pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad pas khyad par du 'phags pa yin no / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las las bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bzhi pa'o / las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes / zhes bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāni karmāṇyanuśayavaśādupacayaṃ gacchanti antareṇa cānuśayān bhavābhinirvarttane na samarthāni bhavanti /<br/> ato veditavyāḥ /<br/> mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ /<br/> kleśo hi pravartamāno daśa kṛtyāni karoti /<br/> mūlaṃ ca dṛḍhīkaroti saṃtatimavasthāpayati kṣetramāpādayati niḥṣyandaṃ nirvartayati karmabhavamabhinirharati svasaṃbhāraṃ arigṛhṇāti ālambane saṃmohayati vijñānasroto namayati kuśalapakṣādvyutkrāmati pandhanārthaṃ ca spharati dhātvanatikramayogeneti /<br/> kati ceme 'nuśayāḥ /<br/> samāsena ṣaṭ /<br/> katame /<br/> ṣaḍrāgaḥ pratighastathā /<br/> māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las de dag kyang phra rgyas kyi dbang gis bsags par 'gyur gyi / phra rgyas med par ni srid pa mngon par 'grub par mi nus pa de'i phyir / srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas yin par rig par bya ste / nyon mongs pa 'jug pa na bya ba bcu byed de / rtsa ba brtan par byed do / rgyud gnas par byed do / zhing du sgrub par byed do / rgyu mthun par sgrub par byed do /  / las kyi srid pa mngon par sgrub par byed do / rang gi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par byed do / dmigs pa la kun du rmongs par byed do / rnam par shes pa'i rgyun 'khrid par byed do / dge ba'i phyogs las gyo bar byed do / khams las mi 'da' ba'i tshul gyis 'ching ba'i don du khyab par byed do / phra rgyas de dag kyang du zhig ce na / mdor bsdus na / drug drug gang zhe na / 'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang / nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang / the tshom yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāgrahaṇaṃ rāgavaśenānyeṣāmālambanānuśāyitajñāpanārtham /<br/> etacca paścāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> te punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin zhes smos pa ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis gzhan dag dmigs pa las rgyas par gyur pa nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir te / de ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o / de drug kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍrāgabhedātsaptoktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dbye bas bdun du bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete ṣaḍnuśayāḥ sūtre rāgasya dvidhā bhedaṃ kṛtvā saptoktāḥ /<br/> kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśyaḥ avidyānuśayo dṛṣṭyanuśayo vicikitsānuśaya iti /<br/> kathamidaṃ jñātavyaṃ kāmarāga evānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ āhosvit kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāganuśayaḥ /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas drug po de dag kyang mdo las 'dod chags phye nas bdun du bshad de / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas dang khong khro ba'i phra rgyas dang srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas dang nga rgyal gyi phra rgyas dang ma rig pa'i phra rgyas dang lta ba'i phra rgyas dang the tshom gyi phra rgyas so / ji ltar shes par bya / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin nam / 'on te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin / de las cir 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmarāga evānuśayaścet sūtravirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihaikatyo na kāmarāgaparyavasthitena cetasā bahulaṃ viharati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di na la las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyi las mang du mi gnas la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpannasya kāmarāgaparyavasthānasyottari niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /<br/> tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaktvasamavahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyataiti /<br/> kāmarāgasyānuśayaścedviprayuktānuśayaprasaṅgādabhidharmavirodhaḥ kāmarāgānuśayastribhirindriyaiḥ saṃprayukta iti /<br/> kāmarāga evānuśya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvadvicikitsaivānuśaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa byung na yang phyis nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes shing / de'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa de'i mthus yang dag par shin tu kun nas 'joms shing phra rgyas dang bcas par spong bar byed do zhas gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo /  / gal te de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin na ni phra rgyas ldan par ma yin par thal bar 'gyur bas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni dbang po gsum dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no zhas 'byung ba'i chos mngon pa dang 'gal lo / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin te / the tshom nyid phra rgyas yin pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu coktamevaṃ sūtravirodha iti /<br/> nāsti virodhaḥ /<br/> sānuśayaṃ sānubandhamityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na mdo dang 'gal lo zhes bshad pa ma yin nam / 'gal ba med de / phra rgyas dang bcas pa ni rjes su 'bral ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don yin pa'i phyir ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aupacāriko vā sūtre 'nuśayaśabdaḥ prāptau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na mdo las phra rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba ni thob pa la nye bar btags pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā duḥkho 'gniriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na me sdug bsngal zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lākṣaṇikastvabhidharme kleśa evānuśayaśabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa las phra rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba ni nyon mongs pa kho na la mtshan nyid pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātsaṃyuktā evānuśayāḥ /<br/> kathamidaṃ gamyate /<br/> anuśayānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na phra rgyas rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pa kho na yin no / 'di ji ltar shes she na / phra rgyas rnams ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittakleśakaratvādāvaraṇatvācchubhairviruddhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems ni nyon mongs byed phyir dang / sgrib phyir dge dang 'gal phyir dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmādanuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate utpannācca parihīyate tasmānna viprayuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir phra rgyas rnams kyi sems nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba dang sngon med pa'i dge ba mi skye ba dang skyes pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ldan pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha viprayuktairapyevaṃ syāt /<br/> kuśalaṃ na kadācidupalabhyeta /<br/> teṣāṃ nityaṃ saṃnihitatvāt /<br/> upalabhyate ca /<br/> ataḥ /<br/> kuśalasya copalambhādaviprayuktāḥ atha ihānuśayāḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang de ltar 'gyur na ni de dag rtag tu nye ba'i phyir dge ba nam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na dmigs te / de lta bas na dge ba 'ang dmigs pa'i phyir na 'dir / phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin min / 'di ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadidamajñāpakaṃ yasmādyo viprayuktamanuśayamicchati sa etatsarvamanuśayakṛtaṃ necchati /<br/> kleśakṛtamevecchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar gang zhig phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin par 'dod pa de yang 'di thams cad phra rgyas kyis byas par ni mi 'dod kyi nyon mongs pas byas pa kho nar 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu sādhu yathā sautrāntikānām /<br/> kathaṃ ca sautrāntikānām /<br/> kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśaya iti /<br/> na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayuktastasyādravyāntaratvāt /<br/> prasupto hi kleśo 'nuśaya ucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de lta bu ni legs pa yin no / mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta bu yin zhe na / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin la / de rdzas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir phra rgyas ni mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la / ldan pa ma yin pa yang ma yin gyi / nyon mongs pa nyal ba la ni phra rgyas zhes bya la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prabuddhaḥ paryavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sang pa la ni kun nas dkris pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kā ca tasya prasuptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nyal ba gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃmukhībhūtasya bījabhāvānubandhaḥ /<br/> kaḥ prabodhaḥ /<br/> saṃmukhībhāvaḥ /<br/> ko 'yaṃ vījabhāvo nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon sum du ma gyur par sa bon gyi dngos pos rjes su 'brel lo / sad pa gang yin zhe na / mngon sum du 'gyur ba'o / sa bon gyi dngos po zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmabhāvasya kleśajā kleśotpādanaśaktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi nyon mongs pa las skyes pa nyon mongs pa bskyed pa'i mthu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathānubhavajñānajā smṛtyutpādanaśaktiryathā cāṅkurādīnāṃ śāliphalajā śāliphalotpādanaśaktiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na nyams su myong ba'i shes pa las skyes pa dran pa bskyed pa'i mthu dang yang dper na myu gu la sogs pa s'a lu'i 'bras bu las bskyed pa'i mthu dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu kleśānāṃ bījārthamarthāntaraṃ vīprayuktamanuśayaṃ kalpayati tena smṛtibījamapyarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyaṃ jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon gyi don du phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin pa don gzhan du rtog par byed pa des na dran pa'i sa bon yang don gzhan du brtag par bya bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtre kleśa evānuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las nyon mongs pa nyid phra rgyas su gang gsungs pa de ji lta bu ste / drug tshan drug pa las 'di'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags de bde ba'i tshor ba la rgyas par 'gyur ro / rgyas par gsungs so she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavatīti vacanānnāsau tadaivānuśayaḥ /<br/> kadā tarhi bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir / de kho na ni phra rgyas ma yin no / 'o na nam 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā prasupto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe nyal ba na 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetau vā tadupacāra eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ /<br/> tiṣṭhatu prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> śāstraṃ pravarttatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'di ni rgyu las de nye bar btags pa yin par blta bar bya'o / zhar la 'ongs pa bzhag nas bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eṣa sūtre rāgasya bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes 'dod chags che ba gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko 'yaṃ bhavarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavarāgo dvidhātujaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gnyis las skyes srid 'dod chags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārūpyadhātujo rāgo bhavarāgaḥ kṛṭaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇamevaṃ kṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams las skyes pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do / ci'i phyir de skad du bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarmukhatvāttanmokṣasaṃjñāvyāvṛttaye kṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha ni nang du bltas phyir der / thar ba'i 'du shes bzlog phyir bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattirāgo hi teṣāṃ prāyeṇa /<br/> sa cāntarmukhapravṛttastasmāt bhavarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni phal cher snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'dod chags pa yin la / de yang kha nang du bltas pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktastayoḥ kila dhātvormokṣasaṃjñāvyāvyavarttanārthamekeṣāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na kha cig khams de gnyis las thar pa yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes bzlog pa'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmabhāva eva tu bhavaḥ /<br/> te ca sattvāḥ samāpattiṃ sāśrayā māsvādayanta ātmabhāvamevāsvādayanti kāmavītarāgatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kho na srid pa yin la sems can de dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa rten dang bcas pa ro myong bar byed pa na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir lus kho na ro myong bar byed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ sa rāgo bhavarāga ityuktaḥ /<br/> punarete ṣaḍanuśayā abhidharme daśa kriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'dod chags de ni srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do / yang chos mngon pa las phra rgyas drug po de las bcur yang 'chad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭayaḥ pañca satkāyamithyāntagrāhadṛṣṭayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang / log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiśīlavṛtaparāmarśāviti punardaśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṇṇāmanuśayānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā daśa bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas drug las lta ba rnam pa lngar byas na bcur 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrahadṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭirdṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba'i rang bzhin lnga ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang log par lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ rāgahpratidhho māno 'vidyā vicikitsā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa lnga ni 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang the tshom mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete punarete daśānuśayā abhidharme 'ṣṭānavatiḥ kriyante /<br/> kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśat ārūpyāvacarā ekatriṃśat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang chos mngon pa las phra rgyas bcu po de dag las 'dod pa na spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug dang gzugs na spyod pa sum cu rtsa gcig dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa sum cu rtsa gcig ste / dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du yang 'chad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāsato hyete 'nuśayāstraidhātukā darśanaprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas de dag ni mdor bsdu na khams gsum pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra tāvat kāmāvacarā darśanaprahātavyā dvātriṃśat /<br/> katame ta ityāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so / de dag gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśaite saptasaptāṣṭau tridvidṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag bcu dang bdun bdun brgyad / lta ba gsum gnyis ma gtogs par
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathākramaṃ prahīyante kāme duḥkhādidarśanaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa / mthong bas rim bzhin spong bar byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ete daśānuśayā uktā ete kāmadhātau daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ santi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes bya ba smos te / phra rgyas bcur bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni bcu yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ebhya eva sapta samudayadarśanapraheyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid la kun 'byung 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bdun dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta nirodhadarśanaheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ ca varjayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bdun te / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭau mārgadarśanaheyāḥ /<br/> satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ ca varjayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni brgyad de / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete kāmāvacarā dvātriṃśadanuśayā darśanaprahātavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gnyis so / de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa prahāṇāt /<br/> catvāro bhāvanāheyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa rnams mthong ba tsam gyis spong ba'i phyir ro / bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bya yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang ma rig pa dang nga rgyal dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭasatyasya paścāt mārgābhyāsena prahāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">den pa mthong bas phyis lam goms par byas pas spong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadevaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭirekaprakārā bhavati duḥkhadarśanaheyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni rnam pa gcig ste / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamantagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ mithyādṛṣṭiścatuṣprakārā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthar 'dzin par lta ba yang de dang 'dra'o / log par lta ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyā /<br/> evaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vicikitsā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlavrataparāmaṛśo dviprakāraḥ duḥkhamārgadarśanaheyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mtshog tu 'dzin pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / sdug bsngal dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ pañcaprakārāścatuḥsatyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa rnams ni rnam pa lnga ste / bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśā ete duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kīdṛśā yāvad bhāvanāheyāḥ /<br/> ye yaddarśanaheyālambanāste taddarśanaheyā avaśiṣṭā bhāvanāheyāḥ /<br/> tā eva dvādaśa dṛṣṭayo bhavanti catasro vicikitsāḥ pañca rāgāḥ pañca pratighāḥ pañca mānāṃ pañcāvidyā ityete kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /<br/> ta evāpratighāḥ punaḥ /<br/> rūpadhātau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba de dag ni ci lta bu yin / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar du ni ji lta bu yin zhe na / gang dag gang zhig mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa can de dag ni de mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la lhag ma ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / de dag la lta ba ni bcu gnyis yin no / the tshom ni bzhi yin no / 'dod chags ni lnga yin no / khong khro ba ni lnga yin no / nga rgyal ni lnga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcaprakāraṃ pratighamapahāya ta eva rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /<br/> yathā rūpadhātau /<br/> tathārūpye /<br/> ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa rnams ni lnga yin te / de ltar na phra rgyas sum cu rtsa drug po de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no / khod khrom gtogs de dag nyid / gzugs khams / khong khro ba lnga bor nas gzugs na spyod pa'i phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig po de dag nyid yin no / gzugs kyi khams na ji lta bar gzugs med pa yang de dang 'dra / phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityaṣṭānavatirmatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta evamete ṣaḍanuśayā ākāraprakāradhātubhedairaṣṭānavatirmatāḥ āmidhārmikāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na chos mngon pa dag na re phra rgyas drug po de dag rnam pa dang bye brag dang khams kyi dbye pas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya ime darśanaprahātavyānuśayā uktāḥ kimete niyataṃ darśanenaiva prahīyante /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci mthong ste spang bar bya ba'i chos phra rgyas su bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag nges par mthong ba kho nas spong ngam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ci lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgrajāḥ kṣāntivadhyā dṛggheyā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid rtse las skyes bzod pa yis / gzhom bya mthong bas spang bya nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye bhavāgrabhūmijā anvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayāste darśanaheyā eva na bhāvanāheyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa las skyes pa'i phra rgyas gang dag rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas gzhom par bya ba de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba kho na yin gyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣajāḥ /<br/> dṛgbhāvanābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag skyes mthong dang bsgom gnyis kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntivadhyā iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pas gzhom par bya ba zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāyogaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ /<br/> akṣāntivadhyā bhāvanayaiva tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa lhag ma dag na chos dang rjes su shes pas bzod pa spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas yod pa rnams ni ci rigs par 'phags pa rnams kyis ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la / so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /  / bzod pas gzhom min bsgom kho nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvāsu bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāste ubhayeṣāṃ nityaṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa thams cad na phra rgyas gang dag shes pas gzhom par bya ba yod pa de dag ni gnyi ga'i yang rtag tu bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyanta ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re phyi rol pa rnams kyis ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni spong ba kho na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāhi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināmekatyaśāśvatikānām ahetusamutpattikānāṃ ca vītarāgāṇāṃ ca kāmadhātvālambanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar las rnam par 'byed pa chen po'i mdo dang sngon gyi mtha' las rtog pa spong ba rnams las rtag par smra pa rnams dang la la rtag par smra ba rnams dang rgyu med pa las kun du 'byung bar smra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la 'dod pa'i khams las dmigs pa'i lta ba kun du 'byung bar gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhāturālambanaṃ vītarāgatvāt /<br/> tasmāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva tā aprahīṇā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa ni ma yin te / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro / de lta bas na 'dod pa dang ldan pa de dag kho na ma spangs pe yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭyutpādasamakālaṃ te parihīṇā devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de dag kyang lta ba bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du yongs su nyams pa'i phyir te / lha sbyin bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭayaḥ paṇca nāmato nirdiṣṭā na tu svabhāvatastat kastāsāṃ svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba lnga ming gi sgo nas bstan gyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas ni ma bstan pas 'di dag gi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmātmīyadruvocchedanāstihīnā gradṛṣṭayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang / me dang sman la mchog lta dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahetvamārge taddṛṣṭiretāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ /<br/> ātmadṛṣṭirātmīyadṛṣṭirvā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> sīdatīti sat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu min lam min der lta ba / de dag lta ba lnga yin no / bdag gam bdag gir lta ba ni / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o / 'jig pas na 'jig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cayaḥ kāyaḥ saṃghātaḥ skandha ityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsags pas na tshogs pa ste / mang po dang phung po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saccāyaṃ kāyaśceti satkāyaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni 'jig pa yang yin la tshogs kyang yin pas 'jig tshogs te / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nityasaṃjñāṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ ca tyājayitumevaṃ dyotitā /<br/> etatpūrvako hi teṣvātmagrahaḥ /<br/> satkāye dṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> sarvaiva sāsravālambanā dṛṣṭiḥ satkāye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtag par 'du shes pa dang ril por 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir / de skad du bshad de / de dag la bdag tu 'dzin pa ni de dag sngon du 'gro ba can yin no / 'jig tshogs la lta bas na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o / zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa thams cad kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin mod kyi / ci nas kyang 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmātmīyadṛṣṭireva tu satkāyadṛṣṭiruktā /<br/> yathā gamyeta satkāyadṛṣṭiriyaṃ nātmani nātmīye veti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gam bdag gi la ni ma yin no / zhes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bdag dang bdag gir lta ba kho na 'jig tshogs ji lta bar bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktaṃ ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam / bram ze gang la la bdag go snyam du yang dag par rjes su lta ba na yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la lta ba kho nar zad do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaivātmābhimatasya vastuno dhruvadṛṣṭirucchedadṛṣṭirvā 'ntagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po de nyid la rtag par lta ba'am / chad par lta ba ni mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāśvatocchedāntagrahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sati duḥkhādisatye nāstīti dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i bden pa yod na med do zhes bya ba ni log par lta ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaiva hi viparītasvabhāvapravṛṭtā dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ ekaiva tūktā /<br/> atiśayavattvāt durgandhakṣatavat /<br/> eṣā hyapavādikā anyāstu samāropikāḥ /<br/> hīne agradṛṣṭirdṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ /<br/> kiṃ hīnam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">log par zhugs pa'i lta ba thams cad log par lta ba yin pa las mar drang ba bzhin du ha cang chabs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir gcig kho na bshad de / 'di ni skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin la / gzhan dag ni sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin no / dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin par lta ba ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'o / dman pa yang ci zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaṃ sāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryaiḥ prahīṇatvāt /<br/> tasyāgrato grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rnams kyis spang ba'i phyir ro / de la mchog tu 'dzin pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭyādiparāmarśa iti vaktavye ādiśabdalopaḥ kṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba la sogs pa mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes brjod par bya ba'i rigs pa la sogs pa'i sgra mi mngon par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahetau hetudṛṣṭiramārge mārgadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśaḥ /<br/> tadyathā maheśvaro na heturlokānām /<br/> taṃ ca hetuṃ paśyati prajāpatimanyaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur lta ba dang lam ma yin pa la lam du lta ba ni tshul khrims dang brdul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te / 'di lta ste / dbang phyug chen po'am / skye dgu'i bdag po'am / gzhan yang rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agnijalapraveśādayaśca na hetuḥ svargasya tāṃśca hetuṃ paśyati /<br/> śīlavratamātrakaṃ sāṃkhyayogajñānādayaśca na mārgo mokṣāsya tāṃśca mārgaṃ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten rnams kyi rgyu ma yin na de la yang rgyur lta ba dang me dang chur 'jug pa la sogs pa mtho ris kyi rgyu ma yin na de dag la yang rgyur lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam dang grangs can dang rnal 'byor gyi shes pa la sogs pa thar pa'i lam ma yin na de dag la yang lam du lta ba lta bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atrāpi kilādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta ityetāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir yang sogs pa'i sgra mi mngon par byas so zhes grag go / de ltar na de dag ni lta ba lnga yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyakāraṇe kāraṇadṛṣṭiḥ śilavrataparāmarśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rgyu yin pa las rgyur lta ba tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādayaṃ na samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir kun 'byung bas mthong bas spang bar bya pa ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi kaścidīśvaraḥ prajāpatimanyaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ paśyati sa tannityamekaṃ cātmānaṃ kartāramabhiniviśya /<br/> tadyasmāt sa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la la dbang phyug gam / skye dgu'i bdag po la rgyur lta ba de ni de la rtag pa gcig pu dang bdag dang byed pa por mngon par zhen nas lta ste / de lta bas na 'di ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">īśvarādiṣu nityātmaviparyāsāt pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang phyug sogs rgyur mngon zhen pa / de ni rtag bdag phyin ci log pa yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāraṇābhiniveśo 'to duḥkhadṛggheya eva saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu 'jug pas de phyir de / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bya nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhadarśanādeva hi teṣu tau nityātmagrāhau prahīyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la rtag pa dang bdag tu 'dzin pa de gnyis ni sdug bsngal mthong ba kho nas spong bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāttatkṛto 'pi kāraṇābhiniveśastata eva prahīyate /<br/> yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva /<br/> eṣa hi śāstrapāṭhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na des byas pa rgyur mngon par zhen pa yang de nyid kyis spong bar 'gyur ro / 'o na gang me dang chur 'jug pa la sogs pas mtho ris su skye ba'am / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyis 'dag par lta ba ji lta bu yin / de yang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin te / bstan bcos las 'di skad du / gang dag skyes bu gang zag gang zhig ba lang gi tshul khrims dang rid gas kyi tshul khrims dang bya gag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas pa ste / des dag par 'gyur / grol bar 'gyur / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /<br/> akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par 'das pa yang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad du smra ba ni rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur mngon par yid ches pas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamasau duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ci'i phyir sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal la log par zhugs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣāṃ sāsravālambanānāṃ duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa thams cad sdug bsngal la log par zhugs pa'i phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśo vā 'nyaḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśo mārgedarśanaprahātvyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa la mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzhan ji lta bu zhig yong [*yod?]
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo mārgadarśanaprahātavyālambanaḥ /<br/> so 'pi hi nāma duḥkhe vipratipannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa'o / de yang sdug bsngal la logs par zhugs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gang la lam la dmigs pa log par lta ba'am / the tshom yod pa de thar pa'i lam med do zhes lta ba'am / the tshom za ba na ji ltar dpe dag par yid ches par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te thar pa'i lam gzhan mchog tu bzung nas 'di ni thar pa yin gyi lam ni med do zhes smra'o zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti /<br/> tasyāpyasau mārgadarśanaprahātavyālambano na sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang gzhan de kho nas dag par yid ches kyi log par lta ba de ni ma yin pas de'i de yang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba la dmigs par mi 'grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ /<br/> tasmāt parīkṣya eṣo 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gang zhig kun 'byung dang 'gog pa mthong pas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i log par lta bas yang dag par yid ches par 'gyur ba de yang / ci'i phyir de dag mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin / de lta bas na don 'di ni rtag par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ nityātmaviparyāsāditi /<br/> kimetāveva dvau viparyāsau /<br/> catvāro viparyāsāḥ /<br/> anitye nityamiti /<br/> duḥkhe sukhamiti /<br/> aśucau śucīti /<br/> anātmanyātmeti /<br/> athaitadviparyāsacatuṣkaṃ kiṃsvabhāvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag rtag phyin ci log pa yis / zhes gang bshad pa / ci phyin ci log de gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na / phyin ci log ni bzhi ste / mi rtag pa la rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la bde ba dang mi gcang ba la gtsang ba dang bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pa'o / yang phyin ci log bzhi chan 'di'i rang bzhin ci zhe na / lta ba gsum las phyin ci log / bzhi tshan / mthar 'dzin par lta ba las rtag par lta ba ni / rtag par ni phyin ci log go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭitrayādviparyāsacatuṣkaṃ /<br/> antagrāhadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭirnityaviparyāsaḥ /<br/> dṛṣṭiparāmarśātsukhaśuciviparyāsau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa las ni bde ba dang gtsang bar phyin ci log go / 'jig tshogs su lta ba las ni bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log go / gzhan dag na re thams cad yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyadṛṣṭerātmadṛṣṭirātmaviparyāsaḥ /<br/> sakaletyapare /<br/> kathamātmīyadṛṣṭirviparyāsaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ ca na viparyāsaḥ /<br/> viparyāsasūtrād
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci ltar na bdag gir lta ba phyin ci log ma yin / ci ltar na phyin ci log ma yin / phyin ci log gi mdo las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / de las ni bdag kho na dbang byed par lta ba na / bdag gir lta bar 'gyur bar bshad pa yin pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt /<br/> mayā mahyamityetadapi syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu lta ba 'di nyid sgo gnyis pa can yin no / 'on te bdag ces bya ba 'di las bdag gi zhes bya ba lta pa gzhan zhig yin na ni bdag gis zhes bya ba dang bdag gi phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādanye kleśā na viparyāsāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa gzhan dag phyin ci log ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāt tribhiḥ kāraṇairviparyāsānāṃ vyavasthānam katamaistribhiḥ /<br/> vīparītataḥ /<br/> nitīraṇāt samāropāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar rgyu gsum gyis rten phyin ci log rnam par bzhag ste / gsum gang zhe na / phyin ci log phyir dang nges rtog phyir dang sgro 'dogs phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekāntaviparyastatvādālambane nitīrakatvātsamāropaṇācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa la gcig tu phyin ci log pa'i phyir dang nges par rtog pa'i phyir dang sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ucchedadṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiśca na samāropike /<br/> abhāvamukhapravṛttatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chad par lta ba dang log par lta ba ni med pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir dang sgro 'dogs par byed pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlavrataparāmarśo naikāntaviparyastastanmātraśuddhyālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ni de tsam zhig gis / 'dag par dmigs pa'i phyir gcig tu phyin ci log pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa gzhan dag ni des par rtog par byed pa ma yin pas de'i phyir phyin ci log dag ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtre ukta manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log pa zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭirevātra viparyāsaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni lta ba kho na phyin ci log yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñācitte tu tadvaśāt /<br/> dṛṣṭiviparyāsavaśādeva tatsaṃprayukte saṃjñācitte viparyāsāvuktau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems dang 'du shes de'i dbang gis lta ba phyin ci log gi dbang gis de dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log tu bshad do
