</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanādayo 'pi kasmānnoktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la sogs pa yang ci'i phyir ma bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokaprasiddhyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten na grags pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten na ni 'du shes phyin ci log / sems phyin ci log ces grags kyi tshor ba phyin ci log ces ni ma grags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti /<br/> darśanapraheyatvāt dṛṣṭīnāṃ sasaṃprayogāṇām /<br/> dvādaśa viparyāsāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyin ci log de dag thams cad kyang / rgyun du zhugs pas spang ba yin te / lta ba mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anitye nityamiti saṃjñādṛṣṭicittaviparyāsāstrayaḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvadanātmanyātmeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde pa gzhan dag na re mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam pa'i 'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gsum nas de bzhin du bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa'i bar gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāṣṭau darśanaprahātavyāścatvāro bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ /<br/> duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyin ci log ni bcu gnyis yin no / de la brgyad ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no / sdug bsngal ba dang mi gtsang ba la 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log pa bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti /<br/> tadetannecchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na bde ba dang gtsang ba'i 'du shes dag mid par ji ltar na / 'phags pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyes par 'gyur zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi sukhaśucisaṃjñācittasamudācārādāryasya tadviparyāsāvīkṣyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod de gal te 'phags pa la bde ba dang gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang sems kun du 'byung ba dang de dag gi phyin ci log dag tu 'dod na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sattvasaṃjñācittasamudācārāttadviparyāsāvapi kiṃ neṣyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can gyi 'du shes dang sems kun du 'byung bas de dag gi phyin ci log dag tu yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bud med dang bdag la sems can du 'du shes pa med par mi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye bar rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre 'pi coktaṃ yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /<br/> yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata iti vistaraḥ /<br/> tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat /<br/> yattarhi sthavirānandenārthaṃ vāgīśamadhikṛtyoktaṃ /<br/> viparyāse ca saṃjñānāṃ cittaṃ te paridahyate /<br/> nimittaṃ varjyatāṃ tasmācchubhaṃ rāgopasaṃhitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las kyang 'di ltar 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas / de'i tshe de'i mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log pa gang yin pa de spong bar byed do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so / de lta bas na lta bas kun nas bslang ba'i 'du shes dang sems kho na phyin ci log yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te / de'i dus su 'khrul pa tsam yin pa'i phyir mgal me'i 'khor lo dang ri mo'i gnod sbyin la 'khrul pa bzhin no zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re 'o na gnas brtan kun dga' bos / 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug gi dbang du byas nas / 'du shes phyin ci log pa yis / khyod kyi sems ni yongs su gdung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare /<br/> te 'pi cāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtaparijñānāt prahīyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gang smras pa ji lta bu / de'i phyir slob pas 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log brgyad po thams cad ma spangs pa kho na'o / de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pas spang bar 'gyur gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vinā tenetyupāyasamā khyānānnāsti sūtravirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de med par ni ma yin no zhes thabs yang dag par bstan pa yin pa'i phyir mdo dang 'gal ba med do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /<br/> mānasyāpyasti /<br/> kathamityāha /<br/> sapta mānāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji lta ba'i phra rgyas kho na la dbye ba yod kyi gzhan la med dam zhe na / nga rgyal la yang yod de / ji lta zhe na / nga rgyal bdun / zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">māno 'timāno mānātimāno 'smimāno 'bhimāna ūnamāno mithyāmānaśca /<br/> abhedena cittasyonnatirmāna uktāḥ /<br/> sa pravṛttibhedāt saptadhā bhavati /<br/> hīnādviśiṣṭaḥ samena vā samo 'smīti manyamānasyonnatirmānaḥ /<br/> samādviśiṣṭo 'smītyabhimānaḥ /<br/> viśiṣṭādviśiṣṭo 'smīti mānātimānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal lo / bye brag med par sems khengs pa la nga rgyal zhes bshad do / de la 'jug pa'i bye brag las ni rnam pa bdun yin te / chung ngu bas bdag khyad par du 'phags pa'am / mnyam pa dang mnyam mo snyam du sems khengs pa ni nga rgyal lo / mnyam pa bas bdag khyad par du 'phags so snyam pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal lo / khyad par du 'phags pa bas kyang bdag khyad par du 'phags so snyam pa ni nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcopādānaskandhānātmata ātmīyato vā manyamānasyāsmimānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bdag gam bdag gis sems pa ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aprāpte viśeṣādhigame prāpto mayetyabhimānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyad par thob par bya ba ma thob par bdag gis thob po snyam pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahvantaraviśiṣṭādalpāntarahīno 'smītyūnamānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ches khyad par du 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad cig gis dman no snyam pa ni cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aguṇavato guṇavānasmīti mithyāmānaḥ /<br/> yattarhi śāstre nava mānavidhā uktāḥ /<br/> śreyānasmīti mānavidhā /<br/> sadṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā /<br/> hīno 'smīti mānavidhā /<br/> asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ /<br/> nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna iti /<br/> ebhya eva mānebhya etāḥ /<br/> navavidhāstribhyaḥ /<br/> katamebhyastribhyaḥ mānātimānonamānebhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yon tan ma yin pa dang ldan pa la bdag yon tan dang ldan no snyam pa ni log pa'i nga rgyal lo / 'o na bstan bcos las nga rgyal rnam pa dgu ste / bdag mchog yin no snyam pa nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag dang 'dra'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag dman no snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag pas mchog yod do / bdag dang mnyam pa yod do / bdag pas dman pa yod do / bdag pas mchog med do / bdag dang mnyam pa med do / bdag pas dman pa med do snyam pa nga rgyal gyi rnam pa zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na / rnam pa dgu pa de dag ni gsum po 'di dag nyid las byung ba ste / gsum gang las she na / nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra prathamaṃ trayaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃniśritāstrayo mānāḥ /<br/> atimānamānonamānāḥ /<br/> dvitīyaṃ trayamūnamānamānātimānāḥ /<br/> tṛtīyaṃ trayaṃ mānātimānonamānāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dang po'i gsum ni lta ba la brten pa'i nga rgyal gsum ste / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal rnams so / gnyis pa'i gsum ni cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnams so / gsum pa'i gsum ni nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yuktastāvad bahvantaraviśiṣṭādalpāntarahīno 'smītyūnamāna unnatisthānatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ches khyad par du 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad cig gis dman no snyam pa ni sems khengs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal du rigs na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag pas dman pa med do snyam pa 'di la go khengs pa'i gnas ci zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate /<br/> api cāstyeva jñānaprasthānavihito vidhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can gyi tshogs dam pa'i nang na bdag nyid dman yang tha gi'o snyam du sems pa de lta bu de yod do / gzhan yang 'di ni ye shes la 'jug pa las bshad pa'i lugs yin gyi rab tu byed pa las bstan pa yongs su bzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag mchog yin no snyam pa 'di ni dman pa dang mnyam pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa la ltos nas nga rgyal yang yin la / lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang yin / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaite sapta mānāḥ kiṃprahātavyā ityāha /<br/> dṛgbhāvanākṣyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na nga rgyal bdun po 'di dag ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na / smras pa / mthong dang bsgom pas zad bya ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛgbhāvanābhyāmeṣāṃ kṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dag gis zad par bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati /<br/> nāvaśyaṃ tadyathā /<br/> vadhādiparyavasthānaṃ heyaṃ bhāvanayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas 'di skad du thams cad mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro / ci 'phags pa rnams bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma spangs pa gang yin pa de kun du spyod dam zhe na / nges pa med de 'di ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni / gsod sogs kun nas dkris pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt /<br/> tathā /<br/> vibhavecchā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gi ched du bsams te / srog chags kyi srog gcod par byed pha nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de ni bsgos pas spang bar bya ba yin te bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / de bzhin 'jig sred
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vibhavatṛṣṇā 'pi bhāvanāheyā /<br/> vibhavo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig pa'i sred pa yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no / 'jig pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traidhātukī anityatā /<br/> tatra prarthanā vibhavatṛṣṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa'i mi rtag pa ste / de la don du gnyer ba ni 'jig pa'i sred pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāśabdena bhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśo gṛhyate /<br/> aho vatāhamairāvaṇaḥ syāṃ nāgarāja ityevamādi /<br/> mānavidhā api bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ santītyuktamasmimamānaśca /<br/> na cāryasya saṃbhavanti vidhādayaḥ /<br/> nāsmitā /<br/> ādigrahaṇena yāvadvibhavatṛṣṇāyā grahaṇam /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇamaprahīṇā apyete na samudācaranti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras ni skye ba'i sred pa'i phyogs bdag ni glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bur gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bzung ngo / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa rnams kyang yod do zhes bshad la / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yang yod mod kyi / 'phags pa la / rnam sogs pa'o snyam mi 'byung / sogs pa smos pas ni 'jig pa'i sred pa'i bar du bzung ngo / ci'i phyir de dag ma spangs kyang mi 'byung zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta bas rgyas par 'gyur phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyadṛṣṭipuṣṭā hi mānavidhā asmimānaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nga rgyal gyi rnam pa rnams dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato bhagnapṛṣṭhatvāt notthātum punarutsahante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rked pa bcag pa'i phyir yang ldan par mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vadhādiparyavasthānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsod pa la sogs pa'i kun nas dkris pa ni log par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vibhavatṛṣṇā uccheddṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig pa'i sred pa ni chad par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśaḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i srid pa'i phyogs ni rtag par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaukṛtyaṃ nāpi cāśubham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi dge ba'i 'gyod pa'am ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akukśalaṃ cāpi kaukṛtyaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyam /<br/> na cāryasya tatsaṃbhavati vicikitsā samutthitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyod pa mi dge ba yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin na 'phags pa la ni mi 'byung ste / de the tshom gyis kun nas bslang ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ kati sarvatragāḥ katyasarvatragāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni kun du 'gro ba dag yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatragā duḥkhahetudṛggheyā dṛṣṭayastathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">du ni kun du 'gro ba ma yin zhe na / sdug bsngal rgyu mthong spang bya ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta dang de bzhin the tshom dang gang de lhan cig ma 'dres pa'i / ma rig gang yin kun du 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i lta ba rnams dang the tshom dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ma rig pa ma 'dres pa kho na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itīme ekādaśānuśayāḥ sabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ /<br/> sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na lta ba bdun dang the tshom gnyis dang ma rig pa gnyis dang phra rgyas bcu gcig po de dag ni rang gi khams mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir / skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimebhiryugapadālambate āhosvit krameṇa /<br/> yadi krameṇa anyeṣāmapi prasaṅga
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci re zhig rim gyis sam 'on te cig car yang dmigs gal te rim gyis na ni gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ /<br/> sakalaṃ nocyate sakalaṃ yugapadālambanta iti /<br/> api tu pañcaprakāramapi sarvaṃ yugapat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te cig car ro zhe na ni / su zhig 'dod pa'i khams mtha' dag gis 'dag par yid ches par 'gyur ba'am / mtha' dag rgyu ma yin pa las rgyur yid ches par 'gyur / mtha' dag la ni cig car du dmigs so zhes ni mi zer ro / 'on kyang rnam pa lnga po thams cad kyang cig car du dmigs so / de lta na yang gang la bdag tu lta ba yod pa de la bdag la sred pa yod la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la mchog dang dag par lta ba yod pa de la de'i don du gnyer ba yod cing / des kyang nga rgyal du 'gyur bas sred pa dang nga rgyal dag kyang rung kun du 'gro ba yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sati darśanabhāvanāheyālambanatvādetadubhayaṃ kiṃprahātavyaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta yin na de gnyi ga mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ vyāmiśrālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dren ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā punarastu darśanaprahātavyaṃ dṛṣṭibalādhānavartitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na lta ba'i stobs bskyed pas bcu pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svalakṣaṇakleśāvetau na sāmānyakleśau /<br/> tasmānna sarvatragāviti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re nyon mongs pa 'di gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa spyi pa 'di ni ma yin te / de lta bas na kun tu 'gro ba dag ma yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">va ete sabhāgadhātusarvatragā ekādaśānuśayā uktāḥ /<br/> navodhrvālambanā eṣāṃ dṛṣṭidvayavivarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag tu phra rgyas bcu gcig bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag las dgu gang du dmigs / lta ba gnyis po ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ ca varjayitvā 'nye navānuśayā visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ /<br/> kadācittu visabhāgamekaṃ dhātumālambante kadācit dvau /<br/> ye 'nuśayāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba las ma gtogs pa phra rgyas gzhan dgu ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag yin no / res 'ga' ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams gcig la dmigs so / res 'ga' ni gnyis la dmigs te / 'dod pa dang ldan pa gzugs dang ldan pa la dmigs pa rnams la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā iti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa dang ldan pa la dmigs pa rnams dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa gzugs med pa dang ldan pa la dmigs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa tshangs pa la sems can du lta ba dang rtag par lta ba skyed par byed pa de'i tshe ji ltar 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta bskal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmātmīyatvenāgrahaṇādantagrāhadṛṣṭiśca tatsamutthitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag dang bdag gir mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang mthar 'dzin par lta pa yang des kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kā tarhīyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na 'di lta ba gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">neyaṃ dṛṣṭirmithyājñānaṃ punaḥ etadityābhidhārmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa pa rnams na re 'di ni lta ba ma yin gyi 'di ni log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ /<br/> kiṃ khalvanuśayāḥ eva sarvatragāḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye'pyebhiste 'pi sarvagāḥ /<br/> sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam /<br/> aneka phalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de la dmigs pa gzhan dag ni lta ba yin gyi 'di ni lta ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na / grub pa'i mtha' ni tshad mar bya dgos so / yang ci phra rgyas kho na kun du 'gro ba dag yin nam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin te / de dag dang ni lhan cig gang / 'byung de 'ang kun 'gro thob ma gtogs / chos gzhan phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams dang lhan cig 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang kun du 'gro ba yin no / thob pa rnams ni 'bras bu du ma'i phyir de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba dag yin la phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba'i rgyus rgyu ma yin pa dag kyang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamā koṭiranāgatāḥ sarvatragā anuśayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu dang po 'di ma 'ongs pa'i phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā 'tītapratyupannāstatsahabhuvaḥ /<br/> tṛtīyācatuthau yojye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i lhan cig 'byung ba rnams so / gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag ni sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ kati sāsravālambanāḥ katyanāsravālambanāḥ /<br/> mithyādṛgvimatī tābhyāṃ yuktā 'vidyā 'tha kevalā /<br/> nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ ṣaḍanāsravagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa dag yin no / du ni zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag yin zhe na / 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya ba / log lta the tshom de dag dang / ldan dang 'ba' zhig ma rig pa / drug ni zag med spyod yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā ’ 'veṇikī ca /<br/> mārgadarśanaprahātavyā apyeta eva trayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%"> / 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas gsum po log par lta ba dang the tshom dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang ma 'dres pa'i ma rig pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang gsum po de dag nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityete ṣaḍanāsravālambanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na drug po de dag ni zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣāṃ sāsravālambanā iti siddham /<br/> tatra punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub po / de la yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmyuparamo mārgaḥ ṣaḍbhūminavabhūmikaḥ /<br/> tadgocarāṇāṃ viṣayo mārgo hyanyo 'nyahetukaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa dang / lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pas / sa drug sa dgu'i lam ni de'o / spyod yul can gyi yul yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa la dmigs pa log par lta ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa ni rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa kho na yin te / 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi kho na yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i pa rnams kyi bar du yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i kho na yin no / lam la dmigs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa drug gi chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pi rūpārūpyapratipakṣaḥ rūpārupyāvacarāṇāmapyadṛṣṭabhūmikānāṃ navabhūmikaḥ /<br/> sa evānvayajñānapakṣyo mārga ālambanaṃ mārgasyānyo 'nyahetukatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po yang yin no / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pas brgyad po rnams kyi dmigs pa yangs dgu pa'i rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin te / lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti /<br/> na kāmāvacarā mārgālambanā anvayajñānapakṣānālambante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dag kyang phan tshun rgyu yin mod kyi rjes su shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po ni ma yin pas lam la dmigs pas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam la ni mi dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmajñānaṃ tarhi rūpārūpyapratipakṣatvāttadbhūmikānāṃ mārgalambanānāmālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni chos shes pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po yin pa nyid kyi phyir lam la dmigs pa de'i sa pa rnams kyi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tat sakalaṃ pratipakṣo duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayoratatpratipakṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa dag de dag gi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir dang mtha' dag kyang gnyen po ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpi sakalayo rūpārūpyayyordarśanaprahātavyānāmapratipakṣatvādityādyābhāvānna bhavatyālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa mtha' dag gi yang ma yin te / de lta bas na dang po med pa'i phyir dang dang po rnams kyi ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmādrāgapratighamānā dṛṣṭiśīlavṛataparāmarśau cānāsravālambanā neṣyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dag zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag tu mi 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na rāgastasya varjyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags ni spang bar bya ba yin na gal te zag pa med pa la dmigs pa yin na go spang bar bya ba ma yin par 'gyur te / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na dveṣo 'napakārataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod mi byed phyir zhe sdang min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apakāravastuni hi pratigha utpadyate /<br/> na caivaṃ nirodhamāgauṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod par byed pa'i dngos po la ni khong khro ba skye na 'gog pa dang lam dang ni de lta ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhi dang dag dang mchog gyur phyir / nga rgyal ma yin mchog 'dzin min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhamārgayoḥ śāntatvānna tābhyāmunnatirbhavitumarhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang lam dag ni zhi ba yin pa'i phyir de dag gis khengs par 'gyur ba 'ongs ba yang ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtārthaśuddhitvānna tayoḥ śuddhigrāhaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ /<br/> agrau ca tau /<br/> hīne cāgragrāho dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa'i don du dag pa yin pa'i phyir de gnyis la dag par 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yang ma yin no / dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na de gnyis ni mchog kyang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādayuktameṣāmanāsravālambanatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de dag gi dmigs pa zag pa med pa yin par rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ katyālambanato 'nuśerate kati saṃprayogata eva /<br/> sarvatragā anuśayāḥ sakalāmanuśerate /<br/> svabhūmimālambanataḥ svanikāyamasarvagāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur / du ni mtshungs par ldan pa kho na'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur zhe na / phra rgyas kun du 'gro rnams ni / dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa / thams cad du ni rgyas par 'gyur / kun 'gro ma yin rang ris so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas gang dag kun du 'gro ba de dag ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa pa'i rnam pa lnga po thams cad la yang rgyas par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad du ni 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sar rang gi ris kho na la rgyas par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyameva nikāyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ris kho na la rgyas par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvadbhāvanāprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyameva nānyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na la rgyas pa'i bar du 'gyur gyi / gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyir btang bar byas nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānāsravordhvaviṣayāḥ /<br/> anāsravālambanā anuśayā naivālambanato 'nuśerate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med gong ma'i yul can min / zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i phra rgyas rnams ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par mi 'gyur ba kho na yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpyūrdhvabhūmyālambanāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> tadālambanasya vastunaḥ /<br/> asvīkārādvipakṣataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa gong ma la dmigs pa rnams kyang ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / de dag gi dmigs pa'i dngos po ni / bdag gir ma byas gnyen po'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante /<br/> ārdra iva paṭe rajāṃsi saṃsthātum /<br/> na caivamanāsravā nāpyevamūrdhvā bhūmiḥ /<br/> ato na tadālambanāsteṣvanuśerate /<br/> yastvihasthastāṃ bhūmiṃ prārthayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po gang zhig bdag tu lta ba dang sred pa dag gis bdag gir byas pa de la phra rgyas gzhan dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur bar nus te / snam bu gsher ba la rdul chags pa bzhin no / zag pa med pa yang de lta ma yin la / sa 'og ma la yang ma yin pas de'i phyir de dag la dmigs pa rnams ni de dag la rgyas par mi 'gyur ro / gang zhig 'di na gnas pa las de don du gnyer bar byed pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām /<br/> ato na teṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ labhante /<br/> tapta ivopale talāni pādānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam ni de dag la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa yin la / sa gong ma yang 'og ma rnams kyi gnyen po yin pas de'i phyir yang de dag tu gnas mi mthong ste / rdo bsreg pa la rkang mthil dag gi gnas mi mthong ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānuguṇyārtho 'trānuśayārthaḥ /<br/> na ca te tadanuguṇā ityapare /<br/> vātikasya rukṣānanuśayanavat /<br/> ata uktā ālambanato 'nuśerate /<br/> yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ /<br/> anuśareta iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re phra rgyas kyi don ni rjes su mthun pa'i don yin de dag ni de rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa ma yin te / rlung nad can la kha zas rtsub po rgyas par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro / dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bshad zin to / gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa / de ni der mtshungs ldan sgo nas / rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'nuśayo yena dharmeṇa saṃprayuktastasmin saṃprayogato 'nuśete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas gang zhig chos gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni der mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvadaprahīṇa iti viśeṣaṇārthastuśabdaḥ /<br/> syuranuśayā nānāsravālambanā na visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ /<br/> te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ /<br/> eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ katyakuśalāḥ katyavyākṛtāḥ /<br/> ūrdhvamavyākṛtāḥ sarve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ji srid du ma spangs ba zhes bya ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir ro / zag pa med pa la dmigs pa de dag kyang ma yin skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun tu 'gro ba dag kyang ma yin la / phra rgyas de dag kyang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur gyi dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin pa'i phra rgyas dag lta yod dam zhe na / yod de / skal pa mi mnyam pa'i sa la kun du 'gro ba'i phra rgyas rnams so / phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni mi dge ba yin / du ni lung du ma bstan pa yin zhe na / gong ma thams cad lung ma bstan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārupyāvacarāstāvatsarva evāvyākṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ syāt /<br/> tacca tayoirnāsti paravyābādhahetvabhāvāt /<br/> kāme satkāyadarśanam /<br/> antagrāhaḥ sahābhyāṃ ca mohaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal yin na de yang de gnyis na med de / pha rol po la yang gnod pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro / 'dod na 'jig tshogs lta ba dang / mthar 'dzin lhan cig ma rig pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī tatsaṃprayuktā cāvidyā avyākṛtāḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> dānādibhiraviruddhatvāt /<br/> ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati /<br/> ucchedadṛṣṭirapi mokṣānukūlā /<br/> ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatīti /<br/> api cānayordṛṣṭyoḥ svadravyasaṃmūḍhatvādaparapīḍāpravṛttatvācca /<br/> svargatṛṣṇā 'smimānayorapyevaṃ prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiravyākṛtā /<br/> yā mṛgapakṣiṇāmapi varttate /<br/> vikalpitā tvakuśaleti pūrvācāryāḥ /<br/> śeṣastvihāśubhāḥ /<br/> śeṣās tvaśubhā anuśayāḥ kāmadhātāvakuśalāḥ /<br/> katyakuśalamūlāni kati na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa lung du ma bstan pa yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / sbyin pa la sogs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir dang bdag 'jig rten pha rol du bde bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sbyin par byed / tshul khrims srung bar byed do / chad par lta ba yang thar ba'i rjes su mthun pa dag yin te / de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis / phyi rol pa'i lta bar gyur pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste / bdag med par gyur cig / bdag gi med par gyur cig / bdag 'byung bar ma gyur cig / bdag gi 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i lta ba 'di mchog yin no zhes gsungs so / gzhan yang lta ba 'di gnyis ni rang gi rdzas la kun du rmongs pa'i phyir dang pha rol po la gnod pa'i rnam par zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / mtho ris la sred pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag kyang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re / lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri dags dang bya rnams la yang yod pa gang yin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no / rnam par brtag pa ni mi dge ba yin no zhes zer ro / lhag ma rnams 'dir mi dge ba'o / phra rgyas lhag ma rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams na mi dge ba dag yin no / du ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin / du ni ma yin zhe na / 'dod na 'dod chags khong khro dang / rmongs rnams mi dge'i rtsa ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme 'kuśalamūlāni rāgapratighamūḍhayaḥ /<br/> kāmadhātau sarvarāgaḥ sarvapratighaḥ sarvo moho 'nyatra satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktādyathākramam /<br/> trīṇyakuśalamūlāni /<br/> lobho 'kuśalamūlaṃ dveṣo moho 'kuśalamūlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na 'dod chags thams cad dang khong khro ba thams cad dang 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa'i rmongs pa thams cad ni go rims bzhin du mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa chags pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang zhe sdang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang gti mug mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddhyakuśalaṃ cākuśalasya ca mūlaṃ tadevākuśalamūlamiṣṭam /<br/> śeṣā anuśayā nākuśalamūlānīti siddham /<br/> katyavyākṛtamūlāni kati na /<br/> trīṇyavyākṛta mūlāni /<br/> katamāni trīṇi /<br/> tṛṣṇā 'vidyā matiśca sā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig mi dge ba yang yin la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yin pa de kho na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin par 'dod do / phra rgyas lhag ma rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / du ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba dag yin / du ni ma yin zhe na / lung ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba gsum / gsum po gang dag ce na / de ni sred dang ma rig blo / de zhes bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa yin par ston te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha che ba rnams na re sred pa dang ma rig pa dang shes rab tha na rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang rung ste / gang cung zad lung du ma bstan pa de thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa de rtsa ba dag kyang yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvaidhordhvavṛtternāto 'nyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam gnyis mthor 'jug phyir de las / gzhan min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicikitsā kila dvaidhavṛtterna mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">the tshom ni rnam pa gnyis nyid du 'jug pa'i phyir rtsa bar 'ong ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">calatvāt /<br/> unnatilakṣaṇenordhvavṛtterna māno mūlam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">g yo ba'i phyir ro / nga rgyal ni khengs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mthon por 'jug pa'i phyir ma yin te / rtsa ba dang chos mi mthun pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti /<br/> catvāryeveti bāhyakāḥ /<br/> bāhyakā ścatvāryavyākṛtamūlānīcchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten na rtsa ba rnams ni brtan pa dang 'og na gnas pa dag yin par mthong ngo zhes grag go / bzhi zhes nyi 'og pa / nyi 'og pa rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba bzhir 'dod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇādṛṅ mānamohāste
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag sred lta nga rgyal rmongs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ityavyākṛtā iti darśayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ces bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya bar ston te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyākṛtā tṛṣṇā dṛṣṭirmāno 'vidyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung du ma bstan pa'i sred pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇametānyavyākṛtamūlānīcchanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir de dag kho na lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba rnams su 'dod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyāyitritvādavidyayā /<br/> yasmāttrayo dhyāyinaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan pa gsum ma rig las / 'di ltar bsam gtan pa ni gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇādṛṣṭimānottaradhyāyinaḥ /<br/> te cāvidyāvaśādbhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sred pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dag yin la / de dag kyang ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi gsungs pa ci de dag lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir yin nam / smras pa ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthāpanīyaḥ praśno 'vyākṛta ityuktam /<br/> caturvidho hi praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhag par bya ba'i dri ba la lung du ma bstan pa zhes bshad do / 'dri ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyo vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ paripṛcchayya vyākaraṇīyaḥ sthāpanīyaśca /<br/> tatra yathākramaṃ veditavyam /<br/> ekāṃśato vyākaraṇaṃ vibhajya paripṛcchaya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba dang rnam par phye nas lung bstan par bya ba dang / dris nas lung bstan par bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba'o / de la go rims bzhin du / mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthāpyaṃ ca maraṇotpatti viśiṣṭātmā 'nyatādivat /<br/> kiṃ sarvasattvā mariṣyantītyekāṃśena vyākarttavyaṃ mariṣyantīti /<br/> kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri dang gzhag par lung bstan pa / 'chi dang skye dang khyad par 'phags / bdag gzhan la sogs lta bu yin / bar rig par bya ste / ci sems can thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri na / 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o / ci sems can thams cad skye bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri na / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni skye bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa med pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam /<br/> kānadhikṛtya praśnayasīti /<br/> yadi brūyād devāniti /<br/> hīna iti vyākarttavyam /<br/> atha brūyādapāyāniti /<br/> viśiṣṭa iti vyākarttavyam /<br/> kimanyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ sattvo 'nanya iti sthāpanīyaḥ /<br/> sattvadravyasyābhāvāt vandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat /<br/> kathametadvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati avyākṛtametaditi /<br/> evaṃ vyākaraṇāt /<br/> apara āha /<br/> idamapyekāṃśavyākaraṇaṃ yanna sarve janiṣyanta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci mi 'di khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam dman pa yin zhes 'dri na / gang las ltos te 'dri zhes dris nas lung bstan par bya ste / gal te lha rnams la ltos te'o zhes zer na ni dman no zhes lung bstan par bya'o / 'on te ngan song rnams las ltos te'o zhes zer na ni khyad par du 'phags so zhes lung bstan par bya'o / ci phung po rnams las sems can gzhan nam gzhan ma yin zhes 'dri na / sems can gyi rdzas med pa'i phyir gzhag par bya ste / mo gsham gyi bu sngo bsangs sam dkar sham zhes bya ba bzhin no / 'di ji ltar na lung ma bstan pa yin zhe na / de ni lung ma bstan no zhes de lta bur lung du bstan pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re thams cad skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig ci gang dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag skye bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri ba de la ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi la yang dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa gnyi ga yod de / ltos pa yin pas mgo gcig tu gnyis kar lung bstan par bya dgos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na rnam par shes pa ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin pa bzhin no / gcig tu 'dri ba la gcig tu lung bstan du mi rung bas rnam par phye ste lung bstan par rigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhebhyo 'nyaḥ sattva ityetadavyākṛtameva /<br/> na cāvyākaraṇameva vyākaraṇaṃ yujyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po dag las sems can gzhan nam zhes 'dri ba 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin te / lung du ma bstan pa kho na ni lung bstan par mi rung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu sthāpanīyaḥ praśnaḥ sthāpanīyatvena vyākriyate /<br/> kathaṃ na vyākṛto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang yin pa gzhag par bya ba nyid du lung ston pa de ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābhidharmikā āhuḥ /<br/> tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ rūpamanityaṃ yāvadvijñāna duḥkhaprajñaptiryāvanmārgaprajñaptirekāṃśena vyākarttavyamarthopasaṃhitatvāt /<br/> vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti /<br/> yadi brū yādatītāniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa rnams na re bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de'i legs par bshad pa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa dang gzugs mi rtag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gdags pa nas lam gdags pa'i bar ni don dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir / mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o / rnam par phye ste lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ni gal te 'ga' zhig chos dag smros shig ces zer na / de la 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang da ltar byung ba dag dang chos mang po zhig yod na gang dag smra bar bya zhes brjod par bya'o / gal te 'das pa dag smros shig ces zer na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'das pa rnams la yang gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mang du yod na zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaṃ brūyādrūpamiti /<br/> sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gzugs smros shig ces zer na / gzugs la yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnam pa gsum yod na zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyāha kuśalamiti /<br/> tadapi saptaprakāraṃ prāṇātipātādviratiryāvatsaṃbhinnapralāpāditi /<br/> yadyāha prāṇātipātādviratimiti /<br/> sā 'pi triprakārā alobhajā 'dveṣajā 'mohajā /<br/> yadyāhālobhajāmiti /<br/> alobhajā 'pi dvividhā vijñāptyavijñaptibhedādityevaṃ vibhajya vaktavyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dge ba smros shig ces zer na / de la yang srog gcod pa spong ba nas tshig kyal pa las spong ba'i bar du rnam pa bdun yod do zhes brjod par bya'o / gal te srog gcod pa las spong ba smros shig zer na / de la yang ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa las skyes pa dang rnam pa gsum yod la ma chags pa las skyes pa la yang rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis yod na zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa rnam par phye ste brjod par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadeva ca śaṭhasya paripṛcchya vyākaraṇam /<br/> tasya vaktavyaṃ dharmā bahava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">g yon can gyi 'dri ba la lung bstan pa yang de nyid yin te / de la ni chos mang po zhig yod na zhes brjod par bya'i rnam par dbye bar ni mi bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti /<br/> yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam /<br/> yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cang mi smra ba'am / bdag nyid lung ston du gzhug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes zer ro / gang gi tshe de gnyis cung zad kyang mi 'dra ba'i gsol ba 'debs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad la / de gnyis la yang cung zad kyang lung mi ston gyi 'dri ba 'ba' zhig zad na de ji ltar na de gnyis kyi 'dri ba yin / ji ltar na lung du ston pa yin / gang zhig lam smros shig ces zer na / ci des lam ma dris pa yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati /<br/> sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri ba nyid kyis de lung bstan pa'i phyir ji ltar dris nas lung bstan pa ma yin / gzhag par bya ba ni dper na 'jig rten mtha' yod pa zhig gam / mtha' med pa zhig ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o / dri ba lung bstan pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di ni mdo kho na las blta bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhadantamahāsāṅghikāḥ sūtraṃ paṭhanti /<br/> catvārīmāni bhikṣavaḥ praśnavyākaraṇānīti /<br/> katamāni catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">btsun pa dge 'dun phal chen sde pa rnams dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni / dri ba lung du bstan pa dag yin te / bzhi gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung du bstan par bya ba'i dri ba yang yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti yāvat sthāpanīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhag par bya ba'i bar du yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa yin nam zhes 'dri ba 'di ni / dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamaśca bhikṣavo vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag rnam par phye ste / lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /<br/> katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ paripṛcchyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ched du bsam par bya ba'i las byas nas ci zhig so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur zhe na / 'dri ba 'di ni dge slong dag mgo rnam par phye ste / lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba yin no / dge slong dag dris nas lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti /<br/> sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du shes skyes bu bdag nyid yin nam / 'on te 'du shes kyang gzhan zhig la / bdag kyang gzhan zhig yin zhes dris na / tshe dang ldan pa bdag gang yin par yid ches zhes 'dri bar bya'o / gal te 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis ni rig pa bdag yin par shes so zhes zer na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta yin na 'di skad du 'du shes kyang gzhan la bdag kyang gzhan yin no zhes brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ hi paripṛcchya vyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni dge slong dag dris nas lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśnaḥ /<br/> tadyathā śāśvato loko 'śāśvataḥ /<br/> śāśvataścāśāśvataśca /<br/> naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataḥ /<br/> antavānantataḥ /<br/> antavāṃścānantaśca /<br/> naivāntavānnānantavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na / dper na 'jig rten rtag pa zhig gam / mi rtag pa zhig gam / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag pa zhig gam / rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa zhig gam / mtha' yod pa zhig gam / mtha' yod pa ma yin pa zhig gam / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med pa zhig gam / mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa zhig gam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin 'ongs pa shi nas yod pa zhig gam zhes bya ba nas srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan zhig gam zhes bya ba'i bar du 'dri ba lta bu ste / 'di ni dge slong dag gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba yin no zhes 'don to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag gang gi phra rgyas gang zhig dmigs pa gang la rgyas par 'gyur ba 'di ni des de dang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti /<br/> samāsata ime dvividhāḥ kleśāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pas ni gang dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas da ltar byung bas ni gang dang ldan zhes bya ba'i bar 'di brjod par bya ste / mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa 'di gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svalakṣaṇakleśāśca rāgaprativamānāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmānyakleśāśca dṛṣṭivicikitsāda 'vidyāḥ /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> rāgapratighamānaiḥ syādatītapratyupasthitaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa spyi pa ni lta ba dang the tshom dang ma rig pa rnams so / de la re zhig / 'das dang nyer gnas 'dod chags dang / khong khro nga rgyal dag gis ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatrotpannā 'prahīṇāste tasmin vastuni saṃyutaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la de skyes ma spangs pa'i / dngos po da dang ldan pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po gang la 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal rnams skyes la ma spangs pa de dag gi dngos po de dang ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete hi svalakṣaṇakleśatvānna sarvasyāvaśyaṃ sarvatrotpadyante /<br/> sarvatrānāgatairebhirmānasaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i nyon mongs pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar thams cad la thams cad du 'byung ba ma yin no / nyid kyis de dag ma 'ongs pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatrāprahīṇāste iti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun dang gang la ma spangs pa de dag ces bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatairebhireva rāgapratighamānairmanobhūmikaiḥ sarvatra vastuni saṃyutastraiyadhvike /<br/> mānasānāṃ tryadhvaviṣayatvāt /<br/> svādhvike paraiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi sa pa'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal ma 'ongs pa de dag nyid kyis dus gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad dang ldan te / yid dag gi yul ni dus gsum pa yin pa'i phyir ro / gzhan gyis rang dus pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyai rāgapratighairanāgatairanāgata eva vastuni saṃyuktaḥ /<br/> ke punaranye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang khong khro ba gzhan dag gis ni ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po kho na dang ldan no / gzhan yang gang dag yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye pañca vijñānakāyikā rāgāśca pratighāśca /<br/> utpattidharmabhireva /<br/> taireva tu /<br/> ajaiḥ sarvatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba ste / skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi ni de lta bu yin no / de dag nyid / mi skye rnams kyis thams cad dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anutpattidharmabhiḥ pañcavijñānakāyikairapi sarvatra vastuni saṃyuktaḥ /<br/> traiyadhvike 'pi /<br/> śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ /<br/> ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ /<br/> dṛṣṭivicikitsā 'vidyāstraiyadhvikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gis kyang dus gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad dang ldan no / lhag ma kun gyi kun dang ldan / lhag ma yang gang dag cig yin zhe na / lta ba dang the tshom dang ma rig pa rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taiḥ sarvairapi sarvasminvastuni saṃyuktaḥ /<br/> sāmānyakleśatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa spyi dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir dus gsum pa'i dngos po med pa'i dngos po thams cad ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvadaprahīṇā ityadhikāro 'nuvarttata eva /<br/> kiṃ punaridamatītānāgatamucyate 'styatha na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji srid du ma spangs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa kho na yin no / ci 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rdzas su yod dam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyasti sarvakālāstitvātsaṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> atha nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te med / gal te yod na ni dus thams cad du yod pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā /<br/> na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te med na ni ji ltar na de dang ngam / des ldan pa'am bral ba yin zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus byas rnams rtag pa nyid du dam mi 'cha'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratijñāyate tu viśadaṃ /<br/> sarvakālāstitā /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus rnams kun du yod par ni gsal bar dam 'cha'o / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktatvāt /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā 'tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsungs phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gal te 'das pa'i gzugs shig yod par ma gyur na 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la mi lta bar yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāttarhyastyatītaṃ rūpaṃ tasmācchrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir 'das pa'i gzugs yod pa de'i phyir 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la mi lta ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs shig yod par ma gyur na 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs la mngon par dga' ba med par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāttarhyastyanāgataṃ rūpamiti vistaraḥ /<br/> dvayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi phyir ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs yod pa zhes rgyas par gsungs so / gnyis phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpāda ityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa ni gnyis la brten nas skye'o zhes gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang gzugs rnams nas yid dang chos rnams kyi bar yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag med na de la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa gnyis la brten par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadāgamato 'styatītānāgataṃ yuktito 'pi /<br/> sadviṣayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig lung las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa ni de lta bu yin no / rigs pas kyang / yul yod phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sati viṣaye vijñānaṃ pravartate nāsati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul yod na rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur gyi med par ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa med na ni dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato vijñānameva na syādālambanābhāvāt /<br/> phalāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro / 'bras phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'das pa zhag med na tshe phyi ma la las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bur yang ji ltar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi phalotpattikāle varttamāno vipākaheturastīti /<br/> tasmādastyevātītānāgatamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> avaśyaṃ ca kilaitatsarvāstivādena satā 'bhyupagantavyam /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> tadastivādāt sarvāstivādā iṣṭāḥ /<br/> ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu bskyed pa'i tshe ni da ltar gyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni med do /  / de lta bas na bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro / thams cad yod par smra ba yin phan chad gdon mi za bar 'di khas blang bar bya dgos so zhes grags te / 'di ltar / de yod smra ba'i phyir thams cad / yod par smra bar 'dod / gang dag 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad yod par smra ba de dag gi thams cad yod par smra ba yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ /<br/> kati caite sarvāstivādā ityāha /<br/> caturvidhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag da ltar byung ba dang 'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i las 'das pa gang yin pa cung zad cig ni yod / ma 'ongs pa dang 'bras bu bskyed zin pa'i 'das pa gang yin pa cung zad cig ni med do zhes rnam par phye ste smra ba de dag ni rnam par phye ste smra ba dag yin no / thams cad yod par smra ba de dag kyang du zhig ce na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te bhāvalakṣaṇāvasthā 'nyathā 'nyathikasaṃjñitāḥ /<br/> bhāvānyathiko bhadantadharmatrātaḥ /<br/> sa kilāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag / rnam bzhi dngos dang mtshan nyid dang / gnas skabs gzhan gzhan 'gyur zhes bya / dngos po gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni / btsun pa chos skyob yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmasyādhvasu pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na dngos po gzhan du 'gyur gyi rdzas gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam /<br/> yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na gser gyi snod bcom nas gzhan du byed pa na / dbyibs gzhan du 'gyur gyi kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa dang yang dper na 'o ma zho nyid du 'gyur ba na ro dang mthu dang smin par byed pa dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ dharmo 'pyanāgatādadhvanaḥ pratyutpannamadhvānamāgacchannanāgatabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su 'dor gyi kha dog ni ma yin pa de bzhin du chos kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas da ltar byung ba'i dus su 'ongs pa na ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po 'dor gyi rdzas kyi dngos po ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti /<br/> lakṣāṇānyathiko bhadantaghoṣakaḥ /<br/> sa kilāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du da ltar byung ba nas 'das pa'i dus su 'gro ba na da ltar byung ba'i dngos po 'dor gyi / rdzas kyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmo 'dhvasu pravarttamāno 'tīto 'tītalakṣaṇayukto 'nāgatapratyutpannābhyāṃ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs yin te / de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na 'das pa na 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i mtshan nyid dag ni mi ldan pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgato 'nāgatalakṣaṇayukto 'tītapratyutpannābhyāmaviyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'das pa da ltar byung ba dag ni mi ldan pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ pratyutpanno 'pyatītānāgatābhyāmaviyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang mi ldan pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na skyes bu bud med dag cig la chags pa lhag ma rnams la 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avasthā 'nyathiko bhadantavasumitraḥ /<br/> sa kilāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni btsun pa dbyig bshes yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na gnas skabs dang gnas skabs su phyin nas gnas skabs gzhan gyi sgo nas gzhan dang gzhan zhes ston gyi rdzas gzhan gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti /<br/> anyathānyathiko bhadantabuddhadevaḥ /<br/> sa kilāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na ri lu gcig gcig gi shad mig tu gzhag na gcig ces bya / brgya'i shod mig tu gzhag na brgya / stong gi shod mig tu gzhag na stong zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /<br/> yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti /<br/> ityete catvāraḥ sarvāstivādāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ni btsun pa sangs rgyas lha yin te / de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na snga ma dang phyi ma la ltos nas gzhan dang gzhan zhes brjod de / dper na bud med gcig la ma zhes kyang bya / bu mo zhes kyang bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ /<br/> dvitīyasyādhvasaṃkaraḥ prāpnoti /<br/> sarvasya sarvakṣaṇayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na bzhi po de dag ni thams cad yod par smra ba dag yin no / de dag las dang po ni yongs su 'gyur bar smra ba'i phyir grangs can gyi phyogs la bslan par bya'o / gnyis pa'i yang thams cad la mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir dus 'chol bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes bu zhig bud med la la la ni 'dod chags kun du 'byung la / la la la ni ldan pa 'ba' zhig go zhes bya ba 'dir ci zhig mtshungs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthasyāpyekasminnevādhvani trayo 'dhvānaḥ prāpnuvanti /<br/> atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti /<br/> evamanāgate 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa'i yang dus gcig la dus gsum char du 'gyur te / 'das pa'i dus la snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin la / dbus kyi skad cig ma ni da ltar byung bar 'gyur ro
