</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ /<br/> tṛtīyaḥ śobhanaḥ /<br/> yo 'yamavasthā 'nyathikaḥ /<br/> tasya kila
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de dag thams cad kyi nang na / gsum pa bzang ste / gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o / de yis ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitāḥ /<br/> yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba yis / dus rnams rnam gzhag gang gi tshe chos de bya ba mi byed pa de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā karoti tadā pratyutpannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe byed pa de'i tshe ni da ltar byung ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā kṛtvā niruddhastadā 'tīta iti /<br/> parigatametatsarvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe byas nas 'gags pa de'i tshe ni 'das pa yin no zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tu vaktavyam /<br/> yadyatītamapi dravyato 'styanāgatamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag thams cad ni yongs su go na gal te 'das pa yang rdzas su yod la ma 'ongs pa yang rdzas su yod na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāttadatītamityucyate 'nāgatamiti vā /<br/> nanu coktamadhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya dgos so / bya ba yis / dus rnams rnam gzhag ces bshad pa ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te khyim de lta na da ltar byung ba'i mig de dang 'dra ba'i bya ba gang zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phaladānapratigrahaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu 'byin pa dang 'dzin pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ /<br/> idaṃ ca vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa 'das pa rnams kyang 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir bya ba'am bya ba byed du thal bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro / 'di yang brjod par bya dgos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenaivātmanā sato dharmasya nityaṃ kāritrakaraṇe /<br/> kiṃ vighnaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te chos de'i bdag nyid kho nar yod na rtag tu bya ba byed pa la / bgegs su byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena kadācit kāritraṃ karoti kadācinneti /<br/> pratyayānāmasāmagrayamiti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis na res 'ga' ni bya ba byed la res 'ga' ni ma yin zhes bya / gal te rkyen rnams ma tshogs pa yin no zhe na / mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nityamāstitvābhyupagamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtag tu yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca tat kāritramatītānāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ cocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatkathaṃ /<br/> kiṃ kāritrasyāpyanyadasti kāritram /<br/> atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang ji ltar / bya ba la yang bya ba gzhan zhig yod dam ci / 'on te de 'das pa yang ma yin / ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenāsaṃskṛtatvānnityamastīti prāptam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod pa yang yin na ni des na 'dus ma byas yin pas rtag tu yod do zhes bya bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti /<br/> syādeṣa doṣo yadi dharmāt kāritramanyatsyāt /<br/> tattu khalu /<br/> nānyat /<br/> ato na bhavatyeṣa doṣaḥ /<br/> evaṃ tahi sa eva /<br/> adhvāyogaḥ /<br/> yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati /<br/> kimatra na sidhyati /<br/> yo hyajāto dharmaḥ so 'nāgataḥ /<br/> yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir gang gi tshe chos bya ba mi byed pa de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes brjod par mi bya'o / gal te chos las bya ba gzhan zhig yin na ni skyon der yang 'gyur ba zhig na de ni gzhan ma yin te / de'i phyir skyon der mi 'gyur ro / de lta na ni 'o na de nyid dus su mi rung ste / gal te chos kho na bya ba yin na chos de de'i bdag nyid kho nar yod bzhin du ci'i phyir res 'ga' ni 'das pa zhes bya / res 'ga' ni ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ste / dus rnam par gzhag pa mi 'grub bo / chos gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa yin no / gang skyes la ma zhig pa de ni da ltar byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo vinaṣṭaḥ so 'tītaḥ iti /<br/> etadevātra vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig pa de ni 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la mi 'grub pa ci zhig yod / 'dir de nyid brjod par bya dgos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti /<br/> tasya /<br/> tathā sataḥ /<br/> ajātanaṣṭatā kena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ji ltar da ltar gyi rdzas su yod pa de bzhin du / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la yang yod na ni / de bzhin du / yod na ci'i phyir ma skyes shig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti /<br/> kimasya pūrvaṃ nāsīdyasyābhāvādajāta ityucyate /<br/> kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate /<br/> tasmānna sidhyati sarvathā 'pyatrādhvatrayam /<br/> yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti /<br/> yadapyuktaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogānna śāśvatatvaprasaṅga iti /<br/> tadidaṃ kevalaṃ vāṅmātramutpādavināśayorayogāt /<br/> nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /<br/> āha khalvapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos de'i rang gi ngo bo kho nar yod na ni ji ltar na ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'am / zhig pa zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par 'gyur / gang zhig med pas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni sngon ci zhig ma byung bar 'gyur / gang zhig med pas zhig pa zhes bya ba yang phyis ci zhig med de / de lta bas na gal te ma byung ba las byung ba dang byung nas kyang yang mi 'byung bar mi 'dod phan chad dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du mi 'grub bo / gang yang 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de yang skye ba dang 'jig pa dag mi rung ba'i phyir tshig tsam ste / chos de rtag pa yang yod la mi rtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lugs 'di ni sngon ma byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvaḥ sarvadā cāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang smras pa / rang bzhin yang ni rtag tu yod / dngos po yang ni rtag mi 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca svabhāvād bhāvo 'nyo vyaktamīśvaraceṣṭitam /<br/> yattūktamuktatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin las kyang dngos mi gzhan / dbang phyug tha snyad yin par gsal / gang yang gsungs phyir zhes smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vayamapi brūmo 'styatītānāgatamiti /<br/> atītaṃ tu yad bhūtapūrvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kho bo cag kyang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod do zhes smras te / sngon byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgataṃ yatsati hetau bhaviṣyati /<br/> evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ /<br/> kaścaivamāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen yod na 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes de ltar byas nas yod de zhes bya'i / rdzas su ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vartamānavattadastīti /<br/> kathamanyathā 'sti /<br/> atītā nāgatātmanā /<br/> idaṃ punastavopasthitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ltar bzhin du yod do zhes de skad du zer / gzhan du na ji ltar yod / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i bdag nyid du yod mod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tadatītamanāgataṃ cocyate yadi nityamastīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rtag tu yod na de ji ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba de nyid nye bar gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā astyatītamastyanāgatamiti /<br/> astiśabdasya nipātatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba dgag pa'i phyir sngon byung ba'i rgyu dang phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu sngon byung ba nyid dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes par bya bar 'das pa yod do / ma 'ongs pa yod do zhes gsungs par zad do / yod ces bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gi sgra yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti /<br/> evamatītānāgatamapyastītyuktam /<br/> anyathā hyatītānāgatabhāva eva na sidhyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na smra ba po mar me snga ma med pa yod do / phyis med pa yod do zhes smras pa dang yang dper na mar me de shi ba ni yod mod kyi kho bos ni ma bsad do zhes 'dzer ba de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang yod do zhes gsungs kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastīti /<br/> kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi 'grub pa kho nar 'gyur ro / 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu dbyug thogs thor tshugs can rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas / las 'das pa dang zad pa dang 'gog pa dang / bral ba dang rnam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yod do zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu / ci de dag las de sngon byung ba nyid du mi 'dod par gyur tam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las ni rgyud de las des kun du drangs par 'bras bu bskyed pa'i mthu yod pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no / de lta ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi ngo bo kho nar yod na 'das pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par shes par bya ste / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mdo las / mig ni skye ba na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong la / 'gag pa na yang gang du yang sogs par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na dge slong dag mig ni ma byung ba las 'byung zhing byung nas kyang slar 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti /<br/> varttamāne 'dhvanyabhūtvā bhavatīti cet na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te ma 'ongs pa'i mig cig yod par gyur na ma byung ba las 'byung ngo zhes gsungs par mi 'gyur ro / gal te da ltar gyi dus su ma byung ba las 'byung ngo zhe na mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhvano bhāvādanarthāntaratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus ni dngos po las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha svātmanyabhūtvā bhavati /<br/> siddhamidamanāgataṃ cakṣurnāstīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te rang gi mtshan nyid du ma byung ba las 'byung ngo zhe na ni ma 'ongs pa'i mig med do zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapyuktaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam /<br/> yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang rnam par shes pa ni gnyis la brten nas skye ba'i phyir ro zhes smras pa ni re zhig 'dir yid dang chos rnams la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de ji ltar yid skyes par byed pa'i rkyen yin pa de ltar chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra 'am / 'on te chos rnams dmigs pa tsam zhig yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gal te chos rnams skyed par byed pa'i rkyen yin no zhe na ni ji ltar na ma 'ongs pa bskal pa stong na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am / yang na mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa bskyed par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇaṃ ca sarvapravṛttinirodhājjanakaṃ nopapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'jug pa thams cad dang 'gal ba'i phyir skyed par byed pa yin par mi 'thad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athālambanamātraṃ dharmā bhavanti /<br/> atītānāgatamapyālambanaṃ bhavatīti brūmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te chos rnams dmigs pa tsam zhig yin no zhe na ni 'das pa dang ma 'das pa yang dmigs pa yin no zhes smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi nāsti kathamālambanam /<br/> atredānīṃ brūmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te med pa ji ltar dmigs pa yin na zhe / da ni 'dir de ji ltar na dmigs pa yin pa de ltar yod do zhes smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i ji ltar na dmigs pa yin zhe na / byung bar gyur pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> abhūditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa'i gzugs sam / tshor ba dran pa na yod do zhes bya bar ni su yang mi lta'o / 'o na ci zhe na / byung bar gyur to zhes bya bar lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate /<br/> yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ji ltar da ltar gyi gzugs nyams su myong ba de ltar 'das pa yang dran no / ma 'ongs pa ji ltar da ltar du 'gyur ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca tattathaivāsti vartamānaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang de de bzhin du yod do zhe na ni da ltar du 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha nāsti /<br/> asadapyālambanaṃ bhavatīti siddham /<br/> tadeva tadvikīrṇamiti cet /<br/> na /<br/> vikīrṇasyāgrahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te med do zhe na ni med pa yang dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no / gal te de nyid sil bu yin no zhe na ma yin te / sil bu la mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang de ni gzugs de kho na yin te / rdul phra rab tu gyes pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sati paramāṇavo nityāḥ prāpnuvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni rdul phra rab rnams rtag par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paramāṇusaṃcaryāvabhāgamātraṃ caivaṃ sati prāpnoti /<br/> na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na rdul phra rab bsags pa dang gyes pa tsam du 'gyur gyi cung zad kyang skye ba yang med la 'gag pa yang med pas 'tsho byed kyi rtsod pa blangs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig ni nam skye ba na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong zhes rgyas par gsungs pa'i mdo yang bor bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aparamāṇusaṃcitānāṃ vedanādīnāṃ kathaṃ vikīrṇatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la sogs pa rdul phra rab bsags pa ma yin pa rnams kyang ji ltar na sil bu nyid yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te 'pi ca yathotpannānubhūtāḥ smaryante /<br/> yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti /<br/> atha na santi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang ji ltar byung zhing nyams su myong ba dran te / gal te yang de dag de bzhin du yod do zhe na ni rtag par 'gyur ro / 'on te med do zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asadapyālambanamiti siddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">med pa yang dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyasadapyālambanaṃ syāt trayodaśamapyāyatanaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te med pa yang dmigs pa yin na skye mched bcu gsum pa yang dmigs pa yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha trayodaśamāyatanaṃ nāstītyasya vijñānasya kimālambanam /<br/> etadeva nāmalambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na skye mched bcu gsum pa med do snyam pa'i rnam par shes pa 'di'i dmigs pa ci zhig yin / ming de nyid dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ni 'o na ming de nyid med do zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca śabdasya prāgabhāvamālambate kiṃ tasyālambanam /<br/> śabda eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sgra'i snga na med pa la dmigs pa de'i dmigs pa yang ci zhig yin / sgra kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt /<br/> anāgatāvasya iti cet /<br/> sati kathaṃ nāstibuddhiḥ /<br/> vartamāno nāstīti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni 'o na gang zhig sgra med pa don du gnyer ba de la sgra dbyung dgos pa kho nar 'gyur ro / gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs yin no zhe na ni yod na ji ltar na med pa'i blor 'gyur / gal te da ltar med pa yin no zhe na ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> ekatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvatā tasya viśeṣastasyābhūtvābhāvasiddhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na de'i bye brag gang yin pa de ma byung ba las 'byung bar 'grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādubhayaṃ vijñānasyālambanam bhāvaścābhāvaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni yod pa dang med pa de gnyi ga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten na med pa gang yin pa de dag gis shes pa'am mthong ba 'di ni gnas med do zhes gang smras pa de ji lta bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apare ābhimānikā bhavantyasantamapyavabhāsaṃ santaṃ paśyanti /<br/> ahaṃ tu santamevārstīti paśyāmītyayaṃ tatrābhiprāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir bsam pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gzhan dag snang ba med bzhin du yod par lta'i bdag ni yod pa kho na la yod do zhes bya bar lta'o zhes bya ba 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ /<br/> itthaṃ caitadevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin te / blo thams cad kyi dmigs pa yod pa nyid yin na 'di rtog par yang ga la 'gyur / yang na khyad par yang ci zhig yod / de ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par shes par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadanyatra bhagavatoktam etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /<br/> sāyamavoditaḥ kalpaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /<br/> sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata iti /<br/> tasmādayamapyahetuḥ /<br/> sadālambanatvādvijñānasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba nas de ngas nang gtams na nub khyad par du 'gro / nub gtams na nang khyad par du 'gro ste / yod pa la yod par shes la / med pa la yang med par shes so / bla na yod pa la yang bla na yod par shes la / bla na med pa la yang bla na med par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te / de lta bas na rnam par shes pa ni yod pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de yang gtan tshigs su mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadaṣyuktaṃ phalāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang 'bras phyir zhes smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde pa rnams ni las dang 'das pa las 'bras bu 'byung bar mi brjod pa kho na'o / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpūrvakātsaṃtānaviśeṣādityātmavādapratiṣedhe saṃpravedayiṣyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de sngon du 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi khyad par las te / bdag tu smra ba dgag pa nas bshad par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rdzas su yod pa de'i 'bras bu rtag tu yod pa kho na bas de la las kyi nus pa ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpādane sāmarthyam /<br/> utpādastarhyabhūtvā bhavatīti siddham /<br/> atha sarvameva cāsti /<br/> kasyedānīṃ kva sāmarthyam /<br/> vārṣagaṇyavādaścaivaṃ dyotito bhavati /<br/> yadastyastyeva tat /<br/> yannāsti nāstyeva tat /<br/> asato nāsti saṃbhavaḥ /<br/> sato nāsti vināśa iti /<br/> vartamānīkaraṇe tarhi sāmarthyam /<br/> kimidaṃ varttamānīkaraṇaṃ nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bskyed par nus so / 'o na ni skye ba ma byung ba las dang 'byung ba zhes bya bar grub pa yin no / yang thams cad yod pa kho na yin na da ni gang la gang zhig 'dus te / de lta na lo rtsis pa rnams kyi rtsod pa skad du gang yod pa di ni yod pa kho na'o / gang med pa de ni med pa kho na'o / med pa la ni skye ba yang med do / yod pa la ni 'jig pa yang med do zhes brjod pa yin no / 'o na da ltar du byed pa nus pa yin no / da ltar du byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">deśāntarākarṣaṇam cet /<br/> nityaṃ prasaktam /<br/> arūpiṇāṃ ca kathaṃ tat /<br/> yacca tadākarṣaṇaṃ tadabhūtvā bhūtam /<br/> svabhāvaviśeṣaṇaṃ cet siddhamabhūtvā bhavanam /<br/> tasmānnaivaṃ sarvāstivādaḥ śāsane sādhurbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yul gzhan du 'dren pa yin no zhe na ni rtag par thal bar 'gyur ro / gzugs can ma yin pa rnams la yang de ji lta bu / de 'dren pa gang yin pa de yang ma byung ba las byung ba yin no / gal te rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par zhig yin no zhe na ni ma byung ba las 'byung ba grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'stīti vadati /<br/> evaṃ tu sādhurbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di skad du / gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i rdzas su yod par smra ba'i thams cad yod par smra ba ni bstan pa la legs pa ma yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sūtre sarvamastītyuktaṃ tathā vadati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du mdo las thams cad yod do zhes gsungs pa de bzhin du smra ba de dag ni legs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ ca sūtre sarvamastītyuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ji lta bu thams cad yod ces gsungs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvamastīti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanānīti /<br/> adhvatrayaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad yod ces bya ba ni bram ze skye mched bcu gnyis kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes gsungs so / yang na dus gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du ni bshad zin to / yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang med na ji ltar na des sam / der ldan pa yin zhe na / de las skyes pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati /<br/> astyeva tvatītānāgatamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rgyu'i phra rgyas yod pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa des ldan la / de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phra rgyas yod pas dngos po dang ldan pa yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni yod pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra netum śakyate tatrātmakātmanaivaṃ veditavyam /<br/> gambhīrā khaludharmatā /<br/> nāvaśyaṃ tarhyasādhyā bhavatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig drang bar mi nus pa de la ni 'di ltar / chos nyid dag ni zab pa yin / de gdon mi za bar rtogs pas sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti paryāyo yadutpadyate tannirudhyate /<br/> rūpamutpadyate rūpaṃ nirudhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang skyes pa de 'gag pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod de / gzugs skye la gzugs 'gag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti paryāyo 'nyadutpadyate 'nyannirudhyate /<br/> anāgatamutpadyate varttamānaṃ nirudhyate /<br/> adhvā 'pyutpadyate /<br/> utpadyamānasyādhvasaṃgṛhītatvāt /<br/> adhvano 'pyutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan skye la gzhan 'gag pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod de / ma 'ongs pa skye la da ltar 'gag go /  / dus kyang skye ste / skye ba dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro / dus las kyang skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anekakṣaṇikatvādanāgatasyādhvanaḥ /<br/> gatametat yatprasaṅgenāgatam /<br/> idānīmidaṃ vicāryate /<br/> yadvastu prahīṇaṃ visaṃyuktaḥ sa tasminvastuni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma 'ongs pa'i dus skad cig ma du ma yin pa'i phyir ro / zhar la 'ongs pa 'di rdzogs so / da ni dngos po gang zhig spangs na de dngos po de dang bral ba yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dang bral na des dngos po de spangs pa yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra tāvadvisaṃyuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastu /<br/> syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gang dang bral na des dngos po de spangs pa yin no / spangs la de dang ma bral ba yang yod de / 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahīṇe duḥkhadṛggheye saṃyuktaḥ śeṣasarvagaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal mthong spang bya spangs kyang / kun 'gro lhag ma rnams kyis ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāk prahīṇe prakāre ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po'i rnam pa spangs kyang de'i /  / yul can dri ma lhag rnams kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal shes pa ni skyes la / kun 'byung shes pa ni ma skyes pa'i tshe sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ris spangs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de spangs kyang de la dmigs pa kun du 'gro ba kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyis ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i ris la yang rnam pa dgu las dang po'i rnam pa spangs na de spangs kyang de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa lhag ma rnams kyis lhag par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po gang la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di re re nas bshad na ni brjod par bya ba mang por 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt piṇḍavibhāṣāṃ kurvanti /<br/> kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na ci nas kyang 'bad pa chung du chung dus 'dri ba'i tshogs mang po go bar 'gyur bar bsdus te rnam par 'chad par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor bsdu na chos ni bcu drug po 'di lta ste / 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang zag pa med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittānyapi ṣoḍaśa etānyeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyang bcu drug ste / de dag nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam /<br/> tatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la chos gang zhig sems gang gi dmigs pa yin pa shes par byas nas 'di la ni phra rgyas 'di de snyed cig rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni rtag par bya'o / de la re zhig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhahetudṛgabhyāsapraheyāḥ kāmadhātujāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal rgyu mthong goms pa yis / spang bya 'dod khams las skyes pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svakatrayaikarūpāptāmalavijñānagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi gsum dang gzugs gtogs gcig / dri med rnam shes spyod yul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svakaṃ ca tattrayaṃ ca svakatrayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni rang gi yang yin la gsum yang yin pas rang gi gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaṃ ca tadrūprāptaṃ ca ekarūpāptam /<br/> eṣā vigrahajātiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gcig kyang yin la gzugs su gtogs pa yang yin pas gzugs gtogs gcig ste / de ni tshig rnam par sbyar ba'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams ni sems lnga'i dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti /<br/> svadādharatrayordhvaikāmalānāṃ rūpadhātujāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi khams pa gsum ste / de dag nyid dang / gzugs na spyod pa gcig ste / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no / gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /<br/> svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva /<br/> adharadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi / chos rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid gzugs na spyod pa ni sems brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin te / rang gi khams pa gsum ste / de dag nyid dang khams 'og ma pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva /<br/> anāsravasya ceti /<br/> ārupyajāstridhātvāptatrayānāsravagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid dang khams gong ma pa gcig ste / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no / gzugs med las skyes khams gsum gtogs / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /<br/> traidhātukānāṃ triprakārāṇāṃ teṣāmeva /<br/> anāsravasya ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo / chos rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin te / khams gsum pa rnam pa gsum gsum ste / de dag nyid dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktāstraidhātukā duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos khams gsum pa dag bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ sarve svādhikagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun / rang gis glags pa'i spyod yul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhamārgadarśanaheyānāṃ svaṃ cittaṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaheyameva /<br/> tasyādhikasya te dharmā ālambanaṃ jñeyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gag pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams kyi rang gi sems ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba kho na yin te / chos de dag ni des glags pa'i spyod yul yin par shes par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /<br/> pūrvoktānāṃ pañcānāṃ tasyaiva ca nirodhadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs pa yin te / sngar bshad pa lnga dang 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba glags pa de nyid kyi dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgadarśanaheyā apyevam /<br/> pañcānāṃ pūrvoktānāṃ tasyaiva ca mārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste / sngar bshad pa lnga dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba glags pa de nyid kyi dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇi /<br/> nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems glags pa de'i dmigs pa yin pas sems dgu dang bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktāstraidhātukāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa'i chos rnam pa lnga bshad zin to / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāstridhātvantyatrayānāsravagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med khams gsum mtha' gsum dang / zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos zag pa med pa rnams ni sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traidhātukānāmantyānāṃ triprakārāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāheyānāmanāsravasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa'i tha ma gsum ste / 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punarasyaivārthasyādhyardhena ślokena saṃgraho bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed pa dang gnyis kyis bsdus pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhahetudṛgabhyāsaheyā dhātutraye 'malāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum sdug bsngal rgyu mthong dang / bsgom pas spang bya zag pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcāṣṭadaśavijñānadaśavijñānagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam shes lnga brgyad bcu dang ni / rnam shes bcu yi spyod yul te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ sarve svādhikagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun / rang gis glags pa'i spyod yul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar sems bcu drug po de dag gi dmigs par chos bcu drug po rnam par gzhag par rig nas / ji ltar na phra rgyas kyi dgos pa yin pa sbyar bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">diṅamātraṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i dbang po ni rnam pa bdun te / 'dod pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang zag pa med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadetatsamāsato dvādaśadharmasya vijñānasyālambanaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par shes pa rnam pa gcu gnyis kyi dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarasya catuṣprakārasyānyatra nirodhadarśanaheyāt /<br/> rūpāvacarasya pañcaprakārasyārūpyāvacarasya dviprakārasya mārgadarśanabhāvanāheyasyānāsravasya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te / lam mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanaṃ vijñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bcu gnyis po 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ci rigs par phra rgyas 'dod pa na spyod pa ris bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa ris gnyis dang kun du 'gro ba rnams rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhendriyālambanālambane vijñāne katyanuśayā anuśerate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams pa bcu gnyis po de ni rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bcu gnyis po de nyid dang yang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /<br/> anayā vartanyā 'nyadapyanugantavyam /<br/> yairanuśayairyaccittaṃ sānuśayaṃ te 'nuśayāstasmiścitte 'nuśerate /<br/> syuranuśerate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bcu bzhi po 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no / de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bskyed nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa ris bzhi bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya ste / lam 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya ste / phra rgyas dang bcas pa'i phra rgyas de dag sems de la rgyas par 'gyur ram zhe na / rgyas par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye 'nuśayāstena cittena saṃprayuktā aprahīṇāstadālambanāścāprahīṇāṃ /<br/> syurnānuśerate /<br/> ye 'nuśayāstena cittena saṃprayuktāḥ prahīṇāstadālambanāśca /<br/> tadevaṃ kṛtvā bhavati /<br/> dvidhā sānuśayaṃ kliṣṭamakliṣṭamanuśāyakaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems de dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma spangs la de la dmigs pa yang ma spangs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa'o / rgyas par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de / sems de dang mtshungs par ldan pa spangs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa'o / de ltar byas na / nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam gnyis / yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭaṃ cittamanuśayānaiścānuśayaiḥ sānuśayaṃ tatsaṃprayuktatadālambanairaprahīṇairananuśayānaiśca tatsaṃprayuktaiḥ prahīṇaistatsahitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs can min rgyas 'gyur gyi / sems nyon mongs pa can ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang de la dmigs pa ma spangs par bya ba'i phra rgyas rgyas par 'gyur ba rnams dang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa spangs pa rgyas par mi 'gyur ba rnams kyi phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin te / de dang lhan cig pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akliṣṭaṃ tu cittamanuśayānaireva tadālambanairaprahīṇairiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni de la dmigs pa ma spangs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba dag kho nas phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ daśānāmanuśayānāṃ kathaṃ pravṛttiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang phra rgyas bcu po 'di dag ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādita eva tāvadavidyāyyogātsatyeṣu sa muhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig dang po kho nar ma rig pa dang ldan pa las bden pa rnams la kun du rmongs par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhamasmai na rocate yāvat mārgastataḥ /<br/> mohākāṅkṣā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de sdug bsngal nas lam gyi bar du mi 'dod do / de'i 'og tu / rmongs las the tshom
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūḍhasya pakṣadvayaṃ śrutvā vicikitsotpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">the tshom rmongs par gyur pa phyogs gnyis thos nas 'di sdug bsngal yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhaṃ nvidaṃ natvidaṃ duḥkhamityevamādi /<br/> tato mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> vicikitsāyā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di sdug bsngal ma yin snyam pa de lta bu la sogs pa'i the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro / de nas ni log lta / the tshom las log pa'i lta ba 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃśayitasya mithyāśramaṇacittānāṃ mithyāniścayotpatteḥ /<br/> nāsti duḥkhamityevmādi /<br/> satkāyadṛktataḥ /<br/> mithyādṛṣṭeḥ kila satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">the tshom skyes pa log par thos pa dang bsams pa las sdug bsngal med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa log par nges pa skye ba'i phyir ro / de nas 'jig tshogs lta / log par lta ba la 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhataḥ skandhānapohyātmato 'bhiniveśāt /<br/> tato 'ntagrahaṇaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal las phung po bsal nas bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyadṛṣṭerantagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate /<br/> ātmanaḥ śāśvatocchedāntagrahaṇāt /<br/> tasmācchhīlāmarśaḥ /<br/> antagrahācchīlavrataparāmarśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas mthar 'dzin 'jig tshogs la lta ba las mthar 'dzin par lta ba 'jug ste / bdag rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / de nas ni / tshul khrims mchog 'dzin / mthar 'dzin pa las tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yamevāntaṃ gṛhṇāti tena śuddhipratyāgamanāt /<br/> tato dṛśaḥ /<br/> āmarśa iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang kho na la mthar 'dzin pa des dag par yid ches pa'i phyir ro / de nas lte / mchog tu 'dzin ces bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlavrataparāmarśāddṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa las lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena śuddhiṃ pratyeti tasyāgrato grahaṇāt /<br/> tato
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis dag par yid ches pa de las mchog tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / de nas ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgaḥ svadṛṣṭau mānaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi lta la nga rgyal chags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāmabhiṣvaṅgāt tayā connatigamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la chags pa'i phyir dang des khengs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dveṣo 'nyatra /<br/> svadṛṣṭyadhyavasitasya tatpratyanīkabhūtāyāṃ paradṛṣṭau dveṣaḥ pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan la zhe sdang rang gi lta ba la lhag par zhen par gyur pa de'i dgra bor gyur pa gzhan gyi lta ba la zhe sdang 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt /<br/> ityanukramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag ni rang gi lta ba blangs nas bor ba gzhan la zhe sdang bar 'dod do / 'dod chags la sogs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi dmigs pa ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro / de ltar rim
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa eṣāṃ daśānāṃ kleśānāṃ pravṛttikramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni phra rgyas bcu po de dag gi 'jug pa'i rim pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpadyamānastu tribhiḥ kāraṇairutpadyate /<br/> aprahīṇādanuśayādviṣayāt pratyupasthitāt /<br/> ayoniśo manaskārāt kleśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba ni rgyu gsum gyis skye ste / phra rgyas spang ba ma yin dang / yul ni nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed las / nyon mongs skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur ba yin / de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin te / de ltar na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tānyetāni yathākramaṃ hetuviṣayaprayogabalāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni go rims bzhin du rgyu dang yul dang sbyor ba'i stobs dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ /<br/> saṃpūrṇakāraṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa gzhan yang de bzhin du skye bar rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācitkial viṣayabalenaivotpadyante /<br/> na hetubalena /<br/> yathā parihāṇadharmakasyārhata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig rgyu ni tshangs pa yin / res 'ga' yul gyi stobs kho na / skye'i rgyu'i stobs kyis ma yin te / dper na dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi lta bu'o zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang phra rgyas de dag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis zag pa gsum du gsungs te / 'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyobho 'vidyaughaśca /<br/> catvāro yogā eta eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu bo bzhi ste / 'dod pa'i chu bo dang srid pa'i chu bo dang lta ba'i chu bo dang ma rig pa'i chu bo'o / sbyor ba bzhi ste / de dag nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāryupādānāni kāmopādānaṃ dṛṣṭyupādānaṃ śīlavṛtopādānamātmavādopādānamiti /<br/> tatra tāvat /<br/> kāme saparyavasthānāḥ kleśāḥ kāmāsravo vinā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar len pa bzhi ste / 'dod pa nye bar len pa dang lta ba nye bar len pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa dang bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa'o / de la re zhig / 'dod na gti mug ma gtogs pa'i / nyon mongs kun nas dkris bcas zag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mohena /<br/> avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa rnams ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rdzas bzhi bcu rtsa gcig ni 'dod pa'i zag pa yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekatriṃśadanuśayāḥ pañcaprakārāmavidyāṃ hitvā daśa paryavasthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa rnam pa lnga ma gtogs pa phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig dang kun nas dkris pa bcu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anuśayā eva rūpārūpye bhavāsravaḥ /<br/> vinā moheneti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs ni med pa na / phra rgyas kho na srid pa'i zag / ma rig pa ma gtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārūpyāvacarā avidyāvarjyā anuśayā bhavāsravo dvāpañcāśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa rnams ma gtogs par gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rdzas lnga bcu rtsa gnyis ni srid pa'i zag pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarāḥ ṣaḍviṃśatiranuśayāḥ pañcaprakārāmavidyāṃ hitvā /<br/> ārūpyāvacarāḥ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ /<br/> nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa rnam pa lnga ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i phra rgyas nyi shu rtsa drug dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyi shu rtsa drug go / de na yang rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang kun nas dkris pa gnyis yod pa ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakaraṇeṣu coktaṃ bhavāsravaḥ katamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu byed pa dag las kyang / srid pa'i zag pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāṃ sthāpayitvā yāni tadanyāni rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāni /<br/> saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānānīti /<br/> kasmā diha tasyāgrahaṇam /<br/> asvātantryāditi kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa rnams ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i kun du sbyor ba dang 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang kun nas dkris pa gang dag yin pa'o zhes bshad na ci'i phyir 'dir de ma smos she na / kha che ba rnams na re rang dbang can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ /<br/> avyākṛtāntarmukhā hi te samāhitabhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rnams gcig tu bsdus nas srid pa'i zag par bshad ce na / de lung ma bstan kha nang bltas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata ekīkṛtāḥ /<br/> te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam gzhag pa yi phyir gcig byas / de gnyi ga yang lung du ma bstan pa dang kha nang du bltas te 'jug pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa dag yin pa'i phyir chos mthun pa rnam pa gsum gyis gcig tu byas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham /<br/> tāni pañcadaśa dravyāṇi /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇamasau pṛthagvyavasthāpyate /<br/> sarveṣāṃ hi teṣāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gang gis srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad pa de nyid kyi srid pa'i zag pa zhes bya'o / da ni ma rig pa'i khams gsum pa rdzas bco lnga ni ma rig pa'i zag pa zhes bya bar grub bo / ci'i phyir 'di logs shig tu rnam par gzhag ce na / de dag thams cad kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūlamavidyetyāsravaḥ pṛthak /<br/> yathā caite āsravā uktā veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsa ba ma rig yin pas na / logs shig tu ni zag par bstan / zag pa de dag ji skad du bshad pa ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathaughayogā dṛṣṭīnāṃ pṛthagbhāvastu pāṭavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu bo sbyor ba'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o / lha rnams gsal phyir logs shig bstan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāsrava eva kāmaughaḥ kāmayogaśca /<br/> evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba rnams ma gtogs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa kho nar 'dod ba'i chu bo dang 'dod pa'i sbyor ba yin la / de bzhin du srid pa'i zag pa kho na srid pa'i chu bo dang srid pa'i sbyor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāḥ kila paṭutvādoghayogeṣu pṛthak sthāpitāḥ /<br/> nāsraveṣvasahāyānāṃ na kilāsyānukūlatā /<br/> āsayantītyāsravāṇāṃ nirvacanaṃ paścādvakṣyate /<br/> na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt /<br/> ata āsraveṣu na pṛṭhak sthāpitāḥ /<br/> miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni bsal ba'i phyir chu bo dang sbyor ba dag ni nang du logs shig tu bsal ba'i rnam par gzhag go zhes grag go / zag pa ma yin grogs med rnams / 'jog pa'i rjes su mi mthun lo / zag pa rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig ni 'jog par byed pas na zhes 'og nas 'chad na / lta ba rnams 'ba' zhig ni bsal ba'i phyir 'jog pa'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas de'i phyir zag pa dag tu logs shig tu ma bzhag gi bsres te ni bzhag go zhes zer ro zhes grag go / de ltar na 'dod pa'i chu bo ni rdzas nyi shu rtsa dgu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgapratighamānāḥ pañcadaśa vicikitsāścatasro daśa paryavasthānānīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal bco lnga dang the tshom bzhi dang kun nas dkris pa bcu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavaugho 'ṣṭāviṃsatidravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i chu bo ni sngas nyi shu rtsa brgyad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgamānā viṃśatirvicikitsā 'ṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang nga rgyal nyi shu dang the tshom brgyad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭyoghaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba'i chu bo ni rdzas sum cu rtsa drug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyaughaḥ pañcadaśa dravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa'i chu bo ni rdzas bco lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">oghavad yogā veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba yang chu bo bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktā eva sā 'vidyā dvidhā dṛṣṭivivecanāt /<br/> upādānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad bshad nyid ma rig bcas / nyer len rnams te lta rnam gnyis / phye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmayoga evasahāvidyayā kāmopādānaṃ catustriṃśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i sbyor ba ma rig pa dang bcas pa rdzas sum cu rtsa bzhi kho na 'dod pa nye bar len pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgapratighamānā 'vidyāviṃśatirvicikitsāścatasro daśa paryavasthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa nyi shu dang the tshom bzhi dang kun nas dkris pa bcu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavayoga eva sahāvidyayā ātmavādopādānamaṣṭatriṃśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i sbyor ba nye bar ma rig pa dang bcas pa rdzas sum cu rtsa brgyad kho na bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgamānāvidyāstriṃśadvicikitsā aṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa sum cu dang the tshom brgyad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiyogācchīlavrataṃ niṣkṛṣya dṛṣṭyu pādānaṃ triṃśaddravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba'i sbyor ba las tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs phyung ste / lta ba la nye bar len pa rdzas sum cu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlavratopādānaṃ ṣaḍdravyāṇi karmadṛṣṭibhyo niṣkṛṣṭam /<br/> mārgapratidvandvitvā dubhayapakṣavipralambhanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa ni rdzas drug go / ci'i phyir lta ba rnams las phyung zhe na / lam gyi dgrar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phyogs gnyi ga bslu ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dis khyim pa rnams kyang lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes pas zas mi za ba la sogs pas bslus la / rab tu byung ba rnams kyang yul yid du 'ong ba yongs su spangs pas dag par yid ches pas bslus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇamavidyāṃ miśrayitvopādānamuktaṃ na pṛthak
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir ma rig pa bsres te nye bar len par bshad la logs shig tu ma bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavagrahaṇādupādānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa 'dzin pa'i phyir nye bar len pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa / 'dzin par byed pa min phyir bsres
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa ni mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mi gsal ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te / de'i phyir bsres so zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre tu bhagavatoktaṃ kāmayogaḥ katamaḥ /<br/> vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ kāmādhyavasānaṃ tadanyacittam paryādāya tiṣṭhati /<br/> ayamucyate kāmayogaḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvadbhavayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las ni 'dod pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas rgyas par 'di'i 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa dang 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod pa la sred pa dang 'dod pa la dad che ba dang 'dod pa la 'dod pas brgyal ba dang 'dod pa la zhen pa dang 'dod pa la dga' ba dang 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang 'dod pa la lhag par chags pa yod pa gang yin pa des 'di'i sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang lta ba'i sbyor ba yang de dang 'dra ba'i bar gsungs so / mdo gzhan dag las 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyang nye bar len pa yin par gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir 'dod pa la sogs pa la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa ni 'dod pa nye bar len pa la sogs pa yang yin par shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktamidamanuśayā evāsravaughayogopādānasaṃśabditāḥ sūtreṣviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo dag las phra rgyas rnams kho na zag pa dang chu bo dang sbyor ba dang nye bar len pa'i ming du gsungs pa 'di ni bshad zin to / yang phra rgyas kyi don ni ci yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha ko 'yamanuśayārthaḥ kaśca yāvadupādānārthaḥ /<br/> aṇavo 'nugatāścaite dvidhā cāpyanuśerate /<br/> anubadhnanti yasmācca tasmādanuśayāḥ smṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar len pa'i bar gyi don ni ci yin zhe na / gang phyir de dag phra ba dang rjes 'brel rnam gnyis rgyas 'gyur dang / rjes su 'brang ba de yi phyir / phra rgyas rtag tu bshad pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāṇavaḥ sūkṣmapracāratvāt durvijñānatayā /<br/> anugatāḥ prāptyanuṣaṅgataḥ /<br/> anuśerate dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāmālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca /<br/> anubadhnantyaprayogeṇa prativārayato 'pi punaḥ punaḥ saṃmukhībhāvāt /<br/> ebhiḥ kāraṇairanuśayā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la phra ba rnams ni rtogs par dka' bas rgyu ba phra ba'i phyir ro / rjes su 'brel pa ni thob pa dang rjes su 'grel pas so / rgyas par 'gyur ba ni rnam pa gnyis te / dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas so / rjes su 'brang bas ni sbyor ba med par te / bzlog bzhin du yang dang yang du mngon par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / rgyu de dag gis na phra rgyas rnams zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsayantyāsravantyete haranti śleṣayantyatha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag 'jog byed zag byed dang / khyer bar byed dang 'byar byed dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upagṛhṇanti cetyeṣāmāsravādiniruktayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar 'dzin phyir zag la sogs / de dag gi ni nges tshig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ /<br/> harantītyoghāḥ /<br/> śleṣayantīti yogāḥ /<br/> upagṛhṇantīti upadānāni /<br/> evaṃ tu sādhīyaḥ syād
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor bar 'jog par byed pa dang / srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i bar du skye mched drug gi rma nas 'dzag pas na zag pa dag yin no / khyer bar byed pas na chu bo dag yin no /  / 'byar bar byed pas na sbyor ba dag yin no / nye bar 'dzin pas na nye bar len pa dag yin no / 'di skad du 'di dag gis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsravatyebhiḥ saṃtatirviṣayeṣvityāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud yul rnams la 'dzag par byed pas na zag pa rnams yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā āyuṣmanto naurmahadbhirabhisaṃskāraiḥ pratisroto nīyate /<br/> sā teṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ gratiprasravdhyā 'lpakṛcchreṇānusrota uhyata'’ iti sūtravādānusārāt /<br/> adhimātravegatvādoghāḥ /<br/> tarhi tadvānuhyate tadanuvidhānāt /<br/> nātimātrasamudācāriṇo 'pi yogā vividhaduḥkhasaṃyojanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe dang ldan pas dper na gru mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos chu'i bzlog phyogs su bkri ba de mngon par 'du bya ba de dag nyid med par tshegs chung dus chu'i 'bab phyogs su 'khyer bar 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig dang mthun pa'i phyir ro / shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir chu bo dag ste / de'i rjes su 'byed pa'i phyir de dag gis de dag dang ldan pa 'khyer bar 'gyur ro / che ba dang kun du mi 'byung ba rnams ni sbyor ba dag ste / sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang sbyor ba'i phyir ram / yang na yang dang yang du rjes su 'brel ba'i sgo nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābhīkṣṇyānuṣaṅgato vā kāmādyupādānādupādānānīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i phyir nye bar len pa rnams ni yin no zhes bya ba ni ches legs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃyojanādibhedena punaste pañcadhoditāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kun du sbyor sogs kyi / dbye bas yang rnam ldar bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta evānuśayāḥ punaḥ saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānabhedena pañcadhā bhittvoktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas de dag nyid kun du sbyor ba dang 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang kun nas dkris pa'i dbye bas yang rnam pa lngar phye nas bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra nava saṃyojanānyanunvayapratighamānāvidyādṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitserṣyā mātsaryasaṃyojanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la kun du sbyor ba ni dgu ste / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang lta ba dang mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang phrag dog dang ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrānunayasaṃyojanaṃ traidhātuko rāgaḥ /<br/> evamanyāni yathāsaṃbhavam yojyāni /<br/> dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ /<br/> parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ dve dṛṣṭī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags te / de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par sbyor bar bya'o / lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni lta ba gsum mo / mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni lta ba gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams la rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor bas ldan zhing lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ma yin pa / de la lta ba'i phra rgyas rgyas par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin pa lta yod dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smras pa yod de / kun 'byung shes pa skyes pa la 'gog pa shes pa ma skyes pa'i tshe 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyuktastadālambanena dṛṣṭisaṃyojanenāsaṃyuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor ba de la dmigs par ldan la lta ba'i kun du sbyor bas ni mi ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatragasya prahīṇatvādasarvatragasya ca tadālambanasaṃprayogiṇo dṛṣṭisaṃyojanasyābhāvāt /<br/> dṛṣṭyanuśayaśca teṣvanuśete /<br/> te eva parāmarśaḍṛṣṭī saṃprayogataḥ /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak /<br/> dravyāmarśana sāmānyāddṛṣṭī saṃyojanāntaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun du 'gro ba ni spangs pa'i phyir la kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa de la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa can lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni med pa'i phyir ro / de dag la lta ba'i phra rgyas dag ni rgyas par 'gyur te / mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba de dag kho na mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas / yang ci'i phyir kun du sbyor ba dag gi nang du lta ba gsum ni logs shig tu lta ba'i kun du sbyor bar bshad la / gnyis ni logs shig tu mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba'i nang du bshad ce na / rdzas dang mchog 'dzin 'dra ba'i phyir / lta gnyis kun du sbyor gzhan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśa dravyāṇi tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba mchog gsum yang rdzas bco brgyad yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśaiva dve parāmarśadṛṣṭī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba gnyis kyang rdzas bco brgyad kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rdzas mnyam pas 'di gnyis kun tu sbyor bas gzhan du byas so zhes grag go
