</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt /<br/> atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam /<br/> ekāntākuśalaṃ yasmāt svatantraṃ cobhayaṃ yataḥ /<br/> īṣryāmātsaryameṣūktaṃ pṛthak saṃyojanadvayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gnyis ni mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin la / lhag ma rnams ni ma yin pas mchog tu 'dzin par 'dra ba'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu bshad de / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro / yang ci'i phyir kun tu sbyor ba dag tu phrag dog dang ser sna ni logs shig tu kun du sbyor ba gnyis su bshad la / kun nas dkris pa gzhan ni ma yin zhe na / gang phyir gnyi ga gcig tu ni / mi dge rang dbang de yi phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyanyatparyavasthānamevañjātīyakamasti yatraitadubhayaṃ syādekāntākuśalatvaṃ svatantratvaṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phrag dog ser sna de dag las / logs shig kun sbyor gnyis su bshad / gang la gcig tu mi dge ba dang rang dbang can 'di gnyis ka yod pa de lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa gzhan ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāṣṭau paryavasthānāni tasyevaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gang gi kun nas dkris pa brgyad yin pa de'i phyir ni de ltar 'gyur gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya punardaśa tasya krodhamrakṣāvapyubhayaprakārau /<br/> tasmānna bhavatyayaṃ parihāra ityapare /<br/> punaranyatra bhagavatā saṃyojanamuktam /<br/> pañcadhā 'varabhāgīyaṃ /<br/> tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti /<br/> kasmādetānvavarabhāgīyānyucyante /<br/> avarabhāgahitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi bcu yin pa de ni khro ba dang 'chab pa yang rnam pa gnyi ga yin pas de'i phyir 'di la lan ma yin no zhes zer ro / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du kun du sbyor ba / tha ma'i cha dang mthun rnam lnga / gsungs te / 'di lta ste / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems so / ci'i phyir 'di dag tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i phyir te / tha ma'i cha ni 'dod pa'i khams yin la / 'di dag kyang de'i rjes su mthun pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāṃ kāmānatikramaḥ /<br/> tribhistu punarāvṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta gnyis kyis 'dod pa las mi 'da' la / gsum po yis ni phyir zlog byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmacchandavyāpādābhyāṃ kāmadhātuṃ nātikrāmati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dag gis ni 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiratikrānto 'pi punarāvartyate dauvārikānucarasādharmyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa dag gis ni 'das kyang phyir zlog par byed de / sgo ba dang rjes su 'brang ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum /<br/> ata eva tānyavarabhāgīyānītyapare /<br/> yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca /<br/> sarvametadvaktavyaṃ syāt /<br/> kiṃ tūktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re gsum gyis ni sems can gyi tha ma so so'i skye bo nyid las mi 'da' la / gnyis kyis ni khams kyi tha ma 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' ste / de'i phyir 'di dag tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya'o zhes zer ro / gang gi tshe rgyun du zhugs pas kun du sbyor ba gsum yongs su gtugs te spang ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa drug spangs pa yin na / ci'i phyir lta ba gsum bor la / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom gsum kho na gsungs she na / de dag thams cad brjod par bya ba ni yin mod kyi 'on kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mukhamūlagrahāttrayam /<br/> triprakārāḥ kila kleśā ekaprakārā dviprakārākścatuprakārākśca /<br/> teṣāmebhistribhirmukhaṃ gṛhītamiti /<br/> apicāntagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭipravartitā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgo dang rtsa ba bsdus phyir gsum / du bshad de / nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam pa gsum ste / rnam pa gcig dang rnam pa gnyis dang rnam pa bzhi dag yin la / de dag gi sgo ni 'di gsum gyis bsdus so / gzhan yang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta lta bas rab tu bcug la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśapravartitaḥ mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsāpravatitā /<br/> mūlaṃ gṛhītamiti /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pas rab tu bcug / log par lta ba ni the tshom gyis rab tu bcug ste / de'i phyir rtsa ba bsdus so zhes zer ro zhes grag go / gzhan dag na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agantukāmatāmārgavibhramo mārgasaṃśayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro mi 'dod dang lam nor dang / lam la the tshom de snyed cig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityantarāyā mokṣasya gamane 'tastrideśanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thar pa bgrod pa bgegs byed pa / de yi phyir na gsum bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trayo 'ntarāyā deśāntaragamane bhavanti /<br/> agantukāmatā mārgavibhramo 'nyamārgasaṃśrayaṇāt mārgasaṃśayaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul gzhan du bgrod par bya ba la bar chad byed pa ni gsum yod do / 'gro mi 'dod pa dang lam gzhan la brten pa'i phyir lam nor ba dang lam la the tshom za ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ mokṣagamane 'pyeta eva trayontarāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du thar ba bgrod par bya ba la yang gsum po de dag nyid bar chad byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra satkāyadṛṣṭyā mokṣādutrāsamāpannasyāgantukāmatā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'jig tshogs la lta bas ni thar pas skrag par 'gyur bas 'gro mi 'dod par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śīlavrataparāmarśenānyamārgasaṃśrayaṇānmokṣavibhramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin bas ni lam gzhan la yang dag par brten pa'i phyir lam nor bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicikitsayā mārgasaṃśayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">the tshom gyis ni lam la the tshom za bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyun du zhugs pas thar par bgrod pa'i bar chad byed pa de dag spang bar ston pa na nyon mongs pa gsum kho na spang bar bstan to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā bhagavatā pañcavidhamavarabhāgīyaṃ saṃyojanamuktam /<br/> evaṃ punaḥ /<br/> pañcadhaivordhvabhāgīyaṃ /<br/> kathamityāha /<br/> dvau rāgau rūpyarūpijau /<br/> tau /<br/> auddhatyamānamohāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar kun du sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga bshad pa de bzhin du yang / gong ma'i cha dang mthun lnga nyid / ji lta zhe na / gzugs dang gzugs med las skyes pa'i / 'dod chags gnyis rgod nga rgyal rmongs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetāni pañcordhvabhāgīyāni saṃyojanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes te / 'di dag gi kun du sbyor ba gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang rgod pa dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmaprahāṇenordhvadhātvanatikramāt /<br/> samāptaḥ saṃyojanaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ma spangs par khams gong ma las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro / kun du sbyor ba'i skabs rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bandhanāni katamāni /<br/> trīṇi bandhanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'ching ba rnams gang zhe na / 'ching ba ni gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ /<br/> kasmādetadeva trayaṃ bandhanamuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'ching ba 'dod chags thams cad dang 'ching ba zhe sdang dang gti mug thams cad do / ci'i phyir gsum po ni 'ching bar bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vidvaśād bandhanatrayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba'i dbang gis 'ching ba gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trivedanāvaśārttīṇi bandhanāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba gsum gyi dbang gis 'ching ba gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhāyāṃ hi vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete ālambanasaṃprayogābhyām /<br/> duḥkhāyāṃ dveṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur la / sdug bsngal la ni zhe sdang ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ moho na tathā rāgadveṣau /<br/> svāsāṃtanikālambanato vā niyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la ni gti mug ste / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag ni de lta ma yin no /  / yang na rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i dmigs pa'i sgo nas nges pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anuśayāḥ pūrvamevoktāḥ /<br/> upakleśāḥ vaktavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas rnams ni sngar bshad pa kho nar zad do / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te /<br/> cittopakleśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig gang dag nyon mongs pa yin pa de dag ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang yin te / sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye 'pyanye caitasāḥ kliṣṭāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃjñitāḥ /<br/> kleśebhyaste 'pyupakleśāste tu na kleśasaṃjñitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs las gzhan nyon mongs can / sems byung 'du byed phung zhes bya / gang de'ang nye ba'i nyon mongs te / de dag nyon mongs zhes mi bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rnams las gzhan pa chos nyon mongs pa can sems las byung ba 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kho na yin gyi / nyon mongs pa dag ni ma yin te / de dag kyang gzhi phran tshegs las byung ba gang dag yin ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha tu paryasthānakleśamalasaṃgṛhītāneva nirdekṣyāmaḥ /<br/> kāni punaḥ paryavasthānānītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir ni kun nas dkris pa dang nyon mongs pa'i dri mas bsdus pa kho na bstan par bya ste / kun nas dkris pa rnams gang zhe na / smras pa nyon mongs pa yang kun nas dkris pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśā apīhiparyavasthānaṃ kāmarāgaparyavasthānapratyayaduḥkhamiti sūtre vacanāt /<br/> prakaraṇaśāstre tu /<br/> āhlīkyamanapatrāpyamīrṣyāmātsaryamuddhavaḥ /<br/> kaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ ca paryavasthānamaṣṭadhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa sdug bsngal gyi rkyen zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / bstan bcos rab tu byed pa las ni / ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang / phrag dog ser sna rgod pa dang / 'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni / kun nas dkris pa rnam pa brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vaibhāṣikanyāyena punardaśa paryavasthānānyetāni cāṣṭau /<br/> krodhabhrakṣau ca /<br/> tatrāhlīkyānapatrāpye vyākhyāte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ngo / bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyis ni kun nas dkris pa bcu ste / brgyad po de dag dang khro dang 'chab pa'o / de la ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parasaṃpattau cetaso vyāroṣa īrṣyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phrag dog ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la sems khong nas 'khrug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmāmiṣakauśalapradānavirodhī cittāgraho mātsaryam /<br/> auddhatyaṃ cetaso 'vyupaśamaḥ /<br/> kaukṛtyaṃ styānaṃ ca vyākhyāte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ser sna ni chos dang zang zing dang mkhas pa rab tu sbyin pa dang 'gal ba can sems kyis kun nas 'dzin pa'o / rgod pa ni sems rnam par ma zhi ba'o / 'gyod pa dang rmugs pa ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyasaṃdhāraṇāsamarthaścittābhisaṃkṣepo middham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyid ni lus yang dag par 'dzin par mi nus pa sems mngon par sdud pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tattu kliṣṭameva paryavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang 'gyod pa ni nyon mongs pa can kho na kun nas dkris pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ /<br/> avadyapracchādanaṃ bhrakṣaḥ /<br/> eṣāṃ ca daśānāṃ paryavasthānānāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khro ba ni gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba ma gtogs pa sems can dang sems can ma yin pa la kun nas mnar sems pa gang yin pa'o / 'chab pa ni kha na ma tho ba mkhyud pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgotthā āhlīkyauddhatyamatsarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun nas dkris pa de rnams las / 'dod chags dang ngo tsha med rgod ser sna bslang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete traya upakleśā rāganiḥṣyandāḥ /<br/> bhrakṣe vivādaḥ /<br/> tṛṣṇāniḥṣyanada ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gsum po 'di dag ni 'dod chags kyi rgyu mthun pa yin no / 'chab pa rtsod do / kha cig na re / sred pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāniḥṣyanda ityapare /<br/> ubhayorityanye /<br/> yathā kramaṃ jñātājñātānāmiti /<br/> avidyātaḥ styānamiddhānapatrapāḥ /<br/> ete trayo 'vidyāniḥṣyandāḥ /<br/> kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsātaḥ kodherṣye pratighānvaye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re ma rig pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re de gnyi ga'i yin te / go rims bzhin du shes pa dang mi shes pa rnams kyi yin no zhes zer ro / ma rig pa las / rmugs dang gnyid dang khrel med do / gsum po 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i rgyu mthun pa yin no / the tshom las 'gyod khro ba dang phrag dog khong khro'i rgyu las byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ /<br/> anye ca ṣaṭkleśamalāḥ /<br/> tadyathā /<br/> māyā śāṭhyaṃ madastathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khong khro bas kun nas bslang ba dag yin te / de ltar na nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcu po de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dag yin no / gzhan yang nyon mongs dri ma drug / 'di lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradāśa upanāhaśca vihiṃsā ceti /<br/> tatra paravañcanā māyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgyu dang gyo dang rgyags pa dang / de bzhin 'tshig dang khon 'dzin dang / rnam 'tshe / de la sgyu ni gzhan 'drid pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /<br/> madaḥ pūrvoktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">g yo ni sems gya gyu ba ste / gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi 'chags gyi [*kyi?] gtam rlung bskur ba 'am mi gsal bar byed pa'o / rgyags pa ni sngar bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'tshig pa ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i dngos po dam du 'dzin pa ste / gang gis rig par gtams pa mi 'dzin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āghātavastuvahulīkāra upanāhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khon du 'dzin pa ni kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po lan mang du byed pa'o / rnam par 'tshe ba ni rnam par tho 'tshams pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate /<br/> eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ kleśamalānāṃ /<br/> rāgajau /<br/> māyāmadau pratighaje upanāhavihiṃsane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gis mtshon cha dang tshig rtsub po dag gis pha rol po rnam par tho 'tshams par byed pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma drug po de dag las / sgyu dang rgyags pa ni / 'dod chags las skyes khon 'dzin dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭyāmarśāt pradāśastu śāṭhyaṃ dṛṣṭisamutthitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam 'tshe khong khro las skyes so / 'tshig pa lta ba mchog 'dzin las / g yo ni lta bas kun nas bslang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kuṭilaṃ pāpikā dṛṣṭiriti gāthāvacanād yujyate /<br/> śāṭhyaṃ dṛṣṭiniḥṣyandaḥ /<br/> ka eṣāṃ kiṃprahātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gya gyu ci yin sdig can lta / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir gyo ni lta ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin par rung ngo / 'di dag ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāni tāvat daśa paryavasthānānyuktāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig kun nas dkris pa bcur bshad pa gang dag yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāhlīkyānapatrāpyastyānamiddhoddhavā dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med rmugs gnyid rgod rnam gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos lnga po 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyis ka dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca yaddarśanaheyasaṃprayuktaḥ sa taddarśanaprahātavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gang mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni de mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadanye bhāvanāheyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gzhan ni bsgom spang bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tebhyo 'nye paryavasthānasaṃgṛhītā upakleśā bhāvanāheyā eva /<br/> irṣyāmātsaryakaukṛtyakrodhabhrakṣāḥ svatantrāśca /<br/> svatantrāścaite pañcopakleśā adhimātrasaṃprayogitvāt /<br/> yathaite īrṣyādayaḥ pañcopakleśā bhāvanāheyāḥ /<br/> svatantrāśca tathā malāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las gzhan pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pas bsdus pa phrag dog dang ser sna dang 'gyod pa dang khro ba dang 'chab pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga po de dag ni / rang dbang can yin te / ma rig pa tsam dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro / ji ltar phrag dog la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga po de dag bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang rang dbang can yin pa / de bzhin dri ma rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṭkleśamalāstathaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa'i dri ma drug kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete punaryathoktā upakleśāḥ /<br/> kāme 'śubhāḥ /<br/> kāmadhātāvakuśalāḥ /<br/> tatrāpi /<br/> trayo dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ji skad du bshad pa de dag ni / 'dod na mi dge / 'dod pa'i khams na ni mi dge ba dag yin no / de dag las kyang / gsum rnam gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">styānauddhatyamiddhānyakuśalāvyākṛtāni /<br/> pareṇāvyākṛtāstataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang gnyid rnams ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no / de yan chad ni lung ma bstan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātorurdhvamavyākṛtāḥ upakleśā yathāsaṃbhavam /<br/> kati punareṣāṃ kutastyā veditavyāḥ /<br/> māyā śāṭhyaṃ ca kāmādyadhyānayoḥ /<br/> etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams yan chad kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni ci rigs par lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no / de dag las du zhig gang na yod par rig par bya zhe na / 'dod dang bsam gtan dang po na / g yo sgyu / 'di gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ brahmaloke māyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na sgyu ji ltar yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmavañcanāt /<br/> sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /<br/> uktamapi śāṭhyaṃ prasaṅgāgataṃ punarevoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pas 'drid phyir ro / tshangs pa chen po de ni bdag nyid log par kun ston pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'dred par zhugs so / g yo ni bshad zin mod kyi zhar la 'ongs pas smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">styānauddhatyamadā dhātutraye /<br/> ete trayastraidhātukāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs rgod rgyags pa khams gsum na / gsum po 'di dag ni khams gsum po dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye kāmadhātujāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na 'dod khams las skyes pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ pañcāpanīyānya ekādaśopakleśāḥ kāmāvacarā eva /<br/> uktā kleśāḥ upakleśāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu drug las lnga bor te / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcu gcig ni 'dod pa na spyod pa kho na yin no / nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāmanuśayānāṃ kati manobhūmikāḥ kati ṣaḍvijñānakāyikāḥ /<br/> saṃkṣepataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang de rnams las yid kyis pa ni du zhig yin / rnam par shes pa drug gi sa pa ni du zhig yin zhe na / mdor bsdu na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samānasiddhā dṛggheyā manovijñānabhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong spang bya nyid nga rgyal bcas / yid rnam shes kyi sa pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad ni yid kyi sa pa dag yin te / gnyid dang nga rgyal bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang yang bcas pa thams cad ni yid kyi sa pa dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hi sakale manobhūmike /<br/> upakleśāḥ svatantrāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni thams cad yid kyi sa pa dag yin no / nye ba'i nyon mongs rang dbang yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rang dbang can gang dag yin pa de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin yang yid kyi sa pa kho na yin par blta bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaḍvijñānāśrayāḥ pare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni rnam shes drug rten can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye kleśopakleśāḥ ṣaḍvijñānabhūmikāḥ veditavyāḥ /<br/> ke punaranye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dag ni rnam par shes pa drug gis pa dag yin par rig par bya'o / gzhan yang gang dag cig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāprahātavyā rāgapratighāvidyā upakleśāśca tatsaṃprayuktāḥ /<br/> āhlīkyānapatrāpyastyānauddhatyāni /<br/> ye ca kleśamahābhūmikeṣūktāḥ /<br/> yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ /<br/> sukhabhyāṃ saṃprayukto hi rāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang ma rig pa rnams dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dang rmugs pa dang rgod pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i sa pa mang po ba dag gi nang du bshad pa gang dag yin pa'o / bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po gang dag yin pa / de dag las dbang po gang zhig nyon mongs pa 'am / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang dang mtshungs par ldan zhe na / bde ba dag dang 'dod chags su
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /<br/> dveṣo viparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs ldan / 'dod chags ni bde ba dang yid bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan no /  / zhe sdang bzlog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhābhyāmityarthaḥ /<br/> duḥkhena daurmanasyena ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dag dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">harṣadainyākāravartitvāt ṣaṅvijñānabhūmikatvācca rāgadveṣayoḥ /<br/> mohaḥ sarvaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag ni dga' ba dang skyo ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir dang rnam par shes pa drug gi sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāyāḥ sarvakleśasaṃprayogitvāt pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayogaḥ /<br/> asaddṛṣṭirmanoduḥkhasukhena tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rig pa dag thams cad dang / ma rig pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dbang po lnga char dang yang mtshungs par ldan no / med lta yid bde sdug bsngal dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manoduḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ manaḥsukhaṃ saumanasyaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid sdug bsngal ba ni yid mi bde ba'o / yid bde ba ni yid bde ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">log par lta ba ni de dag de dang mtshungs par ldan te / bsod nams kyi las can rnams dang sdig pa'i las can rnams kyi dang go rims bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daurmanasyena kāṅkṣā /<br/> saṃśayito hi niścayenārthī durmanāyate /<br/> anye saumanasyena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid mi bde ba dang the tshom mo / the tshom zos pa nges pa don du gnyer ba na / yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye 'nuśayāḥ saumanasyenaiva saṃprayuktāḥ /<br/> ke punaranye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yid bde dang phra rgyas gzhan dag ni yid bde ba kho na dang mtshungs par ldan no / gzhan yang gang dag gcig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catasro dṛṣṭano mānaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba bzhi dang nga rgyal te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">harṣākāravartitvāt /<br/> kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ime 'nuśayā nirdiṣṭāḥ /<br/> āha /<br/> kāmajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dga' ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro / phra rgyas su bshad pa de dag ci zhig dang ldan zhe na / 'dod las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ pratiniyataṃ saṃprayogamuktvā sāmānyenāha /<br/> sarve 'pyupekṣayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na mtshungs par ldan pa so sor nges pa bshad nas spyir smras pa / btang snyoms dang kun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve 'pyete 'nuśayā upekṣendriyeṇa saṃprayuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra rgyas 'di dag thams cad ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravāhacchedakāle kila kleśānāmavaśyamupekṣā saṃtiṣṭhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyun 'chad pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar btang snyoms kun du gnas so zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhobhūmikāḥ kathamityāha /<br/> svaiḥ svairyathābhumyūrdhvabhūmikāḥ /<br/> svaiḥ svairindriyairurdhvabhūmikā anuśayāḥ saṃprayujyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sa gong ma pa rnams ji lta bur zhe na / sa gong ma rnams / sa ji bzhin du rang rang dang sa gong ma'i phra rgyas rnams ni sa gang na dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa rang rang gi dbang po rnams dang mtshungs par ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāṃ bhūmau yāvantīndriyāṇi /<br/> tatrāpi cāturvijñānakāyikāścāturvijñānakāyikairmanobhūmikā manobhūmikaireva yathāsaṃbhavam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na yang ci rigs par rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhin pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan la yid kyi sa pa rnams ni yid kyi sa pa rnams kho na dang mtshungs par ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaḥ kleśānāmindriyasaṃprayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rnams dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upakleśānāṃ punaḥ /<br/> daurmanasyena kaukṛtyamīrṣyā krodho vihiṃsanam /<br/> upanāhaṃ pradāśaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams las / 'gyod dang phrag dog khong khro dang / rnam 'tshe khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa yid mi bde ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayuktānīti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dainyākāravartitvādeṣāṃ manobhūmikatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni skyo ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir dang yid kyi sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang ser sna dag gi bzlog pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mātsaryaṃ tu viparyayāt /<br/> saumanasyenetyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lobhānvayatvena harṣākāravartitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba dga' ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">māyā śāṭhyamathī bhrakṣo middhaṃ cobhayathā /<br/> saumanasyadaurmanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayujyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">g yo dang sgyu dang rgyags 'chab gnyid / gnyi ga dang ldan / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadāciddhi sumanāḥ paraṃ vañcayate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni yid bde ba dag gis pha rol po 'drid par byed la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadāciddurmanāḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvat svapiti /<br/> madaḥ /<br/> sukhābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">res 'ga' ni yid mi bde ba dag gis te / gnyid kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o / bde dag dang rgyags pa / bsam gtan gsum pa na ni bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye dhyāne sukhenādhastātsaumanasyena ūrdhvamupekṣayā /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> sarvagopekṣā /<br/> atastayā sarve 'nuśayāḥ saṃprayujyante /<br/> na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ /<br/> cātvāryanyāni pañcabhiḥ /<br/> āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante /<br/> akuśalamahābhūmikatvāt kleśamahābhūmikatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">man chad na ni yid bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no / yan chad na ni btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan no / 'di ltar btang snyoms kun du 'gro / thams cad btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan te / de ni ma rig pa bzhin du gang la yang 'gag pa med do / bzhi po gzhan ni lnga dag dang / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dang rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang kun nas dkris pa bzhi po 'di dag ni dbang po lnga char dang mtshungs par ldan te / mi dge ba'i sa mang po ba yin pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca /<br/> tatra kiṃ traidhātukyaḥ styānauddhatyavicikitsā gṛhyante /<br/> atha kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva /<br/> kevalo 'yaṃ paripūrṇo'kuśala rāśiryaduta pañca nivaraṇānītyekāntākuśalatvavacanātsūtre /<br/> kāme nivaraṇāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang the tshom dang sgrib pa lnga gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de la ci rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang the tshom khams gsum pa dag bzung ngam / 'on te 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag kho na gzung zhe na / mdo las / 'di ni mi dge ba'i phung po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin te / 'di lta ste / sgrib pa lnga'o zhes gcig tu mi dge bar gsungs pa'i phyir dang 'dod na sgrib rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānyatra dhātau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod na khams gzhan na ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir rmugs pa dang gnyid gnyis kyang sgrib pa gcig tu bshad la / rgod pa dang 'gyod pa gnyis kyang gcig tu bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekavipakṣāhārakṛtyataḥ /<br/> dvyekatā /<br/> dvayorekatā dvyekatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi mthun dang zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir / gnyis gcig / gnyis gcig tu byas pa ni gnyis gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣo 'nāhāra ityeko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi mthun pa dag dang gnyen po dang zas ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">styānamiddhayoreka āhāraḥ sūtre 'nāhāraśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las rmugs pa dang gnyid dag gi zas kyang gcig / zas ma yin pa yang gcig tu gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ styānamiddhanivaraṇasyāhāraḥ /<br/> pañca dharmāḥ /<br/> tandrā aratirvijṛmbhikā bhakte 'samatā cetaso līnatvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas gang zhe na / chos lnga ste / rmya ba dang mi dga' ba dang bya rmyang dang kha zas kyi drod mi zin pa dang sems zhum pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha styānamiddhanivaraṇasyānāhāraḥ ālokasaṃjñeti /<br/> kṛtyamanayorapyekam /<br/> ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na / snang ba'i 'du shes so / 'di gnyis kyi bya ba yang gcig ste / 'di gnyi gas kyang sems zhum par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">auddhatyakaukṛtyayorapyeka āhāra uktaḥ ekonāhāraḥ /<br/> kaścauddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasyāhāraḥ /<br/> catvāro dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dag gis kyang zas kyang gcig / zas ma yin pa yang gcig tu gsungs te / rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i zas gang zhe na / chos bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti /<br/> kaścauddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasyānāhāraḥ /<br/> śamatha iti /<br/> kṛtyamapyanayorekam /<br/> ubhe api hyete cittamavyupaśāntaṃ vartayataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye du'i rnam par rtog pa dang yul gyi rnam par rtog pa dang mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang sngon dgod pa dang rtses pa dang dga' ba dang dga' mgur yongs su spyad pa rnams rjes su dran pa yin no / rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na / zhi gnas so / 'di gnyis kyi bya ba yang gcig ste / 'di gnyi gas kyang sems rnam par ma zhi bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata ekavipakṣāhārakṛtyatvāt dvayorapyekatvamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na mi mthun pa dang zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir gnyis gcig tu bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi sarvakleśā nivaraṇaṃ kasmāt pañcaivoktāni /<br/> pañcatā skandhavidhātavicikitsanāt /<br/> kāmacchandavyāpādābhyāṃ śīlaskandhavidhātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sgrib pa yin na ci'i phyir lnga kho nar bshad ce na / phung po gnod byed dang the tshom phyir na lnga nyid do / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnod par byed do / rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis ni shes rab kyi phung po la gnod par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgod pa dang 'gyod pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gnod par byed do / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dag med na / bden pa dag la the tshom za bar 'gyur te / de'i phyir lngar bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rtog pa 'di la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang 'gal ba rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa sngar smos par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yathāsaṃkhyametābhyāṃ samādhiprajñāskandhopaghāta ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir grangs bzhin du 'di gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po la gnod par byed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhiprayuktasya hi styānamiddhādbhayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin la brtson pa ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis 'jigs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmapravicayaprayuktasyauddhatyakaukṛtyāditi /<br/> anye tvanyathā varṇayanti /<br/> kathaṃ varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la brtson pa ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pas 'jigs so zhes zer ro / gzhan dag ni gzhan du brjod do / ji skad du brjod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu bar gyur bas gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i yul dag la mtshan mar gzung ba'i phyir gnas par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa la / de sngon du 'gro ba'i 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dag dang po nyid du bar chad byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas rigs pa ma yin par zhi gnas lhag mthong bstan pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang the tshom ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dge la bar chad byed la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyutthitasyāpi dharmanidhyānakāle vicikitsāntarāyaṃ karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">langs pa la yang chos la 'os par rtog pa'i tshe the tshom gyi bar chad byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ pañca nivaraṇānyuktāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir sgrib pa lngar bshad do zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ vicāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dpyad par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba rnams dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa la rnams gang gi tshe dmigs pa yongs su shes pa de'i tshe ni spong bar mi 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe spong bar 'gyur la de'i tshe ni dmigs pa yongs su mi shes na ji ltar de dag spong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāvaśyamālambanaparijñānāt kleśānāṃ kṣayo bhavati /<br/> kim tarhi /<br/> caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ /<br/> katamaiścaturbhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rnams ni dmigs pa yongs su shes pas zad par nges pa ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / rnam pa bzhis so / rnam pa bzhi po gang dag gis she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaheyānāṃ tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanaparijñānāttadālambanasaṃkṣayāt /<br/> ālambanagrahāṇācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa yongs su shes pa dang de la dmigs pa yang dag par / zad dang dmigs pa spangs pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrālambanaparijñānād duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyānāṃ svabhūmyālambanānāmanāsravālambanānāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dmigs pa yongs su shes pas ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba rang gi sa la dmigs pa rnams dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang par bya ba zag pa med pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadālambanasaṃkṣayād visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇām /<br/> tadālambanā hi sabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ /<br/> teṣu prahīṇeṣu te 'pi prahīṇā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dmigs pa yang dag par zad pas ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba rnams zad par 'gyur te / de la dmigs pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag yin pas de dag spangs na de dag kyang spang ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanaprahāṇānnirodhamārgaheyānāṃ sāsravālambanānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa spangs pas ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te hyanāsravālambanāsteṣāmālambanam /<br/> atasteṣu prahīṇeṣu te 'piprahīṇā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa la dmigs pa rnams ni de dag gi dmigs pa yin pas de dag spangs na de dag kyang spang ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyānāṃ punaḥ /<br/> pratipakṣodayāt kṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni gnyen po skyes pas zad par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gang dag gi gnyen po lam gang yin pa skyes pa de spong bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasya punaḥ kaḥ pratipakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi gnyen po gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhimātrādhimātrasya mṛdumṛduriti vistāreṇa paścāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> katividhaśca pratipakṣa ityāha /<br/> prahāṇādhārabhūtatvadūṣaṇāruyaścaturvidhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chen po'i chen po ni chung ngu'i chung ngu zhes bya ba ste / rgyas par ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o / gnyen po yang rnam pa du ma zhig yod ce na smras pa / gnyen po rnam bzhi spong ba dang / gzhi dang srid nyid rnam par ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratipakṣaḥ /<br/> prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sun 'byin zhes bya spong ba gnyen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādhārapratipakṣastasmātpareṇāryo mārgo yena tatprāpitaṃ prahāṇamādhāryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi gnyen po ni de yan chad kyi lam gang yin pa ste / gang gis des thob pa'i spong ba kun du 'dzin par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dūrībhāvapratipakṣo vimuktimārgātpareṇa yo mārgaśchinnaprāptidūrīkaraṇāt /<br/> vimuktimārgo 'pītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thag bsring ba'i ngo bo'i gnyen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam yan chad kyi lam gang yin pa ste / rnyed pa chad pa thag bsring ba'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re rnam par grol ba'i lam yang yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'pi hi tāṃ prāpti dūrīkaroti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des kyang thob pa de thag srid par byed do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par sun 'byin pa'i gnyen po ni lam gang gis khams de la skyon du mthong nas rnam par sun 'byin par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tveṣāmiyamātupūrvīṃ sādhvī bhavet /<br/> vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo duḥkhasamudayālambanaḥ prayogamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang 'di dag gi go rims rnam par sun 'byin pa'i gnyen po ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa sbyor ba'i lam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ sarva ānantaryamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spong ba gnyen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādhārapratipakṣo vimuktimārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhi gnyen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dūrībhāvapratipakṣo viśeṣamārga iti /<br/> prahīyamāṇaḥ kleśaḥ kutaḥ prahātavyaḥ /<br/> prahātavyaḥ kleśa ālambanāt mataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thag bsring ba'i ngo bo'i gnyen po ni khyad par gyi lam mo zhes bya ba 'di ni ches legs par 'gyur ro / nyon mongs pa spong ba na gang las spang bar bya zhe na / dmigs pa las nyon mongs pa ni spang bar byar 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate /<br/> yasmānna punastadālambyotpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pa las ni nyon mongs par rnam par dbye bar mi nus so / dmigs pa las ni nus te / 'di ltar yang de la dmigs nas mi skyi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatastāvacchakyetālambanādvivecayitum /<br/> atītastu katham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ma 'ongs pa ni dmigs pa las rnam par da bye bar yang nus grang na 'das pa go ji ltar nus
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athālambana parijñānātprahātavya ityayamasyārthaḥ /<br/> eṣo 'pi naikāntaḥ /<br/> tasmādvaktavyametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'di'i don ni dmigs pa yongs su shes pas spang bar bya ba 'di yin no zhe na de yang ma nges te / de lta bas na 'di brjod par bya dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyatā kleśaḥ prahīṇo vaktavyaḥ /<br/> svāsaṃtānikaḥ prāpticchedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji tsam gyis na nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes brjod ce na rang gi rgyud la yod pa ni thob pa chad pas so / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pārasāṃtānikastu kleśaḥ sarvaṃ ca rūpamakliṣṭaśca dharmastadālambanasvāsāṃtānikakleśaprahāṇāt /<br/> dūrībhāva ityucyate /<br/> katividhho dūrībhāvaḥ /<br/> caturvidhā kila dūratā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa ni nyon mongs pa dang gzugs med pa thams cad dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos ni de dag la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa rang gi rgyud la yod pa spangs pa'o / thag bsring ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba thag bsring ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du yod ce na / thag bsring ba'i ngo bo ni rnam pa bzhi yod do zhes grag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vailakṣaṇyādvipakṣatvāddeśavicchedakālataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid mi mthun mi mthun phyogs / yul rnams chad dang dus kyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtaśīlapradeśādhvadvayānāmiva dūratā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung dang tshul khrims phyogs dang ni / dus gnyis ring ba nyid lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vilakṣaṇadūratā yathā mahābhūtānām /<br/> vailakṣaṇyātsahajānāmapi dūratā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshan nyid kyis ring ba nyid ni dper na 'byung ba chen po rnams lhan cig skyes pa yin yang mtshan nyid mi mthun pas ring ba nyid lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vipakṣadūratā yathā śīlasya dauḥśīlyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyen pos ring ba nyid ni dper na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las tshul khrims lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">deśavicchedadūratā yathā viprakṛṣṭadeśānāṃ deśavicchedāt pūrvapaścimasamudravat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul gyis ring ba nyid ni dper na bskal pa'i yul rnam par chad pas te / shar dang nub kyi rgya mtsho bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāladūratā yathā atītānāgatadūramucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus kyis ring ba nyid ni dper na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dutastaddūram /<br/> vartamānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ring ba zhes bya ba de gang las ring ba yin / de ltar las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadanantarātamutpadyamānaṃ vā tat kathaṃ dūram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das ma thag pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ji ltar na ring ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhvanānātvena taddūraṃ na cirabhūtabhāvitvena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni dus tha dad pa nyid kyis ring ba yin gyi yun ring mo zhig na byung ba dang 'byung ba nyid kyis ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vartamānamapyevaṃ dūraṃ prāpnoti /<br/> akāritrā ttarhi taddūram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar yang de bzhin du ring bar 'gyur ro / 'o na ni byed pas ring ba nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtasya kathamantikatvaṃ sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas ji ltar na nye ba nyid du 'grub
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatra tatprāpteḥ /<br/> atītānāgate 'pi tatprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de thams cad du thob pa'i phyir ro / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśaṃ ca katham /<br/> evaṃ tarhyatītānāgatamanyo 'nyaṃ varttamānavyavahitatvād dūram /<br/> varttamānamubhayo rāsannatvādantikam /<br/> asaṃskṛtaṃ cāpyavyavahitatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' yang ji ltar nye ba yin / de lta na 'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni da ltar gyis chod pa'i phyir phan tshun du ring ba nyid yin no / de ltar ni gnyi ga dang nye ba'i phyir nye ba yin la / 'dus ma byas kyang chod pa med pa'i phyir nye ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapyatītānāgataṃ varttamānasyāntikatvādubhayaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syāt /<br/> dharmasvalakṣaṇādanāgataṃ dūramasaṃprāptatvāt /<br/> atītaṃ ca pracyutatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nye ba'i phyir gnyi gar 'gyur ro / 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i phyir chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid las ring ba yin la / 'das pa ni zhig pa'i phyir ring ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /<br/> naitadasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci lam khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi spangs pa yang dang yang du khyad par du 'gyur ram zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣāṃ hi kleśānāṃ /<br/> sakṛt kṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni med de nyon mongs pa thams cad ni lan cig tu zad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenaiva tasya kṣayaḥ /<br/> visaṃyogalābhasteṣāṃ punaḥ punaḥ /<br/> katiṣu kāleṣvityāha ṣaṭsu kāleṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi spong ba'i lam gang yin pa de kho nas de zad pa yin no / de dag gi dral ba'i thob pa yang dang yang / dus du zhig tu zhe na / smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratipakṣodayaphalaprāptīndriyavivṛddhiṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus drug tu ste / gnyen po skyes dang 'bras thob dang dbang po rnam par 'phel rnams su
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratipakṣo vimuktimārga etasminnabhipretaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni gnyen po'i rnam par grol ba'i lam min par bsams pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalāni catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu dag ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyavivṛddhirindriyasaṃcāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnam par 'phel ba ni dbang po lnga po 'pho ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eteṣu kāleṣu kleśasya visaṃyogalābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus de dag tu nyon mongs pa'i bral ba 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punareṣa yathāyogaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /<br/> keṣāñcit ṣaṭsu kāleṣu keṣāñcid yāvaddvayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang ci rigs par kha cig gis dus drug tu 'thob pa nas kha cig gis ni dus gnyis kyi bar du 'thob par blta bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bral ba de nyid gnas skabs de dang de dag tu yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo / yongs su shes pa ni gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye shes kyi yongs su shes pa dang spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra jñānaparijñā sāsravaṃ jñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ye shes kyi yongs su shes pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇaparijñā tu prahāṇameva /<br/> phale hetūpacārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni spang ba kho na ste / 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimekaiva parijñā sarvaprahāṇam /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> parijñā nava /<br/> tatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci spangs pa thams cad yongs su shes pa gcig kho na yin nam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / yongs su shes dgu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmādyaprakāradvayasaṃkṣayaḥ /<br/> ekā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig 'dod pa na / dang po'i rnam gnyis zad la gcig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātāvādyasya prakāradvayasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyasya prahāṇamekā parijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams na dang po'i rnam pa gnyis te / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa gcig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis zad pa ni de gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātāveva nirodhadarśanaheyasya prakārasyaprahāṇamekā parijñā /<br/> mārgadarśanaheyasyaikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams kho na na 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs ba ni yongs su shes pa gcig yin la / lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs pa yang gcig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ /<br/> tathordhvaṃ nisra eva tāḥ /<br/> rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs ba yongs su shes pa gsum yin pa ltar / de bzhin gong ma'i de gsum nyid / de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs pa yang yongs su shes pa gsum yin te / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gcig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇamekā nirodhadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ dvitīyā mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gnyis yin no / lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gsum yin no / de ltar na khams gsum pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa drug yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyā avarabhāgīyarūpasarvāsravakṣayāḥ /<br/> tisraḥ parijñāḥ /<br/> avarabhāgīyaprahāṇamekā parijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su shes pa gzhan gsum ste tha ma'i cha dang mthun gzugs dang zag pa kun zad / tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa yang / yongs su shes pa gcig yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāsravaprahāṇamekā rūparāgakṣayaparijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi zag pa spangs pa yang gcig yin te / gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyāptānāṃ sarvāsravaprahāṇamekā sarvasaṃyojanaparyādāna parijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa thams cad spangs pa yang gcig yin te / kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni tha dad par bstan la mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyānāmatulyapratipakṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spong bar bya ba rnams kyi gnyen po mi 'dra pa'i phyir ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetā nava parijñāḥ /<br/> āsāṃ pūrvikāḥ /<br/> ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na yongs su shes pa ni de dgu yin no / de dag las / snga ma drug bzod 'bras
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvāḥ /<br/> jñānasya śeṣitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa'o / lhag ma rnams ni shes pa yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avarabhāgīyaprahāṇādiparijñā bhāvanāmārgaphalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa la sogs pa'i yongs su shes pa ste / bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṣāntiphalaṃ parijñā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar yongs su shes pa bzod pa'i 'bras bu yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa rnams ni shes pa'i 'khor can yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rājaparivāre rājopacāravat /<br/> jñānaikaphalatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyal po'i 'khor la rgyal po nye bar btags pa bzhin pa dang shes pa dang 'bras bu gcig pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamyaphalaṃ sarvā dhyānānāṃ pañca vāthavā /<br/> aṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi lcogs med 'bras thams cad do / bsam gtan rnams kyi lnga'am brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyis ni bsam gtan kyi [*gyi?] dngos gzhi'i 'bras bu yongs su shes pa lnga ste / gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spongs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarakleśaprahāṇasyānāgamyaphalatvāt bhadantaghoṣakasya matenāṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti /<br/> anāsravavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa yang bral ba'i thob pa zad pa med pa rnyed pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam gyi 'bras bur 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñā tvanāgamyaphalameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānavaddraṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan khyad par can yang bsam gtan bzhin du blta bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyāṇāṃ tu /<br/> sāmantakasyaikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa rnams kyis ni nye bar bsdogs pa gcig yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakasyaikā rūparāgakṣayaparijñā phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyi 'bras bu ni gcig yin te / gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulārūpyatrayasya ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med dngos gzhi gsum gyi yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulānāṃ ca trayāṇāmārūpyāṇāmekaiva sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñā phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi gsum gyi 'bras bu yang gcig kho na ste / kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryamārgasya sarvāḥ /<br/> nava parijñāḥ phalam /<br/> dve laukikasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su shes pa dgu po thams cad 'phags pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin no / gnyis / 'jig rten pa yi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukisya mārgasya dve avarabhāgīyarūparāgakṣayaparijñe phalam /<br/> anvayasya ca

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaḥ kaścidapūrvā labhate /<br/> kaścid dve yaḥ kevalādārūpyadhātuvairāgyāt parihīyate /<br/> kaścit ṣaṭ yo 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīyate /<br/> pañca tu nai kaścillabhate /<br/> samāptaḥ parijñāprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> abhidharmakośabhāṣye 'nuśayanirddeśo nāma /<br/> pañcamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptmiti /<br/> śrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyam /<br/> ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> namo buddhāya /<br/> uktaṃ yathā prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la la zhig gis sngon med pa 'thob bo / la las ni gnyis te / gang zhig gzugs med pa'i khams las / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'ba' zhig las yongs su nyams pas so / kha cig gis ni drug ste / gang zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa'o / lnga 'thob pa ni 'ga' yang med pa nyid do / yongs su shes pa'i skabs rdzogs so / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las / phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas lnga pa'o / sarba mangg'a lam / / ji skad du spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob po zhes bshad pa de yang

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāvidānīṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgau kimanāsravau sāsravāviti vaktavyam

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgastu lokottara eva traidhātukapratipakṣatvāt /<br/> navaprakārāṇāṃ darśana heyānāṃ sakṛtprahāṇācca /<br/> na hi laukikasya eṣā śaktirasti /<br/> satyadarśanādityuktam /<br/> kānīmāni satyāni kati ca /<br/> satyānyuktāni catvāri /<br/> vavoktāni /<br/> sāsravānāsravadharmanirdeśe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam ni khams gsum pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam pa dgu cig car du sprang ba'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa kho na yin te / 'jig rten pa la ni de 'dra ba'i mthu med do / bden pa mthong ba las zhes bshad pa / bden pa de dag kyang gang zhig tu / bden pa dag ni bzhir bshad do / gang du bshad ce na / chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa bstan par zag med lam gyi bden pa dang zhes lam gyi bden ba rang gi ming gis bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravā mārgasatyamiti svaśabdena pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga iti nirodhasatyaṃ duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye /<br/> kimeṣa evaiṣāmanukramaḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang / bral ba'o zhes 'gog pa'i bden ba bstan to / sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang / zhes bya ba der sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden bdag bstan to / ci 'di dag gi rim pa 'di kho na yin nam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog dang lam ste de ltar na

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi rim ba ni 'di yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvastu yathā pūrvamuktastayaivetipradarśanārthastathāśabdaḥ /<br/> sa punarayam /<br/> eṣāṃ yathā 'bhisamayaṃ kramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi ngo bo ni sngar ji skad bshad ba de kho na bzhin no zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro / de ni / de dag ji ltar mngon rtogs rim
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya hi satyasyābhisamayaḥ pūrvasya pūrvanirdeśaḥ /<br/> itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa gang zhig sngar mngon par rtogs pa de sngar bstan to / de lta ma yin na rgyu ni sngar bstan la 'bras bu ni phyis bstan par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">keṣāñcidutpattyanukūlā deśanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni skye ba dang mthun pa bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā smṛtyupasthānadhyānādīnām /<br/> deṣāñcitprarūpaṇānukūlā deśanā yathā samyak prahāṇānām /<br/> na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati /<br/> paścādanutpannānāmanutpādāyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / bsam gtan la sogs pa lta bu'o / kha cig ni rab tu brtag pa dang mthun par bstan te / dper na yang dag par spong ba rnams lta bu ste / gang sngar ni skyes pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed la / phyis ni ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun bskyed pa'i nges pa 'di ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyānāṃ tvabhisamayānukūlā deśanā /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamevameṣāṃ satyānāmabhisamayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa rnams ni mngon bar rtogs pa dang mthun par bstan pa yin no / ci'i phyir bden pa rnams de ltar mngon par rtogs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la chags pa dang gang gis gnod pa byed pa dang gang las thar pa don du gnyer ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bden bde nyid la dang por rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na yongs su rtog la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyis 'di'i rgyu ni gang zhig yin zhes kun 'byung gi bden pa la yongs su rtog go / 'di'i 'gog pa ni gang zhig yin zhes 'gog pa'i bden ba la yongs su rtog go / 'di'i lam ni gang zhig yin zhes lam gyi bden pa la yongs su rtog ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyādhiṃ dṛṣṭvā tannidānakṣayameṣajānveṣāṇavat /<br/> sūtre 'pyeṣa eva satyānāṃ dṛṣṭānto darśitaḥ /<br/> katamasmin sūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nad mthong bas de'i gzhi dang zad pa dang sman tshol ba bzhin no / bden pa rnams kyi dpe 'di ni mdo las kyang bshad do / mdo gang las she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣaktalpasarttetyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i sman pas zug rdu 'byin pa zhes gsungs pa de las bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ /<br/> pūrvavedhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngar 'phangs pa'i phyir ji ltar rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na bden ba la yongs su rtog pa de kho na bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang bden pa mngon par rtogs te
