</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭabhūminiḥsaṃgāśvadhāvanavat /<br/> abhisamaya iti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> abhisaṃbodha iṇo bodhanārthatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dkyus sa bstan pa'i rta thags thogs med par rgyug pa bzhin no / mngon bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni ci zhe na / mngon par yang dag par rtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karamādanāsrava eva na sāsravaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir zag ba med pa kho na yin gyi zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi nirvāṇābhimukhaḥ samyakbodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par yang dag par rtog pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyagiti tattvena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra phalabhūtā upādānaskandhā duḥkhasatyam /<br/> hetubhūtāḥ samudayasatyam /<br/> samudetyasmāditi kṛtvā /<br/> ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nye bar len pa'i phung po 'bras bur gyur pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin no / rgyur gyur pa rnams ni kun 'byung gi bden ba yin te / 'di las kun 'byung ba'i phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir 'di gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pas ming gi sgo nas bye brag yod kyi rdzas su ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhamārgayostu dravyato 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang lam ni rdzas su yang bye brag yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryasatyānīti sūtra ucyante /<br/> ko 'syārthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes 'byung ba de'i don ci zhe na / 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams la bden pas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryāṇāmetānisatyāni tasmādāryasatyānīti sūtra evoktam /<br/> kimanyeṣāmetāni mṛṣā /<br/> sarveṣāmetāni satyānyaviparītatvāt /<br/> āryaistu yathaitāni tathā dṛṣṭāni nānyaiḥ /<br/> ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na mdo kho na las / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bshad do / ci 'di dag gzhan rnams la brdzun nam zhe na / 'di dag ni phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir thams cad la bden na 'phags pa rnams kyis ni 'di dag ji lta bde kho na bzhin du gzigs kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa zhes bya ba'i phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i phyir 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te / tshigs su bcad pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāryāḥ sukhataḥ prāhustat pare duḥkhato biduḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pas bde bar gang gsungs pa / de ni gzhan gyis sdug bsngal rig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatpare sukhatḥ prāhustadāryā duḥkhato biduḥ /<br/> iti gāthā /<br/> dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare /<br/> yathā vedanaikadeśo duḥkhasvabhāvaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ sarve sāsravāḥ saṃskārā duḥkhamityucyante /<br/> duḥkhāstriduḥkhatāyogādyathāyogamaśeṣataḥ /<br/> manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ /<br/> tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca /<br/> tābhiryathāyogamaśeṣataḥ sarva sāsravāḥ saṃskārā duḥkhāḥ /<br/> tatra manāṣā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā /<br/> amanāṣā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā /<br/> tebhyo 'nye saṃskāraduḥkhatayā /<br/> ke punarmanāpāḥ ke 'manāṣāḥ ke knobhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyis bde bar gang smras pa / de ni 'phags pas sdug bsngal rig / ces 'byung ngo / gzhan dag na re gnyis ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin la / gnyis ni 'phags pa yang yin 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yang yin no zhes zer ro / gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar na 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal zhes brjod ce na / yid 'ong yid du mi 'ong dang / de las gzhan zag bcas rnams nyid / sdug bsngal nyid gsum ldan pa'i phyir / ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo / sdug bsngal nyid ni gsum ste / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid do / de dag gis ci rigs par 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ma lus par sdug bsngal ba yin te / de la yid du 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do / yid du mi 'ong ba rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do / de dag las gzhan pa rnams ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do / yid du 'ong ba ni gang dag yin / yid du mi 'ong ba ni gang dag yin / gnyi ga ma yin pa ni gang dag yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante /<br/> sukhāyā hi vedanāyā vipariṇāmena duḥkhatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba gsum dang go rims bzhin te / de'i dbang gis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'i ming 'thob po / bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkhti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / bde ba'i tshor ba ni skye ba na yang bde / gnas pa na yang bde la / 'gyur ba na sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhāyāḥ duḥkhasvabhāvenaiva duḥkhatā /<br/> duḥkhā vedanā utpādaduḥkhā sthitiduḥkhā iti sūtre /<br/> aduḥkhāsukhāvedanāyāḥ saṃskāreṇaiva duḥkhatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de / mdo las / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni skye ba na yang sdug bsngal la / gnas pa na yang sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so / bde ba yang ma yin / sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni rkyen gyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇādyadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanāvattadvedanīyā api saṃskārā ucyante /<br/> duḥkhameva duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang tshor ba dang 'dra bar brjod do / gzhan dag na re sdug bsngal nyid sdug bsngal nyid yin pas sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvat saṃskārā eva duḥkhatetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed nyid sdug bsngal yin pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asādhāraṇatvāt manāṣā 'manāpānāṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhaduḥkhate ukte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gyur ba yang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dag ni yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve tusaṃskārāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhāḥ /<br/> tāṃstvāryā eva paśyanti /<br/> āha cātra /<br/> ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed thams cad ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba nyid la de dag kyang 'phags pa rnams kho nas gzigs so / 'dir smras pa / lag mthil sbu nyag gcig 'dug pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyis ni mi rtogs la / de nyid mig tu song na ni / mi bde ba dang gnod skyed ltar / byis pa lag mthil 'dab yis / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karatalasadṛśo bālo na vetti saṃskāraduḥkhatāpakṣma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed sdug bsngal spu mi rtogs / 'phags pa mig dang 'dra ba ni / de yis shin tu yid kyang 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akṣisadṛśastu vidvāṃstenaivodvijyate gāḍhamiti /<br/> na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'phags pa rnams srid pa'i rtse mo pa dag la yang sdug bsngal gyi blo 'jug pa ltar byis pa rnams ni mnar med pa'i phung po rnams la yang de ltar sdug bsngal gyi blo mi 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi mārgasyāpi saṃskāraduḥkhatāprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> saṃskṛtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na 'o na ni lam yang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir lam ni sdug bsngal ba ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de skye ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa 'dren pa'i 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe de dag mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar lta ba de'i tshe yang / sdug bsngal du mthong ba gang yin pa de kho na'i 'gog pa la zhi bar lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāpi duḥkhamapyatrāsti tasmāt duḥkhamevāryasatyamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'di dag la bde ba yang yod pa de'i tshe ci'i phyir sdug bsngal kho na 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasyālpatvāt mūdgādibhāve 'pi māṣarāśyapadeśavadityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re bde ba myong ba'i phyir te / mon sran sde'u la sogs pa yod bzhin du mon sran gre'u'i phung bo zhes ston pa bzhin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet /<br/> āha khalvapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mkhas pa su zhig chus btab pa'i bde ba chung dus 'bras bu bde ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur / yang smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasya ca hetutvāt duḥkhaiścānalpakaiḥ samuditatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi ni rgyu phyir dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti iti /<br/> sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /<br/> saṃskāraduḥkhataikarasatvāt /<br/> ato duḥkhamevāryāsatyaṃ vyavasthāpyate na sukham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal mang pos bskyed phyir dang sdug bsngal yod na bde 'dod phyir / bde ba sdug bsngal zhes rtog go / srid pa thams cad ni bde ba dang bcas te 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal du ro gcig ba'i 'phags ba rnams kyis sdug bsngal du gzigs te / de'i phyir sdug bsngal kho na 'phags pa'i bden bar rnam par gzhag gi bden ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīṃ sukhasvabhāvāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /<br/> anityatayā pratikūlatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshor ba rnams la sdug bsngal du lta zhe na / mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā rūpasaṃjñādīnyapi duḥkhataḥ paśyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na gzugs dang 'du shes la sogs pa la yang sdug bsngal du lta mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na catānyevaṃ duḥkhāni yathā duḥkhavedaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu manyate duḥkhahetutvāditi /<br/> tasyāsau samudayākāraḥ syānna duḥkhakāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa de'i de ni kun 'byung gi rnam pa yin gyi sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryāṇāṃ carūpārupyopapattau kathaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pravarteta /<br/> na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dag gis 'phags pa rnams la yang ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes 'jug par 'gyur te / de dag gi phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyu ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyang ci'i phyir gsungs par gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tarhyanityatvāt duḥkhataḥpaśyanti /<br/> anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi rtag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du lta na 'o na mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa dag la khyad par ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">udayavyayadharmitvādanityaṃ paśyanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag par lta la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratikūlatvāt duḥkham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du lta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rtag par mthong na mi mthun par 'gyur bas mi rtag pa'i rnam pas sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa 'dren par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā /<br/> kathamidaṃ gamyate /<br/> sūtrādyuktitaśca /<br/> kathaṃ tāvatsūtrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re bde ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid de / thams cad sdug bsngal kho na yin no / 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na / mdo dang rigs pa las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ hi bhagavatā yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /<br/> duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyeti /<br/> duḥkhe sukhamiti saṃjñāviparyāsa iti /<br/> evaṃ tāvatsūtrāt /<br/> kathaṃ yuktitaḥ /<br/> sukhahetvavyavasthānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig mdo las ji lta bu zhe na bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bde ba'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log go zhes gsungs te / re zhig mdo las ni de lta bu'o / rigs pa las ji lta bu zhe na / bde ba'i rgyu rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig bde ba'i rgyu btung ba dang bza' ba dang grang ba dang dro ba la sogs par 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na ha cang spyad pa dang dus ma yin par spyad pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dag tu 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba'i rgyu 'phel ba'am mnyam pas ni dus gzhan na sdug bsngal skyed par rigs pa ma yin pas de dag ni dang po kho na nas sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dag yin zhing bde ba'i rgyu ni ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti /<br/> evamīryāpathavikalpe 'pi vaktavyam /<br/> duḥkhapratikāre ca sukhabuddherduḥkhavikalpe ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mjug tu ni sdug bsngal de 'phel bar 'gyur bas bsal bar 'gyur bar zad de / spyod lam gyi bye brag la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa /<br/> tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po dang sdug bsngal gyi bye brag la bde ba'i blo skye ba'i yang phyir te / ji srid du bkres pa dang skom pa dang grang ba dang tsha ba dang ngal ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gtses par ma gyur ba de srid du bde ba'o snyam du tshor ba cung zad kyang med do / de lta bas na mi mkhas pa rnams ni gnyen po kho na la bde ba'i blo 'jug gi bde ba la ni ma yin no / byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi bye brag la yang bde ba'i blo skyed par byed de / dper na phrag pa nas phrag par khur yod par byed pa lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnāstyeva sukhamiti /<br/> astyevetyābhivārmikāḥ /<br/> eṣa eva canyāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bde ba ni med pa kho na'o zhes zer ro / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re / yod pa nyid do zhes zer te / 'di nyid rigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ hi tāvadayaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ sukhāpavādī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig bde ba la skur ba 'debs pa de la 'di dri bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadvādhanātmakaṃ cet /<br/> kathamiti vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gnod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'o zhes zer na ni ji lta bu yin zhes brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upaghātakaṃ cet /<br/> anugrāhakaṃ sukhamiti siddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gnod par byed pa yin no zhes zer na ni phan par byed pa bde ba yin no zhes bya bar grub po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anabhipretaṃ cet /<br/> abhipretaṃ sukhamiti siddham /<br/> tadeva hyabhipretaṃ punaranabhipretaṃ bhavatyāryāṇāṃ naivālpakāle /<br/> tasmādaniṣpanamabhipretatvaṃ cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi 'dod pa yin no zhes zer na ni 'dod pa bde ba yin no zhes bya bar grub po / gal te 'dod pa de nyid 'phags pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe mi bzhed pa yin te / de lta bas na 'dod pa nyid yongs su ma grub pa yin no zhes zer na ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> anyathā 'nabhipretatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi 'dod pa ni gzhan du yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid kyis 'dod pa de ni nam yang de kho nas mi 'dod par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati /<br/> na tu khalu svalakṣaṇākāreṇa /<br/> yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ /<br/> tasmādastyeva svalakṣaṇataḥ sukha vedanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'phags pa rnams ni 'di gang gis na mi bzhed par 'gyur ba rnam pa gzhan gyis rnam par sun 'byin par byed cing / 'di la bag med pa'i gnas dang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bsgrub par bya ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba can dang mi rtag par lta'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pas ni ma yin no / gal te 'di rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mi 'dod pa zhig yin bar gyur na ni de la su yang 'dod chags skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na / gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang skyon can du lta bar 'gyur te / de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis yod pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattu bhagavatoktaṃ yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti tadbhagavataiva nītārthaṃ saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /<br/> ato na duḥkhadukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kho nas kun dga' bo gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba ni ngas 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid dang 'du byed rnam par 'gyur ba nyid la dgongs nas gsungs so zhes don nges par mdzad pa yin no / de lta bas na 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid las dgongs te gsungs pa ma yin par grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat /<br/> tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te tshor ba thams cad rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba zhig yin par gyur na ni ci'i phyir 'phags pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma lags sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags ba dang tshor ba 'di gsum yang gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes kyang gsungs na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bka' stsal zhes zhus par gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /<br/> bhagavānaṣyeva vyākariṣyat /<br/> idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /<br/> na tvevamāha /<br/> tasmātsantyeva svabhāvatastisro vedanāḥ /<br/> idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des kyang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas tshor ba gsum zhes bka' stsal zhes zhus par 'gyur la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du tshor ba gsum zhes bya ba 'di ni ngas dgongs nas bshad pa yin no zhes lung bstan par 'gyur ba zhig na de skad kyang bka' stsal te / de lta bas na tshor ba gsum ni rang gi ngo bos yod la / gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba 'di ngas dgongs nas bshad pa yin no zhes tshig 'di ni dgongs pa can du ston par mdzad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadaṣyuktaṃ sukhā vedanā duḥkheti draṣṭavyeti /<br/> ubhayaṃ tasyāmasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang bde ba'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal du blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yang de la gnyi ga yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt /<br/> sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt /<br/> duḥkhato dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi ngo bos yid du 'ong ba'i phyir ni bde ba nyid yin la rnam par 'gyur ba dang mi rtag pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rnam grangs kyis ni sdug bsngal nyid yin no / de la bde bar mthong na ni 'dod chags can rnams de'i ro myong bar byed pa'i phyir 'ching bar 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvairāgyāditi /<br/> yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal du mthong na ni de la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir thar bar 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ji ltar mthong na thar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du blta bar bka' stsal pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidaṃ gamyate svabhāvataḥ sā sukheti /<br/> ya dāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de rang gi ngo bos bde zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na / 'di ltar / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mkhyen gyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskārānityatāṃ jñātvā atho vipariṇāmatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed mi rtag nyid dang ni / rnam par 'gyur ba nyid mkhyen nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanā duḥkhataḥ proktā saṃbuddhena prajānaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba sdug bsngal bar gsungs so / zhes bya ba smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadapi coktaṃ duḥkhe sukhamiti saṃjñāviparyāsa iti /<br/> ābhiprāyika eṣa nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang sdug bsngal la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log go zhes gsungs pa yang bstan ba 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca /<br/> tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ /<br/> evamupapattim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten ni tshor ba dang 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang skye ba la bde bar 'du shes so / de la bde ba'i tshor ba la ni rnam grangs kyis sdug bsngal yang yod na gcig tu bde bar lta ba ni phyin ci log yin la / 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yang bde ba ni chung la sdug bsngal ni mang ba yin na gcig tu bde bar lta ba ni phyin ci log pa yin te / skye ba la de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnātaḥ sukhavedanā 'bhāvasiddhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba med par mi 'grub po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te tshor ba thams cad rang gi ngo bo kho nas sdug bsngal ba yin par 'gyur na tshor ba gsum zhes gsungs pa la yon tan ci zhig yod par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokānuvṛttyeti cet na /<br/> sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃskāravipariṇāmānityatāṃ saṃdhāya bhāṣitavacanāt yathābhūtavacanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'jig rten dang mthun par gsungs pa yin no zhe na ma yin te / tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid ni ngas dgongs nas gsungs so zhes bka' stsal pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye ti vistareṇoktvā yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni prahīṇāni bhavantī tyevamādi /<br/> loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet /<br/> mṛdvadhimātramadhyāsu yathākramaṃ sukhādibuddhiriti cet /<br/> na /<br/> sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt /<br/> yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i yang phyir te / bde ba'i dbang po gang yin pa dang yid bde ba'i dbang po gang yin pa 'di ni bde ba'i tshor ba yin par blta bar bya'o zhes rgyas par gsungs nas gang gis dbang po lnga po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong zhing / de'i kun du sbyor ba gsum yang sbangs pa yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs so / 'jig rten yang ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la rnam pa gsum du rtog par 'gyur gal te chung ngu dang chen po dang 'bring dag la go rims bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa'i blo skye'o zhe na ni bde ba la yang rnam pa gsum yod pas sdug bsngal chung ngu la sogs pa la bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ro / gang gi tshe dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khyad par las skyes pa'i bde ba sang ba de'i tshe gang la 'di bde ba'i blor 'gyur ba sdug bsngal chung ngur gyur pa yang gang zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt /<br/> aśeṣaduḥkhāpagamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal chung ngu de ma skyes pa dang 'gags pa na sdug bsngal ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir bde ba'i blo shin tu ches skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve 'pi vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i bde ba mngon sum du gyur pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba chung du la ni nyams su myong ba shin tu gsal ba dang shas chen por 'dzin la / 'bring la ni mi gsal bar 'dzin zhes bya ba gang yin ba 'di yang ji ltar rung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum na bde ba yod do zhes 'byung bas sdug bsngal chung dur yang 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yod do zhes 'byung bas sdug bsngal 'bring du yang 'gyur te / de lta bas na sdug bsngal chung ngu la sogs pa la bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba rnam par gzhag tu mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca bhagavatā rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatamityevamādi /<br/> tasmādapyasti kiñcitsukham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ming chen gal te gzugs gcig tu sdug bsngal ba zhig yin par gyur na ni bde ba yang med / bde ba dang rjes su 'brel pa yang med ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bde ba cung zad cig yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvanna sūtrātsukhavedanā 'bhāvaḥ sidhyati /<br/> yatpunaḥ sukhahetvavyavasthānādityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig de lta na mdo las bde ba'i tshor ba med par mi 'grub bo / gang yang bde ba'i rgyu rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetvaparijñānādidamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rgyu yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir smra bar zad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /<br/> na kevalo viṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten gyi khyad par la ltos pa'i yul bde ba'i rgyu 'am / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin gyi yul 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lus kyi gnas skabs gang zhig dang phrad na bde ba'i rgyu yin pa de ni de dang phrad na ma yin pa ni nam yang ma yin pas bde ba'i rgyu rnam par gnas pa kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /<br/> dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i khyad par la ltos pa'i me de nyid zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin zhing / de nyid mi zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin la btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i gnas skabs gang dang phrad nas zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yin pa de dang phrad nas rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin pa bzhin te 'di ni dpe yin no / bsam gtan dag na yang bde ba'i rgyu ji ltar rnam par mi gnas pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ /<br/> yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang gnyen po la bde ba'i blo skye zhes smras pa de la yang gang gi tshe dril la sogs pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i bde ba myong ba de'i tshe gang gis gnyen po la bde ba'i blor 'gyur / sdug bsngal de ma skyes pa dang 'gags nas bde ba'i blo shin tu ches skye bar yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan las skyes pa'i bde ba la yang gang gi gnyen po yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa lan bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvasaṃcāre 'pi cāvasthāntarajaṃ sukhamevotpadyate /<br/> yāvadasau tādṛśī kāyāvasthā 'ntarghīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khur sbed pa la yang ji srid du lus kyi gnas skabs de lta bu med par ma gyur gyi bar du gnas skabs gzhan las skyes pa'i bde ba khon skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi paścādbhūyasī sukhabuddhiḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na phyis bde ba'i blo rje mang du skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ śrāntasyeryāpathavikalpeṣu veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngal ba'i spyod lam gyi rnam pa dag la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ante kuto duḥkhabuddhirārambho yadi nādita iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dang po nas rtsom pa zhig med na mjug tu sdug bsngal gyi blor ga la 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cet /<br/> kāyapariṇāmaviśeṣānmadyādīnāmante mādhuryaśuktatāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus yongs su 'gyur pa'i khyad par las te / chang la sogs pa mngar ba la mjug tu skyur por 'gyur ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādastyeva sukhā vedaneti siddham /<br/> triduḥkhatāyogādvā sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ duḥkhamiti /<br/> yattu samudayasatyaṃ tadevocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba yang grub la / sdug bsngal nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba yang grub pa yin no / kun 'byung gi bden pa gang yin pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni mdo las thal ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamutsūtram sūtre hi tṛṣṇaivoktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni sred pa kho na yin par bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradhānyādasau sūtra uktā /<br/> anye 'pi tu samudayaḥ /<br/> kathamidaṃ pratyetavyam /<br/> anyatrānyasyāpi vacanāt /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā /<br/> karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mdo las bshad kyi gzhan dag kyang kun 'byung ni yin no / 'di ji ltar khong du chud par bya zhe na / gzhan las gzhan yang yin par gsungs pa'i phyir te / bcom ldan 'das kyis / las dang srid pa dang ni ma rig pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaścoktaṃ pañca bījajātānīti sopādānasya vijñānasyaitadadhivacanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi ma'i tshe la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu / zhes gsungs la yang sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba / 'di ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dags yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthivīdhāturiti catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnāmetadadhivacanamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no zhes kyang gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādābhiprāyikaḥ sūtreṣu nirdeśo lākṣaṇikastvabhidharme
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na mdo las bstan pa ni dgongs pa can yin la / chos mngon pa las bstan pa ni mtshan nyid pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tvabhinirvṛttihetuṃ brūvatā samudayasatyaṃ tṛṣṇaivoktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu bka' stsol pa na ni kun 'byung gi bden pa sred pa kho na yin par gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba dang mngon bar 'grub pa'i rgyu / rgyu dang bcas par bka' stsol pa ni tshigs su bcad pa las / las dang sred pa dang ma rig pa yin par gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmaheturūpapattaye tṛṣṇāheturabhinirvṛttaya iti sūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / las ni skye ba'i rgyu yin la / srid pa ni mngon bar 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / yang na mdo las rgyu dang bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sahetusapratyayasanidānasūtrakrameṇa vā bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo 'ṣyuktāḥ /<br/> kā punaruṣapattiḥ kā cābhinirvṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkyen dang bcas / gzhi dang bcas zhes 'byung ba'i rim par bstan pa yin no / sa bon dang zhing gi dngos por ston par mdzad pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la yang gsungs so / skye ba ni gang yin / mngon par 'grub ba ni gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhātugatiyonyādiprakārabhedenātmabhāvasyoṣapadanamupapattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus skye ba ni skye ba yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhedena punarbhavapratisaṃdhānamabhinirvṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag med par yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni mngon par 'grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi rgyu ni go rims bzhin du las dang sred pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā bījaṃ śālivādijātiprakārabhedenāṅkuroopapadanasya hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na sa bon s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis myu gu skye ba'i rgyu yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āpaḥ punarabhedena sarvaṅkuraprarohamātrasyetyeva dṛṣṭāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chu ni bye brag med par myu gu thams cad skye ba tsam gyi rgyu yin ba lta bu ste 'di ni dpe yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇā 'bhinirvṛttiheturiti kā 'tra yuktiḥ /<br/> vītatṛṣṇasya janmābhāvāt /<br/> ubhaye 'pi briyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon bar grub pa'i rgyu sred pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na / sred pa dang bral ba skye ba med pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satṛṣṇā vītatṛṣṇāśca /<br/> satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti /<br/> vinā tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvāt /<br/> bhavasyābhinirvṛttau tṛṣṇāhetuṃ pratīmaḥ /<br/> saṃtatinamanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sred pa dang bcas pa dang sred pa dang bral ba gnyi ga yang 'chi ba las sred pa dag kho na skye bar snang gi sred pa dang bral ba rnams ni ma yin pas sred pa med na skye ba med pa'i phyir sred pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba la sred pa rgyu yin par shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ /<br/> tasmāt punarbhave 'ṣyevamiti vyavasyāmaḥ /<br/> na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā /<br/> śuṣkamasūropasnānalepāṅgavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud gzhol ba'i yang phyir te / gang la sred pa dang bcas pa der sems kyi rgyud yang dang yang du gzhol bar mthong bas / de lta bas na yang sred pa la yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya bar shes so / ji ltar sred pas 'dag pa'i chal sran chung gi phye ma'i lde gu bskams pas lus bzung ba bzhin du lus / kun du bzung ba de ltar ni gang gis kyang lus kun du ma bzung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ /<br/> catvāryapi satyānyuktāni bhagavatā /<br/> dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /<br/> tayoḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gzhan ni ji ltar bdag la chags pa de ltar rjes su 'brel ba ma yin te / 'di ni rigs pa yin no / bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bzhi zhes kyang gsungs / kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa dang bden ba gnyis zhes kyang gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ci zhe na / gang la bcom dang blo yis gzhan / bsal na de blo mi 'jug pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ghaṭārthavatsaṃvṛtisat paramārthasadanyathā /<br/> yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bum chu bzhin du kun rdzob tu / yod de don dam yod gzhan no / gang la cha shas su bcom na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā ghaṭaḥ /<br/> tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bum pa lta bu'o / de la ni gyo mor bcom na bum pa'i blo mi 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la blos chos gzhan bsal na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de yang kun rdzob tu yod pa yin par khong du chud par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathāmbu /<br/> tatra hi buddhacyā rūpādīndharmānaṣohyāmbubuddhirna bhavati /<br/> teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam /<br/> atonyathā paramārtha satyam /<br/> tatra bhinne 'poi tadbudhirbhavatyeva /<br/> anyadharmāpohe 'pi buddhacyā tat paramārthasat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na chu lta bu'o / de la ni blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bsal na / chu'i blo mi 'jug go / de dag kho na la kun rdzob tu de'i ming du btags pa yin pas kun rdzob kyi dbang gis bum pa dang chu yod do zhes brjod pa ni bden pa kho na smras pa yin gyi / brdzun pa ni ma yin pas de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no / de las gzhan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste / gang la bcom yang de'i blo 'jug pa kho na yin la / blos chos gzhan bsal yang de'i blo 'jug pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā rūpam /<br/> tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na gzugs lta bu'o / de la rdul phra bar tu bcom yang rung / blos ro la sogs pa'i chos bsal kyang rung gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi blo 'jug pa nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ vedanādayo 'pi draṣṭavyāḥ /<br/> etat paramārthena bhāvāt paramārthasatyamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o / de ni don dam par yod pa'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re / ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam /<br/> yathānyena tathā saṃvṛtisatyam iti pūrvācāryāḥ /<br/> uktāni satyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rjes la thob pa 'jig rten pas 'dzin pa de ltar ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin no / ji ltar gzhan gyis 'dzin pa de ltar ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no zhes zer ro / bden pa rnams bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punasteṣāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vaktavyam /<br/> ata ādiprāthānamārabhyocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir dang po 'jug pa las brtsams te brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vṛttasthaḥ śrutacintāvānbhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshul gnas thos dang bsam gtan pa / bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa ni dang po kho nar tshul khrims srung bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ satyadarśanasyānulomaṃ śrutamudgṛhlātyarthaṃ vā śruṇeni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa'am / don nyan par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos nas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do / bsams nas ting nge 'dzin sgom pa la rab tu sbyor bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab la brten nas bsam pa las byung ba skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cintāmayīṃ niśritya bhāvanāmayī jāyate /<br/> kiṃ punarāsāṃ prajñānāṃ lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam pa las byung ba la brten nas bsgom pa las byung ba skye'o / shes rab 'di dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmobhayārthaviṣayā śrutamayyādikā dhiyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos sogs las byung blo rnams ni / ming dang gnyi ga don yul tsan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmālambanā kila śrutamayī prajñā /<br/> nāmārthālambanā cintāmayī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni ming la dmigs pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kadācidvacyañjanenārthamākarṣati kadācidarthena vyañjanam /<br/> arthalamvanaiva bhāvanāmayī /<br/> sā hi vyañjananirapekṣā arthe pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam pa las byung ba ni ming dang don la dmigs pa yin te / res 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren par byed do / bsgom pa las byung ba ni don la dmigs pa kho na yin te / de ni yi ge la mi ltos par don la 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā 'mbhasi plotumaśikṣitaḥ plavanneva muñcati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na stong rkyal legs par ma lobs pa chu'i nang du 'ju bar bya ba mi gtong ba kho na yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyacchikṣitaḥ kadācit muñcet kadācidālamvate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cung zad lo bas pa ni res 'ga' ni gtong res 'ga' ni 'ju bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">legs par lobs pa ni 'ju par bya ba la mi ltos bar rgal ba lta bu ste 'di ni dpe yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare /<br/> yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rtog pa 'di la ni ming la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa las byung ba yin par 'gyur la / don la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa las byung ba yin par 'gyur bas bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ nāniravadyaṃ vidyate /<br/> āptavacanaprāmāṇyajātaniścayaḥ śrutamayī /<br/> yuktinidhyānajaścintāmayī /<br/> samādhijjo bhāvanāmayīti /<br/> hetau mayaṭvidhānāt /<br/> yadyathā 'nnamayāḥ prāṇāḥ tṛṇamayyo gāyaḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni yid ches pa'i lung tshad ma nyid las skyes pa'i nges pa yin no / bsam pa las byung ba ni rigs pas nges par brtags pa la skyes pa yin no / bsgom pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di dag gi mtshan nyid kha na mtho ba med par snang ngo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha /<br/> vyapakarṣadvayavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bsgom pa la rab tu brtson pa de ji ltar na sgom pa rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na / bsrings gnyis ldan zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi kāyacittābhyāṃ vyapakṛṣṭo bhavati /<br/> saṃsargākuśalavitarkadūrīkaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'du 'dzi dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir lus dang sems dag gis bsrings pa yin na rdzogs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tattarhi vyapakarṣadvayaṃ kasya sukaraṃ bhavati /<br/> yo 'lpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaśca /<br/> nāsaṃtuṣṭamahecchayoḥ /<br/> kā punariyamasaṃtuṣṭiḥ /<br/> kā ca mahecchatā /<br/> labdhe bhūyaḥspṛhā 'tuṣṭiralabdhecchā mahecchātā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bsrings pa de gnyis su la sla zhe na / 'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pa la sla'i / chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can la ma yin no / chog mi shes pa 'di ni gang zhig yin no / 'dod chen can ni gang zhig yin zhe na / rnyed la yang sred chog mi shes / ma rnyed la 'dod 'dod chen can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">labdheṣu kila praṇīteṣu cīvarādiṣu bhūyaskāmata 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa pa rnams na re chos gos la sogs pa gya nom pa rnyed pa la yang dang yang du 'dod pa ni chog mi shes pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alabdheṣu tatkāmatā mahecchatetyābhidhārmikāḥ /<br/> nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad /<br/> evaṃ tu yujyate /<br/> labdhenāpraṇītenāprabhūtena paritāpo 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma rnyed pa dag la de 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go / yang dang yang du 'dod pa de yang ma rnyed pa kho na la yin gyi rnyed pa la ni ma yin pa ma yin nam / 'di gnyis la khyad bar ci zhig yod de 'di ni brjod par bya dgos so / 'di ltar ni rung ste / gya nom pa ma yin pa dang mang po ma yin pa rnyed pas yid mi bde ba ni chog mi shes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alabdhapraṇītaprabhūtecchā mahecchatā /<br/> viparyāsāttadvipakṣau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gya nom pa dang mang po ma rnyed pas 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can yin no / bzlog pa de yi gnyen po dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃtuṣṭimahecchatāviparyayeṇa tatpratipakṣau veditavyau /<br/> saṃtuṣṭiścālpecchatā ceti /<br/> tridhātvāptāmalau ca tau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can las bzlog pa ni de dag gi gnyen po chog shes pa dang 'dod chen chung ba yin par rig par bya'o / de gnyis khams gsum gtogs dri med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvipakṣāviti vartate /<br/> tridhātukau ca poratisaṃyuktau ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i gnyen po zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravānāsravatvāt /<br/> asaṃtuṣṭimahecchate ca kāmāvacaryāveva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa dag dang mi ldan pa dag kyang yin no / chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dag kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ punaranayoralpecchatāsaṃtuṣṭacyoḥ svabhāva ityāha /<br/> alobhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chen chung ba dang chog shes pa 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na / ma chags zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">alobhasvabhāve hyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryavaṃśāśca /<br/> alobha iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags rigs ma chags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryāṇāmebhyaḥ prasavādāryavaṃśāścatvāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag las 'phags pa rnams skye bas na 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te 'pyalobhasvabhāvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ tuṣṭacyātmakāstrayaḥ /<br/> jsaṃtuṣṭisvabhāvāḥ /<br/> cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanasaṃtuṣṭayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do / dang po gsum po chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang stan gyis chog shes pa rnams ni chog shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇabhāvanārāmatā caturtha āryavaṃśaḥ kathamalobhasvabhāvaḥ /<br/> bhavakāmarāgavaimukhyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i rigs bzhi pa ni spong ba dang bsgom pa dag la dga' ba nyid yin no /  / ji ltar na ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin zhe na / srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha caturbhirāryavaṃśaiḥ kiṃ darśitaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis ci zhig bstan ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmāntena tribhirvṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum gyis tshul bstan thams cad las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das kyis / rang gi tshul dang las kyi mtha' yongs su spangs shing thar pa don du gnyer bar khas 'che ba'i slob ma rnams la tshul dang las gnyis bcas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhirāryavaṃśairvṛttiścaturyena karma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i rigs gsum gyis ni tshul bcas so / bzhi pas ni las bcas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti /<br/> kasmātpunariyamīdṛśī vṛttiridaṃ ca karma prajñaptam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyed tshul 'dis las 'di byed na ring por mi thogs par thar pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / ci'i phyir tshul 'di lta bu dang las 'di lta bu bcas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛṣṇotpādavipakṣataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sred pa skye ba'i gnyen po'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvārastṛṣṇotpādāḥ sūtra uktāḥ /<br/> cīvarahetorbhikṣostṛṣṇotpadyamānā utpadyate pratitiṣṭhanti pratitiṣṭhati abhiniviśamānā 'bhiniviśate /<br/> piṇḍapātahetoḥ śayyāsanahetoriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las sred pa skye ba bzhi gsungs te / dge slong sred pa skye ba na chos gos kyi phyir dang bsod snyoms kyi phyir dang / mal cha dang stan gyi phyir skye'o / gnas pa na gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavavibhavahetorbhikṣostṛṣṇotpadyamānā utpadyata iti vistaraḥ /<br/> eṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāra āryavaṃśā deśitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par zhen pa na mngon par zhen to / dge slong sred pa skye ba na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de lta bu'i phyir skye'o zhes rgyas par gsungs te / de dag gi gnyen por 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi bstan to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mamāha kāravastvicchātatkālātyantaśāntaye /<br/> sa evārthaḥ punaḥ pariśeṣeṇocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gi bdag 'dzin dngos 'dod pa / de yi dus dang gtan zhi phyir / don de nyid rnam grangs kyis ston pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mamakāravastu cīvarādayo 'haṃ kāravastvātmabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni chos gos la sogs pa'o / bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni lus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrecchā tṛṣṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la 'dod pa ni sred pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra mamakāravastvicchāyāstatkālaśāntaye traya āryavaṃśā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'phags pa'i rigs gsum ni bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'dod pa de'i dus su zhi bar byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayecchātyantaśāntaye caturtha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni gnyi ga 'dod pa gtan du zhi bar byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktāmidaṃ yathā bhūtasya bhāvanā saṃpadyate /<br/> tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji lta bu'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni bshad zin to / de ltar snod du gyur pa de ji ltar na bsgom pa de la 'jug pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāvatāro 'śubhayā cānāpānasmṛtena ca /<br/> smṛtireva smṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang / dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa yis / dran pa nyid dran pa yin no / gang dag ni mi sdug pas 'jug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">keṣāṃ punaraśubhayā keṣāmānāpānasmṛtyā /<br/> yathākramam /<br/> adhirāgavitarkāṇām /<br/> adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug ce na / go rims bzhin du / 'dod chags rnam rtog lhag rnams so / 'di dag la 'dod chags dang rnam par rtog pa lhag pa yod pas / 'di dag ni 'dod chags dang rnam par rtog pa lhag pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi pratyāsannamatyarthaṃ rāgacaritastasyāśubhayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig 'dod chags nye ba dang shin tu spyad pa de ni mi sdug pas 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi vitarkacaritastasyānāpānasmṛtyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig rnam par rtog pa spyad pa de ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avicitrālambanatvādeṣāṃ vitarkopacchedāya saṃvartata ityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re 'di ni sna tshogs la mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa gcod par byed pa yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhā tu yatra saṃsthānaviśeṣālambanatvādvitarkamāvahatīti /<br/> avahimukhatvādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sdug pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa 'dren par byed do zhes zer ro / gzhan dag na re kha phyir ma bltas pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhā hi cakṣurvijñānavadbahirmukhī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sdug pa ni mig gi rnam bar shes pa bzhin du kha phyir bltas pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadviṣayopanidhyānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i yul la nye bar rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dod chags ni rnam pa bzhi ste / kha dog gi 'dod chags dang dbyibs kyi 'dod chags dang reg ba'i 'dod chags dang bsnyen bkur gyi 'dod chags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamasya pratipakṣeṇa vinolakādyālambanāmaśubhāṃ varjayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po'i gnyen por ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i mi sdug pa rjod par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām /<br/> abhadena tu śasyate /<br/> śaṅkalā sarvarāgiṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa'i ni rnam par zos pa dang rnam par 'thor ba la dmigs pa'o / gsum pa'i ni rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang rgyus pas brang breng du sbrel ba'i keng rus la dmigs pa'o / bzhi pa'i ni shi ba'i ro gyo ba med pa la dmigs pa'o / bye brag med par ni / keng rus chags bcas thams cad la / shis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rus pa'i keng rus la ni chags pa'i gzhi rnam ba bzhi po 'di dag thams cad med do / mos pa dang nyi tshe ba yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pas nyon mongs pa spong ba ni ma yin gyi rnam par gnon pa ni yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sdug ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa de ni rnam pa gsum du brjod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādikārmikaḥ kṛtaparijayo 'tikrāntamanaskāraś ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dang po ba dang yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra /<br/> āsamudrāsthivistārasaṃkṣepād ādikarmikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du ni / spro zhing sdud pa las dang po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśubhāṃ bhāvayitukāma ādito yogācāraḥ /<br/> svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sdug pa bsgom par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa ni dang po nyid du rang gi lus kyi yan lag rkang pa'i mthe bo'am / dpral ba'i dbyes sam / yang na de gar dga' bar sems gtod par byed cing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des der sha myags shing zag par mos pas rim gyis rus pa rnam par spyod bar byed ba na thams cad rus pa'i keng rus su lta zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir gnyis ba la mos par byed pa nas gtsug lag khang dang kun dga'i rab dang grong dang zhing dang rim gyis rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i bar gyis gzhi rus pa'i keng rus kyis gang bar mos par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaśca saṃkṣipanyāvadekāmeva svamasthisaṃkalāmadhimucyate cittasaṃkṣepārtham /<br/> iyatā kila kālenāśubhā opariniṣpannā bhavati /<br/> ayam ādikarmiko yogācāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sdud pa na sems bsdu ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu kho na la rus pa'i keng rus su mos pa'i bar du sdud de / 'di tsam gyis na mi sdug pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes grag ste / 'di ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pādāsthna ākapālārthatyāgāt kṛtajayaḥ smṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rkang rus nas ni thod phyed par / btang bas sbyang ba byas par bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de sems bsdu ba khyad par can du bya ba'i phyir rus pa'i keng rus de las rkang pa'i rus ba rnams bor nas lhag ma yid la byed cing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du thod pa'i byed bor nas thod ba phyed kyi bar yid la byed ba 'di ni yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atikrāntamanaskāro brūmadhye cittadhāraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas / yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati /<br/> ayaṃ kilāśubhāyāmatikrāntamanaskāro yogācāraḥ /<br/> astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de thod pa'i phyed kyang bor nas smin ma gnyis kyi bar du sems 'dzin par byed ba 'di ni mi sdug pa yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no zhes grag go / dmigs pa chung bas chung la dbang chung bas ma yin pas yang mi sdug pa yang yod de zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jitājitamanaskārayorajitajitamanaskārayośca svakāyasamudraparyantālambanāt /<br/> atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate /<br/> yathākramam /<br/> alobho daśabhūḥ kāmadṛśyālambā nṛjā 'śubhā /<br/> alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /<br/> atha evārthālamvaneti siddham /<br/> manuṣyeṣvevotpadyate /<br/> nānyasyāṃ gatau /<br/> kuta eva dhātau /<br/> tatrāpi nottarakurau /<br/> nāmnaiva siddhamaśubhākāreti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid la byed pa sbyang pa byas pa dang sbyang ba ma byas pa dang yid la byed pa sbyang ba ma byas pa dang sbyang ba byas pa dag rang gi lus dang rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / yang mi sdug pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci zhig yin / sa ni du zhig yin / dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin / gang du skyed bar byed ce na / go rims bzhin du / mi sdug ma chags sa bcu dang dmigs ba 'dod snang mis skyed do / rang bzhin ni ma chags pa'o / sa ni bcu pa ste / bsam gtan bzhi nyer bsdogs dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bcas pa dang 'dod pa'i khams na yod do / dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i snang ba yin no / snang ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na / kha dog dang dbyibs te / de nyid kyi phyir don la dmigs pa zhes bya bar grub bo / mi rnams kyi nang kho nar skyed kyi 'gro ba gzhan du yang ma yin na khams gzhan du lta smos kyang ci dgos / der yang byang gi sgra mi snyan du ni ma yin no / mi nyid kyis mi sdug pa'i rnam ba zhes bya bar grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadadhvikā tadadhvālambanā /<br/> anutpattidharmiṇī tu vyadhvālambanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus gang yin pa de'i dus la dmigs so / mi skye ba'i chos can gyi yul ni dus gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhimuktimanaskāratvātsāsravā /<br/> vairāgyalābhikī ca prāyogikī ca /<br/> ucitānucitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mos pa yid la byed ba yin pa'i phyir zag ba dang bcas pa yin no / 'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas thob ba dang sbyor ba las byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktamaśubhāyāḥ saprabhedaṃ lakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi sdug pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang bcas te bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānāpānasmṛtiḥ prajñā pañcabhūrvāyurgīcarā /<br/> kāmāśrayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni / shes rab sa lnga spyod yul rlung / 'dod rten
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānanamāna āśvāso yo vāyuḥ praviśati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbugs rngub pa ni dbugs rngub pa ste rlung 'jug pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apānanamapānaḥ praśvāso yo vāyuḥ niṣkrāmati /<br/> tayoḥ smṛtirānāpānasmṛtiḥ /<br/> saiva prajñāsvabhāvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbugs 'byung ba ni dbugs 'byin pa ste rlung 'byung ba gang yin pa'o / de gnyis dran pa ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dran pa ste / de ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtivacanaṃ tu smṛtyupasthānavattadvalādhānavṛttitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa zhes smos pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste / de'i stobs bskyed pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa lnga po nyer ba sngogs gsum dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang 'dod pa'i khams na yod do / btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkānuguṇatvāt kila lsukhaduḥkhayostatpratipakṣasya tābhyāmasaṃprayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag ni rnam par rtog pa dang mthun pa'i phyir de'i gnyen po ni de dag dang mtshungs par mi ldan no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhasaumanasyayoścāvadhānaparipanthitvāt tasyāścāvadhāne sādhyatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang yid bde bdag kyang gtod pa la bar chad byed pa'i phyir la / de yang gtad pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag bsam gtan dngos gzhi dag na yang snyoms par zhugs pa la btang snyoms kyi dbang po yod par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar nas brgyad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pareṇāśvāsapraśvāsānamabhūmitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan chad ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i sa ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyvālambanā caiṣā kāmadhātvāśrayā /<br/> devamanuṣyeṣu prāyogikī vairāgyalābhiko ca /<br/> tatvamanaskāraścaiṣā /<br/> idaṃ dharmāṇāmeva /<br/> na bāhyānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dmigs pa ni rlung yin no / 'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can yin no / lha dang mi dag gi nang nas skyed do / sbyor ba las byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin no / 'di ni de kho na yid la byed pa yin no / chos 'di pa rnams kho na'i yin gyi / phyi ba'i ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upadeśābhāvāt /<br/> svayaṃ ca sūkṣmadharmānabhisaṃbodhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung med pa'i phyir dang bdag nyid kyis chos zab mo mngon par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā ceyaṃ /<br/> ṣaḍvidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang bgrang ba la sogs pa rnam pa drug
