</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṭkāraṇayuktā caiṣā paripūrṇā bhavati /<br/> gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni bgrang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba dang 'jog pa dang nye bar rtogs pa dang bsgyur ba dang yongs su dag pa ste / rgyu drug dang ldan na yongs su rdzogs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bgrang ba zhes bya ba'i dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dag la sems gtad nas mngon par 'du bya ba med par lus dang sems rnal du gzhag ste dran pa tsam gyis gcig dang gnyis nas bcu'i bar du bgrang bar byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittābhisaṃkṣepa vikṣepabhayānnālpavahutarā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems mngon par sdud pa dang rnam par gyeng bar dogs pas ha cang mang ba dang nyung ngur ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāṃ tu trayo doṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la skyon ni gsum yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūnagaṇanā yadi dvāvekaṃ gṛhlāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gnyis la gcig tu 'dzin nam tshang bar bgrang ba'i skyon no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhikagaṇanā yadyekaṃ dvāviti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gcig la gnyis su 'dzin na lhag par bgrang ba'i skyon no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkaro yadyāśvāsaṃ praśvāsato gṛhlāti viparyayādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dbugs rngub pa la dbugs 'byin par 'dzin tam / dbugs 'byin pa la dbugs rngub par 'dzin na 'chol bar bgrang ba'i skyon no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato 'nyathā samyaggaṇanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gzhan pa ni yang dag pa'i bgrang ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antaravikṣepe punarādito gaṇayitavyaṃ tāvadyāvatsamādhi labhate /<br/> anugamo nāma anabhisaṃskāreṇāśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ gatimanugacchati /<br/> kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar skabs su sems rnam par gyeng na yang mgo nas ji srid du ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du bgrang bar bya'o / rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'di dag thag ni ji srid gcig tu 'byung zhing 'jug / ci 'di dag lus thams cad la khyab pa dag cig gam / phyogs 'ga' zhig na rgyu ba dag yin zhes mngon par 'du bya ba med par dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i 'gros kyis rjes su 'gro ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tān praviśataḥ kaṇṭhahṛdayanābhikaṭyurujaṅghāpraveśakram yāvat pādāvanugacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'jug pa na lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang rked pa dang brla dang byin par 'jug pa'i rim gyis rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du rjes su 'gro la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba na mtho gang dang 'dom gang gi bar du 'byung ngo / gzhan dag na re rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'thor byed kyi rlung gi bar du'o zhes zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadetattatvamanasikāratvānna yuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni kho na yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati /<br/> maṇisūtravat /<br/> kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti /<br/> upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jog pa zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i thag pa bzhin du sna'i rtse mo nas rkang pa'i mthe bong gi bar du gnas par lta zhing / ci 'di dag phan 'dogs par byed pa zhig gam / gnod par byed pa zhig gam / grang ngam / dro ba dag cig ces rtog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati /<br/> vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nye bar rtog pa ni 'di dag ni rlung 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba dag las mngon par grub pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang de dag la brten pa sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang yod do zhes phung po lnga la nye bar rtog par byed pa'o / bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni rlung la dmigs pa'i blo bsgyur te chos kyi mchog gi bar du gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pariśuddhirdarśanamārgādiṣvavatāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtyupasthānādivajropamasamādhyantā vivarta ityapare /<br/> kṣayajñānādiśuddhiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re bsgyur ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar yin la / rnam par dag pa ni zad pa shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhes zer ro / dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gaṇanānugamaḥ sthānaṃ lakṣaṇārthavivarttnā /<br/> pariśuddhiśca ṣoḍheyamānāpānasmṛtirmatā iti saṃgrahaślokāḥ /<br/> tatra punarveditavyau /<br/> ānāpātau yataḥ kāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang / rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang / yang dag rnam ba drug tu 'dod / ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa yin no / de la / dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung gang las lus
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhūmiko hi kāyaḥ tadbhūmikāvetai /<br/> kāyaikadeśatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gnyis ni lus kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir lus sa pa gang yin pa de'i sa pa dag yin par rig bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyacittaviśeṣasaṃniśritā āśvāsapraśvāsā vartante /<br/> ārupyakalalādigatānāmabhāvāt acittacaturthadhyānasamāpannānāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba ni gzugs med pa dang nur nur po la sogs par gyur pa rnams dang sems med pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la med pa'i phyir lus dang sems khyad par can la brten nas 'jug pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te lus kyang sbubs yod pa yin la dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung pa'i sa pa'i sems kyang mngon sum du gyur na de lta na 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti /<br/> etau cānāpānau /<br/> sattvākhyau /<br/> nāsattvasaṃkhyātau /<br/> anupāttakau /<br/> indriyavinirbhāgitvāt /<br/> naiḥṣyandikau /<br/> naupacayikavipākajau /<br/> kāyopacayanānupacayāt chhinnānāṃ punaḥ pratisaṃdhānācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa las ldang ba la ni 'jug la / 'chi ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa la ni 'byung ngo / dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba 'di gnyis ni / sems can zhes bya / sems can du mi bgrang ba dag ni ma yin no / ma zin pa'o / dbang po dang tha dad pa'i phyir ro / rgyu mthun las byung / lus rgyas pas 'grib par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang chad nas yang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir rgyas pa las byung ba dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyetadvipākarūpasyāsti /<br/> nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par smin pa'i gzugs la ni de lta bu med do / 'og ma yi / yid kyis de gnyis mi rtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmyuparibhūmikena ca tayościttenopalakṣaṇam /<br/> nāvareṇeryāpathika nairmāṇikena /<br/> ukte dve avatāramukhe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni rang gi sa pa dang sa gong ma pa'i sems kyis rtogs kyi / 'og ma pa spyod lam pa dang sbrul pa'i sems kyis mi rtogs so / 'jug pa'i sgo gnyis bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyāṃ tu samādhilabdhā /<br/> niṣpannaśamathaḥ kuryāt smṛtyupasthānabhāvanām /<br/> vipaśyanāyāḥ saṃpādanārtham /<br/> kathaṃ ca punaḥ kuryāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas / lhag mthong bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir / zhi gnas grub par gyur pa yis / dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya / ji ltar bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyaviccittadharmāṇāṃ dvilakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇāt /<br/> kāyaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ parīkṣate /<br/> vedanāṃ cittaṃ dharmāśca /<br/> svabhāva evaiṣāṃ svalakṣaṇam /<br/> sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām /<br/> kāyasya punaḥ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus tshor sems dang chos rnams la / mtshan nyid gnyis su yongs brtags pas / lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dag tu yongs su brtags pa ste / de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang gi ngo bo'o / spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dus byas rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid dang zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal ba nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa dang bdag med pa nyid dag go / lus kyi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na / 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmāstribhyo 'nye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum las gzhan pa dag ni chos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par gzhag pas lus la rdul phra rab dang skad cig mar mthong bas lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha smṛtyupasthānānāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ /<br/> vividhasmṛtyupasthānaṃ svabhāvasaṃsrgālambanasmṛtyupasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes grag go / yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / rang bzhin dang 'brel pa dang dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānam /<br/> prajñā /<br/> kīdṛśī prajñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni / shes rab bo / shes rab ji lta bu zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrutādimayī /<br/> śrutamayī cintāmayī bhāvanāmayī ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos sogs las byung ba'o / thos pa las byung ba dang bsam pa las byung ba dang bsgom pa las byung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trividhāni smṛtyupasthānāni śrutacintābhāvanāmayāni /<br/> anye saṃsargālambanāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste / thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba dag go / gzhan ni 'brel dang dmigs pa las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ saṃsargasmṛtyupasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'brel ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadālambanā ālambanasmṛtyupasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi dmigs pa ni dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñeti /<br/> kuta eva tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes rab yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānamiti vacanāt /<br/> kā punaranupaśyanā /<br/> prajñā /<br/> tayā hi tadvānanupaśyaḥ kriyate /<br/> yataścokta madhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharatīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na / shes rab ste / des de dang ldan pa rjes su lta bar byed do / 'di ltar nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so zhes kyang gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anupaśyamasyāsti darśanamityanupaśyī /<br/> kāye 'nupaśyī kāyānupaśyī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la rjes su lta ba ste lta ba yod pas na rjes su lta ba'o / lus la rjes su lta ba ni lus kyi rjes su lta ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt prajñā smṛtyupasthānamityuktā bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir shes rab la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtyudrekatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re dran pa shas che ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtivalādhānavṛttitvāditi yo 'rthaḥ /<br/> dārūpāṭana kīlasaṃdhāraṇavat /<br/> evaṃ tu yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing gshegs pa'i khye'u dag gis 'dzin pa ltar dran pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes zer ro / 'di ltar ni rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtiranayopatiṣṭhata iti smṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñā yathādṛṣṭasyābhilapanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dis dran pa nye bar 'jog pas na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni shes rab yin te / ji ltar mthong ba mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang / lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de'i lus la dmigs pa'i dran pa gnas pa yang dag par gnas zhes rgyas par bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍheti /<br/> yatra tūktaṃ kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de'i dran pa nye bar gnas shing kun tu mi rmongs pa yin zhes gsungs so / gang las dge slong dag ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kun 'byung ba dang nub pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āharasamudayātkāyasya samudayo bhavatyāhāranirodhātkāyasyāstaṅgamaityatrālambanameva smṛtyupasthānamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zas kun 'byung bas ni lus kun 'byung pa yin la / zas 'gags pas ni lus nub pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de las ni dmigs pa khon dran pa nye bar gzhag par gsungs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtiratropatiṣṭhata iti kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam /<br/> kramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi ming ni dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin no / 'di dag rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i rgyud la dmigs pa'i phyir re re zhing rnam pa gsum gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathotpatti /<br/> kasmātpunarevamutpattiḥ /<br/> audārikasya pūrvaṃ darśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rim ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin ci'i phyir de ltar skye zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / sngar rags pa mthong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> catuṣkaṃ tu viparyāsavipakṣataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'di ltar 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa'i rten ni lus yin la / de yang tshor ba mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro / de yang sems ma zhi ba'i phyir ro / de yang nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /  / phyin ci log gi gnyen por bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtsang ba dang bde ba dang rtag pa dang bdag tu phyin ci log rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen por dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi go rims bzhin du bstan te mi mang mi nyung ngo / de dag las gsum ni ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadidharmāneva paśyatyasaṃbhinnālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni gnyi ga yin te / gal te chos kho na la lta na ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te lus la sogs pa gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi po spyi la lta na 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kāyādyālambanāni smṛtyupasthānānyabhyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar lus la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams goms par byas nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa dharmasmṛtyupasthāne samastālambane sthitaḥ /<br/> ānatyaduḥkhataḥ śūnyānātmatastānvipaśyati /<br/> saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni chos dran nye gzhag pa / spyi la dmigs pa la gnas te / de dag la ni mi rtag dang / sdug bsngal stong bdag med par lta / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'dres pa la dmigs pa la gnas te / lus la sogs pa de dag thams cad spyir bsdus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat ūṣmagatotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las dro bar gyur pa 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāddharmasmṛtyupasthānādevamabhyastāt krameṇeṣmagataṃ nāma kuśāmūlamutpadyate /<br/> ūṣmagatamivoṣmagatam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la de ltar goms pa las rim gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba do bar gyur ba zhes bya ba skye'o / dro bar gyur pa dang 'dra bas na dro bar gyur pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśendhanadahanasyāryamārgāgneḥ pūrvarūpatvāt /<br/> taccatuḥsatyagocaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi me'i snga ltas yin pa'i phyir ro / de ni bden bzhi spyod yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadūṣmagataṃ prākarṣikatvāccatuḥsatyālambanam /<br/> ṣoḍaśākāram /<br/> duḥkhaṃ caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyatyanityato duḥkhatḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dro bar gyur pa de ni rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa yin no / rnam pa bcu drug / sdug bsngal la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samudayaṃ caturbhirhetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun 'byung la rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa la 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgaṃ caturbhirmārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataśca /<br/> eṣāṃ tu viśeṣaṇam paścādvakṣayāmaḥ /<br/> ūṣmabhyo mūrdhānaḥ /<br/> te 'pi tādṛśāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam la lam dang rigs pa dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta ste 'di dag gi bye brag ni / 'og nas bshad par bya'o / dro ba las / rtse mo / dro ba chung ngu dang 'phring dang chen po'i rim gyis mngon par 'phel ba las rtse mo dag kyang skye ste / de yang de dang 'dra
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yādṛśā ūṣmāṇaścatuḥsatyālambanāḥ ṣoḍaśākārāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar dro bar gyur pa rnams bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa dang rnam pa bcu drug yin pa bzhin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utkṛṣṭataratvāttu nāmāntaraṃ cala kuśalamūlamūrdhatvāt mūrdhānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ches mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir na ming gzhan du btags so / dge ba'i rtsa ba gyo ba'i rtse mo yin pa'i phyir rtse mo rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ebhyo hi pāto 'tikramo vā /<br/> ubhayākaraṇaṃ dharmeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las ltung ba'am 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ punarubhayeṣamūṣmagatamūrdhnāṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānenākaraṇam /<br/> kimidamākaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga chos kyi rnam pa gtod / dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo gnyis ka chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pas rnam pa gtod par byed do / rnam pa gtod ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyeṣvakārāṇāṃ prathamatovinyasanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po nyid du bden pa rnams la rnam pa dag 'god pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyairapi tu vardhanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag gis kyang 'phel bar byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhirapi smṛtyupasthānaireṣāṃ vardhanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyis kyang de dag 'phel bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivardhayataḥ pūrvapratilabdhānāmaṃsaṃmukhībhābo 'vahumānatvāt /<br/> mṛdumadhyādhimātrakramābhivṛddhebhyaḥ punarutpadyate /<br/> tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ /<br/> adhimātrasya kṣamaṇādaparihāṇitaḥ /<br/> sā 'pi triprakārā mṛdvī madhyā 'dhimātrā ca /<br/> dvidhā tadvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par 'phel bar byed pa na sngon thob pa rnams mngon sum du mi byed de / dga' ba chen po med pa'i phyir ro / de las bzod pa yang skye ste / de chung ngu dang 'breng dang chen po'i rim gyis mngon par 'phel ba dag las yang / bzod pa skye ste / yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas bden pa la cher bzod pa'i phyir ro / de yang rnam pa gsum ste / chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o / de la rnam pa gnyis de bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtse mo rnams ji skad bshad pa ltar bzod pa chung du dang 'bring dag kyang de dang 'dra ste / de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gtong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivardhane tvayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> sarvasyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par 'phel ba la ni khyad par 'di yod de / bzod pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam /<br/> smṛtyupasthānenaiva nānyena /<br/> kāmāptaduḥkhaviṣayā tvadhimātrā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad chos kyis 'phel bar byed chos dran pa nye bar gzhag ba kho nas 'phel bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no / chen po 'dod gtogs sdug bsngal yul
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntiriti varttate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apradharmasaṃśleṣādasau kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni chos kyi mchog dang nye ba'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evoṣmagatādīnāṃ traidhātukaduḥkhadyālambanatvasiddhirniyamāvacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i nges pa ma smos pa'i phyir khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa nyid du grub po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā kila rūpārupyapratipakṣādyekaikasatyālambanāpahlāsena yāvat kāvāvacarameva dukhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti /<br/> kṣaṇaṃ ca sā /<br/> kṣaṇikā cāsau na prākarṣikī /<br/> tathāgradharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po la sogs pa bden pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa re re nas phri nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal kho na la skad cig ma gnyis su yid la byed pa'i bar de thams cad ni bzod pa 'bring yin la / gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig khon yin pa de'i tshe na chen po yin no zhes grag go / de ni skad cig gcig / de ni skad cig ma gcig yin gyi rgyun chags pa ni ma yin no / de bzhin du chos mchog
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaivādhimātrā kṣāntiḥ /<br/> te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang bzod pa chen po ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dmigs pa dang skad cig ma gcig pa dag yin no / de dag ni 'jig rten pa yang yin la chos kyi mchog kyang yin zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvalaukikaśreṣṭhatvāditi laukikāgradharmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vinā sabhāgahetunā mārgasya tatpuruṣakāreṇākarṣaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu med par de'i rtsal gyis lam 'dren par byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarve tu pañcaskandhāḥ /<br/> saparivāragrahaṇāt /<br/> vināptibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad phung po lnga / 'khor dang bcas te smos pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptayo noṣmagatādibhiḥ saṃgṛhyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa ma gtogs / thob ba rnams ni dro bar gyur ba la sogs pas ma bsdus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mā bhūdāryasya tatsaṃmukhībhāvādūṣmagatādīnāṃ saṃmukhībhāva iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa la de mngon sum du gyur pas dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur du 'ongs pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bden pa gsum la dmigs pa'i dro bar gyur pa rnam pa gtod pa la ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa da ltar byung ba yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhasatyālambane tadevobhayathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa la ni de kho na gnyi ga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvatrākārāḥ sabhāgāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa dag ni thams cad du 'dra ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivardhane caturṇāmanyatamadanāgatāni catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par 'phel ba la ni bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatraiva nirodhālambane 'ntyamanāgatānicatvāri ākārāḥ sarve /<br/> labdhatvādgotrāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa la dmigs pa de kho na la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / rnam pa ni thams cad do / rigs rnams tho ba zin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtse mo bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa rnam pa gtod pa dang 'gog pa la dmigs pa 'phel ba la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / rnam pa ni thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trisatyālambanavardhane caturṇāmanyatamadanāgatānicatvāri ākārāḥ sarve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa gsum la dmigs pa rnam par 'phel ba la ni bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / rnam pa ni thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntīnāṃ sarvatra cāntyam /<br/> anāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa rnams la ni thams cad du tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / rnam pa ni thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agradharmeṣvantyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāścatvāra eva /<br/> anyābhāvāddarśanamārgasādṛśyācca /<br/> iti nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ caturdhā /<br/> ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca /<br/> eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram /<br/> nirvedhabhāgīyānīti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> vidha vibhāge
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi mchog dag la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / rnam pa ni bzhi kho na ste / gzhan med pa'i phyir dang mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro / de lta na nges 'byed cha mthun rnam pa bzhi bzhi po 'di dag ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin te / 'di lta ste / dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo rnams dang bzod pa rnams dang chos kyi mchog rnams so / de dag las gnyis ni yongs su nyams pa'i sgo nas gyo ba'i phyir chung ngu dag yin no / bzod pa rnams ni 'bring yin no / chos kyi mchog rnams ni chen po yin no / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / nges par 'byed pas na nges par 'byed pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i lam mo / des the tshom spong ba'i phyir dang bden pa rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba nas 'di ni lam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya bhāgo darśanamārgaikadeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i cha ni mthong ba'i lam gyi phyogs gcig yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāvāhakatvena hitatvānnirvedhabhāgīyāni /<br/> taccaitaccaturvidhamapoi nirvedhabhāgīyam /<br/> bhāvanāmayam /<br/> na śrutacintāmayam /<br/> anāgamyāntaradhyānabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'dren par byed pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni rnam pa 'di bzhi char yang / bsgoms byung / thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba ni ma yin no / mi lcogs med pa dang khyad par bsam gtan sa pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i sa pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi yin te / de dag gis bsdus pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nordhva darśanamārgaparivāratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir gong na med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadabhāvaḥ kāmadhātvālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de med pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya ca pūrvaparijñeyapraheyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang sngar yongs su shes par bya zhing spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ rūpadhātau pañcaskandhako vipākaḥ /<br/> pūripūrakāṇyevanākṣepakāṇi /<br/> bhavadveṣitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi phung po lnga yin no /  / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dag kho na yin gyi 'phen par byed pa dag ni ma yin te / srid pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve tvadho 'pi vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis ni 'og na'ang yod pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāśabdo matavikalpārthaḥ /<br/> bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ /<br/> sarvāṇyapi tvetāni catvāri /<br/> kāmāśrayāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni lugs tha dad pa'i don te / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs kyi ltar na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po gnyis sa bdun pa yin te / 'dod pa'i khams na yang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi manuṣyeṣvevotpadyante /<br/> triṣu dvīpeṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi po de dag thams cad kyang / 'dod rten gsum ni mi dag gi nang kho na dang gling gsum du skyed par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpāditapūrvāṇāṃ tu deveṣu saṃmukhībhāvaḥ /<br/> caturthaṃ deveṣvapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon bskyed pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang du mngon sum du byed do / bzhi pa ni lha dag gi nang du yang skyed bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi strīpuruṣā ubhayāśrayāṇi labhante /<br/> agradharmān dvacyāśrayān labhate 'ṅganā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi gnyi ga'i rten can dag 'thob bo / chos mchog bud med kyis gnyi ga'i rten can 'thob par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">agradharmāstu stryeva dvacyāśrayān labhate /<br/> puruṣaḥ puruṣāśrayāneva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi mchog ni bud med kho nas gnyi ga'i rten can 'thob bo / skyes pa ni skyes pa'i rten can 'ba' zhig 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">strītva syāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhāt /<br/> kathaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyānāṃ tyāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bud med nyid ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa thob pa'i phyir ro / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams ji ltar stong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūmityāgāttyajatyāryastāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pas de dag sa bor nas / stong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa ni sa gang dag thob par gyur pa'i sa de dag 'dor ba na de dag kyang gtong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no / sa 'dor ba ni sa 'phos pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāryastu mṛtyunā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags min 'chi bas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthagjanastu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajatisatyasati vā bhūmisaṃcāre /<br/> ādye dveparihāṇyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so'i skye bo ni sa 'pho yang rung mi 'pho yang rung ste ris mthun pa btang ba kho nas gtong ngo / dang po gnyis yongs nyams pas kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tyajati mṛtyunā ca pṛthagjana eva /<br/> āryasya tu nāsti tābhyāṃ parihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtong la 'chi bas kyang gtong ste / so so'i skye bo kho na yin gyi 'phags pa ni de gnyis las yongs su nyams pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntyagradharmābhyāṃ tu pṛthagjanasyāpi nāsti parihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog dag las ni so so'i skye bo yang yongs su nyams pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulestatraiva satyadṛk
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos gzhis de nyid la bden mthong
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa ba'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi za bar bden pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīvrasaṃvegatvāt /<br/> apūrvāptirvihīneṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid 'byung ba shas che ba'i phyir ro / rnam par nyams na dngos med 'thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni /<br/> pratimokṣasaṃvaravadanucitayatnasādhyatvāt /<br/> sati pratisīmādaiśike pareṇotpādayatyasati mūlādeva /<br/> ete punarvihīniparihāṇī kiṃsvabhāve /<br/> hānī dve asamanvitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe rnam par nyams pa dag gis yang thob pa de'i tshe so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bzhin du sngon med pa dag kho na 'thob kyi sngon btang ba dag ni ma yin te ma 'dris pa dang 'bad de bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro / mtshams ston par byed pa zhig yod na ni gong ma skyed par byed do / med na ni gzhi kho nas skyed par byed do / rnam par nyams pa dang yongs su nyams pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na / nyams pa gnyis ni mi ldan pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhe apyete asamanvāgamasvabhāve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyams pa gnyi gyang mi ldan pa'i rang bzhin yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇistu doṣakṛtā nāvaśyaṃ vihāniḥ /<br/> guṇaviśeṣakṛtā ca sā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa ni nyes pas byas pa yin gyi rnam par nyams pa ni gdon mi za ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihīṇo 'pyūṣmagatalābhī niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dro bar gyur pa thob pa ni yongs su nyams kyang nges par mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mokṣabhāgīyātko viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang khyad par ci yang ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyadarśanāsannataratvamasatyantarāye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar chad byed pa med na bden ba mthong ba la ches nye ba nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūrdhalābhī na mūlacchit
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtse mo thob pa rtsa mi 'chad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihīṇo 'pi mūrdhalābhī kuśalamūlāni na samucchinatti /<br/> apāyāṃstu pāpādānantaryāṇyapi kuryāt /<br/> kṣāntilābhyanapāyagaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtse mo thob pa ni yongs su nyams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun tu mi 'chad kyi ngan song du yang 'gro la mtshams med pa dag kyang byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vihīnāyāmapi kṣāntau na punarapāyānyāti tadbhūmikakarmakleśadūrīkaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod thob ngan song mi 'gro'o / bzod pa las ni rnam par nyams kyang ngan song du mi 'gro ste / der 'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntilābhādeva hi gatiyonyupapattyāśrayāṣṭamādibhavakleśānāṃ keṣāñcidanutpattidharmatā pratilabhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa thob pa kho nas 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang skye ba dang lus dang srid pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams las kha cig gis mi skye ba'i chos nyid thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāyagatīnāmaṇḍajasaṃsvedajayonyorasaṃjñisattvottarakurumahābrahmopapattināṃ śaṇḍhapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanāśrayāṇāmaṣṭamādibhavānāṃ darśanaheyakleśānāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams dang sgo nga las skyes pa dang drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas dag dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dag dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang tshangs pa chen por skye ba rnams dang zam dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa'i lus rnams dang brgyad pa la sogs pa'i srid pa rnams dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos nyid 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāṃ tu yathāyogaṃ mṛdvadhimātrāyāṃ ca /<br/> mṛdvacyāmapāyagatīnām /<br/> adhimātrāyāmitareṣām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni ci rigs par te / chung ngus ni ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams kyi mi skye ba 'thob la / chen pos ni gzhan dag gi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvedhabhāgīyāni trigotrāṇi śrāvakādigotrabhedāt /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams rigs gsum yin te / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis slob rigs las bzlog nas ni / sangs rgyas su 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ /<br/> kṣāntau tu labdhāyāṃ nāstyeva saṃbhavaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> apāyānāṃ kila vyāvṛttatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mor skyes pa nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog nas yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni srid kyi bzod pa thob pa la ni de lta bu mi srid do / ci'i phyir zhe na / ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhisattvāśca parahitkriyāpāratantryādapāyānapyavagāhanta iti /<br/> tasyaiva tu gotrasyāvivartyatvādasaṃbhavaḥ /<br/> trīṇyapītaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gis ngan song du yang 'gro'o zhes grag go / rigs de nyid bzlog tu mi rung ba'i phyir mi srid do / gzhan gsum yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vivartya syāditi vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzlog nas 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ /<br/> pratyekabuddhagotrāṇi tu vyāvartayitumaśakyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsum yang nyan thos kyi rigs las ldog nas sangs rgyas las gzhan par 'gyur te rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams ni bzlog par mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ābodheḥ sarvamekatra dhyānāntye śāstṛkhaḍgayoḥ /<br/> śāstā budhaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar / ston dang bse ru byang chub par / bsam gtan mtha' rten gcig la kun / ston pa ni sangs rgyas so / bse ru lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayorekatraivāsane caturthameva dhyānaṃ niśrityaniñjyapaṭusamādhitvānnirvedhabhāgīyānyārabhya yāvadbodhirutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin mi gyo ba dang gsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi ba kho na la kha rten te stan gcig kho na la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nas bzung ste / byang chub kyi bar du skyed par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayānutpādajñāne hi bodhiriti paścādupapādayiṣyāmaḥ /<br/> aśubhāmārabhya yāvadvodhirityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o /  / gzhan dag na re mi sdug pa nas bzung ste / byang chub kyi bar du'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ tu khaḍgādanyo 'pi pratyekabuddho 'stitadgotrāṇāṃ vyāvartanāpratiṣeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag bse ru lta bu las gzhan pa'i rang sangs rgyas yod par 'dod pa de'i rigs rnams ni bzlog par dgag pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci tshe dang po kho na la sbyor ba byas te nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naitadasti avaśyaṃ hi /<br/> prāktebhyo mokṣabhāgīyaṃ /<br/> utpādayitavyam /<br/> sarvasvalpaṃ hi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bu ni med kyi nges par de'i sngon du thar pa'i cha mthun bskyed par bya dgos so / thams cad pas shin tu / myur ba'i srid pa gsum gyis thar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣipraṃ mokṣastribhirbhavaiḥ /<br/> ekasmin janmani mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamutpādayet /<br/> dvitīye nirvedhabhāgīyāni /<br/> tṛtīye āryamārgam /<br/> bījaviropaṇa sasyābhivṛddhiphalotpattikramavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bon 'debs pa dang 'bru skye ba dang 'bras bu chags pa bzhin du tshe gcig la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do / gnyis pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed do / gsum pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">krameṇa hi saṃtānasyāsyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatāraparipākavimuktayo bhavantīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos nyid 'di la ni rgyud rim gyis 'jug pa dang yongs su smin pa dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca punarmokṣabhāgīyaṃ varṇayanti /<br/> śrutacintāmayaṃ /<br/> na bhāvanāmayam /<br/> kati karmāṇi /<br/> trīṇi karmāṇi /<br/> prādhānyena tu manaskarmma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa de yang thos bsam las byung ba yin par brjod de / bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin no / las du dag cig ce na / las gsum mo / gtso bor ni yid kyi las yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpraṇidhanaparigrahāttu kāyavākkarmāpi mokṣabhāgoyaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i smon lam gyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir lus dang ngag gi las kyang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścidekabhikṣāmapi dattvaika śikṣāmapi cādāya mokṣābhilāṣavalādhānānmokṣabhāgīyānyākṣipati /<br/> tattvetat /<br/> ākṣipyate nṛṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la zhig gis zas 'ga' tsam byin nas sam bslab pa 'ga' tsam yang mnos nas thar pa 'dod pa'i stobs bskyed pas thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i 'phen par 'gyur ro / de yang / mi yi nang nas 'phen par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyeṣveva triṣu dvīpeṣu /<br/> nānyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyi nang kho na dang gling gsum nas 'phen gyi gzhan nas ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñānirvedayorabhāvādyathāyogam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci rigs par shes rab dang skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ prasaṅgena mokṣabhāgīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhar las 'ongs pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhisamayakramastu vaktumārabdhaḥ /<br/> tatra ca yāvadagradharmā uktāḥ /<br/> śeṣaṃ vaktavyam /<br/> ata idamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par rtogs pa'i rim ba bshad par brtsams pa de la chos kyi mchog gi bar rnams ni bshad zin to / lhag ma brjod par bya ste / de'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikebhyo 'gradharmebhyo dharmakṣāntiranāsravā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa yi chos mchog las / chos kyi bzod pa zag pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikāgradharmānantaramanāsrava dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyate /<br/> kasminnālambane /<br/> kāmaduḥkhe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ces bya ba 'di smos te / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa skye'o / dmigs pa gang la zhe na / 'dod sdug bsngal la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraduḥkhamasyā ālambanam /<br/> seyaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirityucyate /<br/> anāsravajñānārthaṃ niḥṣyandena viśeṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal yin te / de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o / zag pa med pa nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyu mthun pas bye brag tu byas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmajñānārthaṃ kṣāntiḥ /<br/> puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat /<br/> saiva ca niyāmāvakrāntirityucyate /<br/> samyaktvaniyāmāvakramaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa'i phyir bzod pa ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa ste me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin no / de nyid nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ste / yang dag pa nyid du nges par zhugs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyaktvaṃ nirvāṇamuktaṃ sūtre /<br/> tatra niyamo niyāma ekāntībhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa nyid ni mdo las mya ngan las 'das pa yin par bshad do / der nges pa ni nges pa ste gcig tu gyur pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyābhigamanamavakramaṇam /<br/> tasyāṃ cotpannāyāmāryapudgala ucyate /<br/> anāgatayā pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartyate /<br/> etadeva tasyāḥ kāritramanāgatāyāmabhyupagamyate nānyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der 'jug pa ni mngon par 'gro ba ste / de skyes na 'phags pa'i gang zag ces bya'o / ma 'ongs pas ni so so'i skye bo nyid zlog par byed do / ma 'ongs pa de'i bya ba ni de kho na yin par khas len gyi gzhan ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradīpajātivat /<br/> laukikāgradharmairityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mar me dang skye ba bzhin no / gzhan dag na re 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams kyis bzlog go zhes zer ro / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na taddharmatvāttadvirodhitvādadoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro / de dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śatruskandhāruḍhatadghātanavat /<br/> ubhayairityapare /<br/> ānantaryavimuktimārgasādhrmyāditi /<br/> tato 'traiva dharmajñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bo'i phrag pa la zhon nas de la 'tshog pa bzhin no / gzhan dag na re gnyi gas bzlog ste / bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate /<br/> tat duḥkhe dharmajñānamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni de nyid la chos she na / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal ba de kho na la chos shes pa skye ste / de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravādhikāraḥ sarvatra veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad du yang zag pa med pa'i gnas skabs yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate /<br/> tathā punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang chos shes pa skye ba de bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣe duḥkhe 'nvayakṣāntijñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal lhag la rjes bzod shes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhe dharmajñānānantaraṃ rūpārupyāvacare duḥkhe samastālambanānvayajñānakṣāntirutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa spyi la dmigs pa skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato 'nvayajñānamutpadyate /<br/> tat duḥkhe 'nvaya jñānamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni rjes su shes pa skye ste / de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamatodharmatattvajñānāddharmajñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir chos shes pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadanvayādūrdhvaṃ duḥkhālambanamanvayajñānam /<br/> tathaivānugamanāt /<br/> yathā caitāni duḥkhasatye catvāri kṣāntijñānānyutpadyante /<br/> satyatraye tathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni rjes su shes pa ste / de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro / ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzod pa dang shes pa bzhi po de dag skye ba ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhānvayajñānādanantaraṃ kāmāvacare samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyate /<br/> tataḥ samudaye dharmajñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa gsum la de bzhin no / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa ni spyod pa'i kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye zhing / de nas kun 'byung la chos shes pa skye la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ samanantarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānam kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntirnirodhe dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirnirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ kāmavacaraduḥkhapratipakṣamārge dharmajñānakṣāntirmārge dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntirmārge 'nvayajñānam /<br/> iti ṣoḍaśacitto 'yaṃ satyābhisamayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mjug thogs su skye ba'i rim gyis kun 'byung lhag ma la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa skye'o / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang 'gog pa la chos shes pa skye'o / 'gog pa lhag ma rnams la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa skye'o / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang lam la chos shes pa skye'o / lam lhag ma rnams la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang lam la rjes su shes pa skye ste / de ltar bden pa mngon rtogs 'di
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityanena krameṇāyaṃ satyānāmabhisamayaḥ ṣoḍaśacittako bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems bcu drug go / de ltar na rim pa 'dis na bden pa mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni sems bcu drug yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye tarhi nikāyāntarīyāḥ satyānāmekābhisamayaṃ varṇayanti /<br/> abhiprāya eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ /<br/> abhedena hyabhisamaya ucyate satyeṣu /<br/> tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde ba gzhan gang dag bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni gcig go zhes brjod pa de dag gi bsam pa ltar bya ste / bye brag med par ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o / de ni rnam gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanālambakāryākhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong dmigs bya ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanābhisamayo 'nāsravayā prajñayā satyānām /<br/> ālambanābhisamayastatsaṃprayuktairvedanādibhirapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa'o / dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāryābhisamayo viprayuktairapi śīlajātyādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa tshul khrims dang skye ba la sogs pas kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ /<br/> prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal mthong na de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni gsum mo / kun 'byung la sogs pa ni bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin te / spong ba dang mngon gsum du byed pa dang sgom pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyadi satyānāṃ darśanābhisamayaṃ pratyekābhisamayaṃ brūyāt /<br/> ayuktaṃ brūyādākārabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gal te bden pa rnams mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes smra ni rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir mi rigs par smra ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāpyanātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanamiti brūyāt /<br/> na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te thams cad bdag med pa'i rnam par mthong ngo zhes zer na ni / 'o na ni bden pa rnams la sdug bsngal la sogs par mthong bar mi 'gyur bas de lta bas na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca sūtravirodhaḥ /<br/> ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya iti /<br/> bhāvanāmārga evamiti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa nyan thos sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la byed pa'am / kun 'byung la kun 'byung du yid la byed pa'am / lam la lam gyi bar du yid la byed pa'i zag pa med pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa zhes gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo / gal te de lta bu ni bsgom pa'i lam ma yin no zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathādarśanaṃ bhāvanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bsgom pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt /<br/> antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gcig mthong bas lhag ma rnams lnga dbang thob pa'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa gcig kho na zhes zer na ni nyes pa med de bar skabs su ldan pa yod dam med ces dpyad par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /<br/> ata ikābhisamaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te sdug bsngal kho na yongs su shes na kun 'byung yang spongs la 'gog pa yang mngon sum du byed cing lam yang sgom par byed pas de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes zer na de lta na yang nyes pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig mthong na lhag ma rnams kyang bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir bden pa rnams rim gyis mngon par rtogs par gsungs par mngon te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyim bdag bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa ni med pa nyid de / 'on kyang mthar gyis mngon par rtogs so zhes rgyas par gsungs pa dpe dang bcas pa'i mdo gsum khungs su yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet /<br/> na /<br/> asaṃmudācārāvaśyaṃprahāṇābhisaṃdhivacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mdo las / gang zhig sdug bsngal la ne ma nur med cing the tshom med pa de ni sangs rgyas la yang zhes gsungs pas mngon bar rtogs pa gcig go zhes zer na / ma yin te / kun du mi 'byung ba dang gdon mi za bar spong ba las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eṣauktaḥ ṣoḍhaśacittako 'bhisamayaḥ /<br/> so 'gradharmaikabhūmikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par rtogs pa sems bcu drug par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni chos mchog dang sa gcig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhūmiko 'gradharmastadbhūmikānyetāni ṣoḍaśa cittāni /<br/> ta punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ityuktaṃ prāk
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos kyi mchog sa gang yin ba sems bcu drug po 'di dag kyang de'i sa pa ste / de dag ni sa drug pa'o zhes sngar bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /<br/> yasmāt /<br/> kṣāntijñānānyanantarya muktimārgā yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gdon mi za bar bzod pa dag dang shes pa dag yin zhe na / bzod dang shes pa go rims bzhin / bar chad med dang rnam grol lam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anantaryamārgāḥ kṣāntayaḥ kleśaprāptivicchedaṃ pratyantarayitumaśakyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa rnam par gcod pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktimārgāstu jñānāni /<br/> kleśaprāptivimuktānāṃ visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādāt /<br/> ata ubhayairavaśyaṃ bhavitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa las rnam par grol ba rnams la bral ba'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam dag yin te / de'i phyir gnyi ga yang yin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāṃ cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis kyis rkun po 'byin pa dang sbo gcod pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt /<br/> prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālambane notpannaṃ syāt /<br/> kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te bar chad med pa'i lam gnyis pa kho na bral ba'i thob ba dang lhan cig skye bar gyur na ni dmigs pa de kho na la the tshom spangs ba'i shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro / gal te brjod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos las kun du sbyor ba'i ris dgu zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt /<br/> rājaparivārakṛtasya rājakṛtavyapadeśavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa rnams ni shes pa'i 'khor yin pa'i phyir rgyal bo'i 'khor gyis byas pa las rgyal pos byas so zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ sarvāṇi ṣoḍaśacittāni satyadarśanāddarśanamārgaḥ /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> adṛṣṭadṛṣṭerdṛṇṭṅmārgastatra pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci sems bcu drug po thams cad bden pa ma mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam yin nam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / de las skad cig bco lnga ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ /<br/> ki kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nas bzung ste lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar gyi skad cig ma bco lnga po de dag ni mthong ba'i lam yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adṛṣṭasatyadarśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa ma mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣoḍaśe tu nāstyapoūrvaṃ dravyamiti /<br/> yathādraṣṭābhyasanādbhāvanāmārga eva /<br/> nanu ca tenāṣyadṛṣṭaṃ paśyati mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu drug pa la ni sngon ma mthong ba blta bar bya ba med kyi ji ltar mthong ba ni goms par byed pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam kho na yin no / des kyang lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ma mthong ba mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyaṃ prati cintā na kṣaṇam /<br/> na hi kṣaṇenādṛṣṭena satyamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /<br/> yathā naikena luṅgenālūnena dedāramalūnaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi skad cig ma la ni ma yin no / skad cig ma gcig ma mthong bas ni bden ba ma mthong ba ma yin te / dper na nyag ma gcig ma brngas pas zhing ma brngas pa ma yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalatvādaṣṭajñānaṣoḍaśākārabhāvanāt pūrvamārgavihāneḥ pravandhikatvācca mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārgaḥ /<br/> aparihāṇistudarśanaheyakleśaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇāt /<br/> ata eva darśanamārga iti cet /<br/> na /<br/> atiprasaṅgāt /<br/> sapta jñānāni kasmāddarśanamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang shes pa brgyad dang rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'i phyir dang lam snga ma rnam par nyams pa'i phyir dang rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin no / yongs su ma nyams pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i spangs pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / gal te de nyid kyi phyir mthong ba'i lam yin zhe na / ma yin te / ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro / ci'i phyir shes pa bdun mthong ba'i lam yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanasyāsamāptatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba ma rdzogs pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa mthong ba thams cad ma rdzogs pas de'i bar mar gyur pa'i phyir de dag kyang mthong ba'i lam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ yathā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārga ścotpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam ji ltar skye ba bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathedānīmutpannāryamārgāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /<br/> ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa'i gang zag rnams rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du bshad par bya ste / mthong ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin gyi skad cig ma bco lngar bshad pa gang dag yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdutīkṣṇendriyau teṣu śraddhādharmānusariṇau /<br/> mṛddhindriyastesu vartamānaḥ śraddhānusārītyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rno rtul de dag tu / dad dang chos kyis rjes 'brang ba / yin par rig par bya ste / dbang po rtul po de dag la gnas pa ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīkṣṇendriyo dharmānusārīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnon po ni chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhayānusāraḥ śraddhānusāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad bas rjes su 'brang bas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'syāstīti śraddhānusārī /<br/> śraddhayānusartuṃ śīlamasyeti vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'di la yod pas sam / 'di dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dang tshul can yin pas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvaṃ parasaṃpratyayenārthānusaraṇāt /<br/> evaṃ dharmānusārī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gzhan gyi dring gis don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro / chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba yang de dang 'dra ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvaṃ svayameva sūtrādibhirdharmairarthānusaraṇāt /<br/> tau punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon bdag nyid kho nas mdo la sogs pa'i chos kyi don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahīnabhāvanāheyau phalādyapratipannakau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni / bsgom pas spang bya ma spangs na / 'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu rnams kyi dang po ni 'bras bu dang po ste / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o / de ni 'bras bu thob par bya ba thams cad kyi dang po yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete /<br/> yāvat pañcaprakāraghnau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba de dag nyid gal te sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma spangs pa 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa zhig yin na ni de gnyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o / rnam lnga'i bar bcom
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /<br/> tathaiva prathamaphalapratīpannakāvucyete /<br/> dvitīye 'rvāṅnavakṣayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsgoms te spang bar bya ba 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams las rnam pa lnga'i bar du spangs pa zhig yin na yang de kho na bzhin du dang po'i 'bras bul zhugs pa dag ces bya'o / gnyis pa la / dgu pa tshun chad zad pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvītīyanimittaṃ dvitīye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa la zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti /<br/> dvau tau dvitīyaphalapratipannakāvucyete /<br/> katamacca dvitīyam /<br/> sakṛdāgāmiphalam
