</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de gnyis kyis de yan chad rnam pa drug gam / bdun nam brgyad dag cig sngon spangs ba yin na ni de gnyis 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / gnyis pa gang zhe na / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmādviraktāburdhva vā tṛtīyapratipannakau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'am yang na gong ma las / chags bral gsum pa la zhugs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete /<br/> katamacca tṛtīyam /<br/> anāgāmiphalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam pa dgu ba yang spangs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin nam / gong ma ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na de gnyis 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / gsum gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o / gang zhig gang la zhugs pa ni / bcu drug pa la de 'bras gnas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete /<br/> nāpi pratipannakau /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> phalastho
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems bcu drug pa skyes na de gnyis dad pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhes kyang mi bya la / zhugs pa zhes kyang ni bya'o / 'o na ci zhe na / 'bras bu la gnas pa dag yin te / gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati /<br/> srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rung 'bras bu gang la zhugs par gyur ba de ni de'i tshe 'bras bu de la gnas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhattvaṃ tu na śakyamāditaḥ prāptum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa nyid ni dang po nyid du thob par mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgeṇa bhāvanāheyānāmaprahāṇāt /<br/> pūrvaṃ ca bhavāgravairāgyāsaṃbhavāt /<br/> śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭacyāptau mṛdutokṣṇendriyau tadā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam gyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba mi spong ba'i phyir dang sngar yang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro / de'i tshe dbang po rno rtul dag / dad bas mos dang mthong bas thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate /<br/> yastīkṣṇendriyo dharmānusāripūrvī sa dṛṣṭiprāpta ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe dbang po rtul bo sngon dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni dad pas mos ba zhes bya'o / dbang po rnon po sngon chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba gang yin ba de ni mthong bas thob pa zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhāprajñādhikatvenādhimokṣadṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pa dang shes rab lhag bas mos pa dang mthong bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir rnam pa lnga spangs kyang sems bcu drug pa la rgyun du zhugs pa kho na zhes bya la / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes mi bya zhe na / gang gi phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phale phalaviśiṣṭasya lābho mārgasya nāstyanaḥ /<br/> nāprayukto viśeṣāya phalasthaḥ pratipannakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras thob 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis / lam thob med pas de yi phyir / 'bras gnas khyad par bya ba'i phyir / mi brtson pa ni zhugs ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu thob na 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mi 'thob po zhes bya ba 'di ni nges so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'bras bu la gnas pa ji srid du khyad par du bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu gzhan thob par bya pa la mi brtson pa de srid du zhugs pa zhes mi bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyatrāpi phale veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig bsam gtan gsum ba las 'dod chags dang bral la / sa 'og ma la brten te nges par 'jug pa de ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mngon du byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na de'i gong du skyes pa de bde ba'i dpang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadbhūyaḥ kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ niyāmāvakrāntau pudgalavyavasthānam /<br/> ānupūrvikaṃ tu vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig phal cher las dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis nges par 'jug pa'i gang zag rnam par gzhag pa ni de lta bu yin no / mthar gyis 'jug ba brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata idaṃ tāvadvacyavasthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir re zhig 'di rnam par gzhag par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ /<br/> navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau /<br/> yāvadbhavāgre /<br/> yathā ca doṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du / sa dang sa na nyes rnam dgu / srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā guṇāḥ /<br/> tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes pa rnams ji lta bde bzhin du yang yon tan rnams sa dang sa na de'i gnyen bo bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba yon tan yang rnam pa dgu dgu kho na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇāṃ punarmṛdvādibhedataḥ /<br/> mṛdumadhyādhimātrā hi trayo mūlaprakārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chung dang 'bring dang che rnams kyi / chung ngu la sogs tha dad phyir / rtsa ba'i rnam pa gsum ste / chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag re re zhing yang chung du dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir dgur rnam par gzhag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa dang chung ngu'i 'bring dang chung ngu'i chen po dang 'bring gi chung ngu dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi chen po dang chen po'i chung ngu dang chen po'i 'bring dang chen po'i chen po'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra mṛdumṛdunāmārgeṇādhimātrādhimātrasya kleśasya prahāṇam /<br/> evaṃ yāvadadhimātrādhimātreṇa mṛdumṛdoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la lam chung ngu'i chung dus ni nyon mongs pa chen po'i chen po sbong la / de bzhin du ma chen po'i chen pos ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ /<br/> audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po kho nar lam chen po mi srid pa'i phyir dang lam chen bo skyes pa la nyon mongs ba chen po mi srid pa'i phyir ro / gos la dri ma che long ni sngar 'khrul phra mo ni phyis 'khru ba dang mun pa che long ni snang ba chung ngus 'joms la phra mo ni chen pos sel zhes bya ba 'di ni dpe'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ /<br/> kṣaṇikamṛdukenāpyāryamārgeṇānādisaṃsāraparaṃparāpyāyitādhimātrāṇāṃ kleśānāmunmūlatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i lam skad cig ma chung ngus kyang 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas brgyud pas spel ba'i nyon mongs pa chen po rnams rtsa ba nas med par byed pa'i phyir chos dkar po rnams ni stobs dang ldan pa yin la / nag po rnams ni stobs chung ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahukālasaṃvarddhitānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trivṛtkarṣavat kṣaṇikālpapradīpamahātamopaghātavacya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yun ring po nas bsags pa'i skyon rnams sman tri byid thun gcig gis 'byin pa lta bu dang mar me skad cig ma chung ngus mun pa chen po 'joms pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ navaprakāreṣu kleśeṣu sarvatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams pa dgu po de dag thams cad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtparaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras gnas bsgom spang bya ma zad / re ltar thogs na lan bdun pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu la gnas pa gang zhig gis / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gcig kyang ma spangs pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptajanmāni karotīti saptakṛta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe bdun gyi bar du skye bas na re ltar thogs na lan bdun pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paraḥ sarvāntyaḥ /<br/> na hi sarvasaptakṛditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad du ni lan bdun pa ma yin pas re ltar thogs na zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi tha shal ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptakṛtvaḥparama iti sūtrapāṭhaḥ /<br/> saptakṛtvaḥ paramaṃ janmā 'syetyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa zhes 'byung ba ni de mchog tu thogs na skye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya pa'i tha tshig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakarṣe paramaśabdaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchog ces bya ba'i sgra ni rab tu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇasroto hi mārgastena tatra gamanāt /<br/> tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ /<br/> kathamāpannaḥ /<br/> ādyamārgalābhāccet aṣṭamako 'pi syāt /<br/> ādyaphalalābhāccet bhūyo vītarāgo 'pi syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyun ni lam ste / des na der 'gro ba'i phyir ro / 'di ni der zhugs shing phyin la son pas na rgyun du zhugs pa yin no / ji ltar na zhugs pa yin / gal te lam dang pho thob pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni brgyad pa yang yin par 'gyur ro / gal te 'bras bu dang po thob ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni phal tshor las 'dod chags dang bral pa yang yin par 'gyur la / 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba yang yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmavītarāgaḥ /<br/> sarvaphalaprāpiṇamadhikṛtyādyaphalalābhāt /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu thams cad thob pa'i dbang du byas nas 'bras bu dang po thob pa'i phyir ro / ci'i phyir de kho na yin la brgyad pa ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratipannakaphalamārgalābhāt darśanabhāvanāmārgalābhāt sakalasroto 'bhisamayācca mārgānvayajñāne /<br/> sa eva tasmādanyānsaptopapattibhavānmanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdadhāti saptāntarābhavān /<br/> evaṃ deveṣvityaṣṭāviṃśatiyavān pratisaṃdadhāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam la rjes su shes pa la ni zhugs pa dang 'bras bu'i lam thob ba'i phyir dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam thob pa'i phyir dang rgyun thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni de las gzhan ba skye ba'i srid pa bdun dang srid pa bar ma bdun du mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed la de bo zhin du lha dag gi nang du yang nying mtshams sbyor bar byed do / de ltar na srid pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nying mtshams sbyor bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptakasāmānyāttu saptakṛtvaḥ /<br/> parama uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bdun tshan du 'dra ba'i phyir mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa zhes bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptasthānakauśalasaptaparṇavaditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas bdun la mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang 'dab ma bdun ba zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati /<br/> nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang mdo las / gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de 'di ni gnas med do zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasyāṃ gatāvityabhiprāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba gcig tu dgongs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti /<br/> kāmadhātvabhi saṃdhivacanādadoṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te sgra ji bzhin du brtags na ni srid pa bar ma yang yod par mi 'gyur ro / de lta na yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du gong du 'pho ba 'gro ba gcig tu skye ba'i srid pa brgyad par mi 'gyur ro zhe na / 'dod pa'i khams las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktirvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la shes par byed pa mdo'am rigs pa ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti /<br/> evaṃ hi paṭhacyate /<br/> saptakṛtvo devāśca manuṣyāśceti /<br/> pratyekamapi tu kāśyapīyāḥ paṭhanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha dang mi dag gi nang nas sor lan bdun skye'i gnyi ga'i nang du lan bdun ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di la yang shes par byed pa ci zhig yod de / 'di skad du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun zhes 'byung ngo zhe na / 'od srungs pa rnams lha rnams su lan bdun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptakṛtvo devān saptakṛtvo manuṣyāniti /<br/> nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams su lan bdun zhes so sor yang 'don pas 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti /<br/> yo deveṣu sa tāneva /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamaṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig mi dag gi nang du rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de ni de kho nar 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la / gang zhig lha dag gi nang du rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de ni de kho nar 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o / ci'i phyir srid pa brgyad pa mngon par mi 'grub ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāvatā kakalenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākāt /<br/> mārgo hi sa tajjātīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus de srid kyis gdon mi za bar rgyud yongs su smin pa'i phyir ro / lam de ni de 'dra ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptapadāśīviṣa daṣṭavaccāturthakajvaravacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprul gom pa bdun pas zin pa lta bu dang rims nyin bzhi ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptasaṃyojanāvaśeṣatvācca /<br/> dve avarabhāgīye pañca cordhvabhāgīyānīti /<br/> antareṇāpyāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇo na parinirvāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun tu sbyor ba bdun po tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa gnyis dang gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga lus pa'i yang phyir ro / bar skabs su yang 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed cing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāvat bhavavedanīyasya karmaṇo valādhānāt /<br/> asati buddhotpādagrahastha evārhattvaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> agāraṃ tu pounarnādhyāvasati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de srid du srid ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro / sangs rgyas 'byung pa med na khyim pa kho nar dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob na khyim na ni mi gnas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmatāpratilambhikaṃ tu bhikṣuliṅga pratilabhate /<br/> anyāśramikaṃ liṅgenetyapare /<br/> kasmādavinipātakadharmā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos nyid kyis 'thob pa'i dge slong gi mtshan ma yang 'thob bo / gzhan dag na re / dge spyong gzhan gyis mtshan mas so zhes zer ro / ci'i phyir log bar ltung pa'i chos can ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadgāmi karmānupacayādupacitavipākadānavaiguṇyācca saṃtaterbalavatkuśalā dhivāsanātprayogāśayaśuddhitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der 'gro ba'i las mi sogs pa'i phyir dang bsags pa yang sbyor ba dang bsam pa dag ba'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs dang ldan pas bsgos pa'i phyir rgyud rnam par smin ba dang mi mthun pa byas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāyanipāte tu karmaṇyasau kṣāntimapi notpādayet /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan song du nges ba'i las yod na ni des bzod pa yang bskyed bar mi 'gyur ro / 'dir smra sa pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtvā budho 'lpamapi pāpamadhaḥ prayāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi mkhas pas ni sdig pa chung du byas kyang 'og tu 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtvā budho mahadapi prajahātyanartham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mkhas pas chen po byas kyang gnod ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">majjanyadho 'lpamapi vāriṇi saṃhataṃ hi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'bying 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pātrikṛtaṃ mahadapi plavate tadeva iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid snod du byas na che yang steng du 'phyo bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasyāntaṃ karotīti ko duḥkhasyāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed do zhes bya ba sdug bsngal gyi mtha' gang yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāt pareṇa duḥkhaṃ nāsti /<br/> apratisaṃdhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotītyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang phan chad sdug bsngal med ba ste / sdug bsngal gyi nying mtshams mi sbyor bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā nirvāṇamantaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na mtha' ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatprāptivivandhāpanayanāt /<br/> yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'thob pa'i bgegs bsal ba'i phyir te dper na smra ba po 'dun khang rdib la nam mkha' gyis [*yis] zhes 'dzer ba lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa gzhan yang yod mod kyi ma nges pas mi brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'bras bu la gnas ba bsgos pas spang par bya ba ma zad pa mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa ni de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tricaturvidhamuktastu dvitrijanmā kulaṅkulaḥ /<br/> sa eva srota āpannastribhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam gsum rnam bzhi las grol ba / tshe gnyis gsum du rigs nas rigs / rgyun du zhugs pa de nyid rgyu gsum gyis na rigs nas rigs su skye ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśaprahāṇatastricatuḥporakāraprahīṇatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa spang ba las ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gsum mam bzhi spang ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyatastatpratipakṣānāsravendriyalābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po lngas ni de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang po thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">janmato dvitrijanmāvaśeṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba las ni tshe gnyis sam gsum lus pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt /<br/> pareṇa bhavyatvād /<br/> ato 'sya grahaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshigs su bcad pa'i nang du gnyis shig smos pa ni / rgyun du zhugs pa phyis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed na de'i gnyen po zag ba med pa'i dbang bo thob pa ni ma smos kyang grub pa'i phyir ro / skye ba ni gal te gong ma'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ches nyung dur yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di smos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna pañcaprakāraprahāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir rnam pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ /<br/> ekavīcikasyeva dhātvanatikramāt /<br/> sa eva kulaṅkulo dvividhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de spangs na drug pa yang gdon mi za bar spong ba'i phyir te / de'i rnam ba gcig gis ni bar chad gcig pa'i bzhin du 'bras bu la bgegs bya bar mi nus te / khams las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro / rigs nas rigs su skye bde ni rnam pa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni lha dag gi nang du rigs gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas lha'i rigs de'am gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti /<br/> sa eva punaḥ phalasthaḥ /<br/> āpañcamaprakāraghno dvitīyapratīpannakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni mi dag gi nang du rigs gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas gling de'am gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o / 'bras bu la gnas ba de nyid / rnam pa lnga yi bar bcom pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa la ni zhugs pa yin / 'bras bu la gnas pa gang gis rnam pa gcig nas lnga'i bar du spangs ba yin na de'i 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa yin bar rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣīṇaṣaṣṭhaprakārastu sakṛdāgāmyasau punaḥ /<br/> dvitīyaphalaprāpto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa drug pa zad gyur pa / de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba / de ni 'bras bu gnyis pa thob pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">devān gatvā sakṛnmanuṣyalokāgamanātsakṛdāgāmī /<br/> pareṇa janmāghāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha dag gi nang du song nas mi'i 'jig rten du lan cig phyir 'od ba'i phyir 'ong ba ste / phan chad skye ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvādityucyate /<br/> mṛduprakārāvaśeṣatvāt /<br/> sa eva punaḥ phalasthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i phyir zhes 'byung pa ni chung du'i rnam pa lus pa'i phyir ro / 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣīṇasaptāṣṭadoṣāṃśa ekajanmaikavīcikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyis cha bdun dang brgyad zad pa / tshe gcig bar chad gcig pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyapratipannaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ /<br/> sa eva sakṛdāgāmyekavīcido veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba de nyid rgyu gsum gyis bar chad gcig pa yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇāt /<br/> tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyalābhādekajanmāvaśeṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa'i rnam ba bdun nam brgyad spangs pa'i phyir dang de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang bo thob pa'i phyir dang tshe gcig lus pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vidhnayitum śaknoti /<br/> dhātvatikramāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na 'di'i rnam pa gcig gis 'bras bu la bgegs byed bar nus she na / khams las 'da' ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta ityuktaṃ prāk
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du las rnams ni gnas skabs gsum du bgegs byed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so zhes bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti /<br/> vipākaniḥṣyandaphalabhūmyatikramāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las rnams ji lta bar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste / rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i sa las 'da' ba'i phyir ro / bar chad ces bya ba ni bar chad byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ /<br/> tṛtīyaphalapratipannakaścaikavīciko veditavyaḥ prahīṇasaptāṣṭaprakāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i mya ngan las 'da' ba la tshe gcig gis chod pa'i phyir ram / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig gis chod pa'i phyir 'di la bar chad gcig yod pas na bar chad gcig pa yin no / rnam pa bdun dang brgyad spangs pa de ni 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvaprahīṇaprakārastu phalaprāptau na tāvatkulaṅkulo bhavatyekavīciko vā yāvatphalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na samukhīkṛtaḥ /<br/> so 'nāgāmī navakṣayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon rnam pa gsum dang bzhi spangs pa'am / bdun pa dang brgyad pa spangs pa 'bras bu thob pa ni ji srid du 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mngon du ma byas pa de srid du rigs nas rigs su skye ba'am bar chad gcig pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa evapunaḥ phalastho navaprakāraprahāṇādanāgāmī upadiṣṭaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dgu zad pas phyir mi 'ong / 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid rnam pa dgu spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin par rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātvanāgamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams su mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādityucyate prahāṇasaṃkulanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun tu sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnam pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ba ni spangs pa sngom pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gdon mi za bar sngon gnyis sam gsum spangs pa yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'ntarotpannasaṃskārāsaṃskāraparinirvṛtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni bar skyes 'du byed dang / 'du byed med spangs mya ngan 'da'
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvasrotāśca /<br/> antarā parinirvṛtirasyetyantarāparinirvṛtiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'pho ba rnams 'di bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamutpannasya saṃskāreṇāsaṃskāreṇeti yojyam /<br/> sa evānāgāmī punaḥ pañcadhā bhavati /<br/> antarāparinirvāyī yo 'ntarābhave parinirvāti /<br/> upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt /<br/> sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇena /<br/> so 'ppi nirūpadhiśeṣeṇetyapare /<br/> nāyurutsargāvaśitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du skyes nas dang 'du byed pa dang 'du byed pa med pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o / phyir mi 'ong ba de nyid rnam pa lnga yin te / bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni srid pa bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o / skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes pa tsam las mi 'chi bar phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste / mngon par brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro / gzhan dag na re de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pas so zhes zer ro / ma yin te / tshe 'dor ba la dbang med pa'i phyir ro / mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes nas sbyor ba ma btang zhing mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī kila upapadyāprati prasrabdhaprayogaḥ /<br/> sābhisaṃskāraṃ parinirvātyabhiyuktāvāhimārgatvāt /<br/> anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī tvaṃnabhisaṃskāreṇābhiyogavāhimārgābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste / mngon par mi brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtālambanamārganirvāṇādityapare /<br/> tattu na /<br/> atiprasaṅgāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dmigs pa'i lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / de ni mi rung ste / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtre tvanābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pūrva paṭhacyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni mngon bar 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba sngar 'byung bas de kho na bzhin du rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathaiva ca yujyate /<br/> vāhyavāhimārgayoranabhisaṃskārābhisaṃskārasādhyatvādayatnayatnaprāptitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam ngang gis 'byung ba dang ngang gis 'byung ba ma yin pa dag ni 'bad pa med pa dang 'bad pas 'thob ba'i sgo nas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byed pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyaparinirvāyiṇastu vāhitaro 'dhimātrataraśca mārgo mṛdutarāścānuśayā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni lam ches ngang gis 'byung ba dang ches che ba dang phra rgyas ches chung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvasrotā yasyordhvaṃ gatirna tatriva parinirvāṇaṃ yatropapannaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'pho ba ni gang du skyes pa de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gong du 'gro ba gang yin pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sroto gatirityeko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'pho ba dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni don gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa dhyāne vyavakīrṇo 'kaniṣṭhagaḥ /<br/> ūrdhvasrotā dvivadho hetutaḥ phalataśca /<br/> hetuto vyavakorṇāvyavakīrṇadhyānatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni bsam gtan spel nas 'og min 'gro / gong du 'pho ba de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis te / rgyu'i sgo nas ni bsam gtan spel ba dang spel ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti /<br/> sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvacyutaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu'i sgo nas ni 'og min dang srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa'i phyir ro / de la gang gis bsam gtan spel ba de ni 'og min du song nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o / de 'phar phyed 'phar thams cad du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punareṣo 'kaniṣṭhaparama ūrdhvaṃsrotāstrividhaḥ /<br/> plutādibhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi 'pho gong du 'pho ba 'og min gyi mthar thug pa de yang 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto 'kaniṣṭheṣūpapadyate /<br/> eṣa himadhyānimajjanāt plutaḥ /<br/> ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir bsam gtan rnam par spel nas bsam gtan dang po'i ro myangs te bsam gtan gsum las yongs su nyams pa tshangs ris pa dag gi nang du skyes nas sngon goms ba'i dbang gis bsam gtan bzhi pa spel te / de nas shi 'phos nas 'og min pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa ste / de ni bar du mi 'gro bas na 'phar ba zhes bya'o / phyed du 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni de nas gnas gtsang ma rnams su skyes la bar nas gnas gzhan 'ga' tsam yang rgal te 'og min du 'phos nas 'og min du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o / 'phags pa ni tshangs chen pa dag gi nang du mi skye ste / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahābrahmasvāryo nopapadyate dṛṣṭisthānatvādekanāyakatvācceti /<br/> sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang gtso bo gcig tu zad pa'i phyir dang gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni gnas gzhan thams cad du 'phos nas 'og min du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca dakācidanāgāmī /<br/> tatraivolpatyāyatane dvitīyaṃ janmābhinirvartayati /<br/> viśeṣagāmitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba ni nam yang skye ba'i skye mched de nyid du tshe gnyis pa mngon par 'grub par mi byed de / khyad par du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cāsya paripūrṇamanāgāmitvaṃ bhavati /<br/> yatropapannastasyādhastatra cātyantamanāgamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar na 'di'i phyir mi 'ong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs pa yin te / gang du skyes pa de 'og dang der gtan du mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvaddhacyāne vyavakīrṇe 'kaniṣṭago veditavyaḥ /<br/> tataḥ /<br/> anyo bhavāgragaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig bsam gtan spel nas 'og min du 'gro ba ni de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o / de las gzhan srid rtse mor 'gro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avyavakīrṇadhyāna ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavāgraniṣṭho bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'pho ba bsam gtan ma spel ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /<br/> śamathacarito hyeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan rnams ro myong bar byed cing gnas gzhan thams cad du skye la / gnas gtsang ma rnams su mi 'jug pa kho na ra gzugs med par skye ba'i rim gyis srid pa'i rtsa mor song ste / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o / 'di ni zhi gnas spyad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvakastu vipaśyanācaritaḥ /<br/> antarāpi tu parinirvāṇamūrdhvaṃsrotaso yujyamānaṃ paśyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snga ma ni lhag mthong spyad pa yin no / gong du 'pho ba bar skabs su yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rung bar blta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og min dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa nyid ni phan chad du 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te / dper na rgyun du zhugs pa mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa nyid bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime tāvat pañca rupopagā anāgāminaḥ /<br/> ārugyagaścaturdhānyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig de dag ni gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba lnga yin no / gzhan ni gzugs med 'gro rnam bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anya ārupyago 'nāgāmī yo rūpavītarāga itaścacyutvārupyeṣupapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba gzhan ni gzugs med par nye bar 'gro ba ste / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas gzugs med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punaścaturvidha upapadyādiparinirvāyibhedāt /<br/> ta ete ṣaḍanāgāmino bhavanti /<br/> tataḥ /<br/> iha nirvāpako 'paraḥ /<br/> ihaiva janmanyaparaḥ parinirvāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi ste / de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnam pa drug yin no / gzhan ni 'di la mya ngan 'da' / gzhan ni tshe 'di kho na la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyo saptamaḥ /<br/> punastrīṃstrividhān kṛtvā nava rupopagāḥ smṛtāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de ni bdun pa yin no / gsum la rnam gsum phyi nas su / gzugs su nyer 'gro dgur bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punastrayāṇāmanāgāmināṃ tridhā bhedādrūpopagā navānāgāmino bhavanti /<br/> katameṣāṃ trayāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba gsum la yang rnam pa gsum du phye bas gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba dgu yin no / gsum po gang dag / ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇorurdhvasrotasaśca /<br/> kathaṃ tridhābhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma do dang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang gong du 'pho ba'o / rnam pa gsum du phye bas ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarāparinirvāyiṇastāvadāśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt dṛṣṭāntatrayeṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni dpe gsum gyis myur ba dang myur ba ma yin pa dang yun ring mo zhig nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa upapadyābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāṇāt /<br/> sarve hyete trayo 'pyupapanna parinirvāṇādupapadyaparinirvāyiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes nas dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro / de dag thams cad kyang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvaṃsrotasaḥ plutādibhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'pho ba ni 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarveṣāṃ vā trayāṇāmāśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāditi tritvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na gsum po thams cad myur ba dang myur ba ma yin pa dang yun ring mo zhig nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadviśeṣaḥ punaḥ karmakleśendriyaviśeṣataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ni khyad par rnams / las dbang nyon mongs bye brag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ punastrayāṇāṃ navānāṃ cānāgāmināṃ karmakleśenriyaviśeṣādviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba gsum dang dgu po de dag gi khyad par ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i bye brag las te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trayāṇāṃ tāvadabhinirvṛttyupapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmopacitatvādyathākramaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātra kleśasamudācāra tvādadhimātramadhyamudvindriyatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gsum po ni go rims bzhin du mngon par 'grub ba dang skyes pa dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pa chung ba dang 'bring dang chen po'i phyir dang dbang po chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi navānāṃ prtyekamata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> prathamayostrikayoḥ kleśendriyaviśeṣāt pūrvavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de dag so so'i khyad par yang ci rigs par gsum tshan dang po gnyis ni gong ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i bye brag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścimasya trikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaviśeṣācceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum tshan tha ma ni lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi bye brag las kyang khyad par du blta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete navaprakārakleśendriyatvānnavānāgāmino bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i rnam pa dgu'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dgu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvaṃsroturabhedena sapta sadgatayo matāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'pho ba ma phye bar / dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun du 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvaṃ sravaṇadharmā ūrdhvaṃsrotā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong du 'gro ba'i chos ni gong du 'gro ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyābhedanirdeśātsapta satpuruṣagatayaḥ sūtre 'bhihitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ni de ma phye bar bstan pa'i phyir mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt punaretā eva satpuruṣagatayo nānyāḥ śaikṣagatayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir 'di dag kho na skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba yin la / slob pa'i 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etā hi gatayo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ satyeva karmāṇi vṛttiḥ kuśale asatyavṛttirakuśale /<br/> etāśca gatīrgatānāṃ na punaḥ pratyāgatirasti /<br/> natvetadyathoktamanyatrāsti /<br/> ataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag la 'gro ba 'di dag yod pa de dag ni las dam pa dge ba kho na la 'jug cing dam pa ma yin pa mi dge ba la mi 'jug pa dang 'gro ba 'di dag tu son pa rnams la yang phyir 'ong ba med pa yin la ji skad du bshad pa 'di dag gzhan la ni med pas de'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sadasadvṛttyavṛttibhyāṃ gatāopratyāgateśca tāḥ /<br/> sapta satpuruṣagatayo nānyā iti /<br/> yattarhi sūtre evoktaṃ satpuruṣāḥ katamaḥ /<br/> śaikṣyaḥ samyagdṛṣṭacyā samanvāgata iti vistaraḥ /<br/> anyeṣāmapyasti poāryāyikaṃ satpuruṣatvam /<br/> pañcavidhasya pāpasyātyantamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilambhāt prāyeṇākuśalaprahāṇācca /<br/> yeṣāṃ tu niṣparyāyeṇa teṣāmihādhhikāraḥ /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'pyanāgāmina eṣa bhedo 'sti /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dam pa dam min 'jug mi 'jug / son pa phyir mi 'ong phyir te / skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba dag yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no / 'o na mdo kho na las skyes bu dam pa gang zhe na / slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba rang ldan pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / gzhan dag la yang sdig pa rnam pa lnga gtan mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa mi dge ba phal cher spangs pa'i phyir rnam grangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid yid mod kyi / 'dir ni gang dag la rnam grangs med par yod pa de dag gi skabs yin no / ci phyir mi 'ong ba tshe yongs su gyur pa la yang dbye ba 'di yod dam zhe na / med de / 'di ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na parāvṛttajanmāryaḥ kāme dhātvantaropagaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod par tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags / khams gzhan du ni 'gro ba med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau parāvṛttajanmāntara āryo na dhātvantaraṃ gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams su tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags pa ni khams gzhan du mi 'gro ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgāmi phalaṃ prāpya tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe 'di nyid la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātau tu parāvṛttajanma kadācidārupyānpraviśati /<br/> ya ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavāgraparamaḥ /<br/> yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ /<br/> ante me hīyamānasya tatropapattirbhaviṣyati /<br/> abhidharmā nabhijñatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> bhavatā pyanivāraṇaṃ saṃharṣaṇīyatvā diti /<br/> sa cordhvajaśca naivākṣasaṃcāraparihāṇibhāk
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams su tshe yongs su gyur ba ni gal te na gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu yang 'jug ste / gong du 'pho ba srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba gang yin pa'o / 'o na brgya byin gyis / bdag ni tham nyams na lha gang 'og min zhes / rnam par grags ba de ni skye bar 'gyur bar shog / ces gang smras pa ji lta bu zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re chos mngon ba mngon par mi shes pa'i phyir te / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba yin ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma bkag go zhes zer ro / de dang gong mar skyes pa ni / yongs nyams dbang po 'pho mi bsten
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams su tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags pa de dang khams gong mar skyes ba'i 'phags pa ni dbang po rnams kyang 'di mi 'pho la ji ltar yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante /<br/> yasmānna santi /<br/> kasmānna santi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir 'phags pa tshe gzhan du yongs su gyur pa gzugs dang gzugs med par 'jug pa dang dbang po 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag tu mi 'dod ce na / 'di ltar med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">janmāntaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvādāśrayaviśeṣalābhācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir med ce na / tshe rabs gzhan nas yongs su 'dris pas dbang por nams ches yongs su smin pa'i phyir dang rten khyad par can thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam ma 'dris pas mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phra rgyas rnams shin tu chung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar dka' ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahu hyanena kartavyaṃ bhavati /<br/> akuśalāmyākṛtakleśaprahāṇaṃ dvitriśrāmaṇyaphalaprāptistridhātusamatikramaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dis nyon mongs pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa spangs pa dang dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gnyis sam gsum thob pa dang khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba dang mang po zhig bya dgos la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccāntarābhavastho na śaktaḥ kartumiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang srid pa bar ma la gnas pas bya bar mi nus zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ sa dhyāne vyavakīrṇe 'kaniṣṭhaga iti /<br/> atha katamaddhacyānaṃ prathamato vyavakīryate /<br/> ākīryate caturthaṃ prāk
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni bsam gtan spel nas 'og min 'gro / zhes bshad pa / yang dang po nyid du bsam gtan gang spel bar byed ce na / dang por bzhi ba spel bar byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi sarvakarmaṇyaḥ samādhiḥ sukhapratipadāmagracyatvāt /<br/> evaṃ ca punaḥ vyavakīryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin ni thams cad pas las su rung ba dang lam sla ba rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir ro / 'di ltar spel bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /<br/> tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa 'am phyir mi 'ong ba yang rung ste zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa rgyun dang ldan pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / de las langs nas de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa rgyun dang ldan pa la snyoms par 'jug la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ /<br/> niṣpatti kṣaṇamiśraṇāt /<br/> yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug ste / de bzhin du rgyun phri nas / gang gi tshe skad cig ma gnyis zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig ma gnyis zag pa dang bcas pa la snyoms bar 'jug la yang zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug go zhes grag ste / 'di ni spel ba'i sbyor ba yin no / skad cig ma ni bsres pas 'grub / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gang gi tshe zag pa med pa'i skad cig ma'i mjug thogs su zag pa dang bcas pa mngon sum du byed cing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa'i mjug thogs su yang zag pa med pa mngon sum du byed la / de ltar zag pa dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma dang zag pa med pa dag tu bsres pas spel ba 'grub pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma gnyis ni bar chad med pa'i lam lta bu yin la / gsum pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tadvalelnānyānyapi vyavakīryante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa spel nas / de'i stobs kyis gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang spel bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau triṣu dvīpeṣu prathamaṃ vyavakīryate /<br/> paścāt parihīṇena rūpadhātau /<br/> aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇamanyatra buddhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang por 'dod pa'i khams su gling gsum dag tu spel bar byed la / phyis ni yongs su nyams pas gzugs kyi khams su spel bar byed do / sangs rgyas ma gtogs pas skad cig ma spel bar mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata icchātaḥ pravāhatrayasamāpattito niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ /<br/> kimarthaṃ pounardhyānaṃ vyavakīryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rgyun chags gsum la ji srid du 'dod par snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya bar blta'o / ci'i phyir bsam gtan spel bar byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattivihārārthaṃ kleśabhīrutayā 'pi ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye dang gnas par bya phyir dang / nyon mongs pas ni 'jig phyir yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhiḥ kāraṇairdhyānaṃ vyavakiranti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gsum gyis na bsam gtan spel bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tīkṣṇendriyā anāgāminaḥ śuddhāvāsopapattyarthaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang ma rnams su skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas bar bya ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhirutayā cāsvādanāsaṃprayuktasamādhidūrīkaraṇādaparihīṇārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te / ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thag bsrings pa'i sgo nas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhantastu tīkṣaṇendriyā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa dbang po rnon po rnams ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhīrutvāccāparihīṇārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te / yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmāt pañcaiva śuddhāvāsopapattayaḥ /<br/> yadetadvacyavakīrṇabhāvitaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci'i phyir gnas gtsang mar skye ba lnga kho na yin zhe na / bsam gtan bzhi pa spel mar bsgoms par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa lnga'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpāñcavidhyātpañcaiva śuddhāvāsopapattayaḥ /<br/> sā hi vyavakīrṇabhāvanā pañcaprakārā mrdumadhyādhimātrataratamabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas gtsang skye ba lnga kho na / spel mar bsgom pa de ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang shin tu che ba dang shin tu ches che ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa lnga yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamāyāṃ trīṇi cittāni saṃmukhīdriyante /<br/> anāsravaṃ sāsravamanāsravaṃ ca /<br/> dvitīyāyāṃ ṣaṭ /<br/> tṛtīyāyāṃ nava /<br/> caturthyāṃ dvādaśa /<br/> pañcamyāṃ pañcadaśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po la ni zag pa med pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang po dang sems gsum mngon sum du byed do / gnyis pa la ni drug go / gsum pa la ni dgu'o / bzhi pa la bcu gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāsāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pañca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalam /<br/> yattatra sāsravaṃ tadvaśātteṣūpapattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga pa la ni bco lnga ste / de dag gi 'bras bu ni grangs bzhin du gnas gtsang ma lnga yin la de la zag pa dang bas pa gang yin pa de'i dbang gas de dag tu skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhādīndriyādhikyāt pañcetyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa lhag pa'i phyir lnga yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhalābhyanāgāmī kāyasākṣī punarmataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa thob pa'i phyir mi 'ong / lus kyis mngon du byed par 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhalābho 'syāstīti nirodhalābhī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la 'gog pa'i thob pa yod pas na 'gog pa thob pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi kaścidanāgāmī nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa kāyasākṣītyucyate /<br/> nirvāṇasadṛśasya dharmasya kāyena sākṣātkaraṇāt /<br/> kathaṃ punaḥ kāyena sākṣātkaroti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba gang la la 'gog pa thob pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i chos lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir lus kyis mngon sum du thob pa zhes bya'o / ji ltar na lugs kyis mngon sum du byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittābhāvāt kāyāśrayotpatteḥ /<br/> evaṃ tu bhavitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems med pas lus la brten te skye ba'i phyir ro / 'di lta bu yin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi tasmādvyutthāyāpratilabdhapūrvā savijñānakāṃ kāyaśāntiṃ pratilabhate /<br/> yato 'syaivaṃ bhavati śāntā vata nirodhasamāpattirnirvāṇasadṛśī vata nirodhasamāpattiriti /<br/> evamanena tasyāḥ śāntatvaṃ kāyena sākṣatkṛtaṃ bhavati /<br/> prāptijñānasākṣātkriyābhyāṃ pratyakṣīkāro hi sākṣātkriyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de 'gog pa de las langs nas gang las de ni 'di snyam du kye ma 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra bar zhi ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus zhi ba sngon ma thob pa thob par 'gyur te / de ltar na 'dis de'i zhi ba nyid du lus kyis mngon du byas pa yin te / thob pa dang shes pas mngon sum du byed pa dag gis mngon sum du gyur pa ni mngon du byed pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ityatra sūtre ki kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ /<br/> kāraṇābhāvāt /<br/> ki punaḥ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las slob pa bco brgyad ces gsungs pa der lus kyis mngon du byed pa ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na / rgyu med pa'i phyir ro / rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāstisraḥ śaikṣāstatphāṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i slob pa gsum dang de'i 'bras bu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadviśeṣeṇa hi śaikṣāṇāṃ vyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i khyad par gyis slob pa rnams rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhasamāpattiśca naivaśaikṣānāśikṣā phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni slob pa yang ma yin la slob pa'i 'bras bu yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato na tadyogācdhaikṣaviśeṣa uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de dang ldan pas slob pa'i khyad par du ma gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa tāvadanāgāmināṃ yathāsthūlaṃ bhedaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni re zhig phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi dbye ba che long yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūkṣmaṃ tu bhidyamānāḥ sahasraśo bhidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhib tu dbye na ni stong phrag tu dbye ba yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarāparinirvāyiṇastrayo mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la dbang po rtul po dang 'bring po dang rnon po'i bye brag gis gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūmibhedāccatvāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid sa'i bye brag gis bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇadharmādigotrabhedāt ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis drug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthānāntarabhedāt ṣoḍaśa bhūmivairāgyabhedāt ṣaṭtriṃśat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas gzhan gyi bye brag gis bcu drug go / sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bye brag gis sum cu rtsa drug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhatau sakalābandhano yāvaccaturthadhyānāṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams kyi 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rnam pa brgyad las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthānāntaragotravairāgyendriyabhedādvānavatāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ śatāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas gzhan dang rigs dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang dbang po'i bye brag gis nyis stong lnga brgyad gu bcu rtsa gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> ekasmin sthāne ṣaṭ gotrāṇi /<br/> gotre gotre nava pudgalāḥ sakalabandhano yāvadaṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmātsthānāt ṣaṇṇṇavakāni catuṣpañcāśat ṣoḍaśa catuṣpañcāśatkāni catuḥṣaṣṭānyaṣṭau śatāni /<br/> indriyabhedāt punastriguṇā ityevaṃ kṛtvā yo 'dharadhyāne navaprakāravītarāgaḥ sa uttare sakalabandhana uktaḥ /<br/> samagaṇanārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na / gnas gcig na rigs drug go / rigs re re la 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa nas rang gi gnas kyi rnam pa brgyad las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar gang zag dgu dgu ste / dgu drug ni lnga bcu bzhi'o / lnga bcu rtsa bzhi phrag bcu drug ni brgyad brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi'o / yang dbang pa'i bye brag gis sum 'gyur te / de ltar byas pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathāntarāparinirvāyiṇa evaṃ yavadūrdhvasrotasa ityabhisamasya sarve catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāpyanāgāmināṃ bhavanti /<br/> ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣidarhattve pratipakṣakaḥ /<br/> anāgāmītyadhikṛtam /<br/> sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti /<br/> navamasyāpyānantaryapathe /<br/> navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva /<br/> vajropamaśca saḥ /<br/> sa cānantaryamārgo vajropamaḥ samādhirityucyeta /<br/> sarvānuśayabheditvāt /<br/> bhinnatvādasau na punaḥ sarvān bhinatti /<br/> sarvāstu bhettuṃ samarthaḥ /<br/> sarvānantaryamārgāṇāmadhimātratamatvāt /<br/> vajropamānāṃ tu bahubhedaṃ varṇayanti /<br/> anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītā bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudāyālambanairduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau /<br/> nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau /<br/> nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ prathamadhyānanirodhālambanāścatvāraḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvat bhavāgranirodhālambanāścatvāraḥ /<br/> mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāścatvāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dra bar rtse ba'i phyir bsam gtan 'og ma'i rnam pa dgu las 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni gong ma'i 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan par bshad pa yin no / bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji lta bar gong du 'pho ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bas thams cad bsdus na phyir mi 'ong ba khri nyis stong dgu brgya drug cu yin no / srid rtse'i bar cha brgyad zad pa / dgra bcom nyid la zhugs ba yin / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa ste / yang phyir mi 'ong ba de bsam gtan dang po'i rnam pa gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas bzung ste / srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par brgyad kyi bar spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa yin no / dgu yi bar chad med lam yang / de srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa dgu pa spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam la gnas pa na / yang dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa kho na yin no / de ni rdo rje lta bu yin / bar chad med pa'i lam de ni phra rgyas thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o / bcom zin pa'i phyir 'dis thams cad 'joms pa ni ma yin gyi / bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad kyi nang nas shin tu che ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'joms bar nus pa yin no / rdo rje lta bu rnams kyi bye brag ni rnam ba mang po zhig tu brjod de / mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la dmigs pas sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes ba'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs pa ldan pa brgyad dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bsam gtan dang po'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa bzhi nas de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i bar du bzhi dang lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālambanāt /<br/> ta ime jñānākārālambanabhedabhinnā dvāpañcāśadvajropamā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zad par la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / de dag ni shes pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu lnga bcu rtsa gnyis yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā 'nāgāmyasaṃgṛhītā evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa ji lta bar bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar dag kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśavijñānānantyākiñcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭāviṃśatiścaturviṃśativiṃśatiśca bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa rnams ni grangs bzhin du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣu dharmajñānasyādhobhūminirodhālambanasya cānvayajñānasyābhāvāt /<br/> adhobhūmipratipakṣālambanaṃ tu bhavati /<br/> tasyānyo 'nyahetutvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pas sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro / sa 'og mi'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de / de ni phan tshun du rgyu pa'i phyir ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānamapyekaikabhūmipratipakṣālambanamiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatimadhikān prakṣīpyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītirvajropamā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag lam la rjes su shes pa yang sa re re'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag par bsnan nams mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa rdo rje lta bu ni brgyad cu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyāna saṃgṛhītāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśānantyāyatanādiṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat dvātriṃśaccaturviśatiśca bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa dag ni go rims bzhin du bzhi bcu dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punargotrendriyabhedāt bhūyāṃso bhavanti /<br/> yastvasau bhāvāgriko navamaḥ prakāra ukto yasya vajropamena prahāṇaṃ /<br/> tatkṣayāptyā kṣayajñānaṃ /<br/> tasya punarnavamasya prakārasya saha kṣayaprāptyā kṣayajñānamutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis ni ches mang ba yin no / gang srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa dgu par bshad pa rdo rje lta bus spangs pa gang yin pa / de zad thob dang zad pa shes / rnam pa dgu pa de zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig tu zad pa shes pa skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vajropamasamādheranantaraṃ paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mjug thogs su rnam par grol ba'i lam tham skye ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva tatkṣayajñānaṃ sarvāsravakṣayaprāptisahajatvātprathamataḥ /<br/> aśaikṣo 'rhannasau tadā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de ni dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir zad pa shes pa yin no / de tshe de mi slob dgra bcom
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utpanne ca punaḥ kṣayajñāne so 'rhattvapratipannakaḥ aśaikṣo bhavatyarhaścārhattvaphalaprāptaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa de zad pa shes pa skye nas mi slob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalāntaraṃ prati punaḥ śikṣitavyābhāvādaśaikṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir slob par bya ba ma med pa'i phyir mi slob pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti /<br/> kena te śaikṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de ni gzhan gyi don byed par 'os pa'i phyir dang 'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa yin no / gang zag sngar bshad pa gzhan bdun ni slob pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / ci'i phyir de dag slob pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsravakṣayāya nityaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlatvācchikṣātraye adhiśīlamadhicittamadhiprajñaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa gsum po lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab la rtag tu slob pa'i dang tshul can yin pa'i phyir to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāḥ punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāsvabhāvāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthagjano 'pi śaikṣaḥ prāpnoti /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so'i skye bo yang slob pa yin par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathābhūtaṃ satyāprajñānāt punaścāpaśikṣaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir dang yang slob ba gtong ba'i phyir ro
