</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata iti /<br/> yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir ci nas kyang gang zhig slob pa de kho na slob pa yin gyi slob pa 'dor ba ni ma yin no zhes dmigs kyis bsal ba shes par bya ba'i phyir mdo las / zhi byed bslab pa la slob cing / bslab pa la slob pas ni de'i phyir slob pa zhes bya'o zhes lan gnyis su gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakṛtistha āryaḥ kathaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlaḥ /<br/> āśayataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa rang bzhin du gnas pa ji ltar slob pa'i dang tshul can yin zhe na / bsam pa'i sgo nas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthitādhvagavat prāptyanuṣaṅgataśca ṣikṣātrayasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam du 'gro ba gnas pa bzhin no / thob pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i yang phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha śaikṣā dharmāḥ katame /<br/> śaikṣasyānāsravāḥ /<br/> aśaikṣāḥ katame /<br/> aśaikṣasyānāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang slob pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / slob pa'i zag pa med pa rnams so / mi slob pa rnams gang zhe na / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇaṃ kasmānna śaikṣam /<br/> aśaikṣapṛthagjanayorapi tadyogāt /<br/> kasmānnāśaikṣam /<br/> śaikṣapṛthagjanayorapi tadyogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa slob pa ma yin zhe na / mi slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /  / ci'i phyir mi slob pa ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete sarva evāṣṭāvāryapudgalā bhavanti /<br/> pratipannakāścatvāraśca phale sthitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro / de dag thams cad ni zhugs pa bzhi dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi dang 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā srota āpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ srota āpannaḥ /<br/> evaṃ yāvadarhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratiṃpannako 'rhanniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa nas de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa'i bar yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmata ete 'ṣṭau bhavanti /<br/> dravyatastu pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming gi sgo nas ni brgyad yin no / rdzas su ni lnga yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamaḥ pratipannakaścatvāraśca phalasthāḥ /<br/> śeṣāṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ triphalasthāvyatirekāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhugs pa dang po dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'o / zhugs pa lhag ma rnams ni 'bras bu la gnas pa gsum las tha mi dad ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anupūrvādhigamaṃ pratyevamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthar gyis 'thob ba'i phyir de skad ces bshad kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ darśanamārge sakudāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau na ca srota āpanna sakṛdāgāmināviti /<br/> dvividho hi bhāvanāmārga ukto laukiko lokottaraśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phal cher dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dag cig yin na ni mthong ba'i lam la lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa dag yin gyi / rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag ni ma yin no / bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kenāyaṃ śaikṣaṃḥ kuto vairāgyaṃ prāpnoti /<br/> lokottareṇa vairāgyaṃ bhavāgrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa 'di gang gis gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob ce na / 'jig rten 'das kyis srid rtse las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na laukikena /<br/> ki kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chags bral 'jig rten pas ni ma yin no / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata ūrdhva laukikābhāvāt svabhūmikasya vā pratipakṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i gong na 'jig rten pa med pa'i phyir dang rang gis pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna pratipakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gnyen po ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatkleśānuśayitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i nyon mongs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti /<br/> anyato dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa gang zhig dngos po gang la rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni dngos po des spong bar byed pa ma yin la / gang gi gnyen po gang yin pa de la ni nyon mongs pa de rgyas par yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgrādanyataḥ sarvato bhūmelaukikenāopi vairāgyaṃ lokottareṇāpi /<br/> tatra punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan las rnam pa gnyis / srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa'i sa thams cad las ni 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral la / 'jig rten las 'das pas kyang 'dod chags dang bral lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikenāryavairāgye visaṃyogāptayo dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa yis chags bral ba'i / 'phags la bral ba'i thob rnams gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca /<br/> lokottareṇa cetyeke /<br/> lokottareṇāpyevamityapare /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> tyavate kleśāsamanvayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa la bral ba'i thob pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rnam pa gnyis skye'o / kha cig 'jig rten 'das kyis kyang / gzhan dag na re 'jig rten las 'das pas kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro / ci'i phyir zhe na / btang la nyon mongs mi ldan phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob pa la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa mi skye na / de lta na 'phags pa'i lam gyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba bsam gtan la brten te dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed pa gang yin pa de lam snga ma zad par btang pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i lam 'ba' zhig thob pa'i phyir sa gong ma pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bral ba dang mi ldan par yang 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de btang na yang nyon mongs pa de dag dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgrādhavimuktordhvajātavattvasamanvayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid rtse'i phyed las rnam grol dang / gong du skyes pa bzhin mi ldan
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asatyāmapi tu tasyāṃ laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau na taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa med du zin kyang de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā bhavāgrādardha prakāravimuktasyāsatyāmapi tu laukikyāṃ tadvisaṃyogaprāptau tyaktāyāmapi cendriyasaṃcāreṇa lokottarāyāṃ na punastaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavati /<br/> yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa phyed la rnam par grol ba la de'i bral ba'i 'thob pa 'jig rten pa yang med la / dbang po 'pho bas 'jig rten las 'das pa yang btang bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba dang yang dper na so so'i skye bo bsam gtan dang po yan chad du skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bral ba'i thob pa btang bas yang de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba bzhin bas 'di ni shes par byed pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katapayā punarbhūmyā kuto vairāgyaṃ bhavati /<br/> anāsraveṇa vairāgyamanāgāmyena sarvataḥ /<br/> ābhavāgrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa gang zhig gis gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur zhe na / zag med mi lcogs med pa yis / thams cad las ni 'dod chags bral
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar las so / yang gang zhig nyer bsdogs la brten te sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob na / ci'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam thams cad bar chad med pa'i lam bzhin du nyer bsdogs las skye'am zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānātsāmantakādvā 'ntyo mukti mārgastribhūjaye /<br/> nava hyapapattibhūmayaḥ /<br/> sarvakāmadhāturaṣṭau ca dhyānārupyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa gsum rgyal la bsam gtan nam / nyer bsdogs las mtha'i rnam grol lam / skye ba'i sa ni thams cad du dgu ste / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yāvat dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ tribhūmijayaḥ /<br/> tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt /<br/> nordhvaṃ sāmantakāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bsam gtan gnyis kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba sa gsum las rgyal ba de la ni rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma nyer bsdogs sam bsam gtan dngos gzhi las skye'o / gong ma'i nye bar bsdogs las min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhūmijayādūrdhvaṃ maulādeva na punaḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyasāmānyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa gsum las rgyal ba yan chad ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dngos gzhi kho na las skye'i nyer bsdogs las ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum na ni nyer bsdogs dang dngos gzhi gnyis kyi dbang po tha dad pa'i phyir la la bsam gtan dang dngos gzhi la 'jug mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyasaṃcārasya duṣkaratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po'i 'pho ba ni dka' ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastribhūmivairāgye dhyānasāmantakādapyanyo vimuktimārgo bhavati /<br/> anāsraveṇa vairāgyamanāgamyena sarvata ityuktamanyaistu noktam /<br/> ata ucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas nas gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma nyer bsdogs las kyang skye'o / zag med mi lcogs med pa yis / thams cad las ni 'dod chags bral / zhes bshad kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma bshad pas de'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryairaṣṭābhiḥ svordhvabhūjayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags / brgyad kyis rang gong sa las rgyal / zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravairaṣṭābhirdhyānadhyānāntarārupyaiḥ svasyā ūrdhvāyāśca bhūmervairāgyaṃ nādharāyā vītarāgatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang gzugs med pa brgyad kyis ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro / 'og ma las ni ma yin te / 'dod chags dang bral zin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i rnam par zhugs pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktyānantaryapathā laukikāstu yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa yi rnam grol dang / bar chad med lam go rims bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāntādyudārādyākārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktimārgāḥ śāntādyākārā ānantaryamārgā audārikādyākārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can dag yin la / bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punaryathākramam /<br/> uktarādharagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang go rims bzhin du / gong dang 'go ma'i spyod yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ /<br/> ānantaryamārgā adharāṃ bhūmimaudārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni ci rigs par sa gong ma la zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par blta'o / bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni sa 'go ma la rags pa dang tha ma ngan pa dang rtsig pa stug po lta bur blta ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśāntatvādaudarikato mahābhisaṃskārataratvāt /<br/> apraṇītatvāt duḥkhilato bahudauṣṭhulyataratvena pratikūlabhāvāt /<br/> sthūlabhittikatastayaiva tadbhūmyaniḥsaraṇāt bhittyaniḥsaraṇavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par 'du byed pa shin tu che ba nyid kyis ma zhi ba'i phyir rags pa blta'o / gya nom pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha ba ngan par blta ste / gnas ngan len rab tu mang ba nyid kyis mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir ro / rtsig pa las nges par mi 'byung ba bzhin du de nyid kyis sa de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir rtsig pa steg po lta bur blta'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ viparyayeṇa śāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārāḥ /<br/> gata mānuṣaṅgikam /<br/> idaṃ tu vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las bzlog pa ni zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa can dag yin no / zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so / dkyus ma kho na brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kṣayajñānākanantaraṃ kimutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang zad pa shes pa'i mjug thogs su ci zhig skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyakopyaḥ kṣayajñānādanutpādamatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi gyo zad shes las / mi skye'i blo gros
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akopyadharmā cedarhanbhavati kṣayajñānātsamanantaramanutpādajñānamasyotpadyate /<br/> na cet /<br/> kṣayajñānamaśaikṣī vā dṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te dgra bcom pa mi gyo ba'i chos can zhig yin na de la zad pa shes pa'i de ma thag tu mi skye ba'i shes ba skye'o / gal te min / zad pa shes sam mi slob lta
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mi gyo ba'i chos can ma yin na ni zad pa shes pa las zad pa shes pa kho na'am / mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvanutpādajñānaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāt /<br/> kiṃ punarakopoyadharmaṇaḥ sā naivotpadyate /<br/> sarvasya sā 'rhataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa srid pa'i phyir mi skye bshes pa ni ma yin no / ci mi gyo ba'i chos can la de mi skye ba kho na yin nam zhe na / de ni dgra bcom thams cad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akopyadharmaṇo 'pyanutpādajñānātkadācidanutpādajñānamevotpadyate kadācidaśaikṣī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can la yang res 'ga' mi skye ba shes pa las mi skye ba shes pa kho na skye la / res 'ga' ni mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yānyetāni catvāri phalānyuktāni kasyaitāni phalāni /<br/> śramaṇyaphalāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag 'bras bu bzhir bshad pa de dag gang gi 'bras bu dag yin zhe na dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimidaṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ nāma /<br/> śrāvaṇyamamalo mārgaṃḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge sbyong gi tshul zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na / dge sbyong tshul ni dri med lam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravo mārgaḥ śramaṇyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge sbyong gi tshul ni zag pa med pa'i lam yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tena hhi śramaṇo bhavati /<br/> kleśasaṃśamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des nyon mongs pa yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i sgo nas dge sbyong du 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata iti sūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las / 'dis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos zhes bya ba nas rgyas par rga shir 'gyur ba'i bar rnam pa du ma zhi bar byas pa yin pas / de'i phyir dge sbyong zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anatyantaśamanānna pṛthagjanaḥ paramārthaśramaṇaḥ /<br/> tasya punaḥ śrāmaṇyasya /<br/> saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ phalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so'i skye bo ni gtan du zhi bar mi byed pa'i phyir don dam pa'i dge sbyong ma yin no / dge sbyong gi tshul de'i 'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāni hi śrāmaṇyaphalāni punaścatvāryuktāni sūtre /<br/> api tu /<br/> ekānnanavatistāni /<br/> kāni punastāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams yin no / de dag kyang mdo las rnam pa bzhir gsungs so / gzhan yang de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">muktimārgāḥ saha kṣayaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang gang zhe na / grol lam zad pa rnams dang bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam brgyad dang rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba spong bar byed pa sa dgu po re re zhing yang nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu dgu spong bar byed pa de snyed kho na'i bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrānantaryamārgāḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ vimuktimārgāḥ saṃskṛtāni śrāmaṇyaphalāni /<br/> tanniṣyandapuruṣakāraphalatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni dge sbyong gi tshul yin no / rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu 'dus byas dag yin te / de'i rgyu mthun pa dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānyasaṃskṛtāni śrāmaṇyaphalāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa de dag gi spangs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu 'dus ma byas dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamekānnanavatirbhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar brgyad cu rtsa dgu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi buddhasyopasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyaṃ jāyate /<br/> na kartavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na 'o na ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa kha bskang bar bya dgos par 'gyur ro zhe na / bya mi dgos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyapi bhūyāṃsi phalāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang 'bras bu rnams mang mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catuṣphalavyavasthā tu pañakāraṇasaṃbhavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu bzhi rnam gzhag pa ni / rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /<br/> katamāni pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis spong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs gang la rgyu lnga srid pa de la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag go zhes grag go / lnga gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvatyāgo 'nyamārgāptiḥ kṣayasaṃkalanaṃ phale /<br/> jñānāṣṭakasya lābho 'tha ṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras la sngon lam btang ba dang / gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang shes pa brgyad tshan thob pa dang / rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvamārgatyāgo 'pūrvamārgāptiḥ pratipannakaphalamārgatyāgalābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam snga ma btang ba dang sngon med pa'i lam thob pa ni zhugs pa dang 'bras bu'i lam btang ba dang thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇasaṃkalanaṃ sarvasyaikaprāptilābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spangs pa bsdoms pa ni thams cad kyis thob pa cig rnyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yugapadaṣṭajñānalābhaścaturvidhanāṃ dharmānvayajñānānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa brgyad cig car du 'thob pa ni chos dang rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā anityādyākārāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bcu drug thob pa ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu lnga po de dag ni 'bras bu re re la yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te zag pa med pa'i lam kho na dge sbyong gi tshul yin na 'jig rten ba'i lam gyis thob pa'i 'bras bu gnyis ji ltar dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bur rung zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikāoptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalalm
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa yis thob 'bras ni / bsres dang zag med thob 'dzin phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'bras bu spangs pa kho na yang ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgaphalamapi prahāṇaṃ tatra miśrīkriyate /<br/> sarvasya tatphalasaṃgṛhītaikavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam gyis 'bras bu spangs pa yang der bsre bar bya ste / thams cad kyi thob pa de'i 'bras bur bsdus pa cig rnyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir mdo las / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa gang yin pa de yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgāmiphalaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduta pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇamiti /<br/> anāsravayā ca visaṃyogāprāptyā tatprahāṇaṃ sadhāryate /<br/> tadvalena parihīṇāmaraṇāt /<br/> ato 'pyasya maraṇaṃ yuktaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalam /<br/> yadeva caitacchrāmaṇyayuktaṃ /<br/> brāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ ca tadeva /<br/> kleśānāṃ vāhanādvāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ tu /<br/> brahmāvartanāt /<br/> anuttarabrahmaṇyayogāt bhagavānbrahmā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun du sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga spangs pa gang yin pa de yin no zhes gsungs so / de'i stobs kyis yongs su nyams pa mi 'chi ba'i phyir bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pas spangs pa de 'dzin par yang byed de / 'di'i phyir yang 'di dge sbyong gi 'bras bu nyid du rigs so / dge sbyong gi tshul du bshad pa gang yin pa / de nyid tshangs tshul tshangs pa yi / 'khor lo / nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i tshul lo / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ni / tshangs pas bskor phyir ro / bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i tshul bla na med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir tshangs pa yin te / mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapīti sūtrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa zhes kyang bya / zhi ba dang bsil bar gyur pa zhes kyang bya zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyedaṃ cakramiti brāhmaṃ tena prartitatvāt /<br/> dharmacakraṃ tu dṛṅmārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor lo 'di ni de'i yin pas na tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ste / des bskor pa'i phyir ro / chos kyi 'khor lo mthong ba'i lam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caṅkramaṇāccakraṃ tatsādharmyāddarśanamārgo dharmacakram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu bas na 'khor lo'o / de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam ni chos kyi 'khor lo yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasya sādharmyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i chos mthun pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśugatvādyarādibhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myur bar 'gro sogs rtsibs sogs kyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśugatvāttyajanakramaṇāt ajitajayajitādhyavasanādutpatananipattanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myur du 'gro ba'i phyir dang 'dor ba dang 'jug pa'i phyir dang ma rgyal ba rgyal bar byed pa dang rgyal ba rnal du dgod pa'i phyir dang 'phar ba dang 'bab pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamāśugatvādibhiḥ arādibhiḥ sādharmyādāryāṣṭāṅṅgo mārgaścakramiti bhadantaghoṣakaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">myur bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ni de lta bu yin no / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rtsibs la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir 'khor lo zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyagdṛṣṭisaṃkalpavyāyāmasmṛtayo hyarasthānīyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang rtsol ba dang dran pa rnams ni rtsibs lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni lte ba lta bu yin no / ting nge 'dzin ni mu khyud lta bu yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau pravarttitaṃ dharmacakramiti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam chos kyi 'khor lo yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na 'phags pa koondi n+ya la de skyes pa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tattriparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na de lan gsum du bzlas pa dang rnam pa bcu gnyis yin zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyam /<br/> tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o / de yongs su shes par bya'o / de yongs su shes so zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lan gsum du bzlas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ /<br/> pratisatyemevaṃ bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzlas pa re re la mig skyes so / shes pa dang rigs pa dang blo skyes so zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yin te / bden pa re re la yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trikadvādaśakasādharmyāttu triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramuktam /<br/> dvayasaptasthānakauśalādeśanāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum tshan dang bcu gnyis su chos mthun pa'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te / rnam pa bcu gnyis zhes bshad de / gnyis dang gnas bdun la mkhas pa bstan pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzlas pa 'di dag gis ni grangs bzhin du mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams bstan to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de lta na 'o na ni mthong ba'i lam kho na la lan gsum du bzlas pa yang ma yin la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang ma yin na ji ltar na mthong ba'i lam 'di chos kyi 'khor lor rnam par gzhag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate /<br/> kathaṃ ca punastriparivartam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo yang yin lan gsum du bzlas pa dang rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang yin par rung ngo / ji ltar na lan gsum du bzlas pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyānāṃ triḥ parivarttanāt /<br/> kathaṃ dvādaśākāram /<br/> caturṇāṃ satyānāṃ tridhākaraṇāt /<br/> duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti /<br/> parijñeyaṃ praheyaṃ sākṣātkartavyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti /<br/> parijñātaṃ prahīṇaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhāvitamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa rnams lan gsum du bzlas pa'i phyir ro / ji ltar na rnam pa bcu gnyis yin zhe na / bden pa rnams la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung / 'gog pa / lam zhes bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya / spang bar bya / mngon sum du bya / bsgom par bya zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes spangs / mngon sum du byas / bsgoms zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum du byas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya punaḥ pravartanaṃ parasaṃtāne gamanamarthajñāpanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bskor ba ni gzhan gyis rgyud la go bar byed pa ste / don shes par byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā sarva evāryamārgo dharmacakraṃ veneyasaṃtānakramaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyang gdul bya'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tattu parasaṃtāne darśanamārgotpādanādvartayitumārabdhamataḥ pravartitamityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni gzhan gyi rgyud la mthong ba'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir bskor bar brtsams pa yin pas de'i phyir bskor ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmindhātau kati śrāmaṇyaphalāni prāpyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang khams gang du dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu du dag cig 'thob ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāme trayāptiḥ /<br/> kāmadhātāveva trayāṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānāṃ prāptirnānyatra /<br/> antyasya triṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod par gsum thob / gsum ni 'dod pa'i khams kho nar 'thob kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no / tha ma ni / gsum du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu tha ma ni dgra bcom pa nyid de / de ni khams gsum du 'thob po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phaladvayasya tāvadavītarāgaprāpyatvādūrdhvamaprāptiryuktā /<br/> tṛtīyasya tu kasmādaprāptiḥ /<br/> nordhvaṃ hi dṛkpathaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'bras bu gnyis ni 'dod chags dang ma bral bas thob bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gong mar mi 'thob par yang rigs na gsum pa go / ci'i phyir mi 'thob ce na / gong na mthong lam med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvaṃ hi kāmadhātordarśanamārgo nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams las gang na ni mthong ba'i lam med la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de med par yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa med pas zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no / ci'i phyir de na mthong ba'i lam med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyeṣu tāvat śravaṇābhāvādadhodhātvanālambanācca /<br/> rūpadhātau tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gzugs med pa'i khams na ni nyan pa med pa dang khams 'og ma la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /  / gzugs kyi khams na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi skye lung las 'dir rtsom zhing / der mthar phyin zhes 'byung phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante /<br/> na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la chags pa'i phyir dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir kun du skyo bar mi 'gyur la / skyo ba med bar yang 'phags pa'i lam thob par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iyaṃ tāvadyuktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni re zhig rigs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āgamo 'pyayaṃ pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa iti /<br/> vidhā hi mārgarambho nirvāṇopāyatvāt /<br/> idamuktaṃ yadyakopyaḥ kṣayajñānādanutpādamati riti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung yang / bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na gong du 'pho ba'i bar gang zag lnga ni 'dir rtsom zhing der mthar phyin bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa 'di yin no / rtsom pa zhes bya ba ni lam rtsom pa yin te / mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro / 'di skad du / gal te mi gyo'i zad shes la / mi skye blo gros zhes bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kimarhatamapyasti bhedaḥ /<br/> astītyucyate /<br/> ṣaḍarhanto matāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci dgra bcom pa la yang dbye ba yod dam zhe na smras pa yod de / dgra bcom drug 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las dgra bcom pa drug gsungs te / yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang mi gyo ba'i chos can no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ pañca śraddhādhhimuktijāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las / lnga ni dad pas mos las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akokpyadharmāṇaṃ varjayitvā 'nye pañca śraddhādhimukti pūrvakāḥ /<br/> vimuktiḥ sāmayikyeṣām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can ma gtogs pa gzhan lnga ni dad pas mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā /<br/> nityānurakṣyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag rnam grol dus dang sbyor / lnga po 'di dag gi sems kyi rnam par grol ba ni dus dang sbyor bas 'phangs pa yin par rig par bya ste / rtag tu rjes su srung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evaite samayavimuktā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samayāpekṣāścaite 'dhimuktāśceti samayavimuktā madhyapadalopāt dhṛtaghaṭavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag ni dus la ltos pa yang yin la rnam par grol ba yang yin pas dus kyi rnam par grol ba dag ste / bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir mar gyi bum pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ hi samayāpekṣāsamādhisaṃmukhībhāva upakaraṇārogyadeśaviśeṣāpekṣatvāt /<br/> akopyākopyadharmaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa ni yo byad dang nad med pa dang yul gyi bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir dus la ltos pa yin no / mi gyo'i chos can mi gyo ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akopyadharmaṇastvakopyā vimuktiḥ /<br/> kopayitumaśakyatvādaparihāṇitaḥ /<br/> ato 'samayamukto 'sau /<br/> ata evāsamayavimukti ucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can gyi rnam par grol ba ni yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas gyo bar mi nus pa'i phyir mi gyo ba yin no / de'i phyir de dus mi sbyor grol / de nyid kyi phyir de ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hyasamayāpekṣāvimuktiśca /<br/> icchātaḥ samādhisaṃmukhībhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'dod dgur ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur ba'i phyir dus la mi ltos par rnam par grol ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ /<br/> dṛṣṭipraptānvayaśca saḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na yongs su nyams pa srid pa dang mi srid pa'i sgo nas dus gzhan gyi bar dang gtan du rnam par grol ba'i phyir dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa cākopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvako veditavyaḥ /<br/> kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni mthong thob rgyu las byung / mi gyo ba'i chos can de ni mthong bas thob pa sngon du 'gro ba yin par rig par bya'o / ci dgra bcom pa drug po 'di dag dang po kho na nas de'i rigs can kho na dag cig yin nam / 'on te phyis yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadgotrā āditaḥ kecitkeciduttāpanāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig dang po nas de'i rigs / kha cig sbyangs pa las gyur to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścitprathamata eva cetanādharmagotrako bhavati /<br/> kaścitpunaḥ parihāṇadharmā bhūtvendriyāṇāmuttāpanayā cetanādharmatāṃ gataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni dang po nyid nas 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can gyi rigs can yin la kha cig ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can du gyur pa las dbang po rnams sbyangs pas 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can du gyur pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvadakoopyadharmatāṃ gato veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can du gyur ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā /<br/> cetanādharmā yaścetayituṃ bhavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i skal ba dang ldan gyi 'chi bar sems pa la sogs pa'i chos can ni ma yin pa gang yin pa'o / 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can ni 'chi bar sems par 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anurakṣaṇādharmā yo 'nurakṣituṃ bhavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes su srung ba'i chos can ni rjes su srung bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena /<br/> prativedhanābhavyo yo 'kopyaḥ prativeddhaṃ bhavyaḥ /<br/> akopyadharmā yo naiva parihātuṃ bhavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa las mi bskyod pa ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i rkyen stobs dang ldan pa med na rjes su ma bsrungs kyang gnas par 'gyur ba'i skal ba can yin zhing nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang mngon par brtson pa med na 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o / rtogs pa'i skal pa can ni mi gyo ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'i skal pa can gang yin pa'o / mi gyo ba'i chos can ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa de kho na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamau dvau pūrvameva śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogavikalau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po gnyis ni sngon slob pa'i gnas skabs kho na na rgyun du sbyor ba dang gus par sbyor ba med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyaḥ sātatyaprayogī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni rgyun du sbyor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthaḥ satkṛtyaprayogī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni gus par sbyor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcama ubhayathāprayogī mṛdvindriyastu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga pa ni gnyi gar sbyor ba pa ni yin la dbang po rtul po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṣṭha ubhayathāprayogī tīkṣṇendriyaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drug pa ni gnyi gar sbyor ba dang dbang po rnon po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati /<br/> saṃbhavaṃ tu pratyevamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yang gdon mi za bar yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin la / rtogs pa'i skal ba can gyi bar du yang rtogs bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi srid ba'i phyir de skad ces bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kṛtvā dhātutraye 'piṣaḍarhanto yujyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na khams gsum char na yang dgra bcom pa drug yod par rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag gi gdon mi za bar yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba nas mngon par rtogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ba de dag gi ltar na 'dod pa'i khams na ni drug go / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na ni gnas pa las mi bskyod ba dang mi gyo ba'i chos can dang gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayoḥparihāṇicetanendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis na yongs su nyams pa dang 'chi bar sems pa dang dbang po 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ punareṣāṃ kutaḥ parihīyate /<br/> phalāt gotrādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag las gang zhig 'bras bu 'am rigs gang las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gotrāccaturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāddhāniḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi ni rigs las lnga 'bras las / nyams 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetanādharmādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ gotrātparihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi bar sems pa'i chos can la sogs pa bzhi ni rigs las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni rang gi rigs las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇadharmādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāt parihāṇiḥ /<br/> teṣāmapi tu /<br/> na pūrvakāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga ni 'bras bu las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro / de dag kyang / dang po las ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi rigs dang po gang yin pa de las ni de yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkutatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattu paścāt pratilabdhamuttāpanayā tasmāt parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyis sbyangs pas thob pa gang yin pa de las ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate /<br/> śeṣāt parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi 'bras bu dang po gang yin pa de las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro / lhag ma las ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva srota āpattiphalānnāsti parihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni rnam pa gsum yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadavasthasya parinirvāṇamindriyasaṃcāraḥ /<br/> parihāya vā śaikṣatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i so na gnas pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbang po 'pho ba'am / yongs su nyams nas slob pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetanādharmaṇaścatvāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi bar sems pa'i chos can ni bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eta eva trayaḥ parihāṇadharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum po de dag nyid dang yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi rigs su slar 'ong ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gsum la yang re re bskyed de / go rims bzhin du rnam pa lnga dang drug dang bdun yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de slob par gyur na gang gi rigs dang po gang yin pa de kho na la gnas kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na rigs khyad par can rnyed pa'i phyir de 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur gyi yongs su nyams par ni mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir 'bras bu dang po las yongs su nyams pa med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanaheyānāmavastukatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams gzhi med pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmādhiṣṭhānapravṛttā hyete /<br/> satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakatvāt /<br/> sa cātmā nāstīti /<br/> asadālambanāstarhi prāpnuvanti /<br/> nāsadālambanāḥ /<br/> satyālambanatvāt /<br/> vitathālambanāstu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir bdag gi gzhi la 'jug pa can yin na bdag de yang med do / 'o na med pa la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na / bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir med pa la dmigs pa ni ma yin gya phyin ci log te dmigs pa dag ni yin no / de lta ma yin pa'i nyon mongs pa gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamaśca kleśo naivamasti viśeṣaḥ /<br/> ātmadṛṣṭihi rūpādike vastuni kārakavedakavaśavartitvenātmatvamabhūtamadhyāropayati tadadhiṣṭhānānuvṛttāścāntagrāhadṛṣṭacyādaya ityavastukā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyad par yod de / bdag tu lta ba ni bdag med bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang dbang bsgyur ba nyid du bdag yang dag ba ma yin pa sgro 'dogs par byed la / mthar 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang de'i gzhi la zhugs pa yin pas gzhi med pa dag ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa rnam pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la chags pa dang kun nas mnar sems dang khengs pa dang mi gsal ba'i ngo bor zhugs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pas gzhi dang bcas pa dag ces bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la de dag 'jug par 'gyur ba sdug pa la sogs pa tsam de ni yod kyi / bdag la sogs pa ni bdag kyang med do / gzhan dag ni 'di skad ces zer te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams la ni gzhi yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid so sor nges pa yod kyi / mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams la ni bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādapyavastukāucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gzhi so sor nges pa med pa dag ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang 'phags pa des par mi rtog pa la dran pa nyams pas nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur gyi nges par rtog pa la ni ma yin te / thag pa la sprul gyi 'du shes bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges par mi rtog pa la ni bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa 'byung bar mi rung ste / kun du rtog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro / de lta bas na mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pas sa dang po las yongs su nyams pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhatvādapi nāsti parihāṇiriti sautrāntikāḥ /<br/> eṣa eva canyāyaḥ /<br/> kathamidaṃ gamyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo sde ba rnams na re dgra bcom pa nyid las kyang yongs su nyams pa med do zhes zer te / de nyid rigs pa yin no / 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āgamādyuktitaśca /<br/> kathamāgamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung dang rigs pa las so / lung las ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taddhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yadāryayā prajñayā prahīṇamityuktam /<br/> ādyantayośca phalayorāryayaiva prajñayā 'dhigamaḥ /<br/> śaikṣasya cāpramādakaraṇiye 'pramādakaraṇīyaṃ vadāmī tyuktaṃ nā 'rhataḥ /<br/> arhato 'pyahamānanda lābhasatkāramantrāyakaraṃ vadāmītyatra sūtre dṛṣṭadhamesukhavihāramātrādeva parihāṇiruktā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis spangs pa gang yin pa de ni spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang slob pa la bag yod pa la bag yod par bya'o zhes dang smra'o gsungs kyi dgra bcom pa la ni ma yin no / kun dga' bo dgra bcom pa la yang rnyed pa dang bkur stis bar chad byed pa yin par nga smra'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo de las ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa tsam kho na las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gsungs par zad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā tvanenākopyacetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā /<br/> tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmīti coktam /<br/> sāmayikyā astīti cet /<br/> vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ /<br/> sā tu vicāryā /<br/> kimarhattvamāhosviddhacyānānīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dis sems rnam par grol ba mi gyo ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs so / gal te dus dang sbyor ba la yod do zhe na / kho bo cag kyang de skad ces ni zer ro / ci de dgra bcom pa nyid yin nam / 'on te bsam gtan pa rnams yin zhes bya ba dpyad par byas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate /<br/> dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca punaḥ punareṣaṇīyatvātkāntetyucyate /<br/> āsvādanīyatvādityapare /<br/> arhattvavimuktistu nityānugatatvānna yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ni dus su mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba zhes kyang bya la mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du btsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba zhes kyang bya'o / gzhan dag na re ro myang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rnam par grol ba ni rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir dus dang sbyor ba yin par yang mi rung la / yang don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba yang ma yin no / gal te yang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa srid pa zhig tu gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat /<br/> ato gamyate sarvasyaivārhato vimuktirakopyādṛṣṭadhrmasukhavihāretyustu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par lhag pa'i sems las byung ba dag kho na las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gsungs par gyur te / de'i phyir dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ni mi gyo ba yin par khong du chud do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścit lābhasatkāravyākṣepadīṣāt parihīyate vaśitvabrhaśādyo mṛdvindriyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las ni la la ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis gyen sbyo ba'i nyes pas dbang nyams pa'i phyir yongs su nyams par 'gyur te / dbang po rtul po gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścinna parihīyate yastīkṣṇendriyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te / dbang po rnon po gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yaḥ parihīyate sa parihāṇadharmā /<br/> yo na parihīyate so 'parihāṇadharmā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la gang zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin la / gang zhig yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur pa de ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ cetanādharmādayo 'pi yojyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aparihāṇadharmasthitākampyākopyadharmaṇāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ /<br/> aparihāṇadharmā 'nuttāpanāgataḥ /<br/> akopyadharmā tūttāpanāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can dang gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang mi gyo ba'i chos can rnams la khyad par ci yod ce na / yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can ni sbyangs pa las gyur pa ni ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can ni sbyangs pa las gyur pa yin te / de gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gang kho na skyed par byed pa de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati /<br/> utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa las mi bskyod pa ni yon tan gang kho nal gnas pa de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi / gzhan yang skyed par mi byed pa'am / skyed par byed na yang de las gyo bar 'gyur ba yin pas 'di ni khyad par yin par mngon no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyuṣmānbhautikaḥ śaikṣībhūtaḥ sāmayikyā vimukteratyāsvādanānmṛdvindriyatvāccabhīkṣṇaṃ parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe dang ldan pa gnag tshogs can slob par gyur pa ha cang ro myang ba'i phyir dang dbang bo rtul po yin pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa las yang dang yang du yongs su nyams pa dang yi chad nas lus dang srog la mi lta bar mtshon gyis 'debs par byed la / 'chi ba'i dus kho nar dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmātso 'pi nārhattvāt parihīṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de yang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">daśottare coktam /<br/> eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcu las 'phros pa las kyang bskyed par bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste / sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba yid du 'ong ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ akopyā cetovimuktiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon sum du bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste / sems rnam par grol ba mi gyo ba yin no zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa yid du 'ong ba dgra bcom pa nyid kho na yin par gyur na / ci'i phyir bcu tshan de kho na las dgra bcom pa nyid lan gnyis su smos par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca kvacidarhattvamutpādayitavyamuktam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa nyid bskyed par bya ba yin par ni gang du yang ma gsungs so / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sākṣātkartavyaṃ mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ cārhattvamutpādayitavyamiti /<br/> kimanena jñāpitaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon sum du bya ba yin no / dbang po rtul pos bsdus pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid bskyed par bya ba yin no zhe na / yang 'dis ci zhig shes par bya ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tāvadutpādayituṃ śakyamityadapi śakyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gal te bskyed par bya bar nus pa yin no zhe na ni / gzhan yang nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athotpādanamarhatīti /<br/> anyatsutarāmarhati /<br/> tasmānna sāmayikī vimuktirarhattvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te bskyed par 'os pa yin no zhe na ni gzhan ches shin tu 'os pa yin te / de lta bas na rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tarhi samayavimukto 'rhannucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa zhes ji skad ces bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya mṛdvindriyatvātsamayāpekṣaḥ samādhisamukhībhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig dbang po rtul po'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du 'gyur ba dus la ltos pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viparyayādasamayavimuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzlog pa ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidharme 'pi coktaṃ tribhiḥ sthāneḥ kāmarāgānuśayasyotpādo bhavati /<br/> kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa las kyang / gnas gsum gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas skye bar 'gyur te / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris par gyur pa'i chos rnams kyang snang bar gyur pa yin / de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paripūrṇotpattirevamiti cet /<br/> kasya vā paripūrṇakāraṇasyotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de lta bu ni rgyu yongs su tshang ba las skyes pa yin no zhe na / rgyu yongs su ma tshang bar go gang zhig skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tāvadāgamāt /<br/> kathaṃ yuktitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig lung las ni de lta bu yin no / rigs pa las ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate /<br/> atha notpannaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ kṣīṇāsravo bhavati /<br/> atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ /<br/> aṅgārakarṣūpomaṃ sūtraṃ tarhi parihāryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gal te dgra bcom pa la gang gis na nyon mongs pa rnams gtan tu mi skye ba'i chos nyid du gyur pa de lta bu'i gnyen po zhig skyes na ni ji ltar na yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur / 'on te ma skyes te de'i sa bon gyi chos nyid gtan du rtsa nas ma bton na ni ji ltar zag pa zad pa yin / zag pa ma zad na yang ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yin te / rigs pa las ni de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatredamuktaṃ tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni gang las 'di skad du 'phags pa nyan thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar spyod pa de ltar gnas pa de brgya la res 'ga' zhig dran pa nyams pa las sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa sol ba'i phung po lta bu'i mdo'i lan gdab dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi tatrārhanneva jñāpitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni de las dgra bcom pa kho na yin par bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dīrgharātra vivekanimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati yāvannirvāṇaprāgbhāramiti vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yun ring po nas sems dben ba la gzhol ba yin zhes bya ba nas / mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhato hyetadbalamanyatroktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan las de ni dgra bcom pa'i stobs yin par yang gsungs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvairāsravasthānīyairdharmaiḥ śītībhūtaṃ vāntībhūtamiti cābhidhānāt astyetadevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos thams cad las ni bsil bar gyur cing bsil bar gyur pa zhes kyang gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ /<br/> pratijñāyate hi laukikamārgapratilabdhātphaladvayātparihāṇiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de skad du 'byung ba yang yod mod kyi ji srid du spyod pa legs par ma rtogs pa de srid du slob pa de ltar spyod pa la yang nyon mongs pa 'byung ba srid pa yod pas slob pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du mdzad nas de skad du gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arhattvādapi tu parihāṇiṃ varṇayanti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti /<br/> śaikṣānāryāśca ṣaḍgotrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni dgra bcom pa nyid las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar brjod do / ci dgra bcom pa de dag kho na rigs drug dang ldan nam / 'on te gzhan dag kyang rigs drug dang ldan zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣapṛthagjanā apyevaṃ ṣaḍgotrāḥ /<br/> tatpūrvakāṇyeva hyarhatāṃ gotrāṇi /<br/> api tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob dang 'phags min rigs drug ldan / slob pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du rigs drug dang ldan te / dgra bcom pa'i rigs rnams ni de dag sngon du 'gro ba yin no / gzhan yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃcāro nāsti darśane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba la ni 'pho ba med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgādanyatrendriyasaṃcāro bhavati /<br/> prayogāsaṃbhavānna darśanamārge
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam las gzhan pa la dbang po 'pho ba yod kyi sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyāmindriyāṇi saṃcarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na dbang po rnams 'pho'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaścicchaddhādhimuktāvasthāyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">la la ni dad pas mos pa'i gnas skabs na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmīti /<br/> kathamakopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭdharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇiḥ /<br/> parihāṇistridhā jñeyā prāptāprāptopabhogataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las 'di skad du / 'dis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa lhag pa'i sems las byung ba bzhi thob pa gang dag yin pa de las gang yang rung ba zhig las 'di yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar ni nga smra'i 'di gcig pus sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi gyo ba'i bar du lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni 'di'i rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar na mi smra'o zhes gang gsungs pa yang ji ltar na ma gyo ba'i chos can mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhe na / thob dang ma thob nyer spyad las / yongs nyams rnam pa gsum shes bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāptaparihāṇiryadi pratilabdhāt guṇāt parihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yon tan thob pa las yongs su nyams na thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aprāptaparihāṇiryadi prāpyaṃ guṇaṃ na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yon tan thob par bya ba ma thob na ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upabhogaparihāṇiryadi prāptaguṇaṃ na saṃmukhīkaroti /<br/> āsāṃ punaḥ parihāṇīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yon tan thob pa mngon sum du mi byed na nye bar spyod pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa 'di rnams las / ston pa tha ma mi gyo la / bar ma 'ang gzhan la rnam gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhasyopabhogaparihāṇireva nānyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas lan nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams pa kho na mnga'i gzhan ni mi mnga'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akopyadharmaṇaḥ sā cāprāptaparihāṇiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can la ni de dang ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pudgalaviśeṣadharmāprāpaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag khyad par can gyi chos ma thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyasyārhataḥ prāptaparihāṇirapyasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata upabhogaparihāṇivacanādakopyadharmaṇaḥ sūtravirodhaḥ /<br/> sarvasyānāsravā vimuktirakopyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir mi gyo ba'i chos can nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo dang mi 'gal lo / yongs su mi nyams par smra ba na re thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa ni mi gyo ba yin la
