</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ tu yathā tathoktam /<br/> ata etadcodyamityaparihāṇivādī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can du ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa ni de bzhin du bshad zin pa de'i phyir 'di ni klan kar mi rung ngo zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha yoi 'rhatphalātparihīyate kimasau punarjāyate /<br/> nāstyetat /<br/> yasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gang zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams na ci de yang skye 'am zhe na / de lta bu ni med de / 'di ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras las nyams pa 'chi ba med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa ni 'ga' yang 'chi ba med de / mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa la dran pa nyams pa chung du 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang yang myur ba kho nar nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hyanāśvāsikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na tshangs par spyod pa yid brtan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yataśca phalāt parihīyate tatphalasthena yadakāryaṃ /<br/> tādakāryaṃ karoti na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu gang zhig las yongs su nyams pa ni 'bras bu de la gnas pas bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihīṇo 'pi saṃstatphalaviruddhāṃ kriyāṃ na karoti /<br/> śūrapraskhalanāpatanavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba ma yin de mi byed / yongs su nyams kyang 'bras bu de dang 'gal ba'i bya ba mi byed de / rtsal po che bred pa rdeg mi 'cha' ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athendriyāṇi saṃcaratāṃ katyānantaryavimuktimārgā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dbang po rnams 'pho ba la bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam du dag cig skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktyānantaryapathā navokopye /<br/> akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti /<br/> yathārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> atisevanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo rnam grol bar chad med / lam dgu'o / rtogs pa'i skal ba can zhig mi gyo ba'i rigs can rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu skye ste / dper na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa bzhin no / ci'i phyir zhe na / dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu brten phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu goms par byas pa yin pas 'bad pa chung dus bzlog par mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣāśaikṣa mārgabhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt /<br/> dṛṣṭacyāptatāyāmekaikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro / mthong bas thob la re re'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiprāptāyāṃ pratividhyamānāyāmeka evānantaryamārgo bhavatyeko vimuktimārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas thob pa rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam gcig kho na dang rnam par grol ba'i lam gcig kho na skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogamārgastu sarvatraika eva /<br/> te punaḥ sarva evānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ /<br/> anāsravāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba'i lam ni thams cad du gcig kho na yin no / bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam de dag thams cad ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi sāsraveṇa mārgeṇāryāṇāmindriyasaṃcāraḥ /<br/> kva punarindriyāṇi vardhante /<br/> nṛṣu vardhanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med / 'phags pa rnams kyi dbang po ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyis 'pho ba med do / dbang po rnams gang du 'pho zhe na / mi yi nang du 'pho
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyeṣvevendriyasaṃcāro nānyatra /<br/> parihāṇyasaṃbhavāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyi nang kho nar dbang po 'pho'i gzhan du ni ma yin te / yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati /<br/> aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig sa gang la brten nas dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed ce na / mi slob pa dgu la brten te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamyasyānantaraṃ catvāri dhyānāni trīṇi cārupyāṇi /<br/> śaikṣastu ṣaṭ /<br/> ārupyavarjyaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> yataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum pa la'o / slob pa drug la / gzugs med pa rnams ma gtogs so / ci'i phyir zhe na / gang gi phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saviśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalamāpnoti vardhayan
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phel ba 'bras bu khyad par can / btang ste 'bras bu thob par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyāṇi hi saṃcaran phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyagotrakaṃ phalamārgameva pratilabhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnams 'pho ba na dbang bo rtul po'i lam gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu khyad par can btang ste dbang po rnon po'i rigs kyi lam gyi 'bras bu kho na 'thob par 'gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cānāgāmiphalamārupyabhūmisaṃgṛhītamastītyetat kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzugs med pas bsdus pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete ṣaḍevārhanto nava bhavanti /<br/> indriyabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa 'di dag thams cad ni dbang po'i bye brag las dgu kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas shi na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas gnyis dang nyan thos bdun / de dgu dbang po rnam dgu can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katame sapta śrāvakāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyan thos bdun gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇadharmādayaḥ pañca /<br/> akopyadharmā ca dvividha uttāpanāgata āditaśca tadgotraḥ akopyabheda eva /<br/> dvau buddhau pratyekabuddho buddhaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga dang mi gyo ba'i chos can rnam pa gnyis te / sbyangs pa las gyur pa dang dang po nas de'i rigs can no / sangs rgyas gnyis ni mi gyo ba'i bye brag kho na yin te / rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityate mṛdumṛdvādinavaprakārendriyabhedānnava pudgalā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na de dag ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dbang po rnam ba dgu'i bye brag gis gang zag dgu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarva eva tvāryapudgalāḥ sapta bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni thams cad du bdun yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī śraddhādhimukto dṛṣṭioprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimukta ubhayatovimuktaśca /<br/> ete punaḥ /<br/> prayogākṣasamāpattivimuktyubhayataḥ kṛtāḥ /<br/> pudgalāḥ sapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dang lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa dang shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o / gang zag bdun po de dag kyang sbyor ba dang dbang po snyoms 'jug rnam grol dang / gnyi gas byas pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogataḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba las ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvameva parapratyayadharmānusārābhyāmartheṣu prayogāt /<br/> indriyata śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po nyid nas gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag gis don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir ro / dbang po las ni dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdutīkṣṇendriyatvāt śraddhādhimokṣaprajñādhikyataḥ /<br/> samāpattitaḥ kāyasākṣī nirodhasamāpatti sākṣātkaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pas mos pa dang shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas dbang po rtul po dang rnon po yin pa'i phyir ro / snyoms par 'jug pa las ni lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ste / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktitaḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba las ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattivimuktitaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par grol ba las ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmata ete sapta pudgalāḥ /<br/> ṣaṭ tvete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ming gi sgo nas ni gang zag de bdun yin no / de dag drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dravyatastvete ṣaṭ bhavanti /<br/> dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas su ni de dag drug yin te / 'di ltar lam gsum la gnyis gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārge hi dvau pudgalau śraddhādharmānusāriṇau /<br/> tāveva bhāvanāmārge dvau bhavataḥ /<br/> śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam la gang zag gnyis te / dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag go / de dag nyid bsgom pa'i lam la gnyis te / dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tau punaraśaikṣamārge dvau bhavataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyang mi slob pa'i lam la gnyis yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samayāsamayavimuktāviti /<br/> tatrendriyatastrayaḥ /<br/> śraddhānusāriṇaḥ gotrataḥ pañca /<br/> mārgataḥ pañcadaśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang / dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba dag go / de la dad pas rjes 'brang ba dbang po'i sgo nas ni gsum mo / rigs kyi sgo nas ni lnga'o / lam gyi sgo nas bco lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭa kṣāntisaptajñānasthāḥ /<br/> vairāgyatastrisaptatiḥ /<br/> sakalabandhanaḥ /<br/> kāmavairāgyānnava /<br/> evaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanavairāgyāt /<br/> āśrayato nava
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa brgyad dang shes pa bdun la gnas pa'o / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas ni bdun cu rtsa gsum ste / 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir dgu nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir gyi bar du'o / rten gyi sgo nas ni dgu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridvīpaṣāḍdevanikāyajāḥ /<br/> indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gling gsum dang lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'o / dbang po dang rigs dang lam dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang rten gyi sgo nas bsdoms na ni / 'bum bzhi khri bdun stong brgyad brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanye 'pi pudgalāḥ saṃbhavataḥ saṃkhyeyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par de bzhin du brtsi bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">koyimubhayatobhāgavimukta ityucyate kaśca prajñāvimuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni gang / shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ni gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhalābhyubhayatovimuktaḥ prajñayetaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog thob gnyi ga las rnam grol / shes rab kyis ni cig shos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñāsamādhibalābhyāṃ kleśavimokṣāvaraṇavimuktatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dag gis nyon mongs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itaraḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cig shos ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñābalena kevalaṃ kleśāvaraṇavimuktatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'ba' zhig las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ bhagavatā kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis / 'di la gang zhig nyon mongs lnga spangs te / mi 'phrogs chos ldan slob pa yongs su rdzogs / zhes gang gsungs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyatā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji tsam gyis na slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattindriyaphalaiḥ pūrṇaḥ śaikṣo 'bhidhīyate /<br/> trividhā śaikṣasya parīpūriḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms 'jug dbang po 'bras rnams kyis / slob pa yongs rdzogs zhes bya'o / slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalataḥ indriyataḥ samāpattitaśca /<br/> phalata eva śraddhādhimuktasyākāyasākṣiṇo 'nāgāminaḥ /<br/> indriyata eva dṛṣṭiprāptasyāvītarāgasya /<br/> phalendriyato dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāyasākṣiṇo 'nāgāminaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu dang dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so / phyir mi 'ong ba dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu kho na las so / mthong bas thob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni dbang po kho na las so / phyir mi 'ong ba mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalasamāpattitaḥ śraddhādhimuktasya kāyasākṣiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalendriyasamāpattito dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāyasākṣiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena /<br/> aśaikṣaparipūrṇatvaṃ dvābhyām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa kho na dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang dbang po las yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ni mad do / gnyis kyis mi slob yongs su rdzogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyataḥ samāpattiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalena tvaparipūrṇasyāśaikṣatvameva nāstīti nāsya punaḥ phalena paripūrṇaparipūrṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa la ni mi slob pa nyid kyang med pa kho na yin pas 'di'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid du rnam par ma bzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyat evāsamayavimuktasya prajñāvimuktasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po kho na las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattita eva samayavimuktasyobhayabhāgavimuktasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyasamāpattibhyāmasamayavimuktasyobhayatobhāgavimuktasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vahava ime mārgabhedā uktā laukikalokokttaradarśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣamārgāḥ prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgā iti /<br/> katividha eṣa samāsato mārga iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams dang sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams zhes bya ba lam gyi bye brag mang po zhig bshad pa de dag mdor bsdu na lam rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgaḥ samāsataḥ /<br/> viśeṣamuktyānantaryaprayogākhyaścaturvidhaḥ /<br/> prayogamārgo yasmādanantarmānantaryamārgotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdor na lam ni rnam pa bzhi ste / khyad par can dang rnam grol dang / bar chad med dang sbyor zhes bya / sbyor ba'i lam ni gang gi mjug thogs su bar chad med pa'i lam skye ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ prajahāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar chad med pa'i lam ni gang gis sgrib pa rab tu spong ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktimārgo yastatpraheyāvaraṇavinirmuktastat prathamata utpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba'i lam ni des spang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa las nges par grol pa dang po nyid du skye ba gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśeṣamārgo ya ebhyo 'nyo mārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyad par can gyi lam ni de dag las gzhan pa'i lam gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt mārga ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir lam zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt /<br/> nirvāṇaṃ mārgayantyaneneti vā /<br/> vimuktiviśeṣamārga yoḥ kathaṃ mārgatvam /<br/> tajjātīyādadhimātrataratvāduttarottaraprāpaṇāt nirūpadhiśeṣapraveśādvā /<br/> mārga eva punaḥ pratipadityukto nirvāṇapratipādanāt /<br/> catasraḥ pratipadaḥ /<br/> asti pratipadduḥkhā dhandhābhijñā /<br/> asti duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas der 'gro ba'i phyir ram / 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba'i phyir 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yin no / rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam dag ji ltar na lam nyid yin zhe na / de dang 'dra ba dang ches che ba yin pa'i phyir te / gong nas gong du phyin par byed pa'i phyir ram / phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par 'jug pa'i phyir ro / yang lam nyid mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir sgrub pa zhes gsungs so / lam ni bzhi ste / mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang yod / mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sukhā 'pi dvidhā /<br/> tatra /<br/> dhyāneṣu mārgaḥ pratipatsukhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du sla ba yang rnam pa gnyis so / de la / bsam gtan dag gi lam rnams sla
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi'i lam ni sla ba yin te / yan lag gis yongs su zin pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mnyam pa dag gis 'bad mi dgos par rang gi dang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhā 'nyabhūmiṣu /<br/> anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti /<br/> sā punardvividhā 'pi pratipat /<br/> dhanyābhijñā mṛdumateḥ kṣiprābhijñetarasya tu /<br/> mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi /<br/> seyaṃ dhandhābhijñā /<br/> evaṃ kṣiprābhijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa gzhan dag gi dka' ba yin / mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang gzugs med pa rnams kyi lam ni / yan lag gis yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chung ba'i phyir lam dka' ba yin te / mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can na ni zhi gnas chung ngo / gzugs med pa dag na ni lhag mthong chung ngo / lam de yang rnam pa gnyis te / blo rtul mngon shes bul ba ste / cig shos kyi ni mngon shes myur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhandhasya vā pudgalasyeyamiti dhandhābhijñā /<br/> punarapyeṣa mārgo bodhipakṣyākhyāṃ labhate /<br/> saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣā dharmāḥ /<br/> catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni /<br/> catvāri samyak prahāṇāni /<br/> catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ /<br/> pañcendriyāṇi /<br/> pañca balāni /<br/> sapta bodhyaṅgāni /<br/> āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ iti /<br/> tatra /<br/> anutpādakṣayajñāne bodhiḥ /<br/> kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /<br/> pudgalabhedena tisro bodhaya utpadyante /<br/> śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabodhiranuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti /<br/> aśeṣāvidyāprahāṇāt /<br/> tābhyāṃ svarthasya yathābhūta kṛtāpunaḥkartavyatāvavodhācca /<br/> tādanulomyataḥ /<br/> saptatriṃśattu tatpakṣyāḥ /<br/> bodheranulomatvādbodhipakṣyāḥ saptatriṃśadutpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rtul po ni lam sla ba 'am dka' ba yang rung ste / mngon par shes pa bul ba yin no / dbang po rnon po ni mngon par shes pa myur ba yin no / lam nyid la mngon par shes pa bul ba yod pas na 'di ni mngon par shes pa bul ba ste / mngon par shes pa myur ba yang de dang 'dra'o / yang na 'di gang zag dbang po rtul po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa bul ba yin la / yid rnon po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa myur ba'o / lam 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par sbong ba zhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do / de la zad dang mi skye shes pa ni / byang chub zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa na gang zag gi bye brag gis nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang byang chub gsum zhes bya ste / de gnyis kyis ma rig pa ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir dang rang gi don byas pa dang yang byar med pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro / de dang mthun nyid phyir / sum cu rtsa bdun de'i phyogs mthun / byang chub dang mthun pa'i phyir ro / ming gi sgo nas / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāmato dravyato daśa /<br/> daśa dravyāṇi sarve bodhipakṣyāḥ /<br/> katamāni daśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas su bcu / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad ni rdzas su bcu ste / bcu gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /<br/> praśrabdhiśīlasaṃkalpāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang / shes rab ting 'dzin btang snyoms dga' / rtog dang tshul khrims shin tu sbyangs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetāni daśa dravyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar byas na de dag ni rdzas su bcu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> prajñā hi smṛtyupasthitiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas shan / dran pa nyer gzhag shes rab ste / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vīryaṃ samyakprahāṇākhyamṛddhipādāḥ samādhayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brtson 'grus yang dag 'jog ces bya / rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ting 'dzin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhādhā hi smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ ata indriyāṇi tāvadvalāni ca nāmagrāhikayā śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñādravyāṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagṛṣṭiśca prajñaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no / de'i phyir re zhig dbang po dang stobs rnams ni ming gis smos pa dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rdzas lnga yin te / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i lta ba ni shes rab kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyakprahāṇāni vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagvyāyāmaśca vīryameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams dang brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni brtson 'grus kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhipādāḥ samādhisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyak samādhiśca samādhireva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin kha na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyak smṛtiśca smṛtireva /<br/> kimavaśiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa kho na yin no / ci zhig lus she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prītiprasrabdhyupekṣasaṃbodhyaṅgāni samyaksaṃkalpaḥ śīlāṅgani ca /<br/> tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams dang rdzas de lnga ste / de ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa de dag ni rdzas bcu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vaibhaṣikāṇā mekādaśa /<br/> kāyavākkarmaṇorasaṃbhinnatvāt śīlāṅgāni dve dravye iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi ltar na lus dang ngag gi las dag tha dad cing rigs mi mthun pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams rdzas gnyis yin pas rdzas bcu gcig yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattvetaduktaṃ prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhāvāḥ smṛtyupasthānādaya iti /<br/> atra veditavyam /<br/> pradhānagrahaṇaṃ sarve gunāḥ prāyogikāstu te
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa der ni / gtso bo smos pa yin par rig par bya'o / de dag ni / sbyor byung yon tan kun kyang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradhānagrahaṇenaivamuktam /<br/> sarve tu prāyogikā guṇāḥḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtso bo smos pas de skad bshad kyi / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādvīrya samyakpradhānamuktam /<br/> tena samyakkāyavāṅmanāṃsi pradhīyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir brtson 'grus la yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bshad ce na / des lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag par 'jog pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhiḥ kasmād ṛddhipāda uktaḥ /<br/> tatpratiṣṭhatvātsarvaguṇasaṃpatteḥ /<br/> ye tvāhuḥ samādhirevarddhiḥ pādāśchandādaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bshad ce na / de ni yon tan thams cad sbyor ba'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro / gang dag rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin kho na yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ dravyatastrayodaśa bodhipakṣyāḥ prāpnuvanti /<br/> cchandacittayoirādhikyātsūtraṃ ca virudhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dun pa la sogs pa ni rkang pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag gi ltar na ni 'dun pa dang sems dag lhag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rdzas bcu gsum du 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhim ca vo bhikṣavo darśayiṣyāmi ṛddhipādāṃśaca yāvadṛddhiḥ katamā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul yang bshad pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bshad do zhes bya ba nas / rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha bhikṣuranekavidhamṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati /<br/> eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatīti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di na dge slong rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed cing / gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gsungs pa'i mdo dang yang 'gal lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādindriyāṇyeva valānyuktāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir dbang po rnams kho na yang stobs rnams su bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛdvadhimātrabhedādavamardanīyānavamardanīyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chung ngu dang chen po'i bye brag gis rdzi ba dang rdzi ba med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">indriyāṇāṃ kiṅkṛto 'nukramaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po rnams kyi go rims cis byas she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śraddadhāno hi phalārthaṃ vīryamārabhate /<br/> ārabdhavīryasya smṛtirūpatiṣṭhate /<br/> upasthitasmṛteravikṣepāccittaṃ samādhīyate /<br/> samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti /<br/> kasyāmavasthāyāṃ katame te bodhipakṣyāḥ prabhāvyante /<br/> ādikarmikanirvedhabhāgīyeṣu prabhāvitāḥ /<br/> bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dad par gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do / brtson 'grus brtsams na dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro / dran pa nye bar gnas na rnam par mi gyeng ba'i phyir sems mnyam par 'jog go / sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par 'gyur ro / gnas skabs gang du byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gang zhig rab tu 'byed can bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / sde tshan bdun ni go rigs bzhin / las ni dang po pa dag dang / nges 'byed cha mthun rnams dang ni / bsgom dang mthong la rab tu phye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādikarmikāvasthāyāṃ kāyādyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las dang po pa'i gnas skabs su ni lus la sogs pa la nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśeṣādhigamena vīryasaṃbadhaṃnādūṣmagateṣu samyakpradhānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyad par thob pas brtson 'grus yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dag la ni yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aparihāṇīyakuśalamūlapraveśatvāt mūrdhaṣvṛddhipādāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa'i phyir rtse mo dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apunaḥparihāṇita ādhipatyaprāptatvāt kṣāntiṣvindriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas dbang po thob pa'i phyir bzod pa dag la ni dbang po rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśānavamardanīyatvādgradharmeṣu balāni laukikānyadharmānavamardanīyatvādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ram / 'jig rten pa'i chos can gzhan dag gis mi brdzi ba'i phyir chos kyi mchog dag la ni stobs rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhyāsannatvāt bhāvanāmārge bodhyaṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub dang nye ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam dag la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gamanaprabhāvitvāddarśanamārge mārgāṅgānī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyāśugāmitvāt /<br/> saṃkhyānupūrvīvidhānārthaṃ tu pūrva saptoktāni paścādaṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro / grangs kyi rim pa bzhin du bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin no / yang dag pa'i lta ba ni lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apare punarabhittvaiva kramaṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāmānupūrvī varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag ni go rims ma nyams pa kho nar byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams go rims bzhin du brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādita eva tāvadvahuvidhaviṣapavyāsekavisāriṇīnāṃ buddhīnāṃ nigrahārya smṛtyupasthānāni cetasa upanibaddhāni bhavanti yāvadeva gardhāśritānāṃ smarasaṃkalpānāṃ prativinodanāyeti sūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig dang po kho nar yul rnam pa mang po la gyeng bar 'phro ba'i blo rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i sems kyi nye bar 'dogs pa yin te / mdo las 'di lta ste / zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvalena vīryasaṃvardhanāccaturvidhakāryasaṃpādanāya samyakcittaṃ pradadhātīti samyakpradhānāni /<br/> tataḥ samādhiviśodhanādṛddhipādāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so / de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhisaṃniśrayeṇa lokottaradharmādhipatibhūtāni śraddhādīnīndriyāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa ni dbang po rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tānyeva ca nirjitavipakṣasamudācārāṇi balāni /<br/> darśanamārge bodhyaṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun tu spyod pa las nges par rgyal ba ni stobs rnams so / mthong ba'i lam la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahamato dharmatattvāvalokāt ubhayormārgāṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i phyir ro / gnyi ga la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hyuktam āryāṣṭāṅge khalu mārge bhāvanāparipūri gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti yāvat sapta bodhyaṅgānīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaścoktaṃ yathābhūtavacanārocanamiti bhikṣavaścaturṇāmāryasatyānāmetadadhivacanaṃ yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇamiti bhikṣo āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyaitadadhivacanamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dge slong yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no / dge slong ji ltar rtogs pa'i lam gyis 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshig bla dags yin no zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādubhayorāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga eṣṭavyaḥ /<br/> siddho 'nukramaḥ /<br/> idaṃ tu vaktavyam /<br/> kati bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sāsravā iti katyanāsravā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gnyi ga la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 'dod par bya dgos pas go rims grub pa yin no / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag yin / du zhig ni zag pa med pa dag yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāṇi bodhyaṅgamārgāṅgāni /<br/> bhāvanādarśanamārga yostadvacyavasthāpanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / zag pa med / de gnyis ni bsgom pa'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam la rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikā api hi samyagdṛṣṭacyādayaḥ santi /<br/> te tu nāryamārgaśabdaṃ labhante /<br/> dvidhetare /<br/> anye bodhipakṣāḥ sāsravāḥ /<br/> kasyāṃ bhūmau kati bodhipakṣāḥ /<br/> sakalāḥ prathame dhyāne /<br/> sarve saptatriṃśatprathame dhyāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa yang yod mod kyi / de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i sgra mi 'thob po / gzhan rnam gnyis so / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no / sa gang na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig yod ce na bsam gtan dang po na thams cad / bsam gtan dang po na sum cu rtsa bdun po thams cad yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgamye prītivarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi lcogs med na dga' ma gtogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādanāgamye prītyabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir mi lcogs pa med pa na dga' ba med ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmantakānāṃ balavāhanīyatvādadharabhūmisāśaṅkatvācca /<br/> dvitīye 'nyatra saṃkalpāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyer bsdogs rnams ni stobs kyis drang dgos pa'i phyir dang sa 'og ma'i dogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro / gnyis pa na ni rtog ma gtogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīye dhyāne samyaksaṃkalpavarjyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa drug kho na yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vitarkābhāvāt /<br/> dvayostaddvayavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro / gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyacaturthayordhyānayoḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ varjitāḥ pañcatriṃśat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāntare ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bar na'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tābhyāmeva dvābhyāṃ varjitāḥ pañcatriṃśadeva /<br/> śīlāṅgaistābhyāṃ ca triṣvarupiṣu /<br/> varjitā iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis nyid ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga kho na yod do / gzugs med pa / gsum na'ang de dang mtshungs yan lag / ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyesu samyagvākkarmāntājīvaiḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ ca varjitā dvātriṃśat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa dag na ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams dang dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātau bhavāgre ca bodhimārgāṅgavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub dang ni lam yan lag / ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvārviśatirbodhipakṣyāstayoranāsravamārgābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni zag pa med pa'i lam med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bodhipakṣeṣu vartamānasya kasyāmavasthāyāmavetyaprasādalābho veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams la gnas pa gnas skabs gang du shes nas dad pa 'thob par rig par bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trisatyadarśane śīladharmāvetyaprasādayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden gsum mthong na tshul khrims dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lābho mārgābhisamaye buddhatatsaṃghayiorapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob / lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang / de yi dge 'dun dag la yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyānyabhisamayan dharme cāvetyaprasādamāryakāntāni ca śīlāni pratilabhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgasatyamabhisamayan buddhe tasya ca śrāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs na sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig de gnyis la dad pa de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa rnams dang dge 'dun du byed pa'i chos slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la dad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api śabdācchīladharmāvetyaprasādau ca pratilabhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshul khrims dang chos la shes nas dad pa dag kyang 'thob par ston to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko 'yamiha dharmo 'bhipretaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir gang la chos su dgongs pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmaḥ satyatrayaṃ bodhisattvapratyekabuddhayoḥ /<br/> mārgaśca /<br/> ataścatvaryapi satyānyabhisamayato dharmāvetyaprasādalābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos bden gsum dang rang sangs rgyas / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no / de'i phyir bden pa bzhi char yang mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ta ete śraddhādhiṣṭhānabhedānnāmataścatvāro 'vetyaprasādā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni dad pa'i gzhi'i bye brag las ming gi sgo nas shes nas dad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas su gnyis te dad pa dang tshul khrims
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ /<br/> kiṃ punarete sāsravānāsravā ekāntenāvetyaprasādāḥ /<br/> nirmalā /<br/> avetyaprasādā iti ko 'rthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa rnams ni dad pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams ni tshul khrims yin pas rdzas gnyis so / ci 'di dag zag pa dang bcas pa dag cig gam zag pa med pa dag cig yin zhe na / shes nas dad pa rnams ni gcig tu / dri ma med pa yin / shes nas dad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathābhūtasatyānyavabudhya saṃpratyayo 'vetyaprasādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs nas yid ches pa ni shes nas dad pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā ca vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti tathaiṣāmānupūrvīm /<br/> kathaṃ vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhī karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi rim pa ni langs nas ji ltar mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du bkod do / langs nas ji ltar mngon sum byed ce na / kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no / de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa yin no zhes bya bar mngon sum du byed de / sman pa dang sman dang nad gyog lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittaprasādakṛtaśca śīlaprasāda ityucyate caturtha uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems rab tu dang bas byas pa'i tshul khrims kyang rab tu dang ba yin pas tha mar bzhi pa bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ prasannasyaiṣā pratipattiriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni de ltar rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārogyabhūtatvādvā deśika mārga sārthikayānavadvā /<br/> sūtra uktamaṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na nad med pa lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro / yang na ston par byed pa dang lam dang lam grogs dang bzhon pa lta bu yin no / mdo las slob pa ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam /<br/> noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅga baddhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa ni yan lag bcu dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa / ci'i phyir slob pa la yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang yang dag pa'i shes pa ma bshad ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">baddho hi śaikṣaḥ kleśabandhanairadyāpīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu / rnam grol ma bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ baddhasyaiva sato vimuktirvyavasthāpyeta /<br/> na hi bandhanaikadeśānmukto mukta ityucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa ni da dung nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams kyis bcings pa yin pas bcings bzhin du ji ltar rnam par grol bar rnam par gzhag ste 'ching ba'i phyogs gcig las grol bas ni grol zhes mi bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba med par yang ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnam par gzhag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam /<br/> keyaṃ vimuktirnāma /<br/> sā punardvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang de so so rang gi shes pa dag gis rab tu phye ba yin pas de kho na la de smos pa rig pa dang ldan pa yin no / rnam par grol zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / de rnam gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskṛtā cāsaṃskṛtā ca /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas so / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtā kleśahānamadhimuktastu saṃskṛtā /<br/> kleśaprahāṇamasaṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma byas / mos pa 'dus byas nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣādhimokṣaḥ saṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ /<br/> sāṅgaḥ /<br/> saivāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiraśaikṣāṅgayuktā /<br/> aṅgānāṃ saṃskṛtatvāt /<br/> saiva vimuktī dve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa'i mos pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus byas yin no / yan lag ni de yin / rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de ni mi slob pa'i yan lag tu bshad de / yan lag rnams ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro / de nyid rnam grol gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte /<br/> ceto vimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktiśca /<br/> vimuktiskndho 'pi sa eva draṣṭṭavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de nyid mdo las / sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba gnyis su gsungs te / de nyid rnam par grol ba'i phung po yin par yang blta'o / gzhan dag na re mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ katamacca vyāgrābodhyāyanā vimuktipariśuddhipradhānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa gtso bo gang yin zhe na / 'di na dge slong 'dod chags las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha bhikṣavo rāgāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ dveṣānmohāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktamityaparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye paripūrṇasya cānugrahāya cchandovīryamiti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhe sdang dang gti mug las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin te / 'di ltar rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'am / yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus gang yin pa zhes rgyas par gang gsungs pa ji lta bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānādhimokṣa eva vimuktiḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir rnam par grol ba ni mos pa kho na yin par ma zad do / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tattvajñānāpanīteṣu rāgādiṣu cetaso vaimalyaṃ vimuktirityapare /<br/> uktā vimuktiḥ /<br/> samyagjñānaṃ tu samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> vyatiriktaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de kho na shes pas 'dod chags la sogs pa spangs nas sems dri ma med pa nyid rnam par grol ba yin no zhes zer ro / yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba bshad zin to / yang dag pa'i lta ba las ma gtogs pa yang dag pa'i shes pa gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byang chub ji skad bshad shes pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaiva hi pūrvaṃ bodhiruktā saiveha samyagjñānaṃ veditavyam /<br/> yaduta kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngar byang chub ji skad du bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang dag pa'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste / 'di lta ste / zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamat punaścittaṃ vimucyate kimatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems gang zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur / ci 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimucyate jāyamānasaśaikṣaṃ cittamāvṛteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba / sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgataṃ cittamutpadyamānaṃ visucyate aśaikṣamāvaraṇebhya iti śāstrapāṭhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las mi slob pa'i sems ma 'ongs pa sgrib pa rnam las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punastasyāvaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i sgrib pa yang gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśaprāptistadutpattivivandhatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin te / de skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vajropame hi samādho sa ca prahīyate /<br/> taccotpadyamānamaśaikṣaṃ cittaṃ vimucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe de yang slong bar 'gyur la mi slob pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā ca prahīṇā bhavati /<br/> tacāśaikṣaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vimuktaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de spangs nas ni mi slob pa'i sems de yang skyes pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi notpadyamānaṃ laukikaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang 'jig rten pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadapi vimucyate /<br/> yattu niyatamutpattau tadevoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur mod kyi skye bar nges pa gang yin pa de kho na bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikaṃ kuto vimucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang las 'jig rten pa rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tata evotpattyāvaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i sgrib pa de nyid las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu cāmuktasyāpi śaikṣasya laukikamutpadyate na tattādṛśam /<br/> kīdṛśaṃ tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma grol ba la yang 'jig rten pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / de ni de dang mi 'dra'o / de ci 'dra zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśaprāptisahitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimavastho mārgastadutpattyāvaraṇaṃ prajahāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas skabs gang yin pa'i lam gyis de skye ba'i sgrib pa spong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirudhyamāno mārgastu prajahāti tadāvṛtim /<br/> vartamāna ityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis ni / de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong / de ltar gyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiruktā ye ca trayodhātava ucyante prahāṇadhāturviṃrāgadhātunirodhadhāturiti /<br/> ka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas su bshad pa gang yin pa dang khams gsum po spangs pa'i khams dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang 'gog pa'i khams zhes 'byung ba gang yin de dag la khyad par ci yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtaiva dhātvākhyā /<br/> saivāsaṃskṛtā vimuktistrayo dhātavaḥ /<br/> tatra punaḥ /<br/> virāgo rāgasaṃkṣayaḥ /<br/> rāgasya prahāṇaṃ virāgadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya / rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas de nyid khams gsum yin no / de la / 'dod chags kun zad 'dod chags bral / 'dod chags spangs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prahāṇadhāturanyeṣāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spangs pa'i khams ni gzhan dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkṣaya iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par zad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgādanyeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa ni spangs pa'i khams yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhākhyastu vastunaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkṣaya ityevānuvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag par zad pa zhes bya ba kho nar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśanirmuktasya vastunaḥ prahāṇaṃ nirodhadhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa las ma gtogs pa bzhi spangs pa ni 'gog pa'i khams yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā /<br/> catuṣkoṭikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dngos po gang gis yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po des 'dod chags dang bral bar yang 'gyur ram zhe na / mu bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> nirvidyate duḥkhahetukṣāntijñānaiḥ /<br/> duḥkhe samudayakṣāntijñānaireva nirvidyate nānyaiḥ /<br/> virajyate /<br/> sarvairjahāti yaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na / sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis / yid 'byung sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kho nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no / gang gis spong 'gyur ba / kun gyis 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvairapi duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga kṣāntijñānairvirajyate /<br/> yaiḥ kleśān prajahāti /<br/> evaṃ catuṣkoṭikasaṃbhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa gang dag gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro / de lta na ni mu bzhi srid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ catuṣkotikaṃ sidhyati /<br/> nirvidyata eva duḥkhasamudayakṣāntijñānaiḥ /<br/> kleśān prajahat nirvedavastvālambanatvāt /<br/> virajyata eva nirodhamārgakṣāntijñānaiḥ kleśān prajahat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na mu bzhir grub ste / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong na yid 'byung ba kho na yin te / yid 'byung ba'i dngos po kho na la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāmodyavastvālambanatvāt /<br/> ubhayaṃ pūrvaiḥ kleśān prajahat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / snga ma rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na gnyi ga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nobhayamuttaraiḥ kleśānaprajahaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi ma rnams kyis nyon mongs bdag mi spong na gnyi ga ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vītarāgaḥ satyāni paśyandharmajñānakṣāntibhiḥ kleśānna prajahāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig bden pa rnams la lta na chos shes pa dang bzod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñānaistu prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītairna prajahātīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam gyis bsdus pa rnams kyis mi spong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /<br/> saptamaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> namo buddhāya /<br/> kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> nāmalā kṣāntayo jñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bshad pa las lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa'o / bzod pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung / shes pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung / yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes kyang 'byung / yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang 'byung na ci bzod pa dag yin la shes pa ma yin nam / yang dag pa'i shes pa yin la yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin nam zhe na / dri med bzod rnams shes pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpraheyasya vicikitsā 'nuśayasyāgrahīṇatvāt /<br/> dṛṣṭayastu tā santiraṇātmakattvāt yathā ca kṣāntayo dṛṣṭirna jñānamevaṃ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas the tshom ma spangs pa'i phyir ro / de dag yang dag par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir lta ba dag yin no / ji ltar bzod pa rnams lta ba yin gyi shes pa ma yin pa de bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayānutpādadhīrna dak
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭirasantīraṇāparimārgaṇāśayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa med pa dang yongs su 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir lta ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadnyobhayathāryā dhīḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyi ga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣāntikṣayānutpādajñānebhyo 'nyā 'nāsravā prajñā dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzod pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag las gzhan pa zag pa med pa'i shes rab ni lta ba dang shes pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyā jñānaṃ /<br/> laukikī prajñā sarvaiva jñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan shes 'jig rten pa'i shes rab thams cad ni shes pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛśaśca ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drug ni lta ba'ang yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca dṛṣṭayo laukikī ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba lnga dang 'jig rten pa'i lta ba yang dag pa'i lta ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñādṛṣṭiḥ anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> jñānaṃ tveṣā cānyā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam pa drug ni lta ba yin gyi gzhan ni lta ba ma yin no / 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang shes pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiyatā sarvajñānasaṃgrahaḥ /<br/> daśabhirjñānaiḥ /<br/> samāsena tu /<br/> sāsravānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji snyed cig gis shes pa thams cad bsdus she na / shes pa bcus bsdus so / mdor bsdu na ni gnyis te / shes pa zag bcas zag pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayoḥ punaḥ /<br/> ādyaṃ saṃvṛtijñāpakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis las kyang / dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni phal cher bum pa dang snam bu dang skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa kun rdzob 'dzin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa yin no / zag med rnam gnyis chos dang ni / rjes su shes pa kho na yin / zag pa med pa'i shes pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'o

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa de dag nyid bden pa'i bye brag gis sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams dang shes pa bzhi yin te

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos dang rjes su shes pa lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa bzhi po de dag kho nar zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o / de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin / zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang po skyes pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin te / srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir ro

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa zhig yin na ni dmigs pa gcig pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturbhyaḥ paracittavit /<br/> vettīti vit jñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa / rig par byed pas na rig pa ste shes pa'o

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa bzhi las skye bar blta bar bya ste / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams las so / de'i nges pa ni 'di yin te / des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das / zhig dang ma skyes mi rig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūmyatikrāntaṃ na jānātīti /<br/> adharadhyānabhūmikenottaradhyānabhūmikamindriyātikrāntaṃ na jānāti /<br/> śraddhādhimuktasamayamuktamārgeṇa dṛṣṭiprāptāsamayavimuktārga pudgalotkrāntaṃ na jānāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa 'das pa mi shes pa ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i sa pas bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pa mi shes pa'o / dbang po 'das pa mi shes pa ni dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam mi shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgāmyahañcchāvaka pratyekabuddhabuddhamārggaṇāmadhareṇottaraṃ naṣṭājātaṃ na jānāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag 'das pa mi shes pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi lam rnams 'og mas gong ma mi shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītānāgataṃ vartamānapara cittacaittaviṣayatvāt /<br/> kiṃ ca bhūyaḥ /<br/> ta dharmānvayadhīpakṣyamanyo 'nyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhig pa dang ma skyes pa mi shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi shes pa ste / da ltar gyi pha rol gyi sems yul yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmajñānapakṣyaṃ paracittajñānamanvayajñānapakṣyaṃ cittaṃ na jānāti /<br/> anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ ca dharmajñānapakṣyaṃ na jānāti /<br/> kāmadhāturdhvadhātupratikṣālambanatvāttayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun min / pha rol gyi sems shes pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes la / rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes te / de gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārge paracittajñānaṃ nāsti /<br/> tadālambanaṃ tvasti /<br/> tatra paracittajñānena darjñanamārga jñātukāmaḥ prayogaṃ kṛtvā prathamau /<br/> darśanakṣaṇau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam la pha rol gyi sems shes pa med do / de'i dmigs pa ni yod de / de la pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam shes par 'dod pas sbyor ba byas na / nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrāvako vetti khaṅgastrīn sarvānbuddho 'prayogataḥ

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyan thos kyis ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam las skad cig ma gnyis shes te / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang chos shes pa'o

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa la dmigs pa ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de ji srid kyis sbyor ba rtsom pa de srid gyis [*kyis] des sems bcu drug rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bas bar du ni mi shes so

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang sangs rgyas kyis ni dang po gnyis dang brgyad pa kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa dang gsum shes te / sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamadvitīyapañcadaśānityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re dang po dang gnyis pa dang bco lnga pa rnams shes so zhes zer ro
