</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag la khyad par ci yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayajñānaṃ hi satyeṣu parijñātādiniścayaḥ /<br/> na parijñeyamityādiranutpādamatirmatā /<br/> kṣayajñānaṃ katamat /<br/> duḥkhaṃ me parijñātamiti jānāti /<br/> samudayaḥ prahīṇo nirodhaḥ sākṣātakṛto mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad pa shes pa bden rnams la / yongs shes la sogs nges pa'o / yongs shes byar med ces la sogs / mi skye ba yi blor 'dod do / bstan bcos las / zad pa shes pa gang zhe na / bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes bya bar shes pa dang kun 'byung spangs so / 'gog pa mngon du byas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam /<br/> anutpādajñānaṃ katamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam bsgoms so zhes bya bar shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i shes pa dang mthong ba dang rig ba dang blo dang rtogs pa dang shes rab dang snang ba dang mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o / mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti /<br/> tadupādāyeti vistareṇoktaṃ śāstre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes te / yang yongs su shes par byar med do zhes bya bar shes pa nas bdag gis lam bsgoms te yang bsgom du med do zhes bya ba'i bar du shes pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamanāsraveṇa jñānenaivaṃ jānāti /<br/> tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vyutthita evaṃ jānāti /<br/> atastadviśeṣeṇa tayorviśeṣaḥ /<br/> śāstre jñāpiota iti kāśmīrāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i shes pas de ltar shes she na / kha che ba rnams na re bstan bcos las / de'i rjes la langs bas de ltar shes te / de'i phyir de'i bye brag gis de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsraveṇāpyevaṃ jānātītyapare darśanavacanaṃ tu bhāṣyākṣepāt /<br/> jpratyakṣavṛttitvādvā /<br/> ata evoktaṃ yāvat jñānaṃ darśanamapi taditi /<br/> ityetāni daśa jñānāni bhavanti yaduta dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayañṇyānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /<br/> tatra saṃvṛtijñānamekaṃ jñānamekasya ca bhāgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re zag pa med pas kyang de ltar shes te / mthong ba smos pa ni bshad pa 'phangs pa'i phyir ram / yang na mngon sum du 'jug pa'i phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir re zhig shes pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba yang yin no zhes 'byung ngo zhes zer ro / de ltar na de dag ni shes pa bcu yin te / 'di lta ste chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa dang lam shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ saptānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /<br/> duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga kṣayānutpādaparacittajñānānām /<br/> evamanvayajñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la kun rdzob shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la gcig gi cha yang yin no / chos shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bdun gyi cha yang yin te / rjes su shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ caturṇā ca bhāgaḥ /<br/> dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānām /<br/> evaṃ samudayanirodhajñāne caturṇāṃ bhāgaḥ /<br/> mārgajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ pañcānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /<br/> caturṇāmanantaroktānāṃ paracittasya ca /<br/> paracittajñanamekaṃ jñānaṃ caturṇāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /<br/> dharmānvayamārga saṃvṛtijñānānām /<br/> kṣayajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /<br/> dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānām /<br/> evamanutpādajñānam /<br/> kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante /<br/> svabhāvapratipakṣānyāmākārākāragocarāt /<br/> prayogakṛtakṛtyatvahetūpacayoto daśa /<br/> saptabhiḥ kila kāraṇairdaśa jñānāni vyavasthāpyante /<br/> svabhāvataḥ saṃvṛtijñānamaparamārthajñānatvāt /<br/> pratipakṣato dharmānvayajñāne /<br/> kāmathāturdhvadhātupratipakṣatvāt /<br/> ākārato duḥkhasamudayajñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin te / kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa shes pa de dang 'dra'o / lam shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la lnga'i cha yang yin no / pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin no / zad pa ni shes pa gcig yin la / drug gi cha yang yin te / mi skye ba shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o / ci'i phyir de dag gsum yod la bcur rnam par gzhag ce na / rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang / rnam pa rnam pa spyod yul dang / sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang / rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin no / rgyu bdun gyis shes pa bcur rnam par gzhag go zhes grag ste / rang bzhin las ni kun rdzob shes pa ste / don dam pa mi shes pa'i phyir ro / gnyen po las ni chos dang rjes su shes pa dag ste / 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro / rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanābhedāt /<br/> ākārālambanato nirodhamārgajñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro / rnam pa dang dmigs pa las ni 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākārālambanabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogataḥ paracittajñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba las ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tena caittā na jñāyate /<br/> cittajñānārthe tu prayuktasyābhiniṣpatteḥ paracittajñānamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des ni sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi shes pa ma yin mod kyi sems shes par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba byas pa las grub pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtakṛtyataḥ kṣayajñānaṃ kṛtakṛtyasaṃtānotpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya ba byas pa las ni zad pa shes pa ste / bya ba byas pa'i rgyud la dang po nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamataḥ hetūpacayato 'nutpādajñānaṃ sarvānāsravahetukatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu rgyas pa las ni mi skye ba shes pa ste / zag pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sakalasya sakalapratipakṣatvāt kāmadhātupratīpakṣo dharmajñānamityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thams cad kyi gnyen po thams cad yin pa'i phyir / chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po zhes bshad par zad kyi gzhan yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tu /<br/> dharmajñānanirodhe yanmārge vā bhāvanāpathe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgom pa'i lam la 'gog pa'am / lam la chos shes gang yin pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridhātupratipakṣastat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhamārgajñāne bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhīte tridhātupratipakṣaḥ /<br/> kāmadhātostu nānvayam /<br/> anvayajñānam tu sarvathā nāsti kāmadhātuporatipakṣaḥ /<br/> eṣāṃ daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ /<br/> dharmajñānānvayajñānaṃ ṣoḍḍaśākāram /<br/> tān purastādupadekṣyāmaḥ /<br/> anyathā /<br/> tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dag ni khams gsum char gyi gnyen po yin no / 'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po rjes su shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du med do / shes pa bcu po de dag las / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes / rnam pa bcu drug / de dag ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o / kun rdzob ni / de bzhin gzhan du'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ṣoḍaśākāramanyathākāraṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇādigrahaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun rdzob shes pa ni rnam pa bcu drug can yang yin la gzhan gyi rnam pa can yang yin te / chos thams cad kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga jñānāni svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiḥ pravartanta ityekaikaṃ caturākāraṃ bhavanti /<br/> tathā paramatojñānaṃ nirmalaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams ni rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa dag tu 'jug pas re re zhing rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin no / pha rol yid shes dri med kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ tatheva /<br/> svasatyākāratvāccuturākāraṃ mārgajñānatvāt /<br/> samalaṃ punaḥ /<br/> śeyasvalakṣaṇākāraṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa med pa yang de bzhin kho nar rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi can yin te / lam shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro / dri ma dang bcas ni / shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ jñeyānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yat svalakṣaṇam tadākārayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni shes bya sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de'i rnam pa 'dzin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svalakṣaṇagrāhakatvāt /<br/> labhayamapi tu /<br/> ekaikadravyagocaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro / gnyi ga yang / rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā cittaṃ gṛhlāti na tadā cittānāṃ yadā vedanāṃ na tadā saṃjñāmityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe sems 'dzin pa de'i tshe sems las byung ba rnams mi 'dzin la / gang gi tshe tshor ba 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'du shes mi 'dzin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi bhagavatīktam sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātītyevamādi /<br/> na tayordugapadgrahaṇam /<br/> vastramalāyugāpadgrahaṇavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / de gnyis cig car du 'dzin pa ni ma yin te / gos dang dri ma cig car du mi 'dzin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarāgaṃ cittamiti dvidhā sarāgatā /<br/> saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatā saṃyoiga sarāgatā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid rnam pa gnyis te / 'dres pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni gnyis kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no / de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pas na 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atra tu sūtre rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣī vigatarāgamityeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re mdo 'dir ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la / 'dod chags kyi gnyen por ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bshad pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syādanyakleśasamprayuktamapi syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na ni nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi tadapratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ cittamakliṣṭaṃ naiva sarāgaṃ na vigatarāgaṃ syādityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re de lta na ni 'o na de'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma yin la / 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādrāgasaṃprayuktatayā 'pi sarāgaṃ cittamatreṣṭavyamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na mdo 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvatsamohaṃ vigatamohaṃ ca veditavyam /<br/> saṃkṣiptaṃ kuśalamālambanābhisaṃkṣepāt /<br/> vikṣiptaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vikṣepasaṃprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o zhes zer ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re kun du bsdus pa ni dmigs pa la mngon par sdud pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / rnam par gyeng ba ni rnam par gyeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkṣiptaṃ middhasaṃprayuktaṃ vikṣiptamanyata kliṣṭamiti pāścāttyāḥ /<br/> tadetanna varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nub phyogs pa rnams na re kun tu bsdus pa ni gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no / rnam par gyeng ba ni nyon mongs pa can gzhan yin no zhes zer ro / de skad du mi brjod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadeva hi cittaṃ saṃkṣiptavikṣiptaṃ syāt kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayīgāt /<br/> śāstravirodhaśca syāt /<br/> saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /<br/> tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānāni dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti /<br/> līnaṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kauśīdyasaṃprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir sems de nyid bsdus pa yang yin la rnam par gyengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro / bstan bcos las / sems kun du bsdus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so / de shes pa'i shes pa ni bzhi ste / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa dang lam shes pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro / sems zhum pa ni le lo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pragṛhītaṃ kuśalaṃ vīryasaṃprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rab tu bzung ba ni brtson 'grus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dge ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parītāṃ kliṣṭaṃ vyavadānaparīttairniṣevitatvāt /<br/> mahadgataṃ kuśalaṃ tadviparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chung ngu ni rnam par byang ba chung du dag gis bsten pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no / chen por gyur pa ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mūlamūlyaparivārānuparivartakavalālpavahutvācca /<br/> kliṣṭacittaṃ dvābhyāmakuśalamūlābhyāṃ samulam /<br/> kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ /<br/> kliṣṭamalpamūlyamayatnasādhyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtsa ba dang rin dang 'khor dang rjes su 'brang ba dang stobs che chung gi yang phyir te / nyon mongs pa can ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis kyis rtsa ba dang bcas pa yin no / dge ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum gyis so / nyon mongs pa can ni 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rin chung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaṃ bhumūlyaṃ vahābhisaṃskārasādhyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba ni tshogs chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rin che ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭaṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanā 'bhāvānna mahāparivāraṃ tribhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa 'thob pa'i phyir 'khor mang ba ma yin la phung po gsum gyis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /<br/> alpabalaṃ khalvapi kliṣṭaṃ bahubalaṃ kuśalam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba ni 'khor mang ba yin la phung po bzhis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no / yang nyon mongs pa can ni stobs chung ba yin no / dge ba ni stobs che ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekayā hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā daśānuśayātyantasamudghātaḥ kriyate /<br/> tasmādapi kliṣṭam parīttaṃ kuśalaṃ mahadgatam /<br/> uddhataṃ kliṣṭamauddhatyasaṃprayogāt /<br/> anuddhataṃ kukśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvāt /<br/> evamabyupaśāntṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca /<br/> asamāhitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vikṣepasaṃprayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa gcig gis kyang phra rgyas bcu gtan du 'joms par byed pas de'i phyir yang nyon mongs pa ni chung ba yin la dge ba ni chen por gyur pa yin no / rgod pa ni rgod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no / rgod pa ma yin pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / rnam par ma zhi ba dang rnam par zhi ba yang de dang 'dra'o / mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni rnam par gyeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāhitaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvāt /<br/> abhāvitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ pratilambhatiṣevaṇabhāvanābhyāmabhāvitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam par bzhag pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / ma bsgoms pa ni 'thob pa dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa dag gis ma bsgoms pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvitaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhāvitatvāt vimuktaṃ kliṣṭaṃ svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyāmavimuktatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgoms pa ni de gnyis kyis bsgoms pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / rnam par ma grol ba ni rang bzhin dang rgyud rnam par ma grol ba dag gis rnam par grol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhayaṃ vimuktatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> evaṃ tu sūtraṃ nānulomitaṃ bhavati /<br/> eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati /<br/> sūtra uktaṃ kathaṃ cittamadhyātmaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par grol ba ni de gnyis kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dge ba yin no zhes zer ro / de lta na ni mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yang yin la / tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par yang ma bshad pa yin no / ji ltar na mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yin zhe na / mdo las ji ltar na sems nang du kun du bsdus pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccittam styānamiddhasahagatamadhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagataṃ no tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam /<br/> kathaṃ vahirvikṣiptaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems gang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun du 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccittaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣvanuvikṣiptaṃ bhavatyanuvisṛtamiti /<br/> nanu coktaṃ tadeva cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ syādvikṣiptaṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa yin zhe na / sems gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la rjes su gyengs pa yin zhing rnam par 'phros pa yin no zhes gsungs so / sems de nyid kun du bsdus pa yin la rnam par gyengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktamidamayuktaṃ tūktaṃ viddhasahagatasya kliṣṭasya vikṣiptatvāpratijñānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de skad du ni bshad mod kyi rigs par bshad pa ni ma yin te / nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur ba rnam par gyengs pa nyid du dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu coktaṃ śāstravirodhaḥ syāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">varaṃ śāstravirodho na sūtravirīdhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos dang 'gal ba ni bla'i mdo dang 'gal ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathameṣāṃ padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ma bshad pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vikṣiptalilinoddhatāvyupaśāntāsamāhitābhāvitāvimuktānāṃ cittānāmabhinnalakṣaṇavacanāt saṃkṣiptapragṛhītādīnāṃ ca /<br/> na vai noktaḥ padānāmarthaviśeṣo bhavati /<br/> kliṣṭasāmānye 'pi taddoṣasaṃdarśanāt /<br/> ityapyetat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnamiti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems rnam par gyengs pa dang zhum pa dang rgod pa dang rnam par ma zhi ba dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang ma bsgoms pa dang rnam par ma grol ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir la / kun du bsdus pa dang rab tu bzung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir ro / tshig rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ni ma bshad pa ma yin pa nyid de / nyon mongs pa can du mtshungs kyang 'di ltar sems nyon mongs pa can 'di ni rnam par gyengs pa yin no / 'di ni zhum pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par de'i nyes pa'i khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ kuśalasyāpi guṇaviśeṣasaṃdarśanādukta evarthaviśeṣo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du dge ba yang yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir don gyi khyad par bshad pa kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūtravirodhasyāparihārānnaiṣa eṣāṃ padānāmarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo dang 'gal ba ma spangs pa'i phyir de ni tshig de rnams kyi don ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca sūtre tadeva līnaṃ cittaṃ tadevoddhatamityabhipretaṃ syāt idaṃ noktaṃ syāt /<br/> yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye prasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mdo las sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad na ni gang gi tshe sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā iti /<br/> kiṃ punarvodhyaṅgānāṃ vyagrā bhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe sems rgod pa dang rgod par dogs pa de'i tshe chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang brtson 'grus dang dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no zhes pa 'di dag gsungs par mi 'gyur ro / ci 'di la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so sor bsgom mam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā na saṃmukhībhāva ityadoṣa eṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag yid la byed pa bsgom pa yin par 'dod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin pas nyes pa med pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kauśīdyādhikamatra cittaṃ līnamityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di las le lo lhag pa'i sems ni zhum pa zhes bshad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">auddhatyādhikaṃ coddhatamityavirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgod pa lhag pa ni rgod pa zhes bshad pas 'gal ba med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tayostu sahabhāvāttadeva cittaṃ līnaṃ tadevoddhatamiti brūmaḥ /<br/> nābhiprayikaṃ vacanaṃ vāryate /<br/> sūtre tu nāyamabhiprāya iti brūmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyang lhan cig pa yin pa'i phyir sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin zhes smra'o / bsam pa can gyi tshig la ni bzlog pa med kyi mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'di ma yin no zhes smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattūktaṃ sarvameva rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems thams cad 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamaccittaṃ rāgasaṃprayuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems gang zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgaprāptisahitaṃ cet /<br/> asāsravamiti sarāgaṃ prāpnoti śaikṣacittam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'dod chags kyi thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no zhe na ni slob pa'i sems zag pa med pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgālambanaṃ cet /<br/> arhato 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamiti gṛhlīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin no zhe na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhes bya bar gzung bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ vā tatsāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmānya kleśālambanatvāditi cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te nyon mongs pa spyi ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamapi samohaṃ gṛhlīyānmohālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na yang gti mug dang bcas par gzung bar 'gyur te / gti mug gi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālambanaṃ nāpi taccittālambanaṃ rāgālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni thob pa la dmigs pa yang ma yin la / sems de la dmigs pa'i 'dod chags la dmigs pa can yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānna rāgasaṃprayogātsarāgaṃ cittamatreṣṭam /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par mi bya'o / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamasaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgamiti sūtrābhigrāyo dṛśyate /<br/> yat tūktaṃ vigatarāgamasya taccittaṃ bhavati vigatadveṣaṃ vigatamohamanāvarttikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārupyabhave iti /<br/> tatra tatpraptivigamaṃ saṃdhāyoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la / 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no zhes bya bar snang ngo / gang las 'di'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba yin / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral ba yin / 'dod pa'i srid pa dang gzugs kyi srid pa dang gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin zhes gsungs pa der ni de'i thob pa dang bral ba las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu coktam anyakleśasaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ rāgaviprayuktatvādvigatarāgaṃ syāditi /<br/> etenābhisaṃdhinā na doṣaḥ /<br/> na tu tadvigatarāgamiti kṛtvā gṛhyate /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sadveṣaṃ samohamityevamādi /<br/> alaṃ prasaṅgena siddhānto varṇyatām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam dgongs pa 'di ni nyes pa med de / de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar mi gzung ngo / 'o na ci lta zhe na / zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par gzung ngo / zhar la 'ongs pas chog go / grub pa'i mtha' brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ paracittajñānaṃ paracittasyākāramālambanaṃ vā gṛhlāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci pha rol gyi sems shes pa pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa 'am dmigs pa 'dzin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na gṛhlāti ākāralambananirapekṣaṃṃ hi tadraktamidaṃ cittamiti jānāti natvamuṣmin rupe raktamiti jānāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi 'dzin to / de ni rnam pa dang dmigs pa la mi ltos pa yin te / sems 'di chags pa yin no zhes bya bar shes kyi gzugs che ge mo zhig la chags so zhes bya bar ni mi shes so / de lta ma yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi tadrūpālambanamapi syāt tadālambanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhlataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gzugs la dmigs par yang 'gyur la / de la dmigs pa'i pha rol gyi sems 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvaṃ ca paracittajñānaṃ dravyasvalakṣaṇacittacaittapratyutpannaparasaṃtatikāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāpratisaṃyuktaviṣayaṃ darśanamārgapratiṣiddhaṃ bhāvanāmārga upalabhyate /<br/> śūnyatā 'nimittasamādhi viprayuktaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānāsaṃgṛhītamānantaryamārga pratiṣiddhaṃ ca vedittavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi sems shes pa thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang da ltar byung ba dang pha rol gyi rgyud dang 'dod pa dang gzugs dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yul can mthong ba'i lam bkag pa dang bsgom pa'i lam la dmigs pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mi ldan pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pas ma bsdus pa dang bar chad med pa'i lam bkag pa yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ paracittajñānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣe caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmavivarjite
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can / stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayānutpādajñāne śeṣe te caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmakārau varjayitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag ste / de gnyis ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa rnam pa bcu bzhi can yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pāramārthikayorapi saṃvṛtibhajanāt śīṇā me jātirnāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti tadvalānuvyavahārataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don dam pa pa dag yin yang de dag gi stobs kyi rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skye ba zad do / 'di las srid pa gzhan rab tu mi shes so zhes kun rdzob la ston pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimanāsravaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro 'styatha na /<br/> kāśmīrāṇāṃ tāvat /<br/> nāmalaḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo 'nya ākāraḥ /<br/> nāstyanāsravākāraḥ ṣoḍaśākāranirmuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci zag pa med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa yod dam / 'on te med ce na / re zhig kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na / dri med bcu drug gzhan rnams med / rnam pa bcu drug las ma gtogs pa zag pa med pa'i rnam pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anye 'sti śāstrataḥ /<br/> śranye punarastītyāhurvahirdeśakāḥ /<br/> kathaṃ gamyate /<br/> śāstrataḥ iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yod ces bya bstan bcos las / gzhan nyi 'og pa rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro / ji ltar na khong du chud ce na / bstan bcos las zhes bya ba smos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāstre hyevamāha /<br/> syādapratisaṃyuktena cittena kāmapratisaṃyuktāndharmānvijānīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bstan bcos las 'di skad du mi ldan pa'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / shes par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ /<br/> astyetasthānamastyetadvastviti /<br/> yogavihitatī vijānoyāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang 'di ni gnas yod do / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsyāyamartho yadastyetatsthānamastyetadvastvityevaṃ vijānīyāditi api tvastyetat sthānamastyetadvastu yadanityādito vijānīyāditi cet /<br/> na /<br/> anyatrāvacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gang las 'di ni gnas yod do / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes de snyam du shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin te / 'on kyang mi rtag pa la sogs pa shes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni gnas yod do / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya ba yin no / zhe na / ma yin te / gzhan nas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa cecchāstrārtho 'bhaviṣyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'di bstan bcos kyi don yin par 'gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadidaṃ paṭhacyate syāddarśanaprahātavyena cittena kāmapratisaṃyuktāndharmānvijānīyāditi /<br/> āha /<br/> vijānīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du mthong bas spang par bya ba'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / shes par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmata ātmīyata ucchedataḥ śāśvatataḥ ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādato 'grataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ /<br/> rajyeta dviṣyānmanyeta muhyedayogavihitato vijānīyāditi /<br/> atrāpyevaṃ pāṭho 'bhaviṣyat /<br/> astyetat sthānamastyetadvastviti /<br/> na tvevaṃ paṭhacyate /<br/> tasmānnāsyāyamarthaḥ /<br/> kiṃ punarime ṣoḍaśākārā nāmata āhosvit dravyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas bdag dang bdag gi dang rtag pa dang chad pa dang rgyu med pa dang byed pa med pa dang skur ba 'debs pa dang mchog dang gtso bo dang khyad par du 'phags pa dang dam pa dang dag pa dang grol ba dang nges par 'dzin par byed pa dang nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom du shes par 'gyur zhing / chags pa dang sdang ba dang rlom pa dang rmongs par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa der yang 'di skad du 'di ni gnas yod do / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na / de skad kyang mi 'byung ste / de lta bas na 'di ni de'i don ma yin no / ci rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag ming gi sgo nas sam / 'on te rdzas su zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta dravyato nāmataḥ ṣoḍaśetyeke
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re rdzas su ni bdun yin la ming gi sgo nas ni bcu drug yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhakārāścatvāraḥ samudayanirodhamārgākārāṇāmekakadravyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams rdzas su re re yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu varṇayanti /<br/> dravyataḥ ṣoḍaśākārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du brjod de rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatpratyayādhīnatvāt anityam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣīḍātmakatvāt duḥkham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmīyadṛṣṭivipakṣeṇa śūnyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gir lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis stong pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmadṛṣṭivipakṣeṇānātmā /<br/> heturvījadharmayogena /<br/> samudayaḥ prādurbhāvayoigena /<br/> prabhavaḥ prabandhayogena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bdag med pa'o / sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis rgyu'o / 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o / 'brel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhiniṣpādanārthena pratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par sgrub pa'i don gyis ni rkyen te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā mṛtpiṇdadaṇdacatrasūtrodakasamavāyāt ghaṭābhiniṣpattirbhavati tadvaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang thal zhar dang 'khor lo dang thag gu dang chu rnams 'dus pa las bum pa mngon par grub pa de bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akndhoparamatvāt nirodhaḥ /<br/> agninirvāṣaṇāt śāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o / me gsum zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirūpadravtvāt praṇītaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'tshe ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvāpakṣālavimuktatvānniḥ saraṇamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gamanārthena mārgaḥ /<br/> yogayuktatvānnyāyaḥ /<br/> samyakpratipādanārthena pratipat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bgrod pa'i don gyis lam mo / rigs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o / yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atyantasamatikramaṇānnairyāṇika iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shin tu yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā anātyantikatvādanityam /<br/> abhinyāsabhūtatvāt duḥkham /<br/> antarvyāpārapuruṣaparahitattvācchūnyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na gtan du ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o / khur lta bur gyur pa'i phyir / sdug bsngal ba'o / nang gi skyes bu dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">akāmakāritvādanātmā /<br/> heturāgamanayogena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod dgur byed pa med pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o / 'ong ba'i tshul gyis rgyu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samudaya unmajjanayogena /<br/> prabhavaḥ prasaraṇayogena /<br/> pratisaraṇārghena pratyaya iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba'i tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o / 'phel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o / so sor 'brad ba'i tshul gyis rkyen no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃbandhaḥ saṃbandhoparamatvānnirodhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'brel ba med pas 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇavimuktatvācchāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalatvāt praṇītaḥ /<br/> paramāśvāsatvānniḥ saraṇamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba'i phyir gya nom pa'o / yid brtan pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kumārgavipakṣeṇa mārgaḥ /<br/> anyāyavipakṣeṇa nyāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam ngan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis lam mo / rigs pa ma yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rigs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇapurāvirodhanārthena pratipat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong dang mi 'gal ba'i don gyis sgrub pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvabhavapratipakṣatvānnairyāṇikaḥ /<br/> ityeṣāṃ vyākhyānamanekaparyāyaḥ /<br/> yathābhipretaṃ pravakṣyāmaḥ /<br/> udayavyayatvādanityam /<br/> pratikūlabhāvāt /<br/> duḥkham /<br/> ātmarahitatvācchūnyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa thams cad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o / ji ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o / mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o / bdag dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svayamanātmatvādanātma /<br/> hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayatvaṃ tu yadeva sūtra uktam /<br/> ime pañcopādānaskandhāśchandamūlakāśchandasamudayāśchandajātīyāśchandaprabhavā iti /<br/> prabhavaśabdaḥ kevalaṃ paścāt paṭhitavyaḥ śāstre /<br/> kaḥ punareṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /<br/> caturvidho hi cchandaḥ /<br/> asmītyabhedenātmabhāvcchandaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o / rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen nyid ni gang mdo las nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa ba can / 'dun pa las kun 'byung ba / 'dun pa dang 'dra ba / 'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no zhes gsungs pa kho na yin te / rab tu skye ba zhes bya ba'i sgra tha mar gdon ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do / yang 'di dag la khyad par ci yod ce na / 'dun pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste / nga'o snyam pa ni bye brag med par lus pa 'dun pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syāmityabhedena punarbhavacchandaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gyur cig snyam pa ni bye brag tu med par yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityaṃ syāmiti bhedena punarbhavacchandaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa ni / bye brag tu yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratisaṃdhivandhacchandaścaturthaḥ /<br/> karmābhisaṃskāracchando vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'ching ba la 'dun pa yin no / yang na las mngon par 'du byed pa la 'dun pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra prathomo duḥkhasyādikāraṇatvānmūlahetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dang po ni sdug bsngal gyi dang po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyu yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalasyeva vījam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu'i sa bon bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyaḥ samudayastena tatsamudāgamātphalasyevāṅkurādiprasavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni kun 'byung ba yin te / des de yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir / 'bras bu'i myu gu la sogs pa skye ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyastajjātīyaduḥkhapratyayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rkyen yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalasyeva kṣotrodakapāśyādikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu'i zhing dang chu dang lud la sogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣetrādivaśena hi phalasya gandharasavīryavipākaprabhāvabhedā bhavanti caturthaḥ prabhavastataḥ eva tatsaṃbhavāt phalasyeva puṣpāvasānamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhing la sogs pa'i dbang gis ni 'bras bu'i dri dang ro dang nus pa dang smin pa dang mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro / bzhi pa ni rab tu skye ba ste / de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha ma me tog bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā /<br/> tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ /<br/> asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā 'smīti sadasmīti asadasmīti /<br/> bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi /<br/> syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na sred pa rnam par spyad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa bzhi ni sred pa'i bye brag rnams las lnga tshan gnyis dang bzhi tshan gnyis yin te / dge slong dag nga'o snyam pa yod na nga 'di lta bu'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nga ni 'di 'dra'o snyam pa dang nga de lta ma yin no snyam pa dang nga bzang ngo snyam pa dang nga ngan no snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro / de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam par 'gyur zhing / de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang 'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang 'di 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro / de la gyur cig snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de la 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang 'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang 'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pravṛttyuparmatvānnirodhaḥ /<br/> nirduḥkhatvācchantaḥ /<br/> iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti vacanāta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o / sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir zhi ba ste / dge slong dag de ltar na 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niruttaratvāt praṇītaḥ /<br/> apunarāvṛttitvānniḥsaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gong na med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o / yang phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pathibhūtatvānmārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam lta bur gyur pa'i phyir lam mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathābhūtapravṛttatvānnyāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du zhugs pa'i phyir rigs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratiniyatatvāt pratipat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor nges pa'i phyir sgrub ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathoktam /<br/> eṣa mārgo hi nāstyanyo darśanasya viśuddhaya iti /<br/> atyantaniryāṇānnairyāṇikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du mthong ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'di lam yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / gtan du nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā nityasukhātmīyātmadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇānityaduḥkhaśunyānātmākārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag gi dang bdag tu lta pa spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahetvekahetupariṇāmabuddhipūrvaka dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu med pa dang rgyu gcig pu dang 'gyur ba dang blo sngar btang ba dang lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen gyi rnam pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ nirodhākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thar pa med do snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkho mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ śāntākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal la thar pa yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen bor zhi ba'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasukhapraṇītadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ praṇītākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi bde ba gya nom pa yin par lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por gya nom pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ punaḥ parihāṇito nātyantiko mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ niḥsaraṇākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dang yang yongs su nyams bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas thar ba ni gtan du ma yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam med do snyam pa dang lam 'di yin no snyam pa dang gzhan yang lam yin no snyam pa dang lam 'di yang lhag go snyam du lta bar spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du lam dang regs pa dang sgrub pa dang des par 'byin pa'i rnam pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāro nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ /<br/> prajñākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati /<br/> prajñāntarāsaṃyogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa shes rab / de lta na ni 'o na shes rab gzhan dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir / shes rab rnam pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syāt /<br/> sarveṣāṃ cittacaittānāmālambanagrahaṇaprakāra ākāra iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar rnam pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kiṃ prajñaivākārayati netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> tayā saha /<br/> ākāraynti sālambāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci shes rab kho nas 'dzin par byed dam zhe na / smras bam yin no / 'on ji lta bu zhe na / de dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñā cānye ca sarve sālambanā dharmā ākārayanti /<br/> sarvamākāryate tu sat /<br/> yatkiñcidasti sarvamākāryate /<br/> tadevaṃ kṛtvā siddhaṃ bhavati prajñā ākāraścākārayati cākāryante ca /<br/> ālambanā ākāryanta eveti /<br/> ataḥ parameṣāṃ jñānānāṃ kuśalādibhedaṃ nirvekṣyāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab dang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan thams cad kyis kyang 'dzin par byed do / yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin / gang ci yod kyang rung thams cad gzung bar bya ba yin no / de ltar byas na shes rab ni rnam ba yang yin / 'dzin par byed pa yang yin / gzung bar bya ba yang yin no / dmigs pa dang bcas pa gzhan ni 'dzin par byed pa dang gzung bar bya ba yin no / dmigs pa med pa rnams ni gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no / 'di man chad ni shes pa bcu po 'di dag gi dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridhādyaṃ kuśalānyanyāni /<br/> saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ślokādau bhavatvādādyam /<br/> tattrividham /<br/> kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge / kun rdzob shes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i dang po ni yod pa'i phyir dang po ste / de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyāni nava jñānāni kuśalānyeva /<br/> ādyaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu /<br/> kāmadhātī yāvadbhavāgre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa gzhan dgu ni dge ba kho na yin no / dang pos rnams thams cad na / 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu /<br/> dharmajñānaṃ caturṣu dhyāneṣvanāgamye dhyānāntare ca /<br/> navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drug na chos shes bya / chos shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med ba dang bsam gtan khyad par can na yod do / dgu na rjes shes bya ba
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca /<br/> tathaiva ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes su shes pa ni sa drug po de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa gsum na yod do / de bzhin du drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgakṣayānutpādajñānānyapyetāsveva navasu bhūmiṣvabhedena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog ba dang lam dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyang bye brag med bar ni sa dgu po de dag nyid na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbye ba ni chos shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa drug na yod do / rjes su shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa dgu na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyāneṣvanyamanojñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittajñānaṃ caturṣveva dhyāneṣu nānyatra /<br/> kāmarūpāśrayaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi kho na na yod kyi gzhan na med do / de na 'dod dang gzugs rten can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmarūpadhātvośca tat paracittajñānaṃ saṃmukhīkriyate /<br/> kāmāśrayaṃ tu dharmāruyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa de ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag tu mngon sum du byed do / chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmajñānaṃ tu kāmadhātvāśrayameva /<br/> na rūpārupyadhātvoḥ saṃmukhīkriyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can kho na yin gyi / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu ni mngon sum du mi byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyattraidhātukāśrayam /<br/> kiṃ punaranyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan / gzhan gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānanirmuktam /<br/> kṛto bhūmyaśrayanirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang chos shes pa ma gtogs pa'o / sa dag dang rten bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtyupasthānasaṃgraho vaktavyaḥ /<br/> so 'yamucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis bsdus pa brjod par bya ste / de smras pa
