</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa / gcig ste blo dang shes rab dang / shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhajñānamekaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa shes pa ni gcig ste / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittadhīḥ /<br/> trīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems blo ni gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittajñānaṃ trīṇi vedanācittadharmasmṛtyupasthānāni /<br/> catvāri śeṣāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni gsum ste / tshor ba dang sems dang chos dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no / lhag ma bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhaparacittajñānābhyāmanyāni jñānāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dag las gzhan pa'i shes pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamasya jñānasya kati jñānānyālambanam /<br/> dharmadhīgocaro nava /<br/> dharmajñānasya nava jñānānyālambanamanyatrānvayajñānāt /<br/> nava mārgānvayadiyoḥ /<br/> anvayajñānasyāpi nava jñānānyālambanamanyatra dharmajñānāt /<br/> mārgajñānasyāpi nava jñānānyālambanamanyatra saṃvṛtijñānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa gang gis dmigs pa shes pa du zhig yin zhe na / chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no / chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni shes pa dgu yin te / rjes su shes pa ma gtogs so / lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no / rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa yang shes pa dgu yin te / chos shes pa ma gtogs so / lam shes pa'i dmigs pa yang dgu yin te / kun rdzob shes pa ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhahetudhiyordvayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal rgyu blo'i gnyis yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayajñānayordve saṃvṛtiparacitajñāne ālambanam /<br/> caturṇāṃ daśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi dmigs pa dag ni gnyis te / kun rdzob dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa yin no / bzhi yi bcu yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvṛtiparacittakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ daśa jñānānyālambanam /<br/> naikasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun rdzob shes pa dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni shes pa bcu char yang yin no / gcig gi min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasya nirodhajñānasya naiva jñānamālambanam /<br/> yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa /<br/> katame daśa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa shes pa ni gcig phu'i dmigs pa ni shes pa ma yin pa nyid do / chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya / bcu gang dag ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gsum pa dang dri med chos / 'dus ma byas rnams gnyis gnyis so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃkṛtā dharmā aṣṭadhā kriyante /<br/> kāmarūpārupyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ saṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos 'dus byas rnams la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med ba na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asaṃskṛtā dvidhā kriyante /<br/> kuśalāvyākṛtabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas rnams la dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis rnam ba gnyis su bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos bcu po 'di dag ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na / shes pa gang gis dmigs pa du zhig yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos bcu po thams cad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmajñānasya pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa ni lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarānāsravā ścatvāraḥ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam /<br/> anvayajñānasya sapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang gzhi dang 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no / rjes su shes pa ni bdun te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpārupyāvacarānāsravāḥ ṣaṭ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang drug dang 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhasamudayajñānayoḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ ṣaṭ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi ni drug ste / 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhajñānasyaikaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa shes pa'i ni gcig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalamevāsaṃskṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dus ma byas dge ba kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mārgajñānasya dvāvanāsravau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam shes pa'i ni gnyis te / zag pa med pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittajñānasya trayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i ni gsum ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmarūpāvacarānāsravāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ nava dharmā ālambanamavyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ muktvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag gi dmigs pa ni chos dgu yin te / 'dus ma byas lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">syādekena jñānena sarvadharmān jānīyāt /<br/> na syāt /<br/> api tu /<br/> sāṃvṛtaṃ svakalāpānyadekaṃ vidyādanātmataḥ /<br/> saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /<br/> jsvabhāvastatsahabhuvaśca dharmāstasya svakalāpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa gcig gis chos thams cad shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / med do / 'on kyang / kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las / gzhan ni bdag med nyid rigs 'gyur / kun rdzob shes pas ni rang gi tshogs las gzhan pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag med ba'i zhes bdag med pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro / de'i rang gi tshogs ni rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i chos rnams yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmagrahaṇaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhedādekālambanatvāditi /<br/> saṃnikṛṣṭatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni yul dang yul can tha dad pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir dang ha cang nye ba'i phyir mi 'dzin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam /<br/> tasya vyavacchinnabhūmyālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba yin no / gzugs na spyod pa ni thos pa las byung ba yin no / bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin te / de ni sa rnam pa chad pa las dmigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi yugapatsarvato vairāgyaṃ syāt /<br/> gatametat /<br/> idaṃ tu vaktavyam /<br/> kaḥ katibhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na thams cad las cig car 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro / 'di ni rdzogs so / gang zhig shes pa du dang ldan / zhes bya ba 'di brjod bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthagjanastāvadekena samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig so so'i skye bo ni kun rdzob shes pa gcig bu dang ldan no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃvṛtijñānena /<br/> vītarāgastu paracittajñānenāpi /<br/> āryaḥ punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang yang ldan no / 'phags pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekajñānānvito rāgīprathame 'nāsravakṣaṇe /<br/> kāmāvītarāgo duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntavekenaiva saṃvṛtijñānena samanvāgato bhavati /<br/> dvitīye tribhiḥ /<br/> duḥkhadharmajñāne tribhiḥ saṃvṛtijñānadharmajñānaduḥkhajñānaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag med skad cig dang po la / chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan / 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan pa yin no / gnyis pa la gsum / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa dang chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal shes pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ūrdhvastu catuṣrvekaikavṛddhimān /<br/> ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum dang ldan no / yan chad ni / bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan / de yan chad kyi skad cig ma bzhi la ni / de la shes pa re re
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhe 'nvayajñāne 'nvayajñānaṃ vardhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phel bar shes bar bya ste / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes ba la ni rjes su shes pa 'phel la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa rnams la ni kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams 'phel bas lam la chos shes pa la shes pa bdun dang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vītarāgastu sarvatrādhikena paracittajñānena samanvāgato veditavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni thams cad du gzhan gyi sems shes pa lhag par ldan par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasyāmavasthāyāṃ kati jñānāni bhavyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na gnas skabs gang du shes pa du dag cig 'thob ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathotpannāni bhāvyante kṣāntijñānāni darśane /<br/> anāgatāni /<br/> darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ /<br/> kasmāddarśanamārge sabhāgajñānākārabhāvanaiva gotrāṇāmaporatilabdhatvāt /<br/> tatraiva sāṃvṛtaṃ cānvayatraye /<br/> tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu /<br/> na dharmajñāneṣvakṛtsnasatyābhisamayāt /<br/> ato 'bhisamayāntyākhyaṃ /<br/> ata eva tadābhisamayāntikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānamākhyāvate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang / shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams / ma 'ongs pa 'thob / mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa'am / shes pa gang dang gang skyes pa de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa de'i rnam pa bzhi kho na 'thob bar 'gyur ro / ci'i phyir / mthong ba'i lam la shes pa dang / rnam ba 'dra ba kho na 'thob ce na / rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro / de nyid las / rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang / mthong ba'i lam de nyid la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes ba gsum la kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo / chos shes pa la ni ma yin te / bden pa zad par mngon par ma rtogs ba'i phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir mngon rtogs mtha' zhes bya ba / de nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob shes pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba zhes bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaikasatyābhisamayānte bhāvanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa re re mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes la 'thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna mārgānvayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchati /<br/> mārgasatyasya pūrva laukikena mārgeṇānabhisamitatvāt akṛtsnābhisamayācca /<br/> kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa na 'thob bar mi 'gyur zhe na / lam gyi bden ba ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang zad par mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro / sdug bsngal zad par yongs su shes par bya ba dang kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya bar ni nus kyi / lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir / de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba mi 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe kun 'byung ba la yang thams cad spangs pa ma yin pas mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsatyadarśanaheyaḥ sarvaḥ prahīṇno bhavati /<br/> mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad spangs pa yin no / lam ni rigs mang ba'i phyir / mthong bas spang ba'i gnyen por thams cad bsgom par mi nus pas khyad par cher yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārgaparivāratvādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadidaṃ sādhyatvādajñāpakam /<br/> kiṃ punastadābhisamayāntikaṃ samvṛtijñānaṃ kadācitsaṃmukhīkriyate /<br/> na kadācit ekāntena hi /<br/> tadānutpattidharmakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no / ci kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung ba de res 'ga' mngon sum du byed dam zhe na / nam yang mi byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punastadbhāvitaṃ bhavati /<br/> alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate /<br/> prāptitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig kho nar de ni mi skye ba'i chos can yin / ji ltar na de thob pa yin te / ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa'i phyir ro / da ni gal te de mngon sum du bya ba mi nus pa kho na yin na ji ltar na de rnyed pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāllabdhaṃ tasmāllabdhamityapūrvaiṣā nirdeśajātiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa'i sgo nas so / gang gi phyir rnyed pa de'i phyir rnyed do zhes ston pa 'di ni sngon ma byung ba'i rnam pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnaivaṃ bhāvanā sidhyati /<br/> evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ /<br/> kathaṃ ca pūrvācāryā āhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de lta na ni thob pa mi 'grub pa nyid kyis sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer ba de lta na 'grub bar 'gyur ro / sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokottaramārgasāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten las 'das ba'i lam gyi mthus de las langs nas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa bden pa la dmigs ba mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba kun rdzob shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yattatsaṃmukhībhāvasamarthāśrayalābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de mngon sum du 'gyur bar nus pa'i rten rnyed pa gang yin pa de nyid rnyed pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /<br/> eva tu necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> katibhūmikaṃ punastatsaṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate /<br/> darśanamārgasya /<br/> svadhobhūmi /<br/> yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate /<br/> ānāgamyabhūmikaścedbhavati dvibhūmikaṃ bāvyate /<br/> anāgamyabhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs rnyed na rigs las byung ba yang rnyed pa yin no zhes zer ro / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do / sa du pa'i kun rdzob shes pa de 'thob ce na / mthong ba'i lam gyis ni / rang dang 'gog pa mthong ba'i lam las sa gang pa yin pa sa de pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob ba ste / gal te mthong ba'i lam mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa zhig yin na ni / mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang sa gnyis pa thob la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin na sa bdun pa'i kun rdzob shes pa thob ba'i bar du'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra punaḥ kati smṛtyupasthānāni /<br/> nirodhe 'ntyaṃ /<br/> nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang dran ba nye bar gzhag pa du dag cig yin zhe na / 'gog pa'i mtha' / 'gog pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob shes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tha ma ste / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti /<br/> taccaitadābhisamayāntikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ /<br/> svasatyākāraṃ /<br/> yatsatyābhisamayāllabhyate tatsatyākārameva /<br/> tadākāravacanādālambanasya tadeva satyamityuktaṃ bhavati /<br/> darśanamārgalabhyatvācca tat /<br/> yatnikam /<br/> prāyogikamityarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig grangs bcad pas lhag ma ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no / kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba de ni rang bden rnams can / bden pa gang zhig mngon bar rtogs pa'i 'thob pa bden pa de'i rnam pa can kho na yin no / de'i rnam pa can yin no / zhes smos pas 'di'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no / de ni mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bad las byung ba sbyor ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saparivāragrahaṇātkāmarūpāvacārāṇi catuṣpañcaskandhasvabhāvāni /<br/> ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya /<br/> bhāvyanta iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin no / chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug / 'thob ces bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne /<br/> mārgajñānamārgānvayajñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa las shes pa gnyis da ltar byung ba yin la / ma 'ongs pa drug 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">purāgatāni ṣaṭ bhāvyante /<br/> dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni /<br/> vītarāgasya sapta tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams so / 'dod la chags dang bral bas bdun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vītarāgasya paracittajñānaṃ saptamaṃ bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bral bas ni bdun pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarāgabhāvanā mārge tadūrdhvaṃ saptabhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi / bsgom ba'i lam la bdun 'thob po
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma bcu drug gi gong ma'i bsgom pa'i lam la ni ji srid du 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bam yin pa de srid du sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasaṃvṛtijñānāni /<br/> laukikaścet bhāvanāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so / gal te bsgom ba'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no / gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokottaraścet caturṇāṃ dharmajñānānāmanyatamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptabhūmijayā 'bhijñākopyāptyākīrṇabhāvite
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang / mi gyo 'thob dang spel bsgoms pa'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ānanataryapatheṣūrdhvaṃ muktimārgāṣṭake 'pi ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang / gong ma'i grol ba'i lam brgyad la'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptajñānāni bhāvyante iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa bdun 'thob bo zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta bhūmayaḥ catvāri dhyānāni trayaścārupyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bdun ni bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante tānyeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las rgyal ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste / slob pas bdun po de dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi gyo ba rtogs par byed pa dang bsam gtan spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ji snyed ba de dag thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikeścet bhāvnāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag nyid do / gal te bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni / kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokottaraśceccaturṇāmanvajñānānāṃ dvayośca dharmajñānayoranyatamat /<br/> akopyaprativedhe tu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni rjes su shes pa bzhi dang chos shes pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no / mi gyo ba rtogs par byed ba la ni kun rdzob shes pa mi 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgrāprati pakṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i tse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra jayajñānaṃ saptamaṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der ni zad pa shes ba bdun ba yin par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang gong ma srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad la yang shes pa bdun kho na 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgaparacittajñānāni /<br/> saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog ba dang lam dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so / kun rdzob shes pa ni mi 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgrāpratipakṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratyutpannaṃ tu caturṇāmanvayajñānānāṃ dvayośca dharmajñānayoranyatamat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi dang chos shes pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣottāpanamuktau vā ṣaṭsaptajñānabhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa sbyong ba'i grol ba la / shes pa drug dang bdun 'thob bam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya /<br/> saṃvṛtijñānasyāpyubhayoriti kecit /<br/> tatra matavikalpajñāpanārtho vāśabdhaḥ /<br/> prayogamārge tu tayoḥ saṃvṛtijñānasyāpi bhāvanā /<br/> ānantaryapatha ṣaṇṇāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa 'dod chags dang bcas pas ni dbang po sbyor ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam la drug 'thob ste / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams so / 'dod chags dang bral bas ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsnan te / bdun 'thob bo / 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kha cig na re gnyi gas kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo zhes zer ba'i lugs tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro / sbyor ba'i lam la ni de gnyis kyis kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo / bar chad med pa'i lam la drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat /<br/> na saṃvṛtijñānasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rung / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang rung / dbang po sbyor ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam la drug 'thob ste / snga ma bzhin no / kun rdzob shes pa ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">darśanamārga sādṛśyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na paracittajñānasya /<br/> sarvānantaryamārga pratipiddhatvāt /<br/> kimartha pratipidhyate /<br/> apratipakṣatvāt /<br/> bhavāgravijaye tathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang ma yin te / bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad la bkag pa'i phyir ro / ci'i phyir bkag pa ci zhe na / gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro / de bzhin srid rtse'i rnam rgyal la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgravairāgye 'pyānantaryamārgeṣu ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā tathaiva /<br/> navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la yang de bzhin du drug 'thob bo / zad pa shes pa la dgu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgravairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ kṣayajñānam /<br/> tatra navānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā anyatrānutpādajñānāt /<br/> akopyasya daśa bhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa ni zad pa shes pa yin te / de la mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa dgu 'thob po / mi gyo bas ni bcu 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā /<br/> anutpādajñānalābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo ba'i chos can gang yin pa des ni bcu 'thob ste / mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃcare 'ntyamuktau ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">der 'pho ba'i grol ba tha ma la'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig mi gyo ba nyid du 'pho ba de'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma la yang bcu 'thob bo / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">proktaśeṣe 'ṣṭabhāvanā /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ śeṣam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bshad pa'i lhag ma la brgyad 'thob bo / lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa dang sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa dag gis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang mi gyo ba rtogs par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sbyor ba dang khyad par can gyi lam thams cad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣu sarveṣvaṣṭau jñānāni bhāvyante /<br/> anāgatabhāvanayā kṣayānutpādajñāne hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag thams cad la ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa 'thob pas 'thob pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śaikṣasyaivam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">slob pa ni de lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi slob pa'i mngon pa shes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams la shes pa dgu 'am bcu 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāvitānantaryavimuktimārgeṣu tvaṣṭau nava vā dvayostvabhhijñāvimuktimārgayoravyākṛtatvānna kicidanāgate bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la ni brgyad dam dgu 'thob po / mngon par shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa cung zad kyang mi 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthagjanasya tu kāmatridhyānavairāgyāntyavimuktimārgeṣu dhyānabhūmikeṣu ca prayogābhijñātrayavimuktimārgāpramāṇādiguṇābhinirhāreṣu saṃvṛtijñānamanāgataṃ bhāvyate paracittajñānaṃ cānyatra nirvedhabhāgīyebhyaḥ /<br/> teṣu hi paracittajñānaṃ na bhāvyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so'i skye bo ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma rnams dang bsam gtan gyis pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang tshad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub pa rnams la kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba ma gtogs pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang 'thob bo / de dag la ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa yang mi 'thob ste

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">glang po che phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs yin no / de bzhin du tshan po che chen po dang rab gnon dang yan lag mchog dang stobs mchog dang sred med kyi bu rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed de brjod par bya'o / gzhan dag na re glang po che phal ba dang spos kyi glang po che dang tshan po che chen po dang rab gnon dang yan lag mchog dang stobs mchog rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed pa ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi phyed yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tu vahutara tathā yujyate /<br/> spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs yin no zhes zer te / ji ltar ches che ba de ltar rung ngo / de ni reg bya'i skye mched do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva /<br/> upādāyarūpaṃ saptabhyo 'rthāntaramityapare /<br/> uktāni valāni /<br/> vaiśāradhyaṃ caturdhā tu /<br/> yathāsūtram /<br/> etāni punaścatvāri vaiśāradyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus kyi stobs de ni thams cad kyang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba chen po'i khyad par kho na yin par rig par bya'o / gzhan dag na re bdun las don gzhan du gyur pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin no zhes zer ro / stobs rnams bshad zin to / mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi / mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no / mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathādyadaśame bale /<br/> dvitīyasaptame caiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang bcu pa gnyis pa bdun pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar / kye mang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar kye mang zag pa zad par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang dag nyan thos rnam la bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /<br/> kathaṃ na jñānameva vaiśārdyam /<br/> nirbhayatā hi vaiśāradyam /<br/> ebhiśca nirbhayo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar das gang nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / ji ltar na mkhyen pa nyid mi 'jigs pa yin zhe na / mi 'jigs pa ni mi skrag pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñānakṛtaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ yujyate /<br/> na jñānameva /<br/> trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni parṣadbhedāt bhavanti yathāsūtram /<br/> tattvetat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gis kyang mi skrag par 'gyur ro / shes pas byas pa ni mi 'jigs par rung gi shes pa nyid ni ma yin no / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni 'khor gyi bye brag las gsum yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtiprajñātmakaṃ trayam /<br/> smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāvānyetāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no / de yang dran pa shes rab dag nyid gsum / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po 'di dag ni dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe nyan thos dag kyang gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa dang gnyi ga la kun du dga' ba'am / kun nas mnar sems mi 'byung ba na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādete āveṇikā buddhadharmā ucyante /<br/> savāsanaprahāṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir / 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya zhe na / bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na nyan thos rnams gang yin pa de la ni gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa dang gnyis po de dag la shin tu yang yid bde ba la sogs pa'i go skabs su mi 'gyur gyi / gzhan la ni de lta ma yin pas de kho na la de mi 'byung ba ya mtshan du rnam par gzhag gi gzhan la ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahākaruṇedānī vaktavyā /<br/> seyamucyate /<br/> mahākṛpā saṃvṛtidhīḥ /<br/> saṃvṛtijñānātmikā mahākaruṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni thugs rje chen po brjod par bya ste / de smras pa / thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo / thugs rje chen po ni kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā /<br/> karuṇāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na sems can thams cad la dmigs par yang mi 'grub la / snying rje bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa can du yang mi 'grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādiyaṃ mahākaruṇetyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ci'i phyir thugs rje chen po zhes bya zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃbhārākāragocaraiḥ /<br/> samatvādādhimāvyācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang / mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches che'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāreṇa mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamāt /<br/> ākāreṇa triduḥkhatākaraṇāt /<br/> ālambanena tridhātukālambanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshogs ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro / rnam pa ni sdug bsngal gsum la rtogs pa'i phyir ro / dmigs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samatyena sarvasattveṣu samavṛttitvāt /<br/> abhimātratvena sarvasttveṣu samavṛttitvāt /<br/> adhimātratvena tato 'dhimātratarābhāvāt /<br/> karuṇāmahākaruṇayoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam /<br/> nānākaraṇamaṣṭdhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mnyam pa nyid ni sems can thams cad la 'dra bar 'jug pa'i phyir ro /  / ches che ba nyid ni de bas cha ba med pa'i phyir ro / snying rje dang thugs rje chen po gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ni ci zhig yod ce na / tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhāvato 'dveṣāmohasvabhāvatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngo bo nyid las ni zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākārata ekatriduḥkhatākāratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal gcig dang gsum gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanata ekatridhātvālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa las ni khams gcig dang gsum gyi sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūmitaścaturdhyānacaturthadhyānabhūmikatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃtānataḥ śrāvakādibuddhasaṃtānajatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lābhataḥ kāmadhātubhavāgravairāgyalabhyatvāt /<br/> aparitrāṇaparitrāṇataḥ atulyakaruṇāyanācca /<br/> kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /<br/> netyāha /<br/> saṃbhāradharmakāyābhyāṃ jagataścārthacaryayā /<br/> samatā sarvabuddhānāṃ nāyurjātipramāṇataḥ /<br/> tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sāmyaṃ sarvabuddhānām /<br/> sarvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamataḥ dharmakāyapariniṣpattitaḥ arthacaryayā ca lokasya /<br/> āyurjātigotrapramāṇakṛtastu bhedo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thob pa las ni 'dod pa'i khams dang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa'i phyir ro / yongs su mi skyob pa dang yongs su skyob pa dang mi 'dra ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje mdzad pa'i phyir ro / ci sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyis mnyam ba yin nam zhe na / sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni / chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas / mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang / rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min / sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu gsum po sngon gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa dang 'jig rten gyi don spyod pas mnyam pa nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cirālpatarajīvanāt kṣatriyavrāhmaṇajātibhedāt kāśyapagautamādigotrabhedāt alpānalpapramāṇabhedācca yathakālamiti /<br/> etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca /<br/> tatra caturdhā hetusaṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sku tshe dang rigs dang gdung dang sku bong tshod du mdzad pa la ni bye brag yod de dus ji lta ba bzhin du yun shin tu ring ba dang thung ngur 'tsho ba'i phyir dang rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir dang 'od srungs dang sh'akya la sogs pa gdung tha dad pa'i phyir dang sku bong tshod chung ba dang chung ba ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro / phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na yid la byed pa mkhas pas ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dga' ba dang gus pa chen po skyed par nus te / 'di lta ste / rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o / de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārābhyāso dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarābhyāsaḥ satkṛtyābhyāsaśca /<br/> caturvidhā phalasaṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bzhi ste / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms pa dang yun ring po nas goms pa dang bar chad med par goms pa dang gus par byas te goms pa'o / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa ba ni ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñānasaṃpat prahāṇasaṃpat prabhāvasaṃpadrūpakayasaṃpacva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturvidhopakārasaṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apāyatrayasaṃsāraduḥkhātyantanirmokṣasaṃpat yānatrayasugati pratiṣṭhāpanasaṃpadvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gtan du thar bar mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o / yang na theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god par mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñānasaṃpat punaścaturvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anupadiṣṭajñānaṃ sarvatrajñāna sarvathājñānamayatnajñānaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ma 'bad par mkhyen pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturvidhā prahāṇasaṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang gtan du spangs pa dang bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib ba thams cad spangs pa'o / mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bāhyaviṣayanirmāṇapariṇāmanā dhiṣṭhānavaśityasaṃpat āyurutptargādhiṣṭhānavaśitvasaṃpat āvṛtākāśadūrakṣīpragamanālpavahutvapraveśana vaśitvasaṃpat vividhanijāścaryadharmasaṃpacca /<br/> caturvidhā rūpakāyasaṃpat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi'i yul sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang sku tshe gtong ba dang byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang sgrib pa dang nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang chung ngur mang po 'jug par mdzad pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang ya mtshan gyi chos nar ma rnam ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lakṣaṇasaṃpat anuvyañjanasaṃpat balasaṃpat vajrasārāsthisaṃpat /<br/> ityetatsāmāsikaṃ buddhānāṃ māhātmyam /<br/> anantaprabhedaṃ tu tadbhidyamānaṃ jāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang sku gdung rdo rje ltar sra ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa'o / de ltar na de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bsdus pa yin no / de dbyen ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ /<br/> evaṃ ca tāvadanantādbhūtaguṇajñānaprabhāvopakāramāharatnākarāstathāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na nas gal te sku tshe bskal pa grangs med pa du mar byin gyis brlabs par gyur na mtha' dag mkhyen pa dang brjod par spyod do / re zhig de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan dang ye shes dang mthu dang phan 'dogs pa mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba ni rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on kyang byis pa rang nyid yon tan dbul bas mos pa bcom pa rnams ni yon tan 'byor pa de lta bu de thos su zin kyang sangs rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par mi byed kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mkhas pa rnams ni rkang yan chad nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la mngon par rab tu dang bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gcig tu rab tu dang ba de dag ni dang ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par smin par ma nges pa'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan te lha dang mi'i legs pa nyams su myong nas bgrod par bya ba'i mchog mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva tathāgatā anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetramucyante /<br/> avandhyeṣṭhaporakṛṣṭāśusvantaphalatvāt /<br/> uktaṃ hi bhagavatā /<br/> ye 'nyānapi jine kārānkariṣyanti vināyake
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa zhes bya ste / 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang mchog tu gyur pa dang myur ba dang mtha' bzang ba'i phyir ro / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / gang dag rgyal ba rnam 'dren la / bya ba chung ngu byed 'gyur ba'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicitraṃ svargamāgamya te lapsyante 'mṛtaṃ padamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag mtho ris sna tshogs dag / bgrod nas bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime tāvadaṣṭādaśa buddhānāmāveṇikā dharmā ucyante /<br/> śiṣyasādhāraṇā anye dharmāḥ /<br/> śrāvakasādhāraṇāstvanye guṇā buddhānām /<br/> kecit pṛthagjanaiḥ /<br/> ke punasta iti yathāyogam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ces gsungs so / re zhig de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o / chos gzhan slob dang thun mong min / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong yin no / kha cig so so'i skye bo dang de dag kyang gang zhe na / ci rigs par / nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">araṇāpraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidguṇādayaḥ /<br/> araṇapraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidabhijñādhyānārupyāṃpramāṇavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so so yang dag rig sngon sogs / nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa dang tshad med pa dang rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ sarvathā 'pi raṇaṃ notpādayati /<br/> na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā /<br/> naiṣā pratipat kañcideva raṇayatītyaraṇā /<br/> sā punareṣā /<br/> saṃvṛtijñānamaraṇā /<br/> ayamasyā svabhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa la sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa las rab tu skye ba dang bdag nyid kyang yon gnas gyi [*kyi] khyad par yin par rig nas pha rol po dag de la dmigs nas / nyon mongs pa skye ba yongs su spangs par 'dod de / gang gis na pha rol po dag rnam pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa skye bar mi byed cing 'ga' yang de la dmigs nas 'dod chags sam / zhes sdang ngam / nga rgyal skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes pa skyed bar byed pa ste / lam de ni 'ga' yang nyon mongs pa skyed par mi byed pas na nyon mongs pa med pa yin no / nyon mongs pa med par de ni / kun rdzob shes / de'i rang bzhin ni 'di yin no

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan mtha' na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin te / lam sla ba rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro / mi gyo ba'i chos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānyasyārhataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti /<br/> nṛjā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni res 'ga' rang gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa mtha' dag yongs su spang bar mi nus so / mis skyed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manuṣyeṣvevotpadyate triṣu dvīpeṣu /<br/> anutpannakāmāptasavastukleśagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gling gsum du mi dag gi nang kho nar skyed par byed do / nyon mongs 'dod gtogs pa / ma skyed gzhir bcas spyod yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa ma 'ongs pa gzhi dang bcas pa rnams yin te / pha rol po dag nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar zhugs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt /<br/> yathā cāraṇoktā /<br/> tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa gzhi med pa rnams ni yongs su spang bar mi nus te / thams cad du 'gro ba rnams ne rang gis mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / nyon mongs pa med pa ji skad du bshad pa / smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no / de yang kun rdzob shes pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca /<br/> sarvālambaṃ tu tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan mtha' na yod pa dang / mi gyo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang mi'i rten can yin no / de'i dmigs pa thams cad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvadharmālambanaṃ tu praṇidhijñānamityeva viśeṣaḥ /<br/> ārupyāstu na sākṣāt prāṇidhijñānena jñāyante /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smon nas shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin bas 'di ni bye brag yin no / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re smon nas shes pa gzugs med pa rnams mngon sum du mi shes so / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niṣpannacaritaviśeṣāt /<br/> karṣakanidarśanaṃ cātreti vaibhāṣikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag las shes te / 'dir dpe ni zhing ba lta bu'o zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /<br/> idaṃ jānīyāmiti tadyathābhūtaṃ jānāti /<br/> sarvastatsamādhiviṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smon pa sngar btang ba'i shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste / 'di shes par bya'o snyam du smon nas rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzin de'i yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā /<br/> dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ /<br/> catasro hi pratisaṃvidaḥ /<br/> dharmapratisaṃvidarthapratisaṃvinniruktipratisaṃvitpratibhānapratisaṃvicca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin chos don des tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag rig / so so yang dag par rig pa ni bzhi ste / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tā api dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidastathaiva yathā 'raṇā /<br/> kimāsāṃ tathaiva akopyadharmamanuṣyāśrayatvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang nyon mongs pa med pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra'o / de dag gi de dang 'dra ba ci zhe na / mi gyo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang mi'i rten can nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ālambanabhūmisvabhāvaviśeṣastvāsāṃ pṛthagucyate

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tisro nāmathavāgjñānamavivartya yathākramam /<br/> nāmapadavyañjanakāyeṣvarthavācitā avivartyajñānaṃ dharmāthaṃniruktipratisaṃvido yathākramam

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthīyuktomuktābhilāpamārgavaśitvayoḥ /<br/> avivartyaṃ jñānamiti vartate /<br/> yuktamutābhilāpitāyāṃ samādhivaśisaṃprakyāne cāvivartyaṃ jñānaṃ pratibhānasaṃvit /<br/> vāṅmārgālambanā cāsau /<br/> vākca mārgaśca tasyāḥ ālmvanam /<br/> nava jñānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa rigs pa thags thogs med / mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid dang / thogs pa med par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni rigs pa dang thags thogs med par mngon par brjod pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang gsal bar bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no / de yi dmigs pa ngag dang lam / de'i dmigs pa ni ngag kyang yin la lam yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">navajñānasvabhāvā pratibhānapratisaṃvidanyatra nirodhajñānāt /<br/> sarvabhūḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes pa dgu'o / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin te / 'gog ba shes pa ma gtogs so / sa thams cad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt /<br/> daśa ṣaḍvā 'rthasaṃvit

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">arthapratibhānasaṃvit sarvadharmāśccedarthā daśa jñānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gal te don chos thams cad yin na ni shes pa bcu yin no

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan chos dang nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te / ming gi tshogs la sogs pa dang ngag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāci prathamakāmayoḥ

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ngag dang nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni don gcig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niruktipratisaṃvitkāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmikā ūrdhvaṃ vitarkābhāvāt /<br/> prajñaptau tu pratisaṃvidāmeva nirdeśaḥ /<br/> padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ /<br/> nirvacanaṃ niruktiḥ /<br/> yathā rupyate tasmādrūpamityevamādi /<br/> uttarottarapratibhā pratibhānamityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'dad pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag yin te / yang chad na rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro / btags pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'di skad du tshig dang yi ge dang de nyid kyi don dang de nyid kyi gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang pho dang mo la sogs pa'i tshig bla dags dang de la thags thogs med par bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa ni chos so so yang dag par rigs pa la sogs pa yin no zhes ston te / de nyid kyis 'di dag gi go rims grub pa yin no / tshig nges pa ni nges pa'i tshig ste / dper na gzugs su rung bas ni de'i phyir / gzugs zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no / gzhan dag na re lan dang lan la spobs pas na spobs pa yin no zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpyeteṣvakṛtakauśalastā utpādayituṃ śaknotīti /<br/> buddhavacanameva tu sarvāsāṃ prayogaṃ varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag la mkhas par ma byas bar de dag skyed par mi nus so zhes grag go / thams cad kyi sbyor ba sangs rgyas kyi bka' kho na yin no zhes brjod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti /<br/> vikalābhirna tallābhī /<br/> nahi vikalābhistābhiḥ pratisaṃvillābhī bhavati /<br/> ye caita upadiṣṭā araṇādayo guṇāḥ /<br/> ṣaḍete prāṇtakoṭikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang la gcig yod pa de la gdon mi za bar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi char yod do / ma tshang bar ni de thob med / de dag ma tshang bar ni so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob pa ma yin no / nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa gang dag yin pa / drug po de dag rab mtha' bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāntakoṭikadhyānavalenaiṣāṃ lābhaḥ /<br/> tatṣaḍivadhaṃ

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadeva prantakoṭikam /<br/> niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā /<br/> kiṃ punaridaṃ prāntakoṭikaṃ nāma /<br/> dhyānamantyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam /<br/> sarvabhūmyanulomitam /<br/> vṛddhikāṣṭāgataṃ tacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni de'i stobs kyis 'thob pa yin gyi de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa ba ni ma yin no / rab kyi mtha' pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhe na / bsam gtan mtha' / bsam gtan bzhi pa yin no / de ni sa kun gyis mthun pas / 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar nas thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāccittātprathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato dvitīyamevaṃ krameṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las ni bsam gtan gnyis pa ste / de bzhin du rim gyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi mthun pa ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyi bar la'o / de la yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du mthun pa yin te / de ltar na sa thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin no

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bsgoms pa chung ngu las 'bring / 'bring las chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa ste / 'phel ba'i mchog ni 'phel ba'i rab yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idamīdṛśaṃ prāntakoṭikaṃ pragatā 'nta koṭirasyeti kṛtvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan 'di lta bu 'di ni rab kyi mtha' pa yin te / 'di la mthar rab tu phyin pa yod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">koṭiḥ punaratra vṛddhiḥ prakāro vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir mtha' ni 'phel ba 'am rnam pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catuṣkoṭikavat /<br/> ete punaḥ buddhatuṇāḥ /<br/> buddhānyasya prayogajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu bzhi pa bzhin no / yon tan drug po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas las gzhan sbyor las skyes
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhādanyasya prāyogikā na vairāgyalābhikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas las gzhan pa ni sbyor ba las byung ba yin gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhasya nāsti kiñcit prāyogikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas kyi ni sbyor ba las byung ba cung zad kyang med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya sarvadharmeśvaratvādicchāmātra pratibadhaḥ sarvaguṇasaṃpatsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags can gyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir / de'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa ni bzhed pa tsam la rag las pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ime tāvacchrādakasādhāraṇaguṇā abhijñādayaḥ pṛthagjanairapi /<br/> keyamabhijñā nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig de dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong pa'i yon tan dag yin no / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa ni so so'i skye bo dag dang yang thun mong yin no / mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhhiśrotramanaḥpūrvajanmacyutyudayakṣaye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul rna ba yid dang ni / sngon tshe 'chi 'pho skye ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jñātasākṣīkriyā 'bhijñā ṣaḍvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad shes mngon du bya ba yi / mngon shes rnam pa drug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhiviṣaye jñānasākṣātkriyā abhijñā /<br/> divyaśrotracetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsānusmṛticyutyutpapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā abhijñāḥ /<br/> etāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes dang lha'i rna ba dang sems kyi rnam grangs dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ste / de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsāṃ pañca pṛthagjanaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ /<br/> sarvāstvetāḥ /<br/> muktimārgadhīḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las lnga ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ba yin no / de dag thams cad ni / rnam grol blo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vimuktimārgaprajñāsvabhāvāḥ /<br/> śrāmaṇyaphalavat /<br/> catasraḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhin du / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no / bzhi ni kun rdzob shes pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetaḥparyāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñe hitvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetasi jñānapañcakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems la shes pa lnga yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetaḥparyāyābhijñā pañca dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtiparacittajñānāni /<br/> kṣayābhijñā balaṃ yadvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni lnga yin te / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam dang kun rdzob dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so / zag pa mngon shes stobs bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathāsravakṣayajñānavalamuktaṃ tathā veditavyā /<br/> ṣaḍ daśa jñānānīti /<br/> sarvabhūmikā 'pyeṣā tathaiva jñātvyā /<br/> śeṣāstu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du shes pa drug gam bcu yin bde yang rig par bya la / de bzhin du 'di ni sa thams cad pa yin par yang shes par bya'o / lhag ma
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca dhyānacatuṣṭaye /<br/> pañcābhijñāḥ caturthadhyānabhūmikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi dag na / mngon par shes pa lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmādārupyabhūmikā na santi /<br/> tisrastāvanna santi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa dag med ce na / re zhig gsum ni med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetaḥparyāyābhhijñāpi nāsti rūpatīrthābhiniṣpādyatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa yang med de gzugs la stegs bcas nas mngon par bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvanivāsasmṛtirapyanupūrvāvasthāntaramaraṇābhiniṣpatteḥ /<br/> sthānagotrādyālambanatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa yang med de mthar gyis sngon gyi gnas gzhan rjes su dran pas mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir dang gnas dang rus la sogs pa la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittaṃ hi jñātukāma ātmanaḥ kāyacittayornimittamudgṛhlāti /<br/> kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan gyi sems shes par 'dod pa ni bdag gi lus 'di 'dra ba zhig las sems ni 'di 'dra ba zhig yin no zhes lus dang sems kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du pha rol bo dag la yang gtod de / sems shes pa las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhiniṣpannāyāmabhijñāyāṃ rūpanirapekṣo jānāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par shes pa mngon par grub na ni gzugs la mi ltos par mngon par shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti /<br/> yāvatsaṃdhicittam /<br/> tato 'ntarābhavasyaikakṣaṇaṃ maraṇe 'pi niṣpanno bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gags ma thag pa'i mtshan ma bzung nas de'i lugs las bzlog ste / mtshams sbyor ba'i sems kyi bar du de ma thag pa'i gnas skabs gzhan rnams yin la byed do / de nas srid pa bar ma'i skad cig ma gcig dran na yang grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ parasyāpi smarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang dran no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhiniṣpannāyāṃ vilaṅghyāpi smaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par grub nas ni thod rgal du yang dran no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anubhūtapūrvasyaiva smaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon nyams su myong ba kho na dran no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuddhāvāsānāṃ katham smaraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas gtsang ma rnams ji ltar dran zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śravaṇenānubhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thos pas nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyacyutasyehopapannasya parasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānenotpādanam /<br/> anyeṣāṃ svasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa na pha rol pa'i rgyud la brten nas skyed de /  / gzhan dag ni rang gi rgyud la brten nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhyādīnāṃ tu laghatvaśabdālokamanasikaraṇaṃ prayogaḥ /<br/> tāḥ punaretāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ /<br/> svādhobhūviṣayāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni yang ba dang sgra dang snang ba yid la byed pa yin no / mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag ni / rang dang 'og sa'i yul can yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati /<br/> nirmiṇoti vā adharāṃ noktarām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang yin pa des sa de 'am 'og mar 'gro ba'am sprul par byed kyi gong du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pas kyang rang gi sa kho na'am sa 'og ma ba'i sgra thos kyi sa gong ma ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetaḥ paryāyābhijñayā nordhvabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ jānāti /<br/> pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyā na smarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pas kyang sa gong ma pa'i sems ni mi shes so / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas kyang mi dran no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cyutopapādābhijñayā na paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mngon par shes pas kyang mi mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt /<br/> kathametā labhyante /<br/> atucittāḥ prayogataḥ /<br/> labhyā ucitāstu virāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa'i sems ni sa gong ma pa yin pa'i phyir / sems kyi rnam grangs dang sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa gnyis kyis mi 'dzin to / 'di dag ji ltar 'thob ce na / ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sbyor bas / thob bya 'dris pa chags bral bas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ /<br/> sarvāsāṃ tu prayogeṇotpādanam /<br/> tṛtīyā trīpyupasthānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par shes pa tshe rabs gzhan na goms pa rnams ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob bo / bye brag can rnams ni sbyor bas so / thams cad kyang sbyong bas bskyed pa yin no / gsum pa dran pa nyer gzhag gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetaḥparyāyābhijñā trīṇi vedanācittadharmasmṛtyupasthānāni /<br/> cittacaittālamlbanatvāt
