</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir / tshor ba dang sems dang chos dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi rang bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādyaṃ śrotrardvivakṣuṣi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po rdzu 'phrul rna ba mig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhijñeti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhidivyaśrotradivyacakṣurabhijñā ādyaṃ smṛtyupasthānamityarthaḥ /<br/> rūpālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po yin te / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhiścaturbāhyāyatanālambanā 'nyatra śabdāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul gyi dmigs pa ni phyi'i skye mched bzhi yin te / sgra ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divyaśrotracakṣurabhijñe śabdarūpāyatanālambane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i rna ba dang mig gi mngon par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni sgra dang gzugs kyi skye mched yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tarhi cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ ityevamādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ji ltar na / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pas 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par shes she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tattena jānāti /<br/> abhijñāparivārajñānaṃ tu tadanyadāryāṇāmutpadyate yenaivaṃ jānanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni des mi shes kyi 'phags pa rnams la de las gzhan pa gang gis na de lta bur shes par 'gyur ba mngon par shes pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'i shes pa skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anirdhāraṇāccheṣe catuḥsmṛtyupasthānasvabhāve iti siddham /<br/> avyākṛte śrotracakṣurabhijñe itarāḥ śubhāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes ni / lung du ma bstan lhag rnams dge
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divyacakṣuḥśrotrābhijñe avyākṛte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i mig dang rna ba'i mngon par shes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te punaścakṣuḥśrotravijñānasaṃprayuktaprajñe /<br/> kathaṃ tarhi te caturdhyānabhūmike sidhyataḥ /<br/> āśrayavaśena tadbhūminirdeśāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba'i shes rab yin no / 'o na de dag ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi'i sa par grub ce na / rten gyi dbang gis de'i sa bstan pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadāśraye hi cakṣuḥśrotre caturdhyānabhūmike /<br/> ānantaryamārgavaśena vā /<br/> anyāścatasraḥ kuśalāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rten mig dang rna ba ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no / yang na bar chad med pa'i lam gyi dbang gis so / gzhan bzhi ni dge ba dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi prakaraṇeṣūktam abhijñā katamā /<br/> kuśalā prajñeti /<br/> pradhānika eṣa nirdeśo vāhuliko vā /<br/> āsāṃ cābhijñānāṃ /<br/> tisro vidyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na rab tu byed pa las mngon par shes pa gang zhe na / shes pa dge ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na / de ni gtso bo'am phal che ba bstan pa yin no / mngon par shes pa 'di rnams las / gsum ni rig pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvanivāsacyutyupapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāstisraḥ aśaikṣyo vidyā ucyante /<br/> kasmādetā eva nānyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi gnas dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba rnams ni mi slob pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya'o / ci'i phyir de dag kho na yin gyi gzhan dag ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avidyāyāḥ pūrvāntādau nivarttanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon mtha' sogs / ma rig pa ni bzlog phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etā hi pūrvāparāntamadhyasaṃmohaṃ vyāvartayanti yathākramam /<br/> āsāṃ paramārthena /<br/> aśaikṣyantyā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gis ni go rims bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar la kun du rmongs pa bzlog par byed do / de dag las kyang don dam par / mi slob tha ma
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyaivāśaikṣī vidyā /<br/> tadāsye dve tatsaṃtānasudbhavāt /<br/> anye dve aśaikṣyasaṃtānasaṃbhūtatvādaśaikṣyāvucyete /<br/> naiva tu te śaikṣyo nāśaikṣyau /<br/> kiṃ punarete abhijñe śaikṣyasya nocyete /<br/> yataḥ śaikṣyau vidye nocyete /<br/> iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba kho na mi slob pa'i rig pa yin no / gnyis ni de'i / rgyud las skyes phyir de zhes bya / gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i rgyud las skyes pa'i phyir mi slob pa zhes bya'i de gnyis ni slob pa yang ma yin la mi slob pa yang ma yin no / mngon par shes pa 'di dag slob ba'i yin par mi 'dod dam zhe na gang gi phyir slob pa'i rig pa dag ces mi bya zhe na / slob la 'dod de ma rig dang / bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi sāvidyasaṃtāne vidyāvyavasthānaṃ yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud ma rig pa dang bcas bzhin du rig pa rnam par gzhag tu ni mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punarapyavidyābhibhavāt /<br/> āsāṃ cābhijñānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ma rig pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro / mngon par shes pa 'di dag las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po gsum pa drug pa ni / cho 'phrul rnams yin rdzu 'phrul dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṛddhicetaḥparyāyāsravakṣayābhijñāstrīṇi prātihāryāṇi yathākramam ṛddhacyādeśanānuśāsanaprātihāryāṇi /<br/> vineyamanasāmādito 'tyartha haraṇāt prātihāryāṇi prātiśabdayorādikarmabṛśārthatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du cho 'phrul gsum yin te / rdzu 'phrul dang kun rdzob pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams yin no / dang po nyid du gdul bya'i yid shen tu 'phrog par byed pa'i phyir cho 'phrul dag yin pa 'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pratihatamadhyasthānāṃ manāṃsyebhiḥ pratiharantīti prātihāryāṇi vā /<br/> eṣāṃ punaḥ /<br/> śāsanam /<br/> agcryam /<br/> anuśāsanaṃ pratihāryamagcya m /<br/> avyabhicāritvāddhiteṣṭaphalayojanāt /<br/> ṛddhacyādeśane hi vidyayā vikeiyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gis zhe 'gras pa dang bar mar gnas pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog par byed pas na cho 'phrul dag yin no / 'di dag gi nang na / bstan pa mchog / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni / mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang / yid 'ong 'bras la sbyor byed phyir / mchog yin no / rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa dag ni rig sngags kyis kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti /<br/> na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byed de / ghan dha ri zhes bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang yod mod kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bstan pa ni gzhan gyis bya bar mi nus pas mi 'khrul pa'i phyir 'di ni gtso bo yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate /<br/> keyamṛddhiḥ /<br/> vaibhāṣikanyāyena /<br/> ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ /<br/> ṛdhyatyaneneti kṛtvā yojayitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyis ni gtod pa tsam du zad kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni thabs nye bar bstan pa'i sgro nas phan pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor bas 'di nyid mchog yin no / rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis ni / rdzu 'phrul ting nge 'dzin / 'dis 'byor par byed pas na zhes bya bar sbyar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tena samṛdhyati /<br/> gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des ci zhig yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur zhe na / de las ni / sprul dang 'gro ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatastatra /<br/> gatistridhā /<br/> śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ /<br/> śāsturmanojavā /<br/> manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'gro ba ni rnam pa gsum ste / lus kyis phyin byed dang mos pa las byung ba dang yid mgyogs pa'o / ston pa la / yid mgyogs 'gro ba dang yid bzhin du mgyogs pas ni yid mgyogs kyi 'gro ba ste / de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sudūramapi deśaṃ cittotpādakālelna gamanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yul thag shin tu ring por yang thugs bskyed pa'i dus kyi byon pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya ityuktaṃ bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">itare tu gatī buddhasyānuktasiddhe /<br/> anyeṣāṃ vāhinyapyādhimokṣikī
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma bshad kyang sangs rgyas la mnga' bar grub po / gzhan dag la / phyin byed mos pa las byung yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śarīravāhinī ca gatiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni lus phyin byed kyi 'gro ba yang yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pakṣivatkrameṇa śarīravāhanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bya bzhin du rim gyis lus phyin par byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādhimokṣikī ca dūrasyāsannādhimokṣeṇāśugamanāt /<br/> nirmāṇaṃ punardvividham /<br/> kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca /<br/> tatra tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mos pa las byung ba yang yod de / thag ring po la nye bar mos nas myur du 'gro ba'i phyir ro / sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'o / de la re zhig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāptaṃ nirmitaṃ bāhyaṃ caturāyatanaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni / phyi'i skye mched bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvam /<br/> tat punar /<br/> dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svaparaśarīrasaṃbaddham /<br/> rūpāptaṃ dve tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang rnam gnyis / bdag dang gzhan gyi lus dang sprul pa'o / gzugs gtogs gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacaranirmāṇaṃ dve rūpaspraṣṭavyāyatane /<br/> tatra gandharasābhāvāt /<br/> tadapi dvividhaṃ tathaiva /<br/> kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātauityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni / de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched gnyis yin no / de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gnyis yin te / 'di ni sprul pa rnam pa bzhi yin no / gzugs kyi khams na yang de dang 'dra bas mdor bsdu na sprul pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati /<br/> vastrābharaṇavanna samanvāgamaḥ /<br/> dvacyāyātanaṃ nirmiṇotītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa sprul pa na ji ltar na dri dang ro dag dang mi ldan pa yang yin zhe na / gos dang rgyan bzhin du mi ldan no / gzhan dag na re skye mched gnyis sprul par byed do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ khalvabhijñayaiva nirmāṇaṃ nirmīyate /<br/> netyucyate /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> abhijñāphalaiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci mngon par shes pa kho nas sprul pa sprul par byed dam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirmāṇacittaistāni caturdaśa /<br/> tāni punaścaturdaśa nirmāṇacittāni /<br/> yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprul sems dag gis de dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o / sprul pa'i sems bcu bzhi po de dag ni / bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar rim bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamadhyānaphalaṃ dve kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmike nirmāṇacitte
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po'i 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni gnyis te / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ trīṇi kāmadhātuprathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikāni /<br/> evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa'i 'bras bu ni gsum ste / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa dag go / da bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa dag kyang bzhi dang lngar spyor bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikādharabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ veditavyam /<br/> nordhvajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni rang gis pa dang sa 'og ma yin par rig par bya'o / gong ma las skyes min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nordhvabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittamadharadhyānaphalamasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bus gong ma'i sprul pa'i sems ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyādidhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikādgatito viśiṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa de'i 'bras bu las 'gros kyi sgo nas khyad par du 'phags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tallabho dhyānavat /<br/> teṣāṃ ca nirmāṇacittānāṃ dhyānavallābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de rnyed bsam gtan bzhin / sprul pa'i sems de dag rnyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ki khalu nirmāṇacittādeva syāt vyutthānam /<br/> nāstyetat /<br/> yasmādutpadyate /<br/> śuddhāttatsvataśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci sprul pa'i sems kho na las ldang bar 'gyur ram zhe na / de lta bu ni med de / 'di ltar / de ni / dag dang rang las skye bar 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuddhakāddhacyānādantaraṃ nirmāṇacittamutpadyate nirmāṇacittadvā nānyataḥ /<br/> tato 'pi te
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprul pa'i sems ni bsam gtan dag pa pa'am sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin no / de las gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sprul pa'i sems las kyang bsam gtan dag pa pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste / gzhan du ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti /<br/> sarvasya ca nirmitasya /<br/> svabhūmikena nirmāṇaṃ /<br/> nānyabhūmikena nirmāṇacittenānyabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ni yang ting nge 'dzin la ma zhugs par ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba med do / sprul pa thams cad kyang / rang gi sa pas sprul par byed / sa gzhan pa'i sprul pa'i sems kyis sa gzhan pa'i sprul par ni mi byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāṣaṇaṃ tvadhareṇa ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smrar 'jug pa ni 'og mas kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikena ceti caśabdaḥ /<br/> kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate /<br/> ūrdhvabhūmikastu prathamadhyānabhūmikena /<br/> ūrdhvaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakābhāvāt /<br/> vahūnāṃ nirmitānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi sa pas kyang smrar 'jug go zhes bya ba yin te / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i sprul pa ni rang gis pa'i sems kho nas smrar 'jug go / sa gong ma pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ste / yan chad na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa med pa'i phyir ro / sprul pa mang po rnams smra ba ni ston min sprul pa dang bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirmātraiva sahāśāstuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas las gzhan pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa dang bcas te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhādanyasya nirmāṇaṃ nirmātrā saha bhāṣate /<br/> yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante /<br/> ekasya bhāṣamāṇasya bhāṣante saha nirmitāḥ /<br/> ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta iti gāthā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smra bas gang gi tshe sprul pa mang po zhig yin pa de'i tshe cig car smra ste / gcig cig smra bar byed pa na / sprul pa thams cad smra bar byed / gcig mi smra bar gyur pa dang / de dag thams cad smrar mi 'gyur / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni snga phyi ji ltar bzhed par smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti /<br/> adhiṣṭhāyānyavarttanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe smrar 'jug pa'i sems yod pa de'i tshe sprul pa'i sems med pa'i phyir sprul pa med na ji ltar smrar 'jug ce na / byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirmāṇamadhiṣṭhāyāvasthānakāmatayā 'nyena manasā vācaṃ pravartayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas par 'dod pas sprul pa byin gyis brlabs nas yid gzhan rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pas ngag 'jug par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ jīvita evādhiṣṭhānamanuvartate atha mṛtaścāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci gson po kho na la byin gyi rlabs yod dam / 'on te shi ba la yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mṛtasyāpyastyadhiṣṭhānaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shi ba la yang byin gyi rlabs yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryamahākaśyapādhiṣṭhānena tadasthisaṃkalāvasthānāt /<br/> tattu /<br/> nāsthirasya /<br/> asthirasya tu bhāvasya nāstyadhiṣṭhānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa'i phyir ro / de yang mi brtan la med / mi brtan pa'i dngos po la ni byin gyi rlabs med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryakāśyapena māṃsādīnāmadhhiṣṭhānāt /<br/> apare tu na /<br/> apare punarāhurnāsti mṛtasyādhiṣṭhānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos sha la sogs pa byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag min gzhan dag na re / shi ba la byin gyi rlabs med kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asthiśaṅkalāvasthānaṃ tu devatānubhāvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa ni lha'i mthus so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimekena cittenaikameva nirmita nirmiṇoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci sems gcig gis sprul pa gcig kho na sprul bar byed dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādāvekamanekena jitāyāṃ tu viparyayāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang por du mas gcig yin te / bya bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādita ekaṃ nirmitamanekena nirmāṇacittena nirmiṇoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po nyid du ni sprul pa'i sems du mas sprul pa gcig sprul par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon par shes pa byang nas ni sems gcig gis sprul pa po ji snyed dod pa du ma sprul par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kiṃ sarvanirmāṇacittamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati /<br/> avyākṛtaṃ bhāvanājaṃ /<br/> yadbhāvanāphalaṃ tadavaśyamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati /<br/> trividhaṃ tūpapatījam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang sprul pa'i sems thams cad lung du ma bstan pa yin nam zhe na / bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni nges par lung du ma bstan pa yin no / skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha dang klu dang sha za la sogs pa'i skye bas thob pa'i sprul pa'i sems ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatkṛtaṃ ca svaparaśarīranirmāṇaṃ navāyatanikaṃ bhavatyaśabdarupyāyatanatvādindriyāvinirbhūtatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis byas pa'i sprul ba rang dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel ba ni sgra med pa'i gzugs can gyi skye mched yin pa'i phyir / skye mched dug pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tvindriyaṃ nirmīyate /<br/> kimeṣaiva dvividharddhibhāvanāmayī copapattilābhikā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro / dbang po ni sprul par mi byed do / ci bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skye bas thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣā ca dvividhā /<br/> ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gnyis pa de dang gsang sngags sman dag dang las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāstaḥ pañcavidhāmṛddhhiṃ varṇayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzu 'phrul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga'o zhes brjod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvanāphalamupapattilābhikaṃ mantrajāmauṣadhajāṃ karmajāṃ ca /<br/> yathā māndhāturantarābhavikānāṃ ca /<br/> yadidaṃ divyaśrotramuktaṃ cakṣuśca /<br/> kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang gsang sngags las skyes pa dang sman las skyes pa dang las las skyes pa ste / dper na nga las nu dang srid pa bar ma pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / lha'i rna ba dang mig tu bshad pa gang yin pa de dag ci lha'i kho na yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā bodhisattvacakravartigṛhapatiratnānām /<br/> divyaśrotrākṣiṇī /<br/> yasmātte /<br/> rūpaprasādau dhyānabhūmikau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang khyim bdag rin po che rnams kyi lta bur lha'i dang 'dra bas lha'i yin zhe na / lha yi mig dang rna ba yin / 'di ltar de gnyis ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānasamāpannasya śabdālokābhogaprayogeṇa dhyānabhūmikāni bhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādau nirvartete cakṣuḥśrotrasāmantake rūpaśabdyordarśanaśravaṇahetū iti dhyānabhūmikatvāt divye eva te cakṣuḥśrotre /<br/> te ca punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba / bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mig dang rna ba'i thod kor du sgra dang snang ba la gtod pa'i sbyor bas bsam gtan gyis pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang sgra dag mthong ba dang thos pa'i rgyu mngon par 'grub pas bsam gtan gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang rna ba de dag ni lha'i kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgāvikale nityaṃ dūrasūkṣmādigocare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis kyang rtag tu brten bcas ma tshang med / thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i mig dang rna ba ni rtag tu rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa med do / zhar ba dang 'on pa med pa'i phyir ma tshang ba yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpāvacarasattvavat /<br/> dūrasūkṣmavatānyapi rūpāṇi śabdhāśca tayiorviṣyaḥ /<br/> āha cātra /<br/> dūrasthamāvṛtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvataśca na paśyati /<br/> māṃsacakṣuryato rūpamato divyaṃ dṛgiṣyate /<br/> kiyaddūraṃ punardivyena cakṣuṣā paśyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can bzhin no / de gnyis kyi yul ni gzugs dang sgra thag ring ba dang phra ba dang bsgribs pa dag kyang yin no / 'dir smras pa / gang phyir sha yi mig gis gzugs / thag ring gnas dang bsgribs pa dang / phra rgyas thams cad mi mthong ba / de phyir lha yis mthong bar 'dod / lha'i mig gis thag ji srid cig mthong zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasya yādṛśaṃ cakṣurbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi mig ji lta bu yin ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śrāvakapratyekabuddhabuddhāstvanabhhisaṃskāreṇa sāhasradvisāhasratrisāhasrakān lokadhātūn yathāsaṃkhyaṃ paśyanti /<br/> abhisaṃskāreṇa tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par stong dang stong gnyis pa dang stong gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo / mngon par 'du byed pas ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitrisāhasrakāsaṃkhyadṛśo 'rhatkhaṅgavaiśikāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis / stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /<br/> trisāhasraṃ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyan thos chen pos kyang mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis lha'i mig gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo / bse ru lta bus ni stong gsum pa mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhastu bhagavānasaṃkhyeyān lokahātūn paśyati yāvadevecchati /<br/> kimṛddhirevopapattilābhikā bhavatyarhānyadapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ji tsam bzhed par 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gzigs so / ci rdzu 'phrul kho na skye bas 'thob pa yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyadapyupapattyāptaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gzhan yang yin zhe na / gzhan yang skye bas kyang 'thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divyaśrotrādikamapi catuṣṭayamupapattipratilabhyamasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lha'i rna ba la sogs pa bzhi yang skye bas 'thob bar bya ba yod mod kyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tūpapattyāptaṃ kiñcidabhijñākhyāṃ labhate /<br/> yattūpapattipratilambhikaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ /<br/> taddṛśyo nāntarībhavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye bas thob pa ni cung zad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ming mi 'thob bo / skye bas 'thob pa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa / des ni / srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhijñācakṣuṣaiva hyantarābhavo dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma ni mngon par shes pa'i mig kho nas mthong gi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nopapattipratilabdhena
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye bas thob pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems shes de ni rnam pa gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattyāptamiti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye bas 'thob pa zhes bya bar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paracittajñānaṃ tūpapattipratilabdhaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam /<br/> tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa skye bas 'thob pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin par rig par bya'o / gang rtogs dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang mtshan ma pa rnams kyis pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang rtog ge ba dang gang yang rig sngags kyis byas pa de yang rnam pa gsum yin bar rig par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na yathā bhāvanāphalaṃ kuśalameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dge ba kho na yin pa lta bu ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattipratilambhikābhyāṃ tu paracittajñānapūrvanivāsānusmṛtibhyāṃ /<br/> jānate nārakā ādau /<br/> yāvanna duḥkhavedanābhyāhatā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa skye bas thob pa dag gis ni dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes / ji srid du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas ma nyen pa de srid du shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyagatisthā nityaṃ jānate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gro ba gzhan na gnas pas ni rtag tu shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nṛṇāṃ notpattilābhikam /<br/> mānuṣyāṇāmetadyathoktamṛddhacyādikaṃ nāstyupapattiprātilambhikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi la skye bas thob pa med / mi rnams la ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa de skye bas thob pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi prakṛtijātismarā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karmaviśeṣajā 'sau teṣām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi de ni las kyi khyad par las skyes pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trividhā hi pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirbhāvanāphalamupapattilabdhā karmajā ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang las las skyes pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthaviraśrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyam /<br/> aṣṭamaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> oṃ namo buddhāya /<br/> jñānādhikāreṇa jñānamayānāṃ guṇānāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ /<br/> asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt /<br/> dvidhā dhyānāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa'o / shes pa'i skabs kyis shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan rnams ni bshad zin to / rang bzhin gzhan rnams brjod par bya ste / de lta bas na yon tan thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir dang po kho nar bsam gtan rnams brtsams te / bsam gtan dag ni rnam pa gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāsato dvividhāni dhyānānyupapattisamāpattidhyānabhedāt /<br/> tāni punaḥ /<br/> catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan rnams ni mdor bsdu na skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so / de dag kyang bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvaccaturtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po nas bzhi pa'i bar ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dhyānopapattayaḥ punarna vaktavyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la bsam gtan du skye ba rnams ni yang mi brjod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lokanirdeśakośasthāne hi /<br/> proktāstadupapattayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas su / der skye ba dag rab tu bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ proktāḥ /<br/> pṛthak pṛthak
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du bshad ce na / der so so'i
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānaṃ tribhūmikaṃ tatra caturtha tvaṣṭabhūmikamiti /<br/> samāpattidhyānaṃ tu vaktavyam /<br/> ata ucyate /<br/> samāpattiḥ śubhaikāgyraṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin / bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin / zhes bya ba yin no / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan brjod par bya ste / de'i phyir smras pa / snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhedena kuśalacittaikāgratā dhyānam /<br/> samādhisvabhāvatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa ni bsam gtan yin te / ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañcaskandhāstu sānugam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saparivāraṃ tu pañcaskandhasvabhāvaṃ veditavyam /<br/> keyamekāgratā nāma /<br/> ekālambanatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o / rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / dmigs pa gcig pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni 'o na sems dmigs pa gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin gyi chos gzhan sems las byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cittānyeva samādhiḥ /<br/> yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems rnams kho na ting nge 'dzin ma yin gyi gang gis de dag rtse gcig par byed pa'i chos de ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid rtse gcig pa nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saiva cittaikāgratā /<br/> nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa ma yin nam / gal te gnyis pa de las rnam par mi gyeng ba yin no zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃprayukte samādhivaiyarthyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtshungs par ldan pa la ting nge 'dzin don med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang kho na las ting nge 'dzin yin pa de kho na las sems rnams kyi dmigs pa gcig pa nyid du yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahābhūmikatvācca samādheḥ sarvacittānāmekāgratāprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur ro / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na durbalatvātsamādheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin stobs chung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittānyevaikāgrāṇi samādhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re sems rtse gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar mdo las / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo ni bsam gtan bzhi yin no zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānamiti ko'rthaḥ /<br/> dhyāyantyaneneti /<br/> prajānantītyarthaḥ /<br/> samāhitacittasya yathābhūtaprajñānāt /<br/> cintanārtho hyeṣa dhātuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / 'dis sems par byed pas na bsam gtan te / sems mnyam par bzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa'i phyir rab tu shes par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / skad kyi byings 'di ni sems pa'i don yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cintanaṃ ca prajñeti siddhāntaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems pa yang shes rab yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi sarvasamādhidhyānaprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni 'o na ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsam gtan du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prakarṣayukte tannāmavidhānādbhāskaravat /<br/> kaśca prakarṣayuktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phul du phyin pa dang ldan ba la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir nyi ma bzhin no / phul du phyin pa dang ldan pa yang gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'ṅgasamāyuktaḥ samādhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gang yan lag dang ldan pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi /<br/> sutarāṃ tena dhyāyanti /<br/> kliṣṭasya kathaṃ dhyānatvam /<br/> mithyopanidhyānāt /<br/> atiprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> na /<br/> uktāni cākuśalāni dhyānānyapi bhagavatā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang lam sla ba zhes gsungs pas de ni shin tu yang sems par byed do / nyon mongs pa can ji ltar bsam gtan yin zhe na / log par nges pa sems pa'i phyir ro / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te / de dang mthun pa kho na la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir te / sa bon rul pa bzhin no / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham /<br/> prathamaṃ tāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni ji lta bu / bzhi pa'i bar ni ji lta bu zhe na / re zhig dang po ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicāraprītisukhavat /<br/> vicāraprītisukhasaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ tat prathamaṃ dhyānam /<br/> vicāravacanādvitarko 'pyukto bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan / dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no / dpyod pa smos pas rtog pa yang bshad pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāhacaryāddhūmāgnivat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir du ba dang me bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi prītisukhavānvicāro vinā vitarkeṇāsti /<br/> śeṣaṃ punrdhyānatrayaṃ /<br/> pūrvapūrvāṅgavarjitam /<br/> śubhaikāgryam iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa med par ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med do / bsam gtan lhag ma gsum ni / yan lag lnga lnga spangs pa yin / dge ba rtse gcig pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / bsam gtan gnyis pa ni dpyod pa spangs la / dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti /<br/> yathā dhyānāni /<br/> tathārūpyāḥ /<br/> kena prakāreṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba spangs la bde ba dang ldan pa yin no / bzhi pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba spangs pa yin no / bsam gtan rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ete 'pi hi dvidhā upapattisamāpattitaḥ /<br/> catvāraśca eṣāmapi copapattaya uktāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa gang gis she na / de dag kyang skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis kyang yin la bzhi yang yin no / de dag gi yang skye ba rnams ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattyārupyāsvabhedena kuśalaikāgratāsvabhāvā ityanena prakāreṇa saparivārāḥ /<br/> catuskandhāḥ /<br/> anuparivartirūpābhāvāt /<br/> adhobhūmivivekajāḥ /<br/> caturthadhyānavivekajaṃ hyākāśānantyāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs med pa rnams ni bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pa des bshad zin to / 'khor dang bcas na ni / phung po bzhi rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro / 'og ma'i sa dben las skyes pa / bsam gtan bzhi pa las dben pa las skyes pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvivekajaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las dben ba las skyes pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvivekajamākiñcanyāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las dben ba las skyes pa ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvivekajaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsamjñāyatanamityevaṃ catvāra ārupyāḥ /<br/> ko 'yaṃ viveko nāma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las dben pa las skyes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched yin te / de ltar na gzugs med pa bzhi yin no / dben pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yena mārgeṇādhastādvimucyate /<br/> vairāgyagamanāt /<br/> ta eva cārupyāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lam gang gis ni 'og ma las rnam par 'byed pa ste / 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir ro / gzugs med pa de dag kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāḥ saha sāmantakaistribhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni / gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakaṃ caturthadhyānālambanatvādvibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāṃ na labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la dmigs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig pa ma yin te / ma bral zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaduktaṃ catuskandhā iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po bzhi zhes gang bshad pa re zhig gzugs med pa dag na gzugs med do zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi syātkathamārupyā ucyeran /<br/> īṣadrūpatvā dāpiṅgalavat /<br/> kīdṛśaṃ tāvadīṣadrūpaṃ tatreṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yod na ji ltar na gzugs med pa rnams brjod par 'gyur / gzugs cung zad cig yod pa'i phyir te / cung zad zer ba bzhin no / re zhig de ni gzugs ji lta bu zhig yod par 'dod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ /<br/> na cāsati bhūte bhautikaṃ yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te lus dang ngag gi sdom ba tsam zhig go zhe na / de dag med na ji ltar de dag gi sdom par 'gyur / 'byung ba med par ni 'byung ba las gyur pa mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravasaṃvaravaccet /<br/> sāsravabhūtasadbhāvāt /<br/> smāpattāvapi tatpratiṣedha uktaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bzhin no zhe na / ma yin te zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro / snyoms par 'jug pa la yang de dgag par bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kāyo 'pyastīndriyāṇyapi rūpīṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te lus kyang yod la dbang po gzugs can rnams kyang yod do zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tadīṣadrūpā iṣyante /<br/> parimāṇālpatvāccet /<br/> udakajantukeṣvapyadṛśyarupeṣu prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> acchatvāccet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na de dag gzugs cung zad yod par 'dod / gal te bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni chung ngu'i skye bo gzugs bltar mi snang ba dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro / gal te dang ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">antarābhavarūpāvacareṣvapi prasaṅgaḥ /<br/> yato nācchataraṃ cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa bar ma dag dang gzugs na spyod pa rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur ro / gal te gang las ches dang ba med pa yin no zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgramevārupyaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo kho na gzugs med pa yin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattivattadupapattiviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi cādharabhūmikendriyāgrahaṇāt kastatra viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang sa 'og ma'i dbang pos mi zin pa'i phyir de dang yang khyad par ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayoranvarthā saṃjñā nārupyadhātoriti cet /<br/> kā 'tra yuktiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin gyi gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhe na / de la rigs pa ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanānnaḍakalāpīdvayavannāmarūpayoranyonyaniśritavacanā dvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vacanāt anyatrarūpādyāvatsaṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatigatipratiṣedhāccārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhiriti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir dang 'dam bu'i shog gnyis bzhin du ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang gzugs nas 'du byed rnams kyi bar las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba'am 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa dag na gzugs yod pa nyid du grub bo zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetadyadidamāyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvamuktam /<br/> kimidaṃ kāmāvacaramāyuḥ saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro / re zhig tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres pa nyid du gang gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i tshe las dgongs te gsungs sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang gang yang ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten pa nyid du gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa las dgongs te gsungs sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa 'di ci rnam par shes pa thams cad ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du gsungs sam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaccānyatra rūpādibhyo vijñānasyāgatipratiṣedhaḥ /<br/> kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti /<br/> aviśeṣavacanānna saṃpradhāryamiti cet /<br/> atiprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te ming dang gzugs thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du gsungs zhes bya ba dang gang yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag par gsungs pa 'di ci de dag thams cad med na de bkag gam / 'on te 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya dgos so / gal te bye brag med par gsungs pa'i phyir dpyad par mi bya'o zhe na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te / tshe med par phyi'i dro ba yang yod par mi 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bāhyasyāpi ca rūpasya nāmāśritatvamaviśeṣavacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyi'i gzugs kyang rnam par shes pa la brten pa nyid du 'gyur te / khyad par med par 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturvijñānasthitivaccāhāracatuṣkavacanādrūpārupyadhātvorapi kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par shes pa gnas bzhin du zas bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na yang kham du byed pa'i zas yod par thal bar yang 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāniti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet /<br/> ārupyeṣvapi rūpasyāprasaṅgaḥ /<br/> rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇamārupyāḥ /<br/> ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyāḥ /<br/> arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāditi vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te kham du byed pa'i zas za ba'i lha rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang dga' ba'i zas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na ni gzugs med pa dag na yang gzugs yod par thal bar mi 'gyur te / gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das nas zhes bya ba dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can dag yod ces bya ba dang rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs shig yod na ni rang gi gzugs gdon mi za bar 'du shes par byed par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">audārikamadhobhūmikaṃ rūpamabhisaṃdhāyoktamiti cet /<br/> kavaḍīkāre 'pi tulyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rags pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no zhe na ni / kham gyi zas la yang mtshungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānānāmapi cādhobhūminiḥsaraṇatvādārupya prasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan rnams kyang sa 'og ma pa las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanādiniḥsaraṇaṃ ca kiṃ noktāḥ /<br/> adhobhūmikavedanāniḥsaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa 'og ma pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir tshor ba la sogs pa las kyang nges par 'byung ba yin bar ci'i phyir ma bshad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpajātiṃ tu kutsnāmatikrāntā na vedanādijātim /<br/> ato rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇamuktāḥ /<br/> bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca /<br/> dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti /<br/> ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi rnam pa zad par las 'das la tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa las ni ma yin pas de'i phyir gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba zhes gsungs so / srid pas srid pa las nges par mi 'byung bar gsungs pa ni de nyid kyis de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang thams cad dang gtan du nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan dag la ni gang de na gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs la / gzugs med pa dag la ni gang de na tshor ba'i rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat /<br/> tasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag na gzugs kyi rnam ba zhig yod na ci'i phyir gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs par mi 'gyur te de lta bas na gzugs med pa na gzugs med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nārupye rūpasadbhāvaḥ /<br/> kathamidānīmanalpakalpocchinnādrūpāt punarapi rupotpattistataḥ pracyutānām /<br/> rupotpattistu cittataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni ji ltar na de nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi gzugs bskal pa mi nyung ba zhig tu gzugs rgyun chad pa las yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na / gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpasya cittādevotpattistadvipākahetuparibhāvitāllabdhavṛttitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 'jug pa rnyed pa las skye bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamanāśritya rūpaṃ cittaṃ vartate /<br/> kasmānna vartitavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na sems gzugs lam brten par gnas she na / ci'i phyir gnas par mi 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihaivamadarśanāt /<br/> kavaḍīkārāntareṇā 'pi vinā rūpadhātau na vartitavyam /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro / kham gyi zas med par yang gzugs kyi khams na gnas par mi 'gyur ro / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ihaivamadarśanāt /<br/> uktaṃ ca pūrvaṃ yathā vartate /<br/> gatametadidaṃ vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro / ji ltar gnas pa ni sngar bshad zin to / 'di ni rdzogs so / 'di brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimepāmākāśānantyāyatanādīnāmākāśādaya evālambanaṃ yata evaṃ samākhyāyate /<br/> na hi /<br/> kathaṃ tarhi /<br/> trayastāvat /<br/> ākāśānantyavijñānānantyākiñcanyasaṃjñakāḥ /<br/> tathāprayogāt /<br/> anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam /<br/> ata eṣāmetāḥ saṃjñā iti /<br/> māndyāktu nasaṃjñanāpyasaṃjñakaḥ /<br/> mṛdutvāttu saṃjñāyā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamuktam /<br/> na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti /<br/> yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti /<br/> kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /<br/> mṛdutvātsaṃjñāmityetadevoktam /<br/> iti maulaṃ samāpattidravyamaṣṭavidhaṃ /<br/> ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti /<br/> teṣāṃ punaḥ /<br/> tridhā /<br/> sapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa de dag nam mkha' la sogs pa kho na la dmigs pa yin pas de'i phyir de skad ces bya'am zhe na / ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / re zhig gsum mo / rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas / ci yang med ces bya de ltar / sbyor phyir grangs bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas so / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so / ci yang med do zhes de ltar yid la byed cing de dag la rab tu sbyor bas de'i phyir de dag gi ming de dag yin no / dman phyir 'du shes med / 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'o / 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bshad de / de ni 'du shes gsal ba yang ma yin la 'du shes med pa kho na yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro / gal te de la yang 'di ltar 'du shes ni nad do / 'du shes ni 'bras so / 'du shes ni zug rngu'o / 'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa'o / 'di ltar 'du shes med / 'du shes med min skye mched 'di ni zhi ba'o / 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes bya bar sbyor ba yod mod kyi ci'i phyir de dag gis de la de ltar 'dzin zhes byas pa dang 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos par 'gyur bas de nyid bshad do / de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas / rnam pa brgyad / de ltar na 'di dag ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos gzhi'i rdzas brgyad yin te / 'di lta ste / bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi'o / de dag las bdun rnam pa gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgrādanyāni sapta trividhāni /<br/> āsvādanāvacchūddhānāsravāṇi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa bdun ni rnam pa gsum yin te / ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang / zag med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni śuddhakānyanāsravāṇi ca /<br/> aṣṭamaṃ dvidhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang dag pa pa rnams dang zag pa med pa rnams so / brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgramāsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ śuddhakaṃ ca /<br/> anāsrava nāsti /<br/> tatra punaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo ni ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang dag pa pa yin gyi zag pa med pa ni med do / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ satṛṣṇaṃ /<br/> tṛṣṇā hyāsvādanā /<br/> laukikaṃ śubham /<br/> śuddhakaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so / ro myang ba ni sred pa yin no / 'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni / dag pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">laukikaṃ kuśalaṃ samāpattidravyaṃ śuddhakamuccayate 'lobhādi śuddhadharmayogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten pa'i dge ba snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas ni dag pa zhes bya ste / ma chags pa la sogs pa chos dkar po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punastenāsvādanāsaṃprayuktenāsvādyate /<br/> tattadāsvādyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa des ci zhig ro myong bar byed ce na / de ni des myang bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tacchuddhakaṃ samāpattidravyaṃ tenāsvādyate samanantarātītam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang 'das ma thag pa de ni des ro myong bar byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadāsvādayati tasmādvyutthito yenāsvādayati tatsamāpannaḥ /<br/> lokattaramanāsravam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro myang bar bya ba gang yin pa de las ni langs pa yin no / gang gis ro myong bar byed pa de la ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no / zag med 'jig rten 'das pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yallokottaraṃ samāpattidravyaṃ tadanāsravam /<br/> eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ /<br/> tatra /<br/> pañcādye /<br/> prathame bhāge pañcāṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa yin no snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas de dag las bsam gtan rnams kho na yan lag dang ldan pa yin gyi gzugs med pa rnams ni ma yin no / de la dang po la lnga / bsam gtan po la yan lag lnga ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tarkacārau ca prītisaukhyasamādhayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog dpyod dang dga' bas bde dang ting 'dzin rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /<br/> śeṣāṇyaṅgānīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid de / de ltar na de dag ni yan lag lnga yin no / ting nge 'dzin ni yan lag kyang yin la bsam gtan yang yin no / lhag ma rnams ni yan lag dag yin no zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag ji lta bar yan lag lnga'i bsam gtan yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prītyādayaḥ prasādaśca dvitīye 'ṅgacatuṣṭayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi / rab dang dad ni dga' la sogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīye dhyāne catvāryaṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittekāgratā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nang rab tu dang ba dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /<br/> tṛtīye tu dhyāne pañcāṅgāni /<br/> upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajñānaṃ sukhaṃ smādhiśca /<br/> samādhiparyāyo hi sthitiḥ /<br/> samyaksamādhiḥ katamaḥ /<br/> yā cittasya sthitiriti sūtre vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa la lnga btang snyoms dang / dran dang shes rab bde dang gnas / bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste / btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang bden pa dang ting nge 'dzin to / gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam grangs yin te / mdo las / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / gang sems gnas pa dang yang dag par gnas pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">catvāryante 'sukhāduḥkhopekṣāsmṛtisamādhayaḥ /<br/> caturthaṃ dhyānamantyam /<br/> tatra catvāryaṅgāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mtha' na bzhi dran btang snyoms dang / bde min sdug min ting 'dzin rnams / mtha' ma ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o / de la yan lag bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ samādhiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa dang ting 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tānyetānyaṣṭādaśa dhyānāṅgāni bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag bco brgyad yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pañcāṅgatvāt /<br/> dvitīyacaturthayoścaturaṅgatvāt /<br/> nāmata evam /<br/> dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca /<br/> dravyata etānyekādaśa bhavanti /<br/> prāthamadhyānikāni pañca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dang po dang gsum pa dag la ni yan lag lnga yin pa'i phyir dang gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag la ni yan lag bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro / ming gi sgo nas ni de lta'o / rdzas su bcu gcig / rdzas su ni de dag bcu gcig yin te / bsam gtan dang po la lnga'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīye 'dhyātmasaṃprasādo vardhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba lhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye upekṣāsmṛtisaṃprajñānasukhāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa la ni btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang bde ba rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthe 'duḥkhāsukhā vedaneti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa la bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam /<br/> prathamā koṭirvitarkavicārau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir smras pa / yan lag gang dag bsam gtan dang po na yod pa de dag gnyis pa na yang yod dam zhe na / mu bzhi ste / mu dang po ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyā adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa ni nang rab tu dang pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyā prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthī koṭiruktanirmuktā dharmā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams so zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ sarvāṇi dhyānāṅgāni parasparaṃ yojyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad phan tshun du sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāt /<br/> tṛtīye dhyāne sukhaṃ dravyāntaramucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa na yod pa'i bde ba rdzas gzhan du brjod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāttadvedanāsukhaṃ dhyānayostu /<br/> prasrabdhisukhamādyayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar de'i bde ba ni tshor ba yin la / bsam gtan dang po na / shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamadvitīyayostu dhyānayoḥ prasrabdhisukhamityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po dag na ni shin tu sbyangs pa la bde ba zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la ni shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin la / de la ni tshor ba bde ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayordhyānasamāpattyoḥ sukhendriyāyogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gnyis na bde ba'i dbang po dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tattayoḥ kāyikaṃ yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis na de lus kyi yin par ni mi rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpannasya vijñānakāyābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par zhugs pa la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpi caitasikaṃ prītivacanāt /<br/> prītirhi saumanasyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems las byung ba yang ma yin te / dga' ba zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca sukhasaumanasyayoryaugapadyamasti /<br/> na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi /<br/> apare punarāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bde ba dang yid bde ba gnyis cig car 'byung ba med do / de gnyis rnam grangs kyis bsam gtan na yod par yang rigs pa ma yin te / yan lag lnga zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re sems las byung ba'i bde ba'i dbang po ni kho na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyikameva sukhamaṅgaṃ vyavasthāpitamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gsum char na yang lus kyi bde ba kho na yan lag tu rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi sutra uktaṃ sukhendriyaṃ katamat /<br/> yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyamiti /<br/> adhyāropita eṣa pāṭhaḥ /<br/> kenāpi sarvanikāyāntareṣu kāyikamityeva pāṭhāt /<br/> sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti svaśabdena vacanācca /<br/> manaskāyeneticet /<br/> evamuktvā ko guṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na mdo las / bde ba'i dbang po gang zhe na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pas reg pa na lus kyi dang sems las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa bde ba sim pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni bde ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / tshig de ni 'ga' zhig gis sgro btags pa yin te / sde pa gzhan thams cad las lus kyi zhes bya ba kho na 'byung ba'i phyir dang bde ba lus kyis myong la zhes rang gi sgras gsungs pa'i phyir ro / gal te yid kyi lus kyis so zhe na ni / de skad bshad pa la yon tan ci zhig yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthe dhyāne prasrabdhibhūyastve 'pi sukhāvacanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa la shin tu sbyangs pa mang bzhin du bde ba ma smos pa'i yang phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhavedanānukūlā prasrabdhiḥ sukhamiti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin no zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye prasrabdhisukhāvacanaṃ kasmāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa na yod pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa bde bar ma gsungs pa yang ci'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upekṣopahatatvāditi cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te btang snyoms kyis bcom pa'i phyir ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na upekṣayaiva tadvṛddhiḥ /<br/> pūrvikābhyastādviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma yin te / snga ma gnyis pas de khyad par du 'phags pas btang snyoms kho nas de 'phel ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatītyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di las kyang shin tu sbyangs pa dang bde ba gnyis tha dad par 'byung ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa kho na bde ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpannasya katham kāyavijñānamiti cet
