</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te snyoms par zhugs pa la ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhiviśeṣajena prasrabdhisaṃjñakena sukhavedanīyena vāyunā kāyasphuraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las skyes pa shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rlung gis lus la rgyas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bahirvikṣepāssamādhibraṃśa iti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samādhijasyāntaḥkāyasaṃbhūtasya kāyasukhasya samādhyanukūlatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa lus kyi bde ba nang du 'byung ba'i lus kyi bde ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyavijñā nakāle vyutthitaḥ syāditi cet /<br/> na /<br/> ata eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i tshe langs par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te / de nyid kyi phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacareṇa kāyendriyeṇa rūpāvacaraspraṣṭavyavijñānānutpattiriti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi dbang pos gzugs na spyod pa'i reg bya la rnam par shes pa mi skye'o zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prasrabdhivijñānasyotpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsrave api spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne syātām /<br/> mā bhūtkiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiñcidanāsravamiti cet /<br/> kāyikaprasrabdhivodhyaṅga vacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med pa yin na mi rung bas reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa zag pa med pa dag tu yang 'gyur ro zhe na / lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pas 'dod pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iṣṭe bodhyaṅgānukūlatvāditi cet /<br/> anāsravatvamapyevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni zag pa med pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravā dharmāḥ katame /<br/> cakṣuryāvadeva spraṣṭavyamityasya sūtrasya virodhāditi cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / mig ji snyed pa zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang 'gal lo zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyaspraṣṭavya kāyavijñānābhisaṃdhivacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te zag pa med pa la yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas ba cung zad cig ni zag pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cig car ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci zhig yod / gal te bde ba dang dga' ba phrad pa med pa'i phyir yan lag lnga par mi 'gyur ro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na saṃbhavaṃ pratyupadeśāndvitarkavicāravat /<br/> sādhyamiti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma yin te / srid pa'i phyir bstan pas rtog pa dang dpyod pa bzhin no / gal te bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">siddhaṃ cittasyaudārikasūkṣmatayorvirodhāt doṣāvacanācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems rtsing ba dang zhib pa gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir dang nyes pa smos pa'i phyir grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bsam gtan dang po la yod pa'i yan lag lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag kho na las yan lag gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi bor nas bsam gtan gnyis ba la sogs pa rnam par gzhag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dang po la ni yan lag lnga nyid du bshad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadapakarṣeṇottaradhyānavyavasthāpanāt /<br/> na tu saṃjñādīnāmaṅgatvamuktam /<br/> kimartha vā pañcānāmevāṅgatvamuktam /<br/> upakārakatvāditi cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las thor bas ni bsam gtan phyi ma rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'du shes la sogs pa ni ma yin no / yang na ci'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin / gal te phan pa'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkavicārābhyāṃ smṛtiprajñayorapakārakataratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis pas dran pa dang shes rab dag ches phan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyeṣa ekeṣāṃ vādaḥ /<br/> naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig de skad du rgol ba yod mod kyi sngon gyi slob dpon rnams ni ji snyed mngon pa de ltar mi ston te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādvicāryametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni dpyad par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhyātmasaṃprasādo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkavicārakṣobhavirahāt praśāntavāhitā saṃtater adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i 'khrug pa dang bral bas rgyud rab tu zhi bar gyur pa ni nang rab tu dang ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang dpyod pas dkrugs pa'i rgyud ni chu bo dba' rlabs dang bcas pa bzhin du rab tu ma dang ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti /<br/> tasmāttarhi /<br/> śraddhā prasādaḥ /<br/> tasya hi dvitīyadhyānalātsamāhibhūminihsaraṇe saṃpratyaya utpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni de rdzas gzhan ma yin pas ji ltar na rdzas su yan lag bcu gcig yin / de lta bas na / rab tu dang ba dad pa yin / de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa las nges par 'byung ba la yid ches ba skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'tradhyātmasaṃprasāda iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'dir nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva hi vitarkavicārasamādhayo nāpyadhātmasaṃprasādo dravyāntarāṇītyapare /<br/> kathamasati dravyāntaratve caitasikatvaṃ siddhyati /<br/> avasthāviseso hi nāma cetasaścetasiko bhavati /<br/> natveṣa śastrasiddhāntaḥ /<br/> kathamidaṃ gamyate /<br/> kimanyat bhavatu /<br/> yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ /<br/> saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyāneṣu sukhamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rdzas gzhan ma yin la nang rab tu dang ba yang rdzas gzhan ma yin no / rdzas gzhan med na ji ltar sems las byung pa nyid du 'grub ce na / sems can gyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag kyang sems las byung ba yin no zhes zer te / 'di ni bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i mtha' ma yin no / dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa 'di ji ltar khong du chud / gzhan ci zhig yin / ji ltar sde pa gzhan dag 'dod pa lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sde ba gzhan dag ji ltar 'dod ce na / dga' ba ni sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag kho na yin la yid bde ba ni bsam gtan gsum char gyi yang bde ba yin par 'dod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate /<br/> prītistu saumanasyaṃ dvidhāgamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i bde ba ni yid bde ba yin par mi rung ba nyid kyi / lus rnams gnyis phyir dga' yid bde
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las bsam gtan gsum pa bka' stsal nas 'dir 'di'i yid bde ba'i dbang po skyes pa ma lus bar 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata ityuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaścoktaṃ sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādityato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bsam gtan gsum pa na yid bde ba'i dbang po med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt prītireva saumansyaṃ na sukham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bas na dga' ba kho na yid bde ba yin gyi bde ba ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti /<br/> na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate /<br/> kliṣṭeṣvasatprītisukhaṃ prasādaḥ saṃpradhīḥ smṛṭiḥ /<br/> upekṣāsmṛtiśuddhiśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dag la yang ji skad du bshad pa ltar yan lag de dag yod dam zhe na / med do / de dag na ci zhig med ce na / nyon mongs can la dga' bde dang / dran dang shes bzhin dran pa dang / btang snyoms dran pa dag pa med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathame dhyāne vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po la ni bde ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśāviviktatvāt /<br/> dvitīye dhyāne 'dhyātmasaṃprasādo nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa las dben ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśāvilatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pas rnyog pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa la ni dran pa dang shes bzhin med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭasukhasaṃbrhamitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas kun du rmongs par bya ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ccaturthe upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhirnāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bzhi pa la ni btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśamalinatvāt /<br/> evaṃ tāvat kecidāhuḥ /<br/> kecit prasrabdhyupekṣaṇe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pas dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir ro / re zhig kha cig de skad zer ro / kha cig shin tu sbyangs btang snyoms
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kecitpunaḥ prathamadvitīyayoḥ kliṣṭayoḥ prasrabdhirnāsti /<br/> tṛtīyacaturthayorupekṣā nāsti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re nyon mongs pa can dang po dang gnyis pa dag na ni shin tu sbyangs pa med la gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni btang snyoms med de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalalmahābhūmikatvādanayoriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyis ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā /<br/> sāpakṣālatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum ni skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir gyo ba dang bcas pa dag yin no zhes bka' stsal te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭāpakṣālamuktatvādāniñjaṃ tu caturthakam /<br/> ke punaste 'pakṣālāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skyon brgyad las ni grol ba'i phyir / bzhi pa gyo ba med pa yin / skyon de dag kyang gang zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog dang dpyod dang dbugs dag dang / bde ba la sogs bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkavicārau sukhaduḥkhe saumanasyadaurmanasye śvāsapraśvāsāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāmaṣṭānāmeko'pyapakṣālaścaturthe nāstyatastadāneñjyamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni skyon brgyad po de dag gcig kyang med pas de'i phyir de ni mi gyo ba zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitarkavicāraprītisukhairakampanīyatvādāneñjyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ sūtre nirvāta pradīpanidarśanādityapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re bzhi pa ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dag gis gyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi gyo ba yin te / mdo las rlung med pa'i mar me dper mdzad pa'i phyir zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayordhyānayoḥ saumanasyamuktaṃ prītivacanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni dga' ba zhes smos pa'i phyir yid bde ba yod par bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīye sukhaṃ caturthe upekṣā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gsum pa na ni bde ba / bzhi pa na ni btang snyoms yod par bshad na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu /<br/> netyāha /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> saumanasyasukhopekṣā upekṣāsumanaskate /<br/> sukhhopekṣe upekṣā pravido dhyānopapattiṣu /<br/> prathamadhyānotpatto tisro vedanāḥ /<br/> sukhaṃ trivijñānakāyikaṃ saumanasyaṃ manobhūmikam /<br/> upekṣā caturvijñānakāyikī /<br/> dvitīyadhyānopapattau dve vedane saumanasyopekṣe manobhūmike /<br/> sukhaṃ nāstyasya vijñānakāyābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ci / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i tshor ba gang dag yin ba de dag nyid skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na yod dam zhe na / smras pa ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na ni / yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dang / btang snyoms yid bde bde ba dang / btang snyoms btang snyoms tshor ba yod / skye ba'i bsam gtan dang po na ni / tshor ba gsum yod de / rnam par shes ba'i tshogs gsum pa'i bde ba dang yid kyis pa'i yid bde ba dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa'i btang snyoms so / skye ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te / yid kyi sa ba'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms so / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gzhan med pa'i phyir bde ba dang yid kyis pa'i yid bde ba dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa'i btang snyoms so / skye ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te / yid kyi sa pa'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms so / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gzhan med pa'i phyir bde ba med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyadhyānopapattī dve vedane
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skye ba'i bsam gtan gsum pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sukhopekṣe manobhūmike /<br/> caturthadhyānopapattāvupekṣaiva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid kyi sa pa'i bde ba dang btang snyoms skye ba'i bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni btang snyoms kho na yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa dag na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gsum med pa la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag kyang med na ji ltar na de dag gis mthong ba nas reg pa'i bar du 'gyur / ji ltar na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ve keṣūpapannānāṃ cakṣurvijñānādayona santi /<br/> na tu svabhūmikāḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag tu skyes pa rnams la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin la rang gis pa yang ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāyākṣiśrotravijñānaṃ vijñaptyutthāpakaṃ ca yat /<br/> dvitīyādau tadādyāptaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang / rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong / gang yin de ni dang por gtogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti /<br/> nirmāṇacittavadyena te paśyanti yāvadvijñapti samutthāpayanti /<br/> akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na ni sprul pa'i sems bzhin du gang gis na de dag gis mthong bas na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa'i bar bsam gtan dang po'i sa ba'i mig dang rna ba dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang rnam par rig byed kun nas slong par byed pa mngon sum du byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min / de dag mngon sum du byed pa bsam gtan dang bo'i sa pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin gyi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na kliṣṭaṃ vītarāgatvānna kuśalaṃ hīnatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la / dman pa'i phyir dge ba yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avasitaṃ dhyānakāryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi bya ba rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha śuddhakādīnāṃ dhyānārupyāṇāṃ kathaṃ lābhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang dag pa sa la sogs pa'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams ji ltar 'thob ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atadvān labhate śuddhaṃ vairāgyeṇopapattitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mi ldan 'dod chags bral / skye ba las ni dag pa 'thob
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asamanvāgatastena śuddhakaṃ dhayanamārupyaṃ vā pratilabhate /<br/> adhobhūmivairāgyādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa dag sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhobhūmyupapattito vā /<br/> anyatra bhavāgrāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pas 'og mar skye ba las 'thob ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tasyopapattito lābhaḥ /<br/> atadvāniti kimartha samanvāgataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni skye bas 'thob pa med do / ci'i phyir de dang mi ldan pa zhes brjod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dag pa ba dang ldan pa ni sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dag pa pa 'thob la / yongs su nyams pa las kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evocyate syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt /<br/> evaṃ parihāṇyā copapattyā ca /<br/> syāddhānabhāgīyaṃ prathamaṃ dhayānam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dag pa pa 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob par 'gyur la 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang skye bas 'thob pa dang 'dor bar 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod de / bsam gtan dang po nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taddhi kāmavairāgyeṇa labhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmalokavairāgyeṇa tyajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brahmalokavairāgyaparihāṇyā labhyate /<br/> kāmavairāgyaprahāṇyā tyajyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'thob la / 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'dor ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upariṣṭādbrahmaloka utpadyamāno labhate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba na 'thob la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt punaḥ kāmadhātāvupapapadyamāno vijahātīti /<br/> anāsravaṃ tu vairāgyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des na 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba na 'dor ro zhes 'byung ngo / zag med 'dod chags bral ba yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atadvān labhate iti vartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mi ldan pa las 'thob / ces bya bar sbyor ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadvāṃstu kṣayajñānato 'pyaśaikṣaṃ labhate indriyasaṃcārato 'pi śaikṣaśaikṣam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang ldan pa ni zad pa shes pa las kyang mi sgrol ba 'thob la / dbang po 'pho ba las kyang slob pa dang mi slob pa 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate /<br/> nāvaśyamānupūrvikeṇālābhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nges par 'jug pa las kyang dang po nyid du zag pa med pa 'thob pa ma yin nam zhe na / mthar gyis pas mi 'thob pa'i phyir gdon mi za ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā tvavaśyaṃ labhate tathoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar gdon mi za bar 'thob pa de ltar bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭaṃ hānyupapattitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs can nyams skye ba yis
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atadvān labhata ityevānuvartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mi ldan ba las 'thob / ces bya ba kho nar sbyar te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">parihāṇito yadi tadvairāgyātparihīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams na yongs su nyams pa las 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upapattito yadyuparibhūmeradharāyāmupapadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sa gong ma las nas 'og mar skyes na skye bas 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">katamasmātsamāpattidravyādanantaraṃ katyupapadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang gi mjug thogs su du zhig skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaprathamadhyānāntaraṃ ṣaḍutpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i mjug thogs su drug skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmike ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa gzhan dag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ākiñcanyāyatanānantaraṃ sapta /<br/> svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave vijñānākāśānantyāyatanabhūmike ca /<br/> bhavāgraṃ śuddhakamevānāsravābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mjug thogs su bdun te rang gis pa dang rnam shes dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i dag pa kho na ste / zag pa med pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānāntaramaṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su brgyad de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave tṛtīyacaturthaprathamadhyānabhūmike ca /<br/> vijñānānantyāyatanānantaraṃ nava
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa dang bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang dang po'i sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dag go / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su dgu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi sa pa gnyis dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa bzhi dang ci yang med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ba gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanyadhyānārupyānantaraṃ daśa dravyāṇi yojyāni /<br/> eṣa tu saṃkṣepaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su yang rdzas bcu sbyar bar bya'o / 'di ni mdor bsdu ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tṛtīyādyāvadūrdhvādho 'nāsravānantaraṃ śubham /<br/> utpadyate /<br/> śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete /<br/> ūrdhvādhobhūmike ca tṛtīvādyāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su / ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba skye ba'o / dge ba smos pa ni dag pa ba dang zag pa med pa gzung ste / dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro / zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas kyi mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa dang sa god ma dang 'og ma sa gsum pa'i bar gyi dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug par byed pas gsum pa las phan chad du ni rgal bar mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anvayajñānānantaraṃ cārupyān samāpadyante na dharmajñānānantaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug gi chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyādharāśrayālambanatvāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cānāsravādanantaramuktam veditavyam /<br/> tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su bshad pa ltar dag pa las de bzhin / rig par bya la / rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamadhikaṃ śuddhakādanantaramutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su lhag par rang gis pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śeṣaṃ yathaivānāsravāt /<br/> anāsravasya hi samanantaraṃ kliṣṭotpattirnāstīti /<br/> kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddhakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lhag ma ni zag pa med pa las bshad pa ji lta ba bzhin no / zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su ni nyon mongs pa can skye ba med do / nyon mongs can las rang dag dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭātsamāpattidravyādanantaraṃ svabhūmike śuddhakakliṣṭe utpadyete /<br/> evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas kyi mjug thogs su ni rang gi sa pa'i dag pa ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag skye'o / 'og ma'i dag cig kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pas gzir ba ni 'og ma'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dag pa pa la yang dga' bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi kliṣṭaṃ paricchidyādhaḥ saṃcarati /<br/> kuśalātsaṃcarito bhavati na kliṣṭāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te nyon mongs pa can yongs su bcad nas 'og mar 'phon ni dge ba las 'phos pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa can las ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāparicchidya kathaṃ saṃcarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te yongs su ma bcad na ni ji ltar 'pho zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon 'phangs pa'i phyir te / sngon 'di snyam du 'og ma'i dag pa ba ni bla'i gong ma'i nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin no snyam du 'dod par 'gyur la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvābhiprāyaṃ ca saṃtatiranuvartate sattvānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi bsam pa yang sems can rnams kyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brangs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praṇidhāya suptasyābhipretakālaprabodhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsams nas gnyid log par 'dod pa'i dus su sad pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaṃ tu kliṣṭādanantaraṃ sarvathā notpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattikālaṃ pratyetaduktam /<br/> śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti /<br/> cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus kyi phyir dag pa pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na skye'i gzhan gyi sa pa ni ma yin no zhes de skad du bshad kyi / 'chi 'pho dag las nyon mongs kun
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cyutikāle tu upapattilābhikācchuddhakādanantaraṃ sarvabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi 'pho ba'i tshe skye bas thob pa'i dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su sa thams cad pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭāttu nottaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs can las gong ma min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kliṣṭāttu dhyānārūpyādanantaraṃ cyutikāle svādharabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate /<br/> nordhvabhūmikam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'chi 'pho ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'i sa gong ma pa ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca sarvasmācchuddhakādanāśravaṃ samāpattidravyamutpadyate /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dag pa pa thams cad las zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas skye ba yang ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturdhā śuddhakaṃ hānabhāgīyādi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dag pa nyams pa'i cha mthun sogs / rnam bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dag pa pa ni nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang rnam pa bzhi'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgraṃ tu trividhamanyatra viśeṣabhāgīyāt /<br/> kimasya lakṣaṇam /<br/> yathākramam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gsum yin te / khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so / 'di'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na / de ni go rims bzhin du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśotpattisvabhūmyūrdhvānāsravānuguṇaṃ hi tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs skye dang rang sa dang / gong dang zag med rjes mthun pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o / gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni rang gi sa dang rjes su mthun pa'o / khyad par can gyi cha dang rjes su mthun pa ni sa gong ma dang rjes su mthun pa'o / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni zag pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādanāsravamutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa ni de las skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ caturṇā kati kasmādanantaramutpadyante /<br/> dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /<br/> hānabhāgīyaṃ hānabhāk /<br/> tasmādanantaraṃ dve utpadyete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bzhi po de dag las gang gi mjug thogs su du zhig skye zhe na / nyams cha mthun sogs mjug thogs su / gnyis dang gsum dang gsum dang gcig / nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa nyi nyams pa dang brten pa'o / de'i mjug thogs su ni gnyis skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hānisthitibhāgīye /<br/> sthitibhāgīyānantaraṃ trīṇyanyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyams pa dang gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag go / gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gsum ste / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśeṣabhāgīyādanantaraṃ trīṇyanyatra hānabhāgīyāt nirvedhabhāgīyādanantaraṃ tadevaikamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyad par can gyi cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gsum ste / nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gcig ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ vyutkrāntakasamāpattirutpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gcig pu skye'o / thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa ji ltar skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gatvāgamya dvidhā bhūmīraṣṭau śliṣṭaikalaṅghitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa brgyad rnam gnyis 'brel ba dang / gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs nas ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyutkrāntakasamāpattirvisabhāgatṛtīyagā /<br/> gatvetyanulomaṃ samāpadya /<br/> āgamyeti pratilomaṃ samāpadya /<br/> dvidheti sāsravānāsravā bhūmīḥ /<br/> aṣṭāviti dhyānārupyasamāpattīḥ /<br/> śliṣṭā ityanukrameṇa /<br/> ekalaṅghitā ityekāmekāmutkramya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ris mi mthun pa gsum par 'gor / thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin / sa brgyad ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so / rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'o / 'brel pa dang zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du'o / gcig rgal zhes bya ba ni re re rgal nas so / song zhing zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mthun par snyoms par zhugs nas so / 'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par bzhugs nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa dang bcas pa'i sa brgyad dang zag pa med pa'i sa bdun lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas byang bar byas nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paścātsāsravāt prathamāddhyānāt sāsravaṃ tṛtīyaṃ samāpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po nas zag pa dang bcas pa'i gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug cing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmādākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādākṃicanyāvatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate /<br/> ayaṃ prayogo vyutkrāntakasamāpatteḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / de bzhin du lugs dang mi mthun pa yang byang bar byas nas zag pa med pa rnams kyang re re rgal zhing lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug pa ni thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas pa dang po nas zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / de nas ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la / de nas ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ punaḥ pratilomam /<br/> tadā visabhāgatṛtīyadravyagamanādabhiniṣpannā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du lugs dang mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe ris mi mthun pa'i rdzas gsum par 'gro ba'i phyir / mngon par grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ativiprakṛṣṭatvānna caturthī samāpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shin tu ring ba'i phyir bzhi pa la ni snyoms par mi 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang gling gsum du dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par gro ba'i dgra bcom pa kho nas skyed par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">niḥkleśatvātsamādhivaśitvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ /<br/> samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong bas 'thob pa ni gal te dbang po rnon po yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba yin yang nyon mongs pa med pa ni ma yin no / dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni gal te nyon mongs pa med pa yin yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kenāśrayeṇa kati dhyānārupyāḥ saṃmukhīkriyante /<br/> svādhobhūmyāśrayā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba ni ma yin no / rten gang gis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa du zhig mngon gsum du byed ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānāśrayā eva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gzugs med rang dang ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānārūpyāḥ /<br/> bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau /<br/> śeṣāṇi svasyāṃ bhūmāvadhaśceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og sa'i rten can srid pa'i rtse mor yang mngon sum du byed la 'og ma 'dod pa'i khams kyi bar du yang mngon sum du byed do / de bzhin du lhag ma rnams kyang rang gis dang sa 'og mar mngon sum du byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ kāraṇamūrdhvopapanno nādharāṃ samāpatti saṃmukhīkaroti /<br/> tasmāttasya /<br/> vṛthā'dharam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gong du skyes pa snyoms par 'jug pa 'og ma mngon sum du mi byed ce na / 'di ltar de la 'og dgos med
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate /<br/> nihīnatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ni snyoms par 'jug pa 'og ma'i rdzas kyis cung zad kyang dgos pa mi byed de dman pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">utsarga kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyir bstan pa byas nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryākiñcanyasāṃmukhyāt bhavāgre tvāsravakṣayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid rtser 'phags pa ci yang med / mngon sum byas nas zag pa zad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgre tūpapannasyānāsravākiñcanyāyatanasaṃmukhībhāvādāsravakṣayo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched mngon sum du byas nas zag pa zad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tatropapannasya tatsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /<br/> svasyābhāvāttasya cābhyāsāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na der skyes pa de mngon sum du byed ce na / rang gi med pa'i phyir dang de yang nye ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣāṃ dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ kimālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa 'di dag gi dmigs pa ci zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satṛṣṇāḥ svabhavālambāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sred bcas rang gi srid la dmigs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāḥ svabhūmikaṃ bhavamālambante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams ni rang gis pa'i srid pa la dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavagrahaṇena sāsravaṃ vastu gṛhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa smos pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gzung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nādharamālambante vītarāgatvānnottaraṃ tṛṣṇāparichinnatvāt bhūmīnām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma la yang mi dmigs so / sa rnams ni srid pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir gong ma la yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānāsravaṃ kuśalatvaprasaṅgāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zag pa med pa la yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānaṃ sadviṣayaṃ śubham /<br/> kuśalaṃ dhyānaṃ śubhakamanāsravaṃ ca /<br/> tat sarvālambanaṃ yatkiñcidasti saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu yin / dge ba'i bsam gtan dag pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan de'i dmigs pa ni 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas gang ci yod kyang rung ba thams cad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na maulāḥ kuśalārūpyāḥ sāsravādharagocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs mod dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi / spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi dge ba rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po ma yin te / rang gi sa pa dang sa gong ma la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravaṃ tvālambanam /<br/> sarvānvayajñānapakṣyo na dharmajñānapakṣo nādhobhūminirodhaḥ /<br/> sāmantakānantaryamārgāṇāṃ tvadharā bhūmirālambanam /<br/> eṣāṃ ca punastrividhānāṃ dhyānānāṃ rūpyārūpyāṇām /<br/> anāsraveṇa hīyante kleśāḥ /<br/> na śuddhakena /<br/> kuta eva kliṣṭena /<br/> vītarāgatvānnādhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad yin gyi chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa yang ma yin la sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa yang ma yin no / nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma yin no / bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag las / zag pa med pas nyon mongs pa rnams spong ngo / dag pa pas kyang mi spong na / nyon mongs pa can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma la yang ma yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaiva tadapratipakṣatvānna svabhūmau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid de'i gnyen po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sa na yod pa yang ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">viśiṣṭataratvānnordhvamiti /<br/> samantakena ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gong ma yang ma yin no / nyer bsdogs dag pas kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānārūpyasāmantakena ca kleśāḥ prahīyante śuddhakenāpi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyer bsdogs ni dag pa pas kyang nyon mongs pa rnams spong ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhobhūmipratipakṣatvāt /<br/> kati punaḥ sāmantakāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa 'og ma pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro / nyer bsdogs du zhig yod ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aṣṭau sāmantakānyeṣāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la ni nyer bsdogs brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaikasyaikaikaṃ yena tatpraveśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re re la gang gis de la 'jug pa re re yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā /<br/> netyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci de dag kyang rnam pa gsum yin la de dag la tshor ba yang de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhe na / smras pa / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuddhāduḥkhāsukhāni hi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dag pa bde min sdug bsngal min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni /<br/> āryaṃ cādyaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag ni dag pa yang yin la btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan ba dag kyang yin te / 'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang sa 'og ma pa las yid 'byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro myang ba dang mtshungs bar ldan pa ma yin no / dang po 'phags pa'ang / nyer bsdogs kyi dang po ni mi lcogs pa med pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati /<br/> samāhitasya tu kliṣṭatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /<br/> tridhā kecit /<br/> kecitpunaricchanti /<br/> āsvādanāsaṃprayuktamapyanāgamyaṃ sāmantakaṃ cocyate dhyānāntaraṃ ca /<br/> kimidamekārthamāhosvinnānārtham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni dag pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no / nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyi snying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi mnyam par gzhag pa la ni nyon mongs ba can nyid dgag go / kha cig gsum / kha cig ni mi lcogs pa med pa ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang 'dod do / nyer bsdogs zhes kyang 'byung / bsam gtan khyad par can zhes kyang 'byung na / ci 'di'i don gcig pa zhig gam / 'on te don tha dad pa zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmantakaṃ hi vairāgyamārgaḥ /<br/> atarka dhyānamantaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">don tha dad ba yin te / nyer bsdogs ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin la / rtog med bsam gtan khyad par can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dhyānameva hi vitarkāsaṃprayuktaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānaviśeṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po kho na rtog pa dang / mtshungs par mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan khyad par can yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi /<br/> tatpunardhyānāntaraṃ /<br/> tridhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro / de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa na rnam par mi gzhag pa ste / khyad par med pa'i phyir ro / bsam gtan khyad par can de ni / rnam gsum
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āsvādanāsaṃprayuktam śuddhakamanāsravaṃ ca /<br/> aduḥkhāsukhaṃ tacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang dag pa dang zag pa med pa yin no / de bden min sdug min
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nātra sukhaṃ duḥkhamityaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktamityarthaḥ /<br/> na prītisaṃprayuktaṃ sābhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /<br/> ata eva duḥkhā pratipat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la bde pa yang med bas na bde ba yang ma yin pa sdug bsngal yang ma yin ba ste / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas pas drangs ba yin pa'i phyir / dga' ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya tarhi dhyānāntarasya kaḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ /<br/> taddhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin no / 'o na bsam gtan khyad par can de'i 'bras bu khyad par can gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mahābrahmaphalaṃ ca tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni tshangs chen 'bras bu can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan khyad par can de bsgoms nas tshangs pa chen por 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre /<br/> savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ /<br/> avitarko vicāramātraḥ /<br/> avitarko 'vicāra iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mdor bsdus te / mdo las rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum du bka' stsal te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam /<br/> vitarkamātrapratiṣedhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig bsam gtan khyad par can na ni / rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes shes par byas zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ /<br/> savitarkavicāro'dhaḥsamādhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de man chad rtog dpyod bcas pa'i / ting nge 'dzin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāddhyānāntarādadhaḥsamādhiḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ /<br/> prathamaṃ dhyānamanāgamyaṃ ca /<br/> parato 'dvayaḥ /<br/> nātra dvayamastītyadvayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan khyad par can de man chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan dang po dang mi lcogs pa med pa ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin no / yan chad gnyi ga med pas na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pareṇa tu dhyānāntarātsamādhiravitarko 'vicāraḥ /<br/> dvitīyadhyānasāmantakādyāvat bhavāgram /<br/> punastrayaḥ uktāḥ /<br/> śūnyatāsamādhirapraṇihita ānimittaśca /<br/> tatra /<br/> ānimittaḥ samākāraiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di na gnyi ga med pa ste / bsam gtan khyad par can yan chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar ni rtog pa yang med pa dpyod pa yang med pa'o / yang stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang smon pa med ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs te / de la / mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam ba dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodhasatyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhirānimittaścaturākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirvāṇaṃ hi daśanimittāpagatatvādanimittam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa bzhi pa yin no / mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshan ma bcu dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadālambanaḥ samādhirānimittaḥ /<br/> pañcaviṣayastrīpuruṣatrisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇanimittāni daśa /<br/> śūnyatānātmaśunyataḥ /<br/> pravartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te / mtshan ma bcu ni yul lnga dang pho dang mo dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams so / stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anātmaśūnyatākārābhyāṃ saṃprayuktaḥ śūnyatāsamādhidvarcyākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jug pa'o / bdag med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apraṇihitaḥ satyākārairataḥ paraiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam pa gnyis pa yin no / smon pa med pa ni / de las gzhan bden rnam pa dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bden pa lhag ma'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa ste / rnam pa bcu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir dang lam yang gdon mi za bar gzings lta bur dor bar bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadatikramābhimukhatvāt śūnyatānātmatābhyāṃ tu nodvego nirvāṇasāmānyāt /<br/> ta ete trayaḥ samādhayo dvividhāḥ /<br/> śuddhāmalāḥ /<br/> śuddhakāścānāsravāśca /<br/> laukikalokottaratvāt /<br/> laukikā ekādaśasu bhūmiṣu /<br/> lokottarā yatra mārgaḥ /<br/> nirmalāstu te vimokṣamukhatrayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de las 'da' bar mngon sum du phyogs pa'i phyir ro / mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir stong pa dang bdag med pa dag gis ni yid mi 'byung ngo / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis te / dag dang dri ma med / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro / dag pa pa yang yin la zag pa med pa dag kyang yin te / 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do / de dag / dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravāstvete trayaḥ samādhayastrīṇi vimokṣamukhānyucyante /<br/> śūnyatā vimokṣamukhamapraṇihitamānimittaṃ vimokṣamukhamiti /<br/> mokṣadvāratvāt /<br/> punaścocyante /<br/> śūnyatāśūnyatādyākhyāstrayo 'parasamādhayaḥ /<br/> śūnyatāśūnyatā apraṇihitāpraṇihitaḥ ānimittānimittaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gsum po de dag dri ma med pa'i thar pa'i sgo yin pa'i phyir rnam bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rnam par pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o / yang / stong nyid stong nyid ces la sogs / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo / zhes bya ba ste / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa smon pa med pa dang mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śūnyatādyālambanatvāttannāma /<br/> teṣāṃ punaḥ /<br/> ālambete akṣaikṣaṃ dvau śūnyataścāpyanityataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ming de skad ces bya'o / de dag las / gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par / mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">aśaikṣaṃ samādhiṃ dvāvaparasamādhī ālambete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śūnyatāśūnyatā aśaikṣaṃ śūnyatāsamādhimālambate śūnyatākāreṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mi slob pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la stong pa'i rnam par dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apraṇihitāpraṇihito 'pyaśaikṣamapraṇihitamanityākāreṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smon pa med pa smon pa med pa yang mi slob pa'i smon pa med pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt /<br/> ānimittānimittastu śāntato'saṃkhyayā kṣayam /<br/> ānimittānimittastu samādhiraśaikṣasyānimittasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhamālambate /<br/> śāntākāreṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug bsngal bar yang ma yin la rgyu la sogs par yang ma yin te / zag pa med pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro / lam gyi rnam pa rnams su yang ma yin te / sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro / mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni / zhi bar ma brtags zad pa la / mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi slob pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i so sor ma brtags pas / 'gog pa la zhi ba'i rnam par dmigs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anāsravasya pratisaṃkhayānirodhābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa la so sor brtags pas / 'gos pa med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na nirodhapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārairanityatānirodhasādhāraṇatvādavyākṛtatvā /<br/> davisaṃyogācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par ni ma yin te / mi rtag ba nyid kyi 'gog pa dang thun mong yin pa nyed kyi phyir dang lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir dang bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekāntena caite parasamādhayaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin gzhan 'di dag ni gcig tu zag bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāsravāḥ /<br/> āryamārgadveṣitvāt nahyevamanāsravā iti /<br/> kutrotpadyante /<br/> nṛṣu /<br/> manuṣyeṣveva na deveṣu /<br/> kasyotpadyante /<br/> akopyasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'phags pa'i lam la sdang pa'i phyir te / zag pa med pa dag ni de lta ma yin no / gang du skyed par byed ce na / mi'i nang / mi rnams kyi nang kho nar skyed kyi lha dag gi nang du ni ma yin no / su la skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānyasyārhataḥ /<br/> katibhūmikāḥ /<br/> saptasāmantavarjitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi gyo la dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni ma yin no / sa du pa zhig la ni ma yin zhe na / nyer bsdogs bdun ni ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sapta sāmantakāni hitvānyāsvekādaśasu bhūmiṣu /<br/> kāmadhātvanāgamyadhyānāntaradhyānārupyeṣu /<br/> punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyer bsdogs bdun ma gtogs pa sa gzhan bcu gcig po 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams na yod do / yang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bzhi ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate iti vistaraḥ /<br/> tatra /<br/> samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun tu brten bsgoms par byas lan mang du byas na / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba de la / dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ni / bde 'gyur ting 'dzin bsgom pa yin / dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ste / dag pa pa'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā /<br/> tadādikatvādanyānyapi jñeyāni
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zag pa med pa ni / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no / de dang po yin pa'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin par shes par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāvaśyaṃ saṃparāyasukhavihārāyāparihiṇordhvopapannaparinirvṛtānāṃ tadabhāvāt /<br/> darśanāyākṣyabhijñeṣṭā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshe phyi ma la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba ni nges pa med de / yongs su nyams pa dang gong du skyes pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la de med pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">divyacakṣurabhijñā jñānadarśanāya samādhibhāvanā /<br/> dhībhedāya prayogajāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi mngon shes mthong 'gyur 'dod / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni shes pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no / sbyor ba las byung blo dbyer 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad ni shes rab rab tu rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vajropamo'ntye yo dhyāne sāsravakṣayabhāvanā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mtha'i / gang yin de zag zad 'gyur bsgom
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā /<br/> ātmopanāyikī kilaiṣā bhagavato dharmadeśanā /<br/> ataścaturbhya evāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa 'di ni bdag nyid la nyer bar gtod pa yin te / de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi kho nar gsungs so zhes grag go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṛtaḥ samādhīnāṃ kālagato nirdeśaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skabs nas 'ongs ba bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante /<br/> apramāṇāni catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nga ni ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'i skabs yin pas bshang bar bya ste / tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maitrī karuṇā muditopekṣā ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apramāṇasattvālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimarthaṃ catvāryeva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir bzhi kho na yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpādādivipakṣataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vyāpādaviṃhisā 'ratikāmarāgavyāpādabahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya catvāri yathāsaṃkhyam /<br/> aśubhopekṣayoḥ kāmarāgapratipakṣatve ko viśeṣaḥ /<br/> varṇarāgasyāśubhā maithunarāgasyopekṣeti vaibhāṣikāḥ /<br/> evaṃ tu yujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems mang ba rnams kyis de dag spang bar bya ba'i phyir bzhi ste grangs bzhin no / mi sdug pa dang btang snyoms gnyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po nyid du khyad par ci zhig yod ce na / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / kha dog gi 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa'o / 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni btang snyoms so zhes zer ro / 'di skad du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">maithūnarāgasyāśubhā mātāpitṛputrajñātirāgasyopekṣeti /<br/> tatra /<br/> maitryadveṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pha dang ma dang bu dang nye du'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni btang snyoms so zhes bya ba ni rung ngo / de la / zhe sdang med byams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adveṣasvabhāvā maitrī /<br/> api karuṇā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byams pa ni zhe sdang med pa'i rang bzhin no / snying rje yang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karuṇāpyevam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snying rje yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">muditā sumanaskatā /<br/> saumanasyasvabhāvā muditā /<br/> upekṣā 'lobhaḥ /<br/> alobhātmikopekṣā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba ni dga' ba yin / dga' ba ni yid bde ba'i rang bzhin no / btang snyoms ma chags / btang snyoms ni ma chags pa'i bdag nyid yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ vyāpādapratipakṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na gnod sems kyi gnyer po yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya lobhākṛṣṭatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni chags pas drangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayasvabhāvā tvasau yujyate /<br/> eṣāṃ tu maitryādīnāṃ /<br/> ākāraḥ sukhitā duḥkhitā vata /<br/> modantāmiti sattvāśca /<br/> sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni gnyi ga'i rang bzhin yin na rung ngo / byams pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa ni / kye ma bder gyur sdug bsngal dang / dgar gyur sems can rnams snyoms pa / kye ma sems can rnams bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go / kye ma sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo snyam du yid la byed cing snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate /<br/> mādhyasthyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kye ma sems can rnams yid bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing dga' ba la snyoms bar 'jug go / sems can rnams mnyam mo snyam du de ltar yid la byed cing btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug ste / bar mar gnas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati /<br/> santvityabhiprāyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dang mi ldan pa rnams la bde bar mos pa'i phyir ji ltar na phyin ci log nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na / gyur cig snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśayasyāviparītatvādvā 'dhimuktisaṃjñānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na bsam pa phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir te / mos par 'du shes pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā ka evaṃ viparītatve doṣaḥ /<br/> akuśalatvamiti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na de ltar phyin ci log ba nyid yin na yang nyes pa ci zhig yod / gal te mi dge ba nyid yin no zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na kuśalamūlatvādvyāpādādipratipakṣatvācca /<br/> ukta eṣāmākāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma yin te / gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin bas dge ba'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro / 'di dag gi rnam pa ni bshad zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmasattvāstu gocaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod yul 'dod pa'i sems can rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarāḥ sattvā eṣāmālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadālambanānāṃ vyāpādādīnāṃ pratipakṣatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la dmigs pa'i gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattūktamekāṃ diśamadhimucyeteti tadbhājanena bhājanagataṃ darśitam /<br/> katibhūmikānyetāni /<br/> dhyānayormuditā /<br/> prathamadvitīyadhyānayormuditā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs gcig tu mos nas zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni snod kyi snod na gnas pa bstan pa yin no / de dag sa du pa zhig yin zhe na / dga' ba bsam gtan gnyis na yod / dga' ba ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na yod de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saumanasyatvāt /<br/> anyāni ṣaṭsu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yid bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyāni trīṇi apramāṇāni ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu /<br/> anāgamye dhyānāntaredhyāneṣu ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ni drug na / tshad med pa gzhan gsum ni sa drug po mi lcogs pa med ba dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan rnams na yod do / kha cig lnga
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saprayogamaulagrahaṇāt /<br/> kecittu pañcasu /<br/> kecit punaḥ anāgamyaṃ hitvā pañcasvetānīcchanti /<br/> daśasvityapare /<br/> kāmadhātuṃ sāmantakāni ca prakṣipya samāhitāsamāhitamaulalprayogagrahaṇāt /<br/> yaduktaṃ vyāpādādivipakṣata iti kimapramāṇairapi kleśagrahaṇaṃ bhavati /<br/> na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ
