</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig ni 'di dag mi lcogs pa med pa ma gtogs pa lnga na yod par 'dod do / gzhan dag na re 'dod pa'i khams dang nyer bsngogs rnams bsnan nas bcu na yod do zhes zer te / mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba smos pa'i phyir ro / gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir / zhes gang bshad pa / ci tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang nyon mongs pa spong ba yin nam zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mauladhyānabhūmikatvādadhimuktimanaskāratvātsattvālambanatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yis mi spong / bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang mos pa yin la byed pa'i phyir dang sems can la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatprayogeṇa tu vyāpādādiviṣkambhaṇāttatpratipakṣatvamuktam /<br/> prahāṇa dūrīkaraṇācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi sbyor bas gnod sems la sogs pa rnam par gnon pa'i phyir dang spangs pa thag sring bar byed pa'i phyir de dag gi gnyen po nyid du bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmadhātvanāgamyabhūmikāni hi maitryādīni maulāpramāṇasadṛśāni saṃvidyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">byams pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa rnams ni dngos gzhi'i tshad med pa dang 'dra ba dag yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taistānviṣkambhya prahāṇamārgaiḥ prajahāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gis de rnams rnam par mnan nas spong ba'i lam rnams kyis rab tu spong bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato vītarāgāvasthāyāṃ maulāpramāṇalābhāt /<br/> balavatpratyayalābhe 'pi tairanādhṛṣyo bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas skabs na ni dngos gzhi'i tshad med pa rnyed pa'i phyir rkyen stobs dang ldan pa rnyed kyang de dag gis mi brdzi ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punarādikarmiko maitryāṃ prayujyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang las dang po pa byams pa la ji ltar sbyor zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar bdag nyid kyi bde ba nyams pa yod pa'am / gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i thos pa de bzhin du kye ma sems can rnams ni de ltar bde bar gyur cig ces sems can rnams la bde bar mos par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate /<br/> tato madhye mṛdau ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te nyon mongs pa'i 'jug pa shas che ba'i phyir mi nus na des mdza' po'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum du phye nas chen po la bde ba de mos par byed do / de nas 'bring dang chung du la bde ba de mos par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de dag la byams pa mnyam pa thob na de'i 'og tu tha mal pa'i phyogs la mos par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'og tu dgra bo'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum du phye nas chung du la bde ba de mos par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato madhye 'dhimātre ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nas 'bring dang chen po la mos par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate /<br/> tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de la mdza' bo chen po'i phyogs bzhin du bde bar mos ba mi ldog bar gyur na de'i 'og tu rim gyis khyim dang grong dang yul 'khor gyi bar du bde bar mos par byas nas phyogs gcig nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi bar du ba mas pa rgyas par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yastu sarvaguṇagrāhī samaitrīṃ kṣipramutpādayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig thams cad du yon tan 'dzin pa de ni byams pa myur du skyed par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon gyi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu snang ba'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa la yang yon tan gzung bar nus la / rang sangs rgyas la yang skyon gzung bar nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate /<br/> etāni cāpramāṇāni /<br/> nṛṣveva janyante /<br/> manuṣyeṣūtpādyante /<br/> nānyatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">snying rje dang dga' ba la yang de bzhin du sems can sdug bsngal ba rnam pa mang po'i chu bor bying ba 'di dag sdug bsngal las myur du thar kyang ci ma rung / mngon par dga' bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du mos shing dga' ba la sbyor bar byed do / btang snyoms ni tha mal ba'i phyogs las rtsom mo / tshad med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni mi dag gi nang du skyed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ /<br/> kintu /<br/> tryanvito dhruvam /<br/> tṛtīyacaturthadhyānopapanno muditayā na samanvāgato bhavati /<br/> tribhistvapramāṇalābhī nityaṃ samanvāgato bhavati /<br/> aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mi rnams kyi nang du skyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no / ci tshad med pa gcig dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni gdon mi za bar thams cad dang ldan na ma zhe na / thams cad dang ldan pa ni nges pa med do / 'on kyang nges gsum ldan / bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi par skyes pa dag dga' ba dang mi ldan no / tshad med pa gsum dang ni rtag tu ldan pa yin no / rnam par thar pa brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīti dvitīyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ /<br/> catvāra ārupyāḥ /<br/> saṃjñāveditanirodhaścāṣṭamaḥ /<br/> teṣāṃ /<br/> prathamāvaśubhā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yin no / gzugs med pa bzhi dang brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'o / de rnams las / dang po gnyis / mi sdug
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamau dvau vimokṣāvaśubhāsvabhāvau /<br/> vinīlakādyākāratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par thar pa dang po gnyis ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata etayoraśubhāvannayo veditavyaḥ /<br/> etau ca /<br/> dhyānayordvayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de gnyis kyi tshul ni mi sdug pa bzhin du rig par bya'o / de gnyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis na yod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamadvitīyayordhyānayornānyasyāṃ bhūmau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag na yod kyi sa gzhan na ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacaraprathamadhyānabhūmikayorvarṇarāgayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa yathāsaṃkhyam /<br/> tṛtīyo 'ntye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags kyi gnyen por grangs bzhin no / gsum pa mtha' na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śubho vimokṣaścaturthadhyāne /<br/> sa cālobhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa na yod do / de ma chags
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so 'pyalobhasvabhāvo natvaśūbhāsvabhāvaḥ /<br/> śubhākāratvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi sdug pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saparivārāstvete pañcaskandhasvabhāvāḥ /<br/> ārupyavimokṣāstu /<br/> śubhārupyāḥ samāhitāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag 'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no / gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams ni / gzugs med mnyam gzhag dge rnams so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave /<br/> anyadāpyasamāhitāḥ santītyapare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba rnams kho na rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob kyi / nyon mongs pa can rnams kyang ma yin la / mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams kyang ma yin no / 'di lta ste 'chi ba'i srid pa'i tshe lta bu'o / gzhan dag na re gzhan na yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod do zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sāmantakavimukti mārgā api vimokṣākhyāṃ labhante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyer bsngogs kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam dag kyang rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānantaryamārgā adharālambanatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vaimukhyārtho hi vimokṣārtha iti /<br/> nirodhastu samāpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par thar pa'i don ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i don yin no / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃjñāveditanirodhastu aṣṭamo vimokṣo nirodhasamāpattiḥ /<br/> sā ca pūrva nirdiṣṭā /<br/> saṃjñāveditavaimukhyātsarvasaṃskṛtādvā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par thar pa brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin te / de ni sngar bshad zin to / 'du shes dang tshor ba'am / 'du byed thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">samāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣaṇādvimokṣa ityapare /<br/> tāṃ tu samāpadyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro / de la ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sūkṣmasūkṣmādanantaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phra ba phra ba'i mjug thogs su / snyoms par 'jug ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /<br/> samāpannānāṃ tu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'du shes ni phra ba yin te / de bas kyang ches phra bar byas nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug go / snyoms par zhugs pa rnams ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svaśuddhakādharāryeṇa vyutthānaṃ cetasā tataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rang gi dag dang 'og ma yin / 'phags pa'i sems kyis de las ldang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems dag pa'am / ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i sems zag pa med pas de las ldang ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar na de'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems na zag pa dang bcas pa yin la / ldang ba'i sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣāṃ ca vimokṣāṇāṃ /<br/> kāmāptadṛśyaviṣayāḥ prathamāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par thar pa 'di dag las / dang po 'dod gtogs snang yul can
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacarameṣāṃ rūpāyatanamālambanamamanojñaṃ manojñaṃ ca yathāyogam /<br/> ye tvarūpiṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gi dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yid du mi 'ong ba dang yid du 'ong ba yin no / gang dag gzugs can min de dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">te 'nvayajñānapakṣordhvasvabhūduḥkhādigocarāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod yul gong dang rang gi sa'i / sdug bsngal sogs dang rjes shes phyogs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni rang gi sa ba dang sa gong ma pa'i sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu dang 'gog pa dag rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">apratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti vaktavyamākāśaṃ caikasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">so sor ma brtags pas 'gog pa yang yin no zhes brjod par bya'o / nam mkha' yang gcig gis yin no zhes brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmānna tṛtīye dhyāne vimokṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa la rnam par thar pa ma bzhag ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvitīyadhyānabhūmikavarṇarāgābhāvāt sukhamaṇḍeñjitatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmācchubhaṃ vimokṣamutpādayati /<br/> aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa skyed par byed ce na / mi sdug pas rgyud zhum par rab tu dga' bar bya ba'am
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kaccidaśubhāvimokṣau niṣpannāviti /<br/> evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci mi sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa dag grub pa yin nam ma yin zhes brtag pa'i phyir te / gal te sdug par yid la byas kyang nyon mongs pa mi skye na de lta na de gnyis grub pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ yogino vimokṣādīnutpādayanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnal 'byor pa rnams ni rgyu gnyis kyis rnam par thar pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kleśadūrīkaraṇārthaṃ samāpattivaśitvārthaṃ ca /<br/> araṇādiguṇābhinirhārāya āryāyāścarddheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyon mongs pa med ba la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i ched dang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa'i ched du / nyon mongs pa thag bsring bar bya ba'i phyir dang snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang bar bya ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sā punaryayā vastupariṇāmādhiṣṭhānāyurutsargādīni kriyante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yang gang gis dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba dang byin gyis rlob pa dang tshe gtong ba la sogs par byed pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmāttṛtīyāṣṭamayoreva sākṣātkaraṇamuktaṃ nānyeṣām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir gsum pa dang brgyad pa dag khon mngon sum du bya bar bshad la gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradhānatvāddhātubhūmiparyantāvasthitatvācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang khams dang sa'i mtha' na gnas pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung bu ba dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes / zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste / de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamadhimātrāṇi /<br/> adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyevameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du chen po rnams dang de kho na bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyeva punarnīlapītalohitāvadātāni paśyatītyaṣṭau bhavanti /<br/> teṣāṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar bzhi po de dag dang gzugs med par 'du shes pa kho na sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams la lta ba ste / de ltar na brgyad yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayamādyavimokṣavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag las gnyis ni rnam par thar pa dang po bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye /<br/> dve dvitīyavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par thar pa dang po ji lta bar zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis po dang gnyis pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis ni gnyis pa bzhin no / rnam par thar pa gnyis pa ji lta bar zil gyis gnon po'i skye mched gnyis po gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyāni punaḥ śubhavimokṣavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā śubho vimokṣa evamanyāni catvāri
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ji lta bar gzhan bzhi yang de dang 'dra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ tairvaimukhyamātram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni khyad par yin te / de dag gis ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa tsam du zad la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ebhistvālambanābhibhavanaṃ yathecchamadhimokṣāt kleśānutpādācca /<br/> daśa kṛtsnāni /<br/> daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni nirantarakṛtsnaspharaṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di dag gis ni dmigs pa zil gyis gnon te / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mos pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro / zad par bcu'o / bar chad med par zad par rgyas par byed pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛthivyaptejovāyunīlapītalohitāvadātakṛtsnāni /<br/> ākāśavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne ca /<br/> teṣām /<br/> alobhāṣṭau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad par sa dang chu dang me dang rlu [*rlung] dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do / de rnams las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prathamānyaṣṭāvalobhasvabhāvāni /<br/> dhyāne 'ntye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">brgyad ma chags / dang po brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no / bsam gtan mtha' na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturtha eva dhyāne /<br/> gocaraḥ punaḥ /<br/> kāmāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na na yod do / spyod yul ni 'dod pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kāmāvacararūpāyatanameṣā mālambanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāyoḥ spraṣṭavyāyatana mityeke /<br/> dve śuddhakārupye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kha cig na re rlung gi ni reg bya'i skye mched yin no zhes zer ro / de gnyis ni gzugs med dag
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dve paścime kṛtsne śuddhakārūpyasvabhāve
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zad par gyi skye mched tha ma gnyis ni gzugs med pa dag pa pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svacatuḥskandhagocare
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyod yul rang gi phung po bzhi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">svabhūmikāścatvāraḥ skandhā anyorālambanam /<br/> vimokṣaprāveśikānyabhibhvāyatanāni /<br/> abhibhvāyatanaprāveśikāni kṛtsnāyatanāni /<br/> uttarottaraviśiṣṭatvāt /<br/> sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di gnyis kyi dmigs pa ni rang gis pa'i phung po bzhi yin no / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams ni rnam par thar pa 'jug pa las byung ba can yin la / zad par gyi skye mched rnams ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched 'jug pa las byung ba can yin te / gong nas gong du khyad bar du 'phags pa'i phyir ro / 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs pa rnam par thar ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad ni so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa dag yin no / ci rnam par thar pa la sogs pa de dag sbyor ba las byung ba yin nam 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin zhes bya ba'i 'dri ba 'di la 'gog ba bshad zin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirodha uktaḥ /<br/> nirodhavimokṣaḥ pūrvamevoktaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sngar rnam pa thams cad du bshad zin to / lhag ma ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vairāgyaprayogāptaṃ tu śeṣitam /<br/> nirodhādanyāni vimokṣādīni vairāgyalābhikāni prāyogikāṇi ca /<br/> ucitānucitatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dod chags bral dang sbyor bas 'thob / 'gog pa las gzhan pa'i rnam par thar pa la sogs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yang yin la sbyor ba las byung ba dag kyang yin te / 'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tridhātvāśrayamārūpyasaṃjñaṃ śeṣaṃ manuṣyajam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med ces bya khams gsum gyi / rten can lhag ma mi las skye
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang gzugs med pa'i zad par ni khams gsum pa'i rten can dag yin no / lhag ma ni mi'i rten can kho na yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upadeśasāmarthyenotpādanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung gi mthus skyed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ rūpārupyadhātvorārūpyadhyānaviśeṣotpādanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa dang bsam gtan gyi khyad par skye zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tribhiḥ kāraṇairdhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāmupapattirhetukarmadharmatābalaiḥ /<br/> tatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu dang las dang chos nyid dang / rgyu gsum gyis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams skye ste / de la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetukarmabalāddhātvorārūpyotpādanaṃ dvayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khams gnyis dag tu gzugs med pa / rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayo rūpārūpyadhātvorārūpyasamāpattyutpādanam /<br/> hetubalādāsannābhīkṣṇābhyāsāt karmabalāccordhvabhūmikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba rgyu'i stobs kyis ni nye ba dang yang dang yang du goms pa la sa so / las kyi stobs kyis ni sa gong ma'i lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyadhastādavīta rāgeṇordhva śakyamutpattumiti /<br/> dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'og ma las 'dod chags dang ma bral bas ni gong du skye bar mi nus so / gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams / de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzugs kyi khams su ni bsam gtan gzhan rgyu dang las kyi stobs de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang skye ste / 'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadānīṃ hi sarvasttvā evādharabhūmikāstaddhyānamutpādayanti /<br/> kṛtsnānāṃ dharmāṇāmudbhūtavṛttitvāt /<br/> kiyacciraṃ punarayaṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /<br/> yatreme īdṛśānām dharmāṇāṃ prakārāḥ prajñāyante /<br/> saddharmo dvividhaḥ śāsturāgamādhigamātmakaḥ /<br/> tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ /<br/> dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca /<br/> āgamasya hi dhārayitāro vaktāraḥ /<br/> adhigamasya pratipattāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i tshe ni sa 'og ma pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos rnams kyi 'jug pa shas che ba nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan de skyed par byed do / gang la chos rnams kyi rnam pa ni du yod / 'di lta bu'i mngon pa'i chos 'di ji srid du gnas she na / ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te / lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do / de la lung ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa rnams so / rtogs ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams te / de ltar na dam pa'i chos 'di ni rnam pa gnyis yin no / de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang / sgrub par byed pa khon yin / lung 'dzin par byed pa ni smra bar byed pa yin no / rtogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir de nyid ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dam pa'i chos gnas par rig par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāṃ tu varṣasahasra mavasthānamāhuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag kyang lo stong du gnas so zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adhigamasyaivam /<br/> āgamasya tu bhūyāṃsaṃ kālamityapare /<br/> yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ /<br/> kāśmīravaibhāṣikanītisiddhaḥ prāyo mayā 'yaṃ kathito 'bhidharmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan dag na re rtogs pa ni de lta bu yin gyi / lung ni yun ring du gnas so zhes zer ro / ci bstan bcos 'dir chos mngon pa bshad pa gang yin pa'i chos mngon pa 'di nyid ston pas bshad dam zhe na / bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni / kha che bye brag smra ba'i tshul grub bshad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaddurgṛhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau manayaḥ pramāṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nyes par zin gang de 'dir bdag gis nyes / dam chos tshul la tshad ma thub rnams yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ /<br/> yadatrāsmābhirdurgṛhītaṃ so 'smākamaparādhaḥ /<br/> saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gis chos mngon pa 'di phal cher kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi tshul du grub par bshad pa yin no / 'di la bdag gis nyes par zin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gis nyes pa yin te / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul la ni sangs rgyas rnams 'khon dang sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams tshad ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing / dbang gyur skye bo phal cher zad pa na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">adṛṣṭatattvairniravagrahaiḥ kṛtaṃ kutārkikaiḥ śāsanametadākulam /<br/> gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur ba yi / ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so / rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams / mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jagatyanāthe gunaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'doms med yon tan 'joms bar byed pa yi / dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iti kaṇṭhagataprāṇaṃ viditvā śāsanaṃ muneḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni / lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ /<br/> navamaṃ kośasthānam /<br/> namo buddhāya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni / thar pa 'dod bdag gis bag yod gyis [*kyis] / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las snyoms par 'dug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ khalvato 'nyatra mokṣo nāsti /<br/> nāsti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang ci 'di las gzhan la thar pa yod dam zhe na / med do / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log la zhen pa nyid kyi phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahi te skandhasaṃtāna evātmaprajñaptiṃ vyavasyanti /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po'i rgyud kho na la bdag tu 'dogs pa ni nges par mi 'dzin to / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ parikalpayanti ātmagrāhaprabhavāśca sarvakleśā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rdzas gzhan kho na la bdag tu yongs su rtogs par byed la / nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las rab tu skye ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti /<br/> pratyakṣānumānābhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu mngon par brjod pa 'di ni phung po'i rgyud kho na la 'jug gi / brjod par bya ba gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir te / chos gang dag yod pa de dag ni bar chad byed pa med na mngon sum du dmigs pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadyathā ṣaṇṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ manasaśca /<br/> anumānaṃ ca /<br/> tadyathā pañcānāmindriyāṇām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na yul drug dang yid lta bu'o / yang na rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa yin te / dper na dbang po lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatredamanumānam /<br/> sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya /<br/> satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca /<br/> atastatrāpi kāraṇāntarasyābhāvo bhāvaśca niścīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin te / rgyu yod kyang rgyu gzhan med na 'bras bu med par mthong la yod na ni yang yod par mthong ba ste / dper na myu gu lta bu'o / yul snang bar gyur pa dang rgyu yid la byed pa yod kyang yul 'dzin pa med par mthong la / yang yod par mthong ba ste / long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa dang ma long ba dang ma 'on pa la sogs pa lta bu'o / de'i phyir de la yang rgyu gzhan med pa dang yod par nges la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca tatkāraṇāntaraṃ tadindriyamityetadanumānam /<br/> na caivamātmano 'stīti nāstyātmā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyu gzhan gang yin bde ni dbang po yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin no / bdag ni de ltar yod pa ma yin pas bdag med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattrhi vātsīputriyāḥ pudgalaṃ santimicchanti /<br/> vicāryaṃ tāvadetat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang gnas ma'i bu rnams gang zag yod par 'dod pa ji lta bu / 'di ni re zhig dpyad par bya ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ te dravyata icchantyāhosvit prajñaptitaḥ /<br/> kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci de dag rdzas su 'dod dam / 'on te btags par 'dod / rdzas su zhes bya ba 'di yang ci yang ci zhig / btags par zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rūpādivat bhāvāntaraṃ cet dravyataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po gzhan zhig yin no zhe na ni rdzas su yod pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣīrādivat samudāyaścet prajñaptitaḥ /<br/> kiṃ cātaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'o ma la sogs pa bzhin du spyi yin no zhe na ni btags par yod pa yin no / de las cir 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tāvat dravyataḥ /<br/> saṃbhinna svabhāvatvāt skandhebhyo 'nyo vaktavya itaretaraskandhavat /<br/> kāraṇaṃ cāsya vaktavyam /<br/> asaṃskṛto vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig gal te rdzas su yod na ni de rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir phung po rnams las gzhan no zhes brjod par bya ste / phan tshun gyi phung po bzhin no / 'di'i rgyu yang brjod dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atastīrthikadṛṣṭiprasaṅgo niṣprayojanatvaṃ ca /<br/> atha prajñaptitaḥ /<br/> vayamapyevaṃ trūmaḥ /<br/> naiva hi dravyato 'sti nāpi prajñaptitaḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> ādhyātmikānupāttānvarttamānān skandhānupādāya pudgalaḥ prajñapyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'dus ma byas yin na ni de'i phyir mu stegs can gyi lta bar yang thal bar 'gyur la / dgos pa med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro / 'on te btags par yod do zhe na ni kho bo cag kyang de skad ces smras so / de ni rdzas su yod pa kho na yang ma yin la btags par yod pa yang ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / da ltar gyi nang gi zin pa'i phung po rnams rgyur byas nas gang zag tu 'dogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadidamandhavacanamanunmīlitārthaṃ na budhyāmahe /<br/> kimidamupādāyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">long ba lta bu'i tshig don mi gsal ba 'di ni mi go'o / rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba 'di ci
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'di'i don phung po rnams la dmigs nas zhes bya ba 'di yin no zhe na ni / de dag kho na la gang zag tu 'dogs par zad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā rūpādīnālamvya teṣveva kṣīraprajñaptiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs nas / de dag kho na la 'o ma 'dogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāyamarthaḥ skandhān pratīyeti /<br/> skandhānāṃ pudgalaprajñaptikāraṇatvāt /<br/> sa eva doṣaḥ /<br/> na sa evaṃ prajñapyate /<br/> kathaṃ tarhi yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'di'i don phung po rnams la brten nas zhes bya ba 'di yin no zhe na ni phung po rnams gang zag gdags pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir skyon de nyid du 'gyur ro / de ni de ltar mi 'dogs so / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / ji ltar bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ cendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate /<br/> na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs she na / bud shing med par me mi 'dogs mod kyi / bud shing las me gzhan yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus la / gzhan ma yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hānyaḥ syādanuṣṇamindhanaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gzhan yin na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athānanyaḥ syāddāhyameva dāhakaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gzhan ma yin na ni bsreg bya nyid sreg byed yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar phung po rnams med par yang gang zag mi 'dogs la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po rnams las gzhan yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus te rtag par thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāpyananya ucchedaprasaṅgaditi /<br/> aṅga tāvadbrūhi kigindhanaṃ ko 'nniriti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan ma yin par yang dam bca' bar mi nus te chad par thal bar 'gyur ro / re zhig kye bud shing ni ci
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato jñāsyāmaḥ kathamindhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">me ni ci yin pa smros shig dang de las ji ltar na bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs par shes par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kimatra vaktavyaṃ dāhyamindhanaṃ dāhako 'gniḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la ci zhig brjod par bya / bsreg bya ni bud shing yin la sreg byed ni me yin par zad mod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dir bsreg bar bya ba ni ci / sreg par byed pa ni ci yin pa de nyid brjod par bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig 'jig rten na ni shing la sogs ba ma 'bar ba la bud shing zhes kyang bya la bsreg bya zhes kyang bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradīptamagnirdāhakaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bar ba la ni me zhes kyang bya la sreg byed ces kyang bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bar ba dang shin tu tsha ba gang yin pa des de tshig pa dang sreg par byed de
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃtativikārāpādānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">taccobhayamaṣṭadravyakaṃ taccegdhanaṃ pratītyāgnirutpadyate /<br/> yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam /<br/> tasmādhigdhanamupādāyetyucyate /<br/> anyaśca sa tasmādbhinnakālatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gnyi ga yang rdzas brgyad pa yin no / bud shing la brten nas me 'byung ba de yang dper na 'o ma la brten nas zho 'byung ba dang mngar po la brten nas tsha ba 'byung ba lta bu yin te / de lta bas na bud shing rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba la de ni de dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante /<br/> tayorapi siddhamanyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te shing la sogs pa 'bar ba de nyid la dro ba nyid yod pa gang yin pa de ni me yin la / de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba gsum ni bud shing yin par 'dod na ni de gnyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin par grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">upādāyārthastu vaktavyaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ tadindhanamupādāya so 'gniḥ prajñapyata iti /<br/> na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /<br/> agnireva hi tatprajñapteḥ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar na bud shing de rgyur byas nas me 'dogs par byed ba rgyur byas pa'i don yang brjod dgos te / de ni de'i rgyu yang ma yin la de gdags ba'i rgyu yang ma yin gyi ma nyid de gdags ba'i rgyu yin no

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadabhāve ca pudgalābhāvaḥ prāpnoti /<br/> indhanabhāva ivāgnyabhāvaḥ

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate /<br/> tadupādāyārthaśca vaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na don tha dad pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do / 'on te shing la sogs pa 'bar bde dag thams cad bud shing yang yin la me yang yin par 'dod na ni des na rgyur byas pa'i don yang brjod par bya'o

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyamiti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti /<br/> tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā /<br/> rūpavacca pudgalasyānyatvaṃ spaṣṭam /<br/> idaṃ tāvadvaktavyam

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ kṛtvā /<br/> cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā /<br/> evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar byas pas she na / gal te mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas / gang zag dmigs par byed na ni gang zag mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la / gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya / gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o / de bzhin du yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyi bar la brten nas / gang zag dmigs bar byed na ni / gang zag yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la / chos rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya la / chos rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o

</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas 'o ma 'am / chu dmigs par byed na ni 'o ma 'am chu mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya / gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o / de bzhin du gal te sna dang lce dang lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par brjod par bya la / reg bya rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya / reg bya rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya ste / 'o ma dang chu gnyis bzhi nyid du thal bar 'gyur du 'ong bas so / de'i phyir ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i spyi kho na la / 'o ma 'am / chu zhes 'dogs pa de bzhin du phung bo rnams la gang zag 'dogs so zhes bya bar grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko 'sya vākyasyārthaḥ /<br/> kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi rūpamapyālokacakṣurmanaskārebhyo 'nyanna vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni 'o na gzugs kyang snang ba dang mig dang yid la byed pa dag las gzhan du brjod par mi bya ste

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaivaṃ na paricchidyate /<br/> kathamidaṃ pratijñāyate rūpamapyasti pudgalo 'pyastīti /<br/> upalabdhivaśena hi tasyāstitvaṃ pratijñāyate

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha rūpapudgalavaktadupalabdhyorapyanyānanyatvamavaktavyam /<br/> tena tarhi saṃskṛte 'pyavaktavyaṃ bhavatīti siddhāntabhedaḥ /<br/> yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ rūpamanātmā yāvadvijñānamanātmeti /<br/> yena cāyaṃ cakṣurvijñānena pudgala upalabhyate /<br/> kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā /<br/> yadi rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">notsahiṣyate pudgalaṃ vijñātuṃ śabdādivat /<br/> yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas skye'o zhes gsungs so

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā iti sūtre vacanāt

</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca pudgalaḥ ṣaḍvijñānavijñeyaḥ pratijñāyate /<br/> sa śrotravijñānavijñeyatvādrūpādanyaḥ prāpnoti śabdhavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang gang zag rnam par shes pa drug gis rnam par shes bar bya ba yin par dam 'cha' na ni de rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs las gzhan yin par 'gyur te / sgra bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">caturvijñānavijñeyatvācchabdādanyaḥ prāpnoti rūpavat /<br/> evamanyebhyo 'pi yojyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir sgra las gzhan yin par 'gyur te gzugs bzhin no / de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ ca sūtrapadaṃ vādhitaṃ bhavati /<br/> yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bram ze dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad pa can yin zhing yul tha dad ba can yin te / rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul so sor nyams su myong ba yin gyi gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba ni ma yin pa dag ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānyadanyasya gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavati /<br/> tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam /<br/> mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇamiti /<br/> na vā pudgalo viṣayaḥ /<br/> na cedviṣayo na tarhi vijñeyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di lta ste / mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po lnga'o / yid kyi dbang bo ni dbang po lnga po 'di dag gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba yin zhing / yid kyi dbang po ni 'di dag gi rten yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig 'di dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro / yang na gang zag yul ma yin par 'gyur ro / gal te yul ma yin no zhe na / 'o na ni rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyevaṃ manaindriyasyāpyavyabhicāraḥ prāpnoti /<br/> ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame /<br/> na ttrendriyamemvendriyaṃ kṛtvoktam /<br/> pañcānāṃ darśanādyā kāṅkṣaṇāsaṃbhavāt tadvijñānānāṃ ca /<br/> atastadādhipatyādhyākṛtamatra manovijñānendriyaṃ kṛtvoktam /<br/> yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de lta na yid kyi dbang po yang 'khrul pa med bar 'gyur te / srog chags drug pa lta bu'i mdo las / dbang po drug po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad ba can yin zhing yul tha dad pa can yin te / rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul 'dod pa dag yin no zhes gsungs so / der ni dbang po kho na la dbang po yin par ma gsungs kyi lnga po dang de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams ni mthong ba la sogs par 'dod mi srid pa'i phyir de dag gi dbang gis drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dbang po yin par gsungs so / yid kyi dbang po 'ba' zhig gis drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni de las gzhan pa dag gi spyod yul la mi 'dod pa nyid pas de'i phyir de nyes pa med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca bhagavatā sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmītyuktvā cakṣurabhijñeyaṃ rūpāṇi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yadapi taccakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayamadhyātmamutpadyate veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs nas / mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ni mig dang gzugs rnams dang mig gi rnam par shes ba dang mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang gang yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de dang zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ayamucyate sarvābhijñeyaparijñeyo dharmaparyāyaḥ iti /<br/> ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ /<br/> tasmādvijñeyo 'pyasau na bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad yin no zhes gsungs so / de'i phyir mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ni de snyed cig yin par nges par gzung gi / gang zag ni ma yin pas / de lta bas na 'di rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñāvijñānayoḥ samānaviṣayatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shes rab dang rnam par shes pa gnyis ni yul 'dra ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti /<br/> sūtre ca bhagavatā nītametat /<br/> skandheṣveva pudgalādhyeti mānuṣyakasūtram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag pa rnams mig gis gang zag blta'o zhes gang zag lta ba ni bdag med pas bdag blta'o zhes bya ba yin pas bdag tu lta ba'i gnas su gyur ba yang yin no / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo las / phung bo rnams kho na la gang zag ces bya'o zhes 'di nges par mdzad do / nges pa'i don gyi mdo las kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate /<br/> atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti /<br/> atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti /<br/> atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti /<br/> iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātrakamevaita dvyavahāramātrakamevaitat /<br/> sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /<br/> nītārthaṃ ca sūtraṃ pratisaraṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā /<br/> tasmānna punaḥ parīkṣyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o / gsum 'dus pas ni reg pa'o / lhan cig skyes pas ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa dag ste / de ltar na gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po de bzhin dang gzugs can mig gi dbang po dang de snyed cig la mi nyid ces bya'o / 'di la sems can dang ming dang shed las skyes dang shed bu dang gso ba dang gang zag dang srog dang skye bo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming yin no / 'di la bdag gis mig gi gzugs rnams blta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni khas 'che ba yin no / 'di la ni 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa de'i ming ni 'di zhes bya / rigs ni 'di zhes bya / rus ni 'di zhes bya / kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong / tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub / yun ni ji srid cig gnas / tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig go zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad yin no / dge slong dag de ltar na 'di dag ni ming tsam / 'di dag khas 'che ba tsam / 'di dag ni tha snyad tsam ste / chos 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa / 'dus byas pa / sems pas 'phangs pa / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag yin no zhes gsungs so / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo la brten par gsungs te / de lta bas na 'di ni yang dang yang du brtag par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathā coktaṃ sarvamastīti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyanānīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du bram ze thams cad yod do zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu zad do zhes kyang gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gang zag 'di skye mched ma yin na ni de yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athāyatanaṃ na tarhyavaktavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te skye mched yin no zhe na / 'o na ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ceti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag gi ltar na yang 'di skad du dge slong mi ji snyed pa dang gzugs ji snyed pa zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs nas / dge slong 'di ji snyed cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dogs par mdzad do / thams cad brtags so zhes gsungs so zhes 'don to / gzugs can snying po'i mdo las kyang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bimbisārasūtre coktam ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate iti vistaraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge slong dag bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas brtags pa la lhung bar zad de / 'di la bdag ga bdag gi ni med kyi sdug bsngal 'di skye ba na skye bar zad do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śailayāpyarhantyā māramārabhyoktaṃ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dgra bcom pa drug gis kyang bdud las brtsams nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /<br/> śūnyaḥ saṃskārapuñjo 'yaṃ nahi sattvjotra vidyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems can zhes bya bdud ci sems / khyod ni lta bar gyur pa yin / 'du byed phung po 'di stong ste /  / 'di la sems can yod ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathaiva hyaṅgasaṃbhārātsaṃjñā ratha iti smṛtā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar yan lag tshogs rnams la / shing rta'i ming du bshad pa ltar
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas / kun rdzob sems can zhes bya'o / zhes bshad do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣadrake 'pi cāgame dāridrabrāhmaṇamathikṛtyoktaṃ /<br/> śṛṇu tvaṃ svādare dharmaḥ sarvagranthipramocanam /<br/> yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lung phran tshegs las kyang / bram ze rgya shug gi bu'i dbang du byas nas / ji ltar sems ni kun nyon mongs / ji ltar sems ni rnam byang dang / mdud pa thams cad 'jig byed pa'i / chos ni rgya shug bu khyod nyon
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmaiva hyātmano nāsti viparītena kalpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag nyid kyis ni bdag med de / phyin ci log gis rtogs par byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di la bdag gam sems can med / chos 'di dag ni rgyu dang bcas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvādaśaiva bhavāṅgāni skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang / phung po skye mched khams rnams te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vicintya sarvāṇyetāni pudgalo nopalabhyate /<br/> śūnyamadhyātmakaṃ paśya śūnyaṃ paśya bahirgatam /<br/> na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rnam par bsams na 'di kun la / gang zag dmigs pa ma yin no / nang gi stong pa yin par ltos / phyi rol gnas pa stong par ltos / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa / de yang 'ga' yang mi dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathoktaṃ pañcādīnavā ātmopalambhe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes gsungs so / de bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa la nyes dmigs lnga yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmadṛṣṭirbhavati sattvadṛṣṭiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang srog tu lta bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ sārdham /<br/> unmārgapratipanno bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu stegs can rnams dang khyad par med par 'gyur / lam gol bar zhugs par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i sems stong pa nyid la mi 'jug cing rab tu dang bar mi 'gyur la yang dag par mi gnas pas rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āryadharmā asya na vyavadāyanta iti /<br/> na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> nāsmākamayaṃ nikāye paṭhacyata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / de dag ni gzhung 'di tshad mar mi byed pa nyid do / ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di kho bo cag gi sde pa mi 'don to zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ punasteṣāṃ nikāya eva pramāṇamāhosvidbuddhavacanam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci de dag la sde pa kho na tshad ma yin nam / 'on te sangs rgyas kyi bka' tshad ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā /<br/> na ca te śākyaputrīyā bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sde pa kho na tshad ma yin na 'o na ni de dag gi ston pa yang sangs rgyas ma yin la / sh'akya'i bu yang ma yin par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha buddhavacanaṃ pramāṇam /<br/> ayaṃ granthaḥ kasmānna pramāṇam /<br/> nahi kilaitat buddhavacanamiti /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te sangs rgyas kyi bka' tshad ma yin no zhe na ni gzhung 'di ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no / de ci'i phyir zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāsmākaṃ nikāye paṭhacyata iti /<br/> ayamanyāyo vartate /<br/> ko 'trānyāyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kho bo cag gi sde pa mi 'don pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro zhes grag go / 'di ni mi rigs par zhugs pa yin no / 'dir mi rigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram /<br/> kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti sarvadharmā anātāna iti /<br/> syāt matam /<br/> naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhung gang zhig sde pa gzhan thams cad las 'byung la mdo dang chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal bde kho bo cag mi 'don pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes smra ba ste / gzu lums tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad do / gzhan yang de dag la chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di yang med dam / gang zag ni chos zhes kyang mi bya la chos las gzhan zhes kyang mi bya'o zhes bya bar 'dod par gyur na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi na manovijñeyaḥ sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni yid kyi rnam par shes par bya bar mi 'grub ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādaḥ ityavadhāraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes nges par gsungs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">iha caivaṃ vikalpyate anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med pa la bdag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na la yang ji ltar rtog
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ /<br/> nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ yattāvaduktaṃ prāk no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no veti tattāvadaśocam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa phyin ci log yin gyi bdag la ni ma yin no / bdag med pa yang gang zhig yin / phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams yin no / re zhig sngar gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o / gzugs rnams ma yin zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa ni bsal to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāniti /<br/> tasmātsarva evānātmanyātmagrāhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdo gzhan las / dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la bdag go snyam du rjes su lta ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kho na la zhes gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathoktaṃ ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāniti /<br/> yadyevamidaṃ kasmādāha rūpavānahamabhūvamatīte adhvanīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na bdag tu 'dzin pa thams cad ni bdag med pa kho na la yin no / de bzhin du gang la sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum rjes su dran par gyur tam / rjes su dran nam / rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kho na la zhes gsungs so / gal te de lta na ni ci'i phyir bdag ni 'das pa'i dus na gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to zhes gsungs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamanekavidhaṃ ye samanusmarantīti pradarśayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang dag de ltar rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba rab tu ston par byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /<br/> apāṭha eva tvanna śaraṇaṃ syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gang zag gzugs dang ldan par lta bar gyur na 'jig tshogs la lta bar thal bar 'gyur bas 'di la ni ma bton pa kho na skyabs yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt prajñāptisatpudgalo rāśidhārāvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na gang zag ni btags pa'i yod pa yin te / phung po dang rgyun la sogs pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti /<br/> na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te de ltar na 'on ni sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur te / thams cad shes par 'gyur ba'i sems sam sems las byung ba gang yin pa de ni cung zad kyang med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣaṇikatvāt /<br/> pudgalastu jānīyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir gang zag gis ni shes par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ni 'o na sems 'jig pa na gang zag mi 'jig par khas blangs pa'i phyir 'di rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> sāmarthyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kho bo cag ni thams cad mkhyen pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa yin par ni mi smra'o / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / mthu yod pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam /<br/> āha cātra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rgyud gang yin pa de la gang du bzhed par gtang ba tsam gyis phyin ci ma log pa'i mkhyen pa skye ba gang yin pa'i mthu 'di yod do / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃtānena samarthatvādyathāgniḥ sarvabhuṅmataḥ /<br/> tathā sarvavideṣṭavyo 'sakṛtsarvasya vedanāt /<br/> kathamidaṃ gamyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyun gyis spyod pa'i phyir na dper / me yis thams cad sreg 'dod lta / de bzhin thams cad mkhyen 'dod bya'i / cig car thams cad mkhyen phyir min / 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atītādivacanāt /<br/> ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'das pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir te / rdzogs sangs rgyas 'das gang dag dang / sangs rgyas ma byon gang dag dang
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da lta'i rdzogs sangs rgyas gang yin / mang po rnams ni mya ngan sel / zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khyed cag kyang phung po rnams kho na dus gsum pa yin par 'dod kyi gang zag ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi skandhā eva pudgalāḥ kasmādidamāha /<br/> bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ceti /<br/> kasmādidaṃ na vaktavyaṃ syāt /<br/> na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> nahyevaṃ dṛśyata iti /<br/> avaktavyo 'pi na yuktaḥ /<br/> kiṃ kāraṇam /<br/> na hyevaṃ dṛśyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te phung po rnams kho na gang zag yin na ci'i phyir dge slong dag khyed la khur yang bstan to / khur len pa dang khur 'dor ba dang khur khyer ba yang bstan gyi zhes gsungs / ci'i phyir gsungs par mi bya / khur nyid khur khyer ba yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te / ci'i phyir zhe na / de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro / brjod par bya ba ma yin pa yang rigs pa ma yin te / ci'i phyir zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhārādānasyāpi skandhāsaṃgrahaprasaṅgācca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro / khur len pa yang phung pos ma bsdus par yang thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityarthameva bhārahāraṃ nirdideśa bhagavān /<br/> yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">khur khyer ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bya ba nas yun ni 'di srid cig gnas nas tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig go zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa de nyid shes par 'gyur zhing
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti /<br/> skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ /<br/> upaghātārtho hi bhāra iti /<br/> asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /<br/> kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /<br/> sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtag pa'am gang zag ces bya ba gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ba don de kho na'i phyir bstan te phung po snga ma rnams kho na phung po phyi ma rnams la gnod par byed pa yin pas khur dang khur khyer ba zhes bshad pa yin no / gang zag ni yod pa nyid de / 'di ltar sems can skye ba ba med do zhes zer ba ni log par lta ba yin no zhes gsungs so / sems can skye ba pa med do zhes su zer / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ba ltar yod do / zhes zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na 'di ni gang zhig pha rol du skye ba pa sems can zhes bya ba phung po'i rgyun la sems can skye ba pa med do zhes skur pa 'debs pa de'i log par lta ba yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhānām upapādukatvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po rnams ni skye ba pa yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa 'di log par lta ba yin na yang ci zhig gis spang bar bya bar 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nahyeṣā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā yujyate /<br/> pudgalasya sattveṣvantarbhāvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin par yang mi rung la bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin par yang mi rung ste / gang zag bden pa rnams kyi khongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'jig rten na yang gang zag gcig pu skye ba na skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir phung po rnams ma yin no zhen ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> samudāye 'pyekopacārādekatilaikataṇḍulavat ekarāśyekavacanavacca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">spyi la yang gcig nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir til gcig dang 'bras thug po che gcig ces bya ba lta bu dang phung po gcig dang tshig gcig ces bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na gang zag 'dus byas yin no zhes bya bar brjod par bya ste / skye ba dang ldan pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni ji ltar phung po rnams sngon med pa las byung ba de ltar skye ba ni ma yin no
