</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhāntaropādānāt /<br/> yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt /<br/> bhikṣurjātaḥ parivrājako jāta iti liṅgopādānāt /<br/> buddhojāto vyādhito jāta ityavasthāntaropādānāditi /<br/> na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām /<br/> iti hibhikṣavo 'sti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ji lta bu zhe na / phung po gzhan len pa'i phyir te / dper na rig pa blangs pa'i phyir mchod sbyin pa skyes so / brda sprod pa pa skyes so zhes bya ba dang rtags blangs pa'i phyir dge slong skyes so / kun du rgyu skyes so zhes bya ba dang gnas skabs gzhan blangs pa'i phyir rga ba skyes so / na ba skyes so zhes bya ba bzhin no / ma yin te / bkag pa'i phyir ro / bcom ldan 'das kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mdo khon las / dge slong dag las ni yod do / rnam par smin pa ni yod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa gang zhig phung po 'di rnams 'dor bar byed cing phung po gzhan dag nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i byed pa po ni mi dmigs so zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalgusūtre coktam upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti /<br/> tasmānnāsti skandhānāṃ kaścidupādātā nāpi nikṣiptā /<br/> kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate /<br/> dṛṣṭātaṃ karoti pudgalaṃ yadi /<br/> so 'siddhaḥ /<br/> atha cittacaittāḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dbo las skyes kyi mdo las kyang / dbo las skyes len ces mi ba'o zhes gsungs te / de lta bas na phung po rnams len par byed pa yang 'ga' yang med la / 'dor bar byed pa yang med do / re zhig khyod mchod sbyin pa nas rga ba'i bar gang gi dbang du byas nas dper byed / gal te gang zag yin no zhen ni de ma grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na /<br/> teṣāṃ pratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattireva /<br/> atha śarīram /<br/> tasyāpi tathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yin no zhe na ni de dag skad cig re re la sngon med pa las skye ba khon yin no / 'on te lus yin no zhe na / de yang de dang 'dra la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śarīravidyāliṅgavacca skandhapudgalayoranyatvamāpadyate /<br/> jīrṇa śarīrāntarameva jyādhitaṃ ca /<br/> pratiṣiddho hi sāṃkhyīyaḥ pariṇāmavādaḥ /<br/> tasmādadṛṣṭāntā ete
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lus dang rig ba dang rtags bzhin du phung po dang gang zag gnyis gzhan nyid du yang 'gyur ro / rga ba dang na ba yang lus gzhan khon yin no / grangs can pa'i 'gyur bar smra ba ni bkag zin to / de lta bas na 'di dag ni dpe ngan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang phung po rnams ni sngon med pa las skyes pa yin la / gang zag ni ma yin par 'dod na ni de de dag las gzhan pa dang rtag par gsal bar yongs su bstan pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po ni lnga'o / gang zag ni gcig go zhes smra bas ji ltar na gzhan nyid du mi brjod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam /<br/> pākṣika eṣa doṣaḥ /<br/> katamasminpakṣa
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig ji ltar na 'byung ba dag ni bzhi yin / gzugs ni gcig yin la 'byung ba rnams las gzugs gzhan yang ma yin / smra ba 'di ni phyogs la yod pa yin no / phyogs gang la zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhūtamātrikapakṣe
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'byung ba tsam pa'i phyogs la'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na yang ji ltar 'byung ba tsam gzugs yin pa de bzhin du phung po tsam gang zag yin par khas blangs pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te phung po tsam gang zag yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srog de nyid lus yin pa'am / gzhan yin no zhes lung ma bstan zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā /<br/> sa hi jīvadravyamekamantarvyāpāra puruṣamadhikṛtya pṛṣṭavān /<br/> sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām /<br/> kaurmasyeva romṇo 'ntaḥkharatā mṛdutā vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos pa'i phyir te / des na ni nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu srog gi rdzas gcig po dris so / de yang 'ga' yang med na 'di ji ltar gzhan nyid dam gzhan ma yin pa nyid lung bstan par bya ste / rus sbal gyi yul ba shor ram 'jam zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">eṣa ca granthaḥ pūrvakaireva nirmocitaḥ /<br/> sthāviro hi nāgasenaḥkaliṅgena rājñopasaṃkramyoktaḥ /<br/> pṛccheyamahaṃ bhadantam bahuvollakāśca śravaṇā bhavanti /<br/> yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /<br/> pṛcchetyuktaḥ pṛṣṭavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mdud pa 'di ni snga ma dag kho nas kyang bkrol zin te / rgyal po des 'du sbyin gnas brtan klu sde'i thad du 'ongs nas btsun pa dge sbyong rnams ni smra ba mang ba ma lags so / gal te gang dris pa de nyid lan 'debs na bdag 'dri bar 'tshal lo zhes smras so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ nu sa jīvastaccharīramanyio jīvo 'nyaccharīramiti /<br/> avyākṛtametadityavocat sthaviraḥ /<br/> sa āha /<br/> nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti /<br/> kimidamanyadevoktamavyākṛtametaditi /<br/> sthavira āha /<br/> ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drir gsol zhes smras pa dag ci lags / srog de nyid lus lags sam / srog kyang gzhan lags la lus kyang gzhan lags zhes dris so / gnas brtan gyis 'di ni lan mi gdags pa yin no zhes smras pa dang des smras pa / bdag gis snga nas btsun pa gzhan lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes dam 'char gsol ba ma lags sam / ci'i slad du 'di skad du 'di ni lan mi gdab pa yin no zhes gzhan kho na gsungs / gnas brtan gyis smras pa / rgyal po chen po rgyal po rnams ni smra ba mang ba lags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te gang dris pa de nyid lan 'debs na bdag kyang 'dri bar 'tshal lags so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pṛcchetyuktaḥ pṛṣṭavān /<br/> yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">drir gsol zhes smras pa dang khyod kyi slas la shing ljon pa aa mra 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de'i 'bras bu rnams ci skyur ram 'on te mngar lags zhes dris so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva mamāntaḥpure kaścidābhravṛkṣo 'stītyāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gi smras la shing ljon pa aa mra nyid 'ga' yang med do zhes smras so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti /<br/> kimidamanyadevoktamābhra eva nāstīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gis snga nas rgyal po chen po gzhan lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes dam 'char gsol ba ma lags sam / ci'i slad du 'di skad du shing ljon pa aa mra nyid med do zhes gzhan kho na gsungs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des smras pa / ji ltar na shing ljon pa med pa'i 'bras bu rnams skyur ba'am mngar ba nyid du lung bstan par bya
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti /<br/> kasmāt bhagavatā 'pi noktaṃ nāstyeveti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyal po chen po de bzhin du srog de nyid med na ci'i slad du 'di lus las gzhan pa nyid dam gzhan ma yin pa nyid du lung bstan par bgyi zhes bya ba lta bu'o / ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang med pa kho na'o zhes ma gsungs she na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā /<br/> sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt /<br/> pratotya samutpādasyājñānāt /<br/> sa cataddeśanāyā akṣamaḥ /<br/> itaścaitadevaṃ niścīyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos pa'i phyir te / des srog ces bya ba phung po'i rgyun gang yin pa de yang med par go bar gyur na log par lta bar ltung bar 'gyur te / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa'i phyir ro / de ni de bstan pa yang mi bzod do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat bhagavatoktam astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo kun du rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pas dri ba dris pa dag yod do zhes lung bstan na ni chos thams cad bdag med pas tshig ma legs pa ma yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti /<br/> astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya pareti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun dga' bo kun du rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pa'i dri ba dris pa bdag med do zhes lung bstan na ni kun tu rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pa'i snga nas kun du rmongs pa yod pa dag gis bdag sngon yod par gyur pa las da ni bdag gi de yang med do zhes kun du rmongs pa phyir zhing ches rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam / kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba ni rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paretīti vistaraḥ /<br/> āha cānna
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun dga' bo bdag med ces bya ba ni chad pa'i mthar 'gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di las kyang de bzhin du nges par zung shig / 'dir smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrāvabhadaṃ ca braṃśaṃ cāpekṣya karmaṇām /<br/> deśayanti jinā dharma vyāgrīpītāpahāravat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">lta ba'i mche bas smras pa dang / las rnams 'jig pa la ltos nas / stag mos phru gu khyer ba ltar / rgyal bas chos ni ston par mdzad
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmāstitvaṃ hyupagato bhinnaḥ syāddṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrayā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag yod nyid du khas blangs nas / lta ba'i mche bas smras par gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhraṃśaṃ kukśalapotasya kuryādaprāpya saṃvṛtimiti /<br/> punarāha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun rdzob rtog par ma gyur nas / dge ba phru gu nyams byed 'gyur / yang smras pa
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asattvādbhagavān jīvaṃ tattvānyatvena nāvadat /<br/> nāstītyapi ca nāvocanmābhūt prājñaptikopyasan
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">med phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srog / de nyid gzhan du ma gsungs so / brtags pa'ang med du 'gyur 'ong bas / med do zhes kyang ma gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yatra hi skandhasaṃtāne śubhāśubhaphalāstitā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phung po'i rgyu ni gang la dge / mi dge'i 'bras bu yod pa nyid
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la srog ces bya ste de / srog ming bstan pas med par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">prajñaptimātraṃ skandhesu jīva ityapināvadat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">srog ces bya ba phung po la / btags tsam zhes kyang ma gsungs te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ /<br/> tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de tshe'i skye bo de 'dra ste / stong nyid rtogs pa'i skal ldan min / 'di ltar gnas pas bdag yod dam / med ces dri ba 'dri ba yi
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsam pa la ltos ma gsungs te / yod na ci phyir yod mi gsungs
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāśvatalokādīnāmapyavayākaraṇaṃ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā /<br/> yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam /<br/> atha sarva eva saṃsāro lokastasyāpyayuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa yang 'dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos nas lung ma bstan te / re zhig gal te 'jig rten bdag yin bar 'dod par gyur na ni de med pa'i phyir lung ma bstan pa rnam pa bzhi char mi rigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'jig rten 'khor ba thams cad yin no zhe na ni de yang rigs pa ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /<br/> aśāśvate sarvepāmucchedaḥ prāpnuyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'jig rten rtag na 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro / mi rtag na ni thams cad chad par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na /<br/> anubhayathātve naiva parinirvāṇaṃ nāparinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnyi ga ltar yin na ni kha cig ni nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la kha cig ni mi 'gyur ro / gnyi ga ltar ma yin na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ma yin / yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yang ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni lam la rag lus pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi char yang nges par lung mi ston te / gcer bu pa'i nyan thos kyis byi'u bzung ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata evāntavān loka iti catuṣkāvyākaraṇam /<br/> tulyārtho hyeṣa catuṣkaḥ /<br/> tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasyeti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yang lung ma bstan te / bzhi tshan 'di ni don mthun no / 'di ltar kun du rgyu smra byed kyis bzhi tshan 'di zhus nas yang ci lags / 'jig rten thams cad lam 'di nges par 'byung ngam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthavira ānanda āha yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇeti sarvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te 'jig rten phyogs gcig lags zhes zhus pa dang gnas brtan kun dga' bos smra byed khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la dang po nyid du zhu ba zhus pa gang yin pa de nyid de rnam grangs gzhan gyis 'dri'am zhes smra'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin 'ongs pa shi phan chad yod dam zhes bya ba bzhi tshan 'di yang dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos nas lung ma bstan te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">des ni bdag grol ba de bzhin 'ongs pa yin par bsams nas zhu ba zhus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag pa rnams la brgal zhing brtag par bya ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir gang zag gson po ni yod do zhes lung ston la shi phan chad ni lung mi ston
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāśvata doṣaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rtag pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni ci'i phyir byams pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kasmācca śrāvakamabhyatītaṃ kālagatamupapattau vyākarotyamuko 'mutropapanna iti /<br/> evamapi hi śāśvatatvaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes nyan thos 'das pa dus 'das pa skye ba la lung ston / de lta yin na ni rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag sngar gzigs la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mi gzigs te / mi mkhyen pa'i phyir lung mi ston to zhe na ni / ston pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsal ba yin no / yang na ni de med do zhes khas blang bar bya dgos so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha paśyatyanucyamāno 'pyasāvasti śāśvataśceti siddhaṃ bhavati /<br/> arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti /<br/> evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te gzigs na ni ma gsungs bzhin du yang de yod pa dang rtag pa zhes bya bar grub pa yin no / 'on te gzigs sam mi gzigs zhes bya ba 'di yang brjod par mi bya ba yin na / de lta na ni 'o na bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa yin nam ma yin zhes bya ba 'di yang rim gyis mi brjod par gyis shig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zag ni yod pa nyid de / 'di ltar bden pa dang gnas par bdag gi bdag med do snyam pa ni lta ba'i gnas su gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astītyapi dṛṣṭisthānamuktam /<br/> tasmādajñāpakametat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yod do snyam pa yang lta ba'i gnas su gsungs te / de lta bas na 'di ni khungs su mi rung ngo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ubhayamapi tvetadantagrāhadṛṣṭi śāśvatocchedadṛṣṭisaṃgṛhītamityābhidharmikāḥ /<br/> tathaiva ca yuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">chos mngon ba ba rnams na re 'di gnyi ga yang mthar 'dzin pa yin te / rtag pa dang chad par lta bas bsdus pa dag yin no zhes zer ro / de kho na bzhin du rigs te gnas ma bu'i mdo las
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitīti vātsyasūtre vacanāt /<br/> yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati /<br/> nahi saṃsāra eṣa saṃsaratīti yuktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba mi rtag par 'gyur ro / kun dga' bo bdag med ces bya ba ni chad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / gal te yang gang zag med na 'khor ba 'di su'i yin / 'khor ba nyid 'khor bar rig pa ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">uktaṃ ca bhagavatā avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa can kun du rgyu ba rnams 'khor ro zhes gsungs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha pudgalaḥ kathaṃ saṃsarati /<br/> skandhāntaratyāgopādānāt /<br/> uktottara eṣa pakṣaḥ /<br/> yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate /<br/> yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvamiti /<br/> kasmānna vaktavyaṃ syāt /<br/> anyatvāt skandhānām /<br/> atha kiṃ pudgalaḥ /<br/> sa evāsau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang gang zag ji ltar 'khor phung po gzhan 'dor ba dang len pa'i phyir ro / phyogs 'di ni lan btab zin to / ji ltar me skad cig ma yin yang rgyun gyis dro ba de bzhin du sred pa nye bar len pa can sems can zhes bya ba phung po'i tshogs 'khor ro / gal te 'di phung po tsam yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na mig bzangs zhes / bya ba'i ston par gyur to zhes gsungs so / ci'i phyir gsung par mi 'gyur / phung po rnams gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">śāśvato hi syāt /<br/> tasmādahameva sa ityekasaṃtānatāṃ darśayati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ci de nyid gang zag yin na ni rtag par 'gyur ro / de lta bas na nga nyid de yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyud gcig pa nyid du ston par mdzad pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā sa evāgnirdahannāgata iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na me de nyid sreg cing 'ongs so zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ /<br/> paśyatāṃ cātmagrāho dṛḍhataraḥ syādātmasnehaśca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yang bdag de yod par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu gsal ba kho nar gzigs par 'gyur ro / gzigs na yang bdag tu 'dzin pa shin tu dam por 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatīti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta /<br/> saiṣā syātsatkāyadṛṣṭi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag yod na bdag gir yang 'gyur ro zhes mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir de dag phung po rnams la bdag gir 'dzin pa lhag bar 'byung bas de ni de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmīyadṛṣṭau ca satyāmātmīyasnehaḥ /<br/> evameṣāṃ dṛḍhatarātmātmīyasnehaparisāditavandhanānāṃ mokṣo dūratarībhavet /<br/> atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag gir lta ba yod na yang bdag gir chags par 'gyur te / de lta bas na bdag dang bdag gir chags pa'i 'ching ba shin tu dam pos glags pa de dag la thar pa thag ring bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te bdag la chags pa mi 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bya bar 'dod na / de ni bdag med pa la ni bdag tu rmongs pas chags pa skye'i bdag nyid la mi skye'o zhes bya ba de ga la rung ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na kha cig ni gang zag tu 'dzin kha cig ni thams cad med pa nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bstan pa 'di la skyon byung ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mu stegs byed gang dag bdag rdzas gzhan kho na yin par sems pa de dag gi ltar na yang thar pa med pa'i nyes pa 'di gyo ba med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gal te bdag rnam pa thams cad du med na sems skad cig ma rnams la nyams su myong nas ring mo zhig lon pa'i don ji ltar dran pa'am ngo shes par 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvayāccittaviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa'i yul la 'du shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems kyi khyad par las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kīdṛśāccittaviśeṣāt yato 'nantaraṃ smṛtirbhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyi khyad par ji lta bu las she na / gang gi mjug thogs su dran pa skye ba ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadābhogasadṛśasamvandhisaṃjñādimato 'nupahata prabhāvādāśrayaviśeṣaśokavyākṣepādibhiḥ /<br/> tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de dag la rtag pa dang 'dra ba dang 'brel ba can gyi 'du shes la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang rten gyi khyad par dang mya ngan dang rnam par gyengs pa la sogs pas mthu ma nyams pa can las so / de lta bu yin yang de'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i sems kyi khyad par gyis ni dran pa de bskyed par mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rgyu las byung ba yin yang gzhan lta bu ni dran pa de skyed par mi nus kyi gnyi ga ltar na nus pas de ltar na dran par 'gyur te / gzhan la ni de'i mthu ma mthong pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamidānīmanyena cetasā dṛṣṭamanyatsmarati /<br/> evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret /<br/> nāsambandhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">da ni ji ltar na sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran de ltar na ni lha sbyin gyis sems kyis mthong la mchod sbyin gyis sems kyis dran par 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma yin te 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro / de gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa'i phyir ji ltar na rgyud gcig la yod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba ni med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na ca brūmo 'nyena cetasā dṛṣṭamanyatsmaratīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran no zhes kyang mi zer ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api tu darśanacittātsmṛticittamanyadutpadyate /<br/> saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ /<br/> smaraṇādeva ca pratyabhijñānaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on kyang ji skad bshad pa ltar rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mthong pa'i sems la dran pa'i sems gzhan skye'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la nyes pa ci zhig yod / dran pa kho na las ngo shes pa yang yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asatyātmanika eṣa smarati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med na su zhig gis de ltar dran
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smaratīti ko 'rthaḥ /<br/> smṛtyā viṣayaṃ gṛhlāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran zhes bya ba'i don ci yin / dran pas yul 'dzin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kiṃ tadgrahaṇamanyatsmaraṇāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci de 'dzin pa dran pa las gzhan zhig yin nam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtiṃ tarhi kaḥ karoti /<br/> uktaḥ sa yastāṃ karoti smṛtihetucittaviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na ni dran pa byed pa yin no / gang gis de byed pa de ni bshad zin te / dran pa'i rgyu ni sems kyi khyad par yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattarhi caitraḥ smaratītyucyate /<br/> tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti /<br/> asatyātmani kasyevaṃ smṛtiḥ /<br/> kiṃarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhī /<br/> svāmyarthā /<br/> yathā kasya kaḥ svāmī /<br/> yathā goścaitraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'o na gang nag pas dran no zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na / nag pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud de las de skye bar mthong nas smra bar zad do / bdag med pa na dran pa 'di su'i yin / drug pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin / rje bo'i don yin no / dper na gang gi rje bo gang lta bu yin / dper na ba'i nag pa lta bu yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasau tasyāḥ svāmī /<br/> tadādhīno hi tasyā vāhadohādiṣu viniyogaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ji ltar de'i rje bo yin / de rmo ba dang bzho ba la sogs pa la sbyor ba de la rag lus pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate /<br/> smartavye 'rthe /<br/> kimartha viniyoktavyā /<br/> smaraṇārtham /<br/> aho sūktāni sukhaidhitānām /<br/> saiva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavyeti /<br/> kathaṃ ca viniyoktavyā /<br/> utpādanata ahosvitsaṃpreṣaṇataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa gang du sbyar bar bya na / 'di ltar de'i rje bo btsal / dran par bya ba'i don la'o / ci'i phyir sbyar bar bya / dran par bya ba'i phyir ro / kye ma de nyid de'i don du sbyor ro zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyis bskyed pa rnams kyis legs par smras so / ji ltar sbyar bar bya / ci de bskyed pa'i sgo nas sam / 'on te mngag pa'i sgo nas
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtigatyayogādutpādanataḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa la 'gro ba mi rung bas bskyed pa'i sgo nas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta na ni rgyu kho na la rje bo yin la 'bras bu kho na bran yin par 'gyur te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti /<br/> yo hyeva hetuḥ smṛtestasyaivāsau
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ltar rgyu ni 'bras bu la dbang byed la 'bras bu yang de dang ldan na rgyu yin pas de ni dran pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro nāmāsti na cāpi gauḥ /<br/> tasmāttatrāpi na hetubhāvaṃ vyatītyāsti svāmihbāvaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang nag pa zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi tshogs kyi rgyun la gcig tu bzung nas ba zhes bya ba'i rje bo brjod pa de yang de yul gzhan du dang 'gyur ba 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos po yid la bsams nas rje bo zhes brjod par zad kyi nag pa zhes bya ba gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med la ba zhes bya ba yang med do / de lta bas na de la yang rgyu'i dngos po ma gtogs pa'i rje bo'i dngos po med do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du su zhig gis rnam par shes / su'i rnam par shes pa yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasya heturindriyārthamanaskārā yathāyogamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rgyu ni ci rigs par dbang po dang don dang yid la byed pa dag yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang yang bya ba ni byed pa bo la ltos pa'i phyir te / bya ba thams cad ni byed pa po la ltos te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate /<br/> tathā vijñānaṃ bhāvaḥ /<br/> tasmādyo vijānāti tena bhavitavyamiti /<br/> sa vaktavyaḥ /<br/> ko 'yaṃ devadatta iti /<br/> yadyātmā sa eva sādhyaḥ /<br/> atha vyavahārapuruṣaḥ /<br/> so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di la 'gro bar bya ba ni 'gro ba po lhas byin la ltos pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni bya ba yin no / de lta bas na gang zhig gis rnam par shes pa de yang brjod dgos so zhes zer ba de la lhas byin zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhes brjod par bya'o / gal te bdag yin no zhe na / de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no / 'on te skyes bur tha snyad gdags pa yin no zhe na / de yang gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med kyi 'du byed de dag la yang ming de skad ces bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti /<br/> kathaṃ ca devadatto gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la ji ltar lhas byin 'gro pa de bzhin du rnam par shes so / lha sbyin ji ltar 'gro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti /<br/> sā ca deśāntaropattirgatirita /<br/> jvālāśabdasaṃtānayorgacchatigamanābhidhānavat /<br/> ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti /<br/> āryairapi teṣāṃ saṃjñayā tathocyante vyavahārārtham /<br/> yattarhi vijñānaṃ vijānātīti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti /<br/> na kiñcitkaroti /<br/> yathā tu kāryaṃ kāraṇamanuvidhīyata ityucyate /<br/> sādṛśyenātmalābhādakurvadapi kiñcit /<br/> evaṃ vijñānamapi vijānātītyucyate /<br/> sādṛśyenātmalābhādakurvadapi kiñcit /<br/> kiṃ punarasya sādṛśyam /<br/> tadākāratā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed skad cig pa rgyun tha mi dad pa rnams la byis pa rnams kyis gcig pa nyid du bzung nas lhas byin zhes mos pa rnams rang gi rgyun yul gzhan du 'byung ba la rgyur gyur na lhas byin 'gro'o zhes bya'o / yul gzhan du 'byung ba de ni 'gro ba yin te / me dang sgra'i rgyun dag la 'gro'o zhes brjod pa yin no / de dag nyid rnam par shes pa'i rgyur gyur na lhas byin gyis rnam par shes so zhes kyang bya'o / 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang tha snyad gdags pa'i don du de dag la ming du de skad ces gsungs so / 'o na gang mdo las rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pa de la rnam par shes pa ci zhig byed / cung zad kyang mi byed de / ji ltar 'bras bu ni cung zad kyang mi byed mod kyi 'dra bar bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir rgyu dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang cung zad kyang mi byed mod kyi 'dra bar bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir yul rnam par shes so zhes bya'o / 'di'i 'dra ba ci zhe na / de'i rnam pa nyid do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de nyid kyi phyir de ni dbang po las kyang skyes mod kyi yul rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i dbang po ni ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt /<br/> ghaṇṭā rautīti yadvat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ni der yang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun rnam par shes ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pas nyes pa med de / rgyu la byed pa po'i sgrar bstan pa'i phyir dril bu sgrogs so zhes bya ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti /<br/> kathaṃ ca pradīpo gacchati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gzhan yang ji ltar sgron ma 'gro ba ltar rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra'o / sgron ma ji ltar 'gro zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pradīpa ityarciṣāṃ saṃtāna upacaryate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sgron ma zhes bya ba ni me lce rnams kyi rgyun la nye bar 'dogs par byed la
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa deśāntareṣūtpadyamānastaṃ deśaṃ gacchatītyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de yul gzhan dag tu 'byung ba las yul de dang der 'gro'o zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ vijñānamapi cittānāṃ saṃtāna upacaryate /<br/> tadviṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sems rnams kyi rgyun la nye bar 'dogs par byed la de yul gzhan dag la skye ba la yul de dang de rnam par shes so zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang na ji ltar gzugs 'gyur ro / skye'o gnas so zhes bya ba 'di la 'gyur ba po dang 'gyur ba don gzhan ma yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa la de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa skye'i bdag las ma yin na ci'i phyir rtag tu de dag 'dra ba kho nar skye bar mi 'gyur zhing myu gu dang sdong po dang 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhin du rim pa nges par skye bar mi 'gyur zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthityanyathātvasya saṃskṛtlakṣaṇatvāt /<br/> eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te / rgyun gdon mi za bar gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam /<br/> kramo 'pi hi cittānāṃ niyata eva /<br/> yato nūtpattavyaṃ tata eva tasyotpādāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta ma yin na bsam gtan rdzogs pas mnyam par gzhag pa rnams las lus dang sems 'dra ba skye na skad cig ma dang po dang khyad par med pa'i phyir phyis kyang bdag nyid ldang bar mi 'gyur ro / gang las gang zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi rim pa yang nges pa kho na ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tulyākāramapi hi kiñcidutpādane samarthaṃ bhavati /<br/> gotraviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rigs kyi bye brag las sems rnam pa 'dra yang 'ga' zhig sems 'ga' bskyed pa la nus pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na bud med kyi mjug thogs su gsal te de'i lus sun 'byin pa'i sems sam / de'i khyo'am bu la sogs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur la / yang phyis rgyud yongs su 'gyur pas bud med kyi sems skye na de ni / de'i lus sun 'byin pa'i sems bskyed pa'am / de'i khyo 'am / bu la sogs pa'i sems bskyed par nus pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadgotratvāt /<br/> anyathā na samartham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i rigs can yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro / gzhan du ni mi nus so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate /<br/> tadbhāvanāyā valīyastvāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang bud med kyi sems las rnam grangs kyi sems rnam pa mang po zhig skyes par gyur na de las ches mang ba dang ches gsal ba dang ches nye bar skyes pa gang yin pa de kho na skye bar 'gyur te / de'i bsgos pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anyatra tatkālikātkāyabāhyapratyayaviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i 'dus pa'i lus dang phyi rol gyi rkyen gyi khyad par ni ma gtogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bsgos pa de nyid ches stobs dang ldan na ci'i phyir rtag tu 'bras bu mi 'byin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sthityanyathātvasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt tasya cānyathātvasyānyabhāvanāphalotpattāvānuguṇyāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur pa nyid ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir la / gzhan du 'gyur ba de yang bsgos pa gzhan gyi 'bras bu skye ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">etaddhi sarvacittaprakāreṣu diṅmātram /<br/> nirantarakāraṇajñāne tu buddhānāṃ prabhutvam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni sems kyi rnam pa thams cad la phyogs tsam du zad kyi mjug thogs kyi rgyu shes pa la ni sangs rgyas rnams mnga' bdag yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ hyāhuḥ /<br/> sarvākārakāraṇamekasya mayūracandrakasyāpi /<br/> nāsarvajñairjñeyaṃ sarvajñabalaṃ hi tajjñānamiti /<br/> prāgevārupiṇāṃ cittabhedānām
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di skad du rma bya'i mdongs ni gcig la yang / rgyu yi rnam pa thams cad ni / kun mkhyen min pas shes bya min / de shes kun mkhyen stobs yin no / zhes bshad na / gzugs can ma yin pa sems kyi bye brag rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ci'i phyir de dang 'dra ba kho nar skye bar mi 'gyur zhing myu gu dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhin du rim pa nges par skye bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mu stegs can gang la la sems ni bdag las skye'o snyam du sems pa de kho na la gsal bar klan kar 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvāditi cet /<br/> na /<br/> anyasaṃyogāsiddheḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te yid dang phrad pa'i bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te / 'brel pa gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'brel pa can dag yongs su chang pa'i phyir dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma phrad pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi phrad pa yin no zhes rnam par bshad pa'i phyir bdag yongs su chad par thal bar 'gyur ro / 
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tato manaḥsamcārādātmanaḥ saṃcāraprasaṅgo virāgasya vā /<br/> pradeśasaṃyoga iti cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de'i phyir yid 'phros pa la bdag 'pho ba'am / nyams par thal bar 'gyur ro / gal te phyogs gcig phrad do zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasyaiva tatpradeśatvāyogāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phyogs de de nyid kyi yin pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phrad pa yod du chug na yang 'on kyang yid rtag tu khyad par med pa la ji ltar phrad pa khyad par du 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">buddhiviśeṣāpekṣa iti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te blo'i khyad par la ltos pa yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar blo'i khyad par yin zhes de nyid la klan ka tshol bar byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣādātmamanaḥ saṃyogāditi cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te 'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i bdag dang yid phrad pa las so zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittādevāstu saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣatvāt /<br/> nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām /<br/> satyātmani tayoḥ saṃyoga iti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i sems kho na las yin par zad kyi bdag gis nus pa ni cung zad kyang mi dmigs te / sman gyi 'bras bu grub pa la sman pa ngan gyo can gyis phu sv'a h'a zhes smras pa dag bzhin no / gal te bdag yod na de gnyis srid do zhe na ni
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vāṅmātram /<br/> āśrayaḥ sa iti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshig tsam du zad do / gal te de ni rten yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā kaḥ kasyāśrayaḥ /<br/> na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ /<br/> pratighātiyutadoṣāt naiva sa evamāśrayaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ tarhi /<br/> yathā gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivīti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dper na gang gi rten gang yin pa lta bu de dag kyang ri mo dang rgya shug la sogs pa ltar brten pa ma yin la / de yang rtsig pa dang gzhong bu la sogs pa ltar rten du rigs pa ma yin te / thogs pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyis nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / gal te de ni de lta bur rten ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / dper na dri la sogs pa'i sa lta bu'o zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atiparitoṣitāḥ smaḥ /<br/> idameva hi naḥ pratyāyakaṃ nāstyātmeti /<br/> yathā na gandhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivīti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di nyid kho bo'i bdag med do zhes bya ba yid ches par byed pa yin pas kho bo yongs su tshim par byas te / dper na dri la sogs pa las sa gzhan ma yin pa bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati /<br/> vyapadeśastu pṛthivyā gandhādaya iti viśeṣaṇārtham /<br/> te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti /<br/> kāṣṭhapratimāyāṃ śarīravyapadeśavat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dri la sogs pa las sa gzhan yin par nges par 'dzin par byed pa de su zhig yin / sa'i dri la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni ci nas dri la sogs pa de dag nyid de zhes bya'i / gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">satyapi ca saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣatve kasmānna yugapatsarvajñānotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">shing gi gzugs kyi lus zhes bya ba bzhin no / 'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa yin du zin kyang ci'i phyir shes pa thams cad dus gcig tu skye bar mi 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi baliṣṭhastenānyeṣāṃ prativandhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig stobs che ba des gzhan dag la gegs byed do
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">stobs che ba de nyid ci'i phyir rtag par 'bras bu mi 'byin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo 'sya nyāyaḥ so 'stu bhāvanāyāḥ /<br/> ātmā tu nirarthakaḥ kalpyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di'i tshul gang yin pa de bsgos pa yin na bdag tu rtog pa ni don med pa yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">avaśyamātmābhyupagantavyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te bdag ni gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet /<br/> na
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dran pa la sogs pa ni yon tan gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir la de yang gdon mi za bar rdzas la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro / de dag gi rten gzhan yin par yang mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na hyeṣāṃ guṇapadārthatvaṃ siddham
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ma grub pa'i phyir ro / 'di dag ni yon tan gyi dngos po nyid yin par ma grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sarvameva no vidyamānaṃ dravya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kho bo cag gi ltar na yod pa thams cad ni rdzas yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ṣaṭ dravyāṇi śrāmaṇyaphalānīti vacanāt /<br/> nāpyeṣāṃ dravyāśritatvaṃ siddham /<br/> parīkṣito hyāśrayārthaḥ /<br/> tasmādyatkiñcideva tat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni rdzas drug go zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / de dag rdzas la brten pa nyid du yang ma grub ste / rten gyi don ni brtags zin to / de lta bas na 'di ni gyi na'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmanyasati kimarthaḥ karmārambhaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med na ci'i phyir las rtsom / bdag bde bar gyur cig
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ /<br/> ko 'sāvahaṃ nāma yadviṣayio 'yamahaṅkāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de'i phyir ro / yang bdag ces bya ba yang gang zhig yin / bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i yul gang yin pa'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skandhaviṣayaḥ /<br/> kathaṃ jñāyate /<br/> teṣu snehāt /<br/> gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāttu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i yul gang zhig yin / yul ni phung po yin no / ji ltar shes / de dag la chags pa'i phyir dang dkar sham la sogs pa'i blos gzhi mthun par byed pa'i phyir te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate /<br/> na cātmana ete prakārā dṛśyante /<br/> tasmādapi skandheṣvayamiti gamyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag dkar sham mo / bdag sngo bsangs so / bdag sbom mo / bdag skem mo / bdag rgas so / bdag dar la bab po zhes dkar sham la sogs pa'i blos bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di gzhi mthun par byed par snang ngo / rnam pa de dag bdag gi yin par ni mi 'dod de / de lta bas na 'di ni phung po rnams la 'dzin par shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ /<br/> sati śarīrālambanatve paraśarīrālamvano 'pi kasmānna bhavati /<br/> asaṃvandhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i lus la yang bdag nye bar 'dogs te / dper na bdag gang yin pa de nyid bdag gi bran 'di yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no phan 'dogs pa la bdag nye bar 'dogs pa yin yang bdag tu 'dzin pa ni ma yin no / lus la dmigs pa yin na ci'i phyir pha rol gyi lus la dmigs pa yang ma yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'brel ba med pa'i phyir te / 'di ni lus sam sems gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa de kho na la bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di 'byung gi gzhan la ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">anādau saṃsārra evamabhyāsāt /<br/> kaśca saṃbandhaḥ /<br/> kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /<br/> yadyātmā nāsti kasyāyamahaṅkāraḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'khor ba thog ma med pa nas de ltar goms pa'i phyir ro / 'brel pa yang gang zhig yin / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i 'bras bu yin no / gal te bdag med pa na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni su'i yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">idaṃ punastadeāyātaṃ kimarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhīti /<br/> yāvadya evāsya hetustasyaivāyamiti /<br/> kaścānyo hetuḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'di ni drug pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba nas de ni dran pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i bar de nyid 'ongs pa yin no / 'di'i rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">pūrvāhaṅkāraparibhāvitaṃ svasaṃtativiṣayaṃ sāvadyaṃ cittam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sngon bdag tu 'dzin pas yongs su bsgos pa rang gi rgyud kyi yul can ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med na bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba su zhig yin
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yasminnāśraye sukhamutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā /<br/> yathā puṣpito vṛkṣaḥ phalitaṃ vanamiti /<br/> kaḥ punaranayorāśrayaḥ /<br/> ṣaḍāyatanam /<br/> yathā kṛtvā tathoktam /<br/> asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati /<br/> karteti ka eṣa vāhyarthaḥ /<br/> karotīti kartā /<br/> bhuṅkta iti bhoktā /<br/> paryāya ucyate nārthaḥ /<br/> svatantraḥ karteti kartṛ lakṣaṇamācakṣate lākṣaṇikāḥ /<br/> asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rten gang bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'byung ba ste / dper na shing ljon ba me tog chags so / nags tshal 'bras bu chags so zhes bya ba lta bu'o / 'di gnyis kyi rten gang zhe na / skye mched drug yin te / ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to / bdag med na las rnams kyi byed pa po ni gang yin / 'bras bu rnams kyi zab po gang yin / byed pa po zhes bya ba'am / za ba bo zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ji lta bu byed pas na byed pa po yin la / za bas na zab po yin no / rnam grangs smras su zin gyi don ni ma yin no / mtshan nyid rnams ni byed pa po'i mtshan nyid rang dbang can ni byed pa po yin no zhes zer na / 'jig rten na 'bras bu 'ga' la yang la la zhig rang dbang yod pa lta bu mthong ngam
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">loke dṛṣṭaṃ devadattasya snānāsanagamanādau /<br/> kaḥ punarbhavān devadattamudāharati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthong ste khrus dang zab dang 'gro ba la sogs pa la lhas byin lta bu'o / khyod lhas byin gang zhig dper brjod
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadyātmānaṃ sa eva sādhyaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te bdag yin no zhe na ni de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha pañcaskandhakaṃ sa ev kartā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'on te phung po lnga yin no zhe na ni de nyid byed pa po yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trividhaṃ cedaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanaskarma
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las 'di ni rnam pa gsum ste / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la re zhig lus dang ngag gi las la sems kyi gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam /<br/> pratyayaparatantrā hi sarve bhāvāḥ pravartante
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sems kyang lus dang ngag la rang gi rgyu'i gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go / de yang de dang 'dra bas gang la yang rang dbang med de / dngos po thams cad ni rkyen gyi gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmano 'pi ca nirapekṣasyākāraṇatvābhyupagamātra svātantryaṃ sidhyati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag kyang ltos pa med par rgyu nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir ro / rang dbang can du mi 'grub bo
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tasmānnaivaṃlakṣaṇam upalabhyate kaścitkartā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa po ni 'ga' yang mi dmigs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate /<br/> na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate /<br/> tasmātsa evamapi na kartā yujyate /<br/> smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang zhig gang gi rgyu'i gtso bo yin ba de ni de'i byed pa po zhes bya na bdag ni gang la yang rgyu yin par mi snang ste / de lta bas na de ni de lta bur yang byed pa por mi rung ngo / dran pa las ni 'dun pa skye'o / 'dun pa las ni rtog pa skye'o / rnam par rtog pa las ni rab tu 'bad pa'o / rab tu 'bad pa las ni rlung ngo / de las ni las 'byung na 'di la bdag ci zhig byed
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate /<br/> upalabhiriti cet
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">'bras bu la yang gang la bdag med na za ba bor brtags pa'i nye bar spyod pa de gang zhig yin / gal te dmigs pa yin no zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nātmanaḥ upalabdhau sāmarthyaṃ vijñāne pratipedhāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">dmigs pa la bdag gi nus pa med de / rnam par shes pa la nus pa bkag pa'i phyir ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">asatyātmani kasmādasattvādhiṣṭhānaḥ pāpapuṇyopacayo na bhavati
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag med na ci'i phyir sems can gyi rten ma yin pa la yang sdig pa dang bsod nams nye bar stsogs par mi 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tshor ba'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir te / de'i rten ni skye mched drug yin gyi bdag ma yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">kathamasatyātmani venaṣṭātkarmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to / bdag med na ji ltar na las zhig zin pa las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">bdag yod na yang ji ltar na las zhi zhig zin pa las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tadāśritāddharmādharmāt /<br/> yathā kaḥkimāśrita ityuktottaraiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /<br/> tasmādanāśritādeva dharmādharmāt bhavatu
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la brten pa'i chos dang chos ma yin pa las 'byung ngo / tshig gi lugs 'di ni dper na gang gi rten gang yin pa lta bu zhes lan btab zin to
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādvījaphalavat /<br/> yathā vījātphalamutpadyata ityucyate /<br/> na ca tadvinaṣṭādvījādutpadyate /<br/> nāpyanantarameva /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de lta bas na chos dang chos ma yin pa rten med pa kho na las 'byung ngo / kho bo cag kyang las zhig zin ba la tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung bar mi smra'o / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / de'i rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las te / sa bon dang 'bras bu bzhin no / dper na sa bon las 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni zhig pa las 'byung ba yang ma yin la mjug thogs kho nar 'byung ba yang ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādikramaniṣpannāt puṣpāvasānāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las te / myu gu dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa me tog la thug pa rim pa rdzogs pa las 'byung ba bzhin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate /<br/> tadāhitaṃ hi tat parayāpuṣpe sāmarthyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ni me tog las grub pa yin na ci'i phyir sa bon de'i 'bras bu zhes bya zhe na / des brgyud pas me tog la de'i nus pa bskyed pas so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gal te sa bon de sngon du 'gro bar ma gyur na 'bras bu de 'dra ba skyed pa la de'i nus pa yod par mi 'gyur ro
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalamutpadyata ityucyate /<br/> na ca tadviniṣṭātkarmaṇa utpadyate nāpyanantarameva /<br/> kiṃ tarhi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du las las 'bras bu 'byung ngo / zhes bya ba de yang las zhig pa las kyang mi 'byung la / mjug thogs su yang ma yin no / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣāt /<br/> kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /<br/> yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las so / rgyud ni ci yin / yongs su 'gyur ba ni ci yin / khyad par ni ci yin zhe na / las sngon du 'gro ba'i sems phyir zhing 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgyud yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sa punartho 'ntaraṃ phalotpādanasamarthaḥ so 'ntapariṇāmaviśiṣṭatvāt pariṇamaviśeṣaḥ /<br/> tadyāthā sopādānaṃ maraṇacittaṃ punarbhavasya
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de gzhan dang gzhan du skye ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba yin no / de'i mjug thogs su 'bras bu skyed nus pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su 'gyur ba gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par yin te / dper na yang srid pa'i nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'chi ba'i sems lta bu'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya /<br/> āha ca
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">las rnam pa sna tshogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid yin yang las gang lci ba'am / nye ba 'am / goms pa yin pa des byas pa'i nus pa bsal bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /<br/> pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vīpacyate karmasaṃsāre
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji skad du / las kyi 'khor ba lci gang dang nye ba gang dang goms pa gang / sngon byas gang yin de las ni / snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">zhes bshad pa lta bu'o / de la rnam par smin pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa ni rnam par smin pa bskyed nas ldog go
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">sabhāgahetvāhitaṃ tu niṣyandaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ kliṣṭānāṃ pratipakṣodayādvinivartate /<br/> akliṣṭānāṃ cittasaṃtānātyantavinivṛtteryadā parinirvāti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa ni nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi ni gnyen po skyes nas ldog go / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa rnams kyi ni sems kyi rgyun gtan du log pa ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">atha kasmādvipākādvipākāntaraṃ notpadyate vījaphalādiva phalāntaram
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'o / yang ci'i phyir sa bon gyi 'bras bu bzhin du rnam par smin pa gzhan mi skye na
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati /<br/> tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate /<br/> kiṃ tarhi /<br/> viklittiviśeṣajādvikāraviśeṣāt
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">re zhig thams cad dpe dang 'dra ba ni ma yin no / de la yang 'bras bu kho na las 'bras bu gzhan skye ba ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / rnam par 'drul ba'i khyad par las skyes pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par las skye ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ /<br/> bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de la 'byung ba'i rnam pa myu gu 'grub par byed pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sa bon yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no / 'gyur ba'i ming gis sam / 'dra ba'i phyir rgyun snga ma yang sa bon zhes bya'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat /<br/> athavā punaretadevaṃ vijñātavyam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de bzhin du 'di la yang rnam par smin pa de las gal te dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos nyan ba la sogs pa'i rkyen las skyes pa dge ba zag ba dang bcas pa 'am / mi dge ba'i sems kyi 'gyur ba skye na de las ni rnam par smin pa gzhan skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin pas 'di ni mtshungs so / yang na de ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ji star ma du lung ga'i me tog rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba las 'bras bu'i nang du rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las skyes pa ge sar dmar po skye bar 'gyur zhing de las ni gzhan mi skye ba de bzhin du las las skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa las yang rnam par smin pa gzhan mi skye'o
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yathāsthūlamidamasmadbuddhigamyaṃ darśitam
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">che long tsam 'di ni bdag gi blos rtogs par bya ba rab tu bstan pa yin te
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ /<br/> āha khalvapi
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">mthu rnam pa sna tshogs pas tha dad pa'i las rnams kyis bsgos pa'i rgyu rnams gnas skabs 'dir phyir na 'bras bu 'di lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kho na'i yul yin no
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">karma tadbhāvanāṃ tasyā vṛttilābhaṃ tataḥ phalam /<br/> niyamena prajānāti buddhādanyio na sarvathā
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">yang smras pa / las dang de'i bsgos de'i 'jug rnyed / de las 'bras bu sangs rgyas las / gzhan gyi rnam pa thams cad ni / nges par rab tu mi shes so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">ityetāṃ suvihitahetumārgaśuddhāṃ /<br/> buddhānāṃ pravacanadharmatāṃ niśamya /<br/> andhānāṃ vividhakudṛṣṭiceṣṭitānāṃ /<br/> tīrthyānāṃ matamapavidhya yāntyanandhāḥ /<br/> imaṃ hi nirvāṇapuraikavartinīṃ /<br/> tathāgatādityavacoṃ 'śubhāsvatīm /<br/> nirātmatāmāryasahasravāhitāṃ /<br/> na mandacakṣurvivṛtāmapīkṣate /<br/> iti diṅmātramevedamupadiṣṭaṃ sumedhasām /<br/> braṇadeśoviṣasyeva svasāmarthyavisarpaṇa iti /<br/> pudgalakośamabhidharmakośabhāṣyaṃ samāptamiti /<br/> kṛtiriyamācāryavasubandhupādānāmiti /<br/> ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /<br/> teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ
</td><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung rab rigs pa'i lam / legs par gsungs pa'i dag pa chos nyid 'di mthong nas / mu stegs long ba ltas ngan sna tshogs gyo rnams kyi / gzhung lugs spangs te long ba ma yin rnams 'gro'o / de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gsung 'od kyis / snang ldan mya ngan 'das grong lam gcig pa / bdag med 'phags pa stong gis bgrod pa 'di / phye yang dman pa'i mig gis mi mthong ngo / de ltar 'di ni phyogs tsam zhig / rang gi mthu yis rnam 'phel ba'i / dug la rma yi phyogs bzhin du / shin tu mkhas pa rnams la bstan / chos mngon pa'i mdzod las gang zag dgag pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas dgu pa ste / chos mngon ba'i mdzod kyi bshad ba slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so
</td></tr><tr><td style="word-wrap: break-word" valign="top" width="50%">
</td></table></html>
